Shtcherbatskys/O,/O he/O realized/O which/O of/O the/O three/O sisters/O he/O was/O indeed/O
destined/O to/O love/O./O

One/O would/O have/O thought/O that/O nothing/O could/O be/O simpler/O than/O for/O him/O,/O a/O man/O
of/O good/O family/O,/O rather/O rich/O than/O poor/O,/O and/O thirty-two/O years/O old/O,/O to/O make/O
the/O young/O Princess/O Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON an/O offer/O of/O marriage/O;/O in/O all/O
likelihood/O he/O would/O at/O once/O have/O been/O looked/O upon/O as/O a/O good/O match/O./O But/O
Levin/PERSON was/O in/O love/O,/O and/O so/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O Kitty/PERSON was/O so/O perfect/O in/O
every/O respect/O that/O she/O was/O a/O creature/O far/O above/O everything/O earthly/O;/O and/O
that/O he/O was/O a/O creature/O so/O low/O and/O so/O earthly/O that/O it/O could/O not/O even/O be/O
conceived/O that/O other/O people/O and/O she/O herself/O could/O regard/O him/O as/O worthy/O
of/O her/O./O

After/O spending/O two/O months/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION in/O a/O state/O of/O enchantment/O,/O seeing/O
Kitty/PERSON almost/O every/O day/O in/O society/O,/O into/O which/O he/O went/O so/O as/O to/O meet/O her/O,/O
he/O abruptly/O decided/O that/O it/O could/O not/O be/O,/O and/O went/O back/O to/O the/O country/O./O

Levin/PERSON's/O conviction/O that/O it/O could/O not/O be/O was/O founded/O on/O the/O idea/O that/O in/O
the/O eyes/O of/O her/O family/O he/O was/O a/O disadvantageous/O and/O worthless/O match/O for/O
the/O charming/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O that/O Kitty/PERSON herself/O could/O not/O love/O him/O./O In/O her/O
family/O's/O eyes/O he/O had/O no/O ordinary/O,/O definite/O career/O and/O position/O in/O
society/O,/O while/O his/O contemporaries/O by/O this/O time/O,/O when/O he/O was/O thirty-two/O,/O
were/O already/O,/O one/O a/O colonel/O,/O and/O another/O a/O professor/O,/O another/O director/O
of/O a/O bank/O and/O railways/O,/O or/O president/O of/O a/O board/O like/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O But/O he/O
-LRB-/Ohe/O knew/O very/O well/O how/O he/O must/O appear/O to/O others/O-RRB-/O was/O a/O country/O
gentleman/O,/O occupied/O in/O breeding/O cattle/O,/O shooting/O game/O,/O and/O building/O
barns/O;/O in/O other/O words/O,/O a/O fellow/O of/O no/O ability/O,/O who/O had/O not/O turned/O out/O
well/O,/O and/O who/O was/O doing/O just/O what/O,/O according/O to/O the/O ideas/O of/O the/O world/O,/O
is/O done/O by/O people/O fit/O for/O nothing/O else/O./O

The/O mysterious/O,/O enchanting/O Kitty/PERSON herself/O could/O not/O love/O such/O an/O ugly/O
person/O as/O he/O conceived/O himself/O to/O be/O,/O and/O,/O above/O all/O,/O such/O an/O ordinary/O,/O
in/O no/O way/O striking/O person/O./O Moreover/O,/O his/O attitude/O to/O Kitty/PERSON in/O the/O
past/O--/Othe/O attitude/O of/O a/O grown-up/O person/O to/O a/O child/O,/O arising/O from/O his/O
friendship/O with/O her/O brother/O--/Oseemed/O to/O him/O yet/O another/O obstacle/O to/O love/O./O
An/O ugly/O,/O good-natured/O man/O,/O as/O he/O considered/O himself/O,/O might/O,/O he/O supposed/O,/O
be/O liked/O as/O a/O friend/O;/O but/O to/O be/O loved/O with/O such/O a/O love/O as/O that/O with/O
which/O he/O loved/O Kitty/PERSON,/O one/O would/O need/O to/O be/O a/O handsome/O and/O,/O still/O more/O,/O a/O
distinguished/O man/O./O

He/O had/O heard/O that/O women/O often/O did/O care/O for/O ugly/O and/O ordinary/O men/O,/O but/O he/O
did/O not/O believe/O it/O,/O for/O he/O judged/O by/O himself/O,/O and/O he/O could/O not/O himself/O
have/O loved/O any/O but/O beautiful/O,/O mysterious/O,/O and/O exceptional/O women/O./O

But/O after/O spending/O two/O months/O alone/O in/O the/O country/O,/O he/O was/O convinced/O
that/O this/O was/O not/O one/O of/O those/O passions/O of/O which/O he/O had/O had/O experience/O
in/O his/O early/O youth/O;/O that/O this/O feeling/O gave/O him/O not/O an/O instant/O's/O rest/O;/O
that/O he/O could/O not/O live/O without/O deciding/O the/O question/O,/O would/O she/O or/O would/O
she/O not/O be/O his/O wife/O,/O and/O that/O his/O despair/O had/O arisen/O only/O from/O his/O own/O
imaginings/O,/O that/O he/O had/O no/O sort/O of/O proof/O that/O he/O would/O be/O rejected/O./O And/O
he/O had/O now/O come/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION with/O a/O firm/O determination/O to/O make/O an/O offer/O,/O
and/O get/O married/O if/O he/O were/O accepted/O./O Or/O .../O he/O could/O not/O conceive/O what/O
would/O become/O of/O him/O if/O he/O were/O rejected/O./O



Chapter/O 7/O


On/O arriving/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION by/O a/O morning/O train/O,/O Levin/PERSON had/O put/O up/O at/O the/O house/O
of/O his/O elder/O half-brother/O,/O Koznishev/PERSON./O After/O changing/O his/O clothes/O he/O went/O
down/O to/O his/O brother/O's/O study/O,/O intending/O to/O talk/O to/O him/O at/O once/O about/O the/O
object/O of/O his/O visit/O,/O and/O to/O ask/O his/O advice/O;/O but/O his/O brother/O was/O not/O
alone/O./O With/O him/O there/O was/O a/O well-known/O professor/O of/O philosophy/O,/O who/O had/O
come/O from/O Harkov/PERSON expressly/O to/O clear/O up/O a/O difference/O that/O had/O arisen/O
between/O them/O on/O a/O very/O important/O philosophical/O question/O./O The/O professor/O
was/O carrying/O on/O a/O hot/O crusade/O against/O materialists/O./O Sergey/PERSON Koznishev/PERSON had/O
been/O following/O this/O crusade/O with/O interest/O,/O and/O after/O reading/O the/O
professor/O's/O last/O article/O,/O he/O had/O written/O him/O a/O letter/O stating/O his/O
objections/O./O He/O accused/O the/O professor/O of/O making/O too/O great/O concessions/O to/O
the/O materialists/O./O And/O the/O professor/O had/O promptly/O appeared/O to/O argue/O the/O
matter/O out/O./O The/O point/O in/O discussion/O was/O the/O question/O then/O in/O vogue/O:/O Is/O
there/O a/O line/O to/O be/O drawn/O between/O psychological/O and/O physiological/O
phenomena/O in/O man/O?/O and/O if/O so/O,/O where/O?/O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON met/O his/O brother/O with/O the/O smile/O of/O chilly/O friendliness/O
he/O always/O had/O for/O everyone/O,/O and/O introducing/O him/O to/O the/O professor/O,/O went/O
on/O with/O the/O conversation/O./O

A/O little/O man/O in/O spectacles/O,/O with/O a/O narrow/O forehead/O,/O tore/O himself/O from/O
the/O discussion/O for/O an/O instant/O to/O greet/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O then/O went/O on/O talking/O
without/O paying/O any/O further/O attention/O to/O him/O./O Levin/PERSON sat/O down/O to/O wait/O till/O
the/O professor/O should/O go/O,/O but/O he/O soon/O began/O to/O get/O interested/O in/O the/O
subject/O under/O discussion/O./O

Levin/PERSON had/O come/O across/O the/O magazine/O articles/O about/O which/O they/O were/O
disputing/O,/O and/O had/O read/O them/O,/O interested/O in/O them/O as/O a/O development/O of/O the/O
first/O principles/O of/O science/O,/O familiar/O to/O him/O as/O a/O natural/O science/O
student/O at/O the/O university/O./O But/O he/O had/O never/O connected/O these/O scientific/O
deductions/O as/O to/O the/O origin/O of/O man/O as/O an/O animal/O,/O as/O to/O reflex/O action/O,/O
biology/O,/O and/O sociology/O,/O with/O those/O questions/O as/O to/O the/O meaning/O of/O life/O
and/O death/O to/O himself/O,/O which/O had/O of/O late/O been/O more/O and/O more/O often/O in/O his/O
mind/O./O

As/O he/O listened/O to/O his/O brother/O's/O argument/O with/O the/O professor/O,/O he/O noticed/O
that/O they/O connected/O these/O scientific/O questions/O with/O those/O spiritual/O
problems/O,/O that/O at/O times/O they/O almost/O touched/O on/O the/O latter/O;/O but/O every/O
time/O they/O were/O close/O upon/O what/O seemed/O to/O him/O the/O chief/O point/O,/O they/O
promptly/O beat/O a/O hasty/O retreat/O,/O and/O plunged/O again/O into/O a/O sea/O of/O subtle/O
distinctions/O,/O reservations/O,/O quotations/O,/O allusions/O,/O and/O appeals/O to/O
authorities/O,/O and/O it/O was/O with/O difficulty/O that/O he/O understood/O what/O they/O
were/O talking/O about/O./O

``/OI/O can/Onot/O admit/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O with/O his/O habitual/O
clearness/O,/O precision/O of/O expression/O,/O and/O elegance/O of/O phrase/O./O ``/OI/O can/Onot/O in/O
any/O case/O agree/O with/O Keiss/PERSON that/O my/O whole/O conception/O of/O the/O external/O world/O
has/O been/O derived/O from/O perceptions/O./O The/O most/O fundamental/O idea/O,/O the/O idea/O
of/O existence/O,/O has/O not/O been/O received/O by/O me/O through/O sensation/O;/O indeed/O,/O
there/O is/O no/O special/O sense-organ/O for/O the/O transmission/O of/O such/O an/O idea/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O they/O--/OWurt/PERSON,/O and/O Knaust/PERSON,/O and/O Pripasov/PERSON--/Owould/O answer/O that/O your/O
consciousness/O of/O existence/O is/O derived/O from/O the/O conjunction/O of/O all/O your/O
sensations/O,/O that/O that/O consciousness/O of/O existence/O is/O the/O result/O of/O your/O
sensations/O./O Wurt/O,/O indeed/O,/O says/O plainly/O that/O,/O assuming/O there/O are/O no/O
sensations/O,/O it/O follows/O that/O there/O is/O no/O idea/O of/O existence/O./O''/O

``/OI/O maintain/O the/O contrary/O,/O''/O began/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

But/O here/O it/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON that/O just/O as/O they/O were/O close/O upon/O the/O real/O
point/O of/O the/O matter/O,/O they/O were/O again/O retreating/O,/O and/O he/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O
to/O put/O a/O question/O to/O the/O professor/O./O

``/OAccording/O to/O that/O,/O if/O my/O senses/O are/O annihilated/O,/O if/O my/O body/O is/O dead/O,/O I/O
can/O have/O no/O existence/O of/O any/O sort/O?/O''/O he/O queried/O./O

The/O professor/O,/O in/O annoyance/O,/O and/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O mental/O suffering/O at/O the/O
interruption/O,/O looked/O round/O at/O the/O strange/O inquirer/O,/O more/O like/O a/O bargeman/O
than/O a/O philosopher/O,/O and/O turned/O his/O eyes/O upon/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O as/O
though/O to/O ask/O:/O What/O's/O one/O to/O say/O to/O him/O?/O But/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O who/O had/O
been/O talking/O with/O far/O less/O heat/O and/O one-sidedness/O than/O the/O professor/O,/O
and/O who/O had/O sufficient/O breadth/O of/O mind/O to/O answer/O the/O professor/O,/O and/O at/O
the/O same/O time/O to/O comprehend/O the/O simple/O and/O natural/O point/O of/O view/O from/O
which/O the/O question/O was/O put/O,/O smiled/O and/O said/O:/O

``/OThat/O question/O we/O have/O no/O right/O to/O answer/O as/O yet/O./O''/O

``/OWe/O have/O not/O the/O requisite/O data/O,/O''/O chimed/O in/O the/O professor/O,/O and/O he/O went/O
back/O to/O his/O argument/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O''/O he/O said/O;/O ``/OI/O would/O point/O out/O the/O fact/O that/O
if/O,/O as/O Pripasov/PERSON directly/O asserts/O,/O perception/O is/O based/O on/O sensation/O,/O then/O
we/O are/O bound/O to/O distinguish/O sharply/O between/O these/O two/O conceptions/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON listened/O no/O more/O,/O and/O simply/O waited/O for/O the/O professor/O to/O go/O./O



Chapter/O 8/O


When/O the/O professor/O had/O gone/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON turned/O to/O his/O brother/O./O

``/ODelighted/O that/O you/O've/O come/O./O For/O some/O time/O,/O is/O it/O?/O How/O's/O your/O farming/O
getting/O on/O?/O''/O

Levin/PERSON knew/O that/O his/O elder/O brother/O took/O little/O interest/O in/O farming/O,/O and/O
only/O put/O the/O question/O in/O deference/O to/O him/O,/O and/O so/O he/O only/O told/O him/O about/O
the/O sale/O of/O his/O wheat/O and/O money/O matters/O./O

Levin/PERSON had/O meant/O to/O tell/O his/O brother/O of/O his/O determination/O to/O get/O married/O,/O
and/O to/O ask/O his/O advice/O;/O he/O had/O indeed/O firmly/O resolved/O to/O do/O so/O./O But/O after/O
seeing/O his/O brother/O,/O listening/O to/O his/O conversation/O with/O the/O professor/O,/O
hearing/O afterwards/O the/O unconsciously/O patronizing/O tone/O in/O which/O his/O
brother/O questioned/O him/O about/O agricultural/O matters/O -LRB-/Otheir/O mother/O's/O
property/O had/O not/O been/O divided/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON took/O charge/O of/O both/O their/O
shares/O-RRB-/O,/O Levin/PERSON felt/O that/O he/O could/O not/O for/O some/O reason/O begin/O to/O talk/O to/O
him/O of/O his/O intention/O of/O marrying/O./O He/O felt/O that/O his/O brother/O would/O not/O
look/O at/O it/O as/O he/O would/O have/O wished/O him/O to/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O is/O your/O district/O council/O doing/O?/O''/O asked/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O who/O
was/O greatly/O interested/O in/O these/O local/O boards/O and/O attached/O great/O
importance/O to/O them/O./O

``/OI/O really/O do/On't/O know/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O!/O Why/O,/O surely/O you/O're/O a/O member/O of/O the/O board/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O a/O member/O now/O;/O I/O've/O resigned/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Oand/O I/O no/O
longer/O attend/O the/O meetings/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O a/O pity/O!/O''/O commented/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O frowning/O./O

Levin/PERSON in/O self-defense/O began/O to/O describe/O what/O took/O place/O in/O the/O meetings/O
in/O his/O district/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O how/O it/O always/O is/O!/O''/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON interrupted/O him/O./O ``/OWe/O
Russians/O are/O always/O like/O that/O./O Perhaps/O it/O's/O our/O strong/O point/O,/O really/O,/O
the/O faculty/O of/O seeing/O our/O own/O shortcomings/O;/O but/O we/O overdo/O it/O,/O we/O comfort/O
ourselves/O with/O irony/O which/O we/O always/O have/O on/O the/O tip/O of/O our/O tongues/O./O All/O
I/O say/O is/O,/O give/O such/O rights/O as/O our/O local/O self-government/O to/O any/O other/O
European/O people/O--/Owhy/O,/O the/O Germans/O or/O the/O English/O would/O have/O worked/O their/O
way/O to/O freedom/O from/O them/O,/O while/O we/O simply/O turn/O them/O into/O ridicule/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O how/O can/O it/O be/O helped/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON penitently/O./O ``/OIt/O was/O my/O last/O
effort/O./O And/O I/O did/O try/O with/O all/O my/O soul/O./O I/O ca/On't/O./O I/O'm/O no/O good/O at/O it/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O that/O you/O're/O no/O good/O at/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON;/O ``/Oit/O is/O
that/O you/O do/On't/O look/O at/O it/O as/O you/O should/O./O''/O

``/OPerhaps/O not/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON answered/O dejectedly/O./O

``/OOh/O!/O do/O you/O know/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON's/O turned/O up/O again/O?/O''/O

This/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON was/O the/O elder/O brother/O of/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O and/O
half-brother/O of/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON;/O a/O man/O utterly/O ruined/O,/O who/O had/O
dissipated/O the/O greater/O part/O of/O his/O fortune/O,/O was/O living/O in/O the/O strangest/O
and/O lowest/O company/O,/O and/O had/O quarreled/O with/O his/O brothers/O./O

``/OWhat/O did/O you/O say/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON cried/O with/O horror/O./O ``/OHow/O do/O you/O know/O?/O''/O

``/OProkofy/PERSON saw/O him/O in/O the/O street/O./O''/O

``/OHere/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION?/O Where/O is/O he/O?/O Do/O you/O know/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON got/O up/O from/O his/O chair/O,/O
as/O though/O on/O the/O point/O of/O starting/O off/O at/O once/O./O

``/OI/O am/O sorry/O I/O told/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O shaking/O his/O head/O at/O his/O
younger/O brother/O's/O excitement/O./O ``/OI/O sent/O to/O find/O out/O where/O he/O is/O living/O,/O
and/O sent/O him/O his/O IOU/O to/O Trubin/PERSON,/O which/O I/O paid/O./O This/O is/O the/O answer/O he/O sent/O
me/O./O''/O

And/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON took/O a/O note/O from/O under/O a/O paper-weight/O and/O handed/O
it/O to/O his/O brother/O./O

Levin/PERSON read/O in/O the/O queer/O,/O familiar/O handwriting/O:/O ``/OI/O humbly/O beg/O you/O to/O
leave/O me/O in/O peace/O./O That/O's/O the/O only/O favor/O I/O ask/O of/O my/O gracious/O
brothers/O./O--/ONikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON./O''/O

Levin/PERSON read/O it/O,/O and/O without/O raising/O his/O head/O stood/O with/O the/O note/O in/O his/O
hands/O opposite/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

There/O was/O a/O struggle/O in/O his/O heart/O between/O the/O desire/O to/O forget/O his/O
unhappy/O brother/O for/O the/O time/O,/O and/O the/O consciousness/O that/O it/O would/O be/O
base/O to/O do/O so/O./O

``/OHe/O obviously/O wants/O to/O offend/O me/O,/O''/O pursued/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON;/O ``/Obut/O he/O
can/Onot/O offend/O me/O,/O and/O I/O should/O have/O wished/O with/O all/O my/O heart/O to/O assist/O
him/O,/O but/O I/O know/O it/O's/O impossible/O to/O do/O that/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O''/O repeated/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OI/O understand/O and/O appreciate/O your/O attitude/O
to/O him/O;/O but/O I/O shall/O go/O and/O see/O him/O./O''/O

``/OIf/O you/O want/O to/O,/O do/O;/O but/O I/O should/On't/O advise/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O
``/OAs/O regards/O myself/O,/O I/O have/O no/O fear/O of/O your/O doing/O so/O;/O he/O will/O not/O make/O
you/O quarrel/O with/O me/O;/O but/O for/O your/O own/O sake/O,/O I/O should/O say/O you/O would/O do/O
better/O not/O to/O go/O./O You/O ca/On't/O do/O him/O any/O good/O;/O still/O,/O do/O as/O you/O please/O./O''/O

``/OVery/O likely/O I/O ca/On't/O do/O any/O good/O,/O but/O I/O feel/O--/Oespecially/O at/O such/O a/O
moment/O--/Obut/O that/O's/O another/O thing/O--/OI/O feel/O I/O could/O not/O be/O at/O peace/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O that/O I/O do/On't/O understand/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O ``/OOne/O thing/O I/O do/O
understand/O,/O''/O he/O added/O;/O ``/Oit/O's/O a/O lesson/O in/O humility/O./O I/O have/O come/O to/O look/O
very/O differently/O and/O more/O charitably/O on/O what/O is/O called/O infamous/O since/O
brother/O Nikolay/PERSON has/O become/O what/O he/O is/O .../O you/O know/O what/O he/O did/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O it/O's/O awful/O,/O awful/O!/O''/O repeated/O Levin/PERSON./O

After/O obtaining/O his/O brother/O's/O address/O from/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O footman/O,/O
Levin/PERSON was/O on/O the/O point/O of/O setting/O off/O at/O once/O to/O see/O him/O,/O but/O on/O second/O
thought/O he/O decided/O to/O put/O off/O his/O visit/O till/O the/O evening/O./O The/O first/O
thing/O to/O do/O to/O set/O his/O heart/O at/O rest/O was/O to/O accomplish/O what/O he/O had/O come/O
to/O Moscow/LOCATION for/O./O From/O his/O brother/O's/O Levin/PERSON went/O to/O Oblonsky/PERSON's/O office/O,/O and/O
on/O getting/O news/O of/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O from/O him/O,/O he/O drove/O to/O the/O place/O
where/O he/O had/O been/O told/O he/O might/O find/O Kitty/PERSON./O



Chapter/O 9/O


At/O four/O o'clock/O,/O conscious/O of/O his/O throbbing/O heart/O,/O Levin/PERSON stepped/O out/O of/O
a/O hired/O sledge/O at/O the/O Zoological/LOCATION Gardens/LOCATION,/O and/O turned/O along/O the/O path/O to/O
the/O frozen/O mounds/O and/O the/O skating/O ground/O,/O knowing/O that/O he/O would/O
certainly/O find/O her/O there/O,/O as/O he/O had/O seen/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O carriage/O at/O
the/O entrance/O./O

It/O was/O a/O bright/O,/O frosty/O day/O./O Rows/O of/O carriages/O,/O sledges/O,/O drivers/O,/O and/O
policemen/O were/O standing/O in/O the/O approach/O./O Crowds/O of/O well-dressed/O people/O,/O
with/O hats/O bright/O in/O the/O sun/O,/O swarmed/O about/O the/O entrance/O and/O along/O the/O
well-swept/O little/O paths/O between/O the/O little/O houses/O adorned/O with/O carving/O
in/O the/O Russian/O style/O./O The/O old/O curly/O birches/O of/O the/O gardens/O,/O all/O their/O
twigs/O laden/O with/O snow/O,/O looked/O as/O though/O freshly/O decked/O in/O sacred/O
vestments/O./O

He/O walked/O along/O the/O path/O towards/O the/O skating-ground/O,/O and/O kept/O saying/O to/O
himself/O--/O``/OYou/O must/On't/O be/O excited/O,/O you/O must/O be/O calm/O./O What/O's/O the/O matter/O
with/O you/O?/O What/O do/O you/O want/O?/O Be/O quiet/O,/O stupid/O,/O''/O he/O conjured/O his/O heart/O./O
And/O the/O more/O he/O tried/O to/O compose/O himself/O,/O the/O more/O breathless/O he/O found/O
himself/O./O An/O acquaintance/O met/O him/O and/O called/O him/O by/O his/O name/O,/O but/O Levin/PERSON
did/O not/O even/O recognize/O him/O./O He/O went/O towards/O the/O mounds/O,/O whence/O came/O the/O
clank/O of/O the/O chains/O of/O sledges/O as/O they/O slipped/O down/O or/O were/O dragged/O up/O,/O
the/O rumble/O of/O the/O sliding/O sledges/O,/O and/O the/O sounds/O of/O merry/O voices/O./O He/O
walked/O on/O a/O few/O steps/O,/O and/O the/O skating-ground/O lay/O open/O before/O his/O eyes/O,/O
and/O at/O once/O,/O amidst/O all/O the/O skaters/O,/O he/O knew/O her/O./O

He/O knew/O she/O was/O there/O by/O the/O rapture/O and/O the/O terror/O that/O seized/O on/O his/O
heart/O./O She/O was/O standing/O talking/O to/O a/O lady/O at/O the/O opposite/O end/O of/O the/O
ground/O./O There/O was/O apparently/O nothing/O striking/O either/O in/O her/O dress/O or/O her/O
attitude/O./O But/O for/O Levin/PERSON she/O was/O as/O easy/O to/O find/O in/O that/O crowd/O as/O a/O rose/O
among/O nettles/O./O Everything/O was/O made/O bright/O by/O her/O./O She/O was/O the/O smile/O that/O
shed/O light/O on/O all/O round/O her/O./O ``/OIs/O it/O possible/O I/O can/O go/O over/O there/O on/O the/O
ice/O,/O go/O up/O to/O her/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O./O The/O place/O where/O she/O stood/O seemed/O to/O him/O
a/O holy/O shrine/O,/O unapproachable/O,/O and/O there/O was/O one/O moment/O when/O he/O was/O
almost/O retreating/O,/O so/O overwhelmed/O was/O he/O with/O terror/O./O He/O had/O to/O make/O an/O
effort/O to/O master/O himself/O,/O and/O to/O remind/O himself/O that/O people/O of/O all/O sorts/O
were/O moving/O about/O her/O,/O and/O that/O he/O too/O might/O come/O there/O to/O skate/O./O He/O
walked/O down/O,/O for/O a/O long/O while/O avoiding/O looking/O at/O her/O as/O at/O the/O sun/O,/O but/O
seeing/O her/O,/O as/O one/O does/O the/O sun/O,/O without/O looking/O./O

On/O that/O day/O of/O the/O week/O and/O at/O that/O time/O of/O day/O people/O of/O one/O set/O,/O all/O
acquainted/O with/O one/O another/O,/O used/O to/O meet/O on/O the/O ice/O./O There/O were/O crack/O
skaters/O there/O,/O showing/O off/O their/O skill/O,/O and/O learners/O clinging/O to/O chairs/O
with/O timid/O,/O awkward/O movements/O,/O boys/O,/O and/O elderly/O people/O skating/O with/O
hygienic/O motives/O./O They/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON an/O elect/O band/O of/O blissful/O beings/O
because/O they/O were/O here/O,/O near/O her/O./O All/O the/O skaters/O,/O it/O seemed/O,/O with/O
perfect/O self-possession/O,/O skated/O towards/O her/O,/O skated/O by/O her/O,/O even/O spoke/O
to/O her/O,/O and/O were/O happy/O,/O quite/O apart/O from/O her/O,/O enjoying/O the/O capital/O ice/O
and/O the/O fine/O weather/O./O

Nikolay/PERSON Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O Kitty/PERSON's/O cousin/O,/O in/O a/O short/O jacket/O and/O tight/O
trousers/O,/O was/O sitting/O on/O a/O garden/O seat/O with/O his/O skates/O on/O./O Seeing/O Levin/PERSON,/O
he/O shouted/O to/O him/O:/O

``/OAh/O,/O the/O first/O skater/O in/O Russia/LOCATION!/O Been/O here/O long/O?/O First-rate/O ice/O--/Odo/O put/O
your/O skates/O on/O./O''/O

``/OI/O have/On't/O got/O my/O skates/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON answered/O,/O marveling/O at/O this/O boldness/O
and/O ease/O in/O her/O presence/O,/O and/O not/O for/O one/O second/O losing/O sight/O of/O her/O,/O
though/O he/O did/O not/O look/O at/O her/O./O He/O felt/O as/O though/O the/O sun/O were/O coming/O
near/O him/O./O She/O was/O in/O a/O corner/O,/O and/O turning/O out/O her/O slender/O feet/O in/O their/O
high/O boots/O with/O obvious/O timidity/O,/O she/O skated/O towards/O him/O./O A/O boy/O in/O
Russian/O dress/O,/O desperately/O waving/O his/O arms/O and/O bowed/O down/O to/O the/O ground/O,/O
overtook/O her/O./O She/O skated/O a/O little/O uncertainly/O;/O taking/O her/O hands/O out/O of/O
the/O little/O muff/O that/O hung/O on/O a/O cord/O,/O she/O held/O them/O ready/O for/O emergency/O,/O
and/O looking/O towards/O Levin/PERSON,/O whom/O she/O had/O recognized/O,/O she/O smiled/O at/O him/O,/O
and/O at/O her/O own/O fears/O./O When/O she/O had/O got/O round/O the/O turn/O,/O she/O gave/O herself/O
a/O push/O off/O with/O one/O foot/O,/O and/O skated/O straight/O up/O to/O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON./O
Clutching/O at/O his/O arm/O,/O she/O nodded/O smiling/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O She/O was/O more/O splendid/O
than/O he/O had/O imagined/O her/O./O

When/O he/O thought/O of/O her/O,/O he/O could/O call/O up/O a/O vivid/O picture/O of/O her/O to/O
himself/O,/O especially/O the/O charm/O of/O that/O little/O fair/O head/O,/O so/O freely/O set/O on/O
the/O shapely/O girlish/O shoulders/O,/O and/O so/O full/O of/O childish/O brightness/O and/O
good/O humor/O./O The/O childishness/O of/O her/O expression/O,/O together/O with/O the/O
delicate/O beauty/O of/O her/O figure/O,/O made/O up/O her/O special/O charm/O,/O and/O that/O he/O
fully/O realized/O./O But/O what/O always/O struck/O him/O in/O her/O as/O something/O unlooked/O
for/O,/O was/O the/O expression/O of/O her/O eyes/O,/O soft/O,/O serene/O,/O and/O truthful/O,/O and/O
above/O all/O,/O her/O smile/O,/O which/O always/O transported/O Levin/PERSON to/O an/O enchanted/O
world/O,/O where/O he/O felt/O himself/O softened/O and/O tender/O,/O as/O he/O remembered/O
himself/O in/O some/O days/O of/O his/O early/O childhood/O./O

``/OHave/O you/O been/O here/O long/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O giving/O him/O her/O hand/O./O ``/OThank/O you/O,/O''/O
she/O added/O,/O as/O he/O picked/O up/O the/O handkerchief/O that/O had/O fallen/O out/O of/O her/O
muff/O./O

``/OI/O?/O I/O've/O not/O long/O .../O yesterday/O .../O I/O mean/O today/O .../O I/O arrived/O,/O''/O
answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O in/O his/O emotion/O not/O at/O once/O understanding/O her/O question/O./O
``/OI/O was/O meaning/O to/O come/O and/O see/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O;/O and/O then/O,/O recollecting/O
with/O what/O intention/O he/O was/O trying/O to/O see/O her/O,/O he/O was/O promptly/O overcome/O
with/O confusion/O and/O blushed/O./O

``/OI/O did/On't/O know/O you/O could/O skate/O,/O and/O skate/O so/O well/O./O''/O

She/O looked/O at/O him/O earnestly/O,/O as/O though/O wishing/O to/O make/O out/O the/O cause/O of/O
his/O confusion/O./O

``/OYour/O praise/O is/O worth/O having/O./O The/O tradition/O is/O kept/O up/O here/O that/O you/O are/O
the/O best/O of/O skaters/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O her/O little/O black-gloved/O hand/O
brushing/O a/O grain/O of/O hoarfrost/O off/O her/O muff/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O used/O once/O to/O skate/O with/O passion/O;/O I/O wanted/O to/O reach/O perfection/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O do/O everything/O with/O passion/O,/O I/O think/O,/O''/O she/O said/O smiling/O./O ``/OI/O should/O
so/O like/O to/O see/O how/O you/O skate/O./O Put/O on/O skates/O,/O and/O let/O us/O skate/O together/O./O''/O

``/OSkate/O together/O!/O Can/O that/O be/O possible/O?/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O gazing/O at/O her/O./O

``/OI/O'll/O put/O them/O on/O directly/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

And/O he/O went/O off/O to/O get/O skates/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O a/O long/O while/O since/O we/O've/O seen/O you/O here/O,/O sir/O,/O''/O said/O the/O attendant/O,/O
supporting/O his/O foot/O,/O and/O screwing/O on/O the/O heel/O of/O the/O skate/O./O ``/OExcept/O you/O,/O
there/O's/O none/O of/O the/O gentlemen/O first-rate/O skaters/O./O Will/O that/O be/O all/O
right/O?/O''/O said/O he/O,/O tightening/O the/O strap/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O yes/O;/O make/O haste/O,/O please/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O with/O difficulty/O
restraining/O the/O smile/O of/O rapture/O which/O would/O overspread/O his/O face/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O''/O
he/O thought/O,/O ``/Othis/O now/O is/O life/O,/O this/O is/O happiness/O!/O _/OTogether/O,/O_/O she/O said/O;/O
_/Olet/O us/O skate/O together/O!/O_/O Speak/O to/O her/O now/O?/O But/O that/O's/O just/O why/O I/O'm/O
afraid/O to/O speak/O--/Obecause/O I/O'm/O happy/O now/O,/O happy/O in/O hope/O,/O anyway/O.../O./O And/O
then/O?/O.../O./O But/O I/O must/O!/O I/O must/O!/O I/O must/O!/O Away/O with/O weakness/O!/O''/O

Levin/PERSON rose/O to/O his/O feet/O,/O took/O off/O his/O overcoat/O,/O and/O scurrying/O over/O the/O
rough/O ice/O round/O the/O hut/O,/O came/O out/O on/O the/O smooth/O ice/O and/O skated/O without/O
effort/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O by/O simple/O exercise/O of/O will/O,/O increasing/O and/O
slackening/O speed/O and/O turning/O his/O course/O./O He/O approached/O with/O timidity/O,/O
but/O again/O her/O smile/O reassured/O him/O./O

She/O gave/O him/O her/O hand/O,/O and/O they/O set/O off/O side/O by/O side/O,/O going/O faster/O and/O
faster/O,/O and/O the/O more/O rapidly/O they/O moved/O the/O more/O tightly/O she/O grasped/O his/O
hand/O./O

``/OWith/O you/O I/O should/O soon/O learn/O;/O I/O somehow/O feel/O confidence/O in/O you/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O to/O him/O./O

``/OAnd/O I/O have/O confidence/O in/O myself/O when/O you/O are/O leaning/O on/O me/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
but/O was/O at/O once/O panic-stricken/O at/O what/O he/O had/O said/O,/O and/O blushed/O./O And/O
indeed/O,/O no/O sooner/O had/O he/O uttered/O these/O words/O,/O when/O all/O at/O once/O,/O like/O the/O
sun/O going/O behind/O a/O cloud/O,/O her/O face/O lost/O all/O its/O friendliness/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON
detected/O the/O familiar/O change/O in/O her/O expression/O that/O denoted/O the/O working/O
of/O thought/O;/O a/O crease/O showed/O on/O her/O smooth/O brow/O./O

``/OIs/O there/O anything/O troubling/O you/O?/O--/Othough/O I/O've/O no/O right/O to/O ask/O such/O a/O
question/O,/O''/O he/O added/O hurriedly/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O why/O so/O?/O.../O./O No/O,/O I/O have/O nothing/O to/O trouble/O me/O,/O''/O she/O responded/O
coldly/O;/O and/O she/O added/O immediately/O:/O ``/OYou/O have/On't/O seen/O Mlle./O Linon/O,/O have/O
you/O?/O''/O

``/ONot/O yet/O./O''/O

``/OGo/O and/O speak/O to/O her/O,/O she/O likes/O you/O so/O much/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O's/O wrong/O?/O I/O have/O offended/O her/O./O Lord/O help/O me/O!/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O he/O
flew/O towards/O the/O old/O Frenchwoman/O with/O the/O gray/O ringlets/O,/O who/O was/O sitting/O
on/O a/O bench/O./O Smiling/O and/O showing/O her/O false/O teeth/O,/O she/O greeted/O him/O as/O an/O
old/O friend/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O see/O we/O're/O growing/O up/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O him/O,/O glancing/O towards/O
Kitty/PERSON,/O ``/Oand/O growing/O old/O./O _/OTiny/O bear/O_/O has/O grown/O big/O now/O!/O''/O pursued/O the/O
Frenchwoman/O,/O laughing/O,/O and/O she/O reminded/O him/O of/O his/O joke/O about/O the/O three/O
young/O ladies/O whom/O he/O had/O compared/O to/O the/O three/O bears/O in/O the/O English/O
nursery/O tale/O./O ``/ODo/O you/O remember/O that/O's/O what/O you/O used/O to/O call/O them/O?/O''/O

He/O remembered/O absolutely/O nothing/O,/O but/O she/O had/O been/O laughing/O at/O the/O joke/O
for/O ten/O years/O now/O,/O and/O was/O fond/O of/O it/O./O

``/ONow/O,/O go/O and/O skate/O,/O go/O and/O skate/O./O Our/O Kitty/PERSON has/O learned/O to/O skate/O nicely/O,/O
has/On't/O she/O?/O''/O

When/O Levin/PERSON darted/O up/O to/O Kitty/PERSON her/O face/O was/O no/O longer/O stern/O;/O her/O eyes/O
looked/O at/O him/O with/O the/O same/O sincerity/O and/O friendliness/O,/O but/O Levin/PERSON
fancied/O that/O in/O her/O friendliness/O there/O was/O a/O certain/O note/O of/O deliberate/O
composure/O./O And/O he/O felt/O depressed/O./O After/O talking/O a/O little/O of/O her/O old/O
governess/O and/O her/O peculiarities/O,/O she/O questioned/O him/O about/O his/O life/O./O

``/OSurely/O you/O must/O be/O dull/O in/O the/O country/O in/O the/O winter/O,/O are/On't/O you/O?/O''/O she/O
said/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O dull/O,/O I/O am/O very/O busy/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O feeling/O that/O she/O was/O
holding/O him/O in/O check/O by/O her/O composed/O tone/O,/O which/O he/O would/O not/O have/O the/O
force/O to/O break/O through/O,/O just/O as/O it/O had/O been/O at/O the/O beginning/O of/O the/O
winter/O./O

``/OAre/O you/O going/O to/O stay/O in/O town/O long/O?/O''/O Kitty/PERSON questioned/O him/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O,/O not/O thinking/O of/O what/O he/O was/O saying/O./O The/O
thought/O that/O if/O he/O were/O held/O in/O check/O by/O her/O tone/O of/O quiet/O friendliness/O
he/O would/O end/O by/O going/O back/O again/O without/O deciding/O anything/O came/O into/O his/O
mind/O,/O and/O he/O resolved/O to/O make/O a/O struggle/O against/O it/O./O

``/OHow/O is/O it/O you/O do/On't/O know/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O./O It/O depends/O upon/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O was/O immediately/O
horror-stricken/O at/O his/O own/O words/O./O

Whether/O it/O was/O that/O she/O had/O heard/O his/O words/O,/O or/O that/O she/O did/O not/O want/O to/O
hear/O them/O,/O she/O made/O a/O sort/O of/O stumble/O,/O twice/O struck/O out/O,/O and/O hurriedly/O
skated/O away/O from/O him/O./O She/O skated/O up/O to/O Mlle./LOCATION Linon/LOCATION,/O said/O something/O to/O
her/O,/O and/O went/O towards/O the/O pavilion/O where/O the/O ladies/O took/O off/O their/O
skates/O./O

``/OMy/O God/O!/O what/O have/O I/O done/O!/O Merciful/O God/O!/O help/O me/O,/O guide/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O
praying/O inwardly/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O,/O feeling/O a/O need/O of/O violent/O
exercise/O,/O he/O skated/O about/O describing/O inner/O and/O outer/O circles/O./O

At/O that/O moment/O one/O of/O the/O young/O men/O,/O the/O best/O of/O the/O skaters/O of/O the/O day/O,/O
came/O out/O of/O the/O coffee-house/O in/O his/O skates/O,/O with/O a/O cigarette/O in/O his/O
mouth/O./O Taking/O a/O run/O,/O he/O dashed/O down/O the/O steps/O in/O his/O skates/O,/O crashing/O
and/O bounding/O up/O and/O down/O./O He/O flew/O down/O,/O and/O without/O even/O changing/O the/O
position/O of/O his/O hands/O,/O skated/O away/O over/O the/O ice/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O that/O's/O a/O new/O trick/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O he/O promptly/O ran/O up/O to/O the/O top/O
to/O do/O this/O new/O trick/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O break/O your/O neck/O!/O it/O needs/O practice/O!/O''/O Nikolay/PERSON Shtcherbatsky/PERSON
shouted/O after/O him/O./O

Levin/PERSON went/O to/O the/O steps/O,/O took/O a/O run/O from/O above/O as/O best/O he/O could/O,/O and/O
dashed/O down/O,/O preserving/O his/O balance/O in/O this/O unwonted/O movement/O with/O his/O
hands/O./O On/O the/O last/O step/O he/O stumbled/O,/O but/O barely/O touching/O the/O ice/O with/O
his/O hand/O,/O with/O a/O violent/O effort/O recovered/O himself/O,/O and/O skated/O off/O,/O
laughing/O./O

``/OHow/O splendid/O,/O how/O nice/O he/O is/O!/O''/O Kitty/PERSON was/O thinking/O at/O that/O time/O,/O as/O she/O
came/O out/O of/O the/O pavilion/O with/O Mlle./O Linon/O,/O and/O looked/O towards/O him/O with/O a/O
smile/O of/O quiet/O affection/O,/O as/O though/O he/O were/O a/O favorite/O brother/O./O ``/OAnd/O can/O
it/O be/O my/O fault/O,/O can/O I/O have/O done/O anything/O wrong/O?/O They/O talk/O of/O flirtation/O./O
I/O know/O it/O's/O not/O he/O that/O I/O love/O;/O but/O still/O I/O am/O happy/O with/O him/O,/O and/O he/O's/O
so/O jolly/O./O Only/O,/O why/O did/O he/O say/O that/O?/O.../O''/O she/O mused/O./O

Catching/O sight/O of/O Kitty/PERSON going/O away/O,/O and/O her/O mother/O meeting/O her/O at/O the/O
steps/O,/O Levin/PERSON,/O flushed/O from/O his/O rapid/O exercise/O,/O stood/O still/O and/O pondered/O
a/O minute/O./O He/O took/O off/O his/O skates/O,/O and/O overtook/O the/O mother/O and/O daughter/O
at/O the/O entrance/O of/O the/O gardens/O./O

``/ODelighted/O to/O see/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Princess/O Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON./O ``/OOn/O Thursdays/O we/O
are/O home/O,/O as/O always/O./O''/O

``/OToday/O,/O then/O?/O''/O

``/OWe/O shall/O be/O pleased/O to/O see/O you/O,/O''/O the/O princess/O said/O stiffly/O./O

This/O stiffness/O hurt/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O she/O could/O not/O resist/O the/O desire/O to/O smooth/O
over/O her/O mother/O's/O coldness/O./O She/O turned/O her/O head/O,/O and/O with/O a/O smile/O said/O:/O

``/OGood-bye/O till/O this/O evening/O./O''/O

At/O that/O moment/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O his/O hat/O cocked/O on/O one/O side/O,/O with/O
beaming/O face/O and/O eyes/O,/O strode/O into/O the/O garden/O like/O a/O conquering/O hero/O./O
But/O as/O he/O approached/O his/O mother-in-law/O,/O he/O responded/O in/O a/O mournful/O and/O
crestfallen/O tone/O to/O her/O inquiries/O about/O Dolly/PERSON's/O health/O./O After/O a/O little/O
subdued/O and/O dejected/O conversation/O with/O his/O mother-in-law/O,/O he/O threw/O out/O
his/O chest/O again/O,/O and/O put/O his/O arm/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O shall/O we/O set/O off/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O ``/OI/O've/O been/O thinking/O about/O you/O all/O
this/O time/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O very/O,/O very/O glad/O you/O've/O come/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O him/O in/O
the/O face/O with/O a/O significant/O air/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O come/O along/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON in/O ecstasy/O,/O hearing/O unceasingly/O the/O
sound/O of/O that/O voice/O saying/O,/O ``/OGood-bye/O till/O this/O evening/O,/O''/O and/O seeing/O the/O
smile/O with/O which/O it/O was/O said/O./O

``/OTo/O the/O England/LOCATION or/O the/O Hermitage/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O mind/O which/O./O''/O

``/OAll/O right/O,/O then/O,/O the/O England/LOCATION,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O selecting/O that/O
restaurant/O because/O he/O owed/O more/O there/O than/O at/O the/O Hermitage/LOCATION,/O and/O
consequently/O considered/O it/O mean/O to/O avoid/O it/O./O ``/OHave/O you/O got/O a/O sledge/O?/O
That/O's/O first-rate/O,/O for/O I/O sent/O my/O carriage/O home/O./O''/O

The/O friends/O hardly/O spoke/O all/O the/O way/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O wondering/O what/O that/O
change/O in/O Kitty/PERSON's/O expression/O had/O meant/O,/O and/O alternately/O assuring/O himself/O
that/O there/O was/O hope/O,/O and/O falling/O into/O despair/O,/O seeing/O clearly/O that/O his/O
hopes/O were/O insane/O,/O and/O yet/O all/O the/O while/O he/O felt/O himself/O quite/O another/O
man/O,/O utterly/O unlike/O what/O he/O had/O been/O before/O her/O smile/O and/O those/O words/O,/O
``/OGood-bye/O till/O this/O evening/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O absorbed/O during/O the/O drive/O in/O composing/O the/O menu/O
of/O the/O dinner/O./O

``/OYou/O like/O turbot/O,/O do/On't/O you/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O Levin/PERSON as/O they/O were/O arriving/O./O

``/OEh/O?/O''/O responded/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OTurbot/O?/O Yes/O,/O I/O'm/O _/Oawfully/O_/O fond/O of/O turbot/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 10/O


When/O Levin/PERSON went/O into/O the/O restaurant/O with/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O he/O could/O not/O help/O
noticing/O a/O certain/O peculiarity/O of/O expression/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O a/O restrained/O
radiance/O,/O about/O the/O face/O and/O whole/O figure/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O
Oblonsky/PERSON took/O off/O his/O overcoat/O,/O and/O with/O his/O hat/O over/O one/O ear/O walked/O
into/O the/O dining/O room/O,/O giving/O directions/O to/O the/O Tatar/O waiters/O,/O who/O were/O
clustered/O about/O him/O in/O evening/O coats/O,/O bearing/O napkins/O./O Bowing/O to/O right/O
and/O left/O to/O the/O people/O he/O met/O,/O and/O here/O as/O everywhere/O joyously/O greeting/O
acquaintances/O,/O he/O went/O up/O to/O the/O sideboard/O for/O a/O preliminary/O appetizer/O
of/O fish/O and/O vodka/O,/O and/O said/O to/O the/O painted/O Frenchwoman/O decked/O in/O
ribbons/O,/O lace/O,/O and/O ringlets/O,/O behind/O the/O counter/O,/O something/O so/O amusing/O
that/O even/O that/O Frenchwoman/O was/O moved/O to/O genuine/O laughter/O./O Levin/PERSON for/O his/O
part/O refrained/O from/O taking/O any/O vodka/O simply/O because/O he/O felt/O such/O a/O
loathing/O of/O that/O Frenchwoman/O,/O all/O made/O up/O,/O it/O seemed/O,/O of/O false/O hair/O,/O
_/Opoudre/O de/O riz/O,/O_/O and/O _/Ovinaigre/O de/O toilette/O_/O./O He/O made/O haste/O to/O move/O away/O
from/O her/O,/O as/O from/O a/O dirty/O place/O./O His/O whole/O soul/O was/O filled/O with/O memories/O
of/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O there/O was/O a/O smile/O of/O triumph/O and/O happiness/O shining/O in/O his/O
eyes/O./O

``/OThis/O way/O,/O your/O excellency/O,/O please/O./O Your/O excellency/O wo/On't/O be/O disturbed/O
here/O,/O''/O said/O a/O particularly/O pertinacious/O,/O white-headed/O old/O Tatar/O with/O
immense/O hips/O and/O coat-tails/O gaping/O widely/O behind/O./O ``/OWalk/O in/O,/O your/O
excellency/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O Levin/PERSON;/O by/O way/O of/O showing/O his/O respect/O to/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O being/O attentive/O to/O his/O guest/O as/O well/O./O

Instantly/O flinging/O a/O fresh/O cloth/O over/O the/O round/O table/O under/O the/O bronze/O
chandelier/O,/O though/O it/O already/O had/O a/O table/O cloth/O on/O it/O,/O he/O pushed/O up/O
velvet/O chairs/O,/O and/O came/O to/O a/O standstill/O before/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON with/O
a/O napkin/O and/O a/O bill/O of/O fare/O in/O his/O hands/O,/O awaiting/O his/O commands/O./O

``/OIf/O you/O prefer/O it/O,/O your/O excellency/O,/O a/O private/O room/O will/O be/O free/O
directly/O;/O Prince/O Golistin/PERSON with/O a/O lady/O./O Fresh/O oysters/O have/O come/O in/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O!/O oysters/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON became/O thoughtful/O./O

``/OHow/O if/O we/O were/O to/O change/O our/O program/O,/O Levin/PERSON?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O keeping/O his/O
finger/O on/O the/O bill/O of/O fare/O./O And/O his/O face/O expressed/O serious/O hesitation/O./O
``/OAre/O the/O oysters/O good/O?/O Mind/O now/O./O''/O

``/OThey/O're/O Flensburg/LOCATION,/O your/O excellency/O./O We/O've/O no/O Ostend/LOCATION./O''/O

``/OFlensburg/LOCATION will/O do/O,/O but/O are/O they/O fresh/O?/O''/O

``/OOnly/O arrived/O yesterday/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O then/O,/O how/O if/O we/O were/O to/O begin/O with/O oysters/O,/O and/O so/O change/O the/O
whole/O program/O?/O Eh/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O all/O the/O same/O to/O me/O./O I/O should/O like/O cabbage/O soup/O and/O porridge/O better/O
than/O anything/O;/O but/O of/O course/O there/O's/O nothing/O like/O that/O here/O./O''/O

''/O_/OPorridge/O à/O la/O Russe/O,/O_/O your/O honor/O would/O like/O?/O''/O said/O the/O Tatar/O,/O bending/O
down/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O like/O a/O nurse/O speaking/O to/O a/O child/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O joking/O apart/O,/O whatever/O you/O choose/O is/O sure/O to/O be/O good/O./O I/O've/O been/O
skating/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O hungry/O./O And/O do/On't/O imagine/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O detecting/O a/O look/O
of/O dissatisfaction/O on/O Oblonsky/PERSON's/O face/O,/O ``/Othat/O I/O sha/On't/O appreciate/O your/O
choice/O./O I/O am/O fond/O of/O good/O things/O./O''/O

``/OI/O should/O hope/O so/O!/O After/O all/O,/O it/O's/O one/O of/O the/O pleasures/O of/O life/O,/O''/O said/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OWell/O,/O then/O,/O my/O friend/O,/O you/O give/O us/O two/O--/Oor/O better/O
say/O three/O--/Odozen/O oysters/O,/O clear/O soup/O with/O vegetables/O.../O''/O

''/O_/OPrintanière/O,/O_/O''/O prompted/O the/O Tatar/O./O But/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON apparently/O
did/O not/O care/O to/O allow/O him/O the/O satisfaction/O of/O giving/O the/O French/O names/O of/O
the/O dishes/O./O

``/OWith/O vegetables/O in/O it/O,/O you/O know/O./O Then/O turbot/O with/O thick/O sauce/O,/O then/O .../O
roast/O beef/O;/O and/O mind/O it/O's/O good/O./O Yes/O,/O and/O capons/O,/O perhaps/O,/O and/O then/O
sweets/O./O''/O

The/O Tatar/O,/O recollecting/O that/O it/O was/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O way/O not/O to/O
call/O the/O dishes/O by/O the/O names/O in/O the/O French/O bill/O of/O fare/O,/O did/O not/O repeat/O
them/O after/O him/O,/O but/O could/O not/O resist/O rehearsing/O the/O whole/O menu/O to/O
himself/O according/O to/O the/O bill/O:/O--/O''/O_/OSoupe/O printanière/O,/O turbot/O,/O sauce/O
Beaumarchais/O,/O poulard/O à/O l'estragon/O,/O macédoine/O de/O fruits/O_/O .../O etc./O,/O''/O and/O
then/O instantly/O,/O as/O though/O worked/O by/O springs/O,/O laying/O down/O one/O bound/O bill/O
of/O fare/O,/O he/O took/O up/O another/O,/O the/O list/O of/O wines/O,/O and/O submitted/O it/O to/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OWhat/O shall/O we/O drink/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O you/O like/O,/O only/O not/O too/O much/O./O Champagne/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWhat/O!/O to/O start/O with/O?/O You/O're/O right/O though/O,/O I/O dare/O say/O./O Do/O you/O like/O the/O
white/O seal/O?/O''/O

''/O_/OCachet/O blanc/O,/O_/O''/O prompted/O the/O Tatar/O./O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O then/O,/O give/O us/O that/O brand/O with/O the/O oysters/O,/O and/O then/O we/O'll/O
see/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O sir/O./O And/O what/O table/O wine/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O can/O give/O us/O Nuits/O./O Oh/O,/O no/O,/O better/O the/O classic/O Chablis/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O sir/O./O And/O _/Oyour/O_/O cheese/O,/O your/O excellency/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O Parmesan/O./O Or/O would/O you/O like/O another/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O it/O's/O all/O the/O same/O to/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O unable/O to/O suppress/O a/O smile/O./O

And/O the/O Tatar/O ran/O off/O with/O flying/O coat-tails/O,/O and/O in/O five/O minutes/O darted/O
in/O with/O a/O dish/O of/O opened/O oysters/O on/O mother-of-pearl/O shells/O,/O and/O a/O bottle/O
between/O his/O fingers/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON crushed/O the/O starchy/O napkin/O,/O tucked/O it/O into/O his/O
waistcoat/O,/O and/O settling/O his/O arms/O comfortably/O,/O started/O on/O the/O oysters/O./O

``/ONot/O bad/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O stripping/O the/O oysters/O from/O the/O pearly/O shell/O with/O a/O
silver/O fork/O,/O and/O swallowing/O them/O one/O after/O another/O./O ``/ONot/O bad/O,/O''/O he/O
repeated/O,/O turning/O his/O dewy/O,/O brilliant/O eyes/O from/O Levin/PERSON to/O the/O Tatar/O./O

Levin/PERSON ate/O the/O oysters/O indeed/O,/O though/O white/O bread/O and/O cheese/O would/O have/O
pleased/O him/O better/O./O But/O he/O was/O admiring/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O Even/O the/O Tatar/O,/O
uncorking/O the/O bottle/O and/O pouring/O the/O sparkling/O wine/O into/O the/O delicate/O
glasses/O,/O glanced/O at/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O and/O settled/O his/O white/O cravat/O
with/O a/O perceptible/O smile/O of/O satisfaction/O./O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O care/O much/O for/O oysters/O,/O do/O you/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
emptying/O his/O wine/O glass/O,/O ``/Oor/O you/O're/O worried/O about/O something/O./O Eh/O?/O''/O

He/O wanted/O Levin/PERSON to/O be/O in/O good/O spirits/O./O But/O it/O was/O not/O that/O Levin/PERSON was/O not/O
in/O good/O spirits/O;/O he/O was/O ill/O at/O ease/O./O With/O what/O he/O had/O in/O his/O soul/O,/O he/O
felt/O sore/O and/O uncomfortable/O in/O the/O restaurant/O,/O in/O the/O midst/O of/O private/O
rooms/O where/O men/O were/O dining/O with/O ladies/O,/O in/O all/O this/O fuss/O and/O bustle/O;/O
the/O surroundings/O of/O bronzes/O,/O looking/O glasses/O,/O gas/O,/O and/O waiters/O--/Oall/O of/O it/O
was/O offensive/O to/O him/O./O He/O was/O afraid/O of/O sullying/O what/O his/O soul/O was/O
brimful/O of/O./O

``/OI/O?/O Yes/O,/O I/O am/O;/O but/O besides/O,/O all/O this/O bothers/O me/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OYou/O ca/On't/O
conceive/O how/O queer/O it/O all/O seems/O to/O a/O country/O person/O like/O me/O,/O as/O queer/O as/O
that/O gentleman/O's/O nails/O I/O saw/O at/O your/O place/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O saw/O how/O much/O interested/O you/O were/O in/O poor/O Grinevitch/PERSON's/O nails/O,/O''/O
said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O laughing/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O too/O much/O for/O me/O,/O''/O responded/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/ODo/O try/O,/O now/O,/O and/O put/O yourself/O
in/O my/O place/O,/O take/O the/O point/O of/O view/O of/O a/O country/O person/O./O We/O in/O the/O
country/O try/O to/O bring/O our/O hands/O into/O such/O a/O state/O as/O will/O be/O most/O
convenient/O for/O working/O with/O./O So/O we/O cut/O our/O nails/O;/O sometimes/O we/O turn/O up/O
our/O sleeves/O./O And/O here/O people/O purposely/O let/O their/O nails/O grow/O as/O long/O as/O
they/O will/O,/O and/O link/O on/O small/O saucers/O by/O way/O of/O studs/O,/O so/O that/O they/O can/O
do/O nothing/O with/O their/O hands/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON smiled/O gaily/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O that/O's/O just/O a/O sign/O that/O he/O has/O no/O need/O to/O do/O coarse/O work/O./O His/O
work/O is/O with/O the/O mind/O.../O''/O

``/OMaybe/O./O But/O still/O it/O's/O queer/O to/O me/O,/O just/O as/O at/O this/O moment/O it/O seems/O
queer/O to/O me/O that/O we/O country/O folks/O try/O to/O get/O our/O meals/O over/O as/O soon/O as/O
we/O can/O,/O so/O as/O to/O be/O ready/O for/O our/O work/O,/O while/O here/O are/O we/O trying/O to/O drag/O
out/O our/O meal/O as/O long/O as/O possible/O,/O and/O with/O that/O object/O eating/O
oysters/O.../O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O of/O course/O,/O''/O objected/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OBut/O that/O's/O just/O the/O aim/O
of/O civilization/O--/Oto/O make/O everything/O a/O source/O of/O enjoyment/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O if/O that/O's/O its/O aim/O,/O I/O'd/O rather/O be/O a/O savage/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O so/O you/O are/O a/O savage/O./O All/O you/O Levins/PERSON are/O savages/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON sighed/O./O He/O remembered/O his/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON,/O and/O felt/O ashamed/O and/O
sore/O,/O and/O he/O scowled/O;/O but/O Oblonsky/PERSON began/O speaking/O of/O a/O subject/O which/O at/O
once/O drew/O his/O attention/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O say/O,/O are/O you/O going/O tonight/O to/O our/O people/O,/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O,/O I/O
mean/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O his/O eyes/O sparkling/O significantly/O as/O he/O pushed/O away/O the/O
empty/O rough/O shells/O,/O and/O drew/O the/O cheese/O towards/O him/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O shall/O certainly/O go/O,/O''/O replied/O Levin/PERSON;/O ``/Othough/O I/O fancied/O the/O
princess/O was/O not/O very/O warm/O in/O her/O invitation/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O nonsense/O!/O That/O's/O her/O manner/O.../O./O Come/O,/O boy/O,/O the/O soup/O!/O.../O./O That/O's/O
her/O manner/O--/O_/Ogrande/O dame/O,/O_/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OI/O'm/O coming/O,/O too/O,/O
but/O I/O have/O to/O go/O to/O the/O Countess/O Bonina/PERSON's/O rehearsal/O./O Come/O,/O is/On't/O it/O true/O
that/O you/O're/O a/O savage/O?/O How/O do/O you/O explain/O the/O sudden/O way/O in/O which/O you/O
vanished/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION?/O The/O Shtcherbatskys/O were/O continually/O asking/O me/O
about/O you/O,/O as/O though/O I/O ought/O to/O know/O./O The/O only/O thing/O I/O know/O is/O that/O you/O
always/O do/O what/O no/O one/O else/O does/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O slowly/O and/O with/O emotion/O,/O ``/Oyou/O're/O right/O./O I/O am/O a/O
savage/O./O Only/O,/O my/O savageness/O is/O not/O in/O having/O gone/O away/O,/O but/O in/O coming/O
now/O./O Now/O I/O have/O come/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O what/O a/O lucky/O fellow/O you/O are/O!/O''/O broke/O in/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O looking/O
into/O Levin/PERSON's/O eyes/O./O

``/OWhy/O?/O''/O

    ``/OI/O know/O a/O gallant/O steed/O by/O tokens/O sure/O,/O
    And/O by/O his/O eyes/O I/O know/O a/O youth/O in/O love/O,/O''/O

declaimed/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OEverything/O is/O before/O you/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O is/O it/O over/O for/O you/O already/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O not/O over/O exactly/O,/O but/O the/O future/O is/O yours/O,/O and/O the/O present/O is/O mine/O,/O
and/O the/O present/O--/Owell/O,/O it/O's/O not/O all/O that/O it/O might/O be/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O so/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O things/O go/O wrong/O./O But/O I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O talk/O of/O myself/O,/O and/O besides/O I/O
ca/On't/O explain/O it/O all/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OWell/O,/O why/O have/O you/O
come/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O then/O?/O.../O./O Hi/O!/O take/O away/O!/O''/O he/O called/O to/O the/O Tatar/O./O

``/OYou/O guess/O?/O''/O responded/O Levin/PERSON,/O his/O eyes/O like/O deep/O wells/O of/O light/O fixed/O on/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OI/O guess/O,/O but/O I/O ca/On't/O be/O the/O first/O to/O talk/O about/O it/O./O You/O can/O see/O by/O that/O
whether/O I/O guess/O right/O or/O wrong/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O gazing/O at/O
Levin/LOCATION with/O a/O subtle/O smile/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O what/O have/O you/O to/O say/O to/O me/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON in/O a/O quivering/O voice/O,/O
feeling/O that/O all/O the/O muscles/O of/O his/O face/O were/O quivering/O too/O./O ``/OHow/O do/O you/O
look/O at/O the/O question/O?/O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON slowly/O emptied/O his/O glass/O of/O Chablis/O,/O never/O taking/O
his/O eyes/O off/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OI/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O ``/Othere/O's/O nothing/O I/O desire/O so/O much/O as/O
that/O--/Onothing/O!/O It/O would/O be/O the/O best/O thing/O that/O could/O be/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O you/O're/O not/O making/O a/O mistake/O?/O You/O know/O what/O we/O're/O speaking/O of/O?/O''/O said/O
Levin/PERSON,/O piercing/O him/O with/O his/O eyes/O./O ``/OYou/O think/O it/O's/O possible/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O think/O it/O's/O possible/O./O Why/O not/O possible/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O!/O do/O you/O really/O think/O it/O's/O possible/O?/O No/O,/O tell/O me/O all/O you/O think/O!/O Oh/O,/O
but/O if/O .../O if/O refusal/O's/O in/O store/O for/O me/O!/O.../O Indeed/O I/O feel/O sure/O.../O''/O

``/OWhy/O should/O you/O think/O that/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O at/O his/O
excitement/O./O

``/OIt/O seems/O so/O to/O me/O sometimes/O./O That/O will/O be/O awful/O for/O me/O,/O and/O for/O her/O
too/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O anyway/O there/O's/O nothing/O awful/O in/O it/O for/O a/O girl/O./O Every/O girl/O's/O
proud/O of/O an/O offer/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O every/O girl/O,/O but/O not/O she/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON smiled/O./O He/O so/O well/O knew/O that/O feeling/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O,/O
that/O for/O him/O all/O the/O girls/O in/O the/O world/O were/O divided/O into/O two/O classes/O:/O
one/O class/O--/Oall/O the/O girls/O in/O the/O world/O except/O her/O,/O and/O those/O girls/O with/O
all/O sorts/O of/O human/O weaknesses/O,/O and/O very/O ordinary/O girls/O:/O the/O other/O
class/O--/Oshe/O alone/O,/O having/O no/O weaknesses/O of/O any/O sort/O and/O higher/O than/O all/O
humanity/O./O

``/OStay/O,/O take/O some/O sauce/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O holding/O back/O Levin/PERSON's/O hand/O as/O it/O pushed/O
away/O the/O sauce/O./O

Levin/PERSON obediently/O helped/O himself/O to/O sauce/O,/O but/O would/O not/O let/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON go/O on/O with/O his/O dinner/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O stop/O a/O minute/O,/O stop/O a/O minute/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OYou/O must/O understand/O that/O
it/O's/O a/O question/O of/O life/O and/O death/O for/O me/O./O I/O have/O never/O spoken/O to/O any/O one/O
of/O this/O./O And/O there/O's/O no/O one/O I/O could/O speak/O of/O it/O to/O,/O except/O you/O./O You/O know/O
we/O're/O utterly/O unlike/O each/O other/O,/O different/O tastes/O and/O views/O and/O
everything/O;/O but/O I/O know/O you/O're/O fond/O of/O me/O and/O understand/O me/O,/O and/O that/O's/O
why/O I/O like/O you/O awfully/O./O But/O for/O God/O's/O sake/O,/O be/O quite/O straightforward/O
with/O me/O./O''/O

``/OI/O tell/O you/O what/O I/O think/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O ``/OBut/O I/O'll/O
say/O more/O:/O my/O wife/O is/O a/O wonderful/O woman/O.../O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON sighed/O,/O
remembering/O his/O position/O with/O his/O wife/O,/O and/O,/O after/O a/O moment/O's/O silence/O,/O
resumed/O--/O``/OShe/O has/O a/O gift/O of/O foreseeing/O things/O./O She/O sees/O right/O through/O
people/O;/O but/O that/O's/O not/O all/O;/O she/O knows/O what/O will/O come/O to/O pass/O,/O especially/O
in/O the/O way/O of/O marriages/O./O She/O foretold/O,/O for/O instance/O,/O that/O Princess/O
Shahovskaya/PERSON would/O marry/O Brenteln/PERSON./O No/O one/O would/O believe/O it/O,/O but/O it/O came/O
to/O pass/O./O And/O she/O's/O on/O your/O side/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O mean/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O only/O that/O she/O likes/O you/O--/Oshe/O says/O that/O Kitty/PERSON is/O certain/O to/O be/O
your/O wife/O./O''/O

At/O these/O words/O Levin/PERSON's/O face/O suddenly/O lighted/O up/O with/O a/O smile/O,/O a/O smile/O
not/O far/O from/O tears/O of/O emotion/O./O

``/OShe/O says/O that/O!/O''/O cried/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OI/O always/O said/O she/O was/O exquisite/O,/O your/O
wife/O./O There/O,/O that/O's/O enough/O,/O enough/O said/O about/O it/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O getting/O up/O
from/O his/O seat/O./O

``/OAll/O right/O,/O but/O do/O sit/O down/O./O''/O

But/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O sit/O down/O./O He/O walked/O with/O his/O firm/O tread/O twice/O up/O and/O
down/O the/O little/O cage/O of/O a/O room/O,/O blinked/O his/O eyelids/O that/O his/O tears/O might/O
not/O fall/O,/O and/O only/O then/O sat/O down/O to/O the/O table/O./O

``/OYou/O must/O understand/O,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O ``/Oit/O's/O not/O love/O./O I/O've/O been/O in/O love/O,/O but/O
it/O's/O not/O that/O./O It/O's/O not/O my/O feeling/O,/O but/O a/O sort/O of/O force/O outside/O me/O has/O
taken/O possession/O of/O me/O./O I/O went/O away/O,/O you/O see/O,/O because/O I/O made/O up/O my/O mind/O
that/O it/O could/O never/O be/O,/O you/O understand/O,/O as/O a/O happiness/O that/O does/O not/O
come/O on/O earth/O;/O but/O I/O've/O struggled/O with/O myself/O,/O I/O see/O there/O's/O no/O living/O
without/O it/O./O And/O it/O must/O be/O settled/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O did/O you/O go/O away/O for/O?/O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O stop/O a/O minute/O!/O Ah/O,/O the/O thoughts/O that/O come/O crowding/O on/O one/O!/O The/O
questions/O one/O must/O ask/O oneself/O!/O Listen/O./O You/O ca/On't/O imagine/O what/O you/O've/O
done/O for/O me/O by/O what/O you/O said/O./O I/O'm/O so/O happy/O that/O I/O've/O become/O positively/O
hateful/O;/O I/O've/O forgotten/O everything/O./O I/O heard/O today/O that/O my/O brother/O
Nikolay/PERSON .../O you/O know/O,/O he/O's/O here/O .../O I/O had/O even/O forgotten/O him/O./O It/O seems/O
to/O me/O that/O he/O's/O happy/O too/O./O It/O's/O a/O sort/O of/O madness/O./O But/O one/O thing/O's/O
awful/O.../O./O Here/O,/O you/O've/O been/O married/O,/O you/O know/O the/O feeling/O .../O it/O's/O awful/O
that/O we/O--/Oold/O--/Owith/O a/O past/O .../O not/O of/O love/O,/O but/O of/O sins/O .../O are/O brought/O all/O
at/O once/O so/O near/O to/O a/O creature/O pure/O and/O innocent/O;/O it/O's/O loathsome/O,/O and/O
that/O's/O why/O one/O ca/On't/O help/O feeling/O oneself/O unworthy/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O you/O've/O not/O many/O sins/O on/O your/O conscience/O./O''/O

``/OAlas/O!/O all/O the/O same/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Owhen/O with/O loathing/O I/O go/O over/O my/O life/O,/O
I/O shudder/O and/O curse/O and/O bitterly/O regret/O it/O.../O./O Yes/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O would/O you/O have/O?/O The/O world/O's/O made/O so/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OThe/O one/O comfort/O is/O like/O that/O prayer/O,/O which/O I/O always/O liked/O:/O `/OForgive/O me/O
not/O according/O to/O my/O unworthiness/O,/O but/O according/O to/O Thy/O lovingkindness/O./O'/O
That/O's/O the/O only/O way/O she/O can/O forgive/O me/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 11/O


Levin/PERSON emptied/O his/O glass/O,/O and/O they/O were/O silent/O for/O a/O while/O./O

``/OThere/O's/O one/O other/O thing/O I/O ought/O to/O tell/O you/O./O Do/O you/O know/O Vronsky/O?/O''/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON asked/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O do/On't/O./O Why/O do/O you/O ask/O?/O''/O

``/OGive/O us/O another/O bottle/O,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON directed/O the/O Tatar/O,/O who/O
was/O filling/O up/O their/O glasses/O and/O fidgeting/O round/O them/O just/O when/O he/O was/O
not/O wanted/O./O

``/OWhy/O you/O ought/O to/O know/O Vronsky/PERSON is/O that/O he/O's/O one/O of/O your/O rivals/O./O''/O

``/OWho/O's/O Vronsky/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O his/O face/O was/O suddenly/O transformed/O from/O
the/O look/O of/O childlike/O ecstasy/O which/O Oblonsky/PERSON had/O just/O been/O admiring/O to/O
an/O angry/O and/O unpleasant/O expression/O./O

``/OVronsky/O is/O one/O of/O the/O sons/O of/O Count/O Kirill/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON Vronsky/PERSON,/O and/O one/O
of/O the/O finest/O specimens/O of/O the/O gilded/O youth/O of/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O I/O made/O his/O
acquaintance/O in/O Tver/LOCATION when/O I/O was/O there/O on/O official/O business/O,/O and/O he/O came/O
there/O for/O the/O levy/O of/O recruits/O./O Fearfully/O rich/O,/O handsome/O,/O great/O
connections/O,/O an/O aide-de-camp/O,/O and/O with/O all/O that/O a/O very/O nice/O,/O
good-natured/O fellow/O./O But/O he/O's/O more/O than/O simply/O a/O good-natured/O fellow/O,/O as/O
I/O've/O found/O out/O here/O--/Ohe/O's/O a/O cultivated/O man/O,/O too/O,/O and/O very/O intelligent/O;/O
he/O's/O a/O man/O who/O'll/O make/O his/O mark/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON scowled/O and/O was/O dumb/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O he/O turned/O up/O here/O soon/O after/O you/O'd/O gone/O,/O and/O as/O I/O can/O see/O,/O he/O's/O
over/O head/O and/O ears/O in/O love/O with/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O you/O know/O that/O her/O mother/O.../O''/O

``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O but/O I/O know/O nothing/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O frowning/O gloomily/O./O And/O
immediately/O he/O recollected/O his/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON and/O how/O hateful/O he/O was/O to/O
have/O been/O able/O to/O forget/O him/O./O

``/OYou/O wait/O a/O bit/O,/O wait/O a/O bit/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O and/O
touching/O his/O hand/O./O ``/OI/O've/O told/O you/O what/O I/O know/O,/O and/O I/O repeat/O that/O in/O this/O
delicate/O and/O tender/O matter/O,/O as/O far/O as/O one/O can/O conjecture/O,/O I/O believe/O the/O
chances/O are/O in/O your/O favor/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON dropped/O back/O in/O his/O chair/O;/O his/O face/O was/O pale/O./O

``/OBut/O I/O would/O advise/O you/O to/O settle/O the/O thing/O as/O soon/O as/O may/O be/O,/O''/O pursued/O
Oblonsky/PERSON,/O filling/O up/O his/O glass/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O thanks/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O drink/O any/O more/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O pushing/O away/O his/O
glass/O./O ``/OI/O shall/O be/O drunk/O.../O./O Come/O,/O tell/O me/O how/O are/O you/O getting/O on/O?/O''/O he/O
went/O on/O,/O obviously/O anxious/O to/O change/O the/O conversation/O./O

``/OOne/O word/O more/O:/O in/O any/O case/O I/O advise/O you/O to/O settle/O the/O question/O soon/O./O
Tonight/O I/O do/On't/O advise/O you/O to/O speak/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OGo/O
round/O tomorrow/O morning/O,/O make/O an/O offer/O in/O due/O form/O,/O and/O God/O bless/O you/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O do/O you/O still/O think/O of/O coming/O to/O me/O for/O some/O shooting/O?/O Come/O next/O
spring/O,/O do/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

Now/O his/O whole/O soul/O was/O full/O of/O remorse/O that/O he/O had/O begun/O this/O
conversation/O with/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O A/O feeling/O such/O as/O his/O was/O
profaned/O by/O talk/O of/O the/O rivalry/O of/O some/O Petersburg/LOCATION officer/O,/O of/O the/O
suppositions/O and/O the/O counsels/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON smiled/O./O He/O knew/O what/O was/O passing/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O soul/O./O

``/OI/O'll/O come/O some/O day/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OBut/O women/O,/O my/O boy/O,/O they/O're/O the/O pivot/O
everything/O turns/O upon/O./O Things/O are/O in/O a/O bad/O way/O with/O me/O,/O very/O bad/O./O And/O
it/O's/O all/O through/O women/O./O Tell/O me/O frankly/O now/O,/O''/O he/O pursued/O,/O picking/O up/O a/O
cigar/O and/O keeping/O one/O hand/O on/O his/O glass/O;/O ``/Ogive/O me/O your/O advice/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O what/O is/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O'll/O tell/O you/O./O Suppose/O you/O're/O married/O,/O you/O love/O your/O wife/O,/O but/O you/O're/O
fascinated/O by/O another/O woman/O.../O''/O

``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O but/O I/O'm/O absolutely/O unable/O to/O comprehend/O how/O .../O just/O as/O I/O
ca/On't/O comprehend/O how/O I/O could/O now/O,/O after/O my/O dinner/O,/O go/O straight/O to/O a/O
baker/O's/O shop/O and/O steal/O a/O roll/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O eyes/O sparkled/O more/O than/O usual/O./O

``/OWhy/O not/O?/O A/O roll/O will/O sometimes/O smell/O so/O good/O one/O ca/On't/O resist/O it/O./O''/O

    ``/OHimmlisch/O ist/O's/O,/O wenn/O ich/O bezwungen/O
    Meine/PERSON irdische/O Begier/O;/O
    Aber/PERSON doch/O wenn/O's/O nich/O gelungen/O
    Hatt/PERSON'/O ich/O auch/O recht/O huebsch/O Plaisir/O!/O''/O

As/O he/O said/O this/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON smiled/O subtly/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O too/O,/O could/O
not/O help/O smiling/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O joking/O apart/O,/O''/O resumed/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O ``/Oyou/O must/O
understand/O that/O the/O woman/O is/O a/O sweet/O,/O gentle/O loving/O creature/O,/O poor/O and/O
lonely/O,/O and/O has/O sacrificed/O everything/O./O Now/O,/O when/O the/O thing/O's/O done/O,/O do/On't/O
you/O see/O,/O can/O one/O possibly/O cast/O her/O off/O?/O Even/O supposing/O one/O parts/O from/O
her/O,/O so/O as/O not/O to/O break/O up/O one/O's/O family/O life/O,/O still/O,/O can/O one/O help/O
feeling/O for/O her/O,/O setting/O her/O on/O her/O feet/O,/O softening/O her/O lot/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O must/O excuse/O me/O there/O./O You/O know/O to/O me/O all/O women/O are/O divided/O
into/O two/O classes/O .../O at/O least/O no/O .../O truer/O to/O say/O:/O there/O are/O women/O and/O
there/O are/O .../O I/O've/O never/O seen/O exquisite/O fallen/O beings/O,/O and/O I/O never/O shall/O
see/O them/O,/O but/O such/O creatures/O as/O that/O painted/O Frenchwoman/O at/O the/O counter/O
with/O the/O ringlets/O are/O vermin/O to/O my/O mind/O,/O and/O all/O fallen/O women/O are/O the/O
same/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O the/O Magdalen/O?/O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O drop/O that/O!/O Christ/PERSON would/O never/O have/O said/O those/O words/O if/O He/O had/O known/O
how/O they/O would/O be/O abused/O./O Of/O all/O the/O Gospel/O those/O words/O are/O the/O only/O
ones/O remembered/O./O However/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O saying/O so/O much/O what/O I/O think/O,/O as/O what/O I/O
feel/O./O I/O have/O a/O loathing/O for/O fallen/O women/O./O You/O're/O afraid/O of/O spiders/O,/O and/O
I/O of/O these/O vermin/O./O Most/O likely/O you/O've/O not/O made/O a/O study/O of/O spiders/O and/O
do/On't/O know/O their/O character/O;/O and/O so/O it/O is/O with/O me/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O very/O well/O for/O you/O to/O talk/O like/O that/O;/O it/O's/O very/O much/O like/O that/O
gentleman/O in/O Dickens/PERSON who/O used/O to/O fling/O all/O difficult/O questions/O over/O his/O
right/O shoulder/O./O But/O to/O deny/O the/O facts/O is/O no/O answer/O./O What/O's/O to/O be/O
done/O--/Oyou/O tell/O me/O that/O,/O what/O's/O to/O be/O done/O?/O Your/O wife/O gets/O older/O,/O while/O
you/O're/O full/O of/O life/O./O Before/O you/O've/O time/O to/O look/O round/O,/O you/O feel/O that/O you/O
ca/On't/O love/O your/O wife/O with/O love/O,/O however/O much/O you/O may/O esteem/O her/O./O And/O
then/O all/O at/O once/O love/O turns/O up/O,/O and/O you/O're/O done/O for/O,/O done/O for/O,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O with/O weary/O despair/O./O

Levin/PERSON half/O smiled/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O're/O done/O for/O,/O''/O resumed/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O ``/OBut/O what/O's/O to/O be/O done/O?/O''/O

``/ODo/On't/O steal/O rolls/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON laughed/O outright/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O moralist/O!/O But/O you/O must/O understand/O,/O there/O are/O two/O women/O;/O one/O insists/O
only/O on/O her/O rights/O,/O and/O those/O rights/O are/O your/O love/O,/O which/O you/O ca/On't/O give/O
her/O;/O and/O the/O other/O sacrifices/O everything/O for/O you/O and/O asks/O for/O nothing/O./O
What/O are/O you/O to/O do/O?/O How/O are/O you/O to/O act/O?/O There/O's/O a/O fearful/O tragedy/O in/O
it/O./O''/O

``/OIf/O you/O care/O for/O my/O profession/O of/O faith/O as/O regards/O that/O,/O I/O'll/O tell/O you/O
that/O I/O do/On't/O believe/O there/O was/O any/O tragedy/O about/O it/O./O And/O this/O is/O why/O./O To/O
my/O mind/O,/O love/O .../O both/O the/O sorts/O of/O love/O,/O which/O you/O remember/O Plato/PERSON
defines/O in/O his/O Banquet/O,/O served/O as/O the/O test/O of/O men/O./O Some/O men/O only/O
understand/O one/O sort/O,/O and/O some/O only/O the/O other/O./O And/O those/O who/O only/O know/O
the/O non-platonic/O love/O have/O no/O need/O to/O talk/O of/O tragedy/O./O In/O such/O love/O
there/O can/O be/O no/O sort/O of/O tragedy/O./O `/OI/O'm/O much/O obliged/O for/O the/O
gratification/O,/O my/O humble/O respects/O'/O--/Othat/O's/O all/O the/O tragedy/O./O And/O in/O
platonic/O love/O there/O can/O be/O no/O tragedy/O,/O because/O in/O that/O love/O all/O is/O clear/O
and/O pure/O,/O because/O.../O''/O

At/O that/O instant/O Levin/PERSON recollected/O his/O own/O sins/O and/O the/O inner/O conflict/O he/O
had/O lived/O through/O./O And/O he/O added/O unexpectedly/O:/O

``/OBut/O perhaps/O you/O are/O right/O./O Very/O likely/O .../O I/O do/On't/O know/O,/O I/O do/On't/O know/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O this/O,/O do/On't/O you/O see/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O ``/Oyou/O're/O very/O much/O
all/O of/O a/O piece/O./O That/O's/O your/O strong/O point/O and/O your/O failing/O./O You/O have/O a/O
character/O that/O's/O all/O of/O a/O piece/O,/O and/O you/O want/O the/O whole/O of/O life/O to/O be/O of/O
a/O piece/O too/O--/Obut/O that/O's/O not/O how/O it/O is/O./O You/O despise/O public/O official/O work/O
because/O you/O want/O the/O reality/O to/O be/O invariably/O corresponding/O all/O the/O
while/O with/O the/O aim/O--/Oand/O that/O's/O not/O how/O it/O is/O./O You/O want/O a/O man/O's/O work/O,/O too/O,/O
always/O to/O have/O a/O defined/O aim/O,/O and/O love/O and/O family/O life/O always/O to/O be/O
undivided/O--/Oand/O that/O's/O not/O how/O it/O is/O./O All/O the/O variety/O,/O all/O the/O charm/O,/O all/O
the/O beauty/O of/O life/O is/O made/O up/O of/O light/O and/O shadow/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON sighed/O and/O made/O no/O reply/O./O He/O was/O thinking/O of/O his/O own/O affairs/O,/O and/O
did/O not/O hear/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O

And/O suddenly/O both/O of/O them/O felt/O that/O though/O they/O were/O friends/O,/O though/O
they/O had/O been/O dining/O and/O drinking/O together/O,/O which/O should/O have/O drawn/O them/O
closer/O,/O yet/O each/O was/O thinking/O only/O of/O his/O own/O affairs/O,/O and/O they/O had/O
nothing/O to/O do/O with/O one/O another/O./O Oblonsky/PERSON had/O more/O than/O once/O experienced/O
this/O extreme/O sense/O of/O aloofness/O,/O instead/O of/O intimacy/O,/O coming/O on/O after/O
dinner/O,/O and/O he/O knew/O what/O to/O do/O in/O such/O cases/O./O

``/OBill/O!/O''/O he/O called/O,/O and/O he/O went/O into/O the/O next/O room/O where/O he/O promptly/O came/O
across/O an/O aide-de-camp/O of/O his/O acquaintance/O and/O dropped/O into/O conversation/O
with/O him/O about/O an/O actress/O and/O her/O protector/O./O And/O at/O once/O in/O the/O
conversation/O with/O the/O aide-de-camp/O Oblonsky/PERSON had/O a/O sense/O of/O relaxation/O
and/O relief/O after/O the/O conversation/O with/O Levin/PERSON,/O which/O always/O put/O him/O to/O
too/O great/O a/O mental/O and/O spiritual/O strain/O./O

When/O the/O Tatar/O appeared/O with/O a/O bill/O for/O twenty-six/O roubles/O and/O odd/O
kopecks/O,/O besides/O a/O tip/O for/O himself/O,/O Levin/PERSON,/O who/O would/O another/O time/O have/O
been/O horrified/O,/O like/O any/O one/O from/O the/O country/O,/O at/O his/O share/O of/O fourteen/O
roubles/O,/O did/O not/O notice/O it/O,/O paid/O,/O and/O set/O off/O homewards/O to/O dress/O and/O go/O
to/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O there/O to/O decide/O his/O fate/O./O



Chapter/O 12/O


The/O young/O Princess/O Kitty/PERSON Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON was/O eighteen/O./O It/O was/O the/O first/O
winter/O that/O she/O had/O been/O out/O in/O the/O world/O./O Her/O success/O in/O society/O had/O
been/O greater/O than/O that/O of/O either/O of/O her/O elder/O sisters/O,/O and/O greater/O even/O
than/O her/O mother/O had/O anticipated/O./O To/O say/O nothing/O of/O the/O young/O men/O who/O
danced/O at/O the/O Moscow/LOCATION balls/O being/O almost/O all/O in/O love/O with/O Kitty/PERSON,/O two/O
serious/O suitors/O had/O already/O this/O first/O winter/O made/O their/O appearance/O:/O
Levin/PERSON,/O and/O immediately/O after/O his/O departure/O,/O Count/O Vronsky/O./O

Levin/PERSON's/O appearance/O at/O the/O beginning/O of/O the/O winter/O,/O his/O frequent/O visits/O,/O
and/O evident/O love/O for/O Kitty/PERSON,/O had/O led/O to/O the/O first/O serious/O conversations/O
between/O Kitty/PERSON's/O parents/O as/O to/O her/O future/O,/O and/O to/O disputes/O between/O them/O./O
The/O prince/O was/O on/O Levin/PERSON's/O side/O;/O he/O said/O he/O wished/O for/O nothing/O better/O for/O
Kitty/PERSON./O The/O princess/O for/O her/O part/O,/O going/O round/O the/O question/O in/O the/O manner/O
peculiar/O to/O women/O,/O maintained/O that/O Kitty/PERSON was/O too/O young/O,/O that/O Levin/PERSON had/O
done/O nothing/O to/O prove/O that/O he/O had/O serious/O intentions/O,/O that/O Kitty/PERSON felt/O no/O
great/O attraction/O to/O him/O,/O and/O other/O side/O issues/O;/O but/O she/O did/O not/O state/O
the/O principal/O point/O,/O which/O was/O that/O she/O looked/O for/O a/O better/O match/O for/O
her/O daughter/O,/O and/O that/O Levin/PERSON was/O not/O to/O her/O liking/O,/O and/O she/O did/O not/O
understand/O him/O./O When/O Levin/PERSON had/O abruptly/O departed/O,/O the/O princess/O was/O
delighted/O,/O and/O said/O to/O her/O husband/O triumphantly/O:/O ``/OYou/O see/O I/O was/O right/O./O''/O
When/O Vronsky/O appeared/O on/O the/O scene/O,/O she/O was/O still/O more/O delighted/O,/O
confirmed/O in/O her/O opinion/O that/O Kitty/PERSON was/O to/O make/O not/O simply/O a/O good/O,/O but/O a/O
brilliant/O match/O./O

In/O the/O mother/O's/O eyes/O there/O could/O be/O no/O comparison/O between/O Vronsky/O and/O
Levin/PERSON./O She/O disliked/O in/O Levin/PERSON his/O strange/O and/O uncompromising/O opinions/O and/O
his/O shyness/O in/O society/O,/O founded/O,/O as/O she/O supposed/O,/O on/O his/O pride/O and/O his/O
queer/O sort/O of/O life/O,/O as/O she/O considered/O it/O,/O absorbed/O in/O cattle/O and/O
peasants/O./O She/O did/O not/O very/O much/O like/O it/O that/O he/O,/O who/O was/O in/O love/O with/O
her/O daughter/O,/O had/O kept/O coming/O to/O the/O house/O for/O six/O weeks/O,/O as/O though/O he/O
were/O waiting/O for/O something/O,/O inspecting/O,/O as/O though/O he/O were/O afraid/O he/O
might/O be/O doing/O them/O too/O great/O an/O honor/O by/O making/O an/O offer/O,/O and/O did/O not/O
realize/O that/O a/O man/O,/O who/O continually/O visits/O at/O a/O house/O where/O there/O is/O a/O
young/O unmarried/O girl/O,/O is/O bound/O to/O make/O his/O intentions/O clear/O./O And/O
suddenly/O,/O without/O doing/O so/O,/O he/O disappeared/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O as/O well/O he/O's/O not/O
attractive/O enough/O for/O Kitty/PERSON to/O have/O fallen/O in/O love/O with/O him/O,/O''/O thought/O
the/O mother/O./O

Vronsky/O satisfied/O all/O the/O mother/O's/O desires/O./O Very/O wealthy/O,/O clever/O,/O of/O
aristocratic/O family/O,/O on/O the/O highroad/O to/O a/O brilliant/O career/O in/O the/O army/O
and/O at/O court/O,/O and/O a/O fascinating/O man/O./O Nothing/O better/O could/O be/O wished/O for/O./O

Vronsky/O openly/O flirted/O with/O Kitty/PERSON at/O balls/O,/O danced/O with/O her/O,/O and/O came/O
continually/O to/O the/O house/O,/O consequently/O there/O could/O be/O no/O doubt/O of/O the/O
seriousness/O of/O his/O intentions/O./O But/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O that/O,/O the/O mother/O had/O
spent/O the/O whole/O of/O that/O winter/O in/O a/O state/O of/O terrible/O anxiety/O and/O
agitation/O./O

Princess/O Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON had/O herself/O been/O married/O thirty/O years/O ago/O,/O her/O
aunt/O arranging/O the/O match/O./O Her/O husband/O,/O about/O whom/O everything/O was/O well/O
known/O before/O hand/O,/O had/O come/O,/O looked/O at/O his/O future/O bride/O,/O and/O been/O looked/O
at/O./O The/O match-making/O aunt/O had/O ascertained/O and/O communicated/O their/O mutual/O
impression/O./O That/O impression/O had/O been/O favorable/O./O Afterwards/O,/O on/O a/O day/O
fixed/O beforehand/O,/O the/O expected/O offer/O was/O made/O to/O her/O parents/O,/O and/O
accepted/O./O All/O had/O passed/O very/O simply/O and/O easily/O./O So/O it/O seemed/O,/O at/O least/O,/O
to/O the/O princess/O./O But/O over/O her/O own/O daughters/O she/O had/O felt/O how/O far/O from/O
simple/O and/O easy/O is/O the/O business/O,/O apparently/O so/O commonplace/O,/O of/O marrying/O
off/O one/O's/O daughters/O./O The/O panics/O that/O had/O been/O lived/O through/O,/O the/O
thoughts/O that/O had/O been/O brooded/O over/O,/O the/O money/O that/O had/O been/O wasted/O,/O and/O
the/O disputes/O with/O her/O husband/O over/O marrying/O the/O two/O elder/O girls/O,/O Darya/PERSON
and/O Natalia/PERSON!/O Now/O,/O since/O the/O youngest/O had/O come/O out/O,/O she/O was/O going/O through/O
the/O same/O terrors/O,/O the/O same/O doubts/O,/O and/O still/O more/O violent/O quarrels/O with/O
her/O husband/O than/O she/O had/O over/O the/O elder/O girls/O./O The/O old/O prince/O,/O like/O all/O
fathers/O indeed/O,/O was/O exceedingly/O punctilious/O on/O the/O score/O of/O the/O honor/O
and/O reputation/O of/O his/O daughters/O./O He/O was/O irrationally/O jealous/O over/O his/O
daughters/O,/O especially/O over/O Kitty/PERSON,/O who/O was/O his/O favorite/O./O At/O every/O turn/O he/O
had/O scenes/O with/O the/O princess/O for/O compromising/O her/O daughter/O./O The/O princess/O
had/O grown/O accustomed/O to/O this/O already/O with/O her/O other/O daughters/O,/O but/O now/O
she/O felt/O that/O there/O was/O more/O ground/O for/O the/O prince/O's/O touchiness/O./O She/O saw/O
that/O of/O late/O years/O much/O was/O changed/O in/O the/O manners/O of/O society/O,/O that/O a/O
mother/O's/O duties/O had/O become/O still/O more/O difficult/O./O She/O saw/O that/O girls/O of/O
