Kitty/PERSON's/O age/O formed/O some/O sort/O of/O clubs/O,/O went/O to/O some/O sort/O of/O lectures/O,/O
mixed/O freely/O in/O men/O's/O society/O;/O drove/O about/O the/O streets/O alone/O,/O many/O of/O
them/O did/O not/O curtsey/O,/O and/O,/O what/O was/O the/O most/O important/O thing/O,/O all/O the/O
girls/O were/O firmly/O convinced/O that/O to/O choose/O their/O husbands/O was/O their/O own/O
affair/O,/O and/O not/O their/O parents/O'/O./O ``/OMarriages/O are/On't/O made/O nowadays/O as/O they/O
used/O to/O be/O,/O''/O was/O thought/O and/O said/O by/O all/O these/O young/O girls/O,/O and/O even/O by/O
their/O elders/O./O But/O how/O marriages/O were/O made/O now/O,/O the/O princess/O could/O not/O
learn/O from/O any/O one/O./O The/O French/O fashion/O--/Oof/O the/O parents/O arranging/O their/O
children/O's/O future/O--/Owas/O not/O accepted/O;/O it/O was/O condemned/O./O The/O English/O
fashion/O of/O the/O complete/O independence/O of/O girls/O was/O also/O not/O accepted/O,/O and/O
not/O possible/O in/O Russian/O society/O./O The/O Russian/O fashion/O of/O match-making/O by/O
the/O offices/O of/O intermediate/O persons/O was/O for/O some/O reason/O considered/O
unseemly/O;/O it/O was/O ridiculed/O by/O every/O one/O,/O and/O by/O the/O princess/O herself/O./O
But/O how/O girls/O were/O to/O be/O married/O,/O and/O how/O parents/O were/O to/O marry/O them/O,/O no/O
one/O knew/O./O Everyone/O with/O whom/O the/O princess/O had/O chanced/O to/O discuss/O the/O
matter/O said/O the/O same/O thing/O:/O ``/OMercy/O on/O us/O,/O it/O's/O high/O time/O in/O our/O day/O to/O
cast/O off/O all/O that/O old-fashioned/O business/O./O It/O's/O the/O young/O people/O have/O to/O
marry/O;/O and/O not/O their/O parents/O;/O and/O so/O we/O ought/O to/O leave/O the/O young/O people/O
to/O arrange/O it/O as/O they/O choose/O./O''/O It/O was/O very/O easy/O for/O anyone/O to/O say/O that/O
who/O had/O no/O daughters/O,/O but/O the/O princess/O realized/O that/O in/O the/O process/O of/O
getting/O to/O know/O each/O other/O,/O her/O daughter/O might/O fall/O in/O love/O,/O and/O fall/O in/O
love/O with/O someone/O who/O did/O not/O care/O to/O marry/O her/O or/O who/O was/O quite/O unfit/O
to/O be/O her/O husband/O./O And/O,/O however/O much/O it/O was/O instilled/O into/O the/O princess/O
that/O in/O our/O times/O young/O people/O ought/O to/O arrange/O their/O lives/O for/O
themselves/O,/O she/O was/O unable/O to/O believe/O it/O,/O just/O as/O she/O would/O have/O been/O
unable/O to/O believe/O that/O,/O at/O any/O time/O whatever/O,/O the/O most/O suitable/O
playthings/O for/O children/O five/O years/O old/O ought/O to/O be/O loaded/O pistols/O./O And/O
so/O the/O princess/O was/O more/O uneasy/O over/O Kitty/PERSON than/O she/O had/O been/O over/O her/O
elder/O sisters/O./O

Now/O she/O was/O afraid/O that/O Vronsky/PERSON might/O confine/O himself/O to/O simply/O flirting/O
with/O her/O daughter/O./O She/O saw/O that/O her/O daughter/O was/O in/O love/O with/O him/O,/O but/O
tried/O to/O comfort/O herself/O with/O the/O thought/O that/O he/O was/O an/O honorable/O man/O,/O
and/O would/O not/O do/O this/O./O But/O at/O the/O same/O time/O she/O knew/O how/O easy/O it/O is/O,/O
with/O the/O freedom/O of/O manners/O of/O today/O,/O to/O turn/O a/O girl/O's/O head/O,/O and/O how/O
lightly/O men/O generally/O regard/O such/O a/O crime/O./O The/O week/O before/O,/O Kitty/PERSON had/O
told/O her/O mother/O of/O a/O conversation/O she/O had/O with/O Vronsky/O during/O a/O mazurka/O./O
This/O conversation/O had/O partly/O reassured/O the/O princess/O;/O but/O perfectly/O at/O
ease/O she/O could/O not/O be/O./O Vronsky/PERSON had/O told/O Kitty/PERSON that/O both/O he/O and/O his/O
brother/O were/O so/O used/O to/O obeying/O their/O mother/O that/O they/O never/O made/O up/O
their/O minds/O to/O any/O important/O undertaking/O without/O consulting/O her/O./O ``/OAnd/O
just/O now/O,/O I/O am/O impatiently/O awaiting/O my/O mother/O's/O arrival/O from/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O
as/O peculiarly/O fortunate/O,/O''/O he/O told/O her/O./O

Kitty/PERSON had/O repeated/O this/O without/O attaching/O any/O significance/O to/O the/O words/O./O
But/O her/O mother/O saw/O them/O in/O a/O different/O light/O./O She/O knew/O that/O the/O old/O lady/O
was/O expected/O from/O day/O to/O day/O,/O that/O she/O would/O be/O pleased/O at/O her/O son/O's/O
choice/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O it/O strange/O that/O he/O should/O not/O make/O his/O offer/O
through/O fear/O of/O vexing/O his/O mother/O./O However/O,/O she/O was/O so/O anxious/O for/O the/O
marriage/O itself/O,/O and/O still/O more/O for/O relief/O from/O her/O fears/O,/O that/O she/O
believed/O it/O was/O so/O./O Bitter/O as/O it/O was/O for/O the/O princess/O to/O see/O the/O
unhappiness/O of/O her/O eldest/O daughter/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O on/O the/O point/O of/O leaving/O her/O
husband/O,/O her/O anxiety/O over/O the/O decision/O of/O her/O youngest/O daughter/O's/O fate/O
engrossed/O all/O her/O feelings/O./O Today/O,/O with/O Levin/PERSON's/O reappearance/O,/O a/O fresh/O
source/O of/O anxiety/O arose/O./O She/O was/O afraid/O that/O her/O daughter/O,/O who/O had/O at/O
one/O time/O,/O as/O she/O fancied/O,/O a/O feeling/O for/O Levin/PERSON,/O might/O,/O from/O extreme/O sense/O
of/O honor/O,/O refuse/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O that/O Levin/PERSON's/O arrival/O might/O generally/O
complicate/O and/O delay/O the/O affair/O so/O near/O being/O concluded/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O has/O he/O been/O here/O long/O?/O''/O the/O princess/O asked/O about/O Levin/PERSON,/O as/O they/O
returned/O home/O./O

``/OHe/O came/O today/O,/O mamma/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O's/O one/O thing/O I/O want/O to/O say/O.../O''/O began/O the/O princess/O,/O and/O from/O her/O
serious/O and/O alert/O face/O,/O Kitty/PERSON guessed/O what/O it/O would/O be/O./O

``/OMamma/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O flushing/O hotly/O and/O turning/O quickly/O to/O her/O,/O ``/Oplease/O,/O
please/O do/On't/O say/O anything/O about/O that/O./O I/O know/O,/O I/O know/O all/O about/O it/O./O''/O

She/O wished/O for/O what/O her/O mother/O wished/O for/O,/O but/O the/O motives/O of/O her/O
mother/O's/O wishes/O wounded/O her/O./O

``/OI/O only/O want/O to/O say/O that/O to/O raise/O hopes/O.../O''/O

``/OMamma/O,/O darling/O,/O for/O goodness/O'/O sake/O,/O do/On't/O talk/O about/O it/O./O It/O's/O so/O
horrible/O to/O talk/O about/O it/O./O''/O

``/OI/O wo/On't/O,/O''/O said/O her/O mother/O,/O seeing/O the/O tears/O in/O her/O daughter/O's/O eyes/O;/O
``/Obut/O one/O thing/O,/O my/O love/O;/O you/O promised/O me/O you/O would/O have/O no/O secrets/O from/O
me/O./O You/O wo/On't/O?/O''/O

``/ONever/O,/O mamma/O,/O none/O,/O''/O answered/O Kitty/PERSON,/O flushing/O a/O little/O,/O and/O looking/O her/O
mother/O straight/O in/O the/O face/O,/O ``/Obut/O there/O's/O no/O use/O in/O my/O telling/O you/O
anything/O,/O and/O I/O .../O I/O .../O if/O I/O wanted/O to/O,/O I/O do/On't/O know/O what/O to/O say/O or/O
how/O .../O I/O do/On't/O know/O.../O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O she/O could/O not/O tell/O an/O untruth/O with/O those/O eyes/O,/O''/O thought/O the/O mother/O,/O
smiling/O at/O her/O agitation/O and/O happiness/O./O The/O princess/O smiled/O that/O what/O
was/O taking/O place/O just/O now/O in/O her/O soul/O seemed/O to/O the/O poor/O child/O so/O
immense/O and/O so/O important/O./O



Chapter/O 13/O


After/O dinner/O,/O and/O till/O the/O beginning/O of/O the/O evening/O,/O Kitty/PERSON was/O feeling/O a/O
sensation/O akin/O to/O the/O sensation/O of/O a/O young/O man/O before/O a/O battle/O./O Her/O
heart/O throbbed/O violently/O,/O and/O her/O thoughts/O would/O not/O rest/O on/O anything/O./O

She/O felt/O that/O this/O evening/O,/O when/O they/O would/O both/O meet/O for/O the/O first/O
time/O,/O would/O be/O a/O turning/O point/O in/O her/O life/O./O And/O she/O was/O continually/O
picturing/O them/O to/O herself/O,/O at/O one/O moment/O each/O separately/O,/O and/O then/O both/O
together/O./O When/O she/O mused/O on/O the/O past/O,/O she/O dwelt/O with/O pleasure/O,/O with/O
tenderness/O,/O on/O the/O memories/O of/O her/O relations/O with/O Levin/PERSON./O The/O memories/O of/O
childhood/O and/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O friendship/O with/O her/O dead/O brother/O gave/O a/O special/O
poetic/O charm/O to/O her/O relations/O with/O him/O./O His/O love/O for/O her/O,/O of/O which/O she/O
felt/O certain/O,/O was/O flattering/O and/O delightful/O to/O her/O;/O and/O it/O was/O pleasant/O
for/O her/O to/O think/O of/O Levin/PERSON./O In/O her/O memories/O of/O Vronsky/O there/O always/O
entered/O a/O certain/O element/O of/O awkwardness/O,/O though/O he/O was/O in/O the/O highest/O
degree/O well-bred/O and/O at/O ease/O,/O as/O though/O there/O were/O some/O false/O note/O--/Onot/O
in/O Vronsky/O,/O he/O was/O very/O simple/O and/O nice/O,/O but/O in/O herself/O,/O while/O with/O
Levin/PERSON she/O felt/O perfectly/O simple/O and/O clear/O./O But/O,/O on/O the/O other/O hand/O,/O
directly/O she/O thought/O of/O the/O future/O with/O Vronsky/O,/O there/O arose/O before/O her/O
a/O perspective/O of/O brilliant/O happiness/O;/O with/O Levin/PERSON the/O future/O seemed/O
misty/O./O

When/O she/O went/O upstairs/O to/O dress/O,/O and/O looked/O into/O the/O looking-glass/O,/O she/O
noticed/O with/O joy/O that/O it/O was/O one/O of/O her/O good/O days/O,/O and/O that/O she/O was/O in/O
complete/O possession/O of/O all/O her/O forces/O,/O--/Oshe/O needed/O this/O so/O for/O what/O lay/O
before/O her/O:/O she/O was/O conscious/O of/O external/O composure/O and/O free/O grace/O in/O
her/O movements/O./O

At/O half-past/O seven/O she/O had/O only/O just/O gone/O down/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O
when/O the/O footman/O announced/O,/O ``/OKonstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON Levin/PERSON./O''/O The/O
princess/O was/O still/O in/O her/O room/O,/O and/O the/O prince/O had/O not/O come/O in/O./O ``/OSo/O it/O
is/O to/O be/O,/O''/O thought/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O all/O the/O blood/O seemed/O to/O rush/O to/O her/O heart/O./O
She/O was/O horrified/O at/O her/O paleness/O,/O as/O she/O glanced/O into/O the/O
looking-glass/O./O At/O that/O moment/O she/O knew/O beyond/O doubt/O that/O he/O had/O come/O
early/O on/O purpose/O to/O find/O her/O alone/O and/O to/O make/O her/O an/O offer/O./O And/O only/O
then/O for/O the/O first/O time/O the/O whole/O thing/O presented/O itself/O in/O a/O new/O,/O
different/O aspect/O;/O only/O then/O she/O realized/O that/O the/O question/O did/O not/O
affect/O her/O only/O--/Owith/O whom/O she/O would/O be/O happy/O,/O and/O whom/O she/O loved/O--/Obut/O
that/O she/O would/O have/O that/O moment/O to/O wound/O a/O man/O whom/O she/O liked/O./O And/O to/O
wound/O him/O cruelly/O./O What/O for/O?/O Because/O he/O,/O dear/O fellow/O,/O loved/O her/O,/O was/O in/O
love/O with/O her/O./O But/O there/O was/O no/O help/O for/O it/O,/O so/O it/O must/O be/O,/O so/O it/O would/O
have/O to/O be/O./O

``/OMy/O God/O!/O shall/O I/O myself/O really/O have/O to/O say/O it/O to/O him/O?/O''/O she/O thought/O./O ``/OCan/O
I/O tell/O him/O I/O do/On't/O love/O him/O?/O That/O will/O be/O a/O lie/O./O What/O am/O I/O to/O say/O to/O
him/O?/O That/O I/O love/O someone/O else/O?/O No/O,/O that/O's/O impossible/O./O I/O'm/O going/O away/O,/O
I/O'm/O going/O away/O./O''/O

She/O had/O reached/O the/O door/O,/O when/O she/O heard/O his/O step/O./O ``/ONo/O!/O it/O's/O not/O honest/O./O
What/O have/O I/O to/O be/O afraid/O of/O?/O I/O have/O done/O nothing/O wrong/O./O What/O is/O to/O be/O,/O
will/O be/O!/O I/O'll/O tell/O the/O truth/O./O And/O with/O him/O one/O ca/On't/O be/O ill/O at/O ease/O./O
Here/O he/O is/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O,/O seeing/O his/O powerful/O,/O shy/O figure/O,/O with/O
his/O shining/O eyes/O fixed/O on/O her/O./O She/O looked/O straight/O into/O his/O face/O,/O as/O
though/O imploring/O him/O to/O spare/O her/O,/O and/O gave/O her/O hand/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O time/O yet/O;/O I/O think/O I/O'm/O too/O early/O,/O''/O he/O said/O glancing/O round/O the/O
empty/O drawing/O room/O./O When/O he/O saw/O that/O his/O expectations/O were/O realized/O,/O
that/O there/O was/O nothing/O to/O prevent/O him/O from/O speaking/O,/O his/O face/O became/O
gloomy/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O sat/O down/O at/O the/O table/O./O

``/OBut/O this/O was/O just/O what/O I/O wanted/O,/O to/O find/O you/O alone/O,/O''/O he/O began/O,/O not/O
sitting/O down/O,/O and/O not/O looking/O at/O her/O,/O so/O as/O not/O to/O lose/O courage/O./O

``/OMamma/O will/O be/O down/O directly/O./O She/O was/O very/O much/O tired/O.../O./O Yesterday/O.../O''/O

She/O talked/O on/O,/O not/O knowing/O what/O her/O lips/O were/O uttering/O,/O and/O not/O taking/O
her/O supplicating/O and/O caressing/O eyes/O off/O him/O./O

He/O glanced/O at/O her/O;/O she/O blushed/O,/O and/O ceased/O speaking/O./O

``/OI/O told/O you/O I/O did/O not/O know/O whether/O I/O should/O be/O here/O long/O .../O that/O it/O
depended/O on/O you/O.../O''/O

She/O dropped/O her/O head/O lower/O and/O lower/O,/O not/O knowing/O herself/O what/O answer/O
she/O should/O make/O to/O what/O was/O coming/O./O

``/OThat/O it/O depended/O on/O you/O,/O''/O he/O repeated/O./O ``/OI/O meant/O to/O say/O .../O I/O meant/O to/O
say/O .../O I/O came/O for/O this/O .../O to/O be/O my/O wife/O!/O''/O he/O brought/O out/O,/O not/O knowing/O
what/O he/O was/O saying/O;/O but/O feeling/O that/O the/O most/O terrible/O thing/O was/O said/O,/O
he/O stopped/O short/O and/O looked/O at/O her/O.../O

She/O was/O breathing/O heavily/O,/O not/O looking/O at/O him/O./O She/O was/O feeling/O ecstasy/O./O
Her/O soul/O was/O flooded/O with/O happiness/O./O She/O had/O never/O anticipated/O that/O the/O
utterance/O of/O love/O would/O produce/O such/O a/O powerful/O effect/O on/O her/O./O But/O it/O
lasted/O only/O an/O instant/O./O She/O remembered/O Vronsky/O./O She/O lifted/O her/O clear/O,/O
truthful/O eyes/O,/O and/O seeing/O his/O desperate/O face/O,/O she/O answered/O hastily/O:/O

``/OThat/O can/Onot/O be/O .../O forgive/O me/O./O''/O

A/O moment/O ago/O,/O and/O how/O close/O she/O had/O been/O to/O him/O,/O of/O what/O importance/O in/O
his/O life/O!/O And/O how/O aloof/O and/O remote/O from/O him/O she/O had/O become/O now/O!/O

``/OIt/O was/O bound/O to/O be/O so/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O not/O looking/O at/O her/O./O

He/O bowed/O,/O and/O was/O meaning/O to/O retreat/O./O



Chapter/O 14/O


But/O at/O that/O very/O moment/O the/O princess/O came/O in/O./O There/O was/O a/O look/O of/O horror/O
on/O her/O face/O when/O she/O saw/O them/O alone/O,/O and/O their/O disturbed/O faces/O./O Levin/PERSON
bowed/O to/O her/O,/O and/O said/O nothing/O./O Kitty/PERSON did/O not/O speak/O nor/O lift/O her/O eyes/O./O
``/OThank/O God/O,/O she/O has/O refused/O him/O,/O''/O thought/O the/O mother/O,/O and/O her/O face/O
lighted/O up/O with/O the/O habitual/O smile/O with/O which/O she/O greeted/O her/O guests/O on/O
Thursdays/O./O She/O sat/O down/O and/O began/O questioning/O Levin/PERSON about/O his/O life/O in/O
the/O country/O./O He/O sat/O down/O again/O,/O waiting/O for/O other/O visitors/O to/O arrive/O,/O in/O
order/O to/O retreat/O unnoticed/O./O

Five/O minutes/O later/O there/O came/O in/O a/O friend/O of/O Kitty/PERSON's/O,/O married/O the/O
preceding/O winter/O,/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON./O

She/O was/O a/O thin/O,/O sallow/O,/O sickly/O,/O and/O nervous/O woman/O,/O with/O brilliant/O black/O
eyes/O./O She/O was/O fond/O of/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O her/O affection/O for/O her/O showed/O itself/O,/O as/O
the/O affection/O of/O married/O women/O for/O girls/O always/O does/O,/O in/O the/O desire/O to/O
make/O a/O match/O for/O Kitty/PERSON after/O her/O own/O ideal/O of/O married/O happiness/O;/O she/O
wanted/O her/O to/O marry/O Vronsky/O./O Levin/PERSON she/O had/O often/O met/O at/O the/O
Shtcherbatskys/O'/O early/O in/O the/O winter/O,/O and/O she/O had/O always/O disliked/O him/O./O
Her/O invariable/O and/O favorite/O pursuit/O,/O when/O they/O met/O,/O consisted/O in/O making/O
fun/O of/O him/O./O

``/OI/O do/O like/O it/O when/O he/O looks/O down/O at/O me/O from/O the/O height/O of/O his/O grandeur/O,/O
or/O breaks/O off/O his/O learned/O conversation/O with/O me/O because/O I/O'm/O a/O fool/O,/O or/O is/O
condescending/O to/O me/O./O I/O like/O that/O so/O;/O to/O see/O him/O condescending/O!/O I/O am/O so/O
glad/O he/O ca/On't/O bear/O me/O,/O''/O she/O used/O to/O say/O of/O him/O./O

She/O was/O right/O,/O for/O Levin/PERSON actually/O could/O not/O bear/O her/O,/O and/O despised/O her/O
for/O what/O she/O was/O proud/O of/O and/O regarded/O as/O a/O fine/O characteristic/O--/Oher/O
nervousness/O,/O her/O delicate/O contempt/O and/O indifference/O for/O everything/O
coarse/O and/O earthly/O./O

The/O Countess/O Nordston/O and/O Levin/PERSON got/O into/O that/O relation/O with/O one/O another/O
not/O seldom/O seen/O in/O society/O,/O when/O two/O persons/O,/O who/O remain/O externally/O on/O
friendly/O terms/O,/O despise/O each/O other/O to/O such/O a/O degree/O that/O they/O can/Onot/O
even/O take/O each/O other/O seriously/O,/O and/O can/Onot/O even/O be/O offended/O by/O each/O
other/O./O

The/O Countess/O Nordston/O pounced/O upon/O Levin/PERSON at/O once/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON!/O So/O you/O've/O come/O back/O to/O our/O corrupt/O
Babylon/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O giving/O him/O her/O tiny/O,/O yellow/O hand/O,/O and/O recalling/O what/O
he/O had/O chanced/O to/O say/O early/O in/O the/O winter/O,/O that/O Moscow/LOCATION was/O a/O Babylon/O./O
``/OCome/O,/O is/O Babylon/O reformed/O,/O or/O have/O you/O degenerated/O?/O''/O she/O added/O,/O
glancing/O with/O a/O simper/O at/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OIt/O's/O very/O flattering/O for/O me/O,/O countess/O,/O that/O you/O remember/O my/O words/O so/O
well/O,/O''/O responded/O Levin/PERSON,/O who/O had/O succeeded/O in/O recovering/O his/O composure/O,/O
and/O at/O once/O from/O habit/O dropped/O into/O his/O tone/O of/O joking/O hostility/O to/O the/O
Countess/O Nordston/O./O ``/OThey/O must/O certainly/O make/O a/O great/O impression/O on/O you/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O should/O think/O so/O!/O I/O always/O note/O them/O all/O down/O./O Well/O,/O Kitty/PERSON,/O have/O
you/O been/O skating/O again/O?/O.../O''/O

And/O she/O began/O talking/O to/O Kitty/PERSON./O Awkward/O as/O it/O was/O for/O Levin/PERSON to/O withdraw/O
now/O,/O it/O would/O still/O have/O been/O easier/O for/O him/O to/O perpetrate/O this/O
awkwardness/O than/O to/O remain/O all/O the/O evening/O and/O see/O Kitty/PERSON,/O who/O glanced/O at/O
him/O now/O and/O then/O and/O avoided/O his/O eyes/O./O He/O was/O on/O the/O point/O of/O getting/O
up/O,/O when/O the/O princess/O,/O noticing/O that/O he/O was/O silent/O,/O addressed/O him/O./O

``/OShall/O you/O be/O long/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION?/O You/O're/O busy/O with/O the/O district/O council/O,/O
though/O,/O are/On't/O you/O,/O and/O ca/On't/O be/O away/O for/O long/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O princess/O,/O I/O'm/O no/O longer/O a/O member/O of/O the/O council/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OI/O have/O
come/O up/O for/O a/O few/O days/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O's/O something/O the/O matter/O with/O him/O,/O''/O thought/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON,/O
glancing/O at/O his/O stern/O,/O serious/O face/O./O ``/OHe/O is/On't/O in/O his/O old/O argumentative/O
mood/O./O But/O I/O'll/O draw/O him/O out/O./O I/O do/O love/O making/O a/O fool/O of/O him/O before/O
Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O I/O'll/O do/O it/O./O''/O

``/OKonstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O him/O,/O ``/Odo/O explain/O to/O me/O,/O please/O,/O
what/O's/O the/O meaning/O of/O it/O./O You/O know/O all/O about/O such/O things/O./O At/O home/O in/O our/O
village/O of/O Kaluga/LOCATION all/O the/O peasants/O and/O all/O the/O women/O have/O drunk/O up/O all/O
they/O possessed/O,/O and/O now/O they/O ca/On't/O pay/O us/O any/O rent/O./O What/O's/O the/O meaning/O
of/O that/O?/O You/O always/O praise/O the/O peasants/O so/O./O''/O

At/O that/O instant/O another/O lady/O came/O into/O the/O room/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON got/O up/O./O

``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O countess/O,/O but/O I/O really/O know/O nothing/O about/O it/O,/O and/O ca/On't/O tell/O
you/O anything/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O looked/O round/O at/O the/O officer/O who/O came/O in/O
behind/O the/O lady/O./O

``/OThat/O must/O be/O Vronsky/O,/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O,/O to/O be/O sure/O of/O it/O,/O glanced/O at/O
Kitty/LOCATION./O She/O had/O already/O had/O time/O to/O look/O at/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O looked/O round/O at/O
Levin/PERSON./O And/O simply/O from/O the/O look/O in/O her/O eyes/O,/O that/O grew/O unconsciously/O
brighter/O,/O Levin/PERSON knew/O that/O she/O loved/O that/O man/O,/O knew/O it/O as/O surely/O as/O if/O
she/O had/O told/O him/O so/O in/O words/O./O But/O what/O sort/O of/O a/O man/O was/O he/O?/O Now/O,/O
whether/O for/O good/O or/O for/O ill/O,/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O choose/O but/O remain/O;/O he/O must/O
find/O out/O what/O the/O man/O was/O like/O whom/O she/O loved/O./O

There/O are/O people/O who/O,/O on/O meeting/O a/O successful/O rival/O,/O no/O matter/O in/O what/O,/O
are/O at/O once/O disposed/O to/O turn/O their/O backs/O on/O everything/O good/O in/O him/O,/O and/O
to/O see/O only/O what/O is/O bad/O./O There/O are/O people/O,/O on/O the/O other/O hand/O,/O who/O desire/O
above/O all/O to/O find/O in/O that/O lucky/O rival/O the/O qualities/O by/O which/O he/O has/O
outstripped/O them/O,/O and/O seek/O with/O a/O throbbing/O ache/O at/O heart/O only/O what/O is/O
good/O./O Levin/PERSON belonged/O to/O the/O second/O class/O./O But/O he/O had/O no/O difficulty/O in/O
finding/O what/O was/O good/O and/O attractive/O in/O Vronsky/O./O It/O was/O apparent/O at/O the/O
first/O glance/O./O Vronsky/O was/O a/O squarely/O built/O,/O dark/O man/O,/O not/O very/O tall/O,/O
with/O a/O good-humored/O,/O handsome/O,/O and/O exceedingly/O calm/O and/O resolute/O face/O./O
Everything/O about/O his/O face/O and/O figure/O,/O from/O his/O short-cropped/O black/O hair/O
and/O freshly/O shaven/O chin/O down/O to/O his/O loosely/O fitting/O,/O brand-new/O uniform/O,/O
was/O simple/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O elegant/O./O Making/O way/O for/O the/O lady/O who/O had/O
come/O in/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON went/O up/O to/O the/O princess/O and/O then/O to/O Kitty/PERSON./O

As/O he/O approached/O her/O,/O his/O beautiful/O eyes/O shone/O with/O a/O specially/O tender/O
light/O,/O and/O with/O a/O faint/O,/O happy/O,/O and/O modestly/O triumphant/O smile/O -LRB-/Oso/O it/O
seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON-RRB-/O,/O bowing/O carefully/O and/O respectfully/O over/O her/O,/O he/O held/O
out/O his/O small/O broad/O hand/O to/O her/O./O

Greeting/O and/O saying/O a/O few/O words/O to/O everyone/O,/O he/O sat/O down/O without/O once/O
glancing/O at/O Levin/PERSON,/O who/O had/O never/O taken/O his/O eyes/O off/O him/O./O

``/OLet/O me/O introduce/O you/O,/O''/O said/O the/O princess/O,/O indicating/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OKonstantin/PERSON
Dmitrievitch/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O Count/O Alexey/PERSON Kirillovitch/PERSON Vronsky/PERSON./O''/O

Vronsky/O got/O up/O and/O,/O looking/O cordially/O at/O Levin/PERSON,/O shook/O hands/O with/O him/O./O

``/OI/O believe/O I/O was/O to/O have/O dined/O with/O you/O this/O winter/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O smiling/O
his/O simple/O and/O open/O smile/O;/O ``/Obut/O you/O had/O unexpectedly/O left/O for/O the/O
country/O./O''/O

``/OKonstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON despises/O and/O hates/O town/O and/O us/O townspeople/O,/O''/O
said/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON./O

``/OMy/O words/O must/O make/O a/O deep/O impression/O on/O you/O,/O since/O you/O remember/O them/O so/O
well/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O,/O suddenly/O conscious/O that/O he/O had/O said/O just/O the/O
same/O thing/O before/O,/O he/O reddened/O./O

Vronsky/O looked/O at/O Levin/PERSON and/O Countess/O Nordston/O,/O and/O smiled/O./O

``/OAre/O you/O always/O in/O the/O country/O?/O''/O he/O inquired/O./O ``/OI/O should/O think/O it/O must/O be/O
dull/O in/O the/O winter/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O dull/O if/O one/O has/O work/O to/O do/O;/O besides/O,/O one/O's/O not/O dull/O by/O
oneself/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON replied/O abruptly/O./O

``/OI/O am/O fond/O of/O the/O country/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O noticing/O,/O and/O affecting/O not/O to/O
notice/O,/O Levin/PERSON's/O tone/O./O

``/OBut/O I/O hope/O,/O count/O,/O you/O would/O not/O consent/O to/O live/O in/O the/O country/O
always/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O;/O I/O have/O never/O tried/O for/O long/O./O I/O experienced/O a/O queer/O
feeling/O once/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O./O ``/OI/O never/O longed/O so/O for/O the/O country/O,/O Russian/O
country/O,/O with/O bast/O shoes/O and/O peasants/O,/O as/O when/O I/O was/O spending/O a/O winter/O
with/O my/O mother/O in/O Nice/O./O Nice/O itself/O is/O dull/O enough/O,/O you/O know/O./O And/O
indeed/O,/O Naples/LOCATION and/O Sorrento/PERSON are/O only/O pleasant/O for/O a/O short/O time/O./O And/O it/O's/O
just/O there/O that/O Russia/LOCATION comes/O back/O to/O me/O most/O vividly/O,/O and/O especially/O the/O
country/O./O It/O's/O as/O though/O.../O''/O

He/O talked/O on/O,/O addressing/O both/O Kitty/PERSON and/O Levin/PERSON,/O turning/O his/O serene/O,/O
friendly/O eyes/O from/O one/O to/O the/O other/O,/O and/O saying/O obviously/O just/O what/O came/O
into/O his/O head/O./O

Noticing/O that/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON wanted/O to/O say/O something/O,/O he/O stopped/O
short/O without/O finishing/O what/O he/O had/O begun/O,/O and/O listened/O attentively/O to/O
her/O./O

The/O conversation/O did/O not/O flag/O for/O an/O instant/O,/O so/O that/O the/O princess/O,/O who/O
always/O kept/O in/O reserve/O,/O in/O case/O a/O subject/O should/O be/O lacking/O,/O two/O heavy/O
guns/O--/Othe/O relative/O advantages/O of/O classical/O and/O of/O modern/O education/O,/O and/O
universal/O military/O service/O--/Ohad/O not/O to/O move/O out/O either/O of/O them/O,/O while/O
Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON had/O not/O a/O chance/O of/O chaffing/O Levin/PERSON./O

Levin/PERSON wanted/O to/O,/O and/O could/O not/O,/O take/O part/O in/O the/O general/O conversation/O;/O
saying/O to/O himself/O every/O instant/O,/O ``/ONow/O go/O,/O''/O he/O still/O did/O not/O go/O,/O as/O
though/O waiting/O for/O something/O./O

The/O conversation/O fell/O upon/O table-turning/O and/O spirits/O,/O and/O Countess/PERSON
Nordston/PERSON,/O who/O believed/O in/O spiritualism/O,/O began/O to/O describe/O the/O marvels/O
she/O had/O seen/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O countess/O,/O you/O really/O must/O take/O me/O,/O for/O pity/O's/O sake/O do/O take/O me/O to/O
see/O them/O!/O I/O have/O never/O seen/O anything/O extraordinary/O,/O though/O I/O am/O always/O
on/O the/O lookout/O for/O it/O everywhere/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O smiling/O./O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O next/O Saturday/O,/O''/O answered/O Countess/O Nordston/O./O ``/OBut/O you/O,/O
Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O do/O you/O believe/O in/O it/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWhy/O do/O you/O ask/O me/O?/O You/O know/O what/O I/O shall/O say/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O want/O to/O hear/O your/O opinion/O./O''/O

``/OMy/O opinion/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Ois/O only/O that/O this/O table-turning/O simply/O
proves/O that/O educated/O society/O--/Oso/O called/O--/Ois/O no/O higher/O than/O the/O peasants/O./O
They/O believe/O in/O the/O evil/O eye/O,/O and/O in/O witchcraft/O and/O omens/O,/O while/O we/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O then/O you/O do/On't/O believe/O in/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O believe/O in/O it/O,/O countess/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O if/O I/O've/O seen/O it/O myself/O?/O''/O

``/OThe/O peasant/O women/O too/O tell/O us/O they/O have/O seen/O goblins/O./O''/O

``/OThen/O you/O think/O I/O tell/O a/O lie/O?/O''/O

And/O she/O laughed/O a/O mirthless/O laugh/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O Masha/PERSON,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON said/O he/O could/O not/O believe/O in/O
it/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O blushing/O for/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O Levin/PERSON saw/O this/O,/O and/O,/O still/O more/O
exasperated/O,/O would/O have/O answered/O,/O but/O Vronsky/PERSON with/O his/O bright/O frank/O
smile/O rushed/O to/O the/O support/O of/O the/O conversation/O,/O which/O was/O threatening/O
to/O become/O disagreeable/O./O

``/OYou/O do/O not/O admit/O the/O conceivability/O at/O all/O?/O''/O he/O queried/O./O ``/OBut/O why/O not/O?/O
We/O admit/O the/O existence/O of/O electricity/O,/O of/O which/O we/O know/O nothing/O./O Why/O
should/O there/O not/O be/O some/O new/O force/O,/O still/O unknown/O to/O us/O,/O which/O.../O''/O

``/OWhen/O electricity/O was/O discovered/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON interrupted/O hurriedly/O,/O ``/Oit/O was/O
only/O the/O phenomenon/O that/O was/O discovered/O,/O and/O it/O was/O unknown/O from/O what/O it/O
proceeded/O and/O what/O were/O its/O effects/O,/O and/O ages/O passed/O before/O its/O
applications/O were/O conceived/O./O But/O the/O spiritualists/O have/O begun/O with/O
tables/O writing/O for/O them/O,/O and/O spirits/O appearing/O to/O them/O,/O and/O have/O only/O
later/O started/O saying/O that/O it/O is/O an/O unknown/O force/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O listened/O attentively/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O as/O he/O always/O did/O listen/O,/O
obviously/O interested/O in/O his/O words/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O the/O spiritualists/O say/O we/O do/On't/O know/O at/O present/O what/O this/O force/O
is/O,/O but/O there/O is/O a/O force/O,/O and/O these/O are/O the/O conditions/O in/O which/O it/O acts/O./O
Let/O the/O scientific/O men/O find/O out/O what/O the/O force/O consists/O in/O./O No/O,/O I/O do/On't/O
see/O why/O there/O should/O not/O be/O a/O new/O force/O,/O if/O it/O.../O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O because/O with/O electricity/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON interrupted/O again/O,/O ``/Oevery/O time/O
you/O rub/O tar/O against/O wool/O,/O a/O recognized/O phenomenon/O is/O manifested/O,/O but/O in/O
this/O case/O it/O does/O not/O happen/O every/O time/O,/O and/O so/O it/O follows/O it/O is/O not/O a/O
natural/O phenomenon/O./O''/O

Feeling/O probably/O that/O the/O conversation/O was/O taking/O a/O tone/O too/O serious/O for/O
a/O drawing/O room/O,/O Vronsky/O made/O no/O rejoinder/O,/O but/O by/O way/O of/O trying/O to/O
change/O the/O conversation/O,/O he/O smiled/O brightly/O,/O and/O turned/O to/O the/O ladies/O./O

``/ODo/O let/O us/O try/O at/O once/O,/O countess/O,/O''/O he/O said/O;/O but/O Levin/PERSON would/O finish/O
saying/O what/O he/O thought/O./O

``/OI/O think/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O ``/Othat/O this/O attempt/O of/O the/O spiritualists/O to/O
explain/O their/O marvels/O as/O some/O sort/O of/O new/O natural/O force/O is/O most/O futile/O./O
They/O boldly/O talk/O of/O spiritual/O force/O,/O and/O then/O try/O to/O subject/O it/O to/O
material/O experiment/O./O''/O

Every/O one/O was/O waiting/O for/O him/O to/O finish/O,/O and/O he/O felt/O it/O./O

``/OAnd/O I/O think/O you/O would/O be/O a/O first-rate/O medium/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON;/O
``/Othere/O's/O something/O enthusiastic/O in/O you/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON opened/O his/O mouth/O,/O was/O about/O to/O say/O something/O,/O reddened/O,/O and/O said/O
nothing/O./O

``/ODo/O let/O us/O try/O table-turning/O at/O once/O,/O please/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OPrincess/O,/O
will/O you/O allow/O it/O?/O''/O

And/O Vronsky/PERSON stood/O up/O,/O looking/O for/O a/O little/O table/O./O

Kitty/PERSON got/O up/O to/O fetch/O a/O table/O,/O and/O as/O she/O passed/O,/O her/O eyes/O met/O Levin/PERSON's/O./O
She/O felt/O for/O him/O with/O her/O whole/O heart/O,/O the/O more/O because/O she/O was/O pitying/O
him/O for/O suffering/O of/O which/O she/O was/O herself/O the/O cause/O./O ``/OIf/O you/O can/O
forgive/O me/O,/O forgive/O me/O,/O''/O said/O her/O eyes/O,/O ``/OI/O am/O so/O happy/O./O''/O

``/OI/O hate/O them/O all/O,/O and/O you/O,/O and/O myself/O,/O''/O his/O eyes/O responded/O,/O and/O he/O took/O
up/O his/O hat/O./O But/O he/O was/O not/O destined/O to/O escape/O./O Just/O as/O they/O were/O
arranging/O themselves/O round/O the/O table/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON was/O on/O the/O point/O of/O
retiring/O,/O the/O old/O prince/O came/O in/O,/O and/O after/O greeting/O the/O ladies/O,/O
addressed/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OAh/O!/O''/O he/O began/O joyously/O./O ``/OBeen/O here/O long/O,/O my/O boy/O?/O I/O did/On't/O even/O know/O you/O
were/O in/O town/O./O Very/O glad/O to/O see/O you/O./O''/O The/O old/O prince/O embraced/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O
talking/O to/O him/O did/O not/O observe/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O who/O had/O risen/O,/O and/O was/O serenely/O
waiting/O till/O the/O prince/O should/O turn/O to/O him/O./O

Kitty/PERSON felt/O how/O distasteful/O her/O father/O's/O warmth/O was/O to/O Levin/PERSON after/O what/O
had/O happened/O./O She/O saw/O,/O too/O,/O how/O coldly/O her/O father/O responded/O at/O last/O to/O
Vronsky/PERSON's/O bow/O,/O and/O how/O Vronsky/O looked/O with/O amiable/O perplexity/O at/O her/O
father/O,/O as/O though/O trying/O and/O failing/O to/O understand/O how/O and/O why/O anyone/O
could/O be/O hostilely/O disposed/O towards/O him/O,/O and/O she/O flushed/O./O

``/OPrince/PERSON,/O let/O us/O have/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON;/O
``/Owe/O want/O to/O try/O an/O experiment/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O experiment/O?/O Table-turning/O?/O Well/O,/O you/O must/O excuse/O me/O,/O ladies/O and/O
gentlemen/O,/O but/O to/O my/O mind/O it/O is/O better/O fun/O to/O play/O the/O ring/O game/O,/O''/O said/O
the/O old/O prince/O,/O looking/O at/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O guessing/O that/O it/O had/O been/O his/O
suggestion/O./O ``/OThere/O's/O some/O sense/O in/O that/O,/O anyway/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O looked/O wonderingly/O at/O the/O prince/O with/O his/O resolute/O eyes/O,/O and/O,/O
with/O a/O faint/O smile/O,/O began/O immediately/O talking/O to/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON of/O
the/O great/O ball/O that/O was/O to/O come/O off/O next/O week/O./O

``/OI/O hope/O you/O will/O be/O there/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O Kitty/PERSON./O As/O soon/O as/O the/O old/O prince/O
turned/O away/O from/O him/O,/O Levin/PERSON went/O out/O unnoticed/O,/O and/O the/O last/O impression/O
he/O carried/O away/O with/O him/O of/O that/O evening/O was/O the/O smiling/O,/O happy/O face/O of/O
Kitty/PERSON answering/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O inquiry/O about/O the/O ball/O./O



Chapter/O 15/O


At/O the/O end/O of/O the/O evening/O Kitty/PERSON told/O her/O mother/O of/O her/O conversation/O with/O
Levin/PERSON,/O and/O in/O spite/O of/O all/O the/O pity/O she/O felt/O for/O Levin/PERSON,/O she/O was/O glad/O at/O
the/O thought/O that/O she/O had/O received/O an/O _/Ooffer/O_/O./O She/O had/O no/O doubt/O that/O she/O
had/O acted/O rightly/O./O But/O after/O she/O had/O gone/O to/O bed/O,/O for/O a/O long/O while/O she/O
could/O not/O sleep/O./O One/O impression/O pursued/O her/O relentlessly/O./O It/O was/O Levin/PERSON's/O
face/O,/O with/O his/O scowling/O brows/O,/O and/O his/O kind/O eyes/O looking/O out/O in/O dark/O
dejection/O below/O them/O,/O as/O he/O stood/O listening/O to/O her/O father/O,/O and/O glancing/O
at/O her/O and/O at/O Vronsky/O./O And/O she/O felt/O so/O sorry/O for/O him/O that/O tears/O came/O
into/O her/O eyes/O./O But/O immediately/O she/O thought/O of/O the/O man/O for/O whom/O she/O had/O
given/O him/O up/O./O She/O vividly/O recalled/O his/O manly/O,/O resolute/O face/O,/O his/O noble/O
self-possession/O,/O and/O the/O good/O nature/O conspicuous/O in/O everything/O towards/O
everyone/O./O She/O remembered/O the/O love/O for/O her/O of/O the/O man/O she/O loved/O,/O and/O once/O
more/O all/O was/O gladness/O in/O her/O soul/O,/O and/O she/O lay/O on/O the/O pillow/O,/O smiling/O
with/O happiness/O./O ``/OI/O'm/O sorry/O,/O I/O'm/O sorry/O;/O but/O what/O could/O I/O do/O?/O It/O's/O not/O my/O
fault/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O;/O but/O an/O inner/O voice/O told/O her/O something/O else/O./O
Whether/O she/O felt/O remorse/O at/O having/O won/O Levin/PERSON's/O love/O,/O or/O at/O having/O
refused/O him/O,/O she/O did/O not/O know/O./O But/O her/O happiness/O was/O poisoned/O by/O doubts/O./O
``/OLord/O,/O have/O pity/O on/O us/O;/O Lord/O,/O have/O pity/O on/O us/O;/O Lord/O,/O have/O pity/O on/O us/O!/O''/O
she/O repeated/O to/O herself/O,/O till/O she/O fell/O asleep/O./O

Meanwhile/O there/O took/O place/O below/O,/O in/O the/O prince/O's/O little/O library/O,/O one/O of/O
the/O scenes/O so/O often/O repeated/O between/O the/O parents/O on/O account/O of/O their/O
favorite/O daughter/O./O

``/OWhat/O?/O I/O'll/O tell/O you/O what/O!/O''/O shouted/O the/O prince/O,/O waving/O his/O arms/O,/O and/O at/O
once/O wrapping/O his/O squirrel-lined/O dressing-gown/O round/O him/O again/O./O ``/OThat/O
you/O've/O no/O pride/O,/O no/O dignity/O;/O that/O you/O're/O disgracing/O,/O ruining/O your/O
daughter/O by/O this/O vulgar/O,/O stupid/O match-making/O!/O''/O

``/OBut/O,/O really/O,/O for/O mercy/O's/O sake/O,/O prince/O,/O what/O have/O I/O done/O?/O''/O said/O the/O
princess/O,/O almost/O crying/O./O

She/O,/O pleased/O and/O happy/O after/O her/O conversation/O with/O her/O daughter/O,/O had/O
gone/O to/O the/O prince/O to/O say/O good-night/O as/O usual/O,/O and/O though/O she/O had/O no/O
intention/O of/O telling/O him/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O offer/O and/O Kitty/PERSON's/O refusal/O,/O still/O she/O
hinted/O to/O her/O husband/O that/O she/O fancied/O things/O were/O practically/O settled/O
with/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O that/O he/O would/O declare/O himself/O so/O soon/O as/O his/O mother/O
arrived/O./O And/O thereupon/O,/O at/O those/O words/O,/O the/O prince/O had/O all/O at/O once/O flown/O
into/O a/O passion/O,/O and/O began/O to/O use/O unseemly/O language/O./O

``/OWhat/O have/O you/O done/O?/O I/O'll/O tell/O you/O what/O./O First/O of/O all/O,/O you/O're/O trying/O to/O
catch/O an/O eligible/O gentleman/O,/O and/O all/O Moscow/LOCATION will/O be/O talking/O of/O it/O,/O and/O
with/O good/O reason/O./O If/O you/O have/O evening/O parties/O,/O invite/O everyone/O,/O do/On't/O
pick/O out/O the/O possible/O suitors/O./O Invite/O all/O the/O young/O bucks/O./O Engage/O a/O
piano/O player/O,/O and/O let/O them/O dance/O,/O and/O not/O as/O you/O do/O things/O nowadays/O,/O
hunting/O up/O good/O matches/O./O It/O makes/O me/O sick/O,/O sick/O to/O see/O it/O,/O and/O you/O've/O
gone/O on/O till/O you/O've/O turned/O the/O poor/O wench/O's/O head/O./O Levin/PERSON's/O a/O thousand/O
times/O the/O better/O man/O./O As/O for/O this/O little/O Petersburg/LOCATION swell/O,/O they/O're/O
turned/O out/O by/O machinery/O,/O all/O on/O one/O pattern/O,/O and/O all/O precious/O rubbish/O./O
But/O if/O he/O were/O a/O prince/O of/O the/O blood/O,/O my/O daughter/O need/O not/O run/O after/O
anyone/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O have/O I/O done/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O you/O've/O.../O''/O The/O prince/O was/O crying/O wrathfully/O./O

``/OI/O know/O if/O one/O were/O to/O listen/O to/O you/O,/O''/O interrupted/O the/O princess/O,/O ``/Owe/O
should/O never/O marry/O our/O daughter/O./O If/O it/O's/O to/O be/O so/O,/O we/O'd/O better/O go/O into/O
the/O country/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O we/O had/O better/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O do/O wait/O a/O minute/O./O Do/O I/O try/O and/O catch/O them/O?/O I/O do/On't/O try/O to/O catch/O
them/O in/O the/O least/O./O A/O young/O man/O,/O and/O a/O very/O nice/O one/O,/O has/O fallen/O in/O love/O
with/O her/O,/O and/O she/O,/O I/O fancy/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O you/O fancy/O!/O And/O how/O if/O she/O really/O is/O in/O love/O,/O and/O he/O's/O no/O more/O
thinking/O of/O marriage/O than/O I/O am/O!/O.../O Oh/O,/O that/O I/O should/O live/O to/O see/O it/O!/O Ah/O!/O
spiritualism/O!/O Ah/O!/O Nice/O!/O Ah/O!/O the/O ball/O!/O''/O And/O the/O prince/O,/O imagining/O that/O he/O
was/O mimicking/O his/O wife/O,/O made/O a/O mincing/O curtsey/O at/O each/O word/O./O ``/OAnd/O this/O
is/O how/O we/O're/O preparing/O wretchedness/O for/O Kitty/PERSON;/O and/O she/O's/O really/O got/O the/O
notion/O into/O her/O head/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O makes/O you/O suppose/O so/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O suppose/O;/O I/O know/O./O We/O have/O eyes/O for/O such/O things/O,/O though/O
women-folk/O have/On't/O./O I/O see/O a/O man/O who/O has/O serious/O intentions/O,/O that/O's/O
Levin/PERSON:/O and/O I/O see/O a/O peacock/O,/O like/O this/O feather-head/O,/O who/O's/O only/O amusing/O
himself/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O when/O once/O you/O get/O an/O idea/O into/O your/O head/O!/O.../O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O'll/O remember/O my/O words/O,/O but/O too/O late/O,/O just/O as/O with/O Dolly/PERSON./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O well/O,/O we/O wo/On't/O talk/O of/O it/O,/O''/O the/O princess/O stopped/O him/O,/O
recollecting/O her/O unlucky/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OBy/O all/O means/O,/O and/O good/O night/O!/O''/O

And/O signing/O each/O other/O with/O the/O cross/O,/O the/O husband/O and/O wife/O parted/O with/O
a/O kiss/O,/O feeling/O that/O they/O each/O remained/O of/O their/O own/O opinion/O./O

The/O princess/O had/O at/O first/O been/O quite/O certain/O that/O that/O evening/O had/O
settled/O Kitty/PERSON's/O future/O,/O and/O that/O there/O could/O be/O no/O doubt/O of/O Vronsky/O's/O
intentions/O,/O but/O her/O husband/O's/O words/O had/O disturbed/O her/O./O And/O returning/O to/O
her/O own/O room/O,/O in/O terror/O before/O the/O unknown/O future/O,/O she/O,/O too/O,/O like/O Kitty/PERSON,/O
repeated/O several/O times/O in/O her/O heart/O,/O ``/OLord/O,/O have/O pity/O;/O Lord/O,/O have/O pity/O;/O
Lord/O,/O have/O pity/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 16/O


Vronsky/O had/O never/O had/O a/O real/O home/O life/O./O His/O mother/O had/O been/O in/O her/O youth/O
a/O brilliant/O society/O woman/O,/O who/O had/O had/O during/O her/O married/O life/O,/O and/O
still/O more/O afterwards/O,/O many/O love/O affairs/O notorious/O in/O the/O whole/O
fashionable/O world/O./O His/O father/O he/O scarcely/O remembered/O,/O and/O he/O had/O been/O
educated/O in/O the/O Corps/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION Pages/ORGANIZATION./O

Leaving/O the/O school/O very/O young/O as/O a/O brilliant/O officer/O,/O he/O had/O at/O once/O got/O
into/O the/O circle/O of/O wealthy/O Petersburg/PERSON army/O men/O./O Although/O he/O did/O go/O more/O
or/O less/O into/O Petersburg/LOCATION society/O,/O his/O love/O affairs/O had/O always/O hitherto/O
been/O outside/O it/O./O

In/O Moscow/LOCATION he/O had/O for/O the/O first/O time/O felt/O,/O after/O his/O luxurious/O and/O coarse/O
life/O at/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O all/O the/O charm/O of/O intimacy/O with/O a/O sweet/O and/O innocent/O
girl/O of/O his/O own/O rank/O,/O who/O cared/O for/O him/O./O It/O never/O even/O entered/O his/O head/O
that/O there/O could/O be/O any/O harm/O in/O his/O relations/O with/O Kitty/PERSON./O At/O balls/O he/O
danced/O principally/O with/O her/O./O He/O was/O a/O constant/O visitor/O at/O their/O house/O./O
He/O talked/O to/O her/O as/O people/O commonly/O do/O talk/O in/O society/O--/Oall/O sorts/O of/O
nonsense/O,/O but/O nonsense/O to/O which/O he/O could/O not/O help/O attaching/O a/O special/O
meaning/O in/O her/O case/O./O Although/O he/O said/O nothing/O to/O her/O that/O he/O could/O not/O
have/O said/O before/O everybody/O,/O he/O felt/O that/O she/O was/O becoming/O more/O and/O more/O
dependent/O upon/O him/O,/O and/O the/O more/O he/O felt/O this/O,/O the/O better/O he/O liked/O it/O,/O
and/O the/O tenderer/O was/O his/O feeling/O for/O her/O./O He/O did/O not/O know/O that/O his/O mode/O
of/O behavior/O in/O relation/O to/O Kitty/PERSON had/O a/O definite/O character/O,/O that/O it/O is/O
courting/O young/O girls/O with/O no/O intention/O of/O marriage/O,/O and/O that/O such/O
courting/O is/O one/O of/O the/O evil/O actions/O common/O among/O brilliant/O young/O men/O
such/O as/O he/O was/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O he/O was/O the/O first/O who/O had/O
discovered/O this/O pleasure/O,/O and/O he/O was/O enjoying/O his/O discovery/O./O

If/O he/O could/O have/O heard/O what/O her/O parents/O were/O saying/O that/O evening/O,/O if/O he/O
could/O have/O put/O himself/O at/O the/O point/O of/O view/O of/O the/O family/O and/O have/O heard/O
that/O Kitty/PERSON would/O be/O unhappy/O if/O he/O did/O not/O marry/O her/O,/O he/O would/O have/O been/O
greatly/O astonished/O,/O and/O would/O not/O have/O believed/O it/O./O He/O could/O not/O believe/O
that/O what/O gave/O such/O great/O and/O delicate/O pleasure/O to/O him/O,/O and/O above/O all/O to/O
her/O,/O could/O be/O wrong/O./O Still/O less/O could/O he/O have/O believed/O that/O he/O ought/O to/O
marry/O./O

Marriage/O had/O never/O presented/O itself/O to/O him/O as/O a/O possibility/O./O He/O not/O only/O
disliked/O family/O life/O,/O but/O a/O family/O,/O and/O especially/O a/O husband/O was/O,/O in/O
accordance/O with/O the/O views/O general/O in/O the/O bachelor/O world/O in/O which/O he/O
lived/O,/O conceived/O as/O something/O alien/O,/O repellant/O,/O and/O,/O above/O all/O,/O
ridiculous/O./O

But/O though/O Vronsky/O had/O not/O the/O least/O suspicion/O what/O the/O parents/O were/O
saying/O,/O he/O felt/O on/O coming/O away/O from/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O that/O the/O secret/O
spiritual/O bond/O which/O existed/O between/O him/O and/O Kitty/PERSON had/O grown/O so/O much/O
stronger/O that/O evening/O that/O some/O step/O must/O be/O taken/O./O But/O what/O step/O could/O
and/O ought/O to/O be/O taken/O he/O could/O not/O imagine/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O so/O exquisite/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O as/O he/O returned/O from/O the/O
Shtcherbatskys/O'/O,/O carrying/O away/O with/O him/O,/O as/O he/O always/O did/O,/O a/O delicious/O
feeling/O of/O purity/O and/O freshness/O,/O arising/O partly/O from/O the/O fact/O that/O he/O
had/O not/O been/O smoking/O for/O a/O whole/O evening/O,/O and/O with/O it/O a/O new/O feeling/O of/O
tenderness/O at/O her/O love/O for/O him/O--/O``/Owhat/O is/O so/O exquisite/O is/O that/O not/O a/O word/O
has/O been/O said/O by/O me/O or/O by/O her/O,/O but/O we/O understand/O each/O other/O so/O well/O in/O
this/O unseen/O language/O of/O looks/O and/O tones/O,/O that/O this/O evening/O more/O clearly/O
than/O ever/O she/O told/O me/O she/O loves/O me/O./O And/O how/O secretly/O,/O simply/O,/O and/O most/O
of/O all/O,/O how/O trustfully/O!/O I/O feel/O myself/O better/O,/O purer/O./O I/O feel/O that/O I/O have/O
a/O heart/O,/O and/O that/O there/O is/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O good/O in/O me/O./O Those/O sweet/O,/O
loving/O eyes/O!/O When/O she/O said/O:/O `/OIndeed/O I/O do/O.../O'/O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O then/O?/O Oh/O,/O nothing/O./O It/O's/O good/O for/O me/O,/O and/O good/O for/O her/O./O''/O And/O
he/O began/O wondering/O where/O to/O finish/O the/O evening/O./O

He/O passed/O in/O review/O of/O the/O places/O he/O might/O go/O to/O./O ``/OClub/O?/O a/O game/O of/O
bezique/O,/O champagne/O with/O Ignatov/PERSON?/O No/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O going/O./O _/OChâteau/PERSON des/PERSON
Fleurs/PERSON_/O;/O there/O I/O shall/O find/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O songs/O,/O the/O cancan/O./O No/O,/O I/O'm/O sick/O of/O
it/O./O That/O's/O why/O I/O like/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O,/O that/O I/O'm/O growing/O better/O./O I/O'll/O
go/O home/O./O''/O He/O went/O straight/O to/O his/O room/O at/O Dussot/LOCATION's/O Hotel/O,/O ordered/O
supper/O,/O and/O then/O undressed/O,/O and/O as/O soon/O as/O his/O head/O touched/O the/O pillow/O,/O
fell/O into/O a/O sound/O sleep/O./O



Chapter/O 17/O


Next/O day/O at/O eleven/O o'clock/O in/O the/O morning/O Vronsky/O drove/O to/O the/O station/O
of/O the/O Petersburg/LOCATION railway/O to/O meet/O his/O mother/O,/O and/O the/O first/O person/O he/O
came/O across/O on/O the/O great/O flight/O of/O steps/O was/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O who/O was/O expecting/O
his/O sister/O by/O the/O same/O train/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O your/O excellency/O!/O''/O cried/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O ``/Owhom/O are/O you/O meeting/O?/O''/O

``/OMy/O mother/O,/O''/O Vronsky/O responded/O,/O smiling/O,/O as/O everyone/O did/O who/O met/O
Oblonsky/PERSON./O He/O shook/O hands/O with/O him/O,/O and/O together/O they/O ascended/O the/O steps/O./O
``/OShe/O is/O to/O be/O here/O from/O Petersburg/LOCATION today/O./O''/O

``/OI/O was/O looking/O out/O for/O you/O till/O two/O o'clock/O last/O night/O./O Where/O did/O you/O go/O
after/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O?/O''/O

``/OHome/O,/O''/O answered/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OI/O must/O own/O I/O felt/O so/O well/O content/O yesterday/O
after/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O that/O I/O did/On't/O care/O to/O go/O anywhere/O./O''/O

    ``/OI/O know/O a/O gallant/O steed/O by/O tokens/O sure/O,/O
    And/O by/O his/O eyes/O I/O know/O a/O youth/O in/O love/O,/O''/O

declaimed/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O just/O as/O he/O had/O done/O before/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O

Vronsky/O smiled/O with/O a/O look/O that/O seemed/O to/O say/O that/O he/O did/O not/O deny/O it/O,/O
but/O he/O promptly/O changed/O the/O subject/O./O

``/OAnd/O whom/O are/O you/O meeting/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O

``/OI/O?/O I/O've/O come/O to/O meet/O a/O pretty/O woman/O,/O''/O said/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O say/O so/O!/O''/O

''/O_/OHoni/PERSON soit/O qui/O mal/O y/O pense/O!/O_/O My/O sister/O Anna/PERSON./O''/O

``/OAh/O!/O that/O's/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OYou/O know/O her/O,/O no/O doubt/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O think/O I/O do/O./O Or/O perhaps/O not/O .../O I/O really/O am/O not/O sure/O,/O''/O Vronsky/O
answered/O heedlessly/O,/O with/O a/O vague/O recollection/O of/O something/O stiff/O and/O
tedious/O evoked/O by/O the/O name/O Karenina/PERSON./O

``/OBut/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O my/O celebrated/O brother-in-law/O,/O you/O surely/O
must/O know/O./O All/O the/O world/O knows/O him/O./O''/O

``/OI/O know/O him/O by/O reputation/O and/O by/O sight/O./O I/O know/O that/O he/O's/O clever/O,/O
learned/O,/O religious/O somewhat/O.../O./O But/O you/O know/O that/O's/O not/O .../O _/Onot/O in/O my/O
line/O,/O_/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O in/O English/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O he/O's/O a/O very/O remarkable/O man/O;/O rather/O a/O conservative/O,/O but/O a/O splendid/O
man/O,/O''/O observed/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O ``/Oa/O splendid/O man/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O so/O much/O the/O better/O for/O him/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O smiling/O./O ``/OOh/O,/O
you/O've/O come/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O addressing/O a/O tall/O old/O footman/O of/O his/O mother/O's/O,/O
standing/O at/O the/O door/O;/O ``/Ocome/O here/O./O''/O

Besides/O the/O charm/O Oblonsky/PERSON had/O in/O general/O for/O everyone/O,/O Vronsky/ORGANIZATION had/O felt/O
of/O late/O specially/O drawn/O to/O him/O by/O the/O fact/O that/O in/O his/O imagination/O he/O
was/O associated/O with/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O do/O you/O say/O?/O Shall/O we/O give/O a/O supper/O on/O Sunday/O for/O the/O
_/Odiva/O?/O_/O''/O he/O said/O to/O him/O with/O a/O smile/O,/O taking/O his/O arm/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O./O I/O'm/O collecting/O subscriptions/O./O Oh/O,/O did/O you/O make/O the/O
acquaintance/O of/O my/O friend/O Levin/PERSON?/O''/O asked/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O;/O but/O he/O left/O rather/O early/O./O''/O

``/OHe/O's/O a/O capital/O fellow/O,/O''/O pursued/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O ``/OIs/On't/O he/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O why/O it/O is/O,/O''/O responded/O Vronsky/O,/O ``/Oin/O all/O Moscow/LOCATION
people/O--/Opresent/O company/O of/O course/O excepted/O,/O''/O he/O put/O in/O jestingly/O,/O
``/Othere/O's/O something/O uncompromising/O./O They/O are/O all/O on/O the/O defensive/O,/O lose/O
their/O tempers/O,/O as/O though/O they/O all/O want/O to/O make/O one/O feel/O something/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O's/O true/O,/O it/O is/O so/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O laughing/O
good-humoredly/O./O

``/OWill/O the/O train/O soon/O be/O in/O?/O''/O Vronsky/O asked/O a/O railway/O official/O./O

``/OThe/O train/O's/O signaled/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O man/O./O

The/O approach/O of/O the/O train/O was/O more/O and/O more/O evident/O by/O the/O preparatory/O
bustle/O in/O the/O station/O,/O the/O rush/O of/O porters/O,/O the/O movement/O of/O policemen/O
and/O attendants/O,/O and/O people/O meeting/O the/O train/O./O Through/O the/O frosty/O vapor/O
could/O be/O seen/O workmen/O in/O short/O sheepskins/O and/O soft/O felt/O boots/O crossing/O
the/O rails/O of/O the/O curving/O line/O./O The/O hiss/O of/O the/O boiler/O could/O be/O heard/O on/O
the/O distant/O rails/O,/O and/O the/O rumble/O of/O something/O heavy/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O who/O felt/O a/O great/O inclination/O to/O tell/O
Vronsky/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O intentions/O in/O regard/O to/O Kitty/PERSON./O ``/ONo/O,/O you/O've/O not/O got/O a/O
true/O impression/O of/O Levin/PERSON./O He/O's/O a/O very/O nervous/O man/O,/O and/O is/O sometimes/O out/O
of/O humor/O,/O it/O's/O true/O,/O but/O then/O he/O is/O often/O very/O nice/O./O He/O's/O such/O a/O true/O,/O
honest/O nature/O,/O and/O a/O heart/O of/O gold/O./O But/O yesterday/O there/O were/O special/O
reasons/O,/O''/O pursued/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O with/O a/O meaning/O smile/O,/O totally/O
oblivious/O of/O the/O genuine/O sympathy/O he/O had/O felt/O the/O day/O before/O for/O his/O
friend/O,/O and/O feeling/O the/O same/O sympathy/O now/O,/O only/O for/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O there/O
were/O reasons/O why/O he/O could/O not/O help/O being/O either/O particularly/O happy/O or/O
particularly/O unhappy/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O stood/O still/O and/O asked/O directly/O:/O ``/OHow/O so/O?/O Do/O you/O mean/O he/O made/O
your/O _/Obelle-soeur/O_/O an/O offer/O yesterday/O?/O''/O

``/OMaybe/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OI/O fancied/O something/O of/O the/O sort/O
yesterday/O./O Yes/O,/O if/O he/O went/O away/O early/O,/O and/O was/O out/O of/O humor/O too/O,/O it/O must/O
mean/O it/O.../O./O He/O's/O been/O so/O long/O in/O love/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O very/O sorry/O for/O him/O./O''/O

``/OSo/O that/O's/O it/O!/O I/O should/O imagine/O,/O though/O,/O she/O might/O reckon/O on/O a/O better/O
match/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O drawing/O himself/O up/O and/O walking/O about/O again/O,/O
``/Othough/O I/O do/On't/O know/O him/O,/O of/O course/O,/O''/O he/O added/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O that/O is/O a/O hateful/O
position/O!/O That/O's/O why/O most/O fellows/O prefer/O to/O have/O to/O do/O with/O Klaras/PERSON./O If/O
you/O do/On't/O succeed/O with/O them/O it/O only/O proves/O that/O you/O've/O not/O enough/O cash/O,/O
but/O in/O this/O case/O one/O's/O dignity/O's/O at/O stake/O./O But/O here/O's/O the/O train/O./O''/O

The/O engine/O had/O already/O whistled/O in/O the/O distance/O./O A/O few/O instants/O later/O
the/O platform/O was/O quivering/O,/O and/O with/O puffs/O of/O steam/O hanging/O low/O in/O the/O
air/O from/O the/O frost/O,/O the/O engine/O rolled/O up/O,/O with/O the/O lever/O of/O the/O middle/O
wheel/O rhythmically/O moving/O up/O and/O down/O,/O and/O the/O stooping/O figure/O of/O the/O
engine-driver/O covered/O with/O frost/O./O Behind/O the/O tender/O,/O setting/O the/O
platform/O more/O and/O more/O slowly/O swaying/O,/O came/O the/O luggage/O van/O with/O a/O dog/O
whining/O in/O it/O./O At/O last/O the/O passenger/O carriages/O rolled/O in/O,/O oscillating/O
before/O coming/O to/O a/O standstill/O./O

A/O smart/O guard/O jumped/O out/O,/O giving/O a/O whistle/O,/O and/O after/O him/O one/O by/O one/O the/O
impatient/O passengers/O began/O to/O get/O down/O:/O an/O officer/O of/O the/O guards/O,/O
holding/O himself/O erect/O,/O and/O looking/O severely/O about/O him/O;/O a/O nimble/O little/O
merchant/O with/O a/O satchel/O,/O smiling/O gaily/O;/O a/O peasant/O with/O a/O sack/O over/O his/O
shoulder/O./O

Vronsky/O,/O standing/O beside/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O watched/O the/O carriages/O and/O the/O
passengers/O,/O totally/O oblivious/O of/O his/O mother/O./O What/O he/O had/O just/O heard/O
about/O Kitty/PERSON excited/O and/O delighted/O him/O./O Unconsciously/O he/O arched/O his/O
chest/O,/O and/O his/O eyes/O flashed/O./O He/O felt/O himself/O a/O conqueror/O./O

``/OCountess/O Vronskaya/PERSON is/O in/O that/O compartment/O,/O''/O said/O the/O smart/O guard/O,/O going/O
up/O to/O Vronsky/O./O

The/O guard/O's/O words/O roused/O him/O,/O and/O forced/O him/O to/O think/O of/O his/O mother/O and/O
his/O approaching/O meeting/O with/O her/O./O He/O did/O not/O in/O his/O heart/O respect/O his/O
mother/O,/O and/O without/O acknowledging/O it/O to/O himself/O,/O he/O did/O not/O love/O her/O,/O
though/O in/O accordance/O with/O the/O ideas/O of/O the/O set/O in/O which/O he/O lived/O,/O and/O
with/O his/O own/O education/O,/O he/O could/O not/O have/O conceived/O of/O any/O behavior/O to/O
his/O mother/O not/O in/O the/O highest/O degree/O respectful/O and/O obedient/O,/O and/O the/O
more/O externally/O obedient/O and/O respectful/O his/O behavior/O,/O the/O less/O in/O his/O
heart/O he/O respected/O and/O loved/O her/O./O



Chapter/O 18/O


Vronsky/O followed/O the/O guard/O to/O the/O carriage/O,/O and/O at/O the/O door/O of/O the/O
compartment/O he/O stopped/O short/O to/O make/O room/O for/O a/O lady/O who/O was/O getting/O
out/O./O

With/O the/O insight/O of/O a/O man/O of/O the/O world/O,/O from/O one/O glance/O at/O this/O lady/O's/O
appearance/O Vronsky/O classified/O her/O as/O belonging/O to/O the/O best/O society/O./O He/O
begged/O pardon/O,/O and/O was/O getting/O into/O the/O carriage/O,/O but/O felt/O he/O must/O
glance/O at/O her/O once/O more/O;/O not/O that/O she/O was/O very/O beautiful/O,/O not/O on/O account/O
of/O the/O elegance/O and/O modest/O grace/O which/O were/O apparent/O in/O her/O whole/O
figure/O,/O but/O because/O in/O the/O expression/O of/O her/O charming/O face/O,/O as/O she/O
passed/O close/O by/O him/O,/O there/O was/O something/O peculiarly/O caressing/O and/O soft/O./O
As/O he/O looked/O round/O,/O she/O too/O turned/O her/O head/O./O Her/O shining/O gray/O eyes/O,/O that/O
looked/O dark/O from/O the/O thick/O lashes/O,/O rested/O with/O friendly/O attention/O on/O his/O
face/O,/O as/O though/O she/O were/O recognizing/O him/O,/O and/O then/O promptly/O turned/O away/O
to/O the/O passing/O crowd/O,/O as/O though/O seeking/O someone/O./O In/O that/O brief/O look/O
Vronsky/O had/O time/O to/O notice/O the/O suppressed/O eagerness/O which/O played/O over/O
her/O face/O,/O and/O flitted/O between/O the/O brilliant/O eyes/O and/O the/O faint/O smile/O
that/O curved/O her/O red/O lips/O./O It/O was/O as/O though/O her/O nature/O were/O so/O brimming/O
over/O with/O something/O that/O against/O her/O will/O it/O showed/O itself/O now/O in/O the/O
flash/O of/O her/O eyes/O,/O and/O now/O in/O her/O smile/O./O Deliberately/O she/O shrouded/O the/O
light/O in/O her/O eyes/O,/O but/O it/O shone/O against/O her/O will/O in/O the/O faintly/O
perceptible/O smile/O./O

Vronsky/O stepped/O into/O the/O carriage/O./O His/O mother/O,/O a/O dried-up/O old/O lady/O with/O
black/O eyes/O and/O ringlets/O,/O screwed/O up/O her/O eyes/O,/O scanning/O her/O son/O,/O and/O
smiled/O slightly/O with/O her/O thin/O lips/O./O Getting/O up/O from/O the/O seat/O and/O handing/O
her/O maid/O a/O bag/O,/O she/O gave/O her/O little/O wrinkled/O hand/O to/O her/O son/O to/O kiss/O,/O
and/O lifting/O his/O head/O from/O her/O hand/O,/O kissed/O him/O on/O the/O cheek/O./O

``/OYou/O got/O my/O telegram/O?/O Quite/O well/O?/O Thank/O God/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O had/O a/O good/O journey/O?/O''/O said/O her/O son/O,/O sitting/O down/O beside/O her/O,/O and/O
involuntarily/O listening/O to/O a/O woman/O's/O voice/O outside/O the/O door/O./O He/O knew/O it/O
was/O the/O voice/O of/O the/O lady/O he/O had/O met/O at/O the/O door/O./O

``/OAll/O the/O same/O I/O do/On't/O agree/O with/O you/O,/O''/O said/O the/O lady/O's/O voice/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O the/O Petersburg/LOCATION view/O,/O madame/O./O''/O

``/ONot/O Petersburg/PERSON,/O but/O simply/O feminine/O,/O''/O she/O responded/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O well/O,/O allow/O me/O to/O kiss/O your/O hand/O./O''/O

``/OGood-bye/O,/O Ivan/PERSON Petrovitch/PERSON./O And/O could/O you/O see/O if/O my/O brother/O is/O here/O,/O and/O
send/O him/O to/O me/O?/O''/O said/O the/O lady/O in/O the/O doorway/O,/O and/O stepped/O back/O again/O
into/O the/O compartment/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O have/O you/O found/O your/O brother/O?/O''/O said/O Countess/PERSON Vronskaya/PERSON,/O addressing/O
the/O lady/O./O

Vronsky/O understood/O now/O that/O this/O was/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON./O

``/OYour/O brother/O is/O here/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O standing/O up/O./O ``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O I/O did/O not/O know/O
you/O,/O and/O,/O indeed/O,/O our/O acquaintance/O was/O so/O slight/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O bowing/O,/O
``/Othat/O no/O doubt/O you/O do/O not/O remember/O me/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O''/O said/O she/O,/O ``/OI/O should/O have/O known/O you/O because/O your/O mother/O and/O I/O
have/O been/O talking/O,/O I/O think/O,/O of/O nothing/O but/O you/O all/O the/O way/O./O''/O As/O she/O
spoke/O she/O let/O the/O eagerness/O that/O would/O insist/O on/O coming/O out/O show/O itself/O
in/O her/O smile/O./O ``/OAnd/O still/O no/O sign/O of/O my/O brother/O./O''/O

``/ODo/O call/O him/O,/O Alexey/PERSON,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O countess/O./O Vronsky/O stepped/O out/O onto/O
the/O platform/O and/O shouted/O:/O

``/OOblonsky/O!/O Here/O!/O''/O

Madame/O Karenina/PERSON,/O however/O,/O did/O not/O wait/O for/O her/O brother/O,/O but/O catching/O
sight/O of/O him/O she/O stepped/O out/O with/O her/O light/O,/O resolute/O step/O./O And/O as/O soon/O
as/O her/O brother/O had/O reached/O her/O,/O with/O a/O gesture/O that/O struck/O Vronsky/O by/O
its/O decision/O and/O its/O grace/O,/O she/O flung/O her/O left/O arm/O around/O his/O neck/O,/O drew/O
him/O rapidly/O to/O her/O,/O and/O kissed/O him/O warmly/O./O Vronsky/O gazed/O,/O never/O taking/O
his/O eyes/O from/O her/O,/O and/O smiled/O,/O he/O could/O not/O have/O said/O why/O./O But/O
recollecting/O that/O his/O mother/O was/O waiting/O for/O him/O,/O he/O went/O back/O again/O
into/O the/O carriage/O./O

``/OShe/O's/O very/O sweet/O,/O is/On't/O she/O?/O''/O said/O the/O countess/O of/O Madame/O Karenina/PERSON./O
``/OHer/O husband/O put/O her/O with/O me/O,/O and/O I/O was/O delighted/O to/O have/O her/O./O We/O've/O
been/O talking/O all/O the/O way/O./O And/O so/O you/O,/O I/O hear/O .../O _/Ovous/O filez/O le/O parfait/O
amour/O./O Tant/O mieux/O,/O mon/O cher/O,/O tant/O mieux/O./O_/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O what/O you/O are/O referring/O to/O,/O maman/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O coldly/O./O
``/OCome/O,/O maman/O,/O let/O us/O go/O./O''/O

Madame/O Karenina/PERSON entered/O the/O carriage/O again/O to/O say/O good-bye/O to/O the/O
countess/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O countess/O,/O you/O have/O met/O your/O son/O,/O and/O I/O my/O brother/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O
``/OAnd/O all/O my/O gossip/O is/O exhausted/O./O I/O should/O have/O nothing/O more/O to/O tell/O
you/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O''/O said/O the/O countess/O,/O taking/O her/O hand/O./O ``/OI/O could/O go/O all/O around/O the/O
world/O with/O you/O and/O never/O be/O dull/O./O You/O are/O one/O of/O those/O delightful/O women/O
in/O whose/O company/O it/O's/O sweet/O to/O be/O silent/O as/O well/O as/O to/O talk/O./O Now/O please/O
do/On't/O fret/O over/O your/O son/O;/O you/O ca/On't/O expect/O never/O to/O be/O parted/O./O''/O

Madame/O Karenina/PERSON stood/O quite/O still/O,/O holding/O herself/O very/O erect/O,/O and/O her/O
eyes/O were/O smiling/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O''/O the/O countess/O said/O in/O explanation/O to/O her/O son/O,/O ``/Ohas/O a/O
little/O son/O eight/O years/O old/O,/O I/O believe/O,/O and/O she/O has/O never/O been/O parted/O
from/O him/O before/O,/O and/O she/O keeps/O fretting/O over/O leaving/O him/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O the/O countess/O and/O I/O have/O been/O talking/O all/O the/O time/O,/O I/O of/O my/O son/O and/O
she/O of/O hers/O,/O''/O said/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON,/O and/O again/O a/O smile/O lighted/O up/O her/O
face/O,/O a/O caressing/O smile/O intended/O for/O him/O./O

``/OI/O am/O afraid/O that/O you/O must/O have/O been/O dreadfully/O bored/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
promptly/O catching/O the/O ball/O of/O coquetry/O she/O had/O flung/O him/O./O But/O apparently/O
she/O did/O not/O care/O to/O pursue/O the/O conversation/O in/O that/O strain/O,/O and/O she/O
turned/O to/O the/O old/O countess/O./O

``/OThank/O you/O so/O much/O./O The/O time/O has/O passed/O so/O quickly/O./O Good-bye/O,/O countess/O./O''/O

``/OGood-bye/O,/O my/O love/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O countess/O./O ``/OLet/O me/O have/O a/O kiss/O of/O your/O
pretty/O face/O./O I/O speak/O plainly/O,/O at/O my/O age/O,/O and/O I/O tell/O you/O simply/O that/O I/O've/O
lost/O my/O heart/O to/O you/O./O''/O

Stereotyped/O as/O the/O phrase/O was/O,/O Madame/O Karenina/PERSON obviously/O believed/O it/O and/O
was/O delighted/O by/O it/O./O She/O flushed/O,/O bent/O down/O slightly/O,/O and/O put/O her/O cheek/O
to/O the/O countess/O's/O lips/O,/O drew/O herself/O up/O again/O,/O and/O with/O the/O same/O smile/O
fluttering/O between/O her/O lips/O and/O her/O eyes/O,/O she/O gave/O her/O hand/O to/O Vronsky/O./O
He/O pressed/O the/O little/O hand/O she/O gave/O him/O,/O and/O was/O delighted/O,/O as/O though/O at/O
something/O special/O,/O by/O the/O energetic/O squeeze/O with/O which/O she/O freely/O and/O
vigorously/O shook/O his/O hand/O./O She/O went/O out/O with/O the/O rapid/O step/O which/O bore/O
her/O rather/O fully-developed/O figure/O with/O such/O strange/O lightness/O./O

``/OVery/O charming/O,/O''/O said/O the/O countess/O./O

That/O was/O just/O what/O her/O son/O was/O thinking/O./O His/O eyes/O followed/O her/O till/O her/O
graceful/O figure/O was/O out/O of/O sight/O,/O and/O then/O the/O smile/O remained/O on/O his/O
face/O./O He/O saw/O out/O of/O the/O window/O how/O she/O went/O up/O to/O her/O brother/O,/O put/O her/O
arm/O in/O his/O,/O and/O began/O telling/O him/O something/O eagerly/O,/O obviously/O something/O
that/O had/O nothing/O to/O do/O with/O him/O,/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O at/O that/O he/O felt/O annoyed/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O maman/O,/O are/O you/O perfectly/O well/O?/O''/O he/O repeated/O,/O turning/O to/O his/O
mother/O./O

``/OEverything/O has/O been/O delightful/O./O Alexander/PERSON has/O been/O very/O good/O,/O and/O Marie/PERSON
has/O grown/O very/O pretty/O./O She/O's/O very/O interesting/O./O''/O

And/O she/O began/O telling/O him/O again/O of/O what/O interested/O her/O most/O--/Othe/O
christening/O of/O her/O grandson/O,/O for/O which/O she/O had/O been/O staying/O in/O
Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O the/O special/O favor/O shown/O her/O elder/O son/O by/O the/O Tsar/O./O

``/OHere/O's/O Lavrenty/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O looking/O out/O of/O the/O window/O;/O ``/Onow/O we/O can/O
go/O,/O if/O you/O like/O./O''/O

The/O old/O butler/O who/O had/O traveled/O with/O the/O countess/O,/O came/O to/O the/O carriage/O
to/O announce/O that/O everything/O was/O ready/O,/O and/O the/O countess/O got/O up/O to/O go/O./O

``/OCome/O;/O there/O's/O not/O such/O a/O crowd/O now/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON./O

The/O maid/O took/O a/O handbag/O and/O the/O lap/O dog/O,/O the/O butler/O and/O a/O porter/O the/O
other/O baggage/O./O Vronsky/O gave/O his/O mother/O his/O arm/O;/O but/O just/O as/O they/O were/O
getting/O out/O of/O the/O carriage/O several/O men/O ran/O suddenly/O by/O with/O
panic-stricken/O faces/O./O The/O station-master/O,/O too/O,/O ran/O by/O in/O his/O
extraordinary/O colored/O cap/O./O Obviously/O something/O unusual/O had/O happened/O./O The/O
crowd/O who/O had/O left/O the/O train/O were/O running/O back/O again/O./O

``/OWhat/O?/O.../O What/O?/O.../O Where/O?/O.../O Flung/O himself/O!/O.../O Crushed/O!/O.../O''/O was/O heard/O
among/O the/O crowd/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O with/O his/O sister/O on/O his/O arm/O,/O turned/O
back/O./O They/O too/O looked/O scared/O,/O and/O stopped/O at/O the/O carriage/O door/O to/O avoid/O
the/O crowd/O./O

The/O ladies/O got/O in/O,/O while/O Vronsky/O and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON followed/O the/O
crowd/O to/O find/O out/O details/O of/O the/O disaster/O./O

A/O guard/O,/O either/O drunk/O or/O too/O much/O muffled/O up/O in/O the/O bitter/O frost/O,/O had/O
not/O heard/O the/O train/O moving/O back/O,/O and/O had/O been/O crushed/O./O

Before/O Vronsky/O and/O Oblonsky/PERSON came/O back/O the/O ladies/O heard/O the/O facts/O from/O
the/O butler/O./O

Oblonsky/PERSON and/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O both/O seen/O the/O mutilated/O corpse/O./O Oblonsky/PERSON was/O
evidently/O upset/O./O He/O frowned/O and/O seemed/O ready/O to/O cry/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O how/O awful/O!/O Ah/O,/O Anna/PERSON,/O if/O you/O had/O seen/O it/O!/O Ah/O,/O how/O awful/O!/O''/O he/O said/O./O

Vronsky/PERSON did/O not/O speak/O;/O his/O handsome/O face/O was/O serious/O,/O but/O perfectly/O
composed/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O if/O you/O had/O seen/O it/O,/O countess/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OAnd/O his/O
wife/O was/O there/O.../O./O It/O was/O awful/O to/O see/O her/O!/O.../O./O She/O flung/O herself/O on/O the/O
body/O./O They/O say/O he/O was/O the/O only/O support/O of/O an/O immense/O family/O./O How/O awful/O!/O''/O

``/OCould/On't/O one/O do/O anything/O for/O her/O?/O''/O said/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON in/O an/O agitated/O
whisper/O./O

Vronsky/O glanced/O at/O her/O,/O and/O immediately/O got/O out/O of/O the/O carriage/O./O

``/OI/O'll/O be/O back/O directly/O,/O maman/O,/O''/O he/O remarked/O,/O turning/O round/O in/O the/O
doorway/O./O

When/O he/O came/O back/O a/O few/O minutes/O later/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O already/O
in/O conversation/O with/O the/O countess/O about/O the/O new/O singer/O,/O while/O the/O
countess/O was/O impatiently/O looking/O towards/O the/O door/O,/O waiting/O for/O her/O son/O./O

``/ONow/O let/O us/O be/O off/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O coming/O in/O./O They/O went/O out/O together/O./O
Vronsky/PERSON was/O in/O front/O with/O his/O mother/O./O Behind/O walked/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON with/O
her/O brother/O./O Just/O as/O they/O were/O going/O out/O of/O the/O station/O the/O
station-master/O overtook/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OYou/O gave/O my/O assistant/O two/O hundred/O roubles/O./O Would/O you/O kindly/O explain/O for/O
whose/O benefit/O you/O intend/O them/O?/O''/O

``/OFor/O the/O widow/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O shrugging/O his/O shoulders/O./O ``/OI/O should/O have/O
thought/O there/O was/O no/O need/O to/O ask/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O gave/O that/O?/O''/O cried/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O behind/O,/O and/O,/O pressing/O his/O sister/O's/O
hand/O,/O he/O added/O:/O ``/OVery/O nice/O,/O very/O nice/O!/O Is/On't/O he/O a/O splendid/O fellow/O?/O
Good-bye/O,/O countess/O./O''/O

And/O he/O and/O his/O sister/O stood/O still/O,/O looking/O for/O her/O maid/O./O

When/O they/O went/O out/O the/O Vronsky/O's/O carriage/O had/O already/O driven/O away/O./O
People/O coming/O in/O were/O still/O talking/O of/O what/O happened/O./O

``/OWhat/O a/O horrible/O death/O!/O''/O said/O a/O gentleman/O,/O passing/O by/O./O ``/OThey/O say/O he/O was/O
cut/O in/O two/O pieces/O./O''/O

``/OOn/O the/O contrary/O,/O I/O think/O it/O's/O the/O easiest/O--/Oinstantaneous/O,/O''/O observed/O
another/O./O

``/OHow/O is/O it/O they/O do/On't/O take/O proper/O precautions/O?/O''/O said/O a/O third/O./O

Madame/O Karenina/PERSON seated/O herself/O in/O the/O carriage/O,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
saw/O with/O surprise/O that/O her/O lips/O were/O quivering/O,/O and/O she/O was/O with/O
difficulty/O restraining/O her/O tears/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O,/O Anna/PERSON?/O''/O he/O asked/O,/O when/O they/O had/O driven/O a/O few/O hundred/O yards/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O an/O omen/O of/O evil/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OWhat/O nonsense/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OYou/O've/O come/O,/O that/O's/O the/O
chief/O thing/O./O You/O ca/On't/O conceive/O how/O I/O'm/O resting/O my/O hopes/O on/O you/O./O''/O

``/OHave/O you/O known/O Vronsky/O long/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O./O

``/OYes/O./O You/O know/O we/O're/O hoping/O he/O will/O marry/O Kitty/PERSON./O''/O

``/OYes/O?/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON softly/O./O ``/OCome/O now/O,/O let/O us/O talk/O of/O you/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O
tossing/O her/O head/O,/O as/O though/O she/O would/O physically/O shake/O off/O something/O
superfluous/O oppressing/O her/O./O ``/OLet/O us/O talk/O of/O your/O affairs/O./O I/O got/O your/O
letter/O,/O and/O here/O I/O am/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O all/O my/O hopes/O are/O in/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O tell/O me/O all/O about/O it/O./O''/O

And/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON began/O to/O tell/O his/O story/O./O

On/O reaching/O home/O Oblonsky/PERSON helped/O his/O sister/O out/O,/O sighed/O,/O pressed/O her/O
hand/O,/O and/O set/O off/O to/O his/O office/O./O



Chapter/O 19/O


When/O Anna/PERSON went/O into/O the/O room/O,/O Dolly/PERSON was/O sitting/O in/O the/O little/O
drawing-room/O with/O a/O white-headed/O fat/O little/O boy/O,/O already/O like/O his/O
father/O,/O giving/O him/O a/O lesson/O in/O French/O reading/O./O As/O the/O boy/O read/O,/O he/O kept/O
twisting/O and/O trying/O to/O tear/O off/O a/O button/O that/O was/O nearly/O off/O his/O jacket/O./O
His/O mother/O had/O several/O times/O taken/O his/O hand/O from/O it/O,/O but/O the/O fat/O little/O
hand/O went/O back/O to/O the/O button/O again/O./O His/O mother/O pulled/O the/O button/O off/O and/O
put/O it/O in/O her/O pocket/O./O

``/OKeep/O your/O hands/O still/O,/O Grisha/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O she/O took/O up/O her/O work/O,/O a/O
coverlet/O she/O had/O long/O been/O making/O./O She/O always/O set/O to/O work/O on/O it/O at/O
depressed/O moments/O,/O and/O now/O she/O knitted/O at/O it/O nervously/O,/O twitching/O her/O
fingers/O and/O counting/O the/O stitches/O./O Though/O she/O had/O sent/O word/O the/O day/O
before/O to/O her/O husband/O that/O it/O was/O nothing/O to/O her/O whether/O his/O sister/O came/O
or/O not/O,/O she/O had/O made/O everything/O ready/O for/O her/O arrival/O,/O and/O was/O expecting/O
her/O sister-in-law/O with/O emotion/O./O

Dolly/PERSON was/O crushed/O by/O her/O sorrow/O,/O utterly/O swallowed/O up/O by/O it/O./O Still/O she/O
did/O not/O forget/O that/O Anna/PERSON,/O her/O sister-in-law/O,/O was/O the/O wife/O of/O one/O of/O the/O
most/O important/O personages/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O was/O a/O Petersburg/LOCATION _/Ogrande/O
dame/O_/O./O And/O,/O thanks/O to/O this/O circumstance/O,/O she/O did/O not/O carry/O out/O her/O
threat/O to/O her/O husband/O--/Othat/O is/O to/O say/O,/O she/O remembered/O that/O her/O
sister-in-law/O was/O coming/O./O ``/OAnd/O,/O after/O all/O,/O Anna/PERSON is/O in/O no/O wise/O to/O blame/O,/O''/O
thought/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OI/O know/O nothing/O of/O her/O except/O the/O very/O best/O,/O and/O I/O have/O
seen/O nothing/O but/O kindness/O and/O affection/O from/O her/O towards/O myself/O./O''/O It/O was/O
true/O that/O as/O far/O as/O she/O could/O recall/O her/O impressions/O at/O Petersburg/LOCATION at/O
the/O Karenins/O'/O,/O she/O did/O not/O like/O their/O household/O itself/O;/O there/O was/O
something/O artificial/O in/O the/O whole/O framework/O of/O their/O family/O life/O./O ``/OBut/O
why/O should/O I/O not/O receive/O her/O?/O If/O only/O she/O does/On't/O take/O it/O into/O her/O head/O
to/O console/O me/O!/O''/O thought/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OAll/O consolation/O and/O counsel/O and/O
Christian/O forgiveness/O,/O all/O that/O I/O have/O thought/O over/O a/O thousand/O times/O,/O
and/O it/O's/O all/O no/O use/O./O''/O

All/O these/O days/O Dolly/PERSON had/O been/O alone/O with/O her/O children/O./O She/O did/O not/O want/O
to/O talk/O of/O her/O sorrow/O,/O but/O with/O that/O sorrow/O in/O her/O heart/O she/O could/O not/O
talk/O of/O outside/O matters/O./O She/O knew/O that/O in/O one/O way/O or/O another/O she/O would/O
tell/O Anna/PERSON everything/O,/O and/O she/O was/O alternately/O glad/O at/O the/O thought/O of/O
speaking/O freely/O,/O and/O angry/O at/O the/O necessity/O of/O speaking/O of/O her/O
humiliation/O with/O her/O,/O his/O sister/O,/O and/O of/O hearing/O her/O ready-made/O phrases/O
of/O good/O advice/O and/O comfort/O./O She/O had/O been/O on/O the/O lookout/O for/O her/O,/O
glancing/O at/O her/O watch/O every/O minute/O,/O and/O,/O as/O so/O often/O happens/O,/O let/O slip/O
just/O that/O minute/O when/O her/O visitor/O arrived/O,/O so/O that/O she/O did/O not/O hear/O the/O
bell/O./O

Catching/O a/O sound/O of/O skirts/O and/O light/O steps/O at/O the/O door/O,/O she/O looked/O
round/O,/O and/O her/O care-worn/O face/O unconsciously/O expressed/O not/O gladness/O,/O but/O
wonder/O./O She/O got/O up/O and/O embraced/O her/O sister-in-law/O./O

``/OWhat/O,/O here/O already/O!/O''/O she/O said/O as/O she/O kissed/O her/O./O

``/ODolly/O,/O how/O glad/O I/O am/O to/O see/O you/O!/O''/O

``/OI/O am/O glad/O,/O too/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O faintly/O smiling/O,/O and/O trying/O by/O the/O
expression/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O face/O to/O find/O out/O whether/O she/O knew/O./O ``/OMost/O likely/O she/O
knows/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O noticing/O the/O sympathy/O in/O Anna/PERSON's/O face/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O come/O
along/O,/O I/O'll/O take/O you/O to/O your/O room/O,/O''/O she/O went/O on/O,/O trying/O to/O defer/O as/O long/O
as/O possible/O the/O moment/O of/O confidences/O./O

``/OIs/O this/O Grisha/PERSON?/O Heavens/O,/O how/O he/O's/O grown/O!/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON;/O and/O kissing/O him/O,/O
never/O taking/O her/O eyes/O off/O Dolly/PERSON,/O she/O stood/O still/O and/O flushed/O a/O little/O./O
``/ONo/O,/O please/O,/O let/O us/O stay/O here/O./O''/O

She/O took/O off/O her/O kerchief/O and/O her/O hat/O,/O and/O catching/O it/O in/O a/O lock/O of/O her/O
black/O hair/O,/O which/O was/O a/O mass/O of/O curls/O,/O she/O tossed/O her/O head/O and/O shook/O her/O
hair/O down/O./O

``/OYou/O are/O radiant/O with/O health/O and/O happiness/O!/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O almost/O with/O
envy/O./O
