``/OI/O?/O.../O./O Yes/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O ``/OMerciful/O heavens/O,/O Tanya/PERSON!/O You/O're/O the/O same/O age/O
as/O my/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O addressing/O the/O little/O girl/O as/O she/O ran/O in/O./O
She/O took/O her/O in/O her/O arms/O and/O kissed/O her/O./O ``/ODelightful/O child/O,/O delightful/O!/O
Show/O me/O them/O all/O./O''/O

She/O mentioned/O them/O,/O not/O only/O remembering/O the/O names/O,/O but/O the/O years/O,/O
months/O,/O characters/O,/O illnesses/O of/O all/O the/O children/O,/O and/O Dolly/PERSON could/O not/O
but/O appreciate/O that/O./O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O we/O will/O go/O to/O them/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O a/O pity/O Vassya/PERSON's/O
asleep/O./O''/O

After/O seeing/O the/O children/O,/O they/O sat/O down/O,/O alone/O now/O,/O in/O the/O drawing/O
room/O,/O to/O coffee/O./O Anna/PERSON took/O the/O tray/O,/O and/O then/O pushed/O it/O away/O from/O her/O./O

``/ODolly/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/Ohe/O has/O told/O me/O./O''/O

Dolly/PERSON looked/O coldly/O at/O Anna/PERSON;/O she/O was/O waiting/O now/O for/O phrases/O of/O
conventional/O sympathy/O,/O but/O Anna/PERSON said/O nothing/O of/O the/O sort/O./O

``/ODolly/O,/O dear/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/OI/O do/On't/O want/O to/O speak/O for/O him/O to/O you/O,/O nor/O to/O
try/O to/O comfort/O you/O;/O that/O's/O impossible/O./O But/O,/O darling/O,/O I/O'm/O simply/O sorry/O,/O
sorry/O from/O my/O heart/O for/O you/O!/O''/O

Under/O the/O thick/O lashes/O of/O her/O shining/O eyes/O tears/O suddenly/O glittered/O./O She/O
moved/O nearer/O to/O her/O sister-in-law/O and/O took/O her/O hand/O in/O her/O vigorous/O
little/O hand/O./O Dolly/PERSON did/O not/O shrink/O away/O,/O but/O her/O face/O did/O not/O lose/O its/O
frigid/O expression/O./O She/O said/O:/O

``/OTo/O comfort/O me/O's/O impossible/O./O Everything/O's/O lost/O after/O what/O has/O happened/O,/O
everything/O's/O over/O!/O''/O

And/O directly/O she/O had/O said/O this/O,/O her/O face/O suddenly/O softened/O./O Anna/PERSON lifted/O
the/O wasted/O,/O thin/O hand/O of/O Dolly/PERSON,/O kissed/O it/O and/O said/O:/O

``/OBut/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O what/O's/O to/O be/O done/O,/O what/O's/O to/O be/O done/O?/O How/O is/O it/O best/O to/O act/O
in/O this/O awful/O position/O--/Othat/O's/O what/O you/O must/O think/O of/O./O''/O

``/OAll/O's/O over/O,/O and/O there/O's/O nothing/O more/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OAnd/O the/O worst/O of/O
all/O is/O,/O you/O see/O,/O that/O I/O ca/On't/O cast/O him/O off/O:/O there/O are/O the/O children/O,/O I/O am/O
tied/O./O And/O I/O ca/On't/O live/O with/O him/O!/O it/O's/O a/O torture/O to/O me/O to/O see/O him/O./O''/O

``/ODolly/O,/O darling/O,/O he/O has/O spoken/O to/O me/O,/O but/O I/O want/O to/O hear/O it/O from/O you/O:/O
tell/O me/O about/O it/O./O''/O

Dolly/PERSON looked/O at/O her/O inquiringly/O./O

Sympathy/O and/O love/O unfeigned/O were/O visible/O on/O Anna/PERSON's/O face/O./O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O''/O she/O said/O all/O at/O once/O./O ``/OBut/O I/O will/O tell/O you/O it/O from/O the/O
beginning/O./O You/O know/O how/O I/O was/O married/O./O With/O the/O education/O mamma/O gave/O us/O
I/O was/O more/O than/O innocent/O,/O I/O was/O stupid/O./O I/O knew/O nothing/O./O I/O know/O they/O say/O
men/O tell/O their/O wives/O of/O their/O former/O lives/O,/O but/O Stiva/PERSON''/O--/Oshe/O corrected/O
herself/O--/O``/OStepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON told/O me/O nothing/O./O You/O'll/O hardly/O believe/O it/O,/O
but/O till/O now/O I/O imagined/O that/O I/O was/O the/O only/O woman/O he/O had/O known/O./O So/O I/O
lived/O eight/O years/O./O You/O must/O understand/O that/O I/O was/O so/O far/O from/O suspecting/O
infidelity/O,/O I/O regarded/O it/O as/O impossible/O,/O and/O then/O--/Otry/O to/O imagine/O it/O--/Owith/O
such/O ideas/O,/O to/O find/O out/O suddenly/O all/O the/O horror/O,/O all/O the/O
loathsomeness/O.../O./O You/O must/O try/O and/O understand/O me/O./O To/O be/O fully/O convinced/O
of/O one/O's/O happiness/O,/O and/O all/O at/O once/O.../O''/O continued/O Dolly/PERSON,/O holding/O back/O
her/O sobs/O,/O ``/Oto/O get/O a/O letter/O .../O his/O letter/O to/O his/O mistress/O,/O my/O governess/O./O
No/O,/O it/O's/O too/O awful/O!/O''/O She/O hastily/O pulled/O out/O her/O handkerchief/O and/O hid/O her/O
face/O in/O it/O./O ``/OI/O can/O understand/O being/O carried/O away/O by/O feeling/O,/O''/O she/O went/O
on/O after/O a/O brief/O silence/O,/O ``/Obut/O deliberately/O,/O slyly/O deceiving/O me/O .../O and/O
with/O whom/O?/O.../O To/O go/O on/O being/O my/O husband/O together/O with/O her/O .../O it/O's/O
awful/O!/O You/O ca/On't/O understand/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O I/O understand/O!/O I/O understand/O!/O Dolly/PERSON,/O dearest/O,/O I/O do/O understand/O,/O''/O
said/O Anna/PERSON,/O pressing/O her/O hand/O./O

``/OAnd/O do/O you/O imagine/O he/O realizes/O all/O the/O awfulness/O of/O my/O position/O?/O''/O Dolly/PERSON
resumed/O./O ``/ONot/O the/O slightest/O!/O He/O's/O happy/O and/O contented/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O!/O''/O Anna/PERSON interposed/O quickly/O./O ``/OHe/O's/O to/O be/O pitied/O,/O he/O's/O weighed/O down/O
by/O remorse/O.../O''/O

``/OIs/O he/O capable/O of/O remorse/O?/O''/O Dolly/PERSON interrupted/O,/O gazing/O intently/O into/O her/O
sister-in-law/O's/O face/O./O

``/OYes/O./O I/O know/O him/O./O I/O could/O not/O look/O at/O him/O without/O feeling/O sorry/O for/O him/O./O
We/O both/O know/O him/O./O He/O's/O good-hearted/O,/O but/O he/O's/O proud/O,/O and/O now/O he/O's/O so/O
humiliated/O./O What/O touched/O me/O most/O.../O''/O -LRB-/Oand/O here/O Anna/PERSON guessed/O what/O would/O
touch/O Dolly/PERSON most/O-RRB-/O ``/Ohe/O's/O tortured/O by/O two/O things/O:/O that/O he/O's/O ashamed/O for/O
the/O children/O's/O sake/O,/O and/O that/O,/O loving/O you/O--/Oyes/O,/O yes/O,/O loving/O you/O beyond/O
everything/O on/O earth/O,/O''/O she/O hurriedly/O interrupted/O Dolly/PERSON,/O who/O would/O have/O
answered/O--/O``/Ohe/O has/O hurt/O you/O,/O pierced/O you/O to/O the/O heart/O./O `/ONo/O,/O no/O,/O she/O can/Onot/O
forgive/O me/O,/O'/O he/O keeps/O saying/O./O''/O

Dolly/PERSON looked/O dreamily/O away/O beyond/O her/O sister-in-law/O as/O she/O listened/O to/O
her/O words/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O can/O see/O that/O his/O position/O is/O awful/O;/O it/O's/O worse/O for/O the/O guilty/O
than/O the/O innocent/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/Oif/O he/O feels/O that/O all/O the/O misery/O comes/O
from/O his/O fault/O./O But/O how/O am/O I/O to/O forgive/O him/O,/O how/O am/O I/O to/O be/O his/O wife/O
again/O after/O her/O?/O For/O me/O to/O live/O with/O him/O now/O would/O be/O torture/O,/O just/O
because/O I/O love/O my/O past/O love/O for/O him/O.../O''/O

And/O sobs/O cut/O short/O her/O words/O./O But/O as/O though/O of/O set/O design/O,/O each/O time/O she/O
was/O softened/O she/O began/O to/O speak/O again/O of/O what/O exasperated/O her/O./O

``/OShe/O's/O young/O,/O you/O see/O,/O she/O's/O pretty/O,/O''/O she/O went/O on/O./O ``/ODo/O you/O know/O,/O Anna/PERSON,/O
my/O youth/O and/O my/O beauty/O are/O gone/O,/O taken/O by/O whom/O?/O By/O him/O and/O his/O children/O./O
I/O have/O worked/O for/O him/O,/O and/O all/O I/O had/O has/O gone/O in/O his/O service/O,/O and/O now/O of/O
course/O any/O fresh/O,/O vulgar/O creature/O has/O more/O charm/O for/O him/O./O No/O doubt/O they/O
talked/O of/O me/O together/O,/O or/O,/O worse/O still/O,/O they/O were/O silent/O./O Do/O you/O
understand/O?/O''/O

Again/O her/O eyes/O glowed/O with/O hatred/O./O

``/OAnd/O after/O that/O he/O will/O tell/O me/O.../O./O What/O!/O can/O I/O believe/O him/O?/O Never/O!/O No/O,/O
everything/O is/O over/O,/O everything/O that/O once/O made/O my/O comfort/O,/O the/O reward/O of/O
my/O work/O,/O and/O my/O sufferings/O.../O./O Would/O you/O believe/O it/O,/O I/O was/O teaching/O
Grisha/PERSON just/O now/O:/O once/O this/O was/O a/O joy/O to/O me/O,/O now/O it/O is/O a/O torture/O./O What/O
have/O I/O to/O strive/O and/O toil/O for/O?/O Why/O are/O the/O children/O here/O?/O What/O's/O so/O
awful/O is/O that/O all/O at/O once/O my/O heart/O's/O turned/O,/O and/O instead/O of/O love/O and/O
tenderness/O,/O I/O have/O nothing/O but/O hatred/O for/O him/O;/O yes/O,/O hatred/O./O I/O could/O kill/O
him/O./O''/O

``/ODarling/O Dolly/O,/O I/O understand/O,/O but/O do/On't/O torture/O yourself/O./O You/O are/O so/O
distressed/O,/O so/O overwrought/O,/O that/O you/O look/O at/O many/O things/O mistakenly/O./O''/O

Dolly/PERSON grew/O calmer/O,/O and/O for/O two/O minutes/O both/O were/O silent/O./O

``/OWhat/O's/O to/O be/O done/O?/O Think/O for/O me/O,/O Anna/PERSON,/O help/O me/O./O I/O have/O thought/O over/O
everything/O,/O and/O I/O see/O nothing/O./O''/O

Anna/PERSON could/O think/O of/O nothing/O,/O but/O her/O heart/O responded/O instantly/O to/O each/O
word/O,/O to/O each/O change/O of/O expression/O of/O her/O sister-in-law/O./O

``/OOne/O thing/O I/O would/O say/O,/O''/O began/O Anna/PERSON./O ``/OI/O am/O his/O sister/O,/O I/O know/O his/O
character/O,/O that/O faculty/O of/O forgetting/O everything/O,/O everything/O''/O -LRB-/Oshe/O waved/O
her/O hand/O before/O her/O forehead/O-RRB-/O,/O ``/Othat/O faculty/O for/O being/O completely/O
carried/O away/O,/O but/O for/O completely/O repenting/O too/O./O He/O can/Onot/O believe/O it/O,/O he/O
can/Onot/O comprehend/O now/O how/O he/O can/O have/O acted/O as/O he/O did/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O he/O understands/O,/O he/O understood/O!/O''/O Dolly/PERSON broke/O in/O./O ``/OBut/O I/O .../O you/O are/O
forgetting/O me/O .../O does/O it/O make/O it/O easier/O for/O me/O?/O''/O

``/OWait/O a/O minute/O./O When/O he/O told/O me/O,/O I/O will/O own/O I/O did/O not/O realize/O all/O the/O
awfulness/O of/O your/O position/O./O I/O saw/O nothing/O but/O him/O,/O and/O that/O the/O family/O
was/O broken/O up/O./O I/O felt/O sorry/O for/O him/O,/O but/O after/O talking/O to/O you/O,/O I/O see/O it/O,/O
as/O a/O woman/O,/O quite/O differently/O./O I/O see/O your/O agony/O,/O and/O I/O ca/On't/O tell/O you/O
how/O sorry/O I/O am/O for/O you/O!/O But/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O darling/O,/O I/O fully/O realize/O your/O
sufferings/O,/O only/O there/O is/O one/O thing/O I/O do/On't/O know/O;/O I/O do/On't/O know/O .../O I/O
do/On't/O know/O how/O much/O love/O there/O is/O still/O in/O your/O heart/O for/O him/O./O That/O you/O
know/O--/Owhether/O there/O is/O enough/O for/O you/O to/O be/O able/O to/O forgive/O him/O./O If/O there/O
is/O,/O forgive/O him/O!/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O''/O Dolly/PERSON was/O beginning/O,/O but/O Anna/PERSON cut/O her/O short/O,/O kissing/O her/O hand/O once/O
more/O./O

``/OI/O know/O more/O of/O the/O world/O than/O you/O do/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OI/O know/O how/O men/O like/O
Stiva/LOCATION look/O at/O it/O./O You/O speak/O of/O his/O talking/O of/O you/O with/O her/O./O That/O never/O
happened/O./O Such/O men/O are/O unfaithful/O,/O but/O their/O home/O and/O wife/O are/O sacred/O to/O
them/O./O Somehow/O or/O other/O these/O women/O are/O still/O looked/O on/O with/O contempt/O by/O
them/O,/O and/O do/O not/O touch/O on/O their/O feeling/O for/O their/O family/O./O They/O draw/O a/O
sort/O of/O line/O that/O ca/On't/O be/O crossed/O between/O them/O and/O their/O families/O./O I/O
do/On't/O understand/O it/O,/O but/O it/O is/O so/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O he/O has/O kissed/O her/O.../O''/O

``/ODolly/O,/O hush/O,/O darling/O./O I/O saw/O Stiva/PERSON when/O he/O was/O in/O love/O with/O you/O./O I/O
remember/O the/O time/O when/O he/O came/O to/O me/O and/O cried/O,/O talking/O of/O you/O,/O and/O all/O
the/O poetry/O and/O loftiness/O of/O his/O feeling/O for/O you/O,/O and/O I/O know/O that/O the/O
longer/O he/O has/O lived/O with/O you/O the/O loftier/O you/O have/O been/O in/O his/O eyes/O./O You/O
know/O we/O have/O sometimes/O laughed/O at/O him/O for/O putting/O in/O at/O every/O word/O:/O
`/ODolly/O's/O a/O marvelous/O woman/O./O'/O You/O have/O always/O been/O a/O divinity/O for/O him/O,/O
and/O you/O are/O that/O still/O,/O and/O this/O has/O not/O been/O an/O infidelity/O of/O the/O
heart/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O if/O it/O is/O repeated/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O can/Onot/O be/O,/O as/O I/O understand/O it/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O could/O you/O forgive/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O judge/O.../O./O Yes/O,/O I/O can/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O thinking/O a/O
moment/O;/O and/O grasping/O the/O position/O in/O her/O thought/O and/O weighing/O it/O in/O her/O
inner/O balance/O,/O she/O added/O:/O ``/OYes/O,/O I/O can/O,/O I/O can/O,/O I/O can/O./O Yes/O,/O I/O could/O
forgive/O it/O./O I/O could/O not/O be/O the/O same/O,/O no/O;/O but/O I/O could/O forgive/O it/O,/O and/O
forgive/O it/O as/O though/O it/O had/O never/O been/O,/O never/O been/O at/O all/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O of/O course/O,/O''/O Dolly/PERSON interposed/O quickly/O,/O as/O though/O saying/O what/O she/O had/O
more/O than/O once/O thought/O,/O ``/Oelse/O it/O would/O not/O be/O forgiveness/O./O If/O one/O
forgives/O,/O it/O must/O be/O completely/O,/O completely/O./O Come/O,/O let/O us/O go/O;/O I/O'll/O take/O
you/O to/O your/O room/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O getting/O up/O,/O and/O on/O the/O way/O she/O embraced/O
Anna/PERSON./O ``/OMy/O dear/O,/O how/O glad/O I/O am/O you/O came/O./O It/O has/O made/O things/O better/O,/O ever/O
so/O much/O better/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 20/O


The/O whole/O of/O that/O day/O Anna/PERSON spent/O at/O home/O,/O that/O's/O to/O say/O at/O the/O
Oblonskys/O'/O,/O and/O received/O no/O one/O,/O though/O some/O of/O her/O acquaintances/O had/O
already/O heard/O of/O her/O arrival/O,/O and/O came/O to/O call/O the/O same/O day/O./O Anna/PERSON spent/O
the/O whole/O morning/O with/O Dolly/PERSON and/O the/O children/O./O She/O merely/O sent/O a/O brief/O
note/O to/O her/O brother/O to/O tell/O him/O that/O he/O must/O not/O fail/O to/O dine/O at/O home/O./O
``/OCome/O,/O God/O is/O merciful/O,/O''/O she/O wrote/O./O

Oblonsky/PERSON did/O dine/O at/O home/O:/O the/O conversation/O was/O general/O,/O and/O his/O wife/O,/O
speaking/O to/O him/O,/O addressed/O him/O as/O ``/OStiva/O,/O''/O as/O she/O had/O not/O done/O before/O./O
In/O the/O relations/O of/O the/O husband/O and/O wife/O the/O same/O estrangement/O still/O
remained/O,/O but/O there/O was/O no/O talk/O now/O of/O separation/O,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON saw/O the/O possibility/O of/O explanation/O and/O reconciliation/O./O

Immediately/O after/O dinner/O Kitty/PERSON came/O in/O./O She/O knew/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O but/O
only/O very/O slightly/O,/O and/O she/O came/O now/O to/O her/O sister/O's/O with/O some/O
trepidation/O,/O at/O the/O prospect/O of/O meeting/O this/O fashionable/O Petersburg/LOCATION
lady/O,/O whom/O everyone/O spoke/O so/O highly/O of/O./O But/O she/O made/O a/O favorable/O
impression/O on/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON--/Oshe/O saw/O that/O at/O once/O./O Anna/PERSON was/O
unmistakably/O admiring/O her/O loveliness/O and/O her/O youth/O:/O before/O Kitty/PERSON knew/O
where/O she/O was/O she/O found/O herself/O not/O merely/O under/O Anna/PERSON's/O sway/O,/O but/O in/O
love/O with/O her/O,/O as/O young/O girls/O do/O fall/O in/O love/O with/O older/O and/O married/O
women/O./O Anna/PERSON was/O not/O like/O a/O fashionable/O lady/O,/O nor/O the/O mother/O of/O a/O boy/O of/O
eight/O years/O old/O./O In/O the/O elasticity/O of/O her/O movements/O,/O the/O freshness/O and/O
the/O unflagging/O eagerness/O which/O persisted/O in/O her/O face/O,/O and/O broke/O out/O in/O
her/O smile/O and/O her/O glance/O,/O she/O would/O rather/O have/O passed/O for/O a/O girl/O of/O
twenty/O,/O had/O it/O not/O been/O for/O a/O serious/O and/O at/O times/O mournful/O look/O in/O her/O
eyes/O,/O which/O struck/O and/O attracted/O Kitty/PERSON./O Kitty/PERSON felt/O that/O Anna/PERSON was/O
perfectly/O simple/O and/O was/O concealing/O nothing/O,/O but/O that/O she/O had/O another/O
higher/O world/O of/O interests/O inaccessible/O to/O her/O,/O complex/O and/O poetic/O./O

After/O dinner/O,/O when/O Dolly/PERSON went/O away/O to/O her/O own/O room/O,/O Anna/PERSON rose/O quickly/O
and/O went/O up/O to/O her/O brother/O,/O who/O was/O just/O lighting/O a/O cigar/O./O

``/OStiva/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O him/O,/O winking/O gaily/O,/O crossing/O him/O and/O glancing/O
towards/O the/O door/O,/O ``/Ogo/O,/O and/O God/O help/O you/O./O''/O

He/O threw/O down/O the/O cigar/O,/O understanding/O her/O,/O and/O departed/O through/O the/O
doorway/O./O

When/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O disappeared/O,/O she/O went/O back/O to/O the/O sofa/O
where/O she/O had/O been/O sitting/O,/O surrounded/O by/O the/O children/O./O Either/O because/O
the/O children/O saw/O that/O their/O mother/O was/O fond/O of/O this/O aunt/O,/O or/O that/O they/O
felt/O a/O special/O charm/O in/O her/O themselves/O,/O the/O two/O elder/O ones/O,/O and/O the/O
younger/O following/O their/O lead/O,/O as/O children/O so/O often/O do/O,/O had/O clung/O about/O
their/O new/O aunt/O since/O before/O dinner/O,/O and/O would/O not/O leave/O her/O side/O./O And/O it/O
had/O become/O a/O sort/O of/O game/O among/O them/O to/O sit/O a/O close/O as/O possible/O to/O their/O
aunt/O,/O to/O touch/O her/O,/O hold/O her/O little/O hand/O,/O kiss/O it/O,/O play/O with/O her/O ring/O,/O
or/O even/O touch/O the/O flounce/O of/O her/O skirt/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O come/O,/O as/O we/O were/O sitting/O before/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O sitting/O
down/O in/O her/O place/O./O

And/O again/O Grisha/PERSON poked/O his/O little/O face/O under/O her/O arm/O,/O and/O nestled/O with/O
his/O head/O on/O her/O gown/O,/O beaming/O with/O pride/O and/O happiness/O./O

``/OAnd/O when/O is/O your/O next/O ball/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/ONext/O week/O,/O and/O a/O splendid/O ball/O./O One/O of/O those/O balls/O where/O one/O always/O
enjoys/O oneself/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O are/O there/O balls/O where/O one/O always/O enjoys/O oneself/O?/O''/O Anna/PERSON said/O,/O with/O
tender/O irony/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O strange/O,/O but/O there/O are/O./O At/O the/O Bobrishtchevs/O'/O one/O always/O enjoys/O
oneself/O,/O and/O at/O the/O Nikitins/O'/O too/O,/O while/O at/O the/O Mezhkovs/O'/O it/O's/O always/O
dull/O./O Have/On't/O you/O noticed/O it/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O my/O dear/O,/O for/O me/O there/O are/O no/O balls/O now/O where/O one/O enjoys/O oneself/O,/O''/O
said/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O Kitty/PERSON detected/O in/O her/O eyes/O that/O mysterious/O world/O which/O
was/O not/O open/O to/O her/O./O ``/OFor/O me/O there/O are/O some/O less/O dull/O and/O tiresome/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O can/O _/Oyou/O_/O be/O dull/O at/O a/O ball/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O should/O not/O _/OI/O_/O be/O dull/O at/O a/O ball/O?/O''/O inquired/O Anna/PERSON./O

Kitty/PERSON perceived/O that/O Anna/PERSON knew/O what/O answer/O would/O follow/O./O

``/OBecause/O you/O always/O look/O nicer/O than/O anyone/O./O''/O

Anna/PERSON had/O the/O faculty/O of/O blushing/O./O She/O blushed/O a/O little/O,/O and/O said/O:/O

``/OIn/O the/O first/O place/O it/O's/O never/O so/O;/O and/O secondly/O,/O if/O it/O were/O,/O what/O
difference/O would/O it/O make/O to/O me/O?/O''/O

``/OAre/O you/O coming/O to/O this/O ball/O?/O''/O asked/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OI/O imagine/O it/O wo/On't/O be/O possible/O to/O avoid/O going/O./O Here/O,/O take/O it/O,/O''/O she/O said/O
to/O Tanya/PERSON,/O who/O was/O pulling/O the/O loosely-fitting/O ring/O off/O her/O white/O,/O
slender-tipped/O finger/O./O

``/OI/O shall/O be/O so/O glad/O if/O you/O go/O./O I/O should/O so/O like/O to/O see/O you/O at/O a/O ball/O./O''/O

``/OAnyway/O,/O if/O I/O do/O go/O,/O I/O shall/O comfort/O myself/O with/O the/O thought/O that/O it/O's/O a/O
pleasure/O to/O you/O .../O Grisha/PERSON,/O do/On't/O pull/O my/O hair/O./O It/O's/O untidy/O enough/O
without/O that/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O putting/O up/O a/O straying/O lock/O,/O which/O Grisha/PERSON had/O
been/O playing/O with/O./O

``/OI/O imagine/O you/O at/O the/O ball/O in/O lilac/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O why/O in/O lilac/O precisely/O?/O''/O asked/O Anna/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O ``/ONow/O,/O children/O,/O run/O
along/O,/O run/O along/O./O Do/O you/O hear/O?/O Miss/O Hoole/PERSON is/O calling/O you/O to/O tea/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O,/O tearing/O the/O children/O from/O her/O,/O and/O sending/O them/O off/O to/O the/O dining/O
room/O./O

``/OI/O know/O why/O you/O press/O me/O to/O come/O to/O the/O ball/O./O You/O expect/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O
this/O ball/O,/O and/O you/O want/O everyone/O to/O be/O there/O to/O take/O part/O in/O it/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O know/O?/O Yes/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O!/O what/O a/O happy/O time/O you/O are/O at/O,/O''/O pursued/O Anna/PERSON./O ``/OI/O remember/O,/O and/O I/O
know/O that/O blue/O haze/O like/O the/O mist/O on/O the/O mountains/O in/O Switzerland/LOCATION./O That/O
mist/O which/O covers/O everything/O in/O that/O blissful/O time/O when/O childhood/O is/O
just/O ending/O,/O and/O out/O of/O that/O vast/O circle/O,/O happy/O and/O gay/O,/O there/O is/O a/O path/O
growing/O narrower/O and/O narrower/O,/O and/O it/O is/O delightful/O and/O alarming/O to/O
enter/O the/O ballroom/O,/O bright/O and/O splendid/O as/O it/O is/O.../O./O Who/O has/O not/O been/O
through/O it/O?/O''/O

Kitty/PERSON smiled/O without/O speaking/O./O ``/OBut/O how/O did/O she/O go/O through/O it/O?/O How/O I/O
should/O like/O to/O know/O all/O her/O love/O story/O!/O''/O thought/O Kitty/PERSON,/O recalling/O the/O
unromantic/O appearance/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O her/O husband/O./O

``/OI/O know/O something/O./O Stiva/PERSON told/O me/O,/O and/O I/O congratulate/O you/O./O I/O liked/O him/O so/O
much/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON continued/O./O ``/OI/O met/O Vronsky/O at/O the/O railway/O station/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O was/O he/O there/O?/O''/O asked/O Kitty/PERSON,/O blushing/O./O ``/OWhat/O was/O it/O Stiva/PERSON told/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OStiva/O gossiped/O about/O it/O all/O./O And/O I/O should/O be/O so/O glad/O .../O I/O traveled/O
yesterday/O with/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O mother/O,/O''/O she/O went/O on/O;/O ``/Oand/O his/O mother/O talked/O
without/O a/O pause/O of/O him/O,/O he/O's/O her/O favorite/O./O I/O know/O mothers/O are/O partial/O,/O
but/O.../O''/O

``/OWhat/O did/O his/O mother/O tell/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O a/O great/O deal/O!/O And/O I/O know/O that/O he/O's/O her/O favorite/O;/O still/O one/O can/O see/O
how/O chivalrous/O he/O is/O.../O./O Well/O,/O for/O instance/O,/O she/O told/O me/O that/O he/O had/O
wanted/O to/O give/O up/O all/O his/O property/O to/O his/O brother/O,/O that/O he/O had/O done/O
something/O extraordinary/O when/O he/O was/O quite/O a/O child/O,/O saved/O a/O woman/O out/O of/O
the/O water/O./O He/O's/O a/O hero/O,/O in/O fact/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O smiling/O and/O recollecting/O
the/O two/O hundred/O roubles/O he/O had/O given/O at/O the/O station/O./O

But/O she/O did/O not/O tell/O Kitty/PERSON about/O the/O two/O hundred/O roubles/O./O For/O some/O
reason/O it/O was/O disagreeable/O to/O her/O to/O think/O of/O it/O./O She/O felt/O that/O there/O
was/O something/O that/O had/O to/O do/O with/O her/O in/O it/O,/O and/O something/O that/O ought/O
not/O to/O have/O been/O./O

``/OShe/O pressed/O me/O very/O much/O to/O go/O and/O see/O her/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON went/O on/O;/O ``/Oand/O I/O shall/O
be/O glad/O to/O go/O to/O see/O her/O tomorrow/O./O Stiva/O is/O staying/O a/O long/O while/O in/O
Dolly/PERSON's/O room/O,/O thank/O God/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON added/O,/O changing/O the/O subject/O,/O and/O getting/O
up/O,/O Kitty/PERSON fancied/O,/O displeased/O with/O something/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O first/O!/O No/O,/O I/O!/O''/O screamed/O the/O children/O,/O who/O had/O finished/O tea/O,/O
running/O up/O to/O their/O Aunt/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OAll/O together/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O she/O ran/O laughing/O to/O meet/O them/O,/O and/O
embraced/O and/O swung/O round/O all/O the/O throng/O of/O swarming/O children/O,/O shrieking/O
with/O delight/O./O



Chapter/O 21/O


Dolly/PERSON came/O out/O of/O her/O room/O to/O the/O tea/O of/O the/O grown-up/O people/O./O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON did/O not/O come/O out/O./O He/O must/O have/O left/O his/O wife/O's/O room/O by/O the/O
other/O door/O./O

``/OI/O am/O afraid/O you/O'll/O be/O cold/O upstairs/O,/O''/O observed/O Dolly/PERSON,/O addressing/O Anna/PERSON;/O
``/OI/O want/O to/O move/O you/O downstairs/O,/O and/O we/O shall/O be/O nearer/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O please/O,/O do/On't/O trouble/O about/O me/O,/O''/O answered/O Anna/PERSON,/O looking/O intently/O
into/O Dolly/PERSON's/O face/O,/O trying/O to/O make/O out/O whether/O there/O had/O been/O a/O
reconciliation/O or/O not/O./O

``/OIt/O will/O be/O lighter/O for/O you/O here/O,/O''/O answered/O her/O sister-in-law/O./O

``/OI/O assure/O you/O that/O I/O sleep/O everywhere/O,/O and/O always/O like/O a/O marmot/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O's/O the/O question/O?/O''/O inquired/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O coming/O out/O of/O his/O
room/O and/O addressing/O his/O wife/O./O

From/O his/O tone/O both/O Kitty/PERSON and/O Anna/PERSON knew/O that/O a/O reconciliation/O had/O taken/O
place/O./O

``/OI/O want/O to/O move/O Anna/PERSON downstairs/O,/O but/O we/O must/O hang/O up/O blinds/O./O No/O one/O
knows/O how/O to/O do/O it/O;/O I/O must/O see/O to/O it/O myself/O,/O''/O answered/O Dolly/PERSON addressing/O
him/O./O

``/OGod/O knows/O whether/O they/O are/O fully/O reconciled/O,/O''/O thought/O Anna/PERSON,/O hearing/O her/O
tone/O,/O cold/O and/O composed/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O nonsense/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O always/O making/O difficulties/O,/O''/O answered/O her/O husband/O./O
``/OCome/O,/O I/O'll/O do/O it/O all/O,/O if/O you/O like/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O they/O must/O be/O reconciled/O,/O''/O thought/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OI/O know/O how/O you/O do/O everything/O,/O''/O answered/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OYou/O tell/O Matvey/PERSON to/O do/O
what/O ca/On't/O be/O done/O,/O and/O go/O away/O yourself/O,/O leaving/O him/O to/O make/O a/O muddle/O
of/O everything/O,/O''/O and/O her/O habitual/O,/O mocking/O smile/O curved/O the/O corners/O of/O
Dolly/PERSON's/O lips/O as/O she/O spoke/O./O

``/OFull/O,/O full/O reconciliation/O,/O full/O,/O''/O thought/O Anna/PERSON;/O ``/Othank/O God/O!/O''/O and/O
rejoicing/O that/O she/O was/O the/O cause/O of/O it/O,/O she/O went/O up/O to/O Dolly/PERSON and/O kissed/O
her/O./O

``/ONot/O at/O all/O./O Why/O do/O you/O always/O look/O down/O on/O me/O and/O Matvey/PERSON?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O hardly/O perceptibly/O,/O and/O addressing/O his/O wife/O./O

The/O whole/O evening/O Dolly/PERSON was/O,/O as/O always/O,/O a/O little/O mocking/O in/O her/O tone/O to/O
her/O husband/O,/O while/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O happy/O and/O cheerful/O,/O but/O not/O
so/O as/O to/O seem/O as/O though/O,/O having/O been/O forgiven/O,/O he/O had/O forgotten/O his/O
offense/O./O

At/O half-past/O nine/O o'clock/O a/O particularly/O joyful/O and/O pleasant/O family/O
conversation/O over/O the/O tea-table/O at/O the/O Oblonskys/O'/O was/O broken/O up/O by/O an/O
apparently/O simple/O incident/O./O But/O this/O simple/O incident/O for/O some/O reason/O
struck/O everyone/O as/O strange/O./O Talking/O about/O common/O acquaintances/O in/O
Petersburg/LOCATION,/O Anna/PERSON got/O up/O quickly/O./O

``/OShe/O is/O in/O my/O album/O,/O''/O she/O said/O;/O ``/Oand/O,/O by/O the/O way/O,/O I/O'll/O show/O you/O my/O
Seryozha/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O with/O a/O mother/O's/O smile/O of/O pride/O./O

Towards/O ten/O o'clock/O,/O when/O she/O usually/O said/O good-night/O to/O her/O son/O,/O and/O
often/O before/O going/O to/O a/O ball/O put/O him/O to/O bed/O herself/O,/O she/O felt/O depressed/O
at/O being/O so/O far/O from/O him/O;/O and/O whatever/O she/O was/O talking/O about/O,/O she/O kept/O
coming/O back/O in/O thought/O to/O her/O curly-headed/O Seryozha/PERSON./O She/O longed/O to/O look/O
at/O his/O photograph/O and/O talk/O of/O him/O./O Seizing/O the/O first/O pretext/O,/O she/O got/O
up/O,/O and/O with/O her/O light/O,/O resolute/O step/O went/O for/O her/O album/O./O The/O stairs/O up/O
to/O her/O room/O came/O out/O on/O the/O landing/O of/O the/O great/O warm/O main/O staircase/O./O

Just/O as/O she/O was/O leaving/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O a/O ring/O was/O heard/O in/O the/O hall/O./O

``/OWho/O can/O that/O be/O?/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OIt/O's/O early/O for/O me/O to/O be/O fetched/O,/O and/O for/O anyone/O else/O it/O's/O late/O,/O''/O
observed/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OSure/O to/O be/O someone/O with/O papers/O for/O me/O,/O''/O put/O in/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O
When/O Anna/PERSON was/O passing/O the/O top/O of/O the/O staircase/O,/O a/O servant/O was/O running/O up/O
to/O announce/O the/O visitor/O,/O while/O the/O visitor/O himself/O was/O standing/O under/O a/O
lamp/O./O Anna/PERSON glancing/O down/O at/O once/O recognized/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O a/O strange/O
feeling/O of/O pleasure/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O of/O dread/O of/O something/O stirred/O
in/O her/O heart/O./O He/O was/O standing/O still/O,/O not/O taking/O off/O his/O coat/O,/O pulling/O
something/O out/O of/O his/O pocket/O./O At/O the/O instant/O when/O she/O was/O just/O facing/O the/O
stairs/O,/O he/O raised/O his/O eyes/O,/O caught/O sight/O of/O her/O,/O and/O into/O the/O expression/O
of/O his/O face/O there/O passed/O a/O shade/O of/O embarrassment/O and/O dismay/O./O With/O a/O
slight/O inclination/O of/O her/O head/O she/O passed/O,/O hearing/O behind/O her/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O loud/O voice/O calling/O him/O to/O come/O up/O,/O and/O the/O quiet/O,/O soft/O,/O
and/O composed/O voice/O of/O Vronsky/O refusing/O./O

When/O Anna/PERSON returned/O with/O the/O album/O,/O he/O was/O already/O gone/O,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O telling/O them/O that/O he/O had/O called/O to/O inquire/O about/O the/O
dinner/O they/O were/O giving/O next/O day/O to/O a/O celebrity/O who/O had/O just/O arrived/O./O
``/OAnd/O nothing/O would/O induce/O him/O to/O come/O up/O./O What/O a/O queer/O fellow/O he/O is/O!/O''/O
added/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

Kitty/PERSON blushed/O./O She/O thought/O that/O she/O was/O the/O only/O person/O who/O knew/O why/O he/O
had/O come/O,/O and/O why/O he/O would/O not/O come/O up/O./O ``/OHe/O has/O been/O at/O home/O,/O''/O she/O
thought/O,/O ``/Oand/O did/On't/O find/O me/O,/O and/O thought/O I/O should/O be/O here/O,/O but/O he/O did/O
not/O come/O up/O because/O he/O thought/O it/O late/O,/O and/O Anna/PERSON's/O here/O./O''/O

All/O of/O them/O looked/O at/O each/O other/O,/O saying/O nothing/O,/O and/O began/O to/O look/O at/O
Anna/PERSON's/O album/O./O

There/O was/O nothing/O either/O exceptional/O or/O strange/O in/O a/O man/O's/O calling/O at/O
half-past/O nine/O on/O a/O friend/O to/O inquire/O details/O of/O a/O proposed/O dinner/O party/O
and/O not/O coming/O in/O,/O but/O it/O seemed/O strange/O to/O all/O of/O them/O./O Above/O all/O,/O it/O
seemed/O strange/O and/O not/O right/O to/O Anna/PERSON./O



Chapter/O 22/O


The/O ball/O was/O only/O just/O beginning/O as/O Kitty/PERSON and/O her/O mother/O walked/O up/O the/O
great/O staircase/O,/O flooded/O with/O light/O,/O and/O lined/O with/O flowers/O and/O footmen/O
in/O powder/O and/O red/O coats/O./O From/O the/O rooms/O came/O a/O constant/O,/O steady/O hum/O,/O as/O
from/O a/O hive/O,/O and/O the/O rustle/O of/O movement/O;/O and/O while/O on/O the/O landing/O
between/O trees/O they/O gave/O last/O touches/O to/O their/O hair/O and/O dresses/O before/O
the/O mirror/O,/O they/O heard/O from/O the/O ballroom/O the/O careful/O,/O distinct/O notes/O of/O
the/O fiddles/O of/O the/O orchestra/O beginning/O the/O first/O waltz/O./O A/O little/O old/O man/O
in/O civilian/O dress/O,/O arranging/O his/O gray/O curls/O before/O another/O mirror/O,/O and/O
diffusing/O an/O odor/O of/O scent/O,/O stumbled/O against/O them/O on/O the/O stairs/O,/O and/O
stood/O aside/O,/O evidently/O admiring/O Kitty/PERSON,/O whom/O he/O did/O not/O know/O./O A/O beardless/O
youth/O,/O one/O of/O those/O society/O youths/O whom/O the/O old/O Prince/O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON
called/O ``/Oyoung/O bucks/O,/O''/O in/O an/O exceedingly/O open/O waistcoat/O,/O straightening/O
his/O white/O tie/O as/O he/O went/O,/O bowed/O to/O them/O,/O and/O after/O running/O by/O,/O came/O back/O
to/O ask/O Kitty/PERSON for/O a/O quadrille/O./O As/O the/O first/O quadrille/O had/O already/O been/O
given/O to/O Vronsky/O,/O she/O had/O to/O promise/O this/O youth/O the/O second/O./O An/O officer/O,/O
buttoning/O his/O glove/O,/O stood/O aside/O in/O the/O doorway/O,/O and/O stroking/O his/O
mustache/O,/O admired/O rosy/O Kitty/PERSON./O

Although/O her/O dress/O,/O her/O coiffure/O,/O and/O all/O the/O preparations/O for/O the/O ball/O
had/O cost/O Kitty/PERSON great/O trouble/O and/O consideration/O,/O at/O this/O moment/O she/O
walked/O into/O the/O ballroom/O in/O her/O elaborate/O tulle/O dress/O over/O a/O pink/O slip/O
as/O easily/O and/O simply/O as/O though/O all/O the/O rosettes/O and/O lace/O,/O all/O the/O minute/O
details/O of/O her/O attire/O,/O had/O not/O cost/O her/O or/O her/O family/O a/O moment/O's/O
attention/O,/O as/O though/O she/O had/O been/O born/O in/O that/O tulle/O and/O lace/O,/O with/O her/O
hair/O done/O up/O high/O on/O her/O head/O,/O and/O a/O rose/O and/O two/O leaves/O on/O the/O top/O of/O
it/O./O

When/O,/O just/O before/O entering/O the/O ballroom/O,/O the/O princess/O,/O her/O mother/O,/O tried/O
to/O turn/O right/O side/O out/O of/O the/O ribbon/O of/O her/O sash/O,/O Kitty/PERSON had/O drawn/O back/O a/O
little/O./O She/O felt/O that/O everything/O must/O be/O right/O of/O itself/O,/O and/O graceful/O,/O
and/O nothing/O could/O need/O setting/O straight/O./O

It/O was/O one/O of/O Kitty/PERSON's/O best/O days/O./O Her/O dress/O was/O not/O uncomfortable/O
anywhere/O;/O her/O lace/O berthe/O did/O not/O droop/O anywhere/O;/O her/O rosettes/O were/O not/O
crushed/O nor/O torn/O off/O;/O her/O pink/O slippers/O with/O high/O,/O hollowed-out/O heels/O
did/O not/O pinch/O,/O but/O gladdened/O her/O feet/O;/O and/O the/O thick/O rolls/O of/O fair/O
chignon/O kept/O up/O on/O her/O head/O as/O if/O they/O were/O her/O own/O hair/O./O All/O the/O three/O
buttons/O buttoned/O up/O without/O tearing/O on/O the/O long/O glove/O that/O covered/O her/O
hand/O without/O concealing/O its/O lines/O./O The/O black/O velvet/O of/O her/O locket/O
nestled/O with/O special/O softness/O round/O her/O neck/O./O That/O velvet/O was/O delicious/O;/O
at/O home/O,/O looking/O at/O her/O neck/O in/O the/O looking/O glass/O,/O Kitty/PERSON had/O felt/O that/O
that/O velvet/O was/O speaking/O./O About/O all/O the/O rest/O there/O might/O be/O a/O doubt/O,/O but/O
the/O velvet/O was/O delicious/O./O Kitty/PERSON smiled/O here/O too/O,/O at/O the/O ball/O,/O when/O she/O
glanced/O at/O it/O in/O the/O glass/O./O Her/O bare/O shoulders/O and/O arms/O gave/O Kitty/PERSON a/O
sense/O of/O chill/O marble/O,/O a/O feeling/O she/O particularly/O liked/O./O Her/O eyes/O
sparkled/O,/O and/O her/O rosy/O lips/O could/O not/O keep/O from/O smiling/O from/O the/O
consciousness/O of/O her/O own/O attractiveness/O./O She/O had/O scarcely/O entered/O the/O
ballroom/O and/O reached/O the/O throng/O of/O ladies/O,/O all/O tulle/O,/O ribbons/O,/O lace/O,/O and/O
flowers/O,/O waiting/O to/O be/O asked/O to/O dance/O--/OKitty/PERSON was/O never/O one/O of/O that/O
throng/O--/Owhen/O she/O was/O asked/O for/O a/O waltz/O,/O and/O asked/O by/O the/O best/O partner/O,/O
the/O first/O star/O in/O the/O hierarchy/O of/O the/O ballroom/O,/O a/O renowned/O director/O of/O
dances/O,/O a/O married/O man/O,/O handsome/O and/O well-built/O,/O Yegorushka/PERSON Korsunsky/PERSON./O He/O
had/O only/O just/O left/O the/O Countess/PERSON Bonina/PERSON,/O with/O whom/O he/O had/O danced/O the/O
first/O half/O of/O the/O waltz/O,/O and/O,/O scanning/O his/O kingdom/O--/Othat/O is/O to/O say/O,/O a/O few/O
couples/O who/O had/O started/O dancing/O--/Ohe/O caught/O sight/O of/O Kitty/PERSON,/O entering/O,/O and/O
flew/O up/O to/O her/O with/O that/O peculiar/O,/O easy/O amble/O which/O is/O confined/O to/O
directors/O of/O balls/O./O Without/O even/O asking/O her/O if/O she/O cared/O to/O dance/O,/O he/O
put/O out/O his/O arm/O to/O encircle/O her/O slender/O waist/O./O She/O looked/O round/O for/O
someone/O to/O give/O her/O fan/O to/O,/O and/O their/O hostess/O,/O smiling/O to/O her/O,/O took/O it/O./O

``/OHow/O nice/O you/O've/O come/O in/O good/O time/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O her/O,/O embracing/O her/O
waist/O;/O ``/Osuch/O a/O bad/O habit/O to/O be/O late/O./O''/O Bending/O her/O left/O hand/O,/O she/O laid/O it/O
on/O his/O shoulder/O,/O and/O her/O little/O feet/O in/O their/O pink/O slippers/O began/O
swiftly/O,/O lightly/O,/O and/O rhythmically/O moving/O over/O the/O slippery/O floor/O in/O
time/O to/O the/O music/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O a/O rest/O to/O waltz/O with/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O her/O,/O as/O they/O fell/O into/O the/O
first/O slow/O steps/O of/O the/O waltz/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O exquisite/O--/Osuch/O lightness/O,/O
precision/O./O''/O He/O said/O to/O her/O the/O same/O thing/O he/O said/O to/O almost/O all/O his/O
partners/O whom/O he/O knew/O well/O./O

She/O smiled/O at/O his/O praise/O,/O and/O continued/O to/O look/O about/O the/O room/O over/O his/O
shoulder/O./O She/O was/O not/O like/O a/O girl/O at/O her/O first/O ball/O,/O for/O whom/O all/O faces/O
in/O the/O ballroom/O melt/O into/O one/O vision/O of/O fairyland/O./O And/O she/O was/O not/O a/O
girl/O who/O had/O gone/O the/O stale/O round/O of/O balls/O till/O every/O face/O in/O the/O
ballroom/O was/O familiar/O and/O tiresome/O./O But/O she/O was/O in/O the/O middle/O stage/O
between/O these/O two/O;/O she/O was/O excited/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O she/O had/O
sufficient/O self-possession/O to/O be/O able/O to/O observe/O./O In/O the/O left/O corner/O of/O
the/O ballroom/O she/O saw/O the/O cream/O of/O society/O gathered/O together/O./O
There/O--/Oincredibly/O naked/O--/Owas/O the/O beauty/O Lidi/PERSON,/O Korsunsky/PERSON's/O wife/O;/O there/O was/O
the/O lady/O of/O the/O house/O;/O there/O shone/O the/O bald/O head/O of/O Krivin/LOCATION,/O always/O to/O be/O
found/O where/O the/O best/O people/O were/O./O In/O that/O direction/O gazed/O the/O young/O men/O,/O
not/O venturing/O to/O approach/O./O There/O,/O too/O,/O she/O descried/O Stiva/PERSON,/O and/O there/O she/O
saw/O the/O exquisite/O figure/O and/O head/O of/O Anna/PERSON in/O a/O black/O velvet/O gown/O./O And/O
_/Ohe/O_/O was/O there/O./O Kitty/PERSON had/O not/O seen/O him/O since/O the/O evening/O she/O refused/O
Levin/PERSON./O With/O her/O long-sighted/O eyes/O,/O she/O knew/O him/O at/O once/O,/O and/O was/O even/O
aware/O that/O he/O was/O looking/O at/O her/O./O

``/OAnother/O turn/O,/O eh/O?/O You/O're/O not/O tired/O?/O''/O said/O Korsunsky/PERSON,/O a/O little/O out/O of/O
breath/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O thank/O you/O!/O''/O

``/OWhere/O shall/O I/O take/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OMadame/O Karenina/PERSON's/O here/O,/O I/O think/O .../O take/O me/O to/O her/O./O''/O

``/OWherever/O you/O command/O./O''/O

And/O Korsunsky/PERSON began/O waltzing/O with/O measured/O steps/O straight/O towards/O the/O
group/O in/O the/O left/O corner/O,/O continually/O saying/O,/O ``/OPardon/O,/O mesdames/O,/O pardon/O,/O
pardon/O,/O mesdames/O''/O;/O and/O steering/O his/O course/O through/O the/O sea/O of/O lace/O,/O
tulle/O,/O and/O ribbon/O,/O and/O not/O disarranging/O a/O feather/O,/O he/O turned/O his/O partner/O
sharply/O round/O,/O so/O that/O her/O slim/O ankles/O,/O in/O light/O transparent/O stockings/O,/O
were/O exposed/O to/O view/O,/O and/O her/O train/O floated/O out/O in/O fan/O shape/O and/O covered/O
Krivin/PERSON's/O knees/O./O Korsunsky/PERSON bowed/O,/O set/O straight/O his/O open/O shirt/O front/O,/O and/O
gave/O her/O his/O arm/O to/O conduct/O her/O to/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON./O Kitty/PERSON,/O flushed/O,/O took/O
her/O train/O from/O Krivin/LOCATION's/O knees/O,/O and/O,/O a/O little/O giddy/O,/O looked/O round/O,/O
seeking/O Anna/PERSON./O Anna/PERSON was/O not/O in/O lilac/O,/O as/O Kitty/PERSON had/O so/O urgently/O wished/O,/O
but/O in/O a/O black/O,/O low-cut/O,/O velvet/O gown/O,/O showing/O her/O full/O throat/O and/O
shoulders/O,/O that/O looked/O as/O though/O carved/O in/O old/O ivory/O,/O and/O her/O rounded/O
arms/O,/O with/O tiny/O,/O slender/O wrists/O./O The/O whole/O gown/O was/O trimmed/O with/O
Venetian/O guipure/O./O On/O her/O head/O,/O among/O her/O black/O hair/O--/Oher/O own/O,/O with/O no/O
false/O additions/O--/Owas/O a/O little/O wreath/O of/O pansies/O,/O and/O a/O bouquet/O of/O the/O
same/O in/O the/O black/O ribbon/O of/O her/O sash/O among/O white/O lace/O./O Her/O coiffure/O was/O
not/O striking/O./O All/O that/O was/O noticeable/O was/O the/O little/O wilful/O tendrils/O of/O
her/O curly/O hair/O that/O would/O always/O break/O free/O about/O her/O neck/O and/O temples/O./O
Round/O her/O well-cut/O,/O strong/O neck/O was/O a/O thread/O of/O pearls/O./O

Kitty/PERSON had/O been/O seeing/O Anna/PERSON every/O day/O;/O she/O adored/O her/O,/O and/O had/O pictured/O
her/O invariably/O in/O lilac/O./O But/O now/O seeing/O her/O in/O black/O,/O she/O felt/O that/O she/O
had/O not/O fully/O seen/O her/O charm/O./O She/O saw/O her/O now/O as/O someone/O quite/O new/O and/O
surprising/O to/O her/O./O Now/O she/O understood/O that/O Anna/PERSON could/O not/O have/O been/O in/O
lilac/O,/O and/O that/O her/O charm/O was/O just/O that/O she/O always/O stood/O out/O against/O her/O
attire/O,/O that/O her/O dress/O could/O never/O be/O noticeable/O on/O her/O./O And/O her/O black/O
dress/O,/O with/O its/O sumptuous/O lace/O,/O was/O not/O noticeable/O on/O her/O;/O it/O was/O only/O
the/O frame/O,/O and/O all/O that/O was/O seen/O was/O she/O--/Osimple/O,/O natural/O,/O elegant/O,/O and/O
at/O the/O same/O time/O gay/O and/O eager/O./O

She/O was/O standing/O holding/O herself/O,/O as/O always/O,/O very/O erect/O,/O and/O when/O Kitty/PERSON
drew/O near/O the/O group/O she/O was/O speaking/O to/O the/O master/O of/O the/O house/O,/O her/O
head/O slightly/O turned/O towards/O him/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O do/On't/O throw/O stones/O,/O''/O she/O was/O saying/O,/O in/O answer/O to/O something/O,/O
``/Othough/O I/O ca/On't/O understand/O it/O,/O''/O she/O went/O on/O,/O shrugging/O her/O shoulders/O,/O
and/O she/O turned/O at/O once/O with/O a/O soft/O smile/O of/O protection/O towards/O Kitty/PERSON./O
With/O a/O flying/O,/O feminine/O glance/O she/O scanned/O her/O attire/O,/O and/O made/O a/O
movement/O of/O her/O head/O,/O hardly/O perceptible/O,/O but/O understood/O by/O Kitty/PERSON,/O
signifying/O approval/O of/O her/O dress/O and/O her/O looks/O./O ``/OYou/O came/O into/O the/O room/O
dancing/O,/O''/O she/O added/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O one/O of/O my/O most/O faithful/O supporters/O,/O''/O said/O Korsunsky/PERSON,/O bowing/O to/O
Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O whom/O he/O had/O not/O yet/O seen/O./O ``/OThe/O princess/O helps/O to/O make/O
balls/O happy/O and/O successful/O./O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O a/O waltz/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O bending/O
down/O to/O her/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O have/O you/O met/O?/O''/O inquired/O their/O host/O./O

``/OIs/O there/O anyone/O we/O have/O not/O met/O?/O My/O wife/O and/O I/O are/O like/O white/O
wolves/O--/Oeveryone/O knows/O us/O,/O''/O answered/O Korsunsky/PERSON./O ``/OA/O waltz/O,/O Anna/PERSON
Arkadyevna/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O dance/O when/O it/O's/O possible/O not/O to/O dance/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OBut/O tonight/O it/O's/O impossible/O,/O''/O answered/O Korsunsky/PERSON./O

At/O that/O instant/O Vronsky/O came/O up/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O since/O it/O's/O impossible/O tonight/O,/O let/O us/O start/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O not/O
noticing/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O bow/O,/O and/O she/O hastily/O put/O her/O hand/O on/O Korsunsky/PERSON's/O
shoulder/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O she/O vexed/O with/O him/O about/O?/O''/O thought/O Kitty/PERSON,/O discerning/O that/O Anna/PERSON
had/O intentionally/O not/O responded/O to/O Vronsky/O's/O bow/O./O Vronsky/O went/O up/O to/O
Kitty/PERSON reminding/O her/O of/O the/O first/O quadrille/O,/O and/O expressing/O his/O regret/O
that/O he/O had/O not/O seen/O her/O all/O this/O time/O./O Kitty/PERSON gazed/O in/O admiration/O at/O
Anna/PERSON waltzing/O,/O and/O listened/O to/O him/O./O She/O expected/O him/O to/O ask/O her/O for/O a/O
waltz/O,/O but/O he/O did/O not/O,/O and/O she/O glanced/O wonderingly/O at/O him/O./O He/O flushed/O
slightly/O,/O and/O hurriedly/O asked/O her/O to/O waltz/O,/O but/O he/O had/O only/O just/O put/O his/O
arm/O round/O her/O waist/O and/O taken/O the/O first/O step/O when/O the/O music/O suddenly/O
stopped/O./O Kitty/PERSON looked/O into/O his/O face/O,/O which/O was/O so/O close/O to/O her/O own/O,/O and/O
long/O afterwards/O--/Ofor/O several/O years/O after/O--/Othat/O look/O,/O full/O of/O love/O,/O to/O
which/O he/O made/O no/O response/O,/O cut/O her/O to/O the/O heart/O with/O an/O agony/O of/O shame/O./O

''/O_/OPardon/O!/O pardon/O!/O_/O Waltz/O!/O waltz/O!/O''/O shouted/O Korsunsky/PERSON from/O the/O other/O side/O
of/O the/O room/O,/O and/O seizing/O the/O first/O young/O lady/O he/O came/O across/O he/O began/O
dancing/O himself/O./O



Chapter/O 23/O


Vronsky/O and/O Kitty/PERSON waltzed/O several/O times/O round/O the/O room/O./O After/O the/O first/O
waltz/O Kitty/PERSON went/O to/O her/O mother/O,/O and/O she/O had/O hardly/O time/O to/O say/O a/O few/O
words/O to/O Countess/O Nordston/O when/O Vronsky/PERSON came/O up/O again/O for/O the/O first/O
quadrille/O./O During/O the/O quadrille/O nothing/O of/O any/O significance/O was/O said/O:/O
there/O was/O disjointed/O talk/O between/O them/O of/O the/O Korsunskys/O,/O husband/O and/O
wife/O,/O whom/O he/O described/O very/O amusingly/O,/O as/O delightful/O children/O at/O forty/O,/O
and/O of/O the/O future/O town/O theater/O;/O and/O only/O once/O the/O conversation/O touched/O
her/O to/O the/O quick/O,/O when/O he/O asked/O her/O about/O Levin/PERSON,/O whether/O he/O was/O here/O,/O
and/O added/O that/O he/O liked/O him/O so/O much/O./O But/O Kitty/PERSON did/O not/O expect/O much/O from/O
the/O quadrille/O./O She/O looked/O forward/O with/O a/O thrill/O at/O her/O heart/O to/O the/O
mazurka/O./O She/O fancied/O that/O in/O the/O mazurka/O everything/O must/O be/O decided/O./O The/O
fact/O that/O he/O did/O not/O during/O the/O quadrille/O ask/O her/O for/O the/O mazurka/O did/O
not/O trouble/O her/O./O She/O felt/O sure/O she/O would/O dance/O the/O mazurka/O with/O him/O as/O
she/O had/O done/O at/O former/O balls/O,/O and/O refused/O five/O young/O men/O,/O saying/O she/O was/O
engaged/O for/O the/O mazurka/O./O The/O whole/O ball/O up/O to/O the/O last/O quadrille/O was/O for/O
Kitty/PERSON an/O enchanted/O vision/O of/O delightful/O colors/O,/O sounds/O,/O and/O motions/O./O She/O
only/O sat/O down/O when/O she/O felt/O too/O tired/O and/O begged/O for/O a/O rest/O./O But/O as/O she/O
was/O dancing/O the/O last/O quadrille/O with/O one/O of/O the/O tiresome/O young/O men/O whom/O
she/O could/O not/O refuse/O,/O she/O chanced/O to/O be/O vis-a-vis/O with/O Vronsky/O and/O Anna/PERSON./O
She/O had/O not/O been/O near/O Anna/PERSON again/O since/O the/O beginning/O of/O the/O evening/O,/O and/O
now/O again/O she/O saw/O her/O suddenly/O quite/O new/O and/O surprising/O./O She/O saw/O in/O her/O
the/O signs/O of/O that/O excitement/O of/O success/O she/O knew/O so/O well/O in/O herself/O;/O she/O
saw/O that/O she/O was/O intoxicated/O with/O the/O delighted/O admiration/O she/O was/O
exciting/O./O She/O knew/O that/O feeling/O and/O knew/O its/O signs/O,/O and/O saw/O them/O in/O
Anna/PERSON;/O saw/O the/O quivering/O,/O flashing/O light/O in/O her/O eyes/O,/O and/O the/O smile/O of/O
happiness/O and/O excitement/O unconsciously/O playing/O on/O her/O lips/O,/O and/O the/O
deliberate/O grace/O,/O precision/O,/O and/O lightness/O of/O her/O movements/O./O

``/OWho/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O herself/O./O ``/OAll/O or/O one/O?/O''/O And/O not/O assisting/O the/O harassed/O
young/O man/O she/O was/O dancing/O with/O in/O the/O conversation/O,/O the/O thread/O of/O which/O
he/O had/O lost/O and/O could/O not/O pick/O up/O again/O,/O she/O obeyed/O with/O external/O
liveliness/O the/O peremptory/O shouts/O of/O Korsunsky/LOCATION starting/O them/O all/O into/O the/O
_/Ogrand/O rond/O_/O,/O and/O then/O into/O the/O _/Ochâine/O_/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O she/O kept/O
watch/O with/O a/O growing/O pang/O at/O her/O heart/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O it/O's/O not/O the/O admiration/O of/O
the/O crowd/O has/O intoxicated/O her/O,/O but/O the/O adoration/O of/O one/O./O And/O that/O one/O?/O
can/O it/O be/O he/O?/O''/O Every/O time/O he/O spoke/O to/O Anna/PERSON the/O joyous/O light/O flashed/O into/O
her/O eyes/O,/O and/O the/O smile/O of/O happiness/O curved/O her/O red/O lips/O./O she/O seemed/O to/O
make/O an/O effort/O to/O control/O herself/O,/O to/O try/O not/O to/O show/O these/O signs/O of/O
delight/O,/O but/O they/O came/O out/O on/O her/O face/O of/O themselves/O./O ``/OBut/O what/O of/O him/O?/O''/O
Kitty/PERSON looked/O at/O him/O and/O was/O filled/O with/O terror/O./O What/O was/O pictured/O so/O
clearly/O to/O Kitty/PERSON in/O the/O mirror/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O face/O she/O saw/O in/O him/O./O What/O had/O
become/O of/O his/O always/O self-possessed/O resolute/O manner/O,/O and/O the/O carelessly/O
serene/O expression/O of/O his/O face/O?/O Now/O every/O time/O he/O turned/O to/O her/O,/O he/O bent/O
his/O head/O,/O as/O though/O he/O would/O have/O fallen/O at/O her/O feet/O,/O and/O in/O his/O eyes/O
there/O was/O nothing/O but/O humble/O submission/O and/O dread/O./O ``/OI/O would/O not/O offend/O
you/O,/O''/O his/O eyes/O seemed/O every/O time/O to/O be/O saying/O,/O ``/Obut/O I/O want/O to/O save/O
myself/O,/O and/O I/O do/On't/O know/O how/O./O''/O On/O his/O face/O was/O a/O look/O such/O as/O Kitty/PERSON had/O
never/O seen/O before/O./O

They/O were/O speaking/O of/O common/O acquaintances/O,/O keeping/O up/O the/O most/O trivial/O
conversation/O,/O but/O to/O Kitty/PERSON it/O seemed/O that/O every/O word/O they/O said/O was/O
determining/O their/O fate/O and/O hers/O./O And/O strange/O it/O was/O that/O they/O were/O
actually/O talking/O of/O how/O absurd/O Ivan/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O with/O his/O French/O,/O and/O
how/O the/O Eletsky/O girl/O might/O have/O made/O a/O better/O match/O,/O yet/O these/O words/O had/O
all/O the/O while/O consequence/O for/O them/O,/O and/O they/O were/O feeling/O just/O as/O Kitty/PERSON
did/O./O The/O whole/O ball/O,/O the/O whole/O world/O,/O everything/O seemed/O lost/O in/O fog/O in/O
Kitty/PERSON's/O soul/O./O Nothing/O but/O the/O stern/O discipline/O of/O her/O bringing-up/O
supported/O her/O and/O forced/O her/O to/O do/O what/O was/O expected/O of/O her/O,/O that/O is/O,/O to/O
dance/O,/O to/O answer/O questions/O,/O to/O talk/O,/O even/O to/O smile/O./O But/O before/O the/O
mazurka/O,/O when/O they/O were/O beginning/O to/O rearrange/O the/O chairs/O and/O a/O few/O
couples/O moved/O out/O of/O the/O smaller/O rooms/O into/O the/O big/O room/O,/O a/O moment/O of/O
despair/O and/O horror/O came/O for/O Kitty/PERSON./O She/O had/O refused/O five/O partners/O,/O and/O
now/O she/O was/O not/O dancing/O the/O mazurka/O./O She/O had/O not/O even/O a/O hope/O of/O being/O
asked/O for/O it/O,/O because/O she/O was/O so/O successful/O in/O society/O that/O the/O idea/O
would/O never/O occur/O to/O anyone/O that/O she/O had/O remained/O disengaged/O till/O now/O./O
She/O would/O have/O to/O tell/O her/O mother/O she/O felt/O ill/O and/O go/O home/O,/O but/O she/O had/O
not/O the/O strength/O to/O do/O this/O./O She/O felt/O crushed/O./O She/O went/O to/O the/O furthest/O
end/O of/O the/O little/O drawing/O room/O and/O sank/O into/O a/O low/O chair/O./O Her/O light/O,/O
transparent/O skirts/O rose/O like/O a/O cloud/O about/O her/O slender/O waist/O;/O one/O bare/O,/O
thin/O,/O soft/O,/O girlish/O arm/O,/O hanging/O listlessly/O,/O was/O lost/O in/O the/O folds/O of/O
her/O pink/O tunic/O;/O in/O the/O other/O she/O held/O her/O fan/O,/O and/O with/O rapid/O,/O short/O
strokes/O fanned/O her/O burning/O face/O./O But/O while/O she/O looked/O like/O a/O butterfly/O,/O
clinging/O to/O a/O blade/O of/O grass/O,/O and/O just/O about/O to/O open/O its/O rainbow/O wings/O
for/O fresh/O flight/O,/O her/O heart/O ached/O with/O a/O horrible/O despair/O./O

``/OBut/O perhaps/O I/O am/O wrong/O,/O perhaps/O it/O was/O not/O so/O?/O''/O And/O again/O she/O recalled/O
all/O she/O had/O seen/O./O

``/OKitty/PERSON,/O what/O is/O it/O?/O''/O said/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON,/O stepping/O noiselessly/O over/O
the/O carpet/O towards/O her/O./O ``/OI/O do/On't/O understand/O it/O./O''/O

Kitty/PERSON's/O lower/O lip/O began/O to/O quiver/O;/O she/O got/O up/O quickly/O./O

``/OKitty/PERSON,/O you/O're/O not/O dancing/O the/O mazurka/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O no/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON in/O a/O voice/O shaking/O with/O tears/O./O

``/OHe/O asked/O her/O for/O the/O mazurka/O before/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON,/O
knowing/O Kitty/PERSON would/O understand/O who/O were/O ``/Ohe/O''/O and/O ``/Oher/O./O''/O ``/OShe/O said/O:/O `/OWhy/O,/O
are/On't/O you/O going/O to/O dance/O it/O with/O Princess/O Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON?/O'/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O do/On't/O care/O!/O''/O answered/O Kitty/PERSON./O

No/O one/O but/O she/O herself/O understood/O her/O position/O;/O no/O one/O knew/O that/O she/O had/O
just/O refused/O the/O man/O whom/O perhaps/O she/O loved/O,/O and/O refused/O him/O because/O she/O
had/O put/O her/O faith/O in/O another/O./O

Countess/O Nordston/O found/O Korsunsky/PERSON,/O with/O whom/O she/O was/O to/O dance/O the/O
mazurka/O,/O and/O told/O him/O to/O ask/O Kitty/PERSON./O

Kitty/PERSON danced/O in/O the/O first/O couple/O,/O and/O luckily/O for/O her/O she/O had/O not/O to/O
talk/O,/O because/O Korsunsky/PERSON was/O all/O the/O time/O running/O about/O directing/O the/O
figure/O./O Vronsky/O and/O Anna/PERSON sat/O almost/O opposite/O her/O./O She/O saw/O them/O with/O her/O
long-sighted/O eyes/O,/O and/O saw/O them/O,/O too/O,/O close/O by/O,/O when/O they/O met/O in/O the/O
figures/O,/O and/O the/O more/O she/O saw/O of/O them/O the/O more/O convinced/O was/O she/O that/O
her/O unhappiness/O was/O complete/O./O She/O saw/O that/O they/O felt/O themselves/O alone/O in/O
that/O crowded/O room/O./O And/O on/O Vronsky/O's/O face/O,/O always/O so/O firm/O and/O
independent/O,/O she/O saw/O that/O look/O that/O had/O struck/O her/O,/O of/O bewilderment/O and/O
humble/O submissiveness/O,/O like/O the/O expression/O of/O an/O intelligent/O dog/O when/O it/O
has/O done/O wrong/O./O

Anna/PERSON smiled/O,/O and/O her/O smile/O was/O reflected/O by/O him/O./O She/O grew/O thoughtful/O,/O
and/O he/O became/O serious/O./O Some/O supernatural/O force/O drew/O Kitty/PERSON's/O eyes/O to/O
Anna/PERSON's/O face/O./O She/O was/O fascinating/O in/O her/O simple/O black/O dress/O,/O fascinating/O
were/O her/O round/O arms/O with/O their/O bracelets/O,/O fascinating/O was/O her/O firm/O neck/O
with/O its/O thread/O of/O pearls/O,/O fascinating/O the/O straying/O curls/O of/O her/O loose/O
hair/O,/O fascinating/O the/O graceful/O,/O light/O movements/O of/O her/O little/O feet/O and/O
hands/O,/O fascinating/O was/O that/O lovely/O face/O in/O its/O eagerness/O,/O but/O there/O was/O
something/O terrible/O and/O cruel/O in/O her/O fascination/O./O

Kitty/PERSON admired/O her/O more/O than/O ever/O,/O and/O more/O and/O more/O acute/O was/O her/O
suffering/O./O Kitty/PERSON felt/O overwhelmed/O,/O and/O her/O face/O showed/O it/O./O When/O Vronsky/PERSON
saw/O her/O,/O coming/O across/O her/O in/O the/O mazurka/O,/O he/O did/O not/O at/O once/O recognize/O
her/O,/O she/O was/O so/O changed/O./O

``/ODelightful/O ball/O!/O''/O he/O said/O to/O her/O,/O for/O the/O sake/O of/O saying/O something/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O she/O answered/O./O

In/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O mazurka/O,/O repeating/O a/O complicated/O figure/O,/O newly/O
invented/O by/O Korsunsky/PERSON,/O Anna/PERSON came/O forward/O into/O the/O center/O of/O the/O circle/O,/O
chose/O two/O gentlemen/O,/O and/O summoned/O a/O lady/O and/O Kitty/PERSON./O Kitty/PERSON gazed/O at/O her/O
in/O dismay/O as/O she/O went/O up/O./O Anna/PERSON looked/O at/O her/O with/O drooping/O eyelids/O,/O and/O
smiled/O,/O pressing/O her/O hand/O./O But/O,/O noticing/O that/O Kitty/PERSON only/O responded/O to/O
her/O smile/O by/O a/O look/O of/O despair/O and/O amazement/O,/O she/O turned/O away/O from/O her/O,/O
and/O began/O gaily/O talking/O to/O the/O other/O lady/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O there/O is/O something/O uncanny/O,/O devilish/O and/O fascinating/O in/O her/O,/O''/O
Kitty/PERSON said/O to/O herself/O./O

Anna/PERSON did/O not/O mean/O to/O stay/O to/O supper/O,/O but/O the/O master/O of/O the/O house/O began/O
to/O press/O her/O to/O do/O so/O./O

``/ONonsense/O,/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Korsunsky/PERSON,/O drawing/O her/O bare/O arm/O under/O
the/O sleeve/O of/O his/O dress/O coat/O,/O ``/OI/O've/O such/O an/O idea/O for/O a/O _/Ocotillion/O!/O Un/O
bijou/O!/O_/O''/O

And/O he/O moved/O gradually/O on/O,/O trying/O to/O draw/O her/O along/O with/O him/O./O Their/O host/O
smiled/O approvingly/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O am/O not/O going/O to/O stay/O,/O''/O answered/O Anna/PERSON,/O smiling/O,/O but/O in/O spite/O of/O
her/O smile/O,/O both/O Korsunsky/PERSON and/O the/O master/O of/O the/O house/O saw/O from/O her/O
resolute/O tone/O that/O she/O would/O not/O stay/O./O

``/ONo/O;/O why/O,/O as/O it/O is/O,/O I/O have/O danced/O more/O at/O your/O ball/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION than/O I/O
have/O all/O the/O winter/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O looking/O round/O at/O Vronsky/O,/O
who/O stood/O near/O her/O./O ``/OI/O must/O rest/O a/O little/O before/O my/O journey/O./O''/O

``/OAre/O you/O certainly/O going/O tomorrow/O then/O?/O''/O asked/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O suppose/O so/O,/O''/O answered/O Anna/PERSON,/O as/O it/O were/O wondering/O at/O the/O boldness/O
of/O his/O question/O;/O but/O the/O irrepressible/O,/O quivering/O brilliance/O of/O her/O eyes/O
and/O her/O smile/O set/O him/O on/O fire/O as/O she/O said/O it/O./O

Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON did/O not/O stay/O to/O supper/O,/O but/O went/O home/O./O



Chapter/O 24/O


``/OYes/O,/O there/O is/O something/O in/O me/O hateful/O,/O repulsive/O,/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O as/O he/O
came/O away/O from/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O,/O and/O walked/O in/O the/O direction/O of/O his/O
brother/O's/O lodgings/O./O ``/OAnd/O I/O do/On't/O get/O on/O with/O other/O people/O./O Pride/O,/O they/O
say/O./O No/O,/O I/O have/O no/O pride/O./O If/O I/O had/O any/O pride/O,/O I/O should/O not/O have/O put/O
myself/O in/O such/O a/O position/O./O''/O And/O he/O pictured/O to/O himself/O Vronsky/O,/O happy/O,/O
good-natured/O,/O clever/O,/O and/O self-possessed/O,/O certainly/O never/O placed/O in/O the/O
awful/O position/O in/O which/O he/O had/O been/O that/O evening/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O she/O was/O bound/O to/O
choose/O him/O./O So/O it/O had/O to/O be/O,/O and/O I/O can/Onot/O complain/O of/O anyone/O or/O
anything/O./O I/O am/O myself/O to/O blame/O./O What/O right/O had/O I/O to/O imagine/O she/O would/O
care/O to/O join/O her/O life/O to/O mine/O?/O Who/O am/O I/O and/O what/O am/O I/O?/O A/O nobody/O,/O not/O
wanted/O by/O any/O one/O,/O nor/O of/O use/O to/O anybody/O./O''/O And/O he/O recalled/O his/O brother/O
Nikolay/PERSON,/O and/O dwelt/O with/O pleasure/O on/O the/O thought/O of/O him/O./O ``/OIs/On't/O he/O right/O
that/O everything/O in/O the/O world/O is/O base/O and/O loathsome/O?/O And/O are/O we/O fair/O in/O
our/O judgment/O of/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON?/O Of/O course/O,/O from/O the/O point/O of/O view/O of/O
Prokofy/LOCATION,/O seeing/O him/O in/O a/O torn/O cloak/O and/O tipsy/O,/O he/O's/O a/O despicable/O person/O./O
But/O I/O know/O him/O differently/O./O I/O know/O his/O soul/O,/O and/O know/O that/O we/O are/O like/O
him/O./O And/O I/O,/O instead/O of/O going/O to/O seek/O him/O out/O,/O went/O out/O to/O dinner/O,/O and/O
came/O here/O./O''/O Levin/PERSON walked/O up/O to/O a/O lamppost/O,/O read/O his/O brother/O's/O address/O,/O
which/O was/O in/O his/O pocketbook/O,/O and/O called/O a/O sledge/O./O All/O the/O long/O way/O to/O
his/O brother/O's/O,/O Levin/PERSON vividly/O recalled/O all/O the/O facts/O familiar/O to/O him/O of/O
his/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON's/O life/O./O He/O remembered/O how/O his/O brother/O,/O while/O at/O the/O
university/O,/O and/O for/O a/O year/O afterwards/O,/O had/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O jeers/O of/O his/O
companions/O,/O lived/O like/O a/O monk/O,/O strictly/O observing/O all/O religious/O rites/O,/O
services/O,/O and/O fasts/O,/O and/O avoiding/O every/O sort/O of/O pleasure/O,/O especially/O
women/O./O And/O afterwards/O,/O how/O he/O had/O all/O at/O once/O broken/O out/O:/O he/O had/O
associated/O with/O the/O most/O horrible/O people/O,/O and/O rushed/O into/O the/O most/O
senseless/O debauchery/O./O He/O remembered/O later/O the/O scandal/O over/O a/O boy/O,/O whom/O
he/O had/O taken/O from/O the/O country/O to/O bring/O up/O,/O and/O,/O in/O a/O fit/O of/O rage/O,/O had/O so/O
violently/O beaten/O that/O proceedings/O were/O brought/O against/O him/O for/O
unlawfully/O wounding/O./O Then/O he/O recalled/O the/O scandal/O with/O a/O sharper/O,/O to/O
whom/O he/O had/O lost/O money/O,/O and/O given/O a/O promissory/O note/O,/O and/O against/O whom/O he/O
had/O himself/O lodged/O a/O complaint/O,/O asserting/O that/O he/O had/O cheated/O him/O./O -LRB-/OThis/O
was/O the/O money/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON had/O paid/O./O-RRB-/O Then/O he/O remembered/O how/O he/O had/O
spent/O a/O night/O in/O the/O lockup/O for/O disorderly/O conduct/O in/O the/O street/O./O He/O
remembered/O the/O shameful/O proceedings/O he/O had/O tried/O to/O get/O up/O against/O his/O
brother/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O accusing/O him/O of/O not/O having/O paid/O him/O his/O share/O
of/O his/O mother/O's/O fortune/O,/O and/O the/O last/O scandal/O,/O when/O he/O had/O gone/O to/O a/O
western/O province/O in/O an/O official/O capacity/O,/O and/O there/O had/O got/O into/O trouble/O
for/O assaulting/O a/O village/O elder/O.../O./O It/O was/O all/O horribly/O disgusting/O,/O yet/O
to/O Levin/PERSON it/O appeared/O not/O at/O all/O in/O the/O same/O disgusting/O light/O as/O it/O
inevitably/O would/O to/O those/O who/O did/O not/O know/O Nikolay/PERSON,/O did/O not/O know/O all/O his/O
story/O,/O did/O not/O know/O his/O heart/O./O

Levin/PERSON remembered/O that/O when/O Nikolay/PERSON had/O been/O in/O the/O devout/O stage/O,/O the/O
period/O of/O fasts/O and/O monks/O and/O church/O services/O,/O when/O he/O was/O seeking/O in/O
religion/O a/O support/O and/O a/O curb/O for/O his/O passionate/O temperament/O,/O everyone/O,/O
far/O from/O encouraging/O him/O,/O had/O jeered/O at/O him/O,/O and/O he/O,/O too/O,/O with/O the/O
others/O./O They/O had/O teased/O him/O,/O called/O him/O Noah/PERSON and/O Monk/O;/O and/O,/O when/O he/O had/O
broken/O out/O,/O no/O one/O had/O helped/O him/O,/O but/O everyone/O had/O turned/O away/O from/O him/O
with/O horror/O and/O disgust/O./O

Levin/PERSON felt/O that/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O all/O the/O ugliness/O of/O his/O life/O,/O his/O brother/O
Nikolay/PERSON,/O in/O his/O soul/O,/O in/O the/O very/O depths/O of/O his/O soul/O,/O was/O no/O more/O in/O the/O
wrong/O than/O the/O people/O who/O despised/O him/O./O He/O was/O not/O to/O blame/O for/O having/O
been/O born/O with/O his/O unbridled/O temperament/O and/O his/O somehow/O limited/O
intelligence/O./O But/O he/O had/O always/O wanted/O to/O be/O good/O./O ``/OI/O will/O tell/O him/O
everything/O,/O without/O reserve/O,/O and/O I/O will/O make/O him/O speak/O without/O reserve/O,/O
too/O,/O and/O I/O'll/O show/O him/O that/O I/O love/O him/O,/O and/O so/O understand/O him/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON
resolved/O to/O himself/O,/O as/O,/O towards/O eleven/O o'clock/O,/O he/O reached/O the/O hotel/O of/O
which/O he/O had/O the/O address/O./O

``/OAt/O the/O top/O,/O 12/O and/O 13/O,/O''/O the/O porter/O answered/O Levin/PERSON's/O inquiry/O./O

``/OAt/O home/O?/O''/O

``/OSure/O to/O be/O at/O home/O./O''/O

The/O door/O of/O No./O 12/O was/O half/O open/O,/O and/O there/O came/O out/O into/O the/O streak/O of/O
light/O thick/O fumes/O of/O cheap/O,/O poor/O tobacco/O,/O and/O the/O sound/O of/O a/O voice/O,/O
unknown/O to/O Levin/PERSON;/O but/O he/O knew/O at/O once/O that/O his/O brother/O was/O there/O;/O he/O
heard/O his/O cough/O./O

As/O he/O went/O in/O the/O door/O,/O the/O unknown/O voice/O was/O saying/O:/O

``/OIt/O all/O depends/O with/O how/O much/O judgment/O and/O knowledge/O the/O thing/O's/O done/O./O''/O

Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON looked/O in/O at/O the/O door/O,/O and/O saw/O that/O the/O speaker/O was/O a/O
young/O man/O with/O an/O immense/O shock/O of/O hair/O,/O wearing/O a/O Russian/O jerkin/O,/O and/O
that/O a/O pockmarked/O woman/O in/O a/O woolen/O gown/O,/O without/O collar/O or/O cuffs/O,/O was/O
sitting/O on/O the/O sofa/O./O His/O brother/O was/O not/O to/O be/O seen/O./O Konstantin/PERSON felt/O a/O
sharp/O pang/O at/O his/O heart/O at/O the/O thought/O of/O the/O strange/O company/O in/O which/O
his/O brother/O spent/O his/O life/O./O No/O one/O had/O heard/O him/O,/O and/O Konstantin/PERSON,/O taking/O
off/O his/O galoshes/O,/O listened/O to/O what/O the/O gentleman/O in/O the/O jerkin/O was/O
saying/O./O He/O was/O speaking/O of/O some/O enterprise/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O the/O devil/O flay/O them/O,/O the/O privileged/O classes/O,/O''/O his/O brother/O's/O voice/O
responded/O,/O with/O a/O cough/O./O ``/OMasha/O!/O get/O us/O some/O supper/O and/O some/O wine/O if/O
there/O's/O any/O left/O;/O or/O else/O go/O and/O get/O some/O./O''/O

The/O woman/O rose/O,/O came/O out/O from/O behind/O the/O screen/O,/O and/O saw/O Konstantin/PERSON./O

``/OThere/O's/O some/O gentleman/O,/O Nikolay/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OWhom/O do/O you/O want/O?/O''/O said/O the/O voice/O of/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O angrily/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O I/O,/O''/O answered/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O coming/O forward/O into/O the/O light/O./O

``/OWho/O's/O _/OI/O_/O?/O''/O Nikolay/PERSON's/O voice/O said/O again/O,/O still/O more/O angrily/O./O He/O could/O be/O
heard/O getting/O up/O hurriedly/O,/O stumbling/O against/O something/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON saw/O,/O
facing/O him/O in/O the/O doorway/O,/O the/O big/O,/O scared/O eyes/O,/O and/O the/O huge/O,/O thin/O,/O
stooping/O figure/O of/O his/O brother/O,/O so/O familiar/O,/O and/O yet/O astonishing/O in/O its/O
weirdness/O and/O sickliness/O./O

He/O was/O even/O thinner/O than/O three/O years/O before/O,/O when/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON had/O
seen/O him/O last/O./O He/O was/O wearing/O a/O short/O coat/O,/O and/O his/O hands/O and/O big/O bones/O
seemed/O huger/O than/O ever/O./O His/O hair/O had/O grown/O thinner/O,/O the/O same/O straight/O
mustaches/O hid/O his/O lips/O,/O the/O same/O eyes/O gazed/O strangely/O and/O naively/O at/O his/O
visitor/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O Kostya/PERSON!/O''/O he/O exclaimed/O suddenly/O,/O recognizing/O his/O brother/O,/O and/O his/O
eyes/O lit/O up/O with/O joy/O./O But/O the/O same/O second/O he/O looked/O round/O at/O the/O young/O
man/O,/O and/O gave/O the/O nervous/O jerk/O of/O his/O head/O and/O neck/O that/O Konstantin/PERSON knew/O
so/O well/O,/O as/O if/O his/O neckband/O hurt/O him/O;/O and/O a/O quite/O different/O expression/O,/O
wild/O,/O suffering/O,/O and/O cruel/O,/O rested/O on/O his/O emaciated/O face/O./O

``/OI/O wrote/O to/O you/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON both/O that/O I/O do/On't/O know/O you/O and/O
do/On't/O want/O to/O know/O you/O./O What/O is/O it/O you/O want/O?/O''/O

He/O was/O not/O at/O all/O the/O same/O as/O Konstantin/PERSON had/O been/O fancying/O him/O./O The/O
worst/O and/O most/O tiresome/O part/O of/O his/O character/O,/O what/O made/O all/O relations/O
with/O him/O so/O difficult/O,/O had/O been/O forgotten/O by/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON when/O he/O
thought/O of/O him/O,/O and/O now/O,/O when/O he/O saw/O his/O face/O,/O and/O especially/O that/O
nervous/O twitching/O of/O his/O head/O,/O he/O remembered/O it/O all/O./O

``/OI/O did/On't/O want/O to/O see/O you/O for/O anything/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O timidly/O./O ``/OI/O've/O
simply/O come/O to/O see/O you/O./O''/O

His/O brother/O's/O timidity/O obviously/O softened/O Nikolay/PERSON./O His/O lips/O twitched/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O so/O that/O's/O it/O?/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O come/O in/O;/O sit/O down/O./O Like/O some/O supper/O?/O
Masha/PERSON,/O bring/O supper/O for/O three/O./O No/O,/O stop/O a/O minute/O./O Do/O you/O know/O who/O this/O
is/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O addressing/O his/O brother/O,/O and/O indicating/O the/O gentleman/O in/O
the/O jerkin/O:/O ``/OThis/O is/O Mr./O Kritsky/PERSON,/O my/O friend/O from/O Kiev/LOCATION,/O a/O very/O remarkable/O
man/O./O He/O's/O persecuted/O by/O the/O police/O,/O of/O course/O,/O because/O he/O's/O not/O a/O
scoundrel/O./O''/O

And/O he/O looked/O round/O in/O the/O way/O he/O always/O did/O at/O everyone/O in/O the/O room/O./O
Seeing/O that/O the/O woman/O standing/O in/O the/O doorway/O was/O moving/O to/O go/O,/O he/O
shouted/O to/O her/O,/O ``/OWait/O a/O minute/O,/O I/O said/O./O''/O And/O with/O the/O inability/O to/O
express/O himself/O,/O the/O incoherence/O that/O Konstantin/PERSON knew/O so/O well/O,/O he/O began/O,/O
with/O another/O look/O round/O at/O everyone/O,/O to/O tell/O his/O brother/O Kritsky/PERSON's/O
story/O:/O how/O he/O had/O been/O expelled/O from/O the/O university/O for/O starting/O a/O
benefit/O society/O for/O the/O poor/O students/O and/O Sunday/O schools/O;/O and/O how/O he/O had/O
afterwards/O been/O a/O teacher/O in/O a/O peasant/O school/O,/O and/O how/O he/O had/O been/O
driven/O out/O of/O that/O too/O,/O and/O had/O afterwards/O been/O condemned/O for/O something/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O of/O the/O Kiev/LOCATION university/O?/O''/O said/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON to/O Kritsky/PERSON,/O to/O
break/O the/O awkward/O silence/O that/O followed/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O was/O of/O Kiev/LOCATION,/O''/O Kritsky/PERSON replied/O angrily/O,/O his/O face/O darkening/O./O

``/OAnd/O this/O woman/O,/O''/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON interrupted/O him/O,/O pointing/O to/O her/O,/O ``/Ois/O
the/O partner/O of/O my/O life/O,/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON./O I/O took/O her/O out/O of/O a/O bad/O
house/O,/O''/O and/O he/O jerked/O his/O neck/O saying/O this/O;/O ``/Obut/O I/O love/O her/O and/O respect/O
her/O,/O and/O any/O one/O who/O wants/O to/O know/O me/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O raising/O his/O voice/O and/O
knitting/O his/O brows/O,/O ``/OI/O beg/O to/O love/O her/O and/O respect/O her/O./O She/O's/O just/O the/O
same/O as/O my/O wife/O,/O just/O the/O same/O./O So/O now/O you/O know/O whom/O you/O've/O to/O do/O with/O./O
And/O if/O you/O think/O you/O're/O lowering/O yourself/O,/O well/O,/O here/O's/O the/O floor/O,/O
there/O's/O the/O door/O./O''/O

And/O again/O his/O eyes/O traveled/O inquiringly/O over/O all/O of/O them/O./O

``/OWhy/O I/O should/O be/O lowering/O myself/O,/O I/O do/On't/O understand/O./O''/O

``/OThen/O,/O Masha/PERSON,/O tell/O them/O to/O bring/O supper/O;/O three/O portions/O,/O spirits/O and/O
wine/O.../O./O No/O,/O wait/O a/O minute/O.../O./O No/O,/O it/O does/On't/O matter/O.../O./O Go/O along/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 25/O


``/OSo/O you/O see/O,/O''/O pursued/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O painfully/O wrinkling/O his/O forehead/O
and/O twitching/O./O

It/O was/O obviously/O difficult/O for/O him/O to/O think/O of/O what/O to/O say/O and/O do/O./O

``/OHere/O,/O do/O you/O see/O?/O''/O.../O He/O pointed/O to/O some/O sort/O of/O iron/O bars/O,/O fastened/O
together/O with/O strings/O,/O lying/O in/O a/O corner/O of/O the/O room/O./O ``/ODo/O you/O see/O that/O?/O
That/O's/O the/O beginning/O of/O a/O new/O thing/O we/O're/O going/O into/O./O It/O's/O a/O productive/O
association/O.../O''/O

Konstantin/PERSON scarcely/O heard/O him/O./O He/O looked/O into/O his/O sickly/O,/O consumptive/O
face/O,/O and/O he/O was/O more/O and/O more/O sorry/O for/O him/O,/O and/O he/O could/O not/O force/O
himself/O to/O listen/O to/O what/O his/O brother/O was/O telling/O him/O about/O the/O
association/O./O He/O saw/O that/O this/O association/O was/O a/O mere/O anchor/O to/O save/O him/O
from/O self-contempt/O./O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON went/O on/O talking/O:/O

``/OYou/O know/O that/O capital/O oppresses/O the/O laborer/O./O The/O laborers/O with/O us/O,/O the/O
peasants/O,/O bear/O all/O the/O burden/O of/O labor/O,/O and/O are/O so/O placed/O that/O however/O
much/O they/O work/O they/O ca/On't/O escape/O from/O their/O position/O of/O beasts/O of/O
burden/O./O All/O the/O profits/O of/O labor/O,/O on/O which/O they/O might/O improve/O their/O
position/O,/O and/O gain/O leisure/O for/O themselves/O,/O and/O after/O that/O education/O,/O all/O
the/O surplus/O values/O are/O taken/O from/O them/O by/O the/O capitalists/O./O And/O society/O's/O
so/O constituted/O that/O the/O harder/O they/O work/O,/O the/O greater/O the/O profit/O of/O the/O
merchants/O and/O landowners/O,/O while/O they/O stay/O beasts/O of/O burden/O to/O the/O end/O./O
And/O that/O state/O of/O things/O must/O be/O changed/O,/O''/O he/O finished/O up/O,/O and/O he/O looked/O
questioningly/O at/O his/O brother/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O of/O course/O,/O''/O said/O Konstantin/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O the/O patch/O of/O red/O that/O had/O
come/O out/O on/O his/O brother/O's/O projecting/O cheek/O bones/O./O

``/OAnd/O so/O we/O're/O founding/O a/O locksmiths/O'/O association/O,/O where/O all/O the/O
production/O and/O profit/O and/O the/O chief/O instruments/O of/O production/O will/O be/O in/O
common/O./O''/O

``/OWhere/O is/O the/O association/O to/O be/O?/O''/O asked/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON./O

``/OIn/O the/O village/O of/O Vozdrem/LOCATION,/O Kazan/PERSON government/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O why/O in/O a/O village/O?/O In/O the/O villages/O,/O I/O think/O,/O there/O is/O plenty/O of/O work/O
as/O it/O is/O./O Why/O a/O locksmiths/O'/O association/O in/O a/O village/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O?/O Because/O the/O peasants/O are/O just/O as/O much/O slaves/O as/O they/O ever/O were/O,/O
and/O that/O's/O why/O you/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON do/On't/O like/O people/O to/O try/O and/O
get/O them/O out/O of/O their/O slavery/O,/O''/O said/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O exasperated/O by/O the/O
objection/O./O

Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON sighed/O,/O looking/O meanwhile/O about/O the/O cheerless/O and/O dirty/O
room/O./O This/O sigh/O seemed/O to/O exasperate/O Nikolay/PERSON still/O more/O./O

``/OI/O know/O your/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O aristocratic/O views/O./O I/O know/O that/O he/O
applies/O all/O the/O power/O of/O his/O intellect/O to/O justify/O existing/O evils/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O and/O what/O do/O you/O talk/O of/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON for/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O
smiling/O./O

``/OSergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON?/O I/O'll/O tell/O you/O what/O for/O!/O''/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON shrieked/O
suddenly/O at/O the/O name/O of/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O ``/OI/O'll/O tell/O you/O what/O for/O.../O./O
But/O what/O's/O the/O use/O of/O talking/O?/O There/O's/O only/O one/O thing/O.../O./O What/O did/O you/O
come/O to/O me/O for/O?/O You/O look/O down/O on/O this/O,/O and/O you/O're/O welcome/O to/O,/O--/Oand/O go/O
away/O,/O in/O God/O's/O name/O go/O away/O!/O''/O he/O shrieked/O,/O getting/O up/O from/O his/O chair/O./O
``/OAnd/O go/O away/O,/O and/O go/O away/O!/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O look/O down/O on/O it/O at/O all/O,/O''/O said/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON timidly/O./O ``/OI/O
do/On't/O even/O dispute/O it/O./O''/O

At/O that/O instant/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON came/O back/O./O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON looked/O round/O
angrily/O at/O her/O./O She/O went/O quickly/O to/O him/O,/O and/O whispered/O something/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O well/O;/O I/O've/O grown/O irritable/O,/O''/O said/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O getting/O calmer/O
and/O breathing/O painfully/O;/O ``/Oand/O then/O you/O talk/O to/O me/O of/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
and/O his/O article/O./O It/O's/O such/O rubbish/O,/O such/O lying/O,/O such/O self-deception/O./O
What/O can/O a/O man/O write/O of/O justice/O who/O knows/O nothing/O of/O it/O?/O Have/O you/O read/O
his/O article/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O Kritsky/PERSON,/O sitting/O down/O again/O at/O the/O table/O,/O and/O
moving/O back/O off/O half/O of/O it/O the/O scattered/O cigarettes/O,/O so/O as/O to/O clear/O a/O
space/O./O

``/OI/O've/O not/O read/O it/O,/O''/O Kritsky/PERSON responded/O gloomily/O,/O obviously/O not/O desiring/O
to/O enter/O into/O the/O conversation/O./O

``/OWhy/O not/O?/O''/O said/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O now/O turning/O with/O exasperation/O upon/O
Kritsky/PERSON./O

``/OBecause/O I/O did/On't/O see/O the/O use/O of/O wasting/O my/O time/O over/O it/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O but/O excuse/O me/O,/O how/O did/O you/O know/O it/O would/O be/O wasting/O your/O time/O?/O That/O
article/O's/O too/O deep/O for/O many/O people/O--/Othat/O's/O to/O say/O it/O's/O over/O their/O heads/O./O
But/O with/O me/O,/O it/O's/O another/O thing/O;/O I/O see/O through/O his/O ideas/O,/O and/O I/O know/O
where/O its/O weakness/O lies/O./O''/O

Everyone/O was/O mute/O./O Kritsky/PERSON got/O up/O deliberately/O and/O reached/O his/O cap/O./O

``/OWo/On't/O you/O have/O supper/O?/O All/O right/O,/O good-bye/O!/O Come/O round/O tomorrow/O with/O
the/O locksmith/O./O''/O

Kritsky/PERSON had/O hardly/O gone/O out/O when/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON smiled/O and/O winked/O./O

``/OHe/O's/O no/O good/O either/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OI/O see/O,/O of/O course/O.../O''/O

But/O at/O that/O instant/O Kritsky/PERSON,/O at/O the/O door/O,/O called/O him/O.../O
