``/OWhat/O do/O you/O want/O now/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O went/O out/O to/O him/O in/O the/O passage/O./O
Left/O alone/O with/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON,/O Levin/PERSON turned/O to/O her/O./O

``/OHave/O you/O been/O long/O with/O my/O brother/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O her/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O more/O than/O a/O year/O./O Nikolay/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON's/O health/O has/O become/O very/O
poor/O./O Nikolay/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON drinks/O a/O great/O deal/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OThat/O is/O .../O how/O does/O he/O drink/O?/O''/O

``/ODrinks/O vodka/O,/O and/O it/O's/O bad/O for/O him/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O a/O great/O deal/O?/O''/O whispered/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O looking/O timidly/O towards/O the/O doorway/O,/O where/O Nikolay/PERSON
Levin/PERSON had/O reappeared/O./O

``/OWhat/O were/O you/O talking/O about/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O knitting/O his/O brows/O,/O and/O turning/O
his/O scared/O eyes/O from/O one/O to/O the/O other/O./O ``/OWhat/O was/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O nothing/O,/O''/O Konstantin/PERSON answered/O in/O confusion/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O if/O you/O do/On't/O want/O to/O say/O,/O do/On't/O./O Only/O it/O's/O no/O good/O your/O talking/O to/O
her/O./O She/O's/O a/O wench/O,/O and/O you/O're/O a/O gentleman/O,/O''/O he/O said/O with/O a/O jerk/O of/O the/O
neck/O./O ``/OYou/O understand/O everything/O,/O I/O see/O,/O and/O have/O taken/O stock/O of/O
everything/O,/O and/O look/O with/O commiseration/O on/O my/O shortcomings/O,/O''/O he/O began/O
again/O,/O raising/O his/O voice/O./O

``/ONikolay/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O Nikolay/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O whispered/O Marya/PERSON
Nikolaevna/PERSON,/O again/O going/O up/O to/O him/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O very/O well/O,/O very/O well/O!/O.../O But/O where/O's/O the/O supper/O?/O Ah/O,/O here/O it/O is/O,/O''/O
he/O said/O,/O seeing/O a/O waiter/O with/O a/O tray/O./O ``/OHere/O,/O set/O it/O here/O,/O''/O he/O added/O
angrily/O,/O and/O promptly/O seizing/O the/O vodka/O,/O he/O poured/O out/O a/O glassful/O and/O
drank/O it/O greedily/O./O ``/OLike/O a/O drink/O?/O''/O he/O turned/O to/O his/O brother/O,/O and/O at/O once/O
became/O better/O humored/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O enough/O of/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O I/O'm/O glad/O to/O see/O you/O,/O anyway/O./O After/O
all/O's/O said/O and/O done/O,/O we/O're/O not/O strangers/O./O Come/O,/O have/O a/O drink/O./O Tell/O me/O
what/O you/O're/O doing/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O greedily/O munching/O a/O piece/O of/O bread/O,/O and/O
pouring/O out/O another/O glassful/O./O ``/OHow/O are/O you/O living/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O live/O alone/O in/O the/O country/O,/O as/O I/O used/O to/O./O I/O'm/O busy/O looking/O after/O the/O
land/O,/O''/O answered/O Konstantin/PERSON,/O watching/O with/O horror/O the/O greediness/O with/O
which/O his/O brother/O ate/O and/O drank/O,/O and/O trying/O to/O conceal/O that/O he/O noticed/O
it/O./O

``/OWhy/O do/On't/O you/O get/O married/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O has/On't/O happened/O so/O,/O''/O Konstantin/PERSON answered/O,/O reddening/O a/O little/O./O

``/OWhy/O not/O?/O For/O me/O now/O .../O everything/O's/O at/O an/O end/O!/O I/O've/O made/O a/O mess/O of/O my/O
life/O./O But/O this/O I/O've/O said/O,/O and/O I/O say/O still/O,/O that/O if/O my/O share/O had/O been/O
given/O me/O when/O I/O needed/O it/O,/O my/O whole/O life/O would/O have/O been/O different/O./O''/O

Konstantin/PERSON made/O haste/O to/O change/O the/O conversation/O./O

``/ODo/O you/O know/O your/O little/O Vanya/O's/O with/O me/O,/O a/O clerk/O in/O the/O countinghouse/O
at/O Pokrovskoe/LOCATION./O''/O

Nikolay/PERSON jerked/O his/O neck/O,/O and/O sank/O into/O thought/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O tell/O me/O what/O's/O going/O on/O at/O Pokrovskoe/LOCATION./O Is/O the/O house/O standing/O
still/O,/O and/O the/O birch/O trees/O,/O and/O our/O schoolroom/O?/O And/O Philip/PERSON the/O gardener/O,/O
is/O he/O living/O?/O How/O I/O remember/O the/O arbor/O and/O the/O seat/O!/O Now/O mind/O and/O do/On't/O
alter/O anything/O in/O the/O house/O,/O but/O make/O haste/O and/O get/O married/O,/O and/O make/O
everything/O as/O it/O used/O to/O be/O again/O./O Then/O I/O'll/O come/O and/O see/O you/O,/O if/O your/O
wife/O is/O nice/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O come/O to/O me/O now/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OHow/O nicely/O we/O would/O arrange/O it/O!/O''/O

``/OI/O'd/O come/O and/O see/O you/O if/O I/O were/O sure/O I/O should/O not/O find/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON./O''/O

``/OYou/O would/On't/O find/O him/O there/O./O I/O live/O quite/O independently/O of/O him/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O say/O what/O you/O like/O,/O you/O will/O have/O to/O choose/O between/O me/O and/O
him/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O timidly/O into/O his/O brother/O's/O face/O./O

This/O timidity/O touched/O Konstantin/PERSON./O

``/OIf/O you/O want/O to/O hear/O my/O confession/O of/O faith/O on/O the/O subject/O,/O I/O tell/O you/O
that/O in/O your/O quarrel/O with/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON I/O take/O neither/O side/O./O You/O're/O
both/O wrong/O./O You/O're/O more/O wrong/O externally/O,/O and/O he/O inwardly/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O ah/O!/O You/O see/O that/O,/O you/O see/O that/O!/O''/O Nikolay/PERSON shouted/O joyfully/O./O

``/OBut/O I/O personally/O value/O friendly/O relations/O with/O you/O more/O because/O.../O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O why/O?/O''/O

Konstantin/PERSON could/O not/O say/O that/O he/O valued/O it/O more/O because/O Nikolay/PERSON was/O
unhappy/O,/O and/O needed/O affection/O./O But/O Nikolay/PERSON knew/O that/O this/O was/O just/O what/O
he/O meant/O to/O say/O,/O and/O scowling/O he/O took/O up/O the/O vodka/O again/O./O

``/OEnough/O,/O Nikolay/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON!/O''/O said/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON,/O stretching/O out/O
her/O plump/O,/O bare/O arm/O towards/O the/O decanter/O./O

``/OLet/O it/O be/O!/O Do/On't/O insist/O!/O I/O'll/O beat/O you/O!/O''/O he/O shouted/O./O

Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON smiled/O a/O sweet/O and/O good-humored/O smile/O,/O which/O was/O at/O
once/O reflected/O on/O Nikolay/PERSON's/O face/O,/O and/O she/O took/O the/O bottle/O./O

``/OAnd/O do/O you/O suppose/O she/O understands/O nothing/O?/O''/O said/O Nikolay/PERSON./O ``/OShe/O
understands/O it/O all/O better/O than/O any/O of/O us/O./O Is/On't/O it/O true/O there/O's/O
something/O good/O and/O sweet/O in/O her/O?/O''/O

``/OWere/O you/O never/O before/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION?/O''/O Konstantin/PERSON said/O to/O her/O,/O for/O the/O sake/O
of/O saying/O something/O./O

``/OOnly/O you/O must/On't/O be/O polite/O and/O stiff/O with/O her/O./O It/O frightens/O her/O./O No/O one/O
ever/O spoke/O to/O her/O so/O but/O the/O justices/O of/O the/O peace/O who/O tried/O her/O for/O
trying/O to/O get/O out/O of/O a/O house/O of/O ill-fame/O./O Mercy/O on/O us/O,/O the/O senselessness/O
in/O the/O world/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O suddenly/O./O ``/OThese/O new/O institutions/O,/O these/O
justices/O of/O the/O peace/O,/O rural/O councils/O,/O what/O hideousness/O it/O all/O is/O!/O''/O

And/O he/O began/O to/O enlarge/O on/O his/O encounters/O with/O the/O new/O institutions/O./O

Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON heard/O him/O,/O and/O the/O disbelief/O in/O the/O sense/O of/O all/O public/O
institutions/O,/O which/O he/O shared/O with/O him/O,/O and/O often/O expressed/O,/O was/O
distasteful/O to/O him/O now/O from/O his/O brother/O's/O lips/O./O

``/OIn/O another/O world/O we/O shall/O understand/O it/O all/O,/O''/O he/O said/O lightly/O./O

``/OIn/O another/O world/O!/O Ah/O,/O I/O do/On't/O like/O that/O other/O world/O!/O I/O do/On't/O like/O it/O,/O''/O
he/O said/O,/O letting/O his/O scared/O eyes/O rest/O on/O his/O brother/O's/O eyes/O./O ``/OHere/O one/O
would/O think/O that/O to/O get/O out/O of/O all/O the/O baseness/O and/O the/O mess/O,/O one/O's/O own/O
and/O other/O people/O's/O,/O would/O be/O a/O good/O thing/O,/O and/O yet/O I/O'm/O afraid/O of/O death/O,/O
awfully/O afraid/O of/O death/O./O''/O He/O shuddered/O./O ``/OBut/O do/O drink/O something/O./O Would/O
you/O like/O some/O champagne/O?/O Or/O shall/O we/O go/O somewhere/O?/O Let/O's/O go/O to/O the/O
Gypsies/O!/O Do/O you/O know/O I/O have/O got/O so/O fond/O of/O the/O Gypsies/O and/O Russian/O
songs/O./O''/O

His/O speech/O had/O begun/O to/O falter/O,/O and/O he/O passed/O abruptly/O from/O one/O subject/O
to/O another/O./O Konstantin/PERSON with/O the/O help/O of/O Masha/PERSON persuaded/O him/O not/O to/O go/O
out/O anywhere/O,/O and/O got/O him/O to/O bed/O hopelessly/O drunk/O./O

Masha/PERSON promised/O to/O write/O to/O Konstantin/PERSON in/O case/O of/O need/O,/O and/O to/O persuade/O
Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON to/O go/O and/O stay/O with/O his/O brother/O./O



Chapter/O 26/O


In/O the/O morning/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON left/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O towards/O evening/O he/O
reached/O home/O./O On/O the/O journey/O in/O the/O train/O he/O talked/O to/O his/O neighbors/O
about/O politics/O and/O the/O new/O railways/O,/O and/O,/O just/O as/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O he/O was/O
overcome/O by/O a/O sense/O of/O confusion/O of/O ideas/O,/O dissatisfaction/O with/O himself/O,/O
shame/O of/O something/O or/O other/O./O But/O when/O he/O got/O out/O at/O his/O own/O station/O,/O
when/O he/O saw/O his/O one-eyed/O coachman/O,/O Ignat/PERSON,/O with/O the/O collar/O of/O his/O coat/O
turned/O up/O;/O when/O,/O in/O the/O dim/O light/O reflected/O by/O the/O station/O fires/O,/O he/O saw/O
his/O own/O sledge/O,/O his/O own/O horses/O with/O their/O tails/O tied/O up/O,/O in/O their/O
harness/O trimmed/O with/O rings/O and/O tassels/O;/O when/O the/O coachman/O Ignat/PERSON,/O as/O he/O
put/O in/O his/O luggage/O,/O told/O him/O the/O village/O news/O,/O that/O the/O contractor/O had/O
arrived/O,/O and/O that/O Pava/PERSON had/O calved/O,/O--/Ohe/O felt/O that/O little/O by/O little/O the/O
confusion/O was/O clearing/O up/O,/O and/O the/O shame/O and/O self-dissatisfaction/O were/O
passing/O away/O./O He/O felt/O this/O at/O the/O mere/O sight/O of/O Ignat/LOCATION and/O the/O horses/O;/O
but/O when/O he/O had/O put/O on/O the/O sheepskin/O brought/O for/O him/O,/O had/O sat/O down/O
wrapped/O up/O in/O the/O sledge/O,/O and/O had/O driven/O off/O pondering/O on/O the/O work/O that/O
lay/O before/O him/O in/O the/O village/O,/O and/O staring/O at/O the/O side-horse/O,/O that/O had/O
been/O his/O saddle-horse/O,/O past/O his/O prime/O now/O,/O but/O a/O spirited/O beast/O from/O the/O
Don/PERSON,/O he/O began/O to/O see/O what/O had/O happened/O to/O him/O in/O quite/O a/O different/O
light/O./O He/O felt/O himself/O,/O and/O did/O not/O want/O to/O be/O any/O one/O else/O./O All/O he/O
wanted/O now/O was/O to/O be/O better/O than/O before/O./O In/O the/O first/O place/O he/O resolved/O
that/O from/O that/O day/O he/O would/O give/O up/O hoping/O for/O any/O extraordinary/O
happiness/O,/O such/O as/O marriage/O must/O have/O given/O him/O,/O and/O consequently/O he/O
would/O not/O so/O disdain/O what/O he/O really/O had/O./O Secondly/O,/O he/O would/O never/O again/O
let/O himself/O give/O way/O to/O low/O passion/O,/O the/O memory/O of/O which/O had/O so/O tortured/O
him/O when/O he/O had/O been/O making/O up/O his/O mind/O to/O make/O an/O offer/O./O Then/O
remembering/O his/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON,/O he/O resolved/O to/O himself/O that/O he/O would/O
never/O allow/O himself/O to/O forget/O him/O,/O that/O he/O would/O follow/O him/O up/O,/O and/O not/O
lose/O sight/O of/O him/O,/O so/O as/O to/O be/O ready/O to/O help/O when/O things/O should/O go/O ill/O
with/O him/O./O And/O that/O would/O be/O soon/O,/O he/O felt/O./O Then/O,/O too/O,/O his/O brother/O's/O talk/O
of/O communism/O,/O which/O he/O had/O treated/O so/O lightly/O at/O the/O time/O,/O now/O made/O him/O
think/O./O He/O considered/O a/O revolution/O in/O economic/O conditions/O nonsense/O./O But/O
he/O always/O felt/O the/O injustice/O of/O his/O own/O abundance/O in/O comparison/O with/O the/O
poverty/O of/O the/O peasants/O,/O and/O now/O he/O determined/O that/O so/O as/O to/O feel/O quite/O
in/O the/O right/O,/O though/O he/O had/O worked/O hard/O and/O lived/O by/O no/O means/O
luxuriously/O before/O,/O he/O would/O now/O work/O still/O harder/O,/O and/O would/O allow/O
himself/O even/O less/O luxury/O./O And/O all/O this/O seemed/O to/O him/O so/O easy/O a/O conquest/O
over/O himself/O that/O he/O spent/O the/O whole/O drive/O in/O the/O pleasantest/O daydreams/O./O
With/O a/O resolute/O feeling/O of/O hope/O in/O a/O new/O,/O better/O life/O,/O he/O reached/O home/O
before/O nine/O o'clock/O at/O night/O./O

The/O snow/O of/O the/O little/O quadrangle/O before/O the/O house/O was/O lit/O up/O by/O a/O light/O
in/O the/O bedroom/O windows/O of/O his/O old/O nurse/O,/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O who/O performed/O
the/O duties/O of/O housekeeper/O in/O his/O house/O./O She/O was/O not/O yet/O asleep/O./O Kouzma/PERSON,/O
waked/O up/O by/O her/O,/O came/O sidling/O sleepily/O out/O onto/O the/O steps/O./O A/O setter/O
bitch/O,/O Laska/PERSON,/O ran/O out/O too/O,/O almost/O upsetting/O Kouzma/PERSON,/O and/O whining/O,/O turned/O
round/O about/O Levin/PERSON's/O knees/O,/O jumping/O up/O and/O longing/O,/O but/O not/O daring/O,/O to/O
put/O her/O forepaws/O on/O his/O chest/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O soon/O back/O again/O,/O sir/O,/O''/O said/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON./O

``/OI/O got/O tired/O of/O it/O,/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON./O With/O friends/O,/O one/O is/O well/O;/O but/O at/O
home/O,/O one/O is/O better/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O,/O and/O went/O into/O his/O study/O./O

The/O study/O was/O slowly/O lit/O up/O as/O the/O candle/O was/O brought/O in/O./O The/O familiar/O
details/O came/O out/O:/O the/O stag/O's/O horns/O,/O the/O bookshelves/O,/O the/O looking-glass/O,/O
the/O stove/O with/O its/O ventilator/O,/O which/O had/O long/O wanted/O mending/O,/O his/O
father/O's/O sofa/O,/O a/O large/O table/O,/O on/O the/O table/O an/O open/O book/O,/O a/O broken/O ash/O
tray/O,/O a/O manuscript/O book/O with/O his/O handwriting/O./O As/O he/O saw/O all/O this/O,/O there/O
came/O over/O him/O for/O an/O instant/O a/O doubt/O of/O the/O possibility/O of/O arranging/O the/O
new/O life/O,/O of/O which/O he/O had/O been/O dreaming/O on/O the/O road/O./O All/O these/O traces/O of/O
his/O life/O seemed/O to/O clutch/O him/O,/O and/O to/O say/O to/O him/O:/O ``/ONo/O,/O you/O're/O not/O going/O
to/O get/O away/O from/O us/O,/O and/O you/O're/O not/O going/O to/O be/O different/O,/O but/O you/O're/O
going/O to/O be/O the/O same/O as/O you/O've/O always/O been/O;/O with/O doubts/O,/O everlasting/O
dissatisfaction/O with/O yourself/O,/O vain/O efforts/O to/O amend/O,/O and/O falls/O,/O and/O
everlasting/O expectation/O,/O of/O a/O happiness/O which/O you/O wo/On't/O get/O,/O and/O which/O
is/On't/O possible/O for/O you/O./O''/O

This/O the/O things/O said/O to/O him/O,/O but/O another/O voice/O in/O his/O heart/O was/O telling/O
him/O that/O he/O must/O not/O fall/O under/O the/O sway/O of/O the/O past/O,/O and/O that/O one/O can/O
do/O anything/O with/O oneself/O./O And/O hearing/O that/O voice/O,/O he/O went/O into/O the/O
corner/O where/O stood/O his/O two/O heavy/O dumbbells/O,/O and/O began/O brandishing/O them/O
like/O a/O gymnast/O,/O trying/O to/O restore/O his/O confident/O temper/O./O There/O was/O a/O
creak/O of/O steps/O at/O the/O door/O./O He/O hastily/O put/O down/O the/O dumbbells/O./O

The/O bailiff/O came/O in/O,/O and/O said/O everything/O,/O thank/O God/O,/O was/O doing/O well/O;/O but/O
informed/O him/O that/O the/O buckwheat/O in/O the/O new/O drying/O machine/O had/O been/O a/O
little/O scorched/O./O This/O piece/O of/O news/O irritated/O Levin/PERSON./O The/O new/O drying/O
machine/O had/O been/O constructed/O and/O partly/O invented/O by/O Levin/PERSON./O The/O bailiff/O
had/O always/O been/O against/O the/O drying/O machine/O,/O and/O now/O it/O was/O with/O
suppressed/O triumph/O that/O he/O announced/O that/O the/O buckwheat/O had/O been/O
scorched/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O firmly/O convinced/O that/O if/O the/O buckwheat/O had/O been/O
scorched/O,/O it/O was/O only/O because/O the/O precautions/O had/O not/O been/O taken/O,/O for/O
which/O he/O had/O hundreds/O of/O times/O given/O orders/O./O He/O was/O annoyed/O,/O and/O
reprimanded/O the/O bailiff/O./O But/O there/O had/O been/O an/O important/O and/O joyful/O
event/O:/O Pava/PERSON,/O his/O best/O cow/O,/O an/O expensive/O beast/O,/O bought/O at/O a/O show/O,/O had/O
calved/O./O

``/OKouzma/O,/O give/O me/O my/O sheepskin/O./O And/O you/O tell/O them/O to/O take/O a/O lantern/O./O I/O'll/O
come/O and/O look/O at/O her/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O bailiff/O./O

The/O cowhouse/O for/O the/O more/O valuable/O cows/O was/O just/O behind/O the/O house/O./O
Walking/O across/O the/O yard/O,/O passing/O a/O snowdrift/O by/O the/O lilac/O tree/O,/O he/O went/O
into/O the/O cowhouse/O./O There/O was/O the/O warm/O,/O steamy/O smell/O of/O dung/O when/O the/O
frozen/O door/O was/O opened/O,/O and/O the/O cows/O,/O astonished/O at/O the/O unfamiliar/O light/O
of/O the/O lantern/O,/O stirred/O on/O the/O fresh/O straw/O./O He/O caught/O a/O glimpse/O of/O the/O
broad/O,/O smooth/O,/O black/O and/O piebald/O back/O of/O Hollandka/LOCATION./O Berkoot/PERSON,/O the/O bull/O,/O
was/O lying/O down/O with/O his/O ring/O in/O his/O lip/O,/O and/O seemed/O about/O to/O get/O up/O,/O but/O
thought/O better/O of/O it/O,/O and/O only/O gave/O two/O snorts/O as/O they/O passed/O by/O him/O./O
Pava/PERSON,/O a/O perfect/O beauty/O,/O huge/O as/O a/O hippopotamus/O,/O with/O her/O back/O turned/O to/O
them/O,/O prevented/O their/O seeing/O the/O calf/O,/O as/O she/O sniffed/O her/O all/O over/O./O

Levin/PERSON went/O into/O the/O pen/O,/O looked/O Pava/PERSON over/O,/O and/O lifted/O the/O red/O and/O
spotted/O calf/O onto/O her/O long/O,/O tottering/O legs/O./O Pava/PERSON,/O uneasy/O,/O began/O lowing/O,/O
but/O when/O Levin/PERSON put/O the/O calf/O close/O to/O her/O she/O was/O soothed/O,/O and/O,/O sighing/O
heavily/O,/O began/O licking/O her/O with/O her/O rough/O tongue/O./O The/O calf/O,/O fumbling/O,/O
poked/O her/O nose/O under/O her/O mother/O's/O udder/O,/O and/O stiffened/O her/O tail/O out/O
straight/O./O

``/OHere/O,/O bring/O the/O light/O,/O Fyodor/PERSON,/O this/O way/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O examining/O the/O
calf/O./O ``/OLike/O the/O mother/O!/O though/O the/O color/O takes/O after/O the/O father/O;/O but/O
that/O's/O nothing/O./O Very/O good/O./O Long/O and/O broad/O in/O the/O haunch/O./O Vassily/PERSON
Fedorovitch/PERSON,/O is/On't/O she/O splendid/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O bailiff/O,/O quite/O
forgiving/O him/O for/O the/O buckwheat/O under/O the/O influence/O of/O his/O delight/O in/O
the/O calf/O./O

``/OHow/O could/O she/O fail/O to/O be/O?/O Oh/O,/O Semyon/PERSON the/O contractor/O came/O the/O day/O after/O
you/O left/O./O You/O must/O settle/O with/O him/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O said/O the/O
bailiff/O./O ``/OI/O did/O inform/O you/O about/O the/O machine/O./O''/O

This/O question/O was/O enough/O to/O take/O Levin/PERSON back/O to/O all/O the/O details/O of/O his/O
work/O on/O the/O estate/O,/O which/O was/O on/O a/O large/O scale/O,/O and/O complicated/O./O He/O went/O
straight/O from/O the/O cowhouse/O to/O the/O counting/O house/O,/O and/O after/O a/O little/O
conversation/O with/O the/O bailiff/O and/O Semyon/PERSON the/O contractor/O,/O he/O went/O back/O to/O
the/O house/O and/O straight/O upstairs/O to/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O



Chapter/O 27/O


The/O house/O was/O big/O and/O old-fashioned/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON,/O though/O he/O lived/O alone/O,/O
had/O the/O whole/O house/O heated/O and/O used/O./O He/O knew/O that/O this/O was/O stupid/O,/O he/O
knew/O that/O it/O was/O positively/O not/O right/O,/O and/O contrary/O to/O his/O present/O new/O
plans/O,/O but/O this/O house/O was/O a/O whole/O world/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O It/O was/O the/O world/O in/O
which/O his/O father/O and/O mother/O had/O lived/O and/O died/O./O They/O had/O lived/O just/O the/O
life/O that/O to/O Levin/PERSON seemed/O the/O ideal/O of/O perfection/O,/O and/O that/O he/O had/O
dreamed/O of/O beginning/O with/O his/O wife/O,/O his/O family/O./O

Levin/PERSON scarcely/O remembered/O his/O mother/O./O His/O conception/O of/O her/O was/O for/O him/O
a/O sacred/O memory/O,/O and/O his/O future/O wife/O was/O bound/O to/O be/O in/O his/O imagination/O
a/O repetition/O of/O that/O exquisite/O,/O holy/O ideal/O of/O a/O woman/O that/O his/O mother/O
had/O been/O./O

He/O was/O so/O far/O from/O conceiving/O of/O love/O for/O woman/O apart/O from/O marriage/O that/O
he/O positively/O pictured/O to/O himself/O first/O the/O family/O,/O and/O only/O secondarily/O
the/O woman/O who/O would/O give/O him/O a/O family/O./O His/O ideas/O of/O marriage/O were/O,/O
consequently/O,/O quite/O unlike/O those/O of/O the/O great/O majority/O of/O his/O
acquaintances/O,/O for/O whom/O getting/O married/O was/O one/O of/O the/O numerous/O facts/O of/O
social/O life/O./O For/O Levin/PERSON it/O was/O the/O chief/O affair/O of/O life/O,/O on/O which/O its/O
whole/O happiness/O turned/O./O And/O now/O he/O had/O to/O give/O up/O that/O./O

When/O he/O had/O gone/O into/O the/O little/O drawing/O room/O,/O where/O he/O always/O had/O tea/O,/O
and/O had/O settled/O himself/O in/O his/O armchair/O with/O a/O book/O,/O and/O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON had/O brought/O him/O tea/O,/O and/O with/O her/O usual/O,/O ``/OWell/O,/O I/O'll/O stay/O a/O
while/O,/O sir/O,/O''/O had/O taken/O a/O chair/O in/O the/O window/O,/O he/O felt/O that/O,/O however/O
strange/O it/O might/O be/O,/O he/O had/O not/O parted/O from/O his/O daydreams/O,/O and/O that/O he/O
could/O not/O live/O without/O them/O./O Whether/O with/O her/O,/O or/O with/O another/O,/O still/O it/O
would/O be/O./O He/O was/O reading/O a/O book/O,/O and/O thinking/O of/O what/O he/O was/O reading/O,/O
and/O stopping/O to/O listen/O to/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O who/O gossiped/O away/O without/O
flagging/O,/O and/O yet/O with/O all/O that/O,/O all/O sorts/O of/O pictures/O of/O family/O life/O
and/O work/O in/O the/O future/O rose/O disconnectedly/O before/O his/O imagination/O./O He/O
felt/O that/O in/O the/O depth/O of/O his/O soul/O something/O had/O been/O put/O in/O its/O place/O,/O
settled/O down/O,/O and/O laid/O to/O rest/O./O

He/O heard/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON talking/O of/O how/O Prohor/PERSON had/O forgotten/O his/O duty/O
to/O God/O,/O and/O with/O the/O money/O Levin/PERSON had/O given/O him/O to/O buy/O a/O horse/O,/O had/O been/O
drinking/O without/O stopping/O,/O and/O had/O beaten/O his/O wife/O till/O he/O'd/O half/O killed/O
her/O./O He/O listened/O,/O and/O read/O his/O book/O,/O and/O recalled/O the/O whole/O train/O of/O
ideas/O suggested/O by/O his/O reading/O./O It/O was/O Tyndall/PERSON's/O _/OTreatise/O on/O Heat/O_/O./O He/O
recalled/O his/O own/O criticisms/O of/O Tyndall/PERSON of/O his/O complacent/O satisfaction/O in/O
the/O cleverness/O of/O his/O experiments/O,/O and/O for/O his/O lack/O of/O philosophic/O
insight/O./O And/O suddenly/O there/O floated/O into/O his/O mind/O the/O joyful/O thought/O:/O
``/OIn/O two/O years/O'/O time/O I/O shall/O have/O two/O Dutch/O cows/O;/O Pava/PERSON herself/O will/O
perhaps/O still/O be/O alive/O,/O a/O dozen/O young/O daughters/O of/O Berkoot/PERSON and/O the/O three/O
others/O--/Ohow/O lovely/O!/O''/O

He/O took/O up/O his/O book/O again/O./O ``/OVery/O good/O,/O electricity/O and/O heat/O are/O the/O same/O
thing/O;/O but/O is/O it/O possible/O to/O substitute/O the/O one/O quantity/O for/O the/O other/O
in/O the/O equation/O for/O the/O solution/O of/O any/O problem/O?/O No/O./O Well/O,/O then/O what/O of/O
it/O?/O The/O connection/O between/O all/O the/O forces/O of/O nature/O is/O felt/O
instinctively/O.../O./O It/O's/O particulary/O nice/O if/O Pava/PERSON's/O daughter/O should/O be/O a/O
red-spotted/O cow/O,/O and/O all/O the/O herd/O will/O take/O after/O her/O,/O and/O the/O other/O
three/O,/O too/O!/O Splendid/O!/O To/O go/O out/O with/O my/O wife/O and/O visitors/O to/O meet/O the/O
herd/O.../O./O My/O wife/O says/O,/O `/OKostya/PERSON and/O I/O looked/O after/O that/O calf/O like/O a/O
child/O./O'/O `/OHow/O can/O it/O interest/O you/O so/O much/O?/O'/O says/O a/O visitor/O./O `/OEverything/O
that/O interests/O him/O,/O interests/O me/O./O'/O But/O who/O will/O she/O be/O?/O''/O And/O he/O
remembered/O what/O had/O happened/O at/O Moscow/LOCATION.../O ``/OWell/O,/O there/O's/O nothing/O to/O be/O
done/O.../O./O It/O's/O not/O my/O fault/O./O But/O now/O everything/O shall/O go/O on/O in/O a/O new/O way/O./O
It/O's/O nonsense/O to/O pretend/O that/O life/O wo/On't/O let/O one/O,/O that/O the/O past/O wo/On't/O
let/O one/O./O One/O must/O struggle/O to/O live/O better/O,/O much/O better/O./O''/O.../O He/O raised/O
his/O head/O,/O and/O fell/O to/O dreaming/O./O Old/O Laska/PERSON,/O who/O had/O not/O yet/O fully/O
digested/O her/O delight/O at/O his/O return/O,/O and/O had/O run/O out/O into/O the/O yard/O to/O
bark/O,/O came/O back/O wagging/O her/O tail/O,/O and/O crept/O up/O to/O him/O,/O bringing/O in/O the/O
scent/O of/O fresh/O air/O,/O put/O her/O head/O under/O his/O hand/O,/O and/O whined/O plaintively/O,/O
asking/O to/O be/O stroked/O./O

``/OThere/O,/O who/O'd/O have/O thought/O it/O?/O''/O said/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON./O ``/OThe/O dog/O now/O .../O
why/O,/O she/O understands/O that/O her/O master/O's/O come/O home/O,/O and/O that/O he/O's/O
low-spirited/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O low-spirited/O?/O''/O

``/ODo/O you/O suppose/O I/O do/On't/O see/O it/O,/O sir/O?/O It/O's/O high/O time/O I/O should/O know/O the/O
gentry/O./O Why/O,/O I/O've/O grown/O up/O from/O a/O little/O thing/O with/O them/O./O It/O's/O nothing/O,/O
sir/O,/O so/O long/O as/O there/O's/O health/O and/O a/O clear/O conscience/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON looked/O intently/O at/O her/O,/O surprised/O at/O how/O well/O she/O knew/O his/O
thought/O./O

``/OShall/O I/O fetch/O you/O another/O cup/O?/O''/O said/O she/O,/O and/O taking/O his/O cup/O she/O went/O
out/O./O

Laska/PERSON kept/O poking/O her/O head/O under/O his/O hand/O./O He/O stroked/O her/O,/O and/O she/O
promptly/O curled/O up/O at/O his/O feet/O,/O laying/O her/O head/O on/O a/O hindpaw/O./O And/O in/O
token/O of/O all/O now/O being/O well/O and/O satisfactory/O,/O she/O opened/O her/O mouth/O a/O
little/O,/O smacked/O her/O lips/O,/O and/O settling/O her/O sticky/O lips/O more/O comfortably/O
about/O her/O old/O teeth/O,/O she/O sank/O into/O blissful/O repose/O./O Levin/PERSON watched/O all/O
her/O movements/O attentively/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O what/O I/O'll/O do/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O;/O ``/Othat/O's/O what/O I/O'll/O do/O!/O
Nothing/O's/O amiss/O.../O./O All/O's/O well/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 28/O


After/O the/O ball/O,/O early/O next/O morning/O,/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON sent/O her/O husband/O a/O
telegram/O that/O she/O was/O leaving/O Moscow/LOCATION the/O same/O day/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O must/O go/O,/O I/O must/O go/O''/O;/O she/O explained/O to/O her/O sister-in-law/O the/O
change/O in/O her/O plans/O in/O a/O tone/O that/O suggested/O that/O she/O had/O to/O remember/O so/O
many/O things/O that/O there/O was/O no/O enumerating/O them/O:/O ``/Ono/O,/O it/O had/O really/O
better/O be/O today/O!/O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O not/O dining/O at/O home/O,/O but/O he/O promised/O to/O come/O and/O
see/O his/O sister/O off/O at/O seven/O o'clock/O./O

Kitty/PERSON,/O too/O,/O did/O not/O come/O,/O sending/O a/O note/O that/O she/O had/O a/O headache/O./O Dolly/PERSON
and/O Anna/PERSON dined/O alone/O with/O the/O children/O and/O the/O English/O governess/O./O
Whether/O it/O was/O that/O the/O children/O were/O fickle/O,/O or/O that/O they/O had/O acute/O
senses/O,/O and/O felt/O that/O Anna/PERSON was/O quite/O different/O that/O day/O from/O what/O she/O
had/O been/O when/O they/O had/O taken/O such/O a/O fancy/O to/O her/O,/O that/O she/O was/O not/O now/O
interested/O in/O them/O,/O--/Obut/O they/O had/O abruptly/O dropped/O their/O play/O with/O their/O
aunt/O,/O and/O their/O love/O for/O her/O,/O and/O were/O quite/O indifferent/O that/O she/O was/O
going/O away/O./O Anna/PERSON was/O absorbed/O the/O whole/O morning/O in/O preparations/O for/O her/O
departure/O./O She/O wrote/O notes/O to/O her/O Moscow/LOCATION acquaintances/O,/O put/O down/O her/O
accounts/O,/O and/O packed/O./O Altogether/O Dolly/PERSON fancied/O she/O was/O not/O in/O a/O placid/O
state/O of/O mind/O,/O but/O in/O that/O worried/O mood/O,/O which/O Dolly/PERSON knew/O well/O with/O
herself/O,/O and/O which/O does/O not/O come/O without/O cause/O,/O and/O for/O the/O most/O part/O
covers/O dissatisfaction/O with/O self/O./O After/O dinner/O,/O Anna/PERSON went/O up/O to/O her/O room/O
to/O dress/O,/O and/O Dolly/PERSON followed/O her/O./O

``/OHow/O queer/O you/O are/O today/O!/O''/O Dolly/PERSON said/O to/O her/O./O

``/OI/O?/O Do/O you/O think/O so/O?/O I/O'm/O not/O queer/O,/O but/O I/O'm/O nasty/O./O I/O am/O like/O that/O
sometimes/O./O I/O keep/O feeling/O as/O if/O I/O could/O cry/O./O It/O's/O very/O stupid/O,/O but/O it/O'll/O
pass/O off/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON quickly/O,/O and/O she/O bent/O her/O flushed/O face/O over/O a/O tiny/O
bag/O in/O which/O she/O was/O packing/O a/O nightcap/O and/O some/O cambric/O handkerchiefs/O./O
Her/O eyes/O were/O particularly/O bright/O,/O and/O were/O continually/O swimming/O with/O
tears/O./O ``/OIn/O the/O same/O way/O I/O did/On't/O want/O to/O leave/O Petersburg/PERSON,/O and/O now/O I/O
do/On't/O want/O to/O go/O away/O from/O here/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O came/O here/O and/O did/O a/O good/O deed/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O looking/O intently/O at/O
her/O./O

Anna/PERSON looked/O at/O her/O with/O eyes/O wet/O with/O tears/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O say/O that/O,/O Dolly/PERSON./O I/O've/O done/O nothing/O,/O and/O could/O do/O nothing/O./O I/O often/O
wonder/O why/O people/O are/O all/O in/O league/O to/O spoil/O me/O./O What/O have/O I/O done/O,/O and/O
what/O could/O I/O do/O?/O In/O your/O heart/O there/O was/O found/O love/O enough/O to/O
forgive/O.../O''/O

``/OIf/O it/O had/O not/O been/O for/O you/O,/O God/O knows/O what/O would/O have/O happened/O!/O How/O
happy/O you/O are/O,/O Anna/PERSON!/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OEverything/O is/O clear/O and/O good/O in/O your/O
heart/O./O''/O

``/OEvery/O heart/O has/O its/O own/O _/Oskeletons/O_/O,/O as/O the/O English/O say/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O have/O no/O sort/O of/O _/Oskeleton/O_/O,/O have/O you/O?/O Everything/O is/O so/O clear/O in/O
you/O./O''/O

``/OI/O have/O!/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON suddenly/O,/O and/O,/O unexpectedly/O after/O her/O tears/O,/O a/O sly/O,/O
ironical/O smile/O curved/O her/O lips/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O he/O's/O amusing/O,/O anyway/O,/O your/O _/Oskeleton/O_/O,/O and/O not/O depressing/O,/O''/O said/O
Dolly/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O he/O's/O depressing/O./O Do/O you/O know/O why/O I/O'm/O going/O today/O instead/O of/O
tomorrow/O?/O It/O's/O a/O confession/O that/O weighs/O on/O me/O;/O I/O want/O to/O make/O it/O to/O
you/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O letting/O herself/O drop/O definitely/O into/O an/O armchair/O,/O and/O
looking/O straight/O into/O Dolly/PERSON's/O face/O./O

And/O to/O her/O surprise/O Dolly/PERSON saw/O that/O Anna/PERSON was/O blushing/O up/O to/O her/O ears/O,/O up/O
to/O the/O curly/O black/O ringlets/O on/O her/O neck/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON went/O on/O./O ``/ODo/O you/O know/O why/O Kitty/PERSON did/On't/O come/O to/O dinner/O?/O She/O's/O
jealous/O of/O me/O./O I/O have/O spoiled/O .../O I/O've/O been/O the/O cause/O of/O that/O ball/O being/O
a/O torture/O to/O her/O instead/O of/O a/O pleasure/O./O But/O truly/O,/O truly/O,/O it/O's/O not/O my/O
fault/O,/O or/O only/O my/O fault/O a/O little/O bit/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O daintily/O drawling/O the/O
words/O ``/Oa/O little/O bit/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O how/O like/O Stiva/O you/O said/O that/O!/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O laughing/O./O

Anna/PERSON was/O hurt/O./O

``/OOh/O no/O,/O oh/O no/O!/O I/O'm/O not/O Stiva/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O knitting/O her/O brows/O./O ``/OThat/O's/O why/O
I/O'm/O telling/O you/O,/O just/O because/O I/O could/O never/O let/O myself/O doubt/O myself/O for/O
an/O instant/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O

But/O at/O the/O very/O moment/O she/O was/O uttering/O the/O words/O,/O she/O felt/O that/O they/O
were/O not/O true/O./O She/O was/O not/O merely/O doubting/O herself/O,/O she/O felt/O emotion/O at/O
the/O thought/O of/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O was/O going/O away/O sooner/O than/O she/O had/O meant/O,/O
simply/O to/O avoid/O meeting/O him/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O Stiva/PERSON told/O me/O you/O danced/O the/O mazurka/O with/O him/O,/O and/O that/O he/O.../O''/O

``/OYou/O ca/On't/O imagine/O how/O absurdly/O it/O all/O came/O about/O./O I/O only/O meant/O to/O be/O
matchmaking/O,/O and/O all/O at/O once/O it/O turned/O out/O quite/O differently/O./O Possibly/O
against/O my/O own/O will/O.../O''/O

She/O crimsoned/O and/O stopped/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O they/O feel/O it/O directly/O?/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OBut/O I/O should/O be/O in/O despair/O if/O there/O were/O anything/O serious/O in/O it/O on/O his/O
side/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON interrupted/O her/O./O ``/OAnd/O I/O am/O certain/O it/O will/O all/O be/O forgotten/O,/O
and/O Kitty/PERSON will/O leave/O off/O hating/O me/O./O''/O

``/OAll/O the/O same/O,/O Anna/PERSON,/O to/O tell/O you/O the/O truth/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O very/O anxious/O for/O
this/O marriage/O for/O Kitty/PERSON./O And/O it/O's/O better/O it/O should/O come/O to/O nothing/O,/O if/O
he/O,/O Vronsky/O,/O is/O capable/O of/O falling/O in/O love/O with/O you/O in/O a/O single/O day/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O heavens/O,/O that/O would/O be/O too/O silly/O!/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O again/O a/O deep/O
flush/O of/O pleasure/O came/O out/O on/O her/O face/O,/O when/O she/O heard/O the/O idea/O,/O that/O
absorbed/O her/O,/O put/O into/O words/O./O ``/OAnd/O so/O here/O I/O am/O going/O away/O,/O having/O made/O
an/O enemy/O of/O Kitty/PERSON,/O whom/O I/O liked/O so/O much/O!/O Ah/O,/O how/O sweet/O she/O is/O!/O But/O
you/O'll/O make/O it/O right/O,/O Dolly/PERSON?/O Eh/O?/O''/O

Dolly/PERSON could/O scarcely/O suppress/O a/O smile/O./O She/O loved/O Anna/PERSON,/O but/O she/O enjoyed/O
seeing/O that/O she/O too/O had/O her/O weaknesses/O./O

``/OAn/O enemy/O?/O That/O ca/On't/O be/O./O''/O

``/OI/O did/O so/O want/O you/O all/O to/O care/O for/O me/O,/O as/O I/O do/O for/O you/O,/O and/O now/O I/O care/O
for/O you/O more/O than/O ever/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O with/O tears/O in/O her/O eyes/O./O ``/OAh/O,/O how/O
silly/O I/O am/O today/O!/O''/O

She/O passed/O her/O handkerchief/O over/O her/O face/O and/O began/O dressing/O./O

At/O the/O very/O moment/O of/O starting/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON arrived/O,/O late/O,/O rosy/O
and/O good-humored/O,/O smelling/O of/O wine/O and/O cigars/O./O

Anna/PERSON's/O emotionalism/O infected/O Dolly/PERSON,/O and/O when/O she/O embraced/O her/O
sister-in-law/O for/O the/O last/O time/O,/O she/O whispered/O:/O ``/ORemember/O,/O Anna/PERSON,/O what/O
you/O've/O done/O for/O me/O--/OI/O shall/O never/O forget/O./O And/O remember/O that/O I/O love/O you/O,/O
and/O shall/O always/O love/O you/O as/O my/O dearest/O friend/O!/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O why/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O kissing/O her/O and/O hiding/O her/O tears/O./O

``/OYou/O understood/O me/O,/O and/O you/O understand/O./O Good-bye/O,/O my/O darling/O!/O''/O



Chapter/O 29/O


``/OCome/O,/O it/O's/O all/O over/O,/O and/O thank/O God/O!/O''/O was/O the/O first/O thought/O that/O came/O to/O
Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O when/O she/O had/O said/O good-bye/O for/O the/O last/O time/O to/O her/O
brother/O,/O who/O had/O stood/O blocking/O up/O the/O entrance/O to/O the/O carriage/O till/O the/O
third/O bell/O rang/O./O She/O sat/O down/O on/O her/O lounge/O beside/O Annushka/LOCATION,/O and/O looked/O
about/O her/O in/O the/O twilight/O of/O the/O sleeping-carriage/O./O ``/OThank/O God/O!/O tomorrow/O
I/O shall/O see/O Seryozha/PERSON and/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O and/O my/O life/O will/O go/O on/O
in/O the/O old/O way/O,/O all/O nice/O and/O as/O usual/O./O''/O

Still/O in/O the/O same/O anxious/O frame/O of/O mind/O,/O as/O she/O had/O been/O all/O that/O day/O,/O
Anna/PERSON took/O pleasure/O in/O arranging/O herself/O for/O the/O journey/O with/O great/O care/O./O
With/O her/O little/O deft/O hands/O she/O opened/O and/O shut/O her/O little/O red/O bag/O,/O took/O
out/O a/O cushion/O,/O laid/O it/O on/O her/O knees/O,/O and/O carefully/O wrapping/O up/O her/O feet/O,/O
settled/O herself/O comfortably/O./O An/O invalid/O lady/O had/O already/O lain/O down/O to/O
sleep/O./O Two/O other/O ladies/O began/O talking/O to/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O a/O stout/O elderly/O lady/O
tucked/O up/O her/O feet/O,/O and/O made/O observations/O about/O the/O heating/O of/O the/O
train/O./O Anna/PERSON answered/O a/O few/O words/O,/O but/O not/O foreseeing/O any/O entertainment/O
from/O the/O conversation/O,/O she/O asked/O Annushka/PERSON to/O get/O a/O lamp/O,/O hooked/O it/O onto/O
the/O arm/O of/O her/O seat/O,/O and/O took/O from/O her/O bag/O a/O paper/O knife/O and/O an/O English/O
novel/O./O At/O first/O her/O reading/O made/O no/O progress/O./O The/O fuss/O and/O bustle/O were/O
disturbing/O;/O then/O when/O the/O train/O had/O started/O,/O she/O could/O not/O help/O
listening/O to/O the/O noises/O;/O then/O the/O snow/O beating/O on/O the/O left/O window/O and/O
sticking/O to/O the/O pane/O,/O and/O the/O sight/O of/O the/O muffled/O guard/O passing/O by/O,/O
covered/O with/O snow/O on/O one/O side/O,/O and/O the/O conversations/O about/O the/O terrible/O
snowstorm/O raging/O outside/O,/O distracted/O her/O attention/O./O Farther/O on/O,/O it/O was/O
continually/O the/O same/O again/O and/O again/O:/O the/O same/O shaking/O and/O rattling/O,/O the/O
same/O snow/O on/O the/O window/O,/O the/O same/O rapid/O transitions/O from/O steaming/O heat/O
to/O cold/O,/O and/O back/O again/O to/O heat/O,/O the/O same/O passing/O glimpses/O of/O the/O same/O
figures/O in/O the/O twilight/O,/O and/O the/O same/O voices/O,/O and/O Anna/PERSON began/O to/O read/O and/O
to/O understand/O what/O she/O read/O./O Annushka/PERSON was/O already/O dozing/O,/O the/O red/O bag/O on/O
her/O lap/O,/O clutched/O by/O her/O broad/O hands/O,/O in/O gloves/O,/O of/O which/O one/O was/O torn/O./O
Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON read/O and/O understood/O,/O but/O it/O was/O distasteful/O to/O her/O to/O
read/O,/O that/O is/O,/O to/O follow/O the/O reflection/O of/O other/O people/O's/O lives/O./O She/O had/O
too/O great/O a/O desire/O to/O live/O herself/O./O If/O she/O read/O that/O the/O heroine/O of/O the/O
novel/O was/O nursing/O a/O sick/O man/O,/O she/O longed/O to/O move/O with/O noiseless/O steps/O
about/O the/O room/O of/O a/O sick/O man/O;/O if/O she/O read/O of/O a/O member/O of/O Parliament/ORGANIZATION
making/O a/O speech/O,/O she/O longed/O to/O be/O delivering/O the/O speech/O;/O if/O she/O read/O of/O
how/O Lady/PERSON Mary/PERSON had/O ridden/O after/O the/O hounds/O,/O and/O had/O provoked/O her/O
sister-in-law/O,/O and/O had/O surprised/O everyone/O by/O her/O boldness/O,/O she/O too/O
wished/O to/O be/O doing/O the/O same/O./O But/O there/O was/O no/O chance/O of/O doing/O anything/O;/O
and/O twisting/O the/O smooth/O paper/O knife/O in/O her/O little/O hands/O,/O she/O forced/O
herself/O to/O read/O./O

The/O hero/O of/O the/O novel/O was/O already/O almost/O reaching/O his/O English/O happiness/O,/O
a/O baronetcy/O and/O an/O estate/O,/O and/O Anna/PERSON was/O feeling/O a/O desire/O to/O go/O with/O him/O
to/O the/O estate/O,/O when/O she/O suddenly/O felt/O that/O _/Ohe/O_/O ought/O to/O feel/O ashamed/O,/O
and/O that/O she/O was/O ashamed/O of/O the/O same/O thing/O./O But/O what/O had/O he/O to/O be/O
ashamed/O of/O?/O ``/OWhat/O have/O I/O to/O be/O ashamed/O of/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O herself/O in/O injured/O
surprise/O./O She/O laid/O down/O the/O book/O and/O sank/O against/O the/O back/O of/O the/O chair/O,/O
tightly/O gripping/O the/O paper/O cutter/O in/O both/O hands/O./O There/O was/O nothing/O./O She/O
went/O over/O all/O her/O Moscow/LOCATION recollections/O./O All/O were/O good/O,/O pleasant/O./O She/O
remembered/O the/O ball/O,/O remembered/O Vronsky/O and/O his/O face/O of/O slavish/O
adoration/O,/O remembered/O all/O her/O conduct/O with/O him/O:/O there/O was/O nothing/O
shameful/O./O And/O for/O all/O that/O,/O at/O the/O same/O point/O in/O her/O memories/O,/O the/O
feeling/O of/O shame/O was/O intensified/O,/O as/O though/O some/O inner/O voice/O,/O just/O at/O
the/O point/O when/O she/O thought/O of/O Vronsky/O,/O were/O saying/O to/O her/O,/O ``/OWarm/O,/O very/O
warm/O,/O hot/O./O''/O ``/OWell/O,/O what/O is/O it/O?/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O resolutely/O,/O shifting/O
her/O seat/O in/O the/O lounge/O./O ``/OWhat/O does/O it/O mean/O?/O Am/O I/O afraid/O to/O look/O it/O
straight/O in/O the/O face/O?/O Why/O,/O what/O is/O it/O?/O Can/O it/O be/O that/O between/O me/O and/O
this/O officer/O boy/O there/O exist/O,/O or/O can/O exist/O,/O any/O other/O relations/O than/O
such/O as/O are/O common/O with/O every/O acquaintance/O?/O''/O She/O laughed/O contemptuously/O
and/O took/O up/O her/O book/O again/O;/O but/O now/O she/O was/O definitely/O unable/O to/O follow/O
what/O she/O read/O./O She/O passed/O the/O paper/O knife/O over/O the/O window/O pane/O,/O then/O
laid/O its/O smooth/O,/O cool/O surface/O to/O her/O cheek/O,/O and/O almost/O laughed/O aloud/O at/O
the/O feeling/O of/O delight/O that/O all/O at/O once/O without/O cause/O came/O over/O her/O./O She/O
felt/O as/O though/O her/O nerves/O were/O strings/O being/O strained/O tighter/O and/O
tighter/O on/O some/O sort/O of/O screwing/O peg/O./O She/O felt/O her/O eyes/O opening/O wider/O
and/O wider/O,/O her/O fingers/O and/O toes/O twitching/O nervously/O,/O something/O within/O
oppressing/O her/O breathing/O,/O while/O all/O shapes/O and/O sounds/O seemed/O in/O the/O
uncertain/O half-light/O to/O strike/O her/O with/O unaccustomed/O vividness/O./O Moments/O
of/O doubt/O were/O continually/O coming/O upon/O her/O,/O when/O she/O was/O uncertain/O
whether/O the/O train/O were/O going/O forwards/O or/O backwards/O,/O or/O were/O standing/O
still/O altogether/O;/O whether/O it/O were/O Annushka/PERSON at/O her/O side/O or/O a/O stranger/O./O
``/OWhat/O's/O that/O on/O the/O arm/O of/O the/O chair/O,/O a/O fur/O cloak/O or/O some/O beast/O?/O And/O
what/O am/O I/O myself/O?/O Myself/O or/O some/O other/O woman/O?/O''/O She/O was/O afraid/O of/O giving/O
way/O to/O this/O delirium/O./O But/O something/O drew/O her/O towards/O it/O,/O and/O she/O could/O
yield/O to/O it/O or/O resist/O it/O at/O will/O./O She/O got/O up/O to/O rouse/O herself/O,/O and/O
slipped/O off/O her/O plaid/O and/O the/O cape/O of/O her/O warm/O dress/O./O For/O a/O moment/O she/O
regained/O her/O self-possession/O,/O and/O realized/O that/O the/O thin/O peasant/O who/O had/O
come/O in/O wearing/O a/O long/O overcoat/O,/O with/O buttons/O missing/O from/O it/O,/O was/O the/O
stoveheater/O,/O that/O he/O was/O looking/O at/O the/O thermometer/O,/O that/O it/O was/O the/O
wind/O and/O snow/O bursting/O in/O after/O him/O at/O the/O door/O;/O but/O then/O everything/O
grew/O blurred/O again/O.../O./O That/O peasant/O with/O the/O long/O waist/O seemed/O to/O be/O
gnawing/O something/O on/O the/O wall/O,/O the/O old/O lady/O began/O stretching/O her/O legs/O
the/O whole/O length/O of/O the/O carriage/O,/O and/O filling/O it/O with/O a/O black/O cloud/O;/O
then/O there/O was/O a/O fearful/O shrieking/O and/O banging/O,/O as/O though/O someone/O were/O
being/O torn/O to/O pieces/O;/O then/O there/O was/O a/O blinding/O dazzle/O of/O red/O fire/O
before/O her/O eyes/O and/O a/O wall/O seemed/O to/O rise/O up/O and/O hide/O everything/O./O Anna/PERSON
felt/O as/O though/O she/O were/O sinking/O down/O./O But/O it/O was/O not/O terrible/O,/O but/O
delightful/O./O The/O voice/O of/O a/O man/O muffled/O up/O and/O covered/O with/O snow/O shouted/O
something/O in/O her/O ear/O./O She/O got/O up/O and/O pulled/O herself/O together/O;/O she/O
realized/O that/O they/O had/O reached/O a/O station/O and/O that/O this/O was/O the/O guard/O./O
She/O asked/O Annushka/PERSON to/O hand/O her/O the/O cape/O she/O had/O taken/O off/O and/O her/O shawl/O,/O
put/O them/O on/O and/O moved/O towards/O the/O door/O./O

``/ODo/O you/O wish/O to/O get/O out/O?/O''/O asked/O Annushka/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O want/O a/O little/O air/O./O It/O's/O very/O hot/O in/O here/O./O''/O And/O she/O opened/O the/O
door/O./O The/O driving/O snow/O and/O the/O wind/O rushed/O to/O meet/O her/O and/O struggled/O
with/O her/O over/O the/O door/O./O But/O she/O enjoyed/O the/O struggle/O./O

She/O opened/O the/O door/O and/O went/O out/O./O The/O wind/O seemed/O as/O though/O lying/O in/O
wait/O for/O her/O;/O with/O gleeful/O whistle/O it/O tried/O to/O snatch/O her/O up/O and/O bear/O
her/O off/O,/O but/O she/O clung/O to/O the/O cold/O door/O post/O,/O and/O holding/O her/O skirt/O got/O
down/O onto/O the/O platform/O and/O under/O the/O shelter/O of/O the/O carriages/O./O The/O wind/O
had/O been/O powerful/O on/O the/O steps/O,/O but/O on/O the/O platform/O,/O under/O the/O lee/O of/O
the/O carriages/O,/O there/O was/O a/O lull/O./O With/O enjoyment/O she/O drew/O deep/O breaths/O of/O
the/O frozen/O,/O snowy/O air/O,/O and/O standing/O near/O the/O carriage/O looked/O about/O the/O
platform/O and/O the/O lighted/O station/O./O



Chapter/O 30/O


The/O raging/O tempest/O rushed/O whistling/O between/O the/O wheels/O of/O the/O carriages/O,/O
about/O the/O scaffolding/O,/O and/O round/O the/O corner/O of/O the/O station/O./O The/O
carriages/O,/O posts/O,/O people/O,/O everything/O that/O was/O to/O be/O seen/O was/O covered/O
with/O snow/O on/O one/O side/O,/O and/O was/O getting/O more/O and/O more/O thickly/O covered/O./O
For/O a/O moment/O there/O would/O come/O a/O lull/O in/O the/O storm/O,/O but/O then/O it/O would/O
swoop/O down/O again/O with/O such/O onslaughts/O that/O it/O seemed/O impossible/O to/O stand/O
against/O it/O./O Meanwhile/O men/O ran/O to/O and/O fro/O,/O talking/O merrily/O together/O,/O
their/O steps/O crackling/O on/O the/O platform/O as/O they/O continually/O opened/O and/O
closed/O the/O big/O doors/O./O The/O bent/O shadow/O of/O a/O man/O glided/O by/O at/O her/O feet/O,/O
and/O she/O heard/O sounds/O of/O a/O hammer/O upon/O iron/O./O ``/OHand/O over/O that/O telegram/O!/O''/O
came/O an/O angry/O voice/O out/O of/O the/O stormy/O darkness/O on/O the/O other/O side/O./O ``/OThis/O
way/O!/O No./O 28/O!/O''/O several/O different/O voices/O shouted/O again/O,/O and/O muffled/O
figures/O ran/O by/O covered/O with/O snow/O./O Two/O gentlemen/O with/O lighted/O cigarettes/O
passed/O by/O her/O./O She/O drew/O one/O more/O deep/O breath/O of/O the/O fresh/O air/O,/O and/O had/O
just/O put/O her/O hand/O out/O of/O her/O muff/O to/O take/O hold/O of/O the/O door/O post/O and/O get/O
back/O into/O the/O carriage/O,/O when/O another/O man/O in/O a/O military/O overcoat/O,/O quite/O
close/O beside/O her/O,/O stepped/O between/O her/O and/O the/O flickering/O light/O of/O the/O
lamp/O post/O./O She/O looked/O round/O,/O and/O the/O same/O instant/O recognized/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O
face/O./O Putting/O his/O hand/O to/O the/O peak/O of/O his/O cap/O,/O he/O bowed/O to/O her/O and/O
asked/O,/O Was/O there/O anything/O she/O wanted/O?/O Could/O he/O be/O of/O any/O service/O to/O her/O?/O
She/O gazed/O rather/O a/O long/O while/O at/O him/O without/O answering/O,/O and/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O
the/O shadow/O in/O which/O he/O was/O standing/O,/O she/O saw/O,/O or/O fancied/O she/O saw/O,/O both/O
the/O expression/O of/O his/O face/O and/O his/O eyes/O./O It/O was/O again/O that/O expression/O of/O
reverential/O ecstasy/O which/O had/O so/O worked/O upon/O her/O the/O day/O before/O./O More/O
than/O once/O she/O had/O told/O herself/O during/O the/O past/O few/O days/O,/O and/O again/O only/O
a/O few/O moments/O before/O,/O that/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O for/O her/O only/O one/O of/O the/O hundreds/O
of/O young/O men/O,/O forever/O exactly/O the/O same/O,/O that/O are/O met/O everywhere/O,/O that/O
she/O would/O never/O allow/O herself/O to/O bestow/O a/O thought/O upon/O him/O./O But/O now/O at/O
the/O first/O instant/O of/O meeting/O him/O,/O she/O was/O seized/O by/O a/O feeling/O of/O joyful/O
pride/O./O She/O had/O no/O need/O to/O ask/O why/O he/O had/O come/O./O She/O knew/O as/O certainly/O as/O
if/O he/O had/O told/O her/O that/O he/O was/O here/O to/O be/O where/O she/O was/O./O

``/OI/O did/On't/O know/O you/O were/O going/O./O What/O are/O you/O coming/O for/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
letting/O fall/O the/O hand/O with/O which/O she/O had/O grasped/O the/O door/O post/O./O And/O
irrepressible/O delight/O and/O eagerness/O shone/O in/O her/O face/O./O

``/OWhat/O am/O I/O coming/O for/O?/O''/O he/O repeated/O,/O looking/O straight/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O
``/OYou/O know/O that/O I/O have/O come/O to/O be/O where/O you/O are/O,/O''/O he/O said/O;/O ``/OI/O ca/On't/O help/O
it/O./O''/O

At/O that/O moment/O the/O wind/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O surmounting/O all/O obstacles/O,/O sent/O the/O
snow/O flying/O from/O the/O carriage/O roofs/O,/O and/O clanked/O some/O sheet/O of/O iron/O it/O
had/O torn/O off/O,/O while/O the/O hoarse/O whistle/O of/O the/O engine/O roared/O in/O front/O,/O
plaintively/O and/O gloomily/O./O All/O the/O awfulness/O of/O the/O storm/O seemed/O to/O her/O
more/O splendid/O now/O./O He/O had/O said/O what/O her/O soul/O longed/O to/O hear/O,/O though/O she/O
feared/O it/O with/O her/O reason/O./O She/O made/O no/O answer/O,/O and/O in/O her/O face/O he/O saw/O
conflict/O./O

``/OForgive/O me/O,/O if/O you/O dislike/O what/O I/O said/O,/O''/O he/O said/O humbly/O./O

He/O had/O spoken/O courteously/O,/O deferentially/O,/O yet/O so/O firmly/O,/O so/O stubbornly/O,/O
that/O for/O a/O long/O while/O she/O could/O make/O no/O answer/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O wrong/O,/O what/O you/O say/O,/O and/O I/O beg/O you/O,/O if/O you/O're/O a/O good/O man/O,/O to/O
forget/O what/O you/O've/O said/O,/O as/O I/O forget/O it/O,/O''/O she/O said/O at/O last/O./O

``/ONot/O one/O word/O,/O not/O one/O gesture/O of/O yours/O shall/O I/O,/O could/O I/O,/O ever/O
forget/O.../O''/O

``/OEnough/O,/O enough/O!/O''/O she/O cried/O trying/O assiduously/O to/O give/O a/O stern/O
expression/O to/O her/O face/O,/O into/O which/O he/O was/O gazing/O greedily/O./O And/O clutching/O
at/O the/O cold/O door/O post/O,/O she/O clambered/O up/O the/O steps/O and/O got/O rapidly/O into/O
the/O corridor/O of/O the/O carriage/O./O But/O in/O the/O little/O corridor/O she/O paused/O,/O
going/O over/O in/O her/O imagination/O what/O had/O happened/O./O Though/O she/O could/O not/O
recall/O her/O own/O words/O or/O his/O,/O she/O realized/O instinctively/O that/O the/O
momentary/O conversation/O had/O brought/O them/O fearfully/O closer/O;/O and/O she/O was/O
panic-stricken/O and/O blissful/O at/O it/O./O After/O standing/O still/O a/O few/O seconds/O,/O
she/O went/O into/O the/O carriage/O and/O sat/O down/O in/O her/O place/O./O The/O overstrained/O
condition/O which/O had/O tormented/O her/O before/O did/O not/O only/O come/O back/O,/O but/O was/O
intensified/O,/O and/O reached/O such/O a/O pitch/O that/O she/O was/O afraid/O every/O minute/O
that/O something/O would/O snap/O within/O her/O from/O the/O excessive/O tension/O./O She/O did/O
not/O sleep/O all/O night/O./O But/O in/O that/O nervous/O tension/O,/O and/O in/O the/O visions/O
that/O filled/O her/O imagination/O,/O there/O was/O nothing/O disagreeable/O or/O gloomy/O:/O
on/O the/O contrary/O there/O was/O something/O blissful/O,/O glowing/O,/O and/O exhilarating/O./O
Towards/O morning/O Anna/PERSON sank/O into/O a/O doze/O,/O sitting/O in/O her/O place/O,/O and/O when/O
she/O waked/O it/O was/O daylight/O and/O the/O train/O was/O near/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O At/O once/O
thoughts/O of/O home/O,/O of/O husband/O and/O of/O son/O,/O and/O the/O details/O of/O that/O day/O and/O
the/O following/O came/O upon/O her/O./O

At/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O as/O soon/O as/O the/O train/O stopped/O and/O she/O got/O out/O,/O the/O first/O
person/O that/O attracted/O her/O attention/O was/O her/O husband/O./O ``/OOh/O,/O mercy/O!/O why/O do/O
his/O ears/O look/O like/O that/O?/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O looking/O at/O his/O frigid/O and/O
imposing/O figure/O,/O and/O especially/O the/O ears/O that/O struck/O her/O at/O the/O moment/O
as/O propping/O up/O the/O brim/O of/O his/O round/O hat/O./O Catching/O sight/O of/O her/O,/O he/O came/O
to/O meet/O her/O,/O his/O lips/O falling/O into/O their/O habitual/O sarcastic/O smile/O,/O and/O
his/O big/O,/O tired/O eyes/O looking/O straight/O at/O her/O./O An/O unpleasant/O sensation/O
gripped/O at/O her/O heart/O when/O she/O met/O his/O obstinate/O and/O weary/O glance/O,/O as/O
though/O she/O had/O expected/O to/O see/O him/O different/O./O She/O was/O especially/O struck/O
by/O the/O feeling/O of/O dissatisfaction/O with/O herself/O that/O she/O experienced/O on/O
meeting/O him/O./O That/O feeling/O was/O an/O intimate/O,/O familiar/O feeling/O,/O like/O a/O
consciousness/O of/O hypocrisy/O,/O which/O she/O experienced/O in/O her/O relations/O with/O
her/O husband/O./O But/O hitherto/O she/O had/O not/O taken/O note/O of/O the/O feeling/O,/O now/O she/O
was/O clearly/O and/O painfully/O aware/O of/O it/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O as/O you/O see/O,/O your/O tender/O spouse/O,/O as/O devoted/O as/O the/O first/O year/O after/O
marriage/O,/O burned/O with/O impatience/O to/O see/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O in/O his/O deliberate/O,/O
high-pitched/O voice/O,/O and/O in/O that/O tone/O which/O he/O almost/O always/O took/O with/O
her/O,/O a/O tone/O of/O jeering/O at/O anyone/O who/O should/O say/O in/O earnest/O what/O he/O said/O./O

``/OIs/O Seryozha/O quite/O well/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O./O

``/OAnd/O is/O this/O all/O the/O reward/O,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O ``/Ofor/O my/O ardor/O?/O He/O's/O quite/O
well/O.../O''/O



Chapter/O 31/O


Vronsky/O had/O not/O even/O tried/O to/O sleep/O all/O that/O night/O./O He/O sat/O in/O his/O
armchair/O,/O looking/O straight/O before/O him/O or/O scanning/O the/O people/O who/O got/O in/O
and/O out/O./O If/O he/O had/O indeed/O on/O previous/O occasions/O struck/O and/O impressed/O
people/O who/O did/O not/O know/O him/O by/O his/O air/O of/O unhesitating/O composure/O,/O he/O
seemed/O now/O more/O haughty/O and/O self-possessed/O than/O ever/O./O He/O looked/O at/O
people/O as/O if/O they/O were/O things/O./O A/O nervous/O young/O man/O,/O a/O clerk/O in/O a/O law/O
court/O,/O sitting/O opposite/O him/O,/O hated/O him/O for/O that/O look/O./O The/O young/O man/O
asked/O him/O for/O a/O light/O,/O and/O entered/O into/O conversation/O with/O him/O,/O and/O even/O
pushed/O against/O him/O,/O to/O make/O him/O feel/O that/O he/O was/O not/O a/O thing/O,/O but/O a/O
person/O./O But/O Vronsky/O gazed/O at/O him/O exactly/O as/O he/O did/O at/O the/O lamp/O,/O and/O the/O
young/O man/O made/O a/O wry/O face/O,/O feeling/O that/O he/O was/O losing/O his/O
self-possession/O under/O the/O oppression/O of/O this/O refusal/O to/O recognize/O him/O as/O
a/O person/O./O

Vronsky/O saw/O nothing/O and/O no/O one/O./O He/O felt/O himself/O a/O king/O,/O not/O because/O he/O
believed/O that/O he/O had/O made/O an/O impression/O on/O Anna/PERSON--/Ohe/O did/O not/O yet/O believe/O
that/O,/O--/Obut/O because/O the/O impression/O she/O had/O made/O on/O him/O gave/O him/O happiness/O
and/O pride/O./O

What/O would/O come/O of/O it/O all/O he/O did/O not/O know/O,/O he/O did/O not/O even/O think/O./O He/O
felt/O that/O all/O his/O forces/O,/O hitherto/O dissipated/O,/O wasted/O,/O were/O centered/O on/O
one/O thing/O,/O and/O bent/O with/O fearful/O energy/O on/O one/O blissful/O goal/O./O And/O he/O was/O
happy/O at/O it/O./O He/O knew/O only/O that/O he/O had/O told/O her/O the/O truth/O,/O that/O he/O had/O
come/O where/O she/O was/O,/O that/O all/O the/O happiness/O of/O his/O life/O,/O the/O only/O meaning/O
in/O life/O for/O him/O,/O now/O lay/O in/O seeing/O and/O hearing/O her/O./O And/O when/O he/O got/O out/O
of/O the/O carriage/O at/O Bologova/LOCATION to/O get/O some/O seltzer/O water/O,/O and/O caught/O sight/O
of/O Anna/PERSON,/O involuntarily/O his/O first/O word/O had/O told/O her/O just/O what/O he/O thought/O./O
And/O he/O was/O glad/O he/O had/O told/O her/O it/O,/O that/O she/O knew/O it/O now/O and/O was/O
thinking/O of/O it/O./O He/O did/O not/O sleep/O all/O night/O./O When/O he/O was/O back/O in/O the/O
carriage/O,/O he/O kept/O unceasingly/O going/O over/O every/O position/O in/O which/O he/O had/O
seen/O her/O,/O every/O word/O she/O had/O uttered/O,/O and/O before/O his/O fancy/O,/O making/O his/O
heart/O faint/O with/O emotion/O,/O floated/O pictures/O of/O a/O possible/O future/O./O

When/O he/O got/O out/O of/O the/O train/O at/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O he/O felt/O after/O his/O sleepless/O
night/O as/O keen/O and/O fresh/O as/O after/O a/O cold/O bath/O./O He/O paused/O near/O his/O
compartment/O,/O waiting/O for/O her/O to/O get/O out/O./O ``/OOnce/O more/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O
himself/O,/O smiling/O unconsciously/O,/O ``/Oonce/O more/O I/O shall/O see/O her/O walk/O,/O her/O
face/O;/O she/O will/O say/O something/O,/O turn/O her/O head/O,/O glance/O,/O smile/O,/O maybe/O./O''/O But/O
before/O he/O caught/O sight/O of/O her/O,/O he/O saw/O her/O husband/O,/O whom/O the/O
station-master/O was/O deferentially/O escorting/O through/O the/O crowd/O./O ``/OAh/O,/O yes/O!/O
The/O husband/O./O''/O Only/O now/O for/O the/O first/O time/O did/O Vronsky/O realize/O clearly/O
the/O fact/O that/O there/O was/O a/O person/O attached/O to/O her/O,/O a/O husband/O./O He/O knew/O
that/O she/O had/O a/O husband/O,/O but/O had/O hardly/O believed/O in/O his/O existence/O,/O and/O
only/O now/O fully/O believed/O in/O him/O,/O with/O his/O head/O and/O shoulders/O,/O and/O his/O
legs/O clad/O in/O black/O trousers/O;/O especially/O when/O he/O saw/O this/O husband/O calmly/O
take/O her/O arm/O with/O a/O sense/O of/O property/O./O

Seeing/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON with/O his/O Petersburg/LOCATION face/O and/O severely/O
self-confident/O figure/O,/O in/O his/O round/O hat/O,/O with/O his/O rather/O prominent/O
spine/O,/O he/O believed/O in/O him/O,/O and/O was/O aware/O of/O a/O disagreeable/O sensation/O,/O
such/O as/O a/O man/O might/O feel/O tortured/O by/O thirst/O,/O who/O,/O on/O reaching/O a/O spring/O,/O
should/O find/O a/O dog/O,/O a/O sheep/O,/O or/O a/O pig/O,/O who/O has/O drunk/O of/O it/O and/O muddied/O
the/O water/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O manner/O of/O walking/O,/O with/O a/O swing/O of/O
the/O hips/O and/O flat/O feet/O,/O particularly/O annoyed/O Vronsky/O./O He/O could/O recognize/O
in/O no/O one/O but/O himself/O an/O indubitable/O right/O to/O love/O her/O./O But/O she/O was/O
still/O the/O same/O,/O and/O the/O sight/O of/O her/O affected/O him/O the/O same/O way/O,/O
physically/O reviving/O him/O,/O stirring/O him/O,/O and/O filling/O his/O soul/O with/O
rapture/O./O He/O told/O his/O German/O valet/O,/O who/O ran/O up/O to/O him/O from/O the/O second/O
class/O,/O to/O take/O his/O things/O and/O go/O on/O,/O and/O he/O himself/O went/O up/O to/O her/O./O He/O
saw/O the/O first/O meeting/O between/O the/O husband/O and/O wife/O,/O and/O noted/O with/O a/O
lover/O's/O insight/O the/O signs/O of/O slight/O reserve/O with/O which/O she/O spoke/O to/O her/O
husband/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O she/O does/O not/O love/O him/O and/O can/Onot/O love/O him/O,/O''/O he/O decided/O to/O
himself/O./O

At/O the/O moment/O when/O he/O was/O approaching/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON he/O noticed/O too/O
with/O joy/O that/O she/O was/O conscious/O of/O his/O being/O near/O,/O and/O looked/O round/O,/O and/O
seeing/O him/O,/O turned/O again/O to/O her/O husband/O./O

``/OHave/O you/O passed/O a/O good/O night/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O,/O bowing/O to/O her/O and/O her/O husband/O
together/O,/O and/O leaving/O it/O up/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON to/O accept/O the/O bow/O
on/O his/O own/O account/O,/O and/O to/O recognize/O it/O or/O not/O,/O as/O he/O might/O see/O fit/O./O

``/OThank/O you/O,/O very/O good/O,/O''/O she/O answered/O./O

Her/O face/O looked/O weary/O,/O and/O there/O was/O not/O that/O play/O of/O eagerness/O in/O it/O,/O
peeping/O out/O in/O her/O smile/O and/O her/O eyes/O;/O but/O for/O a/O single/O instant/O,/O as/O she/O
glanced/O at/O him/O,/O there/O was/O a/O flash/O of/O something/O in/O her/O eyes/O,/O and/O although/O
the/O flash/O died/O away/O at/O once/O,/O he/O was/O happy/O for/O that/O moment/O./O She/O glanced/O
at/O her/O husband/O to/O find/O out/O whether/O he/O knew/O Vronsky/O./O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON looked/O at/O Vronsky/O with/O displeasure/O,/O vaguely/O recalling/O who/O
this/O was/O./O Vronsky/O's/O composure/O and/O self-confidence/O here/O struck/O,/O like/O a/O
scythe/O against/O a/O stone/O,/O upon/O the/O cold/O self-confidence/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OCount/O Vronsky/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OAh/O!/O We/O are/O acquainted/O,/O I/O believe/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
indifferently/O,/O giving/O his/O hand/O./O

``/OYou/O set/O off/O with/O the/O mother/O and/O you/O return/O with/O the/O son/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
articulating/O each/O syllable/O,/O as/O though/O each/O were/O a/O separate/O favor/O he/O was/O
bestowing/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O back/O from/O leave/O,/O I/O suppose/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O without/O waiting/O for/O a/O
reply/O,/O he/O turned/O to/O his/O wife/O in/O his/O jesting/O tone/O:/O ``/OWell/O,/O were/O a/O great/O
many/O tears/O shed/O at/O Moscow/LOCATION at/O parting/O?/O''/O

By/O addressing/O his/O wife/O like/O this/O he/O gave/O Vronsky/PERSON to/O understand/O that/O he/O
wished/O to/O be/O left/O alone/O,/O and/O,/O turning/O slightly/O towards/O him/O,/O he/O touched/O
his/O hat/O;/O but/O Vronsky/PERSON turned/O to/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON./O

``/OI/O hope/O I/O may/O have/O the/O honor/O of/O calling/O on/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON glanced/O with/O his/O weary/O eyes/O at/O Vronsky/O./O

``/ODelighted/O,/O''/O he/O said/O coldly/O./O ``/OOn/O Mondays/O we/O're/O at/O home/O./O Most/O fortunate/O,/O''/O
he/O said/O to/O his/O wife/O,/O dismissing/O Vronsky/O altogether/O,/O ``/Othat/O I/O should/O just/O
have/O half/O an/O hour/O to/O meet/O you/O,/O so/O that/O I/O can/O prove/O my/O devotion/O,/O''/O he/O went/O
on/O in/O the/O same/O jesting/O tone/O./O

``/OYou/O lay/O too/O much/O stress/O on/O your/O devotion/O for/O me/O to/O value/O it/O much/O,/O''/O she/O
responded/O in/O the/O same/O jesting/O tone/O,/O involuntarily/O listening/O to/O the/O sound/O
of/O Vronsky/O's/O steps/O behind/O them/O./O ``/OBut/O what/O has/O it/O to/O do/O with/O me/O?/O''/O she/O
said/O to/O herself/O,/O and/O she/O began/O asking/O her/O husband/O how/O Seryozha/PERSON had/O got/O
on/O without/O her/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O capitally/O!/O Mariette/PERSON says/O he/O has/O been/O very/O good/O,/O And/O .../O I/O must/O
disappoint/O you/O .../O but/O he/O has/O not/O missed/O you/O as/O your/O husband/O has/O./O But/O
once/O more/O _/Omerci/O,/O_/O my/O dear/O,/O for/O giving/O me/O a/O day/O./O Our/O dear/O _/OSamovar/PERSON_/O will/O
be/O delighted/O./O''/O -LRB-/OHe/O used/O to/O call/O the/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O well/O known/O
in/O society/O,/O a/O samovar/O,/O because/O she/O was/O always/O bubbling/O over/O with/O
excitement/O./O-RRB-/O ``/OShe/O has/O been/O continually/O asking/O after/O you/O./O And/O,/O do/O you/O
know/O,/O if/O I/O may/O venture/O to/O advise/O you/O,/O you/O should/O go/O and/O see/O her/O today/O./O
You/O know/O how/O she/O takes/O everything/O to/O heart/O./O Just/O now/O,/O with/O all/O her/O own/O
cares/O,/O she/O's/O anxious/O about/O the/O Oblonskys/PERSON being/O brought/O together/O./O''/O

The/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON was/O a/O friend/O of/O her/O husband/O's/O,/O and/O the/O
center/O of/O that/O one/O of/O the/O coteries/O of/O the/O Petersburg/LOCATION world/O with/O which/O
Anna/PERSON was/O,/O through/O her/O husband/O,/O in/O the/O closest/O relations/O./O

``/OBut/O you/O know/O I/O wrote/O to/O her/O?/O''/O

``/OStill/O she/O'll/O want/O to/O hear/O details/O./O Go/O and/O see/O her/O,/O if/O you/O're/O not/O too/O
tired/O,/O my/O dear/O./O Well/O,/O Kondraty/PERSON will/O take/O you/O in/O the/O carriage/O,/O while/O I/O go/O
to/O my/O committee/O./O I/O shall/O not/O be/O alone/O at/O dinner/O again/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON went/O on/O,/O no/O longer/O in/O a/O sarcastic/O tone/O./O ``/OYou/O would/On't/O
believe/O how/O I/O've/O missed/O.../O''/O And/O with/O a/O long/O pressure/O of/O her/O hand/O and/O a/O
meaning/O smile/O,/O he/O put/O her/O in/O her/O carriage/O./O



Chapter/O 32/O


The/O first/O person/O to/O meet/O Anna/PERSON at/O home/O was/O her/O son/O./O He/O dashed/O down/O the/O
stairs/O to/O her/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O governess/O's/O call/O,/O and/O with/O desperate/O joy/O
shrieked/O:/O ``/OMother/O!/O mother/O!/O''/O Running/O up/O to/O her/O,/O he/O hung/O on/O her/O neck/O./O

``/OI/O told/O you/O it/O was/O mother/O!/O''/O he/O shouted/O to/O the/O governess/O./O ``/OI/O knew/O!/O''/O

And/O her/O son/O,/O like/O her/O husband/O,/O aroused/O in/O Anna/PERSON a/O feeling/O akin/O to/O
disappointment/O./O She/O had/O imagined/O him/O better/O than/O he/O was/O in/O reality/O./O She/O
had/O to/O let/O herself/O drop/O down/O to/O the/O reality/O to/O enjoy/O him/O as/O he/O really/O
was/O./O But/O even/O as/O he/O was/O,/O he/O was/O charming/O,/O with/O his/O fair/O curls/O,/O his/O blue/O
eyes/O,/O and/O his/O plump/O,/O graceful/O little/O legs/O in/O tightly/O pulled-up/O
stockings/O./O Anna/PERSON experienced/O almost/O physical/O pleasure/O in/O the/O sensation/O of/O
his/O nearness/O,/O and/O his/O caresses/O,/O and/O moral/O soothing/O,/O when/O she/O met/O his/O
simple/O,/O confiding/O,/O and/O loving/O glance/O,/O and/O heard/O his/O naïve/O questions/O./O
Anna/PERSON took/O out/O the/O presents/O Dolly/PERSON's/O children/O had/O sent/O him/O,/O and/O told/O her/O
son/O what/O sort/O of/O little/O girl/O was/O Tanya/PERSON at/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O how/O Tanya/PERSON could/O
read/O,/O and/O even/O taught/O the/O other/O children/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O am/O I/O not/O so/O nice/O as/O she/O?/O''/O asked/O Seryozha/PERSON./O

``/OTo/O me/O you/O're/O nicer/O than/O anyone/O in/O the/O world/O./O''/O

``/OI/O know/O that/O,/O''/O said/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

Anna/PERSON had/O not/O had/O time/O to/O drink/O her/O coffee/O when/O the/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON was/O announced/O./O The/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON was/O a/O tall/O,/O stout/O
woman/O,/O with/O an/O unhealthily/O sallow/O face/O and/O splendid/O,/O pensive/O black/O eyes/O./O
Anna/PERSON liked/O her/O,/O but/O today/O she/O seemed/O to/O be/O seeing/O her/O for/O the/O first/O time/O
with/O all/O her/O defects/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O my/O dear/O,/O so/O you/O took/O the/O olive/O branch/O?/O''/O inquired/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON,/O as/O soon/O as/O she/O came/O into/O the/O room/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O all/O over/O,/O but/O it/O was/O all/O much/O less/O serious/O than/O we/O had/O
supposed/O,/O''/O answered/O Anna/PERSON./O ``/OMy/O _/Obelle-soeur/O_/O is/O in/O general/O too/O hasty/O./O''/O

But/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O though/O she/O was/O interested/O in/O everything/O
that/O did/O not/O concern/O her/O,/O had/O a/O habit/O of/O never/O listening/O to/O what/O
interested/O her/O;/O she/O interrupted/O Anna/PERSON:/O

``/OYes/O,/O there/O's/O plenty/O of/O sorrow/O and/O evil/O in/O the/O world/O./O I/O am/O so/O worried/O
today/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O why/O?/O''/O asked/O Anna/PERSON,/O trying/O to/O suppress/O a/O smile/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O beginning/O to/O be/O weary/O of/O fruitlessly/O championing/O the/O truth/O,/O and/O
sometimes/O I/O'm/O quite/O unhinged/O by/O it/O./O The/O Society/O of/O the/O Little/O Sisters/O''/O
-LRB-/Othis/O was/O a/O religiously-patriotic/O,/O philanthropic/O institution/O-RRB-/O ``/Owas/O going/O
splendidly/O,/O but/O with/O these/O gentlemen/O it/O's/O impossible/O to/O do/O anything/O,/O''/O
added/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON in/O a/O tone/O of/O ironical/O submission/O to/O
destiny/O./O ``/OThey/O pounce/O on/O the/O idea/O,/O and/O distort/O it/O,/O and/O then/O work/O it/O out/O
so/O pettily/O and/O unworthily/O./O Two/O or/O three/O people/O,/O your/O husband/O among/O them/O,/O
understand/O all/O the/O importance/O of/O the/O thing/O,/O but/O the/O others/O simply/O drag/O
it/O down/O./O Yesterday/O Pravdin/PERSON wrote/O to/O me/O.../O''/O

Pravdin/PERSON was/O a/O well-known/O Panslavist/O abroad/O,/O and/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON
described/O the/O purport/O of/O his/O letter/O./O

Then/O the/O countess/O told/O her/O of/O more/O disagreements/O and/O intrigues/O against/O
the/O work/O of/O the/O unification/O of/O the/O churches/O,/O and/O departed/O in/O haste/O,/O as/O
she/O had/O that/O day/O to/O be/O at/O the/O meeting/O of/O some/O society/O and/O also/O at/O the/O
Slavonic/O committee/O./O

``/OIt/O was/O all/O the/O same/O before/O,/O of/O course/O;/O but/O why/O was/O it/O I/O did/On't/O notice/O
it/O before/O?/O''/O Anna/PERSON asked/O herself/O./O ``/OOr/O has/O she/O been/O very/O much/O irritated/O
today/O?/O It/O's/O really/O ludicrous/O;/O her/O object/O is/O doing/O good/O;/O she/O a/O Christian/O,/O
yet/O she/O's/O always/O angry/O;/O and/O she/O always/O has/O enemies/O,/O and/O always/O enemies/O
in/O the/O name/O of/O Christianity/O and/O doing/O good/O./O''/O

After/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON another/O friend/O came/O,/O the/O wife/O of/O a/O chief/O
secretary/O,/O who/O told/O her/O all/O the/O news/O of/O the/O town/O./O At/O three/O o'clock/O she/O
too/O went/O away/O,/O promising/O to/O come/O to/O dinner/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O at/O
the/O ministry/O./O Anna/PERSON,/O left/O alone/O,/O spent/O the/O time/O till/O dinner/O in/O assisting/O
at/O her/O son/O's/O dinner/O -LRB-/Ohe/O dined/O apart/O from/O his/O parents/O-RRB-/O and/O in/O putting/O her/O
things/O in/O order/O,/O and/O in/O reading/O and/O answering/O the/O notes/O and/O letters/O
which/O had/O accumulated/O on/O her/O table/O./O

The/O feeling/O of/O causeless/O shame/O,/O which/O she/O had/O felt/O on/O the/O journey/O,/O and/O
her/O excitement/O,/O too/O,/O had/O completely/O vanished/O./O In/O the/O habitual/O conditions/O
of/O her/O life/O she/O felt/O again/O resolute/O and/O irreproachable/O./O

She/O recalled/O with/O wonder/O her/O state/O of/O mind/O on/O the/O previous/O day/O./O ``/OWhat/O
was/O it/O?/O Nothing/O./O Vronsky/O said/O something/O silly/O,/O which/O it/O was/O easy/O to/O put/O
a/O stop/O to/O,/O and/O I/O answered/O as/O I/O ought/O to/O have/O done/O./O To/O speak/O of/O it/O to/O my/O
husband/O would/O be/O unnecessary/O and/O out/O of/O the/O question/O./O To/O speak/O of/O it/O
would/O be/O to/O attach/O importance/O to/O what/O has/O no/O importance/O./O''/O She/O remembered/O
how/O she/O had/O told/O her/O husband/O of/O what/O was/O almost/O a/O declaration/O made/O her/O
at/O Petersburg/LOCATION by/O a/O young/O man/O,/O one/O of/O her/O husband/O's/O subordinates/O,/O and/O how/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O answered/O that/O every/O woman/O living/O in/O the/O world/O
was/O exposed/O to/O such/O incidents/O,/O but/O that/O he/O had/O the/O fullest/O confidence/O in/O
her/O tact/O,/O and/O could/O never/O lower/O her/O and/O himself/O by/O jealousy/O./O ``/OSo/O then/O
there/O's/O no/O reason/O to/O speak/O of/O it/O?/O And/O indeed/O,/O thank/O God/O,/O there/O's/O nothing/O
to/O speak/O of/O,/O''/O she/O told/O herself/O./O



Chapter/O 33/O


Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON came/O back/O from/O the/O meeting/O of/O the/O ministers/O at/O
four/O o'clock/O,/O but/O as/O often/O happened/O,/O he/O had/O not/O time/O to/O come/O in/O to/O her/O./O
He/O went/O into/O his/O study/O to/O see/O the/O people/O waiting/O for/O him/O with/O petitions/O,/O
and/O to/O sign/O some/O papers/O brought/O him/O by/O his/O chief/O secretary/O./O At/O dinner/O
time/O -LRB-/Othere/O were/O always/O a/O few/O people/O dining/O with/O the/O Karenins/LOCATION-RRB-/O there/O
arrived/O an/O old/O lady/O,/O a/O cousin/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O the/O chief/O
secretary/O of/O the/O department/O and/O his/O wife/O,/O and/O a/O young/O man/O who/O had/O been/O
recommended/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON for/O the/O service/O./O Anna/PERSON went/O into/O the/O
drawing/O room/O to/O receive/O these/O guests/O./O Precisely/O at/O five/O o'clock/O,/O before/O
the/O bronze/O Peter/PERSON the/O First/O clock/O had/O struck/O the/O fifth/O stroke/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON came/O in/O,/O wearing/O a/O white/O tie/O and/O evening/O coat/O with/O two/O
stars/O,/O as/O he/O had/O to/O go/O out/O directly/O after/O dinner/O./O Every/O minute/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O life/O was/O portioned/O out/O and/O occupied/O./O And/O to/O make/O time/O
to/O get/O through/O all/O that/O lay/O before/O him/O every/O day/O,/O he/O adhered/O to/O the/O
strictest/O punctuality/O./O ``/OUnhasting/O and/O unresting/O,/O''/O was/O his/O motto/O./O He/O came/O
into/O the/O dining/O hall/O,/O greeted/O everyone/O,/O and/O hurriedly/O sat/O down/O,/O smiling/O
to/O his/O wife/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O my/O solitude/O is/O over/O./O You/O would/On't/O believe/O how/O uncomfortable/O''/O -LRB-/Ohe/O
laid/O stress/O on/O the/O word/O _/Ouncomfortable/O_/O-RRB-/O ``/Oit/O is/O to/O dine/O alone/O./O''/O

At/O dinner/O he/O talked/O a/O little/O to/O his/O wife/O about/O Moscow/LOCATION matters/O,/O and/O,/O with/O
a/O sarcastic/O smile/O,/O asked/O her/O after/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON;/O but/O the/O
conversation/O was/O for/O the/O most/O part/O general/O,/O dealing/O with/O Petersburg/LOCATION
official/O and/O public/O news/O./O After/O dinner/O he/O spent/O half/O an/O hour/O with/O his/O
guests/O,/O and/O again/O,/O with/O a/O smile/O,/O pressed/O his/O wife/O's/O hand/O,/O withdrew/O,/O and/O
drove/O off/O to/O the/O council/O./O Anna/PERSON did/O not/O go/O out/O that/O evening/O either/O to/O the/O
Princess/O Betsy/PERSON Tverskaya/PERSON,/O who/O,/O hearing/O of/O her/O return/O,/O had/O invited/O her/O,/O
nor/O to/O the/O theater/O,/O where/O she/O had/O a/O box/O for/O that/O evening/O./O She/O did/O not/O go/O
out/O principally/O because/O the/O dress/O she/O had/O reckoned/O upon/O was/O not/O ready/O./O
Altogether/O,/O Anna/PERSON,/O on/O turning/O,/O after/O the/O departure/O of/O her/O guests/O,/O to/O the/O
consideration/O of/O her/O attire/O,/O was/O very/O much/O annoyed/O./O She/O was/O generally/O a/O
mistress/O of/O the/O art/O of/O dressing/O well/O without/O great/O expense/O,/O and/O before/O
leaving/O Moscow/LOCATION she/O had/O given/O her/O dressmaker/O three/O dresses/O to/O transform/O./O
The/O dresses/O had/O to/O be/O altered/O so/O that/O they/O could/O not/O be/O recognized/O,/O and/O
they/O ought/O to/O have/O been/O ready/O three/O days/O before/O./O It/O appeared/O that/O two/O
dresses/O had/O not/O been/O done/O at/O all/O,/O while/O the/O other/O one/O had/O not/O been/O
altered/O as/O Anna/PERSON had/O intended/O./O The/O dressmaker/O came/O to/O explain/O,/O declaring/O
that/O it/O would/O be/O better/O as/O she/O had/O done/O it/O,/O and/O Anna/PERSON was/O so/O furious/O that/O
she/O felt/O ashamed/O when/O she/O thought/O of/O it/O afterwards/O./O To/O regain/O her/O
serenity/O completely/O she/O went/O into/O the/O nursery/O,/O and/O spent/O the/O whole/O
evening/O with/O her/O son/O,/O put/O him/O to/O bed/O herself/O,/O signed/O him/O with/O the/O cross/O,/O
and/O tucked/O him/O up/O./O She/O was/O glad/O she/O had/O not/O gone/O out/O anywhere/O,/O and/O had/O
spent/O the/O evening/O so/O well/O./O She/O felt/O so/O light-hearted/O and/O serene/O,/O she/O saw/O
so/O clearly/O that/O all/O that/O had/O seemed/O to/O her/O so/O important/O on/O her/O railway/O
journey/O was/O only/O one/O of/O the/O common/O trivial/O incidents/O of/O fashionable/O
life/O,/O and/O that/O she/O had/O no/O reason/O to/O feel/O ashamed/O before/O anyone/O else/O or/O
before/O herself/O./O Anna/PERSON sat/O down/O at/O the/O hearth/O with/O an/O English/O novel/O and/O
waited/O for/O her/O husband/O./O Exactly/O at/O half-past/O nine/O she/O heard/O his/O ring/O,/O
and/O he/O came/O into/O the/O room/O./O

``/OHere/O you/O are/O at/O last/O!/O''/O she/O observed/O,/O holding/O out/O her/O hand/O to/O him/O./O

He/O kissed/O her/O hand/O and/O sat/O down/O beside/O her/O./O

``/OAltogether/O then/O,/O I/O see/O your/O visit/O was/O a/O success/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O her/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O she/O began/O telling/O him/O about/O everything/O from/O the/O
beginning/O:/O her/O journey/O with/O Countess/O Vronskaya/PERSON,/O her/O arrival/O,/O the/O
accident/O at/O the/O station/O./O Then/O she/O described/O the/O pity/O she/O had/O felt/O,/O first/O
for/O her/O brother/O,/O and/O afterwards/O for/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OI/O imagine/O one/O can/Onot/O exonerate/O such/O a/O man/O from/O blame/O,/O though/O he/O is/O your/O
brother/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON severely/O./O

Anna/PERSON smiled/O./O She/O knew/O that/O he/O said/O that/O simply/O to/O show/O that/O family/O
considerations/O could/O not/O prevent/O him/O from/O expressing/O his/O genuine/O
opinion/O./O She/O knew/O that/O characteristic/O in/O her/O husband/O,/O and/O liked/O it/O./O

``/OI/O am/O glad/O it/O has/O all/O ended/O so/O satisfactorily/O,/O and/O that/O you/O are/O back/O
again/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O./O ``/OCome/O,/O what/O do/O they/O say/O about/O the/O new/O act/O I/O have/O got/O
passed/O in/O the/O council/O?/O''/O
