Anna/PERSON had/O heard/O nothing/O of/O this/O act/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O conscience-stricken/O at/O
having/O been/O able/O so/O readily/O to/O forget/O what/O was/O to/O him/O of/O such/O
importance/O./O

``/OHere/O,/O on/O the/O other/O hand/O,/O it/O has/O made/O a/O great/O sensation/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O
a/O complacent/O smile/O./O

She/O saw/O that/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON wanted/O to/O tell/O her/O something/O pleasant/O
to/O him/O about/O it/O,/O and/O she/O brought/O him/O by/O questions/O to/O telling/O it/O./O With/O
the/O same/O complacent/O smile/O he/O told/O her/O of/O the/O ovations/O he/O had/O received/O in/O

``/OI/O was/O very/O,/O very/O glad/O./O It/O shows/O that/O at/O last/O a/O reasonable/O and/O steady/O
view/O of/O the/O matter/O is/O becoming/O prevalent/O among/O us/O./O''/O

Having/O drunk/O his/O second/O cup/O of/O tea/O with/O cream/O,/O and/O bread/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON got/O up/O,/O and/O was/O going/O towards/O his/O study/O./O

``/OAnd/O you/O've/O not/O been/O anywhere/O this/O evening/O?/O You/O've/O been/O dull/O,/O I/O expect/O?/O''/O
he/O said/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O!/O''/O she/O answered/O,/O getting/O up/O after/O him/O and/O accompanying/O him/O across/O
the/O room/O to/O his/O study/O./O ``/OWhat/O are/O you/O reading/O now/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O./O

``/OJust/O now/O I/O'm/O reading/O Duc/ORGANIZATION de/ORGANIZATION Lille/ORGANIZATION,/O _/OPoésie/ORGANIZATION des/ORGANIZATION Enfers/ORGANIZATION,/O_/O''/O he/O answered/O./O
``/OA/O very/O remarkable/O book/O./O''/O

Anna/PERSON smiled/O,/O as/O people/O smile/O at/O the/O weaknesses/O of/O those/O they/O love/O,/O and/O,/O
putting/O her/O hand/O under/O his/O,/O she/O escorted/O him/O to/O the/O door/O of/O the/O study/O./O
She/O knew/O his/O habit/O,/O that/O had/O grown/O into/O a/O necessity/O,/O of/O reading/O in/O the/O
evening/O./O She/O knew/O,/O too/O,/O that/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O official/O duties/O,/O which/O
swallowed/O up/O almost/O the/O whole/O of/O his/O time/O,/O he/O considered/O it/O his/O duty/O to/O
keep/O up/O with/O everything/O of/O note/O that/O appeared/O in/O the/O intellectual/O world/O./O
She/O knew/O,/O too/O,/O that/O he/O was/O really/O interested/O in/O books/O dealing/O with/O
politics/O,/O philosophy/O,/O and/O theology/O,/O that/O art/O was/O utterly/O foreign/O to/O his/O
nature/O;/O but/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O this/O,/O or/O rather/O,/O in/O consequence/O of/O it/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON never/O passed/O over/O anything/O in/O the/O world/O of/O art/O,/O but/O made/O
it/O his/O duty/O to/O read/O everything/O./O She/O knew/O that/O in/O politics/O,/O in/O
philosophy/O,/O in/O theology/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON often/O had/O doubts/O,/O and/O
made/O investigations/O;/O but/O on/O questions/O of/O art/O and/O poetry/O,/O and/O,/O above/O all/O,/O
of/O music/O,/O of/O which/O he/O was/O totally/O devoid/O of/O understanding/O,/O he/O had/O the/O
most/O distinct/O and/O decided/O opinions/O./O He/O was/O fond/O of/O talking/O about/O
Shakespeare/PERSON,/O Raphael/PERSON,/O Beethoven/PERSON,/O of/O the/O significance/O of/O new/O schools/O of/O
poetry/O and/O music/O,/O all/O of/O which/O were/O classified/O by/O him/O with/O very/O
conspicuous/O consistency/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O God/O be/O with/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O at/O the/O door/O of/O the/O study/O,/O where/O a/O
shaded/O candle/O and/O a/O decanter/O of/O water/O were/O already/O put/O by/O his/O armchair/O./O
``/OAnd/O I/O'll/O write/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION./O''/O

He/O pressed/O her/O hand/O,/O and/O again/O kissed/O it/O./O

``/OAll/O the/O same/O he/O's/O a/O good/O man/O;/O truthful/O,/O good-hearted/O,/O and/O remarkable/O in/O
his/O own/O line/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON said/O to/O herself/O going/O back/O to/O her/O room/O,/O as/O though/O
she/O were/O defending/O him/O to/O someone/O who/O had/O attacked/O him/O and/O said/O that/O one/O
could/O not/O love/O him/O./O ``/OBut/O why/O is/O it/O his/O ears/O stick/O out/O so/O strangely/O?/O Or/O
has/O he/O had/O his/O hair/O cut/O?/O''/O

Precisely/O at/O twelve/O o'clock/O,/O when/O Anna/PERSON was/O still/O sitting/O at/O her/O writing/O
table/O,/O finishing/O a/O letter/O to/O Dolly/PERSON,/O she/O heard/O the/O sound/O of/O measured/O
steps/O in/O slippers/O,/O and/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O freshly/O washed/O and/O combed/O,/O
with/O a/O book/O under/O his/O arm/O,/O came/O in/O to/O her/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O time/O,/O it/O's/O time/O,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O with/O a/O meaning/O smile/O,/O and/O he/O went/O into/O
their/O bedroom/O./O

``/OAnd/O what/O right/O had/O he/O to/O look/O at/O him/O like/O that/O?/O''/O thought/O Anna/PERSON,/O
recalling/O Vronsky/O's/O glance/O at/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

Undressing/O,/O she/O went/O into/O the/O bedroom/O;/O but/O her/O face/O had/O none/O of/O the/O
eagerness/O which/O,/O during/O her/O stay/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O had/O fairly/O flashed/O from/O her/O
eyes/O and/O her/O smile/O;/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O now/O the/O fire/O seemed/O quenched/O in/O
her/O,/O hidden/O somewhere/O far/O away/O./O



Chapter/O 34/O


When/O Vronsky/PERSON went/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION from/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O he/O had/O left/O his/O large/O set/O
of/O rooms/O in/O Morskaia/LOCATION to/O his/O friend/O and/O favorite/O comrade/O Petritsky/PERSON./O

Petritsky/PERSON was/O a/O young/O lieutenant/O,/O not/O particularly/O well-connected/O,/O and/O
not/O merely/O not/O wealthy/O,/O but/O always/O hopelessly/O in/O debt/O./O Towards/O evening/O
he/O was/O always/O drunk/O,/O and/O he/O had/O often/O been/O locked/O up/O after/O all/O sorts/O of/O
ludicrous/O and/O disgraceful/O scandals/O,/O but/O he/O was/O a/O favorite/O both/O of/O his/O
comrades/O and/O his/O superior/O officers/O./O On/O arriving/O at/O twelve/O o'clock/O from/O
the/O station/O at/O his/O flat/O,/O Vronsky/O saw/O,/O at/O the/O outer/O door/O,/O a/O hired/O
carriage/O familiar/O to/O him/O./O While/O still/O outside/O his/O own/O door/O,/O as/O he/O rang/O,/O
he/O heard/O masculine/O laughter/O,/O the/O lisp/O of/O a/O feminine/O voice/O,/O and/O
Petritsky/PERSON's/O voice/O./O ``/OIf/O that/O's/O one/O of/O the/O villains/O,/O do/On't/O let/O him/O in/O!/O''/O
Vronsky/PERSON told/O the/O servant/O not/O to/O announce/O him/O,/O and/O slipped/O quietly/O into/O
the/O first/O room/O./O Baroness/PERSON Shilton/PERSON,/O a/O friend/O of/O Petritsky/PERSON's/O,/O with/O a/O rosy/O
little/O face/O and/O flaxen/O hair/O,/O resplendent/O in/O a/O lilac/O satin/O gown/O,/O and/O
filling/O the/O whole/O room/O,/O like/O a/O canary/O,/O with/O her/O Parisian/O chatter/O,/O sat/O at/O
the/O round/O table/O making/O coffee/O./O Petritsky/PERSON,/O in/O his/O overcoat/O,/O and/O the/O
cavalry/O captain/O Kamerovsky/PERSON,/O in/O full/O uniform/O,/O probably/O just/O come/O from/O
duty/O,/O were/O sitting/O each/O side/O of/O her/O./O

``/OBravo/O!/O Vronsky/O!/O''/O shouted/O Petritsky/PERSON,/O jumping/O up/O,/O scraping/O his/O chair/O./O
``/OOur/O host/O himself/O!/O Baroness/PERSON,/O some/O coffee/O for/O him/O out/O of/O the/O new/O coffee/O
pot/O./O Why/O,/O we/O did/On't/O expect/O you/O!/O Hope/O you/O're/O satisfied/O with/O the/O ornament/O
of/O your/O study/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O indicating/O the/O baroness/O./O ``/OYou/O know/O each/O other/O,/O
of/O course/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O should/O think/O so/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O with/O a/O bright/O smile/O,/O pressing/O the/O
baroness/O's/O little/O hand/O./O ``/OWhat/O next/O!/O I/O'm/O an/O old/O friend/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O home/O after/O a/O journey/O,/O''/O said/O the/O baroness/O,/O ``/Oso/O I/O'm/O flying/O./O Oh/O,/O
I/O'll/O be/O off/O this/O minute/O,/O if/O I/O'm/O in/O the/O way/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O home/O,/O wherever/O you/O are/O,/O baroness/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OHow/O do/O you/O do/O,/O
Kamerovsky/PERSON?/O''/O he/O added/O,/O coldly/O shaking/O hands/O with/O Kamerovsky/PERSON./O

``/OThere/O,/O you/O never/O know/O how/O to/O say/O such/O pretty/O things/O,/O''/O said/O the/O
baroness/O,/O turning/O to/O Petritsky/PERSON./O

``/ONo/O;/O what/O's/O that/O for/O?/O After/O dinner/O I/O say/O things/O quite/O as/O good/O./O''/O

``/OAfter/O dinner/O there/O's/O no/O credit/O in/O them/O?/O Well/O,/O then/O,/O I/O'll/O make/O you/O some/O
coffee/O,/O so/O go/O and/O wash/O and/O get/O ready/O,/O''/O said/O the/O baroness/O,/O sitting/O down/O
again/O,/O and/O anxiously/O turning/O the/O screw/O in/O the/O new/O coffee/O pot/O./O ``/OPierre/PERSON,/O
give/O me/O the/O coffee/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O addressing/O Petritsky/PERSON,/O whom/O she/O called/O
Pierre/PERSON as/O a/O contraction/O of/O his/O surname/O,/O making/O no/O secret/O of/O her/O
relations/O with/O him/O./O ``/OI/O'll/O put/O it/O in/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O'll/O spoil/O it/O!/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O spoil/O it/O!/O Well/O,/O and/O your/O wife/O?/O''/O said/O the/O baroness/O suddenly/O,/O
interrupting/O Vronsky/O's/O conversation/O with/O his/O comrade/O./O ``/OWe/O've/O been/O
marrying/O you/O here/O./O Have/O you/O brought/O your/O wife/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O baroness/O./O I/O was/O born/O a/O Bohemian/O,/O and/O a/O Bohemian/O I/O shall/O die/O./O''/O

``/OSo/O much/O the/O better/O,/O so/O much/O the/O better/O./O Shake/O hands/O on/O it/O./O''/O

And/O the/O baroness/O,/O detaining/O Vronsky/O,/O began/O telling/O him/O,/O with/O many/O jokes/O,/O
about/O her/O last/O new/O plans/O of/O life/O,/O asking/O his/O advice/O./O

``/OHe/O persists/O in/O refusing/O to/O give/O me/O a/O divorce/O!/O Well/O,/O what/O am/O I/O to/O do/O?/O''/O
-LRB-/O_/OHe/O_/O was/O her/O husband/O./O-RRB-/O ``/ONow/O I/O want/O to/O begin/O a/O suit/O against/O him/O./O What/O do/O
you/O advise/O?/O Kamerovsky/PERSON,/O look/O after/O the/O coffee/O;/O it/O's/O boiling/O over/O./O You/O
see/O,/O I/O'm/O engrossed/O with/O business/O!/O I/O want/O a/O lawsuit/O,/O because/O I/O must/O have/O
my/O property/O./O Do/O you/O understand/O the/O folly/O of/O it/O,/O that/O on/O the/O pretext/O of/O
my/O being/O unfaithful/O to/O him/O,/O''/O she/O said/O contemptuously/O,/O ``/Ohe/O wants/O to/O get/O
the/O benefit/O of/O my/O fortune/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O heard/O with/O pleasure/O this/O light-hearted/O prattle/O of/O a/O pretty/O
woman/O,/O agreed/O with/O her/O,/O gave/O her/O half-joking/O counsel/O,/O and/O altogether/O
dropped/O at/O once/O into/O the/O tone/O habitual/O to/O him/O in/O talking/O to/O such/O women/O./O
In/O his/O Petersburg/LOCATION world/O all/O people/O were/O divided/O into/O utterly/O opposed/O
classes/O./O One/O,/O the/O lower/O class/O,/O vulgar/O,/O stupid/O,/O and/O,/O above/O all/O,/O
ridiculous/O people/O,/O who/O believe/O that/O one/O husband/O ought/O to/O live/O with/O the/O
one/O wife/O whom/O he/O has/O lawfully/O married/O;/O that/O a/O girl/O should/O be/O innocent/O,/O a/O
woman/O modest/O,/O and/O a/O man/O manly/O,/O self-controlled/O,/O and/O strong/O;/O that/O one/O
ought/O to/O bring/O up/O one/O's/O children/O,/O earn/O one/O's/O bread/O,/O and/O pay/O one/O's/O debts/O;/O
and/O various/O similar/O absurdities/O./O This/O was/O the/O class/O of/O old-fashioned/O and/O
ridiculous/O people/O./O But/O there/O was/O another/O class/O of/O people/O,/O the/O real/O
people/O./O To/O this/O class/O they/O all/O belonged/O,/O and/O in/O it/O the/O great/O thing/O was/O
to/O be/O elegant/O,/O generous/O,/O plucky/O,/O gay/O,/O to/O abandon/O oneself/O without/O a/O blush/O
to/O every/O passion/O,/O and/O to/O laugh/O at/O everything/O else/O./O

For/O the/O first/O moment/O only/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O startled/O after/O the/O impression/O of/O
a/O quite/O different/O world/O that/O he/O had/O brought/O with/O him/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION./O But/O
immediately/O as/O though/O slipping/O his/O feet/O into/O old/O slippers/O,/O he/O dropped/O
back/O into/O the/O light-hearted/O,/O pleasant/O world/O he/O had/O always/O lived/O in/O./O

The/O coffee/O was/O never/O really/O made/O,/O but/O spluttered/O over/O every/O one/O,/O and/O
boiled/O away/O,/O doing/O just/O what/O was/O required/O of/O it/O--/Othat/O is/O,/O providing/O much/O
cause/O for/O much/O noise/O and/O laughter/O,/O and/O spoiling/O a/O costly/O rug/O and/O the/O
baroness/O's/O gown/O./O

``/OWell/O now/O,/O good-bye/O,/O or/O you/O'll/O never/O get/O washed/O,/O and/O I/O shall/O have/O on/O my/O
conscience/O the/O worst/O sin/O a/O gentleman/O can/O commit/O./O So/O you/O would/O advise/O a/O
knife/O to/O his/O throat/O?/O''/O

``/OTo/O be/O sure/O,/O and/O manage/O that/O your/O hand/O may/O not/O be/O far/O from/O his/O lips/O./O
He/O'll/O kiss/O your/O hand/O,/O and/O all/O will/O end/O satisfactorily/O,/O''/O answered/O
Vronsky/O./O

``/OSo/O at/O the/O Francais/O!/O''/O and/O,/O with/O a/O rustle/O of/O her/O skirts/O,/O she/O vanished/O./O

Kamerovsky/PERSON got/O up/O too/O,/O and/O Vronsky/O,/O not/O waiting/O for/O him/O to/O go/O,/O shook/O
hands/O and/O went/O off/O to/O his/O dressing/O room/O./O

While/O he/O was/O washing/O,/O Petritsky/PERSON described/O to/O him/O in/O brief/O outlines/O his/O
position/O,/O as/O far/O as/O it/O had/O changed/O since/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O left/O Petersburg/PERSON./O No/O
money/O at/O all/O./O His/O father/O said/O he/O would/On't/O give/O him/O any/O and/O pay/O his/O
debts/O./O His/O tailor/O was/O trying/O to/O get/O him/O locked/O up/O,/O and/O another/O fellow/O,/O
too/O,/O was/O threatening/O to/O get/O him/O locked/O up/O./O The/O colonel/O of/O the/O regiment/O
had/O announced/O that/O if/O these/O scandals/O did/O not/O cease/O he/O would/O have/O to/O
leave/O./O As/O for/O the/O baroness/O,/O he/O was/O sick/O to/O death/O of/O her/O,/O especially/O
since/O she/O'd/O taken/O to/O offering/O continually/O to/O lend/O him/O money/O./O But/O he/O had/O
found/O a/O girl/O--/Ohe/O'd/O show/O her/O to/O Vronsky/O--/Oa/O marvel/O,/O exquisite/O,/O in/O the/O strict/O
Oriental/O style/O,/O ``/Ogenre/O of/O the/O slave/O Rebecca/PERSON,/O do/On't/O you/O know/O./O''/O He/O'd/O had/O a/O
row/O,/O too/O,/O with/O Berkoshov/PERSON,/O and/O was/O going/O to/O send/O seconds/O to/O him/O,/O but/O of/O
course/O it/O would/O come/O to/O nothing/O./O Altogether/O everything/O was/O supremely/O
amusing/O and/O jolly/O./O And/O,/O not/O letting/O his/O comrade/O enter/O into/O further/O
details/O of/O his/O position/O,/O Petritsky/PERSON proceeded/O to/O tell/O him/O all/O the/O
interesting/O news/O./O As/O he/O listened/O to/O Petritsky/PERSON's/O familiar/O stories/O in/O the/O
familiar/O setting/O of/O the/O rooms/O he/O had/O spent/O the/O last/O three/O years/O in/O,/O
Vronsky/PERSON felt/O a/O delightful/O sense/O of/O coming/O back/O to/O the/O careless/O
Petersburg/PERSON life/O that/O he/O was/O used/O to/O./O

``/OImpossible/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O,/O letting/O down/O the/O pedal/O of/O the/O washing/O basin/O in/O
which/O he/O had/O been/O sousing/O his/O healthy/O red/O neck/O./O ``/OImpossible/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O,/O
at/O the/O news/O that/O Laura/PERSON had/O flung/O over/O Fertinghof/PERSON and/O had/O made/O up/O to/O
Mileev/PERSON./O ``/OAnd/O is/O he/O as/O stupid/O and/O pleased/O as/O ever/O?/O Well/O,/O and/O how/O's/O
Buzulukov/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O there/O is/O a/O tale/O about/O Buzulukov/O--/Osimply/O lovely/O!/O''/O cried/O Petritsky/PERSON./O
``/OYou/O know/O his/O weakness/O for/O balls/O,/O and/O he/O never/O misses/O a/O single/O court/O
ball/O./O He/O went/O to/O a/O big/O ball/O in/O a/O new/O helmet/O./O Have/O you/O seen/O the/O new/O
helmets/O?/O Very/O nice/O,/O lighter/O./O Well/O,/O so/O he/O's/O standing/O.../O./O No/O,/O I/O say/O,/O do/O
listen/O./O''/O

``/OI/O am/O listening/O,/O''/O answered/O Vronsky/O,/O rubbing/O himself/O with/O a/O rough/O towel/O./O

``/OUp/O comes/O the/O Grand/O Duchess/O with/O some/O ambassador/O or/O other/O,/O and/O,/O as/O
ill-luck/O would/O have/O it/O,/O she/O begins/O talking/O to/O him/O about/O the/O new/O helmets/O./O
The/O Grand/O Duchess/O positively/O wanted/O to/O show/O the/O new/O helmet/O to/O the/O
ambassador/O./O They/O see/O our/O friend/O standing/O there/O./O''/O -LRB-/OPetritsky/PERSON mimicked/O how/O
he/O was/O standing/O with/O the/O helmet/O./O-RRB-/O ``/OThe/O Grand/O Duchess/O asked/O him/O to/O give/O
her/O the/O helmet/O;/O he/O does/On't/O give/O it/O to/O her/O./O What/O do/O you/O think/O of/O that/O?/O
Well/O,/O every/O one/O's/O winking/O at/O him/O,/O nodding/O,/O frowning/O--/Ogive/O it/O to/O her/O,/O do/O!/O
He/O does/On't/O give/O it/O to/O her/O./O He/O's/O mute/O as/O a/O fish/O./O Only/O picture/O it/O!/O.../O
Well/O,/O the/O .../O what/O's/O his/O name/O,/O whatever/O he/O was/O .../O tries/O to/O take/O the/O
helmet/O from/O him/O .../O he/O wo/On't/O give/O it/O up/O!/O.../O He/O pulls/O it/O from/O him/O,/O and/O
hands/O it/O to/O the/O Grand/O Duchess/O./O `/OHere/O,/O your/O Highness/O,/O'/O says/O he/O,/O `/Ois/O the/O
new/O helmet/O./O'/O She/O turned/O the/O helmet/O the/O other/O side/O up/O,/O And/O--/Ojust/O picture/O
it/O!/O--/Oplop/O went/O a/O pear/O and/O sweetmeats/O out/O of/O it/O,/O two/O pounds/O of/O
sweetmeats/O!/O.../O He/O'd/O been/O storing/O them/O up/O,/O the/O darling/O!/O''/O

Vronsky/O burst/O into/O roars/O of/O laughter/O./O And/O long/O afterwards/O,/O when/O he/O was/O
talking/O of/O other/O things/O,/O he/O broke/O out/O into/O his/O healthy/O laugh/O,/O showing/O
his/O strong/O,/O close/O rows/O of/O teeth/O,/O when/O he/O thought/O of/O the/O helmet/O./O

Having/O heard/O all/O the/O news/O,/O Vronsky/O,/O with/O the/O assistance/O of/O his/O valet/O,/O
got/O into/O his/O uniform/O,/O and/O went/O off/O to/O report/O himself/O./O He/O intended/O,/O when/O
he/O had/O done/O that/O,/O to/O drive/O to/O his/O brother/O's/O and/O to/O Betsy/PERSON's/O and/O to/O pay/O
several/O visits/O with/O a/O view/O to/O beginning/O to/O go/O into/O that/O society/O where/O he/O
might/O meet/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON./O As/O he/O always/O did/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O he/O left/O home/O
not/O meaning/O to/O return/O till/O late/O at/O night/O./O




PART/O TWO/O



Chapter/O 1/O


At/O the/O end/O of/O the/O winter/O,/O in/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O house/O,/O a/O consultation/O
was/O being/O held/O,/O which/O was/O to/O pronounce/O on/O the/O state/O of/O Kitty/PERSON's/O health/O
and/O the/O measures/O to/O be/O taken/O to/O restore/O her/O failing/O strength/O./O She/O had/O
been/O ill/O,/O and/O as/O spring/O came/O on/O she/O grew/O worse/O./O The/O family/O doctor/O gave/O
her/O cod/O liver/O oil/O,/O then/O iron/O,/O then/O nitrate/O of/O silver/O,/O but/O as/O the/O first/O
and/O the/O second/O and/O the/O third/O were/O alike/O in/O doing/O no/O good/O,/O and/O as/O his/O
advice/O when/O spring/O came/O was/O to/O go/O abroad/O,/O a/O celebrated/O physician/O was/O
called/O in/O./O The/O celebrated/O physician/O,/O a/O very/O handsome/O man/O,/O still/O
youngish/O,/O asked/O to/O examine/O the/O patient/O./O He/O maintained/O,/O with/O peculiar/O
satisfaction/O,/O it/O seemed/O,/O that/O maiden/O modesty/O is/O a/O mere/O relic/O of/O
barbarism/O,/O and/O that/O nothing/O could/O be/O more/O natural/O than/O for/O a/O man/O still/O
youngish/O to/O handle/O a/O young/O girl/O naked/O./O He/O thought/O it/O natural/O because/O he/O
did/O it/O every/O day/O,/O and/O felt/O and/O thought/O,/O as/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O,/O no/O harm/O as/O
he/O did/O it/O and/O consequently/O he/O considered/O modesty/O in/O the/O girl/O not/O merely/O
as/O a/O relic/O of/O barbarism/O,/O but/O also/O as/O an/O insult/O to/O himself/O./O

There/O was/O nothing/O for/O it/O but/O to/O submit/O,/O since/O,/O although/O all/O the/O doctors/O
had/O studied/O in/O the/O same/O school/O,/O had/O read/O the/O same/O books/O,/O and/O learned/O the/O
same/O science/O,/O and/O though/O some/O people/O said/O this/O celebrated/O doctor/O was/O a/O
bad/O doctor/O,/O in/O the/O princess/O's/O household/O and/O circle/O it/O was/O for/O some/O
reason/O accepted/O that/O this/O celebrated/O doctor/O alone/O had/O some/O special/O
knowledge/O,/O and/O that/O he/O alone/O could/O save/O Kitty/PERSON./O After/O a/O careful/O
examination/O and/O sounding/O of/O the/O bewildered/O patient/O,/O dazed/O with/O shame/O,/O
the/O celebrated/O doctor/O,/O having/O scrupulously/O washed/O his/O hands/O,/O was/O
standing/O in/O the/O drawing/O room/O talking/O to/O the/O prince/O./O The/O prince/O frowned/O
and/O coughed/O,/O listening/O to/O the/O doctor/O./O As/O a/O man/O who/O had/O seen/O something/O of/O
life/O,/O and/O neither/O a/O fool/O nor/O an/O invalid/O,/O he/O had/O no/O faith/O in/O medicine/O,/O
and/O in/O his/O heart/O was/O furious/O at/O the/O whole/O farce/O,/O specially/O as/O he/O was/O
perhaps/O the/O only/O one/O who/O fully/O comprehended/O the/O cause/O of/O Kitty/PERSON's/O
illness/O./O ``/OConceited/O blockhead/O!/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O as/O he/O listened/O to/O the/O
celebrated/O doctor/O's/O chatter/O about/O his/O daughter/O's/O symptoms/O./O The/O doctor/O
was/O meantime/O with/O difficulty/O restraining/O the/O expression/O of/O his/O contempt/O
for/O this/O old/O gentleman/O,/O and/O with/O difficulty/O condescending/O to/O the/O level/O
of/O his/O intelligence/O./O He/O perceived/O that/O it/O was/O no/O good/O talking/O to/O the/O old/O
man/O,/O and/O that/O the/O principal/O person/O in/O the/O house/O was/O the/O mother/O./O Before/O
her/O he/O decided/O to/O scatter/O his/O pearls/O./O At/O that/O instant/O the/O princess/O came/O
into/O the/O drawing/O room/O with/O the/O family/O doctor/O./O The/O prince/O withdrew/O,/O
trying/O not/O to/O show/O how/O ridiculous/O he/O thought/O the/O whole/O performance/O./O The/O
princess/O was/O distracted/O,/O and/O did/O not/O know/O what/O to/O do/O./O She/O felt/O she/O had/O
sinned/O against/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O doctor/O,/O decide/O our/O fate/O,/O''/O said/O the/O princess/O./O ``/OTell/O me/O
everything/O./O''/O

``/OIs/O there/O hope/O?/O''/O she/O meant/O to/O say/O,/O but/O her/O lips/O quivered/O,/O and/O she/O could/O
not/O utter/O the/O question/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O doctor/O?/O''/O

``/OImmediately/O,/O princess/O./O I/O will/O talk/O it/O over/O with/O my/O colleague/O,/O and/O then/O
I/O will/O have/O the/O honor/O of/O laying/O my/O opinion/O before/O you/O./O''/O

``/OSo/O we/O had/O better/O leave/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OAs/O you/O please/O./O''/O

The/O princess/O went/O out/O with/O a/O sigh/O./O

When/O the/O doctors/O were/O left/O alone/O,/O the/O family/O doctor/O began/O timidly/O
explaining/O his/O opinion/O,/O that/O there/O was/O a/O commencement/O of/O tuberculous/O
trouble/O,/O but/O .../O and/O so/O on/O./O The/O celebrated/O doctor/O listened/O to/O him/O,/O and/O
in/O the/O middle/O of/O his/O sentence/O looked/O at/O his/O big/O gold/O watch/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O said/O he/O./O ``/OBut/O.../O''/O

The/O family/O doctor/O respectfully/O ceased/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O his/O observations/O./O

``/OThe/O commencement/O of/O the/O tuberculous/O process/O we/O are/O not/O,/O as/O you/O are/O
aware/O,/O able/O to/O define/O;/O till/O there/O are/O cavities/O,/O there/O is/O nothing/O
definite/O./O But/O we/O may/O suspect/O it/O./O And/O there/O are/O indications/O;/O
malnutrition/O,/O nervous/O excitability/O,/O and/O so/O on/O./O The/O question/O stands/O thus/O:/O
in/O presence/O of/O indications/O of/O tuberculous/O process/O,/O what/O is/O to/O be/O done/O to/O
maintain/O nutrition/O?/O''/O

``/OBut/O,/O you/O know/O,/O there/O are/O always/O moral/O,/O spiritual/O causes/O at/O the/O back/O in/O
these/O cases/O,/O''/O the/O family/O doctor/O permitted/O himself/O to/O interpolate/O with/O a/O
subtle/O smile/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O's/O an/O understood/O thing/O,/O''/O responded/O the/O celebrated/O physician/O,/O
again/O glancing/O at/O his/O watch/O./O ``/OBeg/O pardon/O,/O is/O the/O Yausky/LOCATION bridge/O done/O yet/O,/O
or/O shall/O I/O have/O to/O drive/O around/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O ``/OAh/O!/O it/O is/O./O Oh/O,/O well/O,/O then/O I/O
can/O do/O it/O in/O twenty/O minutes/O./O So/O we/O were/O saying/O the/O problem/O may/O be/O put/O
thus/O:/O to/O maintain/O nutrition/O and/O to/O give/O tone/O to/O the/O nerves/O./O The/O one/O is/O
in/O close/O connection/O with/O the/O other/O,/O one/O must/O attack/O both/O sides/O at/O once/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O how/O about/O a/O tour/O abroad/O?/O''/O asked/O the/O family/O doctor/O./O

``/OI/O've/O no/O liking/O for/O foreign/O tours/O./O And/O take/O note/O:/O if/O there/O is/O an/O early/O
stage/O of/O tuberculous/O process/O,/O of/O which/O we/O can/Onot/O be/O certain/O,/O a/O foreign/O
tour/O will/O be/O of/O no/O use/O./O What/O is/O wanted/O is/O means/O of/O improving/O nutrition/O,/O
and/O not/O for/O lowering/O it/O./O''/O And/O the/O celebrated/O doctor/O expounded/O his/O plan/O
of/O treatment/O with/O Soden/PERSON waters/O,/O a/O remedy/O obviously/O prescribed/O primarily/O
on/O the/O ground/O that/O they/O could/O do/O no/O harm/O./O

The/O family/O doctor/O listened/O attentively/O and/O respectfully/O./O

``/OBut/O in/O favor/O of/O foreign/O travel/O I/O would/O urge/O the/O change/O of/O habits/O,/O the/O
removal/O from/O conditions/O calling/O up/O reminiscences/O./O And/O then/O the/O mother/O
wishes/O it/O,/O''/O he/O added/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O Well/O,/O in/O that/O case/O,/O to/O be/O sure/O,/O let/O them/O go/O./O Only/O,/O those/O German/O
quacks/O are/O mischievous/O.../O./O They/O ought/O to/O be/O persuaded/O.../O./O Well/O,/O let/O them/O
go/O then/O./O''/O

He/O glanced/O once/O more/O at/O his/O watch/O./O

``/OOh/O!/O time/O's/O up/O already/O,/O''/O And/O he/O went/O to/O the/O door/O./O The/O celebrated/O doctor/O
announced/O to/O the/O princess/O -LRB-/Oa/O feeling/O of/O what/O was/O due/O from/O him/O dictated/O
his/O doing/O so/O-RRB-/O that/O he/O ought/O to/O see/O the/O patient/O once/O more/O./O

``/OWhat/O!/O another/O examination/O!/O''/O cried/O the/O mother/O,/O with/O horror/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O only/O a/O few/O details/O,/O princess/O./O''/O

``/OCome/O this/O way/O./O''/O

And/O the/O mother/O,/O accompanied/O by/O the/O doctor/O,/O went/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O to/O
Kitty/PERSON./O Wasted/O and/O flushed/O,/O with/O a/O peculiar/O glitter/O in/O her/O eyes/O,/O left/O
there/O by/O the/O agony/O of/O shame/O she/O had/O been/O put/O through/O,/O Kitty/PERSON stood/O in/O the/O
middle/O of/O the/O room/O./O When/O the/O doctor/O came/O in/O she/O flushed/O crimson/O,/O and/O her/O
eyes/O filled/O with/O tears/O./O All/O her/O illness/O and/O treatment/O struck/O her/O as/O a/O
thing/O so/O stupid/O,/O ludicrous/O even/O!/O Doctoring/O her/O seemed/O to/O her/O as/O absurd/O
as/O putting/O together/O the/O pieces/O of/O a/O broken/O vase/O./O Her/O heart/O was/O broken/O./O
Why/O would/O they/O try/O to/O cure/O her/O with/O pills/O and/O powders/O?/O But/O she/O could/O not/O
grieve/O her/O mother/O,/O especially/O as/O her/O mother/O considered/O herself/O to/O blame/O./O

``/OMay/O I/O trouble/O you/O to/O sit/O down/O,/O princess/O?/O''/O the/O celebrated/O doctor/O said/O to/O
her/O./O

He/O sat/O down/O with/O a/O smile/O,/O facing/O her/O,/O felt/O her/O pulse/O,/O and/O again/O began/O
asking/O her/O tiresome/O questions/O./O She/O answered/O him/O,/O and/O all/O at/O once/O got/O up/O,/O
furious/O./O

``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O doctor/O,/O but/O there/O is/O really/O no/O object/O in/O this/O./O This/O is/O the/O
third/O time/O you/O've/O asked/O me/O the/O same/O thing/O./O''/O

The/O celebrated/O doctor/O did/O not/O take/O offense/O./O

``/ONervous/O irritability/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O princess/O,/O when/O Kitty/PERSON had/O left/O the/O
room/O./O ``/OHowever/O,/O I/O had/O finished/O.../O''/O

And/O the/O doctor/O began/O scientifically/O explaining/O to/O the/O princess/O,/O as/O an/O
exceptionally/O intelligent/O woman/O,/O the/O condition/O of/O the/O young/O princess/O,/O
and/O concluded/O by/O insisting/O on/O the/O drinking/O of/O the/O waters/O,/O which/O were/O
certainly/O harmless/O./O At/O the/O question/O:/O Should/O they/O go/O abroad/O?/O the/O doctor/O
plunged/O into/O deep/O meditation/O,/O as/O though/O resolving/O a/O weighty/O problem/O./O
Finally/O his/O decision/O was/O pronounced/O:/O they/O were/O to/O go/O abroad/O,/O but/O to/O put/O
no/O faith/O in/O foreign/O quacks/O,/O and/O to/O apply/O to/O him/O in/O any/O need/O./O

It/O seemed/O as/O though/O some/O piece/O of/O good/O fortune/O had/O come/O to/O pass/O after/O
the/O doctor/O had/O gone/O./O The/O mother/O was/O much/O more/O cheerful/O when/O she/O went/O
back/O to/O her/O daughter/O,/O and/O Kitty/PERSON pretended/O to/O be/O more/O cheerful/O./O She/O had/O
often/O,/O almost/O always/O,/O to/O be/O pretending/O now/O./O

``/OReally/O,/O I/O'm/O quite/O well/O,/O mamma/O./O But/O if/O you/O want/O to/O go/O abroad/O,/O let/O's/O go/O!/O''/O
she/O said/O,/O and/O trying/O to/O appear/O interested/O in/O the/O proposed/O tour/O,/O she/O
began/O talking/O of/O the/O preparations/O for/O the/O journey/O./O



Chapter/O 2/O


Soon/O after/O the/O doctor/O,/O Dolly/PERSON had/O arrived/O./O She/O knew/O that/O there/O was/O to/O be/O
a/O consultation/O that/O day/O,/O and/O though/O she/O was/O only/O just/O up/O after/O her/O
confinement/O -LRB-/Oshe/O had/O another/O baby/O,/O a/O little/O girl/O,/O born/O at/O the/O end/O of/O the/O
winter/O-RRB-/O,/O though/O she/O had/O trouble/O and/O anxiety/O enough/O of/O her/O own/O,/O she/O had/O
left/O her/O tiny/O baby/O and/O a/O sick/O child/O,/O to/O come/O and/O hear/O Kitty/PERSON's/O fate/O,/O
which/O was/O to/O be/O decided/O that/O day/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O well/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O coming/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O without/O taking/O off/O
her/O hat/O./O ``/OYou/O're/O all/O in/O good/O spirits/O./O Good/O news/O,/O then/O?/O''/O

They/O tried/O to/O tell/O her/O what/O the/O doctor/O had/O said/O,/O but/O it/O appeared/O that/O
though/O the/O doctor/O had/O talked/O distinctly/O enough/O and/O at/O great/O length/O,/O it/O
was/O utterly/O impossible/O to/O report/O what/O he/O had/O said/O./O The/O only/O point/O of/O
interest/O was/O that/O it/O was/O settled/O they/O should/O go/O abroad/O./O

Dolly/PERSON could/O not/O help/O sighing/O./O Her/O dearest/O friend/O,/O her/O sister/O,/O was/O going/O
away/O./O And/O her/O life/O was/O not/O a/O cheerful/O one/O./O Her/O relations/O with/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON after/O their/O reconciliation/O had/O become/O humiliating/O./O The/O
union/O Anna/PERSON had/O cemented/O turned/O out/O to/O be/O of/O no/O solid/O character/O,/O and/O
family/O harmony/O was/O breaking/O down/O again/O at/O the/O same/O point/O./O There/O had/O been/O
nothing/O definite/O,/O but/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O hardly/O ever/O at/O home/O;/O
money/O,/O too/O,/O was/O hardly/O ever/O forthcoming/O,/O and/O Dolly/PERSON was/O continually/O
tortured/O by/O suspicions/O of/O infidelity/O,/O which/O she/O tried/O to/O dismiss/O,/O
dreading/O the/O agonies/O of/O jealousy/O she/O had/O been/O through/O already/O./O The/O first/O
onslaught/O of/O jealousy/O,/O once/O lived/O through/O,/O could/O never/O come/O back/O again/O,/O
and/O even/O the/O discovery/O of/O infidelities/O could/O never/O now/O affect/O her/O as/O it/O
had/O the/O first/O time/O./O Such/O a/O discovery/O now/O would/O only/O mean/O breaking/O up/O
family/O habits/O,/O and/O she/O let/O herself/O be/O deceived/O,/O despising/O him/O and/O still/O
more/O herself/O,/O for/O the/O weakness/O./O Besides/O this/O,/O the/O care/O of/O her/O large/O
family/O was/O a/O constant/O worry/O to/O her/O:/O first/O,/O the/O nursing/O of/O her/O young/O baby/O
did/O not/O go/O well/O,/O then/O the/O nurse/O had/O gone/O away/O,/O now/O one/O of/O the/O children/O
had/O fallen/O ill/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O are/O all/O of/O you/O?/O''/O asked/O her/O mother/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O mamma/O,/O we/O have/O plenty/O of/O troubles/O of/O our/O own/O./O Lili/PERSON is/O ill/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O
afraid/O it/O's/O scarlatina/O./O I/O have/O come/O here/O now/O to/O hear/O about/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O
then/O I/O shall/O shut/O myself/O up/O entirely/O,/O if/O--/OGod/O forbid/O--/Oit/O should/O be/O
scarlatina/O./O''/O

The/O old/O prince/O too/O had/O come/O in/O from/O his/O study/O after/O the/O doctor/O's/O
departure/O,/O and/O after/O presenting/O his/O cheek/O to/O Dolly/PERSON,/O and/O saying/O a/O few/O
words/O to/O her/O,/O he/O turned/O to/O his/O wife/O:/O

``/OHow/O have/O you/O settled/O it/O?/O you/O're/O going/O?/O Well/O,/O and/O what/O do/O you/O mean/O to/O do/O
with/O me/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O suppose/O you/O had/O better/O stay/O here/O,/O Alexander/PERSON,/O''/O said/O his/O wife/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O as/O you/O like/O./O''/O

``/OMamma/O,/O why/O should/On't/O father/O come/O with/O us/O?/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON./O ``/OIt/O would/O be/O
nicer/O for/O him/O and/O for/O us/O too/O./O''/O

The/O old/O prince/O got/O up/O and/O stroked/O Kitty/PERSON's/O hair/O./O She/O lifted/O her/O head/O and/O
looked/O at/O him/O with/O a/O forced/O smile/O./O It/O always/O seemed/O to/O her/O that/O he/O
understood/O her/O better/O than/O anyone/O in/O the/O family/O,/O though/O he/O did/O not/O say/O
much/O about/O her/O./O Being/O the/O youngest/O,/O she/O was/O her/O father/O's/O favorite/O,/O and/O
she/O fancied/O that/O his/O love/O gave/O him/O insight/O./O When/O now/O her/O glance/O met/O his/O
blue/O kindly/O eyes/O looking/O intently/O at/O her/O,/O it/O seemed/O to/O her/O that/O he/O saw/O
right/O through/O her/O,/O and/O understood/O all/O that/O was/O not/O good/O that/O was/O passing/O
within/O her/O./O Reddening/O,/O she/O stretched/O out/O towards/O him/O expecting/O a/O kiss/O,/O
but/O he/O only/O patted/O her/O hair/O and/O said/O:/O

``/OThese/O stupid/O chignons/O!/O There/O's/O no/O getting/O at/O the/O real/O daughter/O./O One/O
simply/O strokes/O the/O bristles/O of/O dead/O women/O./O Well/O,/O Dolinka/PERSON,/O''/O he/O turned/O to/O
his/O elder/O daughter/O,/O ``/Owhat/O's/O your/O young/O buck/O about/O,/O hey/O?/O''/O

``/ONothing/O,/O father/O,/O''/O answered/O Dolly/PERSON,/O understanding/O that/O her/O husband/O was/O
meant/O./O ``/OHe/O's/O always/O out/O;/O I/O scarcely/O ever/O see/O him/O,/O''/O she/O could/O not/O resist/O
adding/O with/O a/O sarcastic/O smile/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O has/On't/O he/O gone/O into/O the/O country/O yet/O--/Oto/O see/O about/O selling/O that/O
forest/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O he/O's/O still/O getting/O ready/O for/O the/O journey/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O that/O's/O it/O!/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O./O ``/OAnd/O so/O am/O I/O to/O be/O getting/O ready/O for/O a/O
journey/O too/O?/O At/O your/O service/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O his/O wife/O,/O sitting/O down/O./O ``/OAnd/O I/O
tell/O you/O what/O,/O Katia/PERSON,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O to/O his/O younger/O daughter/O,/O ``/Oyou/O must/O
wake/O up/O one/O fine/O day/O and/O say/O to/O yourself/O:/O Why/O,/O I/O'm/O quite/O well/O,/O and/O
merry/O,/O and/O going/O out/O again/O with/O father/O for/O an/O early/O morning/O walk/O in/O the/O
frost/O./O Hey/O?/O''/O

What/O her/O father/O said/O seemed/O simple/O enough/O,/O yet/O at/O these/O words/O Kitty/PERSON
became/O confused/O and/O overcome/O like/O a/O detected/O criminal/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O he/O sees/O it/O
all/O,/O he/O understands/O it/O all/O,/O and/O in/O these/O words/O he/O's/O telling/O me/O that/O
though/O I/O'm/O ashamed/O,/O I/O must/O get/O over/O my/O shame/O./O''/O She/O could/O not/O pluck/O up/O
spirit/O to/O make/O any/O answer/O./O She/O tried/O to/O begin/O,/O and/O all/O at/O once/O burst/O
into/O tears/O,/O and/O rushed/O out/O of/O the/O room/O./O

``/OSee/O what/O comes/O of/O your/O jokes/O!/O''/O the/O princess/O pounced/O down/O on/O her/O
husband/O./O ``/OYou/O're/O always/O.../O''/O she/O began/O a/O string/O of/O reproaches/O./O

The/O prince/O listened/O to/O the/O princess/O's/O scolding/O rather/O a/O long/O while/O
without/O speaking/O,/O but/O his/O face/O was/O more/O and/O more/O frowning/O./O

``/OShe/O's/O so/O much/O to/O be/O pitied/O,/O poor/O child/O,/O so/O much/O to/O be/O pitied/O,/O and/O you/O
do/On't/O feel/O how/O it/O hurts/O her/O to/O hear/O the/O slightest/O reference/O to/O the/O cause/O
of/O it/O./O Ah/O!/O to/O be/O so/O mistaken/O in/O people/O!/O''/O said/O the/O princess/O,/O and/O by/O the/O
change/O in/O her/O tone/O both/O Dolly/PERSON and/O the/O prince/O knew/O she/O was/O speaking/O of/O
Vronsky/O./O ``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O why/O there/O are/On't/O laws/O against/O such/O base/O,/O
dishonorable/O people/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O bear/O to/O hear/O you/O!/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O gloomily/O,/O getting/O up/O
from/O his/O low/O chair/O,/O and/O seeming/O anxious/O to/O get/O away/O,/O yet/O stopping/O in/O the/O
doorway/O./O ``/OThere/O are/O laws/O,/O madam/O,/O and/O since/O you/O've/O challenged/O me/O to/O it/O,/O
I/O'll/O tell/O you/O who/O's/O to/O blame/O for/O it/O all/O:/O you/O and/O you/O,/O you/O and/O nobody/O
else/O./O Laws/O against/O such/O young/O gallants/O there/O have/O always/O been/O,/O and/O there/O
still/O are/O!/O Yes/O,/O if/O there/O has/O been/O nothing/O that/O ought/O not/O to/O have/O been/O,/O
old/O as/O I/O am/O,/O I/O'd/O have/O called/O him/O out/O to/O the/O barrier/O,/O the/O young/O dandy/O./O
Yes/O,/O and/O now/O you/O physic/O her/O and/O call/O in/O these/O quacks/O./O''/O

The/O prince/O apparently/O had/O plenty/O more/O to/O say/O,/O but/O as/O soon/O as/O the/O
princess/O heard/O his/O tone/O she/O subsided/O at/O once/O,/O and/O became/O penitent/O,/O as/O
she/O always/O did/O on/O serious/O occasions/O./O

``/OAlexander/PERSON,/O Alexander/PERSON,/O''/O she/O whispered/O,/O moving/O to/O him/O and/O beginning/O to/O
weep/O./O

As/O soon/O as/O she/O began/O to/O cry/O the/O prince/O too/O calmed/O down/O./O He/O went/O up/O to/O
her/O./O

``/OThere/O,/O that/O's/O enough/O,/O that/O's/O enough/O!/O You/O're/O wretched/O too/O,/O I/O know/O./O It/O
ca/On't/O be/O helped/O./O There/O's/O no/O great/O harm/O done/O./O God/O is/O merciful/O .../O
thanks/O.../O''/O he/O said/O,/O not/O knowing/O what/O he/O was/O saying/O,/O as/O he/O responded/O to/O
the/O tearful/O kiss/O of/O the/O princess/O that/O he/O felt/O on/O his/O hand/O./O And/O the/O
prince/O went/O out/O of/O the/O room/O./O

Before/O this/O,/O as/O soon/O as/O Kitty/PERSON went/O out/O of/O the/O room/O in/O tears/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O with/O
her/O motherly/O,/O family/O instincts/O,/O had/O promptly/O perceived/O that/O here/O a/O
woman/O's/O work/O lay/O before/O her/O,/O and/O she/O prepared/O to/O do/O it/O./O She/O took/O off/O her/O
hat/O,/O and/O,/O morally/O speaking/O,/O tucked/O up/O her/O sleeves/O and/O prepared/O for/O
action/O./O While/O her/O mother/O was/O attacking/O her/O father/O,/O she/O tried/O to/O restrain/O
her/O mother/O,/O so/O far/O as/O filial/O reverence/O would/O allow/O./O During/O the/O prince/O's/O
outburst/O she/O was/O silent/O;/O she/O felt/O ashamed/O for/O her/O mother/O,/O and/O tender/O
towards/O her/O father/O for/O so/O quickly/O being/O kind/O again/O./O But/O when/O her/O father/O
left/O them/O she/O made/O ready/O for/O what/O was/O the/O chief/O thing/O needful/O--/Oto/O go/O to/O
Kitty/PERSON and/O console/O her/O./O

``/OI/O'd/O been/O meaning/O to/O tell/O you/O something/O for/O a/O long/O while/O,/O mamma/O:/O did/O you/O
know/O that/O Levin/PERSON meant/O to/O make/O Kitty/PERSON an/O offer/O when/O he/O was/O here/O the/O last/O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O then/O?/O I/O do/On't/O understand/O.../O''/O

``/OSo/O did/O Kitty/PERSON perhaps/O refuse/O him/O?/O.../O She/O did/On't/O tell/O you/O so/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O she/O has/O said/O nothing/O to/O me/O either/O of/O one/O or/O the/O other/O;/O she/O's/O too/O
proud/O./O But/O I/O know/O it/O's/O all/O on/O account/O of/O the/O other/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O suppose/O she/O has/O refused/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O she/O would/On't/O have/O refused/O
him/O if/O it/O had/On't/O been/O for/O the/O other/O,/O I/O know/O./O And/O then/O,/O he/O has/O deceived/O

It/O was/O too/O terrible/O for/O the/O princess/O to/O think/O how/O she/O had/O sinned/O against/O
her/O daughter/O,/O and/O she/O broke/O out/O angrily/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O really/O do/On't/O understand/O!/O Nowadays/O they/O will/O all/O go/O their/O own/O way/O,/O
and/O mothers/O have/On't/O a/O word/O to/O say/O in/O anything/O,/O and/O then/O.../O''/O

``/OMamma/O,/O I/O'll/O go/O up/O to/O her/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O do/O./O Did/O I/O tell/O you/O not/O to/O?/O''/O said/O her/O mother/O./O



Chapter/O 3/O


When/O she/O went/O into/O Kitty/PERSON's/O little/O room/O,/O a/O pretty/O,/O pink/O little/O room/O,/O full/O
of/O knick-knacks/O in/O _/Ovieux/O saxe/O,/O_/O as/O fresh/O,/O and/O pink/O,/O and/O white/O,/O and/O gay/O
as/O Kitty/PERSON herself/O had/O been/O two/O months/O ago/O,/O Dolly/PERSON remembered/O how/O they/O had/O
decorated/O the/O room/O the/O year/O before/O together/O,/O with/O what/O love/O and/O gaiety/O./O
Her/O heart/O turned/O cold/O when/O she/O saw/O Kitty/PERSON sitting/O on/O a/O low/O chair/O near/O the/O
door/O,/O her/O eyes/O fixed/O immovably/O on/O a/O corner/O of/O the/O rug/O./O Kitty/PERSON glanced/O at/O
her/O sister/O,/O and/O the/O cold/O,/O rather/O ill-tempered/O expression/O of/O her/O face/O did/O
not/O change/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O just/O going/O now/O,/O and/O I/O shall/O have/O to/O keep/O in/O and/O you/O wo/On't/O be/O able/O
to/O come/O to/O see/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O sitting/O down/O beside/O her/O./O ``/OI/O want/O to/O talk/O
to/O you/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O about/O?/O''/O Kitty/PERSON asked/O swiftly/O,/O lifting/O her/O head/O in/O dismay/O./O

``/OWhat/O should/O it/O be/O,/O but/O your/O trouble/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O have/O no/O trouble/O./O''/O

``/ONonsense/O,/O Kitty/PERSON./O Do/O you/O suppose/O I/O could/O help/O knowing/O?/O I/O know/O all/O about/O
it/O./O And/O believe/O me/O,/O it/O's/O of/O so/O little/O consequence/O.../O./O We/O've/O all/O been/O
through/O it/O./O''/O

Kitty/PERSON did/O not/O speak/O,/O and/O her/O face/O had/O a/O stern/O expression/O./O

``/OHe/O's/O not/O worth/O your/O grieving/O over/O him/O,/O''/O pursued/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O
coming/O straight/O to/O the/O point/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O because/O he/O has/O treated/O me/O with/O contempt/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O in/O a/O breaking/O
voice/O./O ``/ODo/On't/O talk/O of/O it/O!/O Please/O,/O do/On't/O talk/O of/O it/O!/O''/O

``/OBut/O who/O can/O have/O told/O you/O so/O?/O No/O one/O has/O said/O that/O./O I/O'm/O certain/O he/O was/O
in/O love/O with/O you/O,/O and/O would/O still/O be/O in/O love/O with/O you/O,/O if/O it/O had/On't/O.../O

``/OOh/O,/O the/O most/O awful/O thing/O of/O all/O for/O me/O is/O this/O sympathizing/O!/O''/O shrieked/O
Kitty/PERSON,/O suddenly/O flying/O into/O a/O passion/O./O She/O turned/O round/O on/O her/O chair/O,/O
flushed/O crimson/O,/O and/O rapidly/O moving/O her/O fingers/O,/O pinched/O the/O clasp/O of/O
her/O belt/O first/O with/O one/O hand/O and/O then/O with/O the/O other/O./O Dolly/PERSON knew/O this/O
trick/O her/O sister/O had/O of/O clenching/O her/O hands/O when/O she/O was/O much/O excited/O;/O
she/O knew/O,/O too/O,/O that/O in/O moments/O of/O excitement/O Kitty/PERSON was/O capable/O of/O
forgetting/O herself/O and/O saying/O a/O great/O deal/O too/O much/O,/O and/O Dolly/PERSON would/O
have/O soothed/O her/O,/O but/O it/O was/O too/O late/O./O

``/OWhat/O,/O what/O is/O it/O you/O want/O to/O make/O me/O feel/O,/O eh/O?/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON quickly/O./O
``/OThat/O I/O've/O been/O in/O love/O with/O a/O man/O who/O did/On't/O care/O a/O straw/O for/O me/O,/O and/O
that/O I/O'm/O dying/O of/O love/O for/O him/O?/O And/O this/O is/O said/O to/O me/O by/O my/O own/O sister/O,/O
who/O imagines/O that/O .../O that/O .../O that/O she/O's/O sympathizing/O with/O me/O!/O.../O I/O
do/On't/O want/O these/O condolences/O and/O humbug/O!/O''/O

``/OKitty/PERSON,/O you/O're/O unjust/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O are/O you/O tormenting/O me/O?/O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O .../O quite/O the/O contrary/O .../O I/O see/O you/O're/O unhappy/O.../O''/O

But/O Kitty/PERSON in/O her/O fury/O did/O not/O hear/O her/O./O

``/OI/O've/O nothing/O to/O grieve/O over/O and/O be/O comforted/O about/O./O I/O am/O too/O proud/O ever/O
to/O allow/O myself/O to/O care/O for/O a/O man/O who/O does/O not/O love/O me/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O do/On't/O say/O so/O either/O.../O./O Only/O one/O thing/O./O Tell/O me/O the/O truth/O,/O''/O said/O
Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O taking/O her/O by/O the/O hand/O:/O ``/Otell/O me/O,/O did/O Levin/PERSON speak/O to/O
you/O?/O.../O''/O

The/O mention/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O name/O seemed/O to/O deprive/O Kitty/PERSON of/O the/O last/O vestige/O
of/O self-control/O./O She/O leaped/O up/O from/O her/O chair/O,/O and/O flinging/O her/O clasp/O on/O
the/O ground/O,/O she/O gesticulated/O rapidly/O with/O her/O hands/O and/O said/O:/O

``/OWhy/O bring/O Levin/PERSON in/O too/O?/O I/O ca/On't/O understand/O what/O you/O want/O to/O torment/O me/O
for/O./O I/O've/O told/O you/O,/O and/O I/O say/O it/O again/O,/O that/O I/O have/O some/O pride/O,/O and/O
never/O,/O _/Onever/O_/O would/O I/O do/O as/O you/O're/O doing/O--/Ogo/O back/O to/O a/O man/O who/O's/O
deceived/O you/O,/O who/O has/O cared/O for/O another/O woman/O./O I/O ca/On't/O understand/O it/O!/O
You/O may/O,/O but/O I/O ca/On't/O!/O''/O

And/O saying/O these/O words/O she/O glanced/O at/O her/O sister/O,/O and/O seeing/O that/O Dolly/PERSON
sat/O silent/O,/O her/O head/O mournfully/O bowed/O,/O Kitty/PERSON,/O instead/O of/O running/O out/O of/O
the/O room/O as/O she/O had/O meant/O to/O do/O,/O sat/O down/O near/O the/O door/O,/O and/O hid/O her/O
face/O in/O her/O handkerchief/O./O

The/O silence/O lasted/O for/O two/O minutes/O:/O Dolly/PERSON was/O thinking/O of/O herself/O./O That/O
humiliation/O of/O which/O she/O was/O always/O conscious/O came/O back/O to/O her/O with/O a/O
peculiar/O bitterness/O when/O her/O sister/O reminded/O her/O of/O it/O./O She/O had/O not/O
looked/O for/O such/O cruelty/O in/O her/O sister/O,/O and/O she/O was/O angry/O with/O her/O./O But/O
suddenly/O she/O heard/O the/O rustle/O of/O a/O skirt/O,/O and/O with/O it/O the/O sound/O of/O
heart-rending/O,/O smothered/O sobbing/O,/O and/O felt/O arms/O about/O her/O neck/O./O Kitty/PERSON
was/O on/O her/O knees/O before/O her/O./O

``/ODolinka/PERSON,/O I/O am/O so/O,/O so/O wretched/O!/O''/O she/O whispered/O penitently/O./O And/O the/O sweet/O
face/O covered/O with/O tears/O hid/O itself/O in/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O skirt/O./O

As/O though/O tears/O were/O the/O indispensable/O oil/O,/O without/O which/O the/O machinery/O
of/O mutual/O confidence/O could/O not/O run/O smoothly/O between/O the/O two/O sisters/O,/O the/O
sisters/O after/O their/O tears/O talked/O,/O not/O of/O what/O was/O uppermost/O in/O their/O
minds/O,/O but/O,/O though/O they/O talked/O of/O outside/O matters/O,/O they/O understood/O each/O
other/O./O Kitty/PERSON knew/O that/O the/O words/O she/O had/O uttered/O in/O anger/O about/O her/O
husband/O's/O infidelity/O and/O her/O humiliating/O position/O had/O cut/O her/O poor/O
sister/O to/O the/O heart/O,/O but/O that/O she/O had/O forgiven/O her/O./O Dolly/PERSON for/O her/O part/O
knew/O all/O she/O had/O wanted/O to/O find/O out/O./O She/O felt/O certain/O that/O her/O surmises/O
were/O correct/O;/O that/O Kitty/PERSON's/O misery/O,/O her/O inconsolable/O misery/O,/O was/O due/O
precisely/O to/O the/O fact/O that/O Levin/PERSON had/O made/O her/O an/O offer/O and/O she/O had/O
refused/O him/O,/O and/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O deceived/O her/O,/O and/O that/O she/O was/O fully/O
prepared/O to/O love/O Levin/PERSON and/O to/O detest/O Vronsky/O./O Kitty/PERSON said/O not/O a/O word/O of/O
that/O;/O she/O talked/O of/O nothing/O but/O her/O spiritual/O condition/O./O

``/OI/O have/O nothing/O to/O make/O me/O miserable/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O getting/O calmer/O;/O ``/Obut/O
can/O you/O understand/O that/O everything/O has/O become/O hateful/O,/O loathsome/O,/O coarse/O
to/O me/O,/O and/O I/O myself/O most/O of/O all/O?/O You/O ca/On't/O imagine/O what/O loathsome/O
thoughts/O I/O have/O about/O everything/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O whatever/O loathsome/O thoughts/O can/O you/O have/O?/O''/O asked/O Dolly/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/OThe/O most/O utterly/O loathsome/O and/O coarse/O:/O I/O ca/On't/O tell/O you/O./O It/O's/O not/O
unhappiness/O,/O or/O low/O spirits/O,/O but/O much/O worse/O./O As/O though/O everything/O that/O
was/O good/O in/O me/O was/O all/O hidden/O away/O,/O and/O nothing/O was/O left/O but/O the/O most/O
loathsome/O./O Come/O,/O how/O am/O I/O to/O tell/O you/O?/O''/O she/O went/O on/O,/O seeing/O the/O puzzled/O
look/O in/O her/O sister/O's/O eyes/O./O ``/OFather/O began/O saying/O something/O to/O me/O just/O
now/O.../O./O It/O seems/O to/O me/O he/O thinks/O all/O I/O want/O is/O to/O be/O married/O./O Mother/O
takes/O me/O to/O a/O ball/O:/O it/O seems/O to/O me/O she/O only/O takes/O me/O to/O get/O me/O married/O
off/O as/O soon/O as/O may/O be/O,/O and/O be/O rid/O of/O me/O./O I/O know/O it/O's/O not/O the/O truth/O,/O but/O
I/O ca/On't/O drive/O away/O such/O thoughts/O./O Eligible/O suitors/O,/O as/O they/O call/O them/O--/OI/O
ca/On't/O bear/O to/O see/O them/O./O It/O seems/O to/O me/O they/O're/O taking/O stock/O of/O me/O and/O
summing/O me/O up/O./O In/O old/O days/O to/O go/O anywhere/O in/O a/O ball/O dress/O was/O a/O simple/O
joy/O to/O me/O,/O I/O admired/O myself/O;/O now/O I/O feel/O ashamed/O and/O awkward/O./O And/O then/O!/O
The/O doctor/O.../O./O Then/O.../O''/O Kitty/PERSON hesitated/O;/O she/O wanted/O to/O say/O further/O that/O
ever/O since/O this/O change/O had/O taken/O place/O in/O her/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O
become/O insufferably/O repulsive/O to/O her/O,/O and/O that/O she/O could/O not/O see/O him/O
without/O the/O grossest/O and/O most/O hideous/O conceptions/O rising/O before/O her/O
imagination/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O everything/O presents/O itself/O to/O me/O,/O in/O the/O coarsest/O,/O most/O
loathsome/O light/O,/O''/O she/O went/O on/O./O ``/OThat/O's/O my/O illness/O./O Perhaps/O it/O will/O pass/O
off/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O you/O must/On't/O think/O about/O it/O./O''/O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O help/O it/O./O I/O'm/O never/O happy/O except/O with/O the/O children/O at/O your/O
house/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O a/O pity/O you/O ca/On't/O be/O with/O me/O!/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O I/O'm/O coming/O./O I/O've/O had/O scarlatina/O,/O and/O I/O'll/O persuade/O mamma/O to/O
let/O me/O./O''/O

Kitty/PERSON insisted/O on/O having/O her/O way/O,/O and/O went/O to/O stay/O at/O her/O sister/O's/O and/O
nursed/O the/O children/O all/O through/O the/O scarlatina/O,/O for/O scarlatina/O it/O turned/O
out/O to/O be/O./O The/O two/O sisters/O brought/O all/O the/O six/O children/O successfully/O
through/O it/O,/O but/O Kitty/PERSON was/O no/O better/O in/O health/O,/O and/O in/O Lent/O the/O
Shtcherbatskys/O went/O abroad/O./O



Chapter/O 4/O


The/O highest/O Petersburg/LOCATION society/O is/O essentially/O one/O:/O in/O it/O everyone/O knows/O
everyone/O else/O,/O everyone/O even/O visits/O everyone/O else/O./O But/O this/O great/O set/O
has/O its/O subdivisions/O./O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON Karenina/PERSON had/O friends/O and/O close/O
ties/O in/O three/O different/O circles/O of/O this/O highest/O society/O./O One/O circle/O was/O
her/O husband/O's/O government/O official/O set/O,/O consisting/O of/O his/O colleagues/O and/O
subordinates/O,/O brought/O together/O in/O the/O most/O various/O and/O capricious/O
manner/O,/O and/O belonging/O to/O different/O social/O strata/O./O Anna/PERSON found/O it/O
difficult/O now/O to/O recall/O the/O feeling/O of/O almost/O awe-stricken/O reverence/O
which/O she/O had/O at/O first/O entertained/O for/O these/O persons/O./O Now/O she/O knew/O all/O
of/O them/O as/O people/O know/O one/O another/O in/O a/O country/O town/O;/O she/O knew/O their/O
habits/O and/O weaknesses/O,/O and/O where/O the/O shoe/O pinched/O each/O one/O of/O them/O./O She/O
knew/O their/O relations/O with/O one/O another/O and/O with/O the/O head/O authorities/O,/O
knew/O who/O was/O for/O whom/O,/O and/O how/O each/O one/O maintained/O his/O position/O,/O and/O
where/O they/O agreed/O and/O disagreed/O./O But/O the/O circle/O of/O political/O,/O masculine/O
interests/O had/O never/O interested/O her/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O countess/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON's/O influence/O,/O and/O she/O avoided/O it/O./O

Another/O little/O set/O with/O which/O Anna/PERSON was/O in/O close/O relations/O was/O the/O one/O by/O
means/O of/O which/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O made/O his/O career/O./O The/O center/O of/O
this/O circle/O was/O the/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O It/O was/O a/O set/O made/O up/O of/O
elderly/O,/O ugly/O,/O benevolent/O,/O and/O godly/O women/O,/O and/O clever/O,/O learned/O,/O and/O
ambitious/O men/O./O One/O of/O the/O clever/O people/O belonging/O to/O the/O set/O had/O called/O
it/O ``/Othe/O conscience/O of/O Petersburg/LOCATION society/O./O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O the/O
highest/O esteem/O for/O this/O circle/O,/O and/O Anna/PERSON with/O her/O special/O gift/O for/O
getting/O on/O with/O everyone/O,/O had/O in/O the/O early/O days/O of/O her/O life/O in/O
Petersburg/LOCATION made/O friends/O in/O this/O circle/O also/O./O Now/O,/O since/O her/O return/O from/O
Moscow/LOCATION,/O she/O had/O come/O to/O feel/O this/O set/O insufferable/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O her/O
that/O both/O she/O and/O all/O of/O them/O were/O insincere/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O so/O bored/O and/O
ill/O at/O ease/O in/O that/O world/O that/O she/O went/O to/O see/O the/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON as/O little/O as/O possible/O./O

The/O third/O circle/O with/O which/O Anna/PERSON had/O ties/O was/O preeminently/O the/O
fashionable/O world/O--/Othe/O world/O of/O balls/O,/O of/O dinners/O,/O of/O sumptuous/O dresses/O,/O
the/O world/O that/O hung/O on/O to/O the/O court/O with/O one/O hand/O,/O so/O as/O to/O avoid/O
sinking/O to/O the/O level/O of/O the/O demi-monde/O./O For/O the/O demi-monde/O the/O members/O
of/O that/O fashionable/O world/O believed/O that/O they/O despised/O,/O though/O their/O
tastes/O were/O not/O merely/O similar/O,/O but/O in/O fact/O identical/O./O Her/O connection/O
with/O this/O circle/O was/O kept/O up/O through/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON Tverskaya/PERSON,/O her/O
cousin/O's/O wife/O,/O who/O had/O an/O income/O of/O a/O hundred/O and/O twenty/O thousand/O
roubles/O,/O and/O who/O had/O taken/O a/O great/O fancy/O to/O Anna/PERSON ever/O since/O she/O first/O
came/O out/O,/O showed/O her/O much/O attention/O,/O and/O drew/O her/O into/O her/O set/O,/O making/O
fun/O of/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON's/O coterie/O./O

``/OWhen/O I/O'm/O old/O and/O ugly/O I/O'll/O be/O the/O same/O,/O''/O Betsy/PERSON used/O to/O say/O;/O ``/Obut/O for/O a/O
pretty/O young/O woman/O like/O you/O it/O's/O early/O days/O for/O that/O house/O of/O charity/O./O''/O

Anna/PERSON had/O at/O first/O avoided/O as/O far/O as/O she/O could/O Princess/O Tverskaya/PERSON's/O
world/O,/O because/O it/O necessitated/O an/O expenditure/O beyond/O her/O means/O,/O and/O
besides/O in/O her/O heart/O she/O preferred/O the/O first/O circle/O./O But/O since/O her/O visit/O
to/O Moscow/LOCATION she/O had/O done/O quite/O the/O contrary/O./O She/O avoided/O her/O
serious-minded/O friends/O,/O and/O went/O out/O into/O the/O fashionable/O world/O./O There/O
she/O met/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O experienced/O an/O agitating/O joy/O at/O those/O meetings/O./O She/O
met/O Vronsky/PERSON specially/O often/O at/O Betsy/PERSON's/O for/O Betsy/PERSON was/O a/O Vronsky/O by/O birth/O
and/O his/O cousin/O./O Vronsky/O was/O everywhere/O where/O he/O had/O any/O chance/O of/O
meeting/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O speaking/O to/O her/O,/O when/O he/O could/O,/O of/O his/O love/O./O She/O gave/O
him/O no/O encouragement/O,/O but/O every/O time/O she/O met/O him/O there/O surged/O up/O in/O her/O
heart/O that/O same/O feeling/O of/O quickened/O life/O that/O had/O come/O upon/O her/O that/O
day/O in/O the/O railway/O carriage/O when/O she/O saw/O him/O for/O the/O first/O time/O./O She/O was/O
conscious/O herself/O that/O her/O delight/O sparkled/O in/O her/O eyes/O and/O curved/O her/O
lips/O into/O a/O smile/O,/O and/O she/O could/O not/O quench/O the/O expression/O of/O this/O
delight/O./O

At/O first/O Anna/PERSON sincerely/O believed/O that/O she/O was/O displeased/O with/O him/O for/O
daring/O to/O pursue/O her/O./O Soon/O after/O her/O return/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O on/O arriving/O at/O
a/O _/Osoirée/O_/O where/O she/O had/O expected/O to/O meet/O him/O,/O and/O not/O finding/O him/O
there/O,/O she/O realized/O distinctly/O from/O the/O rush/O of/O disappointment/O that/O she/O
had/O been/O deceiving/O herself/O,/O and/O that/O this/O pursuit/O was/O not/O merely/O not/O
distasteful/O to/O her/O,/O but/O that/O it/O made/O the/O whole/O interest/O of/O her/O life/O./O

A/O celebrated/O singer/O was/O singing/O for/O the/O second/O time/O,/O and/O all/O the/O
fashionable/O world/O was/O in/O the/O theater/O./O Vronsky/O,/O seeing/O his/O cousin/O from/O
his/O stall/O in/O the/O front/O row/O,/O did/O not/O wait/O till/O the/O entr/O'/Oacte/O,/O but/O went/O to/O
her/O box/O./O

``/OWhy/O did/On't/O you/O come/O to/O dinner/O?/O''/O she/O said/O to/O him/O./O ``/OI/O marvel/O at/O the/O
second/O sight/O of/O lovers/O,/O''/O she/O added/O with/O a/O smile/O,/O so/O that/O no/O one/O but/O he/O
could/O hear/O;/O ''/O_/Oshe/O was/On't/O there/O_/O./O But/O come/O after/O the/O opera/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O looked/O inquiringly/O at/O her/O./O She/O nodded/O./O He/O thanked/O her/O by/O a/O
smile/O,/O and/O sat/O down/O beside/O her/O./O

``/OBut/O how/O I/O remember/O your/O jeers/O!/O''/O continued/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON,/O who/O took/O a/O
peculiar/O pleasure/O in/O following/O up/O this/O passion/O to/O a/O successful/O issue/O./O
``/OWhat/O's/O become/O of/O all/O that/O?/O You/O're/O caught/O,/O my/O dear/O boy/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O my/O one/O desire/O,/O to/O be/O caught/O,/O''/O answered/O Vronsky/O,/O with/O his/O serene/O,/O
good-humored/O smile/O./O ``/OIf/O I/O complain/O of/O anything/O it/O's/O only/O that/O I/O'm/O not/O
caught/O enough/O,/O to/O tell/O the/O truth/O./O I/O begin/O to/O lose/O hope/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O whatever/O hope/O can/O you/O have/O?/O''/O said/O Betsy/PERSON,/O offended/O on/O behalf/O of/O her/O
friend/O./O ''/O_/OEntendons/O nous/O.../O_/O''/O But/O in/O her/O eyes/O there/O were/O gleams/O of/O
light/O that/O betrayed/O that/O she/O understood/O perfectly/O and/O precisely/O as/O he/O
did/O what/O hope/O he/O might/O have/O./O

``/ONone/O whatever/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O laughing/O and/O showing/O his/O even/O rows/O of/O
teeth/O./O ``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O taking/O an/O opera/O glass/O out/O of/O her/O hand/O,/O and/O
proceeding/O to/O scrutinize/O,/O over/O her/O bare/O shoulder/O,/O the/O row/O of/O boxes/O
facing/O them/O./O ``/OI/O'm/O afraid/O I/O'm/O becoming/O ridiculous/O./O''/O

He/O was/O very/O well/O aware/O that/O he/O ran/O no/O risk/O of/O being/O ridiculous/O in/O the/O
eyes/O of/O Betsy/PERSON or/O any/O other/O fashionable/O people/O./O He/O was/O very/O well/O aware/O
that/O in/O their/O eyes/O the/O position/O of/O an/O unsuccessful/O lover/O of/O a/O girl/O,/O or/O
of/O any/O woman/O free/O to/O marry/O,/O might/O be/O ridiculous/O./O But/O the/O position/O of/O a/O
man/O pursuing/O a/O married/O woman/O,/O and/O,/O regardless/O of/O everything/O,/O staking/O his/O
life/O on/O drawing/O her/O into/O adultery/O,/O has/O something/O fine/O and/O grand/O about/O
it/O,/O and/O can/O never/O be/O ridiculous/O;/O and/O so/O it/O was/O with/O a/O proud/O and/O gay/O
smile/O under/O his/O mustaches/O that/O he/O lowered/O the/O opera/O glass/O and/O looked/O at/O
his/O cousin/O./O

``/OBut/O why/O was/O it/O you/O did/On't/O come/O to/O dinner/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O admiring/O him/O./O

``/OI/O must/O tell/O you/O about/O that/O./O I/O was/O busily/O employed/O,/O and/O doing/O what/O,/O do/O
you/O suppose/O?/O I/O'll/O give/O you/O a/O hundred/O guesses/O,/O a/O thousand/O .../O you/O'd/O never/O
guess/O./O I/O've/O been/O reconciling/O a/O husband/O with/O a/O man/O who/O'd/O insulted/O his/O
wife/O./O Yes/O,/O really/O!/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O did/O you/O succeed/O?/O''/O

``/OAlmost/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O really/O must/O tell/O me/O about/O it/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O getting/O up/O./O ``/OCome/O to/O me/O in/O
the/O next/O _/Oentr/O'/Oacte/O./O_/O''/O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O;/O I/O'm/O going/O to/O the/O French/O theater/O./O''/O

``/OFrom/O Nilsson/PERSON?/O''/O Betsy/PERSON queried/O in/O horror/O,/O though/O she/O could/O not/O herself/O
have/O distinguished/O Nilsson/PERSON's/O voice/O from/O any/O chorus/O girl/O's/O./O

``/OCa/On't/O help/O it/O./O I/O've/O an/O appointment/O there/O,/O all/O to/O do/O with/O my/O mission/O of/O
peace/O./O''/O

''/O`/OBlessed/O are/O the/O peacemakers/O;/O theirs/O is/O the/O kingdom/O of/O heaven/O,/O'/O''/O said/O
Betsy/PERSON,/O vaguely/O recollecting/O she/O had/O heard/O some/O similar/O saying/O from/O
someone/O./O ``/OVery/O well/O,/O then/O,/O sit/O down/O,/O and/O tell/O me/O what/O it/O's/O all/O about/O./O''/O

And/O she/O sat/O down/O again/O./O



Chapter/O 5/O


``/OThis/O is/O rather/O indiscreet/O,/O but/O it/O's/O so/O good/O it/O's/O an/O awful/O temptation/O to/O
tell/O the/O story/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O her/O with/O his/O laughing/O eyes/O./O
``/OI/O'm/O not/O going/O to/O mention/O any/O names/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O shall/O guess/O,/O so/O much/O the/O better/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O listen/O:/O two/O festive/O young/O men/O were/O driving/O--/O''/O

``/OOfficers/O of/O your/O regiment/O,/O of/O course/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O did/On't/O say/O they/O were/O officers/O,/O--/Otwo/O young/O men/O who/O had/O been/O lunching/O./O''/O

``/OIn/O other/O words/O,/O drinking/O./O''/O

``/OPossibly/O./O They/O were/O driving/O on/O their/O way/O to/O dinner/O with/O a/O friend/O in/O the/O
most/O festive/O state/O of/O mind/O./O And/O they/O beheld/O a/O pretty/O woman/O in/O a/O hired/O
sledge/O;/O she/O overtakes/O them/O,/O looks/O round/O at/O them/O,/O and/O,/O so/O they/O fancy/O
anyway/O,/O nods/O to/O them/O and/O laughs/O./O They/O,/O of/O course/O,/O follow/O her/O./O They/O
gallop/O at/O full/O speed/O./O To/O their/O amazement/O,/O the/O fair/O one/O alights/O at/O the/O
entrance/O of/O the/O very/O house/O to/O which/O they/O were/O going/O./O The/O fair/O one/O darts/O
upstairs/O to/O the/O top/O story/O./O They/O get/O a/O glimpse/O of/O red/O lips/O under/O a/O short/O
veil/O,/O and/O exquisite/O little/O feet/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O describe/O it/O with/O such/O feeling/O that/O I/O fancy/O you/O must/O be/O one/O of/O the/O
two/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O after/O what/O you/O said/O,/O just/O now/O!/O Well/O,/O the/O young/O men/O go/O in/O to/O their/O
comrade/O's/O;/O he/O was/O giving/O a/O farewell/O dinner/O./O There/O they/O certainly/O did/O
drink/O a/O little/O too/O much/O,/O as/O one/O always/O does/O at/O farewell/O dinners/O./O And/O at/O
dinner/O they/O inquire/O who/O lives/O at/O the/O top/O in/O that/O house/O./O No/O one/O knows/O;/O
only/O their/O host/O's/O valet/O,/O in/O answer/O to/O their/O inquiry/O whether/O any/O `/Oyoung/O
ladies/O'/O are/O living/O on/O the/O top/O floor/O,/O answered/O that/O there/O were/O a/O great/O
many/O of/O them/O about/O there/O./O After/O dinner/O the/O two/O young/O men/O go/O into/O their/O
host/O's/O study/O,/O and/O write/O a/O letter/O to/O the/O unknown/O fair/O one/O./O They/O compose/O
an/O ardent/O epistle/O,/O a/O declaration/O in/O fact/O,/O and/O they/O carry/O the/O letter/O
upstairs/O themselves/O,/O so/O as/O to/O elucidate/O whatever/O might/O appear/O not/O
perfectly/O intelligible/O in/O the/O letter/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O are/O you/O telling/O me/O these/O horrible/O stories/O?/O Well/O?/O''/O

``/OThey/O ring/O./O A/O maid-servant/O opens/O the/O door/O,/O they/O hand/O her/O the/O letter/O,/O and/O
assure/O the/O maid/O that/O they/O're/O both/O so/O in/O love/O that/O they/O'll/O die/O on/O the/O
spot/O at/O the/O door/O./O The/O maid/O,/O stupefied/O,/O carries/O in/O their/O messages/O./O All/O at/O
once/O a/O gentleman/O appears/O with/O whiskers/O like/O sausages/O,/O as/O red/O as/O a/O
lobster/O,/O announces/O that/O there/O is/O no/O one/O living/O in/O the/O flat/O except/O his/O
wife/O,/O and/O sends/O them/O both/O about/O their/O business/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O know/O he/O had/O whiskers/O like/O sausages/O,/O as/O you/O say/O?/O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O you/O shall/O hear/O./O I/O've/O just/O been/O to/O make/O peace/O between/O them/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O what/O then/O?/O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O the/O most/O interesting/O part/O of/O the/O story/O./O It/O appears/O that/O it/O's/O a/O
happy/O couple/O,/O a/O government/O clerk/O and/O his/O lady/O./O The/O government/O clerk/O
lodges/O a/O complaint/O,/O and/O I/O became/O a/O mediator/O,/O and/O such/O a/O mediator/O!/O.../O I/O
assure/O you/O Talleyrand/LOCATION could/On't/O hold/O a/O candle/O to/O me/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O where/O was/O the/O difficulty/O?/O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O you/O shall/O hear/O.../O./O We/O apologize/O in/O due/O form/O:/O we/O are/O in/O despair/O,/O we/O
entreat/O forgiveness/O for/O the/O unfortunate/O misunderstanding/O./O The/O government/O
clerk/O with/O the/O sausages/O begins/O to/O melt/O,/O but/O he/O,/O too/O,/O desires/O to/O express/O
his/O sentiments/O,/O and/O as/O soon/O as/O ever/O he/O begins/O to/O express/O them/O,/O he/O begins/O
to/O get/O hot/O and/O say/O nasty/O things/O,/O and/O again/O I/O'm/O obliged/O to/O trot/O out/O all/O
my/O diplomatic/O talents/O./O I/O allowed/O that/O their/O conduct/O was/O bad/O,/O but/O I/O urged/O
him/O to/O take/O into/O consideration/O their/O heedlessness/O,/O their/O youth/O;/O then/O,/O
too/O,/O the/O young/O men/O had/O only/O just/O been/O lunching/O together/O./O `/OYou/O
understand/O./O They/O regret/O it/O deeply/O,/O and/O beg/O you/O to/O overlook/O their/O
misbehavior/O./O'/O The/O government/O clerk/O was/O softened/O once/O more/O./O `/OI/O consent/O,/O
count/O,/O and/O am/O ready/O to/O overlook/O it/O;/O but/O you/O perceive/O that/O my/O wife/O--/Omy/O
wife/O's/O a/O respectable/O woman/O--/Ohas/O been/O exposed/O to/O the/O persecution/O,/O and/O
insults/O,/O and/O effrontery/O of/O young/O upstarts/O,/O scoundrels/O.../O'/O And/O you/O must/O
understand/O,/O the/O young/O upstarts/O are/O present/O all/O the/O while/O,/O and/O I/O have/O to/O
keep/O the/O peace/O between/O them/O./O Again/O I/O call/O out/O all/O my/O diplomacy/O,/O and/O
again/O as/O soon/O as/O the/O thing/O was/O about/O at/O an/O end/O,/O our/O friend/O the/O
government/O clerk/O gets/O hot/O and/O red/O,/O and/O his/O sausages/O stand/O on/O end/O with/O
wrath/O,/O and/O once/O more/O I/O launch/O out/O into/O diplomatic/O wiles/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O he/O must/O tell/O you/O this/O story/O!/O''/O said/O Betsy/PERSON,/O laughing/O,/O to/O a/O lady/O who/O
came/O into/O her/O box/O./O ``/OHe/O has/O been/O making/O me/O laugh/O so/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O _/Obonne/O chance/O_/O!/O''/O she/O added/O,/O giving/O Vronsky/O one/O finger/O of/O the/O hand/O
in/O which/O she/O held/O her/O fan/O,/O and/O with/O a/O shrug/O of/O her/O shoulders/O she/O
twitched/O down/O the/O bodice/O of/O her/O gown/O that/O had/O worked/O up/O,/O so/O as/O to/O be/O
duly/O naked/O as/O she/O moved/O forward/O towards/O the/O footlights/O into/O the/O light/O of/O
the/O gas/O,/O and/O the/O sight/O of/O all/O eyes/O./O

Vronsky/O drove/O to/O the/O French/O theater/O,/O where/O he/O really/O had/O to/O see/O the/O
colonel/O of/O his/O regiment/O,/O who/O never/O missed/O a/O single/O performance/O there/O./O He/O
wanted/O to/O see/O him/O,/O to/O report/O on/O the/O result/O of/O his/O mediation/O,/O which/O had/O
occupied/O and/O amused/O him/O for/O the/O last/O three/O days/O./O Petritsky/PERSON,/O whom/O he/O
liked/O,/O was/O implicated/O in/O the/O affair/O,/O and/O the/O other/O culprit/O was/O a/O capital/O
fellow/O and/O first-rate/O comrade/O,/O who/O had/O lately/O joined/O the/O regiment/O,/O the/O
young/O Prince/PERSON Kedrov/PERSON./O And/O what/O was/O most/O important/O,/O the/O interests/O of/O the/O
regiment/O were/O involved/O in/O it/O too/O./O

Both/O the/O young/O men/O were/O in/O Vronsky/O's/O company/O./O The/O colonel/O of/O the/O
regiment/O was/O waited/O upon/O by/O the/O government/O clerk/O,/O Venden/PERSON,/O with/O a/O
complaint/O against/O his/O officers/O,/O who/O had/O insulted/O his/O wife/O./O His/O young/O
wife/O,/O so/O Venden/PERSON told/O the/O story/O--/Ohe/O had/O been/O married/O half/O a/O year/O--/Owas/O at/O
church/O with/O her/O mother/O,/O and/O suddenly/O overcome/O by/O indisposition/O,/O arising/O
from/O her/O interesting/O condition/O,/O she/O could/O not/O remain/O standing/O,/O she/O drove/O
home/O in/O the/O first/O sledge/O,/O a/O smart-looking/O one/O,/O she/O came/O across/O./O On/O the/O
spot/O the/O officers/O set/O off/O in/O pursuit/O of/O her/O;/O she/O was/O alarmed/O,/O and/O
feeling/O still/O more/O unwell/O,/O ran/O up/O the/O staircase/O home/O./O Venden/O himself/O,/O on/O
returning/O from/O his/O office/O,/O heard/O a/O ring/O at/O their/O bell/O and/O voices/O,/O went/O
out/O,/O and/O seeing/O the/O intoxicated/O officers/O with/O a/O letter/O,/O he/O had/O turned/O
them/O out/O./O He/O asked/O for/O exemplary/O punishment/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O all/O very/O well/O,/O''/O said/O the/O colonel/O to/O Vronsky/O,/O whom/O he/O had/O
invited/O to/O come/O and/O see/O him/O./O ``/OPetritsky/O's/O becoming/O impossible/O./O Not/O a/O
week/O goes/O by/O without/O some/O scandal/O./O This/O government/O clerk/O wo/On't/O let/O it/O
drop/O,/O he/O'll/O go/O on/O with/O the/O thing/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O saw/O all/O the/O thanklessness/O of/O the/O business/O,/O and/O that/O there/O could/O
be/O no/O question/O of/O a/O duel/O in/O it/O,/O that/O everything/O must/O be/O done/O to/O soften/O
the/O government/O clerk/O,/O and/O hush/O the/O matter/O up/O./O The/O colonel/O had/O called/O in/O
Vronsky/O just/O because/O he/O knew/O him/O to/O be/O an/O honorable/O and/O intelligent/O man/O,/O
and/O,/O more/O than/O all/O,/O a/O man/O who/O cared/O for/O the/O honor/O of/O the/O regiment/O./O They/O
talked/O it/O over/O,/O and/O decided/O that/O Petritsky/PERSON and/O Kedrov/PERSON must/O go/O with/O
Vronsky/O to/O Venden/LOCATION's/O to/O apologize/O./O The/O colonel/O and/O Vronsky/PERSON were/O both/O
fully/O aware/O that/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O name/O and/O rank/O would/O be/O sure/O to/O contribute/O
greatly/O to/O the/O softening/O of/O the/O injured/O husband/O's/O feelings/O./O

And/O these/O two/O influences/O were/O not/O in/O fact/O without/O effect/O;/O though/O the/O
result/O remained/O,/O as/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O described/O,/O uncertain/O./O

On/O reaching/O the/O French/O theater/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON retired/O to/O the/O foyer/O with/O the/O
colonel/O,/O and/O reported/O to/O him/O his/O success/O,/O or/O non-success/O./O The/O colonel/O,/O
thinking/O it/O all/O over/O,/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O not/O to/O pursue/O the/O matter/O further/O,/O
but/O then/O for/O his/O own/O satisfaction/O proceeded/O to/O cross-examine/O Vronsky/PERSON
about/O his/O interview/O;/O and/O it/O was/O a/O long/O while/O before/O he/O could/O restrain/O
his/O laughter/O,/O as/O Vronsky/PERSON described/O how/O the/O government/O clerk/O,/O after/O
subsiding/O for/O a/O while/O,/O would/O suddenly/O flare/O up/O again/O,/O as/O he/O recalled/O the/O
details/O,/O and/O how/O Vronsky/O,/O at/O the/O last/O half/O word/O of/O conciliation/O,/O
skillfully/O maneuvered/O a/O retreat/O,/O shoving/O Petritsky/PERSON out/O before/O him/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O a/O disgraceful/O story/O,/O but/O killing/O./O Kedrov/PERSON really/O ca/On't/O fight/O the/O
gentleman/O!/O Was/O he/O so/O awfully/O hot/O?/O''/O he/O commented/O,/O laughing/O./O ``/OBut/O what/O do/O
you/O say/O to/O Claire/PERSON today/O?/O She/O's/O marvelous/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O speaking/O of/O a/O new/O
French/O actress/O./O ``/OHowever/O often/O you/O see/O her/O,/O every/O day/O she/O's/O different/O./O
It/O's/O only/O the/O French/O who/O can/O do/O that/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 6/O


Princess/O Betsy/PERSON drove/O home/O from/O the/O theater/O,/O without/O waiting/O for/O the/O end/O
of/O the/O last/O act/O./O She/O had/O only/O just/O time/O to/O go/O into/O her/O dressing/O room/O,/O
sprinkle/O her/O long/O,/O pale/O face/O with/O powder/O,/O rub/O it/O,/O set/O her/O dress/O to/O
rights/O,/O and/O order/O tea/O in/O the/O big/O drawing/O room/O,/O when/O one/O after/O another/O
carriages/O drove/O up/O to/O her/O huge/O house/O in/O Bolshaia/LOCATION Morskaia/LOCATION./O Her/O guests/O
stepped/O out/O at/O the/O wide/O entrance/O,/O and/O the/O stout/O porter/O,/O who/O used/O to/O read/O
the/O newspapers/O in/O the/O mornings/O behind/O the/O glass/O door/O,/O to/O the/O edification/O
of/O the/O passers-by/O,/O noiselessly/O opened/O the/O immense/O door/O,/O letting/O the/O
visitors/O pass/O by/O him/O into/O the/O house/O./O

Almost/O at/O the/O same/O instant/O the/O hostess/O,/O with/O freshly/O arranged/O coiffure/O
and/O freshened/O face/O,/O walked/O in/O at/O one/O door/O and/O her/O guests/O at/O the/O other/O
door/O of/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O a/O large/O room/O with/O dark/O walls/O,/O downy/O rugs/O,/O and/O
a/O brightly/O lighted/O table/O,/O gleaming/O with/O the/O light/O of/O candles/O,/O white/O
cloth/O,/O silver/O samovar/O,/O and/O transparent/O china/O tea/O things/O./O

The/O hostess/O sat/O down/O at/O the/O table/O and/O took/O off/O her/O gloves/O./O Chairs/O were/O
set/O with/O the/O aid/O of/O footmen/O,/O moving/O almost/O imperceptibly/O about/O the/O room/O;/O
the/O party/O settled/O itself/O,/O divided/O into/O two/O groups/O:/O one/O round/O the/O samovar/O
near/O the/O hostess/O,/O the/O other/O at/O the/O opposite/O end/O of/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O
round/O the/O handsome/O wife/O of/O an/O ambassador/O,/O in/O black/O velvet/O,/O with/O sharply/O
defined/O black/O eyebrows/O./O In/O both/O groups/O conversation/O wavered/O,/O as/O it/O
always/O does/O,/O for/O the/O first/O few/O minutes/O,/O broken/O up/O by/O meetings/O,/O
greetings/O,/O offers/O of/O tea/O,/O and/O as/O it/O were/O,/O feeling/O about/O for/O something/O to/O
rest/O upon/O./O

``/OShe/O's/O exceptionally/O good/O as/O an/O actress/O;/O one/O can/O see/O she/O's/O studied/O
Kaulbach/PERSON,/O''/O said/O a/O diplomatic/O attache/O in/O the/O group/O round/O the/O ambassador/O's/O
wife/O./O ``/ODid/O you/O notice/O how/O she/O fell/O down/O?/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O please/O,/O do/On't/O let/O us/O talk/O about/O Nilsson/PERSON!/O No/O one/O can/O possibly/O say/O
anything/O new/O about/O her/O,/O''/O said/O a/O fat/O,/O red-faced/O,/O flaxen-headed/O lady/O,/O
without/O eyebrows/O and/O chignon/O,/O wearing/O an/O old/O silk/O dress/O./O This/O was/O
Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON,/O noted/O for/O her/O simplicity/O and/O the/O roughness/O of/O her/O
manners/O,/O and/O nicknamed/O _/Oenfant/O terrible/O_/O./O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON,/O sitting/O in/O
the/O middle/O between/O the/O two/O groups/O,/O and/O listening/O to/O both/O,/O took/O part/O in/O
the/O conversation/O first/O of/O one/O and/O then/O of/O the/O other/O./O ``/OThree/O people/O have/O
used/O that/O very/O phrase/O about/O Kaulbach/O to/O me/O today/O already/O,/O just/O as/O though/O
they/O had/O made/O a/O compact/O about/O it/O./O And/O I/O ca/On't/O see/O why/O they/O liked/O that/O
remark/O so/O./O''/O

The/O conversation/O was/O cut/O short/O by/O this/O observation/O,/O and/O a/O new/O subject/O
had/O to/O be/O thought/O of/O again/O./O

``/ODo/O tell/O me/O something/O amusing/O but/O not/O spiteful/O,/O''/O said/O the/O ambassador/O's/O
wife/O,/O a/O great/O proficient/O in/O the/O art/O of/O that/O elegant/O conversation/O called/O
by/O the/O English/O,/O _/Osmall/O talk/O_/O./O She/O addressed/O the/O attache/O,/O who/O was/O at/O a/O
loss/O now/O what/O to/O begin/O upon/O./O

``/OThey/O say/O that/O that/O's/O a/O difficult/O task/O,/O that/O nothing/O's/O amusing/O that/O
is/On't/O spiteful/O,/O''/O he/O began/O with/O a/O smile/O./O ``/OBut/O I/O'll/O try/O./O Get/O me/O a/O subject/O./O
It/O all/O lies/O in/O the/O subject/O./O If/O a/O subject/O's/O given/O me/O,/O it/O's/O easy/O to/O spin/O
something/O round/O it/O./O I/O often/O think/O that/O the/O celebrated/O talkers/O of/O the/O
last/O century/O would/O have/O found/O it/O difficult/O to/O talk/O cleverly/O now/O./O
Everything/O clever/O is/O so/O stale/O.../O''/O

``/OThat/O has/O been/O said/O long/O ago/O,/O''/O the/O ambassador/O's/O wife/O interrupted/O him/O,/O
laughing/O./O

The/O conversation/O began/O amiably/O,/O but/O just/O because/O it/O was/O too/O amiable/O,/O it/O
came/O to/O a/O stop/O again/O./O They/O had/O to/O have/O recourse/O to/O the/O sure/O,/O
never-failing/O topic/O--/Ogossip/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O you/O think/O there/O's/O something/O Louis/PERSON Quinze/PERSON about/O Tushkevitch/PERSON?/O''/O he/O
said/O,/O glancing/O towards/O a/O handsome/O,/O fair-haired/O young/O man/O,/O standing/O at/O
the/O table/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O!/O He/O's/O in/O the/O same/O style/O as/O the/O drawing/O room/O and/O that/O's/O why/O it/O
is/O he/O's/O so/O often/O here/O./O''/O

This/O conversation/O was/O maintained/O,/O since/O it/O rested/O on/O allusions/O to/O what/O
could/O not/O be/O talked/O of/O in/O that/O room/O--/Othat/O is/O to/O say/O,/O of/O the/O relations/O of/O
Tushkevitch/LOCATION with/O their/O hostess/O./O

Round/O the/O samovar/O and/O the/O hostess/O the/O conversation/O had/O been/O meanwhile/O
vacillating/O in/O just/O the/O same/O way/O between/O three/O inevitable/O topics/O:/O the/O
