latest/O piece/O of/O public/O news/O,/O the/O theater/O,/O and/O scandal/O./O It/O,/O too/O,/O came/O
finally/O to/O rest/O on/O the/O last/O topic/O,/O that/O is/O,/O ill-natured/O gossip/O./O

``/OHave/O you/O heard/O the/O Maltishtcheva/O woman/O--/Othe/O mother/O,/O not/O the/O daughter/O--/Ohas/O
ordered/O a/O costume/O in/O _/Odiable/O rose/O_/O color/O?/O''/O

``/ONonsense/O!/O No/O,/O that/O's/O too/O lovely/O!/O''/O

``/OI/O wonder/O that/O with/O her/O sense/O--/Ofor/O she/O's/O not/O a/O fool/O,/O you/O know/O--/Othat/O she/O
does/On't/O see/O how/O funny/O she/O is/O./O''/O

Everyone/O had/O something/O to/O say/O in/O censure/O or/O ridicule/O of/O the/O luckless/O
Madame/PERSON Maltishtcheva/PERSON,/O and/O the/O conversation/O crackled/O merrily/O,/O like/O a/O
burning/O faggot-stack/O./O

The/O husband/O of/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON,/O a/O good-natured/O fat/O man/O,/O an/O ardent/O
collector/O of/O engravings/O,/O hearing/O that/O his/O wife/O had/O visitors/O,/O came/O into/O
the/O drawing/O room/O before/O going/O to/O his/O club/O./O Stepping/O noiselessly/O over/O the/O
thick/O rugs/O,/O he/O went/O up/O to/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON./O

``/OHow/O did/O you/O like/O Nilsson/PERSON?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O how/O can/O you/O steal/O upon/O anyone/O like/O that/O!/O How/O you/O startled/O me/O!/O''/O she/O
responded/O./O ``/OPlease/O do/On't/O talk/O to/O me/O about/O the/O opera/O;/O you/O know/O nothing/O
about/O music/O./O I/O'd/O better/O meet/O you/O on/O your/O own/O ground/O,/O and/O talk/O about/O your/O
majolica/O and/O engravings/O./O Come/O now/O,/O what/O treasure/O have/O you/O been/O buying/O
lately/O at/O the/O old/O curiosity/O shops/O?/O''/O

``/OWould/O you/O like/O me/O to/O show/O you/O?/O But/O you/O do/On't/O understand/O such/O things/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O do/O show/O me/O!/O I/O've/O been/O learning/O about/O them/O at/O those/O--/Owhat/O's/O their/O
names/O?/O.../O the/O bankers/O .../O they/O've/O some/O splendid/O engravings/O./O They/O showed/O
them/O to/O us/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O have/O you/O been/O at/O the/O Schützburgs/O?/O''/O asked/O the/O hostess/O from/O the/O
samovar/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O _/Oma/O chère/O_/O./O They/O asked/O my/O husband/O and/O me/O to/O dinner/O,/O and/O told/O us/O
the/O sauce/O at/O that/O dinner/O cost/O a/O hundred/O pounds/O,/O''/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON said/O,/O
speaking/O loudly/O,/O and/O conscious/O everyone/O was/O listening/O;/O ``/Oand/O very/O nasty/O
sauce/O it/O was/O,/O some/O green/O mess/O./O We/O had/O to/O ask/O them/O,/O and/O I/O made/O them/O sauce/O
for/O eighteen/O pence/O,/O and/O everybody/O was/O very/O much/O pleased/O with/O it/O./O I/O ca/On't/O
run/O to/O hundred-pound/O sauces/O./O''/O

``/OShe/O's/O unique/O!/O''/O said/O the/O lady/O of/O the/O house/O./O

``/OMarvelous/O!/O''/O said/O someone/O./O

The/O sensation/O produced/O by/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON's/O speeches/O was/O always/O unique/O,/O
and/O the/O secret/O of/O the/O sensation/O she/O produced/O lay/O in/O the/O fact/O that/O though/O
she/O spoke/O not/O always/O appropriately/O,/O as/O now/O,/O she/O said/O simple/O things/O with/O
some/O sense/O in/O them/O./O In/O the/O society/O in/O which/O she/O lived/O such/O plain/O
statements/O produced/O the/O effect/O of/O the/O wittiest/O epigram/O./O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON
could/O never/O see/O why/O it/O had/O that/O effect/O,/O but/O she/O knew/O it/O had/O,/O and/O took/O
advantage/O of/O it/O./O

As/O everyone/O had/O been/O listening/O while/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON spoke/O,/O and/O so/O the/O
conversation/O around/O the/O ambassador/O's/O wife/O had/O dropped/O,/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON
tried/O to/O bring/O the/O whole/O party/O together/O,/O and/O turned/O to/O the/O ambassador/O's/O
wife/O./O

``/OWill/O you/O really/O not/O have/O tea/O?/O You/O should/O come/O over/O here/O by/O us/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O we/O're/O very/O happy/O here/O,/O''/O the/O ambassador/O's/O wife/O responded/O with/O a/O
smile/O,/O and/O she/O went/O on/O with/O the/O conversation/O that/O had/O been/O begun/O./O

It/O was/O a/O very/O agreeable/O conversation/O./O They/O were/O criticizing/O the/O
Karenins/LOCATION,/O husband/O and/O wife/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON is/O quite/O changed/O since/O her/O stay/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION./O There/O's/O something/O
strange/O about/O her/O,/O''/O said/O her/O friend/O./O

``/OThe/O great/O change/O is/O that/O she/O brought/O back/O with/O her/O the/O shadow/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Vronsky/PERSON,/O''/O said/O the/O ambassador/O's/O wife/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O of/O it/O?/O There/O's/O a/O fable/O of/O Grimm/PERSON's/O about/O a/O man/O without/O a/O
shadow/O,/O a/O man/O who/O's/O lost/O his/O shadow/O./O And/O that/O's/O his/O punishment/O for/O
something/O./O I/O never/O could/O understand/O how/O it/O was/O a/O punishment/O./O But/O a/O woman/O
must/O dislike/O being/O without/O a/O shadow/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O women/O with/O a/O shadow/O usually/O come/O to/O a/O bad/O end/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON's/O
friend/O./O

``/OBad/O luck/O to/O your/O tongue/O!/O''/O said/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON suddenly/O./O ``/OMadame/O
Karenina/PERSON's/O a/O splendid/O woman/O./O I/O do/On't/O like/O her/O husband/O,/O but/O I/O like/O her/O
very/O much/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O do/On't/O you/O like/O her/O husband/O?/O He/O's/O such/O a/O remarkable/O man/O,/O''/O said/O the/O
ambassador/O's/O wife/O./O ``/OMy/O husband/O says/O there/O are/O few/O statesmen/O like/O him/O in/O
Europe/LOCATION./O''/O

``/OAnd/O my/O husband/O tells/O me/O just/O the/O same/O,/O but/O I/O do/On't/O believe/O it/O,/O''/O said/O
Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON./O ``/OIf/O our/O husbands/O did/On't/O talk/O to/O us/O,/O we/O should/O see/O the/O
facts/O as/O they/O are/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O to/O my/O thinking/O,/O is/O simply/O a/O
fool/O./O I/O say/O it/O in/O a/O whisper/O .../O but/O does/On't/O it/O really/O make/O everything/O
clear/O?/O Before/O,/O when/O I/O was/O told/O to/O consider/O him/O clever/O,/O I/O kept/O looking/O
for/O his/O ability/O,/O and/O thought/O myself/O a/O fool/O for/O not/O seeing/O it/O;/O but/O
directly/O I/O said/O,/O _/Ohe/O's/O a/O fool/O,/O_/O though/O only/O in/O a/O whisper/O,/O everything/O's/O
explained/O,/O is/On't/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OHow/O spiteful/O you/O are/O today/O!/O''/O

``/ONot/O a/O bit/O./O I/O'd/O no/O other/O way/O out/O of/O it/O./O One/O of/O the/O two/O had/O to/O be/O a/O fool/O./O
And/O,/O well/O,/O you/O know/O one/O ca/On't/O say/O that/O of/O oneself/O./O''/O

''/O`/ONo/O one/O is/O satisfied/O with/O his/O fortune/O,/O and/O everyone/O is/O satisfied/O with/O
his/O wit/O./O'/O''/O The/O attaché/O repeated/O the/O French/O saying/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O just/O it/O,/O just/O it/O,/O''/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON turned/O to/O him/O./O ``/OBut/O the/O
point/O is/O that/O I/O wo/On't/O abandon/O Anna/PERSON to/O your/O mercies/O./O She/O's/O so/O nice/O,/O so/O
charming/O./O How/O can/O she/O help/O it/O if/O they/O're/O all/O in/O love/O with/O her/O,/O and/O
follow/O her/O about/O like/O shadows/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O had/O no/O idea/O of/O blaming/O her/O for/O it/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON's/O friend/O said/O in/O
self-defense/O./O

``/OIf/O no/O one/O follows/O us/O about/O like/O a/O shadow/O,/O that/O's/O no/O proof/O that/O we/O've/O
any/O right/O to/O blame/O her/O./O''/O

And/O having/O duly/O disposed/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O friend/O,/O the/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON got/O up/O,/O
and/O together/O with/O the/O ambassador/O's/O wife/O,/O joined/O the/O group/O at/O the/O table/O,/O
where/O the/O conversation/O was/O dealing/O with/O the/O king/O of/O Prussia/LOCATION./O

``/OWhat/O wicked/O gossip/O were/O you/O talking/O over/O there/O?/O''/O asked/O Betsy/PERSON./O

``/OAbout/O the/O Karenins/O./O The/O princess/O gave/O us/O a/O sketch/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O''/O said/O the/O ambassador/O's/O wife/O with/O a/O smile/O,/O as/O she/O sat/O
down/O at/O the/O table/O./O

``/OPity/O we/O did/On't/O hear/O it/O!/O''/O said/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON,/O glancing/O towards/O the/O
door/O./O ``/OAh/O,/O here/O you/O are/O at/O last/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O turning/O with/O a/O smile/O to/O
Vronsky/O,/O as/O he/O came/O in/O./O

Vronsky/O was/O not/O merely/O acquainted/O with/O all/O the/O persons/O whom/O he/O was/O
meeting/O here/O;/O he/O saw/O them/O all/O every/O day/O;/O and/O so/O he/O came/O in/O with/O the/O
quiet/O manner/O with/O which/O one/O enters/O a/O room/O full/O of/O people/O from/O whom/O one/O
has/O only/O just/O parted/O./O

``/OWhere/O do/O I/O come/O from/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O in/O answer/O to/O a/O question/O from/O the/O
ambassador/O's/O wife/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O there/O's/O no/O help/O for/O it/O,/O I/O must/O confess/O./O From/O
the/O _/Oopera/O bouffé/O_/O./O I/O do/O believe/O I/O've/O seen/O it/O a/O hundred/O times/O,/O and/O
always/O with/O fresh/O enjoyment/O./O It/O's/O exquisite/O!/O I/O know/O it/O's/O disgraceful/O,/O
but/O I/O go/O to/O sleep/O at/O the/O opera/O,/O and/O I/O sit/O out/O the/O _/Oopera/O bouffé/O_/O to/O the/O
last/O minute/O,/O and/O enjoy/O it/O./O This/O evening/O.../O''/O

He/O mentioned/O a/O French/O actress/O,/O and/O was/O going/O to/O tell/O something/O about/O
her/O;/O but/O the/O ambassador/O's/O wife/O,/O with/O playful/O horror/O,/O cut/O him/O short/O./O

``/OPlease/O do/On't/O tell/O us/O about/O that/O horror/O./O''/O

``/OAll/O right/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O especially/O as/O everyone/O knows/O those/O horrors/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O we/O should/O all/O go/O to/O see/O them/O if/O it/O were/O accepted/O as/O the/O correct/O
thing/O,/O like/O the/O opera/O,/O''/O chimed/O in/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON./O



Chapter/O 7/O


Steps/O were/O heard/O at/O the/O door/O,/O and/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON,/O knowing/O it/O was/O Madame/O
Karenina/PERSON,/O glanced/O at/O Vronsky/O./O He/O was/O looking/O towards/O the/O door/O,/O and/O his/O
face/O wore/O a/O strange/O new/O expression/O./O Joyfully/O,/O intently/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O
time/O timidly/O,/O he/O gazed/O at/O the/O approaching/O figure/O,/O and/O slowly/O he/O rose/O to/O
his/O feet/O./O Anna/PERSON walked/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O Holding/O herself/O extremely/O
erect/O,/O as/O always/O,/O looking/O straight/O before/O her/O,/O and/O moving/O with/O her/O
swift/O,/O resolute/O,/O and/O light/O step/O,/O that/O distinguished/O her/O from/O all/O other/O
society/O women/O,/O she/O crossed/O the/O short/O space/O to/O her/O hostess/O,/O shook/O hands/O
with/O her/O,/O smiled/O,/O and/O with/O the/O same/O smile/O looked/O around/O at/O Vronsky/O./O
Vronsky/O bowed/O low/O and/O pushed/O a/O chair/O up/O for/O her/O./O

She/O acknowledged/O this/O only/O by/O a/O slight/O nod/O,/O flushed/O a/O little/O,/O and/O
frowned/O./O But/O immediately/O,/O while/O rapidly/O greeting/O her/O acquaintances/O,/O and/O
shaking/O the/O hands/O proffered/O to/O her/O,/O she/O addressed/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON:/O

``/OI/O have/O been/O at/O Countess/ORGANIZATION Lidia/ORGANIZATION's/O,/O and/O meant/O to/O have/O come/O here/O earlier/O,/O
but/O I/O stayed/O on/O./O Sir/O John/PERSON was/O there/O./O He/O's/O very/O interesting/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O that/O's/O this/O missionary/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O;/O he/O told/O us/O about/O the/O life/O in/O India/LOCATION,/O most/O interesting/O things/O./O''/O

The/O conversation/O,/O interrupted/O by/O her/O coming/O in/O,/O flickered/O up/O again/O like/O
the/O light/O of/O a/O lamp/O being/O blown/O out/O./O

``/OSir/O John/PERSON!/O Yes/O,/O Sir/O John/PERSON;/O I/O've/O seen/O him/O./O He/O speaks/O well/O./O The/O Vlassieva/O
girl/O's/O quite/O in/O love/O with/O him/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O is/O it/O true/O the/O younger/O Vlassieva/PERSON girl/O's/O to/O marry/O Topov/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O they/O say/O it/O's/O quite/O a/O settled/O thing/O./O''/O

``/OI/O wonder/O at/O the/O parents/O!/O They/O say/O it/O's/O a/O marriage/O for/O love/O./O''/O

``/OFor/O love/O?/O What/O antediluvian/O notions/O you/O have/O!/O Can/O one/O talk/O of/O love/O in/O
these/O days/O?/O''/O said/O the/O ambassador/O's/O wife/O./O

``/OWhat/O's/O to/O be/O done/O?/O It/O's/O a/O foolish/O old/O fashion/O that/O's/O kept/O up/O still/O,/O''/O
said/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OSo/O much/O the/O worse/O for/O those/O who/O keep/O up/O the/O fashion/O./O The/O only/O happy/O
marriages/O I/O know/O are/O marriages/O of/O prudence/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O then/O how/O often/O the/O happiness/O of/O these/O prudent/O marriages/O flies/O
away/O like/O dust/O just/O because/O that/O passion/O turns/O up/O that/O they/O have/O refused/O
to/O recognize/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OBut/O by/O marriages/O of/O prudence/O we/O mean/O those/O in/O which/O both/O parties/O have/O
sown/O their/O wild/O oats/O already/O./O That/O's/O like/O scarlatina/O--/Oone/O has/O to/O go/O
through/O it/O and/O get/O it/O over/O./O''/O

``/OThen/O they/O ought/O to/O find/O out/O how/O to/O vaccinate/O for/O love/O,/O like/O smallpox/O./O''/O

``/OI/O was/O in/O love/O in/O my/O young/O days/O with/O a/O deacon/O,/O''/O said/O the/O Princess/O
Myakaya/PERSON./O ``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O that/O it/O did/O me/O any/O good/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O I/O imagine/O,/O joking/O apart/O,/O that/O to/O know/O love/O,/O one/O must/O make/O mistakes/O
and/O then/O correct/O them/O,/O''/O said/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON./O

``/OEven/O after/O marriage/O?/O''/O said/O the/O ambassador/O's/O wife/O playfully/O./O

''/O`/OIt/O's/O never/O too/O late/O to/O mend/O./O'/O''/O The/O attaché/O repeated/O the/O English/O
proverb/O./O

``/OJust/O so/O,/O''/O Betsy/PERSON agreed/O;/O ``/Oone/O must/O make/O mistakes/O and/O correct/O them/O./O What/O
do/O you/O think/O about/O it/O?/O''/O she/O turned/O to/O Anna/PERSON,/O who/O,/O with/O a/O faintly/O
perceptible/O resolute/O smile/O on/O her/O lips/O,/O was/O listening/O in/O silence/O to/O the/O
conversation/O./O

``/OI/O think/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O playing/O with/O the/O glove/O she/O had/O taken/O off/O,/O ``/OI/O think/O
.../O of/O so/O many/O men/O,/O so/O many/O minds/O,/O certainly/O so/O many/O hearts/O,/O so/O many/O
kinds/O of/O love/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O was/O gazing/O at/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O with/O a/O fainting/O heart/O waiting/O for/O what/O
she/O would/O say/O./O He/O sighed/O as/O after/O a/O danger/O escaped/O when/O she/O uttered/O
these/O words/O./O

Anna/PERSON suddenly/O turned/O to/O him/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O have/O had/O a/O letter/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION./O They/O write/O me/O that/O Kitty/PERSON
Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON's/O very/O ill/O./O''/O

``/OReally/O?/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O knitting/O his/O brows/O./O

Anna/PERSON looked/O sternly/O at/O him/O./O

``/OThat/O does/On't/O interest/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OOn/O the/O contrary/O,/O it/O does/O,/O very/O much/O./O What/O was/O it/O exactly/O they/O told/O you/O,/O
if/O I/O may/O know/O?/O''/O he/O questioned/O./O

Anna/PERSON got/O up/O and/O went/O to/O Betsy/PERSON./O

``/OGive/O me/O a/O cup/O of/O tea/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O standing/O at/O her/O table/O./O

While/O Betsy/PERSON was/O pouring/O out/O the/O tea/O,/O Vronsky/O went/O up/O to/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O they/O write/O to/O you/O?/O''/O he/O repeated/O./O

``/OI/O often/O think/O men/O have/O no/O understanding/O of/O what/O's/O not/O honorable/O though/O
they/O're/O always/O talking/O of/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O without/O answering/O him/O./O ``/OI/O've/O
wanted/O to/O tell/O you/O so/O a/O long/O while/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O and/O moving/O a/O few/O steps/O
away/O,/O she/O sat/O down/O at/O a/O table/O in/O a/O corner/O covered/O with/O albums/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O quite/O understand/O the/O meaning/O of/O your/O words/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O handing/O
her/O the/O cup/O./O

She/O glanced/O towards/O the/O sofa/O beside/O her/O,/O and/O he/O instantly/O sat/O down/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O have/O been/O wanting/O to/O tell/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O not/O looking/O at/O him/O./O
``/OYou/O behaved/O wrongly/O,/O very/O wrongly/O./O''/O

``/ODo/O you/O suppose/O I/O do/On't/O know/O that/O I/O've/O acted/O wrongly/O?/O But/O who/O was/O the/O
cause/O of/O my/O doing/O so/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O say/O that/O to/O me/O for/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O glancing/O severely/O at/O him/O./O

``/OYou/O know/O what/O for/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O boldly/O and/O joyfully/O,/O meeting/O her/O glance/O
and/O not/O dropping/O his/O eyes/O./O

Not/O he/O,/O but/O she/O,/O was/O confused/O./O

``/OThat/O only/O shows/O you/O have/O no/O heart/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O But/O her/O eyes/O said/O that/O
she/O knew/O he/O had/O a/O heart/O,/O and/O that/O was/O why/O she/O was/O afraid/O of/O him/O./O

``/OWhat/O you/O spoke/O of/O just/O now/O was/O a/O mistake/O,/O and/O not/O love/O./O''/O

``/ORemember/O that/O I/O have/O forbidden/O you/O to/O utter/O that/O word/O,/O that/O hateful/O
word/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O with/O a/O shudder/O./O But/O at/O once/O she/O felt/O that/O by/O that/O very/O
word/O ``/Oforbidden/O''/O she/O had/O shown/O that/O she/O acknowledged/O certain/O rights/O over/O
him/O,/O and/O by/O that/O very/O fact/O was/O encouraging/O him/O to/O speak/O of/O love/O./O ``/OI/O have/O
long/O meant/O to/O tell/O you/O this/O,/O''/O she/O went/O on/O,/O looking/O resolutely/O into/O his/O
eyes/O,/O and/O hot/O all/O over/O from/O the/O burning/O flush/O on/O her/O cheeks/O./O ``/OI/O've/O come/O
on/O purpose/O this/O evening/O,/O knowing/O I/O should/O meet/O you/O./O I/O have/O come/O to/O tell/O
you/O that/O this/O must/O end/O./O I/O have/O never/O blushed/O before/O anyone/O,/O and/O you/O
force/O me/O to/O feel/O to/O blame/O for/O something/O./O''/O

He/O looked/O at/O her/O and/O was/O struck/O by/O a/O new/O spiritual/O beauty/O in/O her/O face/O./O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O wish/O of/O me/O?/O''/O he/O said/O simply/O and/O seriously/O./O

``/OI/O want/O you/O to/O go/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION and/O ask/O for/O Kitty/PERSON's/O forgiveness/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O wish/O that/O?/O''/O he/O said/O./O

He/O saw/O she/O was/O saying/O what/O she/O forced/O herself/O to/O say/O,/O not/O what/O she/O
wanted/O to/O say/O./O

``/OIf/O you/O love/O me/O,/O as/O you/O say/O,/O''/O she/O whispered/O,/O ``/Odo/O so/O that/O I/O may/O be/O at/O
peace/O./O''/O

His/O face/O grew/O radiant/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O you/O know/O that/O you/O're/O all/O my/O life/O to/O me/O?/O But/O I/O know/O no/O peace/O,/O and/O
I/O ca/On't/O give/O it/O to/O you/O;/O all/O myself/O--/Oand/O love/O .../O yes/O./O I/O ca/On't/O think/O of/O
you/O and/O myself/O apart/O./O You/O and/O I/O are/O one/O to/O me/O./O And/O I/O see/O no/O chance/O
before/O us/O of/O peace/O for/O me/O or/O for/O you/O./O I/O see/O a/O chance/O of/O despair/O,/O of/O
wretchedness/O .../O or/O I/O see/O a/O chance/O of/O bliss/O,/O what/O bliss/O!/O.../O Can/O it/O be/O
there/O's/O no/O chance/O of/O it/O?/O''/O he/O murmured/O with/O his/O lips/O;/O but/O she/O heard/O./O

She/O strained/O every/O effort/O of/O her/O mind/O to/O say/O what/O ought/O to/O be/O said/O./O But/O
instead/O of/O that/O she/O let/O her/O eyes/O rest/O on/O him/O,/O full/O of/O love/O,/O and/O made/O no/O
answer/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O come/O!/O''/O he/O thought/O in/O ecstasy/O./O ``/OWhen/O I/O was/O beginning/O to/O despair/O,/O
and/O it/O seemed/O there/O would/O be/O no/O end/O--/Oit/O's/O come/O!/O She/O loves/O me/O!/O She/O owns/O
it/O!/O''/O

``/OThen/O do/O this/O for/O me/O:/O never/O say/O such/O things/O to/O me/O,/O and/O let/O us/O be/O
friends/O,/O''/O she/O said/O in/O words/O;/O but/O her/O eyes/O spoke/O quite/O differently/O./O

``/OFriends/O we/O shall/O never/O be/O,/O you/O know/O that/O yourself/O./O Whether/O we/O shall/O be/O
the/O happiest/O or/O the/O wretchedest/O of/O people/O--/Othat/O's/O in/O your/O hands/O./O''/O

She/O would/O have/O said/O something/O,/O but/O he/O interrupted/O her/O./O

``/OI/O ask/O one/O thing/O only/O:/O I/O ask/O for/O the/O right/O to/O hope/O,/O to/O suffer/O as/O I/O do/O./O
But/O if/O even/O that/O can/Onot/O be/O,/O command/O me/O to/O disappear/O,/O and/O I/O disappear/O./O
You/O shall/O not/O see/O me/O if/O my/O presence/O is/O distasteful/O to/O you/O./O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O want/O to/O drive/O you/O away/O./O''/O

``/OOnly/O do/On't/O change/O anything/O,/O leave/O everything/O as/O it/O is/O,/O''/O he/O said/O in/O a/O
shaky/O voice/O./O ``/OHere/O's/O your/O husband/O./O''/O

At/O that/O instant/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON did/O in/O fact/O walk/O into/O the/O room/O
with/O his/O calm/O,/O awkward/O gait/O./O

Glancing/O at/O his/O wife/O and/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O he/O went/O up/O to/O the/O lady/O of/O the/O house/O,/O
and/O sitting/O down/O for/O a/O cup/O of/O tea/O,/O began/O talking/O in/O his/O deliberate/O,/O
always/O audible/O voice/O,/O in/O his/O habitual/O tone/O of/O banter/O,/O ridiculing/O
someone/O./O

``/OYour/O Rambouillet/O is/O in/O full/O conclave/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O round/O at/O all/O
the/O party/O;/O ``/Othe/O graces/O and/O the/O muses/O./O''/O

But/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON could/O not/O endure/O that/O tone/O of/O his/O--/O``/Osneering/O,/O''/O as/O she/O
called/O it/O,/O using/O the/O English/O word/O,/O and/O like/O a/O skillful/O hostess/O she/O at/O
once/O brought/O him/O into/O a/O serious/O conversation/O on/O the/O subject/O of/O universal/O
conscription/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O immediately/O interested/O in/O the/O
subject/O,/O and/O began/O seriously/O defending/O the/O new/O imperial/O decree/O against/O
Princess/O Betsy/PERSON,/O who/O had/O attacked/O it/O./O

Vronsky/O and/O Anna/PERSON still/O sat/O at/O the/O little/O table/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O getting/O indecorous/O,/O''/O whispered/O one/O lady/O,/O with/O an/O expressive/O
glance/O at/O Madame/LOCATION Karenina/LOCATION,/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O her/O husband/O./O

``/OWhat/O did/O I/O tell/O you/O?/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON's/O friend/O./O

But/O not/O only/O those/O ladies/O,/O almost/O everyone/O in/O the/O room/O,/O even/O the/O
Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON and/O Betsy/PERSON herself/O,/O looked/O several/O times/O in/O the/O
direction/O of/O the/O two/O who/O had/O withdrawn/O from/O the/O general/O circle/O,/O as/O
though/O that/O were/O a/O disturbing/O fact/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O the/O only/O
person/O who/O did/O not/O once/O look/O in/O that/O direction/O,/O and/O was/O not/O diverted/O
from/O the/O interesting/O discussion/O he/O had/O entered/O upon/O./O

Noticing/O the/O disagreeable/O impression/O that/O was/O being/O made/O on/O everyone/O,/O
Princess/O Betsy/PERSON slipped/O someone/O else/O into/O her/O place/O to/O listen/O to/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O and/O went/O up/O to/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OI/O'm/O always/O amazed/O at/O the/O clearness/O and/O precision/O of/O your/O husband/O's/O
language/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OThe/O most/O transcendental/O ideas/O seem/O to/O be/O within/O my/O
grasp/O when/O he/O's/O speaking/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O!/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O radiant/O with/O a/O smile/O of/O happiness/O,/O and/O not/O
understanding/O a/O word/O of/O what/O Betsy/PERSON had/O said/O./O She/O crossed/O over/O to/O the/O big/O
table/O and/O took/O part/O in/O the/O general/O conversation/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O after/O staying/O half/O an/O hour/O,/O went/O up/O to/O his/O wife/O
and/O suggested/O that/O they/O should/O go/O home/O together/O./O But/O she/O answered/O,/O not/O
looking/O at/O him/O,/O that/O she/O was/O staying/O to/O supper/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
made/O his/O bows/O and/O withdrew/O./O

The/O fat/O old/O Tatar/O,/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON's/O coachman/O,/O was/O with/O difficulty/O
holding/O one/O of/O her/O pair/O of/O grays/O,/O chilled/O with/O the/O cold/O and/O rearing/O at/O
the/O entrance/O./O A/O footman/O stood/O opening/O the/O carriage/O door/O./O The/O hall/O porter/O
stood/O holding/O open/O the/O great/O door/O of/O the/O house/O./O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O with/O
her/O quick/O little/O hand/O,/O was/O unfastening/O the/O lace/O of/O her/O sleeve/O,/O caught/O in/O
the/O hook/O of/O her/O fur/O cloak/O,/O and/O with/O bent/O head/O listening/O to/O the/O words/O
Vronsky/PERSON murmured/O as/O he/O escorted/O her/O down/O./O

``/OYou/O've/O said/O nothing/O,/O of/O course/O,/O and/O I/O ask/O nothing/O,/O''/O he/O was/O saying/O;/O ``/Obut/O
you/O know/O that/O friendship/O's/O not/O what/O I/O want/O:/O that/O there/O's/O only/O one/O
happiness/O in/O life/O for/O me/O,/O that/O word/O that/O you/O dislike/O so/O .../O yes/O,/O
love/O!/O.../O''/O

``/OLove/O,/O''/O she/O repeated/O slowly/O,/O in/O an/O inner/O voice/O,/O and/O suddenly/O,/O at/O the/O
very/O instant/O she/O unhooked/O the/O lace/O,/O she/O added/O,/O ``/OWhy/O I/O do/On't/O like/O the/O
word/O is/O that/O it/O means/O too/O much/O to/O me/O,/O far/O more/O than/O you/O can/O understand/O,/O''/O
and/O she/O glanced/O into/O his/O face/O./O ''/O_/OAu/O revoir/O!/O_/O''/O

She/O gave/O him/O her/O hand/O,/O and/O with/O her/O rapid/O,/O springy/O step/O she/O passed/O by/O
the/O porter/O and/O vanished/O into/O the/O carriage/O./O

Her/O glance/O,/O the/O touch/O of/O her/O hand/O,/O set/O him/O aflame/O./O He/O kissed/O the/O palm/O of/O
his/O hand/O where/O she/O had/O touched/O it/O,/O and/O went/O home/O,/O happy/O in/O the/O sense/O
that/O he/O had/O got/O nearer/O to/O the/O attainment/O of/O his/O aims/O that/O evening/O than/O
during/O the/O last/O two/O months/O./O



Chapter/O 8/O


Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O seen/O nothing/O striking/O or/O improper/O in/O the/O fact/O
that/O his/O wife/O was/O sitting/O with/O Vronsky/PERSON at/O a/O table/O apart/O,/O in/O eager/O
conversation/O with/O him/O about/O something/O./O But/O he/O noticed/O that/O to/O the/O rest/O
of/O the/O party/O this/O appeared/O something/O striking/O and/O improper/O,/O and/O for/O that/O
reason/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O too/O to/O be/O improper/O./O He/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O that/O he/O
must/O speak/O of/O it/O to/O his/O wife/O./O

On/O reaching/O home/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON went/O to/O his/O study/O,/O as/O he/O usually/O
did/O,/O seated/O himself/O in/O his/O low/O chair/O,/O opened/O a/O book/O on/O the/O Papacy/O at/O the/O
place/O where/O he/O had/O laid/O the/O paper-knife/O in/O it/O,/O and/O read/O till/O one/O
o'clock/O,/O just/O as/O he/O usually/O did/O./O But/O from/O time/O to/O time/O he/O rubbed/O his/O
high/O forehead/O and/O shook/O his/O head/O,/O as/O though/O to/O drive/O away/O something/O./O At/O
his/O usual/O time/O he/O got/O up/O and/O made/O his/O toilet/O for/O the/O night/O./O Anna/PERSON
Arkadyevna/PERSON had/O not/O yet/O come/O in/O./O With/O a/O book/O under/O his/O arm/O he/O went/O
upstairs/O./O But/O this/O evening/O,/O instead/O of/O his/O usual/O thoughts/O and/O
meditations/O upon/O official/O details/O,/O his/O thoughts/O were/O absorbed/O by/O his/O
wife/O and/O something/O disagreeable/O connected/O with/O her/O./O Contrary/O to/O his/O
usual/O habit/O,/O he/O did/O not/O get/O into/O bed/O,/O but/O fell/O to/O walking/O up/O and/O down/O
the/O rooms/O with/O his/O hands/O clasped/O behind/O his/O back/O./O He/O could/O not/O go/O to/O
bed/O,/O feeling/O that/O it/O was/O absolutely/O needful/O for/O him/O first/O to/O think/O
thoroughly/O over/O the/O position/O that/O had/O just/O arisen/O./O

When/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O that/O he/O must/O talk/O to/O his/O
wife/O about/O it/O,/O it/O had/O seemed/O a/O very/O easy/O and/O simple/O matter/O./O But/O now/O,/O
when/O he/O began/O to/O think/O over/O the/O question/O that/O had/O just/O presented/O itself/O,/O
it/O seemed/O to/O him/O very/O complicated/O and/O difficult/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O not/O jealous/O./O Jealousy/O according/O to/O his/O notions/O
was/O an/O insult/O to/O one/O's/O wife/O,/O and/O one/O ought/O to/O have/O confidence/O in/O one/O's/O
wife/O./O Why/O one/O ought/O to/O have/O confidence/O--/Othat/O is/O to/O say/O,/O complete/O
conviction/O that/O his/O young/O wife/O would/O always/O love/O him/O--/Ohe/O did/O not/O ask/O
himself/O./O But/O he/O had/O no/O experience/O of/O lack/O of/O confidence/O,/O because/O he/O had/O
confidence/O in/O her/O,/O and/O told/O himself/O that/O he/O ought/O to/O have/O it/O./O Now/O,/O
though/O his/O conviction/O that/O jealousy/O was/O a/O shameful/O feeling/O and/O that/O one/O
ought/O to/O feel/O confidence/O,/O had/O not/O broken/O down/O,/O he/O felt/O that/O he/O was/O
standing/O face/O to/O face/O with/O something/O illogical/O and/O irrational/O,/O and/O did/O
not/O know/O what/O was/O to/O be/O done/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O standing/O face/O to/O
face/O with/O life/O,/O with/O the/O possibility/O of/O his/O wife/O's/O loving/O someone/O other/O
than/O himself/O,/O and/O this/O seemed/O to/O him/O very/O irrational/O and/O
incomprehensible/O because/O it/O was/O life/O itself/O./O All/O his/O life/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O lived/O and/O worked/O in/O official/O spheres/O,/O having/O to/O do/O
with/O the/O reflection/O of/O life/O./O And/O every/O time/O he/O had/O stumbled/O against/O life/O
itself/O he/O had/O shrunk/O away/O from/O it/O./O Now/O he/O experienced/O a/O feeling/O akin/O to/O
that/O of/O a/O man/O who/O,/O while/O calmly/O crossing/O a/O precipice/O by/O a/O bridge/O,/O should/O
suddenly/O discover/O that/O the/O bridge/O is/O broken/O,/O and/O that/O there/O is/O a/O chasm/O
below/O./O That/O chasm/O was/O life/O itself/O,/O the/O bridge/O that/O artificial/O life/O in/O
which/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O lived/O./O For/O the/O first/O time/O the/O question/O
presented/O itself/O to/O him/O of/O the/O possibility/O of/O his/O wife/O's/O loving/O someone/O
else/O,/O and/O he/O was/O horrified/O at/O it/O./O

He/O did/O not/O undress/O,/O but/O walked/O up/O and/O down/O with/O his/O regular/O tread/O over/O
the/O resounding/O parquet/O of/O the/O dining/O room/O,/O where/O one/O lamp/O was/O burning/O,/O
over/O the/O carpet/O of/O the/O dark/O drawing/O room/O,/O in/O which/O the/O light/O was/O
reflected/O on/O the/O big/O new/O portrait/O of/O himself/O hanging/O over/O the/O sofa/O,/O and/O
across/O her/O boudoir/O,/O where/O two/O candles/O burned/O,/O lighting/O up/O the/O portraits/O
of/O her/O parents/O and/O woman/O friends/O,/O and/O the/O pretty/O knick-knacks/O of/O her/O
writing/O table/O,/O that/O he/O knew/O so/O well/O./O He/O walked/O across/O her/O boudoir/O to/O the/O
bedroom/O door/O,/O and/O turned/O back/O again/O./O At/O each/O turn/O in/O his/O walk/O,/O
especially/O at/O the/O parquet/O of/O the/O lighted/O dining/O room/O,/O he/O halted/O and/O said/O
to/O himself/O,/O ``/OYes/O,/O this/O I/O must/O decide/O and/O put/O a/O stop/O to/O;/O I/O must/O express/O
my/O view/O of/O it/O and/O my/O decision/O./O''/O And/O he/O turned/O back/O again/O./O ``/OBut/O express/O
what/O--/Owhat/O decision/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O in/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O and/O he/O
found/O no/O reply/O./O ``/OBut/O after/O all/O,/O''/O he/O asked/O himself/O before/O turning/O into/O
the/O boudoir/O,/O ``/Owhat/O has/O occurred/O?/O Nothing/O./O She/O was/O talking/O a/O long/O while/O
with/O him/O./O But/O what/O of/O that/O?/O Surely/O women/O in/O society/O can/O talk/O to/O whom/O
they/O please/O./O And/O then/O,/O jealousy/O means/O lowering/O both/O myself/O and/O her/O,/O''/O he/O
told/O himself/O as/O he/O went/O into/O her/O boudoir/O;/O but/O this/O dictum/O,/O which/O had/O
always/O had/O such/O weight/O with/O him/O before/O,/O had/O now/O no/O weight/O and/O no/O meaning/O
at/O all/O./O And/O from/O the/O bedroom/O door/O he/O turned/O back/O again/O;/O but/O as/O he/O
entered/O the/O dark/O drawing/O room/O some/O inner/O voice/O told/O him/O that/O it/O was/O not/O
so/O,/O and/O that/O if/O others/O noticed/O it/O that/O showed/O that/O there/O was/O something/O./O
And/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O again/O in/O the/O dining/O room/O,/O ``/OYes/O,/O I/O must/O decide/O and/O
put/O a/O stop/O to/O it/O,/O and/O express/O my/O view/O of/O it/O.../O''/O And/O again/O at/O the/O turn/O in/O
the/O drawing/O room/O he/O asked/O himself/O,/O ``/ODecide/O how/O?/O''/O And/O again/O he/O asked/O
himself/O,/O ``/OWhat/O had/O occurred/O?/O''/O and/O answered/O,/O ``/ONothing/O,/O''/O and/O recollected/O
that/O jealousy/O was/O a/O feeling/O insulting/O to/O his/O wife/O;/O but/O again/O in/O the/O
drawing/O room/O he/O was/O convinced/O that/O something/O had/O happened/O./O His/O thoughts/O,/O
like/O his/O body/O,/O went/O round/O a/O complete/O circle/O,/O without/O coming/O upon/O
anything/O new/O./O He/O noticed/O this/O,/O rubbed/O his/O forehead/O,/O and/O sat/O down/O in/O her/O
boudoir/O./O

There/O,/O looking/O at/O her/O table/O,/O with/O the/O malachite/O blotting/O case/O lying/O at/O
the/O top/O and/O an/O unfinished/O letter/O,/O his/O thoughts/O suddenly/O changed/O./O He/O
began/O to/O think/O of/O her/O,/O of/O what/O she/O was/O thinking/O and/O feeling/O./O For/O the/O
first/O time/O he/O pictured/O vividly/O to/O himself/O her/O personal/O life/O,/O her/O ideas/O,/O
her/O desires/O,/O and/O the/O idea/O that/O she/O could/O and/O should/O have/O a/O separate/O life/O
of/O her/O own/O seemed/O to/O him/O so/O alarming/O that/O he/O made/O haste/O to/O dispel/O it/O./O It/O
was/O the/O chasm/O which/O he/O was/O afraid/O to/O peep/O into/O./O To/O put/O himself/O in/O
thought/O and/O feeling/O in/O another/O person/O's/O place/O was/O a/O spiritual/O exercise/O
not/O natural/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O He/O looked/O on/O this/O spiritual/O
exercise/O as/O a/O harmful/O and/O dangerous/O abuse/O of/O the/O fancy/O./O

``/OAnd/O the/O worst/O of/O it/O all/O,/O''/O thought/O he/O,/O ``/Ois/O that/O just/O now/O,/O at/O the/O very/O
moment/O when/O my/O great/O work/O is/O approaching/O completion/O''/O -LRB-/Ohe/O was/O thinking/O of/O
the/O project/O he/O was/O bringing/O forward/O at/O the/O time/O-RRB-/O,/O ``/Owhen/O I/O stand/O in/O need/O
of/O all/O my/O mental/O peace/O and/O all/O my/O energies/O,/O just/O now/O this/O stupid/O worry/O
should/O fall/O foul/O of/O me/O./O But/O what/O's/O to/O be/O done/O?/O I/O'm/O not/O one/O of/O those/O men/O
who/O submit/O to/O uneasiness/O and/O worry/O without/O having/O the/O force/O of/O character/O
to/O face/O them/O./O

``/OI/O must/O think/O it/O over/O,/O come/O to/O a/O decision/O,/O and/O put/O it/O out/O of/O my/O mind/O,/O''/O
he/O said/O aloud/O./O

``/OThe/O question/O of/O her/O feelings/O,/O of/O what/O has/O passed/O and/O may/O be/O passing/O in/O
her/O soul/O,/O that/O's/O not/O my/O affair/O;/O that/O's/O the/O affair/O of/O her/O conscience/O,/O and/O
falls/O under/O the/O head/O of/O religion/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O,/O feeling/O
consolation/O in/O the/O sense/O that/O he/O had/O found/O to/O which/O division/O of/O
regulating/O principles/O this/O new/O circumstance/O could/O be/O properly/O referred/O./O

``/OAnd/O so/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON said/O to/O himself/O,/O ``/Oquestions/O as/O to/O her/O
feelings/O,/O and/O so/O on/O,/O are/O questions/O for/O her/O conscience/O,/O with/O which/O I/O can/O
have/O nothing/O to/O do/O./O My/O duty/O is/O clearly/O defined/O./O As/O the/O head/O of/O the/O
family/O,/O I/O am/O a/O person/O bound/O in/O duty/O to/O guide/O her/O,/O and/O consequently/O,/O in/O
part/O the/O person/O responsible/O;/O I/O am/O bound/O to/O point/O out/O the/O danger/O I/O
perceive/O,/O to/O warn/O her/O,/O even/O to/O use/O my/O authority/O./O I/O ought/O to/O speak/O
plainly/O to/O her/O./O''/O And/O everything/O that/O he/O would/O say/O tonight/O to/O his/O wife/O
took/O clear/O shape/O in/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O head/O./O Thinking/O over/O what/O he/O
would/O say/O,/O he/O somewhat/O regretted/O that/O he/O should/O have/O to/O use/O his/O time/O and/O
mental/O powers/O for/O domestic/O consumption/O,/O with/O so/O little/O to/O show/O for/O it/O,/O
but/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O that/O,/O the/O form/O and/O contents/O of/O the/O speech/O before/O him/O
shaped/O itself/O as/O clearly/O and/O distinctly/O in/O his/O head/O as/O a/O ministerial/O
report/O./O

``/OI/O must/O say/O and/O express/O fully/O the/O following/O points/O:/O first/O,/O exposition/O of/O
the/O value/O to/O be/O attached/O to/O public/O opinion/O and/O to/O decorum/O;/O secondly/O,/O
exposition/O of/O religious/O significance/O of/O marriage/O;/O thirdly/O,/O if/O need/O be/O,/O
reference/O to/O the/O calamity/O possibly/O ensuing/O to/O our/O son/O;/O fourthly/O,/O
reference/O to/O the/O unhappiness/O likely/O to/O result/O to/O herself/O./O''/O And/O,/O
interlacing/O his/O fingers/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON stretched/O them/O,/O and/O the/O
joints/O of/O the/O fingers/O cracked/O./O This/O trick/O,/O a/O bad/O habit/O,/O the/O cracking/O of/O
his/O fingers/O,/O always/O soothed/O him/O,/O and/O gave/O precision/O to/O his/O thoughts/O,/O so/O
needful/O to/O him/O at/O this/O juncture/O./O

There/O was/O the/O sound/O of/O a/O carriage/O driving/O up/O to/O the/O front/O door/O./O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON halted/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O room/O./O

A/O woman/O's/O step/O was/O heard/O mounting/O the/O stairs/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O
ready/O for/O his/O speech/O,/O stood/O compressing/O his/O crossed/O fingers/O,/O waiting/O to/O
see/O if/O the/O crack/O would/O not/O come/O again/O./O One/O joint/O cracked/O./O

Already/O,/O from/O the/O sound/O of/O light/O steps/O on/O the/O stairs/O,/O he/O was/O aware/O that/O
she/O was/O close/O,/O and/O though/O he/O was/O satisfied/O with/O his/O speech/O,/O he/O felt/O
frightened/O of/O the/O explanation/O confronting/O him/O.../O



Chapter/O 9/O


Anna/PERSON came/O in/O with/O hanging/O head/O,/O playing/O with/O the/O tassels/O of/O her/O hood/O./O
Her/O face/O was/O brilliant/O and/O glowing/O;/O but/O this/O glow/O was/O not/O one/O of/O
brightness/O;/O it/O suggested/O the/O fearful/O glow/O of/O a/O conflagration/O in/O the/O
midst/O of/O a/O dark/O night/O./O On/O seeing/O her/O husband/O,/O Anna/PERSON raised/O her/O head/O and/O
smiled/O,/O as/O though/O she/O had/O just/O waked/O up/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O not/O in/O bed/O?/O What/O a/O wonder/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O letting/O fall/O her/O hood/O,/O and/O
without/O stopping/O,/O she/O went/O on/O into/O the/O dressing/O room/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O late/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O when/O she/O had/O gone/O through/O the/O doorway/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O it/O's/O necessary/O for/O me/O to/O have/O a/O talk/O with/O you/O./O''/O

``/OWith/O me/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O wonderingly/O./O She/O came/O out/O from/O behind/O the/O door/O of/O
the/O dressing/O room/O,/O and/O looked/O at/O him/O./O ``/OWhy/O,/O what/O is/O it/O?/O What/O about/O?/O''/O she/O
asked/O,/O sitting/O down/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O let/O's/O talk/O,/O if/O it/O's/O so/O necessary/O./O But/O it/O
would/O be/O better/O to/O get/O to/O sleep/O./O''/O

Anna/PERSON said/O what/O came/O to/O her/O lips/O,/O and/O marveled/O,/O hearing/O herself/O,/O at/O her/O
own/O capacity/O for/O lying/O./O How/O simple/O and/O natural/O were/O her/O words/O,/O and/O how/O
likely/O that/O she/O was/O simply/O sleepy/O!/O She/O felt/O herself/O clad/O in/O an/O
impenetrable/O armor/O of/O falsehood/O./O She/O felt/O that/O some/O unseen/O force/O had/O
come/O to/O her/O aid/O and/O was/O supporting/O her/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O I/O must/O warn/O you/O,/O''/O he/O began/O./O

``/OWarn/O me/O?/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OOf/O what/O?/O''/O

She/O looked/O at/O him/O so/O simply/O,/O so/O brightly/O,/O that/O anyone/O who/O did/O not/O know/O
her/O as/O her/O husband/O knew/O her/O could/O not/O have/O noticed/O anything/O unnatural/O,/O
either/O in/O the/O sound/O or/O the/O sense/O of/O her/O words/O./O But/O to/O him/O,/O knowing/O her/O,/O
knowing/O that/O whenever/O he/O went/O to/O bed/O five/O minutes/O later/O than/O usual/O,/O she/O
noticed/O it/O,/O and/O asked/O him/O the/O reason/O;/O to/O him/O,/O knowing/O that/O every/O joy/O,/O
every/O pleasure/O and/O pain/O that/O she/O felt/O she/O communicated/O to/O him/O at/O once/O;/O
to/O him/O,/O now/O to/O see/O that/O she/O did/O not/O care/O to/O notice/O his/O state/O of/O mind/O,/O
that/O she/O did/O not/O care/O to/O say/O a/O word/O about/O herself/O,/O meant/O a/O great/O deal/O./O
He/O saw/O that/O the/O inmost/O recesses/O of/O her/O soul/O,/O that/O had/O always/O hitherto/O
lain/O open/O before/O him/O,/O were/O closed/O against/O him/O./O More/O than/O that/O,/O he/O saw/O
from/O her/O tone/O that/O she/O was/O not/O even/O perturbed/O at/O that/O,/O but/O as/O it/O were/O
said/O straight/O out/O to/O him/O:/O ``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O shut/O up/O,/O and/O so/O it/O must/O be/O,/O and/O
will/O be/O in/O future/O./O''/O Now/O he/O experienced/O a/O feeling/O such/O as/O a/O man/O might/O
have/O,/O returning/O home/O and/O finding/O his/O own/O house/O locked/O up/O./O ``/OBut/O perhaps/O
the/O key/O may/O yet/O be/O found/O,/O''/O thought/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OI/O want/O to/O warn/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O in/O a/O low/O voice/O,/O ``/Othat/O through/O
thoughtlessness/O and/O lack/O of/O caution/O you/O may/O cause/O yourself/O to/O be/O talked/O
about/O in/O society/O./O Your/O too/O animated/O conversation/O this/O evening/O with/O Count/O
Vronsky/O''/O -LRB-/Ohe/O enunciated/O the/O name/O firmly/O and/O with/O deliberate/O emphasis/O-RRB-/O
``/Oattracted/O attention/O./O''/O

He/O talked/O and/O looked/O at/O her/O laughing/O eyes/O,/O which/O frightened/O him/O now/O with/O
their/O impenetrable/O look/O,/O and/O,/O as/O he/O talked/O,/O he/O felt/O all/O the/O uselessness/O
and/O idleness/O of/O his/O words/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O always/O like/O that/O,/O''/O she/O answered/O,/O as/O though/O completely/O
misapprehending/O him/O,/O and/O of/O all/O he/O had/O said/O only/O taking/O in/O the/O last/O
phrase/O./O ``/OOne/O time/O you/O do/On't/O like/O my/O being/O dull/O,/O and/O another/O time/O you/O
do/On't/O like/O my/O being/O lively/O./O I/O was/On't/O dull/O./O Does/O that/O offend/O you/O?/O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON shivered/O,/O and/O bent/O his/O hands/O to/O make/O the/O joints/O
crack/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O please/O,/O do/On't/O do/O that/O,/O I/O do/O so/O dislike/O it/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O is/O this/O you/O?/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O quietly/O making/O an/O
effort/O over/O himself/O,/O and/O restraining/O the/O motion/O of/O his/O fingers/O./O

``/OBut/O what/O is/O it/O all/O about/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O such/O genuine/O and/O droll/O
wonder/O./O ``/OWhat/O do/O you/O want/O of/O me/O?/O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON paused/O,/O and/O rubbed/O his/O forehead/O and/O his/O eyes/O./O He/O
saw/O that/O instead/O of/O doing/O as/O he/O had/O intended/O--/Othat/O is/O to/O say/O,/O warning/O his/O
wife/O against/O a/O mistake/O in/O the/O eyes/O of/O the/O world/O--/Ohe/O had/O unconsciously/O
become/O agitated/O over/O what/O was/O the/O affair/O of/O her/O conscience/O,/O and/O was/O
struggling/O against/O the/O barrier/O he/O fancied/O between/O them/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O what/O I/O meant/O to/O say/O to/O you/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O coldly/O and/O composedly/O,/O
``/Oand/O I/O beg/O you/O to/O listen/O to/O it/O./O I/O consider/O jealousy/O,/O as/O you/O know/O,/O a/O
humiliating/O and/O degrading/O feeling/O,/O and/O I/O shall/O never/O allow/O myself/O to/O be/O
influenced/O by/O it/O;/O but/O there/O are/O certain/O rules/O of/O decorum/O which/O can/Onot/O be/O
disregarded/O with/O impunity/O./O This/O evening/O it/O was/O not/O I/O observed/O it/O,/O but/O
judging/O by/O the/O impression/O made/O on/O the/O company/O,/O everyone/O observed/O that/O
your/O conduct/O and/O deportment/O were/O not/O altogether/O what/O could/O be/O desired/O./O''/O

``/OI/O positively/O do/On't/O understand/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O shrugging/O her/O shoulders/O--/O``/OHe/O
does/On't/O care/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O./O ``/OBut/O other/O people/O noticed/O it/O,/O and/O that/O's/O
what/O upsets/O him/O./O''/O--/O``/OYou/O're/O not/O well/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O
and/O she/O got/O up/O,/O and/O would/O have/O gone/O towards/O the/O door/O;/O but/O he/O moved/O
forward/O as/O though/O he/O would/O stop/O her/O./O

His/O face/O was/O ugly/O and/O forbidding/O,/O as/O Anna/PERSON had/O never/O seen/O him/O./O She/O
stopped/O,/O and/O bending/O her/O head/O back/O and/O on/O one/O side/O,/O began/O with/O her/O rapid/O
hand/O taking/O out/O her/O hairpins/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O'm/O listening/O to/O what/O's/O to/O come/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O calmly/O and/O
ironically/O;/O ``/Oand/O indeed/O I/O listen/O with/O interest/O,/O for/O I/O should/O like/O to/O
understand/O what/O's/O the/O matter/O./O''/O

She/O spoke/O,/O and/O marveled/O at/O the/O confident/O,/O calm/O,/O and/O natural/O tone/O in/O
which/O she/O was/O speaking/O,/O and/O the/O choice/O of/O the/O words/O she/O used/O./O

``/OTo/O enter/O into/O all/O the/O details/O of/O your/O feelings/O I/O have/O no/O right/O,/O and/O
besides/O,/O I/O regard/O that/O as/O useless/O and/O even/O harmful/O,/O''/O began/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O ``/OFerreting/O in/O one/O's/O soul/O,/O one/O often/O ferrets/O out/O
something/O that/O might/O have/O lain/O there/O unnoticed/O./O Your/O feelings/O are/O an/O
affair/O of/O your/O own/O conscience/O;/O but/O I/O am/O in/O duty/O bound/O to/O you/O,/O to/O myself/O,/O
and/O to/O God/O,/O to/O point/O out/O to/O you/O your/O duties/O./O Our/O life/O has/O been/O joined/O,/O
not/O by/O man/O,/O but/O by/O God/O./O That/O union/O can/O only/O be/O severed/O by/O a/O crime/O,/O and/O a/O
crime/O of/O that/O nature/O brings/O its/O own/O chastisement/O./O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O understand/O a/O word/O./O And/O,/O oh/O dear/O!/O how/O sleepy/O I/O am/O,/O unluckily/O,/O''/O
she/O said/O,/O rapidly/O passing/O her/O hand/O through/O her/O hair/O,/O feeling/O for/O the/O
remaining/O hairpins/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O for/O God/O's/O sake/O do/On't/O speak/O like/O that/O!/O''/O he/O said/O gently/O./O ``/OPerhaps/O I/O
am/O mistaken/O,/O but/O believe/O me/O,/O what/O I/O say/O,/O I/O say/O as/O much/O for/O myself/O as/O for/O
you/O./O I/O am/O your/O husband/O,/O and/O I/O love/O you/O./O''/O

For/O an/O instant/O her/O face/O fell/O,/O and/O the/O mocking/O gleam/O in/O her/O eyes/O died/O
away/O;/O but/O the/O word/O _/Olove/O_/O threw/O her/O into/O revolt/O again/O./O She/O thought/O:/O
``/OLove/O?/O Can/O he/O love/O?/O If/O he/O had/On't/O heard/O there/O was/O such/O a/O thing/O as/O love/O,/O
he/O would/O never/O have/O used/O the/O word/O./O He/O does/On't/O even/O know/O what/O love/O is/O./O''/O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O really/O I/O do/On't/O understand/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/ODefine/O
what/O it/O is/O you/O find/O.../O''/O

``/OPardon/O,/O let/O me/O say/O all/O I/O have/O to/O say/O./O I/O love/O you/O./O But/O I/O am/O not/O speaking/O
of/O myself/O;/O the/O most/O important/O persons/O in/O this/O matter/O are/O our/O son/O and/O
yourself/O./O It/O may/O very/O well/O be/O,/O I/O repeat/O,/O that/O my/O words/O seem/O to/O you/O
utterly/O unnecessary/O and/O out/O of/O place/O;/O it/O may/O be/O that/O they/O are/O called/O
forth/O by/O my/O mistaken/O impression/O./O In/O that/O case/O,/O I/O beg/O you/O to/O forgive/O me/O./O
But/O if/O you/O are/O conscious/O yourself/O of/O even/O the/O smallest/O foundation/O for/O
them/O,/O then/O I/O beg/O you/O to/O think/O a/O little/O,/O and/O if/O your/O heart/O prompts/O you/O,/O
to/O speak/O out/O to/O me/O.../O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O unconsciously/O saying/O something/O utterly/O unlike/O
what/O he/O had/O prepared/O./O

``/OI/O have/O nothing/O to/O say/O./O And/O besides/O,/O''/O she/O said/O hurriedly/O,/O with/O
difficulty/O repressing/O a/O smile/O,/O ``/Oit/O's/O really/O time/O to/O be/O in/O bed/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON sighed/O,/O and/O,/O without/O saying/O more/O,/O went/O into/O the/O
bedroom/O./O

When/O she/O came/O into/O the/O bedroom/O,/O he/O was/O already/O in/O bed/O./O His/O lips/O were/O
sternly/O compressed/O,/O and/O his/O eyes/O looked/O away/O from/O her/O./O Anna/PERSON got/O into/O her/O
bed/O,/O and/O lay/O expecting/O every/O minute/O that/O he/O would/O begin/O to/O speak/O to/O her/O
again/O./O She/O both/O feared/O his/O speaking/O and/O wished/O for/O it/O./O But/O he/O was/O
silent/O./O She/O waited/O for/O a/O long/O while/O without/O moving/O,/O and/O had/O forgotten/O
about/O him/O./O She/O thought/O of/O that/O other/O;/O she/O pictured/O him/O,/O and/O felt/O how/O her/O
heart/O was/O flooded/O with/O emotion/O and/O guilty/O delight/O at/O the/O thought/O of/O him/O./O
Suddenly/O she/O heard/O an/O even/O,/O tranquil/O snore/O./O For/O the/O first/O instant/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON seemed/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O appalled/O at/O his/O own/O snoring/O,/O and/O
ceased/O;/O but/O after/O an/O interval/O of/O two/O breathings/O the/O snore/O sounded/O again/O,/O
with/O a/O new/O tranquil/O rhythm/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O late/O,/O it/O's/O late/O,/O''/O she/O whispered/O with/O a/O smile/O./O A/O long/O while/O she/O
lay/O,/O not/O moving/O,/O with/O open/O eyes/O,/O whose/O brilliance/O she/O almost/O fancied/O she/O
could/O herself/O see/O in/O the/O darkness/O./O



Chapter/O 10/O


From/O that/O time/O a/O new/O life/O began/O for/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON and/O for/O his/O
wife/O./O Nothing/O special/O happened/O./O Anna/PERSON went/O out/O into/O society/O,/O as/O she/O had/O
always/O done/O,/O was/O particularly/O often/O at/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON's/O,/O and/O met/O Vronsky/O
everywhere/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON saw/O this/O,/O but/O could/O do/O nothing/O./O All/O
his/O efforts/O to/O draw/O her/O into/O open/O discussion/O she/O confronted/O with/O a/O
barrier/O which/O he/O could/O not/O penetrate/O,/O made/O up/O of/O a/O sort/O of/O amused/O
perplexity/O./O Outwardly/O everything/O was/O the/O same/O,/O but/O their/O inner/O relations/O
were/O completely/O changed/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O a/O man/O of/O great/O power/O in/O
the/O world/O of/O politics/O,/O felt/O himself/O helpless/O in/O this/O./O Like/O an/O ox/O with/O
head/O bent/O,/O submissively/O he/O awaited/O the/O blow/O which/O he/O felt/O was/O lifted/O
over/O him/O./O Every/O time/O he/O began/O to/O think/O about/O it/O,/O he/O felt/O that/O he/O must/O
try/O once/O more/O,/O that/O by/O kindness/O,/O tenderness/O,/O and/O persuasion/O there/O was/O
still/O hope/O of/O saving/O her/O,/O of/O bringing/O her/O back/O to/O herself/O,/O and/O every/O day/O
he/O made/O ready/O to/O talk/O to/O her/O./O But/O every/O time/O he/O began/O talking/O to/O her/O,/O he/O
felt/O that/O the/O spirit/O of/O evil/O and/O deceit/O,/O which/O had/O taken/O possession/O of/O
her/O,/O had/O possession/O of/O him/O too/O,/O and/O he/O talked/O to/O her/O in/O a/O tone/O quite/O
unlike/O that/O in/O which/O he/O had/O meant/O to/O talk/O./O Involuntarily/O he/O talked/O to/O
her/O in/O his/O habitual/O tone/O of/O jeering/O at/O anyone/O who/O should/O say/O what/O he/O was/O
saying/O./O And/O in/O that/O tone/O it/O was/O impossible/O to/O say/O what/O needed/O to/O be/O said/O
to/O her/O./O



Chapter/O 11/O


That/O which/O for/O Vronsky/O had/O been/O almost/O a/O whole/O year/O the/O one/O absorbing/O
desire/O of/O his/O life/O,/O replacing/O all/O his/O old/O desires/O;/O that/O which/O for/O Anna/PERSON
had/O been/O an/O impossible/O,/O terrible/O,/O and/O even/O for/O that/O reason/O more/O
entrancing/O dream/O of/O bliss/O,/O that/O desire/O had/O been/O fulfilled/O./O He/O stood/O
before/O her/O,/O pale/O,/O his/O lower/O jaw/O quivering/O,/O and/O besought/O her/O to/O be/O calm/O,/O
not/O knowing/O how/O or/O why/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON!/O Anna/PERSON!/O''/O he/O said/O with/O a/O choking/O voice/O,/O ``/OAnna/PERSON,/O for/O pity/O's/O sake/O!/O.../O''/O

But/O the/O louder/O he/O spoke/O,/O the/O lower/O she/O dropped/O her/O once/O proud/O and/O gay/O,/O
now/O shame-stricken/O head/O,/O and/O she/O bowed/O down/O and/O sank/O from/O the/O sofa/O where/O
she/O was/O sitting/O,/O down/O on/O the/O floor/O,/O at/O his/O feet/O;/O she/O would/O have/O fallen/O
on/O the/O carpet/O if/O he/O had/O not/O held/O her/O./O

``/OMy/O God/O!/O Forgive/O me/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O sobbing/O,/O pressing/O his/O hands/O to/O her/O
bosom/O./O

She/O felt/O so/O sinful/O,/O so/O guilty/O,/O that/O nothing/O was/O left/O her/O but/O to/O
humiliate/O herself/O and/O beg/O forgiveness/O;/O and/O as/O now/O there/O was/O no/O one/O in/O
her/O life/O but/O him/O,/O to/O him/O she/O addressed/O her/O prayer/O for/O forgiveness/O./O
Looking/O at/O him/O,/O she/O had/O a/O physical/O sense/O of/O her/O humiliation/O,/O and/O she/O
could/O say/O nothing/O more/O./O He/O felt/O what/O a/O murderer/O must/O feel/O,/O when/O he/O sees/O
the/O body/O he/O has/O robbed/O of/O life/O./O That/O body/O,/O robbed/O by/O him/O of/O life/O,/O was/O
their/O love/O,/O the/O first/O stage/O of/O their/O love/O./O There/O was/O something/O awful/O and/O
revolting/O in/O the/O memory/O of/O what/O had/O been/O bought/O at/O this/O fearful/O price/O of/O
shame/O./O Shame/O at/O their/O spiritual/O nakedness/O crushed/O her/O and/O infected/O him/O./O
But/O in/O spite/O of/O all/O the/O murderer/O's/O horror/O before/O the/O body/O of/O his/O victim/O,/O
he/O must/O hack/O it/O to/O pieces/O,/O hide/O the/O body/O,/O must/O use/O what/O he/O has/O gained/O by/O
his/O murder/O./O

And/O with/O fury/O,/O as/O it/O were/O with/O passion/O,/O the/O murderer/O falls/O on/O the/O body/O,/O
and/O drags/O it/O and/O hacks/O at/O it/O;/O so/O he/O covered/O her/O face/O and/O shoulders/O with/O
kisses/O./O She/O held/O his/O hand/O,/O and/O did/O not/O stir/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O these/O kisses/O--/Othat/O is/O
what/O has/O been/O bought/O by/O this/O shame/O./O Yes/O,/O and/O one/O hand/O,/O which/O will/O always/O
be/O mine/O--/Othe/O hand/O of/O my/O accomplice/O./O''/O She/O lifted/O up/O that/O hand/O and/O kissed/O
it/O./O He/O sank/O on/O his/O knees/O and/O tried/O to/O see/O her/O face/O;/O but/O she/O hid/O it/O,/O and/O
said/O nothing/O./O At/O last/O,/O as/O though/O making/O an/O effort/O over/O herself/O,/O she/O got/O
up/O and/O pushed/O him/O away/O./O Her/O face/O was/O still/O as/O beautiful/O,/O but/O it/O was/O only/O
the/O more/O pitiful/O for/O that/O./O

``/OAll/O is/O over/O,/O''/O she/O said/O;/O ``/OI/O have/O nothing/O but/O you/O./O Remember/O that/O./O''/O

``/OI/O can/O never/O forget/O what/O is/O my/O whole/O life/O./O For/O one/O instant/O of/O this/O
happiness/O.../O''/O

``/OHappiness/O!/O''/O she/O said/O with/O horror/O and/O loathing/O and/O her/O horror/O
unconsciously/O infected/O him/O./O ``/OFor/O pity/O's/O sake/O,/O not/O a/O word/O,/O not/O a/O word/O
more/O./O''/O

She/O rose/O quickly/O and/O moved/O away/O from/O him/O./O

``/ONot/O a/O word/O more/O,/O''/O she/O repeated/O,/O and/O with/O a/O look/O of/O chill/O despair/O,/O
incomprehensible/O to/O him/O,/O she/O parted/O from/O him/O./O She/O felt/O that/O at/O that/O
moment/O she/O could/O not/O put/O into/O words/O the/O sense/O of/O shame/O,/O of/O rapture/O,/O and/O
of/O horror/O at/O this/O stepping/O into/O a/O new/O life/O,/O and/O she/O did/O not/O want/O to/O
speak/O of/O it/O,/O to/O vulgarize/O this/O feeling/O by/O inappropriate/O words/O./O But/O later/O
too/O,/O and/O the/O next/O day/O and/O the/O third/O day/O,/O she/O still/O found/O no/O words/O in/O
which/O she/O could/O express/O the/O complexity/O of/O her/O feelings/O;/O indeed/O,/O she/O
could/O not/O even/O find/O thoughts/O in/O which/O she/O could/O clearly/O think/O out/O all/O
that/O was/O in/O her/O soul/O./O

She/O said/O to/O herself/O:/O ``/ONo/O,/O just/O now/O I/O ca/On't/O think/O of/O it/O,/O later/O on/O,/O when/O I/O
am/O calmer/O./O''/O But/O this/O calm/O for/O thought/O never/O came/O;/O every/O time/O the/O thought/O
rose/O of/O what/O she/O had/O done/O and/O what/O would/O happen/O to/O her/O,/O and/O what/O she/O
ought/O to/O do/O,/O a/O horror/O came/O over/O her/O and/O she/O drove/O those/O thoughts/O away/O./O

``/OLater/O,/O later/O,/O''/O she/O said/O--/O``/Owhen/O I/O am/O calmer/O./O''/O

But/O in/O dreams/O,/O when/O she/O had/O no/O control/O over/O her/O thoughts/O,/O her/O position/O
presented/O itself/O to/O her/O in/O all/O its/O hideous/O nakedness/O./O One/O dream/O haunted/O
her/O almost/O every/O night/O./O She/O dreamed/O that/O both/O were/O her/O husbands/O at/O once/O,/O
that/O both/O were/O lavishing/O caresses/O on/O her/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O
weeping/O,/O kissing/O her/O hands/O,/O and/O saying/O,/O ``/OHow/O happy/O we/O are/O now/O!/O''/O And/O
Alexey/PERSON Vronsky/PERSON was/O there/O too/O,/O and/O he/O too/O was/O her/O husband/O./O And/O she/O was/O
marveling/O that/O it/O had/O once/O seemed/O impossible/O to/O her/O,/O was/O explaining/O to/O
them/O,/O laughing/O,/O that/O this/O was/O ever/O so/O much/O simpler/O,/O and/O that/O now/O both/O of/O
them/O were/O happy/O and/O contented/O./O But/O this/O dream/O weighed/O on/O her/O like/O a/O
nightmare/O,/O and/O she/O awoke/O from/O it/O in/O terror/O./O



Chapter/O 12/O


In/O the/O early/O days/O after/O his/O return/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O whenever/O Levin/PERSON shuddered/O
and/O grew/O red/O,/O remembering/O the/O disgrace/O of/O his/O rejection/O,/O he/O said/O to/O
himself/O:/O ``/OThis/O was/O just/O how/O I/O used/O to/O shudder/O and/O blush/O,/O thinking/O myself/O
utterly/O lost/O,/O when/O I/O was/O plucked/O in/O physics/O and/O did/O not/O get/O my/O remove/O;/O
and/O how/O I/O thought/O myself/O utterly/O ruined/O after/O I/O had/O mismanaged/O that/O
affair/O of/O my/O sister/O's/O that/O was/O entrusted/O to/O me/O./O And/O yet/O,/O now/O that/O years/O
have/O passed/O,/O I/O recall/O it/O and/O wonder/O that/O it/O could/O distress/O me/O so/O much/O./O
It/O will/O be/O the/O same/O thing/O too/O with/O this/O trouble/O./O Time/O will/O go/O by/O and/O I/O
shall/O not/O mind/O about/O this/O either/O./O''/O

But/O three/O months/O had/O passed/O and/O he/O had/O not/O left/O off/O minding/O about/O it/O;/O
and/O it/O was/O as/O painful/O for/O him/O to/O think/O of/O it/O as/O it/O had/O been/O those/O first/O
days/O./O He/O could/O not/O be/O at/O peace/O because/O after/O dreaming/O so/O long/O of/O family/O
life/O,/O and/O feeling/O himself/O so/O ripe/O for/O it/O,/O he/O was/O still/O not/O married/O,/O and/O
was/O further/O than/O ever/O from/O marriage/O./O He/O was/O painfully/O conscious/O himself/O,/O
as/O were/O all/O about/O him/O,/O that/O at/O his/O years/O it/O is/O not/O well/O for/O man/O to/O be/O
alone/O./O He/O remembered/O how/O before/O starting/O for/O Moscow/LOCATION he/O had/O once/O said/O to/O
his/O cowman/O Nikolay/PERSON,/O a/O simple-hearted/O peasant/O,/O whom/O he/O liked/O talking/O to/O:/O
``/OWell/O,/O Nikolay/PERSON!/O I/O mean/O to/O get/O married/O,/O''/O and/O how/O Nikolay/PERSON had/O promptly/O
answered/O,/O as/O of/O a/O matter/O on/O which/O there/O could/O be/O no/O possible/O doubt/O:/O ``/OAnd/O
high/O time/O too/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Demitrievitch/PERSON./O''/O But/O marriage/O had/O now/O become/O
further/O off/O than/O ever/O./O The/O place/O was/O taken/O,/O and/O whenever/O he/O tried/O to/O
imagine/O any/O of/O the/O girls/O he/O knew/O in/O that/O place/O,/O he/O felt/O that/O it/O was/O
utterly/O impossible/O./O Moreover/O,/O the/O recollection/O of/O the/O rejection/O and/O the/O
part/O he/O had/O played/O in/O the/O affair/O tortured/O him/O with/O shame/O./O However/O often/O
he/O told/O himself/O that/O he/O was/O in/O no/O wise/O to/O blame/O in/O it/O,/O that/O
recollection/O,/O like/O other/O humiliating/O reminiscences/O of/O a/O similar/O kind/O,/O
made/O him/O twinge/O and/O blush/O./O There/O had/O been/O in/O his/O past/O,/O as/O in/O every/O
man/O's/O,/O actions/O,/O recognized/O by/O him/O as/O bad/O,/O for/O which/O his/O conscience/O ought/O
to/O have/O tormented/O him/O;/O but/O the/O memory/O of/O these/O evil/O actions/O was/O far/O from/O
causing/O him/O so/O much/O suffering/O as/O those/O trivial/O but/O humiliating/O
reminiscences/O./O These/O wounds/O never/O healed/O./O And/O with/O these/O memories/O was/O
now/O ranged/O his/O rejection/O and/O the/O pitiful/O position/O in/O which/O he/O must/O have/O
appeared/O to/O others/O that/O evening/O./O But/O time/O and/O work/O did/O their/O part/O./O
Bitter/O memories/O were/O more/O and/O more/O covered/O up/O by/O the/O incidents/O--/Opaltry/O in/O
his/O eyes/O,/O but/O really/O important/O--/Oof/O his/O country/O life/O./O Every/O week/O he/O
thought/O less/O often/O of/O Kitty/PERSON./O He/O was/O impatiently/O looking/O forward/O to/O the/O
news/O that/O she/O was/O married/O,/O or/O just/O going/O to/O be/O married/O,/O hoping/O that/O such/O
news/O would/O,/O like/O having/O a/O tooth/O out/O,/O completely/O cure/O him/O./O

Meanwhile/O spring/O came/O on/O,/O beautiful/O and/O kindly/O,/O without/O the/O delays/O and/O
treacheries/O of/O spring/O,/O--/Oone/O of/O those/O rare/O springs/O in/O which/O plants/O,/O
beasts/O,/O and/O man/O rejoice/O alike/O./O This/O lovely/O spring/O roused/O Levin/PERSON still/O
more/O,/O and/O strengthened/O him/O in/O his/O resolution/O of/O renouncing/O all/O his/O past/O
and/O building/O up/O his/O lonely/O life/O firmly/O and/O independently/O./O Though/O many/O of/O
the/O plans/O with/O which/O he/O had/O returned/O to/O the/O country/O had/O not/O been/O carried/O
out/O,/O still/O his/O most/O important/O resolution/O--/Othat/O of/O purity/O--/Ohad/O been/O kept/O by/O
him/O./O He/O was/O free/O from/O that/O shame/O,/O which/O had/O usually/O harassed/O him/O after/O a/O
fall/O;/O and/O he/O could/O look/O everyone/O straight/O in/O the/O face/O./O In/O February/O he/O
had/O received/O a/O letter/O from/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON telling/O him/O that/O his/O brother/O
Nikolay/PERSON's/O health/O was/O getting/O worse/O,/O but/O that/O he/O would/O not/O take/O advice/O,/O
and/O in/O consequence/O of/O this/O letter/O Levin/PERSON went/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION to/O his/O brother/O's/O
and/O succeeded/O in/O persuading/O him/O to/O see/O a/O doctor/O and/O to/O go/O to/O a/O
watering-place/O abroad/O./O He/O succeeded/O so/O well/O in/O persuading/O his/O brother/O,/O
and/O in/O lending/O him/O money/O for/O the/O journey/O without/O irritating/O him/O,/O that/O he/O
was/O satisfied/O with/O himself/O in/O that/O matter/O./O In/O addition/O to/O his/O farming/O,/O
which/O called/O for/O special/O attention/O in/O spring/O,/O and/O in/O addition/O to/O
reading/O,/O Levin/PERSON had/O begun/O that/O winter/O a/O work/O on/O agriculture/O,/O the/O plan/O of/O
which/O turned/O on/O taking/O into/O account/O the/O character/O of/O the/O laborer/O on/O the/O
land/O as/O one/O of/O the/O unalterable/O data/O of/O the/O question/O,/O like/O the/O climate/O
and/O the/O soil/O,/O and/O consequently/O deducing/O all/O the/O principles/O of/O scientific/O
culture/O,/O not/O simply/O from/O the/O data/O of/O soil/O and/O climate/O,/O but/O from/O the/O data/O
of/O soil/O,/O climate/O,/O and/O a/O certain/O unalterable/O character/O of/O the/O laborer/O./O
Thus/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O solitude/O,/O or/O in/O consequence/O of/O his/O solitude/O,/O his/O
life/O was/O exceedingly/O full/O./O Only/O rarely/O he/O suffered/O from/O an/O unsatisfied/O
desire/O to/O communicate/O his/O stray/O ideas/O to/O someone/O besides/O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON./O With/O her/O indeed/O he/O not/O infrequently/O fell/O into/O discussion/O upon/O
physics/O,/O the/O theory/O of/O agriculture/O,/O and/O especially/O philosophy/O;/O
philosophy/O was/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON's/O favorite/O subject/O./O

Spring/O was/O slow/O in/O unfolding/O./O For/O the/O last/O few/O weeks/O it/O had/O been/O
steadily/O fine/O frosty/O weather/O./O In/O the/O daytime/O it/O thawed/O in/O the/O sun/O,/O but/O
at/O night/O there/O were/O even/O seven/O degrees/O of/O frost/O./O There/O was/O such/O a/O frozen/O
surface/O on/O the/O snow/O that/O they/O drove/O the/O wagons/O anywhere/O off/O the/O roads/O./O
Easter/O came/O in/O the/O snow/O./O Then/O all/O of/O a/O sudden/O,/O on/O Easter/O Monday/O,/O a/O warm/O
wind/O sprang/O up/O,/O storm/O clouds/O swooped/O down/O,/O and/O for/O three/O days/O and/O three/O
nights/O the/O warm/O,/O driving/O rain/O fell/O in/O streams/O./O On/O Thursday/O the/O wind/O
dropped/O,/O and/O a/O thick/O gray/O fog/O brooded/O over/O the/O land/O as/O though/O hiding/O the/O
mysteries/O of/O the/O transformations/O that/O were/O being/O wrought/O in/O nature/O./O
Behind/O the/O fog/O there/O was/O the/O flowing/O of/O water/O,/O the/O cracking/O and/O floating/O
of/O ice/O,/O the/O swift/O rush/O of/O turbid/O,/O foaming/O torrents/O;/O and/O on/O the/O following/O
Monday/O,/O in/O the/O evening/O,/O the/O fog/O parted/O,/O the/O storm/O clouds/O split/O up/O into/O
little/O curling/O crests/O of/O cloud/O,/O the/O sky/O cleared/O,/O and/O the/O real/O spring/O had/O
come/O./O In/O the/O morning/O the/O sun/O rose/O brilliant/O and/O quickly/O wore/O away/O the/O
thin/O layer/O of/O ice/O that/O covered/O the/O water/O,/O and/O all/O the/O warm/O air/O was/O
quivering/O with/O the/O steam/O that/O rose/O up/O from/O the/O quickened/O earth/O./O The/O old/O
grass/O looked/O greener/O,/O and/O the/O young/O grass/O thrust/O up/O its/O tiny/O blades/O;/O the/O
buds/O of/O the/O guelder-rose/O and/O of/O the/O currant/O and/O the/O sticky/O birch-buds/O
were/O swollen/O with/O sap/O,/O and/O an/O exploring/O bee/O was/O humming/O about/O the/O golden/O
blossoms/O that/O studded/O the/O willow/O./O Larks/O trilled/O unseen/O above/O the/O velvety/O
green/O fields/O and/O the/O ice-covered/O stubble-land/O;/O peewits/O wailed/O over/O the/O
low/O lands/O and/O marshes/O flooded/O by/O the/O pools/O;/O cranes/O and/O wild/O geese/O flew/O
high/O across/O the/O sky/O uttering/O their/O spring/O calls/O./O The/O cattle/O,/O bald/O in/O
patches/O where/O the/O new/O hair/O had/O not/O grown/O yet/O,/O lowed/O in/O the/O pastures/O;/O the/O
bowlegged/O lambs/O frisked/O round/O their/O bleating/O mothers/O./O Nimble/O children/O
ran/O about/O the/O drying/O paths/O,/O covered/O with/O the/O prints/O of/O bare/O feet/O./O There/O
was/O a/O merry/O chatter/O of/O peasant/O women/O over/O their/O linen/O at/O the/O pond/O,/O and/O
the/O ring/O of/O axes/O in/O the/O yard/O,/O where/O the/O peasants/O were/O repairing/O ploughs/O
and/O harrows/O./O The/O real/O spring/O had/O come/O./O



Chapter/O 13/O


Levin/PERSON put/O on/O his/O big/O boots/O,/O and/O,/O for/O the/O first/O time/O,/O a/O cloth/O jacket/O,/O
instead/O of/O his/O fur/O cloak/O,/O and/O went/O out/O to/O look/O after/O his/O farm/O,/O stepping/O
over/O streams/O of/O water/O that/O flashed/O in/O the/O sunshine/O and/O dazzled/O his/O eyes/O,/O
and/O treading/O one/O minute/O on/O ice/O and/O the/O next/O into/O sticky/O mud/O./O

Spring/O is/O the/O time/O of/O plans/O and/O projects/O./O And/O,/O as/O he/O came/O out/O into/O the/O
farmyard/O,/O Levin/PERSON,/O like/O a/O tree/O in/O spring/O that/O knows/O not/O what/O form/O will/O be/O
taken/O by/O the/O young/O shoots/O and/O twigs/O imprisoned/O in/O its/O swelling/O buds/O,/O
hardly/O knew/O what/O undertakings/O he/O was/O going/O to/O begin/O upon/O now/O in/O the/O farm/O
work/O that/O was/O so/O dear/O to/O him/O./O But/O he/O felt/O that/O he/O was/O full/O of/O the/O most/O
splendid/O plans/O and/O projects/O./O First/O of/O all/O he/O went/O to/O the/O cattle/O./O The/O
cows/O had/O been/O let/O out/O into/O their/O paddock/O,/O and/O their/O smooth/O sides/O were/O
already/O shining/O with/O their/O new/O,/O sleek/O,/O spring/O coats/O;/O they/O basked/O in/O the/O
sunshine/O and/O lowed/O to/O go/O to/O the/O meadow/O./O Levin/PERSON gazed/O admiringly/O at/O the/O
cows/O he/O knew/O so/O intimately/O to/O the/O minutest/O detail/O of/O their/O condition/O,/O
and/O gave/O orders/O for/O them/O to/O be/O driven/O out/O into/O the/O meadow/O,/O and/O the/O
calves/O to/O be/O let/O into/O the/O paddock/O./O The/O herdsman/O ran/O gaily/O to/O get/O ready/O
for/O the/O meadow/O./O The/O cowherd/O girls/O,/O picking/O up/O their/O petticoats/O,/O ran/O
splashing/O through/O the/O mud/O with/O bare/O legs/O,/O still/O white/O,/O not/O yet/O brown/O
from/O the/O sun/O,/O waving/O brush/O wood/O in/O their/O hands/O,/O chasing/O the/O calves/O that/O
frolicked/O in/O the/O mirth/O of/O spring/O./O

After/O admiring/O the/O young/O ones/O of/O that/O year/O,/O who/O were/O particularly/O
fine/O--/Othe/O early/O calves/O were/O the/O size/O of/O a/O peasant/O's/O cow/O,/O and/O Pava/PERSON's/O
daughter/O,/O at/O three/O months/O old/O,/O was/O as/O big/O as/O a/O yearling/O--/OLevin/PERSON gave/O
orders/O for/O a/O trough/O to/O be/O brought/O out/O and/O for/O them/O to/O be/O fed/O in/O the/O
paddock/O./O But/O it/O appeared/O that/O as/O the/O paddock/O had/O not/O been/O used/O during/O
the/O winter/O,/O the/O hurdles/O made/O in/O the/O autumn/O for/O it/O were/O broken/O./O He/O sent/O
for/O the/O carpenter/O,/O who/O,/O according/O to/O his/O orders/O,/O ought/O to/O have/O been/O at/O
work/O at/O the/O thrashing/O machine/O./O But/O it/O appeared/O that/O the/O carpenter/O was/O
repairing/O the/O harrows/O,/O which/O ought/O to/O have/O been/O repaired/O before/O Lent/O./O
This/O was/O very/O annoying/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O It/O was/O annoying/O to/O come/O upon/O that/O
everlasting/O slovenliness/O in/O the/O farm/O work/O against/O which/O he/O had/O been/O
striving/O with/O all/O his/O might/O for/O so/O many/O years/O./O The/O hurdles/O,/O as/O he/O
ascertained/O,/O being/O not/O wanted/O in/O winter/O,/O had/O been/O carried/O to/O the/O
cart-horses/O'/O stable/O;/O and/O there/O broken/O,/O as/O they/O were/O of/O light/O
construction/O,/O only/O meant/O for/O feeding/O calves/O./O Moreover/O,/O it/O was/O apparent/O
also/O that/O the/O harrows/O and/O all/O the/O agricultural/O implements/O,/O which/O he/O had/O
directed/O to/O be/O looked/O over/O and/O repaired/O in/O the/O winter/O,/O for/O which/O very/O
purpose/O he/O had/O hired/O three/O carpenters/O,/O had/O not/O been/O put/O into/O repair/O,/O and/O
the/O harrows/O were/O being/O repaired/O when/O they/O ought/O to/O have/O been/O harrowing/O
the/O field/O./O Levin/PERSON sent/O for/O his/O bailiff/O,/O but/O immediately/O went/O off/O himself/O
to/O look/O for/O him/O./O The/O bailiff/O,/O beaming/O all/O over/O,/O like/O everyone/O that/O day/O,/O
in/O a/O sheepskin/O bordered/O with/O astrachan/O,/O came/O out/O of/O the/O barn/O,/O twisting/O a/O
bit/O of/O straw/O in/O his/O hands/O./O

``/OWhy/O is/On't/O the/O carpenter/O at/O the/O thrashing/O machine/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O meant/O to/O tell/O you/O yesterday/O,/O the/O harrows/O want/O repairing/O./O Here/O
it/O's/O time/O they/O got/O to/O work/O in/O the/O fields/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O were/O they/O doing/O in/O the/O winter/O,/O then/O?/O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O did/O you/O want/O the/O carpenter/O for/O?/O''/O

``/OWhere/O are/O the/O hurdles/O for/O the/O calves/O'/O paddock/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O ordered/O them/O to/O be/O got/O ready/O./O What/O would/O you/O have/O with/O those/O
peasants/O!/O''/O said/O the/O bailiff/O,/O with/O a/O wave/O of/O his/O hand/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O those/O peasants/O but/O this/O bailiff/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O getting/O angry/O./O
``/OWhy/O,/O what/O do/O I/O keep/O you/O for/O?/O''/O he/O cried/O./O But/O,/O bethinking/O himself/O that/O
this/O would/O not/O help/O matters/O,/O he/O stopped/O short/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O a/O
sentence/O,/O and/O merely/O sighed/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O what/O do/O you/O say/O?/O Can/O sowing/O begin/O?/O''/O
he/O asked/O,/O after/O a/O pause/O./O

``/OBehind/O Turkin/LOCATION tomorrow/O or/O the/O next/O day/O they/O might/O begin/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O the/O clover/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O've/O sent/O Vassily/PERSON and/O Mishka/PERSON;/O they/O're/O sowing/O./O Only/O I/O do/On't/O know/O if/O
they/O'll/O manage/O to/O get/O through/O;/O it/O's/O so/O slushy/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O many/O acres/O?/O''/O

``/OAbout/O fifteen/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O not/O sow/O all/O?/O''/O cried/O Levin/PERSON./O

That/O they/O were/O only/O sowing/O the/O clover/O on/O fifteen/O acres/O,/O not/O on/O all/O the/O
forty-five/O,/O was/O still/O more/O annoying/O to/O him/O./O Clover/O,/O as/O he/O knew/O,/O both/O
from/O books/O and/O from/O his/O own/O experience/O,/O never/O did/O well/O except/O when/O it/O
was/O sown/O as/O early/O as/O possible/O,/O almost/O in/O the/O snow/O./O And/O yet/O Levin/PERSON could/O
never/O get/O this/O done/O./O

``/OThere/O's/O no/O one/O to/O send/O./O What/O would/O you/O have/O with/O such/O a/O set/O of/O
peasants/O?/O Three/O have/On't/O turned/O up/O./O And/O there/O's/O Semyon/O.../O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O should/O have/O taken/O some/O men/O from/O the/O thatching/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O so/O I/O have/O,/O as/O it/O is/O./O''/O

``/OWhere/O are/O the/O peasants/O,/O then/O?/O''/O

``/OFive/O are/O making/O compôte/O''/O -LRB-/Owhich/O meant/O compost/O-RRB-/O,/O ``/Ofour/O are/O shifting/O the/O
oats/O for/O fear/O of/O a/O touch/O of/O mildew/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON./O''/O

Levin/PERSON knew/O very/O well/O that/O ``/Oa/O touch/O of/O mildew/O''/O meant/O that/O his/O English/O
seed/O oats/O were/O already/O ruined/O./O Again/O they/O had/O not/O done/O as/O he/O had/O
ordered/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O but/O I/O told/O you/O during/O Lent/O to/O put/O in/O pipes/O,/O''/O he/O cried/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O put/O yourself/O out/O;/O we/O shall/O get/O it/O all/O done/O in/O time/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON waved/O his/O hand/O angrily/O,/O went/O into/O the/O granary/O to/O glance/O at/O the/O
oats/O,/O and/O then/O to/O the/O stable/O./O The/O oats/O were/O not/O yet/O spoiled/O./O But/O the/O
peasants/O were/O carrying/O the/O oats/O in/O spades/O when/O they/O might/O simply/O let/O
them/O slide/O down/O into/O the/O lower/O granary/O;/O and/O arranging/O for/O this/O to/O be/O
done/O,/O and/O taking/O two/O workmen/O from/O there/O for/O sowing/O clover/O,/O Levin/PERSON got/O
over/O his/O vexation/O with/O the/O bailiff/O./O Indeed/O,/O it/O was/O such/O a/O lovely/O day/O
that/O one/O could/O not/O be/O angry/O./O

``/OIgnat/O!/O''/O he/O called/O to/O the/O coachman/O,/O who/O,/O with/O his/O sleeves/O tucked/O up/O,/O was/O
washing/O the/O carriage/O wheels/O,/O ``/Osaddle/O me/O.../O''/O

``/OWhich/O,/O sir/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O let/O it/O be/O Kolpik/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O sir/O./O''/O

While/O they/O were/O saddling/O his/O horse/O,/O Levin/PERSON again/O called/O up/O the/O bailiff/O,/O
who/O was/O hanging/O about/O in/O sight/O,/O to/O make/O it/O up/O with/O him/O,/O and/O began/O
talking/O to/O him/O about/O the/O spring/O operations/O before/O them/O,/O and/O his/O plans/O
for/O the/O farm/O./O

The/O wagons/O were/O to/O begin/O carting/O manure/O earlier/O,/O so/O as/O to/O get/O all/O done/O
before/O the/O early/O mowing/O./O And/O the/O ploughing/O of/O the/O further/O land/O to/O go/O on/O
without/O a/O break/O so/O as/O to/O let/O it/O ripen/O lying/O fallow/O./O And/O the/O mowing/O to/O be/O
all/O done/O by/O hired/O labor/O,/O not/O on/O half-profits/O./O The/O bailiff/O listened/O
attentively/O,/O and/O obviously/O made/O an/O effort/O to/O approve/O of/O his/O employer/O's/O
projects/O./O But/O still/O he/O had/O that/O look/O Levin/PERSON knew/O so/O well/O that/O always/O
irritated/O him/O,/O a/O look/O of/O hopelessness/O and/O despondency/O./O That/O look/O said/O:/O
``/OThat/O's/O all/O very/O well/O,/O but/O as/O God/O wills/O./O''/O

Nothing/O mortified/O Levin/PERSON so/O much/O as/O that/O tone/O./O But/O it/O was/O the/O tone/O common/O
to/O all/O the/O bailiffs/O he/O had/O ever/O had/O./O They/O had/O all/O taken/O up/O that/O attitude/O
to/O his/O plans/O,/O and/O so/O now/O he/O was/O not/O angered/O by/O it/O,/O but/O mortified/O,/O and/O
felt/O all/O the/O more/O roused/O to/O struggle/O against/O this/O,/O as/O it/O seemed/O,/O
elemental/O force/O continually/O ranged/O against/O him/O,/O for/O which/O he/O could/O find/O
no/O other/O expression/O than/O ``/Oas/O God/O wills/O./O''/O

``/OIf/O we/O can/O manage/O it/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O said/O the/O bailiff/O./O

``/OWhy/O ever/O should/On't/O you/O manage/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OWe/O positively/O must/O have/O another/O fifteen/O laborers/O./O And/O they/O do/On't/O turn/O
up/O./O There/O were/O some/O here/O today/O asking/O seventy/O roubles/O for/O the/O summer/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON was/O silent/O./O Again/O he/O was/O brought/O face/O to/O face/O with/O that/O opposing/O
force/O./O He/O knew/O that/O however/O much/O they/O tried/O,/O they/O could/O not/O hire/O more/O
than/O forty/O--/Othirty-seven/O perhaps/O or/O thirty-eight/O--/Olaborers/O for/O a/O
reasonable/O sum/O./O Some/O forty/O had/O been/O taken/O on/O,/O and/O there/O were/O no/O more/O./O
But/O still/O he/O could/O not/O help/O struggling/O against/O it/O./O

``/OSend/O to/O Sury/O,/O to/O Tchefirovka/LOCATION;/O if/O they/O do/On't/O come/O we/O must/O look/O for/O
them/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O'll/O send/O,/O to/O be/O sure/O,/O''/O said/O Vassily/PERSON Fedorovitch/PERSON despondently/O./O ``/OBut/O
there/O are/O the/O horses/O,/O too/O,/O they/O're/O not/O good/O for/O much/O./O''/O

``/OWe/O'll/O get/O some/O more/O./O I/O know/O,/O of/O course/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON added/O laughing/O,/O ``/Oyou/O
always/O want/O to/O do/O with/O as/O little/O and/O as/O poor/O quality/O as/O possible/O;/O but/O
