this/O year/O I/O'm/O not/O going/O to/O let/O you/O have/O things/O your/O own/O way/O./O I/O'll/O see/O to/O
everything/O myself/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O I/O do/On't/O think/O you/O take/O much/O rest/O as/O it/O is/O./O It/O cheers/O us/O up/O to/O work/O
under/O the/O master/O's/O eye/O.../O''/O

``/OSo/O they/O're/O sowing/O clover/O behind/O the/O Birch/O Dale/PERSON?/O I/O'll/O go/O and/O have/O a/O look/O
at/O them/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O getting/O on/O to/O the/O little/O bay/O cob/O,/O Kolpik/PERSON,/O who/O was/O led/O
up/O by/O the/O coachman/O./O

``/OYou/O ca/On't/O get/O across/O the/O streams/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O the/O
coachman/O shouted/O./O

``/OAll/O right/O,/O I/O'll/O go/O by/O the/O forest/O./O''/O

And/O Levin/PERSON rode/O through/O the/O slush/O of/O the/O farmyard/O to/O the/O gate/O and/O out/O
into/O the/O open/O country/O,/O his/O good/O little/O horse/O,/O after/O his/O long/O inactivity/O,/O
stepping/O out/O gallantly/O,/O snorting/O over/O the/O pools/O,/O and/O asking/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O
for/O guidance/O./O If/O Levin/PERSON had/O felt/O happy/O before/O in/O the/O cattle/O pens/O and/O
farmyard/O,/O he/O felt/O happier/O yet/O in/O the/O open/O country/O./O Swaying/O rhythmically/O
with/O the/O ambling/O paces/O of/O his/O good/O little/O cob/O,/O drinking/O in/O the/O warm/O yet/O
fresh/O scent/O of/O the/O snow/O and/O the/O air/O,/O as/O he/O rode/O through/O his/O forest/O over/O
the/O crumbling/O,/O wasted/O snow/O,/O still/O left/O in/O parts/O,/O and/O covered/O with/O
dissolving/O tracks/O,/O he/O rejoiced/O over/O every/O tree/O,/O with/O the/O moss/O reviving/O
on/O its/O bark/O and/O the/O buds/O swelling/O on/O its/O shoots/O./O When/O he/O came/O out/O of/O the/O
forest/O,/O in/O the/O immense/O plain/O before/O him/O,/O his/O grass/O fields/O stretched/O in/O
an/O unbroken/O carpet/O of/O green/O,/O without/O one/O bare/O place/O or/O swamp/O,/O only/O
spotted/O here/O and/O there/O in/O the/O hollows/O with/O patches/O of/O melting/O snow/O./O He/O
was/O not/O put/O out/O of/O temper/O even/O by/O the/O sight/O of/O the/O peasants/O'/O horses/O and/O
colts/O trampling/O down/O his/O young/O grass/O -LRB-/Ohe/O told/O a/O peasant/O he/O met/O to/O drive/O
them/O out/O-RRB-/O,/O nor/O by/O the/O sarcastic/O and/O stupid/O reply/O of/O the/O peasant/O Ipat/PERSON,/O
whom/O he/O met/O on/O the/O way/O,/O and/O asked/O,/O ``/OWell/O,/O Ipat/O,/O shall/O we/O soon/O be/O
sowing/O?/O''/O ``/OWe/O must/O get/O the/O ploughing/O done/O first/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON
Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O answered/O Ipat/O./O The/O further/O he/O rode/O,/O the/O happier/O he/O
became/O,/O and/O plans/O for/O the/O land/O rose/O to/O his/O mind/O each/O better/O than/O the/O
last/O;/O to/O plant/O all/O his/O fields/O with/O hedges/O along/O the/O southern/O borders/O,/O so/O
that/O the/O snow/O should/O not/O lie/O under/O them/O;/O to/O divide/O them/O up/O into/O six/O
fields/O of/O arable/O and/O three/O of/O pasture/O and/O hay/O;/O to/O build/O a/O cattle/O yard/O at/O
the/O further/O end/O of/O the/O estate/O,/O and/O to/O dig/O a/O pond/O and/O to/O construct/O
movable/O pens/O for/O the/O cattle/O as/O a/O means/O of/O manuring/O the/O land/O./O And/O then/O
eight/O hundred/O acres/O of/O wheat/O,/O three/O hundred/O of/O potatoes/O,/O and/O four/O
hundred/O of/O clover/O,/O and/O not/O one/O acre/O exhausted/O./O

Absorbed/O in/O such/O dreams/O,/O carefully/O keeping/O his/O horse/O by/O the/O hedges/O,/O so/O
as/O not/O to/O trample/O his/O young/O crops/O,/O he/O rode/O up/O to/O the/O laborers/O who/O had/O
been/O sent/O to/O sow/O clover/O./O A/O cart/O with/O the/O seed/O in/O it/O was/O standing/O,/O not/O at/O
the/O edge/O,/O but/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O crop/O,/O and/O the/O winter/O corn/O had/O been/O
torn/O up/O by/O the/O wheels/O and/O trampled/O by/O the/O horse/O./O Both/O the/O laborers/O were/O
sitting/O in/O the/O hedge/O,/O probably/O smoking/O a/O pipe/O together/O./O The/O earth/O in/O the/O
cart/O,/O with/O which/O the/O seed/O was/O mixed/O,/O was/O not/O crushed/O to/O powder/O,/O but/O
crusted/O together/O or/O adhering/O in/O clods/O./O Seeing/O the/O master/O,/O the/O laborer/O,/O
Vassily/PERSON,/O went/O towards/O the/O cart/O,/O while/O Mishka/PERSON set/O to/O work/O sowing/O./O This/O
was/O not/O as/O it/O should/O be/O,/O but/O with/O the/O laborers/O Levin/PERSON seldom/O lost/O his/O
temper/O./O When/O Vassily/PERSON came/O up/O,/O Levin/PERSON told/O him/O to/O lead/O the/O horse/O to/O the/O
hedge/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O all/O right/O,/O sir/O,/O it/O'll/O spring/O up/O again/O,/O''/O responded/O Vassily/PERSON./O

``/OPlease/O do/On't/O argue/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Obut/O do/O as/O you/O're/O told/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O sir/O,/O''/O answered/O Vassily/PERSON,/O and/O he/O took/O the/O horse/O's/O head/O./O ``/OWhat/O a/O
sowing/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O hesitating/O;/O ``/Ofirst/O rate/O./O Only/O
it/O's/O a/O work/O to/O get/O about/O!/O You/O drag/O a/O ton/O of/O earth/O on/O your/O shoes/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O is/O it/O you/O have/O earth/O that/O's/O not/O sifted/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O we/O crumble/O it/O up/O,/O''/O answered/O Vassily/PERSON,/O taking/O up/O some/O seed/O and/O
rolling/O the/O earth/O in/O his/O palms/O./O

Vassily/PERSON was/O not/O to/O blame/O for/O their/O having/O filled/O up/O his/O cart/O with/O
unsifted/O earth/O,/O but/O still/O it/O was/O annoying/O./O

Levin/PERSON had/O more/O than/O once/O already/O tried/O a/O way/O he/O knew/O for/O stifling/O his/O
anger/O,/O and/O turning/O all/O that/O seemed/O dark/O right/O again/O,/O and/O he/O tried/O that/O
way/O now/O./O He/O watched/O how/O Mishka/PERSON strode/O along/O,/O swinging/O the/O huge/O clods/O of/O
earth/O that/O clung/O to/O each/O foot/O;/O and/O getting/O off/O his/O horse/O,/O he/O took/O the/O
sieve/O from/O Vassily/PERSON and/O started/O sowing/O himself/O./O

``/OWhere/O did/O you/O stop/O?/O''/O

Vassily/PERSON pointed/O to/O the/O mark/O with/O his/O foot/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON went/O forward/O as/O
best/O he/O could/O,/O scattering/O the/O seed/O on/O the/O land/O./O Walking/O was/O as/O difficult/O
as/O on/O a/O bog/O,/O and/O by/O the/O time/O Levin/PERSON had/O ended/O the/O row/O he/O was/O in/O a/O great/O
heat/O,/O and/O he/O stopped/O and/O gave/O up/O the/O sieve/O to/O Vassily/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O master/O,/O when/O summer/O's/O here/O,/O mind/O you/O do/On't/O scold/O me/O for/O these/O
rows/O,/O''/O said/O Vassily/PERSON./O

``/OEh/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON cheerily/O,/O already/O feeling/O the/O effect/O of/O his/O method/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O you/O'll/O see/O in/O the/O summer/O time/O./O It/O'll/O look/O different/O./O Look/O you/O
where/O I/O sowed/O last/O spring/O./O How/O I/O did/O work/O at/O it/O!/O I/O do/O my/O best/O,/O
Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O d'ye/O see/O,/O as/O I/O would/O for/O my/O own/O father/O./O I/O do/On't/O
like/O bad/O work/O myself/O,/O nor/O would/O I/O let/O another/O man/O do/O it/O./O What/O's/O good/O for/O
the/O master/O's/O good/O for/O us/O too/O./O To/O look/O out/O yonder/O now/O,/O''/O said/O Vassily/PERSON,/O
pointing/O,/O ``/Oit/O does/O one/O's/O heart/O good/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O a/O lovely/O spring/O,/O Vassily/PERSON./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O it/O's/O a/O spring/O such/O as/O the/O old/O men/O do/On't/O remember/O the/O like/O of/O./O I/O
was/O up/O home/O;/O an/O old/O man/O up/O there/O has/O sown/O wheat/O too/O,/O about/O an/O acre/O of/O
it/O./O He/O was/O saying/O you/O would/On't/O know/O it/O from/O rye/O./O''/O

``/OHave/O you/O been/O sowing/O wheat/O long/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O sir/O,/O it/O was/O you/O taught/O us/O the/O year/O before/O last/O./O You/O gave/O me/O two/O
measures/O./O We/O sold/O about/O eight/O bushels/O and/O sowed/O a/O rood/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O mind/O you/O crumble/O up/O the/O clods/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O going/O towards/O his/O
horse/O,/O ``/Oand/O keep/O an/O eye/O on/O Mishka/PERSON./O And/O if/O there/O's/O a/O good/O crop/O you/O shall/O
have/O half/O a/O rouble/O for/O every/O acre/O./O''/O

``/OHumbly/O thankful/O./O We/O are/O very/O well/O content/O,/O sir/O,/O as/O it/O is/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON got/O on/O his/O horse/O and/O rode/O towards/O the/O field/O where/O was/O last/O year/O's/O
clover/O,/O and/O the/O one/O which/O was/O ploughed/O ready/O for/O the/O spring/O corn/O./O

The/O crop/O of/O clover/O coming/O up/O in/O the/O stubble/O was/O magnificent/O./O It/O had/O
survived/O everything/O,/O and/O stood/O up/O vividly/O green/O through/O the/O broken/O
stalks/O of/O last/O year/O's/O wheat/O./O The/O horse/O sank/O in/O up/O to/O the/O pasterns/O,/O and/O
he/O drew/O each/O hoof/O with/O a/O sucking/O sound/O out/O of/O the/O half-thawed/O ground/O./O
Over/O the/O ploughland/O riding/O was/O utterly/O impossible/O;/O the/O horse/O could/O only/O
keep/O a/O foothold/O where/O there/O was/O ice/O,/O and/O in/O the/O thawing/O furrows/O he/O sank/O
deep/O in/O at/O each/O step/O./O The/O ploughland/O was/O in/O splendid/O condition/O;/O in/O a/O
couple/O of/O days/O it/O would/O be/O fit/O for/O harrowing/O and/O sowing/O./O Everything/O was/O
capital/O,/O everything/O was/O cheering/O./O Levin/PERSON rode/O back/O across/O the/O streams/O,/O
hoping/O the/O water/O would/O have/O gone/O down/O./O And/O he/O did/O in/O fact/O get/O across/O,/O
and/O startled/O two/O ducks/O./O ``/OThere/O must/O be/O snipe/O too/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O and/O just/O
as/O he/O reached/O the/O turning/O homewards/O he/O met/O the/O forest/O keeper/O,/O who/O
confirmed/O his/O theory/O about/O the/O snipe/O./O

Levin/PERSON went/O home/O at/O a/O trot/O,/O so/O as/O to/O have/O time/O to/O eat/O his/O dinner/O and/O get/O
his/O gun/O ready/O for/O the/O evening/O./O



Chapter/O 14/O


As/O he/O rode/O up/O to/O the/O house/O in/O the/O happiest/O frame/O of/O mind/O,/O Levin/PERSON heard/O
the/O bell/O ring/O at/O the/O side/O of/O the/O principal/O entrance/O of/O the/O house/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O's/O someone/O from/O the/O railway/O station/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O ``/Ojust/O the/O
time/O to/O be/O here/O from/O the/O Moscow/LOCATION train/O .../O Who/O could/O it/O be/O?/O What/O if/O it/O's/O
brother/O Nikolay/PERSON?/O He/O did/O say/O:/O `/OMaybe/O I/O'll/O go/O to/O the/O waters/O,/O or/O maybe/O I/O'll/O
come/O down/O to/O you/O./O'/O''/O He/O felt/O dismayed/O and/O vexed/O for/O the/O first/O minute/O,/O
that/O his/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON's/O presence/O should/O come/O to/O disturb/O his/O happy/O
mood/O of/O spring/O./O But/O he/O felt/O ashamed/O of/O the/O feeling/O,/O and/O at/O once/O he/O
opened/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O the/O arms/O of/O his/O soul/O,/O and/O with/O a/O softened/O feeling/O of/O
joy/O and/O expectation/O,/O now/O he/O hoped/O with/O all/O his/O heart/O that/O it/O was/O his/O
brother/O./O He/O pricked/O up/O his/O horse/O,/O and/O riding/O out/O from/O behind/O the/O acacias/O
he/O saw/O a/O hired/O three-horse/O sledge/O from/O the/O railway/O station/O,/O and/O a/O
gentleman/O in/O a/O fur/O coat/O./O It/O was/O not/O his/O brother/O./O ``/OOh/O,/O if/O it/O were/O only/O
some/O nice/O person/O one/O could/O talk/O to/O a/O little/O!/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O''/O cried/O Levin/PERSON joyfully/O,/O flinging/O up/O both/O his/O hands/O./O ``/OHere/O's/O a/O
delightful/O visitor/O!/O Ah/O,/O how/O glad/O I/O am/O to/O see/O you/O!/O''/O he/O shouted/O,/O
recognizing/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OI/O shall/O find/O out/O for/O certain/O whether/O she/O's/O married/O,/O or/O when/O she/O's/O going/O
to/O be/O married/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O And/O on/O that/O delicious/O spring/O day/O he/O felt/O
that/O the/O thought/O of/O her/O did/O not/O hurt/O him/O at/O all/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O did/On't/O expect/O me/O,/O eh/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O getting/O out/O
of/O the/O sledge/O,/O splashed/O with/O mud/O on/O the/O bridge/O of/O his/O nose/O,/O on/O his/O
cheek/O,/O and/O on/O his/O eyebrows/O,/O but/O radiant/O with/O health/O and/O good/O spirits/O./O
``/OI/O've/O come/O to/O see/O you/O in/O the/O first/O place/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O embracing/O and/O
kissing/O him/O,/O ``/Oto/O have/O some/O stand-shooting/O second/O,/O and/O to/O sell/O the/O forest/O
at/O Ergushovo/LOCATION third/O./O''/O

``/ODelightful/O!/O What/O a/O spring/O we/O're/O having/O!/O How/O ever/O did/O you/O get/O along/O in/O a/O
sledge/O?/O''/O

``/OIn/O a/O cart/O it/O would/O have/O been/O worse/O still/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O
answered/O the/O driver/O,/O who/O knew/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O'm/O very/O,/O very/O glad/O to/O see/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O with/O a/O genuine/O smile/O
of/O childlike/O delight/O./O

Levin/PERSON led/O his/O friend/O to/O the/O room/O set/O apart/O for/O visitors/O,/O where/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O things/O were/O carried/O also/O--/Oa/O bag/O,/O a/O gun/O in/O a/O case/O,/O a/O
satchel/O for/O cigars/O./O Leaving/O him/O there/O to/O wash/O and/O change/O his/O clothes/O,/O
Levin/PERSON went/O off/O to/O the/O counting/O house/O to/O speak/O about/O the/O ploughing/O and/O
clover/O./O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O always/O very/O anxious/O for/O the/O credit/O of/O the/O
house/O,/O met/O him/O in/O the/O hall/O with/O inquiries/O about/O dinner/O./O

``/ODo/O just/O as/O you/O like/O,/O only/O let/O it/O be/O as/O soon/O as/O possible/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O
went/O to/O the/O bailiff/O./O

When/O he/O came/O back/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O washed/O and/O combed/O,/O came/O out/O of/O
his/O room/O with/O a/O beaming/O smile/O,/O and/O they/O went/O upstairs/O together/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O am/O glad/O I/O managed/O to/O get/O away/O to/O you/O!/O Now/O I/O shall/O understand/O
what/O the/O mysterious/O business/O is/O that/O you/O are/O always/O absorbed/O in/O here/O./O
No/O,/O really/O,/O I/O envy/O you/O./O What/O a/O house/O,/O how/O nice/O it/O all/O is/O!/O So/O bright/O,/O so/O
cheerful/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O forgetting/O that/O it/O was/O not/O always/O
spring/O and/O fine/O weather/O like/O that/O day/O./O ``/OAnd/O your/O nurse/O is/O simply/O
charming/O!/O A/O pretty/O maid/O in/O an/O apron/O might/O be/O even/O more/O agreeable/O,/O
perhaps/O;/O but/O for/O your/O severe/O monastic/O style/O it/O does/O very/O well/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON told/O him/O many/O interesting/O pieces/O of/O news/O;/O especially/O
interesting/O to/O Levin/PERSON was/O the/O news/O that/O his/O brother/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O
was/O intending/O to/O pay/O him/O a/O visit/O in/O the/O summer/O./O

Not/O one/O word/O did/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON say/O in/O reference/O to/O Kitty/PERSON and/O the/O
Shtcherbatskys/O;/O he/O merely/O gave/O him/O greetings/O from/O his/O wife/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O
grateful/O to/O him/O for/O his/O delicacy/O and/O was/O very/O glad/O of/O his/O visitor/O./O As/O
always/O happened/O with/O him/O during/O his/O solitude/O,/O a/O mass/O of/O ideas/O and/O
feelings/O had/O been/O accumulating/O within/O him/O,/O which/O he/O could/O not/O
communicate/O to/O those/O about/O him/O./O And/O now/O he/O poured/O out/O upon/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON his/O poetic/O joy/O in/O the/O spring/O,/O and/O his/O failures/O and/O plans/O
for/O the/O land/O,/O and/O his/O thoughts/O and/O criticisms/O on/O the/O books/O he/O had/O been/O
reading/O,/O and/O the/O idea/O of/O his/O own/O book/O,/O the/O basis/O of/O which/O really/O was/O,/O
though/O he/O was/O unaware/O of/O it/O himself/O,/O a/O criticism/O of/O all/O the/O old/O books/O on/O
agriculture/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O always/O charming/O,/O understanding/O
everything/O at/O the/O slightest/O reference/O,/O was/O particularly/O charming/O on/O this/O
visit/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON noticed/O in/O him/O a/O special/O tenderness/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O and/O a/O
new/O tone/O of/O respect/O that/O flattered/O him/O./O

The/O efforts/O of/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON and/O the/O cook/O,/O that/O the/O dinner/O should/O be/O
particularly/O good/O,/O only/O ended/O in/O the/O two/O famished/O friends/O attacking/O the/O
preliminary/O course/O,/O eating/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O bread/O and/O butter/O,/O salt/O goose/O
and/O salted/O mushrooms/O,/O and/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O finally/O ordering/O the/O soup/O to/O be/O
served/O without/O the/O accompaniment/O of/O little/O pies/O,/O with/O which/O the/O cook/O had/O
particularly/O meant/O to/O impress/O their/O visitor/O./O But/O though/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O accustomed/O to/O very/O different/O dinners/O,/O he/O thought/O
everything/O excellent/O:/O the/O herb/O brandy/O,/O and/O the/O bread/O,/O and/O the/O butter/O,/O
and/O above/O all/O the/O salt/O goose/O and/O the/O mushrooms/O,/O and/O the/O nettle/O soup/O,/O and/O
the/O chicken/O in/O white/O sauce/O,/O and/O the/O white/O Crimean/O wine/O--/Oeverything/O was/O
superb/O and/O delicious/O./O

``/OSplendid/O,/O splendid/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O lighting/O a/O fat/O cigar/O after/O the/O roast/O./O ``/OI/O
feel/O as/O if/O,/O coming/O to/O you/O,/O I/O had/O landed/O on/O a/O peaceful/O shore/O after/O the/O
noise/O and/O jolting/O of/O a/O steamer/O./O And/O so/O you/O maintain/O that/O the/O laborer/O
himself/O is/O an/O element/O to/O be/O studied/O and/O to/O regulate/O the/O choice/O of/O
methods/O in/O agriculture/O./O Of/O course/O,/O I/O'm/O an/O ignorant/O outsider/O;/O but/O I/O
should/O fancy/O theory/O and/O its/O application/O will/O have/O its/O influence/O on/O the/O
laborer/O too/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O wait/O a/O bit/O./O I/O'm/O not/O talking/O of/O political/O economy/O,/O I/O'm/O talking/O
of/O the/O science/O of/O agriculture/O./O It/O ought/O to/O be/O like/O the/O natural/O sciences/O,/O
and/O to/O observe/O given/O phenomena/O and/O the/O laborer/O in/O his/O economic/O,/O
ethnographical/O.../O''/O

At/O that/O instant/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON came/O in/O with/O jam/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O kissing/O the/O tips/O of/O
his/O plump/O fingers/O,/O ``/Owhat/O salt/O goose/O,/O what/O herb/O brandy/O!/O.../O What/O do/O you/O
think/O,/O is/On't/O it/O time/O to/O start/O,/O Kostya/PERSON?/O''/O he/O added/O./O

Levin/PERSON looked/O out/O of/O the/O window/O at/O the/O sun/O sinking/O behind/O the/O bare/O
tree-tops/O of/O the/O forest/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O time/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OKouzma/PERSON,/O get/O ready/O the/O trap/O,/O''/O and/O he/O ran/O
downstairs/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O going/O down/O,/O carefully/O took/O the/O canvas/O cover/O off/O his/O
varnished/O gun/O case/O with/O his/O own/O hands/O,/O and/O opening/O it/O,/O began/O to/O get/O
ready/O his/O expensive/O new-fashioned/O gun/O./O Kouzma/PERSON,/O who/O already/O scented/O a/O big/O
tip/O,/O never/O left/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O side/O,/O and/O put/O on/O him/O both/O his/O
stockings/O and/O boots/O,/O a/O task/O which/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON readily/O left/O him/O./O

``/OKostya/PERSON,/O give/O orders/O that/O if/O the/O merchant/O Ryabinin/PERSON comes/O .../O I/O told/O him/O
to/O come/O today/O,/O he/O's/O to/O be/O brought/O in/O and/O to/O wait/O for/O me/O.../O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O do/O you/O mean/O to/O say/O you/O're/O selling/O the/O forest/O to/O Ryabinin/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OYes/O./O Do/O you/O know/O him/O?/O''/O

``/OTo/O be/O sure/O I/O do/O./O I/O have/O had/O to/O do/O business/O with/O him/O,/O `/Opositively/O and/O
conclusively/O./O'/O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON laughed/O./O ``/OPositively/O and/O conclusively/O''/O were/O the/O
merchant/O's/O favorite/O words/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O wonderfully/O funny/O the/O way/O he/O talks/O./O She/O knows/O where/O her/O
master/O's/O going/O!/O''/O he/O added/O,/O patting/O Laska/PERSON,/O who/O hung/O about/O Levin/PERSON,/O whining/O
and/O licking/O his/O hands/O,/O his/O boots/O,/O and/O his/O gun/O./O

The/O trap/O was/O already/O at/O the/O steps/O when/O they/O went/O out/O./O

``/OI/O told/O them/O to/O bring/O the/O trap/O round/O;/O or/O would/O you/O rather/O walk/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O we/O'd/O better/O drive/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O getting/O into/O the/O
trap/O./O He/O sat/O down/O,/O tucked/O the/O tiger-skin/O rug/O round/O him/O,/O and/O lighted/O a/O
cigar/O./O ``/OHow/O is/O it/O you/O do/On't/O smoke/O?/O A/O cigar/O is/O a/O sort/O of/O thing/O,/O not/O
exactly/O a/O pleasure/O,/O but/O the/O crown/O and/O outward/O sign/O of/O pleasure/O./O Come/O,/O
this/O is/O life/O!/O How/O splendid/O it/O is/O!/O This/O is/O how/O I/O should/O like/O to/O live/O!/O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O who/O prevents/O you/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O you/O're/O a/O lucky/O man/O!/O You/O've/O got/O everything/O you/O like/O./O You/O like/O
horses/O--/Oand/O you/O have/O them/O;/O dogs/O--/Oyou/O have/O them/O;/O shooting/O--/Oyou/O have/O it/O;/O
farming/O--/Oyou/O have/O it/O./O''/O

``/OPerhaps/O because/O I/O rejoice/O in/O what/O I/O have/O,/O and/O do/On't/O fret/O for/O what/O I/O
have/On't/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O thinking/O of/O Kitty/PERSON./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON comprehended/O,/O looked/O at/O him/O,/O but/O said/O nothing/O./O

Levin/PERSON was/O grateful/O to/O Oblonsky/PERSON for/O noticing/O,/O with/O his/O never-failing/O
tact/O,/O that/O he/O dreaded/O conversation/O about/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O,/O and/O so/O
saying/O nothing/O about/O them/O./O But/O now/O Levin/PERSON was/O longing/O to/O find/O out/O what/O
was/O tormenting/O him/O so/O,/O yet/O he/O had/O not/O the/O courage/O to/O begin/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O tell/O me/O how/O things/O are/O going/O with/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O bethinking/O
himself/O that/O it/O was/O not/O nice/O of/O him/O to/O think/O only/O of/O himself/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O eyes/O sparkled/O merrily/O./O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O admit/O,/O I/O know/O,/O that/O one/O can/O be/O fond/O of/O new/O rolls/O when/O one/O has/O
had/O one/O's/O rations/O of/O bread/O--/Oto/O your/O mind/O it/O's/O a/O crime/O;/O but/O I/O do/On't/O count/O
life/O as/O life/O without/O love/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O taking/O Levin/PERSON's/O question/O his/O own/O
way/O./O ``/OWhat/O am/O I/O to/O do/O?/O I/O'm/O made/O that/O way/O./O And/O really/O,/O one/O does/O so/O little/O
harm/O to/O anyone/O,/O and/O gives/O oneself/O so/O much/O pleasure/O.../O''/O

``/OWhat/O!/O is/O there/O something/O new/O,/O then/O?/O''/O queried/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O my/O boy/O,/O there/O is/O!/O There/O,/O do/O you/O see/O,/O you/O know/O the/O type/O of/O Ossian/PERSON's/O
women/O.../O./O Women/O,/O such/O as/O one/O sees/O in/O dreams/O.../O./O Well/O,/O these/O women/O are/O
sometimes/O to/O be/O met/O in/O reality/O .../O and/O these/O women/O are/O terrible/O./O Woman/O,/O
do/On't/O you/O know/O,/O is/O such/O a/O subject/O that/O however/O much/O you/O study/O it/O,/O it/O's/O
always/O perfectly/O new/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O then/O,/O it/O would/O be/O better/O not/O to/O study/O it/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O./O Some/O mathematician/O has/O said/O that/O enjoyment/O lies/O in/O the/O search/O for/O
truth/O,/O not/O in/O the/O finding/O it/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON listened/O in/O silence/O,/O and/O in/O spite/O of/O all/O the/O efforts/O he/O made/O,/O he/O
could/O not/O in/O the/O least/O enter/O into/O the/O feelings/O of/O his/O friend/O and/O
understand/O his/O sentiments/O and/O the/O charm/O of/O studying/O such/O women/O./O



Chapter/O 15/O


The/O place/O fixed/O on/O for/O the/O stand-shooting/O was/O not/O far/O above/O a/O stream/O in/O
a/O little/O aspen/O copse/O./O On/O reaching/O the/O copse/O,/O Levin/PERSON got/O out/O of/O the/O trap/O
and/O led/O Oblonsky/PERSON to/O a/O corner/O of/O a/O mossy/O,/O swampy/O glade/O,/O already/O quite/O
free/O from/O snow/O./O He/O went/O back/O himself/O to/O a/O double/O birch/O tree/O on/O the/O other/O
side/O,/O and/O leaning/O his/O gun/O on/O the/O fork/O of/O a/O dead/O lower/O branch/O,/O he/O took/O
off/O his/O full/O overcoat/O,/O fastened/O his/O belt/O again/O,/O and/O worked/O his/O arms/O to/O
see/O if/O they/O were/O free/O./O

Gray/O old/O Laska/PERSON,/O who/O had/O followed/O them/O,/O sat/O down/O warily/O opposite/O him/O and/O
pricked/O up/O her/O ears/O./O The/O sun/O was/O setting/O behind/O a/O thick/O forest/O,/O and/O in/O
the/O glow/O of/O sunset/O the/O birch/O trees/O,/O dotted/O about/O in/O the/O aspen/O copse/O,/O
stood/O out/O clearly/O with/O their/O hanging/O twigs/O,/O and/O their/O buds/O swollen/O
almost/O to/O bursting/O./O

From/O the/O thickest/O parts/O of/O the/O copse/O,/O where/O the/O snow/O still/O remained/O,/O
came/O the/O faint/O sound/O of/O narrow/O winding/O threads/O of/O water/O running/O away/O./O
Tiny/O birds/O twittered/O,/O and/O now/O and/O then/O fluttered/O from/O tree/O to/O tree/O./O

In/O the/O pauses/O of/O complete/O stillness/O there/O came/O the/O rustle/O of/O last/O year/O's/O
leaves/O,/O stirred/O by/O the/O thawing/O of/O the/O earth/O and/O the/O growth/O of/O the/O grass/O./O

``/OImagine/O!/O One/O can/O hear/O and/O see/O the/O grass/O growing/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O to/O
himself/O,/O noticing/O a/O wet/O,/O slate-colored/O aspen/O leaf/O moving/O beside/O a/O blade/O
of/O young/O grass/O./O He/O stood/O,/O listened/O,/O and/O gazed/O sometimes/O down/O at/O the/O wet/O
mossy/O ground/O,/O sometimes/O at/O Laska/LOCATION listening/O all/O alert/O,/O sometimes/O at/O the/O
sea/O of/O bare/O tree/O tops/O that/O stretched/O on/O the/O slope/O below/O him/O,/O sometimes/O
at/O the/O darkening/O sky/O,/O covered/O with/O white/O streaks/O of/O cloud/O./O

A/O hawk/O flew/O high/O over/O a/O forest/O far/O away/O with/O slow/O sweep/O of/O its/O wings/O;/O
another/O flew/O with/O exactly/O the/O same/O motion/O in/O the/O same/O direction/O and/O
vanished/O./O The/O birds/O twittered/O more/O and/O more/O loudly/O and/O busily/O in/O the/O
thicket/O./O An/O owl/O hooted/O not/O far/O off/O,/O and/O Laska/PERSON,/O starting/O,/O stepped/O
cautiously/O a/O few/O steps/O forward/O,/O and/O putting/O her/O head/O on/O one/O side/O,/O began/O
to/O listen/O intently/O./O Beyond/O the/O stream/O was/O heard/O the/O cuckoo/O./O Twice/O she/O
uttered/O her/O usual/O cuckoo/O call/O,/O and/O then/O gave/O a/O hoarse/O,/O hurried/O call/O and/O
broke/O down/O./O

``/OImagine/O!/O the/O cuckoo/O already/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O coming/O out/O from/O
behind/O a/O bush/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O hear/O it/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O reluctantly/O breaking/O the/O stillness/O
with/O his/O voice/O,/O which/O sounded/O disagreeable/O to/O himself/O./O ``/ONow/O it/O's/O
coming/O!/O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O figure/O again/O went/O behind/O the/O bush/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON saw/O
nothing/O but/O the/O bright/O flash/O of/O a/O match/O,/O followed/O by/O the/O red/O glow/O and/O
blue/O smoke/O of/O a/O cigarette/O./O

``/OTchk/O!/O tchk/O!/O''/O came/O the/O snapping/O sound/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON cocking/O his/O
gun/O./O

``/OWhat/O's/O that/O cry/O?/O''/O asked/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O drawing/O Levin/PERSON's/O attention/O to/O a/O
prolonged/O cry/O,/O as/O though/O a/O colt/O were/O whinnying/O in/O a/O high/O voice/O,/O in/O play/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O do/On't/O you/O know/O it/O?/O That/O's/O the/O hare/O./O But/O enough/O talking/O!/O Listen/O,/O
it/O's/O flying/O!/O''/O almost/O shrieked/O Levin/PERSON,/O cocking/O his/O gun/O./O

They/O heard/O a/O shrill/O whistle/O in/O the/O distance/O,/O and/O in/O the/O exact/O time/O,/O so/O
well/O known/O to/O the/O sportsman/O,/O two/O seconds/O later/O--/Oanother/O,/O a/O third/O,/O and/O
after/O the/O third/O whistle/O the/O hoarse/O,/O guttural/O cry/O could/O be/O heard/O./O

Levin/PERSON looked/O about/O him/O to/O right/O and/O to/O left/O,/O and/O there/O,/O just/O facing/O him/O
against/O the/O dusky/O blue/O sky/O above/O the/O confused/O mass/O of/O tender/O shoots/O of/O
the/O aspens/O,/O he/O saw/O the/O flying/O bird/O./O It/O was/O flying/O straight/O towards/O him/O;/O
the/O guttural/O cry/O,/O like/O the/O even/O tearing/O of/O some/O strong/O stuff/O,/O sounded/O
close/O to/O his/O ear/O;/O the/O long/O beak/O and/O neck/O of/O the/O bird/O could/O be/O seen/O,/O and/O
at/O the/O very/O instant/O when/O Levin/PERSON was/O taking/O aim/O,/O behind/O the/O bush/O where/O
Oblonsky/PERSON stood/O,/O there/O was/O a/O flash/O of/O red/O lightning/O:/O the/O bird/O dropped/O
like/O an/O arrow/O,/O and/O darted/O upwards/O again/O./O Again/O came/O the/O red/O flash/O and/O
the/O sound/O of/O a/O blow/O,/O and/O fluttering/O its/O wings/O as/O though/O trying/O to/O keep/O
up/O in/O the/O air/O,/O the/O bird/O halted/O,/O stopped/O still/O an/O instant/O,/O and/O fell/O with/O
a/O heavy/O splash/O on/O the/O slushy/O ground/O./O

``/OCan/O I/O have/O missed/O it/O?/O''/O shouted/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O who/O could/O not/O see/O
for/O the/O smoke/O./O

``/OHere/O it/O is/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O pointing/O to/O Laska/PERSON,/O who/O with/O one/O ear/O raised/O,/O
wagging/O the/O end/O of/O her/O shaggy/O tail/O,/O came/O slowly/O back/O as/O though/O she/O would/O
prolong/O the/O pleasure/O,/O and/O as/O it/O were/O smiling/O,/O brought/O the/O dead/O bird/O to/O
her/O master/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O I/O'm/O glad/O you/O were/O successful/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O who/O,/O at/O
the/O same/O time/O,/O had/O a/O sense/O of/O envy/O that/O he/O had/O not/O succeeded/O in/O shooting/O
the/O snipe/O./O

``/OIt/O was/O a/O bad/O shot/O from/O the/O right/O barrel/O,/O''/O responded/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O loading/O his/O gun/O./O ``/OSh/O.../O it/O's/O flying/O!/O''/O

The/O shrill/O whistles/O rapidly/O following/O one/O another/O were/O heard/O again/O./O Two/O
snipe/O,/O playing/O and/O chasing/O one/O another/O,/O and/O only/O whistling/O,/O not/O crying/O,/O
flew/O straight/O at/O the/O very/O heads/O of/O the/O sportsmen/O./O There/O was/O the/O report/O
of/O four/O shots/O,/O and/O like/O swallows/O the/O snipe/O turned/O swift/O somersaults/O in/O
the/O air/O and/O vanished/O from/O sight/O./O

The/O stand-shooting/O was/O capital/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON shot/O two/O more/O birds/O
and/O Levin/PERSON two/O,/O of/O which/O one/O was/O not/O found/O./O It/O began/O to/O get/O dark/O./O Venus/PERSON,/O
bright/O and/O silvery/O,/O shone/O with/O her/O soft/O light/O low/O down/O in/O the/O west/O
behind/O the/O birch/O trees/O,/O and/O high/O up/O in/O the/O east/O twinkled/O the/O red/O lights/O
of/O Arcturus/O./O Over/O his/O head/O Levin/PERSON made/O out/O the/O stars/O of/O the/O Great/O Bear/O
and/O lost/O them/O again/O./O The/O snipe/O had/O ceased/O flying/O;/O but/O Levin/PERSON resolved/O to/O
stay/O a/O little/O longer/O,/O till/O Venus/O,/O which/O he/O saw/O below/O a/O branch/O of/O birch/O,/O
should/O be/O above/O it/O,/O and/O the/O stars/O of/O the/O Great/O Bear/O should/O be/O perfectly/O
plain/O./O Venus/PERSON had/O risen/O above/O the/O branch/O,/O and/O the/O ear/O of/O the/O Great/O Bear/O
with/O its/O shaft/O was/O now/O all/O plainly/O visible/O against/O the/O dark/O blue/O sky/O,/O
yet/O still/O he/O waited/O./O

``/OIs/On't/O it/O time/O to/O go/O home/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

It/O was/O quite/O still/O now/O in/O the/O copse/O,/O and/O not/O a/O bird/O was/O stirring/O./O

``/OLet/O's/O stay/O a/O little/O while/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OAs/O you/O like/O./O''/O

They/O were/O standing/O now/O about/O fifteen/O paces/O from/O one/O another/O./O

``/OStiva/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON unexpectedly/O;/O ``/Ohow/O is/O it/O you/O do/On't/O tell/O me/O whether/O
your/O sister-in-law/O's/O married/O yet/O,/O or/O when/O she/O's/O going/O to/O be/O?/O''/O

Levin/PERSON felt/O so/O resolute/O and/O serene/O that/O no/O answer/O,/O he/O fancied/O,/O could/O
affect/O him/O./O But/O he/O had/O never/O dreamed/O of/O what/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
replied/O./O

``/OShe/O's/O never/O thought/O of/O being/O married/O,/O and/O is/On't/O thinking/O of/O it/O;/O but/O
she/O's/O very/O ill/O,/O and/O the/O doctors/O have/O sent/O her/O abroad/O./O They/O're/O positively/O
afraid/O she/O may/O not/O live/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O!/O''/O cried/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OVery/O ill/O?/O What/O is/O wrong/O with/O her/O?/O How/O has/O she/O.../O?/O''/O

While/O they/O were/O saying/O this/O,/O Laska/PERSON,/O with/O ears/O pricked/O up/O,/O was/O looking/O
upwards/O at/O the/O sky/O,/O and/O reproachfully/O at/O them/O./O

``/OThey/O have/O chosen/O a/O time/O to/O talk/O,/O''/O she/O was/O thinking/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O on/O the/O
wing/O.../O./O Here/O it/O is/O,/O yes/O,/O it/O is/O./O They/O'll/O miss/O it/O,/O''/O thought/O Laska/PERSON./O

But/O at/O that/O very/O instant/O both/O suddenly/O heard/O a/O shrill/O whistle/O which/O,/O as/O
it/O were/O,/O smote/O on/O their/O ears/O,/O and/O both/O suddenly/O seized/O their/O guns/O and/O
two/O flashes/O gleamed/O,/O and/O two/O bangs/O sounded/O at/O the/O very/O same/O instant/O./O The/O
snipe/O flying/O high/O above/O instantly/O folded/O its/O wings/O and/O fell/O into/O a/O
thicket/O,/O bending/O down/O the/O delicate/O shoots/O./O

``/OSplendid/O!/O Together/O!/O''/O cried/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O he/O ran/O with/O Laska/PERSON into/O the/O
thicket/O to/O look/O for/O the/O snipe/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O what/O was/O it/O that/O was/O unpleasant/O?/O''/O he/O wondered/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O Kitty/PERSON's/O
ill/O.../O./O Well/O,/O it/O ca/On't/O be/O helped/O;/O I/O'm/O very/O sorry/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

``/OShe/O's/O found/O it/O!/O Is/On't/O she/O a/O clever/O thing/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O taking/O the/O warm/O
bird/O from/O Laska/PERSON's/O mouth/O and/O packing/O it/O into/O the/O almost/O full/O game/O bag/O./O
``/OI/O've/O got/O it/O,/O Stiva/O!/O''/O he/O shouted/O./O



Chapter/O 16/O


On/O the/O way/O home/O Levin/PERSON asked/O all/O details/O of/O Kitty/PERSON's/O illness/O and/O the/O
Shtcherbatskys/O'/O plans/O,/O and/O though/O he/O would/O have/O been/O ashamed/O to/O admit/O
it/O,/O he/O was/O pleased/O at/O what/O he/O heard/O./O He/O was/O pleased/O that/O there/O was/O still/O
hope/O,/O and/O still/O more/O pleased/O that/O she/O should/O be/O suffering/O who/O had/O made/O
him/O suffer/O so/O much/O./O But/O when/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON began/O to/O speak/O of/O the/O
causes/O of/O Kitty/PERSON's/O illness/O,/O and/O mentioned/O Vronsky/O's/O name/O,/O Levin/PERSON cut/O him/O
short/O./O

``/OI/O have/O no/O right/O whatever/O to/O know/O family/O matters/O,/O and/O,/O to/O tell/O the/O
truth/O,/O no/O interest/O in/O them/O either/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON smiled/O hardly/O perceptibly/O,/O catching/O the/O
instantaneous/O change/O he/O knew/O so/O well/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O face/O,/O which/O had/O become/O
as/O gloomy/O as/O it/O had/O been/O bright/O a/O minute/O before/O./O

``/OHave/O you/O quite/O settled/O about/O the/O forest/O with/O Ryabinin/PERSON?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O settled/O./O The/O price/O is/O magnificent/O;/O thirty-eight/O thousand/O./O
Eight/O straight/O away/O,/O and/O the/O rest/O in/O six/O years/O./O I/O've/O been/O bothering/O
about/O it/O for/O ever/O so/O long/O./O No/O one/O would/O give/O more/O./O''/O

``/OThen/O you/O've/O as/O good/O as/O given/O away/O your/O forest/O for/O nothing/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON
gloomily/O./O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O mean/O for/O nothing/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON with/O a/O
good-humored/O smile/O,/O knowing/O that/O nothing/O would/O be/O right/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O eyes/O
now/O./O

``/OBecause/O the/O forest/O is/O worth/O at/O least/O a/O hundred/O and/O fifty/O roubles/O the/O
acre/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O these/O farmers/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON playfully/O./O ``/OYour/O tone/O of/O
contempt/O for/O us/O poor/O townsfolk/O!/O.../O But/O when/O it/O comes/O to/O business/O,/O we/O do/O
it/O better/O than/O anyone/O./O I/O assure/O you/O I/O have/O reckoned/O it/O all/O out/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O,/O ``/Oand/O the/O forest/O is/O fetching/O a/O very/O good/O price/O--/Oso/O much/O so/O that/O I/O'm/O
afraid/O of/O this/O fellow/O's/O crying/O off/O,/O in/O fact/O./O You/O know/O it/O's/O not/O
`/Otimber/O,/O'/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O hoping/O by/O this/O distinction/O to/O
convince/O Levin/PERSON completely/O of/O the/O unfairness/O of/O his/O doubts/O./O ``/OAnd/O it/O wo/On't/O
run/O to/O more/O than/O twenty-five/O yards/O of/O fagots/O per/O acre/O,/O and/O he/O's/O giving/O
me/O at/O the/O rate/O of/O seventy/O roubles/O the/O acre/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON smiled/O contemptuously/O./O ``/OI/O know/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O ``/Othat/O fashion/O not/O
only/O in/O him/O,/O but/O in/O all/O city/O people/O,/O who/O,/O after/O being/O twice/O in/O ten/O years/O
in/O the/O country/O,/O pick/O up/O two/O or/O three/O phrases/O and/O use/O them/O in/O season/O and/O
out/O of/O season/O,/O firmly/O persuaded/O that/O they/O know/O all/O about/O it/O./O `/O_/OTimber/O,/O
run/O to/O so/O many/O yards/O the/O acre/O./O_/O'/O He/O says/O those/O words/O without/O
understanding/O them/O himself/O./O''/O

``/OI/O would/On't/O attempt/O to/O teach/O you/O what/O you/O write/O about/O in/O your/O office/O,/O''/O
said/O he/O,/O ``/Oand/O if/O need/O arose/O,/O I/O should/O come/O to/O you/O to/O ask/O about/O it/O./O But/O
you/O're/O so/O positive/O you/O know/O all/O the/O lore/O of/O the/O forest/O./O It/O's/O difficult/O./O
Have/O you/O counted/O the/O trees/O?/O''/O

``/OHow/O count/O the/O trees/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O laughing/O,/O still/O trying/O
to/O draw/O his/O friend/O out/O of/O his/O ill-temper/O./O ``/OCount/O the/O sands/O of/O the/O sea/O,/O
number/O the/O stars/O./O Some/O higher/O power/O might/O do/O it/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O the/O higher/O power/O of/O Ryabinin/LOCATION can/O./O Not/O a/O single/O merchant/O ever/O
buys/O a/O forest/O without/O counting/O the/O trees/O,/O unless/O they/O get/O it/O given/O them/O
for/O nothing/O,/O as/O you/O're/O doing/O now/O./O I/O know/O your/O forest/O./O I/O go/O there/O every/O
year/O shooting/O,/O and/O your/O forest/O's/O worth/O a/O hundred/O and/O fifty/O roubles/O an/O
acre/O paid/O down/O,/O while/O he/O's/O giving/O you/O sixty/O by/O installments/O./O So/O that/O in/O
fact/O you/O're/O making/O him/O a/O present/O of/O thirty/O thousand/O./O''/O

``/OCome/O,/O do/On't/O let/O your/O imagination/O run/O away/O with/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON piteously/O./O ``/OWhy/O was/O it/O none/O would/O give/O it/O,/O then/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O because/O he/O has/O an/O understanding/O with/O the/O merchants/O;/O he/O's/O bought/O
them/O off/O./O I/O've/O had/O to/O do/O with/O all/O of/O them/O;/O I/O know/O them/O./O They/O're/O not/O
merchants/O,/O you/O know/O:/O they/O're/O speculators/O./O He/O would/On't/O look/O at/O a/O bargain/O
that/O gave/O him/O ten/O,/O fifteen/O per/O cent/O profit/O,/O but/O holds/O back/O to/O buy/O a/O
rouble/O's/O worth/O for/O twenty/O kopecks/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O enough/O of/O it/O!/O You/O're/O out/O of/O temper/O./O''/O

``/ONot/O the/O least/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON gloomily/O,/O as/O they/O drove/O up/O to/O the/O house/O./O

At/O the/O steps/O there/O stood/O a/O trap/O tightly/O covered/O with/O iron/O and/O leather/O,/O
with/O a/O sleek/O horse/O tightly/O harnessed/O with/O broad/O collar-straps/O./O In/O the/O
trap/O sat/O the/O chubby/O,/O tightly/O belted/O clerk/O who/O served/O Ryabinin/PERSON as/O
coachman/O./O Ryabinin/PERSON himself/O was/O already/O in/O the/O house/O,/O and/O met/O the/O friends/O
in/O the/O hall/O./O Ryabinin/PERSON was/O a/O tall/O,/O thinnish/O,/O middle-aged/O man/O,/O with/O
mustache/O and/O a/O projecting/O clean-shaven/O chin/O,/O and/O prominent/O muddy-looking/O
eyes/O./O He/O was/O dressed/O in/O a/O long-skirted/O blue/O coat/O,/O with/O buttons/O below/O the/O
waist/O at/O the/O back/O,/O and/O wore/O high/O boots/O wrinkled/O over/O the/O ankles/O and/O
straight/O over/O the/O calf/O,/O with/O big/O galoshes/O drawn/O over/O them/O./O He/O rubbed/O his/O
face/O with/O his/O handkerchief/O,/O and/O wrapping/O round/O him/O his/O coat/O,/O which/O sat/O
extremely/O well/O as/O it/O was/O,/O he/O greeted/O them/O with/O a/O smile/O,/O holding/O out/O his/O
hand/O to/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O as/O though/O he/O wanted/O to/O catch/O something/O./O

``/OSo/O here/O you/O are/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O giving/O him/O his/O hand/O./O
``/OThat/O's/O capital/O./O''/O

``/OI/O did/O not/O venture/O to/O disregard/O your/O excellency/O's/O commands/O,/O though/O the/O
road/O was/O extremely/O bad/O./O I/O positively/O walked/O the/O whole/O way/O,/O but/O I/O am/O here/O
at/O my/O time/O./O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O my/O respects/O''/O;/O he/O turned/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O
trying/O to/O seize/O his/O hand/O too/O./O But/O Levin/PERSON,/O scowling/O,/O made/O as/O though/O he/O did/O
not/O notice/O his/O hand/O,/O and/O took/O out/O the/O snipe/O./O ``/OYour/O honors/O have/O been/O
diverting/O yourselves/O with/O the/O chase/O?/O What/O kind/O of/O bird/O may/O it/O be/O,/O pray/O?/O''/O
added/O Ryabinin/PERSON,/O looking/O contemptuously/O at/O the/O snipe/O:/O ``/Oa/O great/O delicacy/O,/O
I/O suppose/O./O''/O And/O he/O shook/O his/O head/O disapprovingly/O,/O as/O though/O he/O had/O grave/O
doubts/O whether/O this/O game/O were/O worth/O the/O candle/O./O

``/OWould/O you/O like/O to/O go/O into/O my/O study/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O in/O French/O to/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O scowling/O morosely/O./O ``/OGo/O into/O my/O study/O;/O you/O can/O talk/O there/O./O''/O

``/OQuite/O so/O,/O where/O you/O please/O,/O''/O said/O Ryabinin/PERSON with/O contemptuous/O dignity/O,/O
as/O though/O wishing/O to/O make/O it/O felt/O that/O others/O might/O be/O in/O difficulties/O
as/O to/O how/O to/O behave/O,/O but/O that/O he/O could/O never/O be/O in/O any/O difficulty/O about/O
anything/O./O

On/O entering/O the/O study/O Ryabinin/PERSON looked/O about/O,/O as/O his/O habit/O was/O,/O as/O though/O
seeking/O the/O holy/O picture/O,/O but/O when/O he/O had/O found/O it/O,/O he/O did/O not/O cross/O
himself/O./O He/O scanned/O the/O bookcases/O and/O bookshelves/O,/O and/O with/O the/O same/O
dubious/O air/O with/O which/O he/O had/O regarded/O the/O snipe/O,/O he/O smiled/O
contemptuously/O and/O shook/O his/O head/O disapprovingly/O,/O as/O though/O by/O no/O means/O
willing/O to/O allow/O that/O this/O game/O were/O worth/O the/O candle/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O have/O you/O brought/O the/O money/O?/O''/O asked/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O ``/OSit/O down/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O do/On't/O trouble/O about/O the/O money/O./O I/O've/O come/O to/O see/O you/O to/O talk/O it/O
over/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O is/O there/O to/O talk/O over/O?/O But/O do/O sit/O down/O./O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O mind/O if/O I/O do/O,/O''/O said/O Ryabinin/PERSON,/O sitting/O down/O and/O leaning/O his/O
elbows/O on/O the/O back/O of/O his/O chair/O in/O a/O position/O of/O the/O intensest/O
discomfort/O to/O himself/O./O ``/OYou/O must/O knock/O it/O down/O a/O bit/O,/O prince/O./O It/O would/O
be/O too/O bad/O./O The/O money/O is/O ready/O conclusively/O to/O the/O last/O farthing/O./O As/O to/O
paying/O the/O money/O down/O,/O there/O'll/O be/O no/O hitch/O there/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON,/O who/O had/O meanwhile/O been/O putting/O his/O gun/O away/O in/O the/O cupboard/O,/O was/O
just/O going/O out/O of/O the/O door/O,/O but/O catching/O the/O merchant/O's/O words/O,/O he/O
stopped/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O you/O've/O got/O the/O forest/O for/O nothing/O as/O it/O is/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OHe/O came/O to/O
me/O too/O late/O,/O or/O I/O'd/O have/O fixed/O the/O price/O for/O him/O./O''/O

Ryabinin/PERSON got/O up/O,/O and/O in/O silence/O,/O with/O a/O smile/O,/O he/O looked/O Levin/PERSON down/O and/O
up/O./O

``/OVery/O close/O about/O money/O is/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O with/O a/O
smile/O,/O turning/O to/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON;/O ``/Othere/O's/O positively/O no/O dealing/O
with/O him/O./O I/O was/O bargaining/O for/O some/O wheat/O of/O him/O,/O and/O a/O pretty/O price/O I/O
offered/O too/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O should/O I/O give/O you/O my/O goods/O for/O nothing/O?/O I/O did/On't/O pick/O it/O up/O on/O the/O
ground/O,/O nor/O steal/O it/O either/O./O''/O

``/OMercy/O on/O us/O!/O nowadays/O there/O's/O no/O chance/O at/O all/O of/O stealing/O./O With/O the/O
open/O courts/O and/O everything/O done/O in/O style/O,/O nowadays/O there/O's/O no/O question/O
of/O stealing/O./O We/O are/O just/O talking/O things/O over/O like/O gentlemen/O./O His/O
excellency/O's/O asking/O too/O much/O for/O the/O forest/O./O I/O ca/On't/O make/O both/O ends/O meet/O
over/O it/O./O I/O must/O ask/O for/O a/O little/O concession/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O is/O the/O thing/O settled/O between/O you/O or/O not/O?/O If/O it/O's/O settled/O,/O it/O's/O
useless/O haggling/O;/O but/O if/O it/O's/O not/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/OI/O'll/O buy/O the/O forest/O./O''/O

The/O smile/O vanished/O at/O once/O from/O Ryabinin/PERSON's/O face/O./O A/O hawklike/O,/O greedy/O,/O
cruel/O expression/O was/O left/O upon/O it/O./O With/O rapid/O,/O bony/O fingers/O he/O
unbuttoned/O his/O coat/O,/O revealing/O a/O shirt/O,/O bronze/O waistcoat/O buttons/O,/O and/O a/O
watch/O chain/O,/O and/O quickly/O pulled/O out/O a/O fat/O old/O pocketbook/O./O

``/OHere/O you/O are/O,/O the/O forest/O is/O mine/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O crossing/O himself/O quickly/O,/O
and/O holding/O out/O his/O hand/O./O ``/OTake/O the/O money/O;/O it/O's/O my/O forest/O./O That/O's/O
Ryabinin/PERSON's/O way/O of/O doing/O business/O;/O he/O does/On't/O haggle/O over/O every/O
half-penny/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O scowling/O and/O waving/O the/O pocketbook/O./O

``/OI/O would/On't/O be/O in/O a/O hurry/O if/O I/O were/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OCome/O,/O really/O,/O''/O said/O Oblonsky/PERSON in/O surprise/O./O ``/OI/O've/O given/O my/O word/O,/O you/O
know/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON went/O out/O of/O the/O room/O,/O slamming/O the/O door/O./O Ryabinin/PERSON looked/O towards/O
the/O door/O and/O shook/O his/O head/O with/O a/O smile/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O all/O youthfulness/O--/Opositively/O nothing/O but/O boyishness/O./O Why/O,/O I/O'm/O
buying/O it/O,/O upon/O my/O honor/O,/O simply/O,/O believe/O me/O,/O for/O the/O glory/O of/O it/O,/O that/O
Ryabinin/PERSON,/O and/O no/O one/O else/O,/O should/O have/O bought/O the/O copse/O of/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O And/O
as/O to/O the/O profits/O,/O why/O,/O I/O must/O make/O what/O God/O gives/O./O In/O God/O's/O name/O./O If/O
you/O would/O kindly/O sign/O the/O title-deed/O.../O''/O

Within/O an/O hour/O the/O merchant/O,/O stroking/O his/O big/O overcoat/O neatly/O down/O,/O and/O
hooking/O up/O his/O jacket/O,/O with/O the/O agreement/O in/O his/O pocket/O,/O seated/O himself/O
in/O his/O tightly/O covered/O trap/O,/O and/O drove/O homewards/O./O

``/OUgh/O,/O these/O gentlefolks/O!/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O clerk/O./O ``/OThey/O--/Othey/O're/O a/O nice/O
lot/O!/O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O so/O,/O''/O responded/O the/O clerk/O,/O handing/O him/O the/O reins/O and/O buttoning/O
the/O leather/O apron/O./O ``/OBut/O I/O can/O congratulate/O you/O on/O the/O purchase/O,/O Mihail/PERSON
Ignatitch/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O well/O.../O''/O



Chapter/O 17/O


Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON went/O upstairs/O with/O his/O pocket/O bulging/O with/O notes/O,/O
which/O the/O merchant/O had/O paid/O him/O for/O three/O months/O in/O advance/O./O The/O
business/O of/O the/O forest/O was/O over/O,/O the/O money/O in/O his/O pocket/O;/O their/O shooting/O
had/O been/O excellent/O,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O in/O the/O happiest/O frame/O of/O
mind/O,/O and/O so/O he/O felt/O specially/O anxious/O to/O dissipate/O the/O ill-humor/O that/O
had/O come/O upon/O Levin/PERSON./O He/O wanted/O to/O finish/O the/O day/O at/O supper/O as/O pleasantly/O
as/O it/O had/O been/O begun/O./O

Levin/PERSON certainly/O was/O out/O of/O humor/O,/O and/O in/O spite/O of/O all/O his/O desire/O to/O be/O
affectionate/O and/O cordial/O to/O his/O charming/O visitor/O,/O he/O could/O not/O control/O
his/O mood/O./O The/O intoxication/O of/O the/O news/O that/O Kitty/PERSON was/O not/O married/O had/O
gradually/O begun/O to/O work/O upon/O him/O./O

Kitty/PERSON was/O not/O married/O,/O but/O ill/O,/O and/O ill/O from/O love/O for/O a/O man/O who/O had/O
slighted/O her/O./O This/O slight/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O rebounded/O upon/O him/O./O Vronsky/O had/O
slighted/O her/O,/O and/O she/O had/O slighted/O him/O,/O Levin/PERSON./O Consequently/O Vronsky/O had/O
the/O right/O to/O despise/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O therefore/O he/O was/O his/O enemy/O./O But/O all/O this/O
Levin/PERSON did/O not/O think/O out/O./O He/O vaguely/O felt/O that/O there/O was/O something/O in/O it/O
insulting/O to/O him/O,/O and/O he/O was/O not/O angry/O now/O at/O what/O had/O disturbed/O him/O,/O
but/O he/O fell/O foul/O of/O everything/O that/O presented/O itself/O./O The/O stupid/O sale/O of/O
the/O forest/O,/O the/O fraud/O practiced/O upon/O Oblonsky/PERSON and/O concluded/O in/O his/O
house/O,/O exasperated/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O finished/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O meeting/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON upstairs/O./O ``/OWould/O
you/O like/O supper/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O would/On't/O say/O no/O to/O it/O./O What/O an/O appetite/O I/O get/O in/O the/O country/O!/O
Wonderful/O!/O Why/O did/On't/O you/O offer/O Ryabinin/PERSON something/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O damn/O him/O!/O''/O

``/OStill/O,/O how/O you/O do/O treat/O him/O!/O''/O said/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O ``/OYou/O did/On't/O even/O shake/O
hands/O with/O him/O./O Why/O not/O shake/O hands/O with/O him/O?/O''/O

``/OBecause/O I/O do/On't/O shake/O hands/O with/O a/O waiter/O,/O and/O a/O waiter/O's/O a/O hundred/O
times/O better/O than/O he/O is/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O a/O reactionist/O you/O are/O,/O really/O!/O What/O about/O the/O amalgamation/O of/O
classes/O?/O''/O said/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O

``/OAnyone/O who/O likes/O amalgamating/O is/O welcome/O to/O it/O,/O but/O it/O sickens/O me/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O a/O regular/O reactionist/O,/O I/O see/O./O''/O

``/OReally/O,/O I/O have/O never/O considered/O what/O I/O am/O./O I/O am/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O and/O
nothing/O else/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON very/O much/O out/O of/O temper/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O am/O out/O of/O temper/O,/O and/O do/O you/O know/O why/O?/O Because/O--/Oexcuse/O me/O--/Oof/O your/O
stupid/O sale/O.../O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON frowned/O good-humoredly/O,/O like/O one/O who/O feels/O himself/O
teased/O and/O attacked/O for/O no/O fault/O of/O his/O own/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O enough/O about/O it/O!/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OWhen/O did/O anybody/O ever/O sell/O anything/O
without/O being/O told/O immediately/O after/O the/O sale/O,/O `/OIt/O was/O worth/O much/O more/O'/O?/O
But/O when/O one/O wants/O to/O sell/O,/O no/O one/O will/O give/O anything/O.../O./O No/O,/O I/O see/O
you/O've/O a/O grudge/O against/O that/O unlucky/O Ryabinin/O./O''/O

``/OMaybe/O I/O have/O./O And/O do/O you/O know/O why/O?/O You/O'll/O say/O again/O that/O I/O'm/O a/O
reactionist/O,/O or/O some/O other/O terrible/O word/O;/O but/O all/O the/O same/O it/O does/O annoy/O
and/O anger/O me/O to/O see/O on/O all/O sides/O the/O impoverishing/O of/O the/O nobility/O to/O
which/O I/O belong/O,/O and/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O amalgamation/O of/O classes/O,/O I/O'm/O glad/O
to/O belong/O./O And/O their/O impoverishment/O is/O not/O due/O to/O extravagance/O--/Othat/O
would/O be/O nothing/O;/O living/O in/O good/O style/O--/Othat/O's/O the/O proper/O thing/O for/O
noblemen/O;/O it/O's/O only/O the/O nobles/O who/O know/O how/O to/O do/O it/O./O Now/O the/O peasants/O
about/O us/O buy/O land/O,/O and/O I/O do/On't/O mind/O that/O./O The/O gentleman/O does/O nothing/O,/O
while/O the/O peasant/O works/O and/O supplants/O the/O idle/O man/O./O That/O's/O as/O it/O ought/O
to/O be/O./O And/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O for/O the/O peasant/O./O But/O I/O do/O mind/O seeing/O the/O
process/O of/O impoverishment/O from/O a/O sort/O of/O--/OI/O do/On't/O know/O what/O to/O call/O
it/O--/Oinnocence/O./O Here/O a/O Polish/O speculator/O bought/O for/O half/O its/O value/O a/O
magnificent/O estate/O from/O a/O young/O lady/O who/O lives/O in/O Nice/ORGANIZATION./O And/O there/O a/O
merchant/O will/O get/O three/O acres/O of/O land/O,/O worth/O ten/O roubles/O,/O as/O security/O
for/O the/O loan/O of/O one/O rouble/O./O Here/O,/O for/O no/O kind/O of/O reason/O,/O you/O've/O made/O
that/O rascal/O a/O present/O of/O thirty/O thousand/O roubles/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O should/O I/O have/O done/O?/O Counted/O every/O tree/O?/O''/O

``/OOf/O course/O,/O they/O must/O be/O counted/O./O You/O did/On't/O count/O them/O,/O but/O Ryabinin/PERSON
did/O./O Ryabinin/PERSON's/O children/O will/O have/O means/O of/O livelihood/O and/O education/O,/O
while/O yours/O maybe/O will/O not/O!/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O must/O excuse/O me/O,/O but/O there/O's/O something/O mean/O in/O this/O counting/O./O
We/O have/O our/O business/O and/O they/O have/O theirs/O,/O and/O they/O must/O make/O their/O
profit/O./O Anyway/O,/O the/O thing/O's/O done/O,/O and/O there/O's/O an/O end/O of/O it/O./O And/O here/O
come/O some/O poached/O eggs/O,/O my/O favorite/O dish/O./O And/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON will/O give/O
us/O that/O marvelous/O herb-brandy/O.../O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON sat/O down/O at/O the/O table/O and/O began/O joking/O with/O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON,/O assuring/O her/O that/O it/O was/O long/O since/O he/O had/O tasted/O such/O a/O
dinner/O and/O such/O a/O supper/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O do/O praise/O it/O,/O anyway/O,/O''/O said/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O ``/Obut/O Konstantin/PERSON
Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O give/O him/O what/O you/O will/O--/Oa/O crust/O of/O bread/O--/Ohe/O'll/O eat/O it/O and/O
walk/O away/O./O''/O

Though/O Levin/PERSON tried/O to/O control/O himself/O,/O he/O was/O gloomy/O and/O silent/O./O He/O
wanted/O to/O put/O one/O question/O to/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O but/O he/O could/O not/O
bring/O himself/O to/O the/O point/O,/O and/O could/O not/O find/O the/O words/O or/O the/O moment/O
in/O which/O to/O put/O it/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O gone/O down/O to/O his/O room/O,/O
undressed/O,/O again/O washed/O,/O and/O attired/O in/O a/O nightshirt/O with/O goffered/O
frills/O,/O he/O had/O got/O into/O bed/O,/O but/O Levin/PERSON still/O lingered/O in/O his/O room/O,/O
talking/O of/O various/O trifling/O matters/O,/O and/O not/O daring/O to/O ask/O what/O he/O
wanted/O to/O know/O./O

``/OHow/O wonderfully/O they/O make/O this/O soap/O,/O''/O he/O said/O gazing/O at/O a/O piece/O of/O soap/O
he/O was/O handling/O,/O which/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON had/O put/O ready/O for/O the/O visitor/O
but/O Oblonsky/PERSON had/O not/O used/O./O ``/OOnly/O look/O;/O why/O,/O it/O's/O a/O work/O of/O art/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O everything/O's/O brought/O to/O such/O a/O pitch/O of/O perfection/O nowadays/O,/O''/O said/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O with/O a/O moist/O and/O blissful/O yawn/O./O ``/OThe/O theater/O,/O for/O
instance/O,/O and/O the/O entertainments/O .../O a/O--/Oa/O--/Oa/O!/O''/O he/O yawned/O./O ``/OThe/O electric/O
light/O everywhere/O .../O a/O--/Oa/O--/Oa/O!/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O the/O electric/O light/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OYes/O./O Oh/O,/O and/O where/O's/O Vronsky/O
now/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O suddenly/O,/O laying/O down/O the/O soap/O./O

``/OVronsky/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O checking/O his/O yawn/O;/O ``/Ohe/O's/O in/O
Petersburg/LOCATION./O He/O left/O soon/O after/O you/O did/O,/O and/O he/O's/O not/O once/O been/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION
since/O./O And/O do/O you/O know/O,/O Kostya/PERSON,/O I/O'll/O tell/O you/O the/O truth/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O
leaning/O his/O elbow/O on/O the/O table/O,/O and/O propping/O on/O his/O hand/O his/O handsome/O
ruddy/O face/O,/O in/O which/O his/O moist/O,/O good-natured/O,/O sleepy/O eyes/O shone/O like/O
stars/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O your/O own/O fault/O./O You/O took/O fright/O at/O the/O sight/O of/O your/O rival/O./O
But/O,/O as/O I/O told/O you/O at/O the/O time/O,/O I/O could/On't/O say/O which/O had/O the/O better/O
chance/O./O Why/O did/On't/O you/O fight/O it/O out/O?/O I/O told/O you/O at/O the/O time/O that/O.../O''/O He/O
yawned/O inwardly/O,/O without/O opening/O his/O mouth/O./O

``/ODoes/O he/O know/O,/O or/O does/On't/O he/O,/O that/O I/O did/O make/O an/O offer/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON wondered/O,/O
gazing/O at/O him/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O there/O's/O something/O humbugging/O,/O diplomatic/O in/O his/O
face/O,/O''/O and/O feeling/O he/O was/O blushing/O,/O he/O looked/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
straight/O in/O the/O face/O without/O speaking/O./O

``/OIf/O there/O was/O anything/O on/O her/O side/O at/O the/O time/O,/O it/O was/O nothing/O but/O a/O
superficial/O attraction/O,/O''/O pursued/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O ``/OHis/O being/O such/O a/O perfect/O
aristocrat/O,/O do/On't/O you/O know/O,/O and/O his/O future/O position/O in/O society/O,/O had/O an/O
influence/O not/O with/O her/O,/O but/O with/O her/O mother/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON scowled/O./O The/O humiliation/O of/O his/O rejection/O stung/O him/O to/O the/O heart/O,/O
as/O though/O it/O were/O a/O fresh/O wound/O he/O had/O only/O just/O received/O./O But/O he/O was/O at/O
home/O,/O and/O the/O walls/O of/O home/O are/O a/O support/O./O

``/OStay/O,/O stay/O,/O''/O he/O began/O,/O interrupting/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O ``/OYou/O talk/O of/O his/O being/O an/O
aristocrat/O./O But/O allow/O me/O to/O ask/O what/O it/O consists/O in/O,/O that/O aristocracy/O of/O
Vronsky/O or/O of/O anybody/O else/O,/O beside/O which/O I/O can/O be/O looked/O down/O upon/O?/O You/O
consider/O Vronsky/O an/O aristocrat/O,/O but/O I/O do/On't/O./O A/O man/O whose/O father/O crawled/O
up/O from/O nothing/O at/O all/O by/O intrigue/O,/O and/O whose/O mother/O--/OGod/O knows/O whom/O she/O
was/On't/O mixed/O up/O with/O.../O./O No/O,/O excuse/O me/O,/O but/O I/O consider/O myself/O
aristocratic/O,/O and/O people/O like/O me/O,/O who/O can/O point/O back/O in/O the/O past/O to/O
three/O or/O four/O honorable/O generations/O of/O their/O family/O,/O of/O the/O highest/O
degree/O of/O breeding/O -LRB-/Otalent/O and/O intellect/O,/O of/O course/O that/O's/O another/O
matter/O-RRB-/O,/O and/O have/O never/O curried/O favor/O with/O anyone/O,/O never/O depended/O on/O
anyone/O for/O anything/O,/O like/O my/O father/O and/O my/O grandfather/O./O And/O I/O know/O many/O
such/O./O You/O think/O it/O mean/O of/O me/O to/O count/O the/O trees/O in/O my/O forest/O,/O while/O you/O
make/O Ryabinin/PERSON a/O present/O of/O thirty/O thousand/O;/O but/O you/O get/O rents/O from/O your/O
lands/O and/O I/O do/On't/O know/O what/O,/O while/O I/O do/On't/O and/O so/O I/O prize/O what/O's/O come/O to/O
me/O from/O my/O ancestors/O or/O been/O won/O by/O hard/O work/O.../O./O We/O are/O aristocrats/O,/O
and/O not/O those/O who/O can/O only/O exist/O by/O favor/O of/O the/O powerful/O of/O this/O world/O,/O
and/O who/O can/O be/O bought/O for/O twopence/O halfpenny/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O but/O whom/O are/O you/O attacking/O?/O I/O agree/O with/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O sincerely/O and/O genially/O;/O though/O he/O was/O aware/O that/O in/O the/O
class/O of/O those/O who/O could/O be/O bought/O for/O twopence/O halfpenny/O Levin/PERSON was/O
reckoning/O him/O too/O./O Levin/PERSON's/O warmth/O gave/O him/O genuine/O pleasure/O./O ``/OWhom/O are/O
you/O attacking/O?/O Though/O a/O good/O deal/O is/O not/O true/O that/O you/O say/O about/O
Vronsky/O,/O but/O I/O wo/On't/O talk/O about/O that/O./O I/O tell/O you/O straight/O out/O,/O if/O I/O were/O
you/O,/O I/O should/O go/O back/O with/O me/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O.../O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O I/O do/On't/O know/O whether/O you/O know/O it/O or/O not/O,/O but/O I/O do/On't/O care/O./O And/O I/O
tell/O you/O--/OI/O did/O make/O an/O offer/O and/O was/O rejected/O,/O and/O Katerina/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON
is/O nothing/O now/O to/O me/O but/O a/O painful/O and/O humiliating/O reminiscence/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O ever/O for/O?/O What/O nonsense/O!/O''/O

``/OBut/O we/O wo/On't/O talk/O about/O it/O./O Please/O forgive/O me/O,/O if/O I/O've/O been/O nasty/O,/O''/O
said/O Levin/PERSON./O Now/O that/O he/O had/O opened/O his/O heart/O,/O he/O became/O as/O he/O had/O been/O
in/O the/O morning/O./O ``/OYou/O're/O not/O angry/O with/O me/O,/O Stiva/PERSON?/O Please/O do/On't/O be/O
angry/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O smiling/O,/O he/O took/O his/O hand/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O not/O;/O not/O a/O bit/O,/O and/O no/O reason/O to/O be/O./O I/O'm/O glad/O we/O've/O spoken/O
openly/O./O And/O do/O you/O know/O,/O stand-shooting/O in/O the/O morning/O is/O unusually/O
good/O--/Owhy/O not/O go/O?/O I/O could/On't/O sleep/O the/O night/O anyway/O,/O but/O I/O might/O go/O
straight/O from/O shooting/O to/O the/O station/O./O''/O

``/OCapital/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 18/O


Although/O all/O Vronsky/O's/O inner/O life/O was/O absorbed/O in/O his/O passion/O,/O his/O
external/O life/O unalterably/O and/O inevitably/O followed/O along/O the/O old/O
accustomed/O lines/O of/O his/O social/O and/O regimental/O ties/O and/O interests/O./O The/O
interests/O of/O his/O regiment/O took/O an/O important/O place/O in/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O life/O,/O
both/O because/O he/O was/O fond/O of/O the/O regiment/O,/O and/O because/O the/O regiment/O was/O
fond/O of/O him/O./O They/O were/O not/O only/O fond/O of/O Vronsky/O in/O his/O regiment/O,/O they/O
respected/O him/O too/O,/O and/O were/O proud/O of/O him/O;/O proud/O that/O this/O man/O,/O with/O his/O
immense/O wealth/O,/O his/O brilliant/O education/O and/O abilities/O,/O and/O the/O path/O open/O
before/O him/O to/O every/O kind/O of/O success/O,/O distinction/O,/O and/O ambition/O,/O had/O
disregarded/O all/O that/O,/O and/O of/O all/O the/O interests/O of/O life/O had/O the/O interests/O
of/O his/O regiment/O and/O his/O comrades/O nearest/O to/O his/O heart/O./O Vronsky/PERSON was/O aware/O
of/O his/O comrades/O'/O view/O of/O him/O,/O and/O in/O addition/O to/O his/O liking/O for/O the/O
life/O,/O he/O felt/O bound/O to/O keep/O up/O that/O reputation/O./O

It/O need/O not/O be/O said/O that/O he/O did/O not/O speak/O of/O his/O love/O to/O any/O of/O his/O
comrades/O,/O nor/O did/O he/O betray/O his/O secret/O even/O in/O the/O wildest/O drinking/O
bouts/O -LRB-/Othough/O indeed/O he/O was/O never/O so/O drunk/O as/O to/O lose/O all/O control/O of/O
himself/O-RRB-/O./O And/O he/O shut/O up/O any/O of/O his/O thoughtless/O comrades/O who/O attempted/O
to/O allude/O to/O his/O connection/O./O But/O in/O spite/O of/O that/O,/O his/O love/O was/O known/O to/O
all/O the/O town/O;/O everyone/O guessed/O with/O more/O or/O less/O confidence/O at/O his/O
relations/O with/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON./O The/O majority/O of/O the/O younger/O men/O envied/O
him/O for/O just/O what/O was/O the/O most/O irksome/O factor/O in/O his/O love/O--/Othe/O exalted/O
position/O of/O Karenin/PERSON,/O and/O the/O consequent/O publicity/O of/O their/O connection/O in/O
society/O./O

The/O greater/O number/O of/O the/O young/O women/O,/O who/O envied/O Anna/PERSON and/O had/O long/O been/O
weary/O of/O hearing/O her/O called/O _/Ovirtuous/O_/O,/O rejoiced/O at/O the/O fulfillment/O of/O
their/O predictions/O,/O and/O were/O only/O waiting/O for/O a/O decisive/O turn/O in/O public/O
opinion/O to/O fall/O upon/O her/O with/O all/O the/O weight/O of/O their/O scorn/O./O They/O were/O
already/O making/O ready/O their/O handfuls/O of/O mud/O to/O fling/O at/O her/O when/O the/O
right/O moment/O arrived/O./O The/O greater/O number/O of/O the/O middle-aged/O people/O and/O
certain/O great/O personages/O were/O displeased/O at/O the/O prospect/O of/O the/O
impending/O scandal/O in/O society/O./O

Vronsky/O's/O mother/O,/O on/O hearing/O of/O his/O connection/O,/O was/O at/O first/O pleased/O at/O
it/O,/O because/O nothing/O to/O her/O mind/O gave/O such/O a/O finishing/O touch/O to/O a/O
brilliant/O young/O man/O as/O a/O _/Oliaison/O_/O in/O the/O highest/O society/O;/O she/O was/O
pleased/O,/O too/O,/O that/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON,/O who/O had/O so/O taken/O her/O fancy/O,/O and/O had/O
talked/O so/O much/O of/O her/O son/O,/O was/O,/O after/O all/O,/O just/O like/O all/O other/O pretty/O
and/O well-bred/O women/O,/O--/Oat/O least/O according/O to/O the/O Countess/O Vronskaya/PERSON's/O
ideas/O./O But/O she/O had/O heard/O of/O late/O that/O her/O son/O had/O refused/O a/O position/O
offered/O him/O of/O great/O importance/O to/O his/O career/O,/O simply/O in/O order/O to/O remain/O
in/O the/O regiment/O,/O where/O he/O could/O be/O constantly/O seeing/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON./O
She/O learned/O that/O great/O personages/O were/O displeased/O with/O him/O on/O this/O
account/O,/O and/O she/O changed/O her/O opinion/O./O She/O was/O vexed/O,/O too/O,/O that/O from/O all/O
she/O could/O learn/O of/O this/O connection/O it/O was/O not/O that/O brilliant/O,/O graceful/O,/O
worldly/O _/Oliaison/O_/O which/O she/O would/O have/O welcomed/O,/O but/O a/O sort/O of/O
Wertherish/O,/O desperate/O passion/O,/O so/O she/O was/O told/O,/O which/O might/O well/O lead/O
him/O into/O imprudence/O./O She/O had/O not/O seen/O him/O since/O his/O abrupt/O departure/O
from/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O she/O sent/O her/O elder/O son/O to/O bid/O him/O come/O to/O see/O her/O./O

This/O elder/O son/O,/O too/O,/O was/O displeased/O with/O his/O younger/O brother/O./O He/O did/O not/O
distinguish/O what/O sort/O of/O love/O his/O might/O be/O,/O big/O or/O little/O,/O passionate/O or/O
passionless/O,/O lasting/O or/O passing/O -LRB-/Ohe/O kept/O a/O ballet/O girl/O himself/O,/O though/O
he/O was/O the/O father/O of/O a/O family/O,/O so/O he/O was/O lenient/O in/O these/O matters/O-RRB-/O,/O but/O
he/O knew/O that/O this/O love/O affair/O was/O viewed/O with/O displeasure/O by/O those/O whom/O
it/O was/O necessary/O to/O please/O,/O and/O therefore/O he/O did/O not/O approve/O of/O his/O
brother/O's/O conduct/O./O

Besides/O the/O service/O and/O society/O,/O Vronsky/ORGANIZATION had/O another/O great/O
interest/O--/Ohorses/O;/O he/O was/O passionately/O fond/O of/O horses/O./O

That/O year/O races/O and/O a/O steeplechase/O had/O been/O arranged/O for/O the/O officers/O./O
Vronsky/PERSON had/O put/O his/O name/O down/O,/O bought/O a/O thoroughbred/O English/O mare/O,/O and/O
in/O spite/O of/O his/O love/O affair/O,/O he/O was/O looking/O forward/O to/O the/O races/O with/O
intense/O,/O though/O reserved/O,/O excitement/O.../O

These/O two/O passions/O did/O not/O interfere/O with/O one/O another/O./O On/O the/O contrary/O,/O
he/O needed/O occupation/O and/O distraction/O quite/O apart/O from/O his/O love/O,/O so/O as/O to/O
recruit/O and/O rest/O himself/O from/O the/O violent/O emotions/O that/O agitated/O him/O./O



Chapter/O 19/O


On/O the/O day/O of/O the/O races/O at/O Krasnoe/LOCATION Selo/LOCATION,/O Vronsky/O had/O come/O earlier/O than/O
usual/O to/O eat/O beefsteak/O in/O the/O common/O messroom/O of/O the/O regiment/O./O He/O had/O no/O
need/O to/O be/O strict/O with/O himself/O,/O as/O he/O had/O very/O quickly/O been/O brought/O down/O
to/O the/O required/O light/O weight/O;/O but/O still/O he/O had/O to/O avoid/O gaining/O flesh/O,/O
and/O so/O he/O eschewed/O farinaceous/O and/O sweet/O dishes/O./O He/O sat/O with/O his/O coat/O
unbuttoned/O over/O a/O white/O waistcoat/O,/O resting/O both/O elbows/O on/O the/O table/O,/O and/O
while/O waiting/O for/O the/O steak/O he/O had/O ordered/O he/O looked/O at/O a/O French/O novel/O
that/O lay/O open/O on/O his/O plate/O./O He/O was/O only/O looking/O at/O the/O book/O to/O avoid/O
conversation/O with/O the/O officers/O coming/O in/O and/O out/O;/O he/O was/O thinking/O./O

He/O was/O thinking/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O promise/O to/O see/O him/O that/O day/O after/O the/O races/O./O
But/O he/O had/O not/O seen/O her/O for/O three/O days/O,/O and/O as/O her/O husband/O had/O just/O
returned/O from/O abroad/O,/O he/O did/O not/O know/O whether/O she/O would/O be/O able/O to/O meet/O
him/O today/O or/O not/O,/O and/O he/O did/O not/O know/O how/O to/O find/O out/O./O He/O had/O had/O his/O
last/O interview/O with/O her/O at/O his/O cousin/O Betsy/PERSON's/O summer/O villa/O./O He/O visited/O
the/O Karenins/O'/O summer/O villa/O as/O rarely/O as/O possible/O./O Now/O he/O wanted/O to/O go/O
there/O,/O and/O he/O pondered/O the/O question/O how/O to/O do/O it/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O I/O shall/O say/O Betsy/PERSON has/O sent/O me/O to/O ask/O whether/O she/O's/O coming/O to/O
the/O races/O./O Of/O course/O,/O I/O'll/O go/O,/O''/O he/O decided/O,/O lifting/O his/O head/O from/O the/O
book/O./O And/O as/O he/O vividly/O pictured/O the/O happiness/O of/O seeing/O her/O,/O his/O face/O
lighted/O up/O./O

``/OSend/O to/O my/O house/O,/O and/O tell/O them/O to/O have/O out/O the/O carriage/O and/O three/O
horses/O as/O quick/O as/O they/O can/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O servant/O,/O who/O handed/O him/O the/O
steak/O on/O a/O hot/O silver/O dish/O,/O and/O moving/O the/O dish/O up/O he/O began/O eating/O./O

From/O the/O billiard/O room/O next/O door/O came/O the/O sound/O of/O balls/O knocking/O,/O of/O
talk/O and/O laughter/O./O Two/O officers/O appeared/O at/O the/O entrance-door/O:/O one/O,/O a/O
young/O fellow/O,/O with/O a/O feeble/O,/O delicate/O face/O,/O who/O had/O lately/O joined/O the/O
regiment/O from/O the/O Corps/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION Pages/ORGANIZATION;/O the/O other/O,/O a/O plump/O,/O elderly/O officer/O,/O
with/O a/O bracelet/O on/O his/O wrist/O,/O and/O little/O eyes/O,/O lost/O in/O fat/O./O

Vronsky/O glanced/O at/O them/O,/O frowned/O,/O and/O looking/O down/O at/O his/O book/O as/O though/O
he/O had/O not/O noticed/O them/O,/O he/O proceeded/O to/O eat/O and/O read/O at/O the/O same/O time/O./O

``/OWhat/O?/O Fortifying/O yourself/O for/O your/O work/O?/O''/O said/O the/O plump/O officer/O,/O
sitting/O down/O beside/O him/O./O

``/OAs/O you/O see/O,/O''/O responded/O Vronsky/O,/O knitting/O his/O brows/O,/O wiping/O his/O mouth/O,/O
and/O not/O looking/O at/O the/O officer/O./O

``/OSo/O you/O're/O not/O afraid/O of/O getting/O fat/O?/O''/O said/O the/O latter/O,/O turning/O a/O chair/O
round/O for/O the/O young/O officer/O./O

``/OWhat/O?/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O angrily/O,/O making/O a/O wry/O face/O of/O disgust/O,/O and/O showing/O
his/O even/O teeth/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O not/O afraid/O of/O getting/O fat/O?/O''/O

``/OWaiter/O,/O sherry/O!/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O without/O replying/O,/O and/O moving/O the/O book/O to/O
the/O other/O side/O of/O him/O,/O he/O went/O on/O reading/O./O

The/O plump/O officer/O took/O up/O the/O list/O of/O wines/O and/O turned/O to/O the/O young/O
officer/O./O

``/OYou/O choose/O what/O we/O're/O to/O drink/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O handing/O him/O the/O card/O,/O and/O
looking/O at/O him/O./O

``/ORhine/O wine/O,/O please/O,/O''/O said/O the/O young/O officer/O,/O stealing/O a/O timid/O glance/O at/O
Vronsky/O,/O and/O trying/O to/O pull/O his/O scarcely/O visible/O mustache/O./O Seeing/O that/O
Vronsky/O did/O not/O turn/O round/O,/O the/O young/O officer/O got/O up/O./O

``/OLet/O's/O go/O into/O the/O billiard/O room/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

The/O plump/O officer/O rose/O submissively/O,/O and/O they/O moved/O towards/O the/O door/O./O

At/O that/O moment/O there/O walked/O into/O the/O room/O the/O tall/O and/O well-built/O
Captain/O Yashvin/PERSON./O Nodding/O with/O an/O air/O of/O lofty/O contempt/O to/O the/O two/O
officers/O,/O he/O went/O up/O to/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O here/O he/O is/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O,/O bringing/O his/O big/O hand/O down/O heavily/O on/O his/O
epaulet/O./O Vronsky/O looked/O round/O angrily/O,/O but/O his/O face/O lighted/O up/O
immediately/O with/O his/O characteristic/O expression/O of/O genial/O and/O manly/O
serenity/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O it/O,/O Alexey/PERSON,/O''/O said/O the/O captain/O,/O in/O his/O loud/O baritone/O./O ``/OYou/O must/O
just/O eat/O a/O mouthful/O,/O now/O,/O and/O drink/O only/O one/O tiny/O glass/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O hungry/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O go/O the/O inseparables/O,/O''/O Yashvin/O dropped/O,/O glancing/O sarcastically/O at/O
the/O two/O officers/O who/O were/O at/O that/O instant/O leaving/O the/O room/O./O And/O he/O bent/O
his/O long/O legs/O,/O swathed/O in/O tight/O riding/O breeches/O,/O and/O sat/O down/O in/O the/O
chair/O,/O too/O low/O for/O him/O,/O so/O that/O his/O knees/O were/O cramped/O up/O in/O a/O sharp/O
angle/O./O

``/OWhy/O did/On't/O you/O turn/O up/O at/O the/O Red/LOCATION Theater/LOCATION yesterday/O?/O Numerova/PERSON was/On't/O at/O
all/O bad/O./O Where/O were/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O was/O late/O at/O the/O Tverskoys/O'/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O''/O responded/O Yashvin/PERSON./O

Yashvin/PERSON,/O a/O gambler/O and/O a/O rake/O,/O a/O man/O not/O merely/O without/O moral/O
principles/O,/O but/O of/O immoral/O principles/O,/O Yashvin/PERSON was/O Vronsky/O's/O greatest/O
friend/O in/O the/O regiment/O./O Vronsky/PERSON liked/O him/O both/O for/O his/O exceptional/O
physical/O strength/O,/O which/O he/O showed/O for/O the/O most/O part/O by/O being/O able/O to/O
drink/O like/O a/O fish/O,/O and/O do/O without/O sleep/O without/O being/O in/O the/O slightest/O
degree/O affected/O by/O it/O;/O and/O for/O his/O great/O strength/O of/O character/O,/O which/O he/O
showed/O in/O his/O relations/O with/O his/O comrades/O and/O superior/O officers/O,/O
commanding/O both/O fear/O and/O respect/O,/O and/O also/O at/O cards/O,/O when/O he/O would/O play/O
for/O tens/O of/O thousands/O and/O however/O much/O he/O might/O have/O drunk/O,/O always/O with/O
such/O skill/O and/O decision/O that/O he/O was/O reckoned/O the/O best/O player/O in/O the/O
English/ORGANIZATION Club/ORGANIZATION./O Vronsky/O respected/O and/O liked/O Yashvin/PERSON particularly/O because/O
he/O felt/O Yashvin/PERSON liked/O him/O,/O not/O for/O his/O name/O and/O his/O money/O,/O but/O for/O
himself/O./O And/O of/O all/O men/O he/O was/O the/O only/O one/O with/O whom/O Vronsky/O would/O have/O
liked/O to/O speak/O of/O his/O love/O./O He/O felt/O that/O Yashvin/PERSON,/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O
apparent/O contempt/O for/O every/O sort/O of/O feeling/O,/O was/O the/O only/O man/O who/O could/O,/O
so/O he/O fancied/O,/O comprehend/O the/O intense/O passion/O which/O now/O filled/O his/O whole/O
life/O./O Moreover/O,/O he/O felt/O certain/O that/O Yashvin/PERSON,/O as/O it/O was/O,/O took/O no/O delight/O
in/O gossip/O and/O scandal/O,/O and/O interpreted/O his/O feeling/O rightly/O,/O that/O is/O to/O
say/O,/O knew/O and/O believed/O that/O this/O passion/O was/O not/O a/O jest/O,/O not/O a/O pastime/O,/O
but/O something/O more/O serious/O and/O important/O./O

Vronsky/O had/O never/O spoken/O to/O him/O of/O his/O passion/O,/O but/O he/O was/O aware/O that/O he/O
knew/O all/O about/O it/O,/O and/O that/O he/O put/O the/O right/O interpretation/O on/O it/O,/O and/O
he/O was/O glad/O to/O see/O that/O in/O his/O eyes/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O yes/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O to/O the/O announcement/O that/O Vronsky/O had/O been/O at/O the/O
Tverskoys/O'/O;/O and/O his/O black/O eyes/O shining/O,/O he/O plucked/O at/O his/O left/O mustache/O,/O
and/O began/O twisting/O it/O into/O his/O mouth/O,/O a/O bad/O habit/O he/O had/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O what/O did/O you/O do/O yesterday/O?/O Win/O anything/O?/O''/O asked/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OEight/O thousand/O./O But/O three/O do/On't/O count/O;/O he/O wo/On't/O pay/O up/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O then/O you/O can/O afford/O to/O lose/O over/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O laughing/O./O
-LRB-/OYashvin/PERSON had/O bet/O heavily/O on/O Vronsky/O in/O the/O races/O./O-RRB-/O

``/ONo/O chance/O of/O my/O losing/O./O Mahotin/PERSON's/O the/O only/O one/O that/O's/O risky/O./O''/O

And/O the/O conversation/O passed/O to/O forecasts/O of/O the/O coming/O race/O,/O the/O only/O
thing/O Vronsky/O could/O think/O of/O just/O now/O./O

``/OCome/O along/O,/O I/O've/O finished/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O getting/O up/O he/O went/O to/O the/O
door/O./O Yashvin/PERSON got/O up/O too/O,/O stretching/O his/O long/O legs/O and/O his/O long/O back/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O too/O early/O for/O me/O to/O dine/O,/O but/O I/O must/O have/O a/O drink/O./O I/O'll/O come/O along/O
directly/O./O Hi/O,/O wine/O!/O''/O he/O shouted/O,/O in/O his/O rich/O voice/O,/O that/O always/O rang/O out/O
so/O loudly/O at/O drill/O,/O and/O set/O the/O windows/O shaking/O now/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O all/O right/O,/O''/O he/O shouted/O again/O immediately/O after/O./O ``/OYou/O're/O going/O home/O,/O
so/O I/O'll/O go/O with/O you/O./O''/O

And/O he/O walked/O out/O with/O Vronsky/O./O



Chapter/O 20/O


Vronsky/O was/O staying/O in/O a/O roomy/O,/O clean/O,/O Finnish/O hut/O,/O divided/O into/O two/O by/O
a/O partition/O./O Petritsky/PERSON lived/O with/O him/O in/O camp/O too/O./O Petritsky/PERSON was/O asleep/O
when/O Vronsky/PERSON and/O Yashvin/PERSON came/O into/O the/O hut/O./O

``/OGet/O up/O,/O do/On't/O go/O on/O sleeping/O,/O''/O said/O Yashvin/PERSON,/O going/O behind/O the/O partition/O
and/O giving/O Petritsky/PERSON,/O who/O was/O lying/O with/O ruffled/O hair/O and/O with/O his/O nose/O
in/O the/O pillow/O,/O a/O prod/O on/O the/O shoulder/O./O
