Petritsky/PERSON jumped/O up/O suddenly/O onto/O his/O knees/O and/O looked/O round/O./O

``/OYour/O brother/O's/O been/O here/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OHe/O waked/O me/O up/O,/O damn/O
him/O,/O and/O said/O he/O'd/O look/O in/O again/O./O''/O And/O pulling/O up/O the/O rug/O he/O flung/O
himself/O back/O on/O the/O pillow/O./O ``/OOh/O,/O do/O shut/O up/O,/O Yashvin/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O getting/O
furious/O with/O Yashvin/PERSON,/O who/O was/O pulling/O the/O rug/O off/O him/O./O ``/OShut/O up/O!/O''/O He/O
turned/O over/O and/O opened/O his/O eyes/O./O ``/OYou/O'd/O better/O tell/O me/O what/O to/O drink/O;/O
such/O a/O nasty/O taste/O in/O my/O mouth/O,/O that/O.../O''/O

``/OBrandy/O's/O better/O than/O anything/O,/O''/O boomed/O Yashvin/PERSON./O ``/OTereshtchenko/O!/O brandy/O
for/O your/O master/O and/O cucumbers/O,/O''/O he/O shouted/O,/O obviously/O taking/O pleasure/O in/O
the/O sound/O of/O his/O own/O voice/O./O

``/OBrandy/O,/O do/O you/O think/O?/O Eh/O?/O''/O queried/O Petritsky/PERSON,/O blinking/O and/O rubbing/O his/O
eyes/O./O ``/OAnd/O you/O'll/O drink/O something/O?/O All/O right/O then/O,/O we/O'll/O have/O a/O drink/O
together/O!/O Vronsky/O,/O have/O a/O drink/O?/O''/O said/O Petritsky/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O and/O
wrapping/O the/O tiger-skin/O rug/O round/O him/O./O He/O went/O to/O the/O door/O of/O the/O
partition/O wall/O,/O raised/O his/O hands/O,/O and/O hummed/O in/O French/O,/O ``/OThere/O was/O a/O
king/O in/O Thule/LOCATION./O''/O ``/OVronsky/O,/O will/O you/O have/O a/O drink/O?/O''/O

``/OGo/O along/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O putting/O on/O the/O coat/O his/O valet/O handed/O to/O him/O./O

``/OWhere/O are/O you/O off/O to/O?/O''/O asked/O Yashvin/PERSON./O ``/OOh/O,/O here/O are/O your/O three/O horses/O,/O''/O
he/O added/O,/O seeing/O the/O carriage/O drive/O up/O./O

``/OTo/O the/O stables/O,/O and/O I/O've/O got/O to/O see/O Bryansky/PERSON,/O too/O,/O about/O the/O horses/O,/O''/O
said/O Vronsky/O./O

Vronsky/O had/O as/O a/O fact/O promised/O to/O call/O at/O Bryansky/PERSON's/O,/O some/O eight/O miles/O
from/O Peterhof/O,/O and/O to/O bring/O him/O some/O money/O owing/O for/O some/O horses/O;/O and/O he/O
hoped/O to/O have/O time/O to/O get/O that/O in/O too/O./O But/O his/O comrades/O were/O at/O once/O
aware/O that/O he/O was/O not/O only/O going/O there/O./O

Petritsky/PERSON,/O still/O humming/O,/O winked/O and/O made/O a/O pout/O with/O his/O lips/O,/O as/O
though/O he/O would/O say/O:/O ``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O we/O know/O your/O Bryansky/O./O''/O

``/OMind/O you/O're/O not/O late/O!/O''/O was/O Yashvin/PERSON's/O only/O comment/O;/O and/O to/O change/O the/O
conversation/O:/O ``/OHow/O's/O my/O roan/O?/O is/O he/O doing/O all/O right/O?/O''/O he/O inquired/O,/O
looking/O out/O of/O the/O window/O at/O the/O middle/O one/O of/O the/O three/O horses/O,/O which/O
he/O had/O sold/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OStop/O!/O''/O cried/O Petritsky/PERSON to/O Vronsky/PERSON as/O he/O was/O just/O going/O out/O./O ``/OYour/O
brother/O left/O a/O letter/O and/O a/O note/O for/O you/O./O Wait/O a/O bit/O;/O where/O are/O they/O?/O''/O

Vronsky/O stopped/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O where/O are/O they/O?/O''/O

``/OWhere/O are/O they/O?/O That/O's/O just/O the/O question/O!/O''/O said/O Petritsky/PERSON solemnly/O,/O
moving/O his/O forefinger/O upwards/O from/O his/O nose/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O tell/O me/O;/O this/O is/O silly/O!/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O smiling/O./O

``/OI/O have/O not/O lighted/O the/O fire/O./O Here/O somewhere/O about/O./O''/O

``/OCome/O,/O enough/O fooling/O!/O Where/O is/O the/O letter/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O've/O forgotten/O really/O./O Or/O was/O it/O a/O dream/O?/O Wait/O a/O bit/O,/O wait/O a/O bit/O!/O
But/O what/O's/O the/O use/O of/O getting/O in/O a/O rage/O./O If/O you/O'd/O drunk/O four/O bottles/O
yesterday/O as/O I/O did/O you/O'd/O forget/O where/O you/O were/O lying/O./O Wait/O a/O bit/O,/O I/O'll/O
remember/O!/O''/O

Petritsky/PERSON went/O behind/O the/O partition/O and/O lay/O down/O on/O his/O bed/O./O

``/OWait/O a/O bit/O!/O This/O was/O how/O I/O was/O lying/O,/O and/O this/O was/O how/O he/O was/O standing/O./O
Yes/O--/Oyes/O--/Oyes/O.../O./O Here/O it/O is/O!/O''/O--/Oand/O Petritsky/PERSON pulled/O a/O letter/O out/O from/O
under/O the/O mattress/O,/O where/O he/O had/O hidden/O it/O./O

Vronsky/PERSON took/O the/O letter/O and/O his/O brother/O's/O note/O./O It/O was/O the/O letter/O he/O was/O
expecting/O--/Ofrom/O his/O mother/O,/O reproaching/O him/O for/O not/O having/O been/O to/O see/O
her/O--/Oand/O the/O note/O was/O from/O his/O brother/O to/O say/O that/O he/O must/O have/O a/O little/O
talk/O with/O him/O./O Vronsky/O knew/O that/O it/O was/O all/O about/O the/O same/O thing/O./O ``/OWhat/O
business/O is/O it/O of/O theirs/O!/O''/O thought/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O crumpling/O up/O the/O letters/O
he/O thrust/O them/O between/O the/O buttons/O of/O his/O coat/O so/O as/O to/O read/O them/O
carefully/O on/O the/O road/O./O In/O the/O porch/O of/O the/O hut/O he/O was/O met/O by/O two/O
officers/O;/O one/O of/O his/O regiment/O and/O one/O of/O another/O./O

Vronsky/O's/O quarters/O were/O always/O a/O meeting/O place/O for/O all/O the/O officers/O./O

``/OWhere/O are/O you/O off/O to/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O must/O go/O to/O Peterhof/O./O''/O

``/OHas/O the/O mare/O come/O from/O Tsarskoe/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O I/O've/O not/O seen/O her/O yet/O./O''/O

``/OThey/O say/O Mahotin/PERSON's/O Gladiator/O's/O lame/O./O''/O

``/ONonsense/O!/O But/O however/O are/O you/O going/O to/O race/O in/O this/O mud/O?/O''/O said/O the/O
other/O./O

``/OHere/O are/O my/O saviors/O!/O''/O cried/O Petritsky/PERSON,/O seeing/O them/O come/O in/O./O Before/O him/O
stood/O the/O orderly/O with/O a/O tray/O of/O brandy/O and/O salted/O cucumbers/O./O ``/OHere/O's/O
Yashvin/O ordering/O me/O to/O drink/O a/O pick-me-up/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O did/O give/O it/O to/O us/O yesterday/O,/O''/O said/O one/O of/O those/O who/O had/O come/O
in/O;/O ``/Oyou/O did/On't/O let/O us/O get/O a/O wink/O of/O sleep/O all/O night/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O did/On't/O we/O make/O a/O pretty/O finish/O!/O''/O said/O Petritsky/PERSON./O ``/OVolkov/PERSON climbed/O
onto/O the/O roof/O and/O began/O telling/O us/O how/O sad/O he/O was/O./O I/O said/O:/O `/OLet/O's/O have/O
music/O,/O the/O funeral/O march/O!/O'/O He/O fairly/O dropped/O asleep/O on/O the/O roof/O over/O the/O
funeral/O march/O./O''/O

``/ODrink/O it/O up/O;/O you/O positively/O must/O drink/O the/O brandy/O,/O and/O then/O seltzer/O
water/O and/O a/O lot/O of/O lemon/O,/O''/O said/O Yashvin/PERSON,/O standing/O over/O Petritsky/PERSON like/O a/O
mother/O making/O a/O child/O take/O medicine/O,/O ``/Oand/O then/O a/O little/O champagne/O--/Ojust/O a/O
small/O bottle/O./O''/O

``/OCome/O,/O there/O's/O some/O sense/O in/O that/O./O Stop/O a/O bit/O,/O Vronsky/O./O We/O'll/O all/O have/O a/O
drink/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O good-bye/O all/O of/O you/O./O I/O'm/O not/O going/O to/O drink/O today/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O are/O you/O gaining/O weight/O?/O All/O right/O,/O then/O we/O must/O have/O it/O alone/O./O
Give/O us/O the/O seltzer/O water/O and/O lemon/O./O''/O

``/OVronsky/O!/O''/O shouted/O someone/O when/O he/O was/O already/O outside/O./O

``/OWell/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O'd/O better/O get/O your/O hair/O cut/O,/O it/O'll/O weigh/O you/O down/O,/O especially/O at/O the/O
top/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O was/O in/O fact/O beginning/O,/O prematurely/O,/O to/O get/O a/O little/O bald/O./O He/O
laughed/O gaily/O,/O showing/O his/O even/O teeth/O,/O and/O pulling/O his/O cap/O over/O the/O thin/O
place/O,/O went/O out/O and/O got/O into/O his/O carriage/O./O

``/OTo/O the/O stables/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O was/O just/O pulling/O out/O the/O letters/O to/O read/O
them/O through/O,/O but/O he/O thought/O better/O of/O it/O,/O and/O put/O off/O reading/O them/O so/O
as/O not/O to/O distract/O his/O attention/O before/O looking/O at/O the/O mare/O./O ``/OLater/O!/O''/O



Chapter/O 21/O


The/O temporary/O stable/O,/O a/O wooden/O shed/O,/O had/O been/O put/O up/O close/O to/O the/O race/O
course/O,/O and/O there/O his/O mare/O was/O to/O have/O been/O taken/O the/O previous/O day/O./O He/O
had/O not/O yet/O seen/O her/O there/O./O

During/O the/O last/O few/O days/O he/O had/O not/O ridden/O her/O out/O for/O exercise/O himself/O,/O
but/O had/O put/O her/O in/O the/O charge/O of/O the/O trainer/O,/O and/O so/O now/O he/O positively/O
did/O not/O know/O in/O what/O condition/O his/O mare/O had/O arrived/O yesterday/O and/O was/O
today/O./O He/O had/O scarcely/O got/O out/O of/O his/O carriage/O when/O his/O groom/O,/O the/O
so-called/O ``/Ostable/O boy/O,/O''/O recognizing/O the/O carriage/O some/O way/O off/O,/O called/O
the/O trainer/O./O A/O dry-looking/O Englishman/O,/O in/O high/O boots/O and/O a/O short/O jacket/O,/O
clean-shaven/O,/O except/O for/O a/O tuft/O below/O his/O chin/O,/O came/O to/O meet/O him/O,/O
walking/O with/O the/O uncouth/O gait/O of/O jockey/O,/O turning/O his/O elbows/O out/O and/O
swaying/O from/O side/O to/O side/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O's/O Frou-Frou/O?/O''/O Vronsky/O asked/O in/O English/O./O

``/OAll/O right/O,/O sir/O,/O''/O the/O Englishman/O's/O voice/O responded/O somewhere/O in/O the/O
inside/O of/O his/O throat/O./O ``/OBetter/O not/O go/O in/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O touching/O his/O hat/O./O
``/OI/O've/O put/O a/O muzzle/O on/O her/O,/O and/O the/O mare/O's/O fidgety/O./O Better/O not/O go/O in/O,/O
it/O'll/O excite/O the/O mare/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O going/O in/O./O I/O want/O to/O look/O at/O her/O./O''/O

``/OCome/O along/O,/O then/O,/O''/O said/O the/O Englishman/O,/O frowning/O,/O and/O speaking/O with/O his/O
mouth/O shut/O,/O and/O,/O with/O swinging/O elbows/O,/O he/O went/O on/O in/O front/O with/O his/O
disjointed/O gait/O./O

They/O went/O into/O the/O little/O yard/O in/O front/O of/O the/O shed/O./O A/O stable/O boy/O,/O
spruce/O and/O smart/O in/O his/O holiday/O attire/O,/O met/O them/O with/O a/O broom/O in/O his/O
hand/O,/O and/O followed/O them/O./O In/O the/O shed/O there/O were/O five/O horses/O in/O their/O
separate/O stalls/O,/O and/O Vronsky/PERSON knew/O that/O his/O chief/O rival/O,/O Gladiator/PERSON,/O a/O
very/O tall/O chestnut/O horse/O,/O had/O been/O brought/O there/O,/O and/O must/O be/O standing/O
among/O them/O./O Even/O more/O than/O his/O mare/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON longed/O to/O see/O Gladiator/O,/O
whom/O he/O had/O never/O seen/O./O But/O he/O knew/O that/O by/O the/O etiquette/O of/O the/O race/O
course/O it/O was/O not/O merely/O impossible/O for/O him/O to/O see/O the/O horse/O,/O but/O
improper/O even/O to/O ask/O questions/O about/O him/O./O Just/O as/O he/O was/O passing/O along/O
the/O passage/O,/O the/O boy/O opened/O the/O door/O into/O the/O second/O horse-box/O on/O the/O
left/O,/O and/O Vronsky/O caught/O a/O glimpse/O of/O a/O big/O chestnut/O horse/O with/O white/O
legs/O./O He/O knew/O that/O this/O was/O Gladiator/O,/O but/O,/O with/O the/O feeling/O of/O a/O man/O
turning/O away/O from/O the/O sight/O of/O another/O man/O's/O open/O letter/O,/O he/O turned/O
round/O and/O went/O into/O Frou-Frou/PERSON's/O stall/O./O

``/OThe/O horse/O is/O here/O belonging/O to/O Mak/PERSON.../O Mak/O.../O I/O never/O can/O say/O the/O name/O,/O''/O
said/O the/O Englishman/O,/O over/O his/O shoulder/O,/O pointing/O his/O big/O finger/O and/O
dirty/O nail/O towards/O Gladiator/O's/O stall/O./O

``/OMahotin/O?/O Yes/O,/O he/O's/O my/O most/O serious/O rival/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON./O

``/OIf/O you/O were/O riding/O him/O,/O''/O said/O the/O Englishman/O,/O ``/OI/O'd/O bet/O on/O you/O./O''/O

``/OFrou-Frou/O's/O more/O nervous/O;/O he/O's/O stronger/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O smiling/O at/O the/O
compliment/O to/O his/O riding/O./O

``/OIn/O a/O steeplechase/O it/O all/O depends/O on/O riding/O and/O on/O pluck/O,/O''/O said/O the/O
Englishman/O./O

Of/O pluck/O--/Othat/O is/O,/O energy/O and/O courage/O--/OVronsky/PERSON did/O not/O merely/O feel/O that/O he/O
had/O enough/O;/O what/O was/O of/O far/O more/O importance/O,/O he/O was/O firmly/O convinced/O
that/O no/O one/O in/O the/O world/O could/O have/O more/O of/O this/O ``/Opluck/O''/O than/O he/O had/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O you/O think/O I/O want/O more/O thinning/O down/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O Englishman/O./O ``/OPlease/O,/O do/On't/O speak/O loud/O./O The/O mare/O's/O
fidgety/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O nodding/O towards/O the/O horse-box/O,/O before/O which/O they/O
were/O standing/O,/O and/O from/O which/O came/O the/O sound/O of/O restless/O stamping/O in/O the/O
straw/O./O

He/O opened/O the/O door/O,/O and/O Vronsky/O went/O into/O the/O horse-box/O,/O dimly/O lighted/O
by/O one/O little/O window/O./O In/O the/O horse-box/O stood/O a/O dark/O bay/O mare/O,/O with/O a/O
muzzle/O on/O,/O picking/O at/O the/O fresh/O straw/O with/O her/O hoofs/O./O Looking/O round/O him/O
in/O the/O twilight/O of/O the/O horse-box/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON unconsciously/O took/O in/O once/O
more/O in/O a/O comprehensive/O glance/O all/O the/O points/O of/O his/O favorite/O mare/O./O
Frou-Frou/O was/O a/O beast/O of/O medium/O size/O,/O not/O altogether/O free/O from/O reproach/O,/O
from/O a/O breeder/O's/O point/O of/O view/O./O She/O was/O small-boned/O all/O over/O;/O though/O her/O
chest/O was/O extremely/O prominent/O in/O front/O,/O it/O was/O narrow/O./O Her/O hind-quarters/O
were/O a/O little/O drooping/O,/O and/O in/O her/O fore-legs/O,/O and/O still/O more/O in/O her/O
hind-legs/O,/O there/O was/O a/O noticeable/O curvature/O./O The/O muscles/O of/O both/O hind/O-/O
and/O fore-legs/O were/O not/O very/O thick/O;/O but/O across/O her/O shoulders/O the/O mare/O was/O
exceptionally/O broad/O,/O a/O peculiarity/O specially/O striking/O now/O that/O she/O was/O
lean/O from/O training/O./O The/O bones/O of/O her/O legs/O below/O the/O knees/O looked/O no/O
thicker/O than/O a/O finger/O from/O in/O front/O,/O but/O were/O extraordinarily/O thick/O seen/O
from/O the/O side/O./O She/O looked/O altogether/O,/O except/O across/O the/O shoulders/O,/O as/O it/O
were/O,/O pinched/O in/O at/O the/O sides/O and/O pressed/O out/O in/O depth/O./O But/O she/O had/O in/O
the/O highest/O degree/O the/O quality/O that/O makes/O all/O defects/O forgotten/O:/O that/O
quality/O was/O _/Oblood/O_/O,/O the/O blood/O _/Othat/O tells/O_/O,/O as/O the/O English/O expression/O
has/O it/O./O The/O muscles/O stood/O up/O sharply/O under/O the/O network/O of/O sinews/O,/O
covered/O with/O the/O delicate/O,/O mobile/O skin/O,/O soft/O as/O satin/O,/O and/O they/O were/O
hard/O as/O bone/O./O Her/O clean-cut/O head/O,/O with/O prominent/O,/O bright/O,/O spirited/O eyes/O,/O
broadened/O out/O at/O the/O open/O nostrils/O,/O that/O showed/O the/O red/O blood/O in/O the/O
cartilage/O within/O./O About/O all/O her/O figure/O,/O and/O especially/O her/O head/O,/O there/O
was/O a/O certain/O expression/O of/O energy/O,/O and/O,/O at/O the/O same/O time/O,/O of/O softness/O./O
She/O was/O one/O of/O those/O creatures/O which/O seem/O only/O not/O to/O speak/O because/O the/O
mechanism/O of/O their/O mouth/O does/O not/O allow/O them/O to/O./O

To/O Vronsky/O,/O at/O any/O rate/O,/O it/O seemed/O that/O she/O understood/O all/O he/O felt/O at/O
that/O moment/O,/O looking/O at/O her/O./O

Directly/O Vronsky/O went/O towards/O her/O,/O she/O drew/O in/O a/O deep/O breath/O,/O and/O,/O
turning/O back/O her/O prominent/O eye/O till/O the/O white/O looked/O bloodshot/O,/O she/O
started/O at/O the/O approaching/O figures/O from/O the/O opposite/O side/O,/O shaking/O her/O
muzzle/O,/O and/O shifting/O lightly/O from/O one/O leg/O to/O the/O other/O./O

``/OThere/O,/O you/O see/O how/O fidgety/O she/O is/O,/O''/O said/O the/O Englishman/O./O

``/OThere/O,/O darling/O!/O There/O!/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O going/O up/O to/O the/O mare/O and/O speaking/O
soothingly/O to/O her/O./O

But/O the/O nearer/O he/O came/O,/O the/O more/O excited/O she/O grew/O./O Only/O when/O he/O stood/O by/O
her/O head/O,/O she/O was/O suddenly/O quieter/O,/O while/O the/O muscles/O quivered/O under/O her/O
soft/O,/O delicate/O coat/O./O Vronsky/O patted/O her/O strong/O neck/O,/O straightened/O over/O
her/O sharp/O withers/O a/O stray/O lock/O of/O her/O mane/O that/O had/O fallen/O on/O the/O other/O
side/O,/O and/O moved/O his/O face/O near/O her/O dilated/O nostrils/O,/O transparent/O as/O a/O
bat/O's/O wing/O./O She/O drew/O a/O loud/O breath/O and/O snorted/O out/O through/O her/O tense/O
nostrils/O,/O started/O,/O pricked/O up/O her/O sharp/O ear/O,/O and/O put/O out/O her/O strong/O,/O
black/O lip/O towards/O Vronsky/O,/O as/O though/O she/O would/O nip/O hold/O of/O his/O sleeve/O./O
But/O remembering/O the/O muzzle/O,/O she/O shook/O it/O and/O again/O began/O restlessly/O
stamping/O one/O after/O the/O other/O her/O shapely/O legs/O./O

``/OQuiet/O,/O darling/O,/O quiet/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O patting/O her/O again/O over/O her/O
hind-quarters/O;/O and/O with/O a/O glad/O sense/O that/O his/O mare/O was/O in/O the/O best/O
possible/O condition/O,/O he/O went/O out/O of/O the/O horse-box/O./O

The/O mare/O's/O excitement/O had/O infected/O Vronsky/O./O He/O felt/O that/O his/O heart/O was/O
throbbing/O,/O and/O that/O he/O,/O too/O,/O like/O the/O mare/O,/O longed/O to/O move/O,/O to/O bite/O;/O it/O
was/O both/O dreadful/O and/O delicious/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O rely/O on/O you/O,/O then/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O Englishman/O;/O ``/Ohalf-past/O six/O
on/O the/O ground/O./O''/O

``/OAll/O right/O,/O''/O said/O the/O Englishman/O./O ``/OOh/O,/O where/O are/O you/O going/O,/O my/O lord/O?/O''/O he/O
asked/O suddenly/O,/O using/O the/O title/O ``/Omy/O lord/O,/O''/O which/O he/O had/O scarcely/O ever/O
used/O before/O./O

Vronsky/O in/O amazement/O raised/O his/O head/O,/O and/O stared/O,/O as/O he/O knew/O how/O to/O
stare/O,/O not/O into/O the/O Englishman/O's/O eyes/O,/O but/O at/O his/O forehead/O,/O astounded/O at/O
the/O impertinence/O of/O his/O question/O./O But/O realizing/O that/O in/O asking/O this/O the/O
Englishman/O had/O been/O looking/O at/O him/O not/O as/O an/O employer/O,/O but/O as/O a/O jockey/O,/O
he/O answered/O:/O

``/OI/O've/O got/O to/O go/O to/O Bryansky/PERSON's/O;/O I/O shall/O be/O home/O within/O an/O hour/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O often/O I/O'm/O asked/O that/O question/O today/O!/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O,/O and/O he/O
blushed/O,/O a/O thing/O which/O rarely/O happened/O to/O him/O./O The/O Englishman/O looked/O
gravely/O at/O him/O;/O and/O,/O as/O though/O he/O,/O too/O,/O knew/O where/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O going/O,/O he/O
added/O:/O

``/OThe/O great/O thing/O's/O to/O keep/O quiet/O before/O a/O race/O,/O''/O said/O he/O;/O ``/Odo/On't/O get/O out/O
of/O temper/O or/O upset/O about/O anything/O./O''/O

``/OAll/O right/O,/O''/O answered/O Vronsky/O,/O smiling/O;/O and/O jumping/O into/O his/O carriage/O,/O
he/O told/O the/O man/O to/O drive/O to/O Peterhof/O./O

Before/O he/O had/O driven/O many/O paces/O away/O,/O the/O dark/O clouds/O that/O had/O been/O
threatening/O rain/O all/O day/O broke/O,/O and/O there/O was/O a/O heavy/O downpour/O of/O rain/O./O

``/OWhat/O a/O pity/O!/O''/O thought/O Vronsky/O,/O putting/O up/O the/O roof/O of/O the/O carriage/O./O ``/OIt/O
was/O muddy/O before/O,/O now/O it/O will/O be/O a/O perfect/O swamp/O./O''/O As/O he/O sat/O in/O solitude/O
in/O the/O closed/O carriage/O,/O he/O took/O out/O his/O mother/O's/O letter/O and/O his/O
brother/O's/O note/O,/O and/O read/O them/O through/O./O

Yes/O,/O it/O was/O the/O same/O thing/O over/O and/O over/O again/O./O Everyone/O,/O his/O mother/O,/O
his/O brother/O,/O everyone/O thought/O fit/O to/O interfere/O in/O the/O affairs/O of/O his/O
heart/O./O This/O interference/O aroused/O in/O him/O a/O feeling/O of/O angry/O hatred/O--/Oa/O
feeling/O he/O had/O rarely/O known/O before/O./O ``/OWhat/O business/O is/O it/O of/O theirs/O?/O Why/O
does/O everybody/O feel/O called/O upon/O to/O concern/O himself/O about/O me/O?/O And/O why/O do/O
they/O worry/O me/O so/O?/O Just/O because/O they/O see/O that/O this/O is/O something/O they/O
ca/On't/O understand/O./O If/O it/O were/O a/O common/O,/O vulgar/O,/O worldly/O intrigue/O,/O they/O
would/O have/O left/O me/O alone/O./O They/O feel/O that/O this/O is/O something/O different/O,/O
that/O this/O is/O not/O a/O mere/O pastime/O,/O that/O this/O woman/O is/O dearer/O to/O me/O than/O
life/O./O And/O this/O is/O incomprehensible/O,/O and/O that/O's/O why/O it/O annoys/O them/O./O
Whatever/O our/O destiny/O is/O or/O may/O be/O,/O we/O have/O made/O it/O ourselves/O,/O and/O we/O do/O
not/O complain/O of/O it/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O in/O the/O word/O _/Owe/O_/O linking/O himself/O with/O
Anna/PERSON./O ``/ONo/O,/O they/O must/O needs/O teach/O us/O how/O to/O live/O./O They/O have/On't/O an/O idea/O of/O
what/O happiness/O is/O;/O they/O do/On't/O know/O that/O without/O our/O love/O,/O for/O us/O there/O
is/O neither/O happiness/O nor/O unhappiness/O--/Ono/O life/O at/O all/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

He/O was/O angry/O with/O all/O of/O them/O for/O their/O interference/O just/O because/O he/O
felt/O in/O his/O soul/O that/O they/O,/O all/O these/O people/O,/O were/O right/O./O He/O felt/O that/O
the/O love/O that/O bound/O him/O to/O Anna/PERSON was/O not/O a/O momentary/O impulse/O,/O which/O would/O
pass/O,/O as/O worldly/O intrigues/O do/O pass/O,/O leaving/O no/O other/O traces/O in/O the/O life/O
of/O either/O but/O pleasant/O or/O unpleasant/O memories/O./O He/O felt/O all/O the/O torture/O
of/O his/O own/O and/O her/O position/O,/O all/O the/O difficulty/O there/O was/O for/O them/O,/O
conspicuous/O as/O they/O were/O in/O the/O eye/O of/O all/O the/O world/O,/O in/O concealing/O
their/O love/O,/O in/O lying/O and/O deceiving/O;/O and/O in/O lying/O,/O deceiving/O,/O feigning/O,/O
and/O continually/O thinking/O of/O others/O,/O when/O the/O passion/O that/O united/O them/O
was/O so/O intense/O that/O they/O were/O both/O oblivious/O of/O everything/O else/O but/O
their/O love/O./O

He/O vividly/O recalled/O all/O the/O constantly/O recurring/O instances/O of/O inevitable/O
necessity/O for/O lying/O and/O deceit/O,/O which/O were/O so/O against/O his/O natural/O bent/O./O
He/O recalled/O particularly/O vividly/O the/O shame/O he/O had/O more/O than/O once/O
detected/O in/O her/O at/O this/O necessity/O for/O lying/O and/O deceit/O./O And/O he/O
experienced/O the/O strange/O feeling/O that/O had/O sometimes/O come/O upon/O him/O since/O
his/O secret/O love/O for/O Anna/PERSON./O This/O was/O a/O feeling/O of/O loathing/O for/O
something/O--/Owhether/O for/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O or/O for/O himself/O,/O or/O for/O the/O
whole/O world/O,/O he/O could/O not/O have/O said/O./O But/O he/O always/O drove/O away/O this/O
strange/O feeling/O./O Now/O,/O too/O,/O he/O shook/O it/O off/O and/O continued/O the/O thread/O of/O
his/O thoughts/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O she/O was/O unhappy/O before/O,/O but/O proud/O and/O at/O peace/O;/O and/O now/O she/O can/Onot/O
be/O at/O peace/O and/O feel/O secure/O in/O her/O dignity/O,/O though/O she/O does/O not/O show/O it/O./O
Yes/O,/O we/O must/O put/O an/O end/O to/O it/O,/O''/O he/O decided/O./O

And/O for/O the/O first/O time/O the/O idea/O clearly/O presented/O itself/O that/O it/O was/O
essential/O to/O put/O an/O end/O to/O this/O false/O position/O,/O and/O the/O sooner/O the/O
better/O./O ``/OThrow/O up/O everything/O,/O she/O and/O I/O,/O and/O hide/O ourselves/O somewhere/O
alone/O with/O our/O love/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O./O



Chapter/O 22/O


The/O rain/O did/O not/O last/O long/O,/O and/O by/O the/O time/O Vronsky/O arrived/O,/O his/O
shaft-horse/O trotting/O at/O full/O speed/O and/O dragging/O the/O trace-horses/O
galloping/O through/O the/O mud/O,/O with/O their/O reins/O hanging/O loose/O,/O the/O sun/O had/O
peeped/O out/O again/O,/O the/O roofs/O of/O the/O summer/O villas/O and/O the/O old/O limetrees/O
in/O the/O gardens/O on/O both/O sides/O of/O the/O principal/O streets/O sparkled/O with/O wet/O
brilliance/O,/O and/O from/O the/O twigs/O came/O a/O pleasant/O drip/O and/O from/O the/O roofs/O
rushing/O streams/O of/O water/O./O He/O thought/O no/O more/O of/O the/O shower/O spoiling/O the/O
race/O course/O,/O but/O was/O rejoicing/O now/O that/O--/Othanks/O to/O the/O rain/O--/Ohe/O would/O be/O
sure/O to/O find/O her/O at/O home/O and/O alone/O,/O as/O he/O knew/O that/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O who/O had/O lately/O returned/O from/O a/O foreign/O watering/O place/O,/O
had/O not/O moved/O from/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O

Hoping/O to/O find/O her/O alone/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON alighted/O,/O as/O he/O always/O did/O,/O to/O avoid/O
attracting/O attention/O,/O before/O crossing/O the/O bridge/O,/O and/O walked/O to/O the/O
house/O./O He/O did/O not/O go/O up/O the/O steps/O to/O the/O street/O door/O,/O but/O went/O into/O the/O
court/O./O

``/OHas/O your/O master/O come/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O a/O gardener/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O sir/O./O The/O mistress/O is/O at/O home/O./O But/O will/O you/O please/O go/O to/O the/O front/O
door/O;/O there/O are/O servants/O there/O,/O''/O the/O gardener/O answered/O./O ``/OThey/O'll/O open/O
the/O door/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'll/O go/O in/O from/O the/O garden/O./O''/O

And/O feeling/O satisfied/O that/O she/O was/O alone/O,/O and/O wanting/O to/O take/O her/O by/O
surprise/O,/O since/O he/O had/O not/O promised/O to/O be/O there/O today/O,/O and/O she/O would/O
certainly/O not/O expect/O him/O to/O come/O before/O the/O races/O,/O he/O walked/O,/O holding/O
his/O sword/O and/O stepping/O cautiously/O over/O the/O sandy/O path/O,/O bordered/O with/O
flowers/O,/O to/O the/O terrace/O that/O looked/O out/O upon/O the/O garden/O./O Vronsky/O forgot/O
now/O all/O that/O he/O had/O thought/O on/O the/O way/O of/O the/O hardships/O and/O difficulties/O
of/O their/O position/O./O He/O thought/O of/O nothing/O but/O that/O he/O would/O see/O her/O
directly/O,/O not/O in/O imagination/O,/O but/O living/O,/O all/O of/O her/O,/O as/O she/O was/O in/O
reality/O./O He/O was/O just/O going/O in/O,/O stepping/O on/O his/O whole/O foot/O so/O as/O not/O to/O
creak/O,/O up/O the/O worn/O steps/O of/O the/O terrace/O,/O when/O he/O suddenly/O remembered/O
what/O he/O always/O forgot/O,/O and/O what/O caused/O the/O most/O torturing/O side/O of/O his/O
relations/O with/O her/O,/O her/O son/O with/O his/O questioning/O--/Ohostile/O,/O as/O he/O
fancied/O--/Oeyes/O./O

This/O boy/O was/O more/O often/O than/O anyone/O else/O a/O check/O upon/O their/O freedom/O./O
When/O he/O was/O present/O,/O both/O Vronsky/O and/O Anna/PERSON did/O not/O merely/O avoid/O speaking/O
of/O anything/O that/O they/O could/O not/O have/O repeated/O before/O everyone/O;/O they/O did/O
not/O even/O allow/O themselves/O to/O refer/O by/O hints/O to/O anything/O the/O boy/O did/O not/O
understand/O./O They/O had/O made/O no/O agreement/O about/O this/O,/O it/O had/O settled/O
itself/O./O They/O would/O have/O felt/O it/O wounding/O themselves/O to/O deceive/O the/O
child/O./O In/O his/O presence/O they/O talked/O like/O acquaintances/O./O But/O in/O spite/O of/O
this/O caution/O,/O Vronsky/O often/O saw/O the/O child/O's/O intent/O,/O bewildered/O glance/O
fixed/O upon/O him/O,/O and/O a/O strange/O shyness/O,/O uncertainty/O,/O at/O one/O time/O
friendliness/O,/O at/O another/O,/O coldness/O and/O reserve/O,/O in/O the/O boy/O's/O manner/O to/O
him/O;/O as/O though/O the/O child/O felt/O that/O between/O this/O man/O and/O his/O mother/O there/O
existed/O some/O important/O bond/O,/O the/O significance/O of/O which/O he/O could/O not/O
understand/O./O

As/O a/O fact/O,/O the/O boy/O did/O feel/O that/O he/O could/O not/O understand/O this/O relation/O,/O
and/O he/O tried/O painfully/O,/O and/O was/O not/O able/O to/O make/O clear/O to/O himself/O what/O
feeling/O he/O ought/O to/O have/O for/O this/O man/O./O With/O a/O child/O's/O keen/O instinct/O for/O
every/O manifestation/O of/O feeling/O,/O he/O saw/O distinctly/O that/O his/O father/O,/O his/O
governess/O,/O his/O nurse/O,/O--/Oall/O did/O not/O merely/O dislike/O Vronsky/O,/O but/O looked/O on/O
him/O with/O horror/O and/O aversion/O,/O though/O they/O never/O said/O anything/O about/O him/O,/O
while/O his/O mother/O looked/O on/O him/O as/O her/O greatest/O friend/O./O

``/OWhat/O does/O it/O mean/O?/O Who/O is/O he/O?/O How/O ought/O I/O to/O love/O him/O?/O If/O I/O do/On't/O know/O,/O
it/O's/O my/O fault/O;/O either/O I/O'm/O stupid/O or/O a/O naughty/O boy/O,/O''/O thought/O the/O child/O./O
And/O this/O was/O what/O caused/O his/O dubious/O,/O inquiring/O,/O sometimes/O hostile/O,/O
expression/O,/O and/O the/O shyness/O and/O uncertainty/O which/O Vronsky/O found/O so/O
irksome/O./O This/O child/O's/O presence/O always/O and/O infallibly/O called/O up/O in/O
Vronsky/O that/O strange/O feeling/O of/O inexplicable/O loathing/O which/O he/O had/O
experienced/O of/O late/O./O This/O child/O's/O presence/O called/O up/O both/O in/O Vronsky/O and/O
in/O Anna/PERSON a/O feeling/O akin/O to/O the/O feeling/O of/O a/O sailor/O who/O sees/O by/O the/O
compass/O that/O the/O direction/O in/O which/O he/O is/O swiftly/O moving/O is/O far/O from/O the/O
right/O one/O,/O but/O that/O to/O arrest/O his/O motion/O is/O not/O in/O his/O power/O,/O that/O every/O
instant/O is/O carrying/O him/O further/O and/O further/O away/O,/O and/O that/O to/O admit/O to/O
himself/O his/O deviation/O from/O the/O right/O direction/O is/O the/O same/O as/O admitting/O
his/O certain/O ruin/O./O

This/O child/O,/O with/O his/O innocent/O outlook/O upon/O life/O,/O was/O the/O compass/O that/O
showed/O them/O the/O point/O to/O which/O they/O had/O departed/O from/O what/O they/O knew/O,/O
but/O did/O not/O want/O to/O know/O./O

This/O time/O Seryozha/PERSON was/O not/O at/O home/O,/O and/O she/O was/O completely/O alone/O./O She/O
was/O sitting/O on/O the/O terrace/O waiting/O for/O the/O return/O of/O her/O son/O,/O who/O had/O
gone/O out/O for/O his/O walk/O and/O been/O caught/O in/O the/O rain/O./O She/O had/O sent/O a/O
manservant/O and/O a/O maid/O out/O to/O look/O for/O him/O./O Dressed/O in/O a/O white/O gown/O,/O
deeply/O embroidered/O,/O she/O was/O sitting/O in/O a/O corner/O of/O the/O terrace/O behind/O
some/O flowers/O,/O and/O did/O not/O hear/O him/O./O Bending/O her/O curly/O black/O head/O,/O she/O
pressed/O her/O forehead/O against/O a/O cool/O watering/O pot/O that/O stood/O on/O the/O
parapet/O,/O and/O both/O her/O lovely/O hands/O,/O with/O the/O rings/O he/O knew/O so/O well/O,/O
clasped/O the/O pot/O./O The/O beauty/O of/O her/O whole/O figure/O,/O her/O head/O,/O her/O neck/O,/O her/O
hands/O,/O struck/O Vronsky/O every/O time/O as/O something/O new/O and/O unexpected/O./O He/O
stood/O still/O,/O gazing/O at/O her/O in/O ecstasy/O./O But/O,/O directly/O he/O would/O have/O made/O
a/O step/O to/O come/O nearer/O to/O her/O,/O she/O was/O aware/O of/O his/O presence/O,/O pushed/O away/O
the/O watering/O pot/O,/O and/O turned/O her/O flushed/O face/O towards/O him/O./O

``/OWhat/O's/O the/O matter/O?/O You/O are/O ill/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O her/O in/O French/O,/O going/O up/O to/O
her/O./O He/O would/O have/O run/O to/O her/O,/O but/O remembering/O that/O there/O might/O be/O
spectators/O,/O he/O looked/O round/O towards/O the/O balcony/O door/O,/O and/O reddened/O a/O
little/O,/O as/O he/O always/O reddened/O,/O feeling/O that/O he/O had/O to/O be/O afraid/O and/O be/O
on/O his/O guard/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O quite/O well/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O getting/O up/O and/O pressing/O his/O outstretched/O
hand/O tightly/O./O ``/OI/O did/O not/O expect/O .../O thee/O./O''/O

``/OMercy/O!/O what/O cold/O hands/O!/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OYou/O startled/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OI/O'm/O alone/O,/O and/O expecting/O Seryozha/PERSON;/O he/O's/O
out/O for/O a/O walk/O;/O they/O'll/O come/O in/O from/O this/O side/O./O''/O

But/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O her/O efforts/O to/O be/O calm/O,/O her/O lips/O were/O quivering/O./O

``/OForgive/O me/O for/O coming/O,/O but/O I/O could/On't/O pass/O the/O day/O without/O seeing/O you/O,/O''/O
he/O went/O on/O,/O speaking/O French/O,/O as/O he/O always/O did/O to/O avoid/O using/O the/O stiff/O
Russian/O plural/O form/O,/O so/O impossibly/O frigid/O between/O them/O,/O and/O the/O
dangerously/O intimate/O singular/O./O

``/OForgive/O you/O?/O I/O'm/O so/O glad/O!/O''/O

``/OBut/O you/O're/O ill/O or/O worried/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O not/O letting/O go/O her/O hands/O and/O
bending/O over/O her/O./O ``/OWhat/O were/O you/O thinking/O of/O?/O''/O

``/OAlways/O the/O same/O thing/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O a/O smile/O./O

She/O spoke/O the/O truth/O./O If/O ever/O at/O any/O moment/O she/O had/O been/O asked/O what/O she/O
was/O thinking/O of/O,/O she/O could/O have/O answered/O truly/O:/O of/O the/O same/O thing/O,/O of/O
her/O happiness/O and/O her/O unhappiness/O./O She/O was/O thinking/O,/O just/O when/O he/O came/O
upon/O her/O,/O of/O this/O:/O why/O was/O it/O,/O she/O wondered/O,/O that/O to/O others/O,/O to/O Betsy/PERSON
-LRB-/Oshe/O knew/O of/O her/O secret/O connection/O with/O Tushkevitch/PERSON-RRB-/O it/O was/O all/O easy/O,/O
while/O to/O her/O it/O was/O such/O torture/O?/O Today/O this/O thought/O gained/O special/O
poignancy/O from/O certain/O other/O considerations/O./O She/O asked/O him/O about/O the/O
races/O./O He/O answered/O her/O questions/O,/O and/O,/O seeing/O that/O she/O was/O agitated/O,/O
trying/O to/O calm/O her/O,/O he/O began/O telling/O her/O in/O the/O simplest/O tone/O the/O
details/O of/O his/O preparations/O for/O the/O races/O./O

``/OTell/O him/O or/O not/O tell/O him/O?/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O looking/O into/O his/O quiet/O,/O
affectionate/O eyes/O./O ``/OHe/O is/O so/O happy/O,/O so/O absorbed/O in/O his/O races/O that/O he/O
wo/On't/O understand/O as/O he/O ought/O,/O he/O wo/On't/O understand/O all/O the/O gravity/O of/O
this/O fact/O to/O us/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O you/O have/On't/O told/O me/O what/O you/O were/O thinking/O of/O when/O I/O came/O in/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O,/O interrupting/O his/O narrative/O;/O ``/Oplease/O tell/O me/O!/O''/O

She/O did/O not/O answer/O,/O and/O,/O bending/O her/O head/O a/O little/O,/O she/O looked/O
inquiringly/O at/O him/O from/O under/O her/O brows/O,/O her/O eyes/O shining/O under/O their/O
long/O lashes/O./O Her/O hand/O shook/O as/O it/O played/O with/O a/O leaf/O she/O had/O picked/O./O He/O
saw/O it/O,/O and/O his/O face/O expressed/O that/O utter/O subjection/O,/O that/O slavish/O
devotion/O,/O which/O had/O done/O so/O much/O to/O win/O her/O./O

``/OI/O see/O something/O has/O happened/O./O Do/O you/O suppose/O I/O can/O be/O at/O peace/O,/O knowing/O
you/O have/O a/O trouble/O I/O am/O not/O sharing/O?/O Tell/O me/O,/O for/O God/O's/O sake/O,/O''/O he/O
repeated/O imploringly/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O sha/On't/O be/O able/O to/O forgive/O him/O if/O he/O does/O not/O realize/O all/O the/O
gravity/O of/O it/O./O Better/O not/O tell/O;/O why/O put/O him/O to/O the/O proof/O?/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O
still/O staring/O at/O him/O in/O the/O same/O way/O,/O and/O feeling/O the/O hand/O that/O held/O the/O
leaf/O was/O trembling/O more/O and/O more/O./O

``/OFor/O God/O's/O sake/O!/O''/O he/O repeated/O,/O taking/O her/O hand/O./O

``/OShall/O I/O tell/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O yes/O .../O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O with/O child/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O softly/O and/O deliberately/O./O The/O leaf/O in/O her/O
hand/O shook/O more/O violently/O,/O but/O she/O did/O not/O take/O her/O eyes/O off/O him/O,/O
watching/O how/O he/O would/O take/O it/O./O He/O turned/O white/O,/O would/O have/O said/O
something/O,/O but/O stopped/O;/O he/O dropped/O her/O hand/O,/O and/O his/O head/O sank/O on/O his/O
breast/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O he/O realizes/O all/O the/O gravity/O of/O it/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O and/O
gratefully/O she/O pressed/O his/O hand/O./O

But/O she/O was/O mistaken/O in/O thinking/O he/O realized/O the/O gravity/O of/O the/O fact/O as/O
she/O,/O a/O woman/O,/O realized/O it/O./O On/O hearing/O it/O,/O he/O felt/O come/O upon/O him/O with/O
tenfold/O intensity/O that/O strange/O feeling/O of/O loathing/O of/O someone/O./O But/O at/O
the/O same/O time/O,/O he/O felt/O that/O the/O turning-point/O he/O had/O been/O longing/O for/O
had/O come/O now/O;/O that/O it/O was/O impossible/O to/O go/O on/O concealing/O things/O from/O her/O
husband/O,/O and/O it/O was/O inevitable/O in/O one/O way/O or/O another/O that/O they/O should/O
soon/O put/O an/O end/O to/O their/O unnatural/O position/O./O But/O,/O besides/O that/O,/O her/O
emotion/O physically/O affected/O him/O in/O the/O same/O way/O./O He/O looked/O at/O her/O with/O a/O
look/O of/O submissive/O tenderness/O,/O kissed/O her/O hand/O,/O got/O up/O,/O and/O,/O in/O silence/O,/O
paced/O up/O and/O down/O the/O terrace/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O going/O up/O to/O her/O resolutely/O./O ``/ONeither/O you/O nor/O I/O have/O
looked/O on/O our/O relations/O as/O a/O passing/O amusement/O,/O and/O now/O our/O fate/O is/O
sealed/O./O It/O is/O absolutely/O necessary/O to/O put/O an/O end/O''/O--/Ohe/O looked/O round/O as/O he/O
spoke/O--/O``/Oto/O the/O deception/O in/O which/O we/O are/O living/O./O''/O

``/OPut/O an/O end/O?/O How/O put/O an/O end/O,/O Alexey/PERSON?/O''/O she/O said/O softly/O./O

She/O was/O calmer/O now/O,/O and/O her/O face/O lighted/O up/O with/O a/O tender/O smile/O./O

``/OLeave/O your/O husband/O and/O make/O our/O life/O one/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O is/O one/O as/O it/O is/O,/O''/O she/O answered/O,/O scarcely/O audibly/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O altogether/O;/O altogether/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O how/O,/O Alexey/PERSON,/O tell/O me/O how/O?/O''/O she/O said/O in/O melancholy/O mockery/O at/O the/O
hopelessness/O of/O her/O own/O position/O./O ``/OIs/O there/O any/O way/O out/O of/O such/O a/O
position/O?/O Am/O I/O not/O the/O wife/O of/O my/O husband/O?/O''/O

``/OThere/O is/O a/O way/O out/O of/O every/O position/O./O We/O must/O take/O our/O line/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O
``/OAnything/O's/O better/O than/O the/O position/O in/O which/O you/O're/O living/O./O Of/O course/O,/O
I/O see/O how/O you/O torture/O yourself/O over/O everything/O--/Othe/O world/O and/O your/O son/O
and/O your/O husband/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O not/O over/O my/O husband/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O a/O quiet/O smile/O./O ``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O
him/O,/O I/O do/On't/O think/O of/O him/O./O He/O does/On't/O exist/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O not/O speaking/O sincerely/O./O I/O know/O you/O./O You/O worry/O about/O him/O too/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O he/O does/On't/O even/O know/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O suddenly/O a/O hot/O flush/O came/O over/O
her/O face/O;/O her/O cheeks/O,/O her/O brow/O,/O her/O neck/O crimsoned/O,/O and/O tears/O of/O shame/O
came/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O ``/OBut/O we/O wo/On't/O talk/O of/O him/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 23/O


Vronsky/O had/O several/O times/O already/O,/O though/O not/O so/O resolutely/O as/O now/O,/O
tried/O to/O bring/O her/O to/O consider/O their/O position/O,/O and/O every/O time/O he/O had/O
been/O confronted/O by/O the/O same/O superficiality/O and/O triviality/O with/O which/O she/O
met/O his/O appeal/O now/O./O It/O was/O as/O though/O there/O were/O something/O in/O this/O which/O
she/O could/O not/O or/O would/O not/O face/O,/O as/O though/O directly/O she/O began/O to/O speak/O
of/O this/O,/O she/O,/O the/O real/O Anna/PERSON,/O retreated/O somehow/O into/O herself/O,/O and/O another/O
strange/O and/O unaccountable/O woman/O came/O out/O,/O whom/O he/O did/O not/O love/O,/O and/O whom/O
he/O feared/O,/O and/O who/O was/O in/O opposition/O to/O him/O./O But/O today/O he/O was/O resolved/O
to/O have/O it/O out/O./O

``/OWhether/O he/O knows/O or/O not/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O in/O his/O usual/O quiet/O and/O resolute/O
tone/O,/O ``/Othat/O's/O nothing/O to/O do/O with/O us/O./O We/O can/Onot/O .../O you/O can/Onot/O stay/O like/O
this/O,/O especially/O now/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O's/O to/O be/O done/O,/O according/O to/O you/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O with/O the/O same/O frivolous/O
irony/O./O She/O who/O had/O so/O feared/O he/O would/O take/O her/O condition/O too/O lightly/O was/O
now/O vexed/O with/O him/O for/O deducing/O from/O it/O the/O necessity/O of/O taking/O some/O
step/O./O

``/OTell/O him/O everything/O,/O and/O leave/O him/O./O''/O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O let/O us/O suppose/O I/O do/O that/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/ODo/O you/O know/O what/O the/O
result/O of/O that/O would/O be/O?/O I/O can/O tell/O you/O it/O all/O beforehand/O,/O''/O and/O a/O wicked/O
light/O gleamed/O in/O her/O eyes/O,/O that/O had/O been/O so/O soft/O a/O minute/O before/O./O ''/O`/OEh/O,/O
you/O love/O another/O man/O,/O and/O have/O entered/O into/O criminal/O intrigues/O with/O
him/O?/O'/O''/O -LRB-/OMimicking/O her/O husband/O,/O she/O threw/O an/O emphasis/O on/O the/O word/O
``/Ocriminal/O,/O''/O as/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON did/O./O-RRB-/O ''/O`/OI/O warned/O you/O of/O the/O results/O
in/O the/O religious/O,/O the/O civil/O,/O and/O the/O domestic/O relation/O./O You/O have/O not/O
listened/O to/O me/O./O Now/O I/O can/Onot/O let/O you/O disgrace/O my/O name/O,/O--/O'/O''/O ``/Oand/O my/O son/O,/O''/O
she/O had/O meant/O to/O say/O,/O but/O about/O her/O son/O she/O could/O not/O jest/O,/O--/O''/O`/Odisgrace/O
my/O name/O,/O and/O'/O--/Oand/O more/O in/O the/O same/O style/O,/O''/O she/O added/O./O ``/OIn/O general/O terms/O,/O
he/O'll/O say/O in/O his/O official/O manner/O,/O and/O with/O all/O distinctness/O and/O
precision/O,/O that/O he/O can/Onot/O let/O me/O go/O,/O but/O will/O take/O all/O measures/O in/O his/O
power/O to/O prevent/O scandal/O./O And/O he/O will/O calmly/O and/O punctually/O act/O in/O
accordance/O with/O his/O words/O./O That/O's/O what/O will/O happen/O./O He/O's/O not/O a/O man/O,/O but/O
a/O machine/O,/O and/O a/O spiteful/O machine/O when/O he/O's/O angry/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O recalling/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON as/O she/O spoke/O,/O with/O all/O the/O peculiarities/O of/O his/O
figure/O and/O manner/O of/O speaking/O,/O and/O reckoning/O against/O him/O every/O defect/O
she/O could/O find/O in/O him/O,/O softening/O nothing/O for/O the/O great/O wrong/O she/O herself/O
was/O doing/O him/O./O

``/OBut/O,/O Anna/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O in/O a/O soft/O and/O persuasive/O voice/O,/O trying/O to/O
soothe/O her/O,/O ``/Owe/O absolutely/O must/O,/O anyway/O,/O tell/O him/O,/O and/O then/O be/O guided/O by/O
the/O line/O he/O takes/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O,/O run/O away/O?/O''/O

``/OAnd/O why/O not/O run/O away/O?/O I/O do/On't/O see/O how/O we/O can/O keep/O on/O like/O this/O./O And/O not/O
for/O my/O sake/O--/OI/O see/O that/O you/O suffer/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O run/O away/O,/O and/O become/O your/O mistress/O,/O''/O she/O said/O angrily/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O reproachful/O tenderness/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O she/O went/O on/O,/O ``/Obecome/O your/O mistress/O,/O and/O complete/O the/O ruin/O of/O.../O''/O

Again/O she/O would/O have/O said/O ``/Omy/O son/O,/O''/O but/O she/O could/O not/O utter/O that/O word/O./O

Vronsky/O could/O not/O understand/O how/O she/O,/O with/O her/O strong/O and/O truthful/O
nature/O,/O could/O endure/O this/O state/O of/O deceit/O,/O and/O not/O long/O to/O get/O out/O of/O
it/O./O But/O he/O did/O not/O suspect/O that/O the/O chief/O cause/O of/O it/O was/O the/O
word/O--/O_/Oson/O_/O,/O which/O she/O could/O not/O bring/O herself/O to/O pronounce/O./O When/O she/O
thought/O of/O her/O son/O,/O and/O his/O future/O attitude/O to/O his/O mother/O,/O who/O had/O
abandoned/O his/O father/O,/O she/O felt/O such/O terror/O at/O what/O she/O had/O done/O,/O that/O
she/O could/O not/O face/O it/O;/O but/O,/O like/O a/O woman/O,/O could/O only/O try/O to/O comfort/O
herself/O with/O lying/O assurances/O that/O everything/O would/O remain/O as/O it/O always/O
had/O been/O,/O and/O that/O it/O was/O possible/O to/O forget/O the/O fearful/O question/O of/O how/O
it/O would/O be/O with/O her/O son/O./O

``/OI/O beg/O you/O,/O I/O entreat/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O suddenly/O,/O taking/O his/O hand/O,/O and/O
speaking/O in/O quite/O a/O different/O tone/O,/O sincere/O and/O tender/O,/O ``/Onever/O speak/O to/O
me/O of/O that/O!/O''/O

``/OBut/O,/O Anna/PERSON.../O''/O

``/ONever/O./O Leave/O it/O to/O me/O./O I/O know/O all/O the/O baseness/O,/O all/O the/O horror/O of/O my/O
position/O;/O but/O it/O's/O not/O so/O easy/O to/O arrange/O as/O you/O think/O./O And/O leave/O it/O to/O
me/O,/O and/O do/O what/O I/O say/O./O Never/O speak/O to/O me/O of/O it/O./O Do/O you/O promise/O me/O?/O.../O
No/O,/O no/O,/O promise/O!/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O promise/O everything/O,/O but/O I/O ca/On't/O be/O at/O peace/O,/O especially/O after/O what/O
you/O have/O told/O me/O./O I/O ca/On't/O be/O at/O peace/O,/O when/O you/O ca/On't/O be/O at/O peace/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O?/O''/O she/O repeated/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O I/O am/O worried/O sometimes/O;/O but/O that/O will/O pass/O,/O if/O
you/O will/O never/O talk/O about/O this/O./O When/O you/O talk/O about/O it/O--/Oit/O's/O only/O then/O it/O
worries/O me/O./O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O understand/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OI/O know/O,/O''/O she/O interrupted/O him/O,/O ``/Ohow/O hard/O it/O is/O for/O your/O truthful/O nature/O
to/O lie/O,/O and/O I/O grieve/O for/O you/O./O I/O often/O think/O that/O you/O have/O ruined/O your/O
whole/O life/O for/O me/O./O''/O

``/OI/O was/O just/O thinking/O the/O very/O same/O thing/O,/O''/O he/O said/O;/O ``/Ohow/O could/O you/O
sacrifice/O everything/O for/O my/O sake/O?/O I/O ca/On't/O forgive/O myself/O that/O you/O're/O
unhappy/O!/O''/O

``/OI/O unhappy/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O coming/O closer/O to/O him/O,/O and/O looking/O at/O him/O with/O an/O
ecstatic/O smile/O of/O love/O./O ``/OI/O am/O like/O a/O hungry/O man/O who/O has/O been/O given/O food/O./O
He/O may/O be/O cold/O,/O and/O dressed/O in/O rags/O,/O and/O ashamed/O,/O but/O he/O is/O not/O unhappy/O./O
I/O unhappy/O?/O No/O,/O this/O is/O my/O unhappiness/O.../O''/O

She/O could/O hear/O the/O sound/O of/O her/O son/O's/O voice/O coming/O towards/O them/O,/O and/O
glancing/O swiftly/O round/O the/O terrace/O,/O she/O got/O up/O impulsively/O./O Her/O eyes/O
glowed/O with/O the/O fire/O he/O knew/O so/O well/O;/O with/O a/O rapid/O movement/O she/O raised/O
her/O lovely/O hands/O,/O covered/O with/O rings/O,/O took/O his/O head/O,/O looked/O a/O long/O look/O
into/O his/O face/O,/O and/O,/O putting/O up/O her/O face/O with/O smiling/O,/O parted/O lips/O,/O
swiftly/O kissed/O his/O mouth/O and/O both/O eyes/O,/O and/O pushed/O him/O away/O./O She/O would/O
have/O gone/O,/O but/O he/O held/O her/O back/O./O

``/OWhen/O?/O''/O he/O murmured/O in/O a/O whisper/O,/O gazing/O in/O ecstasy/O at/O her/O./O

``/OTonight/O,/O at/O one/O o'clock/O,/O''/O she/O whispered/O,/O and/O,/O with/O a/O heavy/O sigh/O,/O she/O
walked/O with/O her/O light/O,/O swift/O step/O to/O meet/O her/O son/O./O

Seryozha/PERSON had/O been/O caught/O by/O the/O rain/O in/O the/O big/O garden/O,/O and/O he/O and/O his/O
nurse/O had/O taken/O shelter/O in/O an/O arbor/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O _/Oau/O revoir/O_/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OI/O must/O soon/O be/O getting/O ready/O
for/O the/O races/O./O Betsy/PERSON promised/O to/O fetch/O me/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O,/O looking/O at/O his/O watch/O,/O went/O away/O hurriedly/O./O



Chapter/O 24/O


When/O Vronsky/O looked/O at/O his/O watch/O on/O the/O Karenins/O'/O balcony/O,/O he/O was/O so/O
greatly/O agitated/O and/O lost/O in/O his/O thoughts/O that/O he/O saw/O the/O figures/O on/O the/O
watch/O's/O face/O,/O but/O could/O not/O take/O in/O what/O time/O it/O was/O./O He/O came/O out/O on/O to/O
the/O high/O road/O and/O walked/O,/O picking/O his/O way/O carefully/O through/O the/O mud/O,/O to/O
his/O carriage/O./O He/O was/O so/O completely/O absorbed/O in/O his/O feeling/O for/O Anna/PERSON,/O
that/O he/O did/O not/O even/O think/O what/O o'clock/O it/O was/O,/O and/O whether/O he/O had/O time/O
to/O go/O to/O Bryansky/PERSON's/O./O He/O had/O left/O him/O,/O as/O often/O happens/O,/O only/O the/O
external/O faculty/O of/O memory/O,/O that/O points/O out/O each/O step/O one/O has/O to/O take/O,/O
one/O after/O the/O other/O./O He/O went/O up/O to/O his/O coachman/O,/O who/O was/O dozing/O on/O the/O
box/O in/O the/O shadow/O,/O already/O lengthening/O,/O of/O a/O thick/O limetree/O;/O he/O admired/O
the/O shifting/O clouds/O of/O midges/O circling/O over/O the/O hot/O horses/O,/O and/O,/O waking/O
the/O coachman/O,/O he/O jumped/O into/O the/O carriage/O,/O and/O told/O him/O to/O drive/O to/O
Bryansky/PERSON's/O./O It/O was/O only/O after/O driving/O nearly/O five/O miles/O that/O he/O had/O
sufficiently/O recovered/O himself/O to/O look/O at/O his/O watch/O,/O and/O realize/O that/O it/O
was/O half-past/O five/O,/O and/O he/O was/O late/O./O

There/O were/O several/O races/O fixed/O for/O that/O day/O:/O the/O Mounted/O Guards/O'/O race/O,/O
then/O the/O officers/O'/O mile-and-a-half/O race/O,/O then/O the/O three-mile/O race/O,/O and/O
then/O the/O race/O for/O which/O he/O was/O entered/O./O He/O could/O still/O be/O in/O time/O for/O
his/O race/O,/O but/O if/O he/O went/O to/O Bryansky/PERSON's/O he/O could/O only/O just/O be/O in/O time/O,/O
and/O he/O would/O arrive/O when/O the/O whole/O of/O the/O court/O would/O be/O in/O their/O
places/O./O That/O would/O be/O a/O pity/O./O But/O he/O had/O promised/O Bryansky/PERSON to/O come/O,/O and/O
so/O he/O decided/O to/O drive/O on/O,/O telling/O the/O coachman/O not/O to/O spare/O the/O horses/O./O

He/O reached/O Bryansky/PERSON's/O,/O spent/O five/O minutes/O there/O,/O and/O galloped/O back/O./O This/O
rapid/O drive/O calmed/O him/O./O All/O that/O was/O painful/O in/O his/O relations/O with/O Anna/PERSON,/O
all/O the/O feeling/O of/O indefiniteness/O left/O by/O their/O conversation/O,/O had/O
slipped/O out/O of/O his/O mind/O./O He/O was/O thinking/O now/O with/O pleasure/O and/O
excitement/O of/O the/O race/O,/O of/O his/O being/O anyhow/O,/O in/O time/O,/O and/O now/O and/O then/O
the/O thought/O of/O the/O blissful/O interview/O awaiting/O him/O that/O night/O flashed/O
across/O his/O imagination/O like/O a/O flaming/O light/O./O

The/O excitement/O of/O the/O approaching/O race/O gained/O upon/O him/O as/O he/O drove/O
further/O and/O further/O into/O the/O atmosphere/O of/O the/O races/O,/O overtaking/O
carriages/O driving/O up/O from/O the/O summer/O villas/O or/O out/O of/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O

At/O his/O quarters/O no/O one/O was/O left/O at/O home/O;/O all/O were/O at/O the/O races/O,/O and/O his/O
valet/O was/O looking/O out/O for/O him/O at/O the/O gate/O./O While/O he/O was/O changing/O his/O
clothes/O,/O his/O valet/O told/O him/O that/O the/O second/O race/O had/O begun/O already/O,/O that/O
a/O lot/O of/O gentlemen/O had/O been/O to/O ask/O for/O him/O,/O and/O a/O boy/O had/O twice/O run/O up/O
from/O the/O stables/O./O Dressing/O without/O hurry/O -LRB-/Ohe/O never/O hurried/O himself/O,/O and/O
never/O lost/O his/O self-possession/O-RRB-/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON drove/O to/O the/O sheds/O./O From/O the/O
sheds/O he/O could/O see/O a/O perfect/O sea/O of/O carriages/O,/O and/O people/O on/O foot/O,/O
soldiers/O surrounding/O the/O race/O course/O,/O and/O pavilions/O swarming/O with/O
people/O./O The/O second/O race/O was/O apparently/O going/O on/O,/O for/O just/O as/O he/O went/O
into/O the/O sheds/O he/O heard/O a/O bell/O ringing/O./O Going/O towards/O the/O stable/O,/O he/O met/O
the/O white-legged/O chestnut/O,/O Mahotin/PERSON's/O Gladiator/O,/O being/O led/O to/O the/O
race-course/O in/O a/O blue/O forage/O horsecloth/O,/O with/O what/O looked/O like/O huge/O ears/O
edged/O with/O blue/O./O

``/OWhere/O's/O Cord/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O the/O stable-boy/O./O

``/OIn/O the/O stable/O,/O putting/O on/O the/O saddle/O./O''/O

In/O the/O open/O horse-box/O stood/O Frou-Frou/O,/O saddled/O ready/O./O They/O were/O just/O
going/O to/O lead/O her/O out/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O too/O late/O?/O''/O

``/OAll/O right/O!/O All/O right/O!/O''/O said/O the/O Englishman/O;/O ``/Odo/On't/O upset/O yourself/O!/O''/O

Vronsky/O once/O more/O took/O in/O in/O one/O glance/O the/O exquisite/O lines/O of/O his/O
favorite/O mare/O;/O who/O was/O quivering/O all/O over/O,/O and/O with/O an/O effort/O he/O tore/O
himself/O from/O the/O sight/O of/O her/O,/O and/O went/O out/O of/O the/O stable/O./O He/O went/O
towards/O the/O pavilions/O at/O the/O most/O favorable/O moment/O for/O escaping/O
attention/O./O The/O mile-and-a-half/O race/O was/O just/O finishing/O,/O and/O all/O eyes/O
were/O fixed/O on/O the/O horse-guard/O in/O front/O and/O the/O light/O hussar/O behind/O,/O
urging/O their/O horses/O on/O with/O a/O last/O effort/O close/O to/O the/O winning/O post/O./O
From/O the/O center/O and/O outside/O of/O the/O ring/O all/O were/O crowding/O to/O the/O winning/O
post/O,/O and/O a/O group/O of/O soldiers/O and/O officers/O of/O the/O horse-guards/O were/O
shouting/O loudly/O their/O delight/O at/O the/O expected/O triumph/O of/O their/O officer/O
and/O comrade/O./O Vronsky/O moved/O into/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O crowd/O unnoticed/O,/O
almost/O at/O the/O very/O moment/O when/O the/O bell/O rang/O at/O the/O finish/O of/O the/O race/O,/O
and/O the/O tall/O,/O mudspattered/O horse-guard/O who/O came/O in/O first/O,/O bending/O over/O
the/O saddle/O,/O let/O go/O the/O reins/O of/O his/O panting/O gray/O horse/O that/O looked/O dark/O
with/O sweat/O./O

The/O horse/O,/O stiffening/O out/O its/O legs/O,/O with/O an/O effort/O stopped/O its/O rapid/O
course/O,/O and/O the/O officer/O of/O the/O horse-guards/O looked/O round/O him/O like/O a/O man/O
waking/O up/O from/O a/O heavy/O sleep/O,/O and/O just/O managed/O to/O smile/O./O A/O crowd/O of/O
friends/O and/O outsiders/O pressed/O round/O him/O./O

Vronsky/O intentionally/O avoided/O that/O select/O crowd/O of/O the/O upper/O world/O,/O
which/O was/O moving/O and/O talking/O with/O discreet/O freedom/O before/O the/O pavilions/O./O
He/O knew/O that/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON was/O there/O,/O and/O Betsy/PERSON,/O and/O his/O brother/O's/O
wife/O,/O and/O he/O purposely/O did/O not/O go/O near/O them/O for/O fear/O of/O something/O
distracting/O his/O attention/O./O But/O he/O was/O continually/O met/O and/O stopped/O by/O
acquaintances/O,/O who/O told/O him/O about/O the/O previous/O races/O,/O and/O kept/O asking/O
him/O why/O he/O was/O so/O late/O./O

At/O the/O time/O when/O the/O racers/O had/O to/O go/O to/O the/O pavilion/O to/O receive/O the/O
prizes/O,/O and/O all/O attention/O was/O directed/O to/O that/O point/O,/O Vronsky/O's/O elder/O
brother/O,/O Alexander/PERSON,/O a/O colonel/O with/O heavy/O fringed/O epaulets/O,/O came/O up/O to/O
him/O./O He/O was/O not/O tall/O,/O though/O as/O broadly/O built/O as/O Alexey/PERSON,/O and/O handsomer/O
and/O rosier/O than/O he/O;/O he/O had/O a/O red/O nose/O,/O and/O an/O open/O,/O drunken-looking/O
face/O./O

``/ODid/O you/O get/O my/O note/O?/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OThere/O's/O never/O any/O finding/O you/O./O''/O

Alexander/PERSON Vronsky/PERSON,/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O dissolute/O life/O,/O and/O in/O especial/O the/O
drunken/O habits/O,/O for/O which/O he/O was/O notorious/O,/O was/O quite/O one/O of/O the/O court/O
circle/O./O

Now/O,/O as/O he/O talked/O to/O his/O brother/O of/O a/O matter/O bound/O to/O be/O exceedingly/O
disagreeable/O to/O him/O,/O knowing/O that/O the/O eyes/O of/O many/O people/O might/O be/O fixed/O
upon/O him/O,/O he/O kept/O a/O smiling/O countenance/O,/O as/O though/O he/O were/O jesting/O with/O
his/O brother/O about/O something/O of/O little/O moment/O./O

``/OI/O got/O it/O,/O and/O I/O really/O ca/On't/O make/O out/O what/O _/Oyou/O_/O are/O worrying/O yourself/O
about/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON./O

``/OI/O'm/O worrying/O myself/O because/O the/O remark/O has/O just/O been/O made/O to/O me/O that/O
you/O were/On't/O here/O,/O and/O that/O you/O were/O seen/O in/O Peterhof/O on/O Monday/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O are/O matters/O which/O only/O concern/O those/O directly/O interested/O in/O them/O,/O
and/O the/O matter/O you/O are/O so/O worried/O about/O is/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O if/O so/O,/O you/O may/O as/O well/O cut/O the/O service/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O beg/O you/O not/O to/O meddle/O,/O and/O that/O's/O all/O I/O have/O to/O say/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Vronsky/PERSON's/O frowning/O face/O turned/O white/O,/O and/O his/O prominent/O lower/O jaw/O
quivered/O,/O which/O happened/O rarely/O with/O him/O./O Being/O a/O man/O of/O very/O warm/O
heart/O,/O he/O was/O seldom/O angry/O;/O but/O when/O he/O was/O angry/O,/O and/O when/O his/O chin/O
quivered/O,/O then/O,/O as/O Alexander/PERSON Vronsky/PERSON knew/O,/O he/O was/O dangerous/O./O Alexander/PERSON
Vronsky/PERSON smiled/O gaily/O./O

``/OI/O only/O wanted/O to/O give/O you/O Mother/O's/O letter/O./O Answer/O it/O,/O and/O do/On't/O worry/O
about/O anything/O just/O before/O the/O race/O./O _/OBonne/O chance/O,/O_/O''/O he/O added/O,/O smiling/O
and/O he/O moved/O away/O from/O him/O./O But/O after/O him/O another/O friendly/O greeting/O
brought/O Vronsky/O to/O a/O standstill/O./O

``/OSo/O you/O wo/On't/O recognize/O your/O friends/O!/O How/O are/O you/O,/O _/Omon/O cher/O?/O_/O''/O said/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O as/O conspicuously/O brilliant/O in/O the/O midst/O of/O all/O the/O
Petersburg/LOCATION brilliance/O as/O he/O was/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O his/O face/O rosy/O,/O and/O his/O
whiskers/O sleek/O and/O glossy/O./O ``/OI/O came/O up/O yesterday/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O delighted/O that/O
I/O shall/O see/O your/O triumph/O./O When/O shall/O we/O meet/O?/O''/O

``/OCome/O tomorrow/O to/O the/O messroom/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O squeezing/O him/O by/O the/O
sleeve/O of/O his/O coat/O,/O with/O apologies/O,/O he/O moved/O away/O to/O the/O center/O of/O the/O
race/O course/O,/O where/O the/O horses/O were/O being/O led/O for/O the/O great/O steeplechase/O./O

The/O horses/O who/O had/O run/O in/O the/O last/O race/O were/O being/O led/O home/O,/O steaming/O
and/O exhausted/O,/O by/O the/O stable-boys/O,/O and/O one/O after/O another/O the/O fresh/O
horses/O for/O the/O coming/O race/O made/O their/O appearance/O,/O for/O the/O most/O part/O
English/O racers/O,/O wearing/O horsecloths/O,/O and/O looking/O with/O their/O drawn-up/O
bellies/O like/O strange/O,/O huge/O birds/O./O On/O the/O right/O was/O led/O in/O Frou-Frou/O,/O
lean/O and/O beautiful/O,/O lifting/O up/O her/O elastic/O,/O rather/O long/O pasterns/O,/O as/O
though/O moved/O by/O springs/O./O Not/O far/O from/O her/O they/O were/O taking/O the/O rug/O off/O
the/O lop-eared/O Gladiator/O./O The/O strong/O,/O exquisite/O,/O perfectly/O correct/O lines/O
of/O the/O stallion/O,/O with/O his/O superb/O hind-quarters/O and/O excessively/O short/O
pasterns/O almost/O over/O his/O hoofs/O,/O attracted/O Vronsky/O's/O attention/O in/O spite/O
of/O himself/O./O He/O would/O have/O gone/O up/O to/O his/O mare/O,/O but/O he/O was/O again/O detained/O
by/O an/O acquaintance/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O there/O's/O Karenin/O!/O''/O said/O the/O acquaintance/O with/O whom/O he/O was/O chatting/O./O
``/OHe/O's/O looking/O for/O his/O wife/O,/O and/O she/O's/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O pavilion/O./O
Did/On't/O you/O see/O her/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O''/O answered/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O without/O even/O glancing/O round/O towards/O the/O
pavilion/O where/O his/O friend/O was/O pointing/O out/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON,/O he/O went/O up/O
to/O his/O mare/O./O

Vronsky/O had/O not/O had/O time/O to/O look/O at/O the/O saddle/O,/O about/O which/O he/O had/O to/O
give/O some/O direction/O,/O when/O the/O competitors/O were/O summoned/O to/O the/O pavilion/O
to/O receive/O their/O numbers/O and/O places/O in/O the/O row/O at/O starting/O./O Seventeen/O
officers/O,/O looking/O serious/O and/O severe/O,/O many/O with/O pale/O faces/O,/O met/O together/O
in/O the/O pavilion/O and/O drew/O the/O numbers/O./O Vronsky/O drew/O the/O number/O seven/O./O The/O
cry/O was/O heard/O:/O ``/OMount/O!/O''/O

Feeling/O that/O with/O the/O others/O riding/O in/O the/O race/O,/O he/O was/O the/O center/O upon/O
which/O all/O eyes/O were/O fastened/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON walked/O up/O to/O his/O mare/O in/O that/O
state/O of/O nervous/O tension/O in/O which/O he/O usually/O became/O deliberate/O and/O
composed/O in/O his/O movements/O./O Cord/O,/O in/O honor/O of/O the/O races/O,/O had/O put/O on/O his/O
best/O clothes/O,/O a/O black/O coat/O buttoned/O up/O,/O a/O stiffly/O starched/O collar/O,/O which/O
propped/O up/O his/O cheeks/O,/O a/O round/O black/O hat/O,/O and/O top/O boots/O./O He/O was/O calm/O and/O
dignified/O as/O ever/O,/O and/O was/O with/O his/O own/O hands/O holding/O Frou-Frou/O by/O both/O
reins/O,/O standing/O straight/O in/O front/O of/O her/O./O Frou-Frou/O was/O still/O trembling/O
as/O though/O in/O a/O fever/O./O Her/O eye/O,/O full/O of/O fire/O,/O glanced/O sideways/O at/O
Vronsky/O./O Vronsky/O slipped/O his/O finger/O under/O the/O saddle-girth/O./O The/O mare/O
glanced/O aslant/O at/O him/O,/O drew/O up/O her/O lip/O,/O and/O twitched/O her/O ear/O./O The/O
Englishman/O puckered/O up/O his/O lips/O,/O intending/O to/O indicate/O a/O smile/O that/O
anyone/O should/O verify/O his/O saddling/O./O

``/OGet/O up/O;/O you/O wo/On't/O feel/O so/O excited/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O looked/O round/O for/O the/O last/O time/O at/O his/O rivals/O./O He/O knew/O that/O he/O
would/O not/O see/O them/O during/O the/O race/O./O Two/O were/O already/O riding/O forward/O to/O
the/O point/O from/O which/O they/O were/O to/O start/O./O Galtsin/PERSON,/O a/O friend/O of/O Vronsky/O's/O
and/O one/O of/O his/O more/O formidable/O rivals/O,/O was/O moving/O round/O a/O bay/O horse/O that/O
would/O not/O let/O him/O mount/O./O A/O little/O light/O hussar/O in/O tight/O riding/O breeches/O
rode/O off/O at/O a/O gallop/O,/O crouched/O up/O like/O a/O cat/O on/O the/O saddle/O,/O in/O imitation/O
of/O English/O jockeys/O./O Prince/O Kuzovlev/PERSON sat/O with/O a/O white/O face/O on/O his/O
thoroughbred/O mare/O from/O the/O Grabovsky/O stud/O,/O while/O an/O English/O groom/O led/O
her/O by/O the/O bridle/O./O Vronsky/O and/O all/O his/O comrades/O knew/O Kuzovlev/PERSON and/O his/O
peculiarity/O of/O ``/Oweak/O nerves/O''/O and/O terrible/O vanity/O./O They/O knew/O that/O he/O was/O
afraid/O of/O everything/O,/O afraid/O of/O riding/O a/O spirited/O horse/O./O But/O now/O,/O just/O
because/O it/O was/O terrible/O,/O because/O people/O broke/O their/O necks/O,/O and/O there/O was/O
a/O doctor/O standing/O at/O each/O obstacle/O,/O and/O an/O ambulance/O with/O a/O cross/O on/O it/O,/O
and/O a/O sister/O of/O mercy/O,/O he/O had/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O to/O take/O part/O in/O the/O race/O./O
Their/O eyes/O met/O,/O and/O Vronsky/PERSON gave/O him/O a/O friendly/O and/O encouraging/O nod/O./O
Only/O one/O he/O did/O not/O see/O,/O his/O chief/O rival/O,/O Mahotin/PERSON on/O Gladiator/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O be/O in/O a/O hurry/O,/O''/O said/O Cord/O to/O Vronsky/O,/O ``/Oand/O remember/O one/O thing/O:/O
do/On't/O hold/O her/O in/O at/O the/O fences/O,/O and/O do/On't/O urge/O her/O on/O;/O let/O her/O go/O as/O
she/O likes/O./O''/O

``/OAll/O right/O,/O all/O right/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O taking/O the/O reins/O./O

``/OIf/O you/O can/O,/O lead/O the/O race/O;/O but/O do/On't/O lose/O heart/O till/O the/O last/O minute/O,/O
even/O if/O you/O're/O behind/O./O''/O

Before/O the/O mare/O had/O time/O to/O move/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON stepped/O with/O an/O agile/O,/O
vigorous/O movement/O into/O the/O steel-toothed/O stirrup/O,/O and/O lightly/O and/O firmly/O
seated/O himself/O on/O the/O creaking/O leather/O of/O the/O saddle/O./O Getting/O his/O right/O
foot/O in/O the/O stirrup/O,/O he/O smoothed/O the/O double/O reins/O,/O as/O he/O always/O did/O,/O
between/O his/O fingers/O,/O and/O Cord/O let/O go/O./O

As/O though/O she/O did/O not/O know/O which/O foot/O to/O put/O first/O,/O Frou-Frou/O started/O,/O
dragging/O at/O the/O reins/O with/O her/O long/O neck/O,/O and/O as/O though/O she/O were/O on/O
springs/O,/O shaking/O her/O rider/O from/O side/O to/O side/O./O Cord/O quickened/O his/O step/O,/O
following/O him/O./O The/O excited/O mare/O,/O trying/O to/O shake/O off/O her/O rider/O first/O on/O
one/O side/O and/O then/O the/O other/O,/O pulled/O at/O the/O reins/O,/O and/O Vronsky/O tried/O in/O
vain/O with/O voice/O and/O hand/O to/O soothe/O her/O./O

They/O were/O just/O reaching/O the/O dammed-up/O stream/O on/O their/O way/O to/O the/O
starting/O point/O./O Several/O of/O the/O riders/O were/O in/O front/O and/O several/O behind/O,/O
when/O suddenly/O Vronsky/O heard/O the/O sound/O of/O a/O horse/O galloping/O in/O the/O mud/O
behind/O him/O,/O and/O he/O was/O overtaken/O by/O Mahotin/PERSON on/O his/O white-legged/O,/O
lop-eared/O Gladiator/O./O Mahotin/PERSON smiled/O,/O showing/O his/O long/O teeth/O,/O but/O Vronsky/PERSON
looked/O angrily/O at/O him/O./O He/O did/O not/O like/O him/O,/O and/O regarded/O him/O now/O as/O his/O
most/O formidable/O rival/O./O He/O was/O angry/O with/O him/O for/O galloping/O past/O and/O
exciting/O his/O mare/O./O Frou-Frou/O started/O into/O a/O gallop/O,/O her/O left/O foot/O
forward/O,/O made/O two/O bounds/O,/O and/O fretting/O at/O the/O tightened/O reins/O,/O passed/O
into/O a/O jolting/O trot/O,/O bumping/O her/O rider/O up/O and/O down/O./O Cord/O,/O too/O,/O scowled/O,/O
and/O followed/O Vronsky/O almost/O at/O a/O trot/O./O



Chapter/O 25/O


There/O were/O seventeen/O officers/O in/O all/O riding/O in/O this/O race/O./O The/O race/O
course/O was/O a/O large/O three-mile/O ring/O of/O the/O form/O of/O an/O ellipse/O in/O front/O of/O
the/O pavilion/O./O On/O this/O course/O nine/O obstacles/O had/O been/O arranged/O:/O the/O
stream/O,/O a/O big/O and/O solid/O barrier/O five/O feet/O high/O,/O just/O before/O the/O
pavilion/O,/O a/O dry/O ditch/O,/O a/O ditch/O full/O of/O water/O,/O a/O precipitous/O slope/O,/O an/O
Irish/O barricade/O -LRB-/Oone/O of/O the/O most/O difficult/O obstacles/O,/O consisting/O of/O a/O
mound/O fenced/O with/O brushwood/O,/O beyond/O which/O was/O a/O ditch/O out/O of/O sight/O for/O
the/O horses/O,/O so/O that/O the/O horse/O had/O to/O clear/O both/O obstacles/O or/O might/O be/O
killed/O-RRB-/O;/O then/O two/O more/O ditches/O filled/O with/O water/O,/O and/O one/O dry/O one/O;/O and/O
the/O end/O of/O the/O race/O was/O just/O facing/O the/O pavilion/O./O But/O the/O race/O began/O not/O
in/O the/O ring/O,/O but/O two/O hundred/O yards/O away/O from/O it/O,/O and/O in/O that/O part/O of/O the/O
course/O was/O the/O first/O obstacle/O,/O a/O dammed-up/O stream/O,/O seven/O feet/O in/O
breadth/O,/O which/O the/O racers/O could/O leap/O or/O wade/O through/O as/O they/O preferred/O./O

Three/O times/O they/O were/O ranged/O ready/O to/O start/O,/O but/O each/O time/O some/O horse/O
thrust/O itself/O out/O of/O line/O,/O and/O they/O had/O to/O begin/O again/O./O The/O umpire/O who/O
was/O starting/O them/O,/O Colonel/O Sestrin/PERSON,/O was/O beginning/O to/O lose/O his/O temper/O,/O
when/O at/O last/O for/O the/O fourth/O time/O he/O shouted/O ``/OAway/O!/O''/O and/O the/O racers/O
started/O./O

Every/O eye/O,/O every/O opera/O glass/O,/O was/O turned/O on/O the/O brightly/O colored/O group/O
of/O riders/O at/O the/O moment/O they/O were/O in/O line/O to/O start/O./O

``/OThey/O're/O off/O!/O They/O're/O starting/O!/O''/O was/O heard/O on/O all/O sides/O after/O the/O hush/O
of/O expectation/O./O

And/O little/O groups/O and/O solitary/O figures/O among/O the/O public/O began/O running/O
from/O place/O to/O place/O to/O get/O a/O better/O view/O./O In/O the/O very/O first/O minute/O the/O
close/O group/O of/O horsemen/O drew/O out/O,/O and/O it/O could/O be/O seen/O that/O they/O were/O
approaching/O the/O stream/O in/O twos/O and/O threes/O and/O one/O behind/O another/O./O To/O the/O
spectators/O it/O seemed/O as/O though/O they/O had/O all/O started/O simultaneously/O,/O but/O
to/O the/O racers/O there/O were/O seconds/O of/O difference/O that/O had/O great/O value/O to/O
them/O./O

Frou-Frou/O,/O excited/O and/O over-nervous/O,/O had/O lost/O the/O first/O moment/O,/O and/O
several/O horses/O had/O started/O before/O her/O,/O but/O before/O reaching/O the/O stream/O,/O
Vronsky/O,/O who/O was/O holding/O in/O the/O mare/O with/O all/O his/O force/O as/O she/O tugged/O at/O
the/O bridle/O,/O easily/O overtook/O three/O,/O and/O there/O were/O left/O in/O front/O of/O him/O
Mahotin/PERSON's/O chestnut/O Gladiator/O,/O whose/O hind-quarters/O were/O moving/O lightly/O
and/O rhythmically/O up/O and/O down/O exactly/O in/O front/O of/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O in/O front/O
of/O all/O,/O the/O dainty/O mare/O Diana/PERSON bearing/O Kuzovlev/PERSON more/O dead/O than/O alive/O./O

For/O the/O first/O instant/O Vronsky/O was/O not/O master/O either/O of/O himself/O or/O his/O
mare/O./O Up/O to/O the/O first/O obstacle/O,/O the/O stream/O,/O he/O could/O not/O guide/O the/O
motions/O of/O his/O mare/O./O

Gladiator/PERSON and/O Diana/PERSON came/O up/O to/O it/O together/O and/O almost/O at/O the/O same/O
instant/O;/O simultaneously/O they/O rose/O above/O the/O stream/O and/O flew/O across/O to/O
the/O other/O side/O;/O Frou-Frou/O darted/O after/O them/O,/O as/O if/O flying/O;/O but/O at/O the/O
very/O moment/O when/O Vronsky/PERSON felt/O himself/O in/O the/O air/O,/O he/O suddenly/O saw/O almost/O
under/O his/O mare/O's/O hoofs/O Kuzovlev/PERSON,/O who/O was/O floundering/O with/O Diana/PERSON on/O the/O
further/O side/O of/O the/O stream/O./O -LRB-/OKuzovlev/PERSON had/O let/O go/O the/O reins/O as/O he/O took/O
the/O leap/O,/O and/O the/O mare/O had/O sent/O him/O flying/O over/O her/O head/O./O-RRB-/O Those/O details/O
Vronsky/O learned/O later/O;/O at/O the/O moment/O all/O he/O saw/O was/O that/O just/O under/O him/O,/O
where/O Frou-Frou/O must/O alight/O,/O Diana/PERSON's/O legs/O or/O head/O might/O be/O in/O the/O way/O./O
But/O Frou-Frou/O drew/O up/O her/O legs/O and/O back/O in/O the/O very/O act/O of/O leaping/O,/O like/O
a/O falling/O cat/O,/O and/O,/O clearing/O the/O other/O mare/O,/O alighted/O beyond/O her/O./O

``/OO/O the/O darling/O!/O''/O thought/O Vronsky/O./O

After/O crossing/O the/O stream/O Vronsky/O had/O complete/O control/O of/O his/O mare/O,/O and/O
began/O holding/O her/O in/O,/O intending/O to/O cross/O the/O great/O barrier/O behind/O
Mahotin/ORGANIZATION,/O and/O to/O try/O to/O overtake/O him/O in/O the/O clear/O ground/O of/O about/O five/O
hundred/O yards/O that/O followed/O it/O./O

The/O great/O barrier/O stood/O just/O in/O front/O of/O the/O imperial/O pavilion/O./O The/O Tsar/O
and/O the/O whole/O court/O and/O crowds/O of/O people/O were/O all/O gazing/O at/O them/O--/Oat/O him/O,/O
and/O Mahotin/PERSON a/O length/O ahead/O of/O him/O,/O as/O they/O drew/O near/O the/O ``/Odevil/O,/O''/O as/O the/O
solid/O barrier/O was/O called/O./O Vronsky/PERSON was/O aware/O of/O those/O eyes/O fastened/O upon/O
him/O from/O all/O sides/O,/O but/O he/O saw/O nothing/O except/O the/O ears/O and/O neck/O of/O his/O
own/O mare/O,/O the/O ground/O racing/O to/O meet/O him/O,/O and/O the/O back/O and/O white/O legs/O of/O
Gladiator/O beating/O time/O swiftly/O before/O him/O,/O and/O keeping/O always/O the/O same/O
distance/O ahead/O./O Gladiator/O rose/O,/O with/O no/O sound/O of/O knocking/O against/O
anything/O./O With/O a/O wave/O of/O his/O short/O tail/O he/O disappeared/O from/O Vronsky/O's/O
sight/O./O

``/OBravo/O!/O''/O cried/O a/O voice/O./O

At/O the/O same/O instant/O,/O under/O Vronsky/O's/O eyes/O,/O right/O before/O him/O flashed/O the/O
palings/O of/O the/O barrier/O./O Without/O the/O slightest/O change/O in/O her/O action/O his/O
mare/O flew/O over/O it/O;/O the/O palings/O vanished/O,/O and/O he/O heard/O only/O a/O crash/O
behind/O him/O./O The/O mare/O,/O excited/O by/O Gladiator/PERSON's/O keeping/O ahead/O,/O had/O risen/O
too/O soon/O before/O the/O barrier/O,/O and/O grazed/O it/O with/O her/O hind/O hoofs/O./O But/O her/O
pace/O never/O changed/O,/O and/O Vronsky/O,/O feeling/O a/O spatter/O of/O mud/O in/O his/O face/O,/O
realized/O that/O he/O was/O once/O more/O the/O same/O distance/O from/O Gladiator/O./O Once/O
more/O he/O perceived/O in/O front/O of/O him/O the/O same/O back/O and/O short/O tail/O,/O and/O
again/O the/O same/O swiftly/O moving/O white/O legs/O that/O got/O no/O further/O away/O./O

At/O the/O very/O moment/O when/O Vronsky/O thought/O that/O now/O was/O the/O time/O to/O
overtake/O Mahotin/PERSON,/O Frou-Frou/O herself/O,/O understanding/O his/O thoughts/O,/O without/O
any/O incitement/O on/O his/O part/O,/O gained/O ground/O considerably/O,/O and/O began/O
getting/O alongside/O of/O Mahotin/LOCATION on/O the/O most/O favorable/O side/O,/O close/O to/O the/O
inner/O cord/O./O Mahotin/PERSON would/O not/O let/O her/O pass/O that/O side/O./O Vronsky/O had/O hardly/O
formed/O the/O thought/O that/O he/O could/O perhaps/O pass/O on/O the/O outer/O side/O,/O when/O
Frou-Frou/O shifted/O her/O pace/O and/O began/O overtaking/O him/O on/O the/O other/O side/O./O
Frou-Frou/O's/O shoulder/O,/O beginning/O by/O now/O to/O be/O dark/O with/O sweat/O,/O was/O even/O
with/O Gladiator/PERSON's/O back/O./O For/O a/O few/O lengths/O they/O moved/O evenly/O./O But/O before/O
the/O obstacle/O they/O were/O approaching/O,/O Vronsky/O began/O working/O at/O the/O reins/O,/O
anxious/O to/O avoid/O having/O to/O take/O the/O outer/O circle/O,/O and/O swiftly/O passed/O
Mahotin/PERSON just/O upon/O the/O declivity/O./O He/O caught/O a/O glimpse/O of/O his/O mud-stained/O
face/O as/O he/O flashed/O by/O./O He/O even/O fancied/O that/O he/O smiled/O./O Vronsky/O passed/O
Mahotin/PERSON,/O but/O he/O was/O immediately/O aware/O of/O him/O close/O upon/O him/O,/O and/O he/O
never/O ceased/O hearing/O the/O even-thudding/O hoofs/O and/O the/O rapid/O and/O still/O
quite/O fresh/O breathing/O of/O Gladiator/O./O

The/O next/O two/O obstacles/O,/O the/O water/O course/O and/O the/O barrier/O,/O were/O easily/O
crossed/O,/O but/O Vronsky/PERSON began/O to/O hear/O the/O snorting/O and/O thud/O of/O Gladiator/O
closer/O upon/O him/O./O He/O urged/O on/O his/O mare/O,/O and/O to/O his/O delight/O felt/O that/O she/O
easily/O quickened/O her/O pace/O,/O and/O the/O thud/O of/O Gladiator/PERSON's/O hoofs/O was/O again/O
heard/O at/O the/O same/O distance/O away/O./O

Vronsky/O was/O at/O the/O head/O of/O the/O race/O,/O just/O as/O he/O wanted/O to/O be/O and/O as/O Cord/O
had/O advised/O,/O and/O now/O he/O felt/O sure/O of/O being/O the/O winner/O./O His/O excitement/O,/O
his/O delight/O,/O and/O his/O tenderness/O for/O Frou-Frou/O grew/O keener/O and/O keener/O./O He/O
longed/O to/O look/O round/O again/O,/O but/O he/O did/O not/O dare/O do/O this/O,/O and/O tried/O to/O be/O
cool/O and/O not/O to/O urge/O on/O his/O mare/O so/O to/O keep/O the/O same/O reserve/O of/O force/O in/O
her/O as/O he/O felt/O that/O Gladiator/O still/O kept/O./O There/O remained/O only/O one/O
obstacle/O,/O the/O most/O difficult/O;/O if/O he/O could/O cross/O it/O ahead/O of/O the/O others/O
he/O would/O come/O in/O first/O./O He/O was/O flying/O towards/O the/O Irish/O barricade/O,/O
Frou-Frou/O and/O he/O both/O together/O saw/O the/O barricade/O in/O the/O distance/O,/O and/O
both/O the/O man/O and/O the/O mare/O had/O a/O moment/O's/O hesitation/O./O He/O saw/O the/O
uncertainty/O in/O the/O mare/O's/O ears/O and/O lifted/O the/O whip/O,/O but/O at/O the/O same/O time/O
felt/O that/O his/O fears/O were/O groundless/O;/O the/O mare/O knew/O what/O was/O wanted/O./O She/O
quickened/O her/O pace/O and/O rose/O smoothly/O,/O just/O as/O he/O had/O fancied/O she/O would/O,/O
and/O as/O she/O left/O the/O ground/O gave/O herself/O up/O to/O the/O force/O of/O her/O rush/O,/O
which/O carried/O her/O far/O beyond/O the/O ditch/O;/O and/O with/O the/O same/O rhythm/O,/O
without/O effort/O,/O with/O the/O same/O leg/O forward/O,/O Frou-Frou/O fell/O back/O into/O her/O
pace/O again/O./O

``/OBravo/O,/O Vronsky/O!/O''/O he/O heard/O shouts/O from/O a/O knot/O of/O men/O--/Ohe/O knew/O they/O were/O
his/O friends/O in/O the/O regiment/O--/Owho/O were/O standing/O at/O the/O obstacle/O./O He/O could/O
not/O fail/O to/O recognize/O Yashvin/PERSON's/O voice/O though/O he/O did/O not/O see/O him/O./O

``/OO/O my/O sweet/O!/O''/O he/O said/O inwardly/O to/O Frou-Frou/O,/O as/O he/O listened/O for/O what/O was/O
happening/O behind/O./O ``/OHe/O's/O cleared/O it/O!/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O catching/O the/O thud/O of/O
Gladiator/PERSON's/O hoofs/O behind/O him/O./O There/O remained/O only/O the/O last/O ditch/O,/O filled/O
with/O water/O and/O five/O feet/O wide/O./O Vronsky/O did/O not/O even/O look/O at/O it/O,/O but/O
anxious/O to/O get/O in/O a/O long/O way/O first/O began/O sawing/O away/O at/O the/O reins/O,/O
lifting/O the/O mare/O's/O head/O and/O letting/O it/O go/O in/O time/O with/O her/O paces/O./O He/O
felt/O that/O the/O mare/O was/O at/O her/O very/O last/O reserve/O of/O strength/O;/O not/O her/O
neck/O and/O shoulders/O merely/O were/O wet/O,/O but/O the/O sweat/O was/O standing/O in/O drops/O
on/O her/O mane/O,/O her/O head/O,/O her/O sharp/O ears/O,/O and/O her/O breath/O came/O in/O short/O,/O
sharp/O gasps/O./O But/O he/O knew/O that/O she/O had/O strength/O left/O more/O than/O enough/O for/O
the/O remaining/O five/O hundred/O yards/O./O It/O was/O only/O from/O feeling/O himself/O
nearer/O the/O ground/O and/O from/O the/O peculiar/O smoothness/O of/O his/O motion/O that/O
Vronsky/PERSON knew/O how/O greatly/O the/O mare/O had/O quickened/O her/O pace/O./O She/O flew/O over/O
the/O ditch/O as/O though/O not/O noticing/O it/O./O She/O flew/O over/O it/O like/O a/O bird/O;/O but/O
at/O the/O same/O instant/O Vronsky/O,/O to/O his/O horror/O,/O felt/O that/O he/O had/O failed/O to/O
keep/O up/O with/O the/O mare/O's/O pace/O,/O that/O he/O had/O,/O he/O did/O not/O know/O how/O,/O made/O a/O
fearful/O,/O unpardonable/O mistake/O,/O in/O recovering/O his/O seat/O in/O the/O saddle/O./O All/O
at/O once/O his/O position/O had/O shifted/O and/O he/O knew/O that/O something/O awful/O had/O
happened/O./O He/O could/O not/O yet/O make/O out/O what/O had/O happened/O,/O when/O the/O white/O
