felt/O must/O once/O have/O glowed/O all/O over/O her/O./O

``/OI/O did/On't/O think/O so/O?/O Why/O,/O if/O I/O were/O a/O man/O,/O I/O could/O never/O care/O for/O anyone/O
else/O after/O knowing/O you/O./O Only/O I/O ca/On't/O understand/O how/O he/O could/O,/O to/O please/O
his/O mother/O,/O forget/O you/O and/O make/O you/O unhappy/O;/O he/O had/O no/O heart/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O he/O's/O a/O very/O good/O man/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O not/O unhappy/O;/O quite/O the/O contrary/O,/O
I/O'm/O very/O happy/O./O Well/O,/O so/O we/O sha/On't/O be/O singing/O any/O more/O now/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O
turning/O towards/O the/O house/O./O

``/OHow/O good/O you/O are/O!/O how/O good/O you/O are/O!/O''/O cried/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O stopping/O her/O,/O she/O
kissed/O her/O./O ``/OIf/O I/O could/O only/O be/O even/O a/O little/O like/O you/O!/O''/O

``/OWhy/O should/O you/O be/O like/O anyone/O?/O You/O're/O nice/O as/O you/O are/O,/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON,/O
smiling/O her/O gentle/O,/O weary/O smile/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O nice/O at/O all/O./O Come/O,/O tell/O me/O.../O./O Stop/O a/O minute/O,/O let/O's/O sit/O
down/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O making/O her/O sit/O down/O again/O beside/O her/O./O ``/OTell/O me/O,/O is/On't/O
it/O humiliating/O to/O think/O that/O a/O man/O has/O disdained/O your/O love/O,/O that/O he/O
has/On't/O cared/O for/O it/O?/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O he/O did/On't/O disdain/O it/O;/O I/O believe/O he/O cared/O for/O me/O,/O but/O he/O was/O a/O
dutiful/O son/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O if/O it/O had/On't/O been/O on/O account/O of/O his/O mother/O,/O if/O it/O had/O been/O his/O
own/O doing/O?/O.../O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O feeling/O she/O was/O giving/O away/O her/O secret/O,/O and/O
that/O her/O face/O,/O burning/O with/O the/O flush/O of/O shame/O,/O had/O betrayed/O her/O
already/O./O

``/OIn/O that/O case/O he/O would/O have/O done/O wrong/O,/O and/O I/O should/O not/O have/O regretted/O
him/O,/O''/O answered/O Varenka/PERSON,/O evidently/O realizing/O that/O they/O were/O now/O talking/O
not/O of/O her/O,/O but/O of/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OBut/O the/O humiliation/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O ``/Othe/O humiliation/O one/O can/O never/O
forget/O,/O can/O never/O forget/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O remembering/O her/O look/O at/O the/O last/O
ball/O during/O the/O pause/O in/O the/O music/O./O

``/OWhere/O is/O the/O humiliation/O?/O Why/O,/O you/O did/O nothing/O wrong/O?/O''/O

``/OWorse/O than/O wrong/O--/Oshameful/O./O''/O

Varenka/PERSON shook/O her/O head/O and/O laid/O her/O hand/O on/O Kitty/PERSON's/O hand/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O what/O is/O there/O shameful/O?/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OYou/O did/On't/O tell/O a/O man/O,/O who/O
did/On't/O care/O for/O you/O,/O that/O you/O loved/O him/O,/O did/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OOf/O course/O not/O;/O I/O never/O said/O a/O word/O,/O but/O he/O knew/O it/O./O No/O,/O no/O,/O there/O are/O
looks/O,/O there/O are/O ways/O;/O I/O ca/On't/O forget/O it/O,/O if/O I/O live/O a/O hundred/O years/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O so/O?/O I/O do/On't/O understand/O./O The/O whole/O point/O is/O whether/O you/O love/O him/O now/O
or/O not/O,/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON,/O who/O called/O everything/O by/O its/O name/O./O

``/OI/O hate/O him/O;/O I/O ca/On't/O forgive/O myself/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O what/O for/O?/O''/O

``/OThe/O shame/O,/O the/O humiliation/O!/O''/O

``/OOh/O!/O if/O everyone/O were/O as/O sensitive/O as/O you/O are/O!/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON./O ``/OThere/O
is/On't/O a/O girl/O who/O has/On't/O been/O through/O the/O same/O./O And/O it/O's/O all/O so/O
unimportant/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O what/O is/O important/O?/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O looking/O into/O her/O face/O with/O
inquisitive/O wonder/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O there/O's/O so/O much/O that/O's/O important/O,/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O what/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O so/O much/O that/O's/O more/O important/O,/O''/O answered/O Varenka/PERSON,/O not/O knowing/O what/O
to/O say/O./O But/O at/O that/O instant/O they/O heard/O the/O princess/O's/O voice/O from/O the/O
window/O./O ``/OKitty/PERSON,/O it/O's/O cold/O!/O Either/O get/O a/O shawl/O,/O or/O come/O indoors/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O really/O is/O time/O to/O go/O in/O!/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O./O ``/OI/O have/O to/O go/O on/O
to/O Madame/ORGANIZATION Berthe/ORGANIZATION's/O;/O she/O asked/O me/O to/O./O''/O

Kitty/PERSON held/O her/O by/O the/O hand/O,/O and/O with/O passionate/O curiosity/O and/O entreaty/O
her/O eyes/O asked/O her/O:/O ``/OWhat/O is/O it/O,/O what/O is/O this/O of/O such/O importance/O that/O
gives/O you/O such/O tranquillity/O?/O You/O know/O,/O tell/O me/O!/O''/O But/O Varenka/PERSON did/O not/O
even/O know/O what/O Kitty/PERSON's/O eyes/O were/O asking/O her/O./O She/O merely/O thought/O that/O she/O
had/O to/O go/O to/O see/O Madame/O Berthe/O too/O that/O evening/O,/O and/O to/O make/O haste/O home/O
in/O time/O for/O _/Omaman/O's/O_/O tea/O at/O twelve/O o'clock/O./O She/O went/O indoors/O,/O collected/O
her/O music/O,/O and/O saying/O good-bye/O to/O everyone/O,/O was/O about/O to/O go/O./O

``/OAllow/O me/O to/O see/O you/O home/O,/O''/O said/O the/O colonel/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O how/O can/O you/O go/O alone/O at/O night/O like/O this/O?/O''/O chimed/O in/O the/O princess/O./O
``/OAnyway/O,/O I/O'll/O send/O Parasha/O./O''/O

Kitty/PERSON saw/O that/O Varenka/PERSON could/O hardly/O restrain/O a/O smile/O at/O the/O idea/O that/O
she/O needed/O an/O escort/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O always/O go/O about/O alone/O and/O nothing/O ever/O happens/O to/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
taking/O her/O hat/O./O And/O kissing/O Kitty/PERSON once/O more/O,/O without/O saying/O what/O was/O
important/O,/O she/O stepped/O out/O courageously/O with/O the/O music/O under/O her/O arm/O and/O
vanished/O into/O the/O twilight/O of/O the/O summer/O night/O,/O bearing/O away/O with/O her/O
her/O secret/O of/O what/O was/O important/O and/O what/O gave/O her/O the/O calm/O and/O dignity/O
so/O much/O to/O be/O envied/O./O



Chapter/O 33/O


Kitty/PERSON made/O the/O acquaintance/O of/O Madame/LOCATION Stahl/LOCATION too/O,/O and/O this/O acquaintance/O,/O
together/O with/O her/O friendship/O with/O Varenka/PERSON,/O did/O not/O merely/O exercise/O a/O
great/O influence/O on/O her/O,/O it/O also/O comforted/O her/O in/O her/O mental/O distress/O./O
She/O found/O this/O comfort/O through/O a/O completely/O new/O world/O being/O opened/O to/O
her/O by/O means/O of/O this/O acquaintance/O,/O a/O world/O having/O nothing/O in/O common/O with/O
her/O past/O,/O an/O exalted/O,/O noble/O world/O,/O from/O the/O height/O of/O which/O she/O could/O
contemplate/O her/O past/O calmly/O./O It/O was/O revealed/O to/O her/O that/O besides/O the/O
instinctive/O life/O to/O which/O Kitty/PERSON had/O given/O herself/O up/O hitherto/O there/O was/O
a/O spiritual/O life/O./O This/O life/O was/O disclosed/O in/O religion/O,/O but/O a/O religion/O
having/O nothing/O in/O common/O with/O that/O one/O which/O Kitty/PERSON had/O known/O from/O
childhood/O,/O and/O which/O found/O expression/O in/O litanies/O and/O all-night/O services/O
at/O the/O Widow/O's/O Home/O,/O where/O one/O might/O meet/O one/O's/O friends/O,/O and/O in/O learning/O
by/O heart/O Slavonic/O texts/O with/O the/O priest/O./O This/O was/O a/O lofty/O,/O mysterious/O
religion/O connected/O with/O a/O whole/O series/O of/O noble/O thoughts/O and/O feelings/O,/O
which/O one/O could/O do/O more/O than/O merely/O believe/O because/O one/O was/O told/O to/O,/O
which/O one/O could/O love/O./O

Kitty/PERSON found/O all/O this/O out/O not/O from/O words/O./O Madame/O Stahl/PERSON talked/O to/O Kitty/PERSON as/O
to/O a/O charming/O child/O that/O one/O looks/O on/O with/O pleasure/O as/O on/O the/O memory/O of/O
one/O's/O youth/O,/O and/O only/O once/O she/O said/O in/O passing/O that/O in/O all/O human/O sorrows/O
nothing/O gives/O comfort/O but/O love/O and/O faith/O,/O and/O that/O in/O the/O sight/O of/O
Christ/PERSON's/O compassion/O for/O us/O no/O sorrow/O is/O trifling/O--/Oand/O immediately/O talked/O
of/O other/O things/O./O But/O in/O every/O gesture/O of/O Madame/LOCATION Stahl/LOCATION,/O in/O every/O word/O,/O in/O
every/O heavenly/O--/Oas/O Kitty/PERSON called/O it/O--/Olook/O,/O and/O above/O all/O in/O the/O whole/O story/O
of/O her/O life/O,/O which/O she/O heard/O from/O Varenka/LOCATION,/O Kitty/PERSON recognized/O that/O
something/O ``/Othat/O was/O important/O,/O''/O of/O which/O,/O till/O then/O,/O she/O had/O known/O
nothing/O./O

Yet/O,/O elevated/O as/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON's/O character/O was/O,/O touching/O as/O was/O her/O
story/O,/O and/O exalted/O and/O moving/O as/O was/O her/O speech/O,/O Kitty/PERSON could/O not/O help/O
detecting/O in/O her/O some/O traits/O which/O perplexed/O her/O./O She/O noticed/O that/O when/O
questioning/O her/O about/O her/O family/O,/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON had/O smiled/O
contemptuously/O,/O which/O was/O not/O in/O accord/O with/O Christian/O meekness/O./O She/O
noticed/O,/O too/O,/O that/O when/O she/O had/O found/O a/O Catholic/O priest/O with/O her/O,/O Madame/PERSON
Stahl/PERSON had/O studiously/O kept/O her/O face/O in/O the/O shadow/O of/O the/O lamp-shade/O and/O
had/O smiled/O in/O a/O peculiar/O way/O./O Trivial/O as/O these/O two/O observations/O were/O,/O
they/O perplexed/O her/O,/O and/O she/O had/O her/O doubts/O as/O to/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON./O But/O on/O
the/O other/O hand/O Varenka/LOCATION,/O alone/O in/O the/O world/O,/O without/O friends/O or/O
relations/O,/O with/O a/O melancholy/O disappointment/O in/O the/O past/O,/O desiring/O
nothing/O,/O regretting/O nothing/O,/O was/O just/O that/O perfection/O of/O which/O Kitty/PERSON
dared/O hardly/O dream/O./O In/O Varenka/LOCATION she/O realized/O that/O one/O has/O but/O to/O forget/O
oneself/O and/O love/O others/O,/O and/O one/O will/O be/O calm/O,/O happy/O,/O and/O noble/O./O And/O
that/O was/O what/O Kitty/PERSON longed/O to/O be/O./O Seeing/O now/O clearly/O what/O was/O _/Othe/O most/O
important/O_/O,/O Kitty/PERSON was/O not/O satisfied/O with/O being/O enthusiastic/O over/O it/O;/O she/O
at/O once/O gave/O herself/O up/O with/O her/O whole/O soul/O to/O the/O new/O life/O that/O was/O
opening/O to/O her/O./O From/O Varenka/LOCATION's/O accounts/O of/O the/O doings/O of/O Madame/O Stahl/PERSON
and/O other/O people/O whom/O she/O mentioned/O,/O Kitty/PERSON had/O already/O constructed/O the/O
plan/O of/O her/O own/O future/O life/O./O She/O would/O,/O like/O Madame/ORGANIZATION Stahl/ORGANIZATION's/O niece/O,/O
Aline/PERSON,/O of/O whom/O Varenka/PERSON had/O talked/O to/O her/O a/O great/O deal/O,/O seek/O out/O those/O
who/O were/O in/O trouble/O,/O wherever/O she/O might/O be/O living/O,/O help/O them/O as/O far/O as/O
she/O could/O,/O give/O them/O the/O Gospel/O,/O read/O the/O Gospel/O to/O the/O sick/O,/O to/O
criminals/O,/O to/O the/O dying/O./O The/O idea/O of/O reading/O the/O Gospel/O to/O criminals/O,/O as/O
Aline/PERSON did/O,/O particularly/O fascinated/O Kitty/PERSON./O But/O all/O these/O were/O secret/O
dreams/O,/O of/O which/O Kitty/PERSON did/O not/O talk/O either/O to/O her/O mother/O or/O to/O Varenka/LOCATION./O

While/O awaiting/O the/O time/O for/O carrying/O out/O her/O plans/O on/O a/O large/O scale/O,/O
however/O,/O Kitty/PERSON,/O even/O then/O at/O the/O springs/O,/O where/O there/O were/O so/O many/O
people/O ill/O and/O unhappy/O,/O readily/O found/O a/O chance/O for/O practicing/O her/O new/O
principles/O in/O imitation/O of/O Varenka/LOCATION./O

At/O first/O the/O princess/O noticed/O nothing/O but/O that/O Kitty/PERSON was/O much/O under/O the/O
influence/O of/O her/O _/Oengouement/O_/O,/O as/O she/O called/O it/O,/O for/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON,/O and/O
still/O more/O for/O Varenka/LOCATION./O She/O saw/O that/O Kitty/PERSON did/O not/O merely/O imitate/O
Varenka/PERSON in/O her/O conduct/O,/O but/O unconsciously/O imitated/O her/O in/O her/O manner/O of/O
walking/O,/O of/O talking/O,/O of/O blinking/O her/O eyes/O./O But/O later/O on/O the/O princess/O
noticed/O that/O,/O apart/O from/O this/O adoration/O,/O some/O kind/O of/O serious/O spiritual/O
change/O was/O taking/O place/O in/O her/O daughter/O./O

The/O princess/O saw/O that/O in/O the/O evenings/O Kitty/PERSON read/O a/O French/O testament/O that/O
Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON had/O given/O her/O--/Oa/O thing/O she/O had/O never/O done/O before/O;/O that/O she/O
avoided/O society/O acquaintances/O and/O associated/O with/O the/O sick/O people/O who/O
were/O under/O Varenka/PERSON's/O protection/O,/O and/O especially/O one/O poor/O family/O,/O that/O of/O
a/O sick/O painter/O,/O Petrov/PERSON./O Kitty/PERSON was/O unmistakably/O proud/O of/O playing/O the/O part/O
of/O a/O sister/O of/O mercy/O in/O that/O family/O./O All/O this/O was/O well/O enough/O,/O and/O the/O
princess/O had/O nothing/O to/O say/O against/O it/O,/O especially/O as/O Petrov/PERSON's/O wife/O was/O
a/O perfectly/O nice/O sort/O of/O woman/O,/O and/O that/O the/O German/O princess/O,/O noticing/O
Kitty/PERSON's/O devotion/O,/O praised/O her/O,/O calling/O her/O an/O angel/O of/O consolation/O./O All/O
this/O would/O have/O been/O very/O well/O,/O if/O there/O had/O been/O no/O exaggeration/O./O But/O
the/O princess/O saw/O that/O her/O daughter/O was/O rushing/O into/O extremes/O,/O and/O so/O
indeed/O she/O told/O her/O./O

''/O_/OIl/O ne/O faut/O jamais/O rien/O outrer/O_/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O her/O./O

Her/O daughter/O made/O her/O no/O reply/O,/O only/O in/O her/O heart/O she/O thought/O that/O one/O
could/O not/O talk/O about/O exaggeration/O where/O Christianity/O was/O concerned/O./O What/O
exaggeration/O could/O there/O be/O in/O the/O practice/O of/O a/O doctrine/O wherein/O one/O
was/O bidden/O to/O turn/O the/O other/O cheek/O when/O one/O was/O smitten/O,/O and/O give/O one/O's/O
cloak/O if/O one/O's/O coat/O were/O taken/O?/O But/O the/O princess/O disliked/O this/O
exaggeration/O,/O and/O disliked/O even/O more/O the/O fact/O that/O she/O felt/O her/O daughter/O
did/O not/O care/O to/O show/O her/O all/O her/O heart/O./O Kitty/PERSON did/O in/O fact/O conceal/O her/O
new/O views/O and/O feelings/O from/O her/O mother/O./O She/O concealed/O them/O not/O because/O
she/O did/O not/O respect/O or/O did/O not/O love/O her/O mother/O,/O but/O simply/O because/O she/O
was/O her/O mother/O./O She/O would/O have/O revealed/O them/O to/O anyone/O sooner/O than/O to/O
her/O mother/O./O

``/OHow/O is/O it/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON's/O not/O been/O to/O see/O us/O for/O so/O long/O?/O''/O the/O princess/O
said/O one/O day/O of/O Madame/O Petrova/PERSON./O ``/OI/O've/O asked/O her/O,/O but/O she/O seems/O put/O out/O
about/O something/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O've/O not/O noticed/O it/O,/O maman/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O flushing/O hotly/O./O

``/OIs/O it/O long/O since/O you/O went/O to/O see/O them/O?/O''/O

``/OWe/O're/O meaning/O to/O make/O an/O expedition/O to/O the/O mountains/O tomorrow/O,/O''/O
answered/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O can/O go/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O princess/O,/O gazing/O at/O her/O daughter/O's/O
embarrassed/O face/O and/O trying/O to/O guess/O the/O cause/O of/O her/O embarrassment/O./O

That/O day/O Varenka/LOCATION came/O to/O dinner/O and/O told/O them/O that/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON had/O
changed/O her/O mind/O and/O given/O up/O the/O expedition/O for/O the/O morrow/O./O And/O the/O
princess/O noticed/O again/O that/O Kitty/PERSON reddened/O./O

``/OKitty/O,/O have/On't/O you/O had/O some/O misunderstanding/O with/O the/O Petrovs/O?/O''/O said/O
the/O princess/O,/O when/O they/O were/O left/O alone/O./O ``/OWhy/O has/O she/O given/O up/O sending/O
the/O children/O and/O coming/O to/O see/O us/O?/O''/O

Kitty/PERSON answered/O that/O nothing/O had/O happened/O between/O them/O,/O and/O that/O she/O
could/O not/O tell/O why/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON seemed/O displeased/O with/O her/O./O Kitty/PERSON
answered/O perfectly/O truly/O./O She/O did/O not/O know/O the/O reason/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON had/O
changed/O to/O her/O,/O but/O she/O guessed/O it/O./O She/O guessed/O at/O something/O which/O she/O
could/O not/O tell/O her/O mother/O,/O which/O she/O did/O not/O put/O into/O words/O to/O herself/O./O
It/O was/O one/O of/O those/O things/O which/O one/O knows/O but/O which/O one/O can/O never/O speak/O
of/O even/O to/O oneself/O,/O so/O terrible/O and/O shameful/O would/O it/O be/O to/O be/O mistaken/O./O

Again/O and/O again/O she/O went/O over/O in/O her/O memory/O all/O her/O relations/O with/O the/O
family/O./O She/O remembered/O the/O simple/O delight/O expressed/O on/O the/O round/O,/O
good-humored/O face/O of/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON at/O their/O meetings/O;/O she/O remembered/O
their/O secret/O confabulations/O about/O the/O invalid/O,/O their/O plots/O to/O draw/O him/O
away/O from/O the/O work/O which/O was/O forbidden/O him/O,/O and/O to/O get/O him/O out-of-doors/O;/O
the/O devotion/O of/O the/O youngest/O boy/O,/O who/O used/O to/O call/O her/O ``/Omy/O Kitty/PERSON,/O''/O and/O
would/O not/O go/O to/O bed/O without/O her/O./O How/O nice/O it/O all/O was/O!/O Then/O she/O recalled/O
the/O thin/O,/O terribly/O thin/O figure/O of/O Petrov/PERSON,/O with/O his/O long/O neck/O,/O in/O his/O
brown/O coat/O,/O his/O scant/O,/O curly/O hair/O,/O his/O questioning/O blue/O eyes/O that/O were/O
so/O terrible/O to/O Kitty/PERSON at/O first/O,/O and/O his/O painful/O attempts/O to/O seem/O hearty/O
and/O lively/O in/O her/O presence/O./O She/O recalled/O the/O efforts/O she/O had/O made/O at/O
first/O to/O overcome/O the/O repugnance/O she/O felt/O for/O him/O,/O as/O for/O all/O
consumptive/O people/O,/O and/O the/O pains/O it/O had/O cost/O her/O to/O think/O of/O things/O to/O
say/O to/O him/O./O She/O recalled/O the/O timid/O,/O softened/O look/O with/O which/O he/O gazed/O at/O
her/O,/O and/O the/O strange/O feeling/O of/O compassion/O and/O awkwardness/O,/O and/O later/O of/O
a/O sense/O of/O her/O own/O goodness/O,/O which/O she/O had/O felt/O at/O it/O./O How/O nice/O it/O all/O
was/O!/O But/O all/O that/O was/O at/O first/O./O Now/O,/O a/O few/O days/O ago/O,/O everything/O was/O
suddenly/O spoiled/O./O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON had/O met/O Kitty/PERSON with/O affected/O cordiality/O,/O
and/O had/O kept/O continual/O watch/O on/O her/O and/O on/O her/O husband/O./O

Could/O that/O touching/O pleasure/O he/O showed/O when/O she/O came/O near/O be/O the/O cause/O
of/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON's/O coolness/O?/O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O she/O mused/O,/O ``/Othere/O was/O something/O unnatural/O about/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON,/O
and/O utterly/O unlike/O her/O good/O nature/O,/O when/O she/O said/O angrily/O the/O day/O before/O
yesterday/O:/O `/OThere/O,/O he/O will/O keep/O waiting/O for/O you/O;/O he/O would/On't/O drink/O his/O
coffee/O without/O you/O,/O though/O he/O's/O grown/O so/O dreadfully/O weak/O./O'/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O perhaps/O,/O too/O,/O she/O did/On't/O like/O it/O when/O I/O gave/O him/O the/O rug/O./O It/O was/O
all/O so/O simple/O,/O but/O he/O took/O it/O so/O awkwardly/O,/O and/O was/O so/O long/O thanking/O me/O,/O
that/O I/O felt/O awkward/O too/O./O And/O then/O that/O portrait/O of/O me/O he/O did/O so/O well/O./O
And/O most/O of/O all/O that/O look/O of/O confusion/O and/O tenderness/O!/O Yes/O,/O yes/O,/O that/O's/O
it/O!/O''/O Kitty/PERSON repeated/O to/O herself/O with/O horror/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O it/O ca/On't/O be/O,/O it/O
ought/On't/O to/O be/O!/O He/O's/O so/O much/O to/O be/O pitied/O!/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O directly/O
after/O./O

This/O doubt/O poisoned/O the/O charm/O of/O her/O new/O life/O./O



Chapter/O 34/O


Before/O the/O end/O of/O the/O course/O of/O drinking/O the/O waters/O,/O Prince/PERSON
Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O who/O had/O gone/O on/O from/O Carlsbad/LOCATION to/O Baden/PERSON and/O Kissingen/LOCATION to/O
Russian/O friends/O--/Oto/O get/O a/O breath/O of/O Russian/O air/O,/O as/O he/O said/O--/Ocame/O back/O to/O
his/O wife/O and/O daughter/O./O

The/O views/O of/O the/O prince/O and/O of/O the/O princess/O on/O life/O abroad/O were/O
completely/O opposed/O./O The/O princess/O thought/O everything/O delightful/O,/O and/O in/O
spite/O of/O her/O established/O position/O in/O Russian/O society/O,/O she/O tried/O abroad/O
to/O be/O like/O a/O European/O fashionable/O lady/O,/O which/O she/O was/O not/O--/Ofor/O the/O simple/O
reason/O that/O she/O was/O a/O typical/O Russian/O gentlewoman/O;/O and/O so/O she/O was/O
affected/O,/O which/O did/O not/O altogether/O suit/O her/O./O The/O prince/O,/O on/O the/O
contrary/O,/O thought/O everything/O foreign/O detestable/O,/O got/O sick/O of/O European/O
life/O,/O kept/O to/O his/O Russian/O habits/O,/O and/O purposely/O tried/O to/O show/O himself/O
abroad/O less/O European/O than/O he/O was/O in/O reality/O./O

The/O prince/O returned/O thinner/O,/O with/O the/O skin/O hanging/O in/O loose/O bags/O on/O his/O
cheeks/O,/O but/O in/O the/O most/O cheerful/O frame/O of/O mind/O./O His/O good/O humor/O was/O even/O
greater/O when/O he/O saw/O Kitty/PERSON completely/O recovered/O./O The/O news/O of/O Kitty/PERSON's/O
friendship/O with/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON and/O Varenka/LOCATION,/O and/O the/O reports/O the/O princess/O
gave/O him/O of/O some/O kind/O of/O change/O she/O had/O noticed/O in/O Kitty/LOCATION,/O troubled/O the/O
prince/O and/O aroused/O his/O habitual/O feeling/O of/O jealousy/O of/O everything/O that/O
drew/O his/O daughter/O away/O from/O him/O,/O and/O a/O dread/O that/O his/O daughter/O might/O
have/O got/O out/O of/O the/O reach/O of/O his/O influence/O into/O regions/O inaccessible/O to/O
him/O./O But/O these/O unpleasant/O matters/O were/O all/O drowned/O in/O the/O sea/O of/O
kindliness/O and/O good/O humor/O which/O was/O always/O within/O him/O,/O and/O more/O so/O than/O
ever/O since/O his/O course/O of/O Carlsbad/LOCATION waters/O./O

The/O day/O after/O his/O arrival/O the/O prince/O,/O in/O his/O long/O overcoat/O,/O with/O his/O
Russian/O wrinkles/O and/O baggy/O cheeks/O propped/O up/O by/O a/O starched/O collar/O,/O set/O
off/O with/O his/O daughter/O to/O the/O spring/O in/O the/O greatest/O good/O humor/O./O

It/O was/O a/O lovely/O morning/O:/O the/O bright/O,/O cheerful/O houses/O with/O their/O little/O
gardens/O,/O the/O sight/O of/O the/O red-faced/O,/O red-armed/O,/O beer-drinking/O German/O
waitresses/O,/O working/O away/O merrily/O,/O did/O the/O heart/O good/O./O But/O the/O nearer/O
they/O got/O to/O the/O springs/O the/O oftener/O they/O met/O sick/O people/O;/O and/O their/O
appearance/O seemed/O more/O pitiable/O than/O ever/O among/O the/O everyday/O conditions/O
of/O prosperous/O German/O life/O./O Kitty/PERSON was/O no/O longer/O struck/O by/O this/O contrast/O./O
The/O bright/O sun/O,/O the/O brilliant/O green/O of/O the/O foliage/O,/O the/O strains/O of/O the/O
music/O were/O for/O her/O the/O natural/O setting/O of/O all/O these/O familiar/O faces/O,/O with/O
their/O changes/O to/O greater/O emaciation/O or/O to/O convalescence/O,/O for/O which/O she/O
watched/O./O But/O to/O the/O prince/O the/O brightness/O and/O gaiety/O of/O the/O June/O
morning/O,/O and/O the/O sound/O of/O the/O orchestra/O playing/O a/O gay/O waltz/O then/O in/O
fashion/O,/O and/O above/O all/O,/O the/O appearance/O of/O the/O healthy/O attendants/O,/O seemed/O
something/O unseemly/O and/O monstrous/O,/O in/O conjunction/O with/O these/O slowly/O
moving/O,/O dying/O figures/O gathered/O together/O from/O all/O parts/O of/O Europe/LOCATION./O In/O
spite/O of/O his/O feeling/O of/O pride/O and/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O of/O the/O return/O of/O youth/O,/O
with/O his/O favorite/O daughter/O on/O his/O arm/O,/O he/O felt/O awkward/O,/O and/O almost/O
ashamed/O of/O his/O vigorous/O step/O and/O his/O sturdy/O,/O stout/O limbs/O./O He/O felt/O almost/O
like/O a/O man/O not/O dressed/O in/O a/O crowd/O./O

``/OPresent/O me/O to/O your/O new/O friends/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O his/O daughter/O,/O squeezing/O her/O
hand/O with/O his/O elbow/O./O ``/OI/O like/O even/O your/O horrid/O Soden/PERSON for/O making/O you/O so/O
well/O again/O./O Only/O it/O's/O melancholy/O,/O very/O melancholy/O here/O./O Who/O's/O that/O?/O''/O

Kitty/PERSON mentioned/O the/O names/O of/O all/O the/O people/O they/O met/O,/O with/O some/O of/O whom/O
she/O was/O acquainted/O and/O some/O not/O./O At/O the/O entrance/O of/O the/O garden/O they/O met/O
the/O blind/O lady/O,/O Madame/PERSON Berthe/PERSON,/O with/O her/O guide/O,/O and/O the/O prince/O was/O
delighted/O to/O see/O the/O old/O Frenchwoman/O's/O face/O light/O up/O when/O she/O heard/O
Kitty/PERSON's/O voice/O./O She/O at/O once/O began/O talking/O to/O him/O with/O French/O exaggerated/O
politeness/O,/O applauding/O him/O for/O having/O such/O a/O delightful/O daughter/O,/O
extolling/O Kitty/PERSON to/O the/O skies/O before/O her/O face/O,/O and/O calling/O her/O a/O
treasure/O,/O a/O pearl/O,/O and/O a/O consoling/O angel/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O she/O's/O the/O second/O angel/O,/O then/O,/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O,/O smiling/O./O ``/Oshe/O
calls/O Mademoiselle/PERSON Varenka/PERSON angel/O number/O one/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O!/O Mademoiselle/PERSON Varenka/PERSON,/O she/O's/O a/O real/O angel/O,/O allez/O,/O''/O Madame/PERSON Berthe/PERSON
assented/O./O

In/O the/O arcade/O they/O met/O Varenka/PERSON herself/O./O She/O was/O walking/O rapidly/O towards/O
them/O carrying/O an/O elegant/O red/O bag/O./O

``/OHere/O is/O papa/O come/O,/O''/O Kitty/PERSON said/O to/O her/O./O

Varenka/PERSON made/O--/Osimply/O and/O naturally/O as/O she/O did/O everything/O--/Oa/O movement/O
between/O a/O bow/O and/O a/O curtsey/O,/O and/O immediately/O began/O talking/O to/O the/O
prince/O,/O without/O shyness/O,/O naturally/O,/O as/O she/O talked/O to/O everyone/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O I/O know/O you/O;/O I/O know/O you/O very/O well/O,/O''/O the/O prince/O said/O to/O her/O
with/O a/O smile/O,/O in/O which/O Kitty/PERSON detected/O with/O joy/O that/O her/O father/O liked/O her/O
friend/O./O ``/OWhere/O are/O you/O off/O to/O in/O such/O haste/O?/O''/O

``/OMaman/O's/O here/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O turning/O to/O Kitty/PERSON./O ``/OShe/O has/O not/O slept/O all/O
night/O,/O and/O the/O doctor/O advised/O her/O to/O go/O out/O./O I/O'm/O taking/O her/O her/O work/O./O''/O

``/OSo/O that/O's/O angel/O number/O one/O?/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O when/O Varenka/PERSON had/O gone/O on/O./O

Kitty/PERSON saw/O that/O her/O father/O had/O meant/O to/O make/O fun/O of/O Varenka/LOCATION,/O but/O that/O he/O
could/O not/O do/O it/O because/O he/O liked/O her/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O so/O we/O shall/O see/O all/O your/O friends/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O ``/Oeven/O Madame/PERSON
Stahl/PERSON,/O if/O she/O deigns/O to/O recognize/O me/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O did/O you/O know/O her/O,/O papa/O?/O''/O Kitty/PERSON asked/O apprehensively/O,/O catching/O the/O
gleam/O of/O irony/O that/O kindled/O in/O the/O prince/O's/O eyes/O at/O the/O mention/O of/O
Madame/LOCATION Stahl/LOCATION./O

``/OI/O used/O to/O know/O her/O husband/O,/O and/O her/O too/O a/O little/O,/O before/O she/O'd/O joined/O
the/O Pietists/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O is/O a/O Pietist/O,/O papa/O?/O''/O asked/O Kitty/PERSON,/O dismayed/O to/O find/O that/O what/O she/O
prized/O so/O highly/O in/O Madame/LOCATION Stahl/LOCATION had/O a/O name/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O quite/O know/O myself/O./O I/O only/O know/O that/O she/O thanks/O God/PERSON for/O
everything/O,/O for/O every/O misfortune/O,/O and/O thanks/O God/O too/O that/O her/O husband/O
died/O./O And/O that/O's/O rather/O droll/O,/O as/O they/O did/On't/O get/O on/O together/O./O''/O

``/OWho/O's/O that/O?/O What/O a/O piteous/O face/O!/O''/O he/O asked/O,/O noticing/O a/O sick/O man/O of/O
medium/O height/O sitting/O on/O a/O bench/O,/O wearing/O a/O brown/O overcoat/O and/O white/O
trousers/O that/O fell/O in/O strange/O folds/O about/O his/O long/O,/O fleshless/O legs/O./O This/O
man/O lifted/O his/O straw/O hat/O,/O showed/O his/O scanty/O curly/O hair/O and/O high/O
forehead/O,/O painfully/O reddened/O by/O the/O pressure/O of/O the/O hat/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O Petrov/PERSON,/O an/O artist/O,/O''/O answered/O Kitty/PERSON,/O blushing/O./O ``/OAnd/O that/O's/O his/O
wife/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O indicating/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON,/O who/O,/O as/O though/O on/O purpose/O,/O
at/O the/O very/O instant/O they/O approached/O walked/O away/O after/O a/O child/O that/O had/O
run/O off/O along/O a/O path/O./O

``/OPoor/O fellow/O!/O and/O what/O a/O nice/O face/O he/O has/O!/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O./O ``/OWhy/O do/On't/O
you/O go/O up/O to/O him/O?/O He/O wanted/O to/O speak/O to/O you/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O let/O us/O go/O,/O then/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O turning/O round/O resolutely/O./O ``/OHow/O are/O
you/O feeling/O today/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O Petrov/PERSON./O

Petrov/PERSON got/O up/O,/O leaning/O on/O his/O stick/O,/O and/O looked/O shyly/O at/O the/O prince/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O my/O daughter/O,/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O./O ``/OLet/O me/O introduce/O myself/O./O''/O

The/O painter/O bowed/O and/O smiled/O,/O showing/O his/O strangely/O dazzling/O white/O
teeth/O./O

``/OWe/O expected/O you/O yesterday/O,/O princess/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O Kitty/PERSON./O He/O staggered/O as/O
he/O said/O this/O,/O and/O then/O repeated/O the/O motion/O,/O trying/O to/O make/O it/O seem/O as/O if/O
it/O had/O been/O intentional/O./O

``/OI/O meant/O to/O come/O,/O but/O Varenka/PERSON said/O that/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON sent/O word/O you/O were/O
not/O going/O./O''/O

``/ONot/O going/O!/O''/O said/O Petrov/PERSON,/O blushing/O,/O and/O immediately/O beginning/O to/O cough/O,/O
and/O his/O eyes/O sought/O his/O wife/O./O ``/OAnita/O!/O Anita/O!/O''/O he/O said/O loudly/O,/O and/O the/O
swollen/O veins/O stood/O out/O like/O cords/O on/O his/O thin/O white/O neck/O./O

Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON came/O up/O./O

``/OSo/O you/O sent/O word/O to/O the/O princess/O that/O we/O were/On't/O going/O!/O''/O he/O whispered/O
to/O her/O angrily/O,/O losing/O his/O voice/O./O

``/OGood/O morning/O,/O princess/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON,/O with/O an/O assumed/O smile/O
utterly/O unlike/O her/O former/O manner/O./O ``/OVery/O glad/O to/O make/O your/O acquaintance/O,/O''/O
she/O said/O to/O the/O prince/O./O ``/OYou/O've/O long/O been/O expected/O,/O prince/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O did/O you/O send/O word/O to/O the/O princess/O that/O we/O were/On't/O going/O for/O?/O''/O the/O
artist/O whispered/O hoarsely/O once/O more/O,/O still/O more/O angrily/O,/O obviously/O
exasperated/O that/O his/O voice/O failed/O him/O so/O that/O he/O could/O not/O give/O his/O
words/O the/O expression/O he/O would/O have/O liked/O to/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O mercy/O on/O us/O!/O I/O thought/O we/O were/On't/O going/O,/O''/O his/O wife/O answered/O
crossly/O./O

``/OWhat/O,/O when/O.../O''/O He/O coughed/O and/O waved/O his/O hand/O./O The/O prince/O took/O off/O his/O
hat/O and/O moved/O away/O with/O his/O daughter/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O ah/O!/O''/O he/O sighed/O deeply/O./O ``/OOh/O,/O poor/O things/O!/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O papa/O,/O''/O answered/O Kitty/PERSON./O ``/OAnd/O you/O must/O know/O they/O've/O three/O children/O,/O
no/O servant/O,/O and/O scarcely/O any/O means/O./O He/O gets/O something/O from/O the/O Academy/O,/O''/O
she/O went/O on/O briskly/O,/O trying/O to/O drown/O the/O distress/O that/O the/O queer/O change/O
in/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON's/O manner/O to/O her/O had/O aroused/O in/O her/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O here/O's/O Madame/O Stahl/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O indicating/O an/O invalid/O carriage/O,/O
where/O,/O propped/O on/O pillows/O,/O something/O in/O gray/O and/O blue/O was/O lying/O under/O a/O
sunshade/O./O This/O was/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON./O Behind/O her/O stood/O the/O gloomy/O,/O
healthy-looking/O German/O workman/O who/O pushed/O the/O carriage/O./O Close/O by/O was/O
standing/O a/O flaxen-headed/O Swedish/O count/O,/O whom/O Kitty/PERSON knew/O by/O name/O./O Several/O
invalids/O were/O lingering/O near/O the/O low/O carriage/O,/O staring/O at/O the/O lady/O as/O
though/O she/O were/O some/O curiosity/O./O

The/O prince/O went/O up/O to/O her/O,/O and/O Kitty/PERSON detected/O that/O disconcerting/O gleam/O
of/O irony/O in/O his/O eyes/O./O He/O went/O up/O to/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON,/O and/O addressed/O her/O with/O
extreme/O courtesy/O and/O affability/O in/O that/O excellent/O French/O that/O so/O few/O
speak/O nowadays/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O if/O you/O remember/O me/O,/O but/O I/O must/O recall/O myself/O to/O thank/O you/O
for/O your/O kindness/O to/O my/O daughter/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O taking/O off/O his/O hat/O and/O not/O
putting/O it/O on/O again/O./O

``/OPrince/O Alexander/PERSON Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON,/O lifting/O upon/O him/O
her/O heavenly/O eyes/O,/O in/O which/O Kitty/PERSON discerned/O a/O look/O of/O annoyance/O./O
``/ODelighted/O!/O I/O have/O taken/O a/O great/O fancy/O to/O your/O daughter/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O are/O still/O in/O weak/O health/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O;/O I/O'm/O used/O to/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON,/O and/O she/O introduced/O the/O prince/O
to/O the/O Swedish/O count/O./O

``/OYou/O are/O scarcely/O changed/O at/O all/O,/O''/O the/O prince/O said/O to/O her/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O ten/O or/O
eleven/O years/O since/O I/O had/O the/O honor/O of/O seeing/O you/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O;/O God/O sends/O the/O cross/O and/O sends/O the/O strength/O to/O bear/O it/O./O Often/O one/O
wonders/O what/O is/O the/O goal/O of/O this/O life/O?/O.../O The/O other/O side/O!/O''/O she/O said/O
angrily/O to/O Varenka/LOCATION,/O who/O had/O rearranged/O the/O rug/O over/O her/O feet/O not/O to/O her/O
satisfaction/O./O

``/OTo/O do/O good/O,/O probably/O,/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O with/O a/O twinkle/O in/O his/O eye/O./O

``/OThat/O is/O not/O for/O us/O to/O judge/O,/O''/O said/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON,/O perceiving/O the/O shade/O
of/O expression/O on/O the/O prince/O's/O face/O./O ``/OSo/O you/O will/O send/O me/O that/O book/O,/O dear/O
count/O?/O I/O'm/O very/O grateful/O to/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O the/O young/O Swede/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O''/O cried/O the/O prince/O,/O catching/O sight/O of/O the/O Moscow/LOCATION colonel/O standing/O
near/O,/O and/O with/O a/O bow/O to/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON he/O walked/O away/O with/O his/O daughter/O
and/O the/O Moscow/LOCATION colonel/O,/O who/O joined/O them/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O our/O aristocracy/O,/O prince/O!/O''/O the/O Moscow/LOCATION colonel/O said/O with/O ironical/O
intention/O./O He/O cherished/O a/O grudge/O against/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON for/O not/O making/O his/O
acquaintance/O./O

``/OShe/O's/O just/O the/O same/O,/O''/O replied/O the/O prince/O./O

``/ODid/O you/O know/O her/O before/O her/O illness/O,/O prince/O--/Othat/O's/O to/O say/O before/O she/O
took/O to/O her/O bed/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O./O She/O took/O to/O her/O bed/O before/O my/O eyes/O,/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O./O

``/OThey/O say/O it/O's/O ten/O years/O since/O she/O has/O stood/O on/O her/O feet/O./O''/O

``/OShe/O does/On't/O stand/O up/O because/O her/O legs/O are/O too/O short/O./O She/O's/O a/O very/O bad/O
figure/O./O''/O

``/OPapa/O,/O it/O's/O not/O possible/O!/O''/O cried/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OThat/O's/O what/O wicked/O tongues/O say/O,/O my/O darling/O./O And/O your/O Varenka/O catches/O it/O
too/O,/O''/O he/O added/O./O ``/OOh/O,/O these/O invalid/O ladies/O!/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O papa/O!/O''/O Kitty/PERSON objected/O warmly/O./O ``/OVarenka/PERSON worships/O her/O./O And/O then/O
she/O does/O so/O much/O good/O!/O Ask/O anyone/O!/O Everyone/O knows/O her/O and/O Aline/PERSON Stahl/PERSON./O''/O

``/OPerhaps/O so/O,/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O,/O squeezing/O her/O hand/O with/O his/O elbow/O;/O ``/Obut/O
it/O's/O better/O when/O one/O does/O good/O so/O that/O you/O may/O ask/O everyone/O and/O no/O one/O
knows/O./O''/O

Kitty/PERSON did/O not/O answer/O,/O not/O because/O she/O had/O nothing/O to/O say/O,/O but/O because/O
she/O did/O not/O care/O to/O reveal/O her/O secret/O thoughts/O even/O to/O her/O father/O./O But/O,/O
strange/O to/O say/O,/O although/O she/O had/O so/O made/O up/O her/O mind/O not/O to/O be/O
influenced/O by/O her/O father/O's/O views/O,/O not/O to/O let/O him/O into/O her/O inmost/O
sanctuary/O,/O she/O felt/O that/O the/O heavenly/O image/O of/O Madame/LOCATION Stahl/LOCATION,/O which/O she/O
had/O carried/O for/O a/O whole/O month/O in/O her/O heart/O,/O had/O vanished/O,/O never/O to/O
return/O,/O just/O as/O the/O fantastic/O figure/O made/O up/O of/O some/O clothes/O thrown/O down/O
at/O random/O vanishes/O when/O one/O sees/O that/O it/O is/O only/O some/O garment/O lying/O
there/O./O All/O that/O was/O left/O was/O a/O woman/O with/O short/O legs/O,/O who/O lay/O down/O
because/O she/O had/O a/O bad/O figure/O,/O and/O worried/O patient/O Varenka/PERSON for/O not/O
arranging/O her/O rug/O to/O her/O liking/O./O And/O by/O no/O effort/O of/O the/O imagination/O
could/O Kitty/PERSON bring/O back/O the/O former/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON./O



Chapter/O 35/O


The/O prince/O communicated/O his/O good/O humor/O to/O his/O own/O family/O and/O his/O
friends/O,/O and/O even/O to/O the/O German/O landlord/O in/O whose/O rooms/O the/O
Shtcherbatskys/O were/O staying/O./O

On/O coming/O back/O with/O Kitty/PERSON from/O the/O springs/O,/O the/O prince/O,/O who/O had/O asked/O
the/O colonel/O,/O and/O Marya/PERSON Yevgenyevna/PERSON,/O and/O Varenka/LOCATION all/O to/O come/O and/O have/O
coffee/O with/O them/O,/O gave/O orders/O for/O a/O table/O and/O chairs/O to/O be/O taken/O into/O
the/O garden/O under/O the/O chestnut/O tree/O,/O and/O lunch/O to/O be/O laid/O there/O./O The/O
landlord/O and/O the/O servants/O,/O too/O,/O grew/O brisker/O under/O the/O influence/O of/O his/O
good/O spirits/O./O They/O knew/O his/O open-handedness/O;/O and/O half/O an/O hour/O later/O the/O
invalid/O doctor/O from/O Hamburg/LOCATION,/O who/O lived/O on/O the/O top/O floor/O,/O looked/O
enviously/O out/O of/O the/O window/O at/O the/O merry/O party/O of/O healthy/O Russians/O
assembled/O under/O the/O chestnut/O tree/O./O In/O the/O trembling/O circles/O of/O shadow/O
cast/O by/O the/O leaves/O,/O at/O a/O table/O,/O covered/O with/O a/O white/O cloth/O,/O and/O set/O with/O
coffeepot/O,/O bread-and-butter/O,/O cheese/O,/O and/O cold/O game/O,/O sat/O the/O princess/O in/O
a/O high/O cap/O with/O lilac/O ribbons/O,/O distributing/O cups/O and/O bread-and-butter/O./O
At/O the/O other/O end/O sat/O the/O prince/O,/O eating/O heartily/O,/O and/O talking/O loudly/O and/O
merrily/O./O The/O prince/O had/O spread/O out/O near/O him/O his/O purchases/O,/O carved/O boxes/O,/O
and/O knick-knacks/O,/O paper-knives/O of/O all/O sorts/O,/O of/O which/O he/O bought/O a/O heap/O
at/O every/O watering-place/O,/O and/O bestowed/O them/O upon/O everyone/O,/O including/O
Lieschen/PERSON,/O the/O servant/O girl/O,/O and/O the/O landlord/O,/O with/O whom/O he/O jested/O in/O his/O
comically/O bad/O German/O,/O assuring/O him/O that/O it/O was/O not/O the/O water/O had/O cured/O
Kitty/PERSON,/O but/O his/O splendid/O cookery/O,/O especially/O his/O plum/O soup/O./O The/O princess/O
laughed/O at/O her/O husband/O for/O his/O Russian/O ways/O,/O but/O she/O was/O more/O lively/O and/O
good-humored/O than/O she/O had/O been/O all/O the/O while/O she/O had/O been/O at/O the/O waters/O./O
The/O colonel/O smiled/O,/O as/O he/O always/O did/O,/O at/O the/O prince/O's/O jokes/O,/O but/O as/O far/O
as/O regards/O Europe/LOCATION,/O of/O which/O he/O believed/O himself/O to/O be/O making/O a/O careful/O
study/O,/O he/O took/O the/O princess/O's/O side/O./O The/O simple-hearted/O Marya/PERSON Yevgenyevna/PERSON
simply/O roared/O with/O laughter/O at/O everything/O absurd/O the/O prince/O said/O,/O and/O
his/O jokes/O made/O Varenka/LOCATION helpless/O with/O feeble/O but/O infectious/O laughter/O,/O
which/O was/O something/O Kitty/PERSON had/O never/O seen/O before/O./O

Kitty/PERSON was/O glad/O of/O all/O this/O,/O but/O she/O could/O not/O be/O light-hearted/O./O She/O
could/O not/O solve/O the/O problem/O her/O father/O had/O unconsciously/O set/O her/O by/O his/O
goodhumored/O view/O of/O her/O friends/O,/O and/O of/O the/O life/O that/O had/O so/O attracted/O
her/O./O To/O this/O doubt/O there/O was/O joined/O the/O change/O in/O her/O relations/O with/O the/O
Petrovs/O,/O which/O had/O been/O so/O conspicuously/O and/O unpleasantly/O marked/O that/O
morning/O./O Everyone/O was/O good/O humored/O,/O but/O Kitty/PERSON could/O not/O feel/O good/O
humored/O,/O and/O this/O increased/O her/O distress/O./O She/O felt/O a/O feeling/O such/O as/O she/O
had/O known/O in/O childhood/O,/O when/O she/O had/O been/O shut/O in/O her/O room/O as/O a/O
punishment/O,/O and/O had/O heard/O her/O sisters/O'/O merry/O laughter/O outside/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O but/O what/O did/O you/O buy/O this/O mass/O of/O things/O for/O?/O''/O said/O the/O princess/O,/O
smiling/O,/O and/O handing/O her/O husband/O a/O cup/O of/O coffee/O./O

``/OOne/O goes/O for/O a/O walk/O,/O one/O looks/O in/O a/O shop/O,/O and/O they/O ask/O you/O to/O buy/O./O
`/O_/OErlaucht/O,/O Durchlaucht/PERSON?/O_/O'/O Directly/O they/O say/O `/O_/ODurchlaucht/O_/O,/O'/O I/O ca/On't/O
hold/O out/O./O I/O lose/O ten/O thalers/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O simply/O from/O boredom/O,/O''/O said/O the/O princess/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O it/O is/O./O Such/O boredom/O,/O my/O dear/O,/O that/O one/O does/On't/O know/O what/O to/O
do/O with/O oneself/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O can/O you/O be/O bored/O,/O prince/O?/O There/O's/O so/O much/O that/O's/O interesting/O now/O in/O
Germany/LOCATION,/O''/O said/O Marya/PERSON Yevgenyevna/PERSON./O

``/OBut/O I/O know/O everything/O that/O's/O interesting/O:/O the/O plum/O soup/O I/O know/O,/O and/O the/O
pea/O sausages/O I/O know/O./O I/O know/O everything/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O you/O may/O say/O what/O you/O like/O,/O prince/O,/O there/O's/O the/O interest/O of/O their/O
institutions/O,/O''/O said/O the/O colonel/O./O

``/OBut/O what/O is/O there/O interesting/O about/O it/O?/O They/O're/O all/O as/O pleased/O as/O brass/O
halfpence/O./O They/O've/O conquered/O everybody/O,/O and/O why/O am/O I/O to/O be/O pleased/O at/O
that/O?/O I/O have/On't/O conquered/O anyone/O;/O and/O I/O'm/O obliged/O to/O take/O off/O my/O own/O
boots/O,/O yes/O,/O and/O put/O them/O away/O too/O;/O in/O the/O morning/O,/O get/O up/O and/O dress/O at/O
once/O,/O and/O go/O to/O the/O dining/O room/O to/O drink/O bad/O tea/O!/O How/O different/O it/O is/O at/O
home/O!/O You/O get/O up/O in/O no/O haste/O,/O you/O get/O cross/O,/O grumble/O a/O little/O,/O and/O come/O
round/O again/O./O You/O've/O time/O to/O think/O things/O over/O,/O and/O no/O hurry/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O time/O's/O money/O,/O you/O forget/O that/O,/O''/O said/O the/O colonel/O./O

``/OTime/O,/O indeed/O,/O that/O depends/O!/O Why/O,/O there/O's/O time/O one/O would/O give/O a/O month/O of/O
for/O sixpence/O,/O and/O time/O you/O would/On't/O give/O half/O an/O hour/O of/O for/O any/O money/O./O
Is/On't/O that/O so/O,/O Katinka/PERSON?/O What/O is/O it/O?/O why/O are/O you/O so/O depressed/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O depressed/O./O''/O

``/OWhere/O are/O you/O off/O to/O?/O Stay/O a/O little/O longer/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O Varenka/LOCATION./O

``/OI/O must/O be/O going/O home/O,/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O,/O and/O again/O she/O went/O off/O
into/O a/O giggle/O./O When/O she/O had/O recovered/O,/O she/O said/O good-bye/O,/O and/O went/O into/O
the/O house/O to/O get/O her/O hat/O./O

Kitty/PERSON followed/O her/O./O Even/O Varenka/PERSON struck/O her/O as/O different/O./O She/O was/O not/O
worse/O,/O but/O different/O from/O what/O she/O had/O fancied/O her/O before/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O dear/O!/O it/O's/O a/O long/O while/O since/O I/O've/O laughed/O so/O much/O!/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON,/O
gathering/O up/O her/O parasol/O and/O her/O bag/O./O ``/OHow/O nice/O he/O is/O,/O your/O father/O!/O''/O

Kitty/PERSON did/O not/O speak/O./O

``/OWhen/O shall/O I/O see/O you/O again/O?/O''/O asked/O Varenka/PERSON./O

``/OMamma/O meant/O to/O go/O and/O see/O the/O Petrovs/O./O Wo/On't/O you/O be/O there/O?/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O
to/O try/O Varenka/LOCATION./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O answered/O Varenka/PERSON./O ``/OThey/O're/O getting/O ready/O to/O go/O away/O,/O so/O I/O
promised/O to/O help/O them/O pack/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O'll/O come/O too/O,/O then/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O why/O should/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O not/O?/O why/O not/O?/O why/O not/O?/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O opening/O her/O eyes/O wide/O,/O and/O
clutching/O at/O Varenka/LOCATION's/O parasol/O,/O so/O as/O not/O to/O let/O her/O go/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O wait/O a/O
minute/O;/O why/O not/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O nothing/O;/O your/O father/O has/O come/O,/O and/O besides/O,/O they/O will/O feel/O awkward/O
at/O your/O helping/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O tell/O me/O why/O you/O do/On't/O want/O me/O to/O be/O often/O at/O the/O Petrovs/O'/O./O You/O
do/On't/O want/O me/O to/O--/Owhy/O not/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O did/On't/O say/O that/O,/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON quietly/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O please/O tell/O me/O!/O''/O

``/OTell/O you/O everything/O?/O''/O asked/O Varenka/PERSON./O

``/OEverything/O,/O everything/O!/O''/O Kitty/PERSON assented/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O there/O's/O really/O nothing/O of/O any/O consequence/O;/O only/O that/O Mihail/PERSON
Alexeyevitch/PERSON''/O -LRB-/Othat/O was/O the/O artist/O's/O name/O-RRB-/O ``/Ohad/O meant/O to/O leave/O earlier/O,/O
and/O now/O he/O does/On't/O want/O to/O go/O away/O,/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O well/O!/O''/O Kitty/PERSON urged/O impatiently/O,/O looking/O darkly/O at/O Varenka/LOCATION./O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O for/O some/O reason/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON told/O him/O that/O he/O did/On't/O want/O to/O
go/O because/O you/O are/O here/O./O Of/O course/O,/O that/O was/O nonsense/O;/O but/O there/O was/O a/O
dispute/O over/O it/O--/Oover/O you/O./O You/O know/O how/O irritable/O these/O sick/O people/O are/O./O''/O

Kitty/PERSON,/O scowling/O more/O than/O ever/O,/O kept/O silent/O,/O and/O Varenka/LOCATION went/O on/O
speaking/O alone/O,/O trying/O to/O soften/O or/O soothe/O her/O,/O and/O seeing/O a/O storm/O
coming/O--/Oshe/O did/O not/O know/O whether/O of/O tears/O or/O of/O words/O./O

``/OSo/O you/O'd/O better/O not/O go/O.../O./O You/O understand/O;/O you/O wo/On't/O be/O offended/O?/O.../O''/O

``/OAnd/O it/O serves/O me/O right/O!/O And/O it/O serves/O me/O right/O!/O''/O Kitty/PERSON cried/O quickly/O,/O
snatching/O the/O parasol/O out/O of/O Varenka/LOCATION's/O hand/O,/O and/O looking/O past/O her/O
friend/O's/O face/O./O

Varenka/PERSON felt/O inclined/O to/O smile/O,/O looking/O at/O her/O childish/O fury/O,/O but/O she/O
was/O afraid/O of/O wounding/O her/O./O

``/OHow/O does/O it/O serve/O you/O right/O?/O I/O do/On't/O understand/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OIt/O serves/O me/O right/O,/O because/O it/O was/O all/O sham/O;/O because/O it/O was/O all/O done/O on/O
purpose/O,/O and/O not/O from/O the/O heart/O./O What/O business/O had/O I/O to/O interfere/O with/O
outsiders/O?/O And/O so/O it/O's/O come/O about/O that/O I/O'm/O a/O cause/O of/O quarrel/O,/O and/O that/O
I/O've/O done/O what/O nobody/O asked/O me/O to/O do/O./O Because/O it/O was/O all/O a/O sham/O!/O a/O sham/O!/O
a/O sham/O!/O.../O''/O

``/OA/O sham/O!/O with/O what/O object/O?/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON gently/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O it/O's/O so/O idiotic/O!/O so/O hateful/O!/O There/O was/O no/O need/O whatever/O for/O me/O.../O./O
Nothing/O but/O sham/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O opening/O and/O shutting/O the/O parasol/O./O

``/OBut/O with/O what/O object/O?/O''/O

``/OTo/O seem/O better/O to/O people/O,/O to/O myself/O,/O to/O God/O;/O to/O deceive/O everyone/O./O No/O!/O
now/O I/O wo/On't/O descend/O to/O that/O./O I/O'll/O be/O bad/O;/O but/O anyway/O not/O a/O liar/O,/O a/O
cheat/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O who/O is/O a/O cheat/O?/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON reproachfully/O./O ``/OYou/O speak/O as/O if/O.../O''/O

But/O Kitty/PERSON was/O in/O one/O of/O her/O gusts/O of/O fury/O,/O and/O she/O would/O not/O let/O her/O
finish/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O talk/O about/O you/O,/O not/O about/O you/O at/O all/O./O You/O're/O perfection/O./O Yes/O,/O
yes/O,/O I/O know/O you/O're/O all/O perfection/O;/O but/O what/O am/O I/O to/O do/O if/O I/O'm/O bad/O?/O This/O
would/O never/O have/O been/O if/O I/O were/On't/O bad/O./O So/O let/O me/O be/O what/O I/O am/O./O I/O wo/On't/O
be/O a/O sham/O./O What/O have/O I/O to/O do/O with/O Anna/PERSON Pavlovna/PERSON?/O Let/O them/O go/O their/O way/O,/O
and/O me/O go/O mine/O./O I/O ca/On't/O be/O different/O.../O./O And/O yet/O it/O's/O not/O that/O,/O it/O's/O not/O
that/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O is/O not/O that/O?/O''/O asked/O Varenka/PERSON in/O bewilderment/O./O

``/OEverything/O./O I/O ca/On't/O act/O except/O from/O the/O heart/O,/O and/O you/O act/O from/O
principle/O./O I/O liked/O you/O simply/O,/O but/O you/O most/O likely/O only/O wanted/O to/O save/O
me/O,/O to/O improve/O me/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O are/O unjust/O,/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON./O

``/OBut/O I/O'm/O not/O speaking/O of/O other/O people/O,/O I/O'm/O speaking/O of/O myself/O./O''/O

``/OKitty/O,/O''/O they/O heard/O her/O mother/O's/O voice/O,/O ``/Ocome/O here/O,/O show/O papa/O your/O
necklace/O./O''/O

Kitty/PERSON,/O with/O a/O haughty/O air/O,/O without/O making/O peace/O with/O her/O friend/O,/O took/O
the/O necklace/O in/O a/O little/O box/O from/O the/O table/O and/O went/O to/O her/O mother/O./O

``/OWhat/O's/O the/O matter/O?/O Why/O are/O you/O so/O red/O?/O''/O her/O mother/O and/O father/O said/O to/O
her/O with/O one/O voice/O./O

``/ONothing/O,/O''/O she/O answered/O./O ``/OI/O'll/O be/O back/O directly/O,/O''/O and/O she/O ran/O back/O./O

``/OShe/O's/O still/O here/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O./O ``/OWhat/O am/O I/O to/O say/O to/O her/O?/O Oh/O,/O dear/O!/O
what/O have/O I/O done/O,/O what/O have/O I/O said/O?/O Why/O was/O I/O rude/O to/O her/O?/O What/O am/O I/O to/O
do/O?/O What/O am/O I/O to/O say/O to/O her/O?/O''/O thought/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O she/O stopped/O in/O the/O
doorway/O./O

Varenka/PERSON in/O her/O hat/O and/O with/O the/O parasol/O in/O her/O hands/O was/O sitting/O at/O the/O
table/O examining/O the/O spring/O which/O Kitty/PERSON had/O broken/O./O She/O lifted/O her/O head/O./O

``/OVarenka/O,/O forgive/O me/O,/O do/O forgive/O me/O,/O''/O whispered/O Kitty/PERSON,/O going/O up/O to/O her/O./O
``/OI/O do/On't/O remember/O what/O I/O said/O./O I./O./O./O''/O

``/OI/O really/O did/On't/O mean/O to/O hurt/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

Peace/O was/O made/O./O But/O with/O her/O father/O's/O coming/O all/O the/O world/O in/O which/O she/O
had/O been/O living/O was/O transformed/O for/O Kitty/PERSON./O She/O did/O not/O give/O up/O
everything/O she/O had/O learned/O,/O but/O she/O became/O aware/O that/O she/O had/O deceived/O
herself/O in/O supposing/O she/O could/O be/O what/O she/O wanted/O to/O be/O./O Her/O eyes/O were/O,/O
it/O seemed/O,/O opened/O;/O she/O felt/O all/O the/O difficulty/O of/O maintaining/O herself/O
without/O hypocrisy/O and/O self-conceit/O on/O the/O pinnacle/O to/O which/O she/O had/O
wished/O to/O mount/O./O Moreover/O,/O she/O became/O aware/O of/O all/O the/O dreariness/O of/O the/O
world/O of/O sorrow/O,/O of/O sick/O and/O dying/O people/O,/O in/O which/O she/O had/O been/O living/O./O
The/O efforts/O she/O had/O made/O to/O like/O it/O seemed/O to/O her/O intolerable/O,/O and/O she/O
felt/O a/O longing/O to/O get/O back/O quickly/O into/O the/O fresh/O air/O,/O to/O Russia/LOCATION,/O to/O
Ergushovo/LOCATION,/O where/O,/O as/O she/O knew/O from/O letters/O,/O her/O sister/O Dolly/PERSON had/O already/O
gone/O with/O her/O children/O./O

But/O her/O affection/O for/O Varenka/PERSON did/O not/O wane/O./O As/O she/O said/O good-bye/O,/O Kitty/PERSON
begged/O her/O to/O come/O to/O them/O in/O Russia/LOCATION./O

``/OI/O'll/O come/O when/O you/O get/O married/O,/O''/O said/O Varenka/PERSON./O

``/OI/O shall/O never/O marry/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O then/O,/O I/O shall/O never/O come/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O then/O,/O I/O shall/O be/O married/O simply/O for/O that/O./O Mind/O now/O,/O remember/O your/O
promise/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON./O

The/O doctor/O's/O prediction/O was/O fulfilled/O./O Kitty/PERSON returned/O home/O to/O Russia/LOCATION
cured/O./O She/O was/O not/O so/O gay/O and/O thoughtless/O as/O before/O,/O but/O she/O was/O serene/O./O
Her/O Moscow/LOCATION troubles/O had/O become/O a/O memory/O to/O her/O./O




PART/O THREE/O



Chapter/O 1/O


Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON Koznishev/PERSON wanted/O a/O rest/O from/O mental/O work/O,/O and/O instead/O
of/O going/O abroad/O as/O he/O usually/O did/O,/O he/O came/O towards/O the/O end/O of/O May/O to/O
stay/O in/O the/O country/O with/O his/O brother/O./O In/O his/O judgment/O the/O best/O sort/O of/O
life/O was/O a/O country/O life/O./O He/O had/O come/O now/O to/O enjoy/O such/O a/O life/O at/O his/O
brother/O's/O./O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON was/O very/O glad/O to/O have/O him/O,/O especially/O as/O he/O
did/O not/O expect/O his/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON that/O summer/O./O But/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O
affection/O and/O respect/O for/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON was/O
uncomfortable/O with/O his/O brother/O in/O the/O country/O./O It/O made/O him/O
uncomfortable/O,/O and/O it/O positively/O annoyed/O him/O to/O see/O his/O brother/O's/O
attitude/O to/O the/O country/O./O To/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON the/O country/O was/O the/O
background/O of/O life/O,/O that/O is/O of/O pleasures/O,/O endeavors/O,/O labor/O./O To/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON the/O country/O meant/O on/O one/O hand/O rest/O from/O work/O,/O on/O the/O other/O a/O
valuable/O antidote/O to/O the/O corrupt/O influences/O of/O town/O,/O which/O he/O took/O with/O
satisfaction/O and/O a/O sense/O of/O its/O utility/O./O To/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON the/O country/O
was/O good/O first/O because/O it/O afforded/O a/O field/O for/O labor/O,/O of/O the/O usefulness/O
of/O which/O there/O could/O be/O no/O doubt/O./O To/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON the/O country/O was/O
particularly/O good/O,/O because/O there/O it/O was/O possible/O and/O fitting/O to/O do/O
nothing/O./O Moreover/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O attitude/O to/O the/O peasants/O rather/O
piqued/O Konstantin/PERSON./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON used/O to/O say/O that/O he/O knew/O and/O liked/O
the/O peasantry/O,/O and/O he/O often/O talked/O to/O the/O peasants/O,/O which/O he/O knew/O how/O to/O
do/O without/O affectation/O or/O condescension/O,/O and/O from/O every/O such/O
conversation/O he/O would/O deduce/O general/O conclusions/O in/O favor/O of/O the/O
peasantry/O and/O in/O confirmation/O of/O his/O knowing/O them/O./O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON did/O
not/O like/O such/O an/O attitude/O to/O the/O peasants/O./O To/O Konstantin/PERSON the/O peasant/O was/O
simply/O the/O chief/O partner/O in/O their/O common/O labor/O,/O and/O in/O spite/O of/O all/O the/O
respect/O and/O the/O love/O,/O almost/O like/O that/O of/O kinship/O,/O he/O had/O for/O the/O
peasant/O--/Osucked/O in/O probably/O,/O as/O he/O said/O himself/O,/O with/O the/O milk/O of/O his/O
peasant/O nurse/O--/Ostill/O as/O a/O fellow-worker/O with/O him/O,/O while/O sometimes/O
enthusiastic/O over/O the/O vigor/O,/O gentleness/O,/O and/O justice/O of/O these/O men/O,/O he/O
was/O very/O often/O,/O when/O their/O common/O labors/O called/O for/O other/O qualities/O,/O
exasperated/O with/O the/O peasant/O for/O his/O carelessness/O,/O lack/O of/O method/O,/O
drunkenness/O,/O and/O lying/O./O If/O he/O had/O been/O asked/O whether/O he/O liked/O or/O did/On't/O
like/O the/O peasants/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON would/O have/O been/O absolutely/O at/O a/O loss/O
what/O to/O reply/O./O He/O liked/O and/O did/O not/O like/O the/O peasants/O,/O just/O as/O he/O liked/O
and/O did/O not/O like/O men/O in/O general/O./O Of/O course/O,/O being/O a/O good-hearted/O man/O,/O he/O
liked/O men/O rather/O than/O he/O disliked/O them/O,/O and/O so/O too/O with/O the/O peasants/O./O
But/O like/O or/O dislike/O ``/Othe/O people/O''/O as/O something/O apart/O he/O could/O not/O,/O not/O
only/O because/O he/O lived/O with/O ``/Othe/O people/O,/O''/O and/O all/O his/O interests/O were/O
bound/O up/O with/O theirs/O,/O but/O also/O because/O he/O regarded/O himself/O as/O a/O part/O of/O
``/Othe/O people/O,/O''/O did/O not/O see/O any/O special/O qualities/O or/O failings/O
distinguishing/O himself/O and/O ``/Othe/O people/O,/O''/O and/O could/O not/O contrast/O himself/O
with/O them/O./O Moreover/O,/O although/O he/O had/O lived/O so/O long/O in/O the/O closest/O
relations/O with/O the/O peasants/O,/O as/O farmer/O and/O arbitrator/O,/O and/O what/O was/O
more/O,/O as/O adviser/O -LRB-/Othe/O peasants/O trusted/O him/O,/O and/O for/O thirty/O miles/O round/O
they/O would/O come/O to/O ask/O his/O advice/O-RRB-/O,/O he/O had/O no/O definite/O views/O of/O ``/Othe/O
people/O,/O''/O and/O would/O have/O been/O as/O much/O at/O a/O loss/O to/O answer/O the/O question/O
whether/O he/O knew/O ``/Othe/O people/O''/O as/O the/O question/O whether/O he/O liked/O them/O./O For/O
him/O to/O say/O he/O knew/O the/O peasantry/O would/O have/O been/O the/O same/O as/O to/O say/O he/O
knew/O men/O./O He/O was/O continually/O watching/O and/O getting/O to/O know/O people/O of/O all/O
sorts/O,/O and/O among/O them/O peasants/O,/O whom/O he/O regarded/O as/O good/O and/O interesting/O
people/O,/O and/O he/O was/O continually/O observing/O new/O points/O in/O them/O,/O altering/O
his/O former/O views/O of/O them/O and/O forming/O new/O ones/O./O With/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON it/O
was/O quite/O the/O contrary/O./O Just/O as/O he/O liked/O and/O praised/O a/O country/O life/O in/O
comparison/O with/O the/O life/O he/O did/O not/O like/O,/O so/O too/O he/O liked/O the/O peasantry/O
in/O contradistinction/O to/O the/O class/O of/O men/O he/O did/O not/O like/O,/O and/O so/O too/O he/O
knew/O the/O peasantry/O as/O something/O distinct/O from/O and/O opposed/O to/O men/O
generally/O./O In/O his/O methodical/O brain/O there/O were/O distinctly/O formulated/O
certain/O aspects/O of/O peasant/O life/O,/O deduced/O partly/O from/O that/O life/O itself/O,/O
but/O chiefly/O from/O contrast/O with/O other/O modes/O of/O life/O./O He/O never/O changed/O his/O
opinion/O of/O the/O peasantry/O and/O his/O sympathetic/O attitude/O towards/O them/O./O

In/O the/O discussions/O that/O arose/O between/O the/O brothers/O on/O their/O views/O of/O the/O
peasantry/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON always/O got/O the/O better/O of/O his/O brother/O,/O
precisely/O because/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON had/O definite/O ideas/O about/O the/O
peasant/O--/Ohis/O character/O,/O his/O qualities/O,/O and/O his/O tastes/O./O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON
had/O no/O definite/O and/O unalterable/O idea/O on/O the/O subject/O,/O and/O so/O in/O their/O
arguments/O Konstantin/PERSON was/O readily/O convicted/O of/O contradicting/O himself/O./O

In/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O eyes/O his/O younger/O brother/O was/O a/O capital/O fellow/O,/O
_/Owith/O his/O heart/O in/O the/O right/O place/O_/O -LRB-/Oas/O he/O expressed/O it/O in/O French/O-RRB-/O,/O but/O
with/O a/O mind/O which/O,/O though/O fairly/O quick/O,/O was/O too/O much/O influenced/O by/O the/O
impressions/O of/O the/O moment/O,/O and/O consequently/O filled/O with/O contradictions/O./O
With/O all/O the/O condescension/O of/O an/O elder/O brother/O he/O sometimes/O explained/O to/O
him/O the/O true/O import/O of/O things/O,/O but/O he/O derived/O little/O satisfaction/O from/O
arguing/O with/O him/O because/O he/O got/O the/O better/O of/O him/O too/O easily/O./O

Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON regarded/O his/O brother/O as/O a/O man/O of/O immense/O intellect/O and/O
culture/O,/O as/O generous/O in/O the/O highest/O sense/O of/O the/O word/O,/O and/O possessed/O of/O
a/O special/O faculty/O for/O working/O for/O the/O public/O good/O./O But/O in/O the/O depths/O of/O
his/O heart/O,/O the/O older/O he/O became/O,/O and/O the/O more/O intimately/O he/O knew/O his/O
brother/O,/O the/O more/O and/O more/O frequently/O the/O thought/O struck/O him/O that/O this/O
faculty/O of/O working/O for/O the/O public/O good/O,/O of/O which/O he/O felt/O himself/O utterly/O
devoid/O,/O was/O possibly/O not/O so/O much/O a/O quality/O as/O a/O lack/O of/O something/O--/Onot/O a/O
lack/O of/O good/O,/O honest/O,/O noble/O desires/O and/O tastes/O,/O but/O a/O lack/O of/O vital/O
force/O,/O of/O what/O is/O called/O heart/O,/O of/O that/O impulse/O which/O drives/O a/O man/O to/O
choose/O someone/O out/O of/O the/O innumerable/O paths/O of/O life/O,/O and/O to/O care/O only/O
for/O that/O one/O./O The/O better/O he/O knew/O his/O brother/O,/O the/O more/O he/O noticed/O that/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O and/O many/O other/O people/O who/O worked/O for/O the/O public/O
welfare/O,/O were/O not/O led/O by/O an/O impulse/O of/O the/O heart/O to/O care/O for/O the/O public/O
good/O,/O but/O reasoned/O from/O intellectual/O considerations/O that/O it/O was/O a/O right/O
thing/O to/O take/O interest/O in/O public/O affairs/O,/O and/O consequently/O took/O interest/O
in/O them/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O confirmed/O in/O this/O generalization/O by/O observing/O that/O
his/O brother/O did/O not/O take/O questions/O affecting/O the/O public/O welfare/O or/O the/O
question/O of/O the/O immortality/O of/O the/O soul/O a/O bit/O more/O to/O heart/O than/O he/O did/O
chess/O problems/O,/O or/O the/O ingenious/O construction/O of/O a/O new/O machine/O./O

Besides/O this/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON was/O not/O at/O his/O ease/O with/O his/O brother/O,/O
because/O in/O summer/O in/O the/O country/O Levin/PERSON was/O continually/O busy/O with/O work/O on/O
the/O land/O,/O and/O the/O long/O summer/O day/O was/O not/O long/O enough/O for/O him/O to/O get/O
through/O all/O he/O had/O to/O do/O,/O while/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O taking/O a/O holiday/O./O
But/O though/O he/O was/O taking/O a/O holiday/O now/O,/O that/O is/O to/O say/O,/O he/O was/O doing/O no/O
writing/O,/O he/O was/O so/O used/O to/O intellectual/O activity/O that/O he/O liked/O to/O put/O
into/O concise/O and/O eloquent/O shape/O the/O ideas/O that/O occurred/O to/O him/O,/O and/O
liked/O to/O have/O someone/O to/O listen/O to/O him/O./O His/O most/O usual/O and/O natural/O
listener/O was/O his/O brother/O./O And/O so/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O friendliness/O and/O
directness/O of/O their/O relations/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON felt/O an/O awkwardness/O in/O leaving/O
him/O alone/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON liked/O to/O stretch/O himself/O on/O the/O grass/O in/O
the/O sun/O,/O and/O to/O lie/O so/O,/O basking/O and/O chatting/O lazily/O./O

``/OYou/O would/On't/O believe/O,/O''/O he/O would/O say/O to/O his/O brother/O,/O ``/Owhat/O a/O pleasure/O
this/O rural/O laziness/O is/O to/O me/O./O Not/O an/O idea/O in/O one/O's/O brain/O,/O as/O empty/O as/O a/O
drum/O!/O''/O

But/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON found/O it/O dull/O sitting/O and/O listening/O to/O him/O,/O
especially/O when/O he/O knew/O that/O while/O he/O was/O away/O they/O would/O be/O carting/O
dung/O onto/O the/O fields/O not/O ploughed/O ready/O for/O it/O,/O and/O heaping/O it/O all/O up/O
anyhow/O;/O and/O would/O not/O screw/O the/O shares/O in/O the/O ploughs/O,/O but/O would/O let/O
them/O come/O off/O and/O then/O say/O that/O the/O new/O ploughs/O were/O a/O silly/O invention/O,/O
and/O there/O was/O nothing/O like/O the/O old/O Andreevna/O plough/O,/O and/O so/O on/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O you/O've/O done/O enough/O trudging/O about/O in/O the/O heat/O,/O''/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
would/O say/O to/O him/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O must/O just/O run/O round/O to/O the/O counting-house/O for/O a/O minute/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON
would/O answer/O,/O and/O he/O would/O run/O off/O to/O the/O fields/O./O



Chapter/O 2/O


Early/O in/O June/O it/O happened/O that/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O the/O old/O nurse/O and/O
housekeeper/O,/O in/O carrying/O to/O the/O cellar/O a/O jar/O of/O mushrooms/O she/O had/O just/O
pickled/O,/O slipped/O,/O fell/O,/O and/O sprained/O her/O wrist/O./O The/O district/O doctor/O,/O a/O
talkative/O young/O medical/O student/O,/O who/O had/O just/O finished/O his/O studies/O,/O came/O
to/O see/O her/O./O He/O examined/O the/O wrist/O,/O said/O it/O was/O not/O broken/O,/O was/O delighted/O
at/O a/O chance/O of/O talking/O to/O the/O celebrated/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON Koznishev/PERSON,/O
and/O to/O show/O his/O advanced/O views/O of/O things/O told/O him/O all/O the/O scandal/O of/O the/O
district/O,/O complaining/O of/O the/O poor/O state/O into/O which/O the/O district/O council/O
had/O fallen/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON listened/O attentively/O,/O asked/O him/O questions/O,/O
and/O,/O roused/O by/O a/O new/O listener/O,/O he/O talked/O fluently/O,/O uttered/O a/O few/O keen/O
and/O weighty/O observations/O,/O respectfully/O appreciated/O by/O the/O young/O doctor/O,/O
and/O was/O soon/O in/O that/O eager/O frame/O of/O mind/O his/O brother/O knew/O so/O well/O,/O which/O
always/O,/O with/O him/O,/O followed/O a/O brilliant/O and/O eager/O conversation/O./O After/O the/O
departure/O of/O the/O doctor/O,/O he/O wanted/O to/O go/O with/O a/O fishing/O rod/O to/O the/O
river/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O fond/O of/O angling/O,/O and/O was/O,/O it/O seemed/O,/O proud/O
of/O being/O able/O to/O care/O for/O such/O a/O stupid/O occupation/O./O

Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O whose/O presence/O was/O needed/O in/O the/O plough/O land/O and/O
meadows/O,/O had/O come/O to/O take/O his/O brother/O in/O the/O trap/O./O

It/O was/O that/O time/O of/O the/O year/O,/O the/O turning-point/O of/O summer/O,/O when/O the/O
crops/O of/O the/O present/O year/O are/O a/O certainty/O,/O when/O one/O begins/O to/O think/O of/O
the/O sowing/O for/O next/O year/O,/O and/O the/O mowing/O is/O at/O hand/O;/O when/O the/O rye/O is/O all/O
in/O ear/O,/O though/O its/O ears/O are/O still/O light/O,/O not/O yet/O full/O,/O and/O it/O waves/O in/O
gray-green/O billows/O in/O the/O wind/O;/O when/O the/O green/O oats/O,/O with/O tufts/O of/O
yellow/O grass/O scattered/O here/O and/O there/O among/O it/O,/O droop/O irregularly/O over/O
the/O late-sown/O fields/O;/O when/O the/O early/O buckwheat/O is/O already/O out/O and/O hiding/O
the/O ground/O;/O when/O the/O fallow/O lands/O,/O trodden/O hard/O as/O stone/O by/O the/O cattle/O,/O
are/O half/O ploughed/O over/O,/O with/O paths/O left/O untouched/O by/O the/O plough/O;/O when/O
from/O the/O dry/O dung-heaps/O carted/O onto/O the/O fields/O there/O comes/O at/O sunset/O a/O
smell/O of/O manure/O mixed/O with/O meadow-sweet/O,/O and/O on/O the/O low-lying/O lands/O the/O
riverside/O meadows/O are/O a/O thick/O sea/O of/O grass/O waiting/O for/O the/O mowing/O,/O with/O
blackened/O heaps/O of/O the/O stalks/O of/O sorrel/O among/O it/O./O

It/O was/O the/O time/O when/O there/O comes/O a/O brief/O pause/O in/O the/O toil/O of/O the/O fields/O
before/O the/O beginning/O of/O the/O labors/O of/O harvest/O--/Oevery/O year/O recurring/O,/O
every/O year/O straining/O every/O nerve/O of/O the/O peasants/O./O The/O crop/O was/O a/O
splendid/O one/O,/O and/O bright/O,/O hot/O summer/O days/O had/O set/O in/O with/O short/O,/O dewy/O
nights/O./O

The/O brothers/O had/O to/O drive/O through/O the/O woods/O to/O reach/O the/O meadows/O./O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O all/O the/O while/O admiring/O the/O beauty/O of/O the/O woods/O,/O which/O
were/O a/O tangled/O mass/O of/O leaves/O,/O pointing/O out/O to/O his/O brother/O now/O an/O old/O
lime/O tree/O on/O the/O point/O of/O flowering/O,/O dark/O on/O the/O shady/O side/O,/O and/O
brightly/O spotted/O with/O yellow/O stipules/O,/O now/O the/O young/O shoots/O of/O this/O
year/O's/O saplings/O brilliant/O with/O emerald/O./O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON did/O not/O like/O
talking/O and/O hearing/O about/O the/O beauty/O of/O nature/O./O Words/O for/O him/O took/O away/O
the/O beauty/O of/O what/O he/O saw/O./O He/O assented/O to/O what/O his/O brother/O said/O,/O but/O he/O
could/O not/O help/O beginning/O to/O think/O of/O other/O things/O./O When/O they/O came/O out/O of/O
the/O woods/O,/O all/O his/O attention/O was/O engrossed/O by/O the/O view/O of/O the/O fallow/O
land/O on/O the/O upland/O,/O in/O parts/O yellow/O with/O grass/O,/O in/O parts/O trampled/O and/O
checkered/O with/O furrows/O,/O in/O parts/O dotted/O with/O ridges/O of/O dung/O,/O and/O in/O
parts/O even/O ploughed/O./O A/O string/O of/O carts/O was/O moving/O across/O it/O./O Levin/PERSON
counted/O the/O carts/O,/O and/O was/O pleased/O that/O all/O that/O were/O wanted/O had/O been/O
brought/O,/O and/O at/O the/O sight/O of/O the/O meadows/O his/O thoughts/O passed/O to/O the/O
mowing/O./O He/O always/O felt/O something/O special/O moving/O him/O to/O the/O quick/O at/O the/O
hay-making/O./O On/O reaching/O the/O meadow/O Levin/PERSON stopped/O the/O horse/O./O

The/O morning/O dew/O was/O still/O lying/O on/O the/O thick/O undergrowth/O of/O the/O grass/O,/O
and/O that/O he/O might/O not/O get/O his/O feet/O wet/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON asked/O his/O
brother/O to/O drive/O him/O in/O the/O trap/O up/O to/O the/O willow/O tree/O from/O which/O the/O
carp/O was/O caught/O./O Sorry/O as/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON was/O to/O crush/O down/O his/O mowing/O
grass/O,/O he/O drove/O him/O into/O the/O meadow/O./O The/O high/O grass/O softly/O turned/O about/O
the/O wheels/O and/O the/O horse/O's/O legs/O,/O leaving/O its/O seeds/O clinging/O to/O the/O wet/O
axles/O and/O spokes/O of/O the/O wheels/O./O His/O brother/O seated/O himself/O under/O a/O bush/O,/O
arranging/O his/O tackle/O,/O while/O Levin/PERSON led/O the/O horse/O away/O,/O fastened/O him/O up/O,/O
and/O walked/O into/O the/O vast/O gray-green/O sea/O of/O grass/O unstirred/O by/O the/O wind/O./O
The/O silky/O grass/O with/O its/O ripe/O seeds/O came/O almost/O to/O his/O waist/O in/O the/O
dampest/O spots/O./O

Crossing/O the/O meadow/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON came/O out/O onto/O the/O road/O,/O and/O met/O an/O
old/O man/O with/O a/O swollen/O eye/O,/O carrying/O a/O skep/O on/O his/O shoulder/O./O

``/OWhat/O?/O taken/O a/O stray/O swarm/O,/O Fomitch/PERSON?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O indeed/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrich/PERSON!/O All/O we/O can/O do/O to/O keep/O our/O own/O!/O This/O is/O
the/O second/O swarm/O that/O has/O flown/O away/O.../O./O Luckily/O the/O lads/O caught/O them/O./O
They/O were/O ploughing/O your/O field/O./O They/O unyoked/O the/O horses/O and/O galloped/O
after/O them/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O do/O you/O say/O,/O Fomitch/PERSON--/Ostart/O mowing/O or/O wait/O a/O bit/O?/O''/O

``/OEh/O,/O well/O./O Our/O way/O's/O to/O wait/O till/O St./O Peter/PERSON's/O Day/O./O But/O you/O always/O mow/O
sooner/O./O Well/O,/O to/O be/O sure/O,/O please/O God/O,/O the/O hay/O's/O good/O./O There/O'll/O be/O plenty/O
for/O the/O beasts/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O think/O about/O the/O weather/O?/O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O in/O God/O's/O hands/O./O Maybe/O it/O will/O be/O fine/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON went/O up/O to/O his/O brother/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON had/O caught/O nothing/O,/O but/O he/O was/O not/O bored/O,/O and/O seemed/O
in/O the/O most/O cheerful/O frame/O of/O mind/O./O Levin/PERSON saw/O that/O,/O stimulated/O by/O his/O
conversation/O with/O the/O doctor/O,/O he/O wanted/O to/O talk/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O on/O the/O other/O
hand/O,/O would/O have/O liked/O to/O get/O home/O as/O soon/O as/O possible/O to/O give/O orders/O
about/O getting/O together/O the/O mowers/O for/O next/O day/O,/O and/O to/O set/O at/O rest/O his/O
doubts/O about/O the/O mowing/O,/O which/O greatly/O absorbed/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O let/O's/O be/O going/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OWhy/O be/O in/O such/O a/O hurry/O?/O Let/O's/O stay/O a/O little/O./O But/O how/O wet/O you/O are/O!/O Even/O
though/O one/O catches/O nothing/O,/O it/O's/O nice/O./O That/O's/O the/O best/O thing/O about/O every/O
part/O of/O sport/O,/O that/O one/O has/O to/O do/O with/O nature/O./O How/O exquisite/O this/O steely/O
water/O is/O!/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O ``/OThese/O riverside/O banks/O always/O remind/O
me/O of/O the/O riddle/O--/Odo/O you/O know/O it/O?/O `/OThe/O grass/O says/O to/O the/O water/O:/O we/O quiver/O
and/O we/O quiver/O./O'/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O the/O riddle/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON wearily/O./O



Chapter/O 3/O


``/ODo/O you/O know/O,/O I/O've/O been/O thinking/O about/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O
``/OIt/O's/O beyond/O everything/O what/O's/O being/O done/O in/O the/O district/O,/O according/O to/O
what/O this/O doctor/O tells/O me/O./O He/O's/O a/O very/O intelligent/O fellow/O./O And/O as/O I/O've/O
told/O you/O before/O,/O I/O tell/O you/O again/O:/O it/O's/O not/O right/O for/O you/O not/O to/O go/O to/O
the/O meetings/O,/O and/O altogether/O to/O keep/O out/O of/O the/O district/O business/O./O If/O
decent/O people/O wo/On't/O go/O into/O it/O,/O of/O course/O it/O's/O bound/O to/O go/O all/O wrong/O./O We/O
pay/O the/O money/O,/O and/O it/O all/O goes/O in/O salaries/O,/O and/O there/O are/O no/O schools/O,/O
nor/O district/O nurses/O,/O nor/O midwives/O,/O nor/O drugstores/O--/Onothing/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O did/O try/O,/O you/O know/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O slowly/O and/O unwillingly/O./O ``/OI/O
ca/On't/O!/O and/O so/O there/O's/O no/O help/O for/O it/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O why/O ca/On't/O you/O?/O I/O must/O own/O I/O ca/On't/O make/O it/O out/O./O Indifference/O,/O
incapacity/O--/OI/O wo/On't/O admit/O;/O surely/O it/O's/O not/O simply/O laziness/O?/O''/O

``/ONone/O of/O those/O things/O./O I/O've/O tried/O,/O and/O I/O see/O I/O can/O do/O nothing/O,/O''/O said/O
Levin/PERSON./O

He/O had/O hardly/O grasped/O what/O his/O brother/O was/O saying/O./O Looking/O towards/O the/O
plough/O land/O across/O the/O river/O,/O he/O made/O out/O something/O black/O,/O but/O he/O could/O
not/O distinguish/O whether/O it/O was/O a/O horse/O or/O the/O bailiff/O on/O horseback/O./O

``/OWhy/O is/O it/O you/O can/O do/O nothing/O?/O You/O made/O an/O attempt/O and/O did/On't/O succeed/O,/O
as/O you/O think/O,/O and/O you/O give/O in/O./O How/O can/O you/O have/O so/O little/O self-respect/O?/O''/O

``/OSelf-respect/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O stung/O to/O the/O quick/O by/O his/O brother/O's/O words/O;/O
``/OI/O do/On't/O understand/O./O If/O they/O'd/O told/O me/O at/O college/O that/O other/O people/O
understood/O the/O integral/O calculus/O,/O and/O I/O did/On't/O,/O then/O pride/O would/O have/O
come/O in/O./O But/O in/O this/O case/O one/O wants/O first/O to/O be/O convinced/O that/O one/O has/O
certain/O qualifications/O for/O this/O sort/O of/O business/O,/O and/O especially/O that/O
all/O this/O business/O is/O of/O great/O importance/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O!/O do/O you/O mean/O to/O say/O it/O's/O not/O of/O importance/O?/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O stung/O to/O the/O quick/O too/O at/O his/O brother/O's/O considering/O anything/O
of/O no/O importance/O that/O interested/O him/O,/O and/O still/O more/O at/O his/O obviously/O
paying/O little/O attention/O to/O what/O he/O was/O saying/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O think/O it/O important/O;/O it/O does/O not/O take/O hold/O of/O me/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O help/O
it/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O making/O out/O that/O what/O he/O saw/O was/O the/O bailiff/O,/O and/O
that/O the/O bailiff/O seemed/O to/O be/O letting/O the/O peasants/O go/O off/O the/O ploughed/O
land/O./O They/O were/O turning/O the/O plough/O over/O./O ``/OCan/O they/O have/O finished/O
ploughing/O?/O''/O he/O wondered/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O really/O though/O,/O''/O said/O the/O elder/O brother/O,/O with/O a/O frown/O on/O his/O
handsome/O,/O clever/O face/O,/O ``/Othere/O's/O a/O limit/O to/O everything/O./O It/O's/O very/O well/O to/O
be/O original/O and/O genuine/O,/O and/O to/O dislike/O everything/O conventional/O--/OI/O know/O
all/O about/O that/O;/O but/O really/O,/O what/O you/O're/O saying/O either/O has/O no/O meaning/O,/O or/O
it/O has/O a/O very/O wrong/O meaning/O./O How/O can/O you/O think/O it/O a/O matter/O of/O no/O
importance/O whether/O the/O peasant/O,/O whom/O you/O love/O as/O you/O assert/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O never/O did/O assert/O it/O,/O''/O thought/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON./O

''/O.../O dies/O without/O help/O?/O The/O ignorant/O peasant-women/O starve/O the/O children/O,/O
and/O the/O people/O stagnate/O in/O darkness/O,/O and/O are/O helpless/O in/O the/O hands/O of/O
every/O village/O clerk/O,/O while/O you/O have/O at/O your/O disposal/O a/O means/O of/O helping/O
them/O,/O and/O do/On't/O help/O them/O because/O to/O your/O mind/O it/O's/O of/O no/O importance/O./O''/O

And/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON put/O before/O him/O the/O alternative/O:/O either/O you/O are/O so/O
undeveloped/O that/O you/O ca/On't/O see/O all/O that/O you/O can/O do/O,/O or/O you/O wo/On't/O
sacrifice/O your/O ease/O,/O your/O vanity/O,/O or/O whatever/O it/O is/O,/O to/O do/O it/O./O

Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON felt/O that/O there/O was/O no/O course/O open/O to/O him/O but/O to/O
submit/O,/O or/O to/O confess/O to/O a/O lack/O of/O zeal/O for/O the/O public/O good/O./O And/O this/O
mortified/O him/O and/O hurt/O his/O feelings/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O both/O,/O''/O he/O said/O resolutely/O:/O ``/OI/O do/On't/O see/O that/O it/O was/O possible/O.../O''/O

``/OWhat/O!/O was/O it/O impossible/O,/O if/O the/O money/O were/O properly/O laid/O out/O,/O to/O
provide/O medical/O aid/O?/O''/O

``/OImpossible/O,/O as/O it/O seems/O to/O me/O.../O./O For/O the/O three/O thousand/O square/O miles/O
of/O our/O district/O,/O what/O with/O our/O thaws/O,/O and/O the/O storms/O,/O and/O the/O work/O in/O
the/O fields/O,/O I/O do/On't/O see/O how/O it/O is/O possible/O to/O provide/O medical/O aid/O all/O
over/O./O And/O besides/O,/O I/O do/On't/O believe/O in/O medicine/O./O''/O
