``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O that/O's/O unfair/O .../O I/O can/O quote/O to/O you/O thousands/O of/O
instances/O.../O./O But/O the/O schools/O,/O anyway/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O have/O schools/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O mean/O?/O Can/O there/O be/O two/O opinions/O of/O the/O advantage/O of/O
education/O?/O If/O it/O's/O a/O good/O thing/O for/O you/O,/O it/O's/O a/O good/O thing/O for/O
everyone/O./O''/O

Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON felt/O himself/O morally/O pinned/O against/O a/O wall/O,/O and/O so/O he/O
got/O hot/O,/O and/O unconsciously/O blurted/O out/O the/O chief/O cause/O of/O his/O
indifference/O to/O public/O business/O./O

``/OPerhaps/O it/O may/O all/O be/O very/O good/O;/O but/O why/O should/O I/O worry/O myself/O about/O
establishing/O dispensaries/O which/O I/O shall/O never/O make/O use/O of/O,/O and/O schools/O
to/O which/O I/O shall/O never/O send/O my/O children/O,/O to/O which/O even/O the/O peasants/O
do/On't/O want/O to/O send/O their/O children/O,/O and/O to/O which/O I/O've/O no/O very/O firm/O faith/O
that/O they/O ought/O to/O send/O them/O?/O''/O said/O he/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O for/O a/O minute/O surprised/O at/O this/O unexpected/O view/O of/O
the/O subject/O;/O but/O he/O promptly/O made/O a/O new/O plan/O of/O attack/O./O He/O was/O silent/O
for/O a/O little/O,/O drew/O out/O a/O hook/O,/O threw/O it/O in/O again/O,/O and/O turned/O to/O his/O
brother/O smiling/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O now/O.../O./O In/O the/O first/O place/O,/O the/O dispensary/O is/O needed/O./O We/O
ourselves/O sent/O for/O the/O district/O doctor/O for/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O but/O I/O fancy/O her/O wrist/O will/O never/O be/O straight/O again/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O remains/O to/O be/O proved/O.../O./O Next/O,/O the/O peasant/O who/O can/O read/O and/O write/O
is/O as/O a/O workman/O of/O more/O use/O and/O value/O to/O you/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O you/O can/O ask/O anyone/O you/O like/O,/O''/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON answered/O with/O
decision/O,/O ``/Othe/O man/O that/O can/O read/O and/O write/O is/O much/O inferior/O as/O a/O
workman/O./O And/O mending/O the/O highroads/O is/O an/O impossibility/O;/O and/O as/O soon/O as/O
they/O put/O up/O bridges/O they/O're/O stolen/O./O''/O

``/OStill/O,/O that/O's/O not/O the/O point/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O frowning/O./O He/O
disliked/O contradiction/O,/O and/O still/O more/O,/O arguments/O that/O were/O continually/O
skipping/O from/O one/O thing/O to/O another/O,/O introducing/O new/O and/O disconnected/O
points/O,/O so/O that/O there/O was/O no/O knowing/O to/O which/O to/O reply/O./O ``/ODo/O you/O admit/O
that/O education/O is/O a/O benefit/O for/O the/O people/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O admit/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON without/O thinking/O,/O and/O he/O was/O conscious/O
immediately/O that/O he/O had/O said/O what/O he/O did/O not/O think/O./O He/O felt/O that/O if/O he/O
admitted/O that/O,/O it/O would/O be/O proved/O that/O he/O had/O been/O talking/O meaningless/O
rubbish/O./O How/O it/O would/O be/O proved/O he/O could/O not/O tell/O,/O but/O he/O knew/O that/O this/O
would/O inevitably/O be/O logically/O proved/O to/O him/O,/O and/O he/O awaited/O the/O proofs/O./O

The/O argument/O turned/O out/O to/O be/O far/O simpler/O than/O he/O had/O expected/O./O

``/OIf/O you/O admit/O that/O it/O is/O a/O benefit/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O ``/Othen/O,/O as/O
an/O honest/O man/O,/O you/O can/Onot/O help/O caring/O about/O it/O and/O sympathizing/O with/O the/O
movement/O,/O and/O so/O wishing/O to/O work/O for/O it/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O still/O do/O not/O admit/O this/O movement/O to/O be/O just/O,/O''/O said/O Konstantin/PERSON
Levin/PERSON,/O reddening/O a/O little/O./O

``/OWhat/O!/O But/O you/O said/O just/O now/O.../O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O to/O say/O,/O I/O do/On't/O admit/O it/O's/O being/O either/O good/O or/O possible/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O you/O ca/On't/O tell/O without/O making/O the/O trial/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O supposing/O that/O's/O so/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O though/O he/O did/O not/O suppose/O so/O at/O
all/O,/O ``/Osupposing/O that/O is/O so/O,/O still/O I/O do/On't/O see/O,/O all/O the/O same/O,/O what/O I/O'm/O to/O
worry/O myself/O about/O it/O for/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O so/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O since/O we/O are/O talking/O,/O explain/O it/O to/O me/O from/O the/O philosophical/O point/O
of/O view/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O see/O where/O philosophy/O comes/O in/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O in/O a/O
tone/O,/O Levin/PERSON fancied/O,/O as/O though/O he/O did/O not/O admit/O his/O brother/O's/O right/O to/O
talk/O about/O philosophy/O./O And/O that/O irritated/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OI/O'll/O tell/O you/O,/O then/O,/O''/O he/O said/O with/O heat/O,/O ``/OI/O imagine/O the/O mainspring/O of/O
all/O our/O actions/O is/O,/O after/O all/O,/O self-interest/O./O Now/O in/O the/O local/O
institutions/O I/O,/O as/O a/O nobleman/O,/O see/O nothing/O that/O could/O conduce/O to/O my/O
prosperity/O,/O and/O the/O roads/O are/O not/O better/O and/O could/O not/O be/O better/O;/O my/O
horses/O carry/O me/O well/O enough/O over/O bad/O ones/O./O Doctors/O and/O dispensaries/O are/O
no/O use/O to/O me/O./O An/O arbitrator/O of/O disputes/O is/O no/O use/O to/O me/O./O I/O never/O appeal/O
to/O him/O,/O and/O never/O shall/O appeal/O to/O him/O./O The/O schools/O are/O no/O good/O to/O me/O,/O
but/O positively/O harmful/O,/O as/O I/O told/O you/O./O For/O me/O the/O district/O institutions/O
simply/O mean/O the/O liability/O to/O pay/O fourpence/O halfpenny/O for/O every/O three/O
acres/O,/O to/O drive/O into/O the/O town/O,/O sleep/O with/O bugs/O,/O and/O listen/O to/O all/O sorts/O
of/O idiocy/O and/O loathsomeness/O,/O and/O self-interest/O offers/O me/O no/O inducement/O./O''/O

``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O''/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON interposed/O with/O a/O smile/O,/O ``/Oself-interest/O
did/O not/O induce/O us/O to/O work/O for/O the/O emancipation/O of/O the/O serfs/O,/O but/O we/O did/O
work/O for/O it/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O!/O''/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON broke/O in/O with/O still/O greater/O heat/O;/O ``/Othe/O
emancipation/O of/O the/O serfs/O was/O a/O different/O matter/O./O There/O self-interest/O
did/O come/O in/O./O One/O longed/O to/O throw/O off/O that/O yoke/O that/O crushed/O us/O,/O all/O
decent/O people/O among/O us/O./O But/O to/O be/O a/O town/O councilor/O and/O discuss/O how/O many/O
dustmen/O are/O needed/O,/O and/O how/O chimneys/O shall/O be/O constructed/O in/O the/O town/O in/O
which/O I/O do/On't/O live/O--/Oto/O serve/O on/O a/O jury/O and/O try/O a/O peasant/O who/O's/O stolen/O a/O
flitch/O of/O bacon/O,/O and/O listen/O for/O six/O hours/O at/O a/O stretch/O to/O all/O sorts/O of/O
jabber/O from/O the/O counsel/O for/O the/O defense/O and/O the/O prosecution/O,/O and/O the/O
president/O cross-examining/O my/O old/O half-witted/O Alioshka/PERSON,/O `/ODo/O you/O admit/O,/O
prisoner/O in/O the/O dock/O,/O the/O fact/O of/O the/O removal/O of/O the/O bacon/O?/O'/O `/OEh/O?/O'/O''/O

Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON had/O warmed/O to/O his/O subject/O,/O and/O began/O mimicking/O the/O
president/O and/O the/O half-witted/O Alioshka/O:/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O it/O was/O all/O
to/O the/O point/O./O

But/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON shrugged/O his/O shoulders/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O do/O you/O mean/O to/O say/O,/O then/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O simply/O mean/O to/O say/O that/O those/O rights/O that/O touch/O me/O .../O my/O interest/O,/O I/O
shall/O always/O defend/O to/O the/O best/O of/O my/O ability/O;/O that/O when/O they/O made/O raids/O
on/O us/O students/O,/O and/O the/O police/O read/O our/O letters/O,/O I/O was/O ready/O to/O defend/O
those/O rights/O to/O the/O utmost/O,/O to/O defend/O my/O rights/O to/O education/O and/O
freedom/O./O I/O can/O understand/O compulsory/O military/O service/O,/O which/O affects/O my/O
children/O,/O my/O brothers/O,/O and/O myself/O,/O I/O am/O ready/O to/O deliberate/O on/O what/O
concerns/O me/O;/O but/O deliberating/O on/O how/O to/O spend/O forty/O thousand/O roubles/O of/O
district/O council/O money/O,/O or/O judging/O the/O half-witted/O Alioshka/O--/OI/O do/On't/O
understand/O,/O and/O I/O ca/On't/O do/O it/O./O''/O

Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON spoke/O as/O though/O the/O floodgates/O of/O his/O speech/O had/O burst/O
open/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON smiled/O./O

``/OBut/O tomorrow/O it/O'll/O be/O your/O turn/O to/O be/O tried/O;/O would/O it/O have/O suited/O your/O
tastes/O better/O to/O be/O tried/O in/O the/O old/O criminal/O tribunal/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O going/O to/O be/O tried/O./O I/O sha/On't/O murder/O anybody/O,/O and/O I/O've/O no/O need/O of/O
it/O./O Well/O,/O I/O tell/O you/O what/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O flying/O off/O again/O to/O a/O subject/O
quite/O beside/O the/O point/O,/O ``/Oour/O district/O self-government/O and/O all/O the/O rest/O
of/O it/O--/Oit/O's/O just/O like/O the/O birch/O branches/O we/O stick/O in/O the/O ground/O on/O
Trinity/O Day/O,/O for/O instance/O,/O to/O look/O like/O a/O copse/O which/O has/O grown/O up/O of/O
itself/O in/O Europe/LOCATION,/O and/O I/O ca/On't/O gush/O over/O these/O birch/O branches/O and/O believe/O
in/O them/O./O''/O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON merely/O shrugged/O his/O shoulders/O,/O as/O though/O to/O express/O
his/O wonder/O how/O the/O birch/O branches/O had/O come/O into/O their/O argument/O at/O that/O
point/O,/O though/O he/O did/O really/O understand/O at/O once/O what/O his/O brother/O meant/O./O

``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O but/O you/O know/O one/O really/O ca/On't/O argue/O in/O that/O way/O,/O''/O he/O
observed/O./O

But/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON wanted/O to/O justify/O himself/O for/O the/O failing/O,/O of/O which/O
he/O was/O conscious/O,/O of/O lack/O of/O zeal/O for/O the/O public/O welfare/O,/O and/O he/O went/O
on/O./O

``/OI/O imagine/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/Othat/O no/O sort/O of/O activity/O is/O likely/O to/O be/O lasting/O
if/O it/O is/O not/O founded/O on/O self-interest/O,/O that/O's/O a/O universal/O principle/O,/O a/O
philosophical/O principle/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O repeating/O the/O word/O ``/Ophilosophical/O''/O
with/O determination/O,/O as/O though/O wishing/O to/O show/O that/O he/O had/O as/O much/O right/O
as/O any/O one/O else/O to/O talk/O of/O philosophy/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON smiled/O./O ``/OHe/O too/O has/O a/O philosophy/O of/O his/O own/O at/O the/O
service/O of/O his/O natural/O tendencies/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O you/O'd/O better/O let/O philosophy/O alone/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OThe/O chief/O problem/O
of/O the/O philosophy/O of/O all/O ages/O consists/O just/O in/O finding/O the/O indispensable/O
connection/O which/O exists/O between/O individual/O and/O social/O interests/O./O But/O
that/O's/O not/O to/O the/O point/O;/O what/O is/O to/O the/O point/O is/O a/O correction/O I/O must/O
make/O in/O your/O comparison/O./O The/O birches/O are/O not/O simply/O stuck/O in/O,/O but/O some/O
are/O sown/O and/O some/O are/O planted/O,/O and/O one/O must/O deal/O carefully/O with/O them/O./O
It/O's/O only/O those/O peoples/O that/O have/O an/O intuitive/O sense/O of/O what/O's/O of/O
importance/O and/O significance/O in/O their/O institutions/O,/O and/O know/O how/O to/O value/O
them/O,/O that/O have/O a/O future/O before/O them/O--/Oit/O's/O only/O those/O peoples/O that/O one/O
can/O truly/O call/O historical/O./O''/O

And/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON carried/O the/O subject/O into/O the/O regions/O of/O
philosophical/O history/O where/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON could/O not/O follow/O him/O,/O and/O
showed/O him/O all/O the/O incorrectness/O of/O his/O view/O./O

``/OAs/O for/O your/O dislike/O of/O it/O,/O excuse/O my/O saying/O so/O,/O that/O's/O simply/O our/O
Russian/O sloth/O and/O old/O serf-owner/O's/O ways/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O convinced/O that/O in/O you/O
it/O's/O a/O temporary/O error/O and/O will/O pass/O./O''/O

Konstantin/PERSON was/O silent/O./O He/O felt/O himself/O vanquished/O on/O all/O sides/O,/O but/O he/O
felt/O at/O the/O same/O time/O that/O what/O he/O wanted/O to/O say/O was/O unintelligible/O to/O
his/O brother/O./O Only/O he/O could/O not/O make/O up/O his/O mind/O whether/O it/O was/O
unintelligible/O because/O he/O was/O not/O capable/O of/O expressing/O his/O meaning/O
clearly/O,/O or/O because/O his/O brother/O would/O not/O or/O could/O not/O understand/O him/O./O
But/O he/O did/O not/O pursue/O the/O speculation/O,/O and/O without/O replying/O,/O he/O fell/O to/O
musing/O on/O a/O quite/O different/O and/O personal/O matter/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON wound/O up/O the/O last/O line/O,/O untied/O the/O horse/O,/O and/O they/O
drove/O off/O./O



Chapter/O 4/O


The/O personal/O matter/O that/O absorbed/O Levin/PERSON during/O his/O conversation/O with/O his/O
brother/O was/O this/O./O Once/O in/O a/O previous/O year/O he/O had/O gone/O to/O look/O at/O the/O
mowing/O,/O and/O being/O made/O very/O angry/O by/O the/O bailiff/O he/O had/O recourse/O to/O his/O
favorite/O means/O for/O regaining/O his/O temper/O,/O--/Ohe/O took/O a/O scythe/O from/O a/O peasant/O
and/O began/O mowing/O./O

He/O liked/O the/O work/O so/O much/O that/O he/O had/O several/O times/O tried/O his/O hand/O at/O
mowing/O since/O./O He/O had/O cut/O the/O whole/O of/O the/O meadow/O in/O front/O of/O his/O house/O,/O
and/O this/O year/O ever/O since/O the/O early/O spring/O he/O had/O cherished/O a/O plan/O for/O
mowing/O for/O whole/O days/O together/O with/O the/O peasants/O./O Ever/O since/O his/O
brother/O's/O arrival/O,/O he/O had/O been/O in/O doubt/O whether/O to/O mow/O or/O not/O./O He/O was/O
loath/O to/O leave/O his/O brother/O alone/O all/O day/O long/O,/O and/O he/O was/O afraid/O his/O
brother/O would/O laugh/O at/O him/O about/O it/O./O But/O as/O he/O drove/O into/O the/O meadow/O,/O
and/O recalled/O the/O sensations/O of/O mowing/O,/O he/O came/O near/O deciding/O that/O he/O
would/O go/O mowing/O./O After/O the/O irritating/O discussion/O with/O his/O brother/O,/O he/O
pondered/O over/O this/O intention/O again/O./O

``/OI/O must/O have/O physical/O exercise/O,/O or/O my/O temper/O'll/O certainly/O be/O ruined/O,/O''/O he/O
thought/O,/O and/O he/O determined/O he/O would/O go/O mowing/O,/O however/O awkward/O he/O might/O
feel/O about/O it/O with/O his/O brother/O or/O the/O peasants/O./O

Towards/O evening/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON went/O to/O his/O counting/O house/O,/O gave/O
directions/O as/O to/O the/O work/O to/O be/O done/O,/O and/O sent/O about/O the/O village/O to/O
summon/O the/O mowers/O for/O the/O morrow/O,/O to/O cut/O the/O hay/O in/O Kalinov/LOCATION meadow/O,/O the/O
largest/O and/O best/O of/O his/O grass/O lands/O./O

``/OAnd/O send/O my/O scythe/O,/O please/O,/O to/O Tit/O,/O for/O him/O to/O set/O it/O,/O and/O bring/O it/O
round/O tomorrow/O./O I/O shall/O maybe/O do/O some/O mowing/O myself/O too/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
trying/O not/O to/O be/O embarrassed/O./O

The/O bailiff/O smiled/O and/O said/O:/O ``/OYes/O,/O sir/O./O''/O

At/O tea/O the/O same/O evening/O Levin/PERSON said/O to/O his/O brother/O:/O

``/OI/O fancy/O the/O fine/O weather/O will/O last/O./O Tomorrow/O I/O shall/O start/O mowing/O./O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O so/O fond/O of/O that/O form/O of/O field/O labor/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OI/O'm/O awfully/O fond/O of/O it/O./O I/O sometimes/O mow/O myself/O with/O the/O peasants/O,/O and/O
tomorrow/O I/O want/O to/O try/O mowing/O the/O whole/O day/O./O''/O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON lifted/O his/O head/O,/O and/O looked/O with/O interest/O at/O his/O
brother/O./O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O mean/O?/O Just/O like/O one/O of/O the/O peasants/O,/O all/O day/O long/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O very/O pleasant/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OIt/O's/O splendid/O as/O exercise/O,/O only/O you/O'll/O hardly/O be/O able/O to/O stand/O it/O,/O''/O
said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O without/O a/O shade/O of/O irony/O./O

``/OI/O've/O tried/O it/O./O It/O's/O hard/O work/O at/O first/O,/O but/O you/O get/O into/O it/O./O I/O dare/O say/O
I/O shall/O manage/O to/O keep/O it/O up/O.../O''/O

``/OReally/O!/O what/O an/O idea/O!/O But/O tell/O me/O,/O how/O do/O the/O peasants/O look/O at/O it/O?/O I/O
suppose/O they/O laugh/O in/O their/O sleeves/O at/O their/O master/O's/O being/O such/O a/O queer/O
fish/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O do/On't/O think/O so/O;/O but/O it/O's/O so/O delightful/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O such/O
hard/O work/O,/O that/O one/O has/O no/O time/O to/O think/O about/O it/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O how/O will/O you/O do/O about/O dining/O with/O them/O?/O To/O send/O you/O a/O bottle/O of/O
Lafitte/PERSON and/O roast/O turkey/O out/O there/O would/O be/O a/O little/O awkward/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'll/O simply/O come/O home/O at/O the/O time/O of/O their/O noonday/O rest/O./O''/O

Next/O morning/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON got/O up/O earlier/O than/O usual/O,/O but/O he/O was/O
detained/O giving/O directions/O on/O the/O farm/O,/O and/O when/O he/O reached/O the/O mowing/O
grass/O the/O mowers/O were/O already/O at/O their/O second/O row/O./O

From/O the/O uplands/O he/O could/O get/O a/O view/O of/O the/O shaded/O cut/O part/O of/O the/O
meadow/O below/O,/O with/O its/O grayish/O ridges/O of/O cut/O grass/O,/O and/O the/O black/O heaps/O
of/O coats/O,/O taken/O off/O by/O the/O mowers/O at/O the/O place/O from/O which/O they/O had/O
started/O cutting/O./O

Gradually/O,/O as/O he/O rode/O towards/O the/O meadow/O,/O the/O peasants/O came/O into/O sight/O,/O
some/O in/O coats/O,/O some/O in/O their/O shirts/O mowing/O,/O one/O behind/O another/O in/O a/O long/O
string/O,/O swinging/O their/O scythes/O differently/O./O He/O counted/O forty-two/O of/O
them/O./O

They/O were/O mowing/O slowly/O over/O the/O uneven/O,/O low-lying/O parts/O of/O the/O meadow/O,/O
where/O there/O had/O been/O an/O old/O dam/O./O Levin/PERSON recognized/O some/O of/O his/O own/O men/O./O
Here/O was/O old/O Yermil/PERSON in/O a/O very/O long/O white/O smock/O,/O bending/O forward/O to/O swing/O
a/O scythe/O;/O there/O was/O a/O young/O fellow/O,/O Vaska/PERSON,/O who/O had/O been/O a/O coachman/O of/O
Levin/PERSON's/O,/O taking/O every/O row/O with/O a/O wide/O sweep/O./O Here/O,/O too/O,/O was/O Tit/O,/O Levin/PERSON's/O
preceptor/O in/O the/O art/O of/O mowing/O,/O a/O thin/O little/O peasant/O./O He/O was/O in/O front/O
of/O all/O,/O and/O cut/O his/O wide/O row/O without/O bending/O,/O as/O though/O playing/O with/O the/O
scythe/O./O

Levin/PERSON got/O off/O his/O mare/O,/O and/O fastening/O her/O up/O by/O the/O roadside/O went/O to/O
meet/O Tit/O,/O who/O took/O a/O second/O scythe/O out/O of/O a/O bush/O and/O gave/O it/O to/O him/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O ready/O,/O sir/O;/O it/O's/O like/O a/O razor/O,/O cuts/O of/O itself/O,/O''/O said/O Tit/O,/O taking/O
off/O his/O cap/O with/O a/O smile/O and/O giving/O him/O the/O scythe/O./O

Levin/PERSON took/O the/O scythe/O,/O and/O began/O trying/O it/O./O As/O they/O finished/O their/O rows/O,/O
the/O mowers/O,/O hot/O and/O good-humored/O,/O came/O out/O into/O the/O road/O one/O after/O
another/O,/O and/O,/O laughing/O a/O little/O,/O greeted/O the/O master/O./O They/O all/O stared/O at/O
him/O,/O but/O no/O one/O made/O any/O remark/O,/O till/O a/O tall/O old/O man/O,/O with/O a/O wrinkled/O,/O
beardless/O face/O,/O wearing/O a/O short/O sheepskin/O jacket/O,/O came/O out/O into/O the/O road/O
and/O accosted/O him/O./O

``/OLook/O'/Oee/O now/O,/O master/O,/O once/O take/O hold/O of/O the/O rope/O there/O's/O no/O letting/O it/O
go/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON heard/O smothered/O laughter/O among/O the/O mowers/O./O

``/OI/O'll/O try/O not/O to/O let/O it/O go/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O taking/O his/O stand/O behind/O Tit/O,/O and/O
waiting/O for/O the/O time/O to/O begin/O./O

``/OMind/O'/Oee/O,/O''/O repeated/O the/O old/O man/O./O

Tit/O made/O room/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON started/O behind/O him/O./O The/O grass/O was/O short/O close/O
to/O the/O road/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON,/O who/O had/O not/O done/O any/O mowing/O for/O a/O long/O while/O,/O
and/O was/O disconcerted/O by/O the/O eyes/O fastened/O upon/O him/O,/O cut/O badly/O for/O the/O
first/O moments/O,/O though/O he/O swung/O his/O scythe/O vigorously/O./O Behind/O him/O he/O
heard/O voices/O:/O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O set/O right/O;/O handle/O's/O too/O high/O;/O see/O how/O he/O has/O to/O stoop/O to/O it/O,/O''/O
said/O one/O./O

``/OPress/O more/O on/O the/O heel/O,/O''/O said/O another/O./O

``/ONever/O mind/O,/O he/O'll/O get/O on/O all/O right/O,/O''/O the/O old/O man/O resumed/O./O

``/OHe/O's/O made/O a/O start/O.../O./O You/O swing/O it/O too/O wide/O,/O you/O'll/O tire/O yourself/O
out/O.../O./O The/O master/O,/O sure/O,/O does/O his/O best/O for/O himself/O!/O But/O see/O the/O grass/O
missed/O out/O!/O For/O such/O work/O us/O fellows/O would/O catch/O it/O!/O''/O

The/O grass/O became/O softer/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON,/O listening/O without/O answering/O,/O
followed/O Tit/O,/O trying/O to/O do/O the/O best/O he/O could/O./O They/O moved/O a/O hundred/O
paces/O./O Tit/O kept/O moving/O on/O,/O without/O stopping/O,/O not/O showing/O the/O slightest/O
weariness/O,/O but/O Levin/PERSON was/O already/O beginning/O to/O be/O afraid/O he/O would/O not/O be/O
able/O to/O keep/O it/O up/O:/O he/O was/O so/O tired/O./O

He/O felt/O as/O he/O swung/O his/O scythe/O that/O he/O was/O at/O the/O very/O end/O of/O his/O
strength/O,/O and/O was/O making/O up/O his/O mind/O to/O ask/O Tit/O to/O stop/O./O But/O at/O that/O
very/O moment/O Tit/O stopped/O of/O his/O own/O accord/O,/O and/O stooping/O down/O picked/O up/O
some/O grass/O,/O rubbed/O his/O scythe/O,/O and/O began/O whetting/O it/O./O Levin/PERSON straightened/O
himself/O,/O and/O drawing/O a/O deep/O breath/O looked/O round/O./O Behind/O him/O came/O a/O
peasant/O,/O and/O he/O too/O was/O evidently/O tired/O,/O for/O he/O stopped/O at/O once/O without/O
waiting/O to/O mow/O up/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O began/O whetting/O his/O scythe/O./O Tit/O sharpened/O
his/O scythe/O and/O Levin/PERSON's/O,/O and/O they/O went/O on/O./O The/O next/O time/O it/O was/O just/O the/O
same/O./O Tit/O moved/O on/O with/O sweep/O after/O sweep/O of/O his/O scythe/O,/O not/O stopping/O
nor/O showing/O signs/O of/O weariness/O./O Levin/PERSON followed/O him/O,/O trying/O not/O to/O get/O
left/O behind/O,/O and/O he/O found/O it/O harder/O and/O harder/O:/O the/O moment/O came/O when/O he/O
felt/O he/O had/O no/O strength/O left/O,/O but/O at/O that/O very/O moment/O Tit/O stopped/O and/O
whetted/O the/O scythes/O./O

So/O they/O mowed/O the/O first/O row/O./O And/O this/O long/O row/O seemed/O particularly/O hard/O
work/O to/O Levin/PERSON;/O but/O when/O the/O end/O was/O reached/O and/O Tit/O,/O shouldering/O his/O
scythe/O,/O began/O with/O deliberate/O stride/O returning/O on/O the/O tracks/O left/O by/O his/O
heels/O in/O the/O cut/O grass/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON walked/O back/O in/O the/O same/O way/O over/O the/O
space/O he/O had/O cut/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O sweat/O that/O ran/O in/O streams/O over/O his/O
face/O and/O fell/O in/O drops/O down/O his/O nose/O,/O and/O drenched/O his/O back/O as/O though/O he/O
had/O been/O soaked/O in/O water/O,/O he/O felt/O very/O happy/O./O What/O delighted/O him/O
particularly/O was/O that/O now/O he/O knew/O he/O would/O be/O able/O to/O hold/O out/O./O

His/O pleasure/O was/O only/O disturbed/O by/O his/O row/O not/O being/O well/O cut/O./O ``/OI/O will/O
swing/O less/O with/O my/O arm/O and/O more/O with/O my/O whole/O body/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O
comparing/O Tit/O's/O row/O,/O which/O looked/O as/O if/O it/O had/O been/O cut/O with/O a/O line/O,/O
with/O his/O own/O unevenly/O and/O irregularly/O lying/O grass/O./O

The/O first/O row/O,/O as/O Levin/PERSON noticed/O,/O Tit/O had/O mowed/O specially/O quickly/O,/O
probably/O wishing/O to/O put/O his/O master/O to/O the/O test/O,/O and/O the/O row/O happened/O to/O
be/O a/O long/O one/O./O The/O next/O rows/O were/O easier/O,/O but/O still/O Levin/PERSON had/O to/O strain/O
every/O nerve/O not/O to/O drop/O behind/O the/O peasants/O./O

He/O thought/O of/O nothing/O,/O wished/O for/O nothing/O,/O but/O not/O to/O be/O left/O behind/O the/O
peasants/O,/O and/O to/O do/O his/O work/O as/O well/O as/O possible/O./O He/O heard/O nothing/O but/O
the/O swish/O of/O scythes/O,/O and/O saw/O before/O him/O Tit/O's/O upright/O figure/O mowing/O
away/O,/O the/O crescent-shaped/O curve/O of/O the/O cut/O grass/O,/O the/O grass/O and/O flower/O
heads/O slowly/O and/O rhythmically/O falling/O before/O the/O blade/O of/O his/O scythe/O,/O
and/O ahead/O of/O him/O the/O end/O of/O the/O row/O,/O where/O would/O come/O the/O rest/O./O

Suddenly/O,/O in/O the/O midst/O of/O his/O toil/O,/O without/O understanding/O what/O it/O was/O or/O
whence/O it/O came/O,/O he/O felt/O a/O pleasant/O sensation/O of/O chill/O on/O his/O hot/O,/O moist/O
shoulders/O./O He/O glanced/O at/O the/O sky/O in/O the/O interval/O for/O whetting/O the/O
scythes/O./O A/O heavy/O,/O lowering/O storm/O cloud/O had/O blown/O up/O,/O and/O big/O raindrops/O
were/O falling/O./O Some/O of/O the/O peasants/O went/O to/O their/O coats/O and/O put/O them/O on/O;/O
others/O--/Ojust/O like/O Levin/PERSON himself/O--/Omerely/O shrugged/O their/O shoulders/O,/O enjoying/O
the/O pleasant/O coolness/O of/O it/O./O

Another/O row/O,/O and/O yet/O another/O row/O,/O followed/O--/Olong/O rows/O and/O short/O rows/O,/O
with/O good/O grass/O and/O with/O poor/O grass/O./O Levin/PERSON lost/O all/O sense/O of/O time/O,/O and/O
could/O not/O have/O told/O whether/O it/O was/O late/O or/O early/O now/O./O A/O change/O began/O to/O
come/O over/O his/O work/O,/O which/O gave/O him/O immense/O satisfaction/O./O In/O the/O midst/O of/O
his/O toil/O there/O were/O moments/O during/O which/O he/O forgot/O what/O he/O was/O doing/O,/O
and/O it/O came/O all/O easy/O to/O him/O,/O and/O at/O those/O same/O moments/O his/O row/O was/O
almost/O as/O smooth/O and/O well/O cut/O as/O Tit/O's/O./O But/O so/O soon/O as/O he/O recollected/O
what/O he/O was/O doing/O,/O and/O began/O trying/O to/O do/O better/O,/O he/O was/O at/O once/O
conscious/O of/O all/O the/O difficulty/O of/O his/O task/O,/O and/O the/O row/O was/O badly/O mown/O./O

On/O finishing/O yet/O another/O row/O he/O would/O have/O gone/O back/O to/O the/O top/O of/O the/O
meadow/O again/O to/O begin/O the/O next/O,/O but/O Tit/O stopped/O,/O and/O going/O up/O to/O the/O old/O
man/O said/O something/O in/O a/O low/O voice/O to/O him/O./O They/O both/O looked/O at/O the/O sun/O./O
``/OWhat/O are/O they/O talking/O about/O,/O and/O why/O does/On't/O he/O go/O back/O?/O''/O thought/O
Levin/PERSON,/O not/O guessing/O that/O the/O peasants/O had/O been/O mowing/O no/O less/O than/O four/O
hours/O without/O stopping/O,/O and/O it/O was/O time/O for/O their/O lunch/O./O

``/OLunch/O,/O sir/O,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O man/O./O

``/OIs/O it/O really/O time/O?/O That/O's/O right/O;/O lunch/O,/O then/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON gave/O his/O scythe/O to/O Tit/O,/O and/O together/O with/O the/O peasants/O,/O who/O were/O
crossing/O the/O long/O stretch/O of/O mown/O grass/O,/O slightly/O sprinkled/O with/O rain/O,/O
to/O get/O their/O bread/O from/O the/O heap/O of/O coats/O,/O he/O went/O towards/O his/O house/O./O
Only/O then/O he/O suddenly/O awoke/O to/O the/O fact/O that/O he/O had/O been/O wrong/O about/O the/O
weather/O and/O the/O rain/O was/O drenching/O his/O hay/O./O

``/OThe/O hay/O will/O be/O spoiled/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/ONot/O a/O bit/O of/O it/O,/O sir/O;/O mow/O in/O the/O rain/O,/O and/O you/O'll/O rake/O in/O fine/O
weather/O!/O''/O said/O the/O old/O man/O./O

Levin/PERSON untied/O his/O horse/O and/O rode/O home/O to/O his/O coffee/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
was/O only/O just/O getting/O up/O./O When/O he/O had/O drunk/O his/O coffee/O,/O Levin/PERSON rode/O back/O
again/O to/O the/O mowing/O before/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON had/O had/O time/O to/O dress/O and/O
come/O down/O to/O the/O dining/O room/O./O



Chapter/O 5/O


After/O lunch/O Levin/PERSON was/O not/O in/O the/O same/O place/O in/O the/O string/O of/O mowers/O as/O
before/O,/O but/O stood/O between/O the/O old/O man/O who/O had/O accosted/O him/O jocosely/O,/O and/O
now/O invited/O him/O to/O be/O his/O neighbor/O,/O and/O a/O young/O peasant/O,/O who/O had/O only/O
been/O married/O in/O the/O autumn/O,/O and/O who/O was/O mowing/O this/O summer/O for/O the/O first/O
time/O./O

The/O old/O man/O,/O holding/O himself/O erect/O,/O moved/O in/O front/O,/O with/O his/O feet/O turned/O
out/O,/O taking/O long/O,/O regular/O strides/O,/O and/O with/O a/O precise/O and/O regular/O action/O
which/O seemed/O to/O cost/O him/O no/O more/O effort/O than/O swinging/O one/O's/O arms/O in/O
walking/O,/O as/O though/O it/O were/O in/O play/O,/O he/O laid/O down/O the/O high/O,/O even/O row/O of/O
grass/O./O It/O was/O as/O though/O it/O were/O not/O he/O but/O the/O sharp/O scythe/O of/O itself/O
swishing/O through/O the/O juicy/O grass/O./O

Behind/O Levin/PERSON came/O the/O lad/O Mishka/PERSON./O His/O pretty/O,/O boyish/O face/O,/O with/O a/O twist/O
of/O fresh/O grass/O bound/O round/O his/O hair/O,/O was/O all/O working/O with/O effort/O;/O but/O
whenever/O anyone/O looked/O at/O him/O he/O smiled/O./O He/O would/O clearly/O have/O died/O
sooner/O than/O own/O it/O was/O hard/O work/O for/O him/O./O

Levin/PERSON kept/O between/O them/O./O In/O the/O very/O heat/O of/O the/O day/O the/O mowing/O did/O not/O
seem/O such/O hard/O work/O to/O him/O./O The/O perspiration/O with/O which/O he/O was/O drenched/O
cooled/O him/O,/O while/O the/O sun/O,/O that/O burned/O his/O back/O,/O his/O head/O,/O and/O his/O arms/O,/O
bare/O to/O the/O elbow/O,/O gave/O a/O vigor/O and/O dogged/O energy/O to/O his/O labor/O;/O and/O more/O
and/O more/O often/O now/O came/O those/O moments/O of/O unconsciousness/O,/O when/O it/O was/O
possible/O not/O to/O think/O what/O one/O was/O doing/O./O The/O scythe/O cut/O of/O itself/O./O
These/O were/O happy/O moments/O./O Still/O more/O delightful/O were/O the/O moments/O when/O
they/O reached/O the/O stream/O where/O the/O rows/O ended/O,/O and/O the/O old/O man/O rubbed/O his/O
scythe/O with/O the/O wet/O,/O thick/O grass/O,/O rinsed/O its/O blade/O in/O the/O fresh/O water/O of/O
the/O stream/O,/O ladled/O out/O a/O little/O in/O a/O tin/O dipper/O,/O and/O offered/O Levin/PERSON a/O
drink/O./O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O say/O to/O my/O home-brew/O,/O eh/O?/O Good/O,/O eh/O?/O''/O said/O he/O,/O winking/O./O

And/O truly/O Levin/PERSON had/O never/O drunk/O any/O liquor/O so/O good/O as/O this/O warm/O water/O
with/O green/O bits/O floating/O in/O it/O,/O and/O a/O taste/O of/O rust/O from/O the/O tin/O dipper/O./O
And/O immediately/O after/O this/O came/O the/O delicious/O,/O slow/O saunter/O,/O with/O his/O
hand/O on/O the/O scythe/O,/O during/O which/O he/O could/O wipe/O away/O the/O streaming/O sweat/O,/O
take/O deep/O breaths/O of/O air/O,/O and/O look/O about/O at/O the/O long/O string/O of/O mowers/O
and/O at/O what/O was/O happening/O around/O in/O the/O forest/O and/O the/O country/O./O

The/O longer/O Levin/PERSON mowed/O,/O the/O oftener/O he/O felt/O the/O moments/O of/O
unconsciousness/O in/O which/O it/O seemed/O not/O his/O hands/O that/O swung/O the/O scythe/O,/O
but/O the/O scythe/O mowing/O of/O itself/O,/O a/O body/O full/O of/O life/O and/O consciousness/O
of/O its/O own/O,/O and/O as/O though/O by/O magic/O,/O without/O thinking/O of/O it/O,/O the/O work/O
turned/O out/O regular/O and/O well-finished/O of/O itself/O./O These/O were/O the/O most/O
blissful/O moments/O./O

It/O was/O only/O hard/O work/O when/O he/O had/O to/O break/O off/O the/O motion/O,/O which/O had/O
become/O unconscious/O,/O and/O to/O think/O;/O when/O he/O had/O to/O mow/O round/O a/O hillock/O or/O
a/O tuft/O of/O sorrel/O./O The/O old/O man/O did/O this/O easily/O./O When/O a/O hillock/O came/O he/O
changed/O his/O action/O,/O and/O at/O one/O time/O with/O the/O heel/O,/O and/O at/O another/O with/O
the/O tip/O of/O his/O scythe/O,/O clipped/O the/O hillock/O round/O both/O sides/O with/O short/O
strokes/O./O And/O while/O he/O did/O this/O he/O kept/O looking/O about/O and/O watching/O what/O
came/O into/O his/O view/O:/O at/O one/O moment/O he/O picked/O a/O wild/O berry/O and/O ate/O it/O or/O
offered/O it/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O then/O he/O flung/O away/O a/O twig/O with/O the/O blade/O of/O the/O
scythe/O,/O then/O he/O looked/O at/O a/O quail/O's/O nest/O,/O from/O which/O the/O bird/O flew/O just/O
under/O the/O scythe/O,/O or/O caught/O a/O snake/O that/O crossed/O his/O path/O,/O and/O lifting/O
it/O on/O the/O scythe/O as/O though/O on/O a/O fork/O showed/O it/O to/O Levin/PERSON and/O threw/O it/O
away/O./O

For/O both/O Levin/PERSON and/O the/O young/O peasant/O behind/O him/O,/O such/O changes/O of/O
position/O were/O difficult/O./O Both/O of/O them/O,/O repeating/O over/O and/O over/O again/O the/O
same/O strained/O movement/O,/O were/O in/O a/O perfect/O frenzy/O of/O toil/O,/O and/O were/O
incapable/O of/O shifting/O their/O position/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O watching/O what/O
was/O before/O them/O./O

Levin/PERSON did/O not/O notice/O how/O time/O was/O passing/O./O If/O he/O had/O been/O asked/O how/O long/O
he/O had/O been/O working/O he/O would/O have/O said/O half/O an/O hour/O--/Oand/O it/O was/O getting/O
on/O for/O dinner/O time/O./O As/O they/O were/O walking/O back/O over/O the/O cut/O grass/O,/O the/O
old/O man/O called/O Levin/PERSON's/O attention/O to/O the/O little/O girls/O and/O boys/O who/O were/O
coming/O from/O different/O directions/O,/O hardly/O visible/O through/O the/O long/O grass/O,/O
and/O along/O the/O road/O towards/O the/O mowers/O,/O carrying/O sacks/O of/O bread/O dragging/O
at/O their/O little/O hands/O and/O pitchers/O of/O the/O sour/O rye-beer/O,/O with/O cloths/O
wrapped/O round/O them/O./O

``/OLook/O'/Oee/O,/O the/O little/O emmets/O crawling/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O pointing/O to/O them/O,/O and/O he/O
shaded/O his/O eyes/O with/O his/O hand/O to/O look/O at/O the/O sun/O./O They/O mowed/O two/O more/O
rows/O;/O the/O old/O man/O stopped/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O master/O,/O dinner/O time/O!/O''/O he/O said/O briskly/O./O And/O on/O reaching/O the/O stream/O
the/O mowers/O moved/O off/O across/O the/O lines/O of/O cut/O grass/O towards/O their/O pile/O of/O
coats/O,/O where/O the/O children/O who/O had/O brought/O their/O dinners/O were/O sitting/O
waiting/O for/O them/O./O The/O peasants/O gathered/O into/O groups/O--/Othose/O further/O away/O
under/O a/O cart/O,/O those/O nearer/O under/O a/O willow/O bush/O./O

Levin/PERSON sat/O down/O by/O them/O;/O he/O felt/O disinclined/O to/O go/O away/O./O

All/O constraint/O with/O the/O master/O had/O disappeared/O long/O ago/O./O The/O peasants/O
got/O ready/O for/O dinner/O./O Some/O washed/O,/O the/O young/O lads/O bathed/O in/O the/O stream/O,/O
others/O made/O a/O place/O comfortable/O for/O a/O rest/O,/O untied/O their/O sacks/O of/O bread/O,/O
and/O uncovered/O the/O pitchers/O of/O rye-beer/O./O The/O old/O man/O crumbled/O up/O some/O
bread/O in/O a/O cup/O,/O stirred/O it/O with/O the/O handle/O of/O a/O spoon/O,/O poured/O water/O on/O
it/O from/O the/O dipper/O,/O broke/O up/O some/O more/O bread/O,/O and/O having/O seasoned/O it/O
with/O salt/O,/O he/O turned/O to/O the/O east/O to/O say/O his/O prayer/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O master/O,/O taste/O my/O sop/O,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O kneeling/O down/O before/O the/O cup/O./O

The/O sop/O was/O so/O good/O that/O Levin/PERSON gave/O up/O the/O idea/O of/O going/O home/O./O He/O dined/O
with/O the/O old/O man/O,/O and/O talked/O to/O him/O about/O his/O family/O affairs/O,/O taking/O the/O
keenest/O interest/O in/O them/O,/O and/O told/O him/O about/O his/O own/O affairs/O and/O all/O the/O
circumstances/O that/O could/O be/O of/O interest/O to/O the/O old/O man/O./O He/O felt/O much/O
nearer/O to/O him/O than/O to/O his/O brother/O,/O and/O could/O not/O help/O smiling/O at/O the/O
affection/O he/O felt/O for/O this/O man/O./O When/O the/O old/O man/O got/O up/O again/O,/O said/O his/O
prayer/O,/O and/O lay/O down/O under/O a/O bush/O,/O putting/O some/O grass/O under/O his/O head/O for/O
a/O pillow/O,/O Levin/PERSON did/O the/O same/O,/O and/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O clinging/O flies/O that/O
were/O so/O persistent/O in/O the/O sunshine/O,/O and/O the/O midges/O that/O tickled/O his/O hot/O
face/O and/O body/O,/O he/O fell/O asleep/O at/O once/O and/O only/O waked/O when/O the/O sun/O had/O
passed/O to/O the/O other/O side/O of/O the/O bush/O and/O reached/O him/O./O The/O old/O man/O had/O
been/O awake/O a/O long/O while/O,/O and/O was/O sitting/O up/O whetting/O the/O scythes/O of/O the/O
younger/O lads/O./O

Levin/PERSON looked/O about/O him/O and/O hardly/O recognized/O the/O place/O,/O everything/O was/O
so/O changed/O./O The/O immense/O stretch/O of/O meadow/O had/O been/O mown/O and/O was/O
sparkling/O with/O a/O peculiar/O fresh/O brilliance/O,/O with/O its/O lines/O of/O already/O
sweet-smelling/O grass/O in/O the/O slanting/O rays/O of/O the/O evening/O sun/O./O And/O the/O
bushes/O about/O the/O river/O had/O been/O cut/O down/O,/O and/O the/O river/O itself/O,/O not/O
visible/O before/O,/O now/O gleaming/O like/O steel/O in/O its/O bends/O,/O and/O the/O moving/O,/O
ascending/O,/O peasants/O,/O and/O the/O sharp/O wall/O of/O grass/O of/O the/O unmown/O part/O of/O
the/O meadow/O,/O and/O the/O hawks/O hovering/O over/O the/O stripped/O meadow/O--/Oall/O was/O
perfectly/O new/O./O Raising/O himself/O,/O Levin/PERSON began/O considering/O how/O much/O had/O
been/O cut/O and/O how/O much/O more/O could/O still/O be/O done/O that/O day/O./O

The/O work/O done/O was/O exceptionally/O much/O for/O forty-two/O men/O./O They/O had/O cut/O the/O
whole/O of/O the/O big/O meadow/O,/O which/O had/O,/O in/O the/O years/O of/O serf/O labor/O,/O taken/O
thirty/O scythes/O two/O days/O to/O mow/O./O Only/O the/O corners/O remained/O to/O do/O,/O where/O
the/O rows/O were/O short/O./O But/O Levin/PERSON felt/O a/O longing/O to/O get/O as/O much/O mowing/O done/O
that/O day/O as/O possible/O,/O and/O was/O vexed/O with/O the/O sun/O sinking/O so/O quickly/O in/O
the/O sky/O./O He/O felt/O no/O weariness/O;/O all/O he/O wanted/O was/O to/O get/O his/O work/O done/O
more/O and/O more/O quickly/O and/O as/O much/O done/O as/O possible/O./O

``/OCould/O you/O cut/O Mashkin/O Upland/O too/O?/O--/Owhat/O do/O you/O think/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O
old/O man/O./O

``/OAs/O God/O wills/O,/O the/O sun/O's/O not/O high/O./O A/O little/O vodka/O for/O the/O lads/O?/O''/O

At/O the/O afternoon/O rest/O,/O when/O they/O were/O sitting/O down/O again/O,/O and/O those/O who/O
smoked/O had/O lighted/O their/O pipes/O,/O the/O old/O man/O told/O the/O men/O that/O ``/OMashkin/O
Upland/O's/O to/O be/O cut/O--/Othere/O'll/O be/O some/O vodka/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O not/O cut/O it/O?/O Come/O on/O,/O Tit/O!/O We/O'll/O look/O sharp/O!/O We/O can/O eat/O at/O night/O./O
Come/O on/O!/O''/O cried/O voices/O,/O and/O eating/O up/O their/O bread/O,/O the/O mowers/O went/O back/O
to/O work/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O lads/O,/O keep/O it/O up/O!/O''/O said/O Tit/O,/O and/O ran/O on/O ahead/O almost/O at/O a/O trot/O./O

``/OGet/O along/O,/O get/O along/O!/O''/O said/O the/O old/O man/O,/O hurrying/O after/O him/O and/O easily/O
overtaking/O him/O,/O ``/OI/O'll/O mow/O you/O down/O,/O look/O out/O!/O''/O

And/O young/O and/O old/O mowed/O away/O,/O as/O though/O they/O were/O racing/O with/O one/O
another/O./O But/O however/O fast/O they/O worked/O,/O they/O did/O not/O spoil/O the/O grass/O,/O and/O
the/O rows/O were/O laid/O just/O as/O neatly/O and/O exactly/O./O The/O little/O piece/O left/O
uncut/O in/O the/O corner/O was/O mown/O in/O five/O minutes/O./O The/O last/O of/O the/O mowers/O
were/O just/O ending/O their/O rows/O while/O the/O foremost/O snatched/O up/O their/O coats/O
onto/O their/O shoulders/O,/O and/O crossed/O the/O road/O towards/O Mashkin/LOCATION Upland/LOCATION./O

The/O sun/O was/O already/O sinking/O into/O the/O trees/O when/O they/O went/O with/O their/O
jingling/O dippers/O into/O the/O wooded/O ravine/O of/O Mashkin/LOCATION Upland/LOCATION./O The/O grass/O was/O
up/O to/O their/O waists/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O hollow/O,/O soft/O,/O tender/O,/O and/O
feathery/O,/O spotted/O here/O and/O there/O among/O the/O trees/O with/O wild/O heart/O's/O-/Oease/O./O

After/O a/O brief/O consultation/O--/Owhether/O to/O take/O the/O rows/O lengthwise/O or/O
diagonally/O--/OProhor/O Yermilin/O,/O also/O a/O renowned/O mower/O,/O a/O huge/O,/O black-haired/O
peasant/O,/O went/O on/O ahead/O./O He/O went/O up/O to/O the/O top/O,/O turned/O back/O again/O and/O
started/O mowing/O,/O and/O they/O all/O proceeded/O to/O form/O in/O line/O behind/O him/O,/O going/O
downhill/O through/O the/O hollow/O and/O uphill/O right/O up/O to/O the/O edge/O of/O the/O
forest/O./O The/O sun/O sank/O behind/O the/O forest/O./O The/O dew/O was/O falling/O by/O now/O;/O the/O
mowers/O were/O in/O the/O sun/O only/O on/O the/O hillside/O,/O but/O below/O,/O where/O a/O mist/O was/O
rising/O,/O and/O on/O the/O opposite/O side/O,/O they/O mowed/O into/O the/O fresh/O,/O dewy/O shade/O./O
The/O work/O went/O rapidly/O./O The/O grass/O cut/O with/O a/O juicy/O sound/O,/O and/O was/O at/O once/O
laid/O in/O high/O,/O fragrant/O rows/O./O The/O mowers/O from/O all/O sides/O,/O brought/O closer/O
together/O in/O the/O short/O row/O,/O kept/O urging/O one/O another/O on/O to/O the/O sound/O of/O
jingling/O dippers/O and/O clanging/O scythes/O,/O and/O the/O hiss/O of/O the/O whetstones/O
sharpening/O them/O,/O and/O good-humored/O shouts/O./O

Levin/PERSON still/O kept/O between/O the/O young/O peasant/O and/O the/O old/O man/O./O The/O old/O man/O,/O
who/O had/O put/O on/O his/O short/O sheepskin/O jacket/O,/O was/O just/O as/O good-humored/O,/O
jocose/O,/O and/O free/O in/O his/O movements/O./O Among/O the/O trees/O they/O were/O continually/O
cutting/O with/O their/O scythes/O the/O so-called/O ``/Obirch/O mushrooms/O,/O''/O swollen/O fat/O
in/O the/O succulent/O grass/O./O But/O the/O old/O man/O bent/O down/O every/O time/O he/O came/O
across/O a/O mushroom/O,/O picked/O it/O up/O and/O put/O it/O in/O his/O bosom/O./O ``/OAnother/O
present/O for/O my/O old/O woman/O,/O''/O he/O said/O as/O he/O did/O so/O./O

Easy/O as/O it/O was/O to/O mow/O the/O wet/O,/O soft/O grass/O,/O it/O was/O hard/O work/O going/O up/O and/O
down/O the/O steep/O sides/O of/O the/O ravine/O./O But/O this/O did/O not/O trouble/O the/O old/O
man/O./O Swinging/O his/O scythe/O just/O as/O ever/O,/O and/O moving/O his/O feet/O in/O their/O big/O,/O
plaited/O shoes/O with/O firm/O,/O little/O steps/O,/O he/O climbed/O slowly/O up/O the/O steep/O
place/O,/O and/O though/O his/O breeches/O hanging/O out/O below/O his/O smock/O,/O and/O his/O
whole/O frame/O trembled/O with/O effort/O,/O he/O did/O not/O miss/O one/O blade/O of/O grass/O or/O
one/O mushroom/O on/O his/O way/O,/O and/O kept/O making/O jokes/O with/O the/O peasants/O and/O
Levin/PERSON./O Levin/PERSON walked/O after/O him/O and/O often/O thought/O he/O must/O fall/O,/O as/O he/O
climbed/O with/O a/O scythe/O up/O a/O steep/O cliff/O where/O it/O would/O have/O been/O hard/O
work/O to/O clamber/O without/O anything/O./O But/O he/O climbed/O up/O and/O did/O what/O he/O had/O
to/O do/O./O He/O felt/O as/O though/O some/O external/O force/O were/O moving/O him/O./O



Chapter/O 6/O


Mashkin/ORGANIZATION Upland/ORGANIZATION was/O mown/O,/O the/O last/O row/O finished/O,/O the/O peasants/O had/O put/O on/O
their/O coats/O and/O were/O gaily/O trudging/O home/O./O Levin/PERSON got/O on/O his/O horse/O and/O,/O
parting/O regretfully/O from/O the/O peasants/O,/O rode/O homewards/O./O On/O the/O hillside/O
he/O looked/O back/O;/O he/O could/O not/O see/O them/O in/O the/O mist/O that/O had/O risen/O from/O
the/O valley/O;/O he/O could/O only/O hear/O rough/O,/O good-humored/O voices/O,/O laughter/O,/O and/O
the/O sound/O of/O clanking/O scythes/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON had/O long/O ago/O finished/O dinner/O,/O and/O was/O drinking/O iced/O
lemon/O and/O water/O in/O his/O own/O room/O,/O looking/O through/O the/O reviews/O and/O papers/O
which/O he/O had/O only/O just/O received/O by/O post/O,/O when/O Levin/PERSON rushed/O into/O the/O
room/O,/O talking/O merrily/O,/O with/O his/O wet/O and/O matted/O hair/O sticking/O to/O his/O
forehead/O,/O and/O his/O back/O and/O chest/O grimed/O and/O moist/O./O

``/OWe/O mowed/O the/O whole/O meadow/O!/O Oh/O,/O it/O is/O nice/O,/O delicious/O!/O And/O how/O have/O you/O
been/O getting/O on/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O completely/O forgetting/O the/O disagreeable/O
conversation/O of/O the/O previous/O day/O./O

``/OMercy/O!/O what/O do/O you/O look/O like/O!/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O for/O the/O first/O
moment/O looking/O round/O with/O some/O dissatisfaction/O./O ``/OAnd/O the/O door/O,/O do/O shut/O
the/O door/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O./O ``/OYou/O must/O have/O let/O in/O a/O dozen/O at/O least/O./O''/O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON could/O not/O endure/O flies/O,/O and/O in/O his/O own/O room/O he/O never/O
opened/O the/O window/O except/O at/O night/O,/O and/O carefully/O kept/O the/O door/O shut/O./O

``/ONot/O one/O,/O on/O my/O honor/O./O But/O if/O I/O have/O,/O I/O'll/O catch/O them/O./O You/O would/On't/O
believe/O what/O a/O pleasure/O it/O is/O!/O How/O have/O you/O spent/O the/O day/O?/O''/O

``/OVery/O well/O./O But/O have/O you/O really/O been/O mowing/O the/O whole/O day/O?/O I/O expect/O
you/O're/O as/O hungry/O as/O a/O wolf/O./O Kouzma/PERSON has/O got/O everything/O ready/O for/O you/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O do/On't/O feel/O hungry/O even/O./O I/O had/O something/O to/O eat/O there/O./O But/O I/O'll/O go/O
and/O wash/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O go/O along/O,/O go/O along/O,/O and/O I/O'll/O come/O to/O you/O directly/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O shaking/O his/O head/O as/O he/O looked/O at/O his/O brother/O./O ``/OGo/O along/O,/O
make/O haste/O,/O''/O he/O added/O smiling/O,/O and/O gathering/O up/O his/O books/O,/O he/O prepared/O
to/O go/O too/O./O He/O,/O too/O,/O felt/O suddenly/O good-humored/O and/O disinclined/O to/O leave/O
his/O brother/O's/O side/O./O ``/OBut/O what/O did/O you/O do/O while/O it/O was/O raining/O?/O''/O

``/ORain/O?/O Why/O,/O there/O was/O scarcely/O a/O drop/O./O I/O'll/O come/O directly/O./O So/O you/O had/O a/O
nice/O day/O too/O?/O That/O's/O first-rate/O./O''/O And/O Levin/PERSON went/O off/O to/O change/O his/O
clothes/O./O

Five/O minutes/O later/O the/O brothers/O met/O in/O the/O dining/O room/O./O Although/O it/O
seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON that/O he/O was/O not/O hungry/O,/O and/O he/O sat/O down/O to/O dinner/O simply/O
so/O as/O not/O to/O hurt/O Kouzma/PERSON's/O feelings/O,/O yet/O when/O he/O began/O to/O eat/O the/O dinner/O
struck/O him/O as/O extraordinarily/O good/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON watched/O him/O with/O a/O
smile/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O by/O the/O way/O,/O there/O's/O a/O letter/O for/O you/O,/O''/O said/O he/O./O ``/OKouzma/O,/O bring/O it/O
down/O,/O please/O./O And/O mind/O you/O shut/O the/O doors/O./O''/O

The/O letter/O was/O from/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O Levin/PERSON read/O it/O aloud/O./O Oblonsky/PERSON wrote/O to/O him/O
from/O Petersburg/LOCATION:/O ``/OI/O have/O had/O a/O letter/O from/O Dolly/PERSON;/O she/O's/O at/O Ergushovo/LOCATION,/O
and/O everything/O seems/O going/O wrong/O there/O./O Do/O ride/O over/O and/O see/O her/O,/O
please/O;/O help/O her/O with/O advice/O;/O you/O know/O all/O about/O it/O./O She/O will/O be/O so/O glad/O
to/O see/O you/O./O She/O's/O quite/O alone/O,/O poor/O thing/O./O My/O mother-in-law/O and/O all/O of/O
them/O are/O still/O abroad/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O capital/O!/O I/O will/O certainly/O ride/O over/O to/O her/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OOr/O
we/O'll/O go/O together/O./O She/O's/O such/O a/O splendid/O woman/O,/O is/On't/O she/O?/O''/O

``/OThey/O're/O not/O far/O from/O here/O,/O then/O?/O''/O

``/OTwenty-five/O miles/O./O Or/O perhaps/O it/O is/O thirty/O./O But/O a/O capital/O road/O./O
Capital/O,/O we/O'll/O drive/O over/O./O''/O

``/OI/O shall/O be/O delighted/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O still/O smiling/O./O The/O sight/O
of/O his/O younger/O brother/O's/O appearance/O had/O immediately/O put/O him/O in/O a/O good/O
humor/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O have/O an/O appetite/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O at/O his/O dark-red/O,/O sunburnt/O
face/O and/O neck/O bent/O over/O the/O plate/O./O

``/OSplendid/O!/O You/O ca/On't/O imagine/O what/O an/O effectual/O remedy/O it/O is/O for/O every/O
sort/O of/O foolishness/O./O I/O want/O to/O enrich/O medicine/O with/O a/O new/O word/O:/O
_/OArbeitskur/O_/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O but/O you/O do/On't/O need/O it/O,/O I/O should/O fancy/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O but/O for/O all/O sorts/O of/O nervous/O invalids/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O ought/O to/O be/O tried/O./O I/O had/O meant/O to/O come/O to/O the/O mowing/O to/O look/O at/O
you/O,/O but/O it/O was/O so/O unbearably/O hot/O that/O I/O got/O no/O further/O than/O the/O forest/O./O
I/O sat/O there/O a/O little/O,/O and/O went/O on/O by/O the/O forest/O to/O the/O village/O,/O met/O your/O
old/O nurse/O,/O and/O sounded/O her/O as/O to/O the/O peasants/O'/O view/O of/O you/O./O As/O far/O as/O I/O
can/O make/O out/O,/O they/O do/On't/O approve/O of/O this/O./O She/O said/O:/O `/OIt/O's/O not/O a/O
gentleman/O's/O work/O./O'/O Altogether/O,/O I/O fancy/O that/O in/O the/O people/O's/O ideas/O there/O
are/O very/O clear/O and/O definite/O notions/O of/O certain/O,/O as/O they/O call/O it/O,/O
`/Ogentlemanly/O'/O lines/O of/O action/O./O And/O they/O do/On't/O sanction/O the/O gentry/O's/O
moving/O outside/O bounds/O clearly/O laid/O down/O in/O their/O ideas/O./O''/O

``/OMaybe/O so/O;/O but/O anyway/O it/O's/O a/O pleasure/O such/O as/O I/O have/O never/O known/O in/O my/O
life/O./O And/O there/O's/O no/O harm/O in/O it/O,/O you/O know/O./O Is/O there/O?/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OI/O
ca/On't/O help/O it/O if/O they/O do/On't/O like/O it/O./O Though/O I/O do/O believe/O it/O's/O all/O right/O./O
Eh/O?/O''/O

``/OAltogether/O,/O''/O pursued/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O ``/Oyou/O're/O satisfied/O with/O your/O
day/O?/O''/O

``/OQuite/O satisfied/O./O We/O cut/O the/O whole/O meadow/O./O And/O such/O a/O splendid/O old/O man/O I/O
made/O friends/O with/O there/O!/O You/O ca/On't/O fancy/O how/O delightful/O he/O was/O!/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O so/O you/O're/O content/O with/O your/O day/O./O And/O so/O am/O I./PERSON First/PERSON,/O I/O solved/O two/O
chess/O problems/O,/O and/O one/O a/O very/O pretty/O one/O--/Oa/O pawn/O opening/O./O I/O'll/O show/O it/O
you/O./O And/O then/O--/OI/O thought/O over/O our/O conversation/O yesterday/O./O''/O

``/OEh/O!/O our/O conversation/O yesterday/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O blissfully/O dropping/O his/O
eyelids/O and/O drawing/O deep/O breaths/O after/O finishing/O his/O dinner/O,/O and/O
absolutely/O incapable/O of/O recalling/O what/O their/O conversation/O yesterday/O was/O
about/O./O

``/OI/O think/O you/O are/O partly/O right/O./O Our/O difference/O of/O opinion/O amounts/O to/O
this/O,/O that/O you/O make/O the/O mainspring/O self-interest/O,/O while/O I/O suppose/O that/O
interest/O in/O the/O common/O weal/O is/O bound/O to/O exist/O in/O every/O man/O of/O a/O certain/O
degree/O of/O advancement/O./O Possibly/O you/O are/O right/O too/O,/O that/O action/O founded/O
on/O material/O interest/O would/O be/O more/O desirable/O./O You/O are/O altogether/O,/O as/O the/O
French/O say/O,/O too/O _/Oprimesautière/O_/O a/O nature/O;/O you/O must/O have/O intense/O,/O
energetic/O action/O,/O or/O nothing/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON listened/O to/O his/O brother/O and/O did/O not/O understand/O a/O single/O word/O,/O and/O
did/O not/O want/O to/O understand/O./O He/O was/O only/O afraid/O his/O brother/O might/O ask/O him/O
some/O question/O which/O would/O make/O it/O evident/O he/O had/O not/O heard/O./O

``/OSo/O that/O's/O what/O I/O think/O it/O is/O,/O my/O dear/O boy/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O
touching/O him/O on/O the/O shoulder/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O of/O course/O./O But/O,/O do/O you/O know/O?/O I/O wo/On't/O stand/O up/O for/O my/O view/O,/O''/O
answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O with/O a/O guilty/O,/O childlike/O smile/O./O ``/OWhatever/O was/O it/O I/O was/O
disputing/O about/O?/O''/O he/O wondered/O./O ``/OOf/O course/O,/O I/O'm/O right/O,/O and/O he/O's/O right/O,/O
and/O it/O's/O all/O first-rate/O./O Only/O I/O must/O go/O round/O to/O the/O counting/O house/O and/O
see/O to/O things/O./O''/O He/O got/O up/O,/O stretching/O and/O smiling/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
smiled/O too/O./O

``/OIf/O you/O want/O to/O go/O out/O,/O let/O's/O go/O together/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O disinclined/O to/O be/O
parted/O from/O his/O brother/O,/O who/O seemed/O positively/O breathing/O out/O freshness/O
and/O energy/O./O ``/OCome/O,/O we/O'll/O go/O to/O the/O counting/O house/O,/O if/O you/O have/O to/O go/O
there/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O heavens/O!/O''/O shouted/O Levin/PERSON,/O so/O loudly/O that/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O quite/O
frightened/O./O

``/OWhat/O,/O what/O is/O the/O matter/O?/O''/O

``/OHow/O's/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON's/O hand/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O slapping/O himself/O on/O the/O
head/O./O ``/OI/O'd/O positively/O forgotten/O her/O even/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O much/O better/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O anyway/O I/O'll/O run/O down/O to/O her/O./O Before/O you/O've/O time/O to/O get/O your/O hat/O
on/O,/O I/O'll/O be/O back/O./O''/O

And/O he/O ran/O downstairs/O,/O clattering/O with/O his/O heels/O like/O a/O spring-rattle/O./O



Chapter/O 7/O


Stephan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O gone/O to/O Petersburg/LOCATION to/O perform/O the/O most/O natural/O
and/O essential/O official/O duty/O--/Oso/O familiar/O to/O everyone/O in/O the/O government/O
service/O,/O though/O incomprehensible/O to/O outsiders/O--/Othat/O duty/O,/O but/O for/O which/O
one/O could/O hardly/O be/O in/O government/O service/O,/O of/O reminding/O the/O ministry/O of/O
his/O existence/O--/Oand/O having/O,/O for/O the/O due/O performance/O of/O this/O rite/O,/O taken/O
all/O the/O available/O cash/O from/O home/O,/O was/O gaily/O and/O agreeably/O spending/O his/O
days/O at/O the/O races/O and/O in/O the/O summer/O villas/O./O Meanwhile/O Dolly/PERSON and/O the/O
children/O had/O moved/O into/O the/O country/O,/O to/O cut/O down/O expenses/O as/O much/O as/O
possible/O./O She/O had/O gone/O to/O Ergushovo/LOCATION,/O the/O estate/O that/O had/O been/O her/O dowry/O,/O
and/O the/O one/O where/O in/O spring/O the/O forest/O had/O been/O sold/O./O It/O was/O nearly/O
forty/O miles/O from/O Levin/PERSON's/O Pokrovskoe/O./O The/O big/O,/O old/O house/O at/O Ergushovo/LOCATION had/O
been/O pulled/O down/O long/O ago/O,/O and/O the/O old/O prince/O had/O had/O the/O lodge/O done/O up/O
and/O built/O on/O to/O./O Twenty/O years/O before/O,/O when/O Dolly/PERSON was/O a/O child/O,/O the/O lodge/O
had/O been/O roomy/O and/O comfortable/O,/O though/O,/O like/O all/O lodges/O,/O it/O stood/O
sideways/O to/O the/O entrance/O avenue/O,/O and/O faced/O the/O south/O./O But/O by/O now/O this/O
lodge/O was/O old/O and/O dilapidated/O./O When/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O gone/O down/O in/O
the/O spring/O to/O sell/O the/O forest/O,/O Dolly/PERSON had/O begged/O him/O to/O look/O over/O the/O
house/O and/O order/O what/O repairs/O might/O be/O needed/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O like/O
all/O unfaithful/O husbands/O indeed/O,/O was/O very/O solicitous/O for/O his/O wife/O's/O
comfort/O,/O and/O he/O had/O himself/O looked/O over/O the/O house/O,/O and/O given/O
instructions/O about/O everything/O that/O he/O considered/O necessary/O./O What/O he/O
considered/O necessary/O was/O to/O cover/O all/O the/O furniture/O with/O cretonne/O,/O to/O
put/O up/O curtains/O,/O to/O weed/O the/O garden/O,/O to/O make/O a/O little/O bridge/O on/O the/O
pond/O,/O and/O to/O plant/O flowers/O./O But/O he/O forgot/O many/O other/O essential/O matters/O,/O
the/O want/O of/O which/O greatly/O distressed/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON later/O on/O./O

In/O spite/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O efforts/O to/O be/O an/O attentive/O father/O and/O
husband/O,/O he/O never/O could/O keep/O in/O his/O mind/O that/O he/O had/O a/O wife/O and/O
children/O./O He/O had/O bachelor/O tastes/O,/O and/O it/O was/O in/O accordance/O with/O them/O
that/O he/O shaped/O his/O life/O./O On/O his/O return/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION he/O informed/O his/O wife/O
with/O pride/O that/O everything/O was/O ready/O,/O that/O the/O house/O would/O be/O a/O little/O
paradise/O,/O and/O that/O he/O advised/O her/O most/O certainly/O to/O go/O./O His/O wife/O's/O
staying/O away/O in/O the/O country/O was/O very/O agreeable/O to/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
from/O every/O point/O of/O view/O:/O it/O did/O the/O children/O good/O,/O it/O decreased/O
expenses/O,/O and/O it/O left/O him/O more/O at/O liberty/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON regarded/O
staying/O in/O the/O country/O for/O the/O summer/O as/O essential/O for/O the/O children/O,/O
especially/O for/O the/O little/O girl/O,/O who/O had/O not/O succeeded/O in/O regaining/O her/O
strength/O after/O the/O scarlatina/O,/O and/O also/O as/O a/O means/O of/O escaping/O the/O petty/O
humiliations/O,/O the/O little/O bills/O owing/O to/O the/O wood-merchant/O,/O the/O
fishmonger/O,/O the/O shoemaker/O,/O which/O made/O her/O miserable/O./O Besides/O this/O,/O she/O
was/O pleased/O to/O go/O away/O to/O the/O country/O because/O she/O was/O dreaming/O of/O
getting/O her/O sister/O Kitty/PERSON to/O stay/O with/O her/O there/O./O Kitty/PERSON was/O to/O be/O back/O
from/O abroad/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O summer/O,/O and/O bathing/O had/O been/O prescribed/O
for/O her/O./O Kitty/PERSON wrote/O that/O no/O prospect/O was/O so/O alluring/O as/O to/O spend/O the/O
summer/O with/O Dolly/PERSON at/O Ergushovo/LOCATION,/O full/O of/O childish/O associations/O for/O both/O
of/O them/O./O

The/O first/O days/O of/O her/O existence/O in/O the/O country/O were/O very/O hard/O for/O Dolly/PERSON./O
She/O used/O to/O stay/O in/O the/O country/O as/O a/O child/O,/O and/O the/O impression/O she/O had/O
retained/O of/O it/O was/O that/O the/O country/O was/O a/O refuge/O from/O all/O the/O
unpleasantness/O of/O the/O town/O,/O that/O life/O there/O,/O though/O not/O luxurious/O--/ODolly/PERSON
could/O easily/O make/O up/O her/O mind/O to/O that/O--/Owas/O cheap/O and/O comfortable/O;/O that/O
there/O was/O plenty/O of/O everything/O,/O everything/O was/O cheap/O,/O everything/O could/O
be/O got/O,/O and/O children/O were/O happy/O./O But/O now/O coming/O to/O the/O country/O as/O the/O
head/O of/O a/O family/O,/O she/O perceived/O that/O it/O was/O all/O utterly/O unlike/O what/O she/O
had/O fancied/O./O

The/O day/O after/O their/O arrival/O there/O was/O a/O heavy/O fall/O of/O rain/O,/O and/O in/O the/O
night/O the/O water/O came/O through/O in/O the/O corridor/O and/O in/O the/O nursery/O,/O so/O that/O
the/O beds/O had/O to/O be/O carried/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O There/O was/O no/O kitchen/O
maid/O to/O be/O found/O;/O of/O the/O nine/O cows/O,/O it/O appeared/O from/O the/O words/O of/O the/O
cowherd-woman/O that/O some/O were/O about/O to/O calve/O,/O others/O had/O just/O calved/O,/O
others/O were/O old/O,/O and/O others/O again/O hard-uddered/O;/O there/O was/O not/O butter/O nor/O
milk/O enough/O even/O for/O the/O children/O./O There/O were/O no/O eggs/O./O They/O could/O get/O no/O
fowls/O;/O old/O,/O purplish/O,/O stringy/O cocks/O were/O all/O they/O had/O for/O roasting/O and/O
boiling/O./O Impossible/O to/O get/O women/O to/O scrub/O the/O floors/O--/Oall/O were/O
potato-hoeing/O./O Driving/O was/O out/O of/O the/O question/O,/O because/O one/O of/O the/O
horses/O was/O restive/O,/O and/O bolted/O in/O the/O shafts/O./O There/O was/O no/O place/O where/O
they/O could/O bathe/O;/O the/O whole/O of/O the/O river-bank/O was/O trampled/O by/O the/O cattle/O
and/O open/O to/O the/O road/O;/O even/O walks/O were/O impossible/O,/O for/O the/O cattle/O strayed/O
into/O the/O garden/O through/O a/O gap/O in/O the/O hedge/O,/O and/O there/O was/O one/O terrible/O
bull/O,/O who/O bellowed/O,/O and/O therefore/O might/O be/O expected/O to/O gore/O somebody/O./O
There/O were/O no/O proper/O cupboards/O for/O their/O clothes/O;/O what/O cupboards/O there/O
were/O either/O would/O not/O close/O at/O all/O,/O or/O burst/O open/O whenever/O anyone/O passed/O
by/O them/O./O There/O were/O no/O pots/O and/O pans/O;/O there/O was/O no/O copper/O in/O the/O
washhouse/O,/O nor/O even/O an/O ironing-board/O in/O the/O maids/O'/O room/O./O

Finding/O instead/O of/O peace/O and/O rest/O all/O these/O,/O from/O her/O point/O of/O view/O,/O
fearful/O calamities/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON was/O at/O first/O in/O despair/O./O She/O
exerted/O herself/O to/O the/O utmost/O,/O felt/O the/O hopelessness/O of/O the/O position/O,/O
and/O was/O every/O instant/O suppressing/O the/O tears/O that/O started/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O
The/O bailiff/O,/O a/O retired/O quartermaster/O,/O whom/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O taken/O
a/O fancy/O to/O and/O had/O appointed/O bailiff/O on/O account/O of/O his/O handsome/O and/O
respectful/O appearance/O as/O a/O hall-porter/O,/O showed/O no/O sympathy/O for/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O woes/O./O He/O said/O respectfully/O,/O ``/Onothing/O can/O be/O done/O,/O the/O
peasants/O are/O such/O a/O wretched/O lot/O,/O''/O and/O did/O nothing/O to/O help/O her/O./O

The/O position/O seemed/O hopeless/O./O But/O in/O the/O Oblonskys/O'/O household/O,/O as/O in/O all/O
families/O indeed/O,/O there/O was/O one/O inconspicuous/O but/O most/O valuable/O and/O
useful/O person/O,/O Marya/PERSON Philimonovna/PERSON./O She/O soothed/O her/O mistress/O,/O assured/O her/O
that/O everything/O would/O _/Ocome/O round/O_/O -LRB-/Oit/O was/O her/O expression/O,/O and/O Matvey/PERSON
had/O borrowed/O it/O from/O her/O-RRB-/O,/O and/O without/O fuss/O or/O hurry/O proceeded/O to/O set/O to/O
work/O herself/O./O She/O had/O immediately/O made/O friends/O with/O the/O bailiff/O's/O wife/O,/O
and/O on/O the/O very/O first/O day/O she/O drank/O tea/O with/O her/O and/O the/O bailiff/O under/O
the/O acacias/O,/O and/O reviewed/O all/O the/O circumstances/O of/O the/O position/O./O Very/O
soon/O Marya/PERSON Philimonovna/PERSON had/O established/O her/O club/O,/O so/O to/O say/O,/O under/O the/O
acacias/O,/O and/O there/O it/O was/O,/O in/O this/O club/O,/O consisting/O of/O the/O bailiff/O's/O
wife/O,/O the/O village/O elder/O,/O and/O the/O counting/O house/O clerk/O,/O that/O the/O
difficulties/O of/O existence/O were/O gradually/O smoothed/O away/O,/O and/O in/O a/O week/O's/O
time/O everything/O actually/O had/O come/O round/O./O The/O roof/O was/O mended/O,/O a/O kitchen/O
maid/O was/O found/O--/Oa/O crony/O of/O the/O village/O elder/O's/O--/Ohens/O were/O bought/O,/O the/O cows/O
began/O giving/O milk/O,/O the/O garden/O hedge/O was/O stopped/O up/O with/O stakes/O,/O the/O
carpenter/O made/O a/O mangle/O,/O hooks/O were/O put/O in/O the/O cupboards/O,/O and/O they/O
ceased/O to/O burst/O open/O spontaneously/O,/O and/O an/O ironing-board/O covered/O with/O
army/O cloth/O was/O placed/O across/O from/O the/O arm/O of/O a/O chair/O to/O the/O chest/O of/O
drawers/O,/O and/O there/O was/O a/O smell/O of/O flatirons/O in/O the/O maids/O'/O room/O./O

``/OJust/O see/O,/O now/O,/O and/O you/O were/O quite/O in/O despair/O,/O''/O said/O Marya/PERSON Philimonovna/PERSON,/O
pointing/O to/O the/O ironing-board/O./O They/O even/O rigged/O up/O a/O bathing-shed/O of/O
straw/O hurdles/O./O Lily/PERSON began/O to/O bathe/O,/O and/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON began/O to/O
realize/O,/O if/O only/O in/O part/O,/O her/O expectations/O,/O if/O not/O of/O a/O peaceful/O,/O at/O
least/O of/O a/O comfortable/O,/O life/O in/O the/O country/O./O Peaceful/O with/O six/O children/O
Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON could/O not/O be/O./O One/O would/O fall/O ill/O,/O another/O might/O
easily/O become/O so/O,/O a/O third/O would/O be/O without/O something/O necessary/O,/O a/O fourth/O
would/O show/O symptoms/O of/O a/O bad/O disposition/O,/O and/O so/O on/O./O Rare/O indeed/O were/O
the/O brief/O periods/O of/O peace/O./O But/O these/O cares/O and/O anxieties/O were/O for/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON the/O sole/O happiness/O possible/O./O Had/O it/O not/O been/O for/O them/O,/O she/O
would/O have/O been/O left/O alone/O to/O brood/O over/O her/O husband/O who/O did/O not/O love/O
her/O./O And/O besides/O,/O hard/O though/O it/O was/O for/O the/O mother/O to/O bear/O the/O dread/O of/O
illness/O,/O the/O illnesses/O themselves/O,/O and/O the/O grief/O of/O seeing/O signs/O of/O evil/O
propensities/O in/O her/O children/O--/Othe/O children/O themselves/O were/O even/O now/O
repaying/O her/O in/O small/O joys/O for/O her/O sufferings/O./O Those/O joys/O were/O so/O small/O
that/O they/O passed/O unnoticed/O,/O like/O gold/O in/O sand/O,/O and/O at/O bad/O moments/O she/O
could/O see/O nothing/O but/O the/O pain/O,/O nothing/O but/O sand/O;/O but/O there/O were/O good/O
moments/O too/O when/O she/O saw/O nothing/O but/O the/O joy/O,/O nothing/O but/O gold/O./O

Now/O in/O the/O solitude/O of/O the/O country/O,/O she/O began/O to/O be/O more/O and/O more/O
frequently/O aware/O of/O those/O joys/O./O Often/O,/O looking/O at/O them/O,/O she/O would/O make/O
every/O possible/O effort/O to/O persuade/O herself/O that/O she/O was/O mistaken/O,/O that/O
she/O as/O a/O mother/O was/O partial/O to/O her/O children/O./O All/O the/O same/O,/O she/O could/O not/O
help/O saying/O to/O herself/O that/O she/O had/O charming/O children/O,/O all/O six/O of/O them/O
in/O different/O ways/O,/O but/O a/O set/O of/O children/O such/O as/O is/O not/O often/O to/O be/O met/O
with/O,/O and/O she/O was/O happy/O in/O them/O,/O and/O proud/O of/O them/O./O



Chapter/O 8/O


Towards/O the/O end/O of/O May/O,/O when/O everything/O had/O been/O more/O or/O less/O
satisfactorily/O arranged/O,/O she/O received/O her/O husband/O's/O answer/O to/O her/O
complaints/O of/O the/O disorganized/O state/O of/O things/O in/O the/O country/O./O He/O wrote/O
begging/O her/O forgiveness/O for/O not/O having/O thought/O of/O everything/O before/O,/O and/O
promised/O to/O come/O down/O at/O the/O first/O chance/O./O This/O chance/O did/O not/O present/O
itself/O,/O and/O till/O the/O beginning/O of/O June/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON stayed/O alone/O
in/O the/O country/O./O

On/O the/O Sunday/O in/O St./LOCATION Peter/LOCATION's/O week/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON drove/O to/O mass/O for/O
all/O her/O children/O to/O take/O the/O sacrament/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON in/O her/O
intimate/O,/O philosophical/O talks/O with/O her/O sister/O,/O her/O mother/O,/O and/O her/O
friends/O very/O often/O astonished/O them/O by/O the/O freedom/O of/O her/O views/O in/O regard/O
to/O religion/O./O She/O had/O a/O strange/O religion/O of/O transmigration/O of/O souls/O all/O
her/O own/O,/O in/O which/O she/O had/O firm/O faith/O,/O troubling/O herself/O little/O about/O the/O
dogmas/O of/O the/O Church/ORGANIZATION./O But/O in/O her/O family/O she/O was/O strict/O in/O carrying/O out/O
all/O that/O was/O required/O by/O the/O Church/ORGANIZATION--/Oand/O not/O merely/O in/O order/O to/O set/O an/O
example/O,/O but/O with/O all/O her/O heart/O in/O it/O./O The/O fact/O that/O the/O children/O had/O
not/O been/O at/O the/O sacrament/O for/O nearly/O a/O year/O worried/O her/O extremely/O,/O and/O
with/O the/O full/O approval/O and/O sympathy/O of/O Marya/PERSON Philimonovna/PERSON she/O decided/O
that/O this/O should/O take/O place/O now/O in/O the/O summer/O./O

For/O several/O days/O before/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON was/O busily/O deliberating/O on/O
how/O to/O dress/O all/O the/O children/O./O Frocks/O were/O made/O or/O altered/O and/O washed/O,/O
seams/O and/O flounces/O were/O let/O out/O,/O buttons/O were/O sewn/O on/O,/O and/O ribbons/O got/O
ready/O./O One/O dress/O,/O Tanya/PERSON's/O,/O which/O the/O English/O governess/O had/O undertaken/O,/O
cost/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON much/O loss/O of/O temper/O./O The/O English/O governess/O in/O
altering/O it/O had/O made/O the/O seams/O in/O the/O wrong/O place/O,/O had/O taken/O up/O the/O
sleeves/O too/O much/O,/O and/O altogether/O spoilt/O the/O dress/O./O It/O was/O so/O narrow/O on/O
Tanya/PERSON's/O shoulders/O that/O it/O was/O quite/O painful/O to/O look/O at/O her/O./O But/O Marya/PERSON
Philimonovna/PERSON had/O the/O happy/O thought/O of/O putting/O in/O gussets/O,/O and/O adding/O a/O
little/O shoulder-cape/O./O The/O dress/O was/O set/O right/O,/O but/O there/O was/O nearly/O a/O
quarrel/O with/O the/O English/O governess/O./O On/O the/O morning/O,/O however/O,/O all/O was/O
happily/O arranged/O,/O and/O towards/O ten/O o'clock/O--/Othe/O time/O at/O which/O they/O had/O
asked/O the/O priest/O to/O wait/O for/O them/O for/O the/O mass/O--/Othe/O children/O in/O their/O new/O
dresses/O,/O with/O beaming/O faces/O,/O stood/O on/O the/O step/O before/O the/O carriage/O
waiting/O for/O their/O mother/O./O

To/O the/O carriage/O,/O instead/O of/O the/O restive/O Raven/O,/O they/O had/O harnessed/O,/O
thanks/O to/O the/O representations/O of/O Marya/PERSON Philimonovna/PERSON,/O the/O bailiff/O's/O
horse/O,/O Brownie/PERSON,/O and/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O delayed/O by/O anxiety/O over/O her/O own/O
attire/O,/O came/O out/O and/O got/O in/O,/O dressed/O in/O a/O white/O muslin/O gown/O./O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON had/O done/O her/O hair/O,/O and/O dressed/O with/O care/O and/O
excitement/O./O In/O the/O old/O days/O she/O had/O dressed/O for/O her/O own/O sake/O to/O look/O
pretty/O and/O be/O admired/O./O Later/O on/O,/O as/O she/O got/O older/O,/O dress/O became/O more/O and/O
more/O distasteful/O to/O her/O./O She/O saw/O that/O she/O was/O losing/O her/O good/O looks/O./O But/O
now/O she/O began/O to/O feel/O pleasure/O and/O interest/O in/O dress/O again/O./O Now/O she/O did/O
not/O dress/O for/O her/O own/O sake/O,/O not/O for/O the/O sake/O of/O her/O own/O beauty/O,/O but/O
simply/O that/O as/O the/O mother/O of/O those/O exquisite/O creatures/O she/O might/O not/O
spoil/O the/O general/O effect/O./O And/O looking/O at/O herself/O for/O the/O last/O time/O in/O
the/O looking-glass/O she/O was/O satisfied/O with/O herself/O./O She/O looked/O nice/O./O Not/O
nice/O as/O she/O would/O have/O wished/O to/O look/O nice/O in/O old/O days/O at/O a/O ball/O,/O but/O
nice/O for/O the/O object/O which/O she/O now/O had/O in/O view/O./O

In/O the/O church/O there/O was/O no/O one/O but/O the/O peasants/O,/O the/O servants/O and/O their/O
women-folk/O./O But/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON saw/O,/O or/O fancied/O she/O saw/O,/O the/O
sensation/O produced/O by/O her/O children/O and/O her/O./O The/O children/O were/O not/O only/O
beautiful/O to/O look/O at/O in/O their/O smart/O little/O dresses/O,/O but/O they/O were/O
charming/O in/O the/O way/O they/O behaved/O./O Aliosha/O,/O it/O is/O true/O,/O did/O not/O stand/O
quite/O correctly/O;/O he/O kept/O turning/O round/O,/O trying/O to/O look/O at/O his/O little/O
jacket/O from/O behind/O;/O but/O all/O the/O same/O he/O was/O wonderfully/O sweet/O./O Tanya/PERSON
behaved/O like/O a/O grownup/O person/O,/O and/O looked/O after/O the/O little/O ones/O./O And/O the/O
smallest/O,/O Lily/PERSON,/O was/O bewitching/O in/O her/O naïve/O astonishment/O at/O everything/O,/O
and/O it/O was/O difficult/O not/O to/O smile/O when/O,/O after/O taking/O the/O sacrament/O,/O she/O
said/O in/O English/O,/O ``/OPlease/O,/O some/O more/O./O''/O

On/O the/O way/O home/O the/O children/O felt/O that/O something/O solemn/O had/O happened/O,/O
and/O were/O very/O sedate/O./O

Everything/O went/O happily/O at/O home/O too/O;/O but/O at/O lunch/O Grisha/PERSON began/O
whistling/O,/O and/O,/O what/O was/O worse/O,/O was/O disobedient/O to/O the/O English/O
governess/O,/O and/O was/O forbidden/O to/O have/O any/O tart/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON would/O
not/O have/O let/O things/O go/O so/O far/O on/O such/O a/O day/O had/O she/O been/O present/O;/O but/O
she/O had/O to/O support/O the/O English/O governess/O's/O authority/O,/O and/O she/O upheld/O her/O
decision/O that/O Grisha/PERSON should/O have/O no/O tart/O./O This/O rather/O spoiled/O the/O
general/O good/O humor/O./O Grisha/PERSON cried/O,/O declaring/O that/O Nikolinka/PERSON had/O whistled/O
too/O,/O and/O he/O was/O not/O punished/O,/O and/O that/O he/O was/On't/O crying/O for/O the/O tart/O--/Ohe/O
did/On't/O care/O--/Obut/O at/O being/O unjustly/O treated/O./O This/O was/O really/O too/O tragic/O,/O
and/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON made/O up/O her/O mind/O to/O persuade/O the/O English/O
governess/O to/O forgive/O Grisha/PERSON,/O and/O she/O went/O to/O speak/O to/O her/O./O But/O on/O the/O
way/O,/O as/O she/O passed/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O she/O beheld/O a/O scene/O,/O filling/O her/O
heart/O with/O such/O pleasure/O that/O the/O tears/O came/O into/O her/O eyes/O,/O and/O she/O
forgave/O the/O delinquent/O herself/O./O

The/O culprit/O was/O sitting/O at/O the/O window/O in/O the/O corner/O of/O the/O drawing/O room/O;/O
beside/O him/O was/O standing/O Tanya/PERSON with/O a/O plate/O./O On/O the/O pretext/O of/O wanting/O to/O
give/O some/O dinner/O to/O her/O dolls/O,/O she/O had/O asked/O the/O governess/O's/O permission/O
to/O take/O her/O share/O of/O tart/O to/O the/O nursery/O,/O and/O had/O taken/O it/O instead/O to/O
her/O brother/O./O While/O still/O weeping/O over/O the/O injustice/O of/O his/O punishment/O,/O
he/O was/O eating/O the/O tart/O,/O and/O kept/O saying/O through/O his/O sobs/O,/O ``/OEat/O yourself/O;/O
let/O's/O eat/O it/O together/O .../O together/O./O''/O

Tanya/PERSON had/O at/O first/O been/O under/O the/O influence/O of/O her/O pity/O for/O Grisha/PERSON,/O then/O
of/O a/O sense/O of/O her/O noble/O action/O,/O and/O tears/O were/O standing/O in/O her/O eyes/O too/O;/O
but/O she/O did/O not/O refuse/O,/O and/O ate/O her/O share/O./O

On/O catching/O sight/O of/O their/O mother/O they/O were/O dismayed/O,/O but/O,/O looking/O into/O
her/O face/O,/O they/O saw/O they/O were/O not/O doing/O wrong/O./O They/O burst/O out/O laughing/O,/O
and/O,/O with/O their/O mouths/O full/O of/O tart/O,/O they/O began/O wiping/O their/O smiling/O
lips/O with/O their/O hands/O,/O and/O smearing/O their/O radiant/O faces/O all/O over/O with/O
tears/O and/O jam/O./O

``/OMercy/O!/O Your/O new/O white/O frock/O!/O Tanya/PERSON!/O Grisha/PERSON!/O''/O said/O their/O mother/O,/O trying/O
to/O save/O the/O frock/O,/O but/O with/O tears/O in/O her/O eyes/O,/O smiling/O a/O blissful/O,/O
rapturous/O smile/O./O

The/O new/O frocks/O were/O taken/O off/O,/O and/O orders/O were/O given/O for/O the/O little/O
girls/O to/O have/O their/O blouses/O put/O on/O,/O and/O the/O boys/O their/O old/O jackets/O,/O and/O
the/O wagonette/O to/O be/O harnessed/O;/O with/O Brownie/PERSON,/O to/O the/O bailiff/O's/O annoyance/O,/O
again/O in/O the/O shafts/O,/O to/O drive/O out/O for/O mushroom/O picking/O and/O bathing/O./O A/O
roar/O of/O delighted/O shrieks/O arose/O in/O the/O nursery/O,/O and/O never/O ceased/O till/O
they/O had/O set/O off/O for/O the/O bathing-place/O./O

They/O gathered/O a/O whole/O basketful/O of/O mushrooms/O;/O even/O Lily/PERSON found/O a/O birch/O
mushroom/O./O It/O had/O always/O happened/O before/O that/O Miss/O Hoole/PERSON found/O them/O and/O
pointed/O them/O out/O to/O her/O;/O but/O this/O time/O she/O found/O a/O big/O one/O quite/O of/O
herself/O,/O and/O there/O was/O a/O general/O scream/O of/O delight/O,/O ``/OLily/PERSON has/O found/O a/O
mushroom/O!/O''/O

Then/O they/O reached/O the/O river/O,/O put/O the/O horses/O under/O the/O birch/O trees/O,/O and/O
went/O to/O the/O bathing-place/O./O The/O coachman/O,/O Terenty/PERSON,/O fastened/O the/O horses/O,/O
who/O kept/O whisking/O away/O the/O flies/O,/O to/O a/O tree/O,/O and/O,/O treading/O down/O the/O
grass/O,/O lay/O down/O in/O the/O shade/O of/O a/O birch/O and/O smoked/O his/O shag/O,/O while/O the/O
never-ceasing/O shrieks/O of/O delight/O of/O the/O children/O floated/O across/O to/O him/O
from/O the/O bathing-place/O./O

Though/O it/O was/O hard/O work/O to/O look/O after/O all/O the/O children/O and/O restrain/O
their/O wild/O pranks/O,/O though/O it/O was/O difficult/O too/O to/O keep/O in/O one/O's/O head/O and/O
not/O mix/O up/O all/O the/O stockings/O,/O little/O breeches/O,/O and/O shoes/O for/O the/O
different/O legs/O,/O and/O to/O undo/O and/O to/O do/O up/O again/O all/O the/O tapes/O and/O
buttons/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O who/O had/O always/O liked/O bathing/O herself/O,/O and/O
believed/O it/O to/O be/O very/O good/O for/O the/O children/O,/O enjoyed/O nothing/O so/O much/O as/O
bathing/O with/O all/O the/O children/O./O To/O go/O over/O all/O those/O fat/O little/O legs/O,/O
pulling/O on/O their/O stockings/O,/O to/O take/O in/O her/O arms/O and/O dip/O those/O little/O
naked/O bodies/O,/O and/O to/O hear/O their/O screams/O of/O delight/O and/O alarm/O,/O to/O see/O the/O
breathless/O faces/O with/O wide-open/O,/O scared/O,/O and/O happy/O eyes/O of/O all/O her/O
splashing/O cherubs/O,/O was/O a/O great/O pleasure/O to/O her/O./O

When/O half/O the/O children/O had/O been/O dressed/O,/O some/O peasant/O women/O in/O holiday/O
dress/O,/O out/O picking/O herbs/O,/O came/O up/O to/O the/O bathing-shed/O and/O stopped/O shyly/O./O
Marya/PERSON Philimonovna/PERSON called/O one/O of/O them/O and/O handed/O her/O a/O sheet/O and/O a/O shirt/O
that/O had/O dropped/O into/O the/O water/O for/O her/O to/O dry/O them/O,/O and/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON began/O to/O talk/O to/O the/O women/O./O At/O first/O they/O laughed/O behind/O
