their/O hands/O and/O did/O not/O understand/O her/O questions/O,/O but/O soon/O they/O grew/O
bolder/O and/O began/O to/O talk/O,/O winning/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O heart/O at/O once/O by/O
the/O genuine/O admiration/O of/O the/O children/O that/O they/O showed/O./O

``/OMy/O,/O what/O a/O beauty/O!/O as/O white/O as/O sugar/O,/O''/O said/O one/O,/O admiring/O Tanitchka/PERSON,/O
and/O shaking/O her/O head/O;/O ``/Obut/O thin/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O she/O has/O been/O ill/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O so/O they/O've/O been/O bathing/O you/O too/O,/O''/O said/O another/O to/O the/O baby/O./O

``/ONo/O;/O he/O's/O only/O three/O months/O old/O,/O''/O answered/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON with/O
pride/O./O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O say/O so/O!/O''/O

``/OAnd/O have/O you/O any/O children/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O've/O had/O four/O;/O I/O've/O two/O living/O--/Oa/O boy/O and/O a/O girl/O./O I/O weaned/O her/O last/O
carnival/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O old/O is/O she/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O two/O years/O old/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O did/O you/O nurse/O her/O so/O long/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O our/O custom/O;/O for/O three/O fasts/O.../O''/O

And/O the/O conversation/O became/O most/O interesting/O to/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON./O What/O
sort/O of/O time/O did/O she/O have/O?/O What/O was/O the/O matter/O with/O the/O boy/O?/O Where/O was/O
her/O husband/O?/O Did/O it/O often/O happen/O?/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON felt/O disinclined/O to/O leave/O the/O peasant/O women/O,/O so/O
interesting/O to/O her/O was/O their/O conversation/O,/O so/O completely/O identical/O were/O
all/O their/O interests/O./O What/O pleased/O her/O most/O of/O all/O was/O that/O she/O saw/O
clearly/O what/O all/O the/O women/O admired/O more/O than/O anything/O was/O her/O having/O so/O
many/O children/O,/O and/O such/O fine/O ones/O./O The/O peasant/O women/O even/O made/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON laugh/O,/O and/O offended/O the/O English/O governess/O,/O because/O she/O was/O
the/O cause/O of/O the/O laughter/O she/O did/O not/O understand/O./O One/O of/O the/O younger/O
women/O kept/O staring/O at/O the/O Englishwoman/O,/O who/O was/O dressing/O after/O all/O the/O
rest/O,/O and/O when/O she/O put/O on/O her/O third/O petticoat/O she/O could/O not/O refrain/O from/O
the/O remark/O,/O ``/OMy/O,/O she/O keeps/O putting/O on/O and/O putting/O on/O,/O and/O she/O'll/O never/O
have/O done/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O they/O all/O went/O off/O into/O roars/O./O



Chapter/O 9/O


On/O the/O drive/O home/O,/O as/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O with/O all/O her/O children/O round/O
her/O,/O their/O heads/O still/O wet/O from/O their/O bath/O,/O and/O a/O kerchief/O tied/O over/O her/O
own/O head/O,/O was/O getting/O near/O the/O house/O,/O the/O coachman/O said/O,/O ``/OThere/O's/O some/O
gentleman/O coming/O:/O the/O master/O of/O Pokrovskoe/LOCATION,/O I/O do/O believe/O./O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON peeped/O out/O in/O front/O,/O and/O was/O delighted/O when/O she/O
recognized/O in/O the/O gray/O hat/O and/O gray/O coat/O the/O familiar/O figure/O of/O Levin/PERSON
walking/O to/O meet/O them/O./O She/O was/O glad/O to/O see/O him/O at/O any/O time/O,/O but/O at/O this/O
moment/O she/O was/O specially/O glad/O he/O should/O see/O her/O in/O all/O her/O glory/O./O No/O one/O
was/O better/O able/O to/O appreciate/O her/O grandeur/O than/O Levin/PERSON./O

Seeing/O her/O,/O he/O found/O himself/O face/O to/O face/O with/O one/O of/O the/O pictures/O of/O
his/O daydream/O of/O family/O life/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O like/O a/O hen/O with/O your/O chickens/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O how/O glad/O I/O am/O to/O see/O you/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O holding/O out/O her/O hand/O to/O him/O./O

``/OGlad/O to/O see/O me/O,/O but/O you/O did/On't/O let/O me/O know/O./O My/O brother/O's/O staying/O with/O
me/O./O I/O got/O a/O note/O from/O Stiva/LOCATION that/O you/O were/O here/O./O''/O

``/OFrom/O Stiva/O?/O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON asked/O with/O surprise/O./O

``/OYes/O;/O he/O writes/O that/O you/O are/O here/O,/O and/O that/O he/O thinks/O you/O might/O allow/O me/O
to/O be/O of/O use/O to/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O as/O he/O said/O it/O he/O became/O suddenly/O
embarrassed/O,/O and/O,/O stopping/O abruptly/O,/O he/O walked/O on/O in/O silence/O by/O the/O
wagonette/O,/O snapping/O off/O the/O buds/O of/O the/O lime/O trees/O and/O nibbling/O them/O./O He/O
was/O embarrassed/O through/O a/O sense/O that/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON would/O be/O annoyed/O
by/O receiving/O from/O an/O outsider/O help/O that/O should/O by/O rights/O have/O come/O from/O
her/O own/O husband/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON certainly/O did/O not/O like/O this/O little/O
way/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O of/O foisting/O his/O domestic/O duties/O on/O others/O./O
And/O she/O was/O at/O once/O aware/O that/O Levin/PERSON was/O aware/O of/O this/O./O It/O was/O just/O for/O
this/O fineness/O of/O perception/O,/O for/O this/O delicacy/O,/O that/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON
liked/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OI/O know/O,/O of/O course/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Othat/O that/O simply/O means/O that/O you/O would/O
like/O to/O see/O me/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O exceedingly/O glad/O./O Though/O I/O can/O fancy/O that/O,/O used/O
to/O town/O housekeeping/O as/O you/O are/O,/O you/O must/O feel/O in/O the/O wilds/O here/O,/O and/O if/O
there/O's/O anything/O wanted/O,/O I/O'm/O altogether/O at/O your/O disposal/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O!/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OAt/O first/O things/O were/O rather/O uncomfortable/O,/O but/O
now/O we/O've/O settled/O everything/O capitally/O--/Othanks/O to/O my/O old/O nurse/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O,/O indicating/O Marya/PERSON Philimonovna/PERSON,/O who/O,/O seeing/O that/O they/O were/O speaking/O
of/O her/O,/O smiled/O brightly/O and/O cordially/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O She/O knew/O him/O,/O and/O knew/O
that/O he/O would/O be/O a/O good/O match/O for/O her/O young/O lady/O,/O and/O was/O very/O keen/O to/O
see/O the/O matter/O settled/O./O

``/OWo/On't/O you/O get/O in/O,/O sir/O,/O we/O'll/O make/O room/O this/O side/O!/O''/O she/O said/O to/O him/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'll/O walk/O./O Children/O,/O who/O'd/O like/O to/O race/O the/O horses/O with/O me/O?/O''/O The/O
children/O knew/O Levin/PERSON very/O little/O,/O and/O could/O not/O remember/O when/O they/O had/O
seen/O him/O,/O but/O they/O experienced/O in/O regard/O to/O him/O none/O of/O that/O strange/O
feeling/O of/O shyness/O and/O hostility/O which/O children/O so/O often/O experience/O
towards/O hypocritical/O,/O grown-up/O people/O,/O and/O for/O which/O they/O are/O so/O often/O
and/O miserably/O punished/O./O Hypocrisy/O in/O anything/O whatever/O may/O deceive/O the/O
cleverest/O and/O most/O penetrating/O man/O,/O but/O the/O least/O wide-awake/O of/O children/O
recognizes/O it/O,/O and/O is/O revolted/O by/O it/O,/O however/O ingeniously/O it/O may/O be/O
disguised/O./O Whatever/O faults/O Levin/PERSON had/O,/O there/O was/O not/O a/O trace/O of/O hypocrisy/O
in/O him/O,/O and/O so/O the/O children/O showed/O him/O the/O same/O friendliness/O that/O they/O
saw/O in/O their/O mother/O's/O face/O./O On/O his/O invitation/O,/O the/O two/O elder/O ones/O at/O
once/O jumped/O out/O to/O him/O and/O ran/O with/O him/O as/O simply/O as/O they/O would/O have/O
done/O with/O their/O nurse/O or/O Miss/O Hoole/PERSON or/O their/O mother/O./O Lily/PERSON,/O too/O,/O began/O
begging/O to/O go/O to/O him/O,/O and/O her/O mother/O handed/O her/O to/O him/O;/O he/O sat/O her/O on/O
his/O shoulder/O and/O ran/O along/O with/O her/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O be/O afraid/O,/O do/On't/O be/O afraid/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O smiling/O
good-humoredly/O to/O the/O mother/O;/O ``/Othere/O's/O no/O chance/O of/O my/O hurting/O or/O
dropping/O her/O./O''/O

And/O,/O looking/O at/O his/O strong/O,/O agile/O,/O assiduously/O careful/O and/O needlessly/O
wary/O movements/O,/O the/O mother/O felt/O her/O mind/O at/O rest/O,/O and/O smiled/O gaily/O and/O
approvingly/O as/O she/O watched/O him/O./O

Here/O,/O in/O the/O country/O,/O with/O children/O,/O and/O with/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O with/O
whom/O he/O was/O in/O sympathy/O,/O Levin/PERSON was/O in/O a/O mood/O not/O infrequent/O with/O him/O,/O of/O
childlike/O light-heartedness/O that/O she/O particularly/O liked/O in/O him/O./O As/O he/O
ran/O with/O the/O children/O,/O he/O taught/O them/O gymnastic/O feats/O,/O set/O Miss/O Hoole/PERSON
laughing/O with/O his/O queer/O English/O accent/O,/O and/O talked/O to/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON
of/O his/O pursuits/O in/O the/O country/O./O

After/O dinner/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O sitting/O alone/O with/O him/O on/O the/O balcony/O,/O
began/O to/O speak/O of/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O know/O,/O Kitty/PERSON's/O coming/O here/O,/O and/O is/O going/O to/O spend/O the/O summer/O with/O
me/O./O''/O

``/OReally/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O flushing/O,/O and/O at/O once/O,/O to/O change/O the/O conversation/O,/O he/O
said/O:/O ``/OThen/O I/O'll/O send/O you/O two/O cows/O,/O shall/O I/O?/O If/O you/O insist/O on/O a/O bill/O you/O
shall/O pay/O me/O five/O roubles/O a/O month/O;/O but/O it/O's/O really/O too/O bad/O of/O you/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O thank/O you/O./O We/O can/O manage/O very/O well/O now/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O then/O,/O I/O'll/O have/O a/O look/O at/O your/O cows/O,/O and/O if/O you/O'll/O allow/O me/O,/O
I/O'll/O give/O directions/O about/O their/O food/O./O Everything/O depends/O on/O their/O
food/O./O''/O

And/O Levin/PERSON,/O to/O turn/O the/O conversation/O,/O explained/O to/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON the/O
theory/O of/O cow-keeping/O,/O based/O on/O the/O principle/O that/O the/O cow/O is/O simply/O a/O
machine/O for/O the/O transformation/O of/O food/O into/O milk/O,/O and/O so/O on/O./O

He/O talked/O of/O this/O,/O and/O passionately/O longed/O to/O hear/O more/O of/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O,/O
at/O the/O same/O time/O,/O was/O afraid/O of/O hearing/O it/O./O He/O dreaded/O the/O breaking/O up/O
of/O the/O inward/O peace/O he/O had/O gained/O with/O such/O effort/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O still/O all/O this/O has/O to/O be/O looked/O after/O,/O and/O who/O is/O there/O to/O
look/O after/O it/O?/O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON responded/O,/O without/O interest/O./O

She/O had/O by/O now/O got/O her/O household/O matters/O so/O satisfactorily/O arranged/O,/O
thanks/O to/O Marya/PERSON Philimonovna/PERSON,/O that/O she/O was/O disinclined/O to/O make/O any/O
change/O in/O them/O;/O besides/O,/O she/O had/O no/O faith/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O knowledge/O of/O
farming/O./O General/O principles/O,/O as/O to/O the/O cow/O being/O a/O machine/O for/O the/O
production/O of/O milk/O,/O she/O looked/O on/O with/O suspicion/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O her/O that/O
such/O principles/O could/O only/O be/O a/O hindrance/O in/O farm/O management/O./O It/O all/O
seemed/O to/O her/O a/O far/O simpler/O matter/O:/O all/O that/O was/O needed/O,/O as/O Marya/PERSON
Philimonovna/PERSON had/O explained/O,/O was/O to/O give/O Brindle/PERSON and/O Whitebreast/LOCATION more/O
food/O and/O drink/O,/O and/O not/O to/O let/O the/O cook/O carry/O all/O the/O kitchen/O slops/O to/O
the/O laundry/O maid/O's/O cow/O./O That/O was/O clear/O./O But/O general/O propositions/O as/O to/O
feeding/O on/O meal/O and/O on/O grass/O were/O doubtful/O and/O obscure/O./O And/O,/O what/O was/O
most/O important/O,/O she/O wanted/O to/O talk/O about/O Kitty/PERSON./O



Chapter/O 10/O


``/OKitty/PERSON writes/O to/O me/O that/O there/O's/O nothing/O she/O longs/O for/O so/O much/O as/O quiet/O
and/O solitude/O,/O''/O Dolly/PERSON said/O after/O the/O silence/O that/O had/O followed/O./O

``/OAnd/O how/O is/O she/O--/Obetter/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON asked/O in/O agitation/O./O

``/OThank/O God/O,/O she/O's/O quite/O well/O again/O./O I/O never/O believed/O her/O lungs/O were/O
affected/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O Dolly/PERSON fancied/O she/O saw/O something/O
touching/O,/O helpless/O,/O in/O his/O face/O as/O he/O said/O this/O and/O looked/O silently/O into/O
her/O face/O./O

``/OLet/O me/O ask/O you/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O
smiling/O her/O kindly/O and/O rather/O mocking/O smile/O,/O ``/Owhy/O is/O it/O you/O are/O angry/O
with/O Kitty/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OI/O?/O I/O'm/O not/O angry/O with/O her/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O are/O angry/O./O Why/O was/O it/O you/O did/O not/O come/O to/O see/O us/O nor/O them/O when/O
you/O were/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION?/O''/O

``/ODarya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O blushing/O up/O to/O the/O roots/O of/O his/O hair/O,/O ``/OI/O
wonder/O really/O that/O with/O your/O kind/O heart/O you/O do/On't/O feel/O this/O./O How/O it/O is/O
you/O feel/O no/O pity/O for/O me/O,/O if/O nothing/O else/O,/O when/O you/O know/O.../O''/O

``/OWhat/O do/O I/O know/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O know/O I/O made/O an/O offer/O and/O that/O I/O was/O refused/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O all/O
the/O tenderness/O he/O had/O been/O feeling/O for/O Kitty/PERSON a/O minute/O before/O was/O
replaced/O by/O a/O feeling/O of/O anger/O for/O the/O slight/O he/O had/O suffered/O./O

``/OWhat/O makes/O you/O suppose/O I/O know/O?/O''/O

``/OBecause/O everybody/O knows/O it/O.../O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O just/O where/O you/O are/O mistaken/O;/O I/O did/O not/O know/O it/O,/O though/O I/O had/O
guessed/O it/O was/O so/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O now/O you/O know/O it/O./O''/O

``/OAll/O I/O knew/O was/O that/O something/O had/O happened/O that/O made/O her/O dreadfully/O
miserable/O,/O and/O that/O she/O begged/O me/O never/O to/O speak/O of/O it/O./O And/O if/O she/O would/O
not/O tell/O me/O,/O she/O would/O certainly/O not/O speak/O of/O it/O to/O anyone/O else/O./O But/O
what/O did/O pass/O between/O you/O?/O Tell/O me/O./O''/O

``/OI/O have/O told/O you/O./O''/O

``/OWhen/O was/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OWhen/O I/O was/O at/O their/O house/O the/O last/O time/O./O''/O

``/ODo/O you/O know/O that/O,/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O ``/OI/O am/O awfully/O,/O awfully/O
sorry/O for/O her/O./O You/O suffer/O only/O from/O pride/O.../O''/O

``/OPerhaps/O so/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Obut/O.../O''/O

She/O interrupted/O him/O./O

``/OBut/O she/O,/O poor/O girl/O .../O I/O am/O awfully/O,/O awfully/O sorry/O for/O her/O./O Now/O I/O see/O
it/O all/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O you/O must/O excuse/O me/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O getting/O up/O./O
``/OGood-bye/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O till/O we/O meet/O again/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O wait/O a/O minute/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O clutching/O him/O by/O the/O sleeve/O./O ``/OWait/O a/O
minute/O,/O sit/O down/O./O''/O

``/OPlease/O,/O please/O,/O do/On't/O let/O us/O talk/O of/O this/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O sitting/O down/O,/O and/O
at/O the/O same/O time/O feeling/O rise/O up/O and/O stir/O within/O his/O heart/O a/O hope/O he/O had/O
believed/O to/O be/O buried/O./O

``/OIf/O I/O did/O not/O like/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O tears/O came/O into/O her/O eyes/O;/O ``/Oif/O I/O
did/O not/O know/O you/O,/O as/O I/O do/O know/O you/O .../O''/O

The/O feeling/O that/O had/O seemed/O dead/O revived/O more/O and/O more/O,/O rose/O up/O and/O took/O
possession/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O heart/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O understand/O it/O all/O now/O,/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON./O ``/OYou/O ca/On't/O
understand/O it/O;/O for/O you/O men/O,/O who/O are/O free/O and/O make/O your/O own/O choice/O,/O it/O's/O
always/O clear/O whom/O you/O love/O./O But/O a/O girl/O's/O in/O a/O position/O of/O suspense/O,/O with/O
all/O a/O woman/O's/O or/O maiden/O's/O modesty/O,/O a/O girl/O who/O sees/O you/O men/O from/O afar/O,/O
who/O takes/O everything/O on/O trust/O,/O--/Oa/O girl/O may/O have/O,/O and/O often/O has/O,/O such/O a/O
feeling/O that/O she/O can/Onot/O tell/O what/O to/O say/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O if/O the/O heart/O does/O not/O speak/O.../O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O the/O heart/O does/O speak/O;/O but/O just/O consider/O:/O you/O men/O have/O views/O about/O a/O
girl/O,/O you/O come/O to/O the/O house/O,/O you/O make/O friends/O,/O you/O criticize/O,/O you/O wait/O
to/O see/O if/O you/O have/O found/O what/O you/O love/O,/O and/O then/O,/O when/O you/O are/O sure/O you/O
love/O her/O,/O you/O make/O an/O offer/O.../O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O that/O's/O not/O quite/O it/O./O''/O

``/OAnyway/O you/O make/O an/O offer/O,/O when/O your/O love/O is/O ripe/O or/O when/O the/O balance/O
has/O completely/O turned/O between/O the/O two/O you/O are/O choosing/O from/O./O But/O a/O girl/O
is/O not/O asked/O./O She/O is/O expected/O to/O make/O her/O choice/O,/O and/O yet/O she/O can/Onot/O
choose/O,/O she/O can/O only/O answer/O `/Oyes/O'/O or/O `/Ono/O./O'/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O to/O choose/O between/O me/O and/O Vronsky/O,/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O the/O dead/O
thing/O that/O had/O come/O to/O life/O within/O him/O died/O again/O,/O and/O only/O weighed/O on/O
his/O heart/O and/O set/O it/O aching/O./O

``/ODarya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/Othat/O's/O how/O one/O chooses/O a/O new/O dress/O or/O
some/O purchase/O or/O other/O,/O not/O love/O./O The/O choice/O has/O been/O made/O,/O and/O so/O much/O
the/O better/O.../O./O And/O there/O can/O be/O no/O repeating/O it/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O pride/O,/O pride/O!/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O as/O though/O despising/O him/O for/O
the/O baseness/O of/O this/O feeling/O in/O comparison/O with/O that/O other/O feeling/O which/O
only/O women/O know/O./O ``/OAt/O the/O time/O when/O you/O made/O Kitty/PERSON an/O offer/O she/O was/O just/O
in/O a/O position/O in/O which/O she/O could/O not/O answer/O./O She/O was/O in/O doubt/O./O Doubt/O
between/O you/O and/O Vronsky/O./O Him/O she/O was/O seeing/O every/O day/O,/O and/O you/O she/O had/O
not/O seen/O for/O a/O long/O while/O./O Supposing/O she/O had/O been/O older/O .../O I/O,/O for/O
instance/O,/O in/O her/O place/O could/O have/O felt/O no/O doubt/O./O I/O always/O disliked/O him/O,/O
and/O so/O it/O has/O turned/O out/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON recalled/O Kitty/PERSON's/O answer/O./O She/O had/O said/O:/O ''/O_/ONo/O,/O that/O can/Onot/O be/O_/O.../O''/O

``/ODarya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O dryly/O,/O ``/OI/O appreciate/O your/O confidence/O in/O
me/O;/O I/O believe/O you/O are/O making/O a/O mistake/O./O But/O whether/O I/O am/O right/O or/O wrong/O,/O
that/O pride/O you/O so/O despise/O makes/O any/O thought/O of/O Katerina/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON out/O
of/O the/O question/O for/O me/O,/O--/Oyou/O understand/O,/O utterly/O out/O of/O the/O question/O./O''/O

``/OI/O will/O only/O say/O one/O thing/O more/O:/O you/O know/O that/O I/O am/O speaking/O of/O my/O
sister/O,/O whom/O I/O love/O as/O I/O love/O my/O own/O children/O./O I/O do/On't/O say/O she/O cared/O for/O
you/O,/O all/O I/O meant/O to/O say/O is/O that/O her/O refusal/O at/O that/O moment/O proves/O
nothing/O./O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O jumping/O up/O./O ``/OIf/O you/O only/O knew/O how/O you/O are/O
hurting/O me/O./O It/O's/O just/O as/O if/O a/O child/O of/O yours/O were/O dead/O,/O and/O they/O were/O to/O
say/O to/O you/O:/O He/O would/O have/O been/O like/O this/O and/O like/O that/O,/O and/O he/O might/O
have/O lived/O,/O and/O how/O happy/O you/O would/O have/O been/O in/O him/O./O But/O he/O's/O dead/O,/O
dead/O,/O dead/O!/O.../O''/O

``/OHow/O absurd/O you/O are/O!/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O looking/O with/O mournful/O
tenderness/O at/O Levin/PERSON's/O excitement/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O I/O see/O it/O all/O more/O and/O more/O
clearly/O,/O''/O she/O went/O on/O musingly/O./O ``/OSo/O you/O wo/On't/O come/O to/O see/O us/O,/O then/O,/O when/O
Kitty/PERSON's/O here/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O sha/On't/O come/O./O Of/O course/O I/O wo/On't/O avoid/O meeting/O Katerina/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O but/O as/O far/O as/O I/O can/O,/O I/O will/O try/O to/O save/O her/O the/O annoyance/O
of/O my/O presence/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O are/O very/O,/O very/O absurd/O,/O''/O repeated/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O looking/O with/O
tenderness/O into/O his/O face/O./O ``/OVery/O well/O then/O,/O let/O it/O be/O as/O though/O we/O had/O
not/O spoken/O of/O this/O./O What/O have/O you/O come/O for/O,/O Tanya/PERSON?/O''/O she/O said/O in/O French/O
to/O the/O little/O girl/O who/O had/O come/O in/O./O

``/OWhere/O's/O my/O spade/O,/O mamma/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O speak/O French/O,/O and/O you/O must/O too/O./O''/O

The/O little/O girl/O tried/O to/O say/O it/O in/O French/O,/O but/O could/O not/O remember/O the/O
French/O for/O spade/O;/O the/O mother/O prompted/O her/O,/O and/O then/O told/O her/O in/O French/O
where/O to/O look/O for/O the/O spade/O./O And/O this/O made/O a/O disagreeable/O impression/O on/O
Levin/PERSON./O

Everything/O in/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O house/O and/O children/O struck/O him/O now/O as/O
by/O no/O means/O so/O charming/O as/O a/O little/O while/O before/O./O ``/OAnd/O what/O does/O she/O
talk/O French/O with/O the/O children/O for/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O;/O ``/Ohow/O unnatural/O and/O false/O
it/O is/O!/O And/O the/O children/O feel/O it/O so/O:/O Learning/O French/O and/O unlearning/O
sincerity/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O to/O himself/O,/O unaware/O that/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON had/O
thought/O all/O that/O over/O twenty/O times/O already/O,/O and/O yet/O,/O even/O at/O the/O cost/O of/O
some/O loss/O of/O sincerity/O,/O believed/O it/O necessary/O to/O teach/O her/O children/O
French/O in/O that/O way/O./O

``/OBut/O why/O are/O you/O going/O?/O Do/O stay/O a/O little/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON stayed/O to/O tea/O;/O but/O his/O good-humor/O had/O vanished/O,/O and/O he/O felt/O ill/O at/O
ease/O./O

After/O tea/O he/O went/O out/O into/O the/O hall/O to/O order/O his/O horses/O to/O be/O put/O in/O,/O
and/O,/O when/O he/O came/O back/O,/O he/O found/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON greatly/O disturbed/O,/O
with/O a/O troubled/O face/O,/O and/O tears/O in/O her/O eyes/O./O While/O Levin/PERSON had/O been/O
outside/O,/O an/O incident/O had/O occurred/O which/O had/O utterly/O shattered/O all/O the/O
happiness/O she/O had/O been/O feeling/O that/O day/O,/O and/O her/O pride/O in/O her/O children/O./O
Grisha/PERSON and/O Tanya/PERSON had/O been/O fighting/O over/O a/O ball/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O
hearing/O a/O scream/O in/O the/O nursery/O,/O ran/O in/O and/O saw/O a/O terrible/O sight/O./O Tanya/PERSON
was/O pulling/O Grisha/PERSON's/O hair/O,/O while/O he/O,/O with/O a/O face/O hideous/O with/O rage/O,/O was/O
beating/O her/O with/O his/O fists/O wherever/O he/O could/O get/O at/O her/O./O Something/O
snapped/O in/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O heart/O when/O she/O saw/O this/O./O It/O was/O as/O if/O
darkness/O had/O swooped/O down/O upon/O her/O life/O;/O she/O felt/O that/O these/O children/O of/O
hers/O,/O that/O she/O was/O so/O proud/O of/O,/O were/O not/O merely/O most/O ordinary/O,/O but/O
positively/O bad/O,/O ill-bred/O children/O,/O with/O coarse/O,/O brutal/O
propensities/O--/Owicked/O children/O./O

She/O could/O not/O talk/O or/O think/O of/O anything/O else/O,/O and/O she/O could/O not/O speak/O to/O
Levin/PERSON of/O her/O misery/O./O

Levin/PERSON saw/O she/O was/O unhappy/O and/O tried/O to/O comfort/O her/O,/O saying/O that/O it/O
showed/O nothing/O bad/O,/O that/O all/O children/O fight/O;/O but/O,/O even/O as/O he/O said/O it/O,/O he/O
was/O thinking/O in/O his/O heart/O:/O ``/ONo/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O be/O artificial/O and/O talk/O French/O
with/O my/O children/O;/O but/O my/O children/O wo/On't/O be/O like/O that/O./O All/O one/O has/O to/O do/O
is/O not/O spoil/O children/O,/O not/O to/O distort/O their/O nature/O,/O and/O they/O'll/O be/O
delightful/O./O No/O,/O my/O children/O wo/On't/O be/O like/O that/O./O''/O

He/O said/O good-bye/O and/O drove/O away/O,/O and/O she/O did/O not/O try/O to/O keep/O him/O./O



Chapter/O 11/O


In/O the/O middle/O of/O July/O the/O elder/O of/O the/O village/O on/O Levin/PERSON's/O sister/O's/O
estate/O,/O about/O fifteen/O miles/O from/O Pokrovskoe/LOCATION,/O came/O to/O Levin/PERSON to/O report/O on/O
how/O things/O were/O going/O there/O and/O on/O the/O hay/O./O The/O chief/O source/O of/O income/O
on/O his/O sister/O's/O estate/O was/O from/O the/O riverside/O meadows/O./O In/O former/O years/O
the/O hay/O had/O been/O bought/O by/O the/O peasants/O for/O twenty/O roubles/O the/O three/O
acres/O./O When/O Levin/PERSON took/O over/O the/O management/O of/O the/O estate/O,/O he/O thought/O on/O
examining/O the/O grasslands/O that/O they/O were/O worth/O more/O,/O and/O he/O fixed/O the/O
price/O at/O twenty-five/O roubles/O the/O three/O acres/O./O The/O peasants/O would/O not/O
give/O that/O price/O,/O and/O,/O as/O Levin/PERSON suspected/O,/O kept/O off/O other/O purchasers/O./O
Then/O Levin/PERSON had/O driven/O over/O himself/O,/O and/O arranged/O to/O have/O the/O grass/O cut/O,/O
partly/O by/O hired/O labor/O,/O partly/O at/O a/O payment/O of/O a/O certain/O proportion/O of/O
the/O crop/O./O His/O own/O peasants/O put/O every/O hindrance/O they/O could/O in/O the/O way/O of/O
this/O new/O arrangement/O,/O but/O it/O was/O carried/O out/O,/O and/O the/O first/O year/O the/O
meadows/O had/O yielded/O a/O profit/O almost/O double/O./O The/O previous/O year/O--/Owhich/O was/O
the/O third/O year/O--/Othe/O peasants/O had/O maintained/O the/O same/O opposition/O to/O the/O
arrangement/O,/O and/O the/O hay/O had/O been/O cut/O on/O the/O same/O system/O./O This/O year/O the/O
peasants/O were/O doing/O all/O the/O mowing/O for/O a/O third/O of/O the/O hay/O crop/O,/O and/O the/O
village/O elder/O had/O come/O now/O to/O announce/O that/O the/O hay/O had/O been/O cut/O,/O and/O
that/O,/O fearing/O rain/O,/O they/O had/O invited/O the/O counting-house/O clerk/O over/O,/O had/O
divided/O the/O crop/O in/O his/O presence/O,/O and/O had/O raked/O together/O eleven/O stacks/O
as/O the/O owner/O's/O share/O./O From/O the/O vague/O answers/O to/O his/O question/O how/O much/O
hay/O had/O been/O cut/O on/O the/O principal/O meadow/O,/O from/O the/O hurry/O of/O the/O village/O
elder/O who/O had/O made/O the/O division/O,/O not/O asking/O leave/O,/O from/O the/O whole/O tone/O
of/O the/O peasant/O,/O Levin/PERSON perceived/O that/O there/O was/O something/O wrong/O in/O the/O
division/O of/O the/O hay/O,/O and/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O to/O drive/O over/O himself/O to/O look/O
into/O the/O matter/O./O

Arriving/O for/O dinner/O at/O the/O village/O,/O and/O leaving/O his/O horse/O at/O the/O cottage/O
of/O an/O old/O friend/O of/O his/O,/O the/O husband/O of/O his/O brother/O's/O wet-nurse/O,/O Levin/PERSON
went/O to/O see/O the/O old/O man/O in/O his/O bee-house/O,/O wanting/O to/O find/O out/O from/O him/O
the/O truth/O about/O the/O hay/O./O Parmenitch/PERSON,/O a/O talkative/O,/O comely/O old/O man/O,/O gave/O
Levin/PERSON a/O very/O warm/O welcome/O,/O showed/O him/O all/O he/O was/O doing/O,/O told/O him/O
everything/O about/O his/O bees/O and/O the/O swarms/O of/O that/O year/O;/O but/O gave/O vague/O
and/O unwilling/O answers/O to/O Levin/PERSON's/O inquiries/O about/O the/O mowing/O./O This/O
confirmed/O Levin/PERSON still/O more/O in/O his/O suspicions/O./O He/O went/O to/O the/O hay/O fields/O
and/O examined/O the/O stacks/O./O The/O haystacks/O could/O not/O possibly/O contain/O fifty/O
wagon-loads/O each/O,/O and/O to/O convict/O the/O peasants/O Levin/PERSON ordered/O the/O wagons/O
that/O had/O carried/O the/O hay/O to/O be/O brought/O up/O directly/O,/O to/O lift/O one/O stack/O,/O
and/O carry/O it/O into/O the/O barn/O./O There/O turned/O out/O to/O be/O only/O thirty-two/O loads/O
in/O the/O stack/O./O In/O spite/O of/O the/O village/O elder/O's/O assertions/O about/O the/O
compressibility/O of/O hay/O,/O and/O its/O having/O settled/O down/O in/O the/O stacks/O,/O and/O
his/O swearing/O that/O everything/O had/O been/O done/O in/O the/O fear/O of/O God/O,/O Levin/PERSON
stuck/O to/O his/O point/O that/O the/O hay/O had/O been/O divided/O without/O his/O orders/O,/O and/O
that/O,/O therefore/O,/O he/O would/O not/O accept/O that/O hay/O as/O fifty/O loads/O to/O a/O stack/O./O
After/O a/O prolonged/O dispute/O the/O matter/O was/O decided/O by/O the/O peasants/O taking/O
these/O eleven/O stacks/O,/O reckoning/O them/O as/O fifty/O loads/O each/O./O The/O arguments/O
and/O the/O division/O of/O the/O haycocks/O lasted/O the/O whole/O afternoon/O./O When/O the/O
last/O of/O the/O hay/O had/O been/O divided/O,/O Levin/PERSON,/O intrusting/O the/O superintendence/O
of/O the/O rest/O to/O the/O counting-house/O clerk/O,/O sat/O down/O on/O a/O haycock/O marked/O
off/O by/O a/O stake/O of/O willow/O,/O and/O looked/O admiringly/O at/O the/O meadow/O swarming/O
with/O peasants/O./O

In/O front/O of/O him/O,/O in/O the/O bend/O of/O the/O river/O beyond/O the/O marsh/O,/O moved/O a/O
bright-colored/O line/O of/O peasant/O women/O,/O and/O the/O scattered/O hay/O was/O being/O
rapidly/O formed/O into/O gray/O winding/O rows/O over/O the/O pale/O green/O stubble/O./O After/O
the/O women/O came/O the/O men/O with/O pitchforks/O,/O and/O from/O the/O gray/O rows/O there/O
were/O growing/O up/O broad/O,/O high/O,/O soft/O haycocks/O./O To/O the/O left/O,/O carts/O were/O
rumbling/O over/O the/O meadow/O that/O had/O been/O already/O cleared/O,/O and/O one/O after/O
another/O the/O haycocks/O vanished/O,/O flung/O up/O in/O huge/O forkfuls/O,/O and/O in/O their/O
place/O there/O were/O rising/O heavy/O cartloads/O of/O fragrant/O hay/O hanging/O over/O the/O
horses/O'/O hind-quarters/O./O

``/OWhat/O weather/O for/O haying/O!/O What/O hay/O it/O'll/O be/O!/O''/O said/O an/O old/O man/O,/O squatting/O
down/O beside/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OIt/O's/O tea/O,/O not/O hay/O!/O It/O's/O like/O scattering/O grain/O to/O the/O
ducks/O,/O the/O way/O they/O pick/O it/O up/O!/O''/O he/O added/O,/O pointing/O to/O the/O growing/O
haycocks/O./O ``/OSince/O dinnertime/O they/O've/O carried/O a/O good/O half/O of/O it/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O last/O load/O,/O eh/O?/O''/O he/O shouted/O to/O a/O young/O peasant/O,/O who/O drove/O by/O,/O
standing/O in/O the/O front/O of/O an/O empty/O cart/O,/O shaking/O the/O cord/O reins/O./O

``/OThe/O last/O,/O dad/O!/O''/O the/O lad/O shouted/O back/O,/O pulling/O in/O the/O horse/O,/O and/O,/O
smiling/O,/O he/O looked/O round/O at/O a/O bright/O,/O rosy-checked/O peasant/O girl/O who/O sat/O
in/O the/O cart/O smiling/O too/O,/O and/O drove/O on/O./O

``/OWho/O's/O that/O?/O Your/O son/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OMy/O baby/O,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O man/O with/O a/O tender/O smile/O./O

``/OWhat/O a/O fine/O fellow/O!/O''/O

``/OThe/O lad/O's/O all/O right/O./O''/O

``/OMarried/O already/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O two/O years/O last/O St./LOCATION Philip/LOCATION's/O day/O./O''/O

``/OAny/O children/O?/O''/O

``/OChildren/O indeed/O!/O Why/O,/O for/O over/O a/O year/O he/O was/O innocent/O as/O a/O babe/O
himself/O,/O and/O bashful/O too/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O old/O man/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O the/O hay/O!/O It/O's/O as/O
fragrant/O as/O tea/O!/O''/O he/O repeated/O,/O wishing/O to/O change/O the/O subject/O./O

Levin/PERSON looked/O more/O attentively/O at/O Ivan/PERSON Parmenov/PERSON and/O his/O wife/O./O They/O were/O
loading/O a/O haycock/O onto/O the/O cart/O not/O far/O from/O him/O./O Ivan/PERSON Parmenov/PERSON was/O
standing/O on/O the/O cart/O,/O taking/O,/O laying/O in/O place/O,/O and/O stamping/O down/O the/O
huge/O bundles/O of/O hay/O,/O which/O his/O pretty/O young/O wife/O deftly/O handed/O up/O to/O
him/O,/O at/O first/O in/O armfuls/O,/O and/O then/O on/O the/O pitchfork/O./O The/O young/O wife/O
worked/O easily/O,/O merrily/O,/O and/O dexterously/O./O The/O close-packed/O hay/O did/O not/O
once/O break/O away/O off/O her/O fork/O./O First/O she/O gathered/O it/O together/O,/O stuck/O the/O
fork/O into/O it/O,/O then/O with/O a/O rapid/O,/O supple/O movement/O leaned/O the/O whole/O weight/O
of/O her/O body/O on/O it/O,/O and/O at/O once/O with/O a/O bend/O of/O her/O back/O under/O the/O red/O
belt/O she/O drew/O herself/O up/O,/O and/O arching/O her/O full/O bosom/O under/O the/O white/O
smock/O,/O with/O a/O smart/O turn/O swung/O the/O fork/O in/O her/O arms/O,/O and/O flung/O the/O
bundle/O of/O hay/O high/O onto/O the/O cart/O./O Ivan/PERSON,/O obviously/O doing/O his/O best/O to/O save/O
her/O every/O minute/O of/O unnecessary/O labor/O,/O made/O haste/O,/O opening/O his/O arms/O to/O
clutch/O the/O bundle/O and/O lay/O it/O in/O the/O cart/O./O As/O she/O raked/O together/O what/O was/O
left/O of/O the/O hay/O,/O the/O young/O wife/O shook/O off/O the/O bits/O of/O hay/O that/O had/O
fallen/O on/O her/O neck/O,/O and/O straightening/O the/O red/O kerchief/O that/O had/O dropped/O
forward/O over/O her/O white/O brow/O,/O not/O browned/O like/O her/O face/O by/O the/O sun/O,/O she/O
crept/O under/O the/O cart/O to/O tie/O up/O the/O load/O./O Ivan/PERSON directed/O her/O how/O to/O fasten/O
the/O cord/O to/O the/O cross-piece/O,/O and/O at/O something/O she/O said/O he/O laughed/O aloud/O./O
In/O the/O expressions/O of/O both/O faces/O was/O to/O be/O seen/O vigorous/O,/O young/O,/O freshly/O
awakened/O love/O./O



Chapter/O 12/O


The/O load/O was/O tied/O on/O./O Ivan/PERSON jumped/O down/O and/O took/O the/O quiet/O,/O sleek/O horse/O
by/O the/O bridle/O./O The/O young/O wife/O flung/O the/O rake/O up/O on/O the/O load/O,/O and/O with/O a/O
bold/O step/O,/O swinging/O her/O arms/O,/O she/O went/O to/O join/O the/O women/O,/O who/O were/O
forming/O a/O ring/O for/O the/O haymakers/O'/O dance/O./O Ivan/PERSON drove/O off/O to/O the/O road/O and/O
fell/O into/O line/O with/O the/O other/O loaded/O carts/O./O The/O peasant/O women/O,/O with/O
their/O rakes/O on/O their/O shoulders/O,/O gay/O with/O bright/O flowers/O,/O and/O chattering/O
with/O ringing/O,/O merry/O voices/O,/O walked/O behind/O the/O hay/O cart/O./O One/O wild/O
untrained/O female/O voice/O broke/O into/O a/O song/O,/O and/O sang/O it/O alone/O through/O a/O
verse/O,/O and/O then/O the/O same/O verse/O was/O taken/O up/O and/O repeated/O by/O half/O a/O
hundred/O strong/O healthy/O voices/O,/O of/O all/O sorts/O,/O coarse/O and/O fine/O,/O singing/O in/O
unison/O./O

The/O women/O,/O all/O singing/O,/O began/O to/O come/O close/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O he/O felt/O as/O
though/O a/O storm/O were/O swooping/O down/O upon/O him/O with/O a/O thunder/O of/O merriment/O./O
The/O storm/O swooped/O down/O,/O enveloped/O him/O and/O the/O haycock/O on/O which/O he/O was/O
lying/O,/O and/O the/O other/O haycocks/O,/O and/O the/O wagon-loads/O,/O and/O the/O whole/O meadow/O
and/O distant/O fields/O all/O seemed/O to/O be/O shaking/O and/O singing/O to/O the/O measures/O
of/O this/O wild/O merry/O song/O with/O its/O shouts/O and/O whistles/O and/O clapping/O./O Levin/PERSON
felt/O envious/O of/O this/O health/O and/O mirthfulness/O;/O he/O longed/O to/O take/O part/O in/O
the/O expression/O of/O this/O joy/O of/O life/O./O But/O he/O could/O do/O nothing/O,/O and/O had/O to/O
lie/O and/O look/O on/O and/O listen/O./O When/O the/O peasants/O,/O with/O their/O singing/O,/O had/O
vanished/O out/O of/O sight/O and/O hearing/O,/O a/O weary/O feeling/O of/O despondency/O at/O his/O
own/O isolation/O,/O his/O physical/O inactivity/O,/O his/O alienation/O from/O this/O world/O,/O
came/O over/O Levin/PERSON./O

Some/O of/O the/O very/O peasants/O who/O had/O been/O most/O active/O in/O wrangling/O with/O him/O
over/O the/O hay/O,/O some/O whom/O he/O had/O treated/O with/O contumely/O,/O and/O who/O had/O tried/O
to/O cheat/O him/O,/O those/O very/O peasants/O had/O greeted/O him/O goodhumoredly/O,/O and/O
evidently/O had/O not/O,/O were/O incapable/O of/O having/O any/O feeling/O of/O rancor/O
against/O him/O,/O any/O regret/O,/O any/O recollection/O even/O of/O having/O tried/O to/O
deceive/O him/O./O All/O that/O was/O drowned/O in/O a/O sea/O of/O merry/O common/O labor/O./O God/O
gave/O the/O day/O,/O God/O gave/O the/O strength/O./O And/O the/O day/O and/O the/O strength/O were/O
consecrated/O to/O labor/O,/O and/O that/O labor/O was/O its/O own/O reward/O./O For/O whom/O the/O
labor/O?/O What/O would/O be/O its/O fruits/O?/O These/O were/O idle/O considerations/O--/Obeside/O
the/O point/O./O

Often/O Levin/PERSON had/O admired/O this/O life/O,/O often/O he/O had/O a/O sense/O of/O envy/O of/O the/O
men/O who/O led/O this/O life/O;/O but/O today/O for/O the/O first/O time/O,/O especially/O under/O
the/O influence/O of/O what/O he/O had/O seen/O in/O the/O attitude/O of/O Ivan/PERSON Parmenov/PERSON to/O
his/O young/O wife/O,/O the/O idea/O presented/O itself/O definitely/O to/O his/O mind/O that/O it/O
was/O in/O his/O power/O to/O exchange/O the/O dreary/O,/O artificial/O,/O idle/O,/O and/O
individualistic/O life/O he/O was/O leading/O for/O this/O laborious/O,/O pure/O,/O and/O
socially/O delightful/O life/O./O

The/O old/O man/O who/O had/O been/O sitting/O beside/O him/O had/O long/O ago/O gone/O home/O;/O the/O
people/O had/O all/O separated/O./O Those/O who/O lived/O near/O had/O gone/O home/O,/O while/O
those/O who/O came/O from/O far/O were/O gathered/O into/O a/O group/O for/O supper/O,/O and/O to/O
spend/O the/O night/O in/O the/O meadow/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O unobserved/O by/O the/O peasants/O,/O still/O
lay/O on/O the/O haycock/O,/O and/O still/O looked/O on/O and/O listened/O and/O mused/O./O The/O
peasants/O who/O remained/O for/O the/O night/O in/O the/O meadow/O scarcely/O slept/O all/O the/O
short/O summer/O night/O./O At/O first/O there/O was/O the/O sound/O of/O merry/O talk/O and/O
laughing/O all/O together/O over/O the/O supper/O,/O then/O singing/O again/O and/O laughter/O./O

All/O the/O long/O day/O of/O toil/O had/O left/O no/O trace/O in/O them/O but/O lightness/O of/O
heart/O./O Before/O the/O early/O dawn/O all/O was/O hushed/O./O Nothing/O was/O to/O be/O heard/O but/O
the/O night/O sounds/O of/O the/O frogs/O that/O never/O ceased/O in/O the/O marsh/O,/O and/O the/O
horses/O snorting/O in/O the/O mist/O that/O rose/O over/O the/O meadow/O before/O the/O
morning/O./O Rousing/O himself/O,/O Levin/PERSON got/O up/O from/O the/O haycock/O,/O and/O looking/O at/O
the/O stars/O,/O he/O saw/O that/O the/O night/O was/O over/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O am/O I/O going/O to/O do/O?/O How/O am/O I/O to/O set/O about/O it/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O
himself/O,/O trying/O to/O express/O to/O himself/O all/O the/O thoughts/O and/O feelings/O he/O
had/O passed/O through/O in/O that/O brief/O night/O./O All/O the/O thoughts/O and/O feelings/O he/O
had/O passed/O through/O fell/O into/O three/O separate/O trains/O of/O thought/O./O One/O was/O
the/O renunciation/O of/O his/O old/O life/O,/O of/O his/O utterly/O useless/O education/O./O This/O
renunciation/O gave/O him/O satisfaction/O,/O and/O was/O easy/O and/O simple/O./O Another/O
series/O of/O thoughts/O and/O mental/O images/O related/O to/O the/O life/O he/O longed/O to/O
live/O now/O./O The/O simplicity/O,/O the/O purity/O,/O the/O sanity/O of/O this/O life/O he/O felt/O
clearly/O,/O and/O he/O was/O convinced/O he/O would/O find/O in/O it/O the/O content/O,/O the/O
peace/O,/O and/O the/O dignity/O,/O of/O the/O lack/O of/O which/O he/O was/O so/O miserably/O
conscious/O./O But/O a/O third/O series/O of/O ideas/O turned/O upon/O the/O question/O how/O to/O
effect/O this/O transition/O from/O the/O old/O life/O to/O the/O new/O./O And/O there/O nothing/O
took/O clear/O shape/O for/O him/O./O ``/OHave/O a/O wife/O?/O Have/O work/O and/O the/O necessity/O of/O
work/O?/O Leave/O Pokrovskoe/O?/O Buy/O land/O?/O Become/O a/O member/O of/O a/O peasant/O
community/O?/O Marry/O a/O peasant/O girl/O?/O How/O am/O I/O to/O set/O about/O it/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O
himself/O again/O,/O and/O could/O not/O find/O an/O answer/O./O ``/OI/O have/On't/O slept/O all/O night/O,/O
though/O,/O and/O I/O ca/On't/O think/O it/O out/O clearly/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O./O ``/OI/O'll/O
work/O it/O out/O later/O./O One/O thing/O's/O certain/O,/O this/O night/O has/O decided/O my/O fate/O./O
All/O my/O old/O dreams/O of/O home/O life/O were/O absurd/O,/O not/O the/O real/O thing/O,/O''/O he/O told/O
himself/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O all/O ever/O so/O much/O simpler/O and/O better/O.../O''/O

``/OHow/O beautiful/O!/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O looking/O at/O the/O strange/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O
mother-of-pearl/O shell/O of/O white/O fleecy/O cloudlets/O resting/O right/O over/O his/O
head/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O sky/O./O ``/OHow/O exquisite/O it/O all/O is/O in/O this/O
exquisite/O night/O!/O And/O when/O was/O there/O time/O for/O that/O cloud-shell/O to/O form/O?/O
Just/O now/O I/O looked/O at/O the/O sky/O,/O and/O there/O was/O nothing/O in/O it/O--/Oonly/O two/O white/O
streaks/O./O Yes/O,/O and/O so/O imperceptibly/O too/O my/O views/O of/O life/O changed/O!/O''/O

He/O went/O out/O of/O the/O meadow/O and/O walked/O along/O the/O highroad/O towards/O the/O
village/O./O A/O slight/O wind/O arose/O,/O and/O the/O sky/O looked/O gray/O and/O sullen/O./O The/O
gloomy/O moment/O had/O come/O that/O usually/O precedes/O the/O dawn/O,/O the/O full/O triumph/O
of/O light/O over/O darkness/O./O

Shrinking/O from/O the/O cold/O,/O Levin/PERSON walked/O rapidly/O,/O looking/O at/O the/O ground/O./O
``/OWhat/O's/O that/O?/O Someone/O coming/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O catching/O the/O tinkle/O of/O bells/O,/O
and/O lifting/O his/O head/O./O Forty/O paces/O from/O him/O a/O carriage/O with/O four/O horses/O
harnessed/O abreast/O was/O driving/O towards/O him/O along/O the/O grassy/O road/O on/O which/O
he/O was/O walking/O./O The/O shaft-horses/O were/O tilted/O against/O the/O shafts/O by/O the/O
ruts/O,/O but/O the/O dexterous/O driver/O sitting/O on/O the/O box/O held/O the/O shaft/O over/O
the/O ruts/O,/O so/O that/O the/O wheels/O ran/O on/O the/O smooth/O part/O of/O the/O road/O./O

This/O was/O all/O Levin/PERSON noticed/O,/O and/O without/O wondering/O who/O it/O could/O be/O,/O he/O
gazed/O absently/O at/O the/O coach/O./O

In/O the/O coach/O was/O an/O old/O lady/O dozing/O in/O one/O corner/O,/O and/O at/O the/O window/O,/O
evidently/O only/O just/O awake/O,/O sat/O a/O young/O girl/O holding/O in/O both/O hands/O the/O
ribbons/O of/O a/O white/O cap/O./O With/O a/O face/O full/O of/O light/O and/O thought/O,/O full/O of/O a/O
subtle/O,/O complex/O inner/O life/O,/O that/O was/O remote/O from/O Levin/PERSON,/O she/O was/O gazing/O
beyond/O him/O at/O the/O glow/O of/O the/O sunrise/O./O

At/O the/O very/O instant/O when/O this/O apparition/O was/O vanishing/O,/O the/O truthful/O
eyes/O glanced/O at/O him/O./O She/O recognized/O him/O,/O and/O her/O face/O lighted/O up/O with/O
wondering/O delight/O./O

He/O could/O not/O be/O mistaken/O./O There/O were/O no/O other/O eyes/O like/O those/O in/O the/O
world/O./O There/O was/O only/O one/O creature/O in/O the/O world/O that/O could/O concentrate/O
for/O him/O all/O the/O brightness/O and/O meaning/O of/O life/O./O It/O was/O she/O./O It/O was/O
Kitty/PERSON./O He/O understood/O that/O she/O was/O driving/O to/O Ergushovo/LOCATION from/O the/O railway/O
station/O./O And/O everything/O that/O had/O been/O stirring/O Levin/PERSON during/O that/O
sleepless/O night/O,/O all/O the/O resolutions/O he/O had/O made/O,/O all/O vanished/O at/O once/O./O
He/O recalled/O with/O horror/O his/O dreams/O of/O marrying/O a/O peasant/O girl/O./O There/O
only/O,/O in/O the/O carriage/O that/O had/O crossed/O over/O to/O the/O other/O side/O of/O the/O
road/O,/O and/O was/O rapidly/O disappearing/O,/O there/O only/O could/O he/O find/O the/O
solution/O of/O the/O riddle/O of/O his/O life/O,/O which/O had/O weighed/O so/O agonizingly/O
upon/O him/O of/O late/O./O

She/O did/O not/O look/O out/O again/O./O The/O sound/O of/O the/O carriage-springs/O was/O no/O
longer/O audible/O,/O the/O bells/O could/O scarcely/O be/O heard/O./O The/O barking/O of/O dogs/O
showed/O the/O carriage/O had/O reached/O the/O village/O,/O and/O all/O that/O was/O left/O was/O
the/O empty/O fields/O all/O round/O,/O the/O village/O in/O front/O,/O and/O he/O himself/O
isolated/O and/O apart/O from/O it/O all/O,/O wandering/O lonely/O along/O the/O deserted/O
highroad/O./O

He/O glanced/O at/O the/O sky/O,/O expecting/O to/O find/O there/O the/O cloud/O shell/O he/O had/O
been/O admiring/O and/O taking/O as/O the/O symbol/O of/O the/O ideas/O and/O feelings/O of/O that/O
night/O./O There/O was/O nothing/O in/O the/O sky/O in/O the/O least/O like/O a/O shell/O./O There/O,/O in/O
the/O remote/O heights/O above/O,/O a/O mysterious/O change/O had/O been/O accomplished/O./O
There/O was/O no/O trace/O of/O shell/O,/O and/O there/O was/O stretched/O over/O fully/O half/O the/O
sky/O an/O even/O cover/O of/O tiny/O and/O ever/O tinier/O cloudlets/O./O The/O sky/O had/O grown/O
blue/O and/O bright/O;/O and/O with/O the/O same/O softness/O,/O but/O with/O the/O same/O
remoteness/O,/O it/O met/O his/O questioning/O gaze/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O,/O ``/Ohowever/O good/O that/O life/O of/O simplicity/O and/O toil/O
may/O be/O,/O I/O can/Onot/O go/O back/O to/O it/O./O I/O love/O _/Oher/O_/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 13/O


None/O but/O those/O who/O were/O most/O intimate/O with/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON knew/O
that/O,/O while/O on/O the/O surface/O the/O coldest/O and/O most/O reasonable/O of/O men/O,/O he/O
had/O one/O weakness/O quite/O opposed/O to/O the/O general/O trend/O of/O his/O character/O./O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON could/O not/O hear/O or/O see/O a/O child/O or/O woman/O crying/O
without/O being/O moved/O./O The/O sight/O of/O tears/O threw/O him/O into/O a/O state/O of/O
nervous/O agitation/O,/O and/O he/O utterly/O lost/O all/O power/O of/O reflection/O./O The/O
chief/O secretary/O of/O his/O department/O and/O his/O private/O secretary/O were/O aware/O
of/O this/O,/O and/O used/O to/O warn/O women/O who/O came/O with/O petitions/O on/O no/O account/O to/O
give/O way/O to/O tears/O,/O if/O they/O did/O not/O want/O to/O ruin/O their/O chances/O./O ``/OHe/O will/O
get/O angry/O,/O and/O will/O not/O listen/O to/O you/O,/O''/O they/O used/O to/O say/O./O And/O as/O a/O fact/O,/O
in/O such/O cases/O the/O emotional/O disturbance/O set/O up/O in/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
by/O the/O sight/O of/O tears/O found/O expression/O in/O hasty/O anger/O./O ``/OI/O can/O do/O
nothing/O./O Kindly/O leave/O the/O room/O!/O''/O he/O would/O commonly/O cry/O in/O such/O cases/O./O

When/O returning/O from/O the/O races/O Anna/PERSON had/O informed/O him/O of/O her/O relations/O
with/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O immediately/O afterwards/O had/O burst/O into/O tears/O,/O hiding/O
her/O face/O in/O her/O hands/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O for/O all/O the/O fury/O aroused/O
in/O him/O against/O her/O,/O was/O aware/O at/O the/O same/O time/O of/O a/O rush/O of/O that/O
emotional/O disturbance/O always/O produced/O in/O him/O by/O tears/O./O Conscious/O of/O it/O,/O
and/O conscious/O that/O any/O expression/O of/O his/O feelings/O at/O that/O minute/O would/O
be/O out/O of/O keeping/O with/O the/O position/O,/O he/O tried/O to/O suppress/O every/O
manifestation/O of/O life/O in/O himself/O,/O and/O so/O neither/O stirred/O nor/O looked/O at/O
her/O./O This/O was/O what/O had/O caused/O that/O strange/O expression/O of/O deathlike/O
rigidity/O in/O his/O face/O which/O had/O so/O impressed/O Anna/PERSON./O

When/O they/O reached/O the/O house/O he/O helped/O her/O to/O get/O out/O of/O the/O carriage/O,/O
and/O making/O an/O effort/O to/O master/O himself/O,/O took/O leave/O of/O her/O with/O his/O usual/O
urbanity/O,/O and/O uttered/O that/O phrase/O that/O bound/O him/O to/O nothing/O;/O he/O said/O
that/O tomorrow/O he/O would/O let/O her/O know/O his/O decision/O./O

His/O wife/O's/O words/O,/O confirming/O his/O worst/O suspicions/O,/O had/O sent/O a/O cruel/O pang/O
to/O the/O heart/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O That/O pang/O was/O intensified/O by/O the/O
strange/O feeling/O of/O physical/O pity/O for/O her/O set/O up/O by/O her/O tears/O./O But/O when/O
he/O was/O all/O alone/O in/O the/O carriage/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O to/O his/O surprise/O
and/O delight/O,/O felt/O complete/O relief/O both/O from/O this/O pity/O and/O from/O the/O
doubts/O and/O agonies/O of/O jealousy/O./O

He/O experienced/O the/O sensations/O of/O a/O man/O who/O has/O had/O a/O tooth/O out/O after/O
suffering/O long/O from/O toothache/O./O After/O a/O fearful/O agony/O and/O a/O sense/O of/O
something/O huge/O,/O bigger/O than/O the/O head/O itself/O,/O being/O torn/O out/O of/O his/O jaw/O,/O
the/O sufferer/O,/O hardly/O able/O to/O believe/O in/O his/O own/O good/O luck/O,/O feels/O all/O at/O
once/O that/O what/O has/O so/O long/O poisoned/O his/O existence/O and/O enchained/O his/O
attention/O,/O exists/O no/O longer/O,/O and/O that/O he/O can/O live/O and/O think/O again/O,/O and/O
take/O interest/O in/O other/O things/O besides/O his/O tooth/O./O This/O feeling/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O experiencing/O./O The/O agony/O had/O been/O strange/O and/O
terrible/O,/O but/O now/O it/O was/O over/O;/O he/O felt/O that/O he/O could/O live/O again/O and/O
think/O of/O something/O other/O than/O his/O wife/O./O

``/ONo/O honor/O,/O no/O heart/O,/O no/O religion/O;/O a/O corrupt/O woman/O./O I/O always/O knew/O it/O and/O
always/O saw/O it/O,/O though/O I/O tried/O to/O deceive/O myself/O to/O spare/O her/O,/O''/O he/O said/O
to/O himself/O./O And/O it/O actually/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O he/O always/O had/O seen/O it/O:/O he/O
recalled/O incidents/O of/O their/O past/O life/O,/O in/O which/O he/O had/O never/O seen/O
anything/O wrong/O before/O--/Onow/O these/O incidents/O proved/O clearly/O that/O she/O had/O
always/O been/O a/O corrupt/O woman/O./O ``/OI/O made/O a/O mistake/O in/O linking/O my/O life/O to/O
hers/O;/O but/O there/O was/O nothing/O wrong/O in/O my/O mistake/O,/O and/O so/O I/O can/Onot/O be/O
unhappy/O./O It/O's/O not/O I/O that/O am/O to/O blame/O,/O''/O he/O told/O himself/O,/O ``/Obut/O she/O./O But/O I/O
have/O nothing/O to/O do/O with/O her/O./O She/O does/O not/O exist/O for/O me/O.../O''/O

Everything/O relating/O to/O her/O and/O her/O son/O,/O towards/O whom/O his/O sentiments/O were/O
as/O much/O changed/O as/O towards/O her/O,/O ceased/O to/O interest/O him/O./O The/O only/O thing/O
that/O interested/O him/O now/O was/O the/O question/O of/O in/O what/O way/O he/O could/O best/O,/O
with/O most/O propriety/O and/O comfort/O for/O himself/O,/O and/O thus/O with/O most/O justice/O,/O

fall/O,/O and/O then/O proceed/O along/O his/O path/O of/O active/O,/O honorable/O,/O and/O useful/O
existence/O./O

``/OI/O can/Onot/O be/O made/O unhappy/O by/O the/O fact/O that/O a/O contemptible/O woman/O has/O
committed/O a/O crime/O./O I/O have/O only/O to/O find/O the/O best/O way/O out/O of/O the/O difficult/O
position/O in/O which/O she/O has/O placed/O me/O./O And/O I/O shall/O find/O it/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O
himself/O,/O frowning/O more/O and/O more/O./O ``/OI/O'm/O not/O the/O first/O nor/O the/O last/O./O''/O And/O
to/O say/O nothing/O of/O historical/O instances/O dating/O from/O the/O ``/OFair/O Helen/O''/O of/O
Menelaus/PERSON,/O recently/O revived/O in/O the/O memory/O of/O all/O,/O a/O whole/O list/O of/O
contemporary/O examples/O of/O husbands/O with/O unfaithful/O wives/O in/O the/O highest/O
society/O rose/O before/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O imagination/O./O ``/ODaryalov/O,/O
Poltavsky/O,/O Prince/O Karibanov/PERSON,/O Count/O Paskudin/O,/O Dram/O.../O./O Yes/O,/O even/O Dram/O,/O
such/O an/O honest/O,/O capable/O fellow/O .../O Semyonov/PERSON,/O Tchagin/PERSON,/O Sigonin/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON remembered/O./O ``/OAdmitting/O that/O a/O certain/O quite/O irrational/O
_/Oridicule/O_/O falls/O to/O the/O lot/O of/O these/O men/O,/O yet/O I/O never/O saw/O anything/O but/O a/O
misfortune/O in/O it/O,/O and/O always/O felt/O sympathy/O for/O it/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON said/O to/O himself/O,/O though/O indeed/O this/O was/O not/O the/O fact/O,/O and/O
he/O had/O never/O felt/O sympathy/O for/O misfortunes/O of/O that/O kind/O,/O but/O the/O more/O

which/O may/O befall/O anyone/O./O And/O this/O misfortune/O has/O befallen/O me/O./O The/O only/O

been/O in/O the/O same/O position/O that/O he/O was/O in/O./O

``/ODaryalov/PERSON fought/O a/O duel/O.../O''/O

The/O duel/O had/O particularly/O fascinated/O the/O thoughts/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON in/O his/O youth/O,/O just/O because/O he/O was/O physically/O a/O coward/O,/O
and/O was/O himself/O well/O aware/O of/O the/O fact/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON could/O not/O
without/O horror/O contemplate/O the/O idea/O of/O a/O pistol/O aimed/O at/O himself/O,/O and/O
had/O never/O made/O use/O of/O any/O weapon/O in/O his/O life/O./O This/O horror/O had/O in/O his/O
youth/O set/O him/O pondering/O on/O dueling/O,/O and/O picturing/O himself/O in/O a/O position/O
in/O which/O he/O would/O have/O to/O expose/O his/O life/O to/O danger/O./O Having/O attained/O
success/O and/O an/O established/O position/O in/O the/O world/O,/O he/O had/O long/O ago/O
forgotten/O this/O feeling/O;/O but/O the/O habitual/O bent/O of/O feeling/O reasserted/O
itself/O,/O and/O dread/O of/O his/O own/O cowardice/O proved/O even/O now/O so/O strong/O that/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON spent/O a/O long/O while/O thinking/O over/O the/O question/O of/O
dueling/O in/O all/O its/O aspects/O,/O and/O hugging/O the/O idea/O of/O a/O duel/O,/O though/O he/O
was/O fully/O aware/O beforehand/O that/O he/O would/O never/O under/O any/O circumstances/O
fight/O one/O./O

``/OThere/O's/O no/O doubt/O our/O society/O is/O still/O so/O barbarous/O -LRB-/Oit/O's/O not/O the/O same/O
in/O England/LOCATION-RRB-/O that/O very/O many/O''/O--/Oand/O among/O these/O were/O those/O whose/O opinion/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON particularly/O valued/O--/O``/Olook/O favorably/O on/O the/O duel/O;/O
but/O what/O result/O is/O attained/O by/O it/O?/O Suppose/O I/O call/O him/O out/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON went/O on/O to/O himself/O,/O and/O vividly/O picturing/O the/O night/O he/O
would/O spend/O after/O the/O challenge/O,/O and/O the/O pistol/O aimed/O at/O him/O,/O he/O
shuddered/O,/O and/O knew/O that/O he/O never/O would/O do/O it/O--/O``/Osuppose/O I/O call/O him/O out/O./O
Suppose/O I/O am/O taught/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O musing/O,/O ``/Oto/O shoot/O;/O I/O press/O the/O
trigger/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O,/O closing/O his/O eyes/O,/O ``/Oand/O it/O turns/O out/O I/O have/O
killed/O him/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON said/O to/O himself/O,/O and/O he/O shook/O his/O
head/O as/O though/O to/O dispel/O such/O silly/O ideas/O./O ``/OWhat/O sense/O is/O there/O in/O
murdering/O a/O man/O in/O order/O to/O define/O one/O's/O relation/O to/O a/O guilty/O wife/O and/O
son/O?/O I/O should/O still/O just/O as/O much/O have/O to/O decide/O what/O I/O ought/O to/O do/O with/O
her/O./O But/O what/O is/O more/O probable/O and/O what/O would/O doubtless/O occur/O--/OI/O should/O
be/O killed/O or/O wounded/O./O I/O,/O the/O innocent/O person/O,/O should/O be/O the/O
victim/O--/Okilled/O or/O wounded/O./O It/O's/O even/O more/O senseless/O./O But/O apart/O from/O that/O,/O
a/O challenge/O to/O fight/O would/O be/O an/O act/O hardly/O honest/O on/O my/O side/O./O Do/On't/O I/O
know/O perfectly/O well/O that/O my/O friends/O would/O never/O allow/O me/O to/O fight/O a/O
duel/O--/Owould/O never/O allow/O the/O life/O of/O a/O statesman/O,/O needed/O by/O Russia/LOCATION,/O to/O be/O
exposed/O to/O danger/O?/O Knowing/O perfectly/O well/O beforehand/O that/O the/O matter/O
would/O never/O come/O to/O real/O danger/O,/O it/O would/O amount/O to/O my/O simply/O trying/O to/O
gain/O a/O certain/O sham/O reputation/O by/O such/O a/O challenge/O./O That/O would/O be/O
dishonest/O,/O that/O would/O be/O false/O,/O that/O would/O be/O deceiving/O myself/O and/O
others/O./O A/O duel/O is/O quite/O irrational/O,/O and/O no/O one/O expects/O it/O of/O me/O./O My/O aim/O
is/O simply/O to/O safeguard/O my/O reputation/O,/O which/O is/O essential/O for/O the/O
uninterrupted/O pursuit/O of/O my/O public/O duties/O./O''/O Official/O duties/O,/O which/O had/O
always/O been/O of/O great/O consequence/O in/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O eyes/O,/O seemed/O
of/O special/O importance/O to/O his/O mind/O at/O this/O moment/O./O Considering/O and/O
rejecting/O the/O duel/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON turned/O to/O divorce/O--/Oanother/O
solution/O selected/O by/O several/O of/O the/O husbands/O he/O remembered/O./O Passing/O in/O
mental/O review/O all/O the/O instances/O he/O knew/O of/O divorces/O -LRB-/Othere/O were/O plenty/O
of/O them/O in/O the/O very/O highest/O society/O with/O which/O he/O was/O very/O familiar/O-RRB-/O,/O

object/O of/O divorce/O was/O that/O which/O he/O had/O in/O view/O./O In/O all/O these/O instances/O
the/O husband/O had/O practically/O ceded/O or/O sold/O his/O unfaithful/O wife/O,/O and/O the/O
very/O party/O which/O,/O being/O in/O fault/O,/O had/O not/O the/O right/O to/O contract/O a/O fresh/O
marriage/O,/O had/O formed/O counterfeit/O,/O pseudo-matrimonial/O ties/O with/O a/O
self-styled/O husband/O./O In/O his/O own/O case/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON saw/O that/O a/O

be/O repudiated/O,/O was/O impossible/O of/O attainment/O./O He/O saw/O that/O the/O complex/O

guilt/O,/O required/O by/O the/O law/O,/O out/O of/O the/O question/O;/O he/O saw/O that/O a/O certain/O
refinement/O in/O that/O life/O would/O not/O admit/O of/O such/O proofs/O being/O brought/O
forward/O,/O even/O if/O he/O had/O them/O,/O and/O that/O to/O bring/O forward/O such/O proofs/O
would/O damage/O him/O in/O the/O public/O estimation/O more/O than/O it/O would/O her/O./O

An/O attempt/O at/O divorce/O could/O lead/O to/O nothing/O but/O a/O public/O scandal/O,/O which/O
would/O be/O a/O perfect/O godsend/O to/O his/O enemies/O for/O calumny/O and/O attacks/O on/O his/O

the/O least/O amount/O of/O disturbance/O possible/O,/O would/O not/O be/O attained/O by/O
divorce/O either/O./O Moreover/O,/O in/O the/O event/O of/O divorce/O,/O or/O even/O of/O an/O attempt/O
to/O obtain/O a/O divorce/O,/O it/O was/O obvious/O that/O the/O wife/O broke/O off/O all/O
relations/O with/O the/O husband/O and/O threw/O in/O her/O lot/O with/O the/O lover/O./O And/O in/O
spite/O of/O the/O complete/O,/O as/O he/O supposed/O,/O contempt/O and/O indifference/O he/O now/O
felt/O for/O his/O wife/O,/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O his/O heart/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
