free/O to/O throw/O in/O her/O lot/O with/O Vronsky/O,/O so/O that/O her/O crime/O would/O be/O to/O her/O
advantage/O./O The/O mere/O notion/O of/O this/O so/O exasperated/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O
that/O directly/O it/O rose/O to/O his/O mind/O he/O groaned/O with/O inward/O agony/O,/O and/O got/O
up/O and/O changed/O his/O place/O in/O the/O carriage/O,/O and/O for/O a/O long/O while/O after/O,/O he/O
sat/O with/O scowling/O brows/O,/O wrapping/O his/O numbed/O and/O bony/O legs/O in/O the/O fleecy/O
rug/O./O

``/OApart/O from/O formal/O divorce/O,/O One/O might/O still/O do/O like/O Karibanov/PERSON,/O Paskudin/LOCATION,/O
and/O that/O good/O fellow/O Dram/O--/Othat/O is/O,/O separate/O from/O one/O's/O wife/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O
thinking/O,/O when/O he/O had/O regained/O his/O composure/O./O But/O this/O step/O too/O
presented/O the/O same/O drawback/O of/O public/O scandal/O as/O a/O divorce/O,/O and/O what/O was/O
more/O,/O a/O separation/O,/O quite/O as/O much/O as/O a/O regular/O divorce/O,/O flung/O his/O wife/O
into/O the/O arms/O of/O Vronsky/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O it/O's/O out/O of/O the/O question/O,/O out/O of/O the/O
question/O!/O''/O he/O said/O again/O,/O twisting/O his/O rug/O about/O him/O again/O./O ``/OI/O can/Onot/O be/O
unhappy/O,/O but/O neither/O she/O nor/O he/O ought/O to/O be/O happy/O./O''/O

The/O feeling/O of/O jealousy/O,/O which/O had/O tortured/O him/O during/O the/O period/O of/O
uncertainty/O,/O had/O passed/O away/O at/O the/O instant/O when/O the/O tooth/O had/O been/O with/O
agony/O extracted/O by/O his/O wife/O's/O words/O./O But/O that/O feeling/O had/O been/O replaced/O
by/O another/O,/O the/O desire/O,/O not/O merely/O that/O she/O should/O not/O be/O triumphant/O,/O
but/O that/O she/O should/O get/O due/O punishment/O for/O her/O crime/O./O He/O did/O not/O
acknowledge/O this/O feeling/O,/O but/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O his/O heart/O he/O longed/O for/O
her/O to/O suffer/O for/O having/O destroyed/O his/O peace/O of/O mind/O--/Ohis/O honor/O./O And/O
going/O once/O again/O over/O the/O conditions/O inseparable/O from/O a/O duel/O,/O a/O divorce/O,/O
a/O separation/O,/O and/O once/O again/O rejecting/O them/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON felt/O
convinced/O that/O there/O was/O only/O one/O solution/O,/O--/Oto/O keep/O her/O with/O him/O,/O
concealing/O what/O had/O happened/O from/O the/O world/O,/O and/O using/O every/O measure/O in/O
his/O power/O to/O break/O off/O the/O intrigue/O,/O and/O still/O more/O--/Othough/O this/O he/O did/O
not/O admit/O to/O himself/O--/Oto/O punish/O her/O./O ``/OI/O must/O inform/O her/O of/O my/O conclusion/O,/O
that/O thinking/O over/O the/O terrible/O position/O in/O which/O she/O has/O placed/O her/O
family/O,/O all/O other/O solutions/O will/O be/O worse/O for/O both/O sides/O than/O an/O
external/O _/Ostatus/O quo/O_/O,/O and/O that/O such/O I/O agree/O to/O retain/O,/O on/O the/O strict/O
condition/O of/O obedience/O on/O her/O part/O to/O my/O wishes/O,/O that/O is/O to/O say/O,/O
cessation/O of/O all/O intercourse/O with/O her/O lover/O./O''/O When/O this/O decision/O had/O
been/O finally/O adopted/O,/O another/O weighty/O consideration/O occurred/O to/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON in/O support/O of/O it/O./O ``/OBy/O such/O a/O course/O only/O shall/O I/O be/O
acting/O in/O accordance/O with/O the/O dictates/O of/O religion/O,/O''/O he/O told/O himself/O./O
``/OIn/O adopting/O this/O course/O,/O I/O am/O not/O casting/O off/O a/O guilty/O wife/O,/O but/O giving/O
her/O a/O chance/O of/O amendment/O;/O and/O,/O indeed/O,/O difficult/O as/O the/O task/O will/O be/O to/O
me/O,/O I/O shall/O devote/O part/O of/O my/O energies/O to/O her/O reformation/O and/O
salvation/O./O''/O

Though/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O perfectly/O aware/O that/O he/O could/O not/O exert/O
any/O moral/O influence/O over/O his/O wife/O,/O that/O such/O an/O attempt/O at/O reformation/O
could/O lead/O to/O nothing/O but/O falsity/O;/O though/O in/O passing/O through/O these/O
difficult/O moments/O he/O had/O not/O once/O thought/O of/O seeking/O guidance/O in/O
religion/O,/O yet/O now/O,/O when/O his/O conclusion/O corresponded/O,/O as/O it/O seemed/O to/O
him/O,/O with/O the/O requirements/O of/O religion/O,/O this/O religious/O sanction/O to/O his/O
decision/O gave/O him/O complete/O satisfaction/O,/O and/O to/O some/O extent/O restored/O his/O
peace/O of/O mind/O./O He/O was/O pleased/O to/O think/O that/O,/O even/O in/O such/O an/O important/O
crisis/O in/O life/O,/O no/O one/O would/O be/O able/O to/O say/O that/O he/O had/O not/O acted/O in/O
accordance/O with/O the/O principles/O of/O that/O religion/O whose/O banner/O he/O had/O
always/O held/O aloft/O amid/O the/O general/O coolness/O and/O indifference/O./O As/O he/O
pondered/O over/O subsequent/O developments/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON did/O not/O
see/O,/O indeed/O,/O why/O his/O relations/O with/O his/O wife/O should/O not/O remain/O
practically/O the/O same/O as/O before/O./O No/O doubt/O,/O she/O could/O never/O regain/O his/O
esteem/O,/O but/O there/O was/O not/O,/O and/O there/O could/O not/O be/O,/O any/O sort/O of/O reason/O
that/O his/O existence/O should/O be/O troubled/O,/O and/O that/O he/O should/O suffer/O because/O
she/O was/O a/O bad/O and/O faithless/O wife/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O time/O will/O pass/O;/O time/O,/O which/O
arranges/O all/O things/O,/O and/O the/O old/O relations/O will/O be/O reestablished/O,/O''/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON told/O himself/O;/O ``/Oso/O far/O reestablished/O,/O that/O is/O,/O that/O
I/O shall/O not/O be/O sensible/O of/O a/O break/O in/O the/O continuity/O of/O my/O life/O./O She/O is/O
bound/O to/O be/O unhappy/O,/O but/O I/O am/O not/O to/O blame/O,/O and/O so/O I/O can/Onot/O be/O unhappy/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 14/O


As/O he/O neared/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON not/O only/O adhered/O entirely/O
to/O his/O decision/O,/O but/O was/O even/O composing/O in/O his/O head/O the/O letter/O he/O would/O
write/O to/O his/O wife/O./O Going/O into/O the/O porter/O's/O room/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
glanced/O at/O the/O letters/O and/O papers/O brought/O from/O his/O office/O,/O and/O directed/O
that/O they/O should/O be/O brought/O to/O him/O in/O his/O study/O./O

``/OThe/O horses/O can/O be/O taken/O out/O and/O I/O will/O see/O no/O one/O,/O''/O he/O said/O in/O answer/O
to/O the/O porter/O,/O with/O a/O certain/O pleasure/O,/O indicative/O of/O his/O agreeable/O
frame/O of/O mind/O,/O emphasizing/O the/O words/O,/O ``/Osee/O no/O one/O./O''/O

In/O his/O study/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON walked/O up/O and/O down/O twice/O,/O and/O stopped/O
at/O an/O immense/O writing-table/O,/O on/O which/O six/O candles/O had/O already/O been/O
lighted/O by/O the/O valet/O who/O had/O preceded/O him/O./O He/O cracked/O his/O knuckles/O and/O
sat/O down/O,/O sorting/O out/O his/O writing/O appurtenances/O./O Putting/O his/O elbows/O on/O
the/O table/O,/O he/O bent/O his/O head/O on/O one/O side/O,/O thought/O a/O minute/O,/O and/O began/O to/O
write/O,/O without/O pausing/O for/O a/O second/O./O He/O wrote/O without/O using/O any/O form/O of/O
address/O to/O her/O,/O and/O wrote/O in/O French/O,/O making/O use/O of/O the/O plural/O ''/O_/Ovous/O_/O,/O''/O
which/O has/O not/O the/O same/O note/O of/O coldness/O as/O the/O corresponding/O Russian/O
form/O./O

    ``/OAt/O our/O last/O conversation/O,/O I/O notified/O you/O of/O my/O intention/O to/O
    communicate/O to/O you/O my/O decision/O in/O regard/O to/O the/O subject/O of/O that/O
    conversation/O./O Having/O carefully/O considered/O everything/O,/O I/O am/O
    writing/O now/O with/O the/O object/O of/O fulfilling/O that/O promise/O./O My/O
    decision/O is/O as/O follows/O./O Whatever/O your/O conduct/O may/O have/O been/O,/O I/O
    do/O not/O consider/O myself/O justified/O in/O breaking/O the/O ties/O in/O which/O
    we/O are/O bound/O by/O a/O Higher/O Power/O./O The/O family/O can/Onot/O be/O broken/O up/O
    by/O a/O whim/O,/O a/O caprice/O,/O or/O even/O by/O the/O sin/O of/O one/O of/O the/O partners/O
    in/O the/O marriage/O,/O and/O our/O life/O must/O go/O on/O as/O it/O has/O done/O in/O the/O
    past/O./O This/O is/O essential/O for/O me/O,/O for/O you/O,/O and/O for/O our/O son/O./O I/O am/O
    fully/O persuaded/O that/O you/O have/O repented/O and/O do/O repent/O of/O what/O has/O
    called/O forth/O the/O present/O letter/O,/O and/O that/O you/O will/O cooperate/O
    with/O me/O in/O eradicating/O the/O cause/O of/O our/O estrangement/O,/O and/O
    forgetting/O the/O past/O./O In/O the/O contrary/O event/O,/O you/O can/O conjecture/O
    what/O awaits/O you/O and/O your/O son/O./O All/O this/O I/O hope/O to/O discuss/O more/O in/O
    detail/O in/O a/O personal/O interview/O./O As/O the/O season/O is/O drawing/O to/O a/O
    close/O,/O I/O would/O beg/O you/O to/O return/O to/O Petersburg/LOCATION as/O quickly/O as/O
    possible/O,/O not/O later/O than/O Tuesday/O./O All/O necessary/O preparations/O
    shall/O be/O made/O for/O your/O arrival/O here/O./O I/O beg/O you/O to/O note/O that/O I/O
    attach/O particular/O significance/O to/O compliance/O with/O this/O request/O./O

                                                          A./PERSON Karenin/PERSON

    ``/OP.S./O--/OI/O enclose/O the/O money/O which/O may/O be/O needed/O for/O your/O
    expenses/O./O''/O

He/O read/O the/O letter/O through/O and/O felt/O pleased/O with/O it/O,/O and/O especially/O that/O
he/O had/O remembered/O to/O enclose/O money/O:/O there/O was/O not/O a/O harsh/O word/O,/O not/O a/O
reproach/O in/O it/O,/O nor/O was/O there/O undue/O indulgence/O./O Most/O of/O all/O,/O it/O was/O a/O
golden/O bridge/O for/O return/O./O Folding/O the/O letter/O and/O smoothing/O it/O with/O a/O
massive/O ivory/O knife/O,/O and/O putting/O it/O in/O an/O envelope/O with/O the/O money/O,/O he/O
rang/O the/O bell/O with/O the/O gratification/O it/O always/O afforded/O him/O to/O use/O the/O
well/O arranged/O appointments/O of/O his/O writing-table/O./O

``/OGive/O this/O to/O the/O courier/O to/O be/O delivered/O to/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON tomorrow/O at/O
the/O summer/O villa/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O getting/O up/O./O

``/OCertainly/O,/O your/O excellency/O;/O tea/O to/O be/O served/O in/O the/O study/O?/O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON ordered/O tea/O to/O be/O brought/O to/O the/O study/O,/O and/O
playing/O with/O the/O massive/O paper-knife/O,/O he/O moved/O to/O his/O easy/O chair/O,/O near/O
which/O there/O had/O been/O placed/O ready/O for/O him/O a/O lamp/O and/O the/O French/O work/O on/O
Egyptian/O hieroglyphics/O that/O he/O had/O begun/O./O Over/O the/O easy/O chair/O there/O hung/O
in/O a/O gold/O frame/O an/O oval/O portrait/O of/O Anna/PERSON,/O a/O fine/O painting/O by/O a/O
celebrated/O artist/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON glanced/O at/O it/O./O The/O unfathomable/O
eyes/O gazed/O ironically/O and/O insolently/O at/O him/O./O Insufferably/O insolent/O and/O
challenging/O was/O the/O effect/O in/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O eyes/O of/O the/O black/O
lace/O about/O the/O head/O,/O admirably/O touched/O in/O by/O the/O painter/O,/O the/O black/O hair/O
and/O handsome/O white/O hand/O with/O one/O finger/O lifted/O,/O covered/O with/O rings/O./O
After/O looking/O at/O the/O portrait/O for/O a/O minute/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
shuddered/O so/O that/O his/O lips/O quivered/O and/O he/O uttered/O the/O sound/O ``/Obrrr/O,/O''/O and/O
turned/O away/O./O He/O made/O haste/O to/O sit/O down/O in/O his/O easy/O chair/O and/O opened/O the/O
book/O./O He/O tried/O to/O read/O,/O but/O he/O could/O not/O revive/O the/O very/O vivid/O interest/O
he/O had/O felt/O before/O in/O Egyptian/O hieroglyphics/O./O He/O looked/O at/O the/O book/O and/O
thought/O of/O something/O else/O./O He/O thought/O not/O of/O his/O wife/O,/O but/O of/O a/O
complication/O that/O had/O arisen/O in/O his/O official/O life/O,/O which/O at/O the/O time/O
constituted/O the/O chief/O interest/O of/O it/O./O He/O felt/O that/O he/O had/O penetrated/O
more/O deeply/O than/O ever/O before/O into/O this/O intricate/O affair/O,/O and/O that/O he/O had/O
originated/O a/O leading/O idea/O--/Ohe/O could/O say/O it/O without/O
self-flattery/O--/Ocalculated/O to/O clear/O up/O the/O whole/O business/O,/O to/O strengthen/O
him/O in/O his/O official/O career/O,/O to/O discomfit/O his/O enemies/O,/O and/O thereby/O to/O be/O
of/O the/O greatest/O benefit/O to/O the/O government/O./O Directly/O the/O servant/O had/O set/O
the/O tea/O and/O left/O the/O room/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON got/O up/O and/O went/O to/O the/O
writing-table/O./O Moving/O into/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O table/O a/O portfolio/O of/O
papers/O,/O with/O a/O scarcely/O perceptible/O smile/O of/O self-satisfaction/O,/O he/O took/O
a/O pencil/O from/O a/O rack/O and/O plunged/O into/O the/O perusal/O of/O a/O complex/O report/O
relating/O to/O the/O present/O complication/O./O The/O complication/O was/O of/O this/O
nature/O:/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O characteristic/O quality/O as/O a/O politician/O,/O
that/O special/O individual/O qualification/O that/O every/O rising/O functionary/O
possesses/O,/O the/O qualification/O that/O with/O his/O unflagging/O ambition/O,/O his/O
reserve/O,/O his/O honesty/O,/O and/O with/O his/O self-confidence/O had/O made/O his/O career/O,/O
was/O his/O contempt/O for/O red/O tape/O,/O his/O cutting/O down/O of/O correspondence/O,/O his/O
direct/O contact/O,/O wherever/O possible/O,/O with/O the/O living/O fact/O,/O and/O his/O
economy/O./O It/O happened/O that/O the/O famous/O Commission/O of/O the/O 2nd/O of/O June/O had/O
set/O on/O foot/O an/O inquiry/O into/O the/O irrigation/O of/O lands/O in/O the/O Zaraisky/LOCATION
province/O,/O which/O fell/O under/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O department/O,/O and/O was/O a/O
glaring/O example/O of/O fruitless/O expenditure/O and/O paper/O reforms/O./O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O aware/O of/O the/O truth/O of/O this/O./O The/O irrigation/O of/O these/O
lands/O in/O the/O Zaraisky/LOCATION province/O had/O been/O initiated/O by/O the/O predecessor/O of/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O predecessor/O./O And/O vast/O sums/O of/O money/O had/O actually/O
been/O spent/O and/O were/O still/O being/O spent/O on/O this/O business/O,/O and/O utterly/O
unproductively/O,/O and/O the/O whole/O business/O could/O obviously/O lead/O to/O nothing/O
whatever/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O perceived/O this/O at/O once/O on/O entering/O
office/O,/O and/O would/O have/O liked/O to/O lay/O hands/O on/O the/O Board/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION Irrigation/ORGANIZATION./O
But/O at/O first/O,/O when/O he/O did/O not/O yet/O feel/O secure/O in/O his/O position/O,/O he/O knew/O
it/O would/O affect/O too/O many/O interests/O,/O and/O would/O be/O injudicious/O./O Later/O on/O
he/O had/O been/O engrossed/O in/O other/O questions/O,/O and/O had/O simply/O forgotten/O the/O
Board/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION Irrigation/ORGANIZATION./O It/O went/O of/O itself/O,/O like/O all/O such/O boards/O,/O by/O the/O
mere/O force/O of/O inertia/O./O -LRB-/OMany/O people/O gained/O their/O livelihood/O by/O the/O Board/ORGANIZATION
of/ORGANIZATION Irrigation/ORGANIZATION,/O especially/O one/O highly/O conscientious/O and/O musical/O family/O:/O
all/O the/O daughters/O played/O on/O stringed/O instruments/O,/O and/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON knew/O the/O family/O and/O had/O stood/O godfather/O to/O one/O of/O the/O
elder/O daughters/O./O-RRB-/O The/O raising/O of/O this/O question/O by/O a/O hostile/O department/O
was/O in/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O opinion/O a/O dishonorable/O proceeding/O,/O seeing/O
that/O in/O every/O department/O there/O were/O things/O similar/O and/O worse/O,/O which/O no/O
one/O inquired/O into/O,/O for/O well-known/O reasons/O of/O official/O etiquette/O./O
However/O,/O now/O that/O the/O glove/O had/O been/O thrown/O down/O to/O him/O,/O he/O had/O boldly/O
picked/O it/O up/O and/O demanded/O the/O appointment/O of/O a/O special/O commission/O to/O
investigate/O and/O verify/O the/O working/O of/O the/O Board/O of/O Irrigation/O of/O the/O
lands/O in/O the/O Zaraisky/LOCATION province/O./O But/O in/O compensation/O he/O gave/O no/O quarter/O
to/O the/O enemy/O either/O./O He/O demanded/O the/O appointment/O of/O another/O special/O
commission/O to/O inquire/O into/O the/O question/O of/O the/O Native/ORGANIZATION Tribes/ORGANIZATION
Organization/ORGANIZATION Committee/ORGANIZATION./O The/O question/O of/O the/O Native/O Tribes/O had/O been/O
brought/O up/O incidentally/O in/O the/O Commission/O of/O the/O 2nd/O of/O June/O,/O and/O had/O
been/O pressed/O forward/O actively/O by/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON as/O one/O admitting/O
of/O no/O delay/O on/O account/O of/O the/O deplorable/O condition/O of/O the/O native/O tribes/O./O
In/O the/O commission/O this/O question/O had/O been/O a/O ground/O of/O contention/O between/O
several/O departments/O./O The/O department/O hostile/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
proved/O that/O the/O condition/O of/O the/O native/O tribes/O was/O exceedingly/O
flourishing/O,/O that/O the/O proposed/O reconstruction/O might/O be/O the/O ruin/O of/O their/O
prosperity/O,/O and/O that/O if/O there/O were/O anything/O wrong/O,/O it/O arose/O mainly/O from/O
the/O failure/O on/O the/O part/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O department/O to/O carry/O
out/O the/O measures/O prescribed/O by/O law/O./O Now/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON intended/O
to/O demand/O:/O First/O,/O that/O a/O new/O commission/O should/O be/O formed/O which/O should/O be/O
empowered/O to/O investigate/O the/O condition/O of/O the/O native/O tribes/O on/O the/O spot/O;/O
secondly/O,/O if/O it/O should/O appear/O that/O the/O condition/O of/O the/O native/O tribes/O
actually/O was/O such/O as/O it/O appeared/O to/O be/O from/O the/O official/O documents/O in/O
the/O hands/O of/O the/O committee/O,/O that/O another/O new/O scientific/O commission/O
should/O be/O appointed/O to/O investigate/O the/O deplorable/O condition/O of/O the/O
native/O tribes/O from/O the/O--/O-LRB-/O1/O-RRB-/O political/O,/O -LRB-/O2/O-RRB-/O administrative/O,/O -LRB-/O3/O-RRB-/O economic/O,/O
-LRB-/O4/O-RRB-/O ethnographical/O,/O -LRB-/O5/O-RRB-/O material/O,/O and/O -LRB-/O6/O-RRB-/O religious/O points/O of/O view/O;/O
thirdly/O,/O that/O evidence/O should/O be/O required/O from/O the/O rival/O department/O of/O
the/O measures/O that/O had/O been/O taken/O during/O the/O last/O ten/O years/O by/O that/O
department/O for/O averting/O the/O disastrous/O conditions/O in/O which/O the/O native/O
tribes/O were/O now/O placed/O;/O and/O fourthly/O and/O finally/O,/O that/O that/O department/O
explain/O why/O it/O had/O,/O as/O appeared/O from/O the/O evidence/O before/O the/O committee/O,/O
from/O No./O 17,015/O and/O 18,038/O,/O from/O December/O 5/O,/O 1863/O,/O and/O June/O 7/O,/O 1864/O,/O
acted/O in/O direct/O contravention/O of/O the/O intent/O of/O the/O law/O T./O./O./O Act/O 18/O,/O and/O
the/O note/O to/O Act/O 36/O./O A/O flash/O of/O eagerness/O suffused/O the/O face/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON as/O he/O rapidly/O wrote/O out/O a/O synopsis/O of/O these/O ideas/O for/O his/O
own/O benefit/O./O Having/O filled/O a/O sheet/O of/O paper/O,/O he/O got/O up/O,/O rang/O,/O and/O sent/O a/O
note/O to/O the/O chief/O secretary/O of/O his/O department/O to/O look/O up/O certain/O
necessary/O facts/O for/O him/O./O Getting/O up/O and/O walking/O about/O the/O room/O,/O he/O
glanced/O again/O at/O the/O portrait/O,/O frowned/O,/O and/O smiled/O contemptuously/O./O After/O
reading/O a/O little/O more/O of/O the/O book/O on/O Egyptian/O hieroglyphics/O,/O and/O
renewing/O his/O interest/O in/O it/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON went/O to/O bed/O at/O eleven/O
o'clock/O,/O and/O recollecting/O as/O he/O lay/O in/O bed/O the/O incident/O with/O his/O wife/O,/O
he/O saw/O it/O now/O in/O by/O no/O means/O such/O a/O gloomy/O light/O./O



Chapter/O 15/O


Though/O Anna/PERSON had/O obstinately/O and/O with/O exasperation/O contradicted/O Vronsky/O
when/O he/O told/O her/O their/O position/O was/O impossible/O,/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O her/O
heart/O she/O regarded/O her/O own/O position/O as/O false/O and/O dishonorable/O,/O and/O she/O
longed/O with/O her/O whole/O soul/O to/O change/O it/O./O On/O the/O way/O home/O from/O the/O races/O
she/O had/O told/O her/O husband/O the/O truth/O in/O a/O moment/O of/O excitement/O,/O and/O in/O
spite/O of/O the/O agony/O she/O had/O suffered/O in/O doing/O so/O,/O she/O was/O glad/O of/O it/O./O
After/O her/O husband/O had/O left/O her/O,/O she/O told/O herself/O that/O she/O was/O glad/O,/O that/O
now/O everything/O was/O made/O clear/O,/O and/O at/O least/O there/O would/O be/O no/O more/O lying/O
and/O deception/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O her/O beyond/O doubt/O that/O her/O position/O was/O now/O
made/O clear/O forever/O./O It/O might/O be/O bad/O,/O this/O new/O position/O,/O but/O it/O would/O be/O
clear/O;/O there/O would/O be/O no/O indefiniteness/O or/O falsehood/O about/O it/O./O The/O pain/O
she/O had/O caused/O herself/O and/O her/O husband/O in/O uttering/O those/O words/O would/O be/O
rewarded/O now/O by/O everything/O being/O made/O clear/O,/O she/O thought/O./O That/O evening/O
she/O saw/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O but/O she/O did/O not/O tell/O him/O of/O what/O had/O passed/O between/O her/O
and/O her/O husband/O,/O though/O,/O to/O make/O the/O position/O definite/O,/O it/O was/O necessary/O
to/O tell/O him/O./O

When/O she/O woke/O up/O next/O morning/O the/O first/O thing/O that/O rose/O to/O her/O mind/O was/O
what/O she/O had/O said/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O and/O those/O words/O seemed/O to/O her/O so/O awful/O
that/O she/O could/O not/O conceive/O now/O how/O she/O could/O have/O brought/O herself/O to/O
utter/O those/O strange/O,/O coarse/O words/O,/O and/O could/O not/O imagine/O what/O would/O come/O
of/O it/O./O But/O the/O words/O were/O spoken/O,/O and/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O gone/O
away/O without/O saying/O anything/O./O ``/OI/O saw/O Vronsky/PERSON and/O did/O not/O tell/O him/O./O At/O
the/O very/O instant/O he/O was/O going/O away/O I/O would/O have/O turned/O him/O back/O and/O told/O
him/O,/O but/O I/O changed/O my/O mind/O,/O because/O it/O was/O strange/O that/O I/O had/O not/O told/O
him/O the/O first/O minute/O./O Why/O was/O it/O I/O wanted/O to/O tell/O him/O and/O did/O not/O tell/O
him/O?/O''/O And/O in/O answer/O to/O this/O question/O a/O burning/O blush/O of/O shame/O spread/O
over/O her/O face/O./O She/O knew/O what/O had/O kept/O her/O from/O it/O,/O she/O knew/O that/O she/O had/O
been/O ashamed/O./O Her/O position/O,/O which/O had/O seemed/O to/O her/O simplified/O the/O night/O
before/O,/O suddenly/O struck/O her/O now/O as/O not/O only/O not/O simple/O,/O but/O as/O
absolutely/O hopeless/O./O She/O felt/O terrified/O at/O the/O disgrace/O,/O of/O which/O she/O
had/O not/O ever/O thought/O before/O./O Directly/O she/O thought/O of/O what/O her/O husband/O
would/O do/O,/O the/O most/O terrible/O ideas/O came/O to/O her/O mind/O./O She/O had/O a/O vision/O of/O
being/O turned/O out/O of/O the/O house/O,/O of/O her/O shame/O being/O proclaimed/O to/O all/O the/O
world/O./O She/O asked/O herself/O where/O she/O should/O go/O when/O she/O was/O turned/O out/O of/O
the/O house/O,/O and/O she/O could/O not/O find/O an/O answer/O./O

When/O she/O thought/O of/O Vronsky/O,/O it/O seemed/O to/O her/O that/O he/O did/O not/O love/O her/O,/O
that/O he/O was/O already/O beginning/O to/O be/O tired/O of/O her/O,/O that/O she/O could/O not/O
offer/O herself/O to/O him/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O bitter/O against/O him/O for/O it/O./O It/O seemed/O
to/O her/O that/O the/O words/O that/O she/O had/O spoken/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O and/O had/O
continually/O repeated/O in/O her/O imagination/O,/O she/O had/O said/O to/O everyone/O,/O and/O
everyone/O had/O heard/O them/O./O She/O could/O not/O bring/O herself/O to/O look/O those/O of/O
her/O own/O household/O in/O the/O face/O./O She/O could/O not/O bring/O herself/O to/O call/O her/O
maid/O,/O and/O still/O less/O go/O downstairs/O and/O see/O her/O son/O and/O his/O governess/O./O

The/O maid/O,/O who/O had/O been/O listening/O at/O her/O door/O for/O a/O long/O while/O,/O came/O into/O
her/O room/O of/O her/O own/O accord/O./O Anna/PERSON glanced/O inquiringly/O into/O her/O face/O,/O and/O
blushed/O with/O a/O scared/O look/O./O The/O maid/O begged/O her/O pardon/O for/O coming/O in/O,/O
saying/O that/O she/O had/O fancied/O the/O bell/O rang/O./O She/O brought/O her/O clothes/O and/O a/O
note/O./O The/O note/O was/O from/O Betsy/PERSON./O Betsy/PERSON reminded/O her/O that/O Liza/PERSON Merkalova/PERSON
and/O Baroness/PERSON Shtoltz/PERSON were/O coming/O to/O play/O croquet/O with/O her/O that/O morning/O
with/O their/O adorers/O,/O Kaluzhsky/PERSON and/O old/O Stremov/PERSON./O ``/OCome/O,/O if/O only/O as/O a/O study/O
in/O morals/O./O I/O shall/O expect/O you/O,/O''/O she/O finished/O./O

Anna/PERSON read/O the/O note/O and/O heaved/O a/O deep/O sigh/O./O

``/ONothing/O,/O I/O need/O nothing/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O Annushka/PERSON,/O who/O was/O rearranging/O the/O
bottles/O and/O brushes/O on/O the/O dressing/O table/O./O ``/OYou/O can/O go/O./O I/O'll/O dress/O at/O
once/O and/O come/O down/O./O I/O need/O nothing/O./O''/O

Annushka/PERSON went/O out/O,/O but/O Anna/PERSON did/O not/O begin/O dressing/O,/O and/O sat/O in/O the/O same/O
position/O,/O her/O head/O and/O hands/O hanging/O listlessly/O,/O and/O every/O now/O and/O then/O
she/O shivered/O all/O over/O,/O seemed/O as/O though/O she/O would/O make/O some/O gesture/O,/O
utter/O some/O word/O,/O and/O sank/O back/O into/O lifelessness/O again/O./O She/O repeated/O
continually/O,/O ``/OMy/O God/O!/O my/O God/O!/O''/O But/O neither/O ``/OGod/O''/O nor/O ``/Omy/O''/O had/O any/O
meaning/O to/O her/O./O The/O idea/O of/O seeking/O help/O in/O her/O difficulty/O in/O religion/O
was/O as/O remote/O from/O her/O as/O seeking/O help/O from/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
himself/O,/O although/O she/O had/O never/O had/O doubts/O of/O the/O faith/O in/O which/O she/O had/O
been/O brought/O up/O./O She/O knew/O that/O the/O support/O of/O religion/O was/O possible/O only/O
upon/O condition/O of/O renouncing/O what/O made/O up/O for/O her/O the/O whole/O meaning/O of/O
life/O./O She/O was/O not/O simply/O miserable/O,/O she/O began/O to/O feel/O alarm/O at/O the/O new/O
spiritual/O condition/O,/O never/O experienced/O before/O,/O in/O which/O she/O found/O
herself/O./O She/O felt/O as/O though/O everything/O were/O beginning/O to/O be/O double/O in/O
her/O soul/O,/O just/O as/O objects/O sometimes/O appear/O double/O to/O over-tired/O eyes/O./O
She/O hardly/O knew/O at/O times/O what/O it/O was/O she/O feared/O,/O and/O what/O she/O hoped/O for/O./O
Whether/O she/O feared/O or/O desired/O what/O had/O happened/O,/O or/O what/O was/O going/O to/O
happen/O,/O and/O exactly/O what/O she/O longed/O for/O,/O she/O could/O not/O have/O said/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O what/O am/O I/O doing/O!/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O,/O feeling/O a/O sudden/O thrill/O of/O
pain/O in/O both/O sides/O of/O her/O head/O./O When/O she/O came/O to/O herself/O,/O she/O saw/O that/O
she/O was/O holding/O her/O hair/O in/O both/O hands/O,/O each/O side/O of/O her/O temples/O,/O and/O
pulling/O it/O./O She/O jumped/O up/O,/O and/O began/O walking/O about/O./O

``/OThe/O coffee/O is/O ready/O,/O and/O mademoiselle/O and/O Seryozha/PERSON are/O waiting/O,/O''/O said/O
Annushka/PERSON,/O coming/O back/O again/O and/O finding/O Anna/PERSON in/O the/O same/O position/O./O

``/OSeryozha/PERSON?/O What/O about/O Seryozha/PERSON?/O''/O Anna/PERSON asked/O,/O with/O sudden/O eagerness/O,/O
recollecting/O her/O son/O's/O existence/O for/O the/O first/O time/O that/O morning/O./O

``/OHe/O's/O been/O naughty/O,/O I/O think/O,/O''/O answered/O Annushka/PERSON with/O a/O smile/O./O

``/OIn/O what/O way/O?/O''/O

``/OSome/O peaches/O were/O lying/O on/O the/O table/O in/O the/O corner/O room/O./O I/O think/O he/O
slipped/O in/O and/O ate/O one/O of/O them/O on/O the/O sly/O./O''/O

The/O recollection/O of/O her/O son/O suddenly/O roused/O Anna/PERSON from/O the/O helpless/O
condition/O in/O which/O she/O found/O herself/O./O She/O recalled/O the/O partly/O sincere/O,/O
though/O greatly/O exaggerated/O,/O rôle/O of/O the/O mother/O living/O for/O her/O child/O,/O
which/O she/O had/O taken/O up/O of/O late/O years/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O with/O joy/O that/O in/O the/O
plight/O in/O which/O she/O found/O herself/O she/O had/O a/O support/O,/O quite/O apart/O from/O
her/O relation/O to/O her/O husband/O or/O to/O Vronsky/O./O This/O support/O was/O her/O son/O./O In/O
whatever/O position/O she/O might/O be/O placed/O,/O she/O could/O not/O lose/O her/O son/O./O Her/O
husband/O might/O put/O her/O to/O shame/O and/O turn/O her/O out/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON might/O grow/O cold/O
to/O her/O and/O go/O on/O living/O his/O own/O life/O apart/O -LRB-/Oshe/O thought/O of/O him/O again/O
with/O bitterness/O and/O reproach/O-RRB-/O;/O she/O could/O not/O leave/O her/O son/O./O She/O had/O an/O
aim/O in/O life/O./O And/O she/O must/O act/O;/O act/O to/O secure/O this/O relation/O to/O her/O son/O,/O
so/O that/O he/O might/O not/O be/O taken/O from/O her/O./O Quickly/O indeed/O,/O as/O quickly/O as/O
possible/O,/O she/O must/O take/O action/O before/O he/O was/O taken/O from/O her/O./O She/O must/O
take/O her/O son/O and/O go/O away/O./O Here/O was/O the/O one/O thing/O she/O had/O to/O do/O now/O./O She/O
needed/O consolation/O./O She/O must/O be/O calm/O,/O and/O get/O out/O of/O this/O insufferable/O
position/O./O The/O thought/O of/O immediate/O action/O binding/O her/O to/O her/O son/O,/O of/O
going/O away/O somewhere/O with/O him/O,/O gave/O her/O this/O consolation/O./O

She/O dressed/O quickly/O,/O went/O downstairs/O,/O and/O with/O resolute/O steps/O walked/O
into/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O where/O she/O found/O,/O as/O usual/O,/O waiting/O for/O her/O,/O the/O
coffee/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O and/O his/O governess/O./O Seryozha/PERSON,/O all/O in/O white/O,/O with/O his/O
back/O and/O head/O bent/O,/O was/O standing/O at/O a/O table/O under/O a/O looking-glass/O,/O and/O
with/O an/O expression/O of/O intense/O concentration/O which/O she/O knew/O well/O,/O and/O in/O
which/O he/O resembled/O his/O father/O,/O he/O was/O doing/O something/O to/O the/O flowers/O he/O
carried/O./O

The/O governess/O had/O a/O particularly/O severe/O expression/O./O Seryozha/PERSON screamed/O
shrilly/O,/O as/O he/O often/O did/O,/O ``/OAh/O,/O mamma/O!/O''/O and/O stopped/O,/O hesitating/O whether/O
to/O go/O to/O greet/O his/O mother/O and/O put/O down/O the/O flowers/O,/O or/O to/O finish/O making/O
the/O wreath/O and/O go/O with/O the/O flowers/O./O

The/O governess/O,/O after/O saying/O good-morning/O,/O began/O a/O long/O and/O detailed/O
account/O of/O Seryozha/PERSON's/O naughtiness/O,/O but/O Anna/PERSON did/O not/O hear/O her/O;/O she/O was/O
considering/O whether/O she/O would/O take/O her/O with/O her/O or/O not/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O
take/O her/O,/O''/O she/O decided/O./O ``/OI/O'll/O go/O alone/O with/O my/O child/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O very/O wrong/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O taking/O her/O son/O by/O the/O shoulder/O
she/O looked/O at/O him/O,/O not/O severely/O,/O but/O with/O a/O timid/O glance/O that/O bewildered/O
and/O delighted/O the/O boy/O,/O and/O she/O kissed/O him/O./O ``/OLeave/O him/O to/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O
to/O the/O astonished/O governess/O,/O and/O not/O letting/O go/O of/O her/O son/O,/O she/O sat/O down/O
at/O the/O table/O,/O where/O coffee/O was/O set/O ready/O for/O her/O./O

``/OMamma/O!/O I/O .../O I/O .../O did/On't/O.../O''/O he/O said/O,/O trying/O to/O make/O out/O from/O her/O
expression/O what/O was/O in/O store/O for/O him/O in/O regard/O to/O the/O peaches/O./O

``/OSeryozha/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O as/O soon/O as/O the/O governess/O had/O left/O the/O room/O,/O ``/Othat/O
was/O wrong/O,/O but/O you/O'll/O never/O do/O it/O again/O,/O will/O you/O?/O.../O You/O love/O me/O?/O''/O

She/O felt/O that/O the/O tears/O were/O coming/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O ``/OCan/O I/O help/O loving/O
him/O?/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O,/O looking/O deeply/O into/O his/O scared/O and/O at/O the/O
same/O time/O delighted/O eyes/O./O ``/OAnd/O can/O he/O ever/O join/O his/O father/O in/O punishing/O
me/O?/O Is/O it/O possible/O he/O will/O not/O feel/O for/O me/O?/O''/O Tears/O were/O already/O flowing/O
down/O her/O face/O,/O and/O to/O hide/O them/O she/O got/O up/O abruptly/O and/O almost/O ran/O out/O
on/O to/O the/O terrace/O./O

After/O the/O thunder/O showers/O of/O the/O last/O few/O days/O,/O cold/O,/O bright/O weather/O had/O
set/O in/O./O The/O air/O was/O cold/O in/O the/O bright/O sun/O that/O filtered/O through/O the/O
freshly/O washed/O leaves/O./O

She/O shivered/O,/O both/O from/O the/O cold/O and/O from/O the/O inward/O horror/O which/O had/O
clutched/O her/O with/O fresh/O force/O in/O the/O open/O air/O./O

``/ORun/O along/O,/O run/O along/O to/O Mariette/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O who/O had/O
followed/O her/O out/O,/O and/O she/O began/O walking/O up/O and/O down/O on/O the/O straw/O matting/O
of/O the/O terrace/O./O ``/OCan/O it/O be/O that/O they/O wo/On't/O forgive/O me/O,/O wo/On't/O understand/O
how/O it/O all/O could/On't/O be/O helped/O?/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O./O

Standing/O still/O,/O and/O looking/O at/O the/O tops/O of/O the/O aspen/O trees/O waving/O in/O the/O
wind/O,/O with/O their/O freshly/O washed/O,/O brightly/O shining/O leaves/O in/O the/O cold/O
sunshine/O,/O she/O knew/O that/O they/O would/O not/O forgive/O her/O,/O that/O everyone/O and/O
everything/O would/O be/O merciless/O to/O her/O now/O as/O was/O that/O sky/O,/O that/O green/O./O
And/O again/O she/O felt/O that/O everything/O was/O split/O in/O two/O in/O her/O soul/O./O ``/OI/O
must/On't/O,/O must/On't/O think/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O./O ``/OI/O must/O get/O ready/O./O To/O go/O
where/O?/O When/O?/O Whom/O to/O take/O with/O me/O?/O Yes/O,/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION by/O the/O evening/O train/O./O
Annushka/PERSON and/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O and/O only/O the/O most/O necessary/O things/O./O But/O first/O I/O
must/O write/O to/O them/O both/O./O''/O She/O went/O quickly/O indoors/O into/O her/O boudoir/O,/O sat/O
down/O at/O the/O table/O,/O and/O wrote/O to/O her/O husband/O:/O--/O``/OAfter/O what/O has/O happened/O,/O I/O
can/Onot/O remain/O any/O longer/O in/O your/O house/O./O I/O am/O going/O away/O,/O and/O taking/O my/O
son/O with/O me/O./O I/O do/On't/O know/O the/O law/O,/O and/O so/O I/O do/On't/O know/O with/O which/O of/O the/O
parents/O the/O son/O should/O remain/O;/O but/O I/O take/O him/O with/O me/O because/O I/O can/Onot/O
live/O without/O him/O./O Be/O generous/O,/O leave/O him/O to/O me/O./O''/O

Up/O to/O this/O point/O she/O wrote/O rapidly/O and/O naturally/O,/O but/O the/O appeal/O to/O his/O
generosity/O,/O a/O quality/O she/O did/O not/O recognize/O in/O him/O,/O and/O the/O necessity/O of/O
winding/O up/O the/O letter/O with/O something/O touching/O,/O pulled/O her/O up/O./O ``/OOf/O my/O
fault/O and/O my/O remorse/O I/O can/Onot/O speak/O,/O because/O.../O''/O

She/O stopped/O again/O,/O finding/O no/O connection/O in/O her/O ideas/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O
herself/O,/O ``/Othere/O's/O no/O need/O of/O anything/O,/O''/O and/O tearing/O up/O the/O letter/O,/O she/O
wrote/O it/O again/O,/O leaving/O out/O the/O allusion/O to/O generosity/O,/O and/O sealed/O it/O
up/O./O

Another/O letter/O had/O to/O be/O written/O to/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OI/O have/O told/O my/O husband/O,/O''/O
she/O wrote/O,/O and/O she/O sat/O a/O long/O while/O unable/O to/O write/O more/O./O It/O was/O so/O
coarse/O,/O so/O unfeminine/O./O ``/OAnd/O what/O more/O am/O I/O to/O write/O to/O him/O?/O''/O she/O said/O to/O
herself/O./O Again/O a/O flush/O of/O shame/O spread/O over/O her/O face/O;/O she/O recalled/O his/O
composure/O,/O and/O a/O feeling/O of/O anger/O against/O him/O impelled/O her/O to/O tear/O the/O
sheet/O with/O the/O phrase/O she/O had/O written/O into/O tiny/O bits/O./O ``/ONo/O need/O of/O
anything/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O,/O and/O closing/O her/O blotting-case/O she/O went/O
upstairs/O,/O told/O the/O governess/O and/O the/O servants/O that/O she/O was/O going/O that/O
day/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O at/O once/O set/O to/O work/O to/O pack/O up/O her/O things/O./O



Chapter/O 16/O


All/O the/O rooms/O of/O the/O summer/O villa/O were/O full/O of/O porters/O,/O gardeners/O,/O and/O
footmen/O going/O to/O and/O fro/O carrying/O out/O things/O./O Cupboards/O and/O chests/O were/O
open/O;/O twice/O they/O had/O sent/O to/O the/O shop/O for/O cord/O;/O pieces/O of/O newspaper/O were/O
tossing/O about/O on/O the/O floor/O./O Two/O trunks/O,/O some/O bags/O and/O strapped-up/O rugs/O,/O
had/O been/O carried/O down/O into/O the/O hall/O./O The/O carriage/O and/O two/O hired/O cabs/O
were/O waiting/O at/O the/O steps/O./O Anna/PERSON,/O forgetting/O her/O inward/O agitation/O in/O the/O
work/O of/O packing/O,/O was/O standing/O at/O a/O table/O in/O her/O boudoir/O,/O packing/O her/O
traveling/O bag/O,/O when/O Annushka/PERSON called/O her/O attention/O to/O the/O rattle/O of/O some/O
carriage/O driving/O up/O./O Anna/PERSON looked/O out/O of/O the/O window/O and/O saw/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O courier/O on/O the/O steps/O,/O ringing/O at/O the/O front/O door/O bell/O./O

``/ORun/O and/O find/O out/O what/O it/O is/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O with/O a/O calm/O sense/O of/O being/O
prepared/O for/O anything/O,/O she/O sat/O down/O in/O a/O low/O chair/O,/O folding/O her/O hands/O on/O
her/O knees/O./O A/O footman/O brought/O in/O a/O thick/O packet/O directed/O in/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O hand/O./O

``/OThe/O courier/O has/O orders/O to/O wait/O for/O an/O answer/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O had/O left/O the/O room/O she/O tore/O open/O
the/O letter/O with/O trembling/O fingers/O./O A/O roll/O of/O unfolded/O notes/O done/O up/O in/O a/O
wrapper/O fell/O out/O of/O it/O./O She/O disengaged/O the/O letter/O and/O began/O reading/O it/O
at/O the/O end/O./O ``/OPreparations/O shall/O be/O made/O for/O your/O arrival/O here/O .../O I/O
attach/O particular/O significance/O to/O compliance/O.../O''/O she/O read/O./O She/O ran/O on/O,/O
then/O back/O,/O read/O it/O all/O through/O,/O and/O once/O more/O read/O the/O letter/O all/O
through/O again/O from/O the/O beginning/O./O When/O she/O had/O finished/O,/O she/O felt/O that/O
she/O was/O cold/O all/O over/O,/O and/O that/O a/O fearful/O calamity/O,/O such/O as/O she/O had/O not/O
expected/O,/O had/O burst/O upon/O her/O./O

In/O the/O morning/O she/O had/O regretted/O that/O she/O had/O spoken/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O and/O
wished/O for/O nothing/O so/O much/O as/O that/O those/O words/O could/O be/O unspoken/O./O And/O
here/O this/O letter/O regarded/O them/O as/O unspoken/O,/O and/O gave/O her/O what/O she/O had/O
wanted/O./O But/O now/O this/O letter/O seemed/O to/O her/O more/O awful/O than/O anything/O she/O
had/O been/O able/O to/O conceive/O./O

``/OHe/O's/O right/O!/O''/O she/O said/O;/O ``/Oof/O course/O,/O he/O's/O always/O right/O;/O he/O's/O a/O Christian/O,/O
he/O's/O generous/O!/O Yes/O,/O vile/O,/O base/O creature/O!/O And/O no/O one/O understands/O it/O
except/O me/O,/O and/O no/O one/O ever/O will/O;/O and/O I/O ca/On't/O explain/O it/O./O They/O say/O he/O's/O
so/O religious/O,/O so/O high-principled/O,/O so/O upright/O,/O so/O clever/O;/O but/O they/O do/On't/O
see/O what/O I/O've/O seen/O./O They/O do/On't/O know/O how/O he/O has/O crushed/O my/O life/O for/O eight/O
years/O,/O crushed/O everything/O that/O was/O living/O in/O me/O--/Ohe/O has/O not/O once/O even/O
thought/O that/O I/O'm/O a/O live/O woman/O who/O must/O have/O love/O./O They/O do/On't/O know/O how/O at/O
every/O step/O he/O's/O humiliated/O me/O,/O and/O been/O just/O as/O pleased/O with/O himself/O./O
Have/On't/O I/O striven/O,/O striven/O with/O all/O my/O strength/O,/O to/O find/O something/O to/O
give/O meaning/O to/O my/O life/O?/O Have/On't/O I/O struggled/O to/O love/O him/O,/O to/O love/O my/O son/O
when/O I/O could/O not/O love/O my/O husband/O?/O But/O the/O time/O came/O when/O I/O knew/O that/O I/O
could/On't/O cheat/O myself/O any/O longer/O,/O that/O I/O was/O alive/O,/O that/O I/O was/O not/O to/O
blame/O,/O that/O God/O has/O made/O me/O so/O that/O I/O must/O love/O and/O live/O./O And/O now/O what/O
does/O he/O do/O?/O If/O he/O'd/O killed/O me/O,/O if/O he/O'd/O killed/O him/O,/O I/O could/O have/O borne/O
anything/O,/O I/O could/O have/O forgiven/O anything/O;/O but/O,/O no/O,/O he/O.../O./O How/O was/O it/O I/O
did/On't/O guess/O what/O he/O would/O do/O?/O He/O's/O doing/O just/O what/O's/O characteristic/O of/O
his/O mean/O character/O./O He/O'll/O keep/O himself/O in/O the/O right/O,/O while/O me/O,/O in/O my/O
ruin/O,/O he/O'll/O drive/O still/O lower/O to/O worse/O ruin/O yet/O.../O''/O

She/O recalled/O the/O words/O from/O the/O letter/O./O ``/OYou/O can/O conjecture/O what/O awaits/O
you/O and/O your/O son/O.../O''/O ``/OThat/O's/O a/O threat/O to/O take/O away/O my/O child/O,/O and/O most/O
likely/O by/O their/O stupid/O law/O he/O can/O./O But/O I/O know/O very/O well/O why/O he/O says/O it/O./O
He/O does/On't/O believe/O even/O in/O my/O love/O for/O my/O child/O,/O or/O he/O despises/O it/O -LRB-/Ojust/O
as/O he/O always/O used/O to/O ridicule/O it/O-RRB-/O./O He/O despises/O that/O feeling/O in/O me/O,/O but/O
he/O knows/O that/O I/O wo/On't/O abandon/O my/O child/O,/O that/O I/O ca/On't/O abandon/O my/O child/O,/O
that/O there/O could/O be/O no/O life/O for/O me/O without/O my/O child/O,/O even/O with/O him/O whom/O
I/O love/O;/O but/O that/O if/O I/O abandoned/O my/O child/O and/O ran/O away/O from/O him/O,/O I/O should/O
be/O acting/O like/O the/O most/O infamous/O,/O basest/O of/O women/O./O He/O knows/O that/O,/O and/O
knows/O that/O I/O am/O incapable/O of/O doing/O that/O./O''/O

She/O recalled/O another/O sentence/O in/O the/O letter/O./O ``/OOur/O life/O must/O go/O on/O as/O it/O
has/O done/O in/O the/O past/O.../O''/O ``/OThat/O life/O was/O miserable/O enough/O in/O the/O old/O
days/O;/O it/O has/O been/O awful/O of/O late/O./O What/O will/O it/O be/O now/O?/O And/O he/O knows/O all/O
that/O;/O he/O knows/O that/O I/O ca/On't/O repent/O that/O I/O breathe/O,/O that/O I/O love/O;/O he/O knows/O
that/O it/O can/O lead/O to/O nothing/O but/O lying/O and/O deceit/O;/O but/O he/O wants/O to/O go/O on/O
torturing/O me/O./O I/O know/O him/O;/O I/O know/O that/O he/O's/O at/O home/O and/O is/O happy/O in/O
deceit/O,/O like/O a/O fish/O swimming/O in/O the/O water/O./O No/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O give/O him/O that/O
happiness/O./O I/O'll/O break/O through/O the/O spiderweb/O of/O lies/O in/O which/O he/O wants/O to/O
catch/O me/O,/O come/O what/O may/O./O Anything/O's/O better/O than/O lying/O and/O deceit/O./O

``/OBut/O how/O?/O My/O God/O!/O my/O God/O!/O Was/O ever/O a/O woman/O so/O miserable/O as/O I/O am/O?/O.../O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O I/O will/O break/O through/O it/O,/O I/O will/O break/O through/O it/O!/O''/O she/O cried/O,/O
jumping/O up/O and/O keeping/O back/O her/O tears/O./O And/O she/O went/O to/O the/O writing/O table/O
to/O write/O him/O another/O letter/O./O But/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O her/O heart/O she/O felt/O
that/O she/O was/O not/O strong/O enough/O to/O break/O through/O anything/O,/O that/O she/O was/O
not/O strong/O enough/O to/O get/O out/O of/O her/O old/O position/O,/O however/O false/O and/O
dishonorable/O it/O might/O be/O./O

She/O sat/O down/O at/O the/O writing/O table/O,/O but/O instead/O of/O writing/O she/O clasped/O
her/O hands/O on/O the/O table/O,/O and/O,/O laying/O her/O head/O on/O them/O,/O burst/O into/O tears/O,/O
with/O sobs/O and/O heaving/O breast/O like/O a/O child/O crying/O./O She/O was/O weeping/O that/O
her/O dream/O of/O her/O position/O being/O made/O clear/O and/O definite/O had/O been/O
annihilated/O forever/O./O She/O knew/O beforehand/O that/O everything/O would/O go/O on/O in/O
the/O old/O way/O,/O and/O far/O worse/O,/O indeed/O,/O than/O in/O the/O old/O way/O./O She/O felt/O that/O
the/O position/O in/O the/O world/O that/O she/O enjoyed/O,/O and/O that/O had/O seemed/O to/O her/O
of/O so/O little/O consequence/O in/O the/O morning/O,/O that/O this/O position/O was/O precious/O
to/O her/O,/O that/O she/O would/O not/O have/O the/O strength/O to/O exchange/O it/O for/O the/O
shameful/O position/O of/O a/O woman/O who/O has/O abandoned/O husband/O and/O child/O to/O join/O
her/O lover/O;/O that/O however/O much/O she/O might/O struggle/O,/O she/O could/O not/O be/O
stronger/O than/O herself/O./O She/O would/O never/O know/O freedom/O in/O love/O,/O but/O would/O
remain/O forever/O a/O guilty/O wife/O,/O with/O the/O menace/O of/O detection/O hanging/O over/O
her/O at/O every/O instant/O;/O deceiving/O her/O husband/O for/O the/O sake/O of/O a/O shameful/O
connection/O with/O a/O man/O living/O apart/O and/O away/O from/O her/O,/O whose/O life/O she/O
could/O never/O share/O./O She/O knew/O that/O this/O was/O how/O it/O would/O be/O,/O and/O at/O the/O
same/O time/O it/O was/O so/O awful/O that/O she/O could/O not/O even/O conceive/O what/O it/O would/O
end/O in/O./O And/O she/O cried/O without/O restraint/O,/O as/O children/O cry/O when/O they/O are/O
punished/O./O

The/O sound/O of/O the/O footman/O's/O steps/O forced/O her/O to/O rouse/O herself/O,/O and/O,/O
hiding/O her/O face/O from/O him/O,/O she/O pretended/O to/O be/O writing/O./O

``/OThe/O courier/O asks/O if/O there/O's/O an/O answer/O,/O''/O the/O footman/O announced/O./O

``/OAn/O answer/O?/O Yes/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O ``/OLet/O him/O wait/O./O I/O'll/O ring/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O can/O I/O write/O?/O''/O she/O thought/O./O ``/OWhat/O can/O I/O decide/O upon/O alone/O?/O What/O do/O
I/O know/O?/O What/O do/O I/O want/O?/O What/O is/O there/O I/O care/O for/O?/O''/O Again/O she/O felt/O that/O
her/O soul/O was/O beginning/O to/O be/O split/O in/O two/O./O She/O was/O terrified/O again/O at/O
this/O feeling/O,/O and/O clutched/O at/O the/O first/O pretext/O for/O doing/O something/O
which/O might/O divert/O her/O thoughts/O from/O herself/O./O ``/OI/O ought/O to/O see/O Alexey/PERSON''/O
-LRB-/Oso/O she/O called/O Vronsky/O in/O her/O thoughts/O-RRB-/O;/O ``/Ono/O one/O but/O he/O can/O tell/O me/O what/O
I/O ought/O to/O do/O./O I/O'll/O go/O to/O Betsy/PERSON's/O,/O perhaps/O I/O shall/O see/O him/O there/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O to/O herself/O,/O completely/O forgetting/O that/O when/O she/O had/O told/O him/O the/O
day/O before/O that/O she/O was/O not/O going/O to/O Princess/O Tverskaya/PERSON's/O,/O he/O had/O said/O
that/O in/O that/O case/O he/O should/O not/O go/O either/O./O She/O went/O up/O to/O the/O table/O,/O
wrote/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O ``/OI/O have/O received/O your/O letter/O./O--/OA./O''/O;/O and/O,/O ringing/O
the/O bell/O,/O gave/O it/O to/O the/O footman/O./O

``/OWe/O are/O not/O going/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O Annushka/PERSON,/O as/O she/O came/O in/O./O

``/ONot/O going/O at/O all/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O do/On't/O unpack/O till/O tomorrow/O,/O and/O let/O the/O carriage/O wait/O./O I/O'm/O going/O to/O
the/O princess/O's/O./O''/O

``/OWhich/O dress/O am/O I/O to/O get/O ready/O?/O''/O



Chapter/O 17/O


The/O croquet/O party/O to/O which/O the/O Princess/O Tverskaya/PERSON had/O invited/O Anna/PERSON was/O
to/O consist/O of/O two/O ladies/O and/O their/O adorers/O./O These/O two/O ladies/O were/O the/O
chief/O representatives/O of/O a/O select/O new/O Petersburg/LOCATION circle/O,/O nicknamed/O,/O in/O
imitation/O of/O some/O imitation/O,/O _/Oles/O sept/O merveilles/O du/O monde/O_/O./O These/O
ladies/O belonged/O to/O a/O circle/O which/O,/O though/O of/O the/O highest/O society/O,/O was/O
utterly/O hostile/O to/O that/O in/O which/O Anna/PERSON moved/O./O Moreover/O,/O Stremov/PERSON,/O one/O of/O
the/O most/O influential/O people/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O the/O elderly/O admirer/O of/O
Liza/PERSON Merkalova/PERSON,/O was/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O enemy/O in/O the/O political/O
world/O./O From/O all/O these/O considerations/O Anna/PERSON had/O not/O meant/O to/O go/O,/O and/O the/O
hints/O in/O Princess/O Tverskaya/PERSON's/O note/O referred/O to/O her/O refusal/O./O But/O now/O Anna/PERSON
was/O eager/O to/O go/O,/O in/O the/O hope/O of/O seeing/O Vronsky/O./O

Anna/PERSON arrived/O at/O Princess/O Tverskaya/PERSON's/O earlier/O than/O the/O other/O guests/O./O

At/O the/O same/O moment/O as/O she/O entered/O,/O Vronsky/O's/O footman/O,/O with/O side-whiskers/O
combed/O out/O like/O a/O _/OKammerjunker/O_/O,/O went/O in/O too/O./O He/O stopped/O at/O the/O door/O,/O
and/O,/O taking/O off/O his/O cap/O,/O let/O her/O pass/O./O Anna/PERSON recognized/O him/O,/O and/O only/O
then/O recalled/O that/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O told/O her/O the/O day/O before/O that/O he/O would/O not/O
come/O./O Most/O likely/O he/O was/O sending/O a/O note/O to/O say/O so/O./O

As/O she/O took/O off/O her/O outer/O garment/O in/O the/O hall/O,/O she/O heard/O the/O footman/O,/O
pronouncing/O his/O ``/Or/O's/O''/O even/O like/O a/O _/OKammerjunker/O_/O,/O say/O,/O ``/OFrom/O the/O count/O
for/O the/O princess/O,/O''/O and/O hand/O the/O note/O./O

She/O longed/O to/O question/O him/O as/O to/O where/O his/O master/O was/O./O She/O longed/O to/O
turn/O back/O and/O send/O him/O a/O letter/O to/O come/O and/O see/O her/O,/O or/O to/O go/O herself/O to/O
see/O him/O./O But/O neither/O the/O first/O nor/O the/O second/O nor/O the/O third/O course/O was/O
possible/O./O Already/O she/O heard/O bells/O ringing/O to/O announce/O her/O arrival/O ahead/O
of/O her/O,/O and/O Princess/O Tverskaya/PERSON's/O footman/O was/O standing/O at/O the/O open/O door/O
waiting/O for/O her/O to/O go/O forward/O into/O the/O inner/O rooms/O./O

``/OThe/O princess/O is/O in/O the/O garden/O;/O they/O will/O inform/O her/O immediately/O./O Would/O
you/O be/O pleased/O to/O walk/O into/O the/O garden/O?/O''/O announced/O another/O footman/O in/O
another/O room/O./O

The/O position/O of/O uncertainty/O,/O of/O indecision/O,/O was/O still/O the/O same/O as/O at/O
home/O--/Oworse/O,/O in/O fact/O,/O since/O it/O was/O impossible/O to/O take/O any/O step/O,/O
impossible/O to/O see/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O and/O she/O had/O to/O remain/O here/O among/O outsiders/O,/O
in/O company/O so/O uncongenial/O to/O her/O present/O mood/O./O But/O she/O was/O wearing/O a/O
dress/O that/O she/O knew/O suited/O her/O./O She/O was/O not/O alone/O;/O all/O around/O was/O that/O
luxurious/O setting/O of/O idleness/O that/O she/O was/O used/O to/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O less/O
wretched/O than/O at/O home/O./O She/O was/O not/O forced/O to/O think/O what/O she/O was/O to/O do/O./O
Everything/O would/O be/O done/O of/O itself/O./O On/O meeting/O Betsy/PERSON coming/O towards/O her/O
in/O a/O white/O gown/O that/O struck/O her/O by/O its/O elegance/O,/O Anna/PERSON smiled/O at/O her/O just/O
as/O she/O always/O did/O./O Princess/O Tverskaya/PERSON was/O walking/O with/O Tushkevitch/PERSON and/O a/O
young/O lady/O,/O a/O relation/O,/O who/O,/O to/O the/O great/O joy/O of/O her/O parents/O in/O the/O
provinces/O,/O was/O spending/O the/O summer/O with/O the/O fashionable/O princess/O./O

There/O was/O probably/O something/O unusual/O about/O Anna/PERSON,/O for/O Betsy/PERSON noticed/O it/O at/O
once/O./O

``/OI/O slept/O badly/O,/O''/O answered/O Anna/PERSON,/O looking/O intently/O at/O the/O footman/O who/O came/O
to/O meet/O them/O,/O and/O,/O as/O she/O supposed/O,/O brought/O Vronsky/O's/O note/O./O

``/OHow/O glad/O I/O am/O you/O've/O come/O!/O''/O said/O Betsy/PERSON./O ``/OI/O'm/O tired/O,/O and/O was/O just/O
longing/O to/O have/O some/O tea/O before/O they/O come/O./O You/O might/O go/O''/O--/Oshe/O turned/O to/O
Tushkevitch/PERSON--/O``/Owith/O Masha/PERSON,/O and/O try/O the/O croquet/O ground/O over/O there/O where/O
they/O've/O been/O cutting/O it/O./O We/O shall/O have/O time/O to/O talk/O a/O little/O over/O tea/O;/O
we/O'll/O have/O a/O cozy/O chat/O,/O eh/O?/O''/O she/O said/O in/O English/O to/O Anna/PERSON,/O with/O a/O smile/O,/O
pressing/O the/O hand/O with/O which/O she/O held/O a/O parasol/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O especially/O as/O I/O ca/On't/O stay/O very/O long/O with/O you/O./O I/O'm/O forced/O to/O go/O on/O
to/O old/O Madame/LOCATION Vrede/LOCATION./O I/O've/O been/O promising/O to/O go/O for/O a/O century/O,/O''/O said/O
Anna/PERSON,/O to/O whom/O lying/O,/O alien/O as/O it/O was/O to/O her/O nature/O,/O had/O become/O not/O
merely/O simple/O and/O natural/O in/O society/O,/O but/O a/O positive/O source/O of/O
satisfaction/O./O Why/O she/O said/O this/O,/O which/O she/O had/O not/O thought/O of/O a/O second/O
before/O,/O she/O could/O not/O have/O explained/O./O She/O had/O said/O it/O simply/O from/O the/O
reflection/O that/O as/O Vronsky/O would/O not/O be/O here/O,/O she/O had/O better/O secure/O her/O
own/O freedom/O,/O and/O try/O to/O see/O him/O somehow/O./O But/O why/O she/O had/O spoken/O of/O old/O
Madame/PERSON Vrede/PERSON,/O whom/O she/O had/O to/O go/O and/O see/O,/O as/O she/O had/O to/O see/O many/O other/O
people/O,/O she/O could/O not/O have/O explained/O;/O and/O yet/O,/O as/O it/O afterwards/O turned/O
out/O,/O had/O she/O contrived/O the/O most/O cunning/O devices/O to/O meet/O Vronsky/O,/O she/O
could/O have/O thought/O of/O nothing/O better/O./O

``/ONo/O./O I/O'm/O not/O going/O to/O let/O you/O go/O for/O anything/O,/O''/O answered/O Betsy/PERSON,/O looking/O
intently/O into/O Anna/PERSON's/O face/O./O ``/OReally/O,/O if/O I/O were/O not/O fond/O of/O you/O,/O I/O should/O
feel/O offended/O./O One/O would/O think/O you/O were/O afraid/O my/O society/O would/O
compromise/O you/O./O Tea/O in/O the/O little/O dining/O room/O,/O please/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O half/O
closing/O her/O eyes/O,/O as/O she/O always/O did/O when/O addressing/O the/O footman/O./O

Taking/O the/O note/O from/O him/O,/O she/O read/O it/O./O

``/OAlexey/PERSON's/O playing/O us/O false/O,/O''/O she/O said/O in/O French/O;/O ``/Ohe/O writes/O that/O he/O
ca/On't/O come/O,/O''/O she/O added/O in/O a/O tone/O as/O simple/O and/O natural/O as/O though/O it/O
could/O never/O enter/O her/O head/O that/O Vronsky/O could/O mean/O anything/O more/O to/O Anna/PERSON
than/O a/O game/O of/O croquet/O./O Anna/PERSON knew/O that/O Betsy/PERSON knew/O everything/O,/O but/O,/O
hearing/O how/O she/O spoke/O of/O Vronsky/O before/O her/O,/O she/O almost/O felt/O persuaded/O
for/O a/O minute/O that/O she/O knew/O nothing/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON indifferently/O,/O as/O though/O not/O greatly/O interested/O in/O the/O
matter/O,/O and/O she/O went/O on/O smiling/O:/O ``/OHow/O can/O you/O or/O your/O friends/O compromise/O
anyone/O?/O''/O

This/O playing/O with/O words/O,/O this/O hiding/O of/O a/O secret/O,/O had/O a/O great/O
fascination/O for/O Anna/PERSON,/O as/O,/O indeed/O,/O it/O has/O for/O all/O women/O./O And/O it/O was/O not/O
the/O necessity/O of/O concealment/O,/O not/O the/O aim/O with/O which/O the/O concealment/O was/O
contrived/O,/O but/O the/O process/O of/O concealment/O itself/O which/O attracted/O her/O./O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O be/O more/O Catholic/O than/O the/O Pope/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OStremov/PERSON and/O Liza/PERSON
Merkalova/PERSON,/O why/O,/O they/O're/O the/O cream/O of/O the/O cream/O of/O society/O./O Besides/O,/O
they/O're/O received/O everywhere/O,/O and/O _/OI/O_/O''/O--/Oshe/O laid/O special/O stress/O on/O the/O
I/O--/O``/Ohave/O never/O been/O strict/O and/O intolerant/O./O It/O's/O simply/O that/O I/O have/On't/O the/O
time/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O you/O do/On't/O care/O,/O perhaps/O,/O to/O meet/O Stremov/PERSON?/O Let/O him/O and/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON tilt/O at/O each/O other/O in/O the/O committee/O--/Othat/O's/O no/O affair/O of/O
ours/O./O But/O in/O the/O world/O,/O he/O's/O the/O most/O amiable/O man/O I/O know/O,/O and/O a/O devoted/O
croquet/O player/O./O You/O shall/O see/O./O And/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O absurd/O position/O as/O
Liza/PERSON's/O lovesick/O swain/O at/O his/O age/O,/O you/O ought/O to/O see/O how/O he/O carries/O off/O
the/O absurd/O position/O./O He/O's/O very/O nice/O./O Sappho/PERSON Shtoltz/PERSON you/O do/On't/O know/O?/O Oh/O,/O
that/O's/O a/O new/O type/O,/O quite/O new/O./O''/O

Betsy/PERSON said/O all/O this/O,/O and/O,/O at/O the/O same/O time/O,/O from/O her/O good-humored/O,/O
shrewd/O glance/O,/O Anna/PERSON felt/O that/O she/O partly/O guessed/O her/O plight/O,/O and/O was/O
hatching/O something/O for/O her/O benefit/O./O They/O were/O in/O the/O little/O boudoir/O./O

``/OI/O must/O write/O to/O Alexey/PERSON though/O,/O''/O and/O Betsy/PERSON sat/O down/O to/O the/O table/O,/O
scribbled/O a/O few/O lines/O,/O and/O put/O the/O note/O in/O an/O envelope/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O telling/O him/O to/O come/O to/O dinner/O./O I/O've/O one/O lady/O extra/O to/O dinner/O with/O
me/O,/O and/O no/O man/O to/O take/O her/O in/O./O Look/O what/O I/O've/O said/O,/O will/O that/O persuade/O

directions/O./O''/O

Without/O a/O moment/O's/O thought/O,/O Anna/PERSON sat/O down/O to/O the/O table/O with/O Betsy/PERSON's/O
letter/O,/O and/O,/O without/O reading/O it/O,/O wrote/O below/O:/O ``/OIt/O's/O essential/O for/O me/O to/O

be/O taken/O./O

At/O tea/O,/O which/O was/O brought/O them/O on/O a/O little/O tea-table/O in/O the/O cool/O little/O
drawing/O room/O,/O the/O cozy/O chat/O promised/O by/O Princess/O Tverskaya/O before/O the/O
arrival/O of/O her/O visitors/O really/O did/O come/O off/O between/O the/O two/O women/O./O They/O
criticized/O the/O people/O they/O were/O expecting/O,/O and/O the/O conversation/O fell/O
upon/O Liza/PERSON Merkalova/PERSON./O

``/OShe/O's/O very/O sweet/O,/O and/O I/O always/O liked/O her/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O ought/O to/O like/O her/O./O She/O raves/O about/O you/O./O Yesterday/O she/O came/O up/O to/O me/O
after/O the/O races/O and/O was/O in/O despair/O at/O not/O finding/O you/O./O She/O says/O you/O're/O a/O
real/O heroine/O of/O romance/O,/O and/O that/O if/O she/O were/O a/O man/O she/O would/O do/O all/O
sorts/O of/O mad/O things/O for/O your/O sake/O./O Stremov/PERSON says/O she/O does/O that/O as/O it/O is/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O do/O tell/O me/O,/O please/O,/O I/O never/O could/O make/O it/O out/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O after/O
being/O silent/O for/O some/O time/O,/O speaking/O in/O a/O tone/O that/O showed/O she/O was/O not/O
asking/O an/O idle/O question/O,/O but/O that/O what/O she/O was/O asking/O was/O of/O more/O
importance/O to/O her/O than/O it/O should/O have/O been/O;/O ``/Odo/O tell/O me/O,/O please/O,/O what/O
are/O her/O relations/O with/O Prince/PERSON Kaluzhsky/PERSON,/O Mishka/PERSON,/O as/O he/O's/O called/O?/O I/O've/O
met/O them/O so/O little/O./O What/O does/O it/O mean/O?/O''/O

Betsy/PERSON smiled/O with/O her/O eyes/O,/O and/O looked/O intently/O at/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OIt/O's/O a/O new/O manner/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OThey/O've/O all/O adopted/O that/O manner/O./O They/O've/O
flung/O their/O caps/O over/O the/O windmills/O./O But/O there/O are/O ways/O and/O ways/O of/O
flinging/O them/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O what/O are/O her/O relations/O precisely/O with/O Kaluzhsky/PERSON?/O''/O

Betsy/PERSON broke/O into/O unexpectedly/O mirthful/O and/O irrepressible/O laughter/O,/O a/O
thing/O which/O rarely/O happened/O with/O her/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O encroaching/O on/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON's/O special/O domain/O now/O./O That/O's/O the/O
question/O of/O an/O _/Oenfant/O terrible/O_/O,/O''/O and/O Betsy/PERSON obviously/O tried/O to/O restrain/O
herself/O,/O but/O could/O not/O,/O and/O went/O off/O into/O peals/O of/O that/O infectious/O
laughter/O that/O people/O laugh/O who/O do/O not/O laugh/O often/O./O ``/OYou/O'd/O better/O ask/O
them/O,/O''/O she/O brought/O out/O,/O between/O tears/O of/O laughter/O./O

``/ONo/O;/O you/O laugh/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O laughing/O too/O in/O spite/O of/O herself/O,/O ``/Obut/O I/O
never/O could/O understand/O it/O./O I/O ca/On't/O understand/O the/O husband/O's/O rôle/O in/O it/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O husband/O?/O Liza/PERSON Merkalova/PERSON's/O husband/O carries/O her/O shawl/O,/O and/O is/O always/O
ready/O to/O be/O of/O use/O./O But/O anything/O more/O than/O that/O in/O reality/O,/O no/O one/O cares/O
to/O inquire/O./O You/O know/O in/O decent/O society/O one/O does/On't/O talk/O or/O think/O even/O of/O
certain/O details/O of/O the/O toilet/O./O That/O's/O how/O it/O is/O with/O this/O./O''/O

``/OWill/O you/O be/O at/O Madame/ORGANIZATION Rolandak/ORGANIZATION's/O fête/O?/O''/O asked/O Anna/PERSON,/O to/O change/O the/O
conversation/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O think/O so/O,/O''/O answered/O Betsy/PERSON,/O and/O,/O without/O looking/O at/O her/O friend/O,/O
she/O began/O filling/O the/O little/O transparent/O cups/O with/O fragrant/O tea/O./O Putting/O
a/O cup/O before/O Anna/PERSON,/O she/O took/O out/O a/O cigarette/O,/O and/O,/O fitting/O it/O into/O a/O

``/OIt/O's/O like/O this/O,/O you/O see/O:/O I/O'm/O in/O a/O fortunate/O position/O,/O''/O she/O began/O,/O quite/O
serious/O now/O,/O as/O she/O took/O up/O her/O cup/O./O ``/OI/O understand/O you/O,/O and/O I/O understand/O
Liza/PERSON./O Liza/PERSON now/O is/O one/O of/O those/O naïve/O natures/O that/O,/O like/O children/O,/O do/On't/O
know/O what/O's/O good/O and/O what/O's/O bad/O./O Anyway/O,/O she/O did/On't/O comprehend/O it/O when/O
she/O was/O very/O young/O./O And/O now/O she/O's/O aware/O that/O the/O lack/O of/O comprehension/O
suits/O her/O./O Now/O,/O perhaps/O,/O she/O does/On't/O know/O on/O purpose/O,/O''/O said/O Betsy/PERSON,/O with/O
a/O subtle/O smile/O./O ``/OBut/O,/O anyway/O,/O it/O suits/O her/O./O The/O very/O same/O thing/O,/O do/On't/O
you/O see/O,/O may/O be/O looked/O at/O tragically/O,/O and/O turned/O into/O a/O misery/O,/O or/O it/O
may/O be/O looked/O at/O simply/O and/O even/O humorously/O./O Possibly/O you/O are/O inclined/O
to/O look/O at/O things/O too/O tragically/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O I/O should/O like/O to/O know/O other/O people/O just/O as/O I/O know/O myself/O!/O''/O said/O
Anna/PERSON,/O seriously/O and/O dreamily/O./O ``/OAm/O I/O worse/O than/O other/O people/O,/O or/O better/O?/O
I/O think/O I/O'm/O worse/O./O''/O

''/O_/OEnfant/O terrible/O,/O enfant/O terrible/O!/O_/O''/O repeated/O Betsy/PERSON./O ``/OBut/O here/O they/O
are/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 18/O


They/O heard/O the/O sound/O of/O steps/O and/O a/O man/O's/O voice/O,/O then/O a/O woman/O's/O voice/O
and/O laughter/O,/O and/O immediately/O thereafter/O there/O walked/O in/O the/O expected/O
guests/O:/O Sappho/ORGANIZATION Shtoltz/ORGANIZATION,/O and/O a/O young/O man/O beaming/O with/O excess/O of/O health/O,/O
the/O so-called/O Vaska/PERSON./O It/O was/O evident/O that/O ample/O supplies/O of/O beefsteak/O,/O
truffles/O,/O and/O Burgundy/O never/O failed/O to/O reach/O him/O at/O the/O fitting/O hour/O./O
Vaska/PERSON bowed/O to/O the/O two/O ladies/O,/O and/O glanced/O at/O them/O,/O but/O only/O for/O one/O
second/O./O He/O walked/O after/O Sappho/PERSON into/O the/O drawing-room/O,/O and/O followed/O her/O
about/O as/O though/O he/O were/O chained/O to/O her/O,/O keeping/O his/O sparkling/O eyes/O fixed/O
on/O her/O as/O though/O he/O wanted/O to/O eat/O her/O./O Sappho/PERSON Shtoltz/PERSON was/O a/O blonde/O
beauty/O with/O black/O eyes/O./O She/O walked/O with/O smart/O little/O steps/O in/O
high-heeled/O shoes/O,/O and/O shook/O hands/O with/O the/O ladies/O vigorously/O like/O a/O
man/O./O

Anna/PERSON had/O never/O met/O this/O new/O star/O of/O fashion/O,/O and/O was/O struck/O by/O her/O
beauty/O,/O the/O exaggerated/O extreme/O to/O which/O her/O dress/O was/O carried/O,/O and/O the/O
boldness/O of/O her/O manners/O./O On/O her/O head/O there/O was/O such/O a/O superstructure/O of/O
soft/O,/O golden/O hair/O--/Oher/O own/O and/O false/O mixed/O--/Othat/O her/O head/O was/O equal/O in/O
size/O to/O the/O elegantly/O rounded/O bust/O,/O of/O which/O so/O much/O was/O exposed/O in/O
front/O./O The/O impulsive/O abruptness/O of/O her/O movements/O was/O such/O that/O at/O every/O
step/O the/O lines/O of/O her/O knees/O and/O the/O upper/O part/O of/O her/O legs/O were/O
distinctly/O marked/O under/O her/O dress/O,/O and/O the/O question/O involuntarily/O rose/O
to/O the/O mind/O where/O in/O the/O undulating/O,/O piled-up/O mountain/O of/O material/O at/O
the/O back/O the/O real/O body/O of/O the/O woman/O,/O so/O small/O and/O slender/O,/O so/O naked/O in/O
front/O,/O and/O so/O hidden/O behind/O and/O below/O,/O really/O came/O to/O an/O end/O./O

Betsy/PERSON made/O haste/O to/O introduce/O her/O to/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OOnly/O fancy/O,/O we/O all/O but/O ran/O over/O two/O soldiers/O,/O''/O she/O began/O telling/O them/O
at/O once/O,/O using/O her/O eyes/O,/O smiling/O and/O twitching/O away/O her/O tail/O,/O which/O she/O
flung/O back/O at/O one/O stroke/O all/O on/O one/O side/O./O ``/OI/O drove/O here/O with/O Vaska/PERSON.../O./O
Ah/O,/O to/O be/O sure/O,/O you/O do/On't/O know/O each/O other/O./O''/O And/O mentioning/O his/O surname/O
she/O introduced/O the/O young/O man/O,/O and/O reddening/O a/O little/O,/O broke/O into/O a/O
ringing/O laugh/O at/O her/O mistake/O--/Othat/O is/O,/O at/O her/O having/O called/O him/O Vaska/PERSON to/O
a/O stranger/O./O Vaska/PERSON bowed/O once/O more/O to/O Anna/PERSON,/O but/O he/O said/O nothing/O to/O her/O./O
He/O addressed/O Sappho/PERSON:/O ``/OYou/O've/O lost/O your/O bet/O./O We/O got/O here/O first/O./O Pay/O up/O,/O''/O
said/O he/O,/O smiling/O./O

Sappho/PERSON laughed/O still/O more/O festively/O./O

``/ONot/O just/O now/O,/O''/O said/O she/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O all/O right/O,/O I/O'll/O have/O it/O later/O./O''/O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O very/O well/O./O Oh/O,/O yes/O./O''/O She/O turned/O suddenly/O to/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON:/O
``/OI/O am/O a/O nice/O person/O .../O I/O positively/O forgot/O it/O .../O I/O've/O brought/O you/O a/O
visitor/O./O And/O here/O he/O comes/O./O''/O The/O unexpected/O young/O visitor/O,/O whom/O Sappho/PERSON
had/O invited/O,/O and/O whom/O she/O had/O forgotten/O,/O was/O,/O however/O,/O a/O personage/O of/O
such/O consequence/O that/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O youth/O,/O both/O the/O ladies/O rose/O on/O
his/O entrance/O./O

He/O was/O a/O new/O admirer/O of/O Sappho/PERSON's/O./O He/O now/O dogged/O her/O footsteps/O,/O like/O
Vaska/PERSON./O

Soon/O after/O Prince/PERSON Kaluzhsky/PERSON arrived/O,/O and/O Liza/PERSON Merkalova/PERSON with/O Stremov/PERSON./O
Liza/PERSON Merkalova/PERSON was/O a/O thin/O brunette/O,/O with/O an/O Oriental/O,/O languid/O type/O of/O
face/O,/O and/O--/Oas/O everyone/O used/O to/O say/O--/Oexquisite/O enigmatic/O eyes/O./O The/O tone/O of/O
her/O dark/O dress/O -LRB-/OAnna/PERSON immediately/O observed/O and/O appreciated/O the/O fact/O-RRB-/O was/O
in/O perfect/O harmony/O with/O her/O style/O of/O beauty/O./O Liza/PERSON was/O as/O soft/O and/O
enervated/O as/O Sappho/PERSON was/O smart/O and/O abrupt/O./O

But/O to/O Anna/PERSON's/O taste/O Liza/PERSON was/O far/O more/O attractive/O./O Betsy/PERSON had/O said/O to/O Anna/PERSON
that/O she/O had/O adopted/O the/O pose/O of/O an/O innocent/O child/O,/O but/O when/O Anna/PERSON saw/O
her/O,/O she/O felt/O that/O this/O was/O not/O the/O truth/O./O She/O really/O was/O both/O innocent/O
and/O corrupt/O,/O but/O a/O sweet/O and/O passive/O woman/O./O It/O is/O true/O that/O her/O tone/O was/O
the/O same/O as/O Sappho/PERSON's/O;/O that/O like/O Sappho/PERSON,/O she/O had/O two/O men/O,/O one/O young/O and/O
one/O old/O,/O tacked/O onto/O her/O,/O and/O devouring/O her/O with/O their/O eyes/O./O But/O there/O
was/O something/O in/O her/O higher/O than/O what/O surrounded/O her/O./O There/O was/O in/O her/O
the/O glow/O of/O the/O real/O diamond/O among/O glass/O imitations/O./O This/O glow/O shone/O out/O
in/O her/O exquisite/O,/O truly/O enigmatic/O eyes/O./O The/O weary/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O
passionate/O,/O glance/O of/O those/O eyes/O,/O encircled/O by/O dark/O rings/O,/O impressed/O one/O
by/O its/O perfect/O sincerity/O./O Everyone/O looking/O into/O those/O eyes/O fancied/O he/O
knew/O her/O wholly/O,/O and/O knowing/O her/O,/O could/O not/O but/O love/O her/O./O At/O the/O sight/O
of/O Anna/PERSON,/O her/O whole/O face/O lighted/O up/O at/O once/O with/O a/O smile/O of/O delight/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O how/O glad/O I/O am/O to/O see/O you/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O going/O up/O to/O her/O./O ``/OYesterday/O at/O
the/O races/O all/O I/O wanted/O was/O to/O get/O to/O you/O,/O but/O you/O'd/O gone/O away/O./O I/O did/O so/O
want/O to/O see/O you/O,/O yesterday/O especially/O./O Was/On't/O it/O awful/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
looking/O at/O Anna/PERSON with/O eyes/O that/O seemed/O to/O lay/O bare/O all/O her/O soul/O./O

``/OYes/O;/O I/O had/O no/O idea/O it/O would/O be/O so/O thrilling/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O blushing/O./O

The/O company/O got/O up/O at/O this/O moment/O to/O go/O into/O the/O garden/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O going/O,/O''/O said/O Liza/PERSON,/O smiling/O and/O settling/O herself/O close/O to/O Anna/PERSON./O
``/OYou/O wo/On't/O go/O either/O,/O will/O you/O?/O Who/O wants/O to/O play/O croquet/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O like/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OThere/O,/O how/O do/O you/O manage/O never/O to/O be/O bored/O by/O things/O?/O It/O's/O delightful/O
to/O look/O at/O you/O./O You/O're/O alive/O,/O but/O I/O'm/O bored/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O can/O you/O be/O bored/O?/O Why/O,/O you/O live/O in/O the/O liveliest/O set/O in/O
Petersburg/LOCATION,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OPossibly/O the/O people/O who/O are/O not/O of/O our/O set/O are/O even/O more/O bored/O;/O but/O
we/O--/OI/O certainly/O--/Oare/O not/O happy/O,/O but/O awfully/O,/O awfully/O bored/O./O''/O

Sappho/PERSON smoking/O a/O cigarette/O went/O off/O into/O the/O garden/O with/O the/O two/O young/O
men/O./O Betsy/PERSON and/O Stremov/PERSON remained/O at/O the/O tea-table/O./O

``/OWhat/O,/O bored/O!/O''/O said/O Betsy/PERSON./O ``/OSappho/PERSON says/O they/O did/O enjoy/O themselves/O
tremendously/O at/O your/O house/O last/O night/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O how/O dreary/O it/O all/O was/O!/O''/O said/O Liza/PERSON Merkalova/PERSON./O ``/OWe/O all/O drove/O back/O to/O
my/O place/O after/O the/O races/O./O And/O always/O the/O same/O people/O,/O always/O the/O same/O./O
Always/O the/O same/O thing/O./O We/O lounged/O about/O on/O sofas/O all/O the/O evening/O./O What/O
is/O there/O to/O enjoy/O in/O that/O?/O No/O;/O do/O tell/O me/O how/O you/O manage/O never/O to/O be/O
bored/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O addressing/O Anna/PERSON again/O./O ``/OOne/O has/O but/O to/O look/O at/O you/O and/O
one/O sees/O,/O here/O's/O a/O woman/O who/O may/O be/O happy/O or/O unhappy/O,/O but/O is/On't/O bored/O./O
Tell/O me/O how/O you/O do/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O do/O nothing/O,/O''/O answered/O Anna/PERSON,/O blushing/O at/O these/O searching/O questions/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O the/O best/O way/O,/O''/O Stremov/PERSON put/O in/O./O Stremov/PERSON was/O a/O man/O of/O fifty/O,/O
partly/O gray/O,/O but/O still/O vigorous-looking/O,/O very/O ugly/O,/O but/O with/O a/O
characteristic/O and/O intelligent/O face/O./O Liza/PERSON Merkalova/PERSON was/O his/O wife/O's/O
niece/O,/O and/O he/O spent/O all/O his/O leisure/O hours/O with/O her/O./O On/O meeting/O Anna/PERSON
Karenina/PERSON,/O as/O he/O was/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O enemy/O in/O the/O government/O,/O he/O
tried/O,/O like/O a/O shrewd/O man/O and/O a/O man/O of/O the/O world/O,/O to/O be/O particularly/O
cordial/O with/O her/O,/O the/O wife/O of/O his/O enemy/O./O

''/O`/ONothing/O,/O'/O''/O he/O put/O in/O with/O a/O subtle/O smile/O,/O ``/Othat/O's/O the/O very/O best/O way/O./O I/O
told/O you/O long/O ago/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O turning/O to/O Liza/PERSON Merkalova/PERSON,/O ``/Othat/O if/O you/O
do/On't/O want/O to/O be/O bored/O,/O you/O must/On't/O think/O you/O're/O going/O to/O be/O bored/O./O It/O's/O
just/O as/O you/O must/On't/O be/O afraid/O of/O not/O being/O able/O to/O fall/O asleep/O,/O if/O
you/O're/O afraid/O of/O sleeplessness/O./O That/O's/O just/O what/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON has/O
just/O said/O./O''/O

``/OI/O should/O be/O very/O glad/O if/O I/O had/O said/O it/O,/O for/O it/O's/O not/O only/O clever/O but/O
true/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O do/O tell/O me/O why/O it/O is/O one/O ca/On't/O go/O to/O sleep/O,/O and/O one/O ca/On't/O help/O
being/O bored/O?/O''/O

``/OTo/O sleep/O well/O one/O ought/O to/O work/O,/O and/O to/O enjoy/O oneself/O one/O ought/O to/O work/O
too/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O am/O I/O to/O work/O for/O when/O my/O work/O is/O no/O use/O to/O anybody/O?/O And/O I/O ca/On't/O
and/O wo/On't/O knowingly/O make/O a/O pretense/O about/O it/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O incorrigible/O,/O''/O said/O Stremov/PERSON,/O not/O looking/O at/O her/O,/O and/O he/O spoke/O
again/O to/O Anna/PERSON./O As/O he/O rarely/O met/O Anna/PERSON,/O he/O could/O say/O nothing/O but/O
commonplaces/O to/O her/O,/O but/O he/O said/O those/O commonplaces/O as/O to/O when/O she/O was/O
returning/O to/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O how/O fond/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON was/O of/O
her/O,/O with/O an/O expression/O which/O suggested/O that/O he/O longed/O with/O his/O whole/O
soul/O to/O please/O her/O and/O show/O his/O regard/O for/O her/O and/O even/O more/O than/O that/O./O

Tushkevitch/PERSON came/O in/O,/O announcing/O that/O the/O party/O were/O awaiting/O the/O other/O
players/O to/O begin/O croquet/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O do/On't/O go/O away/O,/O please/O do/On't/O,/O''/O pleaded/O Liza/PERSON Merkalova/PERSON,/O hearing/O that/O
Anna/PERSON was/O going/O./O Stremov/PERSON joined/O in/O her/O entreaties/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O too/O violent/O a/O transition/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/Oto/O go/O from/O such/O company/O to/O
old/O Madame/ORGANIZATION Vrede/ORGANIZATION./O And/O besides/O,/O you/O will/O only/O give/O her/O a/O chance/O for/O
talking/O scandal/O,/O while/O here/O you/O arouse/O none/O but/O such/O different/O feelings/O
of/O the/O highest/O and/O most/O opposite/O kind/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O her/O./O

Anna/PERSON pondered/O for/O an/O instant/O in/O uncertainty/O./O This/O shrewd/O man/O's/O
flattering/O words/O,/O the/O naïve/O,/O childlike/O affection/O shown/O her/O by/O Liza/PERSON
Merkalova/PERSON,/O and/O all/O the/O social/O atmosphere/O she/O was/O used/O to/O,/O--/Oit/O was/O all/O so/O
easy/O,/O and/O what/O was/O in/O store/O for/O her/O was/O so/O difficult/O,/O that/O she/O was/O for/O a/O
minute/O in/O uncertainty/O whether/O to/O remain/O,/O whether/O to/O put/O off/O a/O little/O
longer/O the/O painful/O moment/O of/O explanation/O./O But/O remembering/O what/O was/O in/O
store/O for/O her/O alone/O at/O home/O,/O if/O she/O did/O not/O come/O to/O some/O decision/O,/O
remembering/O that/O gesture/O--/Oterrible/O even/O in/O memory/O--/Owhen/O she/O had/O clutched/O
her/O hair/O in/O both/O hands/O--/Oshe/O said/O good-bye/O and/O went/O away/O./O



Chapter/O 19/O


In/O spite/O of/O Vronsky/O's/O apparently/O frivolous/O life/O in/O society/O,/O he/O was/O a/O man/O
who/O hated/O irregularity/O./O In/O early/O youth/O in/O the/O Corps/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION Pages/ORGANIZATION,/O he/O had/O
experienced/O the/O humiliation/O of/O a/O refusal/O,/O when/O he/O had/O tried/O,/O being/O in/O
difficulties/O,/O to/O borrow/O money/O,/O and/O since/O then/O he/O had/O never/O once/O put/O
himself/O in/O the/O same/O position/O again/O./O

In/O order/O to/O keep/O his/O affairs/O in/O some/O sort/O of/O order/O,/O he/O used/O about/O five/O
times/O a/O year/O -LRB-/Omore/O or/O less/O frequently/O,/O according/O to/O circumstances/O-RRB-/O to/O
shut/O himself/O up/O alone/O and/O put/O all/O his/O affairs/O into/O definite/O shape/O./O This/O
he/O used/O to/O call/O his/O day/O of/O reckoning/O or/O _/Ofaire/O la/O lessive/O_/O./O

On/O waking/O up/O the/O day/O after/O the/O races/O,/O Vronsky/O put/O on/O a/O white/O linen/O coat/O,/O
and/O without/O shaving/O or/O taking/O his/O bath/O,/O he/O distributed/O about/O the/O table/O
moneys/O,/O bills/O,/O and/O letters/O,/O and/O set/O to/O work/O./O Petritsky/PERSON,/O who/O knew/O he/O was/O
ill-tempered/O on/O such/O occasions/O,/O on/O waking/O up/O and/O seeing/O his/O comrade/O at/O
the/O writing-table/O,/O quietly/O dressed/O and/O went/O out/O without/O getting/O in/O his/O
way/O./O

Every/O man/O who/O knows/O to/O the/O minutest/O details/O all/O the/O complexity/O of/O the/O
conditions/O surrounding/O him/O,/O can/Onot/O help/O imagining/O that/O the/O complexity/O of/O
these/O conditions/O,/O and/O the/O difficulty/O of/O making/O them/O clear/O,/O is/O something/O
exceptional/O and/O personal/O,/O peculiar/O to/O himself/O,/O and/O never/O supposes/O that/O
others/O are/O surrounded/O by/O just/O as/O complicated/O an/O array/O of/O personal/O
affairs/O as/O he/O is/O./O So/O indeed/O it/O seemed/O to/O Vronsky/O./O And/O not/O without/O inward/O
pride/O,/O and/O not/O without/O reason/O,/O he/O thought/O that/O any/O other/O man/O would/O long/O
ago/O have/O been/O in/O difficulties/O,/O would/O have/O been/O forced/O to/O some/O
dishonorable/O course/O,/O if/O he/O had/O found/O himself/O in/O such/O a/O difficult/O
position/O./O But/O Vronsky/PERSON felt/O that/O now/O especially/O it/O was/O essential/O for/O him/O
to/O clear/O up/O and/O define/O his/O position/O if/O he/O were/O to/O avoid/O getting/O into/O
difficulties/O./O

What/O Vronsky/O attacked/O first/O as/O being/O the/O easiest/O was/O his/O pecuniary/O
position/O./O Writing/O out/O on/O note/O paper/O in/O his/O minute/O hand/O all/O that/O he/O owed/O,/O
he/O added/O up/O the/O amount/O and/O found/O that/O his/O debts/O amounted/O to/O seventeen/O
thousand/O and/O some/O odd/O hundreds/O,/O which/O he/O left/O out/O for/O the/O sake/O of/O
clearness/O./O Reckoning/O up/O his/O money/O and/O his/O bank/O book/O,/O he/O found/O that/O he/O
