had/O left/O one/O thousand/O eight/O hundred/O roubles/O,/O and/O nothing/O coming/O in/O
before/O the/O New/O Year/O./O Reckoning/O over/O again/O his/O list/O of/O debts/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON
copied/O it/O,/O dividing/O it/O into/O three/O classes/O./O In/O the/O first/O class/O he/O put/O the/O
debts/O which/O he/O would/O have/O to/O pay/O at/O once/O,/O or/O for/O which/O he/O must/O in/O any/O
case/O have/O the/O money/O ready/O so/O that/O on/O demand/O for/O payment/O there/O could/O not/O
be/O a/O moment/O's/O delay/O in/O paying/O./O Such/O debts/O amounted/O to/O about/O four/O
thousand/O:/O one/O thousand/O five/O hundred/O for/O a/O horse/O,/O and/O two/O thousand/O five/O
hundred/O as/O surety/O for/O a/O young/O comrade/O,/O Venovsky/PERSON,/O who/O had/O lost/O that/O sum/O
to/O a/O cardsharper/O in/O Vronsky/O's/O presence/O./O Vronsky/O had/O wanted/O to/O pay/O the/O
money/O at/O the/O time/O -LRB-/Ohe/O had/O that/O amount/O then/O-RRB-/O,/O but/O Venovsky/PERSON and/O Yashvin/PERSON
had/O insisted/O that/O they/O would/O pay/O and/O not/O Vronsky/O,/O who/O had/O not/O played/O./O
That/O was/O so/O far/O well/O,/O but/O Vronsky/PERSON knew/O that/O in/O this/O dirty/O business/O,/O
though/O his/O only/O share/O in/O it/O was/O undertaking/O by/O word/O of/O mouth/O to/O be/O
surety/O for/O Venovsky/O,/O it/O was/O absolutely/O necessary/O for/O him/O to/O have/O the/O two/O
thousand/O five/O hundred/O roubles/O so/O as/O to/O be/O able/O to/O fling/O it/O at/O the/O
swindler/O,/O and/O have/O no/O more/O words/O with/O him/O./O And/O so/O for/O this/O first/O and/O
most/O important/O division/O he/O must/O have/O four/O thousand/O roubles/O./O The/O second/O
class/O--/Oeight/O thousand/O roubles/O--/Oconsisted/O of/O less/O important/O debts/O./O These/O
were/O principally/O accounts/O owing/O in/O connection/O with/O his/O race/O horses/O,/O to/O
the/O purveyor/O of/O oats/O and/O hay/O,/O the/O English/O saddler/O,/O and/O so/O on/O./O He/O would/O
have/O to/O pay/O some/O two/O thousand/O roubles/O on/O these/O debts/O too/O,/O in/O order/O to/O be/O
quite/O free/O from/O anxiety/O./O The/O last/O class/O of/O debts/O--/Oto/O shops/O,/O to/O hotels/O,/O to/O
his/O tailor/O--/Owere/O such/O as/O need/O not/O be/O considered/O./O So/O that/O he/O needed/O at/O
least/O six/O thousand/O roubles/O for/O current/O expenses/O,/O and/O he/O only/O had/O one/O
thousand/O eight/O hundred/O./O For/O a/O man/O with/O one/O hundred/O thousand/O roubles/O of/O
revenue/O,/O which/O was/O what/O everyone/O fixed/O as/O Vronsky/O's/O income/O,/O such/O debts/O,/O
one/O would/O suppose/O,/O could/O hardly/O be/O embarrassing/O;/O but/O the/O fact/O was/O that/O
he/O was/O far/O from/O having/O one/O hundred/O thousand/O./O His/O father/O's/O immense/O
property/O,/O which/O alone/O yielded/O a/O yearly/O income/O of/O two/O hundred/O thousand/O,/O
was/O left/O undivided/O between/O the/O brothers/O./O At/O the/O time/O when/O the/O elder/O
brother/O,/O with/O a/O mass/O of/O debts/O,/O married/O Princess/O Varya/PERSON Tchirkova/PERSON,/O the/O
daughter/O of/O a/O Decembrist/O without/O any/O fortune/O whatever/O,/O Alexey/PERSON had/O given/O
up/O to/O his/O elder/O brother/O almost/O the/O whole/O income/O from/O his/O father/O's/O
estate/O,/O reserving/O for/O himself/O only/O twenty-five/O thousand/O a/O year/O from/O it/O./O
Alexey/PERSON had/O said/O at/O the/O time/O to/O his/O brother/O that/O that/O sum/O would/O be/O
sufficient/O for/O him/O until/O he/O married/O,/O which/O he/O probably/O never/O would/O do/O./O
And/O his/O brother/O,/O who/O was/O in/O command/O of/O one/O of/O the/O most/O expensive/O
regiments/O,/O and/O was/O only/O just/O married/O,/O could/O not/O decline/O the/O gift/O./O His/O
mother/O,/O who/O had/O her/O own/O separate/O property/O,/O had/O allowed/O Alexey/PERSON every/O year/O
twenty/O thousand/O in/O addition/O to/O the/O twenty-five/O thousand/O he/O had/O reserved/O,/O
and/O Alexey/PERSON had/O spent/O it/O all/O./O Of/O late/O his/O mother/O,/O incensed/O with/O him/O on/O
account/O of/O his/O love/O affair/O and/O his/O leaving/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O had/O given/O up/O sending/O
him/O the/O money/O./O And/O in/O consequence/O of/O this/O,/O Vronsky/O,/O who/O had/O been/O in/O the/O
habit/O of/O living/O on/O the/O scale/O of/O forty-five/O thousand/O a/O year/O,/O having/O only/O
received/O twenty/O thousand/O that/O year/O,/O found/O himself/O now/O in/O difficulties/O./O
To/O get/O out/O of/O these/O difficulties/O,/O he/O could/O not/O apply/O to/O his/O mother/O for/O
money/O./O Her/O last/O letter/O,/O which/O he/O had/O received/O the/O day/O before/O,/O had/O
particularly/O exasperated/O him/O by/O the/O hints/O in/O it/O that/O she/O was/O quite/O ready/O
to/O help/O him/O to/O succeed/O in/O the/O world/O and/O in/O the/O army/O,/O but/O not/O to/O lead/O a/O
life/O which/O was/O a/O scandal/O to/O all/O good/O society/O./O His/O mother/O's/O attempt/O to/O
buy/O him/O stung/O him/O to/O the/O quick/O and/O made/O him/O feel/O colder/O than/O ever/O to/O
her/O./O But/O he/O could/O not/O draw/O back/O from/O the/O generous/O word/O when/O it/O was/O once/O
uttered/O,/O even/O though/O he/O felt/O now/O,/O vaguely/O foreseeing/O certain/O
eventualities/O in/O his/O intrigue/O with/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON,/O that/O this/O generous/O
word/O had/O been/O spoken/O thoughtlessly/O,/O and/O that/O even/O though/O he/O were/O not/O
married/O he/O might/O need/O all/O the/O hundred/O thousand/O of/O income/O./O But/O it/O was/O
impossible/O to/O draw/O back/O./O He/O had/O only/O to/O recall/O his/O brother/O's/O wife/O,/O to/O
remember/O how/O that/O sweet/O,/O delightful/O Varya/PERSON sought/O,/O at/O every/O convenient/O
opportunity/O,/O to/O remind/O him/O that/O she/O remembered/O his/O generosity/O and/O
appreciated/O it/O,/O to/O grasp/O the/O impossibility/O of/O taking/O back/O his/O gift/O./O It/O
was/O as/O impossible/O as/O beating/O a/O woman/O,/O stealing/O,/O or/O lying/O./O One/O thing/O only/O
could/O and/O ought/O to/O be/O done/O,/O and/O Vronsky/O determined/O upon/O it/O without/O an/O
instant/O's/O hesitation/O:/O to/O borrow/O money/O from/O a/O money-lender/O,/O ten/O thousand/O
roubles/O,/O a/O proceeding/O which/O presented/O no/O difficulty/O,/O to/O cut/O down/O his/O
expenses/O generally/O,/O and/O to/O sell/O his/O race/O horses/O./O Resolving/O on/O this/O,/O he/O
promptly/O wrote/O a/O note/O to/O Rolandak/PERSON,/O who/O had/O more/O than/O once/O sent/O to/O him/O
with/O offers/O to/O buy/O horses/O from/O him/O./O Then/O he/O sent/O for/O the/O Englishman/O and/O
the/O money-lender/O,/O and/O divided/O what/O money/O he/O had/O according/O to/O the/O
accounts/O he/O intended/O to/O pay/O./O Having/O finished/O this/O business/O,/O he/O wrote/O a/O
cold/O and/O cutting/O answer/O to/O his/O mother/O./O Then/O he/O took/O out/O of/O his/O notebook/O
three/O notes/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O,/O read/O them/O again/O,/O burned/O them/O,/O and/O remembering/O
their/O conversation/O on/O the/O previous/O day/O,/O he/O sank/O into/O meditation/O./O



Chapter/O 20/O


Vronsky/O's/O life/O was/O particularly/O happy/O in/O that/O he/O had/O a/O code/O of/O
principles/O,/O which/O defined/O with/O unfailing/O certitude/O what/O he/O ought/O and/O
what/O he/O ought/O not/O to/O do/O./O This/O code/O of/O principles/O covered/O only/O a/O very/O
small/O circle/O of/O contingencies/O,/O but/O then/O the/O principles/O were/O never/O
doubtful/O,/O and/O Vronsky/O,/O as/O he/O never/O went/O outside/O that/O circle/O,/O had/O never/O
had/O a/O moment/O's/O hesitation/O about/O doing/O what/O he/O ought/O to/O do/O./O These/O
principles/O laid/O down/O as/O invariable/O rules/O:/O that/O one/O must/O pay/O a/O
cardsharper/O,/O but/O need/O not/O pay/O a/O tailor/O;/O that/O one/O must/O never/O tell/O a/O lie/O
to/O a/O man/O,/O but/O one/O may/O to/O a/O woman/O;/O that/O one/O must/O never/O cheat/O anyone/O,/O but/O
one/O may/O a/O husband/O;/O that/O one/O must/O never/O pardon/O an/O insult/O,/O but/O one/O may/O
give/O one/O and/O so/O on/O./O These/O principles/O were/O possibly/O not/O reasonable/O and/O
not/O good/O,/O but/O they/O were/O of/O unfailing/O certainty/O,/O and/O so/O long/O as/O he/O
adhered/O to/O them/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON felt/O that/O his/O heart/O was/O at/O peace/O and/O he/O could/O
hold/O his/O head/O up/O./O Only/O quite/O lately/O in/O regard/O to/O his/O relations/O with/O
Anna/PERSON,/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O begun/O to/O feel/O that/O his/O code/O of/O principles/O did/O not/O
fully/O cover/O all/O possible/O contingencies/O,/O and/O to/O foresee/O in/O the/O future/O
difficulties/O and/O perplexities/O for/O which/O he/O could/O find/O no/O guiding/O clue/O./O

His/O present/O relation/O to/O Anna/PERSON and/O to/O her/O husband/O was/O to/O his/O mind/O clear/O
and/O simple/O./O It/O was/O clearly/O and/O precisely/O defined/O in/O the/O code/O of/O
principles/O by/O which/O he/O was/O guided/O./O

She/O was/O an/O honorable/O woman/O who/O had/O bestowed/O her/O love/O upon/O him/O,/O and/O he/O
loved/O her/O,/O and/O therefore/O she/O was/O in/O his/O eyes/O a/O woman/O who/O had/O a/O right/O to/O
the/O same/O,/O or/O even/O more/O,/O respect/O than/O a/O lawful/O wife/O./O He/O would/O have/O had/O
his/O hand/O chopped/O off/O before/O he/O would/O have/O allowed/O himself/O by/O a/O word/O,/O by/O
a/O hint/O,/O to/O humiliate/O her/O,/O or/O even/O to/O fall/O short/O of/O the/O fullest/O respect/O a/O
woman/O could/O look/O for/O./O

His/O attitude/O to/O society/O,/O too/O,/O was/O clear/O./O Everyone/O might/O know/O,/O might/O
suspect/O it/O,/O but/O no/O one/O might/O dare/O to/O speak/O of/O it/O./O If/O any/O did/O so/O,/O he/O was/O
ready/O to/O force/O all/O who/O might/O speak/O to/O be/O silent/O and/O to/O respect/O the/O
non-existent/O honor/O of/O the/O woman/O he/O loved/O./O

His/O attitude/O to/O the/O husband/O was/O the/O clearest/O of/O all/O./O From/O the/O moment/O
that/O Anna/PERSON loved/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O he/O had/O regarded/O his/O own/O right/O over/O her/O as/O the/O
one/O thing/O unassailable/O./O Her/O husband/O was/O simply/O a/O superfluous/O and/O
tiresome/O person/O./O No/O doubt/O he/O was/O in/O a/O pitiable/O position/O,/O but/O how/O could/O
that/O be/O helped/O?/O The/O one/O thing/O the/O husband/O had/O a/O right/O to/O was/O to/O demand/O
satisfaction/O with/O a/O weapon/O in/O his/O hand/O,/O and/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O prepared/O for/O
this/O at/O any/O minute/O./O

But/O of/O late/O new/O inner/O relations/O had/O arisen/O between/O him/O and/O her/O,/O which/O
frightened/O Vronsky/O by/O their/O indefiniteness/O./O Only/O the/O day/O before/O she/O had/O
told/O him/O that/O she/O was/O with/O child/O./O And/O he/O felt/O that/O this/O fact/O and/O what/O
she/O expected/O of/O him/O called/O for/O something/O not/O fully/O defined/O in/O that/O code/O
of/O principles/O by/O which/O he/O had/O hitherto/O steered/O his/O course/O in/O life/O./O And/O
he/O had/O been/O indeed/O caught/O unawares/O,/O and/O at/O the/O first/O moment/O when/O she/O
spoke/O to/O him/O of/O her/O position/O,/O his/O heart/O had/O prompted/O him/O to/O beg/O her/O to/O
leave/O her/O husband/O./O He/O had/O said/O that/O,/O but/O now/O thinking/O things/O over/O he/O saw/O
clearly/O that/O it/O would/O be/O better/O to/O manage/O to/O avoid/O that/O;/O and/O at/O the/O same/O
time/O,/O as/O he/O told/O himself/O so/O,/O he/O was/O afraid/O whether/O it/O was/O not/O wrong/O./O

``/OIf/O I/O told/O her/O to/O leave/O her/O husband/O,/O that/O must/O mean/O uniting/O her/O life/O
with/O mine/O;/O am/O I/O prepared/O for/O that/O?/O How/O can/O I/O take/O her/O away/O now/O,/O when/O I/O
have/O no/O money/O?/O Supposing/O I/O could/O arrange/O.../O./O But/O how/O can/O I/O take/O her/O away/O
while/O I/O'm/O in/O the/O service/O?/O If/O I/O say/O that/O--/OI/O ought/O to/O be/O prepared/O to/O do/O it/O,/O
that/O is/O,/O I/O ought/O to/O have/O the/O money/O and/O to/O retire/O from/O the/O army/O./O''/O

And/O he/O grew/O thoughtful/O./O The/O question/O whether/O to/O retire/O from/O the/O service/O
or/O not/O brought/O him/O to/O the/O other/O and/O perhaps/O the/O chief/O though/O hidden/O
interest/O of/O his/O life/O,/O of/O which/O none/O knew/O but/O he/O./O

Ambition/O was/O the/O old/O dream/O of/O his/O youth/O and/O childhood/O,/O a/O dream/O which/O he/O
did/O not/O confess/O even/O to/O himself/O,/O though/O it/O was/O so/O strong/O that/O now/O this/O
passion/O was/O even/O doing/O battle/O with/O his/O love/O./O His/O first/O steps/O in/O the/O
world/O and/O in/O the/O service/O had/O been/O successful/O,/O but/O two/O years/O before/O he/O
had/O made/O a/O great/O mistake/O./O Anxious/O to/O show/O his/O independence/O and/O to/O
advance/O,/O he/O had/O refused/O a/O post/O that/O had/O been/O offered/O him/O,/O hoping/O that/O
this/O refusal/O would/O heighten/O his/O value/O;/O but/O it/O turned/O out/O that/O he/O had/O
been/O too/O bold/O,/O and/O he/O was/O passed/O over/O./O And/O having/O,/O whether/O he/O liked/O or/O
not/O,/O taken/O up/O for/O himself/O the/O position/O of/O an/O independent/O man/O,/O he/O carried/O
it/O off/O with/O great/O tact/O and/O good/O sense/O,/O behaving/O as/O though/O he/O bore/O no/O
grudge/O against/O anyone/O,/O did/O not/O regard/O himself/O as/O injured/O in/O any/O way/O,/O and/O
cared/O for/O nothing/O but/O to/O be/O left/O alone/O since/O he/O was/O enjoying/O himself/O./O In/O
reality/O he/O had/O ceased/O to/O enjoy/O himself/O as/O long/O ago/O as/O the/O year/O before/O,/O
when/O he/O went/O away/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION./O He/O felt/O that/O this/O independent/O attitude/O of/O a/O
man/O who/O might/O have/O done/O anything/O,/O but/O cared/O to/O do/O nothing/O,/O was/O already/O
beginning/O to/O pall/O,/O that/O many/O people/O were/O beginning/O to/O fancy/O that/O he/O was/O
not/O really/O capable/O of/O anything/O but/O being/O a/O straightforward/O,/O good-natured/O
fellow/O./O His/O connection/O with/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON,/O by/O creating/O so/O much/O
sensation/O and/O attracting/O general/O attention/O,/O had/O given/O him/O a/O fresh/O
distinction/O which/O soothed/O his/O gnawing/O worm/O of/O ambition/O for/O a/O while/O,/O but/O
a/O week/O before/O that/O worm/O had/O been/O roused/O up/O again/O with/O fresh/O force/O./O The/O
friend/O of/O his/O childhood/O,/O a/O man/O of/O the/O same/O set/O,/O of/O the/O same/O coterie/O,/O his/O
comrade/O in/O the/O Corps/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION Pages/ORGANIZATION,/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON,/O who/O had/O left/O school/O with/O
him/O and/O had/O been/O his/O rival/O in/O class/O,/O in/O gymnastics/O,/O in/O their/O scrapes/O and/O
their/O dreams/O of/O glory/O,/O had/O come/O back/O a/O few/O days/O before/O from/O Central/LOCATION
Asia/LOCATION,/O where/O he/O had/O gained/O two/O steps/O up/O in/O rank/O,/O and/O an/O order/O rarely/O
bestowed/O upon/O generals/O so/O young/O./O

As/O soon/O as/O he/O arrived/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O people/O began/O to/O talk/O about/O him/O as/O a/O
newly/O risen/O star/O of/O the/O first/O magnitude/O./O A/O schoolfellow/O of/O Vronsky/O's/O and/O
of/O the/O same/O age/O,/O he/O was/O a/O general/O and/O was/O expecting/O a/O command/O,/O which/O
might/O have/O influence/O on/O the/O course/O of/O political/O events/O;/O while/O Vronsky/O,/O
independent/O and/O brilliant/O and/O beloved/O by/O a/O charming/O woman/O though/O he/O was/O,/O
was/O simply/O a/O cavalry/O captain/O who/O was/O readily/O allowed/O to/O be/O as/O
independent/O as/O ever/O he/O liked/O./O ``/OOf/O course/O I/O do/On't/O envy/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON and/O
never/O could/O envy/O him/O;/O but/O his/O advancement/O shows/O me/O that/O one/O has/O only/O to/O
watch/O one/O's/O opportunity/O,/O and/O the/O career/O of/O a/O man/O like/O me/O may/O be/O very/O
rapidly/O made/O./O Three/O years/O ago/O he/O was/O in/O just/O the/O same/O position/O as/O I/O am/O./O
If/O I/O retire/O,/O I/O burn/O my/O ships/O./O If/O I/O remain/O in/O the/O army/O,/O I/O lose/O nothing/O./O
She/O said/O herself/O she/O did/O not/O wish/O to/O change/O her/O position/O./O And/O with/O her/O
love/O I/O can/Onot/O feel/O envious/O of/O Serpuhovskoy/O./O''/O And/O slowly/O twirling/O his/O
mustaches/O,/O he/O got/O up/O from/O the/O table/O and/O walked/O about/O the/O room/O./O His/O eyes/O
shone/O particularly/O brightly/O,/O and/O he/O felt/O in/O that/O confident/O,/O calm/O,/O and/O
happy/O frame/O of/O mind/O which/O always/O came/O after/O he/O had/O thoroughly/O faced/O his/O
position/O./O Everything/O was/O straight/O and/O clear/O,/O just/O as/O after/O former/O days/O
of/O reckoning/O./O He/O shaved/O,/O took/O a/O cold/O bath/O,/O dressed/O and/O went/O out/O./O



Chapter/O 21/O


``/OWe/O've/O come/O to/O fetch/O you/O./O Your/O _/Olessive/O_/O lasted/O a/O good/O time/O today/O,/O''/O said/O
Petritsky/PERSON./O ``/OWell/O,/O is/O it/O over/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O is/O over/O,/O''/O answered/O Vronsky/O,/O smiling/O with/O his/O eyes/O only/O,/O and/O twirling/O
the/O tips/O of/O his/O mustaches/O as/O circumspectly/O as/O though/O after/O the/O perfect/O
order/O into/O which/O his/O affairs/O had/O been/O brought/O any/O over-bold/O or/O rapid/O
movement/O might/O disturb/O it/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O always/O just/O as/O if/O you/O'd/O come/O out/O of/O a/O bath/O after/O it/O,/O''/O said/O
Petritsky/PERSON./O ``/OI/O've/O come/O from/O Gritsky/PERSON's/O''/O -LRB-/Othat/O was/O what/O they/O called/O the/O
colonel/O-RRB-/O;/O ``/Othey/O're/O expecting/O you/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O,/O without/O answering/O,/O looked/O at/O his/O comrade/O,/O thinking/O of/O something/O
else/O./O

``/OYes/O;/O is/O that/O music/O at/O his/O place/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O listening/O to/O the/O familiar/O
sounds/O of/O polkas/O and/O waltzes/O floating/O across/O to/O him/O./O ``/OWhat/O's/O the/O fête/O?/O''/O

``/OSerpuhovskoy/O's/O come/O./O''/O

``/OAha/O!/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O ``/Owhy/O,/O I/O did/On't/O know/O./O''/O

The/O smile/O in/O his/O eyes/O gleamed/O more/O brightly/O than/O ever/O./O

Having/O once/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O that/O he/O was/O happy/O in/O his/O love/O,/O that/O he/O
sacrificed/O his/O ambition/O to/O it/O--/Ohaving/O anyway/O taken/O up/O this/O position/O,/O
Vronsky/PERSON was/O incapable/O of/O feeling/O either/O envious/O of/O Serpuhovskoy/O or/O hurt/O
with/O him/O for/O not/O coming/O first/O to/O him/O when/O he/O came/O to/O the/O regiment/O./O
Serpuhovskoy/PERSON was/O a/O good/O friend/O,/O and/O he/O was/O delighted/O he/O had/O come/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O!/O''/O

The/O colonel/O,/O Demin/PERSON,/O had/O taken/O a/O large/O country/O house/O./O The/O whole/O party/O
were/O in/O the/O wide/O lower/O balcony/O./O In/O the/O courtyard/O the/O first/O objects/O that/O
met/O Vronsky/O's/O eyes/O were/O a/O band/O of/O singers/O in/O white/O linen/O coats/O,/O standing/O
near/O a/O barrel/O of/O vodka/O,/O and/O the/O robust/O,/O good-humored/O figure/O of/O the/O
colonel/O surrounded/O by/O officers/O./O He/O had/O gone/O out/O as/O far/O as/O the/O first/O step/O
of/O the/O balcony/O and/O was/O loudly/O shouting/O across/O the/O band/O that/O played/O
Offenbach/PERSON's/O quadrille/O,/O waving/O his/O arms/O and/O giving/O some/O orders/O to/O a/O few/O
soldiers/O standing/O on/O one/O side/O./O A/O group/O of/O soldiers/O,/O a/O quartermaster/O,/O and/O
several/O subalterns/O came/O up/O to/O the/O balcony/O with/O Vronsky/O./O The/O colonel/O
returned/O to/O the/O table/O,/O went/O out/O again/O onto/O the/O steps/O with/O a/O tumbler/O in/O
his/O hand/O,/O and/O proposed/O the/O toast/O,/O ``/OTo/O the/O health/O of/O our/O former/O comrade/O,/O
the/O gallant/O general/O,/O Prince/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON./O Hurrah/O!/O''/O

The/O colonel/O was/O followed/O by/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON,/O who/O came/O out/O onto/O the/O steps/O
smiling/O,/O with/O a/O glass/O in/O his/O hand/O./O

``/OYou/O always/O get/O younger/O,/O Bondarenko/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O rosy-checked/O,/O
smart-looking/O quartermaster/O standing/O just/O before/O him/O,/O still/O youngish/O
looking/O though/O doing/O his/O second/O term/O of/O service/O./O

It/O was/O three/O years/O since/O Vronsky/O had/O seen/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON./O He/O looked/O more/O
robust/O,/O had/O let/O his/O whiskers/O grow/O,/O but/O was/O still/O the/O same/O graceful/O
creature/O,/O whose/O face/O and/O figure/O were/O even/O more/O striking/O from/O their/O
softness/O and/O nobility/O than/O their/O beauty/O./O The/O only/O change/O Vronsky/O
detected/O in/O him/O was/O that/O subdued/O,/O continual/O radiance/O of/O beaming/O content/O
which/O settles/O on/O the/O faces/O of/O men/O who/O are/O successful/O and/O are/O sure/O of/O the/O
recognition/O of/O their/O success/O by/O everyone/O./O Vronsky/O knew/O that/O radiant/O air/O,/O
and/O immediately/O observed/O it/O in/O Serpuhovskoy/LOCATION./O

As/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON came/O down/O the/O steps/O he/O saw/O Vronsky/O./O A/O smile/O of/O pleasure/O
lighted/O up/O his/O face/O./O He/O tossed/O his/O head/O upwards/O and/O waved/O the/O glass/O in/O
his/O hand/O,/O greeting/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O showing/O him/O by/O the/O gesture/O that/O he/O could/O
not/O come/O to/O him/O before/O the/O quartermaster/O,/O who/O stood/O craning/O forward/O his/O
lips/O ready/O to/O be/O kissed/O./O

``/OHere/O he/O is/O!/O''/O shouted/O the/O colonel/O./O ``/OYashvin/PERSON told/O me/O you/O were/O in/O one/O of/O
your/O gloomy/O tempers/O./O''/O

Serpuhovskoy/PERSON kissed/O the/O moist/O,/O fresh/O lips/O of/O the/O gallant-looking/O
quartermaster/O,/O and/O wiping/O his/O mouth/O with/O his/O handkerchief/O,/O went/O up/O to/O
Vronsky/O./O

``/OHow/O glad/O I/O am/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O squeezing/O his/O hand/O and/O drawing/O him/O on/O one/O
side/O./O

``/OYou/O look/O after/O him/O,/O''/O the/O colonel/O shouted/O to/O Yashvin/LOCATION,/O pointing/O to/O
Vronsky/O;/O and/O he/O went/O down/O below/O to/O the/O soldiers/O./O

``/OWhy/O were/On't/O you/O at/O the/O races/O yesterday/O?/O I/O expected/O to/O see/O you/O there/O,/O''/O
said/O Vronsky/O,/O scrutinizing/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON./O

``/OI/O did/O go/O,/O but/O late/O./O I/O beg/O your/O pardon/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O and/O he/O turned/O to/O the/O
adjutant/O:/O ``/OPlease/O have/O this/O divided/O from/O me/O,/O each/O man/O as/O much/O as/O it/O runs/O
to/O./O''/O And/O he/O hurriedly/O took/O notes/O for/O three/O hundred/O roubles/O from/O his/O
pocketbook/O,/O blushing/O a/O little/O./O

``/OVronsky/O!/O Have/O anything/O to/O eat/O or/O drink/O?/O''/O asked/O Yashvin/PERSON./O ``/OHi/O,/O something/O
for/O the/O count/O to/O eat/O!/O Ah/O,/O here/O it/O is/O:/O have/O a/O glass/O!/O''/O

The/O fête/O at/O the/O colonel/O's/O lasted/O a/O long/O while/O./O There/O was/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O
drinking/O./O They/O tossed/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON in/O the/O air/O and/O caught/O him/O again/O
several/O times/O./O Then/O they/O did/O the/O same/O to/O the/O colonel/O./O Then/O,/O to/O the/O
accompaniment/O of/O the/O band/O,/O the/O colonel/O himself/O danced/O with/O Petritsky/PERSON./O
Then/O the/O colonel/O,/O who/O began/O to/O show/O signs/O of/O feebleness/O,/O sat/O down/O on/O a/O
bench/O in/O the/O courtyard/O and/O began/O demonstrating/O to/O Yashvin/LOCATION the/O
superiority/O of/O Russia/LOCATION over/O Poland/LOCATION,/O especially/O in/O cavalry/O attack/O,/O and/O
there/O was/O a/O lull/O in/O the/O revelry/O for/O a/O moment/O./O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON went/O into/O the/O
house/O to/O the/O bathroom/O to/O wash/O his/O hands/O and/O found/O Vronsky/O there/O;/O Vronsky/PERSON
was/O drenching/O his/O head/O with/O water/O./O He/O had/O taken/O off/O his/O coat/O and/O put/O his/O
sunburnt/O,/O hairy/O neck/O under/O the/O tap/O,/O and/O was/O rubbing/O it/O and/O his/O head/O with/O
his/O hands/O./O When/O he/O had/O finished/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON sat/O down/O by/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON./O They/O
both/O sat/O down/O in/O the/O bathroom/O on/O a/O lounge/O,/O and/O a/O conversation/O began/O
which/O was/O very/O interesting/O to/O both/O of/O them/O./O

``/OI/O've/O always/O been/O hearing/O about/O you/O through/O my/O wife/O,/O''/O said/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON./O
``/OI/O'm/O glad/O you/O've/O been/O seeing/O her/O pretty/O often/O./O''/O

``/OShe/O's/O friendly/O with/O Varya/PERSON,/O and/O they/O're/O the/O only/O women/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION I/O
care/O about/O seeing/O,/O''/O answered/O Vronsky/O,/O smiling/O./O He/O smiled/O because/O he/O
foresaw/O the/O topic/O the/O conversation/O would/O turn/O on/O,/O and/O he/O was/O glad/O of/O it/O./O

``/OThe/O only/O ones/O?/O''/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON queried/O,/O smiling/O./O

``/OYes/O;/O and/O I/O heard/O news/O of/O you/O,/O but/O not/O only/O through/O your/O wife/O,/O''/O said/O
Vronsky/PERSON,/O checking/O his/O hint/O by/O a/O stern/O expression/O of/O face/O./O ``/OI/O was/O greatly/O
delighted/O to/O hear/O of/O your/O success/O,/O but/O not/O a/O bit/O surprised/O./O I/O expected/O
even/O more/O./O''/O

Serpuhovskoy/PERSON smiled/O./O Such/O an/O opinion/O of/O him/O was/O obviously/O agreeable/O to/O
him/O,/O and/O he/O did/O not/O think/O it/O necessary/O to/O conceal/O it/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O on/O the/O contrary/O expected/O less/O--/OI/O'll/O own/O frankly/O./O But/O I/O'm/O glad/O,/O
very/O glad/O./O I/O'm/O ambitious/O;/O that/O's/O my/O weakness/O,/O and/O I/O confess/O to/O it/O./O''/O

``/OPerhaps/O you/O would/On't/O confess/O to/O it/O if/O you/O had/On't/O been/O successful/O,/O''/O said/O
Vronsky/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O suppose/O so/O,/O''/O said/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON,/O smiling/O again/O./O ``/OI/O wo/On't/O say/O
life/O would/On't/O be/O worth/O living/O without/O it/O,/O but/O it/O would/O be/O dull/O./O Of/O
course/O I/O may/O be/O mistaken/O,/O but/O I/O fancy/O I/O have/O a/O certain/O capacity/O for/O the/O
line/O I/O've/O chosen/O,/O and/O that/O power/O of/O any/O sort/O in/O my/O hands/O,/O if/O it/O is/O to/O
be/O,/O will/O be/O better/O than/O in/O the/O hands/O of/O a/O good/O many/O people/O I/O know/O,/O''/O said/O
Serpuhovskoy/PERSON,/O with/O beaming/O consciousness/O of/O success/O;/O ``/Oand/O so/O the/O nearer/O
I/O get/O to/O it/O,/O the/O better/O pleased/O I/O am/O./O''/O

``/OPerhaps/O that/O is/O true/O for/O you/O,/O but/O not/O for/O everyone/O./O I/O used/O to/O think/O so/O
too/O,/O but/O here/O I/O live/O and/O think/O life/O worth/O living/O not/O only/O for/O that/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O it/O's/O out/O!/O here/O it/O comes/O!/O''/O said/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON,/O laughing/O./O ``/OEver/O
since/O I/O heard/O about/O you/O,/O about/O your/O refusal/O,/O I/O began/O.../O./O Of/O course/O,/O I/O
approved/O of/O what/O you/O did/O./O But/O there/O are/O ways/O of/O doing/O everything/O./O And/O I/O
think/O your/O action/O was/O good/O in/O itself/O,/O but/O you/O did/On't/O do/O it/O quite/O in/O the/O
way/O you/O ought/O to/O have/O done/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O's/O done/O ca/On't/O be/O undone/O,/O and/O you/O know/O I/O never/O go/O back/O on/O what/O I/O've/O
done/O./O And/O besides/O,/O I/O'm/O very/O well/O off/O./O''/O

``/OVery/O well/O off/O--/Ofor/O the/O time/O./O But/O you/O're/O not/O satisfied/O with/O that/O./O I/O
would/On't/O say/O this/O to/O your/O brother/O./O He/O's/O a/O nice/O child/O,/O like/O our/O host/O
here/O./O There/O he/O goes/O!/O''/O he/O added/O,/O listening/O to/O the/O roar/O of/O ``/Ohurrah/O!/O''/O--/O``/Oand/O
he/O's/O happy/O,/O but/O that/O does/O not/O satisfy/O you/O./O''/O

``/OI/O did/On't/O say/O it/O did/O satisfy/O me/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O that/O's/O not/O the/O only/O thing/O./O Such/O men/O as/O you/O are/O wanted/O./O''/O

``/OBy/O whom/O?/O''/O

``/OBy/O whom/O?/O By/O society/O,/O by/O Russia/LOCATION./O Russia/LOCATION needs/O men/O;/O she/O needs/O a/O party/O,/O or/O
else/O everything/O goes/O and/O will/O go/O to/O the/O dogs/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O mean/O?/O Bertenev/PERSON's/O party/O against/O the/O Russian/O communists/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O''/O said/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON,/O frowning/O with/O vexation/O at/O being/O suspected/O of/O
such/O an/O absurdity/O./O ''/O_/OTout/O ça/O est/O une/O blague/O_/O./O That/O's/O always/O been/O and/O
always/O will/O be/O./O There/O are/O no/O communists/O./O But/O intriguing/O people/O have/O to/O
invent/O a/O noxious/O,/O dangerous/O party/O./O It/O's/O an/O old/O trick/O./O No/O,/O what/O's/O wanted/O
is/O a/O powerful/O party/O of/O independent/O men/O like/O you/O and/O me/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O why/O so/O?/O''/O Vronsky/O mentioned/O a/O few/O men/O who/O were/O in/O power/O./O ``/OWhy/O are/On't/O
they/O independent/O men/O?/O''/O

``/OSimply/O because/O they/O have/O not/O,/O or/O have/O not/O had/O from/O birth/O,/O an/O
independent/O fortune/O;/O they/O've/O not/O had/O a/O name/O,/O they/O've/O not/O been/O close/O to/O
the/O sun/O and/O center/O as/O we/O have/O./O They/O can/O be/O bought/O either/O by/O money/O or/O by/O
favor/O./O And/O they/O have/O to/O find/O a/O support/O for/O themselves/O in/O inventing/O a/O
policy/O./O And/O they/O bring/O forward/O some/O notion/O,/O some/O policy/O that/O they/O do/On't/O
believe/O in/O,/O that/O does/O harm/O;/O and/O the/O whole/O policy/O is/O really/O only/O a/O means/O
to/O a/O government/O house/O and/O so/O much/O income/O./O _/OCela/PERSON n'est/O pas/O plus/O fin/O que/O
ça/O_/O,/O when/O you/O get/O a/O peep/O at/O their/O cards/O./O I/O may/O be/O inferior/O to/O them/O,/O
stupider/O perhaps/O,/O though/O I/O do/On't/O see/O why/O I/O should/O be/O inferior/O to/O them/O./O
But/O you/O and/O I/O have/O one/O important/O advantage/O over/O them/O for/O certain/O,/O in/O
being/O more/O difficult/O to/O buy/O./O And/O such/O men/O are/O more/O needed/O than/O ever/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O listened/O attentively/O,/O but/O he/O was/O not/O so/O much/O interested/O by/O the/O
meaning/O of/O the/O words/O as/O by/O the/O attitude/O of/O Serpuhovskoy/O who/O was/O already/O
contemplating/O a/O struggle/O with/O the/O existing/O powers/O,/O and/O already/O had/O his/O
likes/O and/O dislikes/O in/O that/O higher/O world/O,/O while/O his/O own/O interest/O in/O the/O
governing/O world/O did/O not/O go/O beyond/O the/O interests/O of/O his/O regiment/O./O Vronsky/O
felt/O,/O too/O,/O how/O powerful/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON might/O become/O through/O his/O
unmistakable/O faculty/O for/O thinking/O things/O out/O and/O for/O taking/O things/O in/O,/O
through/O his/O intelligence/O and/O gift/O of/O words/O,/O so/O rarely/O met/O with/O in/O the/O
world/O in/O which/O he/O moved/O./O And/O,/O ashamed/O as/O he/O was/O of/O the/O feeling/O,/O he/O felt/O
envious/O./O

``/OStill/O I/O have/On't/O the/O one/O thing/O of/O most/O importance/O for/O that/O,/O''/O he/O
answered/O;/O ``/OI/O have/On't/O the/O desire/O for/O power/O./O I/O had/O it/O once/O,/O but/O it/O's/O
gone/O./O''/O

``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O that/O's/O not/O true/O,/O''/O said/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O is/O true/O,/O it/O is/O true/O .../O now/O!/O''/O Vronsky/O added/O,/O to/O be/O truthful/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O true/O now/O,/O that/O's/O another/O thing/O;/O but/O that/O _/Onow/O_/O wo/On't/O last/O
forever/O./O''/O

``/OPerhaps/O,/O''/O answered/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OYou/O say/O _/Operhaps/O_/O,/O''/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON went/O on/O,/O as/O though/O guessing/O his/O
thoughts/O,/O ``/Obut/O I/O say/O _/Ofor/O certain/O_/O./O And/O that/O's/O what/O I/O wanted/O to/O see/O you/O
for/O./O Your/O action/O was/O just/O what/O it/O should/O have/O been/O./O I/O see/O that/O,/O but/O you/O
ought/O not/O to/O keep/O it/O up/O./O I/O only/O ask/O you/O to/O give/O me/O carte/O blanche/O./O I/O'm/O
not/O going/O to/O offer/O you/O my/O protection/O .../O though/O,/O indeed/O,/O why/O should/On't/O I/O
protect/O you/O?/O--/Oyou/O've/O protected/O me/O often/O enough/O!/O I/O should/O hope/O our/O
friendship/O rises/O above/O all/O that/O sort/O of/O thing/O./O Yes/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O smiling/O to/O
him/O as/O tenderly/O as/O a/O woman/O,/O ``/Ogive/O me/O _/Ocarte/O blanche/O_/O,/O retire/O from/O the/O
regiment/O,/O and/O I/O'll/O draw/O you/O upwards/O imperceptibly/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O you/O must/O understand/O that/O I/O want/O nothing/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O ``/Oexcept/O
that/O all/O should/O be/O as/O it/O is/O./O''/O

Serpuhovskoy/PERSON got/O up/O and/O stood/O facing/O him/O./O

``/OYou/O say/O that/O all/O should/O be/O as/O it/O is/O./O I/O understand/O what/O that/O means/O./O But/O
listen/O:/O we/O're/O the/O same/O age/O,/O you/O've/O known/O a/O greater/O number/O of/O women/O
perhaps/O than/O I/O have/O./O''/O Serpohovskoy/PERSON's/O smile/O and/O gestures/O told/O Vronsky/PERSON
that/O he/O must/On't/O be/O afraid/O,/O that/O he/O would/O be/O tender/O and/O careful/O in/O
touching/O the/O sore/O place/O./O ``/OBut/O I/O'm/O married/O,/O and/O believe/O me/O,/O in/O getting/O to/O
know/O thoroughly/O one/O's/O wife/O,/O if/O one/O loves/O her/O,/O as/O someone/O has/O said/O,/O one/O
gets/O to/O know/O all/O women/O better/O than/O if/O one/O knew/O thousands/O of/O them/O./O''/O

``/OWe/O're/O coming/O directly/O!/O''/O Vronsky/O shouted/O to/O an/O officer/O,/O who/O looked/O into/O
the/O room/O and/O called/O them/O to/O the/O colonel/O./O

Vronsky/O was/O longing/O now/O to/O hear/O to/O the/O end/O and/O know/O what/O Serpuhovskey/PERSON
would/O say/O to/O him/O./O

``/OAnd/O here/O's/O my/O opinion/O for/O you/O./O Women/O are/O the/O chief/O stumbling/O block/O in/O a/O
man/O's/O career/O./O It/O's/O hard/O to/O love/O a/O woman/O and/O do/O anything/O./O There/O's/O only/O
one/O way/O of/O having/O love/O conveniently/O without/O its/O being/O a/O hindrance/O--/Othat/O's/O
marriage/O./O How/O,/O how/O am/O I/O to/O tell/O you/O what/O I/O mean/O?/O''/O said/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON,/O who/O
liked/O similes/O./O ``/OWait/O a/O minute/O,/O wait/O a/O minute/O!/O Yes/O,/O just/O as/O you/O can/O only/O
carry/O a/O _/Ofardeau/O_/O and/O do/O something/O with/O your/O hands/O,/O when/O the/O fardeau/O is/O
tied/O on/O your/O back/O,/O and/O that/O's/O marriage/O./O And/O that/O's/O what/O I/O felt/O when/O I/O
was/O married/O./O My/O hands/O were/O suddenly/O set/O free/O./O But/O to/O drag/O that/O _/Ofardeau/O_/O
about/O with/O you/O without/O marriage/O,/O your/O hands/O will/O always/O be/O so/O full/O that/O
you/O can/O do/O nothing/O./O Look/O at/O Mazankov/LOCATION,/O at/O Krupov/LOCATION./O They/O've/O ruined/O their/O
careers/O for/O the/O sake/O of/O women/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O women/O!/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O recalling/O the/O Frenchwoman/O and/O the/O actress/O
with/O whom/O the/O two/O men/O he/O had/O mentioned/O were/O connected/O./O

``/OThe/O firmer/O the/O woman/O's/O footing/O in/O society/O,/O the/O worse/O it/O is/O./O That/O's/O much/O
the/O same/O as/O--/Onot/O merely/O carrying/O the/O _/Ofardeau/O_/O in/O your/O arms/O--/Obut/O tearing/O
it/O away/O from/O someone/O else/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O have/O never/O loved/O,/O''/O Vronsky/PERSON said/O softly/O,/O looking/O straight/O before/O him/O
and/O thinking/O of/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OPerhaps/O./O But/O you/O remember/O what/O I/O've/O said/O to/O you/O./O And/O another/O thing/O,/O
women/O are/O all/O more/O materialistic/O than/O men/O./O We/O make/O something/O immense/O out/O
of/O love/O,/O but/O they/O are/O always/O _/Oterre-à-terre/O_/O./O''/O

``/ODirectly/O,/O directly/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O to/O a/O footman/O who/O came/O in/O./O But/O the/O footman/O
had/O not/O come/O to/O call/O them/O again/O,/O as/O he/O supposed/O./O The/O footman/O brought/O
Vronsky/O a/O note/O./O

``/OA/O man/O brought/O it/O from/O Princess/O Tverskaya/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O opened/O the/O letter/O,/O and/O flushed/O crimson/O./O

``/OMy/O head/O's/O begun/O to/O ache/O;/O I/O'm/O going/O home/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O good-bye/O then/O./O You/O give/O me/O _/Ocarte/O blanche/O!/O_/O''/O

``/OWe/O'll/O talk/O about/O it/O later/O on/O;/O I/O'll/O look/O you/O up/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O''/O



Chapter/O 22/O


It/O was/O six/O o'clock/O already/O,/O and/O so/O,/O in/O order/O to/O be/O there/O quickly/O,/O and/O at/O
the/O same/O time/O not/O to/O drive/O with/O his/O own/O horses/O,/O known/O to/O everyone/O,/O
Vronsky/PERSON got/O into/O Yashvin/PERSON's/O hired/O fly/O,/O and/O told/O the/O driver/O to/O drive/O as/O
quickly/O as/O possible/O./O It/O was/O a/O roomy/O,/O old-fashioned/O fly/O,/O with/O seats/O for/O
four/O./O He/O sat/O in/O one/O corner/O,/O stretched/O his/O legs/O out/O on/O the/O front/O seat/O,/O
and/O sank/O into/O meditation/O./O

A/O vague/O sense/O of/O the/O order/O into/O which/O his/O affairs/O had/O been/O brought/O,/O a/O
vague/O recollection/O of/O the/O friendliness/O and/O flattery/O of/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON,/O who/O
had/O considered/O him/O a/O man/O that/O was/O needed/O,/O and/O most/O of/O all/O,/O the/O
anticipation/O of/O the/O interview/O before/O him/O--/Oall/O blended/O into/O a/O general/O,/O
joyous/O sense/O of/O life/O./O This/O feeling/O was/O so/O strong/O that/O he/O could/O not/O help/O
smiling/O./O He/O dropped/O his/O legs/O,/O crossed/O one/O leg/O over/O the/O other/O knee/O,/O and/O
taking/O it/O in/O his/O hand/O,/O felt/O the/O springy/O muscle/O of/O the/O calf/O,/O where/O it/O had/O
been/O grazed/O the/O day/O before/O by/O his/O fall/O,/O and/O leaning/O back/O he/O drew/O several/O
deep/O breaths/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O happy/O,/O very/O happy/O!/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O./O He/O had/O often/O before/O had/O
this/O sense/O of/O physical/O joy/O in/O his/O own/O body/O,/O but/O he/O had/O never/O felt/O so/O
fond/O of/O himself/O,/O of/O his/O own/O body/O,/O as/O at/O that/O moment/O./O He/O enjoyed/O the/O
slight/O ache/O in/O his/O strong/O leg/O,/O he/O enjoyed/O the/O muscular/O sensation/O of/O
movement/O in/O his/O chest/O as/O he/O breathed/O./O The/O bright/O,/O cold/O August/O day/O,/O which/O
had/O made/O Anna/PERSON feel/O so/O hopeless/O,/O seemed/O to/O him/O keenly/O stimulating/O,/O and/O
refreshed/O his/O face/O and/O neck/O that/O still/O tingled/O from/O the/O cold/O water/O./O The/O
scent/O of/O brilliantine/O on/O his/O whiskers/O struck/O him/O as/O particularly/O
pleasant/O in/O the/O fresh/O air/O./O Everything/O he/O saw/O from/O the/O carriage/O window/O,/O
everything/O in/O that/O cold/O pure/O air/O,/O in/O the/O pale/O light/O of/O the/O sunset/O,/O was/O
as/O fresh/O,/O and/O gay/O,/O and/O strong/O as/O he/O was/O himself/O:/O the/O roofs/O of/O the/O houses/O
shining/O in/O the/O rays/O of/O the/O setting/O sun/O,/O the/O sharp/O outlines/O of/O fences/O and/O
angles/O of/O buildings/O,/O the/O figures/O of/O passers-by/O,/O the/O carriages/O that/O met/O
him/O now/O and/O then/O,/O the/O motionless/O green/O of/O the/O trees/O and/O grass/O,/O the/O
fields/O with/O evenly/O drawn/O furrows/O of/O potatoes/O,/O and/O the/O slanting/O shadows/O
that/O fell/O from/O the/O houses/O,/O and/O trees/O,/O and/O bushes/O,/O and/O even/O from/O the/O rows/O
of/O potatoes/O--/Oeverything/O was/O bright/O like/O a/O pretty/O landscape/O just/O finished/O
and/O freshly/O varnished/O./O

``/OGet/O on/O,/O get/O on/O!/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O driver/O,/O putting/O his/O head/O out/O of/O the/O
window/O,/O and/O pulling/O a/O three-rouble/O note/O out/O of/O his/O pocket/O he/O handed/O it/O
to/O the/O man/O as/O he/O looked/O round/O./O The/O driver/O's/O hand/O fumbled/O with/O something/O
at/O the/O lamp/O,/O the/O whip/O cracked/O,/O and/O the/O carriage/O rolled/O rapidly/O along/O the/O
smooth/O highroad/O./O

``/OI/O want/O nothing/O,/O nothing/O but/O this/O happiness/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O staring/O at/O the/O
bone/O button/O of/O the/O bell/O in/O the/O space/O between/O the/O windows/O,/O and/O picturing/O
to/O himself/O Anna/PERSON just/O as/O he/O had/O seen/O her/O last/O time/O./O ``/OAnd/O as/O I/O go/O on/O,/O I/O
love/O her/O more/O and/O more/O./O Here/O's/O the/O garden/O of/O the/O Vrede/ORGANIZATION Villa/ORGANIZATION./O
Whereabouts/O will/O she/O be/O?/O Where/O?/O How/O?/O Why/O did/O she/O fix/O on/O this/O place/O to/O
meet/O me/O,/O and/O why/O does/O she/O write/O in/O Betsy/PERSON's/O letter/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O
wondering/O now/O for/O the/O first/O time/O at/O it/O./O But/O there/O was/O now/O no/O time/O for/O
wonder/O./O He/O called/O to/O the/O driver/O to/O stop/O before/O reaching/O the/O avenue/O,/O and/O
opening/O the/O door/O,/O jumped/O out/O of/O the/O carriage/O as/O it/O was/O moving/O,/O and/O went/O
into/O the/O avenue/O that/O led/O up/O to/O the/O house/O./O There/O was/O no/O one/O in/O the/O
avenue/O;/O but/O looking/O round/O to/O the/O right/O he/O caught/O sight/O of/O her/O./O Her/O face/O
was/O hidden/O by/O a/O veil/O,/O but/O he/O drank/O in/O with/O glad/O eyes/O the/O special/O
movement/O in/O walking/O,/O peculiar/O to/O her/O alone/O,/O the/O slope/O of/O the/O shoulders/O,/O
and/O the/O setting/O of/O the/O head/O,/O and/O at/O once/O a/O sort/O of/O electric/O shock/O ran/O
all/O over/O him/O./O With/O fresh/O force/O,/O he/O felt/O conscious/O of/O himself/O from/O the/O
springy/O motions/O of/O his/O legs/O to/O the/O movements/O of/O his/O lungs/O as/O he/O
breathed/O,/O and/O something/O set/O his/O lips/O twitching/O./O

Joining/O him/O,/O she/O pressed/O his/O hand/O tightly/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O not/O angry/O that/O I/O sent/O for/O you/O?/O I/O absolutely/O had/O to/O see/O you/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O;/O and/O the/O serious/O and/O set/O line/O of/O her/O lips/O,/O which/O he/O saw/O under/O the/O
veil/O,/O transformed/O his/O mood/O at/O once/O./O

``/OI/O angry/O!/O But/O how/O have/O you/O come/O,/O where/O from/O?/O''/O

``/ONever/O mind/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O laying/O her/O hand/O on/O his/O,/O ``/Ocome/O along/O,/O I/O must/O talk/O
to/O you/O./O''/O

He/O saw/O that/O something/O had/O happened/O,/O and/O that/O the/O interview/O would/O not/O be/O
a/O joyous/O one/O./O In/O her/O presence/O he/O had/O no/O will/O of/O his/O own/O:/O without/O knowing/O
the/O grounds/O of/O her/O distress/O,/O he/O already/O felt/O the/O same/O distress/O
unconsciously/O passing/O over/O him/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O?/O what/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O her/O,/O squeezing/O her/O hand/O with/O his/O elbow/O,/O and/O
trying/O to/O read/O her/O thoughts/O in/O her/O face/O./O

She/O walked/O on/O a/O few/O steps/O in/O silence/O,/O gathering/O up/O her/O courage/O;/O then/O
suddenly/O she/O stopped/O./O

``/OI/O did/O not/O tell/O you/O yesterday/O,/O''/O she/O began/O,/O breathing/O quickly/O and/O
painfully/O,/O ``/Othat/O coming/O home/O with/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON I/O told/O him/O
everything/O .../O told/O him/O I/O could/O not/O be/O his/O wife/O,/O that/O .../O and/O told/O him/O
everything/O./O''/O

He/O heard/O her/O,/O unconsciously/O bending/O his/O whole/O figure/O down/O to/O her/O as/O
though/O hoping/O in/O this/O way/O to/O soften/O the/O hardness/O of/O her/O position/O for/O
her/O./O But/O directly/O she/O had/O said/O this/O he/O suddenly/O drew/O himself/O up/O,/O and/O a/O
proud/O and/O hard/O expression/O came/O over/O his/O face/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O that/O's/O better/O,/O a/O thousand/O times/O better/O!/O I/O know/O how/O painful/O it/O
was/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O But/O she/O was/O not/O listening/O to/O his/O words/O,/O she/O was/O reading/O
his/O thoughts/O from/O the/O expression/O of/O his/O face/O./O She/O could/O not/O guess/O that/O
that/O expression/O arose/O from/O the/O first/O idea/O that/O presented/O itself/O to/O
Vronsky/O--/Othat/O a/O duel/O was/O now/O inevitable/O./O The/O idea/O of/O a/O duel/O had/O never/O
crossed/O her/O mind/O,/O and/O so/O she/O put/O a/O different/O interpretation/O on/O this/O
passing/O expression/O of/O hardness/O./O

When/O she/O got/O her/O husband/O's/O letter/O,/O she/O knew/O then/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O her/O
heart/O that/O everything/O would/O go/O on/O in/O the/O old/O way/O,/O that/O she/O would/O not/O
have/O the/O strength/O of/O will/O to/O forego/O her/O position/O,/O to/O abandon/O her/O son/O,/O
and/O to/O join/O her/O lover/O./O The/O morning/O spent/O at/O Princess/O Tverskaya/O's/O had/O
confirmed/O her/O still/O more/O in/O this/O./O But/O this/O interview/O was/O still/O of/O the/O
utmost/O gravity/O for/O her/O./O She/O hoped/O that/O this/O interview/O would/O transform/O
her/O position/O,/O and/O save/O her/O./O If/O on/O hearing/O this/O news/O he/O were/O to/O say/O to/O
her/O resolutely/O,/O passionately/O,/O without/O an/O instant/O's/O wavering/O:/O ``/OThrow/O up/O
everything/O and/O come/O with/O me/O!/O''/O she/O would/O give/O up/O her/O son/O and/O go/O away/O with/O
him/O./O But/O this/O news/O had/O not/O produced/O what/O she/O had/O expected/O in/O him/O;/O he/O
simply/O seemed/O as/O though/O he/O were/O resenting/O some/O affront/O./O

``/OIt/O was/O not/O in/O the/O least/O painful/O to/O me/O./O It/O happened/O of/O itself/O,/O''/O she/O said/O
irritably/O;/O ``/Oand/O see/O.../O''/O she/O pulled/O her/O husband/O's/O letter/O out/O of/O her/O
glove/O./O

``/OI/O understand/O,/O I/O understand/O,/O''/O he/O interrupted/O her/O,/O taking/O the/O letter/O,/O but/O
not/O reading/O it/O,/O and/O trying/O to/O soothe/O her/O./O ``/OThe/O one/O thing/O I/O longed/O for/O,/O
the/O one/O thing/O I/O prayed/O for/O,/O was/O to/O cut/O short/O this/O position/O,/O so/O as/O to/O
devote/O my/O life/O to/O your/O happiness/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O do/O you/O tell/O me/O that/O?/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/ODo/O you/O suppose/O I/O can/O doubt/O it/O?/O If/O
I/O doubted/O.../O''/O

``/OWho/O's/O that/O coming/O?/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O suddenly/O,/O pointing/O to/O two/O ladies/O
walking/O towards/O them/O./O ``/OPerhaps/O they/O know/O us/O!/O''/O and/O he/O hurriedly/O turned/O
off/O,/O drawing/O her/O after/O him/O into/O a/O side/O path/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O do/On't/O care/O!/O''/O she/O said/O./O Her/O lips/O were/O quivering/O./O And/O he/O fancied/O
that/O her/O eyes/O looked/O with/O strange/O fury/O at/O him/O from/O under/O the/O veil/O./O ``/OI/O
tell/O you/O that/O's/O not/O the/O point/O--/OI/O ca/On't/O doubt/O that/O;/O but/O see/O what/O he/O writes/O
to/O me/O./O Read/O it/O./O''/O She/O stood/O still/O again/O./O

Again/O,/O just/O as/O at/O the/O first/O moment/O of/O hearing/O of/O her/O rupture/O with/O her/O
husband/O,/O Vronsky/O,/O on/O reading/O the/O letter/O,/O was/O unconsciously/O carried/O away/O
by/O the/O natural/O sensation/O aroused/O in/O him/O by/O his/O own/O relation/O to/O the/O
betrayed/O husband/O./O Now/O while/O he/O held/O his/O letter/O in/O his/O hands/O,/O he/O could/O
not/O help/O picturing/O the/O challenge/O,/O which/O he/O would/O most/O likely/O find/O at/O
home/O today/O or/O tomorrow/O,/O and/O the/O duel/O itself/O,/O in/O which/O,/O with/O the/O same/O
cold/O and/O haughty/O expression/O that/O his/O face/O was/O assuming/O at/O this/O moment/O he/O
would/O await/O the/O injured/O husband/O's/O shot/O,/O after/O having/O himself/O fired/O into/O
the/O air/O./O And/O at/O that/O instant/O there/O flashed/O across/O his/O mind/O the/O thought/O
of/O what/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON had/O just/O said/O to/O him/O,/O and/O what/O he/O had/O himself/O been/O
thinking/O in/O the/O morning/O--/Othat/O it/O was/O better/O not/O to/O bind/O himself/O--/Oand/O he/O
knew/O that/O this/O thought/O he/O could/O not/O tell/O her/O./O

Having/O read/O the/O letter/O,/O he/O raised/O his/O eyes/O to/O her/O,/O and/O there/O was/O no/O
determination/O in/O them/O./O She/O saw/O at/O once/O that/O he/O had/O been/O thinking/O about/O
it/O before/O by/O himself/O./O She/O knew/O that/O whatever/O he/O might/O say/O to/O her/O,/O he/O
would/O not/O say/O all/O he/O thought/O./O And/O she/O knew/O that/O her/O last/O hope/O had/O failed/O
her/O./O This/O was/O not/O what/O she/O had/O been/O reckoning/O on/O./O

``/OYou/O see/O the/O sort/O of/O man/O he/O is/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O a/O shaking/O voice/O;/O ``/Ohe/O.../O''/O

``/OForgive/O me/O,/O but/O I/O rejoice/O at/O it/O,/O''/O Vronsky/O interrupted/O./O ``/OFor/O God/O's/O sake/O,/O
let/O me/O finish/O!/O''/O he/O added/O,/O his/O eyes/O imploring/O her/O to/O give/O him/O time/O to/O
explain/O his/O words/O./O ``/OI/O rejoice/O,/O because/O things/O can/Onot/O,/O can/Onot/O possibly/O
remain/O as/O he/O supposes/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O ca/On't/O they/O?/O''/O Anna/PERSON said/O,/O restraining/O her/O tears/O,/O and/O obviously/O
attaching/O no/O sort/O of/O consequence/O to/O what/O he/O said/O./O She/O felt/O that/O her/O fate/O
was/O sealed/O./O

Vronsky/O meant/O that/O after/O the/O duel/O--/Oinevitable/O,/O he/O thought/O--/Othings/O could/O
not/O go/O on/O as/O before/O,/O but/O he/O said/O something/O different/O./O

``/OIt/O ca/On't/O go/O on/O./O I/O hope/O that/O now/O you/O will/O leave/O him/O./O I/O hope/O''/O--/Ohe/O was/O
confused/O,/O and/O reddened/O--/O``/Othat/O you/O will/O let/O me/O arrange/O and/O plan/O our/O life/O./O
Tomorrow/O.../O''/O he/O was/O beginning/O./O

She/O did/O not/O let/O him/O go/O on/O./O

``/OBut/O my/O child/O!/O''/O she/O shrieked/O./O ``/OYou/O see/O what/O he/O writes/O!/O I/O should/O have/O to/O
leave/O him/O,/O and/O I/O ca/On't/O and/O wo/On't/O do/O that/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O,/O for/O God/O's/O sake/O,/O which/O is/O better/O?/O--/Oleave/O your/O child/O,/O or/O keep/O up/O this/O
degrading/O position/O?/O''/O

``/OTo/O whom/O is/O it/O degrading/O?/O''/O

``/OTo/O all/O,/O and/O most/O of/O all/O to/O you/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O say/O degrading/O .../O do/On't/O say/O that/O./O Those/O words/O have/O no/O meaning/O for/O
me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O in/O a/O shaking/O voice/O./O She/O did/O not/O want/O him/O now/O to/O say/O what/O
was/O untrue/O./O She/O had/O nothing/O left/O her/O but/O his/O love/O,/O and/O she/O wanted/O to/O
love/O him/O./O ``/ODo/On't/O you/O understand/O that/O from/O the/O day/O I/O loved/O you/O everything/O
has/O changed/O for/O me/O?/O For/O me/O there/O is/O one/O thing/O,/O and/O one/O thing/O only/O--/Oyour/O
love/O./O If/O that/O's/O mine/O,/O I/O feel/O so/O exalted/O,/O so/O strong/O,/O that/O nothing/O can/O be/O
humiliating/O to/O me/O./O I/O am/O proud/O of/O my/O position/O,/O because/O .../O proud/O of/O being/O
.../O proud/O.../O''/O She/O could/O not/O say/O what/O she/O was/O proud/O of/O./O Tears/O of/O shame/O
and/O despair/O choked/O her/O utterance/O./O She/O stood/O still/O and/O sobbed/O./O

He/O felt/O,/O too/O,/O something/O swelling/O in/O his/O throat/O and/O twitching/O in/O his/O
nose/O,/O and/O for/O the/O first/O time/O in/O his/O life/O he/O felt/O on/O the/O point/O of/O
weeping/O./O He/O could/O not/O have/O said/O exactly/O what/O it/O was/O touched/O him/O so/O./O He/O
felt/O sorry/O for/O her/O,/O and/O he/O felt/O he/O could/O not/O help/O her/O,/O and/O with/O that/O he/O
knew/O that/O he/O was/O to/O blame/O for/O her/O wretchedness/O,/O and/O that/O he/O had/O done/O
something/O wrong/O./O

``/OIs/O not/O a/O divorce/O possible/O?/O''/O he/O said/O feebly/O./O She/O shook/O her/O head/O,/O not/O
answering/O./O ``/OCould/On't/O you/O take/O your/O son/O,/O and/O still/O leave/O him/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O;/O but/O it/O all/O depends/O on/O him/O./O Now/O I/O must/O go/O to/O him/O,/O''/O she/O said/O
shortly/O./O Her/O presentiment/O that/O all/O would/O again/O go/O on/O in/O the/O old/O way/O had/O
not/O deceived/O her/O./O

``/OOn/O Tuesday/O I/O shall/O be/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O everything/O can/O be/O settled/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OBut/O do/On't/O let/O us/O talk/O any/O more/O of/O it/O./O''/O

Anna/PERSON's/O carriage/O,/O which/O she/O had/O sent/O away/O,/O and/O ordered/O to/O come/O back/O to/O
the/O little/O gate/O of/O the/O Vrede/LOCATION garden/LOCATION,/O drove/O up/O./O Anna/PERSON said/O good-bye/O to/O
Vronsky/O,/O and/O drove/O home/O./O



Chapter/O 23/O


On/O Monday/O there/O was/O the/O usual/O sitting/O of/O the/O Commission/ORGANIZATION of/O the/O 2nd/O of/O
June/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON walked/O into/O the/O hall/O where/O the/O sitting/O was/O
held/O,/O greeted/O the/O members/O and/O the/O president/O,/O as/O usual/O,/O and/O sat/O down/O in/O
his/O place/O,/O putting/O his/O hand/O on/O the/O papers/O laid/O ready/O before/O him/O./O Among/O
these/O papers/O lay/O the/O necessary/O evidence/O and/O a/O rough/O outline/O of/O the/O
speech/O he/O intended/O to/O make/O./O But/O he/O did/O not/O really/O need/O these/O documents/O./O
He/O remembered/O every/O point/O,/O and/O did/O not/O think/O it/O necessary/O to/O go/O over/O in/O
his/O memory/O what/O he/O would/O say/O./O He/O knew/O that/O when/O the/O time/O came/O,/O and/O when/O
he/O saw/O his/O enemy/O facing/O him/O,/O and/O studiously/O endeavoring/O to/O assume/O an/O
expression/O of/O indifference/O,/O his/O speech/O would/O flow/O of/O itself/O better/O than/O
he/O could/O prepare/O it/O now/O./O He/O felt/O that/O the/O import/O of/O his/O speech/O was/O of/O
such/O magnitude/O that/O every/O word/O of/O it/O would/O have/O weight/O./O Meantime/O,/O as/O he/O
listened/O to/O the/O usual/O report/O,/O he/O had/O the/O most/O innocent/O and/O inoffensive/O
air/O./O No/O one/O,/O looking/O at/O his/O white/O hands/O,/O with/O their/O swollen/O veins/O and/O
long/O fingers/O,/O so/O softly/O stroking/O the/O edges/O of/O the/O white/O paper/O that/O lay/O
before/O him/O,/O and/O at/O the/O air/O of/O weariness/O with/O which/O his/O head/O drooped/O on/O
one/O side/O,/O would/O have/O suspected/O that/O in/O a/O few/O minutes/O a/O torrent/O of/O words/O
would/O flow/O from/O his/O lips/O that/O would/O arouse/O a/O fearful/O storm/O,/O set/O the/O
members/O shouting/O and/O attacking/O one/O another/O,/O and/O force/O the/O president/O to/O
call/O for/O order/O./O When/O the/O report/O was/O over/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
announced/O in/O his/O subdued/O,/O delicate/O voice/O that/O he/O had/O several/O points/O to/O
bring/O before/O the/O meeting/O in/O regard/O to/O the/O Commission/ORGANIZATION for/O the/O
Reorganization/O of/O the/O Native/O Tribes/O./O All/O attention/O was/O turned/O upon/O him/O./O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON cleared/O his/O throat/O,/O and/O not/O looking/O at/O his/O
opponent/O,/O but/O selecting/O,/O as/O he/O always/O did/O while/O he/O was/O delivering/O his/O
speeches/O,/O the/O first/O person/O sitting/O opposite/O him/O,/O an/O inoffensive/O little/O
old/O man/O,/O who/O never/O had/O an/O opinion/O of/O any/O sort/O in/O the/O Commission/O,/O began/O
to/O expound/O his/O views/O./O When/O he/O reached/O the/O point/O about/O the/O fundamental/O
and/O radical/O law/O,/O his/O opponent/O jumped/O up/O and/O began/O to/O protest/O./O Stremov/PERSON,/O
who/O was/O also/O a/O member/O of/O the/O Commission/ORGANIZATION,/O and/O also/O stung/O to/O the/O quick/O,/O
began/O defending/O himself/O,/O and/O altogether/O a/O stormy/O sitting/O followed/O;/O but/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON triumphed/O,/O and/O his/O motion/O was/O carried/O,/O three/O new/O
commissions/O were/O appointed/O,/O and/O the/O next/O day/O in/O a/O certain/O Petersburg/LOCATION
circle/O nothing/O else/O was/O talked/O of/O but/O this/O sitting/O./O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O success/O had/O been/O even/O greater/O than/O he/O had/O anticipated/O./O

Next/O morning/O,/O Tuesday/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O on/O waking/O up/O,/O recollected/O
with/O pleasure/O his/O triumph/O of/O the/O previous/O day/O,/O and/O he/O could/O not/O help/O
smiling/O,/O though/O he/O tried/O to/O appear/O indifferent/O,/O when/O the/O chief/O secretary/O
of/O his/O department/O,/O anxious/O to/O flatter/O him/O,/O informed/O him/O of/O the/O rumors/O
that/O had/O reached/O him/O concerning/O what/O had/O happened/O in/O the/O Commission/ORGANIZATION./O

Absorbed/O in/O business/O with/O the/O chief/O secretary/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O
completely/O forgotten/O that/O it/O was/O Tuesday/O,/O the/O day/O fixed/O by/O him/O for/O the/O
return/O of/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O and/O he/O was/O surprised/O and/O received/O a/O shock/O of/O
annoyance/O when/O a/O servant/O came/O in/O to/O inform/O him/O of/O her/O arrival/O./O

Anna/PERSON had/O arrived/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION early/O in/O the/O morning/O;/O the/O carriage/O had/O
been/O sent/O to/O meet/O her/O in/O accordance/O with/O her/O telegram/O,/O and/O so/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON might/O have/O known/O of/O her/O arrival/O./O But/O when/O she/O arrived/O,/O he/O
did/O not/O meet/O her/O./O She/O was/O told/O that/O he/O had/O not/O yet/O gone/O out/O,/O but/O was/O
busy/O with/O his/O secretary/O./O She/O sent/O word/O to/O her/O husband/O that/O she/O had/O come/O,/O
went/O to/O her/O own/O room/O,/O and/O occupied/O herself/O in/O sorting/O out/O her/O things/O,/O
expecting/O he/O would/O come/O to/O her/O./O But/O an/O hour/O passed/O;/O he/O did/O not/O come/O./O She/O
went/O into/O the/O dining/O room/O on/O the/O pretext/O of/O giving/O some/O directions/O,/O and/O
spoke/O loudly/O on/O purpose/O,/O expecting/O him/O to/O come/O out/O there/O;/O but/O he/O did/O not/O
come/O,/O though/O she/O heard/O him/O go/O to/O the/O door/O of/O his/O study/O as/O he/O parted/O from/O
the/O chief/O secretary/O./O She/O knew/O that/O he/O usually/O went/O out/O quickly/O to/O his/O
office/O,/O and/O she/O wanted/O to/O see/O him/O before/O that/O,/O so/O that/O their/O attitude/O to/O
one/O another/O might/O be/O defined/O./O

She/O walked/O across/O the/O drawing/O room/O and/O went/O resolutely/O to/O him/O./O When/O she/O
went/O into/O his/O study/O he/O was/O in/O official/O uniform/O,/O obviously/O ready/O to/O go/O
out/O,/O sitting/O at/O a/O little/O table/O on/O which/O he/O rested/O his/O elbows/O,/O looking/O
dejectedly/O before/O him/O./O She/O saw/O him/O before/O he/O saw/O her/O,/O and/O she/O saw/O that/O
he/O was/O thinking/O of/O her/O./O

On/O seeing/O her/O,/O he/O would/O have/O risen/O,/O but/O changed/O his/O mind/O,/O then/O his/O face/O
flushed/O hotly/O--/Oa/O thing/O Anna/PERSON had/O never/O seen/O before/O,/O and/O he/O got/O up/O quickly/O
and/O went/O to/O meet/O her/O,/O looking/O not/O at/O her/O eyes/O,/O but/O above/O them/O at/O her/O
forehead/O and/O hair/O./O He/O went/O up/O to/O her/O,/O took/O her/O by/O the/O hand/O,/O and/O asked/O
her/O to/O sit/O down/O./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O glad/O you/O have/O come/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O sitting/O down/O beside/O her/O,/O and/O
obviously/O wishing/O to/O say/O something/O,/O he/O stuttered/O./O Several/O times/O he/O tried/O
to/O begin/O to/O speak/O,/O but/O stopped/O./O In/O spite/O of/O the/O fact/O that/O,/O preparing/O
herself/O for/O meeting/O him/O,/O she/O had/O schooled/O herself/O to/O despise/O and/O
reproach/O him/O,/O she/O did/O not/O know/O what/O to/O say/O to/O him/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O sorry/O
for/O him/O./O And/O so/O the/O silence/O lasted/O for/O some/O time/O./O ``/OIs/O Seryozha/O quite/O
well/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O not/O waiting/O for/O an/O answer/O,/O he/O added/O:/O ``/OI/O sha/On't/O be/O
dining/O at/O home/O today/O,/O and/O I/O have/O got/O to/O go/O out/O directly/O./O''/O

``/OI/O had/O thought/O of/O going/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O you/O did/O quite/O,/O quite/O right/O to/O come/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O was/O silent/O again/O./O

Seeing/O that/O he/O was/O powerless/O to/O begin/O the/O conversation/O,/O she/O began/O
herself/O./O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O looking/O at/O him/O and/O not/O dropping/O her/O
eyes/O under/O his/O persistent/O gaze/O at/O her/O hair/O,/O ``/OI/O'm/O a/O guilty/O woman/O,/O I/O'm/O a/O
bad/O woman/O,/O but/O I/O am/O the/O same/O as/O I/O was/O,/O as/O I/O told/O you/O then/O,/O and/O I/O have/O
come/O to/O tell/O you/O that/O I/O can/O change/O nothing/O./O''/O

``/OI/O have/O asked/O you/O no/O question/O about/O that/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O all/O at/O once/O,/O
resolutely/O and/O with/O hatred/O looking/O her/O straight/O in/O the/O face/O;/O ``/Othat/O was/O
as/O I/O had/O supposed/O./O''/O Under/O the/O influence/O of/O anger/O he/O apparently/O regained/O
complete/O possession/O of/O all/O his/O faculties/O./O ``/OBut/O as/O I/O told/O you/O then/O,/O and/O
have/O written/O to/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O in/O a/O thin/O,/O shrill/O voice/O,/O ``/OI/O repeat/O now/O,/O
that/O I/O am/O not/O bound/O to/O know/O this/O./O I/O ignore/O it/O./O Not/O all/O wives/O are/O so/O kind/O
as/O you/O,/O to/O be/O in/O such/O a/O hurry/O to/O communicate/O such/O agreeable/O news/O to/O
their/O husbands/O./O''/O He/O laid/O special/O emphasis/O on/O the/O word/O ``/Oagreeable/O./O''/O ``/OI/O
shall/O ignore/O it/O so/O long/O as/O the/O world/O knows/O nothing/O of/O it/O,/O so/O long/O as/O my/O
name/O is/O not/O disgraced/O./O And/O so/O I/O simply/O inform/O you/O that/O our/O relations/O
must/O be/O just/O as/O they/O have/O always/O been/O,/O and/O that/O only/O in/O the/O event/O of/O
your/O compromising/O me/O I/O shall/O be/O obliged/O to/O take/O steps/O to/O secure/O my/O
honor/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O our/O relations/O can/Onot/O be/O the/O same/O as/O always/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON began/O in/O a/O timid/O
voice/O,/O looking/O at/O him/O with/O dismay/O./O

When/O she/O saw/O once/O more/O those/O composed/O gestures/O,/O heard/O that/O shrill/O,/O
childish/O,/O and/O sarcastic/O voice/O,/O her/O aversion/O for/O him/O extinguished/O her/O
pity/O for/O him/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O only/O afraid/O,/O but/O at/O all/O costs/O she/O wanted/O to/O
make/O clear/O her/O position/O./O

``/OI/O can/Onot/O be/O your/O wife/O while/O I./O.../O''/O she/O began/O./O

He/O laughed/O a/O cold/O and/O malignant/O laugh/O./O

``/OThe/O manner/O of/O life/O you/O have/O chosen/O is/O reflected/O,/O I/O suppose/O,/O in/O your/O
ideas/O./O I/O have/O too/O much/O respect/O or/O contempt/O,/O or/O both/O .../O I/O respect/O your/O
past/O and/O despise/O your/O present/O .../O that/O I/O was/O far/O from/O the/O interpretation/O
you/O put/O on/O my/O words/O./O''/O

Anna/PERSON sighed/O and/O bowed/O her/O head/O./O

``/OThough/O indeed/O I/O fail/O to/O comprehend/O how/O,/O with/O the/O independence/O you/O
show/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O getting/O hot/O,/O ''/O--/Oannouncing/O your/O infidelity/O to/O your/O
husband/O and/O seeing/O nothing/O reprehensible/O in/O it/O,/O apparently/O--/Oyou/O can/O see/O
anything/O reprehensible/O in/O performing/O a/O wife/O's/O duties/O in/O relation/O to/O your/O
husband/O./O''/O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON!/O What/O is/O it/O you/O want/O of/O me/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O want/O you/O not/O to/O meet/O that/O man/O here/O,/O and/O to/O conduct/O yourself/O so/O that/O
neither/O the/O world/O nor/O the/O servants/O can/O reproach/O you/O .../O not/O to/O see/O him/O./O
That/O's/O not/O much/O,/O I/O think/O./O And/O in/O return/O you/O will/O enjoy/O all/O the/O
privileges/O of/O a/O faithful/O wife/O without/O fulfilling/O her/O duties/O./O That/O's/O all/O
I/O have/O to/O say/O to/O you/O./O Now/O it/O's/O time/O for/O me/O to/O go/O./O I/O'm/O not/O dining/O at/O
home/O./O''/O He/O got/O up/O and/O moved/O towards/O the/O door/O./O

Anna/PERSON got/O up/O too/O./O Bowing/O in/O silence/O,/O he/O let/O her/O pass/O before/O him/O./O



Chapter/O 24/O


The/O night/O spent/O by/O Levin/PERSON on/O the/O haycock/O did/O not/O pass/O without/O result/O for/O
him/O./O The/O way/O in/O which/O he/O had/O been/O managing/O his/O land/O revolted/O him/O and/O had/O
lost/O all/O attraction/O for/O him/O./O In/O spite/O of/O the/O magnificent/O harvest/O,/O never/O
had/O there/O been/O,/O or/O,/O at/O least/O,/O never/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O,/O had/O there/O been/O so/O
many/O hindrances/O and/O so/O many/O quarrels/O between/O him/O and/O the/O peasants/O as/O
that/O year/O,/O and/O the/O origin/O of/O these/O failures/O and/O this/O hostility/O was/O now/O
perfectly/O comprehensible/O to/O him/O./O The/O delight/O he/O had/O experienced/O in/O the/O
work/O itself/O,/O and/O the/O consequent/O greater/O intimacy/O with/O the/O peasants/O,/O the/O
envy/O he/O felt/O of/O them/O,/O of/O their/O life/O,/O the/O desire/O to/O adopt/O that/O life/O,/O
which/O had/O been/O to/O him/O that/O night/O not/O a/O dream/O but/O an/O intention/O,/O the/O
execution/O of/O which/O he/O had/O thought/O out/O in/O detail/O--/Oall/O this/O had/O so/O
transformed/O his/O view/O of/O the/O farming/O of/O the/O land/O as/O he/O had/O managed/O it/O,/O
that/O he/O could/O not/O take/O his/O former/O interest/O in/O it/O,/O and/O could/O not/O help/O
seeing/O that/O unpleasant/O relation/O between/O him/O and/O the/O workpeople/O which/O was/O
the/O foundation/O of/O it/O all/O./O The/O herd/O of/O improved/O cows/O such/O as/O Pava/PERSON,/O the/O
whole/O land/O ploughed/O over/O and/O enriched/O,/O the/O nine/O level/O fields/O surrounded/O
with/O hedges/O,/O the/O two/O hundred/O and/O forty/O acres/O heavily/O manured/O,/O the/O seed/O
sown/O in/O drills/O,/O and/O all/O the/O rest/O of/O it/O--/Oit/O was/O all/O splendid/O if/O only/O the/O
work/O had/O been/O done/O for/O themselves/O,/O or/O for/O themselves/O and/O comrades/O--/Opeople/O
in/O sympathy/O with/O them/O./O But/O he/O saw/O clearly/O now/O -LRB-/Ohis/O work/O on/O a/O book/O of/O
agriculture/O,/O in/O which/O the/O chief/O element/O in/O husbandry/O was/O to/O have/O been/O
the/O laborer/O,/O greatly/O assisted/O him/O in/O this/O-RRB-/O that/O the/O sort/O of/O farming/O he/O
was/O carrying/O on/O was/O nothing/O but/O a/O cruel/O and/O stubborn/O struggle/O between/O
him/O and/O the/O laborers/O,/O in/O which/O there/O was/O on/O one/O side/O--/Ohis/O side/O--/Oa/O
continual/O intense/O effort/O to/O change/O everything/O to/O a/O pattern/O he/O considered/O
better/O;/O on/O the/O other/O side/O,/O the/O natural/O order/O of/O things/O./O And/O in/O this/O
struggle/O he/O saw/O that/O with/O immense/O expenditure/O of/O force/O on/O his/O side/O,/O and/O
with/O no/O effort/O or/O even/O intention/O on/O the/O other/O side/O,/O all/O that/O was/O
attained/O was/O that/O the/O work/O did/O not/O go/O to/O the/O liking/O of/O either/O side/O,/O and/O
that/O splendid/O tools/O,/O splendid/O cattle/O and/O land/O were/O spoiled/O with/O no/O good/O
to/O anyone/O./O Worst/O of/O all/O,/O the/O energy/O expended/O on/O this/O work/O was/O not/O simply/O
wasted/O./O He/O could/O not/O help/O feeling/O now/O,/O since/O the/O meaning/O of/O this/O system/O
had/O become/O clear/O to/O him/O,/O that/O the/O aim/O of/O his/O energy/O was/O a/O most/O unworthy/O
one/O./O In/O reality/O,/O what/O was/O the/O struggle/O about/O?/O He/O was/O struggling/O for/O
every/O farthing/O of/O his/O share/O -LRB-/Oand/O he/O could/O not/O help/O it/O,/O for/O he/O had/O only/O
to/O relax/O his/O efforts/O,/O and/O he/O would/O not/O have/O had/O the/O money/O to/O pay/O his/O
laborers/O'/O wages/O-RRB-/O,/O while/O they/O were/O only/O struggling/O to/O be/O able/O to/O do/O their/O
work/O easily/O and/O agreeably/O,/O that/O is/O to/O say/O,/O as/O they/O were/O used/O to/O doing/O
it/O./O It/O was/O for/O his/O interests/O that/O every/O laborer/O should/O work/O as/O hard/O as/O
possible/O,/O and/O that/O while/O doing/O so/O he/O should/O keep/O his/O wits/O about/O him/O,/O so/O
as/O to/O try/O not/O to/O break/O the/O winnowing/O machines/O,/O the/O horse/O rakes/O,/O the/O
thrashing/O machines/O,/O that/O he/O should/O attend/O to/O what/O he/O was/O doing/O./O What/O the/O
laborer/O wanted/O was/O to/O work/O as/O pleasantly/O as/O possible/O,/O with/O rests/O,/O and/O
above/O all/O,/O carelessly/O and/O heedlessly/O,/O without/O thinking/O./O That/O summer/O
Levin/PERSON saw/O this/O at/O every/O step/O./O He/O sent/O the/O men/O to/O mow/O some/O clover/O for/O
hay/O,/O picking/O out/O the/O worst/O patches/O where/O the/O clover/O was/O overgrown/O with/O
grass/O and/O weeds/O and/O of/O no/O use/O for/O seed/O;/O again/O and/O again/O they/O mowed/O the/O
best/O acres/O of/O clover/O,/O justifying/O themselves/O by/O the/O pretense/O that/O the/O
bailiff/O had/O told/O them/O to/O,/O and/O trying/O to/O pacify/O him/O with/O the/O assurance/O
that/O it/O would/O be/O splendid/O hay/O;/O but/O he/O knew/O that/O it/O was/O owing/O to/O those/O
acres/O being/O so/O much/O easier/O to/O mow/O./O He/O sent/O out/O a/O hay/O machine/O for/O
pitching/O the/O hay/O--/Oit/O was/O broken/O at/O the/O first/O row/O because/O it/O was/O dull/O work/O
for/O a/O peasant/O to/O sit/O on/O the/O seat/O in/O front/O with/O the/O great/O wings/O waving/O
above/O him/O./O And/O he/O was/O told/O,/O ``/ODo/On't/O trouble/O,/O your/O honor/O,/O sure/O,/O the/O
womenfolks/O will/O pitch/O it/O quick/O enough/O./O''/O The/O ploughs/O were/O practically/O
useless/O,/O because/O it/O never/O occurred/O to/O the/O laborer/O to/O raise/O the/O share/O
when/O he/O turned/O the/O plough/O,/O and/O forcing/O it/O round/O,/O he/O strained/O the/O horses/O
and/O tore/O up/O the/O ground/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON was/O begged/O not/O to/O mind/O about/O it/O./O The/O
horses/O were/O allowed/O to/O stray/O into/O the/O wheat/O because/O not/O a/O single/O laborer/O
would/O consent/O to/O be/O night-watchman/O,/O and/O in/O spite/O of/O orders/O to/O the/O
contrary/O,/O the/O laborers/O insisted/O on/O taking/O turns/O for/O night/O duty/O,/O and/O
Ivan/PERSON,/O after/O working/O all/O day/O long/O,/O fell/O asleep/O,/O and/O was/O very/O penitent/O for/O
his/O fault/O,/O saying/O,/O ``/ODo/O what/O you/O will/O to/O me/O,/O your/O honor/O./O''/O

They/O killed/O three/O of/O the/O best/O calves/O by/O letting/O them/O into/O the/O clover/O
aftermath/O without/O care/O as/O to/O their/O drinking/O,/O and/O nothing/O would/O make/O the/O
men/O believe/O that/O they/O had/O been/O blown/O out/O by/O the/O clover/O,/O but/O they/O told/O
him/O,/O by/O way/O of/O consolation/O,/O that/O one/O of/O his/O neighbors/O had/O lost/O a/O hundred/O
and/O twelve/O head/O of/O cattle/O in/O three/O days/O./O All/O this/O happened/O,/O not/O because/O
anyone/O felt/O ill-will/O to/O Levin/PERSON or/O his/O farm/O;/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O he/O knew/O that/O
they/O liked/O him/O,/O thought/O him/O a/O simple/O gentleman/O -LRB-/Otheir/O highest/O praise/O-RRB-/O;/O
but/O it/O happened/O simply/O because/O all/O they/O wanted/O was/O to/O work/O merrily/O and/O
carelessly/O,/O and/O his/O interests/O were/O not/O only/O remote/O and/O incomprehensible/O
to/O them/O,/O but/O fatally/O opposed/O to/O their/O most/O just/O claims/O./O Long/O before/O,/O
Levin/PERSON had/O felt/O dissatisfaction/O with/O his/O own/O position/O in/O regard/O to/O the/O
land/O./O He/O saw/O where/O his/O boat/O leaked/O,/O but/O he/O did/O not/O look/O for/O the/O leak/O,/O
perhaps/O purposely/O deceiving/O himself/O./O -LRB-/ONothing/O would/O be/O left/O him/O if/O he/O
lost/O faith/O in/O it/O./O-RRB-/O But/O now/O he/O could/O deceive/O himself/O no/O longer/O./O The/O
farming/O of/O the/O land/O,/O as/O he/O was/O managing/O it/O,/O had/O become/O not/O merely/O
unattractive/O but/O revolting/O to/O him/O,/O and/O he/O could/O take/O no/O further/O interest/O
in/O it/O./O

To/O this/O now/O was/O joined/O the/O presence/O,/O only/O twenty-five/O miles/O off/O,/O of/O
Kitty/PERSON Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON,/O whom/O he/O longed/O to/O see/O and/O could/O not/O see/O./O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON Oblonskaya/PERSON had/O invited/O him/O,/O when/O he/O was/O over/O there/O,/O to/O
come/O;/O to/O come/O with/O the/O object/O of/O renewing/O his/O offer/O to/O her/O sister/O,/O who/O
would/O,/O so/O she/O gave/O him/O to/O understand/O,/O accept/O him/O now/O./O Levin/PERSON himself/O had/O
felt/O on/O seeing/O Kitty/PERSON Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON that/O he/O had/O never/O ceased/O to/O love/O
her/O;/O but/O he/O could/O not/O go/O over/O to/O the/O Oblonskys/O'/O,/O knowing/O she/O was/O there/O./O
The/O fact/O that/O he/O had/O made/O her/O an/O offer/O,/O and/O she/O had/O refused/O him/O,/O had/O
placed/O an/O insuperable/O barrier/O between/O her/O and/O him/O./O ``/OI/O ca/On't/O ask/O her/O to/O
be/O my/O wife/O merely/O because/O she/O ca/On't/O be/O the/O wife/O of/O the/O man/O she/O wanted/O to/O
marry/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O./O The/O thought/O of/O this/O made/O him/O cold/O and/O
hostile/O to/O her/O./O ``/OI/O should/O not/O be/O able/O to/O speak/O to/O her/O without/O a/O feeling/O
of/O reproach/O;/O I/O could/O not/O look/O at/O her/O without/O resentment/O;/O and/O she/O will/O
only/O hate/O me/O all/O the/O more/O,/O as/O she/O's/O bound/O to/O./O And/O besides/O,/O how/O can/O I/O
now/O,/O after/O what/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON told/O me/O,/O go/O to/O see/O them/O?/O Can/O I/O help/O
showing/O that/O I/O know/O what/O she/O told/O me/O?/O And/O me/O to/O go/O magnanimously/O to/O
forgive/O her/O,/O and/O have/O pity/O on/O her/O!/O Me/O go/O through/O a/O performance/O before/O
her/O of/O forgiving/O,/O and/O deigning/O to/O bestow/O my/O love/O on/O her/O!/O.../O What/O induced/O
Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON to/O tell/O me/O that/O?/O By/O chance/O I/O might/O have/O seen/O her/O,/O
then/O everything/O would/O have/O happened/O of/O itself/O;/O but/O,/O as/O it/O is/O,/O it/O's/O out/O
of/O the/O question/O,/O out/O of/O the/O question/O!/O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON sent/O him/O a/O letter/O,/O asking/O him/O for/O a/O side-saddle/O for/O
Kitty/PERSON's/O use/O./O ``/OI/O'm/O told/O you/O have/O a/O side-saddle/O,/O''/O she/O wrote/O to/O him/O;/O ``/OI/O
hope/O you/O will/O bring/O it/O over/O yourself/O./O''/O

This/O was/O more/O than/O he/O could/O stand/O./O How/O could/O a/O woman/O of/O any/O
intelligence/O,/O of/O any/O delicacy/O,/O put/O her/O sister/O in/O such/O a/O humiliating/O
position/O!/O He/O wrote/O ten/O notes/O,/O and/O tore/O them/O all/O up/O,/O and/O sent/O the/O saddle/O
without/O any/O reply/O./O To/O write/O that/O he/O would/O go/O was/O impossible/O,/O because/O he/O
could/O not/O go/O;/O to/O write/O that/O he/O could/O not/O come/O because/O something/O
prevented/O him/O,/O or/O that/O he/O would/O be/O away/O,/O that/O was/O still/O worse/O./O He/O sent/O
the/O saddle/O without/O an/O answer/O,/O and/O with/O a/O sense/O of/O having/O done/O something/O
shameful/O;/O he/O handed/O over/O all/O the/O now/O revolting/O business/O of/O the/O estate/O to/O
the/O bailiff/O,/O and/O set/O off/O next/O day/O to/O a/O remote/O district/O to/O see/O his/O friend/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O who/O had/O splendid/O marshes/O for/O grouse/O in/O his/O neighborhood/O,/O and/O
had/O lately/O written/O to/O ask/O him/O to/O keep/O a/O long-standing/O promise/O to/O stay/O
with/O him/O./O The/O grouse-marsh/O,/O in/O the/O Surovsky/LOCATION district/O,/O had/O long/O tempted/O
Levin/PERSON,/O but/O he/O had/O continually/O put/O off/O this/O visit/O on/O account/O of/O his/O work/O
on/O the/O estate/O./O Now/O he/O was/O glad/O to/O get/O away/O from/O the/O neighborhood/O of/O the/O
Shtcherbatskys/O,/O and/O still/O more/O from/O his/O farm/O work/O,/O especially/O on/O a/O
shooting/O expedition/O,/O which/O always/O in/O trouble/O served/O as/O the/O best/O
consolation/O./O



Chapter/O 25/O


In/O the/O Surovsky/LOCATION district/O there/O was/O no/O railway/O nor/O service/O of/O post/O
horses/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON drove/O there/O with/O his/O own/O horses/O in/O his/O big/O,/O
old-fashioned/O carriage/O./O

He/O stopped/O halfway/O at/O a/O well-to-do/O peasant/O's/O to/O feed/O his/O horses/O./O A/O bald/O,/O
well-preserved/O old/O man/O,/O with/O a/O broad/O,/O red/O beard/O,/O gray/O on/O his/O cheeks/O,/O
opened/O the/O gate/O,/O squeezing/O against/O the/O gatepost/O to/O let/O the/O three/O horses/O
pass/O./O Directing/O the/O coachman/O to/O a/O place/O under/O the/O shed/O in/O the/O big/O,/O
clean/O,/O tidy/O yard/O,/O with/O charred/O,/O old-fashioned/O ploughs/O in/O it/O,/O the/O old/O man/O
asked/O Levin/PERSON to/O come/O into/O the/O parlor/O./O A/O cleanly/O dressed/O young/O woman/O,/O with/O
clogs/O on/O her/O bare/O feet/O,/O was/O scrubbing/O the/O floor/O in/O the/O new/O outer/O room/O./O
She/O was/O frightened/O of/O the/O dog/O,/O that/O ran/O in/O after/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O uttered/O a/O
shriek/O,/O but/O began/O laughing/O at/O her/O own/O fright/O at/O once/O when/O she/O was/O told/O
the/O dog/O would/O not/O hurt/O her/O./O Pointing/O Levin/PERSON with/O her/O bare/O arm/O to/O the/O door/O
into/O the/O parlor/O,/O she/O bent/O down/O again/O,/O hiding/O her/O handsome/O face/O,/O and/O went/O
on/O scrubbing/O./O

``/OWould/O you/O like/O the/O samovar/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O please/O./O''/O

The/O parlor/O was/O a/O big/O room/O,/O with/O a/O Dutch/O stove/O,/O and/O a/O screen/O dividing/O it/O
into/O two/O./O Under/O the/O holy/O pictures/O stood/O a/O table/O painted/O in/O patterns/O,/O a/O
bench/O,/O and/O two/O chairs/O./O Near/O the/O entrance/O was/O a/O dresser/O full/O of/O crockery/O./O
The/O shutters/O were/O closed/O,/O there/O were/O few/O flies/O,/O and/O it/O was/O so/O clean/O that/O
Levin/PERSON was/O anxious/O that/O Laska/PERSON,/O who/O had/O been/O running/O along/O the/O road/O and/O
bathing/O in/O puddles/O,/O should/O not/O muddy/O the/O floor/O,/O and/O ordered/O her/O to/O a/O
place/O in/O the/O corner/O by/O the/O door/O./O After/O looking/O round/O the/O parlor/O,/O Levin/PERSON
went/O out/O in/O the/O back/O yard/O./O The/O good-looking/O young/O woman/O in/O clogs/O,/O
swinging/O the/O empty/O pails/O on/O the/O yoke/O,/O ran/O on/O before/O him/O to/O the/O well/O for/O
water/O./O

``/OLook/O sharp/O,/O my/O girl/O!/O''/O the/O old/O man/O shouted/O after/O her/O,/O good-humoredly/O,/O
and/O he/O went/O up/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OWell/O,/O sir/O,/O are/O you/O going/O to/O Nikolay/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
Sviazhsky/PERSON?/O His/O honor/O comes/O to/O us/O too/O,/O''/O he/O began/O,/O chatting/O,/O leaning/O his/O
elbows/O on/O the/O railing/O of/O the/O steps/O./O In/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O old/O man/O's/O
account/O of/O his/O acquaintance/O with/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O the/O gates/O creaked/O again/O,/O and/O
