laborers/O came/O into/O the/O yard/O from/O the/O fields/O,/O with/O wooden/O ploughs/O and/O
harrows/O./O The/O horses/O harnessed/O to/O the/O ploughs/O and/O harrows/O were/O sleek/O and/O
fat/O./O The/O laborers/O were/O obviously/O of/O the/O household/O:/O two/O were/O young/O men/O in/O
cotton/O shirts/O and/O caps/O,/O the/O two/O others/O were/O hired/O laborers/O in/O homespun/O
shirts/O,/O one/O an/O old/O man/O,/O the/O other/O a/O young/O fellow/O./O Moving/O off/O from/O the/O
steps/O,/O the/O old/O man/O went/O up/O to/O the/O horses/O and/O began/O unharnessing/O them/O./O

``/OWhat/O have/O they/O been/O ploughing/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OPloughing/O up/O the/O potatoes/O./O We/O rent/O a/O bit/O of/O land/O too/O./O Fedot/PERSON,/O do/On't/O let/O
out/O the/O gelding/O,/O but/O take/O it/O to/O the/O trough/O,/O and/O we/O'll/O put/O the/O other/O in/O
harness/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O father/O,/O the/O ploughshares/O I/O ordered/O,/O has/O he/O brought/O them/O along/O?/O''/O
asked/O the/O big/O,/O healthy-looking/O fellow/O,/O obviously/O the/O old/O man/O's/O son/O./O

``/OThere/O .../O in/O the/O outer/O room/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O old/O man/O,/O bundling/O together/O
the/O harness/O he/O had/O taken/O off/O,/O and/O flinging/O it/O on/O the/O ground/O./O ``/OYou/O can/O
put/O them/O on/O,/O while/O they/O have/O dinner/O./O''/O

The/O good-looking/O young/O woman/O came/O into/O the/O outer/O room/O with/O the/O full/O
pails/O dragging/O at/O her/O shoulders/O./O More/O women/O came/O on/O the/O scene/O from/O
somewhere/O,/O young/O and/O handsome/O,/O middle-aged/O,/O old/O and/O ugly/O,/O with/O children/O
and/O without/O children/O./O

The/O samovar/O was/O beginning/O to/O sing/O;/O the/O laborers/O and/O the/O family/O,/O having/O
disposed/O of/O the/O horses/O,/O came/O in/O to/O dinner/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O getting/O his/O provisions/O
out/O of/O his/O carriage/O,/O invited/O the/O old/O man/O to/O take/O tea/O with/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O have/O had/O some/O today/O already/O,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O man/O,/O obviously/O
accepting/O the/O invitation/O with/O pleasure/O./O ``/OBut/O just/O a/O glass/O for/O company/O./O''/O

Over/O their/O tea/O Levin/PERSON heard/O all/O about/O the/O old/O man/O's/O farming/O./O Ten/O years/O
before/O,/O the/O old/O man/O had/O rented/O three/O hundred/O acres/O from/O the/O lady/O who/O
owned/O them/O,/O and/O a/O year/O ago/O he/O had/O bought/O them/O and/O rented/O another/O three/O
hundred/O from/O a/O neighboring/O landowner/O./O A/O small/O part/O of/O the/O land/O--/Othe/O worst/O
part/O--/Ohe/O let/O out/O for/O rent/O,/O while/O a/O hundred/O acres/O of/O arable/O land/O he/O
cultivated/O himself/O with/O his/O family/O and/O two/O hired/O laborers/O./O The/O old/O man/O
complained/O that/O things/O were/O doing/O badly/O./O But/O Levin/PERSON saw/O that/O he/O simply/O
did/O so/O from/O a/O feeling/O of/O propriety/O,/O and/O that/O his/O farm/O was/O in/O a/O
flourishing/O condition/O./O If/O it/O had/O been/O unsuccessful/O he/O would/O not/O have/O
bought/O land/O at/O thirty-five/O roubles/O the/O acre/O,/O he/O would/O not/O have/O married/O
his/O three/O sons/O and/O a/O nephew/O,/O he/O would/O not/O have/O rebuilt/O twice/O after/O
fires/O,/O and/O each/O time/O on/O a/O larger/O scale/O./O In/O spite/O of/O the/O old/O man/O's/O
complaints/O,/O it/O was/O evident/O that/O he/O was/O proud/O,/O and/O justly/O proud/O,/O of/O his/O
prosperity/O,/O proud/O of/O his/O sons/O,/O his/O nephew/O,/O his/O sons/O'/O wives/O,/O his/O horses/O
and/O his/O cows/O,/O and/O especially/O of/O the/O fact/O that/O he/O was/O keeping/O all/O this/O
farming/O going/O./O From/O his/O conversation/O with/O the/O old/O man/O,/O Levin/PERSON thought/O he/O
was/O not/O averse/O to/O new/O methods/O either/O./O He/O had/O planted/O a/O great/O many/O
potatoes/O,/O and/O his/O potatoes/O,/O as/O Levin/PERSON had/O seen/O driving/O past/O,/O were/O already/O
past/O flowering/O and/O beginning/O to/O die/O down/O,/O while/O Levin/PERSON's/O were/O only/O just/O
coming/O into/O flower/O./O He/O earthed/O up/O his/O potatoes/O with/O a/O modern/O plough/O
borrowed/O from/O a/O neighboring/O landowner/O./O He/O sowed/O wheat/O./O The/O trifling/O fact/O
that/O,/O thinning/O out/O his/O rye/O,/O the/O old/O man/O used/O the/O rye/O he/O thinned/O out/O for/O
his/O horses/O,/O specially/O struck/O Levin/PERSON./O How/O many/O times/O had/O Levin/PERSON seen/O this/O
splendid/O fodder/O wasted/O,/O and/O tried/O to/O get/O it/O saved/O;/O but/O always/O it/O had/O
turned/O out/O to/O be/O impossible/O./O The/O peasant/O got/O this/O done/O,/O and/O he/O could/O not/O
say/O enough/O in/O praise/O of/O it/O as/O food/O for/O the/O beasts/O./O

``/OWhat/O have/O the/O wenches/O to/O do/O?/O They/O carry/O it/O out/O in/O bundles/O to/O the/O
roadside/O,/O and/O the/O cart/O brings/O it/O away/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O we/O landowners/O ca/On't/O manage/O well/O with/O our/O laborers/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O
handing/O him/O a/O glass/O of/O tea/O./O

``/OThank/O you/O,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O man/O,/O and/O he/O took/O the/O glass/O,/O but/O refused/O sugar/O,/O
pointing/O to/O a/O lump/O he/O had/O left/O./O ``/OThey/O're/O simple/O destruction/O,/O''/O said/O he/O./O
``/OLook/O at/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O,/O for/O instance/O./O We/O know/O what/O the/O land/O's/O
like/O--/Ofirst-rate/O,/O yet/O there/O's/O not/O much/O of/O a/O crop/O to/O boast/O of/O./O It/O's/O not/O
looked/O after/O enough/O--/Othat/O's/O all/O it/O is/O!/O''/O

``/OBut/O you/O work/O your/O land/O with/O hired/O laborers/O?/O''/O

``/OWe/O're/O all/O peasants/O together/O./O We/O go/O into/O everything/O ourselves/O./O If/O a/O
man/O's/O no/O use/O,/O he/O can/O go/O,/O and/O we/O can/O manage/O by/O ourselves/O./O''/O

``/OFather/O,/O Finogen/PERSON wants/O some/O tar/O,/O''/O said/O the/O young/O woman/O in/O the/O clogs/O,/O
coming/O in/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O that/O's/O how/O it/O is/O,/O sir/O!/O''/O said/O the/O old/O man/O,/O getting/O up/O,/O and/O
crossing/O himself/O deliberately/O,/O he/O thanked/O Levin/PERSON and/O went/O out/O./O

When/O Levin/PERSON went/O into/O the/O kitchen/O to/O call/O his/O coachman/O he/O saw/O the/O whole/O
family/O at/O dinner/O./O The/O women/O were/O standing/O up/O waiting/O on/O them/O./O The/O young/O,/O
sturdy-looking/O son/O was/O telling/O something/O funny/O with/O his/O mouth/O full/O of/O
pudding/O,/O and/O they/O were/O all/O laughing/O,/O the/O woman/O in/O the/O clogs/O,/O who/O was/O
pouring/O cabbage/O soup/O into/O a/O bowl/O,/O laughing/O most/O merrily/O of/O all/O./O

Very/O probably/O the/O good-looking/O face/O of/O the/O young/O woman/O in/O the/O clogs/O had/O
a/O good/O deal/O to/O do/O with/O the/O impression/O of/O well-being/O this/O peasant/O
household/O made/O upon/O Levin/PERSON,/O but/O the/O impression/O was/O so/O strong/O that/O Levin/PERSON
could/O never/O get/O rid/O of/O it/O./O And/O all/O the/O way/O from/O the/O old/O peasant/O's/O to/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O he/O kept/O recalling/O this/O peasant/O farm/O as/O though/O there/O were/O
something/O in/O this/O impression/O that/O demanded/O his/O special/O attention/O./O



Chapter/O 26/O


Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O the/O marshal/O of/O his/O district/O./O He/O was/O five/O years/O older/O than/O
Levin/PERSON,/O and/O had/O long/O been/O married/O./O His/O sister-in-law/O,/O a/O young/O girl/O Levin/PERSON
liked/O very/O much/O,/O lived/O in/O his/O house/O;/O and/O Levin/PERSON knew/O that/O Sviazhsky/PERSON and/O
his/O wife/O would/O have/O greatly/O liked/O to/O marry/O the/O girl/O to/O him/O./O He/O knew/O this/O
with/O certainty/O,/O as/O so-called/O eligible/O young/O men/O always/O know/O it/O,/O though/O
he/O could/O never/O have/O brought/O himself/O to/O speak/O of/O it/O to/O anyone/O;/O and/O he/O
knew/O too/O that/O,/O although/O he/O wanted/O to/O get/O married/O,/O and/O although/O by/O every/O
token/O this/O very/O attractive/O girl/O would/O make/O an/O excellent/O wife/O,/O he/O could/O
no/O more/O have/O married/O her/O,/O even/O if/O he/O had/O not/O been/O in/O love/O with/O Kitty/PERSON
Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON,/O than/O he/O could/O have/O flown/O up/O to/O the/O sky/O./O And/O this/O
knowledge/O poisoned/O the/O pleasure/O he/O had/O hoped/O to/O find/O in/O the/O visit/O to/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON./O

On/O getting/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O letter/O with/O the/O invitation/O for/O shooting/O,/O Levin/PERSON
had/O immediately/O thought/O of/O this/O;/O but/O in/O spite/O of/O it/O he/O had/O made/O up/O his/O
mind/O that/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O having/O such/O views/O for/O him/O was/O simply/O his/O own/O
groundless/O supposition/O,/O and/O so/O he/O would/O go/O,/O all/O the/O same/O./O Besides/O,/O at/O
the/O bottom/O of/O his/O heart/O he/O had/O a/O desire/O to/O try/O himself/O,/O put/O himself/O to/O
the/O test/O in/O regard/O to/O this/O girl/O./O The/O Sviazhskys/O'/O home-life/O was/O
exceedingly/O pleasant/O,/O and/O Sviazhsky/PERSON himself/O,/O the/O best/O type/O of/O man/O taking/O
part/O in/O local/O affairs/O that/O Levin/PERSON knew/O,/O was/O very/O interesting/O to/O him/O./O

Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O one/O of/O those/O people/O,/O always/O a/O source/O of/O wonder/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O
whose/O convictions/O,/O very/O logical/O though/O never/O original/O,/O go/O one/O way/O by/O
themselves/O,/O while/O their/O life/O,/O exceedingly/O definite/O and/O firm/O in/O its/O
direction/O,/O goes/O its/O way/O quite/O apart/O and/O almost/O always/O in/O direct/O
contradiction/O to/O their/O convictions/O./O Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O an/O extremely/O advanced/O
man/O./O He/O despised/O the/O nobility/O,/O and/O believed/O the/O mass/O of/O the/O nobility/O to/O
be/O secretly/O in/O favor/O of/O serfdom/O,/O and/O only/O concealing/O their/O views/O from/O
cowardice/O./O He/O regarded/O Russia/LOCATION as/O a/O ruined/O country/O,/O rather/O after/O the/O
style/O of/O Turkey/LOCATION,/O and/O the/O government/O of/O Russia/LOCATION as/O so/O bad/O that/O he/O never/O
permitted/O himself/O to/O criticize/O its/O doings/O seriously/O,/O and/O yet/O he/O was/O a/O
functionary/O of/O that/O government/O and/O a/O model/O marshal/O of/O nobility/O,/O and/O when/O
he/O drove/O about/O he/O always/O wore/O the/O cockade/O of/O office/O and/O the/O cap/O with/O the/O
red/O band/O./O He/O considered/O human/O life/O only/O tolerable/O abroad/O,/O and/O went/O
abroad/O to/O stay/O at/O every/O opportunity/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O he/O carried/O on/O
a/O complex/O and/O improved/O system/O of/O agriculture/O in/O Russia/LOCATION,/O and/O with/O extreme/O
interest/O followed/O everything/O and/O knew/O everything/O that/O was/O being/O done/O in/O
Russia/LOCATION./O He/O considered/O the/O Russian/O peasant/O as/O occupying/O a/O stage/O of/O
development/O intermediate/O between/O the/O ape/O and/O the/O man/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O
time/O in/O the/O local/O assemblies/O no/O one/O was/O readier/O to/O shake/O hands/O with/O the/O
peasants/O and/O listen/O to/O their/O opinion/O./O He/O believed/O neither/O in/O God/O nor/O the/O
devil/O,/O but/O was/O much/O concerned/O about/O the/O question/O of/O the/O improvement/O of/O
the/O clergy/O and/O the/O maintenance/O of/O their/O revenues/O,/O and/O took/O special/O
trouble/O to/O keep/O up/O the/O church/O in/O his/O village/O./O

On/O the/O woman/O question/O he/O was/O on/O the/O side/O of/O the/O extreme/O advocates/O of/O
complete/O liberty/O for/O women/O,/O and/O especially/O their/O right/O to/O labor/O./O But/O he/O
lived/O with/O his/O wife/O on/O such/O terms/O that/O their/O affectionate/O childless/O home/O
life/O was/O the/O admiration/O of/O everyone/O,/O and/O arranged/O his/O wife/O's/O life/O so/O
that/O she/O did/O nothing/O and/O could/O do/O nothing/O but/O share/O her/O husband/O's/O
efforts/O that/O her/O time/O should/O pass/O as/O happily/O and/O as/O agreeably/O as/O
possible/O./O

If/O it/O had/O not/O been/O a/O characteristic/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O to/O put/O the/O most/O favorable/O
interpretation/O on/O people/O,/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O character/O would/O have/O presented/O no/O
doubt/O or/O difficulty/O to/O him/O:/O he/O would/O have/O said/O to/O himself/O,/O ``/Oa/O fool/O or/O a/O
knave/O,/O''/O and/O everything/O would/O have/O seemed/O clear/O./O But/O he/O could/O not/O say/O ``/Oa/O
fool/O,/O''/O because/O Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O unmistakably/O clever/O,/O and/O moreover/O,/O a/O highly/O
cultivated/O man/O,/O who/O was/O exceptionally/O modest/O over/O his/O culture/O./O There/O was/O
not/O a/O subject/O he/O knew/O nothing/O of/O./O But/O he/O did/O not/O display/O his/O knowledge/O
except/O when/O he/O was/O compelled/O to/O do/O so/O./O Still/O less/O could/O Levin/PERSON say/O that/O
he/O was/O a/O knave/O,/O as/O Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O unmistakably/O an/O honest/O,/O good-hearted/O,/O
sensible/O man/O,/O who/O worked/O good-humoredly/O,/O keenly/O,/O and/O perseveringly/O at/O
his/O work/O;/O he/O was/O held/O in/O high/O honor/O by/O everyone/O about/O him/O,/O and/O certainly/O
he/O had/O never/O consciously/O done/O,/O and/O was/O indeed/O incapable/O of/O doing/O,/O
anything/O base/O./O

Levin/PERSON tried/O to/O understand/O him/O,/O and/O could/O not/O understand/O him/O,/O and/O looked/O
at/O him/O and/O his/O life/O as/O at/O a/O living/O enigma/O./O

Levin/PERSON and/O he/O were/O very/O friendly/O,/O and/O so/O Levin/PERSON used/O to/O venture/O to/O sound/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O to/O try/O to/O get/O at/O the/O very/O foundation/O of/O his/O view/O of/O life/O;/O but/O
it/O was/O always/O in/O vain/O./O Every/O time/O Levin/PERSON tried/O to/O penetrate/O beyond/O the/O
outer/O chambers/O of/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O mind/O,/O which/O were/O hospitably/O open/O to/O all/O,/O
he/O noticed/O that/O Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O slightly/O disconcerted/O;/O faint/O signs/O of/O
alarm/O were/O visible/O in/O his/O eyes/O,/O as/O though/O he/O were/O afraid/O Levin/PERSON would/O
understand/O him/O,/O and/O he/O would/O give/O him/O a/O kindly/O,/O good-humored/O repulse/O./O

Just/O now/O,/O since/O his/O disenchantment/O with/O farming/O,/O Levin/PERSON was/O particularly/O
glad/O to/O stay/O with/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O Apart/O from/O the/O fact/O that/O the/O sight/O of/O this/O
happy/O and/O affectionate/O couple/O,/O so/O pleased/O with/O themselves/O and/O everyone/O
else/O,/O and/O their/O well-ordered/O home/O had/O always/O a/O cheering/O effect/O on/O Levin/PERSON,/O
he/O felt/O a/O longing/O,/O now/O that/O he/O was/O so/O dissatisfied/O with/O his/O own/O life/O,/O to/O
get/O at/O that/O secret/O in/O Sviazhsky/LOCATION that/O gave/O him/O such/O clearness/O,/O
definiteness/O,/O and/O good/O courage/O in/O life/O./O Moreover/O,/O Levin/PERSON knew/O that/O at/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O he/O should/O meet/O the/O landowners/O of/O the/O neighborhood/O,/O and/O it/O
was/O particularly/O interesting/O for/O him/O just/O now/O to/O hear/O and/O take/O part/O in/O
those/O rural/O conversations/O concerning/O crops/O,/O laborers/O'/O wages/O,/O and/O so/O on/O,/O
which/O,/O he/O was/O aware/O,/O are/O conventionally/O regarded/O as/O something/O very/O low/O,/O
but/O which/O seemed/O to/O him/O just/O now/O to/O constitute/O the/O one/O subject/O of/O
importance/O./O ``/OIt/O was/O not/O,/O perhaps/O,/O of/O importance/O in/O the/O days/O of/O serfdom/O,/O
and/O it/O may/O not/O be/O of/O importance/O in/O England/LOCATION./O In/O both/O cases/O the/O conditions/O
of/O agriculture/O are/O firmly/O established/O;/O but/O among/O us/O now/O,/O when/O everything/O
has/O been/O turned/O upside/O down/O and/O is/O only/O just/O taking/O shape/O,/O the/O question/O
what/O form/O these/O conditions/O will/O take/O is/O the/O one/O question/O of/O importance/O
in/O Russia/LOCATION,/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON./O

The/O shooting/O turned/O out/O to/O be/O worse/O than/O Levin/PERSON had/O expected/O./O The/O marsh/O
was/O dry/O and/O there/O were/O no/O grouse/O at/O all/O./O He/O walked/O about/O the/O whole/O day/O
and/O only/O brought/O back/O three/O birds/O,/O but/O to/O make/O up/O for/O that/O--/Ohe/O brought/O
back/O,/O as/O he/O always/O did/O from/O shooting/O,/O an/O excellent/O appetite/O,/O excellent/O
spirits/O,/O and/O that/O keen/O,/O intellectual/O mood/O which/O with/O him/O always/O
accompanied/O violent/O physical/O exertion/O./O And/O while/O out/O shooting/O,/O when/O he/O
seemed/O to/O be/O thinking/O of/O nothing/O at/O all/O,/O suddenly/O the/O old/O man/O and/O his/O
family/O kept/O coming/O back/O to/O his/O mind/O,/O and/O the/O impression/O of/O them/O seemed/O
to/O claim/O not/O merely/O his/O attention/O,/O but/O the/O solution/O of/O some/O question/O
connected/O with/O them/O./O

In/O the/O evening/O at/O tea/O,/O two/O landowners/O who/O had/O come/O about/O some/O business/O
connected/O with/O a/O wardship/O were/O of/O the/O party/O,/O and/O the/O interesting/O
conversation/O Levin/PERSON had/O been/O looking/O forward/O to/O sprang/O up/O./O

Levin/PERSON was/O sitting/O beside/O his/O hostess/O at/O the/O tea/O table/O,/O and/O was/O obliged/O
to/O keep/O up/O a/O conversation/O with/O her/O and/O her/O sister/O,/O who/O was/O sitting/O
opposite/O him/O./O Madame/O Sviazhskaya/PERSON was/O a/O round-faced/O,/O fair-haired/O,/O rather/O
short/O woman/O,/O all/O smiles/O and/O dimples/O./O Levin/PERSON tried/O through/O her/O to/O get/O a/O
solution/O of/O the/O weighty/O enigma/O her/O husband/O presented/O to/O his/O mind/O;/O but/O he/O
had/O not/O complete/O freedom/O of/O ideas/O,/O because/O he/O was/O in/O an/O agony/O of/O
embarrassment/O./O This/O agony/O of/O embarrassment/O was/O due/O to/O the/O fact/O that/O the/O
sister-in-law/O was/O sitting/O opposite/O to/O him/O,/O in/O a/O dress/O,/O specially/O put/O on/O,/O
as/O he/O fancied/O,/O for/O his/O benefit/O,/O cut/O particularly/O open/O,/O in/O the/O shape/O of/O a/O
trapeze/O,/O on/O her/O white/O bosom/O./O This/O quadrangular/O opening/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O
bosom/O's/O being/O very/O white/O,/O or/O just/O because/O it/O was/O very/O white/O,/O deprived/O
Levin/PERSON of/O the/O full/O use/O of/O his/O faculties/O./O He/O imagined/O,/O probably/O
mistakenly/O,/O that/O this/O low-necked/O bodice/O had/O been/O made/O on/O his/O account/O,/O
and/O felt/O that/O he/O had/O no/O right/O to/O look/O at/O it/O,/O and/O tried/O not/O to/O look/O at/O
it/O;/O but/O he/O felt/O that/O he/O was/O to/O blame/O for/O the/O very/O fact/O of/O the/O low-necked/O
bodice/O having/O been/O made/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON that/O he/O had/O deceived/O
someone/O,/O that/O he/O ought/O to/O explain/O something/O,/O but/O that/O to/O explain/O it/O was/O
impossible/O,/O and/O for/O that/O reason/O he/O was/O continually/O blushing/O,/O was/O ill/O at/O
ease/O and/O awkward/O./O His/O awkwardness/O infected/O the/O pretty/O sister-in-law/O too/O./O
But/O their/O hostess/O appeared/O not/O to/O observe/O this/O,/O and/O kept/O purposely/O
drawing/O her/O into/O the/O conversation/O./O

``/OYou/O say/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O pursuing/O the/O subject/O that/O had/O been/O started/O,/O ``/Othat/O
my/O husband/O can/Onot/O be/O interested/O in/O what/O's/O Russian/O./O It/O's/O quite/O the/O
contrary/O;/O he/O is/O always/O in/O cheerful/O spirits/O abroad/O,/O but/O not/O as/O he/O is/O
here/O./O Here/O,/O he/O feels/O in/O his/O proper/O place/O./O He/O has/O so/O much/O to/O do/O,/O and/O he/O
has/O the/O faculty/O of/O interesting/O himself/O in/O everything/O./O Oh/O,/O you/O've/O not/O
been/O to/O see/O our/O school/O,/O have/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O've/O seen/O it/O.../O./O The/O little/O house/O covered/O with/O ivy/O,/O is/On't/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O;/O that/O's/O Nastia/PERSON's/O work/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O indicating/O her/O sister/O./O

``/OYou/O teach/O in/O it/O yourself/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON,/O trying/O to/O look/O above/O the/O open/O
neck/O,/O but/O feeling/O that/O wherever/O he/O looked/O in/O that/O direction/O he/O should/O
see/O it/O./O

``/OYes/O;/O I/O used/O to/O teach/O in/O it/O myself/O,/O and/O do/O teach/O still/O,/O but/O we/O have/O a/O
first-rate/O schoolmistress/O now/O./O And/O we/O've/O started/O gymnastic/O exercises/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O thank/O you/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O have/O any/O more/O tea/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O conscious/O of/O
doing/O a/O rude/O thing/O,/O but/O incapable/O of/O continuing/O the/O conversation/O,/O he/O got/O
up/O,/O blushing/O./O ``/OI/O hear/O a/O very/O interesting/O conversation/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O and/O
walked/O to/O the/O other/O end/O of/O the/O table/O,/O where/O Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O sitting/O with/O
the/O two/O gentlemen/O of/O the/O neighborhood/O./O Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O sitting/O sideways/O,/O
with/O one/O elbow/O on/O the/O table/O,/O and/O a/O cup/O in/O one/O hand/O,/O while/O with/O the/O other/O
hand/O he/O gathered/O up/O his/O beard/O,/O held/O it/O to/O his/O nose/O and/O let/O it/O drop/O
again/O,/O as/O though/O he/O were/O smelling/O it/O./O His/O brilliant/O black/O eyes/O were/O
looking/O straight/O at/O the/O excited/O country/O gentleman/O with/O gray/O whiskers/O,/O
and/O apparently/O he/O derived/O amusement/O from/O his/O remarks/O./O The/O gentleman/O was/O
complaining/O of/O the/O peasants/O./O It/O was/O evident/O to/O Levin/PERSON that/O Sviazhsky/PERSON knew/O
an/O answer/O to/O this/O gentleman/O's/O complaints/O,/O which/O would/O at/O once/O demolish/O
his/O whole/O contention/O,/O but/O that/O in/O his/O position/O he/O could/O not/O give/O
utterance/O to/O this/O answer/O,/O and/O listened/O,/O not/O without/O pleasure/O,/O to/O the/O
landowner/O's/O comic/O speeches/O./O

The/O gentleman/O with/O the/O gray/O whiskers/O was/O obviously/O an/O inveterate/O
adherent/O of/O serfdom/O and/O a/O devoted/O agriculturist/O,/O who/O had/O lived/O all/O his/O
life/O in/O the/O country/O./O Levin/PERSON saw/O proofs/O of/O this/O in/O his/O dress/O,/O in/O the/O
old-fashioned/O threadbare/O coat/O,/O obviously/O not/O his/O everyday/O attire/O,/O in/O his/O
shrewd/O,/O deep-set/O eyes/O,/O in/O his/O idiomatic/O,/O fluent/O Russian/O,/O in/O the/O
imperious/O tone/O that/O had/O become/O habitual/O from/O long/O use/O,/O and/O in/O the/O
resolute/O gestures/O of/O his/O large/O,/O red/O,/O sunburnt/O hands/O,/O with/O an/O old/O
betrothal/O ring/O on/O the/O little/O finger/O./O



Chapter/O 27/O


``/OIf/O I/O'd/O only/O the/O heart/O to/O throw/O up/O what/O's/O been/O set/O going/O .../O such/O a/O lot/O
of/O trouble/O wasted/O .../O I/O'd/O turn/O my/O back/O on/O the/O whole/O business/O,/O sell/O up/O,/O
go/O off/O like/O Nikolay/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON .../O to/O hear/O _/OLa/ORGANIZATION Belle/ORGANIZATION Hélène/ORGANIZATION_/O,/O''/O said/O the/O
landowner/O,/O a/O pleasant/O smile/O lighting/O up/O his/O shrewd/O old/O face/O./O

``/OBut/O you/O see/O you/O do/On't/O throw/O it/O up/O,/O''/O said/O Nikolay/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON Sviazhsky/PERSON;/O
``/Oso/O there/O must/O be/O something/O gained/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O only/O gain/O is/O that/O I/O live/O in/O my/O own/O house/O,/O neither/O bought/O nor/O hired/O./O
Besides/O,/O one/O keeps/O hoping/O the/O people/O will/O learn/O sense/O./O Though/O,/O instead/O
of/O that/O,/O you/O'd/O never/O believe/O it/O--/Othe/O drunkenness/O,/O the/O immorality/O!/O They/O
keep/O chopping/O and/O changing/O their/O bits/O of/O land/O./O Not/O a/O sight/O of/O a/O horse/O or/O
a/O cow/O./O The/O peasant/O's/O dying/O of/O hunger/O,/O but/O just/O go/O and/O take/O him/O on/O as/O a/O
laborer/O,/O he/O'll/O do/O his/O best/O to/O do/O you/O a/O mischief/O,/O and/O then/O bring/O you/O up/O
before/O the/O justice/O of/O the/O peace/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O then/O you/O make/O complaints/O to/O the/O justice/O too/O,/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O

``/OI/O lodge/O complaints/O?/O Not/O for/O anything/O in/O the/O world/O!/O Such/O a/O talking/O,/O and/O
such/O a/O to-do/O,/O that/O one/O would/O have/O cause/O to/O regret/O it/O./O At/O the/O works/O,/O for/O
instance/O,/O they/O pocketed/O the/O advance-money/O and/O made/O off/O./O What/O did/O the/O
justice/O do/O?/O Why/O,/O acquitted/O them/O./O Nothing/O keeps/O them/O in/O order/O but/O their/O
own/O communal/O court/O and/O their/O village/O elder/O./O He/O'll/O flog/O them/O in/O the/O good/O
old/O style/O!/O But/O for/O that/O there/O'd/O be/O nothing/O for/O it/O but/O to/O give/O it/O all/O up/O
and/O run/O away/O./O''/O

Obviously/O the/O landowner/O was/O chaffing/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O who/O,/O far/O from/O resenting/O
it/O,/O was/O apparently/O amused/O by/O it/O./O

``/OBut/O you/O see/O we/O manage/O our/O land/O without/O such/O extreme/O measures/O,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O
smiling/O:/O ``/OLevin/PERSON and/O I/O and/O this/O gentleman/O./O''/O

He/O indicated/O the/O other/O landowner/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O the/O thing/O's/O done/O at/O Mihail/PERSON Petrovitch/PERSON's/O,/O but/O ask/O him/O how/O it/O's/O
done/O./O Do/O you/O call/O that/O a/O rational/O system/O?/O''/O said/O the/O landowner/O,/O obviously/O
rather/O proud/O of/O the/O word/O ``/Orational/O./O''/O

``/OMy/O system/O's/O very/O simple/O,/O''/O said/O Mihail/PERSON Petrovitch/PERSON,/O ``/Othank/O God/O./O All/O my/O
management/O rests/O on/O getting/O the/O money/O ready/O for/O the/O autumn/O taxes/O,/O and/O
the/O peasants/O come/O to/O me/O,/O `/OFather/O,/O master/O,/O help/O us/O!/O'/O Well/O,/O the/O peasants/O
are/O all/O one/O's/O neighbors/O;/O one/O feels/O for/O them/O./O So/O one/O advances/O them/O a/O
third/O,/O but/O one/O says/O:/O `/ORemember/O,/O lads/O,/O I/O have/O helped/O you/O,/O and/O you/O must/O
help/O me/O when/O I/O need/O it/O--/Owhether/O it/O's/O the/O sowing/O of/O the/O oats/O,/O or/O the/O
haycutting/O,/O or/O the/O harvest/O'/O;/O and/O well/O,/O one/O agrees/O,/O so/O much/O for/O each/O
taxpayer/O--/Othough/O there/O are/O dishonest/O ones/O among/O them/O too/O,/O it/O's/O true/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON,/O who/O had/O long/O been/O familiar/O with/O these/O patriarchal/O methods/O,/O
exchanged/O glances/O with/O Sviazhsky/PERSON and/O interrupted/O Mihail/PERSON Petrovitch/PERSON,/O
turning/O again/O to/O the/O gentleman/O with/O the/O gray/O whiskers/O./O

``/OThen/O what/O do/O you/O think/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O;/O ``/Owhat/O system/O is/O one/O to/O adopt/O
nowadays/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O manage/O like/O Mihail/PERSON Petrovitch/PERSON,/O or/O let/O the/O land/O for/O half/O the/O crop/O
or/O for/O rent/O to/O the/O peasants/O;/O that/O one/O can/O do/O--/Oonly/O that/O's/O just/O how/O the/O
general/O prosperity/O of/O the/O country/O is/O being/O ruined/O./O Where/O the/O land/O with/O
serf-labor/O and/O good/O management/O gave/O a/O yield/O of/O nine/O to/O one/O,/O on/O the/O
half-crop/O system/O it/O yields/O three/O to/O one/O./O Russia/LOCATION has/O been/O ruined/O by/O the/O
emancipation/O!/O''/O

Sviazhsky/PERSON looked/O with/O smiling/O eyes/O at/O Levin/LOCATION,/O and/O even/O made/O a/O faint/O
gesture/O of/O irony/O to/O him/O;/O but/O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O think/O the/O landowner/O's/O words/O
absurd/O,/O he/O understood/O them/O better/O than/O he/O did/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O A/O great/O deal/O
more/O of/O what/O the/O gentleman/O with/O the/O gray/O whiskers/O said/O to/O show/O in/O what/O
way/O Russia/LOCATION was/O ruined/O by/O the/O emancipation/O struck/O him/O indeed/O as/O very/O
true/O,/O new/O to/O him/O,/O and/O quite/O incontestable/O./O The/O landowner/O unmistakably/O
spoke/O his/O own/O individual/O thought/O--/Oa/O thing/O that/O very/O rarely/O happens/O--/Oand/O a/O
thought/O to/O which/O he/O had/O been/O brought/O not/O by/O a/O desire/O of/O finding/O some/O
exercise/O for/O an/O idle/O brain/O,/O but/O a/O thought/O which/O had/O grown/O up/O out/O of/O the/O
conditions/O of/O his/O life/O,/O which/O he/O had/O brooded/O over/O in/O the/O solitude/O of/O his/O
village/O,/O and/O had/O considered/O in/O every/O aspect/O./O

``/OThe/O point/O is/O,/O do/On't/O you/O see/O,/O that/O progress/O of/O every/O sort/O is/O only/O made/O
by/O the/O use/O of/O authority/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O evidently/O wishing/O to/O show/O he/O was/O not/O
without/O culture/O./O ``/OTake/O the/O reforms/O of/O Peter/PERSON,/O of/O Catherine/PERSON,/O of/O Alexander/PERSON./O
Take/O European/O history/O./O And/O progress/O in/O agriculture/O more/O than/O anything/O
else/O--/Othe/O potato/O,/O for/O instance/O,/O that/O was/O introduced/O among/O us/O by/O force/O./O
The/O wooden/O plough/O too/O was/On't/O always/O used/O./O It/O was/O introduced/O maybe/O in/O the/O
days/O before/O the/O Empire/O,/O but/O it/O was/O probably/O brought/O in/O by/O force/O./O Now/O,/O in/O
our/O own/O day/O,/O we/O landowners/O in/O the/O serf/O times/O used/O various/O improvements/O
in/O our/O husbandry/O:/O drying/O machines/O and/O thrashing/O machines/O,/O and/O carting/O
manure/O and/O all/O the/O modern/O implements/O--/Oall/O that/O we/O brought/O into/O use/O by/O our/O
authority/O,/O and/O the/O peasants/O opposed/O it/O at/O first/O,/O and/O ended/O by/O imitating/O
us/O./O Now/O,/O by/O the/O abolition/O of/O serfdom/O we/O have/O been/O deprived/O of/O our/O
authority/O;/O and/O so/O our/O husbandry/O,/O where/O it/O had/O been/O raised/O to/O a/O high/O
level/O,/O is/O bound/O to/O sink/O to/O the/O most/O savage/O primitive/O condition/O./O That/O's/O
how/O I/O see/O it/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O why/O so/O?/O If/O it/O's/O rational/O,/O you/O'll/O be/O able/O to/O keep/O up/O the/O same/O system/O
with/O hired/O labor/O,/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O

``/OWe/O've/O no/O power/O over/O them/O./O With/O whom/O am/O I/O going/O to/O work/O the/O system/O,/O
allow/O me/O to/O ask/O?/O''/O

``/OThere/O it/O is/O--/Othe/O labor/O force/O--/Othe/O chief/O element/O in/O agriculture/O,/O''/O thought/O
Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWith/O laborers/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O laborers/O wo/On't/O work/O well/O,/O and/O wo/On't/O work/O with/O good/O implements/O./O Our/O
laborer/O can/O do/O nothing/O but/O get/O drunk/O like/O a/O pig/O,/O and/O when/O he/O's/O drunk/O he/O
ruins/O everything/O you/O give/O him/O./O He/O makes/O the/O horses/O ill/O with/O too/O much/O
water/O,/O cuts/O good/O harness/O,/O barters/O the/O tires/O of/O the/O wheels/O for/O drink/O,/O
drops/O bits/O of/O iron/O into/O the/O thrashing/O machine/O,/O so/O as/O to/O break/O it/O./O He/O
loathes/O the/O sight/O of/O anything/O that/O's/O not/O after/O his/O fashion/O./O And/O that/O's/O
how/O it/O is/O the/O whole/O level/O of/O husbandry/O has/O fallen/O./O Lands/O gone/O out/O of/O
cultivation/O,/O overgrown/O with/O weeds/O,/O or/O divided/O among/O the/O peasants/O,/O and/O
where/O millions/O of/O bushels/O were/O raised/O you/O get/O a/O hundred/O thousand/O;/O the/O
wealth/O of/O the/O country/O has/O decreased/O./O If/O the/O same/O thing/O had/O been/O done/O,/O
but/O with/O care/O that/O.../O''/O

And/O he/O proceeded/O to/O unfold/O his/O own/O scheme/O of/O emancipation/O by/O means/O of/O
which/O these/O drawbacks/O might/O have/O been/O avoided/O./O

This/O did/O not/O interest/O Levin/PERSON,/O but/O when/O he/O had/O finished/O,/O Levin/PERSON went/O back/O
to/O his/O first/O position/O,/O and/O,/O addressing/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O and/O trying/O to/O draw/O him/O
into/O expressing/O his/O serious/O opinion/O:/O-/O`/O

``/OThat/O the/O standard/O of/O culture/O is/O falling/O,/O and/O that/O with/O our/O present/O
relations/O to/O the/O peasants/O there/O is/O no/O possibility/O of/O farming/O on/O a/O
rational/O system/O to/O yield/O a/O profit/O--/Othat/O's/O perfectly/O true/O,/O''/O said/O he/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O believe/O it/O,/O''/O Sviazhsky/PERSON replied/O quite/O seriously/O;/O ``/Oall/O I/O see/O is/O
that/O we/O do/On't/O know/O how/O to/O cultivate/O the/O land/O,/O and/O that/O our/O system/O of/O
agriculture/O in/O the/O serf/O days/O was/O by/O no/O means/O too/O high/O,/O but/O too/O low/O./O We/O
have/O no/O machines/O,/O no/O good/O stock/O,/O no/O efficient/O supervision/O;/O we/O do/On't/O even/O
know/O how/O to/O keep/O accounts/O./O Ask/O any/O landowner/O;/O he/O wo/On't/O be/O able/O to/O tell/O
you/O what/O crop/O's/O profitable/O,/O and/O what/O's/O not/O./O''/O

``/OItalian/O bookkeeping/O,/O''/O said/O the/O gentleman/O of/O the/O gray/O whiskers/O
ironically/O./O ``/OYou/O may/O keep/O your/O books/O as/O you/O like/O,/O but/O if/O they/O spoil/O
everything/O for/O you/O,/O there/O wo/On't/O be/O any/O profit/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O do/O they/O spoil/O things/O?/O A/O poor/O thrashing/O machine/O,/O or/O your/O Russian/O
presser/O,/O they/O will/O break/O,/O but/O my/O steam/O press/O they/O do/On't/O break/O./O A/O
wretched/O Russian/O nag/O they/O'll/O ruin/O,/O but/O keep/O good/O dray-horses/O--/Othey/O wo/On't/O
ruin/O them/O./O And/O so/O it/O is/O all/O round/O./O We/O must/O raise/O our/O farming/O to/O a/O higher/O
level/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O if/O one/O only/O had/O the/O means/O to/O do/O it/O,/O Nikolay/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON!/O It/O's/O all/O
very/O well/O for/O you/O;/O but/O for/O me/O,/O with/O a/O son/O to/O keep/O at/O the/O university/O,/O
lads/O to/O be/O educated/O at/O the/O high/O school/O--/Ohow/O am/O I/O going/O to/O buy/O these/O
dray-horses/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O that/O's/O what/O the/O land/O banks/O are/O for/O./O''/O

``/OTo/O get/O what/O's/O left/O me/O sold/O by/O auction/O?/O No/O,/O thank/O you/O./O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O agree/O that/O it/O's/O necessary/O or/O possible/O to/O raise/O the/O level/O of/O
agriculture/O still/O higher/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OI/O devote/O myself/O to/O it/O,/O and/O I/O
have/O means/O,/O but/O I/O can/O do/O nothing/O./O As/O to/O the/O banks/O,/O I/O do/On't/O know/O to/O whom/O
they/O're/O any/O good/O./O For/O my/O part/O,/O anyway/O,/O whatever/O I/O've/O spent/O money/O on/O in/O
the/O way/O of/O husbandry/O,/O it/O has/O been/O a/O loss/O:/O stock/O--/Oa/O loss/O,/O machinery/O--/Oa/O
loss/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O true/O enough/O,/O''/O the/O gentleman/O with/O the/O gray/O whiskers/O chimed/O in/O,/O
positively/O laughing/O with/O satisfaction/O./O

``/OAnd/O I/O'm/O not/O the/O only/O one/O,/O''/O pursued/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OI/O mix/O with/O all/O the/O
neighboring/O landowners/O,/O who/O are/O cultivating/O their/O land/O on/O a/O rational/O
system/O;/O they/O all/O,/O with/O rare/O exceptions/O,/O are/O doing/O so/O at/O a/O loss/O./O Come/O,/O
tell/O us/O how/O does/O your/O land/O do/O--/Odoes/O it/O pay/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O at/O once/O in/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O eyes/O he/O detected/O that/O fleeting/O expression/O of/O alarm/O which/O he/O
had/O noticed/O whenever/O he/O had/O tried/O to/O penetrate/O beyond/O the/O outer/O chambers/O
of/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O mind/O./O

Moreover/O,/O this/O question/O on/O Levin/PERSON's/O part/O was/O not/O quite/O in/O good/O faith/O./O
Madame/PERSON Sviazhskaya/PERSON had/O just/O told/O him/O at/O tea/O that/O they/O had/O that/O summer/O
invited/O a/O German/O expert/O in/O bookkeeping/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O who/O for/O a/O
consideration/O of/O five/O hundred/O roubles/O had/O investigated/O the/O management/O of/O
their/O property/O,/O and/O found/O that/O it/O was/O costing/O them/O a/O loss/O of/O three/O
thousand/O odd/O roubles/O./O She/O did/O not/O remember/O the/O precise/O sum/O,/O but/O it/O
appeared/O that/O the/O German/O had/O worked/O it/O out/O to/O the/O fraction/O of/O a/O
farthing/O./O

The/O gray-whiskered/O landowner/O smiled/O at/O the/O mention/O of/O the/O profits/O of/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O famling/O,/O obviously/O aware/O how/O much/O gain/O his/O neighbor/O and/O
marshal/O was/O likely/O to/O be/O making/O./O

``/OPossibly/O it/O does/O not/O pay/O,/O''/O answered/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O ``/OThat/O merely/O proves/O
either/O that/O I/O'm/O a/O bad/O manager/O,/O or/O that/O I/O've/O sunk/O my/O capital/O for/O the/O
increase/O of/O my/O rents/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O rent/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON cried/O with/O horror/O./O ``/ORent/O there/O may/O be/O in/O Europe/LOCATION,/O where/O
land/O has/O been/O improved/O by/O the/O labor/O put/O into/O it/O,/O but/O with/O us/O all/O the/O
land/O is/O deteriorating/O from/O the/O labor/O put/O into/O it/O--/Oin/O other/O words/O they/O're/O
working/O it/O out/O;/O so/O there/O's/O no/O question/O of/O rent/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O no/O rent/O?/O It/O's/O a/O law/O./O''/O

``/OThen/O we/O're/O outside/O the/O law/O;/O rent/O explains/O nothing/O for/O us/O,/O but/O simply/O
muddles/O us/O./O No/O,/O tell/O me/O how/O there/O can/O be/O a/O theory/O of/O rent/O?/O.../O''/O

``/OWill/O you/O have/O some/O junket/O?/O Masha/PERSON,/O pass/O us/O some/O junket/O or/O raspberries/O./O''/O
He/O turned/O to/O his/O wife/O./O ``/OExtraordinarily/O late/O the/O raspberries/O are/O lasting/O
this/O year/O./O''/O

And/O in/O the/O happiest/O frame/O of/O mind/O Sviazhsky/PERSON got/O up/O and/O walked/O off/O,/O
apparently/O supposing/O the/O conversation/O to/O have/O ended/O at/O the/O very/O point/O
when/O to/O Levin/PERSON it/O seemed/O that/O it/O was/O only/O just/O beginning/O./O

Having/O lost/O his/O antagonist/O,/O Levin/PERSON continued/O the/O conversation/O with/O the/O
gray-whiskered/O landowner/O,/O trying/O to/O prove/O to/O him/O that/O all/O the/O difficulty/O
arises/O from/O the/O fact/O that/O we/O do/On't/O find/O out/O the/O peculiarities/O and/O habits/O
of/O our/O laborer/O;/O but/O the/O landowner/O,/O like/O all/O men/O who/O think/O independently/O
and/O in/O isolation/O,/O was/O slow/O in/O taking/O in/O any/O other/O person/O's/O idea/O,/O and/O
particularly/O partial/O to/O his/O own/O./O He/O stuck/O to/O it/O that/O the/O Russian/O peasant/O
is/O a/O swine/O and/O likes/O swinishness/O,/O and/O that/O to/O get/O him/O out/O of/O his/O
swinishness/O one/O must/O have/O authority/O,/O and/O there/O is/O none/O;/O one/O must/O have/O
the/O stick/O,/O and/O we/O have/O become/O so/O liberal/O that/O we/O have/O all/O of/O a/O sudden/O
replaced/O the/O stick/O that/O served/O us/O for/O a/O thousand/O years/O by/O lawyers/O and/O
model/O prisons/O,/O where/O the/O worthless/O,/O stinking/O peasant/O is/O fed/O on/O good/O soup/O
and/O has/O a/O fixed/O allowance/O of/O cubic/O feet/O of/O air/O./O

``/OWhat/O makes/O you/O think/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O trying/O to/O get/O back/O to/O the/O question/O,/O
``/Othat/O it/O's/O impossible/O to/O find/O some/O relation/O to/O the/O laborer/O in/O which/O the/O
labor/O would/O become/O productive/O?/O''/O

``/OThat/O never/O could/O be/O so/O with/O the/O Russian/O peasantry/O;/O we/O've/O no/O power/O over/O
them/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O landowner/O./O

``/OHow/O can/O new/O conditions/O be/O found/O?/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O Having/O eaten/O some/O
junket/O and/O lighted/O a/O cigarette/O,/O he/O came/O back/O to/O the/O discussion/O./O ``/OAll/O
possible/O relations/O to/O the/O labor/O force/O have/O been/O defined/O and/O studied/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O./O ``/OThe/O relic/O of/O barbarism/O,/O the/O primitive/O commune/O with/O each/O guarantee/O
for/O all/O,/O will/O disappear/O of/O itself/O;/O serfdom/O has/O been/O abolished/O--/Othere/O
remains/O nothing/O but/O free/O labor/O,/O and/O its/O forms/O are/O fixed/O and/O ready/O made/O,/O
and/O must/O be/O adopted/O./O Permanent/O hands/O,/O day-laborers/O,/O rammers/O--/Oyou/O ca/On't/O
get/O out/O of/O those/O forms/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O Europe/LOCATION is/O dissatisfied/O with/O these/O forms/O./O''/O

``/ODissatisfied/O,/O and/O seeking/O new/O ones/O./O And/O will/O find/O them/O,/O in/O all/O
probability/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O just/O what/O I/O was/O meaning/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OWhy/O should/On't/O we/O seek/O
them/O for/O ourselves/O?/O''/O

``/OBecause/O it/O would/O be/O just/O like/O inventing/O afresh/O the/O means/O for/O
constructing/O railways/O./O They/O are/O ready/O,/O invented/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O if/O they/O do/On't/O do/O for/O us/O,/O if/O they/O're/O stupid/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

And/O again/O he/O detected/O the/O expression/O of/O alarm/O in/O the/O eyes/O of/O Sviazhsky/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O;/O we/O'll/O bury/O the/O world/O under/O our/O caps/O!/O We/O've/O found/O the/O secret/O
Europe/LOCATION was/O seeking/O for/O!/O I/O've/O heard/O all/O that/O;/O but/O,/O excuse/O me/O,/O do/O you/O know/O
all/O that/O's/O been/O done/O in/O Europe/LOCATION on/O the/O question/O of/O the/O organization/O of/O
labor/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O very/O little/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O question/O is/O now/O absorbing/O the/O best/O minds/O in/O Europe/LOCATION./O The/O
Schulze-Delitsch/ORGANIZATION movement/O.../O./O And/O then/O all/O this/O enormous/O literature/O of/O
the/O labor/O question/O,/O the/O most/O liberal/O Lassalle/PERSON movement/O .../O the/O Mulhausen/PERSON
experiment/O?/O That/O's/O a/O fact/O by/O now/O,/O as/O you/O're/O probably/O aware/O./O''/O

``/OI/O have/O some/O idea/O of/O it/O,/O but/O very/O vague/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O you/O only/O say/O that/O;/O no/O doubt/O you/O know/O all/O about/O it/O as/O well/O as/O I/O do/O./O
I/O'm/O not/O a/O professor/O of/O sociology/O,/O of/O course/O,/O but/O it/O interested/O me/O,/O and/O
really/O,/O if/O it/O interests/O you/O,/O you/O ought/O to/O study/O it/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O conclusion/O have/O they/O come/O to/O?/O''/O

``/OExcuse/O me/O.../O''/O

The/O two/O neighbors/O had/O risen/O,/O and/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O once/O more/O checking/O Levin/PERSON in/O
his/O inconvenient/O habit/O of/O peeping/O into/O what/O was/O beyond/O the/O outer/O
chambers/O of/O his/O mind/O,/O went/O to/O see/O his/O guests/O out/O./O



Chapter/O 28/O


Levin/PERSON was/O insufferably/O bored/O that/O evening/O with/O the/O ladies/O;/O he/O was/O
stirred/O as/O he/O had/O never/O been/O before/O by/O the/O idea/O that/O the/O dissatisfaction/O
he/O was/O feeling/O with/O his/O system/O of/O managing/O his/O land/O was/O not/O an/O
exceptional/O case/O,/O but/O the/O general/O condition/O of/O things/O in/O Russia/LOCATION;/O that/O
the/O organization/O of/O some/O relation/O of/O the/O laborers/O to/O the/O soil/O in/O which/O
they/O would/O work/O,/O as/O with/O the/O peasant/O he/O had/O met/O half-way/O to/O the/O
Sviazhskys/O'/O,/O was/O not/O a/O dream/O,/O but/O a/O problem/O which/O must/O be/O solved/O./O And/O it/O
seemed/O to/O him/O that/O the/O problem/O could/O be/O solved/O,/O and/O that/O he/O ought/O to/O try/O
and/O solve/O it/O./O

After/O saying/O good-night/O to/O the/O ladies/O,/O and/O promising/O to/O stay/O the/O whole/O
of/O the/O next/O day/O,/O so/O as/O to/O make/O an/O expedition/O on/O horseback/O with/O them/O to/O
see/O an/O interesting/O ruin/O in/O the/O crown/O forest/O,/O Levin/PERSON went/O,/O before/O going/O to/O
bed/O,/O into/O his/O host/O's/O study/O to/O get/O the/O books/O on/O the/O labor/O question/O that/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON had/O offered/O him/O./O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O study/O was/O a/O huge/O room/O,/O surrounded/O
by/O bookcases/O and/O with/O two/O tables/O in/O it/O--/Oone/O a/O massive/O writing/O table/O,/O
standing/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O room/O,/O and/O the/O other/O a/O round/O table/O,/O covered/O
with/O recent/O numbers/O of/O reviews/O and/O journals/O in/O different/O languages/O,/O
ranged/O like/O the/O rays/O of/O a/O star/O round/O the/O lamp/O./O On/O the/O writing/O table/O was/O
a/O stand/O of/O drawers/O marked/O with/O gold/O lettering/O,/O and/O full/O of/O papers/O of/O
various/O sorts/O./O

Sviazhsky/PERSON took/O out/O the/O books/O,/O and/O sat/O down/O in/O a/O rocking-chair/O./O

``/OWhat/O are/O you/O looking/O at/O there/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O who/O was/O standing/O at/O
the/O round/O table/O looking/O through/O the/O reviews/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O there/O's/O a/O very/O interesting/O article/O here/O,/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON of/O
the/O review/O Levin/PERSON was/O holding/O in/O his/O hand/O./O ``/OIt/O appears/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O with/O
eager/O interest/O,/O ``/Othat/O Friedrich/PERSON was/O not/O,/O after/O all/O,/O the/O person/O chiefly/O
responsible/O for/O the/O partition/O of/O Poland/LOCATION./O It/O is/O proved/O.../O''/O

And/O with/O his/O characteristic/O clearness/O,/O he/O summed/O up/O those/O new/O,/O very/O
important/O,/O and/O interesting/O revelations/O./O Although/O Levin/PERSON was/O engrossed/O at/O
the/O moment/O by/O his/O ideas/O about/O the/O problem/O of/O the/O land/O,/O he/O wondered/O,/O as/O
he/O heard/O Sviazhsky/PERSON:/O ``/OWhat/O is/O there/O inside/O of/O him/O?/O And/O why/O,/O why/O is/O he/O
interested/O in/O the/O partition/O of/O Poland/LOCATION?/O''/O When/O Sviazhsky/PERSON had/O finished/O,/O
Levin/PERSON could/O not/O help/O asking/O:/O ``/OWell/O,/O and/O what/O then/O?/O''/O But/O there/O was/O
nothing/O to/O follow/O./O It/O was/O simply/O interesting/O that/O it/O had/O been/O proved/O to/O
be/O so/O and/O so/O./O But/O Sviazhsky/PERSON did/O not/O explain/O,/O and/O saw/O no/O need/O to/O explain/O
why/O it/O was/O interesting/O to/O him/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O I/O was/O very/O much/O interested/O by/O your/O irritable/O neighbor/O,/O''/O said/O
Levin/PERSON,/O sighing/O./O ``/OHe/O's/O a/O clever/O fellow/O,/O and/O said/O a/O lot/O that/O was/O true/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O get/O along/O with/O you/O!/O An/O inveterate/O supporter/O of/O serfdom/O at/O heart/O,/O
like/O all/O of/O them/O!/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O

``/OWhose/O marshal/O you/O are/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O only/O I/O marshal/O them/O in/O the/O other/O direction/O,/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O
laughing/O./O

``/OI/O'll/O tell/O you/O what/O interests/O me/O very/O much/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OHe/O's/O right/O
that/O our/O system/O,/O that/O's/O to/O say/O of/O rational/O farming/O,/O does/On't/O answer/O,/O that/O
the/O only/O thing/O that/O answers/O is/O the/O money-lender/O system/O,/O like/O that/O
meek-looking/O gentleman/O's/O,/O or/O else/O the/O very/O simplest/O.../O./O Whose/O fault/O is/O
it/O?/O''/O

``/OOur/O own/O,/O of/O course/O./O Besides/O,/O it/O's/O not/O true/O that/O it/O does/On't/O answer/O./O It/O
answers/O with/O Vassiltchikov/PERSON./O''/O

``/OA/O factory/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O really/O do/On't/O know/O what/O it/O is/O you/O are/O surprised/O at/O./O The/O people/O are/O
at/O such/O a/O low/O stage/O of/O rational/O and/O moral/O development/O,/O that/O it/O's/O obvious/O
they/O're/O bound/O to/O oppose/O everything/O that/O's/O strange/O to/O them/O./O In/O Europe/LOCATION,/O a/O
rational/O system/O answers/O because/O the/O people/O are/O educated/O;/O it/O follows/O that/O
we/O must/O educate/O the/O people/O--/Othat/O's/O all/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O how/O are/O we/O to/O educate/O the/O people/O?/O''/O

``/OTo/O educate/O the/O people/O three/O things/O are/O needed/O:/O schools/O,/O and/O schools/O,/O
and/O schools/O./O

``/OBut/O you/O said/O yourself/O the/O people/O are/O at/O such/O a/O low/O stage/O of/O material/O
development/O:/O what/O help/O are/O schools/O for/O that/O?/O''/O

``/ODo/O you/O know/O,/O you/O remind/O me/O of/O the/O story/O of/O the/O advice/O given/O to/O the/O sick/O
man/O--/OYou/O should/O try/O purgative/O medicine/O./O Taken/O:/O worse/O./O Try/O leeches/O./O Tried/O
them/O:/O worse/O./O Well/O,/O then/O,/O there/O's/O nothing/O left/O but/O to/O pray/O to/O God/O./O Tried/O
it/O:/O worse/O./O That/O's/O just/O how/O it/O is/O with/O us/O./O I/O say/O political/O economy/O;/O you/O
say/O--/Oworse/O./O I/O say/O socialism/O:/O worse/O./O Education/O:/O worse/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O how/O do/O schools/O help/O matters/O?/O''/O

``/OThey/O give/O the/O peasant/O fresh/O wants/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O that/O's/O a/O thing/O I/O've/O never/O understood/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON replied/O with/O heat/O./O
``/OIn/O what/O way/O are/O schools/O going/O to/O help/O the/O people/O to/O improve/O their/O
material/O position/O?/O You/O say/O schools/O,/O education/O,/O will/O give/O them/O fresh/O
wants/O./O So/O much/O the/O worse/O,/O since/O they/O wo/On't/O be/O capable/O of/O satisfying/O
them/O./O And/O in/O what/O way/O a/O knowledge/O of/O addition/O and/O subtraction/O and/O the/O
catechism/O is/O going/O to/O improve/O their/O material/O condition/O,/O I/O never/O could/O
make/O out/O./O The/O day/O before/O yesterday/O,/O I/O met/O a/O peasant/O woman/O in/O the/O evening/O
with/O a/O little/O baby/O,/O and/O asked/O her/O where/O she/O was/O going/O./O She/O said/O she/O was/O
going/O to/O the/O wise/O woman/O;/O her/O boy/O had/O screaming/O fits/O,/O so/O she/O was/O taking/O
him/O to/O be/O doctored/O./O I/O asked/O,/O `/OWhy/O,/O how/O does/O the/O wise/O woman/O cure/O
screaming/O fits/O?/O'/O `/OShe/O puts/O the/O child/O on/O the/O hen-roost/O and/O repeats/O some/O
charm/O.../O'/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O're/O saying/O it/O yourself/O!/O What/O's/O wanted/O to/O prevent/O her/O taking/O
her/O child/O to/O the/O hen-roost/O to/O cure/O it/O of/O screaming/O fits/O is/O just/O.../O''/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON said/O,/O smiling/O good-humoredly/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON with/O annoyance/O;/O ``/Othat/O method/O of/O doctoring/O I/O merely/O
meant/O as/O a/O simile/O for/O doctoring/O the/O people/O with/O schools/O./O The/O people/O are/O
poor/O and/O ignorant/O--/Othat/O we/O see/O as/O surely/O as/O the/O peasant/O woman/O sees/O the/O
baby/O is/O ill/O because/O it/O screams/O./O But/O in/O what/O way/O this/O trouble/O of/O poverty/O
and/O ignorance/O is/O to/O be/O cured/O by/O schools/O is/O as/O incomprehensible/O as/O how/O
the/O hen-roost/O affects/O the/O screaming/O./O What/O has/O to/O be/O cured/O is/O what/O makes/O
him/O poor/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O in/O that/O,/O at/O least/O,/O you/O're/O in/O agreement/O with/O Spencer/PERSON,/O whom/O you/O
dislike/O so/O much/O./O He/O says/O,/O too/O,/O that/O education/O may/O be/O the/O consequence/O of/O
greater/O prosperity/O and/O comfort/O,/O of/O more/O frequent/O washing/O,/O as/O he/O says/O,/O
but/O not/O of/O being/O able/O to/O read/O and/O write/O.../O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O then/O,/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O--/Oor/O the/O contrary/O,/O very/O sorry/O,/O that/O I/O'm/O in/O
agreement/O with/O Spencer/ORGANIZATION;/O only/O I/O've/O known/O it/O a/O long/O while/O./O Schools/O can/O do/O
no/O good/O;/O what/O will/O do/O good/O is/O an/O economic/O organization/O in/O which/O the/O
people/O will/O become/O richer/O,/O will/O have/O more/O leisure/O--/Oand/O then/O there/O will/O be/O
schools/O./O''/O

``/OStill/O,/O all/O over/O Europe/LOCATION now/O schools/O are/O obligatory/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O how/O far/O do/O you/O agree/O with/O Spencer/PERSON yourself/O about/O it/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON./O

But/O there/O was/O a/O gleam/O of/O alarm/O in/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O eyes/O,/O and/O he/O said/O smiling/O:/O

``/ONo/O;/O that/O screaming/O story/O is/O positively/O capital/O!/O Did/O you/O really/O hear/O it/O
yourself/O?/O''/O

Levin/PERSON saw/O that/O he/O was/O not/O to/O discover/O the/O connection/O between/O this/O man/O's/O
life/O and/O his/O thoughts/O./O Obviously/O he/O did/O not/O care/O in/O the/O least/O what/O his/O
reasoning/O led/O him/O to/O;/O all/O he/O wanted/O was/O the/O process/O of/O reasoning/O./O And/O he/O
did/O not/O like/O it/O when/O the/O process/O of/O reasoning/O brought/O him/O into/O a/O blind/O
alley/O./O That/O was/O the/O only/O thing/O he/O disliked/O,/O and/O avoided/O by/O changing/O the/O
conversation/O to/O something/O agreeable/O and/O amusing/O./O

All/O the/O impressions/O of/O the/O day/O,/O beginning/O with/O the/O impression/O made/O by/O
the/O old/O peasant/O,/O which/O served/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O as/O the/O fundamental/O basis/O of/O
all/O the/O conceptions/O and/O ideas/O of/O the/O day/O,/O threw/O Levin/PERSON into/O violent/O
excitement/O./O This/O dear/O good/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O keeping/O a/O stock/O of/O ideas/O simply/O
for/O social/O purposes/O,/O and/O obviously/O having/O some/O other/O principles/O hidden/O
from/O Levin/PERSON,/O while/O with/O the/O crowd/O,/O whose/O name/O is/O legion/O,/O he/O guided/O public/O
opinion/O by/O ideas/O he/O did/O not/O share/O;/O that/O irascible/O country/O gentleman/O,/O
perfectly/O correct/O in/O the/O conclusions/O that/O he/O had/O been/O worried/O into/O by/O
life/O,/O but/O wrong/O in/O his/O exasperation/O against/O a/O whole/O class/O,/O and/O that/O the/O
best/O class/O in/O Russia/LOCATION;/O his/O own/O dissatisfaction/O with/O the/O work/O he/O had/O been/O
doing/O,/O and/O the/O vague/O hope/O of/O finding/O a/O remedy/O for/O all/O this/O--/Oall/O was/O
blended/O in/O a/O sense/O of/O inward/O turmoil/O,/O and/O anticipation/O of/O some/O solution/O
near/O at/O hand/O./O

Left/O alone/O in/O the/O room/O assigned/O him/O,/O lying/O on/O a/O spring/O mattress/O that/O
yielded/O unexpectedly/O at/O every/O movement/O of/O his/O arm/O or/O his/O leg/O,/O Levin/PERSON did/O
not/O fall/O asleep/O for/O a/O long/O while/O./O Not/O one/O conversation/O with/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O
though/O he/O had/O said/O a/O great/O deal/O that/O was/O clever/O,/O had/O interested/O Levin/PERSON;/O
but/O the/O conclusions/O of/O the/O irascible/O landowner/O required/O consideration/O./O
Levin/PERSON could/O not/O help/O recalling/O every/O word/O he/O had/O said/O,/O and/O in/O
imagination/O amending/O his/O own/O replies/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O ought/O to/O have/O said/O to/O him/O:/O You/O say/O that/O our/O husbandry/O does/O not/O
answer/O because/O the/O peasant/O hates/O improvements/O,/O and/O that/O they/O must/O be/O
forced/O on/O him/O by/O authority/O./O If/O no/O system/O of/O husbandry/O answered/O at/O all/O
without/O these/O improvements/O,/O you/O would/O be/O quite/O right/O./O But/O the/O only/O
system/O that/O does/O answer/O is/O where/O laborer/O is/O working/O in/O accordance/O with/O
his/O habits/O,/O just/O as/O on/O the/O old/O peasant/O's/O land/O half-way/O here/O./O Your/O and/O
our/O general/O dissatisfaction/O with/O the/O system/O shows/O that/O either/O we/O are/O to/O
blame/O or/O the/O laborers/O./O We/O have/O gone/O our/O way/O--/Othe/O European/O way/O--/Oa/O long/O
while/O,/O without/O asking/O ourselves/O about/O the/O qualities/O of/O our/O labor/O force/O./O
Let/O us/O try/O to/O look/O upon/O the/O labor/O force/O not/O as/O an/O abstract/O force/O,/O but/O as/O
the/O _/ORussian/O peasant/O_/O with/O his/O instincts/O,/O and/O we/O shall/O arrange/O our/O
system/O of/O culture/O in/O accordance/O with/O that/O./O Imagine/O,/O I/O ought/O to/O have/O said/O
to/O him/O,/O that/O you/O have/O the/O same/O system/O as/O the/O old/O peasant/O has/O,/O that/O you/O
have/O found/O means/O of/O making/O your/O laborers/O take/O an/O interest/O in/O the/O success/O
of/O the/O work/O,/O and/O have/O found/O the/O happy/O mean/O in/O the/O way/O of/O improvements/O
which/O they/O will/O admit/O,/O and/O you/O will/O,/O without/O exhausting/O the/O soil/O,/O get/O
twice/O or/O three/O times/O the/O yield/O you/O got/O before/O./O Divide/O it/O in/O halves/O,/O give/O
half/O as/O the/O share/O of/O labor/O,/O the/O surplus/O left/O you/O will/O be/O greater/O,/O and/O
the/O share/O of/O labor/O will/O be/O greater/O too/O./O And/O to/O do/O this/O one/O must/O lower/O
the/O standard/O of/O husbandry/O and/O interest/O the/O laborers/O in/O its/O success/O./O How/O
to/O do/O this/O?/O--/Othat/O's/O a/O matter/O of/O detail/O;/O but/O undoubtedly/O it/O can/O be/O done/O./O''/O

This/O idea/O threw/O Levin/PERSON into/O a/O great/O excitement/O./O He/O did/O not/O sleep/O half/O the/O
night/O,/O thinking/O over/O in/O detail/O the/O putting/O of/O his/O idea/O into/O practice/O./O He/O
had/O not/O intended/O to/O go/O away/O next/O day/O,/O but/O he/O now/O determined/O to/O go/O home/O
early/O in/O the/O morning/O./O Besides/O,/O the/O sister-in-law/O with/O her/O low-necked/O
bodice/O aroused/O in/O him/O a/O feeling/O akin/O to/O shame/O and/O remorse/O for/O some/O
utterly/O base/O action/O./O Most/O important/O of/O all/O--/Ohe/O must/O get/O back/O without/O
delay/O:/O he/O would/O have/O to/O make/O haste/O to/O put/O his/O new/O project/O to/O the/O
peasants/O before/O the/O sowing/O of/O the/O winter/O wheat/O,/O so/O that/O the/O sowing/O might/O
be/O undertaken/O on/O a/O new/O basis/O./O He/O had/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O to/O revolutionize/O
his/O whole/O system/O./O



Chapter/O 29/O


The/O carrying/O out/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O plan/O presented/O many/O difficulties/O;/O but/O he/O
struggled/O on/O,/O doing/O his/O utmost/O,/O and/O attained/O a/O result/O which/O,/O though/O not/O
what/O he/O desired/O,/O was/O enough/O to/O enable/O him/O,/O without/O self-deception/O,/O to/O
believe/O that/O the/O attempt/O was/O worth/O the/O trouble/O./O One/O of/O the/O chief/O
difficulties/O was/O that/O the/O process/O of/O cultivating/O the/O land/O was/O in/O full/O
swing/O,/O that/O it/O was/O impossible/O to/O stop/O everything/O and/O begin/O it/O all/O again/O
from/O the/O beginning/O,/O and/O the/O machine/O had/O to/O be/O mended/O while/O in/O motion/O./O

When/O on/O the/O evening/O that/O he/O arrived/O home/O he/O informed/O the/O bailiff/O of/O his/O
plans/O,/O the/O latter/O with/O visible/O pleasure/O agreed/O with/O what/O he/O said/O so/O long/O
as/O he/O was/O pointing/O out/O that/O all/O that/O had/O been/O done/O up/O to/O that/O time/O was/O
stupid/O and/O useless/O./O The/O bailiff/O said/O that/O he/O had/O said/O so/O a/O long/O while/O
ago/O,/O but/O no/O heed/O had/O been/O paid/O him/O./O But/O as/O for/O the/O proposal/O made/O by/O
Levin/PERSON--/Oto/O take/O a/O part/O as/O shareholder/O with/O his/O laborers/O in/O each/O
agricultural/O undertaking/O--/Oat/O this/O the/O bailiff/O simply/O expressed/O a/O profound/O
despondency/O,/O and/O offered/O no/O definite/O opinion/O,/O but/O began/O immediately/O
talking/O of/O the/O urgent/O necessity/O of/O carrying/O the/O remaining/O sheaves/O of/O rye/O
the/O next/O day/O,/O and/O of/O sending/O the/O men/O out/O for/O the/O second/O ploughing/O,/O so/O
that/O Levin/PERSON felt/O that/O this/O was/O not/O the/O time/O for/O discussing/O it/O./O

On/O beginning/O to/O talk/O to/O the/O peasants/O about/O it/O,/O and/O making/O a/O proposition/O
to/O cede/O them/O the/O land/O on/O new/O terms/O,/O he/O came/O into/O collision/O with/O the/O same/O
great/O difficulty/O that/O they/O were/O so/O much/O absorbed/O by/O the/O current/O work/O of/O
the/O day/O,/O that/O they/O had/O not/O time/O to/O consider/O the/O advantages/O and/O
disadvantages/O of/O the/O proposed/O scheme/O./O

The/O simple-hearted/O Ivan/PERSON,/O the/O cowherd/O,/O seemed/O completely/O to/O grasp/O Levin/PERSON's/O
proposal/O--/Othat/O he/O should/O with/O his/O family/O take/O a/O share/O of/O the/O profits/O of/O
the/O cattle-yard/O--/Oand/O he/O was/O in/O complete/O sympathy/O with/O the/O plan/O./O But/O when/O
Levin/PERSON hinted/O at/O the/O future/O advantages/O,/O Ivan/PERSON's/O face/O expressed/O alarm/O and/O
regret/O that/O he/O could/O not/O hear/O all/O he/O had/O to/O say/O,/O and/O he/O made/O haste/O to/O
find/O himself/O some/O task/O that/O would/O admit/O of/O no/O delay/O:/O he/O either/O snatched/O
up/O the/O fork/O to/O pitch/O the/O hay/O out/O of/O the/O pens/O,/O or/O ran/O to/O get/O water/O or/O to/O
clear/O out/O the/O dung/O./O

Another/O difficulty/O lay/O in/O the/O invincible/O disbelief/O of/O the/O peasant/O that/O a/O
landowner/O's/O object/O could/O be/O anything/O else/O than/O a/O desire/O to/O squeeze/O all/O
he/O could/O out/O of/O them/O./O They/O were/O firmly/O convinced/O that/O his/O real/O aim/O
-LRB-/Owhatever/O he/O might/O say/O to/O them/O-RRB-/O would/O always/O be/O in/O what/O he/O did/O not/O say/O
to/O them/O./O And/O they/O themselves/O,/O in/O giving/O their/O opinion/O,/O said/O a/O great/O deal/O
but/O never/O said/O what/O was/O their/O real/O object/O./O Moreover/O -LRB-/OLevin/PERSON felt/O that/O the/O
irascible/O landowner/O had/O been/O right/O-RRB-/O the/O peasants/O made/O their/O first/O and/O
unalterable/O condition/O of/O any/O agreement/O whatever/O that/O they/O should/O not/O be/O
forced/O to/O any/O new/O methods/O of/O tillage/O of/O any/O kind/O,/O nor/O to/O use/O new/O
implements/O./O They/O agreed/O that/O the/O modern/O plough/O ploughed/O better/O,/O that/O the/O
scarifier/O did/O the/O work/O more/O quickly/O,/O but/O they/O found/O thousands/O of/O reasons/O
that/O made/O it/O out/O of/O the/O question/O for/O them/O to/O use/O either/O of/O them/O;/O and/O
though/O he/O had/O accepted/O the/O conviction/O that/O he/O would/O have/O to/O lower/O the/O
standard/O of/O cultivation/O,/O he/O felt/O sorry/O to/O give/O up/O improved/O methods/O,/O the/O
advantages/O of/O which/O were/O so/O obvious/O./O But/O in/O spite/O of/O all/O these/O
difficulties/O he/O got/O his/O way/O,/O and/O by/O autumn/O the/O system/O was/O working/O,/O or/O at/O
least/O so/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O./O

At/O first/O Levin/PERSON had/O thought/O of/O giving/O up/O the/O whole/O farming/O of/O the/O land/O
just/O as/O it/O was/O to/O the/O peasants/O,/O the/O laborers/O,/O and/O the/O bailiff/O on/O new/O
conditions/O of/O partnership/O;/O but/O he/O was/O very/O soon/O convinced/O that/O this/O was/O
impossible/O,/O and/O determined/O to/O divide/O it/O up/O./O The/O cattle-yard/O,/O the/O garden/O,/O
hay/O fields/O,/O and/O arable/O land/O,/O divided/O into/O several/O parts/O,/O had/O to/O be/O made/O
into/O separate/O lots/O./O The/O simple-hearted/O cowherd/O,/O Ivan/PERSON,/O who/O,/O Levin/PERSON
fancied/O,/O understood/O the/O matter/O better/O than/O any/O of/O them/O,/O collecting/O
together/O a/O gang/O of/O workers/O to/O help/O him/O,/O principally/O of/O his/O own/O family/O,/O
became/O a/O partner/O in/O the/O cattle-yard/O./O A/O distant/O part/O of/O the/O estate/O,/O a/O
tract/O of/O waste/O land/O that/O had/O lain/O fallow/O for/O eight/O years/O,/O was/O with/O the/O
help/O of/O the/O clever/O carpenter/O,/O Fyodor/PERSON Ryezunov/PERSON,/O taken/O by/O six/O families/O of/O
peasants/O on/O new/O conditions/O of/O partnership/O,/O and/O the/O peasant/O Shuraev/PERSON took/O
the/O management/O of/O all/O the/O vegetable/O gardens/O on/O the/O same/O terms/O./O The/O
remainder/O of/O the/O land/O was/O still/O worked/O on/O the/O old/O system/O,/O but/O these/O
three/O associated/O partnerships/O were/O the/O first/O step/O to/O a/O new/O organization/O
of/O the/O whole/O,/O and/O they/O completely/O took/O up/O Levin/PERSON's/O time/O./O

It/O is/O true/O that/O in/O the/O cattle-yard/O things/O went/O no/O better/O than/O before/O,/O
and/O Ivan/PERSON strenuously/O opposed/O warm/O housing/O for/O the/O cows/O and/O butter/O made/O
of/O fresh/O cream/O,/O affirming/O that/O cows/O require/O less/O food/O if/O kept/O cold/O,/O and/O
that/O butter/O is/O more/O profitable/O made/O from/O sour/O cream/O,/O and/O he/O asked/O for/O
wages/O just/O as/O under/O the/O old/O system/O,/O and/O took/O not/O the/O slightest/O interest/O
in/O the/O fact/O that/O the/O money/O he/O received/O was/O not/O wages/O but/O an/O advance/O out/O
of/O his/O future/O share/O in/O the/O profits/O./O

It/O is/O true/O that/O Fyodor/PERSON Ryezunov/PERSON's/O company/O did/O not/O plough/O over/O the/O ground/O
twice/O before/O sowing/O,/O as/O had/O been/O agreed/O,/O justifying/O themselves/O on/O the/O
plea/O that/O the/O time/O was/O too/O short/O./O It/O is/O true/O that/O the/O peasants/O of/O the/O
same/O company/O,/O though/O they/O had/O agreed/O to/O work/O the/O land/O on/O new/O conditions/O,/O
always/O spoke/O of/O the/O land/O,/O not/O as/O held/O in/O partnership/O,/O but/O as/O rented/O for/O
half/O the/O crop/O,/O and/O more/O than/O once/O the/O peasants/O and/O Ryezunov/PERSON himself/O said/O
to/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/OIf/O you/O would/O take/O a/O rent/O for/O the/O land/O,/O it/O would/O save/O you/O
trouble/O,/O and/O we/O should/O be/O more/O free/O./O''/O Moreover/O the/O same/O peasants/O kept/O
putting/O off/O,/O on/O various/O excuses/O,/O the/O building/O of/O a/O cattleyard/O and/O barn/O
on/O the/O land/O as/O agreed/O upon/O,/O and/O delayed/O doing/O it/O till/O the/O winter/O./O

It/O is/O true/O that/O Shuraev/PERSON would/O have/O liked/O to/O let/O out/O the/O kitchen/O gardens/O
he/O had/O undertaken/O in/O small/O lots/O to/O the/O peasants/O./O He/O evidently/O quite/O
misunderstood/O,/O and/O apparently/O intentionally/O misunderstood/O,/O the/O
conditions/O upon/O which/O the/O land/O had/O been/O given/O to/O him/O./O

Often/O,/O too/O,/O talking/O to/O the/O peasants/O and/O explaining/O to/O them/O all/O the/O
advantages/O of/O the/O plan/O,/O Levin/PERSON felt/O that/O the/O peasants/O heard/O nothing/O but/O
the/O sound/O of/O his/O voice/O,/O and/O were/O firmly/O resolved/O,/O whatever/O he/O might/O say/O,/O
not/O to/O let/O themselves/O be/O taken/O in/O./O He/O felt/O this/O especially/O when/O he/O
talked/O to/O the/O cleverest/O of/O the/O peasants/O,/O Ryezunov/PERSON,/O and/O detected/O the/O
gleam/O in/O Ryezunov/PERSON's/O eyes/O which/O showed/O so/O plainly/O both/O ironical/O amusement/O
at/O Levin/LOCATION,/O and/O the/O firm/O conviction/O that/O,/O if/O any/O one/O were/O to/O be/O taken/O in/O,/O
it/O would/O not/O be/O he/O,/O Ryezunov/PERSON./O But/O in/O spite/O of/O all/O this/O Levin/PERSON thought/O the/O
system/O worked/O,/O and/O that/O by/O keeping/O accounts/O strictly/O and/O insisting/O on/O
his/O own/O way/O,/O he/O would/O prove/O to/O them/O in/O the/O future/O the/O advantages/O of/O the/O
arrangement/O,/O and/O then/O the/O system/O would/O go/O of/O itself/O./O

These/O matters/O,/O together/O with/O the/O management/O of/O the/O land/O still/O left/O on/O
his/O hands/O,/O and/O the/O indoor/O work/O over/O his/O book/O,/O so/O engrossed/O Levin/PERSON the/O
whole/O summer/O that/O he/O scarcely/O ever/O went/O out/O shooting/O./O At/O the/O end/O of/O
August/O he/O heard/O that/O the/O Oblonskys/PERSON had/O gone/O away/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O from/O their/O
servant/O who/O brought/O back/O the/O side-saddle/O./O He/O felt/O that/O in/O not/O answering/O
Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O letter/O he/O had/O by/O his/O rudeness/O,/O of/O which/O he/O could/O
not/O think/O without/O a/O flush/O of/O shame/O,/O burned/O his/O ships/O,/O and/O that/O he/O would/O
never/O go/O and/O see/O them/O again/O./O He/O had/O been/O just/O as/O rude/O with/O the/O
Sviazhskys/PERSON,/O leaving/O them/O without/O saying/O good-bye/O./O But/O he/O would/O never/O go/O
to/O see/O them/O again/O either/O./O He/O did/O not/O care/O about/O that/O now/O./O The/O business/O
of/O reorganizing/O the/O farming/O of/O his/O land/O absorbed/O him/O as/O completely/O as/O
though/O there/O would/O never/O be/O anything/O else/O in/O his/O life/O./O He/O read/O the/O books/O
lent/O him/O by/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O and/O copying/O out/O what/O he/O had/O not/O got/O,/O he/O read/O both/O
the/O economic/O and/O socialistic/O books/O on/O the/O subject/O,/O but/O,/O as/O he/O had/O
anticipated/O,/O found/O nothing/O bearing/O on/O the/O scheme/O he/O had/O undertaken/O./O In/O
the/O books/O on/O political/O economy/O--/Oin/O Mill/O,/O for/O instance/O,/O whom/O he/O studied/O
first/O with/O great/O ardor/O,/O hoping/O every/O minute/O to/O find/O an/O answer/O to/O the/O
questions/O that/O were/O engrossing/O him/O--/Ohe/O found/O laws/O deduced/O from/O the/O
condition/O of/O land/O culture/O in/O Europe/LOCATION;/O but/O he/O did/O not/O see/O why/O these/O laws/O,/O
which/O did/O not/O apply/O in/O Russia/LOCATION,/O must/O be/O general/O./O He/O saw/O just/O the/O same/O
thing/O in/O the/O socialistic/O books/O:/O either/O they/O were/O the/O beautiful/O but/O
impracticable/O fantasies/O which/O had/O fascinated/O him/O when/O he/O was/O a/O student/O,/O
or/O they/O were/O attempts/O at/O improving/O,/O rectifying/O the/O economic/O position/O in/O
which/O Europe/LOCATION was/O placed/O,/O with/O which/O the/O system/O of/O land/O tenure/O in/O Russia/LOCATION
had/O nothing/O in/O common/O./O Political/O economy/O told/O him/O that/O the/O laws/O by/O which/O
the/O wealth/O of/O Europe/LOCATION had/O been/O developed/O,/O and/O was/O developing/O,/O were/O
universal/O and/O unvarying/O./O Socialism/O told/O him/O that/O development/O along/O these/O
lines/O leads/O to/O ruin/O./O And/O neither/O of/O them/O gave/O an/O answer/O,/O or/O even/O a/O hint/O,/O
in/O reply/O to/O the/O question/O what/O he/O,/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O all/O the/O Russian/O peasants/O
and/O landowners/O,/O were/O to/O do/O with/O their/O millions/O of/O hands/O and/O millions/O of/O
acres/O,/O to/O make/O them/O as/O productive/O as/O possible/O for/O the/O common/O weal/O./O

Having/O once/O taken/O the/O subject/O up/O,/O he/O read/O conscientiously/O everything/O
bearing/O on/O it/O,/O and/O intended/O in/O the/O autumn/O to/O go/O abroad/O to/O study/O land/O
systems/O on/O the/O spot/O,/O in/O order/O that/O he/O might/O not/O on/O this/O question/O be/O
confronted/O with/O what/O so/O often/O met/O him/O on/O various/O subjects/O./O Often/O,/O just/O
as/O he/O was/O beginning/O to/O understand/O the/O idea/O in/O the/O mind/O of/O anyone/O he/O was/O
talking/O to/O,/O and/O was/O beginning/O to/O explain/O his/O own/O,/O he/O would/O suddenly/O be/O
told/O:/O ``/OBut/O Kauffmann/PERSON,/O but/O Jones/PERSON,/O but/O Dubois/PERSON,/O but/O Michelli/PERSON?/O You/O have/On't/O
read/O them/O:/O they/O've/O thrashed/O that/O question/O out/O thoroughly/O./O''/O

He/O saw/O now/O distinctly/O that/O Kauffmann/PERSON and/O Michelli/PERSON had/O nothing/O to/O tell/O
him/O./O He/O knew/O what/O he/O wanted/O./O He/O saw/O that/O Russia/LOCATION has/O splendid/O land/O,/O
splendid/O laborers/O,/O and/O that/O in/O certain/O cases/O,/O as/O at/O the/O peasant/O's/O on/O the/O
way/O to/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O,/O the/O produce/O raised/O by/O the/O laborers/O and/O the/O land/O is/O
great/O--/Oin/O the/O majority/O of/O cases/O when/O capital/O is/O applied/O in/O the/O European/O
way/O the/O produce/O is/O small/O,/O and/O that/O this/O simply/O arises/O from/O the/O fact/O that/O
the/O laborers/O want/O to/O work/O and/O work/O well/O only/O in/O their/O own/O peculiar/O way/O,/O
and/O that/O this/O antagonism/O is/O not/O incidental/O but/O invariable/O,/O and/O has/O its/O
roots/O in/O the/O national/O spirit/O./O He/O thought/O that/O the/O Russian/O people/O whose/O
task/O it/O was/O to/O colonize/O and/O cultivate/O vast/O tracts/O of/O unoccupied/O land/O,/O
consciously/O adhered/O,/O till/O all/O their/O land/O was/O occupied/O,/O to/O the/O methods/O
suitable/O to/O their/O purpose/O,/O and/O that/O their/O methods/O were/O by/O no/O means/O so/O
bad/O as/O was/O generally/O supposed/O./O And/O he/O wanted/O to/O prove/O this/O theoretically/O
in/O his/O book/O and/O practically/O on/O his/O land/O./O



Chapter/O 30/O


At/O the/O end/O of/O September/O the/O timber/O had/O been/O carted/O for/O building/O the/O
cattleyard/O on/O the/O land/O that/O had/O been/O allotted/O to/O the/O association/O of/O
peasants/O,/O and/O the/O butter/O from/O the/O cows/O was/O sold/O and/O the/O profits/O divided/O./O
In/O practice/O the/O system/O worked/O capitally/O,/O or/O,/O at/O least/O,/O so/O it/O seemed/O to/O
Levin/PERSON./O In/O order/O to/O work/O out/O the/O whole/O subject/O theoretically/O and/O to/O
complete/O his/O book/O,/O which/O,/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O daydreams/O,/O was/O not/O merely/O to/O effect/O
a/O revolution/O in/O political/O economy/O,/O but/O to/O annihilate/O that/O science/O
entirely/O and/O to/O lay/O the/O foundation/O of/O a/O new/O science/O of/O the/O relation/O of/O
the/O people/O to/O the/O soil/O,/O all/O that/O was/O left/O to/O do/O was/O to/O make/O a/O tour/O
abroad/O,/O and/O to/O study/O on/O the/O spot/O all/O that/O had/O been/O done/O in/O the/O same/O
direction/O,/O and/O to/O collect/O conclusive/O evidence/O that/O all/O that/O had/O been/O
done/O there/O was/O not/O what/O was/O wanted/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O only/O waiting/O for/O the/O
delivery/O of/O his/O wheat/O to/O receive/O the/O money/O for/O it/O and/O go/O abroad/O./O But/O the/O
rains/O began/O,/O preventing/O the/O harvesting/O of/O the/O corn/O and/O potatoes/O left/O in/O
the/O fields/O,/O and/O putting/O a/O stop/O to/O all/O work/O,/O even/O to/O the/O delivery/O of/O the/O
wheat/O./O

The/O mud/O was/O impassable/O along/O the/O roads/O;/O two/O mills/O were/O carried/O away/O,/O and/O
the/O weather/O got/O worse/O and/O worse/O./O

On/O the/O 30th/O of/O September/O the/O sun/O came/O out/O in/O the/O morning/O,/O and/O hoping/O for/O
fine/O weather/O,/O Levin/PERSON began/O making/O final/O preparations/O for/O his/O journey/O./O He/O
gave/O orders/O for/O the/O wheat/O to/O be/O delivered/O,/O sent/O the/O bailiff/O to/O the/O
merchant/O to/O get/O the/O money/O owing/O him/O,/O and/O went/O out/O himself/O to/O give/O some/O
final/O directions/O on/O the/O estate/O before/O setting/O off/O./O

Having/O finished/O all/O his/O business/O,/O soaked/O through/O with/O the/O streams/O of/O
water/O which/O kept/O running/O down/O the/O leather/O behind/O his/O neck/O and/O his/O
gaiters/O,/O but/O in/O the/O keenest/O and/O most/O confident/O temper/O,/O Levin/PERSON returned/O
homewards/O in/O the/O evening/O./O The/O weather/O had/O become/O worse/O than/O ever/O towards/O
evening/O;/O the/O hail/O lashed/O the/O drenched/O mare/O so/O cruelly/O that/O she/O went/O
along/O sideways/O,/O shaking/O her/O head/O and/O ears/O;/O but/O Levin/PERSON was/O all/O right/O under/O
his/O hood/O,/O and/O he/O looked/O cheerfully/O about/O him/O at/O the/O muddy/O streams/O
running/O under/O the/O wheels/O,/O at/O the/O drops/O hanging/O on/O every/O bare/O twig/O,/O at/O
the/O whiteness/O of/O the/O patch/O of/O unmelted/O hailstones/O on/O the/O planks/O of/O the/O
bridge/O,/O at/O the/O thick/O layer/O of/O still/O juicy/O,/O fleshy/O leaves/O that/O lay/O heaped/O
up/O about/O the/O stripped/O elm-tree/O./O In/O spite/O of/O the/O gloominess/O of/O nature/O
around/O him/O,/O he/O felt/O peculiarly/O eager/O./O The/O talks/O he/O had/O been/O having/O with/O
the/O peasants/O in/O the/O further/O village/O had/O shown/O that/O they/O were/O beginning/O
to/O get/O used/O to/O their/O new/O position/O./O The/O old/O servant/O to/O whose/O hut/O he/O had/O
gone/O to/O get/O dry/O evidently/O approved/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O plan/O,/O and/O of/O his/O own/O
accord/O proposed/O to/O enter/O the/O partnership/O by/O the/O purchase/O of/O cattle/O./O

``/OI/O have/O only/O to/O go/O stubbornly/O on/O towards/O my/O aim/O,/O and/O I/O shall/O attain/O my/O
end/O,/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON;/O ``/Oand/O it/O's/O something/O to/O work/O and/O take/O trouble/O for/O./O
This/O is/O not/O a/O matter/O of/O myself/O individually/O;/O the/O question/O of/O the/O public/O
welfare/O comes/O into/O it/O./O The/O whole/O system/O of/O culture/O,/O the/O chief/O element/O in/O
the/O condition/O of/O the/O people/O,/O must/O be/O completely/O transformed/O./O Instead/O of/O
poverty/O,/O general/O prosperity/O and/O content/O;/O instead/O of/O hostility/O,/O harmony/O
and/O unity/O of/O interests/O./O In/O short/O,/O a/O bloodless/O revolution/O,/O but/O a/O
revolution/O of/O the/O greatest/O magnitude/O,/O beginning/O in/O the/O little/O circle/O of/O
our/O district/O,/O then/O the/O province/O,/O then/O Russia/LOCATION,/O the/O whole/O world/O./O Because/O a/O
just/O idea/O can/Onot/O but/O be/O fruitful/O./O Yes/O,/O it/O's/O an/O aim/O worth/O working/O for/O./O
And/O its/O being/O me/O,/O Kostya/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O who/O went/O to/O a/O ball/O in/O a/O black/O tie/O,/O and/O
was/O refused/O by/O the/O Shtcherbatskaya/O girl/O,/O and/O who/O was/O intrinsically/O such/O
a/O pitiful/O,/O worthless/O creature/O--/Othat/O proves/O nothing/O;/O I/O feel/O sure/O Franklin/PERSON
felt/O just/O as/O worthless/O,/O and/O he/O too/O had/O no/O faith/O in/O himself/O,/O thinking/O of/O
himself/O as/O a/O whole/O./O That/O means/O nothing/O./O And/O he/O too/O,/O most/O likely/O,/O had/O an/O
Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON to/O whom/O he/O confided/O his/O secrets/O./O''/O

Musing/O on/O such/O thoughts/O Levin/PERSON reached/O home/O in/O the/O darkness/O./O

The/O bailiff/O,/O who/O had/O been/O to/O the/O merchant/O,/O had/O come/O back/O and/O brought/O
part/O of/O the/O money/O for/O the/O wheat/O./O An/O agreement/O had/O been/O made/O with/O the/O old/O
servant/O,/O and/O on/O the/O road/O the/O bailiff/O had/O learned/O that/O everywhere/O the/O
corn/O was/O still/O standing/O in/O the/O fields/O,/O so/O that/O his/O one/O hundred/O and/O sixty/O
shocks/O that/O had/O not/O been/O carried/O were/O nothing/O in/O comparison/O with/O the/O
losses/O of/O others/O./O

After/O dinner/O Levin/PERSON was/O sitting/O,/O as/O he/O usually/O did/O,/O in/O an/O easy/O chair/O with/O
a/O book/O,/O and/O as/O he/O read/O he/O went/O on/O thinking/O of/O the/O journey/O before/O him/O in/O
connection/O with/O his/O book/O./O Today/O all/O the/O significance/O of/O his/O book/O rose/O
before/O him/O with/O special/O distinctness/O,/O and/O whole/O periods/O ranged/O
themselves/O in/O his/O mind/O in/O illustration/O of/O his/O theories/O./O ``/OI/O must/O write/O
that/O down/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O ``/OThat/O ought/O to/O form/O a/O brief/O introduction/O,/O which/O
I/O thought/O unnecessary/O before/O./O''/O He/O got/O up/O to/O go/O to/O his/O writing/O table/O,/O and/O
Laska/PERSON,/O lying/O at/O his/O feet/O,/O got/O up/O too/O,/O stretching/O and/O looking/O at/O him/O as/O
though/O to/O inquire/O where/O to/O go/O./O But/O he/O had/O not/O time/O to/O write/O it/O down/O,/O for/O
the/O head/O peasants/O had/O come/O round/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON went/O out/O into/O the/O hall/O to/O
them/O./O

After/O his/O levee/O,/O that/O is/O to/O say/O,/O giving/O directions/O about/O the/O labors/O of/O
the/O next/O day/O,/O and/O seeing/O all/O the/O peasants/O who/O had/O business/O with/O him/O,/O
Levin/PERSON went/O back/O to/O his/O study/O and/O sat/O down/O to/O work/O./O

Laska/PERSON lay/O under/O the/O table/O;/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON settled/O herself/O in/O her/O place/O
with/O her/O stocking/O./O
