After/O writing/O for/O a/O little/O while/O,/O Levin/PERSON suddenly/O thought/O with/O
exceptional/O vividness/O of/O Kitty/PERSON,/O her/O refusal/O,/O and/O their/O last/O meeting/O./O He/O
got/O up/O and/O began/O walking/O about/O the/O room/O./O

``/OWhat/O's/O the/O use/O of/O being/O dreary/O?/O''/O said/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON./O ``/OCome/O,/O why/O do/O
you/O stay/O on/O at/O home/O?/O You/O ought/O to/O go/O to/O some/O warm/O springs/O,/O especially/O
now/O you/O're/O ready/O for/O the/O journey/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O am/O going/O away/O the/O day/O after/O tomorrow/O,/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON;/O I/O must/O
finish/O my/O work/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O,/O there/O,/O your/O work/O,/O you/O say/O!/O As/O if/O you/O had/On't/O done/O enough/O for/O the/O
peasants/O!/O Why/O,/O as/O '/Otis/O,/O they/O're/O saying/O,/O `/OYour/O master/O will/O be/O getting/O
some/O honor/O from/O the/O Tsar/O for/O it/O./O'/O Indeed/O and/O it/O is/O a/O strange/O thing/O;/O why/O
need/O you/O worry/O about/O the/O peasants/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O worrying/O about/O them/O;/O I/O'm/O doing/O it/O for/O my/O own/O good/O./O''/O

Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON knew/O every/O detail/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O plans/O for/O his/O land/O./O Levin/PERSON
often/O put/O his/O views/O before/O her/O in/O all/O their/O complexity/O,/O and/O not/O
uncommonly/O he/O argued/O with/O her/O and/O did/O not/O agree/O with/O her/O comments/O./O But/O
on/O this/O occasion/O she/O entirely/O misinterpreted/O what/O he/O had/O said/O./O

``/OOf/O one/O's/O soul/O's/O salvation/O we/O all/O know/O and/O must/O think/O before/O all/O else/O,/O''/O
she/O said/O with/O a/O sigh/O./O ``/OParfen/PERSON Denisitch/PERSON now/O,/O for/O all/O he/O was/O no/O scholar/O,/O
he/O died/O a/O death/O that/O God/O grant/O every/O one/O of/O us/O the/O like/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
referring/O to/O a/O servant/O who/O had/O died/O recently/O./O ``/OTook/O the/O sacrament/O and/O
all/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O not/O what/O I/O mean/O,/O''/O said/O he/O./O ``/OI/O mean/O that/O I/O'm/O acting/O for/O my/O own/O
advantage/O./O It/O's/O all/O the/O better/O for/O me/O if/O the/O peasants/O do/O their/O work/O
better/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O whatever/O you/O do/O,/O if/O he/O's/O a/O lazy/O good-for-nought/O,/O everything/O'll/O be/O
at/O sixes/O and/O sevens/O./O If/O he/O has/O a/O conscience/O,/O he/O'll/O work/O,/O and/O if/O not/O,/O
there/O's/O no/O doing/O anything/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O come/O,/O you/O say/O yourself/O Ivan/PERSON has/O begun/O looking/O after/O the/O cattle/O
better/O./O''/O

``/OAll/O I/O say/O is/O,/O''/O answered/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O evidently/O not/O speaking/O at/O
random/O,/O but/O in/O strict/O sequence/O of/O idea/O,/O ``/Othat/O you/O ought/O to/O get/O married/O,/O
that/O's/O what/O I/O say/O./O''/O

Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON's/O allusion/O to/O the/O very/O subject/O he/O had/O only/O just/O been/O
thinking/O about/O,/O hurt/O and/O stung/O him/O./O Levin/PERSON scowled/O,/O and/O without/O answering/O
her/O,/O he/O sat/O down/O again/O to/O his/O work/O,/O repeating/O to/O himself/O all/O that/O he/O had/O
been/O thinking/O of/O the/O real/O significance/O of/O that/O work/O./O Only/O at/O intervals/O
he/O listened/O in/O the/O stillness/O to/O the/O click/O of/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON's/O needles/O,/O
and/O recollecting/O what/O he/O did/O not/O want/O to/O remember/O,/O he/O frowned/O again/O./O

At/O nine/O o'clock/O they/O heard/O the/O bell/O and/O the/O faint/O vibration/O of/O a/O
carriage/O over/O the/O mud/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O here/O's/O visitors/O come/O to/O us/O,/O and/O you/O wo/On't/O be/O dull/O,/O''/O said/O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O and/O going/O to/O the/O door/O./O But/O Levin/PERSON overtook/O her/O./O His/O
work/O was/O not/O going/O well/O now/O,/O and/O he/O was/O glad/O of/O a/O visitor/O,/O whoever/O it/O
might/O be/O./O



Chapter/O 31/O


Running/O halfway/O down/O the/O staircase/O,/O Levin/PERSON caught/O a/O sound/O he/O knew/O,/O a/O
familiar/O cough/O in/O the/O hall/O./O But/O he/O heard/O it/O indistinctly/O through/O the/O
sound/O of/O his/O own/O footsteps/O,/O and/O hoped/O he/O was/O mistaken/O./O Then/O he/O caught/O
sight/O of/O a/O long/O,/O bony/O,/O familiar/O figure/O,/O and/O now/O it/O seemed/O there/O was/O no/O
possibility/O of/O mistake/O;/O and/O yet/O he/O still/O went/O on/O hoping/O that/O this/O tall/O
man/O taking/O off/O his/O fur/O cloak/O and/O coughing/O was/O not/O his/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON./O

Levin/PERSON loved/O his/O brother/O,/O but/O being/O with/O him/O was/O always/O a/O torture/O./O Just/O
now/O,/O when/O Levin/PERSON,/O under/O the/O influence/O of/O the/O thoughts/O that/O had/O come/O to/O
him/O,/O and/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON's/O hint/O,/O was/O in/O a/O troubled/O and/O uncertain/O humor/O,/O
the/O meeting/O with/O his/O brother/O that/O he/O had/O to/O face/O seemed/O particularly/O
difficult/O./O Instead/O of/O a/O lively/O,/O healthy/O visitor/O,/O some/O outsider/O who/O
would/O,/O he/O hoped/O,/O cheer/O him/O up/O in/O his/O uncertain/O humor/O,/O he/O had/O to/O see/O his/O
brother/O,/O who/O knew/O him/O through/O and/O through/O,/O who/O would/O call/O forth/O all/O the/O
thoughts/O nearest/O his/O heart/O,/O would/O force/O him/O to/O show/O himself/O fully/O./O And/O
that/O he/O was/O not/O disposed/O to/O do/O./O

Angry/O with/O himself/O for/O so/O base/O a/O feeling/O,/O Levin/PERSON ran/O into/O the/O hall/O;/O as/O
soon/O as/O he/O had/O seen/O his/O brother/O close/O,/O this/O feeling/O of/O selfish/O
disappointment/O vanished/O instantly/O and/O was/O replaced/O by/O pity/O./O Terrible/O as/O
his/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON had/O been/O before/O in/O his/O emaciation/O and/O sickliness/O,/O
now/O he/O looked/O still/O more/O emaciated/O,/O still/O more/O wasted/O./O He/O was/O a/O skeleton/O
covered/O with/O skin/O./O

He/O stood/O in/O the/O hall/O,/O jerking/O his/O long/O thin/O neck/O,/O and/O pulling/O the/O scarf/O
off/O it/O,/O and/O smiled/O a/O strange/O and/O pitiful/O smile/O./O When/O he/O saw/O that/O smile/O,/O
submissive/O and/O humble/O,/O Levin/PERSON felt/O something/O clutching/O at/O his/O throat/O./O

``/OYou/O see/O,/O I/O've/O come/O to/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Nikolay/PERSON in/O a/O thick/O voice/O,/O never/O for/O
one/O second/O taking/O his/O eyes/O off/O his/O brother/O's/O face/O./O ``/OI/O've/O been/O meaning/O to/O
a/O long/O while/O,/O but/O I/O've/O been/O unwell/O all/O the/O time/O./O Now/O I/O'm/O ever/O so/O much/O
better/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O rubbing/O his/O beard/O with/O his/O big/O thin/O hands/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O!/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON./O And/O he/O felt/O still/O more/O frightened/O when/O,/O
kissing/O him/O,/O he/O felt/O with/O his/O lips/O the/O dryness/O of/O his/O brother/O's/O skin/O and/O
saw/O close/O to/O him/O his/O big/O eyes/O,/O full/O of/O a/O strange/O light/O./O

A/O few/O weeks/O before/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON had/O written/O to/O his/O brother/O that/O
through/O the/O sale/O of/O the/O small/O part/O of/O the/O property/O,/O that/O had/O remained/O
undivided/O,/O there/O was/O a/O sum/O of/O about/O two/O thousand/O roubles/O to/O come/O to/O him/O
as/O his/O share/O./O

Nikolay/PERSON said/O that/O he/O had/O come/O now/O to/O take/O this/O money/O and/O,/O what/O was/O more/O
important/O,/O to/O stay/O a/O while/O in/O the/O old/O nest/O,/O to/O get/O in/O touch/O with/O the/O
earth/O,/O so/O as/O to/O renew/O his/O strength/O like/O the/O heroes/O of/O old/O for/O the/O work/O
that/O lay/O before/O him/O./O In/O spite/O of/O his/O exaggerated/O stoop/O,/O and/O the/O
emaciation/O that/O was/O so/O striking/O from/O his/O height/O,/O his/O movements/O were/O as/O
rapid/O and/O abrupt/O as/O ever/O./O Levin/PERSON led/O him/O into/O his/O study/O./O

His/O brother/O dressed/O with/O particular/O care/O--/Oa/O thing/O he/O never/O used/O to/O
do/O--/Ocombed/O his/O scanty/O,/O lank/O hair/O,/O and/O,/O smiling/O,/O went/O upstairs/O./O

He/O was/O in/O the/O most/O affectionate/O and/O good-humored/O mood/O,/O just/O as/O Levin/PERSON
often/O remembered/O him/O in/O childhood/O./O He/O even/O referred/O to/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
without/O rancor/O./O When/O he/O saw/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O he/O made/O jokes/O with/O her/O and/O
asked/O after/O the/O old/O servants/O./O The/O news/O of/O the/O death/O of/O Parfen/PERSON Denisitch/PERSON
made/O a/O painful/O impression/O on/O him/O./O A/O look/O of/O fear/O crossed/O his/O face/O,/O but/O
he/O regained/O his/O serenity/O immediately/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O he/O was/O quite/O old/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O changed/O the/O subject/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O
I/O'll/O spend/O a/O month/O or/O two/O with/O you/O,/O and/O then/O I/O'm/O off/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION./O Do/O you/O
know/O,/O Myakov/PERSON has/O promised/O me/O a/O place/O there/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O going/O into/O the/O
service/O./O Now/O I/O'm/O going/O to/O arrange/O my/O life/O quite/O differently/O,/O''/O he/O went/O
on/O./O ``/OYou/O know/O I/O got/O rid/O of/O that/O woman/O./O''/O

``/OMarya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON?/O Why/O,/O what/O for/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O she/O was/O a/O horrid/O woman/O!/O She/O caused/O me/O all/O sorts/O of/O worries/O./O''/O But/O he/O
did/O not/O say/O what/O the/O annoyances/O were/O./O He/O could/O not/O say/O that/O he/O had/O cast/O
off/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON because/O the/O tea/O was/O weak/O,/O and/O,/O above/O all/O,/O because/O
she/O would/O look/O after/O him/O,/O as/O though/O he/O were/O an/O invalid/O./O

``/OBesides/O,/O I/O want/O to/O turn/O over/O a/O new/O leaf/O completely/O now/O./O I/O've/O done/O silly/O
things/O,/O of/O course/O,/O like/O everyone/O else/O,/O but/O money/O's/O the/O last/O
consideration/O;/O I/O do/On't/O regret/O it/O./O So/O long/O as/O there/O's/O health/O,/O and/O my/O
health/O,/O thank/O God/O,/O is/O quite/O restored/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON listened/O and/O racked/O his/O brains/O,/O but/O could/O think/O of/O nothing/O to/O say/O./O
Nikolay/PERSON probably/O felt/O the/O same/O;/O he/O began/O questioning/O his/O brother/O about/O
his/O affairs/O;/O and/O Levin/PERSON was/O glad/O to/O talk/O about/O himself/O,/O because/O then/O he/O
could/O speak/O without/O hypocrisy/O./O He/O told/O his/O brother/O of/O his/O plans/O and/O his/O
doings/O./O

His/O brother/O listened/O,/O but/O evidently/O he/O was/O not/O interested/O by/O it/O./O

These/O two/O men/O were/O so/O akin/O,/O so/O near/O each/O other/O,/O that/O the/O slightest/O
gesture/O,/O the/O tone/O of/O voice/O,/O told/O both/O more/O than/O could/O be/O said/O in/O words/O./O

Both/O of/O them/O now/O had/O only/O one/O thought/O--/Othe/O illness/O of/O Nikolay/PERSON and/O the/O
nearness/O of/O his/O death/O--/Owhich/O stifled/O all/O else/O./O But/O neither/O of/O them/O dared/O
to/O speak/O of/O it/O,/O and/O so/O whatever/O they/O said/O--/Onot/O uttering/O the/O one/O thought/O
that/O filled/O their/O minds/O--/Owas/O all/O falsehood/O./O Never/O had/O Levin/PERSON been/O so/O glad/O
when/O the/O evening/O was/O over/O and/O it/O was/O time/O to/O go/O to/O bed/O./O Never/O with/O any/O
outside/O person/O,/O never/O on/O any/O official/O visit/O had/O he/O been/O so/O unnatural/O and/O
false/O as/O he/O was/O that/O evening/O./O And/O the/O consciousness/O of/O this/O
unnaturalness/O,/O and/O the/O remorse/O he/O felt/O at/O it/O,/O made/O him/O even/O more/O
unnatural/O./O He/O wanted/O to/O weep/O over/O his/O dying/O,/O dearly/O loved/O brother/O,/O and/O
he/O had/O to/O listen/O and/O keep/O on/O talking/O of/O how/O he/O meant/O to/O live/O./O

As/O the/O house/O was/O damp/O,/O and/O only/O one/O bedroom/O had/O been/O kept/O heated/O,/O Levin/PERSON
put/O his/O brother/O to/O sleep/O in/O his/O own/O bedroom/O behind/O a/O screen/O./O

His/O brother/O got/O into/O bed/O,/O and/O whether/O he/O slept/O or/O did/O not/O sleep/O,/O tossed/O
about/O like/O a/O sick/O man/O,/O coughed/O,/O and/O when/O he/O could/O not/O get/O his/O throat/O
clear/O,/O mumbled/O something/O./O Sometimes/O when/O his/O breathing/O was/O painful/O,/O he/O
said/O,/O ``/OOh/O,/O my/O God/O!/O''/O Sometimes/O when/O he/O was/O choking/O he/O muttered/O angrily/O,/O
``/OAh/O,/O the/O devil/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O sleep/O for/O a/O long/O while/O,/O hearing/O him/O./O
His/O thoughts/O were/O of/O the/O most/O various/O,/O but/O the/O end/O of/O all/O his/O thoughts/O
was/O the/O same/O--/Odeath/O./O Death/O,/O the/O inevitable/O end/O of/O all/O,/O for/O the/O first/O time/O
presented/O itself/O to/O him/O with/O irresistible/O force/O./O And/O death/O,/O which/O was/O
here/O in/O this/O loved/O brother/O,/O groaning/O half/O asleep/O and/O from/O habit/O calling/O
without/O distinction/O on/O God/O and/O the/O devil/O,/O was/O not/O so/O remote/O as/O it/O had/O
hitherto/O seemed/O to/O him/O./O It/O was/O in/O himself/O too/O,/O he/O felt/O that/O./O If/O not/O
today/O,/O tomorrow/O,/O if/O not/O tomorrow/O,/O in/O thirty/O years/O,/O was/On't/O it/O all/O the/O
same/O!/O And/O what/O was/O this/O inevitable/O death/O--/Ohe/O did/O not/O know/O,/O had/O never/O
thought/O about/O it/O,/O and/O what/O was/O more/O,/O had/O not/O the/O power/O,/O had/O not/O the/O
courage/O to/O think/O about/O it/O./O

``/OI/O work/O,/O I/O want/O to/O do/O something/O,/O but/O I/O had/O forgotten/O it/O must/O all/O end/O;/O I/O
had/O forgotten/O--/Odeath/O./O''/O

He/O sat/O on/O his/O bed/O in/O the/O darkness/O,/O crouched/O up/O,/O hugging/O his/O knees/O,/O and/O
holding/O his/O breath/O from/O the/O strain/O of/O thought/O,/O he/O pondered/O./O But/O the/O more/O
intensely/O he/O thought/O,/O the/O clearer/O it/O became/O to/O him/O that/O it/O was/O
indubitably/O so/O,/O that/O in/O reality/O,/O looking/O upon/O life/O,/O he/O had/O forgotten/O one/O
little/O fact/O--/Othat/O death/O will/O come/O,/O and/O all/O ends/O;/O that/O nothing/O was/O even/O
worth/O beginning/O,/O and/O that/O there/O was/O no/O helping/O it/O anyway/O./O Yes/O,/O it/O was/O
awful/O,/O but/O it/O was/O so/O./O

``/OBut/O I/O am/O alive/O still/O./O Now/O what/O's/O to/O be/O done/O?/O what/O's/O to/O be/O done/O?/O''/O he/O
said/O in/O despair/O./O He/O lighted/O a/O candle/O,/O got/O up/O cautiously/O and/O went/O to/O the/O
looking-glass/O,/O and/O began/O looking/O at/O his/O face/O and/O hair/O./O Yes/O,/O there/O were/O
gray/O hairs/O about/O his/O temples/O./O He/O opened/O his/O mouth/O./O His/O back/O teeth/O were/O
beginning/O to/O decay/O./O He/O bared/O his/O muscular/O arms/O./O Yes/O,/O there/O was/O strength/O
in/O them/O./O But/O Nikolay/PERSON,/O who/O lay/O there/O breathing/O with/O what/O was/O left/O of/O
lungs/O,/O had/O had/O a/O strong/O,/O healthy/O body/O too/O./O And/O suddenly/O he/O recalled/O how/O
they/O used/O to/O go/O to/O bed/O together/O as/O children/O,/O and/O how/O they/O only/O waited/O
till/O Fyodor/PERSON Bogdanitch/PERSON was/O out/O of/O the/O room/O to/O fling/O pillows/O at/O each/O
other/O and/O laugh/O,/O laugh/O irrepressibly/O,/O so/O that/O even/O their/O awe/O of/O Fyodor/PERSON
Bogdanitch/PERSON could/O not/O check/O the/O effervescing/O,/O overbrimming/O sense/O of/O life/O
and/O happiness/O./O ``/OAnd/O now/O that/O bent/O,/O hollow/O chest/O .../O and/O I/O,/O not/O knowing/O
what/O will/O become/O of/O me/O,/O or/O wherefore/O.../O''/O

``/OK./O./O./Oha/O!/O K./O./O./Oha/O!/O Damnation/O!/O Why/O do/O you/O keep/O fidgeting/O,/O why/O do/On't/O you/O go/O
to/O sleep/O?/O''/O his/O brother/O's/O voice/O called/O to/O him/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O do/On't/O know/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O sleepy/O./O''/O

``/OI/O have/O had/O a/O good/O sleep/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O in/O a/O sweat/O now/O./O Just/O see/O,/O feel/O my/O
shirt/O;/O it/O's/O not/O wet/O,/O is/O it/O?/O''/O

Levin/PERSON felt/O,/O withdrew/O behind/O the/O screen/O,/O and/O put/O out/O the/O candle/O,/O but/O for/O
a/O long/O while/O he/O could/O not/O sleep/O./O The/O question/O how/O to/O live/O had/O hardly/O
begun/O to/O grow/O a/O little/O clearer/O to/O him/O,/O when/O a/O new/O,/O insoluble/O question/O
presented/O itself/O--/Odeath/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O he/O's/O dying/O--/Oyes/O,/O he/O'll/O die/O in/O the/O spring/O,/O and/O how/O help/O him/O?/O What/O
can/O I/O say/O to/O him/O?/O What/O do/O I/O know/O about/O it/O?/O I/O'd/O even/O forgotten/O that/O it/O
was/O at/O all/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 32/O


Levin/PERSON had/O long/O before/O made/O the/O observation/O that/O when/O one/O is/O
uncomfortable/O with/O people/O from/O their/O being/O excessively/O amenable/O and/O
meek/O,/O one/O is/O apt/O very/O soon/O after/O to/O find/O things/O intolerable/O from/O their/O
touchiness/O and/O irritability/O./O He/O felt/O that/O this/O was/O how/O it/O would/O be/O with/O
his/O brother/O./O And/O his/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON's/O gentleness/O did/O in/O fact/O not/O last/O
out/O for/O long/O./O The/O very/O next/O morning/O he/O began/O to/O be/O irritable/O,/O and/O seemed/O
doing/O his/O best/O to/O find/O fault/O with/O his/O brother/O,/O attacking/O him/O on/O his/O
tenderest/O points/O./O

Levin/PERSON felt/O himself/O to/O blame/O,/O and/O could/O not/O set/O things/O right/O./O He/O felt/O
that/O if/O they/O had/O both/O not/O kept/O up/O appearances/O,/O but/O had/O spoken/O,/O as/O it/O is/O
called/O,/O from/O the/O heart/O--/Othat/O is/O to/O say/O,/O had/O said/O only/O just/O what/O they/O were/O
thinking/O and/O feeling/O--/Othey/O would/O simply/O have/O looked/O into/O each/O other/O's/O
faces/O,/O and/O Konstantin/PERSON could/O only/O have/O said/O,/O ``/OYou/O're/O dying/O,/O you/O're/O
dying/O!/O''/O and/O Nikolay/PERSON could/O only/O have/O answered/O,/O ``/OI/O know/O I/O'm/O dying/O,/O but/O I/O'm/O
afraid/O,/O I/O'm/O afraid/O,/O I/O'm/O afraid/O!/O''/O And/O they/O could/O have/O said/O nothing/O more/O,/O
if/O they/O had/O said/O only/O what/O was/O in/O their/O hearts/O./O But/O life/O like/O that/O was/O
impossible/O,/O and/O so/O Konstantin/PERSON tried/O to/O do/O what/O he/O had/O been/O trying/O to/O do/O
all/O his/O life/O,/O and/O never/O could/O learn/O to/O do/O,/O though/O,/O as/O far/O as/O he/O could/O
observe/O,/O many/O people/O knew/O so/O well/O how/O to/O do/O it/O,/O and/O without/O it/O there/O was/O
no/O living/O at/O all/O./O He/O tried/O to/O say/O what/O he/O was/O not/O thinking/O,/O but/O he/O felt/O
continually/O that/O it/O had/O a/O ring/O of/O falsehood/O,/O that/O his/O brother/O detected/O
him/O in/O it/O,/O and/O was/O exasperated/O at/O it/O./O

The/O third/O day/O Nikolay/PERSON induced/O his/O brother/O to/O explain/O his/O plan/O to/O him/O
again/O,/O and/O began/O not/O merely/O attacking/O it/O,/O but/O intentionally/O confounding/O
it/O with/O communism/O./O

``/OYou/O've/O simply/O borrowed/O an/O idea/O that/O's/O not/O your/O own/O,/O but/O you/O've/O
distorted/O it/O,/O and/O are/O trying/O to/O apply/O it/O where/O it/O's/O not/O applicable/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O tell/O you/O it/O's/O nothing/O to/O do/O with/O it/O./O They/O deny/O the/O justice/O of/O
property/O,/O of/O capital/O,/O of/O inheritance/O,/O while/O I/O do/O not/O deny/O this/O chief/O
stimulus/O./O''/O -LRB-/OLevin/PERSON felt/O disgusted/O himself/O at/O using/O such/O expressions/O,/O but/O
ever/O since/O he/O had/O been/O engrossed/O by/O his/O work/O,/O he/O had/O unconsciously/O come/O
more/O and/O more/O frequently/O to/O use/O words/O not/O Russian/O./O-RRB-/O ``/OAll/O I/O want/O is/O to/O
regulate/O labor/O./O''/O

``/OWhich/O means/O,/O you/O've/O borrowed/O an/O idea/O,/O stripped/O it/O of/O all/O that/O gave/O it/O
its/O force/O,/O and/O want/O to/O make/O believe/O that/O it/O's/O something/O new/O,/O''/O said/O
Nikolay/PERSON,/O angrily/O tugging/O at/O his/O necktie/O./O

``/OBut/O my/O idea/O has/O nothing/O in/O common/O.../O''/O

``/OThat/O,/O anyway/O,/O''/O said/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O with/O an/O ironical/O smile/O,/O his/O eyes/O
flashing/O malignantly/O,/O ``/Ohas/O the/O charm/O of/O--/Owhat/O's/O one/O to/O call/O
it/O?/O--/Ogeometrical/O symmetry/O,/O of/O clearness/O,/O of/O definiteness/O./O It/O may/O be/O a/O
Utopia/O./O But/O if/O once/O one/O allows/O the/O possibility/O of/O making/O of/O all/O the/O past/O
a/O _/Otabula/O rasa/O_/O--/Ono/O property/O,/O no/O family/O--/Othen/O labor/O would/O organize/O itself/O./O
But/O you/O gain/O nothing/O.../O''/O

``/OWhy/O do/O you/O mix/O things/O up/O?/O I/O've/O never/O been/O a/O communist/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O have/O,/O and/O I/O consider/O it/O's/O premature/O,/O but/O rational/O,/O and/O it/O has/O a/O
future/O,/O just/O like/O Christianity/O in/O its/O first/O ages/O./O''/O

``/OAll/O that/O I/O maintain/O is/O that/O the/O labor/O force/O ought/O to/O be/O investigated/O
from/O the/O point/O of/O view/O of/O natural/O science/O;/O that/O is/O to/O say/O,/O it/O ought/O to/O
be/O studied/O,/O its/O qualities/O ascertained/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O that/O's/O utter/O waste/O of/O time/O./O That/O force/O finds/O a/O certain/O form/O of/O
activity/O of/O itself/O,/O according/O to/O the/O stage/O of/O its/O development/O./O There/O
have/O been/O slaves/O first/O everywhere/O,/O then/O metayers/O;/O and/O we/O have/O the/O
half-crop/O system/O,/O rent/O,/O and/O day/O laborers/O./O What/O are/O you/O trying/O to/O find/O?/O''/O

Levin/PERSON suddenly/O lost/O his/O temper/O at/O these/O words/O,/O because/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O
his/O heart/O he/O was/O afraid/O that/O it/O was/O true/O--/Otrue/O that/O he/O was/O trying/O to/O hold/O
the/O balance/O even/O between/O communism/O and/O the/O familiar/O forms/O,/O and/O that/O this/O
was/O hardly/O possible/O./O

``/OI/O am/O trying/O to/O find/O means/O of/O working/O productively/O for/O myself/O and/O for/O
the/O laborers/O./O I/O want/O to/O organize/O.../O''/O he/O answered/O hotly/O./O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O want/O to/O organize/O anything/O;/O it/O's/O simply/O just/O as/O you/O've/O been/O
all/O your/O life/O,/O that/O you/O want/O to/O be/O original/O to/O pose/O as/O not/O exploiting/O
the/O peasants/O simply/O,/O but/O with/O some/O idea/O in/O view/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O all/O right/O,/O that/O's/O what/O you/O think/O--/Oand/O let/O me/O alone/O!/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O
feeling/O the/O muscles/O of/O his/O left/O cheek/O twitching/O uncontrollably/O./O

``/OYou/O've/O never/O had/O,/O and/O never/O have/O,/O convictions/O;/O all/O you/O want/O is/O to/O
please/O your/O vanity/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O very/O well/O;/O then/O let/O me/O alone/O!/O''/O

``/OAnd/O I/O will/O let/O you/O alone/O!/O and/O it/O's/O high/O time/O I/O did/O,/O and/O go/O to/O the/O devil/O
with/O you/O!/O and/O I/O'm/O very/O sorry/O I/O ever/O came/O!/O''/O

In/O spite/O of/O all/O Levin/PERSON's/O efforts/O to/O soothe/O his/O brother/O afterwards/O,/O
Nikolay/PERSON would/O listen/O to/O nothing/O he/O said/O,/O declaring/O that/O it/O was/O better/O to/O
part/O,/O and/O Konstantin/PERSON saw/O that/O it/O simply/O was/O that/O life/O was/O unbearable/O to/O
him/O./O

Nikolay/PERSON was/O just/O getting/O ready/O to/O go/O,/O when/O Konstantin/PERSON went/O in/O to/O him/O
again/O and/O begged/O him/O,/O rather/O unnaturally/O,/O to/O forgive/O him/O if/O he/O had/O hurt/O
his/O feelings/O in/O any/O way/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O generosity/O!/O''/O said/O Nikolay/PERSON,/O and/O he/O smiled/O./O ``/OIf/O you/O want/O to/O be/O right/O,/O
I/O can/O give/O you/O that/O satisfaction/O./O You/O're/O in/O the/O right/O;/O but/O I/O'm/O going/O all/O
the/O same/O./O''/O

It/O was/O only/O just/O at/O parting/O that/O Nikolay/PERSON kissed/O him/O,/O and/O said/O,/O looking/O
with/O sudden/O strangeness/O and/O seriousness/O at/O his/O brother/O:/O

``/OAnyway/O,/O do/On't/O remember/O evil/O against/O me/O,/O Kostya/PERSON!/O''/O and/O his/O voice/O
quivered/O./O These/O were/O the/O only/O words/O that/O had/O been/O spoken/O sincerely/O
between/O them/O./O Levin/PERSON knew/O that/O those/O words/O meant/O,/O ``/OYou/O see/O,/O and/O you/O know/O,/O
that/O I/O'm/O in/O a/O bad/O way/O,/O and/O maybe/O we/O shall/O not/O see/O each/O other/O again/O./O''/O
Levin/PERSON knew/O this/O,/O and/O the/O tears/O gushed/O from/O his/O eyes/O./O He/O kissed/O his/O
brother/O once/O more/O,/O but/O he/O could/O not/O speak/O,/O and/O knew/O not/O what/O to/O say/O./O

Three/O days/O after/O his/O brother/O's/O departure/O,/O Levin/PERSON too/O set/O off/O for/O his/O
foreign/O tour/O./O Happening/O to/O meet/O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O Kitty/PERSON's/O cousin/O,/O in/O the/O
railway/O train/O,/O Levin/PERSON greatly/O astonished/O him/O by/O his/O depression/O./O

``/OWhat/O's/O the/O matter/O with/O you/O?/O''/O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON asked/O him/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O nothing/O;/O there/O's/O not/O much/O happiness/O in/O life/O./O''/O

``/ONot/O much/O?/O You/O come/O with/O me/O to/O Paris/LOCATION instead/O of/O to/O Mulhausen/PERSON./O You/O shall/O
see/O how/O to/O be/O happy/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O've/O done/O with/O it/O all/O./O It/O's/O time/O I/O was/O dead/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O that/O's/O a/O good/O one/O!/O''/O said/O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O laughing/O;/O ``/Owhy/O,/O I/O'm/O only/O
just/O getting/O ready/O to/O begin/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O thought/O the/O same/O not/O long/O ago/O,/O but/O now/O I/O know/O I/O shall/O soon/O be/O
dead/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON said/O what/O he/O had/O genuinely/O been/O thinking/O of/O late/O./O He/O saw/O nothing/O
but/O death/O or/O the/O advance/O towards/O death/O in/O everything/O./O But/O his/O cherished/O
scheme/O only/O engrossed/O him/O the/O more/O./O Life/O had/O to/O be/O got/O through/O somehow/O
till/O death/O did/O come/O./O Darkness/O had/O fallen/O upon/O everything/O for/O him/O;/O but/O
just/O because/O of/O this/O darkness/O he/O felt/O that/O the/O one/O guiding/O clue/O in/O the/O
darkness/O was/O his/O work/O,/O and/O he/O clutched/O it/O and/O clung/O to/O it/O with/O all/O his/O
strength/O./O




PART/O FOUR/O



Chapter/O 1/O


The/O Karenins/O,/O husband/O and/O wife/O,/O continued/O living/O in/O the/O same/O house/O,/O met/O
every/O day/O,/O but/O were/O complete/O strangers/O to/O one/O another/O./O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON made/O it/O a/O rule/O to/O see/O his/O wife/O every/O day/O,/O so/O that/O the/O
servants/O might/O have/O no/O grounds/O for/O suppositions/O,/O but/O avoided/O dining/O at/O
home/O./O Vronsky/O was/O never/O at/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O house/O,/O but/O Anna/PERSON saw/O
him/O away/O from/O home/O,/O and/O her/O husband/O was/O aware/O of/O it/O./O

The/O position/O was/O one/O of/O misery/O for/O all/O three/O;/O and/O not/O one/O of/O them/O would/O
have/O been/O equal/O to/O enduring/O this/O position/O for/O a/O single/O day/O,/O if/O it/O had/O
not/O been/O for/O the/O expectation/O that/O it/O would/O change/O,/O that/O it/O was/O merely/O a/O
temporary/O painful/O ordeal/O which/O would/O pass/O over/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
hoped/O that/O this/O passion/O would/O pass/O,/O as/O everything/O does/O pass/O,/O that/O
everyone/O would/O forget/O about/O it/O,/O and/O his/O name/O would/O remain/O unsullied/O./O
Anna/PERSON,/O on/O whom/O the/O position/O depended/O,/O and/O for/O whom/O it/O was/O more/O miserable/O
than/O for/O anyone/O,/O endured/O it/O because/O she/O not/O merely/O hoped/O,/O but/O firmly/O
believed/O,/O that/O it/O would/O all/O very/O soon/O be/O settled/O and/O come/O right/O./O She/O had/O
not/O the/O least/O idea/O what/O would/O settle/O the/O position/O,/O but/O she/O firmly/O
believed/O that/O something/O would/O very/O soon/O turn/O up/O now/O./O Vronsky/O,/O against/O
his/O own/O will/O or/O wishes/O,/O followed/O her/O lead/O,/O hoped/O too/O that/O something/O,/O
apart/O from/O his/O own/O action/O,/O would/O be/O sure/O to/O solve/O all/O difficulties/O./O

In/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O winter/O Vronsky/O spent/O a/O very/O tiresome/O week/O./O A/O
foreign/O prince/O,/O who/O had/O come/O on/O a/O visit/O to/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O was/O put/O under/O his/O
charge/O,/O and/O he/O had/O to/O show/O him/O the/O sights/O worth/O seeing/O./O Vronsky/O was/O of/O
distinguished/O appearance/O;/O he/O possessed/O,/O moreover/O,/O the/O art/O of/O behaving/O
with/O respectful/O dignity/O,/O and/O was/O used/O to/O having/O to/O do/O with/O such/O grand/O
personages/O--/Othat/O was/O how/O he/O came/O to/O be/O put/O in/O charge/O of/O the/O prince/O./O But/O
he/O felt/O his/O duties/O very/O irksome/O./O The/O prince/O was/O anxious/O to/O miss/O nothing/O
of/O which/O he/O would/O be/O asked/O at/O home/O,/O had/O he/O seen/O that/O in/O Russia/LOCATION?/O And/O on/O
his/O own/O account/O he/O was/O anxious/O to/O enjoy/O to/O the/O utmost/O all/O Russian/O forms/O
of/O amusement/O./O Vronsky/O was/O obliged/O to/O be/O his/O guide/O in/O satisfying/O both/O
these/O inclinations/O./O The/O mornings/O they/O spent/O driving/O to/O look/O at/O places/O of/O
interest/O;/O the/O evenings/O they/O passed/O enjoying/O the/O national/O entertainments/O./O
The/O prince/O rejoiced/O in/O health/O exceptional/O even/O among/O princes/O./O By/O
gymnastics/O and/O careful/O attention/O to/O his/O health/O he/O had/O brought/O himself/O to/O
such/O a/O point/O that/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O excess/O in/O pleasure/O he/O looked/O as/O fresh/O
as/O a/O big/O glossy/O green/O Dutch/O cucumber/O./O The/O prince/O had/O traveled/O a/O great/O
deal/O,/O and/O considered/O one/O of/O the/O chief/O advantages/O of/O modern/O facilities/O of/O
communication/O was/O the/O accessibility/O of/O the/O pleasures/O of/O all/O nations/O./O

He/O had/O been/O in/O Spain/LOCATION,/O and/O there/O had/O indulged/O in/O serenades/O and/O had/O made/O
friends/O with/O a/O Spanish/O girl/O who/O played/O the/O mandolin/O./O In/O Switzerland/LOCATION he/O
had/O killed/O chamois/O./O In/O England/LOCATION he/O had/O galloped/O in/O a/O red/O coat/O over/O hedges/O
and/O killed/O two/O hundred/O pheasants/O for/O a/O bet/O./O In/O Turkey/LOCATION he/O had/O got/O into/O a/O
harem/O;/O in/O India/LOCATION he/O had/O hunted/O on/O an/O elephant/O,/O and/O now/O in/O Russia/LOCATION he/O
wished/O to/O taste/O all/O the/O specially/O Russian/O forms/O of/O pleasure/O./O

Vronsky/O,/O who/O was/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O chief/O master/O of/O the/O ceremonies/O to/O him/O,/O was/O
at/O great/O pains/O to/O arrange/O all/O the/O Russian/O amusements/O suggested/O by/O
various/O persons/O to/O the/O prince/O./O They/O had/O race/O horses/O,/O and/O Russian/O
pancakes/O and/O bear/O hunts/O and/O three-horse/O sledges/O,/O and/O gypsies/O and/O
drinking/O feasts/O,/O with/O the/O Russian/O accompaniment/O of/O broken/O crockery/O./O And/O
the/O prince/O with/O surprising/O ease/O fell/O in/O with/O the/O Russian/O spirit/O,/O smashed/O
trays/O full/O of/O crockery/O,/O sat/O with/O a/O gypsy/O girl/O on/O his/O knee/O,/O and/O seemed/O to/O
be/O asking/O--/Owhat/O more/O,/O and/O does/O the/O whole/O Russian/O spirit/O consist/O in/O just/O
this/O?/O

In/O reality/O,/O of/O all/O the/O Russian/O entertainments/O the/O prince/O liked/O best/O
French/O actresses/O and/O ballet/O dancers/O and/O white-seal/O champagne/O./O Vronsky/O
was/O used/O to/O princes/O,/O but/O,/O either/O because/O he/O had/O himself/O changed/O of/O late/O,/O
or/O that/O he/O was/O in/O too/O close/O proximity/O to/O the/O prince/O,/O that/O week/O seemed/O
fearfully/O wearisome/O to/O him/O./O The/O whole/O of/O that/O week/O he/O experienced/O a/O
sensation/O such/O as/O a/O man/O might/O have/O set/O in/O charge/O of/O a/O dangerous/O madman/O,/O
afraid/O of/O the/O madman/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O,/O from/O being/O with/O him/O,/O fearing/O
for/O his/O own/O reason/O./O Vronsky/O was/O continually/O conscious/O of/O the/O necessity/O
of/O never/O for/O a/O second/O relaxing/O the/O tone/O of/O stern/O official/O
respectfulness/O,/O that/O he/O might/O not/O himself/O be/O insulted/O./O The/O prince/O's/O
manner/O of/O treating/O the/O very/O people/O who/O,/O to/O Vronsky/O's/O surprise/O,/O were/O
ready/O to/O descend/O to/O any/O depths/O to/O provide/O him/O with/O Russian/O amusements/O,/O
was/O contemptuous/O./O His/O criticisms/O of/O Russian/O women/O,/O whom/O he/O wished/O to/O
study/O,/O more/O than/O once/O made/O Vronsky/O crimson/O with/O indignation/O./O The/O chief/O
reason/O why/O the/O prince/O was/O so/O particularly/O disagreeable/O to/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O
that/O he/O could/O not/O help/O seeing/O himself/O in/O him/O./O And/O what/O he/O saw/O in/O this/O
mirror/O did/O not/O gratify/O his/O self-esteem/O./O He/O was/O a/O very/O stupid/O and/O very/O
self-satisfied/O and/O very/O healthy/O and/O very/O well-washed/O man/O,/O and/O nothing/O
else/O./O He/O was/O a/O gentleman/O--/Othat/O was/O true/O,/O and/O Vronsky/O could/O not/O deny/O it/O./O
He/O was/O equable/O and/O not/O cringing/O with/O his/O superiors/O,/O was/O free/O and/O
ingratiating/O in/O his/O behavior/O with/O his/O equals/O,/O and/O was/O contemptuously/O
indulgent/O with/O his/O inferiors/O./O Vronsky/PERSON was/O himself/O the/O same/O,/O and/O regarded/O
it/O as/O a/O great/O merit/O to/O be/O so/O./O But/O for/O this/O prince/O he/O was/O an/O inferior/O,/O
and/O his/O contemptuous/O and/O indulgent/O attitude/O to/O him/O revolted/O him/O./O

``/OBrainless/O beef/O!/O can/O I/O be/O like/O that/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

Be/O that/O as/O it/O might/O,/O when/O,/O on/O the/O seventh/O day/O,/O he/O parted/O from/O the/O
prince/O,/O who/O was/O starting/O for/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O received/O his/O thanks/O,/O he/O was/O
happy/O to/O be/O rid/O of/O his/O uncomfortable/O position/O and/O the/O unpleasant/O
reflection/O of/O himself/O./O He/O said/O good-bye/O to/O him/O at/O the/O station/O on/O their/O
return/O from/O a/O bear/O hunt/O,/O at/O which/O they/O had/O had/O a/O display/O of/O Russian/O
prowess/O kept/O up/O all/O night/O./O



Chapter/O 2/O


When/O he/O got/O home/O,/O Vronsky/O found/O there/O a/O note/O from/O Anna/PERSON./O She/O wrote/O,/O ``/OI/O am/O
ill/O and/O unhappy/O./O I/O can/Onot/O come/O out/O,/O but/O I/O can/Onot/O go/O on/O longer/O without/O
seeing/O you/O./O Come/O in/O this/O evening/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON goes/O to/O the/O
council/O at/O seven/O and/O will/O be/O there/O till/O ten/O./O''/O Thinking/O for/O an/O instant/O of/O
the/O strangeness/O of/O her/O bidding/O him/O come/O straight/O to/O her/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O her/O
husband/O's/O insisting/O on/O her/O not/O receiving/O him/O,/O he/O decided/O to/O go/O./O

Vronsky/PERSON had/O that/O winter/O got/O his/O promotion/O,/O was/O now/O a/O colonel/O,/O had/O left/O
the/O regimental/O quarters/O,/O and/O was/O living/O alone/O./O After/O having/O some/O lunch/O,/O
he/O lay/O down/O on/O the/O sofa/O immediately/O,/O and/O in/O five/O minutes/O memories/O of/O the/O
hideous/O scenes/O he/O had/O witnessed/O during/O the/O last/O few/O days/O were/O confused/O
together/O and/O joined/O on/O to/O a/O mental/O image/O of/O Anna/PERSON and/O of/O the/O peasant/O who/O
had/O played/O an/O important/O part/O in/O the/O bear/O hunt/O,/O and/O Vronsky/O fell/O asleep/O./O
He/O waked/O up/O in/O the/O dark/O,/O trembling/O with/O horror/O,/O and/O made/O haste/O to/O light/O
a/O candle/O./O ``/OWhat/O was/O it/O?/O What/O?/O What/O was/O the/O dreadful/O thing/O I/O dreamed/O?/O
Yes/O,/O yes/O;/O I/O think/O a/O little/O dirty/O man/O with/O a/O disheveled/O beard/O was/O
stooping/O down/O doing/O something/O,/O and/O all/O of/O a/O sudden/O he/O began/O saying/O some/O
strange/O words/O in/O French/O./O Yes/O,/O there/O was/O nothing/O else/O in/O the/O dream/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O to/O himself/O./O ``/OBut/O why/O was/O it/O so/O awful/O?/O''/O He/O vividly/O recalled/O the/O
peasant/O again/O and/O those/O incomprehensible/O French/O words/O the/O peasant/O had/O
uttered/O,/O and/O a/O chill/O of/O horror/O ran/O down/O his/O spine/O./O

``/OWhat/O nonsense/O!/O''/O thought/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O glanced/O at/O his/O watch/O./O

It/O was/O half-past/O eight/O already/O./O He/O rang/O up/O his/O servant/O,/O dressed/O in/O
haste/O,/O and/O went/O out/O onto/O the/O steps/O,/O completely/O forgetting/O the/O dream/O and/O
only/O worried/O at/O being/O late/O./O As/O he/O drove/O up/O to/O the/O Karenins/O'/O entrance/O he/O
looked/O at/O his/O watch/O and/O saw/O it/O was/O ten/O minutes/O to/O nine/O./O A/O high/O,/O narrow/O
carriage/O with/O a/O pair/O of/O grays/O was/O standing/O at/O the/O entrance/O./O He/O
recognized/O Anna/PERSON's/O carriage/O./O ``/OShe/O is/O coming/O to/O me/O,/O''/O thought/O Vronsky/O,/O ``/Oand/O
better/O she/O should/O./O I/O do/On't/O like/O going/O into/O that/O house/O./O But/O no/O matter/O;/O I/O
ca/On't/O hide/O myself/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O and/O with/O that/O manner/O peculiar/O to/O him/O
from/O childhood/O,/O as/O of/O a/O man/O who/O has/O nothing/O to/O be/O ashamed/O of/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON
got/O out/O of/O his/O sledge/O and/O went/O to/O the/O door/O./O The/O door/O opened/O,/O and/O the/O
hall/O porter/O with/O a/O rug/O on/O his/O arm/O called/O the/O carriage/O./O Vronsky/O,/O though/O
he/O did/O not/O usually/O notice/O details/O,/O noticed/O at/O this/O moment/O the/O amazed/O
expression/O with/O which/O the/O porter/O glanced/O at/O him/O./O In/O the/O very/O doorway/O
Vronsky/O almost/O ran/O up/O against/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O The/O gas/O jet/O threw/O
its/O full/O light/O on/O the/O bloodless/O,/O sunken/O face/O under/O the/O black/O hat/O and/O on/O
the/O white/O cravat/O,/O brilliant/O against/O the/O beaver/O of/O the/O coat/O./O Karenin/PERSON's/O
fixed/O,/O dull/O eyes/O were/O fastened/O upon/O Vronsky/O's/O face/O./O Vronsky/O bowed/O,/O and/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O chewing/O his/O lips/O,/O lifted/O his/O hand/O to/O his/O hat/O and/O
went/O on/O./O Vronsky/O saw/O him/O without/O looking/O round/O get/O into/O the/O carriage/O,/O
pick/O up/O the/O rug/O and/O the/O opera-glass/O at/O the/O window/O and/O disappear/O./O Vronsky/O
went/O into/O the/O hall/O./O His/O brows/O were/O scowling/O,/O and/O his/O eyes/O gleamed/O with/O a/O
proud/O and/O angry/O light/O in/O them/O./O

``/OWhat/O a/O position/O!/O''/O he/O thought/O./O ``/OIf/O he/O would/O fight/O,/O would/O stand/O up/O for/O
his/O honor/O,/O I/O could/O act/O,/O could/O express/O my/O feelings/O;/O but/O this/O weakness/O or/O
baseness/O.../O./O He/O puts/O me/O in/O the/O position/O of/O playing/O false/O,/O which/O I/O never/O
meant/O and/O never/O mean/O to/O do/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O's/O ideas/O had/O changed/O since/O the/O day/O of/O his/O conversation/O with/O Anna/PERSON
in/O the/O Vrede/LOCATION garden/LOCATION./O Unconsciously/O yielding/O to/O the/O weakness/O of/O Anna/PERSON--/Owho/O
had/O surrendered/O herself/O up/O to/O him/O utterly/O,/O and/O simply/O looked/O to/O him/O to/O
decide/O her/O fate/O,/O ready/O to/O submit/O to/O anything/O--/Ohe/O had/O long/O ceased/O to/O think/O
that/O their/O tie/O might/O end/O as/O he/O had/O thought/O then/O./O His/O ambitious/O plans/O had/O
retreated/O into/O the/O background/O again/O,/O and/O feeling/O that/O he/O had/O got/O out/O of/O
that/O circle/O of/O activity/O in/O which/O everything/O was/O definite/O,/O he/O had/O given/O
himself/O entirely/O to/O his/O passion/O,/O and/O that/O passion/O was/O binding/O him/O more/O
and/O more/O closely/O to/O her/O./O

He/O was/O still/O in/O the/O hall/O when/O he/O caught/O the/O sound/O of/O her/O retreating/O
footsteps/O./O He/O knew/O she/O had/O been/O expecting/O him/O,/O had/O listened/O for/O him/O,/O and/O
was/O now/O going/O back/O to/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O''/O she/O cried/O,/O on/O seeing/O him/O,/O and/O at/O the/O first/O sound/O of/O her/O voice/O the/O
tears/O came/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O ``/ONo/O;/O if/O things/O are/O to/O go/O on/O like/O this/O,/O the/O end/O
will/O come/O much/O,/O much/O too/O soon/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O,/O dear/O one/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O?/O I/O've/O been/O waiting/O in/O agony/O for/O an/O hour/O,/O two/O hours/O .../O No/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O
.../O I/O ca/On't/O quarrel/O with/O you/O./O Of/O course/O you/O could/On't/O come/O./O No/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O./O''/O
She/O laid/O her/O two/O hands/O on/O his/O shoulders/O,/O and/O looked/O a/O long/O while/O at/O him/O
with/O a/O profound/O,/O passionate/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O searching/O look/O./O She/O
was/O studying/O his/O face/O to/O make/O up/O for/O the/O time/O she/O had/O not/O seen/O him/O./O She/O
was/O,/O every/O time/O she/O saw/O him/O,/O making/O the/O picture/O of/O him/O in/O her/O
imagination/O -LRB-/Oincomparably/O superior/O,/O impossible/O in/O reality/O-RRB-/O fit/O with/O him/O
as/O he/O really/O was/O./O



Chapter/O 3/O


``/OYou/O met/O him/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O,/O when/O they/O had/O sat/O down/O at/O the/O table/O in/O the/O
lamplight/O./O ``/OYou/O're/O punished/O,/O you/O see/O,/O for/O being/O late/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O;/O but/O how/O was/O it/O?/O Was/On't/O he/O to/O be/O at/O the/O council/O?/O''/O

``/OHe/O had/O been/O and/O come/O back/O,/O and/O was/O going/O out/O somewhere/O again/O./O But/O
that/O's/O no/O matter/O./O Do/On't/O talk/O about/O it/O./O Where/O have/O you/O been/O?/O With/O the/O
prince/O still/O?/O''/O

She/O knew/O every/O detail/O of/O his/O existence/O./O He/O was/O going/O to/O say/O that/O he/O had/O
been/O up/O all/O night/O and/O had/O dropped/O asleep/O,/O but/O looking/O at/O her/O thrilled/O
and/O rapturous/O face/O,/O he/O was/O ashamed/O./O And/O he/O said/O he/O had/O had/O to/O go/O to/O
report/O on/O the/O prince/O's/O departure/O./O

``/OBut/O it/O's/O over/O now/O?/O He/O is/O gone/O?/O''/O

``/OThank/O God/O it/O's/O over/O!/O You/O would/On't/O believe/O how/O insufferable/O it/O's/O been/O
for/O me/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O so/O?/O Is/On't/O it/O the/O life/O all/O of/O you/O,/O all/O young/O men/O,/O always/O lead/O?/O''/O she/O
said/O,/O knitting/O her/O brows/O;/O and/O taking/O up/O the/O crochet/O work/O that/O was/O lying/O
on/O the/O table/O,/O she/O began/O drawing/O the/O hook/O out/O of/O it/O,/O without/O looking/O at/O
Vronsky/O./O

``/OI/O gave/O that/O life/O up/O long/O ago/O,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O wondering/O at/O the/O change/O in/O her/O
face/O,/O and/O trying/O to/O divine/O its/O meaning/O./O ``/OAnd/O I/O confess/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O a/O
smile/O,/O showing/O his/O thick/O,/O white/O teeth/O,/O ``/Othis/O week/O I/O've/O been/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O
looking/O at/O myself/O in/O a/O glass/O,/O seeing/O that/O life/O,/O and/O I/O did/On't/O like/O it/O./O''/O

She/O held/O the/O work/O in/O her/O hands/O,/O but/O did/O not/O crochet/O,/O and/O looked/O at/O him/O
with/O strange/O,/O shining/O,/O and/O hostile/O eyes/O./O

``/OThis/O morning/O Liza/O came/O to/O see/O me/O--/Othey/O're/O not/O afraid/O to/O call/O on/O me/O,/O in/O
spite/O of/O the/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O''/O she/O put/O in/O--/O``/Oand/O she/O told/O me/O about/O
your/O Athenian/O evening/O./O How/O loathsome/O!/O''/O

``/OI/O was/O just/O going/O to/O say/O.../O''/O

She/O interrupted/O him/O./O ``/OIt/O was/O that/O Thèrése/O you/O used/O to/O know/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O was/O just/O saying/O.../O''/O

``/OHow/O disgusting/O you/O are/O,/O you/O men/O!/O How/O is/O it/O you/O ca/On't/O understand/O that/O a/O
woman/O can/O never/O forget/O that/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O getting/O more/O and/O more/O angry/O,/O and/O
so/O letting/O him/O see/O the/O cause/O of/O her/O irritation/O,/O ``/Oespecially/O a/O woman/O who/O
can/Onot/O know/O your/O life/O?/O What/O do/O I/O know/O?/O What/O have/O I/O ever/O known/O?/O''/O she/O
said/O,/O ``/Owhat/O you/O tell/O me/O./O And/O how/O do/O I/O know/O whether/O you/O tell/O me/O the/O
truth/O?/O.../O''/O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O you/O hurt/O me/O./O Do/On't/O you/O trust/O me/O?/O Have/On't/O I/O told/O you/O that/O I/O
have/On't/O a/O thought/O I/O would/On't/O lay/O bare/O to/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O evidently/O trying/O to/O suppress/O her/O jealous/O thoughts/O./O
``/OBut/O if/O only/O you/O knew/O how/O wretched/O I/O am/O!/O I/O believe/O you/O,/O I/O believe/O
you/O.../O./O What/O were/O you/O saying/O?/O''/O

But/O he/O could/O not/O at/O once/O recall/O what/O he/O had/O been/O going/O to/O say/O./O These/O
fits/O of/O jealousy/O,/O which/O of/O late/O had/O been/O more/O and/O more/O frequent/O with/O
her/O,/O horrified/O him/O,/O and/O however/O much/O he/O tried/O to/O disguise/O the/O fact/O,/O made/O
him/O feel/O cold/O to/O her/O,/O although/O he/O knew/O the/O cause/O of/O her/O jealousy/O was/O her/O
love/O for/O him/O./O How/O often/O he/O had/O told/O himself/O that/O her/O love/O was/O happiness/O;/O
and/O now/O she/O loved/O him/O as/O a/O woman/O can/O love/O when/O love/O has/O outweighed/O for/O
her/O all/O the/O good/O things/O of/O life/O--/Oand/O he/O was/O much/O further/O from/O happiness/O
than/O when/O he/O had/O followed/O her/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION./O Then/O he/O had/O thought/O himself/O
unhappy/O,/O but/O happiness/O was/O before/O him/O;/O now/O he/O felt/O that/O the/O best/O
happiness/O was/O already/O left/O behind/O./O She/O was/O utterly/O unlike/O what/O she/O had/O
been/O when/O he/O first/O saw/O her/O./O Both/O morally/O and/O physically/O she/O had/O changed/O
for/O the/O worse/O./O She/O had/O broadened/O out/O all/O over/O,/O and/O in/O her/O face/O at/O the/O
time/O when/O she/O was/O speaking/O of/O the/O actress/O there/O was/O an/O evil/O expression/O
of/O hatred/O that/O distorted/O it/O./O He/O looked/O at/O her/O as/O a/O man/O looks/O at/O a/O faded/O
flower/O he/O has/O gathered/O,/O with/O difficulty/O recognizing/O in/O it/O the/O beauty/O for/O
which/O he/O picked/O and/O ruined/O it/O./O And/O in/O spite/O of/O this/O he/O felt/O that/O then/O,/O
when/O his/O love/O was/O stronger/O,/O he/O could/O,/O if/O he/O had/O greatly/O wished/O it/O,/O have/O
torn/O that/O love/O out/O of/O his/O heart/O;/O but/O now/O,/O when/O as/O at/O that/O moment/O it/O
seemed/O to/O him/O he/O felt/O no/O love/O for/O her/O,/O he/O knew/O that/O what/O bound/O him/O to/O
her/O could/O not/O be/O broken/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O well/O,/O what/O was/O it/O you/O were/O going/O to/O say/O about/O the/O prince/O?/O I/O have/O
driven/O away/O the/O fiend/O,/O''/O she/O added/O./O The/O fiend/O was/O the/O name/O they/O had/O given/O
her/O jealousy/O./O ``/OWhat/O did/O you/O begin/O to/O tell/O me/O about/O the/O prince/O?/O Why/O did/O
you/O find/O it/O so/O tiresome/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O it/O was/O intolerable/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O trying/O to/O pick/O up/O the/O thread/O of/O his/O
interrupted/O thought/O./O ``/OHe/O does/O not/O improve/O on/O closer/O acquaintance/O./O If/O you/O
want/O him/O defined/O,/O here/O he/O is/O:/O a/O prime/O,/O well-fed/O beast/O such/O as/O takes/O
medals/O at/O the/O cattle/O shows/O,/O and/O nothing/O more/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O a/O tone/O of/O
vexation/O that/O interested/O her/O./O

``/ONo/O;/O how/O so/O?/O''/O she/O replied/O./O ``/OHe/O's/O seen/O a/O great/O deal/O,/O anyway/O;/O he/O's/O
cultured/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O an/O utterly/O different/O culture/O--/Otheir/O culture/O./O He/O's/O cultivated/O,/O one/O
sees/O,/O simply/O to/O be/O able/O to/O despise/O culture/O,/O as/O they/O despise/O everything/O
but/O animal/O pleasures/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O do/On't/O you/O all/O care/O for/O these/O animal/O pleasures/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O again/O
he/O noticed/O a/O dark/O look/O in/O her/O eyes/O that/O avoided/O him/O./O

``/OHow/O is/O it/O you/O're/O defending/O him/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O smiling/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O defending/O him/O,/O it/O's/O nothing/O to/O me/O;/O but/O I/O imagine/O,/O if/O you/O had/O
not/O cared/O for/O those/O pleasures/O yourself/O,/O you/O might/O have/O got/O out/O of/O them/O./O
But/O if/O it/O affords/O you/O satisfaction/O to/O gaze/O at/O Thèrése/O in/O the/O attire/O of/O
Eve/O.../O''/O

``/OAgain/O,/O the/O devil/O again/O,/O''/O Vronsky/PERSON said/O,/O taking/O the/O hand/O she/O had/O laid/O on/O
the/O table/O and/O kissing/O it/O./O

``/OYes/O;/O but/O I/O ca/On't/O help/O it/O./O You/O do/On't/O know/O what/O I/O have/O suffered/O waiting/O
for/O you/O./O I/O believe/O I/O'm/O not/O jealous/O./O I/O'm/O not/O jealous/O:/O I/O believe/O you/O when/O
you/O're/O here/O;/O but/O when/O you/O're/O away/O somewhere/O leading/O your/O life/O,/O so/O
incomprehensible/O to/O me/O.../O''/O

She/O turned/O away/O from/O him/O,/O pulled/O the/O hook/O at/O last/O out/O of/O the/O crochet/O
work/O,/O and/O rapidly/O,/O with/O the/O help/O of/O her/O forefinger/O,/O began/O working/O loop/O
after/O loop/O of/O the/O wool/O that/O was/O dazzling/O white/O in/O the/O lamplight/O,/O while/O
the/O slender/O wrist/O moved/O swiftly/O,/O nervously/O in/O the/O embroidered/O cuff/O./O

``/OHow/O was/O it/O,/O then/O?/O Where/O did/O you/O meet/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON?/O''/O Her/O voice/O
sounded/O in/O an/O unnatural/O and/O jarring/O tone/O./O

``/OWe/O ran/O up/O against/O each/O other/O in/O the/O doorway/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O he/O bowed/O to/O you/O like/O this/O?/O''/O

She/O drew/O a/O long/O face/O,/O and/O half-closing/O her/O eyes/O,/O quickly/O transformed/O her/O
expression/O,/O folded/O her/O hands/O,/O and/O Vronsky/O suddenly/O saw/O in/O her/O beautiful/O
face/O the/O very/O expression/O with/O which/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O bowed/O to/O
him/O./O He/O smiled/O,/O while/O she/O laughed/O gaily/O,/O with/O that/O sweet/O,/O deep/O laugh/O,/O
which/O was/O one/O of/O her/O greatest/O charms/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O understand/O him/O in/O the/O least/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OIf/O after/O your/O
avowal/O to/O him/O at/O your/O country/O house/O he/O had/O broken/O with/O you/O,/O if/O he/O had/O
called/O me/O out/O--/Obut/O this/O I/O ca/On't/O understand/O./O How/O can/O he/O put/O up/O with/O such/O a/O
position/O?/O He/O feels/O it/O,/O that/O's/O evident/O./O''/O

``/OHe/O?/O''/O she/O said/O sneeringly/O./O ``/OHe/O's/O perfectly/O satisfied/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O are/O we/O all/O miserable/O for/O,/O when/O everything/O might/O be/O so/O happy/O?/O''/O

``/OOnly/O not/O he/O./O Do/On't/O I/O know/O him/O,/O the/O falsity/O in/O which/O he/O's/O utterly/O
steeped/O?/O.../O Could/O one/O,/O with/O any/O feeling/O,/O live/O as/O he/O is/O living/O with/O me/O?/O
He/O understands/O nothing/O,/O and/O feels/O nothing/O./O Could/O a/O man/O of/O any/O feeling/O
live/O in/O the/O same/O house/O with/O his/O unfaithful/O wife/O?/O Could/O he/O talk/O to/O her/O,/O
call/O her/O `/Omy/O dear/O'/O?/O''/O

And/O again/O she/O could/O not/O help/O mimicking/O him/O:/O ''/O`/OAnna/PERSON,/O _/Oma/O chère/O_/O;/O Anna/PERSON,/O
dear/O'/O!/O''/O

``/OHe/O's/O not/O a/O man/O,/O not/O a/O human/O being/O--/Ohe/O's/O a/O doll/O!/O No/O one/O knows/O him/O;/O but/O I/O
know/O him/O./O Oh/O,/O if/O I/O'd/O been/O in/O his/O place/O,/O I/O'd/O long/O ago/O have/O killed/O,/O have/O
torn/O to/O pieces/O a/O wife/O like/O me/O./O I/O would/On't/O have/O said/O,/O `/OAnna/PERSON,/O _/Oma/O chère/O_/O'/O!/O
He/O's/O not/O a/O man/O,/O he/O's/O an/O official/O machine/O./O He/O does/On't/O understand/O that/O I/O'm/O
your/O wife/O,/O that/O he/O's/O outside/O,/O that/O he/O's/O superfluous/O.../O./O Do/On't/O let/O's/O talk/O
of/O him/O!/O.../O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O unfair/O,/O very/O unfair/O,/O dearest/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O trying/O to/O soothe/O
her/O./O ``/OBut/O never/O mind/O,/O do/On't/O let/O's/O talk/O of/O him/O./O Tell/O me/O what/O you/O've/O been/O
doing/O?/O What/O is/O the/O matter/O?/O What/O has/O been/O wrong/O with/O you/O,/O and/O what/O did/O
the/O doctor/O say/O?/O''/O

She/O looked/O at/O him/O with/O mocking/O amusement/O./O Evidently/O she/O had/O hit/O on/O other/O
absurd/O and/O grotesque/O aspects/O in/O her/O husband/O and/O was/O awaiting/O the/O moment/O
to/O give/O expression/O to/O them/O./O

But/O he/O went/O on/O:/O

``/OI/O imagine/O that/O it/O's/O not/O illness/O,/O but/O your/O condition/O./O When/O will/O it/O be/O?/O''/O

The/O ironical/O light/O died/O away/O in/O her/O eyes/O,/O but/O a/O different/O smile/O,/O a/O
consciousness/O of/O something/O,/O he/O did/O not/O know/O what/O,/O and/O of/O quiet/O
melancholy/O,/O came/O over/O her/O face/O./O

``/OSoon/O,/O soon/O./O You/O say/O that/O our/O position/O is/O miserable/O,/O that/O we/O must/O put/O an/O
end/O to/O it/O./O If/O you/O knew/O how/O terrible/O it/O is/O to/O me/O,/O what/O I/O would/O give/O to/O be/O
able/O to/O love/O you/O freely/O and/O boldly/O!/O I/O should/O not/O torture/O myself/O and/O
torture/O you/O with/O my/O jealousy/O.../O./O And/O it/O will/O come/O soon/O,/O but/O not/O as/O we/O
expect/O./O''/O

And/O at/O the/O thought/O of/O how/O it/O would/O come/O,/O she/O seemed/O so/O pitiable/O to/O
herself/O that/O tears/O came/O into/O her/O eyes/O,/O and/O she/O could/O not/O go/O on/O./O She/O laid/O
her/O hand/O on/O his/O sleeve/O,/O dazzling/O and/O white/O with/O its/O rings/O in/O the/O
lamplight/O./O

``/OIt/O wo/On't/O come/O as/O we/O suppose/O./O I/O did/On't/O mean/O to/O say/O this/O to/O you/O,/O but/O
you/O've/O made/O me/O./O Soon/O,/O soon/O,/O all/O will/O be/O over/O,/O and/O we/O shall/O all/O,/O all/O be/O
at/O peace/O,/O and/O suffer/O no/O more/O./O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O understand/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O understanding/O her/O./O

``/OYou/O asked/O when/O?/O Soon/O./O And/O I/O sha/On't/O live/O through/O it/O./O Do/On't/O interrupt/O
me/O!/O''/O and/O she/O made/O haste/O to/O speak/O./O ``/OI/O know/O it/O;/O I/O know/O for/O certain/O./O I/O
shall/O die/O;/O and/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O I/O shall/O die/O,/O and/O release/O myself/O and/O you/O./O''/O

Tears/O dropped/O from/O her/O eyes/O;/O he/O bent/O down/O over/O her/O hand/O and/O began/O
kissing/O it/O,/O trying/O to/O hide/O his/O emotion/O,/O which/O,/O he/O knew/O,/O had/O no/O sort/O of/O
grounds/O,/O though/O he/O could/O not/O control/O it/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O better/O so/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O tightly/O gripping/O his/O hand/O./O ``/OThat/O's/O the/O
only/O way/O,/O the/O only/O way/O left/O us/O./O''/O

He/O had/O recovered/O himself/O,/O and/O lifted/O his/O head/O./O

``/OHow/O absurd/O!/O What/O absurd/O nonsense/O you/O are/O talking/O!/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O it/O's/O the/O truth/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O,/O what/O's/O the/O truth/O?/O''/O

``/OThat/O I/O shall/O die/O./O I/O have/O had/O a/O dream/O./O''/O

``/OA/O dream/O?/O''/O repeated/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O instantly/O he/O recalled/O the/O peasant/O of/O
his/O dream/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O a/O dream/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O a/O long/O while/O since/O I/O dreamed/O it/O./O I/O
dreamed/O that/O I/O ran/O into/O my/O bedroom/O,/O that/O I/O had/O to/O get/O something/O there/O,/O
to/O find/O out/O something/O;/O you/O know/O how/O it/O is/O in/O dreams/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O her/O eyes/O
wide/O with/O horror/O;/O ``/Oand/O in/O the/O bedroom/O,/O in/O the/O corner/O,/O stood/O something/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O what/O nonsense/O!/O How/O can/O you/O believe/O.../O''/O

But/O she/O would/O not/O let/O him/O interrupt/O her/O./O What/O she/O was/O saying/O was/O too/O
important/O to/O her/O./O

``/OAnd/O the/O something/O turned/O round/O,/O and/O I/O saw/O it/O was/O a/O peasant/O with/O a/O
disheveled/O beard/O,/O little/O,/O and/O dreadful/O looking/O./O I/O wanted/O to/O run/O away/O,/O
but/O he/O bent/O down/O over/O a/O sack/O,/O and/O was/O fumbling/O there/O with/O his/O hands/O.../O''/O

She/O showed/O how/O he/O had/O moved/O his/O hands/O./O There/O was/O terror/O in/O her/O face/O./O And/O
Vronsky/O,/O remembering/O his/O dream/O,/O felt/O the/O same/O terror/O filling/O his/O soul/O./O

``/OHe/O was/O fumbling/O and/O kept/O talking/O quickly/O,/O quickly/O in/O French/O,/O you/O know/O:/O
_/OIl/O faut/O le/O battre/O,/O le/O fer/O,/O le/O brayer/O,/O le/O pétrir/O_/O.../O./O And/O in/O my/O horror/O I/O
tried/O to/O wake/O up/O,/O and/O woke/O up/O .../O but/O woke/O up/O in/O the/O dream/O./O And/O I/O began/O
asking/O myself/O what/O it/O meant/O./O And/O Korney/PERSON said/O to/O me/O:/O `/OIn/O childbirth/O
you/O'll/O die/O,/O ma'am/O,/O you/O'll/O die/O.../O'/O And/O I/O woke/O up/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O nonsense/O,/O what/O nonsense/O!/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON;/O but/O he/O felt/O himself/O that/O
there/O was/O no/O conviction/O in/O his/O voice/O./O

``/OBut/O do/On't/O let/O's/O talk/O of/O it/O./O Ring/O the/O bell/O,/O I/O'll/O have/O tea/O./O And/O stay/O a/O
little/O now/O;/O it/O's/O not/O long/O I/O shall/O.../O''/O

But/O all/O at/O once/O she/O stopped/O./O The/O expression/O of/O her/O face/O instantaneously/O
changed/O./O Horror/O and/O excitement/O were/O suddenly/O replaced/O by/O a/O look/O of/O soft/O,/O
solemn/O,/O blissful/O attention/O./O He/O could/O not/O comprehend/O the/O meaning/O of/O the/O
change/O./O She/O was/O listening/O to/O the/O stirring/O of/O the/O new/O life/O within/O her/O./O



Chapter/O 4/O


Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O after/O meeting/O Vronsky/O on/O his/O own/O steps/O,/O drove/O,/O as/O
he/O had/O intended/O,/O to/O the/O Italian/O opera/O./O He/O sat/O through/O two/O acts/O there/O,/O
and/O saw/O everyone/O he/O had/O wanted/O to/O see/O./O On/O returning/O home/O,/O he/O carefully/O
scrutinized/O the/O hat/O stand/O,/O and/O noticing/O that/O there/O was/O not/O a/O military/O
overcoat/O there/O,/O he/O went/O,/O as/O usual/O,/O to/O his/O own/O room/O./O But/O,/O contrary/O to/O his/O
usual/O habit/O,/O he/O did/O not/O go/O to/O bed/O,/O he/O walked/O up/O and/O down/O his/O study/O till/O
three/O o'clock/O in/O the/O morning/O./O The/O feeling/O of/O furious/O anger/O with/O his/O
wife/O,/O who/O would/O not/O observe/O the/O proprieties/O and/O keep/O to/O the/O one/O
stipulation/O he/O had/O laid/O on/O her/O,/O not/O to/O receive/O her/O lover/O in/O her/O own/O
home/O,/O gave/O him/O no/O peace/O./O She/O had/O not/O complied/O with/O his/O request/O,/O and/O he/O
was/O bound/O to/O punish/O her/O and/O carry/O out/O his/O threat/O--/Oobtain/O a/O divorce/O and/O
take/O away/O his/O son/O./O He/O knew/O all/O the/O difficulties/O connected/O with/O this/O
course/O,/O but/O he/O had/O said/O he/O would/O do/O it/O,/O and/O now/O he/O must/O carry/O out/O his/O
threat/O./O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON had/O hinted/O that/O this/O was/O the/O best/O way/O
out/O of/O his/O position/O,/O and/O of/O late/O the/O obtaining/O of/O divorces/O had/O been/O
brought/O to/O such/O perfection/O that/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON saw/O a/O possibility/O
of/O overcoming/O the/O formal/O difficulties/O./O Misfortunes/O never/O come/O singly/O,/O
and/O the/O affairs/O of/O the/O reorganization/O of/O the/O native/O tribes/O,/O and/O of/O the/O
irrigation/O of/O the/O lands/O of/O the/O Zaraisky/LOCATION province/O,/O had/O brought/O such/O
official/O worries/O upon/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON that/O he/O had/O been/O of/O late/O in/O
a/O continual/O condition/O of/O extreme/O irritability/O./O

He/O did/O not/O sleep/O the/O whole/O night/O,/O and/O his/O fury/O,/O growing/O in/O a/O sort/O of/O
vast/O,/O arithmetical/O progression/O,/O reached/O its/O highest/O limits/O in/O the/O
morning/O./O He/O dressed/O in/O haste/O,/O and/O as/O though/O carrying/O his/O cup/O full/O of/O
wrath/O,/O and/O fearing/O to/O spill/O any/O over/O,/O fearing/O to/O lose/O with/O his/O wrath/O the/O
energy/O necessary/O for/O the/O interview/O with/O his/O wife/O,/O he/O went/O into/O her/O room/O
directly/O he/O heard/O she/O was/O up/O./O

Anna/PERSON,/O who/O had/O thought/O she/O knew/O her/O husband/O so/O well/O,/O was/O amazed/O at/O his/O
appearance/O when/O he/O went/O in/O to/O her/O./O His/O brow/O was/O lowering/O,/O and/O his/O eyes/O
stared/O darkly/O before/O him/O,/O avoiding/O her/O eyes/O;/O his/O mouth/O was/O tightly/O and/O
contemptuously/O shut/O./O In/O his/O walk/O,/O in/O his/O gestures/O,/O in/O the/O sound/O of/O his/O
voice/O there/O was/O a/O determination/O and/O firmness/O such/O as/O his/O wife/O had/O never/O
seen/O in/O him/O./O He/O went/O into/O her/O room/O,/O and/O without/O greeting/O her/O,/O walked/O
straight/O up/O to/O her/O writing-table/O,/O and/O taking/O her/O keys/O,/O opened/O a/O drawer/O./O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O want/O?/O''/O she/O cried/O./O

``/OYour/O lover/O's/O letters/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OThey/O're/O not/O here/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O shutting/O the/O drawer/O;/O but/O from/O that/O action/O
he/O saw/O he/O had/O guessed/O right/O,/O and/O roughly/O pushing/O away/O her/O hand/O,/O he/O
quickly/O snatched/O a/O portfolio/O in/O which/O he/O knew/O she/O used/O to/O put/O her/O most/O
important/O papers/O./O She/O tried/O to/O pull/O the/O portfolio/O away/O,/O but/O he/O pushed/O
her/O back/O./O

``/OSit/O down/O!/O I/O have/O to/O speak/O to/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O putting/O the/O portfolio/O under/O
his/O arm/O,/O and/O squeezing/O it/O so/O tightly/O with/O his/O elbow/O that/O his/O shoulder/O
stood/O up/O./O Amazed/O and/O intimidated/O,/O she/O gazed/O at/O him/O in/O silence/O./O

``/OI/O told/O you/O that/O I/O would/O not/O allow/O you/O to/O receive/O your/O lover/O in/O this/O
house/O./O''/O

``/OI/O had/O to/O see/O him/O to/O.../O''/O

She/O stopped/O,/O not/O finding/O a/O reason/O./O

``/OI/O do/O not/O enter/O into/O the/O details/O of/O why/O a/O woman/O wants/O to/O see/O her/O lover/O./O''/O

``/OI/O meant/O,/O I/O only/O.../O''/O she/O said/O,/O flushing/O hotly/O./O This/O coarseness/O of/O his/O
angered/O her/O,/O and/O gave/O her/O courage/O./O ``/OSurely/O you/O must/O feel/O how/O easy/O it/O is/O
for/O you/O to/O insult/O me/O?/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OAn/O honest/O man/O and/O an/O honest/O woman/O may/O be/O insulted/O,/O but/O to/O tell/O a/O thief/O
he/O's/O a/O thief/O is/O simply/O _/Ola/O constatation/O d'un/O fait/O_/O./O''/O

``/OThis/O cruelty/O is/O something/O new/O I/O did/O not/O know/O in/O you/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O call/O it/O cruelty/O for/O a/O husband/O to/O give/O his/O wife/O liberty/O,/O giving/O her/O
the/O honorable/O protection/O of/O his/O name/O,/O simply/O on/O the/O condition/O of/O
observing/O the/O proprieties/O:/O is/O that/O cruelty/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O worse/O than/O cruel/O--/Oit/O's/O base/O,/O if/O you/O want/O to/O know/O!/O''/O Anna/PERSON cried/O,/O in/O a/O
rush/O of/O hatred/O,/O and/O getting/O up/O,/O she/O was/O going/O away/O./O

``/ONo/O!/O''/O he/O shrieked/O,/O in/O his/O shrill/O voice/O,/O which/O pitched/O a/O note/O higher/O than/O
usual/O even/O,/O and/O his/O big/O hands/O clutching/O her/O by/O the/O arm/O so/O violently/O that/O
red/O marks/O were/O left/O from/O the/O bracelet/O he/O was/O squeezing/O,/O he/O forcibly/O sat/O
her/O down/O in/O her/O place/O./O

``/OBase/O!/O If/O you/O care/O to/O use/O that/O word/O,/O what/O is/O base/O is/O to/O forsake/O husband/O
and/O child/O for/O a/O lover/O,/O while/O you/O eat/O your/O husband/O's/O bread/O!/O''/O

She/O bowed/O her/O head/O./O She/O did/O not/O say/O what/O she/O had/O said/O the/O evening/O before/O
to/O her/O lover/O,/O that/O _/Ohe/O_/O was/O her/O husband/O,/O and/O her/O husband/O was/O
superfluous/O;/O she/O did/O not/O even/O think/O that/O./O She/O felt/O all/O the/O justice/O of/O
his/O words/O,/O and/O only/O said/O softly/O:/O

``/OYou/O can/Onot/O describe/O my/O position/O as/O worse/O than/O I/O feel/O it/O to/O be/O myself/O;/O
but/O what/O are/O you/O saying/O all/O this/O for/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O am/O I/O saying/O it/O for/O?/O what/O for/O?/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O as/O angrily/O./O ``/OThat/O you/O
may/O know/O that/O since/O you/O have/O not/O carried/O out/O my/O wishes/O in/O regard/O to/O
observing/O outward/O decorum/O,/O I/O will/O take/O measures/O to/O put/O an/O end/O to/O this/O
state/O of/O things/O./O''/O

``/OSoon/O,/O very/O soon/O,/O it/O will/O end/O,/O anyway/O,/O''/O she/O said/O;/O and/O again/O,/O at/O the/O
thought/O of/O death/O near/O at/O hand/O and/O now/O desired/O,/O tears/O came/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O

``/OIt/O will/O end/O sooner/O than/O you/O and/O your/O lover/O have/O planned/O!/O If/O you/O must/O
have/O the/O satisfaction/O of/O animal/O passion/O.../O''/O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON!/O I/O wo/On't/O say/O it/O's/O not/O generous/O,/O but/O it/O's/O not/O like/O
a/O gentleman/O to/O strike/O anyone/O who/O's/O down/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O only/O think/O of/O yourself/O!/O But/O the/O sufferings/O of/O a/O man/O who/O was/O
your/O husband/O have/O no/O interest/O for/O you/O./O You/O do/On't/O care/O that/O his/O whole/O
life/O is/O ruined/O,/O that/O he/O is/O thuff/O .../O thuff/O.../O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O speaking/O so/O quickly/O that/O he/O stammered/O,/O and/O was/O
utterly/O unable/O to/O articulate/O the/O word/O ``/Osuffering/O./O''/O In/O the/O end/O he/O
pronounced/O it/O ``/Othuffering/O./O''/O She/O wanted/O to/O laugh/O,/O and/O was/O immediately/O
ashamed/O that/O anything/O could/O amuse/O her/O at/O such/O a/O moment/O./O And/O for/O the/O
first/O time/O,/O for/O an/O instant/O,/O she/O felt/O for/O him/O,/O put/O herself/O in/O his/O place/O,/O
and/O was/O sorry/O for/O him/O./O But/O what/O could/O she/O say/O or/O do/O?/O Her/O head/O sank/O,/O and/O
she/O sat/O silent/O./O He/O too/O was/O silent/O for/O some/O time/O,/O and/O then/O began/O speaking/O
in/O a/O frigid/O,/O less/O shrill/O voice/O,/O emphasizing/O random/O words/O that/O had/O no/O
special/O significance/O./O

``/OI/O came/O to/O tell/O you/O.../O''/O he/O said/O./O

She/O glanced/O at/O him/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O it/O was/O my/O fancy/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O recalling/O the/O
expression/O of/O his/O face/O when/O he/O stumbled/O over/O the/O word/O ``/Osuffering/O./O''/O ``/ONo/O;/O
can/O a/O man/O with/O those/O dull/O eyes/O,/O with/O that/O self-satisfied/O complacency/O,/O
feel/O anything/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O can/Onot/O change/O anything/O,/O''/O she/O whispered/O./O

``/OI/O have/O come/O to/O tell/O you/O that/O I/O am/O going/O tomorrow/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O shall/O
not/O return/O again/O to/O this/O house/O,/O and/O you/O will/O receive/O notice/O of/O what/O I/O
decide/O through/O the/O lawyer/O into/O whose/O hands/O I/O shall/O intrust/O the/O task/O of/O
getting/O a/O divorce/O./O My/O son/O is/O going/O to/O my/O sister/O's/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O with/O an/O effort/O recalling/O what/O he/O had/O meant/O to/O say/O about/O
his/O son/O./O

``/OYou/O take/O Seryozha/PERSON to/O hurt/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O looking/O at/O him/O from/O under/O her/O
brows/O./O ``/OYou/O do/O not/O love/O him/O.../O./O Leave/O me/O Seryozha/O!/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O have/O lost/O even/O my/O affection/O for/O my/O son/O,/O because/O he/O is/O associated/O
with/O the/O repulsion/O I/O feel/O for/O you/O./O But/O still/O I/O shall/O take/O him/O./O Goodbye/O!/O''/O

And/O he/O was/O going/O away/O,/O but/O now/O she/O detained/O him/O./O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O leave/O me/O Seryozha/O!/O''/O she/O whispered/O once/O more/O./O ``/OI/O
have/O nothing/O else/O to/O say/O./O Leave/O Seryozha/PERSON till/O my/O .../O I/O shall/O soon/O be/O
confined/O;/O leave/O him/O!/O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON flew/O into/O a/O rage/O,/O and/O,/O snatching/O his/O hand/O from/O
her/O,/O he/O went/O out/O of/O the/O room/O without/O a/O word/O./O



Chapter/O 5/O


The/O waiting-room/O of/O the/O celebrated/O Petersburg/LOCATION lawyer/O was/O full/O when/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON entered/O it/O./O Three/O ladies/O--/Oan/O old/O lady/O,/O a/O young/O
lady/O,/O and/O a/O merchant/O's/O wife/O--/Oand/O three/O gentlemen/O--/Oone/O a/O German/O banker/O with/O
a/O ring/O on/O his/O finger/O,/O the/O second/O a/O merchant/O with/O a/O beard/O,/O and/O the/O third/O
a/O wrathful-looking/O government/O clerk/O in/O official/O uniform/O,/O with/O a/O cross/O on/O
his/O neck/O--/Ohad/O obviously/O been/O waiting/O a/O long/O while/O already/O./O Two/O clerks/O
were/O writing/O at/O tables/O with/O scratching/O pens/O./O The/O appurtenances/O of/O the/O
writing-tables/O,/O about/O which/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O himself/O very/O
fastidious/O,/O were/O exceptionally/O good/O./O He/O could/O not/O help/O observing/O this/O./O
One/O of/O the/O clerks/O,/O without/O getting/O up/O,/O turned/O wrathfully/O to/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O half/O closing/O his/O eyes/O./O ``/OWhat/O are/O you/O wanting/O?/O''/O

He/O replied/O that/O he/O had/O to/O see/O the/O lawyer/O on/O some/O business/O./O

``/OHe/O is/O engaged/O,/O''/O the/O clerk/O responded/O severely/O,/O and/O he/O pointed/O with/O his/O
pen/O at/O the/O persons/O waiting/O,/O and/O went/O on/O writing/O./O

``/OCa/On't/O he/O spare/O time/O to/O see/O me/O?/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OHe/O has/O no/O time/O free/O;/O he/O is/O always/O busy/O./O Kindly/O wait/O your/O turn/O./O''/O

``/OThen/O I/O must/O trouble/O you/O to/O give/O him/O my/O card/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
said/O with/O dignity/O,/O seeing/O the/O impossibility/O of/O preserving/O his/O incognito/O./O

The/O clerk/O took/O the/O card/O and/O,/O obviously/O not/O approving/O of/O what/O he/O read/O on/O
it/O,/O went/O to/O the/O door/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O in/O principle/O in/O favor/O of/O the/O publicity/O of/O
legal/O proceedings/O,/O though/O for/O some/O higher/O official/O considerations/O he/O
disliked/O the/O application/O of/O the/O principle/O in/O Russia/LOCATION,/O and/O disapproved/O of/O
it/O,/O as/O far/O as/O he/O could/O disapprove/O of/O anything/O instituted/O by/O authority/O of/O
the/O Emperor/O./O His/O whole/O life/O had/O been/O spent/O in/O administrative/O work/O,/O and/O
consequently/O,/O when/O he/O did/O not/O approve/O of/O anything/O,/O his/O disapproval/O was/O
softened/O by/O the/O recognition/O of/O the/O inevitability/O of/O mistakes/O and/O the/O
possibility/O of/O reform/O in/O every/O department/O./O In/O the/O new/O public/O law/O courts/O
he/O disliked/O the/O restrictions/O laid/O on/O the/O lawyers/O conducting/O cases/O./O But/O
till/O then/O he/O had/O had/O nothing/O to/O do/O with/O the/O law/O courts/O,/O and/O so/O had/O
disapproved/O of/O their/O publicity/O simply/O in/O theory/O;/O now/O his/O disapprobation/O
was/O strengthened/O by/O the/O unpleasant/O impression/O made/O on/O him/O in/O the/O
lawyer/O's/O waiting/O room/O./O

``/OComing/O immediately/O,/O''/O said/O the/O clerk/O;/O and/O two/O minutes/O later/O there/O did/O
actually/O appear/O in/O the/O doorway/O the/O large/O figure/O of/O an/O old/O solicitor/O who/O
had/O been/O consulting/O with/O the/O lawyer/O himself/O./O

The/O lawyer/O was/O a/O little/O,/O squat/O,/O bald/O man/O,/O with/O a/O dark/O,/O reddish/O beard/O,/O
light-colored/O long/O eyebrows/O,/O and/O an/O overhanging/O brow/O./O He/O was/O attired/O as/O
though/O for/O a/O wedding/O,/O from/O his/O cravat/O to/O his/O double/O watch-chain/O and/O
varnished/O boots/O./O His/O face/O was/O clever/O and/O manly/O,/O but/O his/O dress/O was/O
dandified/O and/O in/O bad/O taste/O./O

``/OPray/O walk/O in/O,/O''/O said/O the/O lawyer/O,/O addressing/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON;/O and/O,/O
gloomily/O ushering/O Karenin/PERSON in/O before/O him/O,/O he/O closed/O the/O door/O./O

``/OWo/On't/O you/O sit/O down/O?/O''/O He/O indicated/O an/O armchair/O at/O a/O writing/O table/O
covered/O with/O papers/O./O He/O sat/O down/O himself/O,/O and/O,/O rubbing/O his/O little/O hands/O
with/O short/O fingers/O covered/O with/O white/O hairs/O,/O he/O bent/O his/O head/O on/O one/O
side/O./O But/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O was/O settled/O in/O this/O position/O a/O moth/O flew/O over/O
the/O table/O./O The/O lawyer/O,/O with/O a/O swiftness/O that/O could/O never/O have/O been/O
expected/O of/O him/O,/O opened/O his/O hands/O,/O caught/O the/O moth/O,/O and/O resumed/O his/O
former/O attitude/O./O

``/OBefore/O beginning/O to/O speak/O of/O my/O business/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O
following/O the/O lawyer/O's/O movements/O with/O wondering/O eyes/O,/O ``/OI/O ought/O to/O
observe/O that/O the/O business/O about/O which/O I/O have/O to/O speak/O to/O you/O is/O to/O be/O
strictly/O private/O./O''/O

The/O lawyer/O's/O overhanging/O reddish/O mustaches/O were/O parted/O in/O a/O scarcely/O
perceptible/O smile/O./O

``/OI/O should/O not/O be/O a/O lawyer/O if/O I/O could/O not/O keep/O the/O secrets/O confided/O to/O
me/O./O But/O if/O you/O would/O like/O proof/O.../O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON glanced/O at/O his/O face/O,/O and/O saw/O that/O the/O shrewd/O,/O gray/O
eyes/O were/O laughing/O,/O and/O seemed/O to/O know/O all/O about/O it/O already/O./O

``/OYou/O know/O my/O name/O?/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON resumed/O./O

``/OI/O know/O you/O and/O the/O good/O''/O--/Oagain/O he/O caught/O a/O moth/O--/O``/Owork/O you/O are/O doing/O,/O
like/O every/O Russian/O,/O''/O said/O the/O lawyer/O,/O bowing/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON sighed/O,/O plucking/O up/O his/O courage/O./O But/O having/O once/O
made/O up/O his/O mind/O he/O went/O on/O in/O his/O shrill/O voice/O,/O without/O timidity/O--/Oor/O
hesitation/O,/O accentuating/O here/O and/O there/O a/O word/O./O

``/OI/O have/O the/O misfortune/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON began/O,/O ``/Oto/O have/O been/O
deceived/O in/O my/O married/O life/O,/O and/O I/O desire/O to/O break/O off/O all/O relations/O
with/O my/O wife/O by/O legal/O means/O--/Othat/O is/O,/O to/O be/O divorced/O,/O but/O to/O do/O this/O so/O
that/O my/O son/O may/O not/O remain/O with/O his/O mother/O./O''/O

The/O lawyer/O's/O gray/O eyes/O tried/O not/O to/O laugh/O,/O but/O they/O were/O dancing/O with/O
irrepressible/O glee/O,/O and/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON saw/O that/O it/O was/O not/O simply/O
the/O delight/O of/O a/O man/O who/O has/O just/O got/O a/O profitable/O job/O:/O there/O was/O
triumph/O and/O joy/O,/O there/O was/O a/O gleam/O like/O the/O malignant/O gleam/O he/O saw/O in/O
his/O wife/O's/O eyes/O./O

``/OYou/O desire/O my/O assistance/O in/O securing/O a/O divorce/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O precisely/O so/O;/O but/O I/O ought/O to/O warn/O you/O that/O I/O may/O be/O wasting/O your/O
time/O and/O attention/O./O I/O have/O come/O simply/O to/O consult/O you/O as/O a/O preliminary/O
step/O./O I/O want/O a/O divorce/O,/O but/O the/O form/O in/O which/O it/O is/O possible/O is/O of/O great/O
consequence/O to/O me/O./O It/O is/O very/O possible/O that/O if/O that/O form/O does/O not/O
correspond/O with/O my/O requirements/O I/O may/O give/O up/O a/O legal/O divorce/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O that/O's/O always/O the/O case/O,/O''/O said/O the/O lawyer/O,/O ``/Oand/O that/O's/O always/O for/O
you/O to/O decide/O./O''/O

He/O let/O his/O eyes/O rest/O on/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O feet/O,/O feeling/O that/O he/O
might/O offend/O his/O client/O by/O the/O sight/O of/O his/O irrepressible/O amusement/O./O He/O
looked/O at/O a/O moth/O that/O flew/O before/O his/O nose/O,/O and/O moved/O his/O hands/O,/O but/O did/O
not/O catch/O it/O from/O regard/O for/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O position/O./O

``/OThough/O in/O their/O general/O features/O our/O laws/O on/O this/O subject/O are/O known/O to/O
me/O,/O''/O pursued/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O ``/OI/O should/O be/O glad/O to/O have/O an/O idea/O of/O
the/O forms/O in/O which/O such/O things/O are/O done/O in/O practice/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O would/O be/O glad/O,/O''/O the/O lawyer/O,/O without/O lifting/O his/O eyes/O,/O responded/O,/O
adopting/O,/O with/O a/O certain/O satisfaction/O,/O the/O tone/O of/O his/O client/O's/O remarks/O,/O
``/Ofor/O me/O to/O lay/O before/O you/O all/O the/O methods/O by/O which/O you/O could/O secure/O what/O
you/O desire/O?/O''/O

And/O on/O receiving/O an/O assuring/O nod/O from/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O he/O went/O on/O,/O
stealing/O a/O glance/O now/O and/O then/O at/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O face/O,/O which/O
was/O growing/O red/O in/O patches/O./O

``/ODivorce/O by/O our/O laws/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O a/O slight/O shade/O of/O disapprobation/O of/O
our/O laws/O,/O ``/Ois/O possible/O,/O as/O you/O are/O aware/O,/O in/O the/O following/O cases/O.../O./O
Wait/O a/O little/O!/O''/O he/O called/O to/O a/O clerk/O who/O put/O his/O head/O in/O at/O the/O door/O,/O
but/O he/O got/O up/O all/O the/O same/O,/O said/O a/O few/O words/O to/O him/O,/O and/O sat/O down/O again/O./O
''/O.../O In/O the/O following/O cases/O:/O physical/O defect/O in/O the/O married/O parties/O,/O
desertion/O without/O communication/O for/O five/O years/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O crooking/O a/O
short/O finger/O covered/O with/O hair/O,/O ``/Oadultery/O''/O -LRB-/Othis/O word/O he/O pronounced/O with/O
obvious/O satisfaction/O-RRB-/O,/O ``/Osubdivided/O as/O follows/O''/O -LRB-/Ohe/O continued/O to/O crook/O
his/O fat/O fingers/O,/O though/O the/O three/O cases/O and/O their/O subdivisions/O could/O
obviously/O not/O be/O classified/O together/O-RRB-/O:/O ``/Ophysical/O defect/O of/O the/O husband/O
or/O of/O the/O wife/O,/O adultery/O of/O the/O husband/O or/O of/O the/O wife/O./O''/O As/O by/O now/O all/O
his/O fingers/O were/O used/O up/O,/O he/O uncrooked/O all/O his/O fingers/O and/O went/O on/O:/O
``/OThis/O is/O the/O theoretical/O view/O;/O but/O I/O imagine/O you/O have/O done/O me/O the/O honor/O
to/O apply/O to/O me/O in/O order/O to/O learn/O its/O application/O in/O practice/O./O And/O
therefore/O,/O guided/O by/O precedents/O,/O I/O must/O inform/O you/O that/O in/O practice/O
cases/O of/O divorce/O may/O all/O be/O reduced/O to/O the/O following/O--/Othere/O's/O no/O physical/O
defect/O,/O I/O may/O assume/O,/O nor/O desertion/O?/O.../O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON bowed/O his/O head/O in/O assent/O./O

''/O--/OMay/O be/O reduced/O to/O the/O following/O:/O adultery/O of/O one/O of/O the/O married/O
