parties/O,/O and/O the/O detection/O in/O the/O fact/O of/O the/O guilty/O party/O by/O mutual/O
agreement/O,/O and/O failing/O such/O agreement/O,/O accidental/O detection/O./O It/O must/O be/O
admitted/O that/O the/O latter/O case/O is/O rarely/O met/O with/O in/O practice/O,/O''/O said/O the/O
lawyer/O,/O and/O stealing/O a/O glance/O at/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON he/O paused/O,/O as/O a/O
man/O selling/O pistols/O,/O after/O enlarging/O on/O the/O advantages/O of/O each/O weapon/O,/O
might/O await/O his/O customer/O's/O choice/O./O But/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON said/O
nothing/O,/O and/O therefore/O the/O lawyer/O went/O on/O:/O ``/OThe/O most/O usual/O and/O simple/O,/O
the/O sensible/O course/O,/O I/O consider/O,/O is/O adultery/O by/O mutual/O consent/O./O I/O should/O
not/O permit/O myself/O to/O express/O it/O so/O,/O speaking/O with/O a/O man/O of/O no/O
education/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/Obut/O I/O imagine/O that/O to/O you/O this/O is/O comprehensible/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O,/O however/O,/O so/O perturbed/O that/O he/O did/O not/O
immediately/O comprehend/O all/O the/O good/O sense/O of/O adultery/O by/O mutual/O consent/O,/O
and/O his/O eyes/O expressed/O this/O uncertainty/O;/O but/O the/O lawyer/O promptly/O came/O to/O
his/O assistance/O./O

``/OPeople/O can/Onot/O go/O on/O living/O together/O--/Ohere/O you/O have/O a/O fact/O./O And/O if/O both/O
are/O agreed/O about/O it/O,/O the/O details/O and/O formalities/O become/O a/O matter/O of/O no/O
importance/O./O And/O at/O the/O same/O time/O this/O is/O the/O simplest/O and/O most/O certain/O
method/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON fully/O understood/O now/O./O But/O he/O had/O religious/O
scruples/O,/O which/O hindered/O the/O execution/O of/O such/O a/O plan/O./O

``/OThat/O is/O out/O of/O the/O question/O in/O the/O present/O case/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OOnly/O one/O
alternative/O is/O possible/O:/O undesigned/O detection/O,/O supported/O by/O letters/O
which/O I/O have/O./O''/O

At/O the/O mention/O of/O letters/O the/O lawyer/O pursed/O up/O his/O lips/O,/O and/O gave/O
utterance/O to/O a/O thin/O little/O compassionate/O and/O contemptuous/O sound/O./O

``/OKindly/O consider/O,/O''/O he/O began/O,/O ``/Ocases/O of/O that/O kind/O are/O,/O as/O you/O are/O aware/O,/O
under/O ecclesiastical/O jurisdiction/O;/O the/O reverend/O fathers/O are/O fond/O of/O
going/O into/O the/O minutest/O details/O in/O cases/O of/O that/O kind/O,/O''/O he/O said/O with/O a/O
smile/O,/O which/O betrayed/O his/O sympathy/O with/O the/O reverend/O fathers/O'/O taste/O./O
``/OLetters/O may/O,/O of/O course/O,/O be/O a/O partial/O confirmation/O;/O but/O detection/O in/O the/O
fact/O there/O must/O be/O of/O the/O most/O direct/O kind/O,/O that/O is/O,/O by/O eyewitnesses/O./O In/O
fact/O,/O if/O you/O do/O me/O the/O honor/O to/O intrust/O your/O confidence/O to/O me/O,/O you/O will/O
do/O well/O to/O leave/O me/O the/O choice/O of/O the/O measures/O to/O be/O employed/O./O If/O one/O
wants/O the/O result/O,/O one/O must/O admit/O the/O means/O./O''/O

``/OIf/O it/O is/O so/O.../O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON began/O,/O suddenly/O turning/O white/O;/O
but/O at/O that/O moment/O the/O lawyer/O rose/O and/O again/O went/O to/O the/O door/O to/O speak/O
to/O the/O intruding/O clerk/O./O

``/OTell/O her/O we/O do/On't/O haggle/O over/O fees/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O returned/O to/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

On/O his/O way/O back/O he/O caught/O unobserved/O another/O moth/O./O ``/ONice/O state/O my/O rep/O
curtains/O will/O be/O in/O by/O the/O summer/O!/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O frowning/O./O

``/OAnd/O so/O you/O were/O saying/O?/O.../O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OI/O will/O communicate/O my/O decision/O to/O you/O by/O letter/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O,/O and/O he/O clutched/O at/O the/O table/O./O After/O standing/O
a/O moment/O in/O silence/O,/O he/O said/O:/O ``/OFrom/O your/O words/O I/O may/O consequently/O
conclude/O that/O a/O divorce/O may/O be/O obtained/O?/O I/O would/O ask/O you/O to/O let/O me/O know/O
what/O are/O your/O terms/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O may/O be/O obtained/O if/O you/O give/O me/O complete/O liberty/O of/O action/O,/O''/O said/O the/O
lawyer/O,/O not/O answering/O his/O question/O./O ``/OWhen/O can/O I/O reckon/O on/O receiving/O

his/O varnished/O boots/O shining/O./O

``/OIn/O a/O week/O's/O time/O./O Your/O answer/O as/O to/O whether/O you/O will/O undertake/O to/O
conduct/O the/O case/O,/O and/O on/O what/O terms/O,/O you/O will/O be/O so/O good/O as/O to/O
communicate/O to/O me/O./O''/O

``/OVery/O good/O./O''/O

The/O lawyer/O bowed/O respectfully/O,/O let/O his/O client/O out/O of/O the/O door/O,/O and/O,/O left/O
alone/O,/O gave/O himself/O up/O to/O his/O sense/O of/O amusement/O./O He/O felt/O so/O mirthful/O
that/O,/O contrary/O to/O his/O rules/O,/O he/O made/O a/O reduction/O in/O his/O terms/O to/O the/O
haggling/O lady/O,/O and/O gave/O up/O catching/O moths/O,/O finally/O deciding/O that/O next/O
winter/O he/O must/O have/O the/O furniture/O covered/O with/O velvet/O,/O like/O Sigonin/PERSON's/O./O



Chapter/O 6/O


Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O gained/O a/O brilliant/O victory/O at/O the/O sitting/O of/O
the/O Commission/ORGANIZATION of/O the/O 17th/O of/O August/O,/O but/O in/O the/O sequel/O this/O victory/O cut/O
the/O ground/O from/O under/O his/O feet/O./O The/O new/O commission/O for/O the/O inquiry/O into/O
the/O condition/O of/O the/O native/O tribes/O in/O all/O its/O branches/O had/O been/O formed/O
and/O despatched/O to/O its/O destination/O with/O an/O unusual/O speed/O and/O energy/O
inspired/O by/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O Within/O three/O months/O a/O report/O was/O
presented/O./O The/O condition/O of/O the/O native/O tribes/O was/O investigated/O in/O its/O
political/O,/O administrative/O,/O economic/O,/O ethnographic/O,/O material/O,/O and/O
religious/O aspects/O./O To/O all/O these/O questions/O there/O were/O answers/O admirably/O
stated/O,/O and/O answers/O admitting/O no/O shade/O of/O doubt/O,/O since/O they/O were/O not/O a/O
product/O of/O human/O thought/O,/O always/O liable/O to/O error/O,/O but/O were/O all/O the/O
product/O of/O official/O activity/O./O The/O answers/O were/O all/O based/O on/O official/O
data/O furnished/O by/O governors/O and/O heads/O of/O churches/O,/O and/O founded/O on/O the/O
reports/O of/O district/O magistrates/O and/O ecclesiastical/O superintendents/O,/O
founded/O in/O their/O turn/O on/O the/O reports/O of/O parochial/O overseers/O and/O parish/O
priests/O;/O and/O so/O all/O of/O these/O answers/O were/O unhesitating/O and/O certain/O./O All/O
such/O questions/O as/O,/O for/O instance/O,/O of/O the/O cause/O of/O failure/O of/O crops/O,/O of/O
the/O adherence/O of/O certain/O tribes/O to/O their/O ancient/O beliefs/O,/O etc./O--/Oquestions/O
which/O,/O but/O for/O the/O convenient/O intervention/O of/O the/O official/O machine/O,/O are/O
not/O,/O and/O can/Onot/O be/O solved/O for/O ages/O--/Oreceived/O full/O,/O unhesitating/O solution/O./O
And/O this/O solution/O was/O in/O favor/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O contention/O./O
But/O Stremov/PERSON,/O who/O had/O felt/O stung/O to/O the/O quick/O at/O the/O last/O sitting/O,/O had/O,/O
on/O the/O reception/O of/O the/O commission/O's/O report/O,/O resorted/O to/O tactics/O which/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O not/O anticipated/O./O Stremov/PERSON,/O carrying/O with/O him/O
several/O members/O,/O went/O over/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O side/O,/O and/O not/O
contenting/O himself/O with/O warmly/O defending/O the/O measure/O proposed/O by/O
Karenin/PERSON,/O proposed/O other/O more/O extreme/O measures/O in/O the/O same/O direction/O./O
These/O measures/O,/O still/O further/O exaggerated/O in/O opposition/O to/O what/O was/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O fundamental/O idea/O,/O were/O passed/O by/O the/O commission/O,/O
and/O then/O the/O aim/O of/O Stremov/PERSON's/O tactics/O became/O apparent/O./O Carried/O to/O an/O
extreme/O,/O the/O measures/O seemed/O at/O once/O to/O be/O so/O absurd/O that/O the/O highest/O
authorities/O,/O and/O public/O opinion/O,/O and/O intellectual/O ladies/O,/O and/O the/O
newspapers/O,/O all/O at/O the/O same/O time/O fell/O foul/O of/O them/O,/O expressing/O their/O
indignation/O both/O with/O the/O measures/O and/O their/O nominal/O father/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O Stremov/PERSON drew/O back/O,/O affecting/O to/O have/O blindly/O followed/O
Karenin/PERSON,/O and/O to/O be/O astounded/O and/O distressed/O at/O what/O had/O been/O done/O./O This/O
meant/O the/O defeat/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O But/O in/O spite/O of/O failing/O
health/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O domestic/O griefs/O,/O he/O did/O not/O give/O in/O./O There/O was/O a/O
split/O in/O the/O commission/O./O Some/O members/O,/O with/O Stremov/PERSON at/O their/O head/O,/O
justified/O their/O mistake/O on/O the/O ground/O that/O they/O had/O put/O faith/O in/O the/O
commission/O of/O revision/O,/O instituted/O by/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O and/O
maintained/O that/O the/O report/O of/O the/O commission/O was/O rubbish/O,/O and/O simply/O so/O
much/O waste/O paper/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O with/O a/O following/O of/O those/O who/O
saw/O the/O danger/O of/O so/O revolutionary/O an/O attitude/O to/O official/O documents/O,/O
persisted/O in/O upholding/O the/O statements/O obtained/O by/O the/O revising/O
commission/O./O In/O consequence/O of/O this/O,/O in/O the/O higher/O spheres/O,/O and/O even/O in/O
society/O,/O all/O was/O chaos/O,/O and/O although/O everyone/O was/O interested/O,/O no/O one/O
could/O tell/O whether/O the/O native/O tribes/O really/O were/O becoming/O impoverished/O
and/O ruined/O,/O or/O whether/O they/O were/O in/O a/O flourishing/O condition/O./O The/O
position/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O owing/O to/O this/O,/O and/O partly/O owing/O to/O
the/O contempt/O lavished/O on/O him/O for/O his/O wife/O's/O infidelity/O,/O became/O very/O
precarious/O./O And/O in/O this/O position/O he/O took/O an/O important/O resolution/O./O To/O the/O
astonishment/O of/O the/O commission/O,/O he/O announced/O that/O he/O should/O ask/O
permission/O to/O go/O himself/O to/O investigate/O the/O question/O on/O the/O spot/O./O And/O
having/O obtained/O permission/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON prepared/O to/O set/O off/O to/O
these/O remote/O provinces/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O departure/O made/O a/O great/O sensation/O,/O the/O more/O so/O as/O
just/O before/O he/O started/O he/O officially/O returned/O the/O posting-fares/O allowed/O
him/O for/O twelve/O horses/O,/O to/O drive/O to/O his/O destination/O./O

``/OI/O think/O it/O very/O noble/O,/O''/O Betsy/PERSON said/O about/O this/O to/O the/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON./O
``/OWhy/O take/O money/O for/O posting-horses/O when/O everyone/O knows/O that/O there/O are/O
railways/O everywhere/O now/O?/O''/O

But/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON did/O not/O agree/O,/O and/O the/O Princess/O Tverskaya/PERSON's/O opinion/O
annoyed/O her/O indeed/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O all/O very/O well/O for/O you/O to/O talk/O,/O''/O said/O she/O,/O ``/Owhen/O you/O have/O I/O do/On't/O
know/O how/O many/O millions/O;/O but/O I/O am/O very/O glad/O when/O my/O husband/O goes/O on/O a/O
revising/O tour/O in/O the/O summer/O./O It/O's/O very/O good/O for/O him/O and/O pleasant/O
traveling/O about/O,/O and/O it/O's/O a/O settled/O arrangement/O for/O me/O to/O keep/O a/O
carriage/O and/O coachman/O on/O the/O money/O./O''/O

On/O his/O way/O to/O the/O remote/O provinces/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON stopped/O for/O
three/O days/O at/O Moscow/LOCATION./O

The/O day/O after/O his/O arrival/O he/O was/O driving/O back/O from/O calling/O on/O the/O
governor-general/O./O At/O the/O crossroads/O by/O Gazetoy/LOCATION Place/LOCATION,/O where/O there/O are/O
always/O crowds/O of/O carriages/O and/O sledges/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON suddenly/O
heard/O his/O name/O called/O out/O in/O such/O a/O loud/O and/O cheerful/O voice/O that/O he/O
could/O not/O help/O looking/O round/O./O At/O the/O corner/O of/O the/O pavement/O,/O in/O a/O short/O,/O
stylish/O overcoat/O and/O a/O low-crowned/O fashionable/O hat/O,/O jauntily/O askew/O,/O with/O
a/O smile/O that/O showed/O a/O gleam/O of/O white/O teeth/O and/O red/O lips/O,/O stood/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O radiant/O,/O young/O,/O and/O beaming/O./O He/O called/O him/O vigorously/O and/O
urgently/O,/O and/O insisted/O on/O his/O stopping/O./O He/O had/O one/O arm/O on/O the/O window/O of/O
a/O carriage/O that/O was/O stopping/O at/O the/O corner/O,/O and/O out/O of/O the/O window/O were/O
thrust/O the/O heads/O of/O a/O lady/O in/O a/O velvet/O hat/O,/O and/O two/O children/O./O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O smiling/O and/O beckoning/O to/O his/O brother-in-law/O./O The/O lady/O
smiled/O a/O kindly/O smile/O too/O,/O and/O she/O too/O waved/O her/O hand/O to/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O It/O was/O Dolly/PERSON with/O her/O children/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON did/O not/O want/O to/O see/O anyone/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O least/O of/O
all/O his/O wife/O's/O brother/O./O He/O raised/O his/O hat/O and/O would/O have/O driven/O on/O,/O but/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON told/O his/O coachman/O to/O stop/O,/O and/O ran/O across/O the/O snow/O
to/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O a/O shame/O not/O to/O have/O let/O us/O know/O!/O Been/O here/O long/O?/O I/O was/O at/O
Dussot/PERSON's/O yesterday/O and/O saw/O `/OKarenin/PERSON'/O on/O the/O visitors/O'/O list/O,/O but/O it/O never/O
entered/O my/O head/O that/O it/O was/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O sticking/O his/O
head/O in/O at/O the/O window/O of/O the/O carriage/O,/O ``/Oor/O I/O should/O have/O looked/O you/O up/O./O
I/O am/O glad/O to/O see/O you/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O knocking/O one/O foot/O against/O the/O other/O to/O
shake/O the/O snow/O off/O./O ``/OWhat/O a/O shame/O of/O you/O not/O to/O let/O us/O know/O!/O''/O he/O
repeated/O./O

``/OI/O had/O no/O time/O;/O I/O am/O very/O busy/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON responded/O dryly/O./O

``/OCome/O to/O my/O wife/O,/O she/O does/O so/O want/O to/O see/O you/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON unfolded/O the/O rug/O in/O which/O his/O frozen/O feet/O were/O
wrapped/O,/O and/O getting/O out/O of/O his/O carriage/O made/O his/O way/O over/O the/O snow/O to/O
Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON./O

``/OWhy/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O what/O are/O you/O cutting/O us/O like/O this/O for/O?/O''/O
said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/OI/O was/O very/O busy/O./O Delighted/O to/O see/O you/O!/O''/O he/O said/O in/O a/O tone/O clearly/O
indicating/O that/O he/O was/O annoyed/O by/O it/O./O ``/OHow/O are/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OTell/O me/O,/O how/O is/O my/O darling/O Anna/PERSON?/O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON mumbled/O something/O and/O would/O have/O gone/O on/O./O But/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON stopped/O him/O./O

``/OI/O tell/O you/O what/O we/O'll/O do/O tomorrow/O./O Dolly/PERSON,/O ask/O him/O to/O dinner/O./O We/O'll/O ask/O
Koznishev/PERSON and/O Pestsov/PERSON,/O so/O as/O to/O entertain/O him/O with/O our/O Moscow/LOCATION
celebrities/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O please/O,/O do/O come/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON;/O ``/Owe/O will/O expect/O you/O at/O five/O,/O or/O six/O
o'clock/O,/O if/O you/O like/O./O How/O is/O my/O darling/O Anna/PERSON?/O How/O long/O.../O''/O

``/OShe/O is/O quite/O well/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON mumbled/O,/O frowning/O./O
``/ODelighted/O!/O''/O and/O he/O moved/O away/O towards/O his/O carriage/O./O

``/OYou/O will/O come/O?/O''/O Dolly/PERSON called/O after/O him/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON said/O something/O which/O Dolly/PERSON could/O not/O catch/O in/O the/O
noise/O of/O the/O moving/O carriages/O./O

``/OI/O shall/O come/O round/O tomorrow/O!/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON shouted/O to/O him/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON got/O into/O his/O carriage/O,/O and/O buried/O himself/O in/O it/O so/O
as/O neither/O to/O see/O nor/O be/O seen/O./O

``/OQueer/O fish/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON to/O his/O wife/O,/O and/O glancing/O at/O his/O
watch/O,/O he/O made/O a/O motion/O of/O his/O hand/O before/O his/O face/O,/O indicating/O a/O caress/O
to/O his/O wife/O and/O children/O,/O and/O walked/O jauntily/O along/O the/O pavement/O./O

``/OStiva/O!/O Stiva/O!/O''/O Dolly/PERSON called/O,/O reddening/O./O

He/O turned/O round/O./O

``/OI/O must/O get/O coats/O,/O you/O know/O,/O for/O Grisha/PERSON and/O Tanya/PERSON./O Give/O me/O the/O money/O./O''/O

``/ONever/O mind/O;/O you/O tell/O them/O I/O'll/O pay/O the/O bill/O!/O''/O and/O he/O vanished/O,/O nodding/O
genially/O to/O an/O acquaintance/O who/O drove/O by/O./O



Chapter/O 7/O


The/O next/O day/O was/O Sunday/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON went/O to/O the/O Grand/O Theater/O
to/O a/O rehearsal/O of/O the/O ballet/O,/O and/O gave/O Masha/PERSON Tchibisova/PERSON,/O a/O pretty/O
dancing-girl/O whom/O he/O had/O just/O taken/O under/O his/O protection/O,/O the/O coral/O
necklace/O he/O had/O promised/O her/O the/O evening/O before/O,/O and/O behind/O the/O scenes/O
in/O the/O dim/O daylight/O of/O the/O theater/O,/O managed/O to/O kiss/O her/O pretty/O little/O
face/O,/O radiant/O over/O her/O present/O./O Besides/O the/O gift/O of/O the/O necklace/O he/O
wanted/O to/O arrange/O with/O her/O about/O meeting/O after/O the/O ballet/O./O After/O
explaining/O that/O he/O could/O not/O come/O at/O the/O beginning/O of/O the/O ballet/O,/O he/O
promised/O he/O would/O come/O for/O the/O last/O act/O and/O take/O her/O to/O supper/O./O From/O the/O
theater/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON drove/O to/O Ohotny/PERSON Row/PERSON,/O selected/O himself/O the/O
fish/O and/O asparagus/O for/O dinner/O,/O and/O by/O twelve/O o'clock/O was/O at/O Dussot/PERSON's/O,/O
where/O he/O had/O to/O see/O three/O people/O,/O luckily/O all/O staying/O at/O the/O same/O hotel/O:/O
Levin/PERSON,/O who/O had/O recently/O come/O back/O from/O abroad/O and/O was/O staying/O there/O;/O the/O
new/O head/O of/O his/O department/O,/O who/O had/O just/O been/O promoted/O to/O that/O position/O,/O
and/O had/O come/O on/O a/O tour/O of/O revision/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION;/O and/O his/O brother-in-law/O,/O
Karenin/PERSON,/O whom/O he/O must/O see/O,/O so/O as/O to/O be/O sure/O of/O bringing/O him/O to/O dinner/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON liked/O dining/O,/O but/O still/O better/O he/O liked/O to/O give/O a/O
dinner/O,/O small/O,/O but/O very/O choice/O,/O both/O as/O regards/O the/O food/O and/O drink/O and/O
as/O regards/O the/O selection/O of/O guests/O./O He/O particularly/O liked/O the/O program/O of/O
that/O day/O's/O dinner/O./O There/O would/O be/O fresh/O perch/O,/O asparagus/O,/O and/O _/Ola/O pièce/O
de/O resistance/O_/O--/Ofirst-rate/O,/O but/O quite/O plain/O,/O roast/O beef/O,/O and/O wines/O to/O
suit/O:/O so/O much/O for/O the/O eating/O and/O drinking/O./O Kitty/PERSON and/O Levin/PERSON would/O be/O of/O
the/O party/O,/O and/O that/O this/O might/O not/O be/O obtrusively/O evident/O,/O there/O would/O
be/O a/O girl/O cousin/O too/O,/O and/O young/O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O and/O _/Ola/O pièce/O de/O
resistance/O_/O among/O the/O guests/O--/OSergey/PERSON Koznishev/PERSON and/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O a/O Moscow/LOCATION man/O,/O and/O a/O philosopher/O;/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON a/O Petersburger/O,/O and/O a/O practical/O politician/O./O He/O was/O
asking/O,/O too/O,/O the/O well-known/O eccentric/O enthusiast/O,/O Pestsov/PERSON,/O a/O liberal/O,/O a/O
great/O talker/O,/O a/O musician/O,/O an/O historian/O,/O and/O the/O most/O delightfully/O
youthful/O person/O of/O fifty/O,/O who/O would/O be/O a/O sauce/O or/O garnish/O for/O Koznishev/LOCATION
and/O Karenin/PERSON./O He/O would/O provoke/O them/O and/O set/O them/O off/O./O

The/O second/O installment/O for/O the/O forest/O had/O been/O received/O from/O the/O
merchant/O and/O was/O not/O yet/O exhausted/O;/O Dolly/PERSON had/O been/O very/O amiable/O and/O
goodhumored/O of/O late/O,/O and/O the/O idea/O of/O the/O dinner/O pleased/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON from/O every/O point/O of/O view/O./O He/O was/O in/O the/O most/O light-hearted/O
mood/O./O There/O were/O two/O circumstances/O a/O little/O unpleasant/O,/O but/O these/O two/O
circumstances/O were/O drowned/O in/O the/O sea/O of/O good-humored/O gaiety/O which/O
flooded/O the/O soul/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O These/O two/O circumstances/O were/O:/O
first/O,/O that/O on/O meeting/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON the/O day/O before/O in/O the/O
street/O he/O had/O noticed/O that/O he/O was/O cold/O and/O reserved/O with/O him/O,/O and/O
putting/O the/O expression/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O face/O and/O the/O fact/O that/O
he/O had/O not/O come/O to/O see/O them/O or/O let/O them/O know/O of/O his/O arrival/O with/O the/O
rumors/O he/O had/O heard/O about/O Anna/PERSON and/O Vronsky/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON guessed/O
that/O something/O was/O wrong/O between/O the/O husband/O and/O wife/O./O

That/O was/O one/O disagreeable/O thing/O./O The/O other/O slightly/O disagreeable/O fact/O
was/O that/O the/O new/O head/O of/O his/O department/O,/O like/O all/O new/O heads/O,/O had/O the/O
reputation/O already/O of/O a/O terrible/O person/O,/O who/O got/O up/O at/O six/O o'clock/O in/O
the/O morning/O,/O worked/O like/O a/O horse/O,/O and/O insisted/O on/O his/O subordinates/O
working/O in/O the/O same/O way/O./O Moreover/O,/O this/O new/O head/O had/O the/O further/O
reputation/O of/O being/O a/O bear/O in/O his/O manners/O,/O and/O was/O,/O according/O to/O all/O
reports/O,/O a/O man/O of/O a/O class/O in/O all/O respects/O the/O opposite/O of/O that/O to/O which/O
his/O predecessor/O had/O belonged/O,/O and/O to/O which/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O
hitherto/O belonged/O himself/O./O On/O the/O previous/O day/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O
appeared/O at/O the/O office/O in/O a/O uniform/O,/O and/O the/O new/O chief/O had/O been/O very/O
affable/O and/O had/O talked/O to/O him/O as/O to/O an/O acquaintance/O./O Consequently/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON deemed/O it/O his/O duty/O to/O call/O upon/O him/O in/O his/O non-official/O
dress/O./O The/O thought/O that/O the/O new/O chief/O might/O not/O tender/O him/O a/O warm/O
reception/O was/O the/O other/O unpleasant/O thing/O./O But/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
instinctively/O felt/O that/O everything/O would/O _/Ocome/O round/O_/O all/O right/O./O
``/OThey/O're/O all/O people/O,/O all/O men/O,/O like/O us/O poor/O sinners/O;/O why/O be/O nasty/O and/O
quarrelsome/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O as/O he/O went/O into/O the/O hotel/O./O

``/OGood-day/O,/O Vassily/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O walking/O into/O the/O corridor/O with/O his/O hat/O
cocked/O on/O one/O side/O,/O and/O addressing/O a/O footman/O he/O knew/O;/O ``/Owhy/O,/O you/O've/O let/O
your/O whiskers/O grow/O!/O Levin/PERSON,/O number/O seven/O,/O eh/O?/O Take/O me/O up/O,/O please/O./O And/O
find/O out/O whether/O Count/O Anitchkin/O''/O -LRB-/Othis/O was/O the/O new/O head/O-RRB-/O ``/Ois/O
receiving/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O sir/O,/O''/O Vassily/PERSON responded/O,/O smiling/O./O ``/OYou/O've/O not/O been/O to/O see/O us/O for/O a/O
long/O while/O./O''/O

``/OI/O was/O here/O yesterday/O,/O but/O at/O the/O other/O entrance/O./O Is/O this/O number/O seven/O?/O''/O

Levin/PERSON was/O standing/O with/O a/O peasant/O from/O Tver/LOCATION in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O room/O,/O
measuring/O a/O fresh/O bearskin/O,/O when/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON went/O in/O./O

``/OWhat/O!/O you/O killed/O him/O?/O''/O cried/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OWell/O done/O!/O A/O
she-bear/O?/O How/O are/O you/O,/O Arhip/O!/O''/O

He/O shook/O hands/O with/O the/O peasant/O and/O sat/O down/O on/O the/O edge/O of/O a/O chair/O,/O
without/O taking/O off/O his/O coat/O and/O hat/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O take/O off/O your/O coat/O and/O stay/O a/O little/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O taking/O his/O
hat/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O have/On't/O time/O;/O I/O've/O only/O looked/O in/O for/O a/O tiny/O second/O,/O''/O answered/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O He/O threw/O open/O his/O coat/O,/O but/O afterwards/O did/O take/O it/O
off/O,/O and/O sat/O on/O for/O a/O whole/O hour/O,/O talking/O to/O Levin/PERSON about/O hunting/O and/O the/O
most/O intimate/O subjects/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O tell/O me/O,/O please/O,/O what/O you/O did/O abroad/O?/O Where/O have/O you/O been/O?/O''/O said/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O when/O the/O peasant/O had/O gone/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O stayed/O in/O Germany/LOCATION,/O in/O Prussia/LOCATION,/O in/O France/LOCATION,/O and/O in/O England/LOCATION--/Onot/O in/O
the/O capitals/O,/O but/O in/O the/O manufacturing/O towns/O,/O and/O saw/O a/O great/O deal/O that/O
was/O new/O to/O me/O./O And/O I/O'm/O glad/O I/O went/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O knew/O your/O idea/O of/O the/O solution/O of/O the/O labor/O question/O./O''/O

``/ONot/O a/O bit/O:/O in/O Russia/LOCATION there/O can/O be/O no/O labor/O question/O./O In/O Russia/LOCATION the/O
question/O is/O that/O of/O the/O relation/O of/O the/O working/O people/O to/O the/O land/O;/O
though/O the/O question/O exists/O there/O too/O--/Obut/O there/O it/O's/O a/O matter/O of/O
repairing/O what/O's/O been/O ruined/O,/O while/O with/O us/O.../O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON listened/O attentively/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/Oit/O's/O very/O possible/O you/O're/O right/O./O But/O I/O'm/O glad/O
you/O're/O in/O good/O spirits/O,/O and/O are/O hunting/O bears/O,/O and/O working/O,/O and/O
interested/O./O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON told/O me/O another/O story/O--/Ohe/O met/O you/O--/Othat/O you/O were/O
in/O such/O a/O depressed/O state/O,/O talking/O of/O nothing/O but/O death/O.../O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O of/O it/O?/O I/O've/O not/O given/O up/O thinking/O of/O death/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O
``/OIt/O's/O true/O that/O it/O's/O high/O time/O I/O was/O dead/O;/O and/O that/O all/O this/O is/O
nonsense/O./O It/O's/O the/O truth/O I/O'm/O telling/O you/O./O I/O do/O value/O my/O idea/O and/O my/O work/O
awfully/O;/O but/O in/O reality/O only/O consider/O this/O:/O all/O this/O world/O of/O ours/O is/O
nothing/O but/O a/O speck/O of/O mildew/O,/O which/O has/O grown/O up/O on/O a/O tiny/O planet/O./O And/O
for/O us/O to/O suppose/O we/O can/O have/O something/O great/O--/Oideas/O,/O work/O--/Oit/O's/O all/O dust/O
and/O ashes/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O all/O that/O's/O as/O old/O as/O the/O hills/O,/O my/O boy/O!/O''/O

``/OIt/O is/O old/O;/O but/O do/O you/O know/O,/O when/O you/O grasp/O this/O fully/O,/O then/O somehow/O
everything/O becomes/O of/O no/O consequence/O./O When/O you/O understand/O that/O you/O will/O
die/O tomorrow/O,/O if/O not/O today/O,/O and/O nothing/O will/O be/O left/O,/O then/O everything/O is/O
so/O unimportant/O!/O And/O I/O consider/O my/O idea/O very/O important/O,/O but/O it/O turns/O out/O
really/O to/O be/O as/O unimportant/O too/O,/O even/O if/O it/O were/O carried/O out/O,/O as/O doing/O
for/O that/O bear/O./O So/O one/O goes/O on/O living/O,/O amusing/O oneself/O with/O hunting/O,/O with/O
work/O--/Oanything/O so/O as/O not/O to/O think/O of/O death/O!/O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON smiled/O a/O subtle/O affectionate/O smile/O as/O he/O listened/O to/O
Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O of/O course/O!/O Here/O you/O've/O come/O round/O to/O my/O point/O./O Do/O you/O remember/O
you/O attacked/O me/O for/O seeking/O enjoyment/O in/O life/O?/O Do/On't/O be/O so/O severe/O,/O O/O
moralist/O!/O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O all/O the/O same/O,/O what/O's/O fine/O in/O life/O is/O.../O''/O Levin/PERSON hesitated/O--/O``/Ooh/O,/O I/O
do/On't/O know/O./O All/O I/O know/O is/O that/O we/O shall/O soon/O be/O dead/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O so/O soon/O?/O''/O

``/OAnd/O do/O you/O know/O,/O there/O's/O less/O charm/O in/O life/O,/O when/O one/O thinks/O of/O death/O,/O
but/O there/O's/O more/O peace/O./O''/O

``/OOn/O the/O contrary/O,/O the/O finish/O is/O always/O the/O best/O./O But/O I/O must/O be/O going/O,/O''/O
said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O for/O the/O tenth/O time/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O stay/O a/O bit/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O keeping/O him/O./O ``/ONow/O,/O when/O shall/O we/O see/O
each/O other/O again/O?/O I/O'm/O going/O tomorrow/O./O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O a/O nice/O person/O!/O Why/O,/O that/O's/O just/O what/O I/O came/O for/O!/O You/O simply/O must/O
come/O to/O dinner/O with/O us/O today/O./O Your/O brother/O's/O coming/O,/O and/O Karenin/PERSON,/O my/O
brother-in-law/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O mean/O to/O say/O he/O's/O here/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O he/O wanted/O to/O inquire/O
about/O Kitty/PERSON./O He/O had/O heard/O at/O the/O beginning/O of/O the/O winter/O that/O she/O was/O at/O
Petersburg/LOCATION with/O her/O sister/O,/O the/O wife/O of/O the/O diplomat/O,/O and/O he/O did/O not/O
know/O whether/O she/O had/O come/O back/O or/O not/O;/O but/O he/O changed/O his/O mind/O and/O did/O
not/O ask/O./O ``/OWhether/O she/O's/O coming/O or/O not/O,/O I/O do/On't/O care/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O
himself/O./O

``/OSo/O you/O'll/O come/O?/O''/O

``/OOf/O course/O./O''/O

``/OAt/O five/O o'clock/O,/O then/O,/O and/O not/O evening/O dress/O./O''/O

And/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON got/O up/O and/O went/O down/O below/O to/O the/O new/O head/O of/O
his/O department/O./O Instinct/O had/O not/O misled/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O The/O
terrible/O new/O head/O turned/O out/O to/O be/O an/O extremely/O amenable/O person/O,/O and/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON lunched/O with/O him/O and/O stayed/O on/O,/O so/O that/O it/O was/O four/O
o'clock/O before/O he/O got/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O



Chapter/O 8/O


Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O on/O coming/O back/O from/O church/O service/O,/O had/O spent/O the/O
whole/O morning/O indoors/O./O He/O had/O two/O pieces/O of/O business/O before/O him/O that/O
morning/O;/O first/O,/O to/O receive/O and/O send/O on/O a/O deputation/O from/O the/O native/O
tribes/O which/O was/O on/O its/O way/O to/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O now/O at/O Moscow/LOCATION;/O secondly/O,/O
to/O write/O the/O promised/O letter/O to/O the/O lawyer/O./O The/O deputation/O,/O though/O it/O
had/O been/O summoned/O at/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O instigation/O,/O was/O not/O
without/O its/O discomforting/O and/O even/O dangerous/O aspect/O,/O and/O he/O was/O glad/O he/O
had/O found/O it/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION./O The/O members/O of/O this/O deputation/O had/O not/O the/O
slightest/O conception/O of/O their/O duty/O and/O the/O part/O they/O were/O to/O play/O./O They/O
naïvely/O believed/O that/O it/O was/O their/O business/O to/O lay/O before/O the/O commission/O
their/O needs/O and/O the/O actual/O condition/O of/O things/O,/O and/O to/O ask/O assistance/O of/O
the/O government/O,/O and/O utterly/O failed/O to/O grasp/O that/O some/O of/O their/O
statements/O and/O requests/O supported/O the/O contention/O of/O the/O enemy/O's/O side/O,/O
and/O so/O spoiled/O the/O whole/O business/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O busily/O
engaged/O with/O them/O for/O a/O long/O while/O,/O drew/O up/O a/O program/O for/O them/O from/O
which/O they/O were/O not/O to/O depart/O,/O and/O on/O dismissing/O them/O wrote/O a/O letter/O to/O
Petersburg/LOCATION for/O the/O guidance/O of/O the/O deputation/O./O He/O had/O his/O chief/O support/O
in/O this/O affair/O in/O the/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O She/O was/O a/O specialist/O in/O
the/O matter/O of/O deputations/O,/O and/O no/O one/O knew/O better/O than/O she/O how/O to/O manage/O
them/O,/O and/O put/O them/O in/O the/O way/O they/O should/O go/O./O Having/O completed/O this/O
task/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON wrote/O the/O letter/O to/O the/O lawyer/O./O Without/O the/O
slightest/O hesitation/O he/O gave/O him/O permission/O to/O act/O as/O he/O might/O judge/O
best/O./O In/O the/O letter/O he/O enclosed/O three/O of/O Vronsky/O's/O notes/O to/O Anna/PERSON,/O which/O
were/O in/O the/O portfolio/O he/O had/O taken/O away/O./O

Since/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O left/O home/O with/O the/O intention/O of/O not/O
returning/O to/O his/O family/O again/O,/O and/O since/O he/O had/O been/O at/O the/O lawyer/O's/O and/O
had/O spoken/O,/O though/O only/O to/O one/O man/O,/O of/O his/O intention/O,/O since/O especially/O
he/O had/O translated/O the/O matter/O from/O the/O world/O of/O real/O life/O to/O the/O world/O of/O
ink/O and/O paper/O,/O he/O had/O grown/O more/O and/O more/O used/O to/O his/O own/O intention/O,/O and/O
by/O now/O distinctly/O perceived/O the/O feasibility/O of/O its/O execution/O./O

He/O was/O sealing/O the/O envelope/O to/O the/O lawyer/O,/O when/O he/O heard/O the/O loud/O tones/O
of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O voice/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O disputing/O with/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O servant/O,/O and/O insisting/O on/O being/O announced/O./O

``/ONo/O matter/O,/O''/O thought/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O ``/Oso/O much/O the/O better/O./O I/O will/O
inform/O him/O at/O once/O of/O my/O position/O in/O regard/O to/O his/O sister/O,/O and/O explain/O
why/O it/O is/O I/O ca/On't/O dine/O with/O him/O./O''/O

``/OCome/O in/O!/O''/O he/O said/O aloud/O,/O collecting/O his/O papers/O,/O and/O putting/O them/O in/O the/O
blotting-paper/O./O

``/OThere/O,/O you/O see/O,/O you/O're/O talking/O nonsense/O,/O and/O he/O's/O at/O home/O!/O''/O responded/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O voice/O,/O addressing/O the/O servant/O,/O who/O had/O refused/O to/O
let/O him/O in/O,/O and/O taking/O off/O his/O coat/O as/O he/O went/O,/O Oblonsky/PERSON walked/O into/O the/O
room/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O I/O'm/O awfully/O glad/O I/O've/O found/O you/O!/O So/O I/O hope/O.../O''/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON began/O cheerfully/O./O

``/OI/O can/Onot/O come/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON said/O coldly/O,/O standing/O and/O not/O
asking/O his/O visitor/O to/O sit/O down/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O thought/O to/O pass/O at/O once/O into/O those/O frigid/O
relations/O in/O which/O he/O ought/O to/O stand/O with/O the/O brother/O of/O a/O wife/O against/O
whom/O he/O was/O beginning/O a/O suit/O for/O divorce/O./O But/O he/O had/O not/O taken/O into/O
account/O the/O ocean/O of/O kindliness/O brimming/O over/O in/O the/O heart/O of/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON opened/O wide/O his/O clear/O,/O shining/O eyes/O./O

``/OWhy/O ca/On't/O you/O?/O What/O do/O you/O mean/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O in/O perplexity/O,/O speaking/O in/O
French/O./O ``/OOh/O,/O but/O it/O's/O a/O promise/O./O And/O we/O're/O all/O counting/O on/O you/O./O''/O

``/OI/O want/O to/O tell/O you/O that/O I/O ca/On't/O dine/O at/O your/O house/O,/O because/O the/O terms/O
of/O relationship/O which/O have/O existed/O between/O us/O must/O cease/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O?/O How/O do/O you/O mean/O?/O What/O for/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON with/O a/O smile/O./O

``/OBecause/O I/O am/O beginning/O an/O action/O for/O divorce/O against/O your/O sister/O,/O my/O
wife/O./O I/O ought/O to/O have/O.../O''/O

But/O,/O before/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O time/O to/O finish/O his/O sentence/O,/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O behaving/O not/O at/O all/O as/O he/O had/O expected/O./O He/O
groaned/O and/O sank/O into/O an/O armchair/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON!/O What/O are/O you/O saying/O?/O''/O cried/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O and/O
his/O suffering/O was/O apparent/O in/O his/O face/O./O

``/OIt/O is/O so/O./O''/O

``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O believe/O it/O!/O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON sat/O down/O,/O feeling/O that/O his/O words/O had/O not/O had/O the/O
effect/O he/O anticipated/O,/O and/O that/O it/O would/O be/O unavoidable/O for/O him/O to/O
explain/O his/O position/O,/O and/O that/O,/O whatever/O explanations/O he/O might/O make/O,/O his/O
relations/O with/O his/O brother-in-law/O would/O remain/O unchanged/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O am/O brought/O to/O the/O painful/O necessity/O of/O seeking/O a/O divorce/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O./O

``/OI/O will/O say/O one/O thing/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O I/O know/O you/O for/O an/O
excellent/O,/O upright/O man/O;/O I/O know/O Anna/PERSON--/Oexcuse/O me/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O change/O my/O opinion/O
of/O her/O--/Ofor/O a/O good/O,/O an/O excellent/O woman/O;/O and/O so/O,/O excuse/O me/O,/O I/O can/Onot/O
believe/O it/O./O There/O is/O some/O misunderstanding/O,/O''/O said/O he/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O if/O it/O were/O merely/O a/O misunderstanding/O!/O.../O''/O

``/OPardon/O,/O I/O understand/O,/O''/O interposed/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OBut/O of/O
course/O.../O./O One/O thing/O:/O you/O must/O not/O act/O in/O haste/O./O You/O must/O not/O,/O you/O must/O
not/O act/O in/O haste/O!/O''/O

``/OI/O am/O not/O acting/O in/O haste/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON said/O coldly/O,/O ``/Obut/O one/O
can/Onot/O ask/O advice/O of/O anyone/O in/O such/O a/O matter/O./O I/O have/O quite/O made/O up/O my/O
mind/O./O''/O

``/OThis/O is/O awful/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OI/O would/O do/O one/O thing/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O I/O beseech/O you/O,/O do/O it/O!/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/ONo/O action/O has/O yet/O been/O
taken/O,/O if/O I/O understand/O rightly/O./O Before/O you/O take/O advice/O,/O see/O my/O wife/O,/O
talk/O to/O her/O./O She/O loves/O Anna/PERSON like/O a/O sister/O,/O she/O loves/O you/O,/O and/O she/O's/O a/O
wonderful/O woman/O./O For/O God/O's/O sake/O,/O talk/O to/O her/O!/O Do/O me/O that/O favor/O,/O I/O
beseech/O you/O!/O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON pondered/O,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON looked/O at/O him/O
sympathetically/O,/O without/O interrupting/O his/O silence/O./O

``/OYou/O will/O go/O to/O see/O her/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O./O That/O was/O just/O why/O I/O have/O not/O been/O to/O see/O you/O./O I/O imagine/O
our/O relations/O must/O change/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O so/O?/O I/O do/On't/O see/O that/O./O Allow/O me/O to/O believe/O that/O apart/O from/O our/O
connection/O you/O have/O for/O me/O,/O at/O least/O in/O part/O,/O the/O same/O friendly/O feeling/O
I/O have/O always/O had/O for/O you/O .../O and/O sincere/O esteem/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O pressing/O his/O hand/O./O ``/OEven/O if/O your/O worst/O suppositions/O were/O
correct/O,/O I/O do/On't/O--/Oand/O never/O would/O--/Otake/O on/O myself/O to/O judge/O either/O side/O,/O
and/O I/O see/O no/O reason/O why/O our/O relations/O should/O be/O affected/O./O But/O now/O,/O do/O
this/O,/O come/O and/O see/O my/O wife/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O we/O look/O at/O the/O matter/O differently/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
coldly/O./O ``/OHowever/O,/O we/O wo/On't/O discuss/O it/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O why/O should/On't/O you/O come/O today/O to/O dine/O,/O anyway/O?/O My/O wife/O's/O expecting/O
you/O./O Please/O,/O do/O come/O./O And/O,/O above/O all/O,/O talk/O it/O over/O with/O her/O./O She/O's/O a/O
wonderful/O woman/O./O For/O God/O's/O sake/O,/O on/O my/O knees/O,/O I/O implore/O you/O!/O''/O

``/OIf/O you/O so/O much/O wish/O it/O,/O I/O will/O come/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O
sighing/O./O

And/O,/O anxious/O to/O change/O the/O conversation/O,/O he/O inquired/O about/O what/O
interested/O them/O both/O--/Othe/O new/O head/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O department/O,/O a/O
man/O not/O yet/O old/O,/O who/O had/O suddenly/O been/O promoted/O to/O so/O high/O a/O position/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O previously/O felt/O no/O liking/O for/O Count/O Anitchkin/PERSON,/O
and/O had/O always/O differed/O from/O him/O in/O his/O opinions/O./O But/O now/O,/O from/O a/O
feeling/O readily/O comprehensible/O to/O officials/O--/Othat/O hatred/O felt/O by/O one/O who/O
has/O suffered/O a/O defeat/O in/O the/O service/O for/O one/O who/O has/O received/O a/O
promotion/O,/O he/O could/O not/O endure/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O have/O you/O seen/O him/O?/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON with/O a/O malignant/O
smile/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O;/O he/O was/O at/O our/O sitting/O yesterday/O./O He/O seems/O to/O know/O his/O work/O
capitally/O,/O and/O to/O be/O very/O energetic/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O what/O is/O his/O energy/O directed/O to/O?/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O
``/OIs/O he/O aiming/O at/O doing/O anything/O,/O or/O simply/O undoing/O what/O's/O been/O done/O?/O
It/O's/O the/O great/O misfortune/O of/O our/O government/O--/Othis/O paper/O administration/O,/O
of/O which/O he/O's/O a/O worthy/O representative/O./O''/O

``/OReally/O,/O I/O do/On't/O know/O what/O fault/O one/O could/O find/O with/O him/O./O His/O policy/O I/O
do/On't/O know/O,/O but/O one/O thing/O--/Ohe/O's/O a/O very/O nice/O fellow/O,/O''/O answered/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OI/O've/O just/O been/O seeing/O him/O,/O and/O he/O's/O really/O a/O capital/O
fellow/O./O We/O lunched/O together/O,/O and/O I/O taught/O him/O how/O to/O make/O,/O you/O know/O that/O
drink/O,/O wine/O and/O oranges/O./O It/O's/O so/O cooling/O./O And/O it/O's/O a/O wonder/O he/O did/On't/O
know/O it/O./O He/O liked/O it/O awfully/O./O No/O,/O really/O he/O's/O a/O capital/O fellow/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON glanced/O at/O his/O watch/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O good/O heavens/O,/O it/O's/O four/O already/O,/O and/O I/O've/O still/O to/O go/O to/O
Dolgovushin/PERSON's/O!/O So/O please/O come/O round/O to/O dinner/O./O You/O ca/On't/O imagine/O how/O you/O
will/O grieve/O my/O wife/O and/O me/O./O''/O

The/O way/O in/O which/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON saw/O his/O brother-in-law/O out/O was/O
very/O different/O from/O the/O manner/O in/O which/O he/O had/O met/O him/O./O

``/OI/O've/O promised/O,/O and/O I/O'll/O come/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O wearily/O./O

``/OBelieve/O me/O,/O I/O appreciate/O it/O,/O and/O I/O hope/O you/O wo/On't/O regret/O it/O,/O''/O answered/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

And/O,/O putting/O on/O his/O coat/O as/O he/O went/O,/O he/O patted/O the/O footman/O on/O the/O head/O,/O
chuckled/O,/O and/O went/O out/O./O

``/OAt/O five/O o'clock/O,/O and/O not/O evening/O dress/O,/O please/O,/O''/O he/O shouted/O once/O more/O,/O
turning/O at/O the/O door/O./O



Chapter/O 9/O


It/O was/O past/O five/O,/O and/O several/O guests/O had/O already/O arrived/O,/O before/O the/O
host/O himself/O got/O home/O./O He/O went/O in/O together/O with/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
Koznishev/PERSON and/O Pestsov/PERSON,/O who/O had/O reached/O the/O street/O door/O at/O the/O same/O
moment/O./O These/O were/O the/O two/O leading/O representatives/O of/O the/O Moscow/LOCATION
intellectuals/O,/O as/O Oblonsky/PERSON had/O called/O them/O./O Both/O were/O men/O respected/O for/O
their/O character/O and/O their/O intelligence/O./O They/O respected/O each/O other/O,/O but/O
were/O in/O complete/O and/O hopeless/O disagreement/O upon/O almost/O every/O subject/O,/O
not/O because/O they/O belonged/O to/O opposite/O parties/O,/O but/O precisely/O because/O
they/O were/O of/O the/O same/O party/O -LRB-/Otheir/O enemies/O refused/O to/O see/O any/O
distinction/O between/O their/O views/O-RRB-/O;/O but/O,/O in/O that/O party/O,/O each/O had/O his/O own/O
special/O shade/O of/O opinion/O./O And/O since/O no/O difference/O is/O less/O easily/O
overcome/O than/O the/O difference/O of/O opinion/O about/O semi-abstract/O questions/O,/O
they/O never/O agreed/O in/O any/O opinion/O,/O and/O had/O long/O,/O indeed/O,/O been/O accustomed/O
to/O jeer/O without/O anger/O,/O each/O at/O the/O other/O's/O incorrigible/O aberrations/O./O

They/O were/O just/O going/O in/O at/O the/O door/O,/O talking/O of/O the/O weather/O,/O when/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON overtook/O them/O./O In/O the/O drawing/O room/O there/O were/O already/O
sitting/O Prince/O Alexander/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O young/O
Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O Turovtsin/LOCATION,/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O Karenin/PERSON./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON saw/O immediately/O that/O things/O were/O not/O going/O well/O in/O
the/O drawing-room/O without/O him/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O in/O her/O best/O gray/O silk/O
gown/O,/O obviously/O worried/O about/O the/O children/O,/O who/O were/O to/O have/O their/O
dinner/O by/O themselves/O in/O the/O nursery/O,/O and/O by/O her/O husband/O's/O absence/O,/O was/O
not/O equal/O to/O the/O task/O of/O making/O the/O party/O mix/O without/O him/O./O All/O were/O
sitting/O like/O so/O many/O priests/O'/O wives/O on/O a/O visit/O -LRB-/Oso/O the/O old/O prince/O
expressed/O it/O-RRB-/O,/O obviously/O wondering/O why/O they/O were/O there/O,/O and/O pumping/O up/O
remarks/O simply/O to/O avoid/O being/O silent/O./O Turovtsin/O--/Ogood/O,/O simple/O man/O--/Ofelt/O
unmistakably/O a/O fish/O out/O of/O water/O,/O and/O the/O smile/O with/O which/O his/O thick/O
lips/O greeted/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O,/O as/O plainly/O as/O words/O:/O ``/OWell/O,/O old/O
boy/O,/O you/O have/O popped/O me/O down/O in/O a/O learned/O set/O!/O A/O drinking/O party/O now/O,/O or/O
the/O _/OChâteau/ORGANIZATION des/ORGANIZATION Fleurs/ORGANIZATION_/O,/O would/O be/O more/O in/O my/O line/O!/O''/O The/O old/O prince/O sat/O
in/O silence/O,/O his/O bright/O little/O eyes/O watching/O Karenin/PERSON from/O one/O side/O,/O and/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON saw/O that/O he/O had/O already/O formed/O a/O phrase/O to/O sum/O up/O
that/O politician/O of/O whom/O guests/O were/O invited/O to/O partake/O as/O though/O he/O were/O
a/O sturgeon/O./O Kitty/PERSON was/O looking/O at/O the/O door/O,/O calling/O up/O all/O her/O energies/O
to/O keep/O her/O from/O blushing/O at/O the/O entrance/O of/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON./O Young/PERSON
Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O who/O had/O not/O been/O introduced/O to/O Karenin/PERSON,/O was/O trying/O to/O
look/O as/O though/O he/O were/O not/O in/O the/O least/O conscious/O of/O it/O./O Karenin/PERSON himself/O
had/O followed/O the/O Petersburg/LOCATION fashion/O for/O a/O dinner/O with/O ladies/O and/O was/O
wearing/O evening/O dress/O and/O a/O white/O tie/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON saw/O by/O his/O
face/O that/O he/O had/O come/O simply/O to/O keep/O his/O promise/O,/O and/O was/O performing/O a/O
disagreeable/O duty/O in/O being/O present/O at/O this/O gathering/O./O He/O was/O indeed/O the/O
person/O chiefly/O responsible/O for/O the/O chill/O benumbing/O all/O the/O guests/O before/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON came/O in/O./O

On/O entering/O the/O drawing/O room/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON apologized/O,/O explaining/O
that/O he/O had/O been/O detained/O by/O that/O prince/O,/O who/O was/O always/O the/O scapegoat/O
for/O all/O his/O absences/O and/O unpunctualities/O,/O and/O in/O one/O moment/O he/O had/O made/O
all/O the/O guests/O acquainted/O with/O each/O other/O,/O and/O,/O bringing/O together/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON and/O Sergey/PERSON Koznishev/PERSON,/O started/O them/O on/O a/O discussion/O of/O the/O
Russification/O of/O Poland/LOCATION,/O into/O which/O they/O immediately/O plunged/O with/O
Pestsov/PERSON./O Slapping/O Turovtsin/PERSON on/O the/O shoulder/O,/O he/O whispered/O something/O
comic/O in/O his/O ear/O,/O and/O set/O him/O down/O by/O his/O wife/O and/O the/O old/O prince/O./O Then/O
he/O told/O Kitty/PERSON she/O was/O looking/O very/O pretty/O that/O evening/O,/O and/O presented/O
Shtcherbatsky/PERSON to/O Karenin/PERSON./O In/O a/O moment/O he/O had/O so/O kneaded/O together/O the/O
social/O dough/O that/O the/O drawing/O room/O became/O very/O lively/O,/O and/O there/O was/O a/O
merry/O buzz/O of/O voices/O./O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON was/O the/O only/O person/O who/O had/O not/O
arrived/O./O But/O this/O was/O so/O much/O the/O better/O,/O as/O going/O into/O the/O dining/O room/O,/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON found/O to/O his/O horror/O that/O the/O port/O and/O sherry/O had/O
been/O procured/O from/O Deprè/LOCATION,/O and/O not/O from/O Levy/PERSON,/O and/O,/O directing/O that/O the/O
coachman/O should/O be/O sent/O off/O as/O speedily/O as/O possible/O to/O Levy/PERSON's/O,/O he/O was/O
going/O back/O to/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O

In/O the/O dining/O room/O he/O was/O met/O by/O Konstantin/PERSON Levin/PERSON./O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O late/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O can/O never/O help/O being/O late/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O taking/O his/O
arm/O./O

``/OHave/O you/O a/O lot/O of/O people/O?/O Who/O's/O here/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON,/O unable/O to/O help/O
blushing/O,/O as/O he/O knocked/O the/O snow/O off/O his/O cap/O with/O his/O glove/O./O

``/OAll/O our/O own/O set/O./O Kitty/PERSON's/O here/O./O Come/O along/O,/O I/O'll/O introduce/O you/O to/O
Karenin/PERSON./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O for/O all/O his/O liberal/O views/O,/O was/O well/O aware/O that/O to/O
meet/O Karenin/PERSON was/O sure/O to/O be/O felt/O a/O flattering/O distinction/O,/O and/O so/O
treated/O his/O best/O friends/O to/O this/O honor/O./O But/O at/O that/O instant/O Konstantin/PERSON
Levin/PERSON was/O not/O in/O a/O condition/O to/O feel/O all/O the/O gratification/O of/O making/O
such/O an/O acquaintance/O./O He/O had/O not/O seen/O Kitty/PERSON since/O that/O memorable/O evening/O
when/O he/O met/O Vronsky/O,/O not/O counting/O,/O that/O is/O,/O the/O moment/O when/O he/O had/O had/O a/O
glimpse/O of/O her/O on/O the/O highroad/O./O He/O had/O known/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O his/O heart/O
that/O he/O would/O see/O her/O here/O today/O./O But/O to/O keep/O his/O thoughts/O free/O,/O he/O had/O
tried/O to/O persuade/O himself/O that/O he/O did/O not/O know/O it/O./O Now/O when/O he/O heard/O
that/O she/O was/O here/O,/O he/O was/O suddenly/O conscious/O of/O such/O delight/O,/O and/O at/O the/O
same/O time/O of/O such/O dread/O,/O that/O his/O breath/O failed/O him/O and/O he/O could/O not/O
utter/O what/O he/O wanted/O to/O say/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O she/O like/O,/O what/O is/O she/O like/O?/O Like/O what/O she/O used/O to/O be/O,/O or/O like/O
what/O she/O was/O in/O the/O carriage/O?/O What/O if/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON told/O the/O truth/O?/O
Why/O should/On't/O it/O be/O the/O truth/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O please/O,/O introduce/O me/O to/O Karenin/PERSON,/O''/O he/O brought/O out/O with/O an/O effort/O,/O
and/O with/O a/O desperately/O determined/O step/O he/O walked/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O
and/O beheld/O her/O./O

She/O was/O not/O the/O same/O as/O she/O used/O to/O be/O,/O nor/O was/O she/O as/O she/O had/O been/O in/O
the/O carriage/O;/O she/O was/O quite/O different/O./O

She/O was/O scared/O,/O shy/O,/O shame-faced/O,/O and/O still/O more/O charming/O from/O it/O./O She/O
saw/O him/O the/O very/O instant/O he/O walked/O into/O the/O room/O./O She/O had/O been/O expecting/O
him/O./O She/O was/O delighted/O,/O and/O so/O confused/O at/O her/O own/O delight/O that/O there/O
was/O a/O moment/O,/O the/O moment/O when/O he/O went/O up/O to/O her/O sister/O and/O glanced/O again/O
at/O her/O,/O when/O she/O,/O and/O he/O,/O and/O Dolly/PERSON,/O who/O saw/O it/O all/O,/O thought/O she/O would/O
break/O down/O and/O would/O begin/O to/O cry/O./O She/O crimsoned/O,/O turned/O white/O,/O
crimsoned/O again/O,/O and/O grew/O faint/O,/O waiting/O with/O quivering/O lips/O for/O him/O to/O
come/O to/O her/O./O He/O went/O up/O to/O her/O,/O bowed/O,/O and/O held/O out/O his/O hand/O without/O
speaking/O./O Except/O for/O the/O slight/O quiver/O of/O her/O lips/O and/O the/O moisture/O in/O
her/O eyes/O that/O made/O them/O brighter/O,/O her/O smile/O was/O almost/O calm/O as/O she/O said/O:/O

``/OHow/O long/O it/O is/O since/O we/O've/O seen/O each/O other/O!/O''/O and/O with/O desperate/O
determination/O she/O pressed/O his/O hand/O with/O her/O cold/O hand/O./O

``/OYou/O've/O not/O seen/O me/O,/O but/O I/O've/O seen/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O with/O a/O radiant/O
smile/O of/O happiness/O./O ``/OI/O saw/O you/O when/O you/O were/O driving/O from/O the/O railway/O
station/O to/O Ergushovo/O./O''/O

``/OWhen/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O,/O wondering/O./O

``/OYou/O were/O driving/O to/O Ergushovo/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O feeling/O as/O if/O he/O would/O sob/O
with/O the/O rapture/O that/O was/O flooding/O his/O heart/O./O ``/OAnd/O how/O dared/O I/O associate/O
a/O thought/O of/O anything/O not/O innocent/O with/O this/O touching/O creature/O?/O And/O,/O
yes/O,/O I/O do/O believe/O it/O's/O true/O what/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON told/O me/O,/O''/O he/O
thought/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON took/O him/O by/O the/O arm/O and/O led/O him/O away/O to/O Karenin/PERSON./O

``/OLet/O me/O introduce/O you/O./O''/O He/O mentioned/O their/O names/O./O

``/OVery/O glad/O to/O meet/O you/O again/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON coldly/O,/O
shaking/O hands/O with/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O are/O acquainted/O?/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON asked/O in/O surprise/O./O

``/OWe/O spent/O three/O hours/O together/O in/O the/O train/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON smiling/O,/O ``/Obut/O
got/O out/O,/O just/O as/O in/O a/O masquerade/O,/O quite/O mystified/O--/Oat/O least/O I/O was/O./O''/O

``/ONonsense/O!/O Come/O along/O,/O please/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O pointing/O in/O
the/O direction/O of/O the/O dining/O room/O./O

The/O men/O went/O into/O the/O dining-room/O and/O went/O up/O to/O a/O table/O,/O laid/O with/O six/O
sorts/O of/O spirits/O and/O as/O many/O kinds/O of/O cheese/O,/O some/O with/O little/O silver/O
spades/O and/O some/O without/O,/O caviar/O,/O herrings/O,/O preserves/O of/O various/O kinds/O,/O
and/O plates/O with/O slices/O of/O French/O bread/O./O

The/O men/O stood/O round/O the/O strong-smelling/O spirits/O and/O salt/O delicacies/O,/O and/O
the/O discussion/O of/O the/O Russification/O of/O Poland/LOCATION between/O Koznishev/LOCATION,/O
Karenin/PERSON,/O and/O Pestsov/PERSON died/O down/O in/O anticipation/O of/O dinner/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O unequaled/O in/O his/O skill/O in/O winding/O up/O the/O most/O
heated/O and/O serious/O argument/O by/O some/O unexpected/O pinch/O of/O Attic/LOCATION salt/O that/O
changed/O the/O disposition/O of/O his/O opponent/O./O He/O did/O this/O now/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O been/O maintaining/O that/O the/O Russification/O of/O
Poland/LOCATION could/O only/O be/O accomplished/O as/O a/O result/O of/O larger/O measures/O which/O
ought/O to/O be/O introduced/O by/O the/O Russian/O government/O./O

Pestsov/PERSON insisted/O that/O one/O country/O can/O only/O absorb/O another/O when/O it/O is/O the/O
more/O densely/O populated/O./O

Koznishev/PERSON admitted/O both/O points/O,/O but/O with/O limitations/O./O As/O they/O were/O going/O
out/O of/O the/O drawing/O room/O to/O conclude/O the/O argument/O,/O Koznishev/PERSON said/O,/O
smiling/O:/O

``/OSo/O,/O then/O,/O for/O the/O Russification/O of/O our/O foreign/O populations/O there/O is/O but/O
one/O method/O--/Oto/O bring/O up/O as/O many/O children/O as/O one/O can/O./O My/O brother/O and/O I/O are/O
terribly/O in/O fault/O,/O I/O see/O./O You/O married/O men/O,/O especially/O you/O,/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O are/O the/O real/O patriots/O:/O what/O number/O have/O you/O reached/O?/O''/O he/O
said/O,/O smiling/O genially/O at/O their/O host/O and/O holding/O out/O a/O tiny/O wine/O glass/O
to/O him/O./O

Everyone/O laughed/O,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON with/O particular/O good/O humor/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O that/O's/O the/O best/O method/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O munching/O cheese/O and/O filling/O
the/O wine-glass/O with/O a/O special/O sort/O of/O spirit/O./O The/O conversation/O dropped/O
at/O the/O jest/O./O

``/OThis/O cheese/O is/O not/O bad/O./O Shall/O I/O give/O you/O some/O?/O''/O said/O the/O master/O of/O the/O
house/O./O ``/OWhy/O,/O have/O you/O been/O going/O in/O for/O gymnastics/O again/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O
Levin/PERSON,/O pinching/O his/O muscle/O with/O his/O left/O hand/O./O Levin/PERSON smiled/O,/O bent/O his/O
arm/O,/O and/O under/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O fingers/O the/O muscles/O swelled/O up/O like/O
a/O sound/O cheese/O,/O hard/O as/O a/O knob/O of/O iron/O,/O through/O the/O fine/O cloth/O of/O the/O
coat/O./O

``/OWhat/O biceps/O!/O A/O perfect/O Samson/PERSON!/O''/O

``/OI/O imagine/O great/O strength/O is/O needed/O for/O hunting/O bears/O,/O''/O observed/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O who/O had/O the/O mistiest/O notions/O about/O the/O chase/O./O He/O cut/O off/O
and/O spread/O with/O cheese/O a/O wafer/O of/O bread/O fine/O as/O a/O spider-web/O./O

Levin/PERSON smiled/O./O

``/ONot/O at/O all/O./O Quite/O the/O contrary/O;/O a/O child/O can/O kill/O a/O bear/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O
a/O slight/O bow/O moving/O aside/O for/O the/O ladies/O,/O who/O were/O approaching/O the/O
table/O./O

``/OYou/O have/O killed/O a/O bear/O,/O I/O've/O been/O told/O!/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O trying/O assiduously/O
to/O catch/O with/O her/O fork/O a/O perverse/O mushroom/O that/O would/O slip/O away/O,/O and/O
setting/O the/O lace/O quivering/O over/O her/O white/O arm/O./O ``/OAre/O there/O bears/O on/O your/O
place/O?/O''/O she/O added/O,/O turning/O her/O charming/O little/O head/O to/O him/O and/O smiling/O./O

There/O was/O apparently/O nothing/O extraordinary/O in/O what/O she/O said/O,/O but/O what/O
unutterable/O meaning/O there/O was/O for/O him/O in/O every/O sound/O,/O in/O every/O turn/O of/O
her/O lips/O,/O her/O eyes/O,/O her/O hand/O as/O she/O said/O it/O!/O There/O was/O entreaty/O for/O
forgiveness/O,/O and/O trust/O in/O him/O,/O and/O tenderness/O--/Osoft/O,/O timid/O tenderness/O--/Oand/O
promise/O and/O hope/O and/O love/O for/O him/O,/O which/O he/O could/O not/O but/O believe/O in/O and/O
which/O choked/O him/O with/O happiness/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O we/O've/O been/O hunting/O in/O the/O Tver/LOCATION province/O./O It/O was/O coming/O back/O from/O
there/O that/O I/O met/O your/O _/Obeaufrère/O_/O in/O the/O train/O,/O or/O your/O _/Obeaufrère/O's/O_/O
brother-in-law/O,/O''/O he/O said/O with/O a/O smile/O./O ``/OIt/O was/O an/O amusing/O meeting/O./O''/O

And/O he/O began/O telling/O with/O droll/O good-humor/O how/O,/O after/O not/O sleeping/O all/O
night/O,/O he/O had/O,/O wearing/O an/O old/O fur-lined/O,/O full-skirted/O coat/O,/O got/O into/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O compartment/O./O

``/OThe/O conductor/O,/O forgetting/O the/O proverb/O,/O would/O have/O chucked/O me/O out/O on/O
account/O of/O my/O attire/O;/O but/O thereupon/O I/O began/O expressing/O my/O feelings/O in/O
elevated/O language/O,/O and/O .../O you/O,/O too/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O addressing/O Karenin/PERSON and/O
forgetting/O his/O name/O,/O ``/Oat/O first/O would/O have/O ejected/O me/O on/O the/O ground/O of/O
the/O old/O coat/O,/O but/O afterwards/O you/O took/O my/O part/O,/O for/O which/O I/O am/O extremely/O
grateful/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O rights/O of/O passengers/O generally/O to/O choose/O their/O seats/O are/O too/O
ill-defined/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O rubbing/O the/O tips/O of/O his/O
fingers/O on/O his/O handkerchief/O./O

``/OI/O saw/O you/O were/O in/O uncertainty/O about/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O smiling/O
good-naturedly/O,/O ``/Obut/O I/O made/O haste/O to/O plunge/O into/O intellectual/O
conversation/O to/O smooth/O over/O the/O defects/O of/O my/O attire/O./O''/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O while/O he/O kept/O up/O a/O conversation/O with/O their/O hostess/O,/O had/O one/O
ear/O for/O his/O brother/O,/O and/O he/O glanced/O askance/O at/O him/O./O ``/OWhat/O is/O the/O matter/O
with/O him/O today/O?/O Why/O such/O a/O conquering/O hero/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O./O He/O did/O not/O know/O
that/O Levin/PERSON was/O feeling/O as/O though/O he/O had/O grown/O wings/O./O Levin/PERSON knew/O she/O was/O
listening/O to/O his/O words/O and/O that/O she/O was/O glad/O to/O listen/O to/O him/O./O And/O this/O
was/O the/O only/O thing/O that/O interested/O him/O./O Not/O in/O that/O room/O only/O,/O but/O in/O
the/O whole/O world/O,/O there/O existed/O for/O him/O only/O himself/O,/O with/O enormously/O
increased/O importance/O and/O dignity/O in/O his/O own/O eyes/O,/O and/O she/O./O He/O felt/O
himself/O on/O a/O pinnacle/O that/O made/O him/O giddy/O,/O and/O far/O away/O down/O below/O were/O
all/O those/O nice/O excellent/O Karenins/LOCATION,/O Oblonskys/PERSON,/O and/O all/O the/O world/O./O

Quite/O without/O attracting/O notice/O,/O without/O glancing/O at/O them/O,/O as/O though/O
there/O were/O no/O other/O places/O left/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON put/O Levin/PERSON and/O Kitty/PERSON
side/O by/O side/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O you/O may/O as/O well/O sit/O there/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O

The/O dinner/O was/O as/O choice/O as/O the/O china/O,/O in/O which/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O
a/O connoisseur/O./O The/O _/Osoupe/O Marie-Louise/PERSON_/O was/O a/O splendid/O success/O;/O the/O tiny/O
pies/O eaten/O with/O it/O melted/O in/O the/O mouth/O and/O were/O irreproachable/O./O The/O two/O
footmen/O and/O Matvey/PERSON,/O in/O white/O cravats/O,/O did/O their/O duty/O with/O the/O dishes/O and/O
wines/O unobtrusively/O,/O quietly/O,/O and/O swiftly/O./O On/O the/O material/O side/O the/O
dinner/O was/O a/O success/O;/O it/O was/O no/O less/O so/O on/O the/O immaterial/O./O The/O
conversation/O,/O at/O times/O general/O and/O at/O times/O between/O individuals/O,/O never/O
paused/O,/O and/O towards/O the/O end/O the/O company/O was/O so/O lively/O that/O the/O men/O rose/O
from/O the/O table/O,/O without/O stopping/O speaking/O,/O and/O even/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON thawed/O./O



Chapter/O 10/O


Pestsov/PERSON liked/O thrashing/O an/O argument/O out/O to/O the/O end/O,/O and/O was/O not/O
satisfied/O with/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O words/O,/O especially/O as/O he/O felt/O the/O
injustice/O of/O his/O view/O./O

``/OI/O did/O not/O mean/O,/O''/O he/O said/O over/O the/O soup/O,/O addressing/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O ``/Omere/O density/O of/O population/O alone/O,/O but/O in/O conjunction/O
with/O fundamental/O ideas/O,/O and/O not/O by/O means/O of/O principles/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O seems/O to/O me/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON said/O languidly/O,/O and/O with/O no/O
haste/O,/O ``/Othat/O that/O's/O the/O same/O thing/O./O In/O my/O opinion/O,/O influence/O over/O
another/O people/O is/O only/O possible/O to/O the/O people/O which/O has/O the/O higher/O
development/O,/O which/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O that/O's/O just/O the/O question/O,/O''/O Pestsov/PERSON broke/O in/O in/O his/O bass/O./O

He/O was/O always/O in/O a/O hurry/O to/O speak/O,/O and/O seemed/O always/O to/O put/O his/O whole/O
soul/O into/O what/O he/O was/O saying/O./O ``/OIn/O what/O are/O we/O to/O make/O higher/O development/O
consist/O?/O The/O English/O,/O the/O French/O,/O the/O Germans/O,/O which/O is/O at/O the/O highest/O
stage/O of/O development/O?/O Which/O of/O them/O will/O nationalize/O the/O other/O?/O We/O see/O
the/O Rhine/O provinces/O have/O been/O turned/O French/O,/O but/O the/O Germans/O are/O not/O at/O
a/O lower/O stage/O!/O''/O he/O shouted/O./O ``/OThere/O is/O another/O law/O at/O work/O there/O./O''/O

``/OI/O fancy/O that/O the/O greater/O influence/O is/O always/O on/O the/O side/O of/O true/O
civilization/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O slightly/O lifting/O his/O
eyebrows/O./O

``/OBut/O what/O are/O we/O to/O lay/O down/O as/O the/O outward/O signs/O of/O true/O civilization/O?/O''/O
said/O Pestsov/PERSON./O

``/OI/O imagine/O such/O signs/O are/O generally/O very/O well/O known/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OBut/O are/O they/O fully/O known/O?/O''/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON put/O in/O with/O a/O subtle/O
smile/O./O ``/OIt/O is/O the/O accepted/O view/O now/O that/O real/O culture/O must/O be/O purely/O
classical/O;/O but/O we/O see/O most/O intense/O disputes/O on/O each/O side/O of/O the/O
question/O,/O and/O there/O is/O no/O denying/O that/O the/O opposite/O camp/O has/O strong/O
points/O in/O its/O favor/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O are/O for/O classics/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O Will/O you/O take/O red/O wine/O?/O''/O said/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OI/O am/O not/O expressing/O my/O own/O opinion/O of/O either/O form/O of/O culture/O,/O''/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON said/O,/O holding/O out/O his/O glass/O with/O a/O smile/O of/O condescension/O,/O as/O
to/O a/O child/O./O ``/OI/O only/O say/O that/O both/O sides/O have/O strong/O arguments/O to/O support/O
them/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O addressing/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O ``/OMy/O sympathies/O are/O
classical/O from/O education/O,/O but/O in/O this/O discussion/O I/O am/O personally/O unable/O
to/O arrive/O at/O a/O conclusion/O./O I/O see/O no/O distinct/O grounds/O for/O classical/O
studies/O being/O given/O a/O preeminence/O over/O scientific/O studies/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O natural/O sciences/O have/O just/O as/O great/O an/O educational/O value/O,/O''/O put/O in/O
Pestsov/LOCATION./O ``/OTake/O astronomy/O,/O take/O botany/O,/O or/O zoology/O with/O its/O system/O of/O
general/O principles/O./O''/O

``/OI/O can/Onot/O quite/O agree/O with/O that/O,/O''/O responded/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON ``/OIt/O
seems/O to/O me/O that/O one/O must/O admit/O that/O the/O very/O process/O of/O studying/O the/O
forms/O of/O language/O has/O a/O peculiarly/O favorable/O influence/O on/O intellectual/O
development/O./O Moreover/O,/O it/O can/Onot/O be/O denied/O that/O the/O influence/O of/O the/O
classical/O authors/O is/O in/O the/O highest/O degree/O moral/O,/O while/O,/O unfortunately/O,/O
with/O the/O study/O of/O the/O natural/O sciences/O are/O associated/O the/O false/O and/O
noxious/O doctrines/O which/O are/O the/O curse/O of/O our/O day/O./O''/O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON would/O have/O said/O something/O,/O but/O Pestsov/PERSON interrupted/O him/O
in/O his/O rich/O bass/O./O He/O began/O warmly/O contesting/O the/O justice/O of/O this/O view/O./O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON waited/O serenely/O to/O speak/O,/O obviously/O with/O a/O convincing/O
reply/O ready/O./O

``/OBut/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O subtly/O,/O and/O addressing/O Karenin/PERSON,/O
``/OOne/O must/O allow/O that/O to/O weigh/O all/O the/O advantages/O and/O disadvantages/O of/O
classical/O and/O scientific/O studies/O is/O a/O difficult/O task/O,/O and/O the/O question/O
which/O form/O of/O education/O was/O to/O be/O preferred/O would/O not/O have/O been/O so/O
quickly/O and/O conclusively/O decided/O if/O there/O had/O not/O been/O in/O favor/O of/O
classical/O education/O,/O as/O you/O expressed/O it/O just/O now/O,/O its/O moral/O--/Odisons/O le/O
mot/O--/Oanti-nihilist/O influence/O./O''/O

``/OUndoubtedly/O./O''/O

``/OIf/O it/O had/O not/O been/O for/O the/O distinctive/O property/O of/O anti-nihilistic/O
influence/O on/O the/O side/O of/O classical/O studies/O,/O we/O should/O have/O considered/O
the/O subject/O more/O,/O have/O weighed/O the/O arguments/O on/O both/O sides/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON with/O a/O subtle/O smile/O,/O ``/Owe/O should/O have/O given/O elbow-room/O to/O both/O
tendencies/O./O But/O now/O we/O know/O that/O these/O little/O pills/O of/O classical/O
learning/O possess/O the/O medicinal/O property/O of/O anti-nihilism/O,/O and/O we/O boldly/O
prescribe/O them/O to/O our/O patients/O.../O./O But/O what/O if/O they/O had/O no/O such/O
medicinal/O property/O?/O''/O he/O wound/O up/O humorously/O./O

At/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O little/O pills/O,/O everyone/O laughed/O;/O Turovtsin/PERSON in/O
especial/O roared/O loudly/O and/O jovially/O,/O glad/O at/O last/O to/O have/O found/O
something/O to/O laugh/O at/O,/O all/O he/O ever/O looked/O for/O in/O listening/O to/O
conversation/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O not/O made/O a/O mistake/O in/O inviting/O Pestsov/PERSON./O With/O
Pestsov/O intellectual/O conversation/O never/O flagged/O for/O an/O instant/O./O Directly/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON had/O concluded/O the/O conversation/O with/O his/O jest/O,/O Pestsov/PERSON
promptly/O started/O a/O new/O one/O./O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O agree/O even/O,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O ``/Othat/O the/O government/O had/O that/O aim/O./O The/O
government/O obviously/O is/O guided/O by/O abstract/O considerations/O,/O and/O remains/O
indifferent/O to/O the/O influence/O its/O measures/O may/O exercise/O./O The/O education/O of/O
women/O,/O for/O instance/O,/O would/O naturally/O be/O regarded/O as/O likely/O to/O be/O
harmful/O,/O but/O the/O government/O opens/O schools/O and/O universities/O for/O women/O./O''/O

And/O the/O conversation/O at/O once/O passed/O to/O the/O new/O subject/O of/O the/O education/O
of/O women/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON expressed/O the/O idea/O that/O the/O education/O of/O women/O is/O
apt/O to/O be/O confounded/O with/O the/O emancipation/O of/O women/O,/O and/O that/O it/O is/O only/O
so/O that/O it/O can/O be/O considered/O dangerous/O./O

``/OI/O consider/O,/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O that/O the/O two/O questions/O are/O inseparably/O
connected/O together/O,/O''/O said/O Pestsov/PERSON;/O ``/Oit/O is/O a/O vicious/O circle/O./O Woman/O is/O
deprived/O of/O rights/O from/O lack/O of/O education/O,/O and/O the/O lack/O of/O education/O
results/O from/O the/O absence/O of/O rights/O./O We/O must/O not/O forget/O that/O the/O
subjection/O of/O women/O is/O so/O complete/O,/O and/O dates/O from/O such/O ages/O back/O that/O
we/O are/O often/O unwilling/O to/O recognize/O the/O gulf/O that/O separates/O them/O from/O
us/O,/O''/O said/O he/O./O

``/OYou/O said/O rights/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O waiting/O till/O Pestsov/PERSON had/O
finished/O,/O ``/Omeaning/O the/O right/O of/O sitting/O on/O juries/O,/O of/O voting/O,/O of/O
presiding/O at/O official/O meetings/O,/O the/O right/O of/O entering/O the/O civil/O service/O,/O
of/O sitting/O in/O parliament/O.../O''/O

``/OUndoubtedly/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O if/O women/O,/O as/O a/O rare/O exception/O,/O can/O occupy/O such/O positions/O,/O it/O seems/O
to/O me/O you/O are/O wrong/O in/O using/O the/O expression/O `/Orights/O./O'/O It/O would/O be/O more/O
correct/O to/O say/O duties/O./O Every/O man/O will/O agree/O that/O in/O doing/O the/O duty/O of/O a/O
juryman/O,/O a/O witness/O,/O a/O telegraph/O clerk/O,/O we/O feel/O we/O are/O performing/O duties/O./O
And/O therefore/O it/O would/O be/O correct/O to/O say/O that/O women/O are/O seeking/O duties/O,/O
and/O quite/O legitimately/O./O And/O one/O can/O but/O sympathize/O with/O this/O desire/O to/O
assist/O in/O the/O general/O labor/O of/O man/O./O''/O

``/OQuite/O so/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON assented/O./O ``/OThe/O question/O,/O I/O imagine/O,/O is/O
simply/O whether/O they/O are/O fitted/O for/O such/O duties/O./O''/O

``/OThey/O will/O most/O likely/O be/O perfectly/O fitted/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
``/Owhen/O education/O has/O become/O general/O among/O them/O./O We/O see/O this/O.../O''/O

``/OHow/O about/O the/O proverb/O?/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O,/O who/O had/O a/O long/O while/O been/O
intent/O on/O the/O conversation/O,/O his/O little/O comical/O eyes/O twinkling/O./O ``/OI/O can/O
say/O it/O before/O my/O daughter/O:/O her/O hair/O is/O long/O,/O because/O her/O wit/O is/O.../O''/O

``/OJust/O what/O they/O thought/O of/O the/O negroes/O before/O their/O emancipation/O!/O''/O said/O
Pestsov/PERSON angrily/O./O

``/OWhat/O seems/O strange/O to/O me/O is/O that/O women/O should/O seek/O fresh/O duties/O,/O''/O said/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O ``/Owhile/O we/O see/O,/O unhappily/O,/O that/O men/O usually/O try/O to/O
avoid/O them/O./O''/O

``/ODuties/O are/O bound/O up/O with/O rights/O--/Opower/O,/O money/O,/O honor/O;/O those/O are/O what/O
women/O are/O seeking/O,/O''/O said/O Pestsov/PERSON./O

``/OJust/O as/O though/O I/O should/O seek/O the/O right/O to/O be/O a/O wet-nurse/O and/O feel/O
injured/O because/O women/O are/O paid/O for/O the/O work/O,/O while/O no/O one/O will/O take/O me/O,/O''/O
said/O the/O old/O prince/O./O

Turovtsin/PERSON exploded/O in/O a/O loud/O roar/O of/O laughter/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
regretted/O that/O he/O had/O not/O made/O this/O comparison/O./O Even/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON smiled/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O a/O man/O ca/On't/O nurse/O a/O baby/O,/O''/O said/O Pestsov/PERSON,/O ``/Owhile/O a/O woman/O.../O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O there/O was/O an/O Englishman/O who/O did/O suckle/O his/O baby/O on/O board/O ship/O,/O''/O
said/O the/O old/O prince/O,/O feeling/O this/O freedom/O in/O conversation/O permissible/O
before/O his/O own/O daughters/O./O

``/OThere/O are/O as/O many/O such/O Englishmen/O as/O there/O would/O be/O women/O officials/O,/O''/O
said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O what/O is/O a/O girl/O to/O do/O who/O has/O no/O family/O?/O''/O put/O in/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O thinking/O of/O Masha/PERSON Tchibisova/PERSON,/O whom/O he/O had/O had/O in/O his/O mind/O
all/O along/O,/O in/O sympathizing/O with/O Pestsov/PERSON and/O supporting/O him/O./O

``/OIf/O the/O story/O of/O such/O a/O girl/O were/O thoroughly/O sifted/O,/O you/O would/O find/O she/O
had/O abandoned/O a/O family/O--/Oher/O own/O or/O a/O sister/O's/O,/O where/O she/O might/O have/O found/O
a/O woman/O's/O duties/O,/O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON broke/O in/O unexpectedly/O in/O a/O tone/O of/O
exasperation/O,/O probably/O suspecting/O what/O sort/O of/O girl/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
was/O thinking/O of/O./O

``/OBut/O we/O take/O our/O stand/O on/O principle/O as/O the/O ideal/O,/O''/O replied/O Pestsov/PERSON in/O
his/O mellow/O bass/O./O ``/OWoman/O desires/O to/O have/O rights/O,/O to/O be/O independent/O,/O
educated/O./O She/O is/O oppressed/O,/O humiliated/O by/O the/O consciousness/O of/O her/O
disabilities/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O I/O'm/O oppressed/O and/O humiliated/O that/O they/O wo/On't/O engage/O me/O at/O the/O
Foundling/O,/O''/O the/O old/O prince/O said/O again/O,/O to/O the/O huge/O delight/O of/O Turovtsin/PERSON,/O
who/O in/O his/O mirth/O dropped/O his/O asparagus/O with/O the/O thick/O end/O in/O the/O sauce/O./O



Chapter/O 11/O


Everyone/O took/O part/O in/O the/O conversation/O except/O Kitty/PERSON and/O Levin/PERSON./O At/O first/O,/O
when/O they/O were/O talking/O of/O the/O influence/O that/O one/O people/O has/O on/O another/O,/O
there/O rose/O to/O Levin/PERSON's/O mind/O what/O he/O had/O to/O say/O on/O the/O subject/O./O But/O these/O
ideas/O,/O once/O of/O such/O importance/O in/O his/O eyes/O,/O seemed/O to/O come/O into/O his/O
brain/O as/O in/O a/O dream/O,/O and/O had/O now/O not/O the/O slightest/O interest/O for/O him/O./O It/O
even/O struck/O him/O as/O strange/O that/O they/O should/O be/O so/O eager/O to/O talk/O of/O what/O
was/O of/O no/O use/O to/O anyone/O./O Kitty/PERSON,/O too/O,/O should/O,/O one/O would/O have/O supposed/O,/O
have/O been/O interested/O in/O what/O they/O were/O saying/O of/O the/O rights/O and/O
education/O of/O women/O./O How/O often/O she/O had/O mused/O on/O the/O subject/O,/O thinking/O of/O
her/O friend/O abroad/O,/O Varenka/LOCATION,/O of/O her/O painful/O state/O of/O dependence/O,/O how/O
often/O she/O had/O wondered/O about/O herself/O what/O would/O become/O of/O her/O if/O she/O did/O
not/O marry/O,/O and/O how/O often/O she/O had/O argued/O with/O her/O sister/O about/O it/O!/O But/O it/O
did/O not/O interest/O her/O at/O all/O./O She/O and/O Levin/PERSON had/O a/O conversation/O of/O their/O
own/O,/O yet/O not/O a/O conversation/O,/O but/O some/O sort/O of/O mysterious/O communication/O,/O
which/O brought/O them/O every/O moment/O nearer/O,/O and/O stirred/O in/O both/O a/O sense/O of/O
glad/O terror/O before/O the/O unknown/O into/O which/O they/O were/O entering/O./O

At/O first/O Levin/PERSON,/O in/O answer/O to/O Kitty/PERSON's/O question/O how/O he/O could/O have/O seen/O her/O
last/O year/O in/O the/O carriage/O,/O told/O her/O how/O he/O had/O been/O coming/O home/O from/O the/O
mowing/O along/O the/O highroad/O and/O had/O met/O her/O./O

``/OIt/O was/O very/O,/O very/O early/O in/O the/O morning/O./O You/O were/O probably/O only/O just/O
awake/O./O Your/O mother/O was/O asleep/O in/O the/O corner/O./O It/O was/O an/O exquisite/O
morning/O./O I/O was/O walking/O along/O wondering/O who/O it/O could/O be/O in/O a/O
four-in-hand/O?/O It/O was/O a/O splendid/O set/O of/O four/O horses/O with/O bells/O,/O and/O in/O a/O
second/O you/O flashed/O by/O,/O and/O I/O saw/O you/O at/O the/O window/O--/Oyou/O were/O sitting/O like/O
this/O,/O holding/O the/O strings/O of/O your/O cap/O in/O both/O hands/O,/O and/O thinking/O
awfully/O deeply/O about/O something/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O smiling/O./O ``/OHow/O I/O should/O like/O to/O
know/O what/O you/O were/O thinking/O about/O then/O!/O Something/O important/O?/O''/O

``/OWas/On't/O I/O dreadfully/O untidy/O?/O''/O she/O wondered/O,/O but/O seeing/O the/O smile/O of/O
ecstasy/O these/O reminiscences/O called/O up/O,/O she/O felt/O that/O the/O impression/O she/O
had/O made/O had/O been/O very/O good/O./O She/O blushed/O and/O laughed/O with/O delight/O;/O
``/OReally/O I/O do/On't/O remember/O./O''/O
