``/OHow/O nicely/O Turovtsin/O laughs/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O admiring/O his/O moist/O eyes/O and/O
shaking/O chest/O./O

``/OHave/O you/O known/O him/O long/O?/O''/O asked/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O everyone/O knows/O him/O!/O''/O

``/OAnd/O I/O see/O you/O think/O he/O's/O a/O horrid/O man/O?/O''/O

``/ONot/O horrid/O,/O but/O nothing/O in/O him/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O you/O're/O wrong/O!/O And/O you/O must/O give/O up/O thinking/O so/O directly/O!/O''/O said/O
Kitty/PERSON./O ``/OI/O used/O to/O have/O a/O very/O poor/O opinion/O of/O him/O too/O,/O but/O he/O,/O he/O's/O an/O
awfully/O nice/O and/O wonderfully/O good-hearted/O man/O./O He/O has/O a/O heart/O of/O gold/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O could/O you/O find/O out/O what/O sort/O of/O heart/O he/O has/O?/O''/O

``/OWe/O are/O great/O friends/O./O I/O know/O him/O very/O well/O./O Last/O winter/O,/O soon/O after/O .../O
you/O came/O to/O see/O us/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O a/O guilty/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O
confiding/O smile/O,/O ``/Oall/O Dolly/O's/O children/O had/O scarlet/O fever/O,/O and/O he/O
happened/O to/O come/O and/O see/O her/O./O And/O only/O fancy/O,/O''/O she/O said/O in/O a/O whisper/O,/O
``/Ohe/O felt/O so/O sorry/O for/O her/O that/O he/O stayed/O and/O began/O to/O help/O her/O look/O
after/O the/O children/O./O Yes/O,/O and/O for/O three/O weeks/O he/O stopped/O with/O them/O,/O and/O
looked/O after/O the/O children/O like/O a/O nurse/O./O''/O

``/OI/O am/O telling/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON about/O Turovtsin/PERSON in/O the/O scarlet/O
fever/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O bending/O over/O to/O her/O sister/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O was/O wonderful/O,/O noble/O!/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O glancing/O towards/O Turovtsin/PERSON,/O
who/O had/O become/O aware/O they/O were/O talking/O of/O him/O,/O and/O smiling/O gently/O to/O
him/O./O Levin/PERSON glanced/O once/O more/O at/O Turovtsin/LOCATION,/O and/O wondered/O how/O it/O was/O he/O
had/O not/O realized/O all/O this/O man/O's/O goodness/O before/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O sorry/O,/O I/O'm/O sorry/O,/O and/O I/O'll/O never/O think/O ill/O of/O people/O again/O!/O''/O he/O
said/O gaily/O,/O genuinely/O expressing/O what/O he/O felt/O at/O the/O moment/O./O



Chapter/O 12/O


Connected/O with/O the/O conversation/O that/O had/O sprung/O up/O on/O the/O rights/O of/O
women/O there/O were/O certain/O questions/O as/O to/O the/O inequality/O of/O rights/O in/O
marriage/O improper/O to/O discuss/O before/O the/O ladies/O./O Pestsov/PERSON had/O several/O
times/O during/O dinner/O touched/O upon/O these/O questions/O,/O but/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON carefully/O drew/O him/O off/O them/O./O

When/O they/O rose/O from/O the/O table/O and/O the/O ladies/O had/O gone/O out/O,/O Pestsov/PERSON did/O
not/O follow/O them/O,/O but/O addressing/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O began/O to/O expound/O
the/O chief/O ground/O of/O inequality/O./O The/O inequality/O in/O marriage/O,/O in/O his/O
opinion/O,/O lay/O in/O the/O fact/O that/O the/O infidelity/O of/O the/O wife/O and/O the/O
infidelity/O of/O the/O husband/O are/O punished/O unequally/O,/O both/O by/O the/O law/O and/O by/O
public/O opinion/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON went/O hurriedly/O up/O to/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON and/O offered/O him/O a/O cigar/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O do/On't/O smoke/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON answered/O calmly/O,/O and/O as/O
though/O purposely/O wishing/O to/O show/O that/O he/O was/O not/O afraid/O of/O the/O subject/O,/O
he/O turned/O to/O Pestsov/PERSON with/O a/O chilly/O smile/O./O

``/OI/O imagine/O that/O such/O a/O view/O has/O a/O foundation/O in/O the/O very/O nature/O of/O
things/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O would/O have/O gone/O on/O to/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O But/O at/O
this/O point/O Turovtsin/PERSON broke/O suddenly/O and/O unexpectedly/O into/O the/O
conversation/O,/O addressing/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O heard/O,/O perhaps/O,/O about/O Pryatchnikov/PERSON?/O''/O said/O Turovtsin/PERSON,/O warmed/O up/O by/O
the/O champagne/O he/O had/O drunk/O,/O and/O long/O waiting/O for/O an/O opportunity/O to/O break/O
the/O silence/O that/O had/O weighed/O on/O him/O./O ``/OVasya/PERSON Pryatchnikov/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O
a/O good-natured/O smile/O on/O his/O damp/O,/O red/O lips/O,/O addressing/O himself/O
principally/O to/O the/O most/O important/O guest/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O ``/Othey/O
told/O me/O today/O he/O fought/O a/O duel/O with/O Kvitsky/PERSON at/O Tver/LOCATION,/O and/O has/O killed/O
him/O./O''/O

Just/O as/O it/O always/O seems/O that/O one/O bruises/O oneself/O on/O a/O sore/O place/O,/O so/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON felt/O now/O that/O the/O conversation/O would/O by/O ill/O luck/O
fall/O every/O moment/O on/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O sore/O spot/O./O He/O would/O again/O
have/O got/O his/O brother-in-law/O away/O,/O but/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON himself/O
inquired/O,/O with/O curiosity/O:/O

``/OWhat/O did/O Pryatchnikov/PERSON fight/O about/O?/O''/O

``/OHis/O wife/O./O Acted/O like/O a/O man/O,/O he/O did/O!/O Called/O him/O out/O and/O shot/O him/O!/O''/O

``/OAh/O!/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON indifferently/O,/O and/O lifting/O his/O
eyebrows/O,/O he/O went/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O

``/OHow/O glad/O I/O am/O you/O have/O come/O,/O''/O Dolly/PERSON said/O with/O a/O frightened/O smile/O,/O
meeting/O him/O in/O the/O outer/O drawing/O room/O./O ``/OI/O must/O talk/O to/O you/O./O Let/O's/O sit/O
here/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O with/O the/O same/O expression/O of/O indifference/O,/O given/O
him/O by/O his/O lifted/O eyebrows/O,/O sat/O down/O beside/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O and/O
smiled/O affectedly/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O fortunate/O,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O ``/Oespecially/O as/O I/O was/O meaning/O to/O ask/O you/O to/O
excuse/O me/O,/O and/O to/O be/O taking/O leave/O./O I/O have/O to/O start/O tomorrow/O./O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON was/O firmly/O convinced/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O innocence/O,/O and/O she/O
felt/O herself/O growing/O pale/O and/O her/O lips/O quivering/O with/O anger/O at/O this/O
frigid/O,/O unfeeling/O man/O,/O who/O was/O so/O calmly/O intending/O to/O ruin/O her/O innocent/O
friend/O./O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O desperate/O resolution/O looking/O him/O
in/O the/O face/O,/O ``/OI/O asked/O you/O about/O Anna/PERSON,/O you/O made/O me/O no/O answer/O./O How/O is/O
she/O?/O''/O

``/OShe/O is/O,/O I/O believe/O,/O quite/O well/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O''/O replied/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O not/O looking/O at/O her/O./O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O forgive/O me/O,/O I/O have/O no/O right/O .../O but/O I/O love/O Anna/PERSON
as/O a/O sister/O,/O and/O esteem/O her/O;/O I/O beg/O,/O I/O beseech/O you/O to/O tell/O me/O what/O is/O
wrong/O between/O you/O?/O what/O fault/O do/O you/O find/O with/O her/O?/O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON frowned/O,/O and/O almost/O closing/O his/O eyes/O,/O dropped/O his/O
head/O./O

``/OI/O presume/O that/O your/O husband/O has/O told/O you/O the/O grounds/O on/O which/O I/O
consider/O it/O necessary/O to/O change/O my/O attitude/O to/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON?/O''/O he/O
said/O,/O not/O looking/O her/O in/O the/O face/O,/O but/O eyeing/O with/O displeasure/O
Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O who/O was/O walking/O across/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O believe/O it/O,/O I/O do/On't/O believe/O it/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O believe/O it/O!/O''/O Dolly/PERSON
said/O,/O clasping/O her/O bony/O hands/O before/O her/O with/O a/O vigorous/O gesture/O./O She/O
rose/O quickly/O,/O and/O laid/O her/O hand/O on/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O sleeve/O./O ``/OWe/O
shall/O be/O disturbed/O here/O./O Come/O this/O way/O,/O please/O./O''/O

Dolly/PERSON's/O agitation/O had/O an/O effect/O on/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O He/O got/O up/O and/O
submissively/O followed/O her/O to/O the/O schoolroom/O./O They/O sat/O down/O to/O a/O table/O
covered/O with/O an/O oilcloth/O cut/O in/O slits/O by/O penknives/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O,/O I/O do/On't/O believe/O it/O!/O''/O Dolly/PERSON said/O,/O trying/O to/O catch/O his/O glance/O
that/O avoided/O her/O./O

``/OOne/O can/Onot/O disbelieve/O facts/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O with/O an/O
emphasis/O on/O the/O word/O ``/Ofacts/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O has/O she/O done/O?/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON./O ``/OWhat/O precisely/O has/O
she/O done/O?/O''/O

``/OShe/O has/O forsaken/O her/O duty/O,/O and/O deceived/O her/O husband/O./O That/O's/O what/O she/O
has/O done/O,/O''/O said/O he/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O no/O,/O it/O ca/On't/O be/O!/O No/O,/O for/O God/O's/O sake/O,/O you/O are/O mistaken/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O
putting/O her/O hands/O to/O her/O temples/O and/O closing/O her/O eyes/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON smiled/O coldly/O,/O with/O his/O lips/O alone/O,/O meaning/O to/O
signify/O to/O her/O and/O to/O himself/O the/O firmness/O of/O his/O conviction/O;/O but/O this/O
warm/O defense/O,/O though/O it/O could/O not/O shake/O him/O,/O reopened/O his/O wound/O./O He/O
began/O to/O speak/O with/O greater/O heat/O./O

``/OIt/O is/O extremely/O difficult/O to/O be/O mistaken/O when/O a/O wife/O herself/O informs/O
her/O husband/O of/O the/O fact/O--/Oinforms/O him/O that/O eight/O years/O of/O her/O life/O,/O and/O a/O
son/O,/O all/O that/O's/O a/O mistake/O,/O and/O that/O she/O wants/O to/O begin/O life/O again/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O angrily/O,/O with/O a/O snort/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON and/O sin/O--/OI/O can/Onot/O connect/O them/O,/O I/O can/Onot/O believe/O it/O!/O''/O

``/ODarya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O now/O looking/O straight/O into/O Dolly/PERSON's/O kindly/O,/O
troubled/O face/O,/O and/O feeling/O that/O his/O tongue/O was/O being/O loosened/O in/O spite/O
of/O himself/O,/O ``/OI/O would/O give/O a/O great/O deal/O for/O doubt/O to/O be/O still/O possible/O./O
When/O I/O doubted/O,/O I/O was/O miserable/O,/O but/O it/O was/O better/O than/O now/O./O When/O I/O
doubted/O,/O I/O had/O hope/O;/O but/O now/O there/O is/O no/O hope/O,/O and/O still/O I/O doubt/O of/O
everything/O./O I/O am/O in/O such/O doubt/O of/O everything/O that/O I/O even/O hate/O my/O son/O,/O
and/O sometimes/O do/O not/O believe/O he/O is/O my/O son/O./O I/O am/O very/O unhappy/O./O''/O

He/O had/O no/O need/O to/O say/O that/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON had/O seen/O that/O as/O soon/O as/O
he/O glanced/O into/O her/O face/O;/O and/O she/O felt/O sorry/O for/O him/O,/O and/O her/O faith/O in/O
the/O innocence/O of/O her/O friend/O began/O to/O totter/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O this/O is/O awful/O,/O awful/O!/O But/O can/O it/O be/O true/O that/O you/O are/O resolved/O on/O a/O
divorce/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O am/O resolved/O on/O extreme/O measures/O./O There/O is/O nothing/O else/O for/O me/O to/O do/O./O''/O

``/ONothing/O else/O to/O do/O,/O nothing/O else/O to/O do/O.../O''/O she/O replied/O,/O with/O tears/O in/O
her/O eyes/O./O ``/OOh/O no/O,/O do/On't/O say/O nothing/O else/O to/O do/O!/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O horrible/O in/O a/O trouble/O of/O this/O kind/O is/O that/O one/O can/Onot/O,/O as/O in/O
any/O other/O--/Oin/O loss/O,/O in/O death/O--/Obear/O one/O's/O trouble/O in/O peace/O,/O but/O that/O one/O
must/O act/O,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O as/O though/O guessing/O her/O thought/O./O ``/OOne/O must/O get/O out/O of/O
the/O humiliating/O position/O in/O which/O one/O is/O placed/O;/O one/O ca/On't/O live/O _/Oà/O
trois/O_/O./O''/O

``/OI/O understand/O,/O I/O quite/O understand/O that/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O and/O her/O head/O sank/O./O
She/O was/O silent/O for/O a/O little/O,/O thinking/O of/O herself/O,/O of/O her/O own/O grief/O in/O
her/O family/O,/O and/O all/O at/O once/O,/O with/O an/O impulsive/O movement/O,/O she/O raised/O her/O
head/O and/O clasped/O her/O hands/O with/O an/O imploring/O gesture/O./O ``/OBut/O wait/O a/O
little/O!/O You/O are/O a/O Christian/O./O Think/O of/O her/O!/O What/O will/O become/O of/O her/O,/O if/O
you/O cast/O her/O off/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O have/O thought/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O I/O have/O thought/O a/O great/O deal/O,/O''/O said/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O His/O face/O turned/O red/O in/O patches/O,/O and/O his/O dim/O eyes/O
looked/O straight/O before/O him/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON at/O that/O moment/O pitied/O him/O
with/O all/O her/O heart/O./O ``/OThat/O was/O what/O I/O did/O indeed/O when/O she/O herself/O made/O
known/O to/O me/O my/O humiliation/O;/O I/O left/O everything/O as/O of/O old/O./O I/O gave/O her/O a/O
chance/O to/O reform/O,/O I/O tried/O to/O save/O her/O./O And/O with/O what/O result/O?/O She/O would/O
not/O regard/O the/O slightest/O request/O--/Othat/O she/O should/O observe/O decorum/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O,/O getting/O heated/O./O ``/OOne/O may/O save/O anyone/O who/O does/O not/O want/O to/O be/O
ruined/O;/O but/O if/O the/O whole/O nature/O is/O so/O corrupt/O,/O so/O depraved/O,/O that/O ruin/O
itself/O seems/O to/O be/O her/O salvation/O,/O what/O's/O to/O be/O done/O?/O''/O

``/OAnything/O,/O only/O not/O divorce/O!/O''/O answered/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON

``/OBut/O what/O is/O anything/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O it/O is/O awful/O!/O She/O will/O be/O no/O one/O's/O wife/O,/O she/O will/O be/O lost/O!/O''/O

``/OWhat/O can/O I/O do/O?/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O raising/O his/O shoulders/O and/O
his/O eyebrows/O./O The/O recollection/O of/O his/O wife/O's/O last/O act/O had/O so/O incensed/O
him/O that/O he/O had/O become/O frigid/O,/O as/O at/O the/O beginning/O of/O the/O conversation/O./O
``/OI/O am/O very/O grateful/O for/O your/O sympathy/O,/O but/O I/O must/O be/O going/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
getting/O up/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O wait/O a/O minute/O./O You/O must/O not/O ruin/O her/O./O Wait/O a/O little/O;/O I/O will/O tell/O
you/O about/O myself/O./O I/O was/O married/O,/O and/O my/O husband/O deceived/O me/O;/O in/O anger/O
and/O jealousy/O,/O I/O would/O have/O thrown/O up/O everything/O,/O I/O would/O myself/O.../O./O But/O
I/O came/O to/O myself/O again/O;/O and/O who/O did/O it/O?/O Anna/PERSON saved/O me/O./O And/O here/O I/O am/O
living/O on/O./O The/O children/O are/O growing/O up/O,/O my/O husband/O has/O come/O back/O to/O his/O
family/O,/O and/O feels/O his/O fault/O,/O is/O growing/O purer/O,/O better/O,/O and/O I/O live/O on/O.../O./O
I/O have/O forgiven/O it/O,/O and/O you/O ought/O to/O forgive/O!/O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON heard/O her/O,/O but/O her/O words/O had/O no/O effect/O on/O him/O now/O./O
All/O the/O hatred/O of/O that/O day/O when/O he/O had/O resolved/O on/O a/O divorce/O had/O sprung/O
up/O again/O in/O his/O soul/O./O He/O shook/O himself/O,/O and/O said/O in/O a/O shrill/O,/O loud/O
voice/O:/O--/O

``/OForgive/O I/O can/Onot/O,/O and/O do/O not/O wish/O to/O,/O and/O I/O regard/O it/O as/O wrong/O./O I/O have/O
done/O everything/O for/O this/O woman/O,/O and/O she/O has/O trodden/O it/O all/O in/O the/O mud/O to/O
which/O she/O is/O akin/O./O I/O am/O not/O a/O spiteful/O man/O,/O I/O have/O never/O hated/O anyone/O,/O
but/O I/O hate/O her/O with/O my/O whole/O soul/O,/O and/O I/O can/Onot/O even/O forgive/O her/O,/O
because/O I/O hate/O her/O too/O much/O for/O all/O the/O wrong/O she/O has/O done/O me/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
with/O tones/O of/O hatred/O in/O his/O voice/O./O

``/OLove/O those/O that/O hate/O you/O.../O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON whispered/O timorously/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON smiled/O contemptuously/O./O That/O he/O knew/O long/O ago/O,/O but/O
it/O could/O not/O be/O applied/O to/O his/O case/O./O

``/OLove/O those/O that/O hate/O you/O,/O but/O to/O love/O those/O one/O hates/O is/O impossible/O./O
Forgive/O me/O for/O having/O troubled/O you/O./O Everyone/O has/O enough/O to/O bear/O in/O his/O
own/O grief/O!/O''/O And/O regaining/O his/O self-possession/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
quietly/O took/O leave/O and/O went/O away/O./O



Chapter/O 13/O


When/O they/O rose/O from/O table/O,/O Levin/PERSON would/O have/O liked/O to/O follow/O Kitty/PERSON into/O
the/O drawing/O room/O;/O but/O he/O was/O afraid/O she/O might/O dislike/O this/O,/O as/O too/O
obviously/O paying/O her/O attention/O./O He/O remained/O in/O the/O little/O ring/O of/O men/O,/O
taking/O part/O in/O the/O general/O conversation/O,/O and/O without/O looking/O at/O Kitty/PERSON,/O
he/O was/O aware/O of/O her/O movements/O,/O her/O looks/O,/O and/O the/O place/O where/O she/O was/O in/O
the/O drawing/O room/O./O

He/O did/O at/O once/O,/O and/O without/O the/O smallest/O effort/O,/O keep/O the/O promise/O he/O had/O
made/O her/O--/Oalways/O to/O think/O well/O of/O all/O men/O,/O and/O to/O like/O everyone/O always/O./O
The/O conversation/O fell/O on/O the/O village/O commune/O,/O in/O which/O Pestsov/PERSON saw/O a/O
sort/O of/O special/O principle/O,/O called/O by/O him/O the/O choral/O principle/O./O Levin/PERSON did/O
not/O agree/O with/O Pestsov/PERSON,/O nor/O with/O his/O brother/O,/O who/O had/O a/O special/O attitude/O
of/O his/O own/O,/O both/O admitting/O and/O not/O admitting/O the/O significance/O of/O the/O
Russian/O commune/O./O But/O he/O talked/O to/O them/O,/O simply/O trying/O to/O reconcile/O and/O
soften/O their/O differences/O./O He/O was/O not/O in/O the/O least/O interested/O in/O what/O he/O
said/O himself/O,/O and/O even/O less/O so/O in/O what/O they/O said/O;/O all/O he/O wanted/O was/O that/O
they/O and/O everyone/O should/O be/O happy/O and/O contented/O./O He/O knew/O now/O the/O one/O
thing/O of/O importance/O;/O and/O that/O one/O thing/O was/O at/O first/O there/O,/O in/O the/O
drawing/O room/O,/O and/O then/O began/O moving/O across/O and/O came/O to/O a/O standstill/O at/O
the/O door/O./O Without/O turning/O round/O he/O felt/O the/O eyes/O fixed/O on/O him/O,/O and/O the/O
smile/O,/O and/O he/O could/O not/O help/O turning/O round/O./O She/O was/O standing/O in/O the/O
doorway/O with/O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O him/O./O

``/OI/O thought/O you/O were/O going/O towards/O the/O piano/O,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O going/O up/O to/O her/O./O
``/OThat/O's/O something/O I/O miss/O in/O the/O country/O--/Omusic/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O we/O only/O came/O to/O fetch/O you/O and/O thank/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O rewarding/O him/O
with/O a/O smile/O that/O was/O like/O a/O gift/O,/O ``/Ofor/O coming/O./O What/O do/O they/O want/O to/O
argue/O for/O?/O No/O one/O ever/O convinces/O anyone/O,/O you/O know/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O;/O that/O's/O true/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON;/O ``/Oit/O generally/O happens/O that/O one/O argues/O
warmly/O simply/O because/O one/O ca/On't/O make/O out/O what/O one/O's/O opponent/O wants/O to/O
prove/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON had/O often/O noticed/O in/O discussions/O between/O the/O most/O intelligent/O
people/O that/O after/O enormous/O efforts/O,/O and/O an/O enormous/O expenditure/O of/O
logical/O subtleties/O and/O words/O,/O the/O disputants/O finally/O arrived/O at/O being/O
aware/O that/O what/O they/O had/O so/O long/O been/O struggling/O to/O prove/O to/O one/O another/O
had/O long/O ago/O,/O from/O the/O beginning/O of/O the/O argument/O,/O been/O known/O to/O both/O,/O
but/O that/O they/O liked/O different/O things/O,/O and/O would/O not/O define/O what/O they/O
liked/O for/O fear/O of/O its/O being/O attacked/O./O He/O had/O often/O had/O the/O experience/O of/O
suddenly/O in/O a/O discussion/O grasping/O what/O it/O was/O his/O opponent/O liked/O and/O at/O
once/O liking/O it/O too/O,/O and/O immediately/O he/O found/O himself/O agreeing/O,/O and/O then/O
all/O arguments/O fell/O away/O as/O useless/O./O Sometimes/O,/O too/O,/O he/O had/O experienced/O
the/O opposite/O,/O expressing/O at/O last/O what/O he/O liked/O himself/O,/O which/O he/O was/O
devising/O arguments/O to/O defend/O,/O and/O,/O chancing/O to/O express/O it/O well/O and/O
genuinely/O,/O he/O had/O found/O his/O opponent/O at/O once/O agreeing/O and/O ceasing/O to/O
dispute/O his/O position/O./O He/O tried/O to/O say/O this/O./O

She/O knitted/O her/O brow/O,/O trying/O to/O understand/O./O But/O directly/O he/O began/O to/O
illustrate/O his/O meaning/O,/O she/O understood/O at/O once/O./O

``/OI/O know/O:/O one/O must/O find/O out/O what/O he/O is/O arguing/O for/O,/O what/O is/O precious/O to/O
him/O,/O then/O one/O can/O.../O''/O

She/O had/O completely/O guessed/O and/O expressed/O his/O badly/O expressed/O idea/O./O Levin/PERSON
smiled/O joyfully/O;/O he/O was/O struck/O by/O this/O transition/O from/O the/O confused/O,/O
verbose/O discussion/O with/O Pestsov/PERSON and/O his/O brother/O to/O this/O laconic/O,/O clear/O,/O
almost/O wordless/O communication/O of/O the/O most/O complex/O ideas/O./O

Shtcherbatsky/PERSON moved/O away/O from/O them/O,/O and/O Kitty/PERSON,/O going/O up/O to/O a/O card/O table/O,/O
sat/O down/O,/O and/O,/O taking/O up/O the/O chalk/O,/O began/O drawing/O diverging/O circles/O over/O
the/O new/O green/O cloth/O./O

They/O began/O again/O on/O the/O subject/O that/O had/O been/O started/O at/O dinner/O--/Othe/O
liberty/O and/O occupations/O of/O women/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O of/O the/O opinion/O of/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON that/O a/O girl/O who/O did/O not/O marry/O should/O find/O a/O woman/O's/O duties/O
in/O a/O family/O./O He/O supported/O this/O view/O by/O the/O fact/O that/O no/O family/O can/O get/O
on/O without/O women/O to/O help/O;/O that/O in/O every/O family/O,/O poor/O or/O rich/O,/O there/O are/O
and/O must/O be/O nurses/O,/O either/O relations/O or/O hired/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O blushing/O,/O but/O looking/O at/O him/O all/O the/O more/O boldly/O with/O
her/O truthful/O eyes/O;/O ``/Oa/O girl/O may/O be/O so/O circumstanced/O that/O she/O can/Onot/O live/O
in/O the/O family/O without/O humiliation/O,/O while/O she/O herself/O.../O''/O

At/O the/O hint/O he/O understood/O her/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O yes/O--/Oyou/O're/O right/O;/O you/O're/O right/O!/O''/O

And/O he/O saw/O all/O that/O Pestsov/PERSON had/O been/O maintaining/O at/O dinner/O of/O the/O
liberty/O of/O woman/O,/O simply/O from/O getting/O a/O glimpse/O of/O the/O terror/O of/O an/O old/O
maid/O's/O existence/O and/O its/O humiliation/O in/O Kitty/PERSON's/O heart/O;/O and/O loving/O her/O,/O
he/O felt/O that/O terror/O and/O humiliation/O,/O and/O at/O once/O gave/O up/O his/O arguments/O./O

A/O silence/O followed/O./O She/O was/O still/O drawing/O with/O the/O chalk/O on/O the/O table/O./O
Her/O eyes/O were/O shining/O with/O a/O soft/O light/O./O Under/O the/O influence/O of/O her/O mood/O
he/O felt/O in/O all/O his/O being/O a/O continually/O growing/O tension/O of/O happiness/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O I/O've/O scribbled/O all/O over/O the/O table/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O,/O laying/O down/O the/O
chalk/O,/O she/O made/O a/O movement/O as/O though/O to/O get/O up/O./O

``/OWhat/O!/O shall/O I/O be/O left/O alone/O--/Owithout/O her/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O with/O horror/O,/O and/O
he/O took/O the/O chalk/O./O ``/OWait/O a/O minute/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O sitting/O down/O to/O the/O table/O./O
``/OI/O've/O long/O wanted/O to/O ask/O you/O one/O thing/O./O''/O

He/O looked/O straight/O into/O her/O caressing/O,/O though/O frightened/O eyes/O./O

``/OPlease/O,/O ask/O it/O./O''/O

``/OHere/O,/O''/O he/O said/O;/O and/O he/O wrote/O the/O initial/O letters/O,/O _/Ow/O,/O y/O,/O t/O,/O m/O,/O i/O,/O c/O,/O n/O,/O
b/O,/O d/O,/O t/O,/O m/O,/O n/O,/O o/O,/O t/O_/O./O These/O letters/O meant/O,/O ``/OWhen/O you/O told/O me/O it/O could/O
never/O be/O,/O did/O that/O mean/O never/O,/O or/O then/O?/O''/O There/O seemed/O no/O likelihood/O that/O
she/O could/O make/O out/O this/O complicated/O sentence/O;/O but/O he/O looked/O at/O her/O as/O
though/O his/O life/O depended/O on/O her/O understanding/O the/O words/O./O She/O glanced/O at/O
him/O seriously/O,/O then/O leaned/O her/O puckered/O brow/O on/O her/O hands/O and/O began/O to/O
read/O./O Once/O or/O twice/O she/O stole/O a/O look/O at/O him/O,/O as/O though/O asking/O him/O,/O ``/OIs/O
it/O what/O I/O think/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O understand/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O flushing/O a/O little/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O this/O word/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O pointing/O to/O the/O n/O that/O stood/O for/O _/Onever/O_/O./O

``/OIt/O means/O _/Onever/O_/O,/O''/O she/O said/O;/O ``/Obut/O that/O's/O not/O true/O!/O''/O

He/O quickly/O rubbed/O out/O what/O he/O had/O written/O,/O gave/O her/O the/O chalk/O,/O and/O stood/O
up/O./O She/O wrote/O,/O _/Ot/O,/O i/O,/O c/O,/O n/O,/O a/O,/O d/O_/O./O

Dolly/PERSON was/O completely/O comforted/O in/O the/O depression/O caused/O by/O her/O
conversation/O with/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON when/O she/O caught/O sight/O of/O the/O two/O
figures/O:/O Kitty/PERSON with/O the/O chalk/O in/O her/O hand/O,/O with/O a/O shy/O and/O happy/O smile/O
looking/O upwards/O at/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O his/O handsome/O figure/O bending/O over/O the/O table/O
with/O glowing/O eyes/O fastened/O one/O minute/O on/O the/O table/O and/O the/O next/O on/O her/O./O
He/O was/O suddenly/O radiant/O:/O he/O had/O understood/O./O It/O meant/O,/O ``/OThen/O I/O could/O not/O
answer/O differently/O./O''/O

He/O glanced/O at/O her/O questioningly/O,/O timidly/O./O

``/OOnly/O then/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O her/O smile/O answered/O./O

``/OAnd/O n./O./O./O and/O now/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O read/O this/O./O I/O'll/O tell/O you/O what/O I/O should/O like/O--/Oshould/O like/O so/O much/O!/O''/O
she/O wrote/O the/O initial/O letters/O,/O i/O,/O y/O,/O c/O,/O f/O,/O a/O,/O f/O,/O w/O,/O h/O./O This/O meant/O,/O ``/OIf/O
you/O could/O forget/O and/O forgive/O what/O happened/O./O''/O

He/O snatched/O the/O chalk/O with/O nervous/O,/O trembling/O fingers/O,/O and/O breaking/O it/O,/O
wrote/O the/O initial/O letters/O of/O the/O following/O phrase/O,/O ``/OI/O have/O nothing/O to/O
forget/O and/O to/O forgive/O;/O I/O have/O never/O ceased/O to/O love/O you/O./O''/O

She/O glanced/O at/O him/O with/O a/O smile/O that/O did/O not/O waver/O./O

``/OI/O understand/O,/O''/O she/O said/O in/O a/O whisper/O./O

He/O sat/O down/O and/O wrote/O a/O long/O phrase/O./O She/O understood/O it/O all/O,/O and/O without/O
asking/O him/O,/O ``/OIs/O it/O this/O?/O''/O took/O the/O chalk/O and/O at/O once/O answered/O./O

For/O a/O long/O while/O he/O could/O not/O understand/O what/O she/O had/O written/O,/O and/O often/O
looked/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O He/O was/O stupefied/O with/O happiness/O./O He/O could/O not/O
supply/O the/O word/O she/O had/O meant/O;/O but/O in/O her/O charming/O eyes/O,/O beaming/O with/O
happiness/O,/O he/O saw/O all/O he/O needed/O to/O know/O./O And/O he/O wrote/O three/O letters/O./O But/O
he/O had/O hardly/O finished/O writing/O when/O she/O read/O them/O over/O her/O arm/O,/O and/O
herself/O finished/O and/O wrote/O the/O answer/O,/O ``/OYes/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O playing/O _/Osecrétaire/O_/O?/O''/O said/O the/O old/O prince/O./O ``/OBut/O we/O must/O really/O
be/O getting/O along/O if/O you/O want/O to/O be/O in/O time/O at/O the/O theater/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON got/O up/O and/O escorted/O Kitty/PERSON to/O the/O door/O./O

In/O their/O conversation/O everything/O had/O been/O said/O;/O it/O had/O been/O said/O that/O
she/O loved/O him/O,/O and/O that/O she/O would/O tell/O her/O father/O and/O mother/O that/O he/O
would/O come/O tomorrow/O morning/O./O



Chapter/O 14/O


When/O Kitty/PERSON had/O gone/O and/O Levin/PERSON was/O left/O alone/O,/O he/O felt/O such/O uneasiness/O
without/O her/O,/O and/O such/O an/O impatient/O longing/O to/O get/O as/O quickly/O,/O as/O quickly/O
as/O possible/O,/O to/O tomorrow/O morning/O,/O when/O he/O would/O see/O her/O again/O and/O be/O
plighted/O to/O her/O forever/O,/O that/O he/O felt/O afraid/O,/O as/O though/O of/O death/O,/O of/O
those/O fourteen/O hours/O that/O he/O had/O to/O get/O through/O without/O her/O./O It/O was/O
essential/O for/O him/O to/O be/O with/O someone/O to/O talk/O to/O,/O so/O as/O not/O to/O be/O left/O
alone/O,/O to/O kill/O time/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON would/O have/O been/O the/O companion/O
most/O congenial/O to/O him/O,/O but/O he/O was/O going/O out/O,/O he/O said/O,/O to/O a/O _/Osoirée/O_/O,/O in/O
reality/O to/O the/O ballet/O./O Levin/PERSON only/O had/O time/O to/O tell/O him/O he/O was/O happy/O,/O and/O
that/O he/O loved/O him/O,/O and/O would/O never/O,/O never/O forget/O what/O he/O had/O done/O for/O
him/O./O The/O eyes/O and/O the/O smile/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON showed/O Levin/PERSON that/O he/O
comprehended/O that/O feeling/O fittingly/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O so/O it/O's/O not/O time/O to/O die/O yet/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O pressing/O
Levin/PERSON's/O hand/O with/O emotion/O./O

``/ON-n-no/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON too/O,/O as/O she/O said/O good-bye/O to/O him/O,/O gave/O him/O a/O sort/O of/O
congratulation/O,/O saying/O,/O ``/OHow/O glad/O I/O am/O you/O have/O met/O Kitty/PERSON again/O!/O One/O
must/O value/O old/O friends/O./O''/O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O like/O these/O words/O of/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O./O She/O could/O not/O understand/O how/O lofty/O and/O beyond/O her/O it/O all/O
was/O,/O and/O she/O ought/O not/O to/O have/O dared/O to/O allude/O to/O it/O./O Levin/PERSON said/O
good-bye/O to/O them/O,/O but/O,/O not/O to/O be/O left/O alone/O,/O he/O attached/O himself/O to/O his/O
brother/O./O

``/OWhere/O are/O you/O going/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O going/O to/O a/O meeting/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O'll/O come/O with/O you/O./O May/O I/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O for/O?/O Yes/O,/O come/O along/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O ``/OWhat/O is/O
the/O matter/O with/O you/O today/O?/O''/O

``/OWith/O me/O?/O Happiness/O is/O the/O matter/O with/O me/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O letting/O down/O the/O
window/O of/O the/O carriage/O they/O were/O driving/O in/O./O ``/OYou/O do/On't/O mind/O?/O--/Oit/O's/O so/O
stifling/O./O It/O's/O happiness/O is/O the/O matter/O with/O me/O!/O Why/O is/O it/O you/O have/O never/O
married/O?/O''/O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON smiled/O./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O glad/O,/O she/O seems/O a/O nice/O gi/O.../O''/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O
beginning/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O say/O it/O!/O do/On't/O say/O it/O!/O''/O shouted/O Levin/PERSON,/O clutching/O at/O the/O collar/O of/O
his/O fur/O coat/O with/O both/O hands/O,/O and/O muffling/O him/O up/O in/O it/O./O ``/OShe/O's/O a/O nice/O
girl/O''/O were/O such/O simple/O,/O humble/O words/O,/O so/O out/O of/O harmony/O with/O his/O
feeling/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON laughed/O outright/O a/O merry/O laugh/O,/O which/O was/O rare/O with/O
him/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O anyway/O,/O I/O may/O say/O that/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O of/O it/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O you/O may/O do/O tomorrow/O,/O tomorrow/O and/O nothing/O more/O!/O Nothing/O,/O nothing/O,/O
silence/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O muffling/O him/O once/O more/O in/O his/O fur/O coat/O,/O he/O
added/O:/O ``/OI/O do/O like/O you/O so/O!/O Well/O,/O is/O it/O possible/O for/O me/O to/O be/O present/O at/O
the/O meeting/O?/O''/O

``/OOf/O course/O it/O is/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O is/O your/O discussion/O about/O today/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON,/O never/O ceasing/O
smiling/O./O

They/O arrived/O at/O the/O meeting/O./O Levin/PERSON heard/O the/O secretary/O hesitatingly/O read/O
the/O minutes/O which/O he/O obviously/O did/O not/O himself/O understand/O;/O but/O Levin/PERSON saw/O
from/O this/O secretary/O's/O face/O what/O a/O good/O,/O nice/O,/O kind-hearted/O person/O he/O
was/O./O This/O was/O evident/O from/O his/O confusion/O and/O embarrassment/O in/O reading/O
the/O minutes/O./O Then/O the/O discussion/O began/O./O They/O were/O disputing/O about/O the/O
misappropriation/O of/O certain/O sums/O and/O the/O laying/O of/O certain/O pipes/O,/O and/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O very/O cutting/O to/O two/O members/O,/O and/O said/O something/O at/O
great/O length/O with/O an/O air/O of/O triumph/O;/O and/O another/O member/O,/O scribbling/O
something/O on/O a/O bit/O of/O paper/O,/O began/O timidly/O at/O first/O,/O but/O afterwards/O
answered/O him/O very/O viciously/O and/O delightfully/O./O And/O then/O Sviazhsky/PERSON -LRB-/Ohe/O was/O
there/O too/O-RRB-/O said/O something/O too/O,/O very/O handsomely/O and/O nobly/O./O Levin/PERSON listened/O
to/O them/O,/O and/O saw/O clearly/O that/O these/O missing/O sums/O and/O these/O pipes/O were/O
not/O anything/O real/O,/O and/O that/O they/O were/O not/O at/O all/O angry/O,/O but/O were/O all/O the/O
nicest/O,/O kindest/O people/O,/O and/O everything/O was/O as/O happy/O and/O charming/O as/O
possible/O among/O them/O./O They/O did/O no/O harm/O to/O anyone/O,/O and/O were/O all/O enjoying/O
it/O./O What/O struck/O Levin/PERSON was/O that/O he/O could/O see/O through/O them/O all/O today/O,/O and/O
from/O little/O,/O almost/O imperceptible/O signs/O knew/O the/O soul/O of/O each/O,/O and/O saw/O
distinctly/O that/O they/O were/O all/O good/O at/O heart/O./O And/O Levin/PERSON himself/O in/O
particular/O they/O were/O all/O extremely/O fond/O of/O that/O day/O./O That/O was/O evident/O
from/O the/O way/O they/O spoke/O to/O him/O,/O from/O the/O friendly/O,/O affectionate/O way/O even/O
those/O he/O did/O not/O know/O looked/O at/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O did/O you/O like/O it/O?/O''/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON asked/O him/O./O

``/OVery/O much/O./O I/O never/O supposed/O it/O was/O so/O interesting/O!/O Capital/O!/O Splendid/O!/O''/O

Sviazhsky/PERSON went/O up/O to/O Levin/PERSON and/O invited/O him/O to/O come/O round/O to/O tea/O with/O
him/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O utterly/O at/O a/O loss/O to/O comprehend/O or/O recall/O what/O it/O was/O he/O
had/O disliked/O in/O Sviazhsky/LOCATION,/O what/O he/O had/O failed/O to/O find/O in/O him/O./O He/O was/O a/O
clever/O and/O wonderfully/O good-hearted/O man/O./O

``/OMost/O delighted/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O asked/O after/O his/O wife/O and/O sister-in-law/O./O
And/O from/O a/O queer/O association/O of/O ideas/O,/O because/O in/O his/O imagination/O the/O
idea/O of/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O sister-in-law/O was/O connected/O with/O marriage/O,/O it/O
occurred/O to/O him/O that/O there/O was/O no/O one/O to/O whom/O he/O could/O more/O suitably/O
speak/O of/O his/O happiness/O,/O and/O he/O was/O very/O glad/O to/O go/O and/O see/O them/O./O

Sviazhsky/PERSON questioned/O him/O about/O his/O improvements/O on/O his/O estate/O,/O
presupposing/O,/O as/O he/O always/O did/O,/O that/O there/O was/O no/O possibility/O of/O doing/O
anything/O not/O done/O already/O in/O Europe/LOCATION,/O and/O now/O this/O did/O not/O in/O the/O least/O
annoy/O Levin/PERSON./O On/O the/O contrary/O,/O he/O felt/O that/O Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O right/O,/O that/O the/O
whole/O business/O was/O of/O little/O value/O,/O and/O he/O saw/O the/O wonderful/O softness/O
and/O consideration/O with/O which/O Sviazhsky/PERSON avoided/O fully/O expressing/O his/O
correct/O view/O./O The/O ladies/O of/O the/O Sviazhsky/O household/O were/O particularly/O
delightful/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON that/O they/O knew/O all/O about/O it/O already/O and/O
sympathized/O with/O him/O,/O saying/O nothing/O merely/O from/O delicacy/O./O He/O stayed/O
with/O them/O one/O hour/O,/O two/O,/O three/O,/O talking/O of/O all/O sorts/O of/O subjects/O but/O the/O
one/O thing/O that/O filled/O his/O heart/O,/O and/O did/O not/O observe/O that/O he/O was/O boring/O
them/O dreadfully/O,/O and/O that/O it/O was/O long/O past/O their/O bedtime/O./O

Sviazhsky/PERSON went/O with/O him/O into/O the/O hall/O,/O yawning/O and/O wondering/O at/O the/O
strange/O humor/O his/O friend/O was/O in/O./O It/O was/O past/O one/O o'clock/O./O Levin/PERSON went/O
back/O to/O his/O hotel/O,/O and/O was/O dismayed/O at/O the/O thought/O that/O all/O alone/O now/O
with/O his/O impatience/O he/O had/O ten/O hours/O still/O left/O to/O get/O through/O./O The/O
servant/O,/O whose/O turn/O it/O was/O to/O be/O up/O all/O night/O,/O lighted/O his/O candles/O,/O and/O
would/O have/O gone/O away/O,/O but/O Levin/PERSON stopped/O him/O./O This/O servant/O,/O Yegor/PERSON,/O whom/O
Levin/PERSON had/O noticed/O before/O,/O struck/O him/O as/O a/O very/O intelligent/O,/O excellent/O,/O
and/O,/O above/O all/O,/O good-hearted/O man/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O Yegor/PERSON,/O it/O's/O hard/O work/O not/O sleeping/O,/O is/On't/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OOne/O's/O got/O to/O put/O up/O with/O it/O!/O It/O's/O part/O of/O our/O work/O,/O you/O see/O./O In/O a/O
gentleman/O's/O house/O it/O's/O easier/O;/O but/O then/O here/O one/O makes/O more/O./O''/O

It/O appeared/O that/O Yegor/PERSON had/O a/O family/O,/O three/O boys/O and/O a/O daughter/O,/O a/O
sempstress/O,/O whom/O he/O wanted/O to/O marry/O to/O a/O cashier/O in/O a/O saddler/O's/O shop/O./O

Levin/PERSON,/O on/O hearing/O this/O,/O informed/O Yegor/PERSON that/O,/O in/O his/O opinion/O,/O in/O marriage/O
the/O great/O thing/O was/O love/O,/O and/O that/O with/O love/O one/O would/O always/O be/O happy/O,/O
for/O happiness/O rests/O only/O on/O oneself/O./O Yegor/PERSON listened/O attentively/O,/O and/O
obviously/O quite/O took/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O idea/O,/O but/O by/O way/O of/O assent/O to/O it/O he/O
enunciated/O,/O greatly/O to/O Levin/PERSON's/O surprise/O,/O the/O observation/O that/O when/O he/O
had/O lived/O with/O good/O masters/O he/O had/O always/O been/O satisfied/O with/O his/O
masters/O,/O and/O now/O was/O perfectly/O satisfied/O with/O his/O employer/O,/O though/O he/O
was/O a/O Frenchman/O./O

``/OWonderfully/O good-hearted/O fellow/O!/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O but/O you/O yourself/O,/O Yegor/PERSON,/O when/O you/O got/O married/O,/O did/O you/O love/O your/O
wife/O?/O''/O

``/OAy/O!/O and/O why/O not/O?/O''/O responded/O Yegor/PERSON./O

And/O Levin/PERSON saw/O that/O Yegor/PERSON too/O was/O in/O an/O excited/O state/O and/O intending/O to/O
express/O all/O his/O most/O heartfelt/O emotions/O./O

``/OMy/O life/O,/O too/O,/O has/O been/O a/O wonderful/O one/O./O From/O a/O child/O up/O.../O''/O he/O was/O
beginning/O with/O flashing/O eyes/O,/O apparently/O catching/O Levin/PERSON's/O enthusiasm/O,/O
just/O as/O people/O catch/O yawning/O./O

But/O at/O that/O moment/O a/O ring/O was/O heard/O./O Yegor/PERSON departed/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON was/O left/O
alone/O./O He/O had/O eaten/O scarcely/O anything/O at/O dinner/O,/O had/O refused/O tea/O and/O
supper/O at/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O,/O but/O he/O was/O incapable/O of/O thinking/O of/O supper/O./O He/O
had/O not/O slept/O the/O previous/O night/O,/O but/O was/O incapable/O of/O thinking/O of/O sleep/O
either/O./O His/O room/O was/O cold/O,/O but/O he/O was/O oppressed/O by/O heat/O./O He/O opened/O both/O
the/O movable/O panes/O in/O his/O window/O and/O sat/O down/O to/O the/O table/O opposite/O the/O
open/O panes/O./O Over/O the/O snow-covered/O roofs/O could/O be/O seen/O a/O decorated/O cross/O
with/O chains/O,/O and/O above/O it/O the/O rising/O triangle/O of/O Charles/PERSON's/O Wain/PERSON with/O the/O
yellowish/O light/O of/O Capella/LOCATION./O He/O gazed/O at/O the/O cross/O,/O then/O at/O the/O stars/O,/O
drank/O in/O the/O fresh/O freezing/O air/O that/O flowed/O evenly/O into/O the/O room/O,/O and/O
followed/O as/O though/O in/O a/O dream/O the/O images/O and/O memories/O that/O rose/O in/O his/O
imagination/O./O At/O four/O o'clock/O he/O heard/O steps/O in/O the/O passage/O and/O peeped/O
out/O at/O the/O door/O./O It/O was/O the/O gambler/O Myaskin/PERSON,/O whom/O he/O knew/O,/O coming/O from/O
the/O club/O./O He/O walked/O gloomily/O,/O frowning/O and/O coughing/O./O ``/OPoor/O,/O unlucky/O
fellow/O!/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O tears/O came/O into/O his/O eyes/O from/O love/O and/O pity/O
for/O this/O man/O./O He/O would/O have/O talked/O with/O him/O,/O and/O tried/O to/O comfort/O him/O,/O
but/O remembering/O that/O he/O had/O nothing/O but/O his/O shirt/O on/O,/O he/O changed/O his/O
mind/O and/O sat/O down/O again/O at/O the/O open/O pane/O to/O bathe/O in/O the/O cold/O air/O and/O
gaze/O at/O the/O exquisite/O lines/O of/O the/O cross/O,/O silent/O,/O but/O full/O of/O meaning/O
for/O him/O,/O and/O the/O mounting/O lurid/O yellow/O star/O./O At/O seven/O o'clock/O there/O was/O
a/O noise/O of/O people/O polishing/O the/O floors/O,/O and/O bells/O ringing/O in/O some/O
servants/O'/O department/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON felt/O that/O he/O was/O beginning/O to/O get/O
frozen/O./O He/O closed/O the/O pane/O,/O washed/O,/O dressed/O,/O and/O went/O out/O into/O the/O
street/O./O



Chapter/O 15/O


The/O streets/O were/O still/O empty/O./O Levin/PERSON went/O to/O the/O house/O of/O the/O
Shtcherbatskys/O./O The/O visitors/O'/O doors/O were/O closed/O and/O everything/O was/O
asleep/O./O He/O walked/O back/O,/O went/O into/O his/O room/O again/O,/O and/O asked/O for/O coffee/O./O
The/O day/O servant/O,/O not/O Yegor/PERSON this/O time/O,/O brought/O it/O to/O him/O./O Levin/PERSON would/O
have/O entered/O into/O conversation/O with/O him/O,/O but/O a/O bell/O rang/O for/O the/O
servant/O,/O and/O he/O went/O out/O./O Levin/PERSON tried/O to/O drink/O coffee/O and/O put/O some/O roll/O
in/O his/O mouth/O,/O but/O his/O mouth/O was/O quite/O at/O a/O loss/O what/O to/O do/O with/O the/O
roll/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O rejecting/O the/O roll/O,/O put/O on/O his/O coat/O and/O went/O out/O again/O for/O
a/O walk/O./O It/O was/O nine/O o'clock/O when/O he/O reached/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O steps/O
the/O second/O time/O./O In/O the/O house/O they/O were/O only/O just/O up/O,/O and/O the/O cook/O came/O
out/O to/O go/O marketing/O./O He/O had/O to/O get/O through/O at/O least/O two/O hours/O more/O./O

All/O that/O night/O and/O morning/O Levin/PERSON lived/O perfectly/O unconsciously/O,/O and/O felt/O
perfectly/O lifted/O out/O of/O the/O conditions/O of/O material/O life/O./O He/O had/O eaten/O
nothing/O for/O a/O whole/O day/O,/O he/O had/O not/O slept/O for/O two/O nights/O,/O had/O spent/O
several/O hours/O undressed/O in/O the/O frozen/O air/O,/O and/O felt/O not/O simply/O fresher/O
and/O stronger/O than/O ever/O,/O but/O felt/O utterly/O independent/O of/O his/O body/O;/O he/O
moved/O without/O muscular/O effort/O,/O and/O felt/O as/O if/O he/O could/O do/O anything/O./O He/O
was/O convinced/O he/O could/O fly/O upwards/O or/O lift/O the/O corner/O of/O the/O house/O,/O if/O
need/O be/O./O He/O spent/O the/O remainder/O of/O the/O time/O in/O the/O street/O,/O incessantly/O
looking/O at/O his/O watch/O and/O gazing/O about/O him/O./O

And/O what/O he/O saw/O then/O,/O he/O never/O saw/O again/O after/O./O The/O children/O especially/O
going/O to/O school/O,/O the/O bluish/O doves/O flying/O down/O from/O the/O roofs/O to/O the/O
pavement/O,/O and/O the/O little/O loaves/O covered/O with/O flour/O,/O thrust/O out/O by/O an/O
unseen/O hand/O,/O touched/O him/O./O Those/O loaves/O,/O those/O doves/O,/O and/O those/O two/O boys/O
were/O not/O earthly/O creatures/O./O It/O all/O happened/O at/O the/O same/O time/O:/O a/O boy/O ran/O
towards/O a/O dove/O and/O glanced/O smiling/O at/O Levin/ORGANIZATION;/O the/O dove/O,/O with/O a/O whir/O of/O
her/O wings/O,/O darted/O away/O,/O flashing/O in/O the/O sun/O,/O amid/O grains/O of/O snow/O that/O
quivered/O in/O the/O air/O,/O while/O from/O a/O little/O window/O there/O came/O a/O smell/O of/O
fresh-baked/O bread/O,/O and/O the/O loaves/O were/O put/O out/O./O All/O of/O this/O together/O was/O
so/O extraordinarily/O nice/O that/O Levin/PERSON laughed/O and/O cried/O with/O delight/O./O Going/O
a/O long/O way/O round/O by/O Gazetny/PERSON Place/PERSON and/O Kislovka/PERSON,/O he/O went/O back/O again/O to/O
the/O hotel/O,/O and/O putting/O his/O watch/O before/O him/O,/O he/O sat/O down/O to/O wait/O for/O
twelve/O o'clock/O./O In/O the/O next/O room/O they/O were/O talking/O about/O some/O sort/O of/O
machines/O,/O and/O swindling/O,/O and/O coughing/O their/O morning/O coughs/O./O They/O did/O not/O
realize/O that/O the/O hand/O was/O near/O twelve/O./O The/O hand/O reached/O it/O./O Levin/PERSON went/O
out/O onto/O the/O steps/O./O The/O sledge-drivers/O clearly/O knew/O all/O about/O it/O./O They/O
crowded/O round/O Levin/PERSON with/O happy/O faces/O,/O quarreling/O among/O themselves/O,/O and/O
offering/O their/O services/O./O Trying/O not/O to/O offend/O the/O other/O sledge/O drivers/O,/O
and/O promising/O to/O drive/O with/O them/O too/O,/O Levin/PERSON took/O one/O and/O told/O him/O to/O
drive/O to/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O./O The/O sledge-driver/O was/O splendid/O in/O a/O white/O
shirt-collar/O sticking/O out/O over/O his/O overcoat/O and/O into/O his/O strong/O,/O
full-blooded/O red/O neck/O./O The/O sledge/O was/O high/O and/O comfortable/O,/O and/O
altogether/O such/O a/O one/O as/O Levin/PERSON never/O drove/O in/O after/O,/O and/O the/O horse/O was/O a/O
good/O one/O,/O and/O tried/O to/O gallop/O but/O did/On't/O seem/O to/O move/O./O The/O driver/O knew/O
the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O house/O,/O and/O drew/O up/O at/O the/O entrance/O with/O a/O curve/O of/O
his/O arm/O and/O a/O ``/OWo/O!/O''/O especially/O indicative/O of/O respect/O for/O his/O fare/O./O The/O
Shtcherbatskys/O'/O hall-porter/O certainly/O knew/O all/O about/O it/O./O This/O was/O
evident/O from/O the/O smile/O in/O his/O eyes/O and/O the/O way/O he/O said/O:/O

``/OWell/O,/O it/O's/O a/O long/O while/O since/O you/O've/O been/O to/O see/O us/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON
Demitrievitch/PERSON!/O''/O

Not/O only/O he/O knew/O all/O about/O it/O,/O but/O he/O was/O unmistakably/O delighted/O and/O
making/O efforts/O to/O conceal/O his/O joy/O./O Looking/O into/O his/O kindly/O old/O eyes/O,/O
Levin/PERSON realized/O even/O something/O new/O in/O his/O happiness/O./O

``/OAre/O they/O up/O?/O''/O

``/OPray/O walk/O in/O!/O Leave/O it/O here/O,/O''/O said/O he/O,/O smiling/O,/O as/O Levin/PERSON would/O have/O
come/O back/O to/O take/O his/O hat/O./O That/O meant/O something/O./O

``/OTo/O whom/O shall/O I/O announce/O your/O honor/O?/O''/O asked/O the/O footman/O./O

The/O footman/O,/O though/O a/O young/O man/O,/O and/O one/O of/O the/O new/O school/O of/O footmen/O,/O a/O
dandy/O,/O was/O a/O very/O kind-hearted/O,/O good/O fellow/O,/O and/O he/O too/O knew/O all/O about/O
it/O./O

``/OThe/O princess/O .../O the/O prince/O .../O the/O young/O princess/O.../O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

The/O first/O person/O he/O saw/O was/O Mademoiselle/PERSON Linon/PERSON./O She/O walked/O across/O the/O
room/O,/O and/O her/O ringlets/O and/O her/O face/O were/O beaming/O./O He/O had/O only/O just/O
spoken/O to/O her/O,/O when/O suddenly/O he/O heard/O the/O rustle/O of/O a/O skirt/O at/O the/O door/O,/O
and/O Mademoiselle/PERSON Linon/PERSON vanished/O from/O Levin/PERSON's/O eyes/O,/O and/O a/O joyful/O terror/O
came/O over/O him/O at/O the/O nearness/O of/O his/O happiness/O./O Mademoiselle/PERSON Linon/PERSON was/O
in/O great/O haste/O,/O and/O leaving/O him/O,/O went/O out/O at/O the/O other/O door/O./O Directly/O
she/O had/O gone/O out/O,/O swift/O,/O swift/O light/O steps/O sounded/O on/O the/O parquet/O,/O and/O
his/O bliss/O,/O his/O life/O,/O himself/O--/Owhat/O was/O best/O in/O himself/O,/O what/O he/O had/O so/O
long/O sought/O and/O longed/O for/O--/Owas/O quickly/O,/O so/O quickly/O approaching/O him/O./O She/O
did/O not/O walk/O,/O but/O seemed/O,/O by/O some/O unseen/O force/O,/O to/O float/O to/O him/O./O He/O saw/O
nothing/O but/O her/O clear/O,/O truthful/O eyes/O,/O frightened/O by/O the/O same/O bliss/O of/O
love/O that/O flooded/O his/O heart/O./O Those/O eyes/O were/O shining/O nearer/O and/O nearer/O,/O
blinding/O him/O with/O their/O light/O of/O love/O./O She/O stopped/O still/O close/O to/O him/O,/O
touching/O him/O./O Her/O hands/O rose/O and/O dropped/O onto/O his/O shoulders/O./O

She/O had/O done/O all/O she/O could/O--/Oshe/O had/O run/O up/O to/O him/O and/O given/O herself/O up/O
entirely/O,/O shy/O and/O happy/O./O He/O put/O his/O arms/O round/O her/O and/O pressed/O his/O lips/O
to/O her/O mouth/O that/O sought/O his/O kiss/O./O

She/O too/O had/O not/O slept/O all/O night/O,/O and/O had/O been/O expecting/O him/O all/O the/O
morning/O./O

Her/O mother/O and/O father/O had/O consented/O without/O demur/O,/O and/O were/O happy/O in/O her/O
happiness/O./O She/O had/O been/O waiting/O for/O him/O./O She/O wanted/O to/O be/O the/O first/O to/O
tell/O him/O her/O happiness/O and/O his/O./O She/O had/O got/O ready/O to/O see/O him/O alone/O,/O and/O
had/O been/O delighted/O at/O the/O idea/O,/O and/O had/O been/O shy/O and/O ashamed/O,/O and/O did/O
not/O know/O herself/O what/O she/O was/O doing/O./O She/O had/O heard/O his/O steps/O and/O voice/O,/O
and/O had/O waited/O at/O the/O door/O for/O Mademoiselle/PERSON Linon/PERSON to/O go/O./O Mademoiselle/PERSON
Linon/PERSON had/O gone/O away/O./O Without/O thinking/O,/O without/O asking/O herself/O how/O and/O
what/O,/O she/O had/O gone/O up/O to/O him/O,/O and/O did/O as/O she/O was/O doing/O./O

``/OLet/O us/O go/O to/O mamma/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O taking/O him/O by/O the/O hand/O./O For/O a/O long/O while/O
he/O could/O say/O nothing/O,/O not/O so/O much/O because/O he/O was/O afraid/O of/O desecrating/O
the/O loftiness/O of/O his/O emotion/O by/O a/O word/O,/O as/O that/O every/O time/O he/O tried/O to/O
say/O something/O,/O instead/O of/O words/O he/O felt/O that/O tears/O of/O happiness/O were/O
welling/O up/O./O He/O took/O her/O hand/O and/O kissed/O it/O./O

``/OCan/O it/O be/O true/O?/O''/O he/O said/O at/O last/O in/O a/O choked/O voice/O./O ``/OI/O ca/On't/O believe/O
you/O love/O me/O,/O dear/O!/O''/O

She/O smiled/O at/O that/O ``/Odear/O,/O''/O and/O at/O the/O timidity/O with/O which/O he/O glanced/O at/O
her/O./O

``/OYes/O!/O''/O she/O said/O significantly/O,/O deliberately/O./O ``/OI/O am/O so/O happy/O!/O''/O

Not/O letting/O go/O his/O hands/O,/O she/O went/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O The/O princess/O,/O
seeing/O them/O,/O breathed/O quickly/O,/O and/O immediately/O began/O to/O cry/O and/O then/O
immediately/O began/O to/O laugh/O,/O and/O with/O a/O vigorous/O step/O Levin/PERSON had/O not/O
expected/O,/O ran/O up/O to/O him/O,/O and/O hugging/O his/O head/O,/O kissed/O him/O,/O wetting/O his/O
cheeks/O with/O her/O tears/O./O

``/OSo/O it/O is/O all/O settled/O!/O I/O am/O glad/O./O Love/O her/O./O I/O am/O glad/O.../O./O Kitty/PERSON!/O''/O

``/OYou/O've/O not/O been/O long/O settling/O things/O,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O prince/O,/O trying/O to/O
seem/O unmoved/O;/O but/O Levin/PERSON noticed/O that/O his/O eyes/O were/O wet/O when/O he/O turned/O to/O
him/O./O

``/OI/O've/O long/O,/O always/O wished/O for/O this/O!/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O,/O taking/O Levin/PERSON by/O
the/O arm/O and/O drawing/O him/O towards/O himself/O./O ``/OEven/O when/O this/O little/O
feather-head/O fancied/O.../O''/O

``/OPapa/O!/O''/O shrieked/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O shut/O his/O mouth/O with/O her/O hands/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O!/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OI/O'm/O very/O,/O very/O .../O plea/O.../O Oh/O,/O what/O a/O fool/O I/O
am/O.../O''/O

He/O embraced/O Kitty/PERSON,/O kissed/O her/O face/O,/O her/O hand/O,/O her/O face/O again/O,/O and/O made/O
the/O sign/O of/O the/O cross/O over/O her/O./O

And/O there/O came/O over/O Levin/PERSON a/O new/O feeling/O of/O love/O for/O this/O man/O,/O till/O then/O
so/O little/O known/O to/O him/O,/O when/O he/O saw/O how/O slowly/O and/O tenderly/O Kitty/PERSON kissed/O
his/O muscular/O hand/O./O



Chapter/O 16/O


The/O princess/O sat/O in/O her/O armchair/O,/O silent/O and/O smiling/O;/O the/O prince/O sat/O
down/O beside/O her/O./O Kitty/PERSON stood/O by/O her/O father/O's/O chair/O,/O still/O holding/O his/O
hand/O./O All/O were/O silent/O./O

The/O princess/O was/O the/O first/O to/O put/O everything/O into/O words/O,/O and/O to/O
translate/O all/O thoughts/O and/O feelings/O into/O practical/O questions/O./O And/O all/O
equally/O felt/O this/O strange/O and/O painful/O for/O the/O first/O minute/O./O

``/OWhen/O is/O it/O to/O be/O?/O We/O must/O have/O the/O benediction/O and/O announcement/O./O And/O
when/O's/O the/O wedding/O to/O be/O?/O What/O do/O you/O think/O,/O Alexander/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OHere/O he/O is/O,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O prince/O,/O pointing/O to/O Levin/PERSON--/O``/Ohe/O's/O the/O principal/O
person/O in/O the/O matter/O./O''/O

``/OWhen/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON blushing/O./O ``/OTomorrow/O;/O If/O you/O ask/O me/O,/O I/O should/O say/O,/O the/O
benediction/O today/O and/O the/O wedding/O tomorrow/O./O''/O

``/OCome/O,/O _/Omon/O cher/O_/O,/O that/O's/O nonsense/O!/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O in/O a/O week/O./O''/O

``/OHe/O's/O quite/O mad/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O why/O so/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O upon/O my/O word/O!/O''/O said/O the/O mother/O,/O smiling/O,/O delighted/O at/O this/O haste/O./O
``/OHow/O about/O the/O trousseau/O?/O''/O

``/OWill/O there/O really/O be/O a/O trousseau/O and/O all/O that/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON thought/O with/O
horror/O./O ``/OBut/O can/O the/O trousseau/O and/O the/O benediction/O and/O all/O that/O--/Ocan/O it/O
spoil/O my/O happiness/O?/O Nothing/O can/O spoil/O it/O!/O''/O He/O glanced/O at/O Kitty/ORGANIZATION,/O and/O
noticed/O that/O she/O was/O not/O in/O the/O least/O,/O not/O in/O the/O very/O least/O,/O disturbed/O
by/O the/O idea/O of/O the/O trousseau/O./O ``/OThen/O it/O must/O be/O all/O right/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O know/O nothing/O about/O it/O;/O I/O only/O said/O what/O I/O should/O like/O,/O''/O he/O said/O
apologetically/O./O

``/OWe/O'll/O talk/O it/O over/O,/O then/O./O The/O benediction/O and/O announcement/O can/O take/O
place/O now/O./O That/O's/O very/O well/O./O''/O

The/O princess/O went/O up/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O kissed/O him/O,/O and/O would/O have/O gone/O
away/O,/O but/O he/O kept/O her/O,/O embraced/O her/O,/O and/O,/O tenderly/O as/O a/O young/O lover/O,/O
kissed/O her/O several/O times/O,/O smiling/O./O The/O old/O people/O were/O obviously/O muddled/O
for/O a/O moment/O,/O and/O did/O not/O quite/O know/O whether/O it/O was/O they/O who/O were/O in/O
love/O again/O or/O their/O daughter/O./O When/O the/O prince/O and/O the/O princess/O had/O gone/O,/O
Levin/PERSON went/O up/O to/O his/O betrothed/O and/O took/O her/O hand/O./O He/O was/O self-possessed/O
now/O and/O could/O speak/O,/O and/O he/O had/O a/O great/O deal/O he/O wanted/O to/O tell/O her/O./O But/O
he/O said/O not/O at/O all/O what/O he/O had/O to/O say/O./O

``/OHow/O I/O knew/O it/O would/O be/O so/O!/O I/O never/O hoped/O for/O it/O;/O and/O yet/O in/O my/O heart/O I/O
was/O always/O sure/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OI/O believe/O that/O it/O was/O ordained/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O I/O!/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OEven/O when/O.../O''/O She/O stopped/O and/O went/O on/O again/O,/O
looking/O at/O him/O resolutely/O with/O her/O truthful/O eyes/O,/O ``/OEven/O when/O I/O thrust/O
from/O me/O my/O happiness/O./O I/O always/O loved/O you/O alone/O,/O but/O I/O was/O carried/O away/O./O
I/O ought/O to/O tell/O you/O.../O./O Can/O you/O forgive/O that/O?/O''/O

``/OPerhaps/O it/O was/O for/O the/O best/O./O You/O will/O have/O to/O forgive/O me/O so/O much/O./O I/O
ought/O to/O tell/O you/O.../O''/O

This/O was/O one/O of/O the/O things/O he/O had/O meant/O to/O speak/O about/O./O He/O had/O resolved/O
from/O the/O first/O to/O tell/O her/O two/O things/O--/Othat/O he/O was/O not/O chaste/O as/O she/O was/O,/O
and/O that/O he/O was/O not/O a/O believer/O./O It/O was/O agonizing/O,/O but/O he/O considered/O he/O
ought/O to/O tell/O her/O both/O these/O facts/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O not/O now/O,/O later/O!/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O later/O,/O but/O you/O must/O certainly/O tell/O me/O./O I/O'm/O not/O afraid/O of/O
anything/O./O I/O want/O to/O know/O everything/O./O Now/O it/O is/O settled/O./O''/O

He/O added/O:/O ``/OSettled/O that/O you/O'll/O take/O me/O whatever/O I/O may/O be/O--/Oyou/O wo/On't/O give/O
me/O up/O?/O Yes/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O./O''/O

Their/O conversation/O was/O interrupted/O by/O Mademoiselle/PERSON Linon/PERSON,/O who/O with/O an/O
affected/O but/O tender/O smile/O came/O to/O congratulate/O her/O favorite/O pupil/O./O
Before/O she/O had/O gone/O,/O the/O servants/O came/O in/O with/O their/O congratulations/O./O
Then/O relations/O arrived/O,/O and/O there/O began/O that/O state/O of/O blissful/O absurdity/O
from/O which/O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O emerge/O till/O the/O day/O after/O his/O wedding/O./O Levin/PERSON
was/O in/O a/O continual/O state/O of/O awkwardness/O and/O discomfort/O,/O but/O the/O
intensity/O of/O his/O happiness/O went/O on/O all/O the/O while/O increasing/O./O He/O felt/O
continually/O that/O a/O great/O deal/O was/O being/O expected/O of/O him/O--/Owhat/O,/O he/O did/O not/O
know/O;/O and/O he/O did/O everything/O he/O was/O told/O,/O and/O it/O all/O gave/O him/O happiness/O./O
He/O had/O thought/O his/O engagement/O would/O have/O nothing/O about/O it/O like/O others/O,/O
that/O the/O ordinary/O conditions/O of/O engaged/O couples/O would/O spoil/O his/O special/O
happiness/O;/O but/O it/O ended/O in/O his/O doing/O exactly/O as/O other/O people/O did/O,/O and/O
his/O happiness/O being/O only/O increased/O thereby/O and/O becoming/O more/O and/O more/O
special/O,/O more/O and/O more/O unlike/O anything/O that/O had/O ever/O happened/O./O

``/ONow/O we/O shall/O have/O sweetmeats/O to/O eat/O,/O''/O said/O Mademoiselle/PERSON Linon/PERSON--/Oand/O Levin/PERSON
drove/O off/O to/O buy/O sweetmeats/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O,/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O ``/OI/O advise/O you/O to/O get/O the/O bouquets/O
from/O Fomin/PERSON's/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O are/O they/O wanted/O?/O''/O And/O he/O drove/O to/O Fomin/PERSON's/O./O

His/O brother/O offered/O to/O lend/O him/O money/O,/O as/O he/O would/O have/O so/O many/O
expenses/O,/O presents/O to/O give/O.../O

``/OOh/O,/O are/O presents/O wanted/O?/O''/O And/O he/O galloped/O to/O Foulde/PERSON's/O./O

And/O at/O the/O confectioner/O's/O,/O and/O at/O Fomin/PERSON's/O,/O and/O at/O Foulde/PERSON's/O he/O saw/O that/O
he/O was/O expected/O;/O that/O they/O were/O pleased/O to/O see/O him/O,/O and/O prided/O
themselves/O on/O his/O happiness/O,/O just/O as/O every/O one/O whom/O he/O had/O to/O do/O with/O
during/O those/O days/O./O What/O was/O extraordinary/O was/O that/O everyone/O not/O only/O
liked/O him/O,/O but/O even/O people/O previously/O unsympathetic/O,/O cold/O,/O and/O callous/O,/O
were/O enthusiastic/O over/O him/O,/O gave/O way/O to/O him/O in/O everything/O,/O treated/O his/O
feeling/O with/O tenderness/O and/O delicacy/O,/O and/O shared/O his/O conviction/O that/O he/O
was/O the/O happiest/O man/O in/O the/O world/O because/O his/O betrothed/O was/O beyond/O
perfection/O./O Kitty/PERSON too/O felt/O the/O same/O thing/O./O When/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON
ventured/O to/O hint/O that/O she/O had/O hoped/O for/O something/O better/O,/O Kitty/PERSON was/O so/O
angry/O and/O proved/O so/O conclusively/O that/O nothing/O in/O the/O world/O could/O be/O
better/O than/O Levin/PERSON,/O that/O Countess/ORGANIZATION Nordston/ORGANIZATION had/O to/O admit/O it/O,/O and/O in/O
Kitty/PERSON's/O presence/O never/O met/O Levin/PERSON without/O a/O smile/O of/O ecstatic/O admiration/O./O

The/O confession/O he/O had/O promised/O was/O the/O one/O painful/O incident/O of/O this/O
time/O./O He/O consulted/O the/O old/O prince/O,/O and/O with/O his/O sanction/O gave/O Kitty/PERSON his/O
diary/O,/O in/O which/O there/O was/O written/O the/O confession/O that/O tortured/O him/O./O He/O
had/O written/O this/O diary/O at/O the/O time/O with/O a/O view/O to/O his/O future/O wife/O./O Two/O
things/O caused/O him/O anguish/O:/O his/O lack/O of/O purity/O and/O his/O lack/O of/O faith/O./O His/O
confession/O of/O unbelief/O passed/O unnoticed/O./O She/O was/O religious/O,/O had/O never/O
doubted/O the/O truths/O of/O religion/O,/O but/O his/O external/O unbelief/O did/O not/O affect/O
her/O in/O the/O least/O./O Through/O love/O she/O knew/O all/O his/O soul/O,/O and/O in/O his/O soul/O
she/O saw/O what/O she/O wanted/O,/O and/O that/O such/O a/O state/O of/O soul/O should/O be/O called/O
unbelieving/O was/O to/O her/O a/O matter/O of/O no/O account/O./O The/O other/O confession/O set/O
her/O weeping/O bitterly/O./O

Levin/PERSON,/O not/O without/O an/O inner/O struggle/O,/O handed/O her/O his/O diary/O./O He/O knew/O that/O
between/O him/O and/O her/O there/O could/O not/O be/O,/O and/O should/O not/O be/O,/O secrets/O,/O and/O
so/O he/O had/O decided/O that/O so/O it/O must/O be/O./O But/O he/O had/O not/O realized/O what/O an/O
effect/O it/O would/O have/O on/O her/O,/O he/O had/O not/O put/O himself/O in/O her/O place/O./O It/O was/O
only/O when/O the/O same/O evening/O he/O came/O to/O their/O house/O before/O the/O theater/O,/O
went/O into/O her/O room/O and/O saw/O her/O tear-stained/O,/O pitiful/O,/O sweet/O face/O,/O
miserable/O with/O suffering/O he/O had/O caused/O and/O nothing/O could/O undo/O,/O he/O felt/O
the/O abyss/O that/O separated/O his/O shameful/O past/O from/O her/O dovelike/O purity/O,/O and/O
was/O appalled/O at/O what/O he/O had/O done/O./O

``/OTake/O them/O,/O take/O these/O dreadful/O books/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O pushing/O away/O the/O
notebooks/O lying/O before/O her/O on/O the/O table/O./O ``/OWhy/O did/O you/O give/O them/O me/O?/O No/O,/O
it/O was/O better/O anyway/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O touched/O by/O his/O despairing/O face/O./O ``/OBut/O
it/O's/O awful/O,/O awful/O!/O''/O

His/O head/O sank/O,/O and/O he/O was/O silent/O./O He/O could/O say/O nothing/O./O

``/OYou/O ca/On't/O forgive/O me/O,/O''/O he/O whispered/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O forgive/O you/O;/O but/O it/O's/O terrible/O!/O''/O

But/O his/O happiness/O was/O so/O immense/O that/O this/O confession/O did/O not/O shatter/O
it/O,/O it/O only/O added/O another/O shade/O to/O it/O./O She/O forgave/O him/O;/O but/O from/O that/O
time/O more/O than/O ever/O he/O considered/O himself/O unworthy/O of/O her/O,/O morally/O bowed/O
down/O lower/O than/O ever/O before/O her/O,/O and/O prized/O more/O highly/O than/O ever/O his/O
undeserved/O happiness/O./O



Chapter/O 17/O


Unconsciously/O going/O over/O in/O his/O memory/O the/O conversations/O that/O had/O taken/O
place/O during/O and/O after/O dinner/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON returned/O to/O his/O
solitary/O room/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O words/O about/O forgiveness/O had/O aroused/O
in/O him/O nothing/O but/O annoyance/O./O The/O applicability/O or/O non-applicability/O of/O
the/O Christian/O precept/O to/O his/O own/O case/O was/O too/O difficult/O a/O question/O to/O be/O
discussed/O lightly/O,/O and/O this/O question/O had/O long/O ago/O been/O answered/O by/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON in/O the/O negative/O./O Of/O all/O that/O had/O been/O said/O,/O what/O
stuck/O most/O in/O his/O memory/O was/O the/O phrase/O of/O stupid/O,/O good-natured/O
Turovtsin/O--/O''/O_/OActed/O like/O a/O man/O,/O he/O did/O!/O Called/O him/O out/O and/O shot/O him/O!/O_/O''/O
Everyone/O had/O apparently/O shared/O this/O feeling/O,/O though/O from/O politeness/O they/O
had/O not/O expressed/O it/O./O

``/OBut/O the/O matter/O is/O settled/O,/O it/O's/O useless/O thinking/O about/O it/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON told/O himself/O./O And/O thinking/O of/O nothing/O but/O the/O journey/O
before/O him/O,/O and/O the/O revision/O work/O he/O had/O to/O do/O,/O he/O went/O into/O his/O room/O
and/O asked/O the/O porter/O who/O escorted/O him/O where/O his/O man/O was/O./O The/O porter/O said/O
that/O the/O man/O had/O only/O just/O gone/O out/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON ordered/O tea/O
to/O be/O sent/O him/O,/O sat/O down/O to/O the/O table/O,/O and/O taking/O the/O guidebook/O,/O began/O
considering/O the/O route/O of/O his/O journey/O./O

``/OTwo/O telegrams/O,/O''/O said/O his/O manservant/O,/O coming/O into/O the/O room/O./O ``/OI/O beg/O your/O
pardon/O,/O your/O excellency/O;/O I/O'd/O only/O just/O that/O minute/O gone/O out/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON took/O the/O telegrams/O and/O opened/O them/O./O The/O first/O
telegram/O was/O the/O announcement/O of/O Stremov/PERSON's/O appointment/O to/O the/O very/O post/O
Karenin/PERSON had/O coveted/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON flung/O the/O telegram/O down/O,/O and/O
flushing/O a/O little/O,/O got/O up/O and/O began/O to/O pace/O up/O and/O down/O the/O room/O./O ''/O_/OQuos/O
vult/O perdere/O dementat/O_/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O meaning/O by/O _/Oquos/O_/O the/O persons/O
responsible/O for/O this/O appointment/O./O He/O was/O not/O so/O much/O annoyed/O that/O he/O had/O
not/O received/O the/O post/O,/O that/O he/O had/O been/O conspicuously/O passed/O over/O;/O but/O
it/O was/O incomprehensible/O,/O amazing/O to/O him/O that/O they/O did/O not/O see/O that/O the/O
wordy/O phrase-monger/O Stremov/PERSON was/O the/O last/O man/O fit/O for/O it/O./O How/O could/O they/O
fail/O to/O see/O how/O they/O were/O ruining/O themselves/O,/O lowering/O their/O _/Oprestige/O_/O
by/O this/O appointment/O?/O

``/OSomething/O else/O in/O the/O same/O line/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O bitterly/O,/O opening/O
the/O second/O telegram/O./O The/O telegram/O was/O from/O his/O wife/O./O Her/O name/O,/O written/O
in/O blue/O pencil/O,/O ``/OAnna/PERSON,/O''/O was/O the/O first/O thing/O that/O caught/O his/O eye/O./O ``/OI/O am/O
dying/O;/O I/O beg/O,/O I/O implore/O you/O to/O come/O./O I/O shall/O die/O easier/O with/O your/O
forgiveness/O,/O''/O he/O read/O./O He/O smiled/O contemptuously/O,/O and/O flung/O down/O the/O
telegram/O./O That/O this/O was/O a/O trick/O and/O a/O fraud/O,/O of/O that/O,/O he/O thought/O for/O the/O
first/O minute/O,/O there/O could/O be/O no/O doubt/O./O

``/OThere/O is/O no/O deceit/O she/O would/O stick/O at/O./O She/O was/O near/O her/O confinement/O./O
Perhaps/O it/O is/O the/O confinement/O./O But/O what/O can/O be/O their/O aim/O?/O To/O legitimize/O
the/O child/O,/O to/O compromise/O me/O,/O and/O prevent/O a/O divorce/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O ``/OBut/O
something/O was/O said/O in/O it/O:/O I/O am/O dying/O.../O''/O He/O read/O the/O telegram/O again/O,/O
and/O suddenly/O the/O plain/O meaning/O of/O what/O was/O said/O in/O it/O struck/O him/O./O

``/OAnd/O if/O it/O is/O true/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O./O ``/OIf/O it/O is/O true/O that/O in/O the/O
moment/O of/O agony/O and/O nearness/O to/O death/O she/O is/O genuinely/O penitent/O,/O and/O I/O,/O
taking/O it/O for/O a/O trick/O,/O refuse/O to/O go/O?/O That/O would/O not/O only/O be/O cruel/O,/O and/O
everyone/O would/O blame/O me/O,/O but/O it/O would/O be/O stupid/O on/O my/O part/O./O''/O

``/OPiotr/PERSON,/O call/O a/O coach/O;/O I/O am/O going/O to/O Petersburg/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O his/O servant/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON decided/O that/O he/O would/O go/O to/O Petersburg/LOCATION and/O see/O his/O
wife/O./O If/O her/O illness/O was/O a/O trick/O,/O he/O would/O say/O nothing/O and/O go/O away/O
again/O./O If/O she/O was/O really/O in/O danger/O,/O and/O wished/O to/O see/O him/O before/O her/O
death/O,/O he/O would/O forgive/O her/O if/O he/O found/O her/O alive/O,/O and/O pay/O her/O the/O last/O
duties/O if/O he/O came/O too/O late/O./O

All/O the/O way/O he/O thought/O no/O more/O of/O what/O he/O ought/O to/O do/O./O

With/O a/O sense/O of/O weariness/O and/O uncleanness/O from/O the/O night/O spent/O in/O the/O
train/O,/O in/O the/O early/O fog/O of/O Petersburg/PERSON Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON drove/O
through/O the/O deserted/O Nevsky/LOCATION and/O stared/O straight/O before/O him/O,/O not/O thinking/O
of/O what/O was/O awaiting/O him/O./O He/O could/O not/O think/O about/O it/O,/O because/O in/O
picturing/O what/O would/O happen/O,/O he/O could/O not/O drive/O away/O the/O reflection/O that/O
her/O death/O would/O at/O once/O remove/O all/O the/O difficulty/O of/O his/O position/O./O
Bakers/O,/O closed/O shops/O,/O night-cabmen/O,/O porters/O sweeping/O the/O pavements/O
flashed/O past/O his/O eyes/O,/O and/O he/O watched/O it/O all/O,/O trying/O to/O smother/O the/O
thought/O of/O what/O was/O awaiting/O him/O,/O and/O what/O he/O dared/O not/O hope/O for/O,/O and/O
yet/O was/O hoping/O for/O./O He/O drove/O up/O to/O the/O steps/O./O A/O sledge/O and/O a/O carriage/O
with/O the/O coachman/O asleep/O stood/O at/O the/O entrance/O./O As/O he/O went/O into/O the/O
entry/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O got/O out/O his/O resolution/O from/O
the/O remotest/O corner/O of/O his/O brain/O,/O and/O mastered/O it/O thoroughly/O./O Its/O
meaning/O ran/O:/O ``/OIf/O it/O's/O a/O trick/O,/O then/O calm/O contempt/O and/O departure/O./O If/O
truth/O,/O do/O what/O is/O proper/O./O''/O

The/O porter/O opened/O the/O door/O before/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON rang/O./O The/O
porter/O,/O Kapitonitch/PERSON,/O looked/O queer/O in/O an/O old/O coat/O,/O without/O a/O tie/O,/O and/O in/O
slippers/O./O

``/OHow/O is/O your/O mistress/O?/O''/O

``/OA/O successful/O confinement/O yesterday/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON stopped/O short/O and/O turned/O white/O./O He/O felt/O distinctly/O
now/O how/O intensely/O he/O had/O longed/O for/O her/O death/O./O

``/OAnd/O how/O is/O she/O?/O''/O

Korney/PERSON in/O his/O morning/O apron/O ran/O downstairs/O./O

``/OVery/O ill/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O./O ``/OThere/O was/O a/O consultation/O yesterday/O,/O and/O the/O
doctor/O's/O here/O now/O./O''/O

``/OTake/O my/O things/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O and/O feeling/O some/O relief/O at/O
the/O news/O that/O there/O was/O still/O hope/O of/O her/O death/O,/O he/O went/O into/O the/O hall/O./O

On/O the/O hatstand/O there/O was/O a/O military/O overcoat/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
noticed/O it/O and/O asked/O:/O

``/OWho/O is/O here/O?/O''/O

``/OThe/O doctor/O,/O the/O midwife/O,/O and/O Count/O Vronsky/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON went/O into/O the/O inner/O rooms/O./O

In/O the/O drawing/O room/O there/O was/O no/O one/O;/O at/O the/O sound/O of/O his/O steps/O there/O
came/O out/O of/O her/O boudoir/O the/O midwife/O in/O a/O cap/O with/O lilac/O ribbons/O./O

She/O went/O up/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O and/O with/O the/O familiarity/O given/O by/O
the/O approach/O of/O death/O took/O him/O by/O the/O arm/O and/O drew/O him/O towards/O the/O
bedroom/O./O

``/OThank/O God/O you/O've/O come/O!/O She/O keeps/O on/O about/O you/O and/O nothing/O but/O you/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O./O

``/OMake/O haste/O with/O the/O ice/O!/O''/O the/O doctor/O's/O peremptory/O voice/O said/O from/O the/O
bedroom/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON went/O into/O her/O boudoir/O./O

At/O the/O table/O,/O sitting/O sideways/O in/O a/O low/O chair/O,/O was/O Vronsky/O,/O his/O face/O
hidden/O in/O his/O hands/O,/O weeping/O./O He/O jumped/O up/O at/O the/O doctor/O's/O voice/O,/O took/O
his/O hands/O from/O his/O face/O,/O and/O saw/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O Seeing/O the/O
husband/O,/O he/O was/O so/O overwhelmed/O that/O he/O sat/O down/O again/O,/O drawing/O his/O head/O
down/O to/O his/O shoulders/O,/O as/O if/O he/O wanted/O to/O disappear/O;/O but/O he/O made/O an/O
effort/O over/O himself/O,/O got/O up/O and/O said/O:/O

``/OShe/O is/O dying/O./O The/O doctors/O say/O there/O is/O no/O hope/O./O I/O am/O entirely/O in/O your/O
power/O,/O only/O let/O me/O be/O here/O .../O though/O I/O am/O at/O your/O disposal/O./O I./O./O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O seeing/O Vronsky/O's/O tears/O,/O felt/O a/O rush/O of/O that/O
nervous/O emotion/O always/O produced/O in/O him/O by/O the/O sight/O of/O other/O people/O's/O
suffering/O,/O and/O turning/O away/O his/O face/O,/O he/O moved/O hurriedly/O to/O the/O door/O,/O
without/O hearing/O the/O rest/O of/O his/O words/O./O From/O the/O bedroom/O came/O the/O sound/O
of/O Anna/PERSON's/O voice/O saying/O something/O./O Her/O voice/O was/O lively/O,/O eager/O,/O with/O
exceedingly/O distinct/O intonations/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON went/O into/O the/O
bedroom/O,/O and/O went/O up/O to/O the/O bed/O./O She/O was/O lying/O turned/O with/O her/O face/O
towards/O him/O./O Her/O cheeks/O were/O flushed/O crimson/O,/O her/O eyes/O glittered/O,/O her/O
little/O white/O hands/O thrust/O out/O from/O the/O sleeves/O of/O her/O dressing/O gown/O were/O
playing/O with/O the/O quilt/O,/O twisting/O it/O about/O./O It/O seemed/O as/O though/O she/O were/O
not/O only/O well/O and/O blooming/O,/O but/O in/O the/O happiest/O frame/O of/O mind/O./O She/O was/O
talking/O rapidly/O,/O musically/O,/O and/O with/O exceptionally/O correct/O articulation/O
and/O expressive/O intonation/O./O

``/OFor/O Alexey/PERSON--/OI/O am/O speaking/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON -LRB-/Owhat/O a/O strange/O and/O
awful/O thing/O that/O both/O are/O Alexey/PERSON,/O is/On't/O it/O?/O-RRB-/O--/OAlexey/PERSON would/O not/O refuse/O me/O./O
I/O should/O forget/O,/O he/O would/O forgive/O.../O./O But/O why/O does/On't/O he/O come/O?/O He/O's/O so/O
good/O he/O does/On't/O know/O himself/O how/O good/O he/O is/O./O Ah/O,/O my/O God/O,/O what/O agony/O!/O
Give/O me/O some/O water/O,/O quick/O!/O Oh/O,/O that/O will/O be/O bad/O for/O her/O,/O my/O little/O girl/O!/O
Oh/O,/O very/O well/O then/O,/O give/O her/O to/O a/O nurse/O./O Yes/O,/O I/O agree/O,/O it/O's/O better/O in/O
fact/O./O He/O'll/O be/O coming/O;/O it/O will/O hurt/O him/O to/O see/O her/O./O Give/O her/O to/O the/O
nurse/O./O''/O

``/OAnna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O he/O has/O come/O./O Here/O he/O is/O!/O''/O said/O the/O midwife/O,/O trying/O to/O
attract/O her/O attention/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O what/O nonsense/O!/O''/O Anna/PERSON went/O on/O,/O not/O seeing/O her/O husband/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O give/O her/O
to/O me/O;/O give/O me/O my/O little/O one/O!/O He/O has/O not/O come/O yet/O./O You/O say/O he/O wo/On't/O
forgive/O me/O,/O because/O you/O do/On't/O know/O him/O./O No/O one/O knows/O him/O./O I/O'm/O the/O only/O
one/O,/O and/O it/O was/O hard/O for/O me/O even/O./O His/O eyes/O I/O ought/O to/O know/O--/OSeryozha/PERSON has/O
just/O the/O same/O eyes/O--/Oand/O I/O ca/On't/O bear/O to/O see/O them/O because/O of/O it/O./O Has/PERSON
Seryozha/PERSON had/O his/O dinner/O?/O I/O know/O everyone/O will/O forget/O him/O./O He/O would/O not/O
forget/O./O Seryozha/PERSON must/O be/O moved/O into/O the/O corner/O room/O,/O and/O Mariette/PERSON must/O
be/O asked/O to/O sleep/O with/O him/O./O''/O

All/O of/O a/O sudden/O she/O shrank/O back/O,/O was/O silent/O;/O and/O in/O terror/O,/O as/O though/O
expecting/O a/O blow/O,/O as/O though/O to/O defend/O herself/O,/O she/O raised/O her/O hands/O to/O
her/O face/O./O She/O had/O seen/O her/O husband/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O no/O!/O''/O she/O began/O./O ``/OI/O am/O not/O afraid/O of/O him/O;/O I/O am/O afraid/O of/O death/O./O
Alexey/PERSON,/O come/O here/O./O I/O am/O in/O a/O hurry/O,/O because/O I/O've/O no/O time/O,/O I/O've/O not/O long/O
left/O to/O live/O;/O the/O fever/O will/O begin/O directly/O and/O I/O shall/O understand/O
nothing/O more/O./O Now/O I/O understand/O,/O I/O understand/O it/O all/O,/O I/O see/O it/O all/O!/O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O wrinkled/O face/O wore/O an/O expression/O of/O agony/O;/O he/O
took/O her/O by/O the/O hand/O and/O tried/O to/O say/O something/O,/O but/O he/O could/O not/O utter/O
it/O;/O his/O lower/O lip/O quivered/O,/O but/O he/O still/O went/O on/O struggling/O with/O his/O
emotion/O,/O and/O only/O now/O and/O then/O glanced/O at/O her/O./O And/O each/O time/O he/O glanced/O
at/O her/O,/O he/O saw/O her/O eyes/O gazing/O at/O him/O with/O such/O passionate/O and/O
triumphant/O tenderness/O as/O he/O had/O never/O seen/O in/O them/O./O

``/OWait/O a/O minute/O,/O you/O do/On't/O know/O .../O stay/O a/O little/O,/O stay/O!/O.../O''/O She/O stopped/O,/O
as/O though/O collecting/O her/O ideas/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O''/O she/O began/O;/O ``/Oyes/O,/O yes/O,/O yes/O./O This/O
is/O what/O I/O wanted/O to/O say/O./O Do/On't/O be/O surprised/O at/O me/O./O I/O'm/O still/O the/O
same/O.../O./O But/O there/O is/O another/O woman/O in/O me/O,/O I/O'm/O afraid/O of/O her/O:/O she/O loved/O
that/O man/O,/O and/O I/O tried/O to/O hate/O you/O,/O and/O could/O not/O forget/O about/O her/O that/O
used/O to/O be/O./O I/O'm/O not/O that/O woman/O./O Now/O I/O'm/O my/O real/O self/O,/O all/O myself/O./O I/O'm/O
dying/O now/O,/O I/O know/O I/O shall/O die/O,/O ask/O him/O./O Even/O now/O I/O feel/O--/Osee/O here/O,/O the/O
weights/O on/O my/O feet/O,/O on/O my/O hands/O,/O on/O my/O fingers/O./O My/O fingers/O--/Osee/O how/O huge/O
they/O are/O!/O But/O this/O will/O soon/O all/O be/O over/O.../O./O Only/O one/O thing/O I/O want/O:/O
forgive/O me/O,/O forgive/O me/O quite/O./O I/O'm/O terrible/O,/O but/O my/O nurse/O used/O to/O tell/O
me/O;/O the/O holy/O martyr/O--/Owhat/O was/O her/O name/O?/O She/O was/O worse/O./O And/O I/O'll/O go/O to/O
Rome/LOCATION;/O there/O's/O a/O wilderness/O,/O and/O there/O I/O shall/O be/O no/O trouble/O to/O any/O one/O,/O
only/O I/O'll/O take/O Seryozha/PERSON and/O the/O little/O one/O.../O./O No/O,/O you/O ca/On't/O forgive/O me/O!/O
I/O know/O,/O it/O ca/On't/O be/O forgiven/O!/O No/O,/O no/O,/O go/O away/O,/O you/O're/O too/O good/O!/O''/O She/O
held/O his/O hand/O in/O one/O burning/O hand/O,/O while/O she/O pushed/O him/O away/O with/O the/O
other/O./O

The/O nervous/O agitation/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON kept/O increasing/O,/O and/O had/O
by/O now/O reached/O such/O a/O point/O that/O he/O ceased/O to/O struggle/O with/O it/O./O He/O
suddenly/O felt/O that/O what/O he/O had/O regarded/O as/O nervous/O agitation/O was/O on/O the/O
contrary/O a/O blissful/O spiritual/O condition/O that/O gave/O him/O all/O at/O once/O a/O new/O
