happiness/O he/O had/O never/O known/O./O He/O did/O not/O think/O that/O the/O Christian/O law/O
that/O he/O had/O been/O all/O his/O life/O trying/O to/O follow/O,/O enjoined/O on/O him/O to/O
forgive/O and/O love/O his/O enemies/O;/O but/O a/O glad/O feeling/O of/O love/O and/O forgiveness/O
for/O his/O enemies/O filled/O his/O heart/O./O He/O knelt/O down/O,/O and/O laying/O his/O head/O in/O
the/O curve/O of/O her/O arm/O,/O which/O burned/O him/O as/O with/O fire/O through/O the/O sleeve/O,/O
he/O sobbed/O like/O a/O little/O child/O./O She/O put/O her/O arm/O around/O his/O head/O,/O moved/O
towards/O him/O,/O and/O with/O defiant/O pride/O lifted/O up/O her/O eyes/O./O

``/OThat/O is/O he/O./O I/O knew/O him/O!/O Now/O,/O forgive/O me/O,/O everyone/O,/O forgive/O me/O!/O.../O
They/O've/O come/O again/O;/O why/O do/On't/O they/O go/O away/O?/O.../O Oh/O,/O take/O these/O cloaks/O off/O
me/O!/O''/O

The/O doctor/O unloosed/O her/O hands/O,/O carefully/O laying/O her/O on/O the/O pillow/O,/O and/O
covered/O her/O up/O to/O the/O shoulders/O./O She/O lay/O back/O submissively/O,/O and/O looked/O
before/O her/O with/O beaming/O eyes/O./O

``/ORemember/O one/O thing/O,/O that/O I/O needed/O nothing/O but/O forgiveness/O,/O and/O I/O want/O
nothing/O more/O.../O./O Why/O does/On't/O _/Ohe/O_/O come/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O turning/O to/O the/O door/O
towards/O Vronsky/O./O ``/ODo/O come/O,/O do/O come/O!/O Give/O him/O your/O hand/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O came/O to/O the/O side/O of/O the/O bed/O,/O and/O seeing/O Anna/PERSON,/O again/O hid/O his/O face/O
in/O his/O hands/O./O

``/OUncover/O your/O face/O--/Olook/O at/O him/O!/O He/O's/O a/O saint/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OOh/O!/O uncover/O
your/O face/O,/O do/O uncover/O it/O!/O''/O she/O said/O angrily/O./O ``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O do/O
uncover/O his/O face/O!/O I/O want/O to/O see/O him/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON took/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O hands/O and/O drew/O them/O away/O from/O his/O
face/O,/O which/O was/O awful/O with/O the/O expression/O of/O agony/O and/O shame/O upon/O it/O./O

``/OGive/O him/O your/O hand/O./O Forgive/O him/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON gave/O him/O his/O hand/O,/O not/O attempting/O to/O restrain/O the/O
tears/O that/O streamed/O from/O his/O eyes/O./O

``/OThank/O God/O,/O thank/O God/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/Onow/O everything/O is/O ready/O./O Only/O to/O
stretch/O my/O legs/O a/O little/O./O There/O,/O that/O's/O capital/O./O How/O badly/O these/O flowers/O
are/O done/O--/Onot/O a/O bit/O like/O a/O violet/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O pointing/O to/O the/O hangings/O./O
``/OMy/O God/O,/O my/O God/O!/O when/O will/O it/O end/O?/O Give/O me/O some/O morphine/O./O Doctor/O,/O give/O
me/O some/O morphine/O!/O Oh/O,/O my/O God/O,/O my/O God/O!/O''/O

And/O she/O tossed/O about/O on/O the/O bed/O./O

The/O doctors/O said/O that/O it/O was/O puerperal/O fever/O,/O and/O that/O it/O was/O
ninety-nine/O chances/O in/O a/O hundred/O it/O would/O end/O in/O death/O./O The/O whole/O day/O
long/O there/O was/O fever/O,/O delirium/O,/O and/O unconsciousness/O./O At/O midnight/O the/O
patient/O lay/O without/O consciousness/O,/O and/O almost/O without/O pulse/O./O

The/O end/O was/O expected/O every/O minute/O./O

Vronsky/O had/O gone/O home/O,/O but/O in/O the/O morning/O he/O came/O to/O inquire/O,/O and/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON meeting/O him/O in/O the/O hall/O,/O said/O:/O ``/OBetter/O stay/O,/O she/O might/O
ask/O for/O you/O,/O''/O and/O himself/O led/O him/O to/O his/O wife/O's/O boudoir/O./O Towards/O
morning/O,/O there/O was/O a/O return/O again/O of/O excitement/O,/O rapid/O thought/O and/O talk/O,/O
and/O again/O it/O ended/O in/O unconsciousness/O./O On/O the/O third/O day/O it/O was/O the/O same/O
thing/O,/O and/O the/O doctors/O said/O there/O was/O hope/O./O That/O day/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON went/O into/O the/O boudoir/O where/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O sitting/O,/O and/O
closing/O the/O door/O sat/O down/O opposite/O him/O./O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O feeling/O that/O a/O statement/O of/O the/O
position/O was/O coming/O,/O ``/OI/O ca/On't/O speak/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O understand/O./O Spare/O me/O!/O
However/O hard/O it/O is/O for/O you/O,/O believe/O me/O,/O it/O is/O more/O terrible/O for/O me/O./O''/O

He/O would/O have/O risen/O;/O but/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON took/O him/O by/O the/O hand/O and/O
said/O:/O

``/OI/O beg/O you/O to/O hear/O me/O out/O;/O it/O is/O necessary/O./O I/O must/O explain/O my/O feelings/O,/O
the/O feelings/O that/O have/O guided/O me/O and/O will/O guide/O me/O,/O so/O that/O you/O may/O not/O
be/O in/O error/O regarding/O me/O./O You/O know/O I/O had/O resolved/O on/O a/O divorce/O,/O and/O had/O
even/O begun/O to/O take/O proceedings/O./O I/O wo/On't/O conceal/O from/O you/O that/O in/O
beginning/O this/O I/O was/O in/O uncertainty/O,/O I/O was/O in/O misery/O;/O I/O will/O confess/O
that/O I/O was/O pursued/O by/O a/O desire/O to/O revenge/O myself/O on/O you/O and/O on/O her/O./O When/O
I/O got/O the/O telegram/O,/O I/O came/O here/O with/O the/O same/O feelings/O;/O I/O will/O say/O more/O,/O
I/O longed/O for/O her/O death/O./O But/O.../O''/O He/O paused/O,/O pondering/O whether/O to/O
disclose/O or/O not/O to/O disclose/O his/O feeling/O to/O him/O./O ``/OBut/O I/O saw/O her/O and/O
forgave/O her/O./O And/O the/O happiness/O of/O forgiveness/O has/O revealed/O to/O me/O my/O
duty/O./O I/O forgive/O completely/O./O I/O would/O offer/O the/O other/O cheek/O,/O I/O would/O give/O
my/O cloak/O if/O my/O coat/O be/O taken/O./O I/O pray/O to/O God/O only/O not/O to/O take/O from/O me/O the/O
bliss/O of/O forgiveness/O!/O''/O

Tears/O stood/O in/O his/O eyes/O,/O and/O the/O luminous/O,/O serene/O look/O in/O them/O impressed/O
Vronsky/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O my/O position/O:/O you/O can/O trample/O me/O in/O the/O mud/O,/O make/O me/O the/O
laughing-stock/O of/O the/O world/O,/O I/O will/O not/O abandon/O her/O,/O and/O I/O will/O never/O
utter/O a/O word/O of/O reproach/O to/O you/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON went/O on/O./O ``/OMy/O
duty/O is/O clearly/O marked/O for/O me/O;/O I/O ought/O to/O be/O with/O her/O,/O and/O I/O will/O be/O./O If/O
she/O wishes/O to/O see/O you/O,/O I/O will/O let/O you/O know/O,/O but/O now/O I/O suppose/O it/O would/O
be/O better/O for/O you/O to/O go/O away/O./O''/O

He/O got/O up/O,/O and/O sobs/O cut/O short/O his/O words/O./O Vronsky/O too/O was/O getting/O up/O,/O and/O
in/O a/O stooping/O,/O not/O yet/O erect/O posture/O,/O looked/O up/O at/O him/O from/O under/O his/O
brows/O./O He/O did/O not/O understand/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O feeling/O,/O but/O he/O
felt/O that/O it/O was/O something/O higher/O and/O even/O unattainable/O for/O him/O with/O his/O
view/O of/O life/O./O



Chapter/O 18/O


After/O the/O conversation/O with/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O Vronsky/PERSON went/O out/O onto/O
the/O steps/O of/O the/O Karenins/O'/O house/O and/O stood/O still/O,/O with/O difficulty/O
remembering/O where/O he/O was/O,/O and/O where/O he/O ought/O to/O walk/O or/O drive/O./O He/O felt/O
disgraced/O,/O humiliated/O,/O guilty/O,/O and/O deprived/O of/O all/O possibility/O of/O
washing/O away/O his/O humiliation/O./O He/O felt/O thrust/O out/O of/O the/O beaten/O track/O
along/O which/O he/O had/O so/O proudly/O and/O lightly/O walked/O till/O then/O./O All/O the/O
habits/O and/O rules/O of/O his/O life/O that/O had/O seemed/O so/O firm/O,/O had/O turned/O out/O
suddenly/O false/O and/O inapplicable/O./O The/O betrayed/O husband/O,/O who/O had/O figured/O
till/O that/O time/O as/O a/O pitiful/O creature/O,/O an/O incidental/O and/O somewhat/O
ludicrous/O obstacle/O to/O his/O happiness/O,/O had/O suddenly/O been/O summoned/O by/O her/O
herself/O,/O elevated/O to/O an/O awe-inspiring/O pinnacle/O,/O and/O on/O the/O pinnacle/O that/O
husband/O had/O shown/O himself/O,/O not/O malignant/O,/O not/O false/O,/O not/O ludicrous/O,/O but/O
kind/O and/O straightforward/O and/O large/O./O Vronsky/O could/O not/O but/O feel/O this/O,/O and/O
the/O parts/O were/O suddenly/O reversed/O./O Vronsky/O felt/O his/O elevation/O and/O his/O own/O
abasement/O,/O his/O truth/O and/O his/O own/O falsehood/O./O He/O felt/O that/O the/O husband/O was/O
magnanimous/O even/O in/O his/O sorrow/O,/O while/O he/O had/O been/O base/O and/O petty/O in/O his/O
deceit/O./O But/O this/O sense/O of/O his/O own/O humiliation/O before/O the/O man/O he/O had/O
unjustly/O despised/O made/O up/O only/O a/O small/O part/O of/O his/O misery/O./O He/O felt/O
unutterably/O wretched/O now/O,/O for/O his/O passion/O for/O Anna/PERSON,/O which/O had/O seemed/O to/O
him/O of/O late/O to/O be/O growing/O cooler/O,/O now/O that/O he/O knew/O he/O had/O lost/O her/O
forever/O,/O was/O stronger/O than/O ever/O it/O had/O been/O./O He/O had/O seen/O all/O of/O her/O in/O
her/O illness/O,/O had/O come/O to/O know/O her/O very/O soul/O,/O and/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O
he/O had/O never/O loved/O her/O till/O then/O./O And/O now/O when/O he/O had/O learned/O to/O know/O
her/O,/O to/O love/O her/O as/O she/O should/O be/O loved/O,/O he/O had/O been/O humiliated/O before/O
her/O,/O and/O had/O lost/O her/O forever/O,/O leaving/O with/O her/O nothing/O of/O himself/O but/O a/O
shameful/O memory/O./O Most/O terrible/O of/O all/O had/O been/O his/O ludicrous/O,/O shameful/O
position/O when/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O pulled/O his/O hands/O away/O from/O his/O
humiliated/O face/O./O He/O stood/O on/O the/O steps/O of/O the/O Karenins/O'/O house/O like/O one/O
distraught/O,/O and/O did/O not/O know/O what/O to/O do/O./O

``/OA/O sledge/O,/O sir/O?/O''/O asked/O the/O porter/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O a/O sledge/O./O''/O

On/O getting/O home/O,/O after/O three/O sleepless/O nights/O,/O Vronsky/O,/O without/O
undressing/O,/O lay/O down/O flat/O on/O the/O sofa/O,/O clasping/O his/O hands/O and/O laying/O his/O
head/O on/O them/O./O His/O head/O was/O heavy/O./O Images/O,/O memories/O,/O and/O ideas/O of/O the/O
strangest/O description/O followed/O one/O another/O with/O extraordinary/O rapidity/O
and/O vividness/O./O First/O it/O was/O the/O medicine/O he/O had/O poured/O out/O for/O the/O
patient/O and/O spilt/O over/O the/O spoon/O,/O then/O the/O midwife/O's/O white/O hands/O,/O then/O
the/O queer/O posture/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON on/O the/O floor/O beside/O the/O bed/O./O

``/OTo/O sleep/O!/O To/O forget/O!/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O with/O the/O serene/O confidence/O of/O
a/O healthy/O man/O that/O if/O he/O is/O tired/O and/O sleepy/O,/O he/O will/O go/O to/O sleep/O at/O
once/O./O And/O the/O same/O instant/O his/O head/O did/O begin/O to/O feel/O drowsy/O and/O he/O
began/O to/O drop/O off/O into/O forgetfulness/O./O The/O waves/O of/O the/O sea/O of/O
unconsciousness/O had/O begun/O to/O meet/O over/O his/O head/O,/O when/O all/O at/O once/O--/Oit/O was/O
as/O though/O a/O violent/O shock/O of/O electricity/O had/O passed/O over/O him/O./O He/O started/O
so/O that/O he/O leaped/O up/O on/O the/O springs/O of/O the/O sofa/O,/O and/O leaning/O on/O his/O arms/O
got/O in/O a/O panic/O onto/O his/O knees/O./O His/O eyes/O were/O wide/O open/O as/O though/O he/O had/O
never/O been/O asleep/O./O The/O heaviness/O in/O his/O head/O and/O the/O weariness/O in/O his/O
limbs/O that/O he/O had/O felt/O a/O minute/O before/O had/O suddenly/O gone/O./O

``/OYou/O may/O trample/O me/O in/O the/O mud/O,/O''/O he/O heard/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O words/O
and/O saw/O him/O standing/O before/O him/O,/O and/O saw/O Anna/PERSON's/O face/O with/O its/O burning/O
flush/O and/O glittering/O eyes/O,/O gazing/O with/O love/O and/O tenderness/O not/O at/O him/O
but/O at/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON;/O he/O saw/O his/O own/O,/O as/O he/O fancied/O,/O foolish/O and/O
ludicrous/O figure/O when/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON took/O his/O hands/O away/O from/O his/O
face/O./O He/O stretched/O out/O his/O legs/O again/O and/O flung/O himself/O on/O the/O sofa/O in/O
the/O same/O position/O and/O shut/O his/O eyes/O./O

``/OTo/O sleep/O!/O To/O forget/O!/O''/O he/O repeated/O to/O himself/O./O But/O with/O his/O eyes/O shut/O he/O
saw/O more/O distinctly/O than/O ever/O Anna/PERSON's/O face/O as/O it/O had/O been/O on/O the/O
memorable/O evening/O before/O the/O races/O./O

``/OThat/O is/O not/O and/O will/O not/O be/O,/O and/O she/O wants/O to/O wipe/O it/O out/O of/O her/O
memory/O./O But/O I/O can/Onot/O live/O without/O it/O./O How/O can/O we/O be/O reconciled/O?/O how/O can/O
we/O be/O reconciled/O?/O''/O he/O said/O aloud/O,/O and/O unconsciously/O began/O to/O repeat/O
these/O words/O./O This/O repetition/O checked/O the/O rising/O up/O of/O fresh/O images/O and/O
memories/O,/O which/O he/O felt/O were/O thronging/O in/O his/O brain/O./O But/O repeating/O words/O
did/O not/O check/O his/O imagination/O for/O long/O./O Again/O in/O extraordinarily/O rapid/O
succession/O his/O best/O moments/O rose/O before/O his/O mind/O,/O and/O then/O his/O recent/O
humiliation/O./O ``/OTake/O away/O his/O hands/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON's/O voice/O says/O./O He/O takes/O away/O his/O
hands/O and/O feels/O the/O shamestruck/O and/O idiotic/O expression/O of/O his/O face/O./O

He/O still/O lay/O down/O,/O trying/O to/O sleep/O,/O though/O he/O felt/O there/O was/O not/O the/O
smallest/O hope/O of/O it/O,/O and/O kept/O repeating/O stray/O words/O from/O some/O chain/O of/O
thought/O,/O trying/O by/O this/O to/O check/O the/O rising/O flood/O of/O fresh/O images/O./O He/O
listened/O,/O and/O heard/O in/O a/O strange/O,/O mad/O whisper/O words/O repeated/O:/O ``/OI/O did/O not/O
appreciate/O it/O,/O did/O not/O make/O enough/O of/O it/O./O I/O did/O not/O appreciate/O it/O,/O did/O
not/O make/O enough/O of/O it/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O's/O this/O?/O Am/O I/O going/O out/O of/O my/O mind/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O./O ``/OPerhaps/O./O
What/O makes/O men/O go/O out/O of/O their/O minds/O;/O what/O makes/O men/O shoot/O themselves/O?/O''/O
he/O answered/O himself/O,/O and/O opening/O his/O eyes/O,/O he/O saw/O with/O wonder/O an/O
embroidered/O cushion/O beside/O him/O,/O worked/O by/O Varya/PERSON,/O his/O brother/O's/O wife/O./O He/O
touched/O the/O tassel/O of/O the/O cushion/O,/O and/O tried/O to/O think/O of/O Varya/LOCATION,/O of/O when/O
he/O had/O seen/O her/O last/O./O But/O to/O think/O of/O anything/O extraneous/O was/O an/O
agonizing/O effort/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O I/O must/O sleep/O!/O''/O He/O moved/O the/O cushion/O up/O,/O and/O
pressed/O his/O head/O into/O it/O,/O but/O he/O had/O to/O make/O an/O effort/O to/O keep/O his/O eyes/O
shut/O./O He/O jumped/O up/O and/O sat/O down/O./O ``/OThat/O's/O all/O over/O for/O me/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O
himself/O./O ``/OI/O must/O think/O what/O to/O do/O./O What/O is/O left/O?/O''/O His/O mind/O rapidly/O ran/O
through/O his/O life/O apart/O from/O his/O love/O of/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OAmbition/O?/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON?/O Society/O?/O The/O court/O?/O''/O He/O could/O not/O come/O to/O a/O
pause/O anywhere/O./O All/O of/O it/O had/O had/O meaning/O before/O,/O but/O now/O there/O was/O no/O
reality/O in/O it/O./O He/O got/O up/O from/O the/O sofa/O,/O took/O off/O his/O coat/O,/O undid/O his/O
belt/O,/O and/O uncovering/O his/O hairy/O chest/O to/O breathe/O more/O freely/O,/O walked/O up/O
and/O down/O the/O room/O./O ``/OThis/O is/O how/O people/O go/O mad/O,/O''/O he/O repeated/O,/O ``/Oand/O how/O
they/O shoot/O themselves/O .../O to/O escape/O humiliation/O,/O''/O he/O added/O slowly/O./O

He/O went/O to/O the/O door/O and/O closed/O it/O,/O then/O with/O fixed/O eyes/O and/O clenched/O
teeth/O he/O went/O up/O to/O the/O table/O,/O took/O a/O revolver/O,/O looked/O round/O him/O,/O turned/O
it/O to/O a/O loaded/O barrel/O,/O and/O sank/O into/O thought/O./O For/O two/O minutes/O,/O his/O head/O
bent/O forward/O with/O an/O expression/O of/O an/O intense/O effort/O of/O thought/O,/O he/O
stood/O with/O the/O revolver/O in/O his/O hand/O,/O motionless/O,/O thinking/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O,/O as/O though/O a/O logical/O,/O continuous/O,/O and/O
clear/O chain/O of/O reasoning/O had/O brought/O him/O to/O an/O indubitable/O conclusion/O./O
In/O reality/O this/O ``/Oof/O course/O,/O''/O that/O seemed/O convincing/O to/O him/O,/O was/O simply/O
the/O result/O of/O exactly/O the/O same/O circle/O of/O memories/O and/O images/O through/O
which/O he/O had/O passed/O ten/O times/O already/O during/O the/O last/O hour/O--/Omemories/O of/O
happiness/O lost/O forever/O./O There/O was/O the/O same/O conception/O of/O the/O
senselessness/O of/O everything/O to/O come/O in/O life/O,/O the/O same/O consciousness/O of/O
humiliation/O./O Even/O the/O sequence/O of/O these/O images/O and/O emotions/O was/O the/O
same/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O,/O''/O he/O repeated/O,/O when/O for/O the/O third/O time/O his/O thought/O passed/O
again/O round/O the/O same/O spellbound/O circle/O of/O memories/O and/O images/O,/O and/O
pulling/O the/O revolver/O to/O the/O left/O side/O of/O his/O chest/O,/O and/O clutching/O it/O
vigorously/O with/O his/O whole/O hand/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O squeezing/O it/O in/O his/O fist/O,/O he/O
pulled/O the/O trigger/O./O He/O did/O not/O hear/O the/O sound/O of/O the/O shot/O,/O but/O a/O violent/O
blow/O on/O his/O chest/O sent/O him/O reeling/O./O He/O tried/O to/O clutch/O at/O the/O edge/O of/O
the/O table/O,/O dropped/O the/O revolver/O,/O staggered/O,/O and/O sat/O down/O on/O the/O ground/O,/O
looking/O about/O him/O in/O astonishment/O./O He/O did/O not/O recognize/O his/O room/O,/O
looking/O up/O from/O the/O ground/O,/O at/O the/O bent/O legs/O of/O the/O table/O,/O at/O the/O
wastepaper/O basket/O,/O and/O the/O tiger-skin/O rug/O./O The/O hurried/O,/O creaking/O steps/O
of/O his/O servant/O coming/O through/O the/O drawing/O room/O brought/O him/O to/O his/O
senses/O./O He/O made/O an/O effort/O at/O thought/O,/O and/O was/O aware/O that/O he/O was/O on/O the/O
floor/O;/O and/O seeing/O blood/O on/O the/O tiger-skin/O rug/O and/O on/O his/O arm/O,/O he/O knew/O he/O
had/O shot/O himself/O./O

``/OIdiotic/O!/O Missed/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O fumbling/O after/O the/O revolver/O./O The/O revolver/O
was/O close/O beside/O him/O--/Ohe/O sought/O further/O off/O./O Still/O feeling/O for/O it/O,/O he/O
stretched/O out/O to/O the/O other/O side/O,/O and/O not/O being/O strong/O enough/O to/O keep/O his/O
balance/O,/O fell/O over/O,/O streaming/O with/O blood/O./O

The/O elegant/O,/O whiskered/O manservant/O,/O who/O used/O to/O be/O continually/O
complaining/O to/O his/O acquaintances/O of/O the/O delicacy/O of/O his/O nerves/O,/O was/O so/O
panic-stricken/O on/O seeing/O his/O master/O lying/O on/O the/O floor/O,/O that/O he/O left/O him/O
losing/O blood/O while/O he/O ran/O for/O assistance/O./O An/O hour/O later/O Varya/PERSON,/O his/O
brother/O's/O wife/O,/O had/O arrived/O,/O and/O with/O the/O assistance/O of/O three/O doctors/O,/O
whom/O she/O had/O sent/O for/O in/O all/O directions/O,/O and/O who/O all/O appeared/O at/O the/O
same/O moment/O,/O she/O got/O the/O wounded/O man/O to/O bed/O,/O and/O remained/O to/O nurse/O him/O./O



Chapter/O 19/O


The/O mistake/O made/O by/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON in/O that/O,/O when/O preparing/O for/O
seeing/O his/O wife/O,/O he/O had/O overlooked/O the/O possibility/O that/O her/O repentance/O
might/O be/O sincere/O,/O and/O he/O might/O forgive/O her/O,/O and/O she/O might/O not/O die/O--/Othis/O
mistake/O was/O two/O months/O after/O his/O return/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION brought/O home/O to/O him/O
in/O all/O its/O significance/O./O But/O the/O mistake/O made/O by/O him/O had/O arisen/O not/O
simply/O from/O his/O having/O overlooked/O that/O contingency/O,/O but/O also/O from/O the/O
fact/O that/O until/O that/O day/O of/O his/O interview/O with/O his/O dying/O wife/O,/O he/O had/O
not/O known/O his/O own/O heart/O./O At/O his/O sick/O wife/O's/O bedside/O he/O had/O for/O the/O first/O
time/O in/O his/O life/O given/O way/O to/O that/O feeling/O of/O sympathetic/O suffering/O
always/O roused/O in/O him/O by/O the/O sufferings/O of/O others/O,/O and/O hitherto/O looked/O on/O
by/O him/O with/O shame/O as/O a/O harmful/O weakness/O./O And/O pity/O for/O her/O,/O and/O remorse/O
for/O having/O desired/O her/O death/O,/O and/O most/O of/O all/O,/O the/O joy/O of/O forgiveness/O,/O
made/O him/O at/O once/O conscious/O,/O not/O simply/O of/O the/O relief/O of/O his/O own/O
sufferings/O,/O but/O of/O a/O spiritual/O peace/O he/O had/O never/O experienced/O before/O./O He/O
suddenly/O felt/O that/O the/O very/O thing/O that/O was/O the/O source/O of/O his/O sufferings/O
had/O become/O the/O source/O of/O his/O spiritual/O joy/O;/O that/O what/O had/O seemed/O
insoluble/O while/O he/O was/O judging/O,/O blaming/O,/O and/O hating/O,/O had/O become/O clear/O
and/O simple/O when/O he/O forgave/O and/O loved/O./O

He/O forgave/O his/O wife/O and/O pitied/O her/O for/O her/O sufferings/O and/O her/O remorse/O./O
He/O forgave/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O pitied/O him/O,/O especially/O after/O reports/O reached/O him/O
of/O his/O despairing/O action/O./O He/O felt/O more/O for/O his/O son/O than/O before/O./O And/O he/O
blamed/O himself/O now/O for/O having/O taken/O too/O little/O interest/O in/O him/O./O But/O for/O
the/O little/O newborn/O baby/O he/O felt/O a/O quite/O peculiar/O sentiment/O,/O not/O of/O pity/O,/O
only/O,/O but/O of/O tenderness/O./O At/O first/O,/O from/O a/O feeling/O of/O compassion/O alone/O,/O
he/O had/O been/O interested/O in/O the/O delicate/O little/O creature/O,/O who/O was/O not/O his/O
child/O,/O and/O who/O was/O cast/O on/O one/O side/O during/O her/O mother/O's/O illness/O,/O and/O
would/O certainly/O have/O died/O if/O he/O had/O not/O troubled/O about/O her/O,/O and/O he/O did/O
not/O himself/O observe/O how/O fond/O he/O became/O of/O her/O./O He/O would/O go/O into/O the/O
nursery/O several/O times/O a/O day/O,/O and/O sit/O there/O for/O a/O long/O while/O,/O so/O that/O the/O
nurses/O,/O who/O were/O at/O first/O afraid/O of/O him/O,/O got/O quite/O used/O to/O his/O presence/O./O
Sometimes/O for/O half/O an/O hour/O at/O a/O stretch/O he/O would/O sit/O silently/O gazing/O at/O
the/O saffron-red/O,/O downy/O,/O wrinkled/O face/O of/O the/O sleeping/O baby/O,/O watching/O the/O
movements/O of/O the/O frowning/O brows/O,/O and/O the/O fat/O little/O hands/O,/O with/O clenched/O
fingers/O,/O that/O rubbed/O the/O little/O eyes/O and/O nose/O./O At/O such/O moments/O
particularly/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O a/O sense/O of/O perfect/O peace/O and/O
inward/O harmony/O,/O and/O saw/O nothing/O extraordinary/O in/O his/O position/O,/O nothing/O
that/O ought/O to/O be/O changed/O./O

But/O as/O time/O went/O on/O,/O he/O saw/O more/O and/O more/O distinctly/O that/O however/O
natural/O the/O position/O now/O seemed/O to/O him/O,/O he/O would/O not/O long/O be/O allowed/O to/O
remain/O in/O it/O./O He/O felt/O that/O besides/O the/O blessed/O spiritual/O force/O
controlling/O his/O soul/O,/O there/O was/O another/O,/O a/O brutal/O force/O,/O as/O powerful/O,/O or/O
more/O powerful/O,/O which/O controlled/O his/O life/O,/O and/O that/O this/O force/O would/O not/O
allow/O him/O that/O humble/O peace/O he/O longed/O for/O./O He/O felt/O that/O everyone/O was/O
looking/O at/O him/O with/O inquiring/O wonder/O,/O that/O he/O was/O not/O understood/O,/O and/O
that/O something/O was/O expected/O of/O him/O./O Above/O all/O,/O he/O felt/O the/O instability/O
and/O unnaturalness/O of/O his/O relations/O with/O his/O wife/O./O

When/O the/O softening/O effect/O of/O the/O near/O approach/O of/O death/O had/O passed/O away/O,/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON began/O to/O notice/O that/O Anna/PERSON was/O afraid/O of/O him/O,/O ill/O
at/O ease/O with/O him/O,/O and/O could/O not/O look/O him/O straight/O in/O the/O face/O./O She/O
seemed/O to/O be/O wanting/O,/O and/O not/O daring/O,/O to/O tell/O him/O something/O;/O and/O as/O
though/O foreseeing/O their/O present/O relations/O could/O not/O continue/O,/O she/O seemed/O
to/O be/O expecting/O something/O from/O him/O./O

Towards/O the/O end/O of/O February/O it/O happened/O that/O Anna/PERSON's/O baby/O daughter/O,/O who/O
had/O been/O named/O Anna/PERSON too/O,/O fell/O ill/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O in/O the/O
nursery/O in/O the/O morning/O,/O and/O leaving/O orders/O for/O the/O doctor/O to/O be/O sent/O
for/O,/O he/O went/O to/O his/O office/O./O On/O finishing/O his/O work/O,/O he/O returned/O home/O at/O
four/O./O Going/O into/O the/O hall/O he/O saw/O a/O handsome/O groom/O,/O in/O a/O braided/O livery/O
and/O a/O bear/O fur/O cape/O,/O holding/O a/O white/O fur/O cloak/O./O

``/OWho/O is/O here/O?/O''/O asked/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OPrincess/O Elizaveta/PERSON Federovna/PERSON Tverskaya/PERSON,/O''/O the/O groom/O answered/O,/O and/O it/O
seemed/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON that/O he/O grinned/O./O

During/O all/O this/O difficult/O time/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O noticed/O that/O
his/O worldly/O acquaintances/O,/O especially/O women/O,/O took/O a/O peculiar/O interest/O in/O
him/O and/O his/O wife/O./O All/O these/O acquaintances/O he/O observed/O with/O difficulty/O
concealing/O their/O mirth/O at/O something/O;/O the/O same/O mirth/O that/O he/O had/O
perceived/O in/O the/O lawyer/O's/O eyes/O,/O and/O just/O now/O in/O the/O eyes/O of/O this/O groom/O./O
Everyone/O seemed/O,/O somehow/O,/O hugely/O delighted/O,/O as/O though/O they/O had/O just/O been/O
at/O a/O wedding/O./O When/O they/O met/O him/O,/O with/O ill-disguised/O enjoyment/O they/O
inquired/O after/O his/O wife/O's/O health/O./O The/O presence/O of/O Princess/O Tverskaya/PERSON was/O
unpleasant/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON from/O the/O memories/O associated/O with/O
her/O,/O and/O also/O because/O he/O disliked/O her/O,/O and/O he/O went/O straight/O to/O the/O
nursery/O./O In/O the/O day/O nursery/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O leaning/O on/O the/O table/O with/O his/O legs/O
on/O a/O chair/O,/O was/O drawing/O and/O chatting/O away/O merrily/O./O The/O English/O
governess/O,/O who/O had/O during/O Anna/PERSON's/O illness/O replaced/O the/O French/O one/O,/O was/O
sitting/O near/O the/O boy/O knitting/O a/O shawl/O./O She/O hurriedly/O got/O up/O,/O curtseyed/O,/O
and/O pulled/O Seryozha/PERSON./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON stroked/O his/O son/O's/O hair/O,/O answered/O the/O governess/O's/O
inquiries/O about/O his/O wife/O,/O and/O asked/O what/O the/O doctor/O had/O said/O of/O the/O
baby/O./O

``/OThe/O doctor/O said/O it/O was/O nothing/O serious/O,/O and/O he/O ordered/O a/O bath/O,/O sir/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O she/O is/O still/O in/O pain/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O listening/O to/O the/O
baby/O's/O screaming/O in/O the/O next/O room/O./O

``/OI/O think/O it/O's/O the/O wet-nurse/O,/O sir/O,/O''/O the/O Englishwoman/O said/O firmly/O./O

``/OWhat/O makes/O you/O think/O so/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O,/O stopping/O short/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O just/O as/O it/O was/O at/O Countess/O Paul/PERSON's/O,/O sir/O./O They/O gave/O the/O baby/O
medicine/O,/O and/O it/O turned/O out/O that/O the/O baby/O was/O simply/O hungry/O:/O the/O nurse/O
had/O no/O milk/O,/O sir/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON pondered/O,/O and/O after/O standing/O still/O a/O few/O seconds/O
he/O went/O in/O at/O the/O other/O door/O./O The/O baby/O was/O lying/O with/O its/O head/O thrown/O
back/O,/O stiffening/O itself/O in/O the/O nurse/O's/O arms/O,/O and/O would/O not/O take/O the/O
plump/O breast/O offered/O it/O;/O and/O it/O never/O ceased/O screaming/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O
double/O hushing/O of/O the/O wet-nurse/O and/O the/O other/O nurse/O,/O who/O was/O bending/O
over/O her/O./O

``/OStill/O no/O better/O?/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OShe/O's/O very/O restless/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O nurse/O in/O a/O whisper/O./O

``/OMiss/O Edwarde/PERSON says/O that/O perhaps/O the/O wet-nurse/O has/O no/O milk/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OI/O think/O so/O too/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O''/O

``/OThen/O why/O did/On't/O you/O say/O so/O?/O''/O

``/OWho/O's/O one/O to/O say/O it/O to/O?/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON still/O ill/O.../O''/O said/O the/O nurse/O
discontentedly/O./O

The/O nurse/O was/O an/O old/O servant/O of/O the/O family/O./O And/O in/O her/O simple/O words/O
there/O seemed/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON an/O allusion/O to/O his/O position/O./O

The/O baby/O screamed/O louder/O than/O ever/O,/O struggling/O and/O sobbing/O./O The/O nurse/O,/O
with/O a/O gesture/O of/O despair/O,/O went/O to/O it/O,/O took/O it/O from/O the/O wet-nurse/O's/O
arms/O,/O and/O began/O walking/O up/O and/O down/O,/O rocking/O it/O./O

``/OYou/O must/O ask/O the/O doctor/O to/O examine/O the/O wet-nurse/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O The/O smartly/O dressed/O and/O healthy-looking/O nurse/O,/O

herself/O,/O and/O covering/O her/O bosom/O,/O smiled/O contemptuously/O at/O the/O idea/O of/O
doubts/O being/O cast/O on/O her/O abundance/O of/O milk/O./O In/O that/O smile/O,/O too/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON saw/O a/O sneer/O at/O his/O position/O./O

``/OLuckless/O child/O!/O''/O said/O the/O nurse/O,/O hushing/O the/O baby/O,/O and/O still/O walking/O up/O
and/O down/O with/O it/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON sat/O down/O,/O and/O with/O a/O despondent/O and/O suffering/O face/O
watched/O the/O nurse/O walking/O to/O and/O fro/O./O

When/O the/O child/O at/O last/O was/O still/O,/O and/O had/O been/O put/O in/O a/O deep/O bed/O,/O and/O
the/O nurse/O,/O after/O smoothing/O the/O little/O pillow/O,/O had/O left/O her/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON got/O up/O,/O and/O walking/O awkwardly/O on/O tiptoe/O,/O approached/O the/O
baby/O./O For/O a/O minute/O he/O was/O still/O,/O and/O with/O the/O same/O despondent/O face/O gazed/O

of/O his/O forehead/O,/O came/O out/O on/O his/O face/O,/O and/O he/O went/O as/O softly/O out/O of/O the/O
room/O./O

In/O the/O dining/O room/O he/O rang/O the/O bell/O,/O and/O told/O the/O servant/O who/O came/O in/O to/O
send/O again/O for/O the/O doctor/O./O He/O felt/O vexed/O with/O his/O wife/O for/O not/O being/O

wish/O to/O go/O to/O her/O;/O he/O had/O no/O wish/O,/O either/O,/O to/O see/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON./O But/O
his/O wife/O might/O wonder/O why/O he/O did/O not/O go/O to/O her/O as/O usual/O;/O and/O so/O,/O
overcoming/O his/O disinclination/O,/O he/O went/O towards/O the/O bedroom/O./O As/O he/O walked/O

``/OIf/O he/O had/On't/O been/O going/O away/O,/O I/O could/O have/O understood/O your/O answer/O and/O
his/O too/O./O But/O your/O husband/O ought/O to/O be/O above/O that/O,/O''/O Betsy/PERSON was/O saying/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O for/O my/O husband/O;/O for/O myself/O I/O do/On't/O wish/O it/O./O Do/On't/O say/O that/O!/O''/O
answered/O Anna/PERSON's/O excited/O voice/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O you/O must/O care/O to/O say/O good-bye/O to/O a/O man/O who/O has/O shot/O himself/O on/O
your/O account/O.../O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O just/O why/O I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O./O''/O

With/O a/O dismayed/O and/O guilty/O expression/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON stopped/O and/O
would/O have/O gone/O back/O unobserved/O./O But/O reflecting/O that/O this/O would/O be/O
undignified/O,/O he/O turned/O back/O again/O,/O and/O clearing/O his/O throat/O,/O he/O went/O up/O
to/O the/O bedroom/O./O The/O voices/O were/O silent/O,/O and/O he/O went/O in/O./O

Anna/PERSON,/O in/O a/O gray/O dressing/O gown/O,/O with/O a/O crop/O of/O short/O clustering/O black/O

her/O head/O and/O looked/O round/O uneasily/O at/O Betsy/PERSON./O Betsy/PERSON,/O dressed/O in/O the/O
height/O of/O the/O latest/O fashion/O,/O in/O a/O hat/O that/O towered/O somewhere/O over/O her/O

was/O sitting/O beside/O Anna/PERSON,/O her/O tall/O flat/O figure/O held/O erect/O./O Bowing/O her/O
head/O,/O she/O greeted/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON with/O an/O ironical/O smile/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O as/O though/O surprised/O./O ``/OI/O'm/O very/O glad/O you/O're/O at/O home/O./O You/O
never/O put/O in/O an/O appearance/O anywhere/O,/O and/O I/O have/On't/O seen/O you/O ever/O since/O
Anna/PERSON has/O been/O ill/O./O I/O have/O heard/O all/O about/O it/O--/Oyour/O anxiety/O./O Yes/O,/O you/O're/O a/O
wonderful/O husband/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O a/O meaning/O and/O affable/O air/O,/O as/O though/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON bowed/O frigidly/O,/O and/O kissing/O his/O wife/O's/O hand/O,/O asked/O
how/O she/O was/O./O

``/OBetter/O,/O I/O think/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O avoiding/O his/O eyes/O./O

``/OBut/O you/O've/O rather/O a/O feverish-looking/O color/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O laying/O stress/O on/O
the/O word/O ``/Ofeverish/O./O''/O

``/OWe/O've/O been/O talking/O too/O much/O,/O''/O said/O Betsy/PERSON./O ``/OI/O feel/O it/O's/O selfishness/O on/O
my/O part/O,/O and/O I/O am/O going/O away/O./O''/O

She/O got/O up/O,/O but/O Anna/PERSON,/O suddenly/O flushing/O,/O quickly/O caught/O at/O her/O hand/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O wait/O a/O minute/O,/O please/O./O I/O must/O tell/O you/O .../O no/O,/O you/O./O''/O she/O turned/O to/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O and/O her/O neck/O and/O brow/O were/O suffused/O with/O crimson/O./O
``/OI/O wo/On't/O and/O ca/On't/O keep/O anything/O secret/O from/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON cracked/O his/O fingers/O and/O bowed/O his/O head/O./O

``/OBetsy/PERSON's/O been/O telling/O me/O that/O Count/O Vronsky/O wants/O to/O come/O here/O to/O say/O

``/OYou/O said/O,/O my/O dear/O,/O that/O it/O would/O depend/O on/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O''/O
Betsy/PERSON corrected/O her/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O receive/O him/O;/O and/O what/O object/O would/O there/O.../O''/O She/O
stopped/O suddenly/O,/O and/O glanced/O inquiringly/O at/O her/O husband/O -LRB-/Ohe/O did/O not/O
look/O at/O her/O-RRB-/O./O ``/OIn/O short/O,/O I/O do/On't/O wish/O it/O.../O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON advanced/O and/O would/O have/O taken/O her/O hand/O./O

Her/O first/O impulse/O was/O to/O jerk/O back/O her/O hand/O from/O the/O damp/O hand/O with/O big/O
swollen/O veins/O that/O sought/O hers/O,/O but/O with/O an/O obvious/O effort/O to/O control/O
herself/O she/O pressed/O his/O hand/O./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O grateful/O to/O you/O for/O your/O confidence/O,/O but/O.../O''/O he/O said/O,/O feeling/O
with/O confusion/O and/O annoyance/O that/O what/O he/O could/O decide/O easily/O and/O
clearly/O by/O himself/O,/O he/O could/O not/O discuss/O before/O Princess/O Tverskaya/PERSON,/O who/O
to/O him/O stood/O for/O the/O incarnation/O of/O that/O brute/O force/O which/O would/O
inevitably/O control/O him/O in/O the/O life/O he/O led/O in/O the/O eyes/O of/O the/O world/O,/O and/O

``/OWell/O,/O good-bye/O,/O my/O darling/O,/O''/O said/O Betsy/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O./O She/O kissed/O Anna/PERSON,/O
and/O went/O out/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON escorted/O her/O out/O./O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON!/O I/O know/O you/O are/O a/O truly/O magnanimous/O man/O,/O''/O said/O
Betsy/PERSON,/O stopping/O in/O the/O little/O drawing-room/O,/O and/O with/O special/O warmth/O
shaking/O hands/O with/O him/O once/O more/O./O ``/OI/O am/O an/O outsider/O,/O but/O I/O so/O love/O her/O
and/O respect/O you/O that/O I/O venture/O to/O advise/O./O Receive/O him/O./O Alexey/PERSON Vronsky/PERSON is/O
the/O soul/O of/O honor/O,/O and/O he/O is/O going/O away/O to/O Tashkend/O./O''/O

``/OThank/O you/O,/O princess/O,/O for/O your/O sympathy/O and/O advice/O./O But/O the/O question/O of/O
whether/O my/O wife/O can/O or/O can/Onot/O see/O anyone/O she/O must/O decide/O herself/O./O''/O

He/O said/O this/O from/O habit/O,/O lifting/O his/O brows/O with/O dignity/O,/O and/O reflected/O
immediately/O that/O whatever/O his/O words/O might/O be/O,/O there/O could/O be/O no/O dignity/O
in/O his/O position/O./O And/O he/O saw/O this/O by/O the/O suppressed/O,/O malicious/O,/O and/O
ironical/O smile/O with/O which/O Betsy/PERSON glanced/O at/O him/O after/O this/O phrase/O./O



Chapter/O 20/O


Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON took/O leave/O of/O Betsy/PERSON in/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O and/O went/O
to/O his/O wife/O./O She/O was/O lying/O down/O,/O but/O hearing/O his/O steps/O she/O sat/O up/O
hastily/O in/O her/O former/O attitude/O,/O and/O looked/O in/O a/O scared/O way/O at/O him/O./O He/O
saw/O she/O had/O been/O crying/O./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O grateful/O for/O your/O confidence/O in/O me/O./O''/O He/O repeated/O gently/O in/O
Russian/O the/O phrase/O he/O had/O said/O in/O Betsy/PERSON's/O presence/O in/O French/O,/O and/O sat/O
down/O beside/O her/O./O When/O he/O spoke/O to/O her/O in/O Russian/O,/O using/O the/O Russian/O
``/Othou/O''/O of/O intimacy/O and/O affection/O,/O it/O was/O insufferably/O irritating/O to/O
Anna/PERSON./O ``/OAnd/O I/O am/O very/O grateful/O for/O your/O decision/O./O I/O,/O too/O,/O imagine/O that/O
since/O he/O is/O going/O away/O,/O there/O is/O no/O sort/O of/O necessity/O for/O Count/O Vronsky/O
to/O come/O here/O./O However/O,/O if/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O've/O said/O so/O already/O,/O so/O why/O repeat/O it/O?/O''/O Anna/PERSON suddenly/O interrupted/O
him/O with/O an/O irritation/O she/O could/O not/O succeed/O in/O repressing/O./O ``/ONo/O sort/O of/O
necessity/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O ``/Ofor/O a/O man/O to/O come/O and/O say/O good-bye/O to/O the/O
woman/O he/O loves/O,/O for/O whom/O he/O was/O ready/O to/O ruin/O himself/O,/O and/O has/O ruined/O
himself/O,/O and/O who/O can/Onot/O live/O without/O him/O./O No/O sort/O of/O necessity/O!/O''/O she/O
compressed/O her/O lips/O,/O and/O dropped/O her/O burning/O eyes/O to/O his/O hands/O with/O
their/O swollen/O veins/O./O They/O were/O rubbing/O each/O other/O./O

``/OLet/O us/O never/O speak/O of/O it/O,/O''/O she/O added/O more/O calmly/O./O

``/OI/O have/O left/O this/O question/O to/O you/O to/O decide/O,/O and/O I/O am/O very/O glad/O to/O
see/O.../O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O beginning/O./O

``/OThat/O my/O wish/O coincides/O with/O your/O own/O,/O''/O she/O finished/O quickly/O,/O
exasperated/O at/O his/O talking/O so/O slowly/O while/O she/O knew/O beforehand/O all/O he/O
would/O say/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O he/O assented/O;/O ``/Oand/O Princess/O Tverskaya/O's/O interference/O in/O the/O most/O
difficult/O private/O affairs/O is/O utterly/O uncalled/O for/O./O She/O especially/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O believe/O a/O word/O of/O what/O's/O said/O about/O her/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON quickly/O./O ``/OI/O
know/O she/O really/O cares/O for/O me/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON sighed/O and/O said/O nothing/O./O She/O played/O nervously/O with/O
the/O tassel/O of/O her/O dressing-gown/O,/O glancing/O at/O him/O with/O that/O torturing/O
sensation/O of/O physical/O repulsion/O for/O which/O she/O blamed/O herself/O,/O though/O she/O
could/O not/O control/O it/O./O Her/O only/O desire/O now/O was/O to/O be/O rid/O of/O his/O
oppressive/O presence/O./O

``/OI/O have/O just/O sent/O for/O the/O doctor/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O well/O;/O what/O do/O I/O want/O the/O doctor/O for/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O the/O little/O one/O cries/O,/O and/O they/O say/O the/O nurse/O has/On't/O enough/O milk/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O did/On't/O you/O let/O me/O nurse/O her/O,/O when/O I/O begged/O to/O?/O Anyway/O''/O -LRB-/OAlexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON knew/O what/O was/O meant/O by/O that/O ``/Oanyway/O''/O-RRB-/O,/O ``/Oshe/O's/O a/O baby/O,/O and/O
they/O're/O killing/O her/O./O''/O She/O rang/O the/O bell/O and/O ordered/O the/O baby/O to/O be/O
brought/O her/O./O ``/OI/O begged/O to/O nurse/O her/O,/O I/O was/On't/O allowed/O to/O,/O and/O now/O I/O'm/O
blamed/O for/O it/O./O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O blame/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O do/O blame/O me/O!/O My/O God/O!/O why/O did/On't/O I/O die/O!/O''/O And/O she/O broke/O into/O
sobs/O./O ``/OForgive/O me/O,/O I/O'm/O nervous/O,/O I/O'm/O unjust/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O controlling/O
herself/O,/O ``/Obut/O do/O go/O away/O.../O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O it/O ca/On't/O go/O on/O like/O this/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON said/O to/O himself/O
decidedly/O as/O he/O left/O his/O wife/O's/O room/O./O

Never/O had/O the/O impossibility/O of/O his/O position/O in/O the/O world/O's/O eyes/O,/O and/O his/O
wife/O's/O hatred/O of/O him/O,/O and/O altogether/O the/O might/O of/O that/O mysterious/O brutal/O
force/O that/O guided/O his/O life/O against/O his/O spiritual/O inclinations/O,/O and/O
exacted/O conformity/O with/O its/O decrees/O and/O change/O in/O his/O attitude/O to/O his/O
wife/O,/O been/O presented/O to/O him/O with/O such/O distinctness/O as/O that/O day/O./O He/O saw/O
clearly/O that/O all/O the/O world/O and/O his/O wife/O expected/O of/O him/O something/O,/O but/O
what/O exactly/O,/O he/O could/O not/O make/O out/O./O He/O felt/O that/O this/O was/O rousing/O in/O
his/O soul/O a/O feeling/O of/O anger/O destructive/O of/O his/O peace/O of/O mind/O and/O of/O all/O
the/O good/O of/O his/O achievement/O./O He/O believed/O that/O for/O Anna/PERSON herself/O it/O would/O
be/O better/O to/O break/O off/O all/O relations/O with/O Vronsky/O;/O but/O if/O they/O all/O
thought/O this/O out/O of/O the/O question/O,/O he/O was/O even/O ready/O to/O allow/O these/O
relations/O to/O be/O renewed/O,/O so/O long/O as/O the/O children/O were/O not/O disgraced/O,/O and/O
he/O was/O not/O deprived/O of/O them/O nor/O forced/O to/O change/O his/O position/O./O Bad/O as/O
this/O might/O be/O,/O it/O was/O anyway/O better/O than/O a/O rupture/O,/O which/O would/O put/O her/O
in/O a/O hopeless/O and/O shameful/O position/O,/O and/O deprive/O him/O of/O everything/O he/O
cared/O for/O./O But/O he/O felt/O helpless/O;/O he/O knew/O beforehand/O that/O every/O one/O was/O
against/O him/O,/O and/O that/O he/O would/O not/O be/O allowed/O to/O do/O what/O seemed/O to/O him/O
now/O so/O natural/O and/O right/O,/O but/O would/O be/O forced/O to/O do/O what/O was/O wrong/O,/O
though/O it/O seemed/O the/O proper/O thing/O to/O them/O./O



Chapter/O 21/O


Before/O Betsy/PERSON had/O time/O to/O walk/O out/O of/O the/O drawing-room/O,/O she/O was/O met/O in/O
the/O doorway/O by/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O who/O had/O just/O come/O from/O Yeliseev/LOCATION's/O,/O
where/O a/O consignment/O of/O fresh/O oysters/O had/O been/O received/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O princess/O!/O what/O a/O delightful/O meeting/O!/O''/O he/O began/O./O ``/OI/O've/O been/O to/O see/O
you/O./O''/O

``/OA/O meeting/O for/O one/O minute/O,/O for/O I/O'm/O going/O,/O''/O said/O Betsy/PERSON,/O smiling/O and/O
putting/O on/O her/O glove/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O put/O on/O your/O glove/O yet/O,/O princess/O;/O let/O me/O kiss/O your/O hand/O./O There/O's/O
nothing/O I/O'm/O so/O thankful/O to/O the/O revival/O of/O the/O old/O fashions/O for/O as/O the/O
kissing/O the/O hand/O./O''/O He/O kissed/O Betsy/PERSON's/O hand/O./O ``/OWhen/O shall/O we/O see/O each/O
other/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O deserve/O it/O,/O''/O answered/O Betsy/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O I/O deserve/O a/O great/O deal/O,/O for/O I/O've/O become/O a/O most/O serious/O person/O./O
I/O do/On't/O only/O manage/O my/O own/O affairs/O,/O but/O other/O people/O's/O too/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
with/O a/O significant/O expression/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O'm/O so/O glad/O!/O''/O answered/O Betsy/PERSON,/O at/O once/O understanding/O that/O he/O was/O
speaking/O of/O Anna/PERSON./O And/O going/O back/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O they/O stood/O in/O a/O
corner/O./O ``/OHe/O's/O killing/O her/O,/O''/O said/O Betsy/PERSON in/O a/O whisper/O full/O of/O meaning/O./O
``/OIt/O's/O impossible/O,/O impossible/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O so/O glad/O you/O think/O so/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O shaking/O his/O head/O
with/O a/O serious/O and/O sympathetically/O distressed/O expression/O,/O ``/Othat/O's/O what/O
I/O've/O come/O to/O Petersburg/LOCATION for/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O whole/O town/O's/O talking/O of/O it/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O an/O impossible/O
position/O./O She/O pines/O and/O pines/O away/O./O He/O does/On't/O understand/O that/O she/O's/O one/O
of/O those/O women/O who/O ca/On't/O trifle/O with/O their/O feelings/O./O One/O of/O two/O things/O:/O
either/O let/O him/O take/O her/O away/O,/O act/O with/O energy/O,/O or/O give/O her/O a/O divorce/O./O
This/O is/O stifling/O her/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O .../O just/O so/O.../O''/O Oblonsky/PERSON said/O,/O sighing/O./O ``/OThat/O's/O what/O I/O've/O come/O
for/O./O At/O least/O not/O solely/O for/O that/O .../O I/O've/O been/O made/O a/O _/OKammerherr/LOCATION_/O;/O of/O
course/O,/O one/O has/O to/O say/O thank/O you/O./O But/O the/O chief/O thing/O was/O having/O to/O
settle/O this/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O God/O help/O you/O!/O''/O said/O Betsy/PERSON./O

After/O accompanying/O Betsy/PERSON to/O the/O outside/O hall/O,/O once/O more/O kissing/O her/O hand/O
above/O the/O glove/O,/O at/O the/O point/O where/O the/O pulse/O beats/O,/O and/O murmuring/O to/O
her/O such/O unseemly/O nonsense/O that/O she/O did/O not/O know/O whether/O to/O laugh/O or/O be/O
angry/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON went/O to/O his/O sister/O./O He/O found/O her/O in/O tears/O./O

Although/O he/O happened/O to/O be/O bubbling/O over/O with/O good/O spirits/O,/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON immediately/O and/O quite/O naturally/O fell/O into/O the/O sympathetic/O,/O
poetically/O emotional/O tone/O which/O harmonized/O with/O her/O mood/O./O He/O asked/O her/O
how/O she/O was/O,/O and/O how/O she/O had/O spent/O the/O morning/O./O

``/OVery/O,/O very/O miserably/O./O Today/O and/O this/O morning/O and/O all/O past/O days/O and/O days/O
to/O come/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OI/O think/O you/O're/O giving/O way/O to/O pessimism/O./O You/O must/O rouse/O yourself/O,/O you/O
must/O look/O life/O in/O the/O face/O./O I/O know/O it/O's/O hard/O,/O but/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O have/O heard/O it/O said/O that/O women/O love/O men/O even/O for/O their/O vices/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON
began/O suddenly/O,/O ``/Obut/O I/O hate/O him/O for/O his/O virtues/O./O I/O ca/On't/O live/O with/O him/O./O
Do/O you/O understand/O?/O the/O sight/O of/O him/O has/O a/O physical/O effect/O on/O me/O,/O it/O
makes/O me/O beside/O myself/O./O I/O ca/On't/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O live/O with/O him/O./O What/O am/O I/O to/O do/O?/O
I/O have/O been/O unhappy/O,/O and/O used/O to/O think/O one/O could/On't/O be/O more/O unhappy/O,/O but/O
the/O awful/O state/O of/O things/O I/O am/O going/O through/O now/O,/O I/O could/O never/O have/O
conceived/O./O Would/O you/O believe/O it/O,/O that/O knowing/O he/O's/O a/O good/O man/O,/O a/O
splendid/O man/O,/O that/O I/O'm/O not/O worth/O his/O little/O finger/O,/O still/O I/O hate/O him/O./O I/O
hate/O him/O for/O his/O generosity/O./O And/O there/O's/O nothing/O left/O for/O me/O but/O.../O''/O

She/O would/O have/O said/O death/O,/O but/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON would/O not/O let/O her/O
finish/O./O

``/OYou/O are/O ill/O and/O overwrought/O,/O''/O he/O said/O;/O ``/Obelieve/O me/O,/O you/O're/O exaggerating/O
dreadfully/O./O There/O's/O nothing/O so/O terrible/O in/O it/O./O''/O

And/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON smiled/O./O No/O one/O else/O in/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O
place/O,/O having/O to/O do/O with/O such/O despair/O,/O would/O have/O ventured/O to/O smile/O -LRB-/Othe/O
smile/O would/O have/O seemed/O brutal/O-RRB-/O;/O but/O in/O his/O smile/O there/O was/O so/O much/O of/O
sweetness/O and/O almost/O feminine/O tenderness/O that/O his/O smile/O did/O not/O wound/O,/O
but/O softened/O and/O soothed/O./O His/O gentle/O,/O soothing/O words/O and/O smiles/O were/O as/O
soothing/O and/O softening/O as/O almond/O oil/O./O And/O Anna/PERSON soon/O felt/O this/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O Stiva/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/OI/O'm/O lost/O,/O lost/O!/O worse/O than/O lost/O!/O I/O ca/On't/O say/O yet/O
that/O all/O is/O over/O;/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O I/O feel/O that/O it/O's/O not/O over/O./O I/O'm/O an/O
overstrained/O string/O that/O must/O snap/O./O But/O it/O's/O not/O ended/O yet/O .../O and/O it/O
will/O have/O a/O fearful/O end/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O matter/O,/O we/O must/O let/O the/O string/O be/O loosened/O,/O little/O by/O little/O./O
There/O's/O no/O position/O from/O which/O there/O is/O no/O way/O of/O escape/O./O''/O

``/OI/O have/O thought/O,/O and/O thought/O./O Only/O one/O.../O''/O

Again/O he/O knew/O from/O her/O terrified/O eyes/O that/O this/O one/O way/O of/O escape/O in/O her/O
thought/O was/O death/O,/O and/O he/O would/O not/O let/O her/O say/O it/O./O

``/ONot/O at/O all/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OListen/O to/O me/O./O You/O ca/On't/O see/O your/O own/O position/O as/O
I/O can/O./O Let/O me/O tell/O you/O candidly/O my/O opinion/O./O''/O Again/O he/O smiled/O discreetly/O
his/O almond-oil/O smile/O./O ``/OI/O'll/O begin/O from/O the/O beginning/O./O You/O married/O a/O man/O
twenty/O years/O older/O than/O yourself/O./O You/O married/O him/O without/O love/O and/O not/O
knowing/O what/O love/O was/O./O It/O was/O a/O mistake/O,/O let/O's/O admit/O./O''/O

``/OA/O fearful/O mistake/O!/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OBut/O I/O repeat/O,/O it/O's/O an/O accomplished/O fact/O./O Then/O you/O had/O,/O let/O us/O say/O,/O the/O
misfortune/O to/O love/O a/O man/O not/O your/O husband/O./O That/O was/O a/O misfortune/O;/O but/O
that/O,/O too/O,/O is/O an/O accomplished/O fact/O./O And/O your/O husband/O knew/O it/O and/O forgave/O
it/O./O''/O He/O stopped/O at/O each/O sentence/O,/O waiting/O for/O her/O to/O object/O,/O but/O she/O
made/O no/O answer/O./O ``/OThat/O's/O so/O./O Now/O the/O question/O is/O:/O can/O you/O go/O on/O living/O
with/O your/O husband/O?/O Do/O you/O wish/O it/O?/O Does/O he/O wish/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O know/O nothing/O,/O nothing/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O you/O said/O yourself/O that/O you/O ca/On't/O endure/O him/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O did/On't/O say/O so/O./O I/O deny/O it/O./O I/O ca/On't/O tell/O,/O I/O do/On't/O know/O anything/O
about/O it/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O let/O.../O''/O

``/OYou/O ca/On't/O understand/O./O I/O feel/O I/O'm/O lying/O head/O downwards/O in/O a/O sort/O of/O pit/O,/O
but/O I/O ought/O not/O to/O save/O myself/O./O And/O I/O ca/On't/O .../O''/O

``/ONever/O mind/O,/O we/O'll/O slip/O something/O under/O and/O pull/O you/O out/O./O I/O understand/O
you/O:/O I/O understand/O that/O you/O ca/On't/O take/O it/O on/O yourself/O to/O express/O your/O
wishes/O,/O your/O feelings/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O's/O nothing/O,/O nothing/O I/O wish/O .../O except/O for/O it/O to/O be/O all/O over/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O he/O sees/O this/O and/O knows/O it/O./O And/O do/O you/O suppose/O it/O weighs/O on/O him/O any/O
less/O than/O on/O you/O?/O You/O're/O wretched/O,/O he/O's/O wretched/O,/O and/O what/O good/O can/O come/O
of/O it/O?/O while/O divorce/O would/O solve/O the/O difficulty/O completely/O./O''/O With/O some/O
effort/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON brought/O out/O his/O central/O idea/O,/O and/O looked/O
significantly/O at/O her/O./O

She/O said/O nothing/O,/O and/O shook/O her/O cropped/O head/O in/O dissent/O./O But/O from/O the/O
look/O in/O her/O face/O,/O that/O suddenly/O brightened/O into/O its/O old/O beauty/O,/O he/O saw/O
that/O if/O she/O did/O not/O desire/O this/O,/O it/O was/O simply/O because/O it/O seemed/O to/O her/O
unattainable/O happiness/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O awfully/O sorry/O for/O you/O!/O And/O how/O happy/O I/O should/O be/O if/O I/O could/O arrange/O
things/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O more/O boldly/O./O ``/ODo/On't/O speak/O,/O
do/On't/O say/O a/O word/O!/O God/O grant/O only/O that/O I/O may/O speak/O as/O I/O feel/O./O I/O'm/O going/O
to/O him/O./O''/O

Anna/PERSON looked/O at/O him/O with/O dreamy/O,/O shining/O eyes/O,/O and/O said/O nothing/O./O



Chapter/O 22/O


Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O with/O the/O same/O somewhat/O solemn/O expression/O with/O which/O
he/O used/O to/O take/O his/O presidential/O chair/O at/O his/O board/O,/O walked/O into/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O room/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O walking/O about/O his/O room/O
with/O his/O hands/O behind/O his/O back/O,/O thinking/O of/O just/O what/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O been/O discussing/O with/O his/O wife/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O interrupting/O you/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O on/O the/O sight/O of/O
his/O brother-in-law/O becoming/O suddenly/O aware/O of/O a/O sense/O of/O embarrassment/O
unusual/O with/O him/O./O To/O conceal/O this/O embarrassment/O he/O took/O out/O a/O cigarette/O
case/O he/O had/O just/O bought/O that/O opened/O in/O a/O new/O way/O,/O and/O sniffing/O the/O
leather/O,/O took/O a/O cigarette/O out/O of/O it/O./O

``/ONo/O./O Do/O you/O want/O anything/O?/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON asked/O without/O
eagerness/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O wished/O .../O I/O wanted/O .../O yes/O,/O I/O wanted/O to/O talk/O to/O you/O,/O''/O said/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O with/O surprise/O aware/O of/O an/O unaccustomed/O timidity/O./O

This/O feeling/O was/O so/O unexpected/O and/O so/O strange/O that/O he/O did/O not/O believe/O it/O
was/O the/O voice/O of/O conscience/O telling/O him/O that/O what/O he/O was/O meaning/O to/O do/O
was/O wrong/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON made/O an/O effort/O and/O struggled/O with/O the/O timidity/O that/O
had/O come/O over/O him/O./O

``/OI/O hope/O you/O believe/O in/O my/O love/O for/O my/O sister/O and/O my/O sincere/O affection/O
and/O respect/O for/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O reddening/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON stood/O still/O and/O said/O nothing/O,/O but/O his/O face/O struck/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON by/O its/O expression/O of/O an/O unresisting/O sacrifice/O./O

``/OI/O intended/O .../O I/O wanted/O to/O have/O a/O little/O talk/O with/O you/O about/O my/O sister/O
and/O your/O mutual/O position/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O still/O struggling/O with/O an/O
unaccustomed/O constraint/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON smiled/O mournfully/O,/O looked/O at/O his/O brother-in-law/O,/O
and/O without/O answering/O went/O up/O to/O the/O table/O,/O took/O from/O it/O an/O unfinished/O
letter/O,/O and/O handed/O it/O to/O his/O brother-in-law/O./O

``/OI/O think/O unceasingly/O of/O the/O same/O thing/O./O And/O here/O is/O what/O I/O had/O begun/O
writing/O,/O thinking/O I/O could/O say/O it/O better/O by/O letter/O,/O and/O that/O my/O presence/O
irritates/O her/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O as/O he/O gave/O him/O the/O letter/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON took/O the/O letter/O,/O looked/O with/O incredulous/O surprise/O at/O
the/O lusterless/O eyes/O fixed/O so/O immovably/O on/O him/O,/O and/O began/O to/O read/O./O

``/OI/O see/O that/O my/O presence/O is/O irksome/O to/O you/O./O Painful/O as/O it/O is/O to/O me/O to/O
believe/O it/O,/O I/O see/O that/O it/O is/O so/O,/O and/O can/Onot/O be/O otherwise/O./O I/O do/On't/O blame/O
you/O,/O and/O God/O is/O my/O witness/O that/O on/O seeing/O you/O at/O the/O time/O of/O your/O
illness/O I/O resolved/O with/O my/O whole/O heart/O to/O forget/O all/O that/O had/O passed/O
between/O us/O and/O to/O begin/O a/O new/O life/O./O I/O do/O not/O regret/O,/O and/O shall/O never/O
regret/O,/O what/O I/O have/O done/O;/O but/O I/O have/O desired/O one/O thing/O--/Oyour/O good/O,/O the/O
good/O of/O your/O soul/O--/Oand/O now/O I/O see/O I/O have/O not/O attained/O that/O./O Tell/O me/O
yourself/O what/O will/O give/O you/O true/O happiness/O and/O peace/O to/O your/O soul/O./O I/O put/O
myself/O entirely/O in/O your/O hands/O,/O and/O trust/O to/O your/O feeling/O of/O what/O's/O
right/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON handed/O back/O the/O letter/O,/O and/O with/O the/O same/O surprise/O
continued/O looking/O at/O his/O brother-in-law/O,/O not/O knowing/O what/O to/O say/O./O This/O
silence/O was/O so/O awkward/O for/O both/O of/O them/O that/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O lips/O
began/O twitching/O nervously/O,/O while/O he/O still/O gazed/O without/O speaking/O at/O
Karenin/ORGANIZATION's/O face/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O what/O I/O wanted/O to/O say/O to/O her/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O
turning/O away/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O.../O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O not/O able/O to/O answer/O for/O the/O tears/O
that/O were/O choking/O him/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O I/O understand/O you/O,/O''/O he/O brought/O out/O at/O last/O./O

``/OI/O want/O to/O know/O what/O she/O would/O like/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OI/O am/O afraid/O she/O does/O not/O understand/O her/O own/O position/O./O She/O is/O not/O a/O
judge/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O recovering/O himself/O./O ``/OShe/O is/O crushed/O,/O
simply/O crushed/O by/O your/O generosity/O./O If/O she/O were/O to/O read/O this/O letter/O,/O she/O
would/O be/O incapable/O of/O saying/O anything/O,/O she/O would/O only/O hang/O her/O head/O
lower/O than/O ever/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O what/O's/O to/O be/O done/O in/O that/O case/O?/O how/O explain/O,/O how/O find/O out/O her/O
wishes/O?/O''/O

``/OIf/O you/O will/O allow/O me/O to/O give/O my/O opinion/O,/O I/O think/O that/O it/O lies/O with/O you/O
to/O point/O out/O directly/O the/O steps/O you/O consider/O necessary/O to/O end/O the/O
position/O./O''/O

``/OSo/O you/O consider/O it/O must/O be/O ended/O?/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON interrupted/O
him/O./O ``/OBut/O how/O?/O''/O he/O added/O,/O with/O a/O gesture/O of/O his/O hands/O before/O his/O eyes/O
not/O usual/O with/O him/O./O ``/OI/O see/O no/O possible/O way/O out/O of/O it/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O is/O some/O way/O of/O getting/O out/O of/O every/O position/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O standing/O up/O and/O becoming/O more/O cheerful/O./O ``/OThere/O was/O a/O time/O
when/O you/O thought/O of/O breaking/O off/O.../O./O If/O you/O are/O convinced/O now/O that/O you/O
can/Onot/O make/O each/O other/O happy/O.../O''/O

``/OHappiness/O may/O be/O variously/O understood/O./O But/O suppose/O that/O I/O agree/O to/O
everything/O,/O that/O I/O want/O nothing/O:/O what/O way/O is/O there/O of/O getting/O out/O of/O our/O
position/O?/O''/O

``/OIf/O you/O care/O to/O know/O my/O opinion/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON with/O the/O same/O
smile/O of/O softening/O,/O almond-oil/O tenderness/O with/O which/O he/O had/O been/O talking/O
to/O Anna/PERSON./O His/O kindly/O smile/O was/O so/O winning/O that/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O
feeling/O his/O own/O weakness/O and/O unconsciously/O swayed/O by/O it/O,/O was/O ready/O to/O
believe/O what/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O saying/O./O

``/OShe/O will/O never/O speak/O out/O about/O it/O./O But/O one/O thing/O is/O possible/O,/O one/O thing/O
she/O might/O desire/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O ``/Othat/O is/O the/O cessation/O of/O your/O relations/O
and/O all/O memories/O associated/O with/O them/O./O To/O my/O thinking/O,/O in/O your/O position/O
what/O's/O essential/O is/O the/O formation/O of/O a/O new/O attitude/O to/O one/O another/O./O And/O
that/O can/O only/O rest/O on/O a/O basis/O of/O freedom/O on/O both/O sides/O./O''/O

``/ODivorce/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON interrupted/O,/O in/O a/O tone/O of/O aversion/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O imagine/O that/O divorce/O--/Oyes/O,/O divorce/O,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
repeated/O,/O reddening/O./O ``/OThat/O is/O from/O every/O point/O of/O view/O the/O most/O rational/O
course/O for/O married/O people/O who/O find/O themselves/O in/O the/O position/O you/O are/O
in/O./O What/O can/O be/O done/O if/O married/O people/O find/O that/O life/O is/O impossible/O for/O
them/O together/O?/O That/O may/O always/O happen/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON sighed/O heavily/O and/O closed/O his/O eyes/O./O

``/OThere/O's/O only/O one/O point/O to/O be/O considered/O:/O is/O either/O of/O the/O parties/O
desirous/O of/O forming/O new/O ties/O?/O If/O not/O,/O it/O is/O very/O simple/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O feeling/O more/O and/O more/O free/O from/O constraint/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O scowling/O with/O emotion/O,/O muttered/O something/O to/O
himself/O,/O and/O made/O no/O answer/O./O All/O that/O seemed/O so/O simple/O to/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O thought/O over/O thousands/O of/O times/O./O
And/O,/O so/O far/O from/O being/O simple/O,/O it/O all/O seemed/O to/O him/O utterly/O impossible/O./O
Divorce/O,/O the/O details/O of/O which/O he/O knew/O by/O this/O time/O,/O seemed/O to/O him/O now/O
out/O of/O the/O question/O,/O because/O the/O sense/O of/O his/O own/O dignity/O and/O respect/O
for/O religion/O forbade/O his/O taking/O upon/O himself/O a/O fictitious/O charge/O of/O
adultery/O,/O and/O still/O more/O suffering/O his/O wife/O,/O pardoned/O and/O beloved/O by/O
him/O,/O to/O be/O caught/O in/O the/O fact/O and/O put/O to/O public/O shame/O./O Divorce/O appeared/O
to/O him/O impossible/O also/O on/O other/O still/O more/O weighty/O grounds/O./O

What/O would/O become/O of/O his/O son/O in/O case/O of/O a/O divorce/O?/O To/O leave/O him/O with/O his/O
mother/O was/O out/O of/O the/O question/O./O The/O divorced/O mother/O would/O have/O her/O own/O
illegitimate/O family/O,/O in/O which/O his/O position/O as/O a/O stepson/O and/O his/O
education/O would/O not/O be/O good/O./O Keep/O him/O with/O him/O?/O He/O knew/O that/O would/O be/O an/O
act/O of/O vengeance/O on/O his/O part/O,/O and/O that/O he/O did/O not/O want/O./O But/O apart/O from/O
this/O,/O what/O more/O than/O all/O made/O divorce/O seem/O impossible/O to/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O,/O that/O by/O consenting/O to/O a/O divorce/O he/O would/O be/O
completely/O ruining/O Anna/PERSON./O The/O saying/O of/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON at/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O
that/O in/O deciding/O on/O a/O divorce/O he/O was/O thinking/O of/O himself/O,/O and/O not/O
considering/O that/O by/O this/O he/O would/O be/O ruining/O her/O irrevocably/O,/O had/O sunk/O
into/O his/O heart/O./O And/O connecting/O this/O saying/O with/O his/O forgiveness/O of/O her/O,/O
with/O his/O devotion/O to/O the/O children/O,/O he/O understood/O it/O now/O in/O his/O own/O way/O./O
To/O consent/O to/O a/O divorce/O,/O to/O give/O her/O her/O freedom/O,/O meant/O in/O his/O thoughts/O
to/O take/O from/O himself/O the/O last/O tie/O that/O bound/O him/O to/O life/O--/Othe/O children/O
whom/O he/O loved/O;/O and/O to/O take/O from/O her/O the/O last/O prop/O that/O stayed/O her/O on/O the/O
path/O of/O right/O,/O to/O thrust/O her/O down/O to/O her/O ruin/O./O If/O she/O were/O divorced/O,/O he/O
knew/O she/O would/O join/O her/O life/O to/O Vronsky/O's/O,/O and/O their/O tie/O would/O be/O an/O
illegitimate/O and/O criminal/O one/O,/O since/O a/O wife/O,/O by/O the/O interpretation/O of/O
the/O ecclesiastical/O law/O,/O could/O not/O marry/O while/O her/O husband/O was/O living/O./O
``/OShe/O will/O join/O him/O,/O and/O in/O a/O year/O or/O two/O he/O will/O throw/O her/O over/O,/O or/O she/O
will/O form/O a/O new/O tie/O,/O''/O thought/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O ``/OAnd/O I/O,/O by/O agreeing/O
to/O an/O unlawful/O divorce/O,/O shall/O be/O to/O blame/O for/O her/O ruin/O./O''/O He/O had/O thought/O
it/O all/O over/O hundreds/O of/O times/O,/O and/O was/O convinced/O that/O a/O divorce/O was/O not/O
at/O all/O simple/O,/O as/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O said/O,/O but/O was/O utterly/O
impossible/O./O He/O did/O not/O believe/O a/O single/O word/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O to/O
him/O;/O to/O every/O word/O he/O had/O a/O thousand/O objections/O to/O make/O,/O but/O he/O listened/O
to/O him/O,/O feeling/O that/O his/O words/O were/O the/O expression/O of/O that/O mighty/O brutal/O
force/O which/O controlled/O his/O life/O and/O to/O which/O he/O would/O have/O to/O submit/O./O

``/OThe/O only/O question/O is/O on/O what/O terms/O you/O agree/O to/O give/O her/O a/O divorce/O./O She/O
does/O not/O want/O anything/O,/O does/O not/O dare/O ask/O you/O for/O anything/O,/O she/O leaves/O
it/O all/O to/O your/O generosity/O./O''/O

``/OMy/O God/O,/O my/O God/O!/O what/O for/O?/O''/O thought/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O remembering/O
the/O details/O of/O divorce/O proceedings/O in/O which/O the/O husband/O took/O the/O blame/O
on/O himself/O,/O and/O with/O just/O the/O same/O gesture/O with/O which/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O done/O
the/O same/O,/O he/O hid/O his/O face/O for/O shame/O in/O his/O hands/O./O

``/OYou/O are/O distressed/O,/O I/O understand/O that/O./O But/O if/O you/O think/O it/O over/O.../O''/O

``/OWhosoever/O shall/O smite/O thee/O on/O thy/O right/O cheek/O,/O turn/O to/O him/O the/O other/O
also/O;/O and/O if/O any/O man/O take/O away/O thy/O coat/O,/O let/O him/O have/O thy/O cloak/O also/O,/O''/O
thought/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O in/O a/O shrill/O voice/O./O ``/OI/O will/O take/O the/O disgrace/O on/O
myself/O,/O I/O will/O give/O up/O even/O my/O son/O,/O but/O .../O but/O would/On't/O it/O be/O better/O to/O
let/O it/O alone/O?/O Still/O you/O may/O do/O as/O you/O like/O.../O''/O

And/O turning/O away/O so/O that/O his/O brother-in-law/O could/O not/O see/O him/O,/O he/O sat/O
down/O on/O a/O chair/O at/O the/O window/O./O There/O was/O bitterness/O,/O there/O was/O shame/O in/O
his/O heart/O,/O but/O with/O bitterness/O and/O shame/O he/O felt/O joy/O and/O emotion/O at/O the/O
height/O of/O his/O own/O meekness/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O touched/O./O He/O was/O silent/O for/O a/O space/O./O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O believe/O me/O,/O she/O appreciates/O your/O generosity/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O./O ``/OBut/O it/O seems/O it/O was/O the/O will/O of/O God/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O and/O as/O he/O said/O it/O
felt/O how/O foolish/O a/O remark/O it/O was/O,/O and/O with/O difficulty/O repressed/O a/O smile/O
at/O his/O own/O foolishness/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON would/O have/O made/O some/O reply/O,/O but/O tears/O stopped/O him/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O an/O unhappy/O fatality/O,/O and/O one/O must/O accept/O it/O as/O such/O./O I/O accept/O
the/O calamity/O as/O an/O accomplished/O fact/O,/O and/O am/O doing/O my/O best/O to/O help/O both/O
her/O and/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

When/O he/O went/O out/O of/O his/O brother-in-law/O's/O room/O he/O was/O touched/O,/O but/O that/O
did/O not/O prevent/O him/O from/O being/O glad/O he/O had/O successfully/O brought/O the/O
matter/O to/O a/O conclusion/O,/O for/O he/O felt/O certain/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON would/O
not/O go/O back/O on/O his/O words/O./O To/O this/O satisfaction/O was/O added/O the/O fact/O that/O
an/O idea/O had/O just/O struck/O him/O for/O a/O riddle/O turning/O on/O his/O successful/O
achievement/O,/O that/O when/O the/O affair/O was/O over/O he/O would/O ask/O his/O wife/O and/O
most/O intimate/O friends/O./O He/O put/O this/O riddle/O into/O two/O or/O three/O different/O
ways/O./O ``/OBut/O I/O'll/O work/O it/O out/O better/O than/O that/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O with/O a/O
smile/O./O



Chapter/O 23/O


Vronsky/O's/O wound/O had/O been/O a/O dangerous/O one/O,/O though/O it/O did/O not/O touch/O the/O
heart/O,/O and/O for/O several/O days/O he/O had/O lain/O between/O life/O and/O death/O./O The/O
first/O time/O he/O was/O able/O to/O speak/O,/O Varya/PERSON,/O his/O brother/O's/O wife/O,/O was/O alone/O in/O
the/O room/O./O

``/OVarya/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O sternly/O at/O her/O,/O ``/OI/O shot/O myself/O by/O accident/O./O
And/O please/O never/O speak/O of/O it/O,/O and/O tell/O everyone/O so/O./O Or/O else/O it/O's/O too/O
ridiculous/O./O''/O

Without/O answering/O his/O words/O,/O Varya/PERSON bent/O over/O him/O,/O and/O with/O a/O delighted/O
smile/O gazed/O into/O his/O face/O./O His/O eyes/O were/O clear/O,/O not/O feverish/O;/O but/O their/O
expression/O was/O stern/O./O

``/OThank/O God/O!/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OYou/O're/O not/O in/O pain/O?/O''/O

``/OA/O little/O here/O./O''/O He/O pointed/O to/O his/O breast/O./O

``/OThen/O let/O me/O change/O your/O bandages/O./O''/O

In/O silence/O,/O stiffening/O his/O broad/O jaws/O,/O he/O looked/O at/O her/O while/O she/O
bandaged/O him/O up/O./O When/O she/O had/O finished/O he/O said/O:/O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O delirious/O./O Please/O manage/O that/O there/O may/O be/O no/O talk/O of/O my/O having/O
shot/O myself/O on/O purpose/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O one/O does/O say/O so/O./O Only/O I/O hope/O you/O wo/On't/O shoot/O yourself/O by/O accident/O
any/O more/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O a/O questioning/O smile/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O I/O wo/On't/O,/O but/O it/O would/O have/O been/O better/O.../O''/O

And/O he/O smiled/O gloomily/O./O

In/O spite/O of/O these/O words/O and/O this/O smile/O,/O which/O so/O frightened/O Varya/O,/O when/O
the/O inflammation/O was/O over/O and/O he/O began/O to/O recover/O,/O he/O felt/O that/O he/O was/O
completely/O free/O from/O one/O part/O of/O his/O misery/O./O By/O his/O action/O he/O had/O,/O as/O it/O
were/O,/O washed/O away/O the/O shame/O and/O humiliation/O he/O had/O felt/O before/O./O He/O could/O
now/O think/O calmly/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O He/O recognized/O all/O his/O
magnanimity/O,/O but/O he/O did/O not/O now/O feel/O himself/O humiliated/O by/O it/O./O Besides/O,/O
he/O got/O back/O again/O into/O the/O beaten/O track/O of/O his/O life/O./O He/O saw/O the/O
possibility/O of/O looking/O men/O in/O the/O face/O again/O without/O shame/O,/O and/O he/O could/O
live/O in/O accordance/O with/O his/O own/O habits/O./O One/O thing/O he/O could/O not/O pluck/O out/O
of/O his/O heart/O,/O though/O he/O never/O ceased/O struggling/O with/O it/O,/O was/O the/O regret/O,/O
amounting/O to/O despair/O,/O that/O he/O had/O lost/O her/O forever/O./O That/O now/O,/O having/O
expiated/O his/O sin/O against/O the/O husband/O,/O he/O was/O bound/O to/O renounce/O her/O,/O and/O
never/O in/O future/O to/O stand/O between/O her/O with/O her/O repentance/O and/O her/O
husband/O,/O he/O had/O firmly/O decided/O in/O his/O heart/O;/O but/O he/O could/O not/O tear/O out/O
of/O his/O heart/O his/O regret/O at/O the/O loss/O of/O her/O love/O,/O he/O could/O not/O erase/O from/O
his/O memory/O those/O moments/O of/O happiness/O that/O he/O had/O so/O little/O prized/O at/O
the/O time/O,/O and/O that/O haunted/O him/O in/O all/O their/O charm/O./O

Serpuhovskoy/PERSON had/O planned/O his/O appointment/O at/O Tashkend/LOCATION,/O and/O Vronsky/O agreed/O
to/O the/O proposition/O without/O the/O slightest/O hesitation/O./O But/O the/O nearer/O the/O
time/O of/O departure/O came/O,/O the/O bitterer/O was/O the/O sacrifice/O he/O was/O making/O to/O
what/O he/O thought/O his/O duty/O./O

His/O wound/O had/O healed/O,/O and/O he/O was/O driving/O about/O making/O preparations/O for/O
his/O departure/O for/O Tashkend/O./O

``/OTo/O see/O her/O once/O and/O then/O to/O bury/O myself/O,/O to/O die/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O and/O as/O he/O
was/O paying/O farewell/O visits/O,/O he/O uttered/O this/O thought/O to/O Betsy/PERSON./O Charged/O
with/O this/O commission/O,/O Betsy/PERSON had/O gone/O to/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O brought/O him/O back/O a/O
negative/O reply/O./O

``/OSo/O much/O the/O better/O,/O''/O thought/O Vronsky/O,/O when/O he/O received/O the/O news/O./O ``/OIt/O
was/O a/O weakness/O,/O which/O would/O have/O shattered/O what/O strength/O I/O have/O left/O./O''/O

Next/O day/O Betsy/PERSON herself/O came/O to/O him/O in/O the/O morning/O,/O and/O announced/O that/O
she/O had/O heard/O through/O Oblonsky/PERSON as/O a/O positive/O fact/O that/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O agreed/O to/O a/O divorce/O,/O and/O that/O therefore/O Vronsky/O could/O
see/O Anna/PERSON./O

Without/O even/O troubling/O himself/O to/O see/O Betsy/PERSON out/O of/O his/O flat/O,/O forgetting/O
all/O his/O resolutions/O,/O without/O asking/O when/O he/O could/O see/O her/O,/O where/O her/O
husband/O was/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON drove/O straight/O to/O the/O Karenins/O'/O./O He/O ran/O up/O the/O
stairs/O seeing/O no/O one/O and/O nothing/O,/O and/O with/O a/O rapid/O step/O,/O almost/O breaking/O
into/O a/O run/O,/O he/O went/O into/O her/O room/O./O And/O without/O considering/O,/O without/O
noticing/O whether/O there/O was/O anyone/O in/O the/O room/O or/O not/O,/O he/O flung/O his/O arms/O
round/O her/O,/O and/O began/O to/O cover/O her/O face/O,/O her/O hands/O,/O her/O neck/O with/O kisses/O./O

Anna/PERSON had/O been/O preparing/O herself/O for/O this/O meeting/O,/O had/O thought/O what/O she/O
would/O say/O to/O him/O,/O but/O she/O did/O not/O succeed/O in/O saying/O anything/O of/O it/O;/O his/O
passion/O mastered/O her/O./O She/O tried/O to/O calm/O him/O,/O to/O calm/O herself/O,/O but/O it/O was/O
too/O late/O./O His/O feeling/O infected/O her/O./O Her/O lips/O trembled/O so/O that/O for/O a/O long/O
while/O she/O could/O say/O nothing/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O have/O conquered/O me/O,/O and/O I/O am/O yours/O,/O''/O she/O said/O at/O last/O,/O pressing/O
his/O hands/O to/O her/O bosom/O./O

``/OSo/O it/O had/O to/O be/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OSo/O long/O as/O we/O live/O,/O it/O must/O be/O so/O./O I/O know/O
it/O now/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O true/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O getting/O whiter/O and/O whiter/O,/O and/O embracing/O his/O
head/O./O ``/OStill/O there/O is/O something/O terrible/O in/O it/O after/O all/O that/O has/O
happened/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O will/O all/O pass/O,/O it/O will/O all/O pass/O;/O we/O shall/O be/O so/O happy/O./O Our/O love/O,/O if/O
it/O could/O be/O stronger/O,/O will/O be/O strengthened/O by/O there/O being/O something/O
terrible/O in/O it/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O lifting/O his/O head/O and/O parting/O his/O strong/O teeth/O
in/O a/O smile/O./O

And/O she/O could/O not/O but/O respond/O with/O a/O smile/O--/Onot/O to/O his/O words/O,/O but/O to/O the/O
love/O in/O his/O eyes/O./O She/O took/O his/O hand/O and/O stroked/O her/O chilled/O cheeks/O and/O
cropped/O head/O with/O it/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O you/O with/O this/O short/O hair/O./O You/O've/O grown/O so/O pretty/O./O A/O boy/O./O
But/O how/O pale/O you/O are/O!/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O'm/O very/O weak/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O smiling/O./O And/O her/O lips/O began/O trembling/O
again/O./O

``/OWe/O'll/O go/O to/O Italy/LOCATION;/O you/O will/O get/O strong/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OCan/O it/O be/O possible/O we/O could/O be/O like/O husband/O and/O wife/O,/O alone/O,/O your/O
family/O with/O you/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O looking/O close/O into/O his/O eyes/O./O

``/OIt/O only/O seems/O strange/O to/O me/O that/O it/O can/O ever/O have/O been/O otherwise/O./O''/O

``/OStiva/PERSON says/O that/O _/Ohe/O_/O has/O agreed/O to/O everything/O,/O but/O I/O ca/On't/O accept/O _/Ohis/O_/O
generosity/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O looking/O dreamily/O past/O Vronsky/O's/O face/O./O ``/OI/O do/On't/O
want/O a/O divorce/O;/O it/O's/O all/O the/O same/O to/O me/O now/O./O Only/O I/O do/On't/O know/O what/O he/O
will/O decide/O about/O Seryozha/PERSON./O''/O

He/O could/O not/O conceive/O how/O at/O this/O moment/O of/O their/O meeting/O she/O could/O
remember/O and/O think/O of/O her/O son/O,/O of/O divorce/O./O What/O did/O it/O all/O matter/O?/O

``/ODo/On't/O speak/O of/O that/O,/O do/On't/O think/O of/O it/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O turning/O her/O hand/O in/O
his/O,/O and/O trying/O to/O draw/O her/O attention/O to/O him/O;/O but/O still/O she/O did/O not/O look/O
at/O him/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O why/O did/On't/O I/O die/O!/O it/O would/O have/O been/O better/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O silent/O
tears/O flowed/O down/O both/O her/O cheeks/O;/O but/O she/O tried/O to/O smile/O,/O so/O as/O not/O to/O
wound/O him/O./O

To/O decline/O the/O flattering/O and/O dangerous/O appointment/O at/O Tashkend/LOCATION would/O
have/O been/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O till/O then/O considered/O,/O disgraceful/O and/O impossible/O./O
But/O now/O,/O without/O an/O instant/O's/O consideration/O,/O he/O declined/O it/O,/O and/O
observing/O dissatisfaction/O in/O the/O most/O exalted/O quarters/O at/O this/O step/O,/O he/O
immediately/O retired/O from/O the/O army/O./O

A/O month/O later/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O left/O alone/O with/O his/O son/O in/O his/O
house/O at/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O while/O Anna/PERSON and/O Vronsky/O had/O gone/O abroad/O,/O not/O having/O
obtained/O a/O divorce/O,/O but/O having/O absolutely/O declined/O all/O idea/O of/O one/O./O




PART/O FIVE/O



Chapter/O 1/O


Princess/O Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON considered/O that/O it/O was/O out/O of/O the/O question/O for/O
the/O wedding/O to/O take/O place/O before/O Lent/O,/O just/O five/O weeks/O off/O,/O since/O not/O
half/O the/O trousseau/O could/O possibly/O be/O ready/O by/O that/O time/O./O But/O she/O could/O
not/O but/O agree/O with/O Levin/PERSON that/O to/O fix/O it/O for/O after/O Lent/O would/O be/O putting/O
it/O off/O too/O late/O,/O as/O an/O old/O aunt/O of/O Prince/O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON's/O was/O seriously/O
ill/O and/O might/O die/O,/O and/O then/O the/O mourning/O would/O delay/O the/O wedding/O still/O
longer/O./O And/O therefore/O,/O deciding/O to/O divide/O the/O trousseau/O into/O two/O parts/O--/Oa/O
larger/O and/O smaller/O trousseau/O--/Othe/O princess/O consented/O to/O have/O the/O wedding/O
before/O Lent/O./O She/O determined/O that/O she/O would/O get/O the/O smaller/O part/O of/O the/O
trousseau/O all/O ready/O now/O,/O and/O the/O larger/O part/O should/O be/O made/O later/O,/O and/O
she/O was/O much/O vexed/O with/O Levin/PERSON because/O he/O was/O incapable/O of/O giving/O her/O a/O
serious/O answer/O to/O the/O question/O whether/O he/O agreed/O to/O this/O arrangement/O or/O
