not/O./O The/O arrangement/O was/O the/O more/O suitable/O as/O,/O immediately/O after/O the/O
wedding/O,/O the/O young/O people/O were/O to/O go/O to/O the/O country/O,/O where/O the/O more/O
important/O part/O of/O the/O trousseau/O would/O not/O be/O wanted/O./O

Levin/PERSON still/O continued/O in/O the/O same/O delirious/O condition/O in/O which/O it/O seemed/O
to/O him/O that/O he/O and/O his/O happiness/O constituted/O the/O chief/O and/O sole/O aim/O of/O
all/O existence/O,/O and/O that/O he/O need/O not/O now/O think/O or/O care/O about/O anything/O,/O
that/O everything/O was/O being/O done/O and/O would/O be/O done/O for/O him/O by/O others/O./O He/O
had/O not/O even/O plans/O and/O aims/O for/O the/O future/O,/O he/O left/O its/O arrangement/O to/O
others/O,/O knowing/O that/O everything/O would/O be/O delightful/O./O His/O brother/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O and/O the/O princess/O guided/O him/O in/O doing/O
what/O he/O had/O to/O do/O./O All/O he/O did/O was/O to/O agree/O entirely/O with/O everything/O
suggested/O to/O him/O./O His/O brother/O raised/O money/O for/O him/O,/O the/O princess/O advised/O
him/O to/O leave/O Moscow/LOCATION after/O the/O wedding/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON advised/O him/O
to/O go/O abroad/O./O He/O agreed/O to/O everything/O./O ``/ODo/O what/O you/O choose/O,/O if/O it/O amuses/O
you/O./O I/O'm/O happy/O,/O and/O my/O happiness/O can/O be/O no/O greater/O and/O no/O less/O for/O
anything/O you/O do/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O When/O he/O told/O Kitty/PERSON of/PERSON Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O advice/O that/O they/O should/O go/O abroad/O,/O he/O was/O much/O surprised/O
that/O she/O did/O not/O agree/O to/O this/O,/O and/O had/O some/O definite/O requirements/O of/O
her/O own/O in/O regard/O to/O their/O future/O./O She/O knew/O Levin/PERSON had/O work/O he/O loved/O in/O
the/O country/O./O She/O did/O not/O,/O as/O he/O saw/O,/O understand/O this/O work/O,/O she/O did/O not/O
even/O care/O to/O understand/O it/O./O But/O that/O did/O not/O prevent/O her/O from/O regarding/O
it/O as/O a/O matter/O of/O great/O importance/O./O And/O then/O she/O knew/O their/O home/O would/O
be/O in/O the/O country/O,/O and/O she/O wanted/O to/O go/O,/O not/O abroad/O where/O she/O was/O not/O
going/O to/O live/O,/O but/O to/O the/O place/O where/O their/O home/O would/O be/O./O This/O
definitely/O expressed/O purpose/O astonished/O Levin/PERSON./O But/O since/O he/O did/O not/O care/O
either/O way/O,/O he/O immediately/O asked/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O as/O though/O it/O were/O
his/O duty/O,/O to/O go/O down/O to/O the/O country/O and/O to/O arrange/O everything/O there/O to/O
the/O best/O of/O his/O ability/O with/O the/O taste/O of/O which/O he/O had/O so/O much/O./O

``/OBut/O I/O say/O,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O to/O him/O one/O day/O after/O he/O had/O come/O
back/O from/O the/O country/O,/O where/O he/O had/O got/O everything/O ready/O for/O the/O young/O
people/O's/O arrival/O,/O ``/Ohave/O you/O a/O certificate/O of/O having/O been/O at/O confession/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O./O But/O what/O of/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O ca/On't/O be/O married/O without/O it/O./O''/O

''/O_/OAïe/O,/O aïe/O,/O aïe/O!/O_/O''/O cried/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OWhy/O,/O I/O believe/O it/O's/O nine/O years/O since/O
I/O've/O taken/O the/O sacrament/O!/O I/O never/O thought/O of/O it/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O a/O pretty/O fellow/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON laughing/O,/O ``/Oand/O you/O
call/O me/O a/O Nihilist/O!/O But/O this/O wo/On't/O do/O,/O you/O know/O./O You/O must/O take/O the/O
sacrament/O./O''/O

``/OWhen/O?/O There/O are/O four/O days/O left/O now/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON arranged/O this/O also/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON had/O to/O go/O to/O
confession/O./O To/O Levin/PERSON,/O as/O to/O any/O unbeliever/O who/O respects/O the/O beliefs/O of/O
others/O,/O it/O was/O exceedingly/O disagreeable/O to/O be/O present/O at/O and/O take/O part/O
in/O church/O ceremonies/O./O At/O this/O moment/O,/O in/O his/O present/O softened/O state/O of/O
feeling/O,/O sensitive/O to/O everything/O,/O this/O inevitable/O act/O of/O hypocrisy/O was/O
not/O merely/O painful/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O utterly/O impossible/O./O Now/O,/O
in/O the/O heyday/O of/O his/O highest/O glory/O,/O his/O fullest/O flower/O,/O he/O would/O have/O to/O
be/O a/O liar/O or/O a/O scoffer/O./O He/O felt/O incapable/O of/O being/O either/O./O But/O though/O he/O
repeatedly/O plied/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON with/O questions/O as/O to/O the/O
possibility/O of/O obtaining/O a/O certificate/O without/O actually/O communicating/O,/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON maintained/O that/O it/O was/O out/O of/O the/O question/O./O

``/OBesides/O,/O what/O is/O it/O to/O you/O--/Otwo/O days/O?/O And/O he/O's/O an/O awfully/O nice/O clever/O
old/O fellow/O./O He/O'll/O pull/O the/O tooth/O out/O for/O you/O so/O gently/O,/O you/O wo/On't/O notice/O
it/O./O''/O

Standing/O at/O the/O first/O litany/O,/O Levin/PERSON attempted/O to/O revive/O in/O himself/O his/O
youthful/O recollections/O of/O the/O intense/O religious/O emotion/O he/O had/O passed/O
through/O between/O the/O ages/O of/O sixteen/O and/O seventeen/O./O

But/O he/O was/O at/O once/O convinced/O that/O it/O was/O utterly/O impossible/O to/O him/O./O He/O
attempted/O to/O look/O at/O it/O all/O as/O an/O empty/O custom/O,/O having/O no/O sort/O of/O
meaning/O,/O like/O the/O custom/O of/O paying/O calls/O./O But/O he/O felt/O that/O he/O could/O not/O
do/O that/O either/O./O Levin/PERSON found/O himself/O,/O like/O the/O majority/O of/O his/O
contemporaries/O,/O in/O the/O vaguest/O position/O in/O regard/O to/O religion/O./O Believe/O
he/O could/O not/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O he/O had/O no/O firm/O conviction/O that/O it/O was/O
all/O wrong/O./O And/O consequently/O,/O not/O being/O able/O to/O believe/O in/O the/O
significance/O of/O what/O he/O was/O doing/O nor/O to/O regard/O it/O with/O indifference/O as/O
an/O empty/O formality/O,/O during/O the/O whole/O period/O of/O preparing/O for/O the/O
sacrament/O he/O was/O conscious/O of/O a/O feeling/O of/O discomfort/O and/O shame/O at/O doing/O
what/O he/O did/O not/O himself/O understand/O,/O and/O what/O,/O as/O an/O inner/O voice/O told/O
him/O,/O was/O therefore/O false/O and/O wrong/O./O

During/O the/O service/O he/O would/O first/O listen/O to/O the/O prayers/O,/O trying/O to/O
attach/O some/O meaning/O to/O them/O not/O discordant/O with/O his/O own/O views/O;/O then/O
feeling/O that/O he/O could/O not/O understand/O and/O must/O condemn/O them/O,/O he/O tried/O not/O
to/O listen/O to/O them/O,/O but/O to/O attend/O to/O the/O thoughts/O,/O observations/O,/O and/O
memories/O which/O floated/O through/O his/O brain/O with/O extreme/O vividness/O during/O
this/O idle/O time/O of/O standing/O in/O church/O./O

He/O had/O stood/O through/O the/O litany/O,/O the/O evening/O service/O and/O the/O midnight/O
service/O,/O and/O the/O next/O day/O he/O got/O up/O earlier/O than/O usual/O,/O and/O without/O
having/O tea/O went/O at/O eight/O o'clock/O in/O the/O morning/O to/O the/O church/O for/O the/O
morning/O service/O and/O the/O confession/O./O

There/O was/O no/O one/O in/O the/O church/O but/O a/O beggar/O soldier/O,/O two/O old/O women/O,/O and/O
the/O church/O officials/O./O A/O young/O deacon/O,/O whose/O long/O back/O showed/O in/O two/O
distinct/O halves/O through/O his/O thin/O undercassock/O,/O met/O him/O,/O and/O at/O once/O
going/O to/O a/O little/O table/O at/O the/O wall/O read/O the/O exhortation/O./O During/O the/O
reading/O,/O especially/O at/O the/O frequent/O and/O rapid/O repetition/O of/O the/O same/O
words/O,/O ``/OLord/O,/O have/O mercy/O on/O us/O!/O''/O which/O resounded/O with/O an/O echo/O,/O Levin/PERSON
felt/O that/O thought/O was/O shut/O and/O sealed/O up/O,/O and/O that/O it/O must/O not/O be/O
touched/O or/O stirred/O now/O or/O confusion/O would/O be/O the/O result/O;/O and/O so/O standing/O
behind/O the/O deacon/O he/O went/O on/O thinking/O of/O his/O own/O affairs/O,/O neither/O
listening/O nor/O examining/O what/O was/O said/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O wonderful/O what/O expression/O
there/O is/O in/O her/O hand/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O remembering/O how/O they/O had/O been/O sitting/O
the/O day/O before/O at/O a/O corner/O table/O./O They/O had/O nothing/O to/O talk/O about/O,/O as/O was/O
almost/O always/O the/O case/O at/O this/O time/O,/O and/O laying/O her/O hand/O on/O the/O table/O
she/O kept/O opening/O and/O shutting/O it/O,/O and/O laughed/O herself/O as/O she/O watched/O her/O
action/O./O He/O remembered/O how/O he/O had/O kissed/O it/O and/O then/O had/O examined/O the/O
lines/O on/O the/O pink/O palm/O./O ``/OHave/O mercy/O on/O us/O again/O!/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O
crossing/O himself/O,/O bowing/O,/O and/O looking/O at/O the/O supple/O spring/O of/O the/O
deacon/O's/O back/O bowing/O before/O him/O./O ``/OShe/O took/O my/O hand/O then/O and/O examined/O the/O
lines/O `/OYou/O've/O got/O a/O splendid/O hand/O,/O'/O she/O said/O./O''/O And/O he/O looked/O at/O his/O own/O
hand/O and/O the/O short/O hand/O of/O the/O deacon/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O now/O it/O will/O soon/O be/O over/O,/O''/O
he/O thought/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O it/O seems/O to/O be/O beginning/O again/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O listening/O
to/O the/O prayers/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O it/O's/O just/O ending/O:/O there/O he/O is/O bowing/O down/O to/O the/O
ground/O./O That/O's/O always/O at/O the/O end/O./O''/O

The/O deacon/O's/O hand/O in/O a/O plush/O cuff/O accepted/O a/O three-rouble/O note/O
unobtrusively/O,/O and/O the/O deacon/O said/O he/O would/O put/O it/O down/O in/O the/O register/O,/O
and/O his/O new/O boots/O creaking/O jauntily/O over/O the/O flagstones/O of/O the/O empty/O
church/O,/O he/O went/O to/O the/O altar/O./O A/O moment/O later/O he/O peeped/O out/O thence/O and/O
beckoned/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O Thought/O,/O till/O then/O locked/O up/O,/O began/O to/O stir/O in/O
Levin/PERSON's/O head/O,/O but/O he/O made/O haste/O to/O drive/O it/O away/O./O ``/OIt/O will/O come/O right/O
somehow/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O and/O went/O towards/O the/O altar-rails/O./O He/O went/O up/O the/O
steps/O,/O and/O turning/O to/O the/O right/O saw/O the/O priest/O./O The/O priest/O,/O a/O little/O old/O
man/O with/O a/O scanty/O grizzled/O beard/O and/O weary/O,/O good-natured/O eyes/O,/O was/O
standing/O at/O the/O altar-rails/O,/O turning/O over/O the/O pages/O of/O a/O missal/O./O With/O a/O
slight/O bow/O to/O Levin/PERSON he/O began/O immediately/O reading/O prayers/O in/O the/O official/O
voice/O./O When/O he/O had/O finished/O them/O he/O bowed/O down/O to/O the/O ground/O and/O turned/O,/O
facing/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OChrist/O is/O present/O here/O unseen/O,/O receiving/O your/O confession/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
pointing/O to/O the/O crucifix/O./O ``/ODo/O you/O believe/O in/O all/O the/O doctrines/O of/O the/O
Holy/O Apostolic/O Church/O?/O''/O the/O priest/O went/O on/O,/O turning/O his/O eyes/O away/O from/O
Levin/PERSON's/O face/O and/O folding/O his/O hands/O under/O his/O stole/O./O

``/OI/O have/O doubted/O,/O I/O doubt/O everything/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON in/O a/O voice/O that/O jarred/O
on/O himself/O,/O and/O he/O ceased/O speaking/O./O

The/O priest/O waited/O a/O few/O seconds/O to/O see/O if/O he/O would/O not/O say/O more/O,/O and/O
closing/O his/O eyes/O he/O said/O quickly/O,/O with/O a/O broad/O,/O Vladimirsky/PERSON accent/O:/O

``/ODoubt/O is/O natural/O to/O the/O weakness/O of/O mankind/O,/O but/O we/O must/O pray/O that/O God/O
in/O His/O mercy/O will/O strengthen/O us/O./O What/O are/O your/O special/O sins/O?/O''/O he/O added/O,/O
without/O the/O slightest/O interval/O,/O as/O though/O anxious/O not/O to/O waste/O time/O./O

``/OMy/O chief/O sin/O is/O doubt/O./O I/O have/O doubts/O of/O everything/O,/O and/O for/O the/O most/O
part/O I/O am/O in/O doubt/O./O''/O

``/ODoubt/O is/O natural/O to/O the/O weakness/O of/O mankind/O,/O''/O the/O priest/O repeated/O the/O
same/O words/O./O ``/OWhat/O do/O you/O doubt/O about/O principally/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O doubt/O of/O everything/O./O I/O sometimes/O even/O have/O doubts/O of/O the/O existence/O of/O
God/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O help/O saying/O,/O and/O he/O was/O horrified/O at/O the/O
impropriety/O of/O what/O he/O was/O saying/O./O But/O Levin/PERSON's/O words/O did/O not/O,/O it/O seemed/O,/O
make/O much/O impression/O on/O the/O priest/O./O

``/OWhat/O sort/O of/O doubt/O can/O there/O be/O of/O the/O existence/O of/O God/O?/O''/O he/O said/O
hurriedly/O,/O with/O a/O just/O perceptible/O smile/O./O

Levin/PERSON did/O not/O speak/O./O

``/OWhat/O doubt/O can/O you/O have/O of/O the/O Creator/O when/O you/O behold/O His/O creation/O?/O''/O
the/O priest/O went/O on/O in/O the/O rapid/O customary/O jargon/O./O ``/OWho/O has/O decked/O the/O
heavenly/O firmament/O with/O its/O lights/O?/O Who/O has/O clothed/O the/O earth/O in/O its/O
beauty/O?/O How/O explain/O it/O without/O the/O Creator/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O
inquiringly/O at/O Levin/PERSON./O

Levin/PERSON felt/O that/O it/O would/O be/O improper/O to/O enter/O upon/O a/O metaphysical/O
discussion/O with/O the/O priest/O,/O and/O so/O he/O said/O in/O reply/O merely/O what/O was/O a/O
direct/O answer/O to/O the/O question/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O know/O!/O Then/O how/O can/O you/O doubt/O that/O God/O created/O all/O?/O''/O the/O
priest/O said/O,/O with/O good-humored/O perplexity/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O understand/O it/O at/O all/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O blushing/O,/O and/O feeling/O that/O
his/O words/O were/O stupid/O,/O and/O that/O they/O could/O not/O be/O anything/O but/O stupid/O in/O
such/O a/O position/O./O

``/OPray/O to/O God/O and/O beseech/O Him/O./O Even/O the/O holy/O fathers/O had/O doubts/O,/O and/O
prayed/O to/O God/O to/O strengthen/O their/O faith/O./O The/O devil/O has/O great/O power/O,/O and/O
we/O must/O resist/O him/O./O Pray/O to/O God/O,/O beseech/O Him/O./O Pray/O to/O God/O,/O''/O he/O repeated/O
hurriedly/O./O

The/O priest/O paused/O for/O some/O time/O,/O as/O though/O meditating/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O about/O,/O I/O hear/O,/O to/O marry/O the/O daughter/O of/O my/O parishioner/O and/O son/O
in/O the/O spirit/O,/O Prince/O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON?/O''/O he/O resumed/O,/O with/O a/O smile/O./O ``/OAn/O
excellent/O young/O lady/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O blushing/O for/O the/O priest/O./O ``/OWhat/O does/O he/O want/O to/O
ask/O me/O about/O this/O at/O confession/O for/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

And/O,/O as/O though/O answering/O his/O thought/O,/O the/O priest/O said/O to/O him/O:/O

``/OYou/O are/O about/O to/O enter/O into/O holy/O matrimony/O,/O and/O God/O may/O bless/O you/O with/O
offspring/O./O Well/O,/O what/O sort/O of/O bringing-up/O can/O you/O give/O your/O babes/O if/O you/O
do/O not/O overcome/O the/O temptation/O of/O the/O devil/O,/O enticing/O you/O to/O
infidelity/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O gentle/O reproachfulness/O./O ``/OIf/O you/O love/O your/O
child/O as/O a/O good/O father/O,/O you/O will/O not/O desire/O only/O wealth/O,/O luxury/O,/O honor/O
for/O your/O infant/O;/O you/O will/O be/O anxious/O for/O his/O salvation/O,/O his/O spiritual/O
enlightenment/O with/O the/O light/O of/O truth/O./O Eh/O?/O What/O answer/O will/O you/O make/O him/O
when/O the/O innocent/O babe/O asks/O you/O:/O `/OPapa/O!/O who/O made/O all/O that/O enchants/O me/O in/O
this/O world/O--/Othe/O earth/O,/O the/O waters/O,/O the/O sun/O,/O the/O flowers/O,/O the/O grass/O?/O'/O Can/O
you/O say/O to/O him/O:/O `/OI/O do/On't/O know/O'/O?/O You/O can/Onot/O but/O know/O,/O since/O the/O Lord/O God/O
in/O His/O infinite/O mercy/O has/O revealed/O it/O to/O us/O./O Or/O your/O child/O will/O ask/O you/O:/O
`/OWhat/O awaits/O me/O in/O the/O life/O beyond/O the/O tomb/O?/O'/O What/O will/O you/O say/O to/O him/O
when/O you/O know/O nothing/O?/O How/O will/O you/O answer/O him/O?/O Will/O you/O leave/O him/O to/O
the/O allurements/O of/O the/O world/O and/O the/O devil/O?/O That/O's/O not/O right/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
and/O he/O stopped/O,/O putting/O his/O head/O on/O one/O side/O and/O looking/O at/O Levin/PERSON with/O
his/O kindly/O,/O gentle/O eyes/O./O

Levin/PERSON made/O no/O answer/O this/O time/O,/O not/O because/O he/O did/O not/O want/O to/O enter/O
upon/O a/O discussion/O with/O the/O priest/O,/O but/O because/O,/O so/O far/O,/O no/O one/O had/O ever/O
asked/O him/O such/O questions/O,/O and/O when/O his/O babes/O did/O ask/O him/O those/O
questions/O,/O it/O would/O be/O time/O enough/O to/O think/O about/O answering/O them/O./O

``/OYou/O are/O entering/O upon/O a/O time/O of/O life/O,/O''/O pursued/O the/O priest/O,/O ``/Owhen/O you/O
must/O choose/O your/O path/O and/O keep/O to/O it/O./O Pray/O to/O God/O that/O He/O may/O in/O His/O
mercy/O aid/O you/O and/O have/O mercy/O on/O you/O!/O''/O he/O concluded/O./O ``/OOur/O Lord/O and/O God/O,/O
Jesus/PERSON Christ/PERSON,/O in/O the/O abundance/O and/O riches/O of/O His/O lovingkindness/O,/O
forgives/O this/O child/O.../O''/O and/O,/O finishing/O the/O prayer/O of/O absolution/O,/O the/O
priest/O blessed/O him/O and/O dismissed/O him/O./O

On/O getting/O home/O that/O day/O,/O Levin/PERSON had/O a/O delightful/O sense/O of/O relief/O at/O the/O
awkward/O position/O being/O over/O and/O having/O been/O got/O through/O without/O his/O
having/O to/O tell/O a/O lie/O./O Apart/O from/O this/O,/O there/O remained/O a/O vague/O memory/O
that/O what/O the/O kind/O,/O nice/O old/O fellow/O had/O said/O had/O not/O been/O at/O all/O so/O
stupid/O as/O he/O had/O fancied/O at/O first/O,/O and/O that/O there/O was/O something/O in/O it/O
that/O must/O be/O cleared/O up/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O,/O not/O now/O,/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Obut/O some/O day/O later/O on/O./O''/O Levin/PERSON felt/O
more/O than/O ever/O now/O that/O there/O was/O something/O not/O clear/O and/O not/O clean/O in/O
his/O soul/O,/O and/O that/O,/O in/O regard/O to/O religion/O,/O he/O was/O in/O the/O same/O position/O
which/O he/O perceived/O so/O clearly/O and/O disliked/O in/O others/O,/O and/O for/O which/O he/O
blamed/O his/O friend/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O

Levin/PERSON spent/O that/O evening/O with/O his/O betrothed/O at/O Dolly/PERSON's/O,/O and/O was/O in/O very/O
high/O spirits/O./O To/O explain/O to/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON the/O state/O of/O excitement/O
in/O which/O he/O found/O himself/O,/O he/O said/O that/O he/O was/O happy/O like/O a/O dog/O being/O
trained/O to/O jump/O through/O a/O hoop/O,/O who/O,/O having/O at/O last/O caught/O the/O idea/O,/O and/O
done/O what/O was/O required/O of/O him/O,/O whines/O and/O wags/O its/O tail/O,/O and/O jumps/O up/O to/O
the/O table/O and/O the/O windows/O in/O its/O delight/O./O



Chapter/O 2/O


On/O the/O day/O of/O the/O wedding/O,/O according/O to/O the/O Russian/O custom/O -LRB-/Othe/O princess/O
and/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON insisted/O on/O strictly/O keeping/O all/O the/O customs/O-RRB-/O,/O
Levin/PERSON did/O not/O see/O his/O betrothed/O,/O and/O dined/O at/O his/O hotel/O with/O three/O
bachelor/O friends/O,/O casually/O brought/O together/O at/O his/O rooms/O./O These/O were/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O a/O university/O friend/O,/O now/O professor/O of/O
natural/O science/O,/O whom/O Levin/PERSON had/O met/O in/O the/O street/O and/O insisted/O on/O taking/O
home/O with/O him/O,/O and/O Tchirikov/PERSON,/O his/O best/O man/O,/O a/O Moscow/LOCATION conciliation-board/O
judge/O,/O Levin/PERSON's/O companion/O in/O his/O bear-hunts/O./O The/O dinner/O was/O a/O very/O merry/O
one/O:/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O in/O his/O happiest/O mood/O,/O and/O was/O much/O amused/O by/O
Katavasov/PERSON's/O originality/O./O Katavasov/PERSON,/O feeling/O his/O originality/O was/O
appreciated/O and/O understood/O,/O made/O the/O most/O of/O it/O./O Tchirikov/PERSON always/O gave/O a/O
lively/O and/O good-humored/O support/O to/O conversation/O of/O any/O sort/O./O

``/OSee/O,/O now/O,/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O drawling/O his/O words/O from/O a/O habit/O acquired/O in/O
the/O lecture-room/O,/O ``/Owhat/O a/O capable/O fellow/O was/O our/O friend/O Konstantin/PERSON
Dmitrievitch/PERSON./O I/O'm/O not/O speaking/O of/O present/O company/O,/O for/O he/O's/O absent/O./O At/O
the/O time/O he/O left/O the/O university/O he/O was/O fond/O of/O science/O,/O took/O an/O interest/O
in/O humanity/O;/O now/O one-half/O of/O his/O abilities/O is/O devoted/O to/O deceiving/O
himself/O,/O and/O the/O other/O to/O justifying/O the/O deceit/O./O''/O

``/OA/O more/O determined/O enemy/O of/O matrimony/O than/O you/O I/O never/O saw/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O an/O enemy/O of/O matrimony/O./O I/O'm/O in/O favor/O of/O division/O of/O
labor/O./O People/O who/O can/O do/O nothing/O else/O ought/O to/O rear/O people/O while/O the/O
rest/O work/O for/O their/O happiness/O and/O enlightenment/O./O That/O's/O how/O I/O look/O at/O
it/O./O To/O muddle/O up/O two/O trades/O is/O the/O error/O of/O the/O amateur/O;/O I/O'm/O not/O one/O of/O
their/O number/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O happy/O I/O shall/O be/O when/O I/O hear/O that/O you/O're/O in/O love/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O
``/OPlease/O invite/O me/O to/O the/O wedding/O./O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O in/O love/O now/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O with/O a/O cuttlefish/O!/O You/O know/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON turned/O to/O his/O brother/O,/O ``/OMihail/PERSON
Semyonovitch/PERSON is/O writing/O a/O work/O on/O the/O digestive/O organs/O of/O the/O.../O''/O

``/ONow/O,/O make/O a/O muddle/O of/O it/O!/O It/O does/On't/O matter/O what/O about/O./O And/O the/O fact/O
is/O,/O I/O certainly/O do/O love/O cuttlefish/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O that/O's/O no/O hindrance/O to/O your/O loving/O your/O wife/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O cuttlefish/O is/O no/O hindrance/O./O The/O wife/O is/O the/O hindrance/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O so/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O you/O'll/O see/O!/O You/O care/O about/O farming/O,/O hunting/O,/O--/Owell/O,/O you/O'd/O better/O
look/O out/O!/O''/O

``/OArhip/PERSON was/O here/O today/O;/O he/O said/O there/O were/O a/O lot/O of/O elks/O in/O Prudno/LOCATION,/O and/O
two/O bears/O,/O''/O said/O Tchirikov/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O must/O go/O and/O get/O them/O without/O me/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O that/O's/O the/O truth/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O ``/OAnd/O you/O may/O say/O
good-bye/O to/O bear-hunting/O for/O the/O future/O--/Oyour/O wife/O wo/On't/O allow/O it/O!/O''/O

Levin/PERSON smiled/O./O The/O picture/O of/O his/O wife/O not/O letting/O him/O go/O was/O so/O pleasant/O
that/O he/O was/O ready/O to/O renounce/O the/O delights/O of/O looking/O upon/O bears/O
forever/O./O

``/OStill/O,/O it/O's/O a/O pity/O they/O should/O get/O those/O two/O bears/O without/O you/O./O Do/O you/O
remember/O last/O time/O at/O Hapilovo/LOCATION?/O That/O was/O a/O delightful/O hunt/O!/O''/O said/O
Tchirikov/PERSON./O

Levin/PERSON had/O not/O the/O heart/O to/O disillusion/O him/O of/O the/O notion/O that/O there/O
could/O be/O something/O delightful/O apart/O from/O her/O,/O and/O so/O said/O nothing/O./O

``/OThere/O's/O some/O sense/O in/O this/O custom/O of/O saying/O good-bye/O to/O bachelor/O life/O,/O''/O
said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O ``/OHowever/O happy/O you/O may/O be/O,/O you/O must/O regret/O your/O
freedom/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O confess/O there/O is/O a/O feeling/O that/O you/O want/O to/O jump/O out/O of/O the/O window/O,/O
like/O Gogol/PERSON's/O bridegroom/O?/O''/O

``/OOf/O course/O there/O is/O,/O but/O it/O is/On't/O confessed/O,/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O and/O he/O
broke/O into/O loud/O laughter/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O the/O window/O's/O open/O./O Let/O's/O start/O off/O this/O instant/O to/O Tver/LOCATION!/O
There/O's/O a/O big/O she-bear/O;/O one/O can/O go/O right/O up/O to/O the/O lair/O./O Seriously/O,/O
let/O's/O go/O by/O the/O five/O o'clock/O!/O And/O here/O let/O them/O do/O what/O they/O like/O,/O''/O said/O
Tchirikov/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O now/O,/O on/O my/O honor/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O smiling/O,/O ``/OI/O ca/On't/O find/O in/O my/O heart/O
that/O feeling/O of/O regret/O for/O my/O freedom/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O there/O's/O such/O a/O chaos/O in/O your/O heart/O just/O now/O that/O you/O ca/On't/O find/O
anything/O there/O,/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON./O ``/OWait/O a/O bit/O,/O when/O you/O set/O it/O to/O rights/O
a/O little/O,/O you/O'll/O find/O it/O!/O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O if/O so/O,/O I/O should/O have/O felt/O a/O little/O,/O apart/O from/O my/O feeling/O''/O -LRB-/Ohe/O
could/O not/O say/O love/O before/O them/O-RRB-/O ``/Oand/O happiness/O,/O a/O certain/O regret/O at/O
losing/O my/O freedom/O.../O./O On/O the/O contrary/O,/O I/O am/O glad/O at/O the/O very/O loss/O of/O my/O
freedom/O./O''/O

``/OAwful/O!/O It/O's/O a/O hopeless/O case/O!/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON./O ``/OWell/O,/O let/O's/O drink/O to/O his/O
recovery/O,/O or/O wish/O that/O a/O hundredth/O part/O of/O his/O dreams/O may/O be/O
realized/O--/Oand/O that/O would/O be/O happiness/O such/O as/O never/O has/O been/O seen/O on/O
earth/O!/O''/O

Soon/O after/O dinner/O the/O guests/O went/O away/O to/O be/O in/O time/O to/O be/O dressed/O for/O
the/O wedding/O./O

When/O he/O was/O left/O alone/O,/O and/O recalled/O the/O conversation/O of/O these/O bachelor/O
friends/O,/O Levin/PERSON asked/O himself/O:/O had/O he/O in/O his/O heart/O that/O regret/O for/O his/O
freedom/O of/O which/O they/O had/O spoken/O?/O He/O smiled/O at/O the/O question/O./O ``/OFreedom/O!/O
What/O is/O freedom/O for/O?/O Happiness/O is/O only/O in/O loving/O and/O wishing/O her/O wishes/O,/O
thinking/O her/O thoughts/O,/O that/O is/O to/O say/O,/O not/O freedom/O at/O all/O--/Othat/O's/O
happiness/O!/O''/O

``/OBut/O do/O I/O know/O her/O ideas/O,/O her/O wishes/O,/O her/O feelings/O?/O''/O some/O voice/O suddenly/O
whispered/O to/O him/O./O The/O smile/O died/O away/O from/O his/O face/O,/O and/O he/O grew/O
thoughtful/O./O And/O suddenly/O a/O strange/O feeling/O came/O upon/O him/O./O There/O came/O
over/O him/O a/O dread/O and/O doubt/O--/Odoubt/O of/O everything/O./O

``/OWhat/O if/O she/O does/O not/O love/O me/O?/O What/O if/O she/O's/O marrying/O me/O simply/O to/O be/O
married/O?/O What/O if/O she/O does/On't/O see/O herself/O what/O she/O's/O doing/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O
himself/O./O ``/OShe/O may/O come/O to/O her/O senses/O,/O and/O only/O when/O she/O is/O being/O married/O
realize/O that/O she/O does/O not/O and/O can/Onot/O love/O me/O./O''/O And/O strange/O,/O most/O evil/O
thoughts/O of/O her/O began/O to/O come/O to/O him/O./O He/O was/O jealous/O of/O Vronsky/O,/O as/O he/O
had/O been/O a/O year/O ago/O,/O as/O though/O the/O evening/O he/O had/O seen/O her/O with/O Vronsky/PERSON
had/O been/O yesterday/O./O He/O suspected/O she/O had/O not/O told/O him/O everything/O./O

He/O jumped/O up/O quickly/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O this/O ca/On't/O go/O on/O!/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O in/O
despair/O./O ``/OI/O'll/O go/O to/O her/O;/O I/O'll/O ask/O her/O;/O I/O'll/O say/O for/O the/O last/O time/O:/O we/O
are/O free/O,/O and/O had/On't/O we/O better/O stay/O so/O?/O Anything/O's/O better/O than/O endless/O
misery/O,/O disgrace/O,/O unfaithfulness/O!/O''/O With/O despair/O in/O his/O heart/O and/O bitter/O
anger/O against/O all/O men/O,/O against/O himself/O,/O against/O her/O,/O he/O went/O out/O of/O the/O
hotel/O and/O drove/O to/O her/O house/O./O

He/O found/O her/O in/O one/O of/O the/O back/O rooms/O./O She/O was/O sitting/O on/O a/O chest/O and/O
making/O some/O arrangements/O with/O her/O maid/O,/O sorting/O over/O heaps/O of/O dresses/O of/O
different/O colors/O,/O spread/O on/O the/O backs/O of/O chairs/O and/O on/O the/O floor/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O''/O she/O cried/O,/O seeing/O him/O,/O and/O beaming/O with/O delight/O./O ``/OKostya/PERSON!/O
Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON!/O''/O -LRB-/OThese/O latter/O days/O she/O used/O these/O names/O almost/O
alternately/O./O-RRB-/O ``/OI/O did/On't/O expect/O you/O!/O I/O'm/O going/O through/O my/O wardrobe/O to/O see/O
what/O's/O for/O whom/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O!/O that/O's/O very/O nice/O!/O''/O he/O said/O gloomily/O,/O looking/O at/O the/O maid/O./O

``/OYou/O can/O go/O,/O Dunyasha/O,/O I/O'll/O call/O you/O presently/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON./O ``/OKostya/PERSON,/O
what/O's/O the/O matter/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O,/O definitely/O adopting/O this/O familiar/O name/O as/O
soon/O as/O the/O maid/O had/O gone/O out/O./O She/O noticed/O his/O strange/O face/O,/O agitated/O
and/O gloomy/O,/O and/O a/O panic/O came/O over/O her/O./O

``/OKitty/O!/O I/O'm/O in/O torture/O./O I/O ca/On't/O suffer/O alone/O,/O''/O he/O said/O with/O despair/O in/O
his/O voice/O,/O standing/O before/O her/O and/O looking/O imploringly/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O He/O
saw/O already/O from/O her/O loving/O,/O truthful/O face/O,/O that/O nothing/O could/O come/O of/O
what/O he/O had/O meant/O to/O say/O,/O but/O yet/O he/O wanted/O her/O to/O reassure/O him/O herself/O./O
``/OI/O've/O come/O to/O say/O that/O there/O's/O still/O time/O./O This/O can/O all/O be/O stopped/O and/O
set/O right/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O?/O I/O do/On't/O understand/O./O What/O is/O the/O matter/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O I/O have/O said/O a/O thousand/O times/O over/O,/O and/O ca/On't/O help/O thinking/O .../O
that/O I/O'm/O not/O worthy/O of/O you/O./O You/O could/On't/O consent/O to/O marry/O me/O./O Think/O a/O
little/O./O You/O've/O made/O a/O mistake/O./O Think/O it/O over/O thoroughly/O./O You/O ca/On't/O love/O
me/O.../O./O If/O .../O better/O say/O so/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O not/O looking/O at/O her/O./O ``/OI/O shall/O be/O
wretched/O./O Let/O people/O say/O what/O they/O like/O;/O anything/O's/O better/O than/O
misery/O.../O./O Far/O better/O now/O while/O there/O's/O still/O time/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O understand/O,/O''/O she/O answered/O,/O panic-stricken/O;/O ``/Oyou/O mean/O you/O want/O
to/O give/O it/O up/O .../O do/On't/O want/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O if/O you/O do/On't/O love/O me/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O out/O of/O your/O mind/O!/O''/O she/O cried/O,/O turning/O crimson/O with/O vexation/O./O But/O
his/O face/O was/O so/O piteous/O,/O that/O she/O restrained/O her/O vexation/O,/O and/O flinging/O
some/O clothes/O off/O an/O arm-chair/O,/O she/O sat/O down/O beside/O him/O./O ``/OWhat/O are/O you/O
thinking/O?/O tell/O me/O all/O./O''/O

``/OI/O am/O thinking/O you/O ca/On't/O love/O me/O./O What/O can/O you/O love/O me/O for/O?/O''/O

``/OMy/O God/O!/O what/O can/O I/O do/O?/O.../O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O burst/O into/O tears/O./O

``/OOh/O!/O what/O have/O I/O done/O?/O''/O he/O cried/O,/O and/O kneeling/O before/O her/O,/O he/O fell/O to/O
kissing/O her/O hands/O./O

When/O the/O princess/O came/O into/O the/O room/O five/O minutes/O later/O,/O she/O found/O them/O
completely/O reconciled/O./O Kitty/PERSON had/O not/O simply/O assured/O him/O that/O she/O loved/O
him/O,/O but/O had/O gone/O so/O far/O--/Oin/O answer/O to/O his/O question/O,/O what/O she/O loved/O him/O
for/O--/Oas/O to/O explain/O what/O for/O./O She/O told/O him/O that/O she/O loved/O him/O because/O she/O
understood/O him/O completely/O,/O because/O she/O knew/O what/O he/O would/O like/O,/O and/O
because/O everything/O he/O liked/O was/O good/O./O And/O this/O seemed/O to/O him/O perfectly/O
clear/O./O When/O the/O princess/O came/O to/O them/O,/O they/O were/O sitting/O side/O by/O side/O on/O
the/O chest/O,/O sorting/O the/O dresses/O and/O disputing/O over/O Kitty/PERSON's/O wanting/O to/O
give/O Dunyasha/PERSON the/O brown/O dress/O she/O had/O been/O wearing/O when/O Levin/PERSON proposed/O
to/O her/O,/O while/O he/O insisted/O that/O that/O dress/O must/O never/O be/O given/O away/O,/O but/O
Dunyasha/PERSON must/O have/O the/O blue/O one/O./O

``/OHow/O is/O it/O you/O do/On't/O see/O?/O She/O's/O a/O brunette/O,/O and/O it/O wo/On't/O suit/O her/O.../O./O
I/O've/O worked/O it/O all/O out/O./O''/O

Hearing/O why/O he/O had/O come/O,/O the/O princess/O was/O half/O humorously/O,/O half/O
seriously/O angry/O with/O him/O,/O and/O sent/O him/O home/O to/O dress/O and/O not/O to/O hinder/O
Kitty/PERSON's/O hair-dressing/O,/O as/O Charles/PERSON the/O hair-dresser/O was/O just/O coming/O./O

``/OAs/O it/O is/O,/O she/O's/O been/O eating/O nothing/O lately/O and/O is/O losing/O her/O looks/O,/O and/O
then/O you/O must/O come/O and/O upset/O her/O with/O your/O nonsense/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O him/O./O
``/OGet/O along/O with/O you/O,/O my/O dear/O!/O''/O

Levin/PERSON,/O guilty/O and/O shamefaced/O,/O but/O pacified/O,/O went/O back/O to/O his/O hotel/O./O His/O
brother/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O all/O in/O full/O dress/O,/O
were/O waiting/O for/O him/O to/O bless/O him/O with/O the/O holy/O picture/O./O There/O was/O no/O
time/O to/O lose/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON had/O to/O drive/O home/O again/O to/O fetch/O her/O
curled/O and/O pomaded/O son/O,/O who/O was/O to/O carry/O the/O holy/O pictures/O after/O the/O
bride/O./O Then/O a/O carriage/O had/O to/O be/O sent/O for/O the/O best/O man/O,/O and/O another/O that/O
would/O take/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON away/O would/O have/O to/O be/O sent/O back/O.../O./O
Altogether/O there/O were/O a/O great/O many/O most/O complicated/O matters/O to/O be/O
considered/O and/O arranged/O./O One/O thing/O was/O unmistakable/O,/O that/O there/O must/O be/O
no/O delay/O,/O as/O it/O was/O already/O half-past/O six/O./O

Nothing/O special/O happened/O at/O the/O ceremony/O of/O benediction/O with/O the/O holy/O
picture/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON stood/O in/O a/O comically/O solemn/O pose/O beside/O his/O
wife/O,/O took/O the/O holy/O picture/O,/O and/O telling/O Levin/PERSON to/O bow/O down/O to/O the/O
ground/O,/O he/O blessed/O him/O with/O his/O kindly/O,/O ironical/O smile/O,/O and/O kissed/O him/O
three/O times/O;/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON did/O the/O same/O,/O and/O immediately/O was/O in/O a/O
hurry/O to/O get/O off/O,/O and/O again/O plunged/O into/O the/O intricate/O question/O of/O the/O
destinations/O of/O the/O various/O carriages/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O I/O'll/O tell/O you/O how/O we/O'll/O manage/O:/O you/O drive/O in/O our/O carriage/O to/O
fetch/O him/O,/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O if/O he/O'll/O be/O so/O good/O,/O will/O drive/O there/O
and/O then/O send/O his/O carriage/O./O''/O

``/OOf/O course/O;/O I/O shall/O be/O delighted/O./O''/O

``/OWe/O'll/O come/O on/O directly/O with/O him/O./O Are/O your/O things/O sent/O off/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O he/O told/O Kouzma/PERSON to/O put/O out/O his/O clothes/O for/O him/O
to/O dress/O./O



Chapter/O 3/O


A/O crowd/O of/O people/O,/O principally/O women/O,/O was/O thronging/O round/O the/O church/O
lighted/O up/O for/O the/O wedding/O./O Those/O who/O had/O not/O succeeded/O in/O getting/O into/O
the/O main/O entrance/O were/O crowding/O about/O the/O windows/O,/O pushing/O,/O wrangling/O,/O
and/O peeping/O through/O the/O gratings/O./O

More/O than/O twenty/O carriages/O had/O already/O been/O drawn/O up/O in/O ranks/O along/O the/O
street/O by/O the/O police/O./O A/O police/O officer/O,/O regardless/O of/O the/O frost/O,/O stood/O
at/O the/O entrance/O,/O gorgeous/O in/O his/O uniform/O./O More/O carriages/O were/O
continually/O driving/O up/O,/O and/O ladies/O wearing/O flowers/O and/O carrying/O their/O
trains/O,/O and/O men/O taking/O off/O their/O helmets/O or/O black/O hats/O kept/O walking/O into/O
the/O church/O./O Inside/O the/O church/O both/O lusters/O were/O already/O lighted/O,/O and/O all/O
the/O candles/O before/O the/O holy/O pictures/O./O The/O gilt/O on/O the/O red/O ground/O of/O the/O
holy/O picture-stand/O,/O and/O the/O gilt/O relief/O on/O the/O pictures/O,/O and/O the/O silver/O
of/O the/O lusters/O and/O candlesticks/O,/O and/O the/O stones/O of/O the/O floor/O,/O and/O the/O
rugs/O,/O and/O the/O banners/O above/O in/O the/O choir/O,/O and/O the/O steps/O of/O the/O altar/O,/O
and/O the/O old/O blackened/O books/O,/O and/O the/O cassocks/O and/O surplices/O--/Oall/O were/O
flooded/O with/O light/O./O On/O the/O right/O side/O of/O the/O warm/O church/O,/O in/O the/O crowd/O
of/O frock/O coats/O and/O white/O ties/O,/O uniforms/O and/O broadcloth/O,/O velvet/O,/O satin/O,/O
hair/O and/O flowers/O,/O bare/O shoulders/O and/O arms/O and/O long/O gloves/O,/O there/O was/O
discreet/O but/O lively/O conversation/O that/O echoed/O strangely/O in/O the/O high/O
cupola/O./O Every/O time/O there/O was/O heard/O the/O creak/O of/O the/O opened/O door/O the/O
conversation/O in/O the/O crowd/O died/O away/O,/O and/O everybody/O looked/O round/O
expecting/O to/O see/O the/O bride/O and/O bridegroom/O come/O in/O./O But/O the/O door/O had/O
opened/O more/O than/O ten/O times/O,/O and/O each/O time/O it/O was/O either/O a/O belated/O guest/O
or/O guests/O,/O who/O joined/O the/O circle/O of/O the/O invited/O on/O the/O right/O,/O or/O a/O
spectator/O,/O who/O had/O eluded/O or/O softened/O the/O police/O officer/O,/O and/O went/O to/O
join/O the/O crowd/O of/O outsiders/O on/O the/O left/O./O Both/O the/O guests/O and/O the/O outside/O
public/O had/O by/O now/O passed/O through/O all/O the/O phases/O of/O anticipation/O./O

At/O first/O they/O imagined/O that/O the/O bride/O and/O bridegroom/O would/O arrive/O
immediately/O,/O and/O attached/O no/O importance/O at/O all/O to/O their/O being/O late/O./O Then/O
they/O began/O to/O look/O more/O and/O more/O often/O towards/O the/O door/O,/O and/O to/O talk/O of/O
whether/O anything/O could/O have/O happened/O./O Then/O the/O long/O delay/O began/O to/O be/O
positively/O discomforting/O,/O and/O relations/O and/O guests/O tried/O to/O look/O as/O if/O
they/O were/O not/O thinking/O of/O the/O bridegroom/O but/O were/O engrossed/O in/O
conversation/O./O

The/O head/O deacon/O,/O as/O though/O to/O remind/O them/O of/O the/O value/O of/O his/O time/O,/O
coughed/O impatiently/O,/O making/O the/O window-panes/O quiver/O in/O their/O frames/O./O In/O
the/O choir/O the/O bored/O choristers/O could/O be/O heard/O trying/O their/O voices/O and/O
blowing/O their/O noses/O./O The/O priest/O was/O continually/O sending/O first/O the/O beadle/O
and/O then/O the/O deacon/O to/O find/O out/O whether/O the/O bridegroom/O had/O not/O come/O,/O
more/O and/O more/O often/O he/O went/O himself/O,/O in/O a/O lilac/O vestment/O and/O an/O
embroidered/O sash/O,/O to/O the/O side/O door/O,/O expecting/O to/O see/O the/O bridegroom/O./O At/O
last/O one/O of/O the/O ladies/O,/O glancing/O at/O her/O watch/O,/O said/O,/O ``/OIt/O really/O is/O
strange/O,/O though/O!/O''/O and/O all/O the/O guests/O became/O uneasy/O and/O began/O loudly/O
expressing/O their/O wonder/O and/O dissatisfaction/O./O One/O of/O the/O bridegroom/O's/O
best/O men/O went/O to/O find/O out/O what/O had/O happened/O./O Kitty/PERSON meanwhile/O had/O long/O
ago/O been/O quite/O ready/O,/O and/O in/O her/O white/O dress/O and/O long/O veil/O and/O wreath/O of/O
orange/O blossoms/O she/O was/O standing/O in/O the/O drawing-room/O of/O the/O
Shtcherbatskys/O'/O house/O with/O her/O sister/O,/O Madame/PERSON Lvova/PERSON,/O who/O was/O her/O
bridal-mother/O./O She/O was/O looking/O out/O of/O the/O window/O,/O and/O had/O been/O for/O over/O
half/O an/O hour/O anxiously/O expecting/O to/O hear/O from/O the/O best/O man/O that/O her/O
bridegroom/O was/O at/O the/O church/O./O

Levin/PERSON meanwhile/O,/O in/O his/O trousers/O,/O but/O without/O his/O coat/O and/O waistcoat/O,/O
was/O walking/O to/O and/O fro/O in/O his/O room/O at/O the/O hotel/O,/O continually/O putting/O his/O
head/O out/O of/O the/O door/O and/O looking/O up/O and/O down/O the/O corridor/O./O But/O in/O the/O
corridor/O there/O was/O no/O sign/O of/O the/O person/O he/O was/O looking/O for/O and/O he/O came/O
back/O in/O despair/O,/O and/O frantically/O waving/O his/O hands/O addressed/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O who/O was/O smoking/O serenely/O./O

``/OWas/O ever/O a/O man/O in/O such/O a/O fearful/O fool/O's/O position/O?/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O is/O stupid/O,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON assented/O,/O smiling/O soothingly/O./O
``/OBut/O do/On't/O worry/O,/O it/O'll/O be/O brought/O directly/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O what/O is/O to/O be/O done/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O with/O smothered/O fury/O./O ``/OAnd/O these/O
fools/O of/O open/O waistcoats/O!/O Out/O of/O the/O question/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O at/O the/O
crumpled/O front/O of/O his/O shirt/O./O ``/OAnd/O what/O if/O the/O things/O have/O been/O taken/O on/O
to/O the/O railway/O station/O!/O''/O he/O roared/O in/O desperation/O./O

``/OThen/O you/O must/O put/O on/O mine/O./O''/O

``/OI/O ought/O to/O have/O done/O so/O long/O ago/O,/O if/O at/O all/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O nice/O to/O look/O ridiculous/O.../O./O Wait/O a/O bit/O!/O it/O will/O _/Ocome/O round/O_/O./O''/O

The/O point/O was/O that/O when/O Levin/PERSON asked/O for/O his/O evening/O suit/O,/O Kouzma/PERSON,/O his/O
old/O servant/O,/O had/O brought/O him/O the/O coat/O,/O waistcoat/O,/O and/O everything/O that/O
was/O wanted/O./O

``/OBut/O the/O shirt/O!/O''/O cried/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O've/O got/O a/O shirt/O on/O,/O''/O Kouzma/PERSON answered/O,/O with/O a/O placid/O smile/O./O

Kouzma/PERSON had/O not/O thought/O of/O leaving/O out/O a/O clean/O shirt/O,/O and/O on/O receiving/O
instructions/O to/O pack/O up/O everything/O and/O send/O it/O round/O to/O the/O
Shtcherbatskys/O'/O house/O,/O from/O which/O the/O young/O people/O were/O to/O set/O out/O the/O
same/O evening/O,/O he/O had/O done/O so/O,/O packing/O everything/O but/O the/O dress/O suit/O./O The/O
shirt/O worn/O since/O the/O morning/O was/O crumpled/O and/O out/O of/O the/O question/O with/O
the/O fashionable/O open/O waistcoat/O./O It/O was/O a/O long/O way/O to/O send/O to/O the/O
Shtcherbatskys/O'/O./O They/O sent/O out/O to/O buy/O a/O shirt/O./O The/O servant/O came/O back/O;/O
everything/O was/O shut/O up/O--/Oit/O was/O Sunday/O./O They/O sent/O to/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O
and/O brought/O a/O shirt/O--/Oit/O was/O impossibly/O wide/O and/O short/O./O They/O sent/O finally/O
to/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O to/O unpack/O the/O things/O./O The/O bridegroom/O was/O expected/O
at/O the/O church/O while/O he/O was/O pacing/O up/O and/O down/O his/O room/O like/O a/O wild/O beast/O
in/O a/O cage/O,/O peeping/O out/O into/O the/O corridor/O,/O and/O with/O horror/O and/O despair/O
recalling/O what/O absurd/O things/O he/O had/O said/O to/O Kitty/PERSON and/O what/O she/O might/O be/O
thinking/O now/O./O

At/O last/O the/O guilty/O Kouzma/PERSON flew/O panting/O into/O the/O room/O with/O the/O shirt/O./O

``/OOnly/O just/O in/O time/O./O They/O were/O just/O lifting/O it/O into/O the/O van/O,/O''/O said/O
Kouzma/PERSON./O

Three/O minutes/O later/O Levin/PERSON ran/O full/O speed/O into/O the/O corridor/O,/O not/O looking/O
at/O his/O watch/O for/O fear/O of/O aggravating/O his/O sufferings/O./O

``/OYou/O wo/On't/O help/O matters/O like/O this/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON with/O a/O
smile/O,/O hurrying/O with/O more/O deliberation/O after/O him/O./O ``/OIt/O will/O come/O round/O,/O
it/O will/O come/O round/O .../O I/O tell/O you/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 4/O


``/OThey/O've/O come/O!/O''/O ``/OHere/O he/O is/O!/O''/O ``/OWhich/O one/O?/O''/O ``/ORather/O young/O,/O eh/O?/O''/O ``/OWhy/O,/O my/O
dear/O soul/O,/O she/O looks/O more/O dead/O than/O alive/O!/O''/O were/O the/O comments/O in/O the/O
crowd/O,/O when/O Levin/PERSON,/O meeting/O his/O bride/O in/O the/O entrance/O,/O walked/O with/O her/O
into/O the/O church/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON told/O his/O wife/O the/O cause/O of/O the/O delay/O,/O and/O the/O guests/O
were/O whispering/O it/O with/O smiles/O to/O one/O another/O./O Levin/PERSON saw/O nothing/O and/O no/O
one/O;/O he/O did/O not/O take/O his/O eyes/O off/O his/O bride/O./O

Everyone/O said/O she/O had/O lost/O her/O looks/O dreadfully/O of/O late/O,/O and/O was/O not/O
nearly/O so/O pretty/O on/O her/O wedding/O day/O as/O usual/O;/O but/O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O think/O
so/O./O He/O looked/O at/O her/O hair/O done/O up/O high/O,/O with/O the/O long/O white/O veil/O and/O
white/O flowers/O and/O the/O high/O,/O stand-up/O,/O scalloped/O collar/O,/O that/O in/O such/O a/O
maidenly/O fashion/O hid/O her/O long/O neck/O at/O the/O sides/O and/O only/O showed/O it/O in/O
front/O,/O her/O strikingly/O slender/O figure/O,/O and/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O she/O
looked/O better/O than/O ever/O--/Onot/O because/O these/O flowers/O,/O this/O veil/O,/O this/O gown/O
from/O Paris/LOCATION added/O anything/O to/O her/O beauty/O;/O but/O because/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O
elaborate/O sumptuousness/O of/O her/O attire/O,/O the/O expression/O of/O her/O sweet/O face/O,/O
of/O her/O eyes/O,/O of/O her/O lips/O was/O still/O her/O own/O characteristic/O expression/O of/O
guileless/O truthfulness/O./O

``/OI/O was/O beginning/O to/O think/O you/O meant/O to/O run/O away/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O smiled/O
to/O him/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O so/O stupid/O,/O what/O happened/O to/O me/O,/O I/O'm/O ashamed/O to/O speak/O of/O it/O!/O''/O he/O
said/O,/O reddening/O,/O and/O he/O was/O obliged/O to/O turn/O to/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O who/O
came/O up/O to/O him/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O a/O pretty/O story/O of/O yours/O about/O the/O shirt/O!/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O shaking/O his/O head/O and/O smiling/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O!/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O without/O an/O idea/O of/O what/O they/O were/O talking/O
about/O./O

``/ONow/O,/O Kostya/PERSON,/O you/O have/O to/O decide/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON with/O an/O air/O
of/O mock/O dismay/O,/O ``/Oa/O weighty/O question/O./O You/O are/O at/O this/O moment/O just/O in/O the/O
humor/O to/O appreciate/O all/O its/O gravity/O./O They/O ask/O me/O,/O are/O they/O to/O light/O the/O
candles/O that/O have/O been/O lighted/O before/O or/O candles/O that/O have/O never/O been/O
lighted/O?/O It/O's/O a/O matter/O of/O ten/O roubles/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O relaxing/O his/O lips/O into/O
a/O smile/O./O ``/OI/O have/O decided/O,/O but/O I/O was/O afraid/O you/O might/O not/O agree/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON saw/O it/O was/O a/O joke/O,/O but/O he/O could/O not/O smile/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O's/O it/O to/O be/O then/O?/O--/Ounlighted/O or/O lighted/O candles/O?/O that/O's/O the/O
question/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O unlighted/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O./O The/O question/O's/O decided/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
smiling/O./O ``/OHow/O silly/O men/O are/O,/O though/O,/O in/O this/O position/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O
Tchirikov/PERSON,/O when/O Levin/PERSON,/O after/O looking/O absently/O at/O him/O,/O had/O moved/O back/O to/O
his/O bride/O./O

``/OKitty/PERSON,/O mind/O you/O're/O the/O first/O to/O step/O on/O the/O carpet/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/PERSON
Nordston/PERSON,/O coming/O up/O./O ``/OYou/O're/O a/O nice/O person/O!/O''/O she/O said/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OAre/On't/O you/O frightened/O,/O eh/O?/O''/O said/O Marya/PERSON Dmitrievna/PERSON,/O an/O old/O aunt/O./O

``/OAre/O you/O cold/O?/O You/O're/O pale/O./O Stop/O a/O minute/O,/O stoop/O down/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON's/O
sister/O,/O Madame/PERSON Lvova/PERSON,/O and/O with/O her/O plump/O,/O handsome/O arms/O she/O smilingly/O
set/O straight/O the/O flowers/O on/O her/O head/O./O

Dolly/PERSON came/O up/O,/O tried/O to/O say/O something/O,/O but/O could/O not/O speak/O,/O cried/O,/O and/O
then/O laughed/O unnaturally/O./O

Kitty/PERSON looked/O at/O all/O of/O them/O with/O the/O same/O absent/O eyes/O as/O Levin/PERSON./O

Meanwhile/O the/O officiating/O clergy/O had/O got/O into/O their/O vestments/O,/O and/O the/O
priest/O and/O deacon/O came/O out/O to/O the/O lectern/O,/O which/O stood/O in/O the/O forepart/O
of/O the/O church/O./O The/O priest/O turned/O to/O Levin/PERSON saying/O something/O./O Levin/PERSON did/O
not/O hear/O what/O the/O priest/O said/O./O

``/OTake/O the/O bride/O's/O hand/O and/O lead/O her/O up/O,/O''/O the/O best/O man/O said/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O

It/O was/O a/O long/O while/O before/O Levin/PERSON could/O make/O out/O what/O was/O expected/O of/O
him/O./O For/O a/O long/O time/O they/O tried/O to/O set/O him/O right/O and/O made/O him/O begin/O
again/O--/Obecause/O he/O kept/O taking/O Kitty/PERSON by/O the/O wrong/O arm/O or/O with/O the/O wrong/O
arm/O--/Otill/O he/O understood/O at/O last/O that/O what/O he/O had/O to/O do/O was/O,/O without/O
changing/O his/O position/O,/O to/O take/O her/O right/O hand/O in/O his/O right/O hand/O./O When/O at/O
last/O he/O had/O taken/O the/O bride/O's/O hand/O in/O the/O correct/O way/O,/O the/O priest/O walked/O
a/O few/O paces/O in/O front/O of/O them/O and/O stopped/O at/O the/O lectern/O./O The/O crowd/O of/O
friends/O and/O relations/O moved/O after/O them/O,/O with/O a/O buzz/O of/O talk/O and/O a/O rustle/O
of/O skirts/O./O Someone/O stooped/O down/O and/O pulled/O out/O the/O bride/O's/O train/O./O The/O
church/O became/O so/O still/O that/O the/O drops/O of/O wax/O could/O be/O heard/O falling/O from/O
the/O candles/O./O

The/O little/O old/O priest/O in/O his/O ecclesiastical/O cap/O,/O with/O his/O long/O
silvery-gray/O locks/O of/O hair/O parted/O behind/O his/O ears/O,/O was/O fumbling/O with/O
something/O at/O the/O lectern/O,/O putting/O out/O his/O little/O old/O hands/O from/O under/O
the/O heavy/O silver/O vestment/O with/O the/O gold/O cross/O on/O the/O back/O of/O it/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON approached/O him/O cautiously/O,/O whispered/O something/O,/O and/O
making/O a/O sign/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O walked/O back/O again/O./O

The/O priest/O lighted/O two/O candles/O,/O wreathed/O with/O flowers/O,/O and/O holding/O them/O
sideways/O so/O that/O the/O wax/O dropped/O slowly/O from/O them/O he/O turned/O,/O facing/O the/O
bridal/O pair/O./O The/O priest/O was/O the/O same/O old/O man/O that/O had/O confessed/O Levin/PERSON./O
He/O looked/O with/O weary/O and/O melancholy/O eyes/O at/O the/O bride/O and/O bridegroom/O,/O
sighed/O,/O and/O putting/O his/O right/O hand/O out/O from/O his/O vestment/O,/O blessed/O the/O
bridegroom/O with/O it/O,/O and/O also/O with/O a/O shade/O of/O solicitous/O tenderness/O laid/O
the/O crossed/O fingers/O on/O the/O bowed/O head/O of/O Kitty/PERSON./O Then/O he/O gave/O them/O the/O
candles/O,/O and/O taking/O the/O censer/O,/O moved/O slowly/O away/O from/O them/O./O

``/OCan/O it/O be/O true/O?/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O he/O looked/O round/O at/O his/O bride/O./O
Looking/O down/O at/O her/O he/O saw/O her/O face/O in/O profile/O,/O and/O from/O the/O scarcely/O
perceptible/O quiver/O of/O her/O lips/O and/O eyelashes/O he/O knew/O she/O was/O aware/O of/O
his/O eyes/O upon/O her/O./O She/O did/O not/O look/O round/O,/O but/O the/O high/O scalloped/O
collar/O,/O that/O reached/O her/O little/O pink/O ear/O,/O trembled/O faintly/O./O He/O saw/O that/O
a/O sigh/O was/O held/O back/O in/O her/O throat/O,/O and/O the/O little/O hand/O in/O the/O long/O
glove/O shook/O as/O it/O held/O the/O candle/O./O

All/O the/O fuss/O of/O the/O shirt/O,/O of/O being/O late/O,/O all/O the/O talk/O of/O friends/O and/O
relations/O,/O their/O annoyance/O,/O his/O ludicrous/O position/O--/Oall/O suddenly/O passed/O
away/O and/O he/O was/O filled/O with/O joy/O and/O dread/O./O

The/O handsome/O,/O stately/O head-deacon/O wearing/O a/O silver/O robe/O and/O his/O curly/O
locks/O standing/O out/O at/O each/O side/O of/O his/O head/O,/O stepped/O smartly/O forward/O,/O
and/O lifting/O his/O stole/O on/O two/O fingers/O,/O stood/O opposite/O the/O priest/O./O

``/OBlessed/O be/O the/O name/O of/O the/O Lord/O,/O''/O the/O solemn/O syllables/O rang/O out/O slowly/O
one/O after/O another/O,/O setting/O the/O air/O quivering/O with/O waves/O of/O sound/O./O

``/OBlessed/O is/O the/O name/O of/O our/O God/O,/O from/O the/O beginning/O,/O is/O now/O,/O and/O ever/O
shall/O be/O,/O''/O the/O little/O old/O priest/O answered/O in/O a/O submissive/O,/O piping/O voice/O,/O
still/O fingering/O something/O at/O the/O lectern/O./O And/O the/O full/O chorus/O of/O the/O
unseen/O choir/O rose/O up/O,/O filling/O the/O whole/O church/O,/O from/O the/O windows/O to/O the/O
vaulted/O roof/O,/O with/O broad/O waves/O of/O melody/O./O It/O grew/O stronger/O,/O rested/O for/O
an/O instant/O,/O and/O slowly/O died/O away/O./O

They/O prayed/O,/O as/O they/O always/O do/O,/O for/O peace/O from/O on/O high/O and/O for/O
salvation/O,/O for/O the/O Holy/O Synod/O,/O and/O for/O the/O Tsar/O;/O they/O prayed/O,/O too/O,/O for/O
the/O servants/O of/O God/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON and/O Ekaterina/PERSON,/O now/O plighting/O their/O
troth/O./O

``/OVouchsafe/O to/O them/O love/O made/O perfect/O,/O peace/O and/O help/O,/O O/O Lord/O,/O we/O beseech/O
Thee/O,/O''/O the/O whole/O church/O seemed/O to/O breathe/O with/O the/O voice/O of/O the/O head/O
deacon/O./O

Levin/PERSON heard/O the/O words/O,/O and/O they/O impressed/O him/O./O ``/OHow/O did/O they/O guess/O that/O
it/O is/O help/O,/O just/O help/O that/O one/O wants/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O recalling/O all/O his/O
fears/O and/O doubts/O of/O late/O./O ``/OWhat/O do/O I/O know/O?/O what/O can/O I/O do/O in/O this/O fearful/O
business/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O ``/Owithout/O help/O?/O Yes/O,/O it/O is/O help/O I/O want/O now/O./O''/O

When/O the/O deacon/O had/O finished/O the/O prayer/O for/O the/O Imperial/O family/O,/O the/O
priest/O turned/O to/O the/O bridal/O pair/O with/O a/O book/O:/O ``/OEternal/O God/O,/O that/O joinest/O
together/O in/O love/O them/O that/O were/O separate/O,/O''/O he/O read/O in/O a/O gentle/O,/O piping/O
voice/O:/O ``/Owho/O hast/O ordained/O the/O union/O of/O holy/O wedlock/O that/O can/Onot/O be/O set/O
asunder/O,/O Thou/O who/O didst/O bless/O Isaac/PERSON and/O Rebecca/PERSON and/O their/O descendants/O,/O
according/O to/O Thy/O Holy/O Covenant/O;/O bless/O Thy/O servants/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON and/O
Ekaterina/PERSON,/O leading/O them/O in/O the/O path/O of/O all/O good/O works/O./O For/O gracious/O and/O
merciful/O art/O Thou/O,/O our/O Lord/O,/O and/O glory/O be/O to/O Thee/O,/O the/O Father/O,/O the/O Son/O,/O
and/O the/O Holy/O Ghost/O,/O now/O and/O ever/O shall/O be/O./O''/O

``/OAmen/O!/O''/O the/O unseen/O choir/O sent/O rolling/O again/O upon/O the/O air/O./O

''/O`/OJoinest/O together/O in/O love/O them/O that/O were/O separate/O./O'/O What/O deep/O meaning/O
in/O those/O words/O,/O and/O how/O they/O correspond/O with/O what/O one/O feels/O at/O this/O
moment/O,/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OIs/O she/O feeling/O the/O same/O as/O I/O?/O''/O

And/O looking/O round/O,/O he/O met/O her/O eyes/O,/O and/O from/O their/O expression/O he/O
concluded/O that/O she/O was/O understanding/O it/O just/O as/O he/O was/O./O But/O this/O was/O a/O
mistake/O;/O she/O almost/O completely/O missed/O the/O meaning/O of/O the/O words/O of/O the/O
service/O;/O she/O had/O not/O heard/O them/O,/O in/O fact/O./O She/O could/O not/O listen/O to/O them/O
and/O take/O them/O in/O,/O so/O strong/O was/O the/O one/O feeling/O that/O filled/O her/O breast/O
and/O grew/O stronger/O and/O stronger/O./O That/O feeling/O was/O joy/O at/O the/O completion/O
of/O the/O process/O that/O for/O the/O last/O month/O and/O a/O half/O had/O been/O going/O on/O in/O
her/O soul/O,/O and/O had/O during/O those/O six/O weeks/O been/O a/O joy/O and/O a/O torture/O to/O
her/O./O On/O the/O day/O when/O in/O the/O drawing/O room/O of/O the/O house/O in/O Arbaty/LOCATION Street/LOCATION
she/O had/O gone/O up/O to/O him/O in/O her/O brown/O dress/O,/O and/O given/O herself/O to/O him/O
without/O a/O word/O--/Oon/O that/O day/O,/O at/O that/O hour/O,/O there/O took/O place/O in/O her/O heart/O
a/O complete/O severance/O from/O all/O her/O old/O life/O,/O and/O a/O quite/O different/O,/O new/O,/O
utterly/O strange/O life/O had/O begun/O for/O her/O,/O while/O the/O old/O life/O was/O actually/O
going/O on/O as/O before/O./O Those/O six/O weeks/O had/O for/O her/O been/O a/O time/O of/O the/O
utmost/O bliss/O and/O the/O utmost/O misery/O./O All/O her/O life/O,/O all/O her/O desires/O and/O
hopes/O were/O concentrated/O on/O this/O one/O man/O,/O still/O uncomprehended/O by/O her/O,/O to/O
whom/O she/O was/O bound/O by/O a/O feeling/O of/O alternate/O attraction/O and/O repulsion/O,/O
even/O less/O comprehended/O than/O the/O man/O himself/O,/O and/O all/O the/O while/O she/O was/O
going/O on/O living/O in/O the/O outward/O conditions/O of/O her/O old/O life/O./O Living/O the/O
old/O life/O,/O she/O was/O horrified/O at/O herself/O,/O at/O her/O utter/O insurmountable/O
callousness/O to/O all/O her/O own/O past/O,/O to/O things/O,/O to/O habits/O,/O to/O the/O people/O she/O
had/O loved/O,/O who/O loved/O her/O--/Oto/O her/O mother/O,/O who/O was/O wounded/O by/O her/O
indifference/O,/O to/O her/O kind/O,/O tender/O father/O,/O till/O then/O dearer/O than/O all/O the/O
world/O./O At/O one/O moment/O she/O was/O horrified/O at/O this/O indifference/O,/O at/O another/O
she/O rejoiced/O at/O what/O had/O brought/O her/O to/O this/O indifference/O./O She/O could/O not/O
frame/O a/O thought/O,/O not/O a/O wish/O apart/O from/O life/O with/O this/O man/O;/O but/O this/O new/O
life/O was/O not/O yet/O,/O and/O she/O could/O not/O even/O picture/O it/O clearly/O to/O herself/O./O
There/O was/O only/O anticipation/O,/O the/O dread/O and/O joy/O of/O the/O new/O and/O the/O
unknown/O./O And/O now/O behold/O--/Oanticipation/O and/O uncertainty/O and/O remorse/O at/O the/O
abandonment/O of/O the/O old/O life/O--/Oall/O was/O ending/O,/O and/O the/O new/O was/O beginning/O./O
This/O new/O life/O could/O not/O but/O have/O terrors/O for/O her/O inexperience/O;/O but/O,/O
terrible/O or/O not/O,/O the/O change/O had/O been/O wrought/O six/O weeks/O before/O in/O her/O
soul/O,/O and/O this/O was/O merely/O the/O final/O sanction/O of/O what/O had/O long/O been/O
completed/O in/O her/O heart/O./O

Turning/O again/O to/O the/O lectern/O,/O the/O priest/O with/O some/O difficulty/O took/O
Kitty/PERSON's/O little/O ring/O,/O and/O asking/O Levin/PERSON for/O his/O hand/O,/O put/O it/O on/O the/O first/O
joint/O of/O his/O finger/O./O ``/OThe/O servant/O of/O God/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON,/O plights/O his/O troth/O
to/O the/O servant/O of/O God/O,/O Ekaterina/PERSON./O''/O And/O putting/O his/O big/O ring/O on/O Kitty/PERSON's/O
touchingly/O weak/O,/O pink/O little/O finger/O,/O the/O priest/O said/O the/O same/O thing/O./O

And/O the/O bridal/O pair/O tried/O several/O times/O to/O understand/O what/O they/O had/O to/O
do/O,/O and/O each/O time/O made/O some/O mistake/O and/O were/O corrected/O by/O the/O priest/O in/O
a/O whisper/O./O At/O last/O,/O having/O duly/O performed/O the/O ceremony/O,/O having/O signed/O
the/O rings/O with/O the/O cross/O,/O the/O priest/O handed/O Kitty/PERSON the/O big/O ring/O,/O and/O
Levin/PERSON the/O little/O one/O./O Again/O they/O were/O puzzled/O,/O and/O passed/O the/O rings/O from/O
hand/O to/O hand/O,/O still/O without/O doing/O what/O was/O expected/O./O

Dolly/PERSON,/O Tchirikov/PERSON,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON stepped/O forward/O to/O set/O them/O
right/O./O There/O was/O an/O interval/O of/O hesitation/O,/O whispering/O,/O and/O smiles/O;/O but/O
the/O expression/O of/O solemn/O emotion/O on/O the/O faces/O of/O the/O betrothed/O pair/O did/O
not/O change/O:/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O in/O their/O perplexity/O over/O their/O hands/O they/O
looked/O more/O grave/O and/O deeply/O moved/O than/O before/O,/O and/O the/O smile/O with/O which/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON whispered/O to/O them/O that/O now/O they/O would/O each/O put/O on/O
their/O own/O ring/O died/O away/O on/O his/O lips/O./O He/O had/O a/O feeling/O that/O any/O smile/O
would/O jar/O on/O them/O./O

``/OThou/O who/O didst/O from/O the/O beginning/O create/O male/O and/O female/O,/O''/O the/O priest/O
read/O after/O the/O exchange/O of/O rings/O,/O ``/Ofrom/O Thee/O woman/O was/O given/O to/O man/O to/O
be/O a/O helpmeet/O to/O him/O,/O and/O for/O the/O procreation/O of/O children/O./O O/O Lord/O,/O our/O
God/O,/O who/O hast/O poured/O down/O the/O blessings/O of/O Thy/O Truth/O according/O to/O Thy/O
Holy/O Covenant/O upon/O Thy/O chosen/O servants/O,/O our/O fathers/O,/O from/O generation/O to/O
generation/O,/O bless/O Thy/O servants/O Konstantin/PERSON and/O Ekaterina/PERSON,/O and/O make/O their/O
troth/O fast/O in/O faith/O,/O and/O union/O of/O hearts/O,/O and/O truth/O,/O and/O love/O.../O''/O

Levin/PERSON felt/O more/O and/O more/O that/O all/O his/O ideas/O of/O marriage/O,/O all/O his/O dreams/O
of/O how/O he/O would/O order/O his/O life/O,/O were/O mere/O childishness/O,/O and/O that/O it/O was/O
something/O he/O had/O not/O understood/O hitherto/O,/O and/O now/O understood/O less/O than/O
ever/O,/O though/O it/O was/O being/O performed/O upon/O him/O./O The/O lump/O in/O his/O throat/O
rose/O higher/O and/O higher/O,/O tears/O that/O would/O not/O be/O checked/O came/O into/O his/O
eyes/O./O



Chapter/O 5/O


In/O the/O church/O there/O was/O all/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O all/O the/O friends/O and/O relations/O;/O and/O
during/O the/O ceremony/O of/O plighting/O troth/O,/O in/O the/O brilliantly/O lighted/O
church/O,/O there/O was/O an/O incessant/O flow/O of/O discreetly/O subdued/O talk/O in/O the/O
circle/O of/O gaily/O dressed/O women/O and/O girls/O,/O and/O men/O in/O white/O ties/O,/O
frockcoats/O,/O and/O uniforms/O./O The/O talk/O was/O principally/O kept/O up/O by/O the/O men/O,/O
while/O the/O women/O were/O absorbed/O in/O watching/O every/O detail/O of/O the/O ceremony/O,/O
which/O always/O means/O so/O much/O to/O them/O./O

In/O the/O little/O group/O nearest/O to/O the/O bride/O were/O her/O two/O sisters/O:/O Dolly/PERSON,/O
and/O the/O other/O one/O,/O the/O self-possessed/O beauty/O,/O Madame/PERSON Lvova/PERSON,/O who/O had/O just/O
arrived/O from/O abroad/O./O

``/OWhy/O is/O it/O Marie/PERSON's/O in/O lilac/O,/O as/O bad/O as/O black/O,/O at/O a/O wedding/O?/O''/O said/O Madame/PERSON
Korsunskaya/PERSON./O

``/OWith/O her/O complexion/O,/O it/O's/O the/O one/O salvation/O,/O''/O responded/O Madame/O
Trubetskaya/O./O ``/OI/O wonder/O why/O they/O had/O the/O wedding/O in/O the/O evening/O?/O It/O's/O
like/O shop-people/O.../O''/O

``/OSo/O much/O prettier/O./O I/O was/O married/O in/O the/O evening/O too/O.../O''/O answered/O Madame/PERSON
Korsunskaya/PERSON,/O and/O she/O sighed/O,/O remembering/O how/O charming/O she/O had/O been/O that/O
day/O,/O and/O how/O absurdly/O in/O love/O her/O husband/O was/O,/O and/O how/O different/O it/O all/O
was/O now/O./O

``/OThey/O say/O if/O anyone/O's/O best/O man/O more/O than/O ten/O times/O,/O he/O'll/O never/O be/O
married/O./O I/O wanted/O to/O be/O for/O the/O tenth/O time/O,/O but/O the/O post/O was/O taken/O,/O''/O
said/O Count/O Siniavin/O to/O the/O pretty/O Princess/O Tcharskaya/PERSON,/O who/O had/O designs/O
on/O him/O./O

Princess/O Tcharskaya/PERSON only/O answered/O with/O a/O smile/O./O She/O looked/O at/O Kitty/ORGANIZATION,/O
thinking/O how/O and/O when/O she/O would/O stand/O with/O Count/PERSON Siniavin/PERSON in/O Kitty/PERSON's/O
place/O,/O and/O how/O she/O would/O remind/O him/O then/O of/O his/O joke/O today/O./O

Shtcherbatsky/PERSON told/O the/O old/O maid/O of/O honor/O,/O Madame/PERSON Nikolaeva/PERSON,/O that/O he/O
meant/O to/O put/O the/O crown/O on/O Kitty/PERSON's/O chignon/O for/O luck/O./O

``/OShe/O ought/O not/O to/O have/O worn/O a/O chignon/O,/O''/O answered/O Madame/PERSON Nikolaeva/PERSON,/O who/O
had/O long/O ago/O made/O up/O her/O mind/O that/O if/O the/O elderly/O widower/O she/O was/O
angling/O for/O married/O her/O,/O the/O wedding/O should/O be/O of/O the/O simplest/O./O ``/OI/O do/On't/O
like/O such/O grandeur/O./O''/O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O talking/O to/O Darya/PERSON Dmitrievna/PERSON,/O jestingly/O assuring/O
her/O that/O the/O custom/O of/O going/O away/O after/O the/O wedding/O was/O becoming/O common/O
because/O newly/O married/O people/O always/O felt/O a/O little/O ashamed/O of/O themselves/O./O

``/OYour/O brother/O may/O feel/O proud/O of/O himself/O./O She/O's/O a/O marvel/O of/O sweetness/O./O I/O
believe/O you/O're/O envious/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O've/O got/O over/O that/O,/O Darya/PERSON Dmitrievna/PERSON,/O''/O he/O answered/O,/O and/O a/O
melancholy/O and/O serious/O expression/O suddenly/O came/O over/O his/O face/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O telling/O his/O sister-in-law/O his/O joke/O about/O
divorce/O./O

``/OThe/O wreath/O wants/O setting/O straight/O,/O''/O she/O answered/O,/O not/O hearing/O him/O./O

``/OWhat/O a/O pity/O she/O's/O lost/O her/O looks/O so/O,/O''/O Countess/PERSON Nordston/PERSON said/O to/O Madame/PERSON
Lvova/PERSON./O ``/OStill/O he/O's/O not/O worth/O her/O little/O finger/O,/O is/O he/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O like/O him/O so/O--/Onot/O because/O he/O's/O my/O future/O _/Obeau-frère/O_/O,/O''/O answered/O
Madame/PERSON Lvova/PERSON./O ``/OAnd/O how/O well/O he/O's/O behaving/O!/O It/O's/O so/O difficult/O,/O too/O,/O to/O
look/O well/O in/O such/O a/O position/O,/O not/O to/O be/O ridiculous/O./O And/O he/O's/O not/O
ridiculous/O,/O and/O not/O affected/O;/O one/O can/O see/O he/O's/O moved/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O expected/O it/O,/O I/O suppose/O?/O''/O

``/OAlmost/O./O She/O always/O cared/O for/O him/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O we/O shall/O see/O which/O of/O them/O will/O step/O on/O the/O rug/O first/O./O I/O warned/O
Kitty/PERSON./O''/O

``/OIt/O will/O make/O no/O difference/O,/O''/O said/O Madame/PERSON Lvova/PERSON;/O ``/Owe/O're/O all/O obedient/O
wives/O;/O it/O's/O in/O our/O family/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O stepped/O on/O the/O rug/O before/O Vassily/PERSON on/O purpose/O./O And/O you/O,/O Dolly/PERSON?/O''/O

Dolly/PERSON stood/O beside/O them/O;/O she/O heard/O them/O,/O but/O she/O did/O not/O answer/O./O She/O was/O
deeply/O moved/O./O The/O tears/O stood/O in/O her/O eyes/O,/O and/O she/O could/O not/O have/O spoken/O
without/O crying/O./O She/O was/O rejoicing/O over/O Kitty/PERSON and/O Levin/PERSON;/O going/O back/O in/O
thought/O to/O her/O own/O wedding/O,/O she/O glanced/O at/O the/O radiant/O figure/O of/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O forgot/O all/O the/O present/O,/O and/O remembered/O only/O her/O own/O
innocent/O love/O./O She/O recalled/O not/O herself/O only/O,/O but/O all/O her/O women-friends/O
and/O acquaintances/O./O She/O thought/O of/O them/O on/O the/O one/O day/O of/O their/O triumph/O,/O
when/O they/O had/O stood/O like/O Kitty/PERSON under/O the/O wedding/O crown/O,/O with/O love/O and/O
hope/O and/O dread/O in/O their/O hearts/O,/O renouncing/O the/O past/O,/O and/O stepping/O
forward/O into/O the/O mysterious/O future/O./O Among/O the/O brides/O that/O came/O back/O to/O
her/O memory/O,/O she/O thought/O too/O of/O her/O darling/O Anna/PERSON,/O of/O whose/O proposed/O
divorce/O she/O had/O just/O been/O hearing/O./O And/O she/O had/O stood/O just/O as/O innocent/O in/O
orange/O flowers/O and/O bridal/O veil/O./O And/O now/O?/O ``/OIt/O's/O terribly/O strange/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O to/O herself/O./O It/O was/O not/O merely/O the/O sisters/O,/O the/O women-friends/O and/O
female/O relations/O of/O the/O bride/O who/O were/O following/O every/O detail/O of/O the/O
ceremony/O./O Women/O who/O were/O quite/O strangers/O,/O mere/O spectators/O,/O were/O watching/O
it/O excitedly/O,/O holding/O their/O breath/O,/O in/O fear/O of/O losing/O a/O single/O movement/O
or/O expression/O of/O the/O bride/O and/O bridegroom/O,/O and/O angrily/O not/O answering/O,/O
often/O not/O hearing/O,/O the/O remarks/O of/O the/O callous/O men/O,/O who/O kept/O making/O
joking/O or/O irrelevant/O observations/O./O

``/OWhy/O has/O she/O been/O crying/O?/O Is/O she/O being/O married/O against/O her/O will/O?/O''/O

``/OAgainst/O her/O will/O to/O a/O fine/O fellow/O like/O that/O?/O A/O prince/O,/O is/On't/O he/O?/O''/O

``/OIs/O that/O her/O sister/O in/O the/O white/O satin/O?/O Just/O listen/O how/O the/O deacon/O booms/O
out/O,/O `/OAnd/O fearing/O her/O husband/O./O'/O''/O

``/OAre/O the/O choristers/O from/O Tchudovo/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O from/O the/O Synod/O./O''/O

``/OI/O asked/O the/O footman/O./O He/O says/O he/O's/O going/O to/O take/O her/O home/O to/O his/O country/O
place/O at/O once/O./O Awfully/O rich/O,/O they/O say/O./O That/O's/O why/O she/O's/O being/O married/O to/O
him/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O they/O're/O a/O well-matched/O pair/O./O''/O

``/OI/O say/O,/O Marya/PERSON Vassilievna/PERSON,/O you/O were/O making/O out/O those/O fly-away/O crinolines/O
were/O not/O being/O worn/O./O Just/O look/O at/O her/O in/O the/O puce/O dress/O--/Oan/O ambassador/O's/O
wife/O they/O say/O she/O is/O--/Ohow/O her/O skirt/O bounces/O out/O from/O side/O to/O side/O!/O''/O

``/OWhat/O a/O pretty/O dear/O the/O bride/O is/O--/Olike/O a/O lamb/O decked/O with/O flowers/O!/O Well/O,/O
say/O what/O you/O will/O,/O we/O women/O feel/O for/O our/O sister/O./O''/O

Such/O were/O the/O comments/O in/O the/O crowd/O of/O gazing/O women/O who/O had/O succeeded/O in/O
slipping/O in/O at/O the/O church/O doors/O./O



Chapter/O 6/O


When/O the/O ceremony/O of/O plighting/O troth/O was/O over/O,/O the/O beadle/O spread/O before/O
the/O lectern/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O church/O a/O piece/O of/O pink/O silken/O stuff/O,/O
the/O choir/O sang/O a/O complicated/O and/O elaborate/O psalm/O,/O in/O which/O the/O bass/O and/O
tenor/O sang/O responses/O to/O one/O another/O,/O and/O the/O priest/O turning/O round/O
pointed/O the/O bridal/O pair/O to/O the/O pink/O silk/O rug/O./O Though/O both/O had/O often/O
heard/O a/O great/O deal/O about/O the/O saying/O that/O the/O one/O who/O steps/O first/O on/O the/O
rug/O will/O be/O the/O head/O of/O the/O house/O,/O neither/O Levin/PERSON nor/O Kitty/PERSON were/O capable/O
of/O recollecting/O it/O,/O as/O they/O took/O the/O few/O steps/O towards/O it/O./O They/O did/O not/O
hear/O the/O loud/O remarks/O and/O disputes/O that/O followed/O,/O some/O maintaining/O he/O
had/O stepped/O on/O first/O,/O and/O others/O that/O both/O had/O stepped/O on/O together/O./O

After/O the/O customary/O questions/O,/O whether/O they/O desired/O to/O enter/O upon/O
matrimony/O,/O and/O whether/O they/O were/O pledged/O to/O anyone/O else/O,/O and/O their/O
answers/O,/O which/O sounded/O strange/O to/O themselves/O,/O a/O new/O ceremony/O began/O./O
Kitty/PERSON listened/O to/O the/O words/O of/O the/O prayer/O,/O trying/O to/O make/O out/O their/O
meaning/O,/O but/O she/O could/O not/O./O The/O feeling/O of/O triumph/O and/O radiant/O happiness/O
flooded/O her/O soul/O more/O and/O more/O as/O the/O ceremony/O went/O on/O,/O and/O deprived/O her/O
of/O all/O power/O of/O attention/O./O

They/O prayed/O:/O ``/OEndow/O them/O with/O continence/O and/O fruitfulness/O,/O and/O vouchsafe/O
that/O their/O hearts/O may/O rejoice/O looking/O upon/O their/O sons/O and/O daughters/O./O''/O
They/O alluded/O to/O God/O's/O creation/O of/O a/O wife/O from/O Adam/PERSON's/O rib/O ``/Oand/O for/O this/O
cause/O a/O man/O shall/O leave/O father/O and/O mother/O,/O and/O cleave/O unto/O his/O wife/O,/O and/O
they/O two/O shall/O be/O one/O flesh/O,/O''/O and/O that/O ``/Othis/O is/O a/O great/O mystery/O''/O;/O they/O
prayed/O that/O God/O would/O make/O them/O fruitful/O and/O bless/O them/O,/O like/O Isaac/PERSON and/O
Rebecca/PERSON,/O Joseph/PERSON,/O Moses/PERSON and/O Zipporah/PERSON,/O and/O that/O they/O might/O look/O upon/O their/O
children/O's/O children/O./O ``/OThat/O's/O all/O splendid/O,/O''/O thought/O Kitty/PERSON,/O catching/O the/O
words/O,/O ``/Oall/O that/O's/O just/O as/O it/O should/O be/O,/O''/O and/O a/O smile/O of/O happiness/O,/O
unconsciously/O reflected/O in/O everyone/O who/O looked/O at/O her/O,/O beamed/O on/O her/O
radiant/O face/O./O

``/OPut/O it/O on/O quite/O,/O''/O voices/O were/O heard/O urging/O when/O the/O priest/O had/O put/O on/O
the/O wedding/O crowns/O and/O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O his/O hand/O shaking/O in/O its/O
three-button/O glove/O,/O held/O the/O crown/O high/O above/O her/O head/O./O

``/OPut/O it/O on/O!/O''/O she/O whispered/O,/O smiling/O./O

Levin/PERSON looked/O round/O at/O her/O,/O and/O was/O struck/O by/O the/O joyful/O radiance/O on/O her/O
face/O,/O and/O unconsciously/O her/O feeling/O infected/O him/O./O He/O too/O,/O like/O her/O felt/O
glad/O and/O happy/O./O

They/O enjoyed/O hearing/O the/O epistle/O read/O,/O and/O the/O roll/O of/O the/O head/O deacon/O's/O
voice/O at/O the/O last/O verse/O,/O awaited/O with/O such/O impatience/O by/O the/O outside/O
public/O./O They/O enjoyed/O drinking/O out/O of/O the/O shallow/O cup/O of/O warm/O red/O wine/O
and/O water/O,/O and/O they/O were/O still/O more/O pleased/O when/O the/O priest/O,/O flinging/O
back/O his/O stole/O and/O taking/O both/O their/O hands/O in/O his/O,/O led/O them/O round/O the/O
lectern/O to/O the/O accompaniment/O of/O bass/O voices/O chanting/O ``/OGlory/O to/O God/O./O''/O

Shtcherbatsky/PERSON and/O Tchirikov/PERSON,/O supporting/O the/O crowns/O and/O stumbling/O over/O
the/O bride/O's/O train/O,/O smiling/O too/O and/O seeming/O delighted/O at/O something/O,/O were/O
at/O one/O moment/O left/O behind/O,/O at/O the/O next/O treading/O on/O the/O bridal/O pair/O as/O
the/O priest/O came/O to/O a/O halt/O./O The/O spark/O of/O joy/O kindled/O in/O Kitty/LOCATION seemed/O to/O
have/O infected/O everyone/O in/O the/O church/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON that/O the/O priest/O
and/O the/O deacon/O too/O wanted/O to/O smile/O just/O as/O he/O did/O./O

Taking/O the/O crowns/O off/O their/O heads/O the/O priest/O read/O the/O last/O prayer/O and/O
congratulated/O the/O young/O people/O./O Levin/PERSON looked/O at/O Kitty/ORGANIZATION,/O and/O he/O had/O never/O
before/O seen/O her/O look/O as/O she/O did/O./O She/O was/O charming/O with/O the/O new/O radiance/O
of/O happiness/O in/O her/O face/O./O Levin/PERSON longed/O to/O say/O something/O to/O her/O,/O but/O he/O
did/O not/O know/O whether/O it/O was/O all/O over/O./O The/O priest/O got/O him/O out/O of/O his/O
difficulty/O./O He/O smiled/O his/O kindly/O smile/O and/O said/O gently/O,/O ``/OKiss/O your/O wife/O,/O
and/O you/O kiss/O your/O husband/O,/O''/O and/O took/O the/O candles/O out/O of/O their/O hands/O./O

Levin/PERSON kissed/O her/O smiling/O lips/O with/O timid/O care/O,/O gave/O her/O his/O arm/O,/O and/O
with/O a/O new/O strange/O sense/O of/O closeness/O,/O walked/O out/O of/O the/O church/O./O He/O did/O
not/O believe/O,/O he/O could/O not/O believe/O,/O that/O it/O was/O true/O./O It/O was/O only/O when/O
their/O wondering/O and/O timid/O eyes/O met/O that/O he/O believed/O in/O it/O,/O because/O he/O
felt/O that/O they/O were/O one/O./O

After/O supper/O,/O the/O same/O night/O,/O the/O young/O people/O left/O for/O the/O country/O./O



Chapter/O 7/O


Vronsky/O and/O Anna/PERSON had/O been/O traveling/O for/O three/O months/O together/O in/O Europe/LOCATION./O
They/O had/O visited/O Venice/LOCATION,/O Rome/LOCATION,/O and/O Naples/LOCATION,/O and/O had/O just/O arrived/O at/O a/O
small/O Italian/O town/O where/O they/O meant/O to/O stay/O some/O time/O./O A/O handsome/O head/O
waiter/O,/O with/O thick/O pomaded/O hair/O parted/O from/O the/O neck/O upwards/O,/O an/O evening/O
coat/O,/O a/O broad/O white/O cambric/O shirt/O front/O,/O and/O a/O bunch/O of/O trinkets/O hanging/O
above/O his/O rounded/O stomach/O,/O stood/O with/O his/O hands/O in/O the/O full/O curve/O of/O his/O
pockets/O,/O looking/O contemptuously/O from/O under/O his/O eyelids/O while/O he/O gave/O
some/O frigid/O reply/O to/O a/O gentleman/O who/O had/O stopped/O him/O./O Catching/O the/O sound/O
of/O footsteps/O coming/O from/O the/O other/O side/O of/O the/O entry/O towards/O the/O
staircase/O,/O the/O head/O waiter/O turned/O round/O,/O and/O seeing/O the/O Russian/O count/O,/O
who/O had/O taken/O their/O best/O rooms/O,/O he/O took/O his/O hands/O out/O of/O his/O pockets/O
deferentially/O,/O and/O with/O a/O bow/O informed/O him/O that/O a/O courier/O had/O been/O,/O and/O
that/O the/O business/O about/O the/O palazzo/O had/O been/O arranged/O./O The/O steward/O was/O
prepared/O to/O sign/O the/O agreement/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O I/O'm/O glad/O to/O hear/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OIs/O madame/O at/O home/O or/O not/O?/O''/O

``/OMadame/O has/O been/O out/O for/O a/O walk/O but/O has/O returned/O now/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O
waiter/O./O

Vronsky/O took/O off/O his/O soft/O,/O wide-brimmed/O hat/O and/O passed/O his/O handkerchief/O
over/O his/O heated/O brow/O and/O hair/O,/O which/O had/O grown/O half/O over/O his/O ears/O,/O and/O
was/O brushed/O back/O covering/O the/O bald/O patch/O on/O his/O head/O./O And/O glancing/O
casually/O at/O the/O gentleman/O,/O who/O still/O stood/O there/O gazing/O intently/O at/O him/O,/O
he/O would/O have/O gone/O on/O./O

``/OThis/O gentleman/O is/O a/O Russian/O,/O and/O was/O inquiring/O after/O you/O,/O''/O said/O the/O
head/O waiter/O./O

With/O mingled/O feelings/O of/O annoyance/O at/O never/O being/O able/O to/O get/O away/O from/O
acquaintances/O anywhere/O,/O and/O longing/O to/O find/O some/O sort/O of/O diversion/O from/O
the/O monotony/O of/O his/O life/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON looked/O once/O more/O at/O the/O gentleman/O,/O who/O
had/O retreated/O and/O stood/O still/O again/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O moment/O a/O light/O came/O
into/O the/O eyes/O of/O both/O./O

``/OGolenishtchev/O!/O''/O

``/OVronsky/O!/O''/O

It/O really/O was/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O a/O comrade/O of/O Vronsky/O's/O in/O the/O Corps/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION
Pages/ORGANIZATION./O In/O the/O corps/O Golenishtchev/PERSON had/O belonged/O to/O the/O liberal/O party/O;/O he/O
left/O the/O corps/O without/O entering/O the/O army/O,/O and/O had/O never/O taken/O office/O
under/O the/O government/O./O Vronsky/O and/O he/O had/O gone/O completely/O different/O ways/O
