on/O leaving/O the/O corps/O,/O and/O had/O only/O met/O once/O since/O./O

At/O that/O meeting/O Vronsky/O perceived/O that/O Golenishtchev/PERSON had/O taken/O up/O a/O sort/O
of/O lofty/O,/O intellectually/O liberal/O line/O,/O and/O was/O consequently/O disposed/O to/O
look/O down/O upon/O Vronsky/O's/O interests/O and/O calling/O in/O life/O./O Hence/O Vronsky/O
had/O met/O him/O with/O the/O chilling/O and/O haughty/O manner/O he/O so/O well/O knew/O how/O to/O
assume/O,/O the/O meaning/O of/O which/O was/O:/O ``/OYou/O may/O like/O or/O dislike/O my/O way/O of/O
life/O,/O that/O's/O a/O matter/O of/O the/O most/O perfect/O indifference/O to/O me/O;/O you/O will/O
have/O to/O treat/O me/O with/O respect/O if/O you/O want/O to/O know/O me/O./O''/O Golenishtchev/PERSON had/O
been/O contemptuously/O indifferent/O to/O the/O tone/O taken/O by/O Vronsky/O./O This/O
second/O meeting/O might/O have/O been/O expected/O,/O one/O would/O have/O supposed/O,/O to/O
estrange/O them/O still/O more/O./O But/O now/O they/O beamed/O and/O exclaimed/O with/O delight/O
on/O recognizing/O one/O another/O./O Vronsky/O would/O never/O have/O expected/O to/O be/O so/O
pleased/O to/O see/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O but/O probably/O he/O was/O not/O himself/O aware/O how/O
bored/O he/O was/O./O He/O forgot/O the/O disagreeable/O impression/O of/O their/O last/O
meeting/O,/O and/O with/O a/O face/O of/O frank/O delight/O held/O out/O his/O hand/O to/O his/O old/O
comrade/O./O The/O same/O expression/O of/O delight/O replaced/O the/O look/O of/O uneasiness/O
on/O Golenishtchev/PERSON's/O face/O./O

``/OHow/O glad/O I/O am/O to/O meet/O you/O!/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O showing/O his/O strong/O white/O
teeth/O in/O a/O friendly/O smile/O./O

``/OI/O heard/O the/O name/O Vronsky/O,/O but/O I/O did/On't/O know/O which/O one/O./O I/O'm/O very/O,/O very/O
glad/O!/O''/O

``/OLet/O's/O go/O in/O./O Come/O,/O tell/O me/O what/O you/O're/O doing/O./O''/O

``/OI/O've/O been/O living/O here/O for/O two/O years/O./O I/O'm/O working/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O!/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O with/O sympathy/O;/O ``/Olet/O's/O go/O in/O./O''/O And/O with/O the/O habit/O
common/O with/O Russians/O,/O instead/O of/O saying/O in/O Russian/O what/O he/O wanted/O to/O
keep/O from/O the/O servants/O,/O he/O began/O to/O speak/O in/O French/O./O

``/ODo/O you/O know/O Madame/O Karenina/PERSON?/O We/O are/O traveling/O together/O./O I/O am/O going/O to/O
see/O her/O now/O,/O''/O he/O said/O in/O French/O,/O carefully/O scrutinizing/O Golenishtchev/PERSON's/O
face/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O I/O did/O not/O know/O''/O -LRB-/Othough/O he/O did/O know/O-RRB-/O,/O Golenishtchev/PERSON answered/O
carelessly/O./O ``/OHave/O you/O been/O here/O long/O?/O''/O he/O added/O./O

``/OFour/O days/O,/O''/O Vronsky/O answered/O,/O once/O more/O scrutinizing/O his/O friend/O's/O face/O
intently/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O he/O's/O a/O decent/O fellow/O,/O and/O will/O look/O at/O the/O thing/O properly/O,/O''/O
Vronsky/PERSON said/O to/O himself/O,/O catching/O the/O significance/O of/O Golenishtchev/PERSON's/O
face/O and/O the/O change/O of/O subject/O./O ``/OI/O can/O introduce/O him/O to/O Anna/PERSON,/O he/O looks/O
at/O it/O properly/O./O''/O

During/O those/O three/O months/O that/O Vronsky/O had/O spent/O abroad/O with/O Anna/PERSON,/O he/O
had/O always/O on/O meeting/O new/O people/O asked/O himself/O how/O the/O new/O person/O would/O
look/O at/O his/O relations/O with/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O for/O the/O most/O part/O,/O in/O men/O,/O he/O had/O
met/O with/O the/O ``/Oproper/O''/O way/O of/O looking/O at/O it/O./O But/O if/O he/O had/O been/O asked/O,/O
and/O those/O who/O looked/O at/O it/O ``/Oproperly/O''/O had/O been/O asked/O,/O exactly/O how/O they/O
did/O look/O at/O it/O,/O both/O he/O and/O they/O would/O have/O been/O greatly/O puzzled/O to/O
answer/O./O

In/O reality/O,/O those/O who/O in/O Vronsky/O's/O opinion/O had/O the/O ``/Oproper/O''/O view/O had/O no/O
sort/O of/O view/O at/O all/O,/O but/O behaved/O in/O general/O as/O well-bred/O persons/O do/O
behave/O in/O regard/O to/O all/O the/O complex/O and/O insoluble/O problems/O with/O which/O
life/O is/O encompassed/O on/O all/O sides/O;/O they/O behaved/O with/O propriety/O,/O avoiding/O
allusions/O and/O unpleasant/O questions/O./O They/O assumed/O an/O air/O of/O fully/O
comprehending/O the/O import/O and/O force/O of/O the/O situation/O,/O of/O accepting/O and/O
even/O approving/O of/O it/O,/O but/O of/O considering/O it/O superfluous/O and/O uncalled/O for/O
to/O put/O all/O this/O into/O words/O./O

Vronsky/O at/O once/O divined/O that/O Golenishtchev/PERSON was/O of/O this/O class/O,/O and/O
therefore/O was/O doubly/O pleased/O to/O see/O him/O./O And/O in/O fact/O,/O Golenishtchev/PERSON's/O
manner/O to/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON,/O when/O he/O was/O taken/O to/O call/O on/O her/O,/O was/O all/O
that/O Vronsky/O could/O have/O desired/O./O Obviously/O without/O the/O slightest/O effort/O
he/O steered/O clear/O of/O all/O subjects/O which/O might/O lead/O to/O embarrassment/O./O

He/O had/O never/O met/O Anna/PERSON before/O,/O and/O was/O struck/O by/O her/O beauty/O,/O and/O still/O
more/O by/O the/O frankness/O with/O which/O she/O accepted/O her/O position/O./O She/O blushed/O
when/O Vronsky/O brought/O in/O Golenishtchev/LOCATION,/O and/O he/O was/O extremely/O charmed/O by/O
this/O childish/O blush/O overspreading/O her/O candid/O and/O handsome/O face/O./O But/O what/O
he/O liked/O particularly/O was/O the/O way/O in/O which/O at/O once/O,/O as/O though/O on/O purpose/O
that/O there/O might/O be/O no/O misunderstanding/O with/O an/O outsider/O,/O she/O called/O
Vronsky/O simply/O Alexey/PERSON,/O and/O said/O they/O were/O moving/O into/O a/O house/O they/O had/O
just/O taken/O,/O what/O was/O here/O called/O a/O palazzo/O./O Golenishtchev/PERSON liked/O this/O
direct/O and/O simple/O attitude/O to/O her/O own/O position/O./O Looking/O at/O Anna/PERSON's/O manner/O
of/O simple-hearted/O,/O spirited/O gaiety/O,/O and/O knowing/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
and/O Vronsky/O,/O Golenishtchev/PERSON fancied/O that/O he/O understood/O her/O perfectly/O./O He/O
fancied/O that/O he/O understood/O what/O she/O was/O utterly/O unable/O to/O understand/O:/O
how/O it/O was/O that/O,/O having/O made/O her/O husband/O wretched/O,/O having/O abandoned/O him/O
and/O her/O son/O and/O lost/O her/O good/O name/O,/O she/O yet/O felt/O full/O of/O spirits/O,/O
gaiety/O,/O and/O happiness/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O in/O the/O guide-book/O,/O''/O said/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O referring/O to/O the/O palazzo/O
Vronsky/O had/O taken/O./O ``/OThere/O's/O a/O first-rate/O Tintoretto/O there/O./O One/O of/O his/O
latest/O period/O./O''/O

``/OI/O tell/O you/O what/O:/O it/O's/O a/O lovely/O day/O,/O let/O's/O go/O and/O have/O another/O look/O at/O
it/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O addressing/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OI/O shall/O be/O very/O glad/O to/O;/O I/O'll/O go/O and/O put/O on/O my/O hat/O./O Would/O you/O say/O it/O's/O
hot/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O stopping/O short/O in/O the/O doorway/O and/O looking/O inquiringly/O at/O
Vronsky/O./O And/O again/O a/O vivid/O flush/O overspread/O her/O face/O./O

Vronsky/PERSON saw/O from/O her/O eyes/O that/O she/O did/O not/O know/O on/O what/O terms/O he/O cared/O
to/O be/O with/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O and/O so/O was/O afraid/O of/O not/O behaving/O as/O he/O would/O
wish/O./O

He/O looked/O a/O long/O,/O tender/O look/O at/O her/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O not/O very/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

And/O it/O seemed/O to/O her/O that/O she/O understood/O everything/O,/O most/O of/O all/O,/O that/O
he/O was/O pleased/O with/O her/O;/O and/O smiling/O to/O him/O,/O she/O walked/O with/O her/O rapid/O
step/O out/O at/O the/O door/O./O

The/O friends/O glanced/O at/O one/O another/O,/O and/O a/O look/O of/O hesitation/O came/O into/O
both/O faces/O,/O as/O though/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O unmistakably/O admiring/O her/O,/O would/O
have/O liked/O to/O say/O something/O about/O her/O,/O and/O could/O not/O find/O the/O right/O
thing/O to/O say/O,/O while/O Vronsky/O desired/O and/O dreaded/O his/O doing/O so/O./O

``/OWell/O then/O,/O''/O Vronsky/O began/O to/O start/O a/O conversation/O of/O some/O sort/O;/O ``/Oso/O
you/O're/O settled/O here/O?/O You/O're/O still/O at/O the/O same/O work/O,/O then/O?/O''/O he/O went/O on/O,/O
recalling/O that/O he/O had/O been/O told/O Golenishtchev/PERSON was/O writing/O something/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O'm/O writing/O the/O second/O part/O of/O the/O _/OTwo/O Elements/O_/O,/O''/O said/O
Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O coloring/O with/O pleasure/O at/O the/O question/O--/O``/Othat/O is/O,/O to/O be/O
exact/O,/O I/O am/O not/O writing/O it/O yet/O;/O I/O am/O preparing/O,/O collecting/O materials/O./O It/O
will/O be/O of/O far/O wider/O scope/O,/O and/O will/O touch/O on/O almost/O all/O questions/O./O We/O
in/O Russia/LOCATION refuse/O to/O see/O that/O we/O are/O the/O heirs/O of/O Byzantium/O,/O''/O and/O he/O
launched/O into/O a/O long/O and/O heated/O explanation/O of/O his/O views/O./O

Vronsky/O at/O the/O first/O moment/O felt/O embarrassed/O at/O not/O even/O knowing/O of/O the/O
first/O part/O of/O the/O _/OTwo/O Elements/O_/O,/O of/O which/O the/O author/O spoke/O as/O something/O
well/O known/O./O But/O as/O Golenishtchev/PERSON began/O to/O lay/O down/O his/O opinions/O and/O
Vronsky/PERSON was/O able/O to/O follow/O them/O even/O without/O knowing/O the/O _/OTwo/O Elements/O_/O,/O
he/O listened/O to/O him/O with/O some/O interest/O,/O for/O Golenishtchev/PERSON spoke/O well/O./O But/O
Vronsky/O was/O startled/O and/O annoyed/O by/O the/O nervous/O irascibility/O with/O which/O
Golenishtchev/PERSON talked/O of/O the/O subject/O that/O engrossed/O him/O./O As/O he/O went/O on/O
talking/O,/O his/O eyes/O glittered/O more/O and/O more/O angrily/O;/O he/O was/O more/O and/O more/O
hurried/O in/O his/O replies/O to/O imaginary/O opponents/O,/O and/O his/O face/O grew/O more/O
and/O more/O excited/O and/O worried/O./O Remembering/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O a/O thin/O,/O lively/O,/O
good-natured/O and/O well-bred/O boy/O,/O always/O at/O the/O head/O of/O the/O class/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON
could/O not/O make/O out/O the/O reason/O of/O his/O irritability/O,/O and/O he/O did/O not/O like/O
it/O./O What/O he/O particularly/O disliked/O was/O that/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O a/O man/O
belonging/O to/O a/O good/O set/O,/O should/O put/O himself/O on/O a/O level/O with/O some/O
scribbling/O fellows/O,/O with/O whom/O he/O was/O irritated/O and/O angry/O./O Was/O it/O worth/O
it/O?/O Vronsky/O disliked/O it/O,/O yet/O he/O felt/O that/O Golenishtchev/PERSON was/O unhappy/O,/O and/O
was/O sorry/O for/O him/O./O Unhappiness/O,/O almost/O mental/O derangement/O,/O was/O visible/O
on/O his/O mobile/O,/O rather/O handsome/O face/O,/O while/O without/O even/O noticing/O Anna/PERSON's/O
coming/O in/O,/O he/O went/O on/O hurriedly/O and/O hotly/O expressing/O his/O views/O./O

When/O Anna/PERSON came/O in/O in/O her/O hat/O and/O cape/O,/O and/O her/O lovely/O hand/O rapidly/O
swinging/O her/O parasol/O,/O and/O stood/O beside/O him/O,/O it/O was/O with/O a/O feeling/O of/O
relief/O that/O Vronsky/O broke/O away/O from/O the/O plaintive/O eyes/O of/O Golenishtchev/O
which/O fastened/O persistently/O upon/O him/O,/O and/O with/O a/O fresh/O rush/O of/O love/O
looked/O at/O his/O charming/O companion/O,/O full/O of/O life/O and/O happiness/O./O
Golenishtchev/PERSON recovered/O himself/O with/O an/O effort/O,/O and/O at/O first/O was/O
dejected/O and/O gloomy/O,/O but/O Anna/PERSON,/O disposed/O to/O feel/O friendly/O with/O everyone/O
as/O she/O was/O at/O that/O time/O,/O soon/O revived/O his/O spirits/O by/O her/O direct/O and/O
lively/O manner/O./O After/O trying/O various/O subjects/O of/O conversation/O,/O she/O got/O
him/O upon/O painting/O,/O of/O which/O he/O talked/O very/O well/O,/O and/O she/O listened/O to/O him/O
attentively/O./O They/O walked/O to/O the/O house/O they/O had/O taken/O,/O and/O looked/O over/O
it/O./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O glad/O of/O one/O thing/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON to/O Golenishtchev/LOCATION when/O they/O were/O
on/O their/O way/O back/O,/O ``/OAlexey/PERSON will/O have/O a/O capital/O _/Oatelier/O_/O./O You/O must/O
certainly/O take/O that/O room/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O Vronsky/O in/O Russian/O,/O using/O the/O
affectionately/O familiar/O form/O as/O though/O she/O saw/O that/O Golenishtchev/PERSON would/O
become/O intimate/O with/O them/O in/O their/O isolation/O,/O and/O that/O there/O was/O no/O need/O
of/O reserve/O before/O him/O./O

``/ODo/O you/O paint/O?/O''/O said/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O turning/O round/O quickly/O to/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O used/O to/O study/O long/O ago/O,/O and/O now/O I/O have/O begun/O to/O do/O a/O little/O,/O''/O
said/O Vronsky/O,/O reddening/O./O

``/OHe/O has/O great/O talent/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON with/O a/O delighted/O smile/O./O ``/OI/O'm/O no/O judge/O,/O
of/O course/O./O But/O good/O judges/O have/O said/O the/O same/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 8/O


Anna/PERSON,/O in/O that/O first/O period/O of/O her/O emancipation/O and/O rapid/O return/O to/O
health/O,/O felt/O herself/O unpardonably/O happy/O and/O full/O of/O the/O joy/O of/O life/O./O The/O
thought/O of/O her/O husband/O's/O unhappiness/O did/O not/O poison/O her/O happiness/O./O On/O
one/O side/O that/O memory/O was/O too/O awful/O to/O be/O thought/O of/O./O On/O the/O other/O side/O
her/O husband/O's/O unhappiness/O had/O given/O her/O too/O much/O happiness/O to/O be/O
regretted/O./O The/O memory/O of/O all/O that/O had/O happened/O after/O her/O illness/O:/O her/O
reconciliation/O with/O her/O husband/O,/O its/O breakdown/O,/O the/O news/O of/O Vronsky/O's/O
wound/O,/O his/O visit/O,/O the/O preparations/O for/O divorce/O,/O the/O departure/O from/O her/O
husband/O's/O house/O,/O the/O parting/O from/O her/O son/O--/Oall/O that/O seemed/O to/O her/O like/O a/O
delirious/O dream/O,/O from/O which/O she/O had/O waked/O up/O alone/O with/O Vronsky/O abroad/O./O
The/O thought/O of/O the/O harm/O caused/O to/O her/O husband/O aroused/O in/O her/O a/O feeling/O
like/O repulsion/O,/O and/O akin/O to/O what/O a/O drowning/O man/O might/O feel/O who/O has/O
shaken/O off/O another/O man/O clinging/O to/O him/O./O That/O man/O did/O drown/O./O It/O was/O an/O
evil/O action/O,/O of/O course/O,/O but/O it/O was/O the/O sole/O means/O of/O escape/O,/O and/O better/O
not/O to/O brood/O over/O these/O fearful/O facts/O./O

One/O consolatory/O reflection/O upon/O her/O conduct/O had/O occurred/O to/O her/O at/O the/O
first/O moment/O of/O the/O final/O rupture/O,/O and/O when/O now/O she/O recalled/O all/O the/O
past/O,/O she/O remembered/O that/O one/O reflection/O./O ``/OI/O have/O inevitably/O made/O that/O
man/O wretched/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O;/O ``/Obut/O I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O profit/O by/O his/O misery/O./O I/O
too/O am/O suffering/O,/O and/O shall/O suffer/O;/O I/O am/O losing/O what/O I/O prized/O above/O
everything/O--/OI/O am/O losing/O my/O good/O name/O and/O my/O son/O./O I/O have/O done/O wrong/O,/O and/O
so/O I/O do/On't/O want/O happiness/O,/O I/O do/On't/O want/O a/O divorce/O,/O and/O shall/O suffer/O from/O
my/O shame/O and/O the/O separation/O from/O my/O child/O./O''/O But/O,/O however/O sincerely/O Anna/PERSON
had/O meant/O to/O suffer/O,/O she/O was/O not/O suffering/O./O Shame/O there/O was/O not/O./O With/O
the/O tact/O of/O which/O both/O had/O such/O a/O large/O share/O,/O they/O had/O succeeded/O in/O
avoiding/O Russian/O ladies/O abroad/O,/O and/O so/O had/O never/O placed/O themselves/O in/O a/O
false/O position/O,/O and/O everywhere/O they/O had/O met/O people/O who/O pretended/O that/O
they/O perfectly/O understood/O their/O position/O,/O far/O better/O indeed/O than/O they/O
did/O themselves/O./O Separation/O from/O the/O son/O she/O loved/O--/Oeven/O that/O did/O not/O
cause/O her/O anguish/O in/O these/O early/O days/O./O The/O baby/O girl/O--/O_/Ohis/O_/O child/O--/Owas/O so/O
sweet/O,/O and/O had/O so/O won/O Anna/PERSON's/O heart/O,/O since/O she/O was/O all/O that/O was/O left/O her/O,/O
that/O Anna/PERSON rarely/O thought/O of/O her/O son/O./O

The/O desire/O for/O life/O,/O waxing/O stronger/O with/O recovered/O health/O,/O was/O so/O
intense/O,/O and/O the/O conditions/O of/O life/O were/O so/O new/O and/O pleasant/O,/O that/O Anna/PERSON
felt/O unpardonably/O happy/O./O The/O more/O she/O got/O to/O know/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O the/O more/O she/O
loved/O him/O./O She/O loved/O him/O for/O himself/O,/O and/O for/O his/O love/O for/O her/O./O Her/O
complete/O ownership/O of/O him/O was/O a/O continual/O joy/O to/O her/O./O His/O presence/O was/O
always/O sweet/O to/O her/O./O All/O the/O traits/O of/O his/O character/O,/O which/O she/O learned/O
to/O know/O better/O and/O better/O,/O were/O unutterably/O dear/O to/O her/O./O His/O appearance/O,/O
changed/O by/O his/O civilian/O dress/O,/O was/O as/O fascinating/O to/O her/O as/O though/O she/O
were/O some/O young/O girl/O in/O love/O./O In/O everything/O he/O said/O,/O thought/O,/O and/O did/O,/O
she/O saw/O something/O particularly/O noble/O and/O elevated/O./O Her/O adoration/O of/O him/O
alarmed/O her/O indeed/O;/O she/O sought/O and/O could/O not/O find/O in/O him/O anything/O not/O
fine/O./O She/O dared/O not/O show/O him/O her/O sense/O of/O her/O own/O insignificance/O beside/O
him/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O her/O that/O,/O knowing/O this/O,/O he/O might/O sooner/O cease/O to/O love/O
her/O;/O and/O she/O dreaded/O nothing/O now/O so/O much/O as/O losing/O his/O love/O,/O though/O she/O
had/O no/O grounds/O for/O fearing/O it/O./O But/O she/O could/O not/O help/O being/O grateful/O to/O
him/O for/O his/O attitude/O to/O her/O,/O and/O showing/O that/O she/O appreciated/O it/O./O He/O,/O
who/O had/O in/O her/O opinion/O such/O a/O marked/O aptitude/O for/O a/O political/O career/O,/O in/O
which/O he/O would/O have/O been/O certain/O to/O play/O a/O leading/O part/O--/Ohe/O had/O
sacrificed/O his/O ambition/O for/O her/O sake/O,/O and/O never/O betrayed/O the/O slightest/O
regret/O./O He/O was/O more/O lovingly/O respectful/O to/O her/O than/O ever/O,/O and/O the/O
constant/O care/O that/O she/O should/O not/O feel/O the/O awkwardness/O of/O her/O position/O
never/O deserted/O him/O for/O a/O single/O instant/O./O He/O,/O so/O manly/O a/O man/O,/O never/O
opposed/O her/O,/O had/O indeed/O,/O with/O her/O,/O no/O will/O of/O his/O own/O,/O and/O was/O anxious/O,/O
it/O seemed/O,/O for/O nothing/O but/O to/O anticipate/O her/O wishes/O./O And/O she/O could/O not/O
but/O appreciate/O this/O,/O even/O though/O the/O very/O intensity/O of/O his/O solicitude/O
for/O her/O,/O the/O atmosphere/O of/O care/O with/O which/O he/O surrounded/O her/O,/O sometimes/O
weighed/O upon/O her/O./O

Vronsky/O,/O meanwhile/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O complete/O realization/O of/O what/O he/O had/O
so/O long/O desired/O,/O was/O not/O perfectly/O happy/O./O He/O soon/O felt/O that/O the/O
realization/O of/O his/O desires/O gave/O him/O no/O more/O than/O a/O grain/O of/O sand/O out/O of/O
the/O mountain/O of/O happiness/O he/O had/O expected/O./O It/O showed/O him/O the/O mistake/O men/O
make/O in/O picturing/O to/O themselves/O happiness/O as/O the/O realization/O of/O their/O
desires/O./O For/O a/O time/O after/O joining/O his/O life/O to/O hers/O,/O and/O putting/O on/O
civilian/O dress/O,/O he/O had/O felt/O all/O the/O delight/O of/O freedom/O in/O general/O of/O
which/O he/O had/O known/O nothing/O before/O,/O and/O of/O freedom/O in/O his/O love/O,/O--/Oand/O he/O
was/O content/O,/O but/O not/O for/O long/O./O He/O was/O soon/O aware/O that/O there/O was/O
springing/O up/O in/O his/O heart/O a/O desire/O for/O desires/O--/O_/Oennui/O_/O./O Without/O
conscious/O intention/O he/O began/O to/O clutch/O at/O every/O passing/O caprice/O,/O taking/O
it/O for/O a/O desire/O and/O an/O object/O./O Sixteen/O hours/O of/O the/O day/O must/O be/O occupied/O
in/O some/O way/O,/O since/O they/O were/O living/O abroad/O in/O complete/O freedom/O,/O outside/O
the/O conditions/O of/O social/O life/O which/O filled/O up/O time/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O As/O for/O
the/O amusements/O of/O bachelor/O existence/O,/O which/O had/O provided/O Vronsky/O with/O
entertainment/O on/O previous/O tours/O abroad/O,/O they/O could/O not/O be/O thought/O of/O,/O
since/O the/O sole/O attempt/O of/O the/O sort/O had/O led/O to/O a/O sudden/O attack/O of/O
depression/O in/O Anna/PERSON,/O quite/O out/O of/O proportion/O with/O the/O cause/O--/Oa/O late/O supper/O
with/O bachelor/O friends/O./O Relations/O with/O the/O society/O of/O the/O place/O--/Oforeign/O
and/O Russian/O--/Owere/O equally/O out/O of/O the/O question/O owing/O to/O the/O irregularity/O
of/O their/O position/O./O The/O inspection/O of/O objects/O of/O interest/O,/O apart/O from/O the/O
fact/O that/O everything/O had/O been/O seen/O already/O,/O had/O not/O for/O Vronsky/O,/O a/O
Russian/O and/O a/O sensible/O man/O,/O the/O immense/O significance/O Englishmen/O are/O able/O
to/O attach/O to/O that/O pursuit/O./O

And/O just/O as/O the/O hungry/O stomach/O eagerly/O accepts/O every/O object/O it/O can/O get/O,/O
hoping/O to/O find/O nourishment/O in/O it/O,/O Vronsky/O quite/O unconsciously/O clutched/O
first/O at/O politics/O,/O then/O at/O new/O books/O,/O and/O then/O at/O pictures/O./O

As/O he/O had/O from/O a/O child/O a/O taste/O for/O painting/O,/O and/O as/O,/O not/O knowing/O what/O to/O
spend/O his/O money/O on/O,/O he/O had/O begun/O collecting/O engravings/O,/O he/O came/O to/O a/O
stop/O at/O painting/O,/O began/O to/O take/O interest/O in/O it/O,/O and/O concentrated/O upon/O it/O
the/O unoccupied/O mass/O of/O desires/O which/O demanded/O satisfaction/O./O

He/O had/O a/O ready/O appreciation/O of/O art/O,/O and/O probably/O,/O with/O a/O taste/O for/O
imitating/O art/O,/O he/O supposed/O himself/O to/O have/O the/O real/O thing/O essential/O for/O
an/O artist/O,/O and/O after/O hesitating/O for/O some/O time/O which/O style/O of/O painting/O to/O
select/O--/Oreligious/O,/O historical/O,/O realistic/O,/O or/O genre/O painting/O--/Ohe/O set/O to/O
work/O to/O paint/O./O He/O appreciated/O all/O kinds/O,/O and/O could/O have/O felt/O inspired/O by/O
any/O one/O of/O them/O;/O but/O he/O had/O no/O conception/O of/O the/O possibility/O of/O knowing/O
nothing/O at/O all/O of/O any/O school/O of/O painting/O,/O and/O of/O being/O inspired/O directly/O
by/O what/O is/O within/O the/O soul/O,/O without/O caring/O whether/O what/O is/O painted/O will/O
belong/O to/O any/O recognized/O school/O./O Since/O he/O knew/O nothing/O of/O this/O,/O and/O drew/O
his/O inspiration/O,/O not/O directly/O from/O life/O,/O but/O indirectly/O from/O life/O
embodied/O in/O art/O,/O his/O inspiration/O came/O very/O quickly/O and/O easily/O,/O and/O as/O
quickly/O and/O easily/O came/O his/O success/O in/O painting/O something/O very/O similar/O
to/O the/O sort/O of/O painting/O he/O was/O trying/O to/O imitate/O./O

More/O than/O any/O other/O style/O he/O liked/O the/O French/O--/Ograceful/O and/O effective/O--/Oand/O
in/O that/O style/O he/O began/O to/O paint/O Anna/PERSON's/O portrait/O in/O Italian/O costume/O,/O and/O
the/O portrait/O seemed/O to/O him/O,/O and/O to/O everyone/O who/O saw/O it/O,/O extremely/O
successful/O./O



Chapter/O 9/O


The/O old/O neglected/O palazzo/O,/O with/O its/O lofty/O carved/O ceilings/O and/O frescoes/O
on/O the/O walls/O,/O with/O its/O floors/O of/O mosaic/O,/O with/O its/O heavy/O yellow/O stuff/O
curtains/O on/O the/O windows/O,/O with/O its/O vases/O on/O pedestals/O,/O and/O its/O open/O
fireplaces/O,/O its/O carved/O doors/O and/O gloomy/O reception/O rooms/O,/O hung/O with/O
pictures/O--/Othis/O palazzo/O did/O much/O,/O by/O its/O very/O appearance/O after/O they/O had/O
moved/O into/O it/O,/O to/O confirm/O in/O Vronsky/O the/O agreeable/O illusion/O that/O he/O was/O
not/O so/O much/O a/O Russian/O country/O gentleman/O,/O a/O retired/O army/O officer/O,/O as/O an/O
enlightened/O amateur/O and/O patron/O of/O the/O arts/O,/O himself/O a/O modest/O artist/O who/O
had/O renounced/O the/O world/O,/O his/O connections/O,/O and/O his/O ambition/O for/O the/O sake/O
of/O the/O woman/O he/O loved/O./O

The/O pose/O chosen/O by/O Vronsky/O with/O their/O removal/O into/O the/O palazzo/O was/O
completely/O successful/O,/O and/O having/O,/O through/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O made/O
acquaintance/O with/O a/O few/O interesting/O people/O,/O for/O a/O time/O he/O was/O satisfied/O./O
He/O painted/O studies/O from/O nature/O under/O the/O guidance/O of/O an/O Italian/O
professor/O of/O painting/O,/O and/O studied/O mediaeval/O Italian/O life/O./O Mediaeval/O
Italian/O life/O so/O fascinated/O Vronsky/O that/O he/O even/O wore/O a/O hat/O and/O flung/O a/O
cloak/O over/O his/O shoulder/O in/O the/O mediaeval/O style/O,/O which/O,/O indeed/O,/O was/O
extremely/O becoming/O to/O him/O./O

``/OHere/O we/O live/O,/O and/O know/O nothing/O of/O what/O's/O going/O on/O,/O''/O Vronsky/PERSON said/O to/O
Golenishtchev/PERSON as/O he/O came/O to/O see/O him/O one/O morning/O./O ``/OHave/O you/O seen/O
Mihailov/PERSON's/O picture/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O handing/O him/O a/O Russian/O gazette/O he/O had/O
received/O that/O morning/O,/O and/O pointing/O to/O an/O article/O on/O a/O Russian/O artist/O,/O
living/O in/O the/O very/O same/O town/O,/O and/O just/O finishing/O a/O picture/O which/O had/O
long/O been/O talked/O about/O,/O and/O had/O been/O bought/O beforehand/O./O The/O article/O
reproached/O the/O government/O and/O the/O academy/O for/O letting/O so/O remarkable/O an/O
artist/O be/O left/O without/O encouragement/O and/O support/O./O

``/OI/O've/O seen/O it/O,/O''/O answered/O Golenishtchev/PERSON./O ``/OOf/O course/O,/O he/O's/O not/O without/O
talent/O,/O but/O it/O's/O all/O in/O a/O wrong/O direction/O./O It/O's/O all/O the/O
Ivanov-Strauss-Renan/LOCATION attitude/O to/O Christ/PERSON and/O to/O religious/O painting/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O is/O the/O subject/O of/O the/O picture/O?/O''/O asked/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OChrist/O before/O Pilate/O./O Christ/PERSON is/O represented/O as/O a/O Jew/O with/O all/O the/O
realism/O of/O the/O new/O school/O./O''/O

And/O the/O question/O of/O the/O subject/O of/O the/O picture/O having/O brought/O him/O to/O one/O
of/O his/O favorite/O theories/O,/O Golenishtchev/PERSON launched/O forth/O into/O a/O
disquisition/O on/O it/O./O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O understand/O how/O they/O can/O fall/O into/O such/O a/O gross/O mistake/O./O Christ/PERSON
always/O has/O His/O definite/O embodiment/O in/O the/O art/O of/O the/O great/O masters/O./O And/O
therefore/O,/O if/O they/O want/O to/O depict/O,/O not/O God/O,/O but/O a/O revolutionist/O or/O a/O
sage/O,/O let/O them/O take/O from/O history/O a/O Socrates/O,/O a/O Franklin/ORGANIZATION,/O a/O Charlotte/PERSON
Corday/PERSON,/O but/O not/O Christ/O./O They/O take/O the/O very/O figure/O which/O can/Onot/O be/O taken/O
for/O their/O art/O,/O and/O then/O.../O''/O

``/OAnd/O is/O it/O true/O that/O this/O Mihailov/PERSON is/O in/O such/O poverty/O?/O''/O asked/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O
thinking/O that/O,/O as/O a/O Russian/O Maecenas/O,/O it/O was/O his/O duty/O to/O assist/O the/O
artist/O regardless/O of/O whether/O the/O picture/O were/O good/O or/O bad/O./O

``/OI/O should/O say/O not/O./O He/O's/O a/O remarkable/O portrait-painter/O./O Have/O you/O ever/O
seen/O his/O portrait/O of/O Madame/O Vassiltchikova/O?/O But/O I/O believe/O he/O does/On't/O
care/O about/O painting/O any/O more/O portraits/O,/O and/O so/O very/O likely/O he/O is/O in/O
want/O./O I/O maintain/O that/O.../O''/O

``/OCould/On't/O we/O ask/O him/O to/O paint/O a/O portrait/O of/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON?/O''/O said/O
Vronsky/O./O

``/OWhy/O mine/O?/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O ``/OAfter/O yours/O I/O do/On't/O want/O another/O portrait/O./O
Better/O have/O one/O of/O Annie/PERSON''/O -LRB-/Oso/O she/O called/O her/O baby/O girl/O-RRB-/O./O ``/OHere/O she/O is/O,/O''/O
she/O added/O,/O looking/O out/O of/O the/O window/O at/O the/O handsome/O Italian/O nurse/O,/O who/O
was/O carrying/O the/O child/O out/O into/O the/O garden/O,/O and/O immediately/O glancing/O
unnoticed/O at/O Vronsky/O./O The/O handsome/O nurse/O,/O from/O whom/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O painting/O
a/O head/O for/O his/O picture/O,/O was/O the/O one/O hidden/O grief/O in/O Anna/PERSON's/O life/O./O He/O
painted/O with/O her/O as/O his/O model/O,/O admired/O her/O beauty/O and/O mediaevalism/O,/O and/O
Anna/PERSON dared/O not/O confess/O to/O herself/O that/O she/O was/O afraid/O of/O becoming/O
jealous/O of/O this/O nurse/O,/O and/O was/O for/O that/O reason/O particularly/O gracious/O and/O
condescending/O both/O to/O her/O and/O her/O little/O son/O./O Vronsky/O,/O too/O,/O glanced/O out/O
of/O the/O window/O and/O into/O Anna/PERSON's/O eyes/O,/O and/O,/O turning/O at/O once/O to/O
Golenishtchev/LOCATION,/O he/O said/O:/O

``/ODo/O you/O know/O this/O Mihailov/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OI/O have/O met/O him/O./O But/O he/O's/O a/O queer/O fish/O,/O and/O quite/O without/O breeding/O./O You/O
know/O,/O one/O of/O those/O uncouth/O new/O people/O one/O's/O so/O often/O coming/O across/O
nowadays/O,/O one/O of/O those/O free-thinkers/O you/O know/O,/O who/O are/O reared/O _/Od'emblée/O_/O
in/O theories/O of/O atheism/O,/O scepticism/O,/O and/O materialism/O./O In/O former/O days/O,/O''/O
said/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O not/O observing/O,/O or/O not/O willing/O to/O observe/O,/O that/O both/O
Anna/PERSON and/O Vronsky/PERSON wanted/O to/O speak/O,/O ``/Oin/O former/O days/O the/O free-thinker/O was/O a/O
man/O who/O had/O been/O brought/O up/O in/O ideas/O of/O religion/O,/O law/O,/O and/O morality/O,/O and/O
only/O through/O conflict/O and/O struggle/O came/O to/O free-thought/O;/O but/O now/O there/O
has/O sprung/O up/O a/O new/O type/O of/O born/O free-thinkers/O who/O grow/O up/O without/O even/O
having/O heard/O of/O principles/O of/O morality/O or/O of/O religion/O,/O of/O the/O existence/O
of/O authorities/O,/O who/O grow/O up/O directly/O in/O ideas/O of/O negation/O in/O everything/O,/O
that/O is/O to/O say/O,/O savages/O./O Well/O,/O he/O's/O of/O that/O class/O./O He/O's/O the/O son/O,/O it/O
appears/O,/O of/O some/O Moscow/LOCATION butler/O,/O and/O has/O never/O had/O any/O sort/O of/O
bringing-up/O./O When/O he/O got/O into/O the/O academy/O and/O made/O his/O reputation/O he/O
tried/O,/O as/O he/O's/O no/O fool/O,/O to/O educate/O himself/O./O And/O he/O turned/O to/O what/O seemed/O
to/O him/O the/O very/O source/O of/O culture/O--/Othe/O magazines/O./O In/O old/O times/O,/O you/O see/O,/O
a/O man/O who/O wanted/O to/O educate/O himself/O--/Oa/O Frenchman/O,/O for/O instance/O--/Owould/O have/O
set/O to/O work/O to/O study/O all/O the/O classics/O and/O theologians/O and/O tragedians/O and/O
historiaris/O and/O philosophers/O,/O and/O,/O you/O know/O,/O all/O the/O intellectual/O work/O
that/O came/O in/O his/O way/O./O But/O in/O our/O day/O he/O goes/O straight/O for/O the/O literature/O
of/O negation/O,/O very/O quickly/O assimilates/O all/O the/O extracts/O of/O the/O science/O of/O
negation/O,/O and/O he/O's/O ready/O./O And/O that/O's/O not/O all/O--/Otwenty/O years/O ago/O he/O would/O
have/O found/O in/O that/O literature/O traces/O of/O conflict/O with/O authorities/O,/O with/O
the/O creeds/O of/O the/O ages/O;/O he/O would/O have/O perceived/O from/O this/O conflict/O that/O
there/O was/O something/O else/O;/O but/O now/O he/O comes/O at/O once/O upon/O a/O literature/O in/O
which/O the/O old/O creeds/O do/O not/O even/O furnish/O matter/O for/O discussion/O,/O but/O it/O
is/O stated/O baldly/O that/O there/O is/O nothing/O else/O--/Oevolution/O,/O natural/O
selection/O,/O struggle/O for/O existence/O--/Oand/O that/O's/O all/O./O In/O my/O article/O I/O've/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O tell/O you/O what/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O who/O had/O for/O a/O long/O while/O been/O exchanging/O
wary/O glances/O with/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O knew/O that/O he/O was/O not/O in/O the/O least/O
interested/O in/O the/O education/O of/O this/O artist/O,/O but/O was/O simply/O absorbed/O by/O
the/O idea/O of/O assisting/O him/O,/O and/O ordering/O a/O portrait/O of/O him/O;/O ``/OI/O tell/O you/O
what/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O resolutely/O interrupting/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O who/O was/O still/O
talking/O away/O,/O ``/Olet/O's/O go/O and/O see/O him/O!/O''/O

Golenishtchev/PERSON recovered/O his/O self-possession/O and/O readily/O agreed/O./O But/O as/O
the/O artist/O lived/O in/O a/O remote/O suburb/O,/O it/O was/O decided/O to/O take/O the/O
carriage/O./O

An/O hour/O later/O Anna/PERSON,/O with/O Golenishtchev/PERSON by/O her/O side/O and/O Vronsky/O on/O the/O
front/O seat/O of/O the/O carriage/O,/O facing/O them/O,/O drove/O up/O to/O a/O new/O ugly/O house/O in/O
the/O remote/O suburb/O./O On/O learning/O from/O the/O porter/O's/O wife/O,/O who/O came/O out/O to/O
them/O,/O that/O Mihailov/PERSON saw/O visitors/O at/O his/O studio/O,/O but/O that/O at/O that/O moment/O
he/O was/O in/O his/O lodging/O only/O a/O couple/O of/O steps/O off/O,/O they/O sent/O her/O to/O him/O
with/O their/O cards/O,/O asking/O permission/O to/O see/O his/O picture/O./O



Chapter/O 10/O


The/O artist/O Mihailov/PERSON was/O,/O as/O always/O,/O at/O work/O when/O the/O cards/O of/O Count/O
Vronsky/O and/O Golenishtchev/PERSON were/O brought/O to/O him/O./O In/O the/O morning/O he/O had/O
been/O working/O in/O his/O studio/O at/O his/O big/O picture/O./O On/O getting/O home/O he/O flew/O
into/O a/O rage/O with/O his/O wife/O for/O not/O having/O managed/O to/O put/O off/O the/O
landlady/O,/O who/O had/O been/O asking/O for/O money/O./O

``/OI/O've/O said/O it/O to/O you/O twenty/O times/O,/O do/On't/O enter/O into/O details/O./O You/O're/O fool/O
enough/O at/O all/O times/O,/O and/O when/O you/O start/O explaining/O things/O in/O Italian/O
you/O're/O a/O fool/O three/O times/O as/O foolish/O,/O''/O he/O said/O after/O a/O long/O dispute/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O let/O it/O run/O so/O long/O;/O it/O's/O not/O my/O fault/O./O If/O I/O had/O the/O money/O.../O''/O

``/OLeave/O me/O in/O peace/O,/O for/O God/O's/O sake/O!/O''/O Mihailov/PERSON shrieked/O,/O with/O tears/O in/O
his/O voice/O,/O and/O,/O stopping/O his/O ears/O,/O he/O went/O off/O into/O his/O working/O room/O,/O
the/O other/O side/O of/O a/O partition/O wall/O,/O and/O closed/O the/O door/O after/O him/O./O
``/OIdiotic/O woman/O!/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O,/O sat/O down/O to/O the/O table/O,/O and/O,/O opening/O
a/O portfolio/O,/O he/O set/O to/O work/O at/O once/O with/O peculiar/O fervor/O at/O a/O sketch/O he/O
had/O begun/O./O

Never/O did/O he/O work/O with/O such/O fervor/O and/O success/O as/O when/O things/O went/O ill/O
with/O him/O,/O and/O especially/O when/O he/O quarreled/O with/O his/O wife/O./O ``/OOh/O!/O damn/O them/O
all/O!/O''/O he/O thought/O as/O he/O went/O on/O working/O./O He/O was/O making/O a/O sketch/O for/O the/O
figure/O of/O a/O man/O in/O a/O violent/O rage/O./O A/O sketch/O had/O been/O made/O before/O,/O but/O he/O
was/O dissatisfied/O with/O it/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O that/O one/O was/O better/O .../O where/O is/O it/O?/O''/O He/O
went/O back/O to/O his/O wife/O,/O and/O scowling/O,/O and/O not/O looking/O at/O her/O,/O asked/O his/O
eldest/O little/O girl/O,/O where/O was/O that/O piece/O of/O paper/O he/O had/O given/O them/O?/O The/O
paper/O with/O the/O discarded/O sketch/O on/O it/O was/O found/O,/O but/O it/O was/O dirty/O,/O and/O
spotted/O with/O candle-grease/O./O Still/O,/O he/O took/O the/O sketch/O,/O laid/O it/O on/O his/O
table/O,/O and/O,/O moving/O a/O little/O away/O,/O screwing/O up/O his/O eyes/O,/O he/O fell/O to/O
gazing/O at/O it/O./O All/O at/O once/O he/O smiled/O and/O gesticulated/O gleefully/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O it/O!/O that/O's/O it/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O,/O at/O once/O picking/O up/O the/O pencil/O,/O he/O
began/O rapidly/O drawing/O./O The/O spot/O of/O tallow/O had/O given/O the/O man/O a/O new/O pose/O./O

He/O had/O sketched/O this/O new/O pose/O,/O when/O all/O at/O once/O he/O recalled/O the/O face/O of/O
a/O shopkeeper/O of/O whom/O he/O had/O bought/O cigars/O,/O a/O vigorous/O face/O with/O a/O
prominent/O chin/O,/O and/O he/O sketched/O this/O very/O face/O,/O this/O chin/O on/O to/O the/O
figure/O of/O the/O man/O./O He/O laughed/O aloud/O with/O delight/O./O The/O figure/O from/O a/O
lifeless/O imagined/O thing/O had/O become/O living/O,/O and/O such/O that/O it/O could/O never/O
be/O changed/O./O That/O figure/O lived/O,/O and/O was/O clearly/O and/O unmistakably/O defined/O./O
The/O sketch/O might/O be/O corrected/O in/O accordance/O with/O the/O requirements/O of/O the/O
figure/O,/O the/O legs/O,/O indeed/O,/O could/O and/O must/O be/O put/O differently/O,/O and/O the/O
position/O of/O the/O left/O hand/O must/O be/O quite/O altered/O;/O the/O hair/O too/O might/O be/O
thrown/O back/O./O But/O in/O making/O these/O corrections/O he/O was/O not/O altering/O the/O
figure/O but/O simply/O getting/O rid/O of/O what/O concealed/O the/O figure/O./O He/O was/O,/O as/O
it/O were/O,/O stripping/O off/O the/O wrappings/O which/O hindered/O it/O from/O being/O
distinctly/O seen/O./O Each/O new/O feature/O only/O brought/O out/O the/O whole/O figure/O in/O
all/O its/O force/O and/O vigor/O,/O as/O it/O had/O suddenly/O come/O to/O him/O from/O the/O spot/O of/O
tallow/O./O He/O was/O carefully/O finishing/O the/O figure/O when/O the/O cards/O were/O
brought/O him/O./O

``/OComing/O,/O coming/O!/O''/O

He/O went/O in/O to/O his/O wife/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O Sasha/PERSON,/O do/On't/O be/O cross/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O smiling/O timidly/O and/O
affectionately/O at/O her/O./O ``/OYou/O were/O to/O blame/O./O I/O was/O to/O blame/O./O I/O'll/O make/O it/O
all/O right/O./O''/O And/O having/O made/O peace/O with/O his/O wife/O he/O put/O on/O an/O olive-green/O
overcoat/O with/O a/O velvet/O collar/O and/O a/O hat/O,/O and/O went/O towards/O his/O studio/O./O
The/O successful/O figure/O he/O had/O already/O forgotten/O./O Now/O he/O was/O delighted/O and/O
excited/O at/O the/O visit/O of/O these/O people/O of/O consequence/O,/O Russians/O,/O who/O had/O
come/O in/O their/O carriage/O./O

Of/O his/O picture/O,/O the/O one/O that/O stood/O now/O on/O his/O easel/O,/O he/O had/O at/O the/O
bottom/O of/O his/O heart/O one/O conviction/O--/Othat/O no/O one/O had/O ever/O painted/O a/O
picture/O like/O it/O./O He/O did/O not/O believe/O that/O his/O picture/O was/O better/O than/O all/O
the/O pictures/O of/O Raphael/PERSON,/O but/O he/O knew/O that/O what/O he/O tried/O to/O convey/O in/O
that/O picture/O,/O no/O one/O ever/O had/O conveyed/O./O This/O he/O knew/O positively/O,/O and/O had/O
known/O a/O long/O while/O,/O ever/O since/O he/O had/O begun/O to/O paint/O it/O./O But/O other/O
people/O's/O criticisms/O,/O whatever/O they/O might/O be/O,/O had/O yet/O immense/O consequence/O
in/O his/O eyes/O,/O and/O they/O agitated/O him/O to/O the/O depths/O of/O his/O soul/O./O Any/O
remark/O,/O the/O most/O insignificant/O,/O that/O showed/O that/O the/O critic/O saw/O even/O the/O
tiniest/O part/O of/O what/O he/O saw/O in/O the/O picture/O,/O agitated/O him/O to/O the/O depths/O
of/O his/O soul/O./O He/O always/O attributed/O to/O his/O critics/O a/O more/O profound/O
comprehension/O than/O he/O had/O himself/O,/O and/O always/O expected/O from/O them/O
something/O he/O did/O not/O himself/O see/O in/O the/O picture/O./O And/O often/O in/O their/O
criticisms/O he/O fancied/O that/O he/O had/O found/O this/O./O

He/O walked/O rapidly/O to/O the/O door/O of/O his/O studio/O,/O and/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O
excitement/O he/O was/O struck/O by/O the/O soft/O light/O on/O Anna/PERSON's/O figure/O as/O she/O stood/O
in/O the/O shade/O of/O the/O entrance/O listening/O to/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O who/O was/O eagerly/O
telling/O her/O something/O,/O while/O she/O evidently/O wanted/O to/O look/O round/O at/O the/O
artist/O./O He/O was/O himself/O unconscious/O how/O,/O as/O he/O approached/O them/O,/O he/O seized/O
on/O this/O impression/O and/O absorbed/O it/O,/O as/O he/O had/O the/O chin/O of/O the/O shopkeeper/O
who/O had/O sold/O him/O the/O cigars/O,/O and/O put/O it/O away/O somewhere/O to/O be/O brought/O out/O
when/O he/O wanted/O it/O./O The/O visitors/O,/O not/O agreeably/O impressed/O beforehand/O by/O
Golenishtchev/PERSON's/O account/O of/O the/O artist/O,/O were/O still/O less/O so/O by/O his/O
personal/O appearance/O./O Thick-set/O and/O of/O middle/O height/O,/O with/O nimble/O
movements/O,/O with/O his/O brown/O hat/O,/O olive-green/O coat/O and/O narrow/O
trousers/O--/Othough/O wide/O trousers/O had/O been/O a/O long/O while/O in/O fashion/O,/O--/Omost/O of/O
all/O,/O with/O the/O ordinariness/O of/O his/O broad/O face/O,/O and/O the/O combined/O
expression/O of/O timidity/O and/O anxiety/O to/O keep/O up/O his/O dignity/O,/O Mihailov/PERSON made/O
an/O unpleasant/O impression/O./O

``/OPlease/O step/O in/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O trying/O to/O look/O indifferent/O,/O and/O going/O into/O
the/O passage/O he/O took/O a/O key/O out/O of/O his/O pocket/O and/O opened/O the/O door/O./O



Chapter/O 11/O


On/O entering/O the/O studio/O,/O Mihailov/PERSON once/O more/O scanned/O his/O visitors/O and/O
noted/O down/O in/O his/O imagination/O Vronsky/O's/O expression/O too/O,/O and/O especially/O
his/O jaws/O./O Although/O his/O artistic/O sense/O was/O unceasingly/O at/O work/O collecting/O
materials/O,/O although/O he/O felt/O a/O continually/O increasing/O excitement/O as/O the/O
moment/O of/O criticizing/O his/O work/O drew/O nearer/O,/O he/O rapidly/O and/O subtly/O
formed/O,/O from/O imperceptible/O signs/O,/O a/O mental/O image/O of/O these/O three/O persons/O./O

That/O fellow/O -LRB-/OGolenishtchev/PERSON-RRB-/O was/O a/O Russian/O living/O here/O./O Mihailov/PERSON did/O not/O
remember/O his/O surname/O nor/O where/O he/O had/O met/O him/O,/O nor/O what/O he/O had/O said/O to/O
him/O./O He/O only/O remembered/O his/O face/O as/O he/O remembered/O all/O the/O faces/O he/O had/O
ever/O seen/O;/O but/O he/O remembered/O,/O too/O,/O that/O it/O was/O one/O of/O the/O faces/O laid/O by/O
in/O his/O memory/O in/O the/O immense/O class/O of/O the/O falsely/O consequential/O and/O poor/O
in/O expression/O./O The/O abundant/O hair/O and/O very/O open/O forehead/O gave/O an/O
appearance/O of/O consequence/O to/O the/O face/O,/O which/O had/O only/O one/O expression/O--/Oa/O
petty/O,/O childish/O,/O peevish/O expression/O,/O concentrated/O just/O above/O the/O bridge/O
of/O the/O narrow/O nose/O./O Vronsky/O and/O Madame/O Karenina/PERSON must/O be/O,/O Mihailov/PERSON
supposed/O,/O distinguished/O and/O wealthy/O Russians/O,/O knowing/O nothing/O about/O art/O,/O
like/O all/O those/O wealthy/O Russians/O,/O but/O posing/O as/O amateurs/O and/O
connoisseurs/O./O ``/OMost/O likely/O they/O've/O already/O looked/O at/O all/O the/O antiques/O,/O
and/O now/O they/O're/O making/O the/O round/O of/O the/O studios/O of/O the/O new/O people/O,/O the/O
German/O humbug/O,/O and/O the/O cracked/O Pre-Raphaelite/O English/O fellow/O,/O and/O have/O
only/O come/O to/O me/O to/O make/O the/O point/O of/O view/O complete/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O He/O was/O
well/O acquainted/O with/O the/O way/O dilettanti/O have/O -LRB-/Othe/O cleverer/O they/O were/O the/O
worse/O he/O found/O them/O-RRB-/O of/O looking/O at/O the/O works/O of/O contemporary/O artists/O
with/O the/O sole/O object/O of/O being/O in/O a/O position/O to/O say/O that/O art/O is/O a/O thing/O
of/O the/O past/O,/O and/O that/O the/O more/O one/O sees/O of/O the/O new/O men/O the/O more/O one/O sees/O
how/O inimitable/O the/O works/O of/O the/O great/O old/O masters/O have/O remained/O./O He/O
expected/O all/O this/O;/O he/O saw/O it/O all/O in/O their/O faces/O,/O he/O saw/O it/O in/O the/O
careless/O indifference/O with/O which/O they/O talked/O among/O themselves/O,/O stared/O at/O
the/O lay/O figures/O and/O busts/O,/O and/O walked/O about/O in/O leisurely/O fashion/O,/O
waiting/O for/O him/O to/O uncover/O his/O picture/O./O But/O in/O spite/O of/O this/O,/O while/O he/O
was/O turning/O over/O his/O studies/O,/O pulling/O up/O the/O blinds/O and/O taking/O off/O the/O
sheet/O,/O he/O was/O in/O intense/O excitement/O,/O especially/O as/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O
conviction/O that/O all/O distinguished/O and/O wealthy/O Russians/O were/O certain/O to/O
be/O beasts/O and/O fools/O,/O he/O liked/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O still/O more/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OHere/O,/O if/O you/O please/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O moving/O on/O one/O side/O with/O his/O nimble/O gait/O
and/O pointing/O to/O his/O picture/O,/O ``/Oit/O's/O the/O exhortation/O to/O Pilate/O./O Matthew/PERSON,/O
chapter/O xxvii/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O feeling/O his/O lips/O were/O beginning/O to/O tremble/O with/O
emotion/O./O He/O moved/O away/O and/O stood/O behind/O them/O./O

For/O the/O few/O seconds/O during/O which/O the/O visitors/O were/O gazing/O at/O the/O picture/O
in/O silence/O Mihailov/PERSON too/O gazed/O at/O it/O with/O the/O indifferent/O eye/O of/O an/O
outsider/O./O For/O those/O few/O seconds/O he/O was/O sure/O in/O anticipation/O that/O a/O
higher/O,/O juster/O criticism/O would/O be/O uttered/O by/O them/O,/O by/O those/O very/O
visitors/O whom/O he/O had/O been/O so/O despising/O a/O moment/O before/O./O He/O forgot/O all/O he/O
had/O thought/O about/O his/O picture/O before/O during/O the/O three/O years/O he/O had/O been/O
painting/O it/O;/O he/O forgot/O all/O its/O qualities/O which/O had/O been/O absolutely/O
certain/O to/O him/O--/Ohe/O saw/O the/O picture/O with/O their/O indifferent/O,/O new/O,/O outside/O
eyes/O,/O and/O saw/O nothing/O good/O in/O it/O./O He/O saw/O in/O the/O foreground/O Pilate/ORGANIZATION's/O
irritated/O face/O and/O the/O serene/O face/O of/O Christ/PERSON,/O and/O in/O the/O background/O the/O
figures/O of/O Pilate/ORGANIZATION's/O retinue/O and/O the/O face/O of/O John/PERSON watching/O what/O was/O
happening/O./O Every/O face/O that/O,/O with/O such/O agony/O,/O such/O blunders/O and/O
corrections/O had/O grown/O up/O within/O him/O with/O its/O special/O character/O,/O every/O
face/O that/O had/O given/O him/O such/O torments/O and/O such/O raptures/O,/O and/O all/O these/O
faces/O so/O many/O times/O transposed/O for/O the/O sake/O of/O the/O harmony/O of/O the/O whole/O,/O
all/O the/O shades/O of/O color/O and/O tones/O that/O he/O had/O attained/O with/O such/O
labor/O--/Oall/O of/O this/O together/O seemed/O to/O him/O now/O,/O looking/O at/O it/O with/O their/O
eyes/O,/O the/O merest/O vulgarity/O,/O something/O that/O had/O been/O done/O a/O thousand/O
times/O over/O./O The/O face/O dearest/O to/O him/O,/O the/O face/O of/O Christ/PERSON,/O the/O center/O of/O
the/O picture/O,/O which/O had/O given/O him/O such/O ecstasy/O as/O it/O unfolded/O itself/O to/O
him/O,/O was/O utterly/O lost/O to/O him/O when/O he/O glanced/O at/O the/O picture/O with/O their/O
eyes/O./O He/O saw/O a/O well-painted/O -LRB-/Ono/O,/O not/O even/O that/O--/Ohe/O distinctly/O saw/O now/O a/O
mass/O of/O defects/O-RRB-/O repetition/O of/O those/O endless/O Christs/O of/O Titian/PERSON,/O Raphael/PERSON,/O
Rubens/PERSON,/O and/O the/O same/O soldiers/O and/O Pilate/ORGANIZATION./O It/O was/O all/O common/O,/O poor/O,/O and/O
stale/O,/O and/O positively/O badly/O painted/O--/Oweak/O and/O unequal/O./O They/O would/O be/O
justified/O in/O repeating/O hypocritically/O civil/O speeches/O in/O the/O presence/O of/O
the/O painter/O,/O and/O pitying/O him/O and/O laughing/O at/O him/O when/O they/O were/O alone/O
again/O./O

The/O silence/O -LRB-/Othough/O it/O lasted/O no/O more/O than/O a/O minute/O-RRB-/O became/O too/O
intolerable/O to/O him/O./O To/O break/O it/O,/O and/O to/O show/O he/O was/O not/O agitated/O,/O he/O
made/O an/O effort/O and/O addressed/O Golenishtchev/PERSON./O

``/OI/O think/O I/O've/O had/O the/O pleasure/O of/O meeting/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O
uneasily/O first/O at/O Anna/PERSON,/O then/O at/O Vronsky/ORGANIZATION,/O in/O fear/O of/O losing/O any/O shade/O of/O
their/O expression/O./O

``/OTo/O be/O sure/O!/O We/O met/O at/O Rossi/PERSON's/O,/O do/O you/O remember/O,/O at/O that/O _/Osoirée/O_/O when/O
that/O Italian/O lady/O recited/O--/Othe/O new/O Rachel/PERSON?/O''/O Golenishtchev/PERSON answered/O
easily/O,/O removing/O his/O eyes/O without/O the/O slightest/O regret/O from/O the/O picture/O
and/O turning/O to/O the/O artist/O./O

Noticing/O,/O however/O,/O that/O Mihailov/PERSON was/O expecting/O a/O criticism/O of/O the/O
picture/O,/O he/O said/O:/O

``/OYour/O picture/O has/O got/O on/O a/O great/O deal/O since/O I/O saw/O it/O last/O time/O;/O and/O what/O
strikes/O me/O particularly/O now/O,/O as/O it/O did/O then/O,/O is/O the/O figure/O of/O Pilate/O./O
One/O so/O knows/O the/O man/O:/O a/O good-natured/O,/O capital/O fellow/O,/O but/O an/O official/O
through/O and/O through/O,/O who/O does/O not/O know/O what/O it/O is/O he/O's/O doing/O./O But/O I/O
fancy/O.../O''/O

All/O Mihailov/PERSON's/O mobile/O face/O beamed/O at/O once/O;/O his/O eyes/O sparkled/O./O He/O tried/O
to/O say/O something/O,/O but/O he/O could/O not/O speak/O for/O excitement/O,/O and/O pretended/O
to/O be/O coughing/O./O Low/PERSON as/O was/O his/O opinion/O of/O Golenishtchev/PERSON's/O capacity/O for/O
understanding/O art/O,/O trifling/O as/O was/O the/O true/O remark/O upon/O the/O fidelity/O of/O
the/O expression/O of/O Pilate/O as/O an/O official/O,/O and/O offensive/O as/O might/O have/O
seemed/O the/O utterance/O of/O so/O unimportant/O an/O observation/O while/O nothing/O was/O
said/O of/O more/O serious/O points/O,/O Mihailov/PERSON was/O in/O an/O ecstasy/O of/O delight/O at/O
this/O observation/O./O He/O had/O himself/O thought/O about/O Pilate/ORGANIZATION's/O figure/O just/O what/O
Golenishtchev/PERSON said/O./O The/O fact/O that/O this/O reflection/O was/O but/O one/O of/O
millions/O of/O reflections/O,/O which/O as/O Mihailov/PERSON knew/O for/O certain/O would/O be/O
true/O,/O did/O not/O diminish/O for/O him/O the/O significance/O of/O Golenishtchev/PERSON's/O
remark/O./O His/O heart/O warmed/O to/O Golenishtchev/PERSON for/O this/O remark/O,/O and/O from/O a/O
state/O of/O depression/O he/O suddenly/O passed/O to/O ecstasy/O./O At/O once/O the/O whole/O of/O
his/O picture/O lived/O before/O him/O in/O all/O the/O indescribable/O complexity/O of/O
everything/O living/O./O Mihailov/PERSON again/O tried/O to/O say/O that/O that/O was/O how/O he/O
understood/O Pilate/O,/O but/O his/O lips/O quivered/O intractably/O,/O and/O he/O could/O not/O
pronounce/O the/O words/O./O Vronsky/O and/O Anna/PERSON too/O said/O something/O in/O that/O subdued/O
voice/O in/O which/O,/O partly/O to/O avoid/O hurting/O the/O artist/O's/O feelings/O and/O partly/O
to/O avoid/O saying/O out/O loud/O something/O silly/O--/Oso/O easily/O said/O when/O talking/O of/O
art/O--/Opeople/O usually/O speak/O at/O exhibitions/O of/O pictures/O./O Mihailov/PERSON fancied/O
that/O the/O picture/O had/O made/O an/O impression/O on/O them/O too/O./O He/O went/O up/O to/O them/O./O

``/OHow/O marvelous/O Christ/PERSON's/O expression/O is/O!/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O Of/O all/O she/O saw/O she/O
liked/O that/O expression/O most/O of/O all/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O that/O it/O was/O the/O center/O
of/O the/O picture/O,/O and/O so/O praise/O of/O it/O would/O be/O pleasant/O to/O the/O artist/O./O
``/OOne/O can/O see/O that/O He/O is/O pitying/O Pilate/O./O''/O

This/O again/O was/O one/O of/O the/O million/O true/O reflections/O that/O could/O be/O found/O
in/O his/O picture/O and/O in/O the/O figure/O of/O Christ/PERSON./O She/O said/O that/O He/O was/O pitying/O
Pilate/O./O In/O Christ/PERSON's/O expression/O there/O ought/O to/O be/O indeed/O an/O expression/O of/O
pity/O,/O since/O there/O is/O an/O expression/O of/O love/O,/O of/O heavenly/O peace/O,/O of/O
readiness/O for/O death/O,/O and/O a/O sense/O of/O the/O vanity/O of/O words/O./O Of/O course/O there/O
is/O the/O expression/O of/O an/O official/O in/O Pilate/O and/O of/O pity/O in/O Christ/PERSON,/O seeing/O
that/O one/O is/O the/O incarnation/O of/O the/O fleshly/O and/O the/O other/O of/O the/O
spiritual/O life/O./O All/O this/O and/O much/O more/O flashed/O into/O Mihailov/PERSON's/O thoughts/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O and/O how/O that/O figure/O is/O done/O--/Owhat/O atmosphere/O!/O One/O can/O walk/O round/O
it/O,/O''/O said/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O unmistakably/O betraying/O by/O this/O remark/O that/O he/O
did/O not/O approve/O of/O the/O meaning/O and/O idea/O of/O the/O figure/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O there/O's/O a/O wonderful/O mastery/O!/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OHow/O those/O figures/O in/O
the/O background/O stand/O out/O!/O There/O you/O have/O technique/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O addressing/O
Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O alluding/O to/O a/O conversation/O between/O them/O about/O Vronsky/O's/O
despair/O of/O attaining/O this/O technique/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O marvelous/O!/O''/O Golenishtchev/PERSON and/O Anna/PERSON assented/O./O In/O spite/O of/O the/O
excited/O condition/O in/O which/O he/O was/O,/O the/O sentence/O about/O technique/O had/O sent/O
a/O pang/O to/O Mihailov/PERSON's/O heart/O,/O and/O looking/O angrily/O at/O Vronsky/O he/O suddenly/O
scowled/O./O He/O had/O often/O heard/O this/O word/O technique/O,/O and/O was/O utterly/O unable/O
to/O understand/O what/O was/O understood/O by/O it/O./O He/O knew/O that/O by/O this/O term/O was/O
understood/O a/O mechanical/O facility/O for/O painting/O or/O drawing/O,/O entirely/O apart/O
from/O its/O subject/O./O He/O had/O noticed/O often/O that/O even/O in/O actual/O praise/O
technique/O was/O opposed/O to/O essential/O quality/O,/O as/O though/O one/O could/O paint/O
well/O something/O that/O was/O bad/O./O He/O knew/O that/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O attention/O and/O
care/O was/O necessary/O in/O taking/O off/O the/O coverings/O,/O to/O avoid/O injuring/O the/O
creation/O itself/O,/O and/O to/O take/O off/O all/O the/O coverings/O;/O but/O there/O was/O no/O art/O
of/O painting/O--/Ono/O technique/O of/O any/O sort/O--/Oabout/O it/O./O If/O to/O a/O little/O child/O or/O
to/O his/O cook/O were/O revealed/O what/O he/O saw/O,/O it/O or/O she/O would/O have/O been/O able/O to/O
peel/O the/O wrappings/O off/O what/O was/O seen/O./O And/O the/O most/O experienced/O and/O
adroit/O painter/O could/O not/O by/O mere/O mechanical/O facility/O paint/O anything/O if/O
the/O lines/O of/O the/O subject/O were/O not/O revealed/O to/O him/O first/O./O Besides/O,/O he/O saw/O
that/O if/O it/O came/O to/O talking/O about/O technique/O,/O it/O was/O impossible/O to/O praise/O
him/O for/O it/O./O In/O all/O he/O had/O painted/O and/O repainted/O he/O saw/O faults/O that/O hurt/O
his/O eyes/O,/O coming/O from/O want/O of/O care/O in/O taking/O off/O the/O wrappings/O--/Ofaults/O he/O
could/O not/O correct/O now/O without/O spoiling/O the/O whole/O./O And/O in/O almost/O all/O the/O
figures/O and/O faces/O he/O saw/O,/O too/O,/O remnants/O of/O the/O wrappings/O not/O perfectly/O
removed/O that/O spoiled/O the/O picture/O./O

``/OOne/O thing/O might/O be/O said/O,/O if/O you/O will/O allow/O me/O to/O make/O the/O remark/O.../O''/O
observed/O Golenishtchev/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O shall/O be/O delighted/O,/O I/O beg/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Mihailov/PERSON with/O a/O forced/O
smile/O./O

``/OThat/O is/O,/O that/O you/O make/O Him/O the/O man-god/O,/O and/O not/O the/O God-man/O./O But/O I/O know/O
that/O was/O what/O you/O meant/O to/O do/O./O''/O

``/OI/O can/Onot/O paint/O a/O Christ/O that/O is/O not/O in/O my/O heart/O,/O''/O said/O Mihailov/PERSON
gloomily/O./O

``/OYes/O;/O but/O in/O that/O case/O,/O if/O you/O will/O allow/O me/O to/O say/O what/O I/O think/O.../O./O
Your/O picture/O is/O so/O fine/O that/O my/O observation/O can/Onot/O detract/O from/O it/O,/O and/O,/O
besides/O,/O it/O is/O only/O my/O personal/O opinion/O./O With/O you/O it/O is/O different/O./O Your/O
very/O motive/O is/O different/O./O But/O let/O us/O take/O Ivanov/PERSON./O I/O imagine/O that/O if/O
Christ/PERSON is/O brought/O down/O to/O the/O level/O of/O an/O historical/O character/O,/O it/O would/O
have/O been/O better/O for/O Ivanov/PERSON to/O select/O some/O other/O historical/O subject/O,/O
fresh/O,/O untouched/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O if/O this/O is/O the/O greatest/O subject/O presented/O to/O art/O?/O''/O

``/OIf/O one/O looked/O one/O would/O find/O others/O./O But/O the/O point/O is/O that/O art/O can/Onot/O
suffer/O doubt/O and/O discussion/O./O And/O before/O the/O picture/O of/O Ivanov/PERSON the/O
question/O arises/O for/O the/O believer/O and/O the/O unbeliever/O alike/O,/O `/OIs/O it/O God/O,/O
or/O is/O it/O not/O God/O?/O'/O and/O the/O unity/O of/O the/O impression/O is/O destroyed/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O so/O?/O I/O think/O that/O for/O educated/O people/O,/O''/O said/O Mihailov/PERSON,/O ``/Othe/O question/O
can/Onot/O exist/O./O''/O

Golenishtchev/PERSON did/O not/O agree/O with/O this/O,/O and/O confounded/O Mihailov/PERSON by/O his/O
support/O of/O his/O first/O idea/O of/O the/O unity/O of/O the/O impression/O being/O essential/O
to/O art/O./O

Mihailov/PERSON was/O greatly/O perturbed/O,/O but/O he/O could/O say/O nothing/O in/O defense/O of/O
his/O own/O idea/O./O



Chapter/O 12/O


Anna/PERSON and/O Vronsky/O had/O long/O been/O exchanging/O glances/O,/O regretting/O their/O
friend/O's/O flow/O of/O cleverness/O./O At/O last/O Vronsky/O,/O without/O waiting/O for/O the/O
artist/O,/O walked/O away/O to/O another/O small/O picture/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O how/O exquisite/O!/O What/O a/O lovely/O thing/O!/O A/O gem/O!/O How/O exquisite/O!/O''/O they/O
cried/O with/O one/O voice/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O they/O're/O so/O pleased/O with/O?/O''/O thought/O Mihailov/PERSON./O He/O had/O
positively/O forgotten/O that/O picture/O he/O had/O painted/O three/O years/O ago/O./O He/O had/O
forgotten/O all/O the/O agonies/O and/O the/O ecstasies/O he/O had/O lived/O through/O with/O
that/O picture/O when/O for/O several/O months/O it/O had/O been/O the/O one/O thought/O
haunting/O him/O day/O and/O night/O./O He/O had/O forgotten/O,/O as/O he/O always/O forgot/O,/O the/O
pictures/O he/O had/O finished/O./O He/O did/O not/O even/O like/O to/O look/O at/O it/O,/O and/O had/O
only/O brought/O it/O out/O because/O he/O was/O expecting/O an/O Englishman/O who/O wanted/O to/O
buy/O it/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O that/O's/O only/O an/O old/O study/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OHow/O fine/O!/O''/O said/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O he/O too/O,/O with/O unmistakable/O sincerity/O,/O
falling/O under/O the/O spell/O of/O the/O picture/O./O

Two/O boys/O were/O angling/O in/O the/O shade/O of/O a/O willow-tree/O./O The/O elder/O had/O just/O
dropped/O in/O the/O hook/O,/O and/O was/O carefully/O pulling/O the/O float/O from/O behind/O a/O
bush/O,/O entirely/O absorbed/O in/O what/O he/O was/O doing/O./O The/O other/O,/O a/O little/O
younger/O,/O was/O lying/O in/O the/O grass/O leaning/O on/O his/O elbows/O,/O with/O his/O tangled/O,/O
flaxen/O head/O in/O his/O hands/O,/O staring/O at/O the/O water/O with/O his/O dreamy/O blue/O
eyes/O./O What/O was/O he/O thinking/O of/O?/O

The/O enthusiasm/O over/O this/O picture/O stirred/O some/O of/O the/O old/O feeling/O for/O it/O
in/O Mihailov/PERSON,/O but/O he/O feared/O and/O disliked/O this/O waste/O of/O feeling/O for/O things/O
past/O,/O and/O so/O,/O even/O though/O this/O praise/O was/O grateful/O to/O him/O,/O he/O tried/O to/O
draw/O his/O visitors/O away/O to/O a/O third/O picture/O./O

But/O Vronsky/PERSON asked/O whether/O the/O picture/O was/O for/O sale/O./O To/O Mihailov/PERSON at/O that/O
moment/O,/O excited/O by/O visitors/O,/O it/O was/O extremely/O distasteful/O to/O speak/O of/O
money/O matters/O./O

``/OIt/O is/O put/O up/O there/O to/O be/O sold/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O,/O scowling/O gloomily/O./O

When/O the/O visitors/O had/O gone/O,/O Mihailov/PERSON sat/O down/O opposite/O the/O picture/O of/O
Pilate/O and/O Christ/PERSON,/O and/O in/O his/O mind/O went/O over/O what/O had/O been/O said/O,/O and/O
what/O,/O though/O not/O said/O,/O had/O been/O implied/O by/O those/O visitors/O./O And/O,/O strange/O
to/O say/O,/O what/O had/O had/O such/O weight/O with/O him/O,/O while/O they/O were/O there/O and/O
while/O he/O mentally/O put/O himself/O at/O their/O point/O of/O view/O,/O suddenly/O lost/O all/O
importance/O for/O him/O./O He/O began/O to/O look/O at/O his/O picture/O with/O all/O his/O own/O
full/O artist/O vision/O,/O and/O was/O soon/O in/O that/O mood/O of/O conviction/O of/O the/O
perfectibility/O,/O and/O so/O of/O the/O significance/O,/O of/O his/O picture/O--/Oa/O conviction/O
essential/O to/O the/O most/O intense/O fervor/O,/O excluding/O all/O other/O interests/O--/Oin/O
which/O alone/O he/O could/O work/O./O

Christ/PERSON's/O foreshortened/O leg/O was/O not/O right/O,/O though/O./O He/O took/O his/O palette/O
and/O began/O to/O work/O./O As/O he/O corrected/O the/O leg/O he/O looked/O continually/O at/O the/O
figure/O of/O John/PERSON in/O the/O background/O,/O which/O his/O visitors/O had/O not/O even/O
noticed/O,/O but/O which/O he/O knew/O was/O beyond/O perfection/O./O When/O he/O had/O finished/O
the/O leg/O he/O wanted/O to/O touch/O that/O figure/O,/O but/O he/O felt/O too/O much/O excited/O for/O
it/O./O He/O was/O equally/O unable/O to/O work/O when/O he/O was/O cold/O and/O when/O he/O was/O too/O
much/O affected/O and/O saw/O everything/O too/O much/O./O There/O was/O only/O one/O stage/O in/O
the/O transition/O from/O coldness/O to/O inspiration/O,/O at/O which/O work/O was/O possible/O./O
Today/O he/O was/O too/O much/O agitated/O./O He/O would/O have/O covered/O the/O picture/O,/O but/O
he/O stopped/O,/O holding/O the/O cloth/O in/O his/O hand/O,/O and/O,/O smiling/O blissfully/O,/O
gazed/O a/O long/O while/O at/O the/O figure/O of/O John/PERSON./O At/O last/O,/O as/O it/O were/O
regretfully/O tearing/O himself/O away/O,/O he/O dropped/O the/O cloth/O,/O and/O,/O exhausted/O
but/O happy/O,/O went/O home/O./O

Vronsky/O,/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O on/O their/O way/O home/O,/O were/O particularly/O
lively/O and/O cheerful/O./O They/O talked/O of/O Mihailov/PERSON and/O his/O pictures/O./O The/O word/O
_/Otalent/O_/O,/O by/O which/O they/O meant/O an/O inborn/O,/O almost/O physical/O,/O aptitude/O apart/O
from/O brain/O and/O heart/O,/O and/O in/O which/O they/O tried/O to/O find/O an/O expression/O for/O
all/O the/O artist/O had/O gained/O from/O life/O,/O recurred/O particularly/O often/O in/O
their/O talk/O,/O as/O though/O it/O were/O necessary/O for/O them/O to/O sum/O up/O what/O they/O had/O
no/O conception/O of/O,/O though/O they/O wanted/O to/O talk/O of/O it/O./O They/O said/O that/O there/O
was/O no/O denying/O his/O talent/O,/O but/O that/O his/O talent/O could/O not/O develop/O for/O
want/O of/O education/O--/Othe/O common/O defect/O of/O our/O Russian/O artists/O./O But/O the/O
picture/O of/O the/O boys/O had/O imprinted/O itself/O on/O their/O memories/O,/O and/O they/O
were/O continually/O coming/O back/O to/O it/O./O ``/OWhat/O an/O exquisite/O thing/O!/O How/O he/O has/O
succeeded/O in/O it/O,/O and/O how/O simply/O!/O He/O does/On't/O even/O comprehend/O how/O good/O it/O
is/O./O Yes/O,/O I/O must/On't/O let/O it/O slip/O;/O I/O must/O buy/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O



Chapter/O 13/O


Mihailov/PERSON sold/O Vronsky/O his/O picture/O,/O and/O agreed/O to/O paint/O a/O portrait/O of/O
Anna/PERSON./O On/O the/O day/O fixed/O he/O came/O and/O began/O the/O work/O./O

From/O the/O fifth/O sitting/O the/O portrait/O impressed/O everyone/O,/O especially/O
Vronsky/O,/O not/O only/O by/O its/O resemblance/O,/O but/O by/O its/O characteristic/O beauty/O./O
It/O was/O strange/O how/O Mihailov/PERSON could/O have/O discovered/O just/O her/O
characteristic/O beauty/O./O ``/OOne/O needs/O to/O know/O and/O love/O her/O as/O I/O have/O loved/O
her/O to/O discover/O the/O very/O sweetest/O expression/O of/O her/O soul/O,/O''/O Vronsky/O
thought/O,/O though/O it/O was/O only/O from/O this/O portrait/O that/O he/O had/O himself/O
learned/O this/O sweetest/O expression/O of/O her/O soul/O./O But/O the/O expression/O was/O so/O
true/O that/O he/O,/O and/O others/O too/O,/O fancied/O they/O had/O long/O known/O it/O./O

``/OI/O have/O been/O struggling/O on/O for/O ever/O so/O long/O without/O doing/O anything/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O of/O his/O own/O portrait/O of/O her/O,/O ``/Oand/O he/O just/O looked/O and/O painted/O it/O./O
That/O's/O where/O technique/O comes/O in/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O will/O come/O,/O''/O was/O the/O consoling/O reassurance/O given/O him/O by/O
Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O in/O whose/O view/O Vronsky/O had/O both/O talent/O,/O and/O what/O was/O most/O
important/O,/O culture/O,/O giving/O him/O a/O wider/O outlook/O on/O art/O./O Golenishtchev/PERSON's/O
faith/O in/O Vronsky/O's/O talent/O was/O propped/O up/O by/O his/O own/O need/O of/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O
sympathy/O and/O approval/O for/O his/O own/O articles/O and/O ideas/O,/O and/O he/O felt/O that/O
the/O praise/O and/O support/O must/O be/O mutual/O./O

In/O another/O man/O's/O house/O,/O and/O especially/O in/O Vronsky/O's/O palazzo/O,/O Mihailov/PERSON
was/O quite/O a/O different/O man/O from/O what/O he/O was/O in/O his/O studio/O./O He/O behaved/O
with/O hostile/O courtesy/O,/O as/O though/O he/O were/O afraid/O of/O coming/O closer/O to/O
people/O he/O did/O not/O respect/O./O He/O called/O Vronsky/O ``/Oyour/O excellency/O,/O''/O and/O
notwithstanding/O Anna/PERSON's/O and/O Vronsky/O's/O invitations/O,/O he/O would/O never/O stay/O to/O
dinner/O,/O nor/O come/O except/O for/O the/O sittings/O./O Anna/PERSON was/O even/O more/O friendly/O to/O
him/O than/O to/O other/O people/O,/O and/O was/O very/O grateful/O for/O her/O portrait/O./O
Vronsky/PERSON was/O more/O than/O cordial/O with/O him/O,/O and/O was/O obviously/O interested/O to/O
know/O the/O artist/O's/O opinion/O of/O his/O picture/O./O Golenishtchev/PERSON never/O let/O slip/O
an/O opportunity/O of/O instilling/O sound/O ideas/O about/O art/O into/O Mihailov/PERSON./O But/O
Mihailov/PERSON remained/O equally/O chilly/O to/O all/O of/O them/O./O Anna/PERSON was/O aware/O from/O his/O
eyes/O that/O he/O liked/O looking/O at/O her/O,/O but/O he/O avoided/O conversation/O with/O her/O./O
Vronsky/PERSON's/O talk/O about/O his/O painting/O he/O met/O with/O stubborn/O silence/O,/O and/O he/O
was/O as/O stubbornly/O silent/O when/O he/O was/O shown/O Vronsky/O's/O picture/O./O He/O was/O
unmistakably/O bored/O by/O Golenishtchev/PERSON's/O conversation/O,/O and/O he/O did/O not/O
attempt/O to/O oppose/O him/O./O

Altogether/O Mihailov/PERSON,/O with/O his/O reserved/O and/O disagreeable/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O
hostile/O attitude/O,/O was/O quite/O disliked/O by/O them/O as/O they/O got/O to/O know/O him/O
better/O;/O and/O they/O were/O glad/O when/O the/O sittings/O were/O over/O,/O and/O they/O were/O
left/O with/O a/O magnificent/O portrait/O in/O their/O possession/O,/O and/O he/O gave/O up/O
coming/O./O Golenishtchev/PERSON was/O the/O first/O to/O give/O expression/O to/O an/O idea/O that/O
had/O occurred/O to/O all/O of/O them/O,/O which/O was/O that/O Mihailov/PERSON was/O simply/O jealous/O
of/O Vronsky/O./O

``/ONot/O envious/O,/O let/O us/O say/O,/O since/O he/O has/O _/Otalent/O_/O;/O but/O it/O annoys/O him/O that/O
a/O wealthy/O man/O of/O the/O highest/O society/O,/O and/O a/O count/O,/O too/O -LRB-/Oyou/O know/O they/O
all/O detest/O a/O title/O-RRB-/O,/O can/O,/O without/O any/O particular/O trouble/O,/O do/O as/O well/O,/O if/O
not/O better/O,/O than/O he/O who/O has/O devoted/O all/O his/O life/O to/O it/O./O And/O more/O than/O
all/O,/O it/O's/O a/O question/O of/O culture/O,/O which/O he/O is/O without/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O defended/O Mihailov/PERSON,/O but/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O his/O heart/O he/O believed/O
it/O,/O because/O in/O his/O view/O a/O man/O of/O a/O different/O,/O lower/O world/O would/O be/O sure/O
to/O be/O envious/O./O

Anna/PERSON's/O portrait/O--/Othe/O same/O subject/O painted/O from/O nature/O both/O by/O him/O and/O by/O
Mihailov/PERSON--/Oought/O to/O have/O shown/O Vronsky/O the/O difference/O between/O him/O and/O
Mihailov/PERSON;/O but/O he/O did/O not/O see/O it/O./O Only/O after/O Mihailov/PERSON's/O portrait/O was/O
painted/O he/O left/O off/O painting/O his/O portrait/O of/O Anna/PERSON,/O deciding/O that/O it/O was/O
now/O not/O needed/O./O His/O picture/O of/O mediaeval/O life/O he/O went/O on/O with/O./O And/O he/O
himself/O,/O and/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O and/O still/O more/O Anna/PERSON,/O thought/O it/O very/O good/O,/O
because/O it/O was/O far/O more/O like/O the/O celebrated/O pictures/O they/O knew/O than/O
Mihailov/PERSON's/O picture/O./O

Mihailov/PERSON meanwhile/O,/O although/O Anna/PERSON's/O portrait/O greatly/O fascinated/O him/O,/O was/O
even/O more/O glad/O than/O they/O were/O when/O the/O sittings/O were/O over/O,/O and/O he/O had/O no/O
longer/O to/O listen/O to/O Golenishtchev/PERSON's/O disquisitions/O upon/O art/O,/O and/O could/O
forget/O about/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O painting/O./O He/O knew/O that/O Vronsky/O could/O not/O be/O
prevented/O from/O amusing/O himself/O with/O painting/O;/O he/O knew/O that/O he/O and/O all/O
dilettanti/O had/O a/O perfect/O right/O to/O paint/O what/O they/O liked/O,/O but/O it/O was/O
distasteful/O to/O him/O./O A/O man/O could/O not/O be/O prevented/O from/O making/O himself/O a/O
big/O wax/O doll/O,/O and/O kissing/O it/O./O But/O if/O the/O man/O were/O to/O come/O with/O the/O doll/O
and/O sit/O before/O a/O man/O in/O love/O,/O and/O begin/O caressing/O his/O doll/O as/O the/O lover/O
caressed/O the/O woman/O he/O loved/O,/O it/O would/O be/O distasteful/O to/O the/O lover/O./O Just/O
such/O a/O distasteful/O sensation/O was/O what/O Mihailov/PERSON felt/O at/O the/O sight/O of/O
Vronsky/O's/O painting/O:/O he/O felt/O it/O both/O ludicrous/O and/O irritating/O,/O both/O
pitiable/O and/O offensive/O./O

Vronsky/O's/O interest/O in/O painting/O and/O the/O Middle/O Ages/O did/O not/O last/O long/O./O He/O
had/O enough/O taste/O for/O painting/O to/O be/O unable/O to/O finish/O his/O picture/O./O The/O
picture/O came/O to/O a/O standstill/O./O He/O was/O vaguely/O aware/O that/O its/O defects/O,/O
inconspicuous/O at/O first/O,/O would/O be/O glaring/O if/O he/O were/O to/O go/O on/O with/O it/O./O
The/O same/O experience/O befell/O him/O as/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O who/O felt/O that/O he/O had/O
nothing/O to/O say/O,/O and/O continually/O deceived/O himself/O with/O the/O theory/O that/O
his/O idea/O was/O not/O yet/O mature/O,/O that/O he/O was/O working/O it/O out/O and/O collecting/O
materials/O./O This/O exasperated/O and/O tortured/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O but/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O
incapable/O of/O deceiving/O and/O torturing/O himself/O,/O and/O even/O more/O incapable/O of/O
exasperation/O./O With/O his/O characteristic/O decision/O,/O without/O explanation/O or/O
apology/O,/O he/O simply/O ceased/O working/O at/O painting/O./O

But/O without/O this/O occupation/O,/O the/O life/O of/O Vronsky/O and/O of/O Anna/PERSON,/O who/O
wondered/O at/O his/O loss/O of/O interest/O in/O it/O,/O struck/O them/O as/O intolerably/O
tedious/O in/O an/O Italian/O town/O./O The/O palazzo/O suddenly/O seemed/O so/O obtrusively/O
old/O and/O dirty/O,/O the/O spots/O on/O the/O curtains/O,/O the/O cracks/O in/O the/O floors/O,/O the/O
broken/O plaster/O on/O the/O cornices/O became/O so/O disagreeably/O obvious/O,/O and/O the/O
everlasting/O sameness/O of/O Golenishtchev/PERSON,/O and/O the/O Italian/O professor/O and/O the/O
German/O traveler/O became/O so/O wearisome/O,/O that/O they/O had/O to/O make/O some/O change/O./O
They/O resolved/O to/O go/O to/O Russia/LOCATION,/O to/O the/O country/O./O In/O Petersburg/LOCATION Vronsky/O
intended/O to/O arrange/O a/O partition/O of/O the/O land/O with/O his/O brother/O,/O while/O Anna/PERSON
meant/O to/O see/O her/O son/O./O The/O summer/O they/O intended/O to/O spend/O on/O Vronsky/O's/O
great/O family/O estate/O./O



Chapter/O 14/O


Levin/PERSON had/O been/O married/O three/O months/O./O He/O was/O happy/O,/O but/O not/O at/O all/O in/O the/O
way/O he/O had/O expected/O to/O be/O./O At/O every/O step/O he/O found/O his/O former/O dreams/O
disappointed/O,/O and/O new/O,/O unexpected/O surprises/O of/O happiness/O./O He/O was/O happy/O;/O
but/O on/O entering/O upon/O family/O life/O he/O saw/O at/O every/O step/O that/O it/O was/O
utterly/O different/O from/O what/O he/O had/O imagined/O./O At/O every/O step/O he/O
experienced/O what/O a/O man/O would/O experience/O who/O,/O after/O admiring/O the/O smooth/O,/O
happy/O course/O of/O a/O little/O boat/O on/O a/O lake/O,/O should/O get/O himself/O into/O that/O
little/O boat/O./O He/O saw/O that/O it/O was/O not/O all/O sitting/O still/O,/O floating/O
smoothly/O;/O that/O one/O had/O to/O think/O too/O,/O not/O for/O an/O instant/O to/O forget/O where/O
one/O was/O floating/O;/O and/O that/O there/O was/O water/O under/O one/O,/O and/O that/O one/O must/O
row/O;/O and/O that/O his/O unaccustomed/O hands/O would/O be/O sore/O;/O and/O that/O it/O was/O only/O
to/O look/O at/O it/O that/O was/O easy/O;/O but/O that/O doing/O it/O,/O though/O very/O delightful/O,/O
was/O very/O difficult/O./O

As/O a/O bachelor/O,/O when/O he/O had/O watched/O other/O people/O's/O married/O life/O,/O seen/O the/O
petty/O cares/O,/O the/O squabbles/O,/O the/O jealousy/O,/O he/O had/O only/O smiled/O
contemptuously/O in/O his/O heart/O./O In/O his/O future/O married/O life/O there/O could/O be/O,/O
he/O was/O convinced/O,/O nothing/O of/O that/O sort/O;/O even/O the/O external/O forms/O,/O indeed/O,/O
he/O fancied/O,/O must/O be/O utterly/O unlike/O the/O life/O of/O others/O in/O everything/O./O And/O
all/O of/O a/O sudden/O,/O instead/O of/O his/O life/O with/O his/O wife/O being/O made/O on/O an/O
individual/O pattern/O,/O it/O was/O,/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O entirely/O made/O up/O of/O the/O
pettiest/O details/O,/O which/O he/O had/O so/O despised/O before/O,/O but/O which/O now/O,/O by/O no/O
will/O of/O his/O own/O,/O had/O gained/O an/O extraordinary/O importance/O that/O it/O was/O
useless/O to/O contend/O against/O./O And/O Levin/PERSON saw/O that/O the/O organization/O of/O all/O
these/O details/O was/O by/O no/O means/O so/O easy/O as/O he/O had/O fancied/O before/O./O Although/O
Levin/PERSON believed/O himself/O to/O have/O the/O most/O exact/O conceptions/O of/O domestic/O
life/O,/O unconsciously/O,/O like/O all/O men/O,/O he/O pictured/O domestic/O life/O as/O the/O
happiest/O enjoyment/O of/O love/O,/O with/O nothing/O to/O hinder/O and/O no/O petty/O cares/O to/O
distract/O./O He/O ought/O,/O as/O he/O conceived/O the/O position/O,/O to/O do/O his/O work/O,/O and/O to/O
find/O repose/O from/O it/O in/O the/O happiness/O of/O love/O./O She/O ought/O to/O be/O beloved/O,/O
and/O nothing/O more/O./O But/O,/O like/O all/O men/O,/O he/O forgot/O that/O she/O too/O would/O want/O
work/O./O And/O he/O was/O surprised/O that/O she/O,/O his/O poetic/O,/O exquisite/O Kitty/PERSON,/O could/O,/O
not/O merely/O in/O the/O first/O weeks/O,/O but/O even/O in/O the/O first/O days/O of/O their/O
married/O life/O,/O think/O,/O remember/O,/O and/O busy/O herself/O about/O tablecloths/O,/O and/O
furniture/O,/O about/O mattresses/O for/O visitors/O,/O about/O a/O tray/O,/O about/O the/O cook/O,/O
and/O the/O dinner/O,/O and/O so/O on/O./O While/O they/O were/O still/O engaged/O,/O he/O had/O been/O
struck/O by/O the/O definiteness/O with/O which/O she/O had/O declined/O the/O tour/O abroad/O
and/O decided/O to/O go/O into/O the/O country/O,/O as/O though/O she/O knew/O of/O something/O she/O
wanted/O,/O and/O could/O still/O think/O of/O something/O outside/O her/O love/O./O This/O had/O
jarred/O upon/O him/O then/O,/O and/O now/O her/O trivial/O cares/O and/O anxieties/O jarred/O
upon/O him/O several/O times/O./O But/O he/O saw/O that/O this/O was/O essential/O for/O her/O./O And/O,/O
loving/O her/O as/O he/O did/O,/O though/O he/O did/O not/O understand/O the/O reason/O of/O them/O,/O
and/O jeered/O at/O these/O domestic/O pursuits/O,/O he/O could/O not/O help/O admiring/O them/O./O
He/O jeered/O at/O the/O way/O in/O which/O she/O arranged/O the/O furniture/O they/O had/O
brought/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION;/O rearranged/O their/O room/O;/O hung/O up/O curtains/O;/O prepared/O
rooms/O for/O visitors/O;/O a/O room/O for/O Dolly/PERSON;/O saw/O after/O an/O abode/O for/O her/O new/O
maid/O;/O ordered/O dinner/O of/O the/O old/O cook/O;/O came/O into/O collision/O with/O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON,/O taking/O from/O her/O the/O charge/O of/O the/O stores/O./O He/O saw/O how/O the/O old/O
cook/O smiled/O,/O admiring/O her/O,/O and/O listening/O to/O her/O inexperienced/O,/O
impossible/O orders/O,/O how/O mournfully/O and/O tenderly/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON shook/O
her/O head/O over/O the/O young/O mistress/O's/O new/O arrangements/O./O He/O saw/O that/O Kitty/PERSON
was/O extraordinarily/O sweet/O when/O,/O laughing/O and/O crying/O,/O she/O came/O to/O tell/O
him/O that/O her/O maid/O,/O Masha/PERSON,/O was/O used/O to/O looking/O upon/O her/O as/O her/O young/O
lady/O,/O and/O so/O no/O one/O obeyed/O her/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O him/O sweet/O,/O but/O strange/O,/O and/O
he/O thought/O it/O would/O have/O been/O better/O without/O this/O./O

He/O did/O not/O know/O how/O great/O a/O sense/O of/O change/O she/O was/O experiencing/O;/O she/O,/O
who/O at/O home/O had/O sometimes/O wanted/O some/O favorite/O dish/O,/O or/O sweets/O,/O without/O
the/O possibility/O of/O getting/O either/O,/O now/O could/O order/O what/O she/O liked/O,/O buy/O
pounds/O of/O sweets/O,/O spend/O as/O much/O money/O as/O she/O liked/O,/O and/O order/O any/O
puddings/O she/O pleased/O./O

She/O was/O dreaming/O with/O delight/O now/O of/O Dolly/PERSON's/O coming/O to/O them/O with/O her/O
children/O,/O especially/O because/O she/O would/O order/O for/O the/O children/O their/O
favorite/O puddings/O and/O Dolly/PERSON would/O appreciate/O all/O her/O new/O housekeeping/O./O
She/O did/O not/O know/O herself/O why/O and/O wherefore/O,/O but/O the/O arranging/O of/O her/O
house/O had/O an/O irresistible/O attraction/O for/O her/O./O Instinctively/O feeling/O the/O
approach/O of/O spring/O,/O and/O knowing/O that/O there/O would/O be/O days/O of/O rough/O
weather/O too/O,/O she/O built/O her/O nest/O as/O best/O she/O could/O,/O and/O was/O in/O haste/O at/O
