the/O same/O time/O to/O build/O it/O and/O to/O learn/O how/O to/O do/O it/O./O

This/O care/O for/O domestic/O details/O in/O Kitty/LOCATION,/O so/O opposed/O to/O Levin/PERSON's/O ideal/O of/O
exalted/O happiness/O,/O was/O at/O first/O one/O of/O the/O disappointments/O;/O and/O this/O
sweet/O care/O of/O her/O household/O,/O the/O aim/O of/O which/O he/O did/O not/O understand/O,/O but/O
could/O not/O help/O loving/O,/O was/O one/O of/O the/O new/O happy/O surprises/O./O

Another/O disappointment/O and/O happy/O surprise/O came/O in/O their/O quarrels/O./O Levin/PERSON
could/O never/O have/O conceived/O that/O between/O him/O and/O his/O wife/O any/O relations/O
could/O arise/O other/O than/O tender/O,/O respectful/O and/O loving/O,/O and/O all/O at/O once/O in/O
the/O very/O early/O days/O they/O quarreled/O,/O so/O that/O she/O said/O he/O did/O not/O care/O for/O
her/O,/O that/O he/O cared/O for/O no/O one/O but/O himself/O,/O burst/O into/O tears/O,/O and/O wrung/O
her/O arms/O./O

This/O first/O quarrel/O arose/O from/O Levin/PERSON's/O having/O gone/O out/O to/O a/O new/O farmhouse/O
and/O having/O been/O away/O half/O an/O hour/O too/O long/O,/O because/O he/O had/O tried/O to/O get/O
home/O by/O a/O short/O cut/O and/O had/O lost/O his/O way/O./O He/O drove/O home/O thinking/O of/O
nothing/O but/O her/O,/O of/O her/O love/O,/O of/O his/O own/O happiness/O,/O and/O the/O nearer/O he/O
drew/O to/O home/O,/O the/O warmer/O was/O his/O tenderness/O for/O her/O./O He/O ran/O into/O the/O
room/O with/O the/O same/O feeling/O,/O with/O an/O even/O stronger/O feeling/O than/O he/O had/O
had/O when/O he/O reached/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O'/O house/O to/O make/O his/O offer/O./O And/O
suddenly/O he/O was/O met/O by/O a/O lowering/O expression/O he/O had/O never/O seen/O in/O her/O./O
He/O would/O have/O kissed/O her/O;/O she/O pushed/O him/O away/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O've/O been/O enjoying/O yourself/O,/O''/O she/O began/O,/O trying/O to/O be/O calm/O and/O
spiteful/O./O But/O as/O soon/O as/O she/O opened/O her/O mouth/O,/O a/O stream/O of/O reproach/O,/O of/O
senseless/O jealousy/O,/O of/O all/O that/O had/O been/O torturing/O her/O during/O that/O half/O
hour/O which/O she/O had/O spent/O sitting/O motionless/O at/O the/O window/O,/O burst/O from/O
her/O./O It/O was/O only/O then/O,/O for/O the/O first/O time/O,/O that/O he/O clearly/O understood/O
what/O he/O had/O not/O understood/O when/O he/O led/O her/O out/O of/O the/O church/O after/O the/O
wedding/O./O He/O felt/O now/O that/O he/O was/O not/O simply/O close/O to/O her/O,/O but/O that/O he/O
did/O not/O know/O where/O he/O ended/O and/O she/O began/O./O He/O felt/O this/O from/O the/O
agonizing/O sensation/O of/O division/O that/O he/O experienced/O at/O that/O instant/O./O He/O
was/O offended/O for/O the/O first/O instant/O,/O but/O the/O very/O same/O second/O he/O felt/O
that/O he/O could/O not/O be/O offended/O by/O her/O,/O that/O she/O was/O himself/O./O He/O felt/O for/O
the/O first/O moment/O as/O a/O man/O feels/O when/O,/O having/O suddenly/O received/O a/O violent/O
blow/O from/O behind/O,/O he/O turns/O round/O,/O angry/O and/O eager/O to/O avenge/O himself/O,/O to/O
look/O for/O his/O antagonist/O,/O and/O finds/O that/O it/O is/O he/O himself/O who/O has/O
accidentally/O struck/O himself/O,/O that/O there/O is/O no/O one/O to/O be/O angry/O with/O,/O and/O
that/O he/O must/O put/O up/O with/O and/O try/O to/O soothe/O the/O pain/O./O

Never/O afterwards/O did/O he/O feel/O it/O with/O such/O intensity/O,/O but/O this/O first/O time/O
he/O could/O not/O for/O a/O long/O while/O get/O over/O it/O./O His/O natural/O feeling/O urged/O him/O
to/O defend/O himself/O,/O to/O prove/O to/O her/O she/O was/O wrong/O;/O but/O to/O prove/O her/O wrong/O
would/O mean/O irritating/O her/O still/O more/O and/O making/O the/O rupture/O greater/O that/O
was/O the/O cause/O of/O all/O his/O suffering/O./O One/O habitual/O feeling/O impelled/O him/O to/O
get/O rid/O of/O the/O blame/O and/O to/O pass/O it/O on/O to/O her/O./O Another/O feeling/O,/O even/O
stronger/O,/O impelled/O him/O as/O quickly/O as/O possible/O to/O smooth/O over/O the/O rupture/O
without/O letting/O it/O grow/O greater/O./O To/O remain/O under/O such/O undeserved/O
reproach/O was/O wretched/O,/O but/O to/O make/O her/O suffer/O by/O justifying/O himself/O was/O
worse/O still/O./O Like/O a/O man/O half-awake/O in/O an/O agony/O of/O pain/O,/O he/O wanted/O to/O
tear/O out/O,/O to/O fling/O away/O the/O aching/O place/O,/O and/O coming/O to/O his/O senses/O,/O he/O
felt/O that/O the/O aching/O place/O was/O himself/O./O He/O could/O do/O nothing/O but/O try/O to/O
help/O the/O aching/O place/O to/O bear/O it/O,/O and/O this/O he/O tried/O to/O do/O./O

They/O made/O peace/O./O She/O,/O recognizing/O that/O she/O was/O wrong/O,/O though/O she/O did/O not/O
say/O so/O,/O became/O tenderer/O to/O him/O,/O and/O they/O experienced/O new/O,/O redoubled/O
happiness/O in/O their/O love/O./O But/O that/O did/O not/O prevent/O such/O quarrels/O from/O
happening/O again/O,/O and/O exceedingly/O often/O too/O,/O on/O the/O most/O unexpected/O and/O
trivial/O grounds/O./O These/O quarrels/O frequently/O arose/O from/O the/O fact/O that/O they/O
did/O not/O yet/O know/O what/O was/O of/O importance/O to/O each/O other/O and/O that/O all/O this/O
early/O period/O they/O were/O both/O often/O in/O a/O bad/O temper/O./O When/O one/O was/O in/O a/O
good/O temper/O,/O and/O the/O other/O in/O a/O bad/O temper/O,/O the/O peace/O was/O not/O broken/O;/O
but/O when/O both/O happened/O to/O be/O in/O an/O ill-humor/O,/O quarrels/O sprang/O up/O from/O
such/O incomprehensibly/O trifling/O causes/O,/O that/O they/O could/O never/O remember/O
afterwards/O what/O they/O had/O quarreled/O about/O./O It/O is/O true/O that/O when/O they/O were/O
both/O in/O a/O good/O temper/O their/O enjoyment/O of/O life/O was/O redoubled/O./O But/O still/O
this/O first/O period/O of/O their/O married/O life/O was/O a/O difficult/O time/O for/O them/O./O

During/O all/O this/O early/O time/O they/O had/O a/O peculiarly/O vivid/O sense/O of/O tension/O,/O
as/O it/O were/O,/O a/O tugging/O in/O opposite/O directions/O of/O the/O chain/O by/O which/O they/O
were/O bound/O./O Altogether/O their/O honeymoon/O--/Othat/O is/O to/O say/O,/O the/O month/O after/O
their/O wedding/O--/Ofrom/O which/O from/O tradition/O Levin/PERSON expected/O so/O much/O,/O was/O not/O
merely/O not/O a/O time/O of/O sweetness/O,/O but/O remained/O in/O the/O memories/O of/O both/O as/O
the/O bitterest/O and/O most/O humiliating/O period/O in/O their/O lives/O./O They/O both/O
alike/O tried/O in/O later/O life/O to/O blot/O out/O from/O their/O memories/O all/O the/O
monstrous/O,/O shameful/O incidents/O of/O that/O morbid/O period/O,/O when/O both/O were/O
rarely/O in/O a/O normal/O frame/O of/O mind/O,/O both/O were/O rarely/O quite/O themselves/O./O

It/O was/O only/O in/O the/O third/O month/O of/O their/O married/O life/O,/O after/O their/O return/O
from/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O where/O they/O had/O been/O staying/O for/O a/O month/O,/O that/O their/O life/O
began/O to/O go/O more/O smoothly/O./O



Chapter/O 15/O


They/O had/O just/O come/O back/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O were/O glad/O to/O be/O alone/O./O He/O was/O
sitting/O at/O the/O writing/O table/O in/O his/O study/O,/O writing/O./O She/O,/O wearing/O the/O
dark/O lilac/O dress/O she/O had/O worn/O during/O the/O first/O days/O of/O their/O married/O
life/O,/O and/O put/O on/O again/O today/O,/O a/O dress/O particularly/O remembered/O and/O loved/O
by/O him/O,/O was/O sitting/O on/O the/O sofa/O,/O the/O same/O old-fashioned/O leather/O sofa/O
which/O had/O always/O stood/O in/O the/O study/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O father/O's/O and/O
grandfather/O's/O days/O./O She/O was/O sewing/O at/O _/Obroderie/O anglaise/O_/O./O He/O thought/O
and/O wrote/O,/O never/O losing/O the/O happy/O consciousness/O of/O her/O presence/O./O His/O
work/O,/O both/O on/O the/O land/O and/O on/O the/O book/O,/O in/O which/O the/O principles/O of/O the/O
new/O land/O system/O were/O to/O be/O laid/O down/O,/O had/O not/O been/O abandoned/O;/O but/O just/O
as/O formerly/O these/O pursuits/O and/O ideas/O had/O seemed/O to/O him/O petty/O and/O trivial/O
in/O comparison/O with/O the/O darkness/O that/O overspread/O all/O life/O,/O now/O they/O
seemed/O as/O unimportant/O and/O petty/O in/O comparison/O with/O the/O life/O that/O lay/O
before/O him/O suffused/O with/O the/O brilliant/O light/O of/O happiness/O./O He/O went/O on/O
with/O his/O work/O,/O but/O he/O felt/O now/O that/O the/O center/O of/O gravity/O of/O his/O
attention/O had/O passed/O to/O something/O else/O,/O and/O that/O consequently/O he/O looked/O
at/O his/O work/O quite/O differently/O and/O more/O clearly/O./O Formerly/O this/O work/O had/O
been/O for/O him/O an/O escape/O from/O life/O./O Formerly/O he/O had/O felt/O that/O without/O this/O
work/O his/O life/O would/O be/O too/O gloomy/O./O Now/O these/O pursuits/O were/O necessary/O for/O
him/O that/O life/O might/O not/O be/O too/O uniformly/O bright/O./O Taking/O up/O his/O
manuscript/O,/O reading/O through/O what/O he/O had/O written/O,/O he/O found/O with/O pleasure/O
that/O the/O work/O was/O worth/O his/O working/O at/O./O Many/O of/O his/O old/O ideas/O seemed/O to/O
him/O superfluous/O and/O extreme/O,/O but/O many/O blanks/O became/O distinct/O to/O him/O when/O
he/O reviewed/O the/O whole/O thing/O in/O his/O memory/O./O He/O was/O writing/O now/O a/O new/O
chapter/O on/O the/O causes/O of/O the/O present/O disastrous/O condition/O of/O agriculture/O
in/O Russia/LOCATION./O He/O maintained/O that/O the/O poverty/O of/O Russia/LOCATION arises/O not/O merely/O
from/O the/O anomalous/O distribution/O of/O landed/O property/O and/O misdirected/O
reforms/O,/O but/O that/O what/O had/O contributed/O of/O late/O years/O to/O this/O result/O was/O
the/O civilization/O from/O without/O abnormally/O grafted/O upon/O Russia/LOCATION,/O especially/O
facilities/O of/O communication/O,/O as/O railways/O,/O leading/O to/O centralization/O in/O
towns/O,/O the/O development/O of/O luxury/O,/O and/O the/O consequent/O development/O of/O
manufactures/O,/O credit/O and/O its/O accompaniment/O of/O speculation/O--/Oall/O to/O the/O
detriment/O of/O agriculture/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O in/O a/O normal/O development/O
of/O wealth/O in/O a/O state/O all/O these/O phenomena/O would/O arise/O only/O when/O a/O
considerable/O amount/O of/O labor/O had/O been/O put/O into/O agriculture/O,/O when/O it/O had/O
come/O under/O regular/O,/O or/O at/O least/O definite/O,/O conditions/O;/O that/O the/O wealth/O of/O
a/O country/O ought/O to/O increase/O proportionally/O,/O and/O especially/O in/O such/O a/O way/O
that/O other/O sources/O of/O wealth/O should/O not/O outstrip/O agriculture/O;/O that/O in/O
harmony/O with/O a/O certain/O stage/O of/O agriculture/O there/O should/O be/O means/O of/O
communication/O corresponding/O to/O it/O,/O and/O that/O in/O our/O unsettled/O condition/O
of/O the/O land/O,/O railways/O,/O called/O into/O being/O by/O political/O and/O not/O by/O
economic/O needs/O,/O were/O premature/O,/O and/O instead/O of/O promoting/O agriculture/O,/O as/O
was/O expected/O of/O them/O,/O they/O were/O competing/O with/O agriculture/O and/O promoting/O
the/O development/O of/O manufactures/O and/O credit/O,/O and/O so/O arresting/O its/O
progress/O;/O and/O that/O just/O as/O the/O one-sided/O and/O premature/O development/O of/O
one/O organ/O in/O an/O animal/O would/O hinder/O its/O general/O development/O,/O so/O in/O the/O
general/O development/O of/O wealth/O in/O Russia/LOCATION,/O credit/O,/O facilities/O of/O
communication/O,/O manufacturing/O activity/O,/O indubitably/O necessary/O in/O Europe/LOCATION,/O
where/O they/O had/O arisen/O in/O their/O proper/O time/O,/O had/O with/O us/O only/O done/O harm/O,/O
by/O throwing/O into/O the/O background/O the/O chief/O question/O calling/O for/O
settlement/O--/Othe/O question/O of/O the/O organization/O of/O agriculture/O./O

While/O he/O was/O writing/O his/O ideas/O she/O was/O thinking/O how/O unnaturally/O cordial/O
her/O husband/O had/O been/O to/O young/O Prince/PERSON Tcharsky/PERSON,/O who/O had/O,/O with/O great/O want/O
of/O tact/O,/O flirted/O with/O her/O the/O day/O before/O they/O left/O Moscow/LOCATION./O ``/OHe/O's/O
jealous/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O./O ``/OGoodness/O!/O how/O sweet/O and/O silly/O he/O is/O!/O He/O's/O
jealous/O of/O me/O!/O If/O he/O knew/O that/O I/O think/O no/O more/O of/O them/O than/O of/O Piotr/PERSON the/PERSON
cook/PERSON,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O looking/O at/O his/O head/O and/O red/O neck/O with/O a/O feeling/O of/O
possession/O strange/O to/O herself/O./O ``/OThough/O it/O's/O a/O pity/O to/O take/O him/O from/O his/O
work/O -LRB-/Obut/O he/O has/O plenty/O of/O time/O!/O-RRB-/O,/O I/O must/O look/O at/O his/O face/O;/O will/O he/O feel/O
I/O'm/O looking/O at/O him/O?/O I/O wish/O he/O'd/O turn/O round/O .../O I/O'll/O _/Owill/O_/O him/O to/O!/O''/O and/O
she/O opened/O her/O eyes/O wide/O,/O as/O though/O to/O intensify/O the/O influence/O of/O her/O
gaze/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O they/O draw/O away/O all/O the/O sap/O and/O give/O a/O false/O appearance/O of/O
prosperity/O,/O''/O he/O muttered/O,/O stopping/O to/O write/O,/O and/O,/O feeling/O that/O she/O was/O
looking/O at/O him/O and/O smiling/O,/O he/O looked/O round/O./O

``/OWell/O?/O''/O he/O queried/O,/O smiling/O,/O and/O getting/O up/O./O

``/OHe/O looked/O round/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O nothing/O;/O I/O wanted/O you/O to/O look/O round/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O watching/O him/O,/O and/O
trying/O to/O guess/O whether/O he/O was/O vexed/O at/O being/O interrupted/O or/O not/O./O

``/OHow/O happy/O we/O are/O alone/O together/O!/O--/OI/O am/O,/O that/O is/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O going/O up/O to/O
her/O with/O a/O radiant/O smile/O of/O happiness/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O just/O as/O happy/O./O I/O'll/O never/O go/O anywhere/O,/O especially/O not/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION./O''/O

``/OAnd/O what/O were/O you/O thinking/O about/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O?/O I/O was/O thinking/O.../O./O No/O,/O no/O,/O go/O along/O,/O go/O on/O writing/O;/O do/On't/O break/O
off/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O pursing/O up/O her/O lips/O,/O ``/Oand/O I/O must/O cut/O out/O these/O little/O
holes/O now/O,/O do/O you/O see/O?/O''/O

She/O took/O up/O her/O scissors/O and/O began/O cutting/O them/O out/O./O

``/ONo/O;/O tell/O me/O,/O what/O was/O it/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O sitting/O down/O beside/O her/O and/O
watching/O the/O tiny/O scissors/O moving/O round/O./O

``/OOh/O!/O what/O was/O I/O thinking/O about/O?/O I/O was/O thinking/O about/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O about/O the/O
back/O of/O your/O head/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O should/O I/O,/O of/O all/O people/O,/O have/O such/O happiness/O!/O It/O's/O unnatural/O,/O too/O
good/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O kissing/O her/O hand/O./O

``/OI/O feel/O quite/O the/O opposite/O;/O the/O better/O things/O are/O,/O the/O more/O natural/O it/O
seems/O to/O me/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O you/O've/O got/O a/O little/O curl/O loose/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O carefully/O turning/O her/O
head/O round/O./O

``/OA/O little/O curl/O,/O oh/O yes/O./O No/O,/O no/O,/O we/O are/O busy/O at/O our/O work/O!/O''/O

Work/O did/O not/O progress/O further/O,/O and/O they/O darted/O apart/O from/O one/O another/O
like/O culprits/O when/O Kouzma/PERSON came/O in/O to/O announce/O that/O tea/O was/O ready/O./O

``/OHave/O they/O come/O from/O the/O town/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON asked/O Kouzma/PERSON./O

``/OThey/O've/O just/O come/O;/O they/O're/O unpacking/O the/O things/O./O''/O

``/OCome/O quickly/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O him/O as/O she/O went/O out/O of/O the/O study/O,/O ``/Oor/O else/O I/O
shall/O read/O your/O letters/O without/O you/O./O''/O

Left/O alone/O,/O after/O putting/O his/O manuscripts/O together/O in/O the/O new/O portfolio/O
bought/O by/O her/O,/O he/O washed/O his/O hands/O at/O the/O new/O washstand/O with/O the/O elegant/O
fittings/O,/O that/O had/O all/O made/O their/O appearance/O with/O her/O./O Levin/PERSON smiled/O at/O
his/O own/O thoughts/O,/O and/O shook/O his/O head/O disapprovingly/O at/O those/O thoughts/O;/O a/O
feeling/O akin/O to/O remorse/O fretted/O him/O./O There/O was/O something/O shameful/O,/O
effeminate/O,/O Capuan/PERSON,/O as/O he/O called/O it/O to/O himself/O,/O in/O his/O present/O mode/O of/O
life/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O not/O right/O to/O go/O on/O like/O this/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O ``/OIt/O'll/O soon/O be/O
three/O months/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O doing/O next/O to/O nothing/O./O Today/O,/O almost/O for/O the/O first/O
time/O,/O I/O set/O to/O work/O seriously/O,/O and/O what/O happened/O?/O I/O did/O nothing/O but/O
begin/O and/O throw/O it/O aside/O./O Even/O my/O ordinary/O pursuits/O I/O have/O almost/O given/O
up/O./O On/O the/O land/O I/O scarcely/O walk/O or/O drive/O about/O at/O all/O to/O look/O after/O
things/O./O Either/O I/O am/O loath/O to/O leave/O her/O,/O or/O I/O see/O she/O's/O dull/O alone/O./O And/O I/O
used/O to/O think/O that/O,/O before/O marriage/O,/O life/O was/O nothing/O much/O,/O somehow/O

almost/O three/O months/O have/O passed/O,/O and/O I/O have/O spent/O my/O time/O so/O idly/O and/O

fault/O./O She/O's/O not/O to/O blame/O in/O any/O way/O./O I/O ought/O myself/O to/O be/O firmer/O,/O to/O
maintain/O my/O masculine/O independence/O of/O action/O;/O or/O else/O I/O shall/O get/O into/O

blame/O,/O''/O he/O told/O himself/O./O

and/O especially/O the/O person/O nearest/O of/O all/O to/O him/O,/O for/O the/O ground/O of/O his/O
dissatisfaction/O./O And/O it/O vaguely/O came/O into/O Levin/PERSON's/O mind/O that/O she/O herself/O
was/O not/O to/O blame/O -LRB-/Oshe/O could/O not/O be/O to/O blame/O for/O anything/O-RRB-/O,/O but/O what/O was/O

``/OYes/O,/O apart/O from/O her/O interest/O in/O the/O house/O -LRB-/Othat/O she/O has/O-RRB-/O,/O apart/O from/O

satisfied/O./O''/O Levin/PERSON,/O in/O his/O heart/O,/O censured/O this/O,/O and/O did/O not/O as/O yet/O
understand/O that/O she/O was/O preparing/O for/O that/O period/O of/O activity/O which/O was/O
to/O come/O for/O her/O when/O she/O would/O at/O once/O be/O the/O wife/O of/O her/O husband/O and/O
mistress/O of/O the/O house/O,/O and/O would/O bear/O,/O and/O nurse/O,/O and/O bring/O up/O children/O./O

while/O gaily/O building/O her/O nest/O for/O the/O future/O./O



Chapter/O 16/O


When/O Levin/PERSON went/O upstairs/O,/O his/O wife/O was/O sitting/O near/O the/O new/O silver/O
samovar/O behind/O the/O new/O tea/O service/O,/O and/O,/O having/O settled/O old/O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON at/O a/O little/O table/O with/O a/O full/O cup/O of/O tea/O,/O was/O reading/O a/O letter/O
from/O Dolly/PERSON,/O with/O whom/O they/O were/O in/O continual/O and/O frequent/O
correspondence/O./O

``/OYou/O see/O,/O your/O good/O lady/O's/O settled/O me/O here/O,/O told/O me/O to/O sit/O a/O bit/O with/O
her/O,/O''/O said/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O smiling/O affectionately/O at/O Kitty/LOCATION./O

In/O these/O words/O of/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O Levin/PERSON read/O the/O final/O act/O of/O the/O
drama/O which/O had/O been/O enacted/O of/O late/O between/O her/O and/O Kitty/PERSON./O He/O saw/O that/O,/O
in/O spite/O of/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON's/O feelings/O being/O hurt/O by/O a/O new/O mistress/O
taking/O the/O reins/O of/O government/O out/O of/O her/O hands/O,/O Kitty/PERSON had/O yet/O conquered/O
her/O and/O made/O her/O love/O her/O./O

``/OHere/O,/O I/O opened/O your/O letter/O too/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O handing/O him/O an/O illiterate/O
letter/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O from/O that/O woman/O,/O I/O think/O,/O your/O brother/O's/O.../O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OI/O
did/O not/O read/O it/O through/O./O This/O is/O from/O my/O people/O and/O from/O Dolly/PERSON./O Fancy/O!/O
Dolly/PERSON took/O Tanya/PERSON and/O Grisha/PERSON to/O a/O children/O's/O ball/O at/O the/O Sarmatskys/O'/O:/O
Tanya/PERSON was/O a/O French/O marquise/O./O''/O

But/O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O hear/O her/O./O Flushing/O,/O he/O took/O the/O letter/O from/O Marya/PERSON
Nikolaevna/PERSON,/O his/O brother/O's/O former/O mistress/O,/O and/O began/O to/O read/O it/O./O This/O
was/O the/O second/O letter/O he/O had/O received/O from/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON./O In/O the/O
first/O letter/O,/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON wrote/O that/O his/O brother/O had/O sent/O her/O away/O
for/O no/O fault/O of/O hers/O,/O and/O,/O with/O touching/O simplicity/O,/O added/O that/O though/O
she/O was/O in/O want/O again/O,/O she/O asked/O for/O nothing/O,/O and/O wished/O for/O nothing/O,/O
but/O was/O only/O tormented/O by/O the/O thought/O that/O Nikolay/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON would/O
come/O to/O grief/O without/O her/O,/O owing/O to/O the/O weak/O state/O of/O his/O health/O,/O and/O
begged/O his/O brother/O to/O look/O after/O him/O./O Now/O she/O wrote/O quite/O differently/O./O
She/O had/O found/O Nikolay/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O had/O again/O made/O it/O up/O with/O him/O in/O
Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O had/O moved/O with/O him/O to/O a/O provincial/O town/O,/O where/O he/O had/O
received/O a/O post/O in/O the/O government/O service/O./O But/O that/O he/O had/O quarreled/O
with/O the/O head/O official/O,/O and/O was/O on/O his/O way/O back/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O only/O he/O had/O
been/O taken/O so/O ill/O on/O the/O road/O that/O it/O was/O doubtful/O if/O he/O would/O ever/O
leave/O his/O bed/O again/O,/O she/O wrote/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O always/O of/O you/O he/O has/O talked/O,/O and/O,/O
besides/O,/O he/O has/O no/O more/O money/O left/O./O''/O

``/ORead/O this/O;/O Dolly/PERSON writes/O about/O you/O,/O''/O Kitty/PERSON was/O beginning/O,/O with/O a/O smile/O;/O
but/O she/O stopped/O suddenly/O,/O noticing/O the/O changed/O expression/O on/O her/O
husband/O's/O face/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O?/O What/O's/O the/O matter/O?/O''/O

``/OShe/O writes/O to/O me/O that/O Nikolay/PERSON,/O my/O brother/O,/O is/O at/O death/O's/O door/O./O I/O shall/O
go/O to/O him/O./O''/O

Kitty/PERSON's/O face/O changed/O at/O once/O./O Thoughts/O of/O Tanya/PERSON as/O a/O marquise/O,/O of/O Dolly/PERSON,/O
all/O had/O vanished/O./O

``/OWhen/O are/O you/O going/O?/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OTomorrow/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O I/O will/O go/O with/O you/O,/O can/O I/O?/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OKitty/O!/O What/O are/O you/O thinking/O of/O?/O''/O he/O said/O reproachfully/O./O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O mean/O?/O''/O offended/O that/O he/O should/O seem/O to/O take/O her/O suggestion/O
unwillingly/O and/O with/O vexation/O./O ``/OWhy/O should/On't/O I/O go/O?/O I/O sha/On't/O be/O in/O your/O
way/O./O I./O./O./O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O going/O because/O my/O brother/O is/O dying/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OWhy/O should/O you/O.../O''/O

``/OWhy/O?/O For/O the/O same/O reason/O as/O you/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O,/O at/O a/O moment/O of/O such/O gravity/O for/O me/O,/O she/O only/O thinks/O of/O her/O being/O
dull/O by/O herself/O,/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON./O And/O this/O lack/O of/O candor/O in/O a/O matter/O of/O
such/O gravity/O infuriated/O him/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O out/O of/O the/O question/O,/O''/O he/O said/O sternly/O./O

Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O seeing/O that/O it/O was/O coming/O to/O a/O quarrel/O,/O gently/O put/O
down/O her/O cup/O and/O withdrew/O./O Kitty/PERSON did/O not/O even/O notice/O her/O./O The/O tone/O in/O
which/O her/O husband/O had/O said/O the/O last/O words/O wounded/O her/O,/O especially/O
because/O he/O evidently/O did/O not/O believe/O what/O she/O had/O said/O./O

``/OI/O tell/O you/O,/O that/O if/O you/O go/O,/O I/O shall/O come/O with/O you/O;/O I/O shall/O certainly/O
come/O,/O''/O she/O said/O hastily/O and/O wrathfully/O./O ``/OWhy/O out/O of/O the/O question/O?/O Why/O do/O
you/O say/O it/O's/O out/O of/O the/O question/O?/O''/O

``/OBecause/O it/O'll/O be/O going/O God/O knows/O where/O,/O by/O all/O sorts/O of/O roads/O and/O to/O
all/O sorts/O of/O hotels/O./O You/O would/O be/O a/O hindrance/O to/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O trying/O
to/O be/O cool/O./O

``/ONot/O at/O all/O./O I/O do/On't/O want/O anything/O./O Where/O you/O can/O go/O,/O I/O can/O.../O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O for/O one/O thing/O then/O,/O because/O this/O woman/O's/O there/O whom/O you/O ca/On't/O
meet/O./O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O and/O do/On't/O care/O to/O know/O who/O's/O there/O and/O what/O./O I/O know/O that/O
my/O husband/O's/O brother/O is/O dying/O and/O my/O husband/O is/O going/O to/O him/O,/O and/O I/O go/O
with/O my/O husband/O too/O.../O''/O

``/OKitty/O!/O Do/On't/O get/O angry/O./O But/O just/O think/O a/O little/O:/O this/O is/O a/O matter/O of/O
such/O importance/O that/O I/O ca/On't/O bear/O to/O think/O that/O you/O should/O bring/O in/O a/O
feeling/O of/O weakness/O,/O of/O dislike/O to/O being/O left/O alone/O./O Come/O,/O you/O'll/O be/O
dull/O alone/O,/O so/O go/O and/O stay/O at/O Moscow/LOCATION a/O little/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O,/O you/O always/O ascribe/O base/O,/O vile/O motives/O to/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O with/O
tears/O of/O wounded/O pride/O and/O fury/O./O ``/OI/O did/On't/O mean/O,/O it/O was/On't/O weakness/O,/O it/O
was/On't/O .../O I/O feel/O that/O it/O's/O my/O duty/O to/O be/O with/O my/O husband/O when/O he/O's/O in/O
trouble/O,/O but/O you/O try/O on/O purpose/O to/O hurt/O me/O,/O you/O try/O on/O purpose/O not/O to/O
understand/O.../O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O this/O is/O awful/O!/O To/O be/O such/O a/O slave/O!/O''/O cried/O Levin/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O,/O and/O
unable/O to/O restrain/O his/O anger/O any/O longer/O./O But/O at/O the/O same/O second/O he/O felt/O
that/O he/O was/O beating/O himself/O./O

``/OThen/O why/O did/O you/O marry/O?/O You/O could/O have/O been/O free/O./O Why/O did/O you/O,/O if/O you/O
regret/O it/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O getting/O up/O and/O running/O away/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O

When/O he/O went/O to/O her/O,/O she/O was/O sobbing/O./O

He/O began/O to/O speak/O,/O trying/O to/O find/O words/O not/O to/O dissuade/O but/O simply/O to/O
soothe/O her/O./O But/O she/O did/O not/O heed/O him/O,/O and/O would/O not/O agree/O to/O anything/O./O
He/O bent/O down/O to/O her/O and/O took/O her/O hand/O,/O which/O resisted/O him/O./O He/O kissed/O her/O
hand/O,/O kissed/O her/O hair/O,/O kissed/O her/O hand/O again/O--/Ostill/O she/O was/O silent/O./O But/O
when/O he/O took/O her/O face/O in/O both/O his/O hands/O and/O said/O ``/OKitty/O!/O''/O she/O suddenly/O
recovered/O herself/O,/O and/O began/O to/O cry/O,/O and/O they/O were/O reconciled/O./O

It/O was/O decided/O that/O they/O should/O go/O together/O the/O next/O day/O./O Levin/PERSON told/O his/O
wife/O that/O he/O believed/O she/O wanted/O to/O go/O simply/O in/O order/O to/O be/O of/O use/O,/O
agreed/O that/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON's/O being/O with/O his/O brother/O did/O not/O make/O her/O
going/O improper/O,/O but/O he/O set/O off/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O his/O heart/O dissatisfied/O
both/O with/O her/O and/O with/O himself/O./O He/O was/O dissatisfied/O with/O her/O for/O being/O
unable/O to/O make/O up/O her/O mind/O to/O let/O him/O go/O when/O it/O was/O necessary/O -LRB-/Oand/O how/O
strange/O it/O was/O for/O him/O to/O think/O that/O he/O,/O so/O lately/O hardly/O daring/O to/O
believe/O in/O such/O happiness/O as/O that/O she/O could/O love/O him/O--/Onow/O was/O unhappy/O
because/O she/O loved/O him/O too/O much/O!/O-RRB-/O,/O and/O he/O was/O dissatisfied/O with/O himself/O
for/O not/O showing/O more/O strength/O of/O will/O./O Even/O greater/O was/O the/O feeling/O of/O
disagreement/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O his/O heart/O as/O to/O her/O not/O needing/O to/O
consider/O the/O woman/O who/O was/O with/O his/O brother/O,/O and/O he/O thought/O with/O horror/O
of/O all/O the/O contingencies/O they/O might/O meet/O with/O./O The/O mere/O idea/O of/O his/O
wife/O,/O his/O Kitty/PERSON,/O being/O in/O the/O same/O room/O with/O a/O common/O wench/O,/O set/O him/O
shuddering/O with/O horror/O and/O loathing/O./O



Chapter/O 17/O


The/O hotel/O of/O the/O provincial/O town/O where/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON was/O lying/O ill/O was/O
one/O of/O those/O provincial/O hotels/O which/O are/O constructed/O on/O the/O newest/O model/O
of/O modern/O improvements/O,/O with/O the/O best/O intentions/O of/O cleanliness/O,/O
comfort/O,/O and/O even/O elegance/O,/O but/O owing/O to/O the/O public/O that/O patronizes/O
them/O,/O are/O with/O astounding/O rapidity/O transformed/O into/O filthy/O taverns/O with/O
a/O pretension/O of/O modern/O improvement/O that/O only/O makes/O them/O worse/O than/O the/O
old-fashioned/O,/O honestly/O filthy/O hotels/O./O This/O hotel/O had/O already/O reached/O
that/O stage/O,/O and/O the/O soldier/O in/O a/O filthy/O uniform/O smoking/O in/O the/O entry/O,/O
supposed/O to/O stand/O for/O a/O hall-porter/O,/O and/O the/O cast-iron/O,/O slippery/O,/O dark/O,/O
and/O disagreeable/O staircase/O,/O and/O the/O free/O and/O easy/O waiter/O in/O a/O filthy/O
frock/O coat/O,/O and/O the/O common/O dining/O room/O with/O a/O dusty/O bouquet/O of/O wax/O
flowers/O adorning/O the/O table/O,/O and/O filth/O,/O dust/O,/O and/O disorder/O everywhere/O,/O
and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O the/O sort/O of/O modern/O up-to-date/O self-complacent/O
railway/O uneasiness/O of/O this/O hotel/O,/O aroused/O a/O most/O painful/O feeling/O in/O
Levin/PERSON after/O their/O fresh/O young/O life/O,/O especially/O because/O the/O impression/O of/O
falsity/O made/O by/O the/O hotel/O was/O so/O out/O of/O keeping/O with/O what/O awaited/O them/O./O

As/O is/O invariably/O the/O case/O,/O after/O they/O had/O been/O asked/O at/O what/O price/O they/O
wanted/O rooms/O,/O it/O appeared/O that/O there/O was/O not/O one/O decent/O room/O for/O them/O;/O
one/O decent/O room/O had/O been/O taken/O by/O the/O inspector/O of/O railroads/O,/O another/O by/O
a/O lawyer/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O a/O third/O by/O Princess/O Astafieva/PERSON from/O the/O country/O./O
There/O remained/O only/O one/O filthy/O room/O,/O next/O to/O which/O they/O promised/O that/O
another/O should/O be/O empty/O by/O the/O evening/O./O Feeling/O angry/O with/O his/O wife/O
because/O what/O he/O had/O expected/O had/O come/O to/O pass/O,/O which/O was/O that/O at/O the/O
moment/O of/O arrival/O,/O when/O his/O heart/O throbbed/O with/O emotion/O and/O anxiety/O to/O
know/O how/O his/O brother/O was/O getting/O on/O,/O he/O should/O have/O to/O be/O seeing/O after/O
her/O,/O instead/O of/O rushing/O straight/O to/O his/O brother/O,/O Levin/PERSON conducted/O her/O to/O
the/O room/O assigned/O them/O./O

``/OGo/O,/O do/O go/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O looking/O at/O him/O with/O timid/O and/O guilty/O eyes/O./O

He/O went/O out/O of/O the/O door/O without/O a/O word/O,/O and/O at/O once/O stumbled/O over/O Marya/PERSON
Nikolaevna/PERSON,/O who/O had/O heard/O of/O his/O arrival/O and/O had/O not/O dared/O to/O go/O in/O to/O
see/O him/O./O She/O was/O just/O the/O same/O as/O when/O he/O saw/O her/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION;/O the/O same/O
woolen/O gown/O,/O and/O bare/O arms/O and/O neck/O,/O and/O the/O same/O good-naturedly/O stupid/O,/O
pockmarked/O face/O,/O only/O a/O little/O plumper/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O is/O he/O?/O how/O is/O he/O?/O''/O

``/OVery/O bad/O./O He/O ca/On't/O get/O up/O./O He/O has/O kept/O expecting/O you/O./O He/O.../O./O Are/O you/O
.../O with/O your/O wife/O?/O''/O

Levin/PERSON did/O not/O for/O the/O first/O moment/O understand/O what/O it/O was/O confused/O her/O,/O
but/O she/O immediately/O enlightened/O him/O./O

``/OI/O'll/O go/O away/O./O I/O'll/O go/O down/O to/O the/O kitchen/O,/O''/O she/O brought/O out/O./O ``/ONikolay/PERSON
Dmitrievitch/PERSON will/O be/O delighted/O./O He/O heard/O about/O it/O,/O and/O knows/O your/O lady/O,/O
and/O remembers/O her/O abroad/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON realized/O that/O she/O meant/O his/O wife/O,/O and/O did/O not/O know/O what/O answer/O to/O
make/O./O

``/OCome/O along/O,/O come/O along/O to/O him/O!/O''/O he/O said/O./O

But/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O moved/O,/O the/O door/O of/O his/O room/O opened/O and/O Kitty/PERSON peeped/O
out/O./O Levin/PERSON crimsoned/O both/O from/O shame/O and/O anger/O with/O his/O wife/O,/O who/O had/O
put/O herself/O and/O him/O in/O such/O a/O difficult/O position/O;/O but/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON
crimsoned/O still/O more/O./O She/O positively/O shrank/O together/O and/O flushed/O to/O the/O
point/O of/O tears/O,/O and/O clutching/O the/O ends/O of/O her/O apron/O in/O both/O hands/O,/O
twisted/O them/O in/O her/O red/O fingers/O without/O knowing/O what/O to/O say/O and/O what/O to/O
do/O./O

For/O the/O first/O instant/O Levin/PERSON saw/O an/O expression/O of/O eager/O curiosity/O in/O the/O
eyes/O with/O which/O Kitty/PERSON looked/O at/O this/O awful/O woman/O,/O so/O incomprehensible/O to/O
her/O;/O but/O it/O lasted/O only/O a/O single/O instant/O./O

``/OWell/O!/O how/O is/O he/O?/O''/O she/O turned/O to/O her/O husband/O and/O then/O to/O her/O./O

``/OBut/O one/O ca/On't/O go/O on/O talking/O in/O the/O passage/O like/O this/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O,/O
looking/O angrily/O at/O a/O gentleman/O who/O walked/O jauntily/O at/O that/O instant/O
across/O the/O corridor/O,/O as/O though/O about/O his/O affairs/O./O

``/OWell/O then/O,/O come/O in/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O turning/O to/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON,/O who/O had/O
recovered/O herself/O,/O but/O noticing/O her/O husband/O's/O face/O of/O dismay/O,/O ``/Oor/O go/O on/O;/O
go/O,/O and/O then/O come/O for/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O went/O back/O into/O the/O room/O./O

Levin/PERSON went/O to/O his/O brother/O's/O room/O./O He/O had/O not/O in/O the/O least/O expected/O what/O
he/O saw/O and/O felt/O in/O his/O brother/O's/O room/O./O He/O had/O expected/O to/O find/O him/O in/O
the/O same/O state/O of/O self-deception/O which/O he/O had/O heard/O was/O so/O frequent/O with/O
the/O consumptive/O,/O and/O which/O had/O struck/O him/O so/O much/O during/O his/O brother/O's/O
visit/O in/O the/O autumn/O./O He/O had/O expected/O to/O find/O the/O physical/O signs/O of/O the/O
approach/O of/O death/O more/O marked/O--/Ogreater/O weakness/O,/O greater/O emaciation/O,/O but/O
still/O almost/O the/O same/O condition/O of/O things/O./O He/O had/O expected/O himself/O to/O
feel/O the/O same/O distress/O at/O the/O loss/O of/O the/O brother/O he/O loved/O and/O the/O same/O
horror/O in/O face/O of/O death/O as/O he/O had/O felt/O then/O,/O only/O in/O a/O greater/O degree/O./O
And/O he/O had/O prepared/O himself/O for/O this/O;/O but/O he/O found/O something/O utterly/O
different/O./O

In/O a/O little/O dirty/O room/O with/O the/O painted/O panels/O of/O its/O walls/O filthy/O with/O
spittle/O,/O and/O conversation/O audible/O through/O the/O thin/O partition/O from/O the/O
next/O room/O,/O in/O a/O stifling/O atmosphere/O saturated/O with/O impurities/O,/O on/O a/O
bedstead/O moved/O away/O from/O the/O wall/O,/O there/O lay/O covered/O with/O a/O quilt/O,/O a/O
body/O./O One/O arm/O of/O this/O body/O was/O above/O the/O quilt/O,/O and/O the/O wrist/O,/O huge/O as/O a/O
rake-handle/O,/O was/O attached/O,/O inconceivably/O it/O seemed/O,/O to/O the/O thin/O,/O long/O
bone/O of/O the/O arm/O smooth/O from/O the/O beginning/O to/O the/O middle/O./O The/O head/O lay/O
sideways/O on/O the/O pillow/O./O Levin/PERSON could/O see/O the/O scanty/O locks/O wet/O with/O sweat/O
on/O the/O temples/O and/O tense/O,/O transparent-looking/O forehead/O./O

``/OIt/O can/Onot/O be/O that/O that/O fearful/O body/O was/O my/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON?/O''/O thought/O
Levin/PERSON./O But/O he/O went/O closer/O,/O saw/O the/O face/O,/O and/O doubt/O became/O impossible/O./O In/O
spite/O of/O the/O terrible/O change/O in/O the/O face/O,/O Levin/PERSON had/O only/O to/O glance/O at/O
those/O eager/O eyes/O raised/O at/O his/O approach/O,/O only/O to/O catch/O the/O faint/O
movement/O of/O the/O mouth/O under/O the/O sticky/O mustache/O,/O to/O realize/O the/O terrible/O
truth/O that/O this/O death-like/O body/O was/O his/O living/O brother/O./O

The/O glittering/O eyes/O looked/O sternly/O and/O reproachfully/O at/O his/O brother/O as/O
he/O drew/O near/O./O And/O immediately/O this/O glance/O established/O a/O living/O
relationship/O between/O living/O men/O./O Levin/PERSON immediately/O felt/O the/O reproach/O in/O
the/O eyes/O fixed/O on/O him/O,/O and/O felt/O remorse/O at/O his/O own/O happiness/O./O

When/O Konstantin/PERSON took/O him/O by/O the/O hand/O,/O Nikolay/PERSON smiled/O./O The/O smile/O was/O
faint/O,/O scarcely/O perceptible/O,/O and/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O smile/O the/O stern/O
expression/O of/O the/O eyes/O was/O unchanged/O./O

``/OYou/O did/O not/O expect/O to/O find/O me/O like/O this/O,/O''/O he/O articulated/O with/O effort/O./O

``/OYes/O .../O no/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O hesitating/O over/O his/O words/O./O ``/OHow/O was/O it/O you/O
did/On't/O let/O me/O know/O before/O,/O that/O is/O,/O at/O the/O time/O of/O my/O wedding/O?/O I/O made/O
inquiries/O in/O all/O directions/O./O''/O

He/O had/O to/O talk/O so/O as/O not/O to/O be/O silent/O,/O and/O he/O did/O not/O know/O what/O to/O say/O,/O
especially/O as/O his/O brother/O made/O no/O reply/O,/O and/O simply/O stared/O without/O
dropping/O his/O eyes/O,/O and/O evidently/O penetrated/O to/O the/O inner/O meaning/O of/O each/O
word/O./O Levin/PERSON told/O his/O brother/O that/O his/O wife/O had/O come/O with/O him/O./O Nikolay/PERSON
expressed/O pleasure/O,/O but/O said/O he/O was/O afraid/O of/O frightening/O her/O by/O his/O
condition/O./O A/O silence/O followed/O./O Suddenly/O Nikolay/PERSON stirred/O,/O and/O began/O to/O
say/O something/O./O Levin/PERSON expected/O something/O of/O peculiar/O gravity/O and/O
importance/O from/O the/O expression/O of/O his/O face/O,/O but/O Nikolay/PERSON began/O speaking/O
of/O his/O health/O./O He/O found/O fault/O with/O the/O doctor/O,/O regretting/O he/O had/O not/O a/O
celebrated/O Moscow/LOCATION doctor/O./O Levin/PERSON saw/O that/O he/O still/O hoped/O./O

Seizing/O the/O first/O moment/O of/O silence/O,/O Levin/PERSON got/O up/O,/O anxious/O to/O escape/O,/O if/O
only/O for/O an/O instant/O,/O from/O his/O agonizing/O emotion/O,/O and/O said/O that/O he/O would/O
go/O and/O fetch/O his/O wife/O./O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O and/O I/O'll/O tell/O her/O to/O tidy/O up/O here/O./O It/O's/O dirty/O and/O stinking/O
here/O,/O I/O expect/O./O Marya/PERSON!/O clear/O up/O the/O room/O,/O''/O the/O sick/O man/O said/O with/O
effort/O./O ``/OOh/O,/O and/O when/O you/O've/O cleared/O up/O,/O go/O away/O yourself/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O
looking/O inquiringly/O at/O his/O brother/O./O

Levin/PERSON made/O no/O answer/O./O Going/O out/O into/O the/O corridor/O,/O he/O stopped/O short/O./O He/O
had/O said/O he/O would/O fetch/O his/O wife/O,/O but/O now/O,/O taking/O stock/O of/O the/O emotion/O
he/O was/O feeling/O,/O he/O decided/O that/O he/O would/O try/O on/O the/O contrary/O to/O persuade/O
her/O not/O to/O go/O in/O to/O the/O sick/O man/O./O ``/OWhy/O should/O she/O suffer/O as/O I/O am/O
suffering/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O is/O he/O?/O''/O Kitty/PERSON asked/O with/O a/O frightened/O face/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O it/O's/O awful/O,/O it/O's/O awful/O!/O What/O did/O you/O come/O for/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

Kitty/PERSON was/O silent/O for/O a/O few/O seconds/O,/O looking/O timidly/O and/O ruefully/O at/O her/O
husband/O;/O then/O she/O went/O up/O and/O took/O him/O by/O the/O elbow/O with/O both/O hands/O./O

``/OKostya/PERSON!/O take/O me/O to/O him/O;/O it/O will/O be/O easier/O for/O us/O to/O bear/O it/O together/O./O
You/O only/O take/O me/O,/O take/O me/O to/O him/O,/O please/O,/O and/O go/O away/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OYou/O
must/O understand/O that/O for/O me/O to/O see/O you/O,/O and/O not/O to/O see/O him/O,/O is/O far/O more/O
painful/O./O There/O I/O might/O be/O a/O help/O to/O you/O and/O to/O him/O./O Please/O,/O let/O me/O!/O''/O she/O
besought/O her/O husband/O,/O as/O though/O the/O happiness/O of/O her/O life/O depended/O on/O
it/O./O

Levin/PERSON was/O obliged/O to/O agree/O,/O and/O regaining/O his/O composure/O,/O and/O completely/O
forgetting/O about/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON by/O now/O,/O he/O went/O again/O in/O to/O his/O
brother/O with/O Kitty/PERSON./O

Stepping/O lightly/O,/O and/O continually/O glancing/O at/O her/O husband/O,/O showing/O him/O a/O
valorous/O and/O sympathetic/O face/O,/O Kitty/PERSON went/O into/O the/O sick-room/O,/O and/O,/O
turning/O without/O haste/O,/O noiselessly/O closed/O the/O door/O./O With/O inaudible/O steps/O
she/O went/O quickly/O to/O the/O sick/O man/O's/O bedside/O,/O and/O going/O up/O so/O that/O he/O had/O
not/O to/O turn/O his/O head/O,/O she/O immediately/O clasped/O in/O her/O fresh/O young/O hand/O
the/O skeleton/O of/O his/O huge/O hand/O,/O pressed/O it/O,/O and/O began/O speaking/O with/O that/O
soft/O eagerness/O,/O sympathetic/O and/O not/O jarring/O,/O which/O is/O peculiar/O to/O women/O./O

``/OWe/O have/O met/O,/O though/O we/O were/O not/O acquainted/O,/O at/O Soden/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OYou/O
never/O thought/O I/O was/O to/O be/O your/O sister/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O would/O not/O have/O recognized/O me/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O a/O radiant/O smile/O at/O her/O
entrance/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O should/O./O What/O a/O good/O thing/O you/O let/O us/O know/O!/O Not/O a/O day/O has/O passed/O
that/O Kostya/PERSON has/O not/O mentioned/O you/O,/O and/O been/O anxious/O./O''/O

But/O the/O sick/O man/O's/O interest/O did/O not/O last/O long/O./O

Before/O she/O had/O finished/O speaking/O,/O there/O had/O come/O back/O into/O his/O face/O the/O
stern/O,/O reproachful/O expression/O of/O the/O dying/O man/O's/O envy/O of/O the/O living/O./O

``/OI/O am/O afraid/O you/O are/O not/O quite/O comfortable/O here/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O turning/O away/O
from/O his/O fixed/O stare/O,/O and/O looking/O about/O the/O room/O./O ``/OWe/O must/O ask/O about/O
another/O room/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O ``/Oso/O that/O we/O might/O be/O nearer/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 18/O


Levin/PERSON could/O not/O look/O calmly/O at/O his/O brother/O;/O he/O could/O not/O himself/O be/O
natural/O and/O calm/O in/O his/O presence/O./O When/O he/O went/O in/O to/O the/O sick/O man/O,/O his/O
eyes/O and/O his/O attention/O were/O unconsciously/O dimmed/O,/O and/O he/O did/O not/O see/O and/O
did/O not/O distinguish/O the/O details/O of/O his/O brother/O's/O position/O./O He/O smelt/O the/O
awful/O odor/O,/O saw/O the/O dirt/O,/O disorder/O,/O and/O miserable/O condition/O,/O and/O heard/O
the/O groans/O,/O and/O felt/O that/O nothing/O could/O be/O done/O to/O help/O./O It/O never/O
entered/O his/O head/O to/O analyze/O the/O details/O of/O the/O sick/O man/O's/O situation/O,/O to/O
consider/O how/O that/O body/O was/O lying/O under/O the/O quilt/O,/O how/O those/O emaciated/O
legs/O and/O thighs/O and/O spine/O were/O lying/O huddled/O up/O,/O and/O whether/O they/O could/O
not/O be/O made/O more/O comfortable/O,/O whether/O anything/O could/O not/O be/O done/O to/O make/O
things/O,/O if/O not/O better/O,/O at/O least/O less/O bad/O./O It/O made/O his/O blood/O run/O cold/O
when/O he/O began/O to/O think/O of/O all/O these/O details/O./O He/O was/O absolutely/O convinced/O
that/O nothing/O could/O be/O done/O to/O prolong/O his/O brother/O's/O life/O or/O to/O relieve/O
his/O suffering/O./O But/O a/O sense/O of/O his/O regarding/O all/O aid/O as/O out/O of/O the/O
question/O was/O felt/O by/O the/O sick/O man/O,/O and/O exasperated/O him/O./O And/O this/O made/O it/O
still/O more/O painful/O for/O Levin/PERSON./O To/O be/O in/O the/O sick-room/O was/O agony/O to/O him/O,/O
not/O to/O be/O there/O still/O worse/O./O And/O he/O was/O continually/O,/O on/O various/O
pretexts/O,/O going/O out/O of/O the/O room/O,/O and/O coming/O in/O again/O,/O because/O he/O was/O
unable/O to/O remain/O alone/O./O

But/O Kitty/PERSON thought/O,/O and/O felt/O,/O and/O acted/O quite/O differently/O./O On/O seeing/O the/O
sick/O man/O,/O she/O pitied/O him/O./O And/O pity/O in/O her/O womanly/O heart/O did/O not/O arouse/O
at/O all/O that/O feeling/O of/O horror/O and/O loathing/O that/O it/O aroused/O in/O her/O
husband/O,/O but/O a/O desire/O to/O act/O,/O to/O find/O out/O all/O the/O details/O of/O his/O state/O,/O
and/O to/O remedy/O them/O./O And/O since/O she/O had/O not/O the/O slightest/O doubt/O that/O it/O
was/O her/O duty/O to/O help/O him/O,/O she/O had/O no/O doubt/O either/O that/O it/O was/O possible/O,/O
and/O immediately/O set/O to/O work/O./O The/O very/O details/O,/O the/O mere/O thought/O of/O which/O
reduced/O her/O husband/O to/O terror/O,/O immediately/O engaged/O her/O attention/O./O She/O
sent/O for/O the/O doctor/O,/O sent/O to/O the/O chemist/O's/O,/O set/O the/O maid/O who/O had/O come/O
with/O her/O and/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON to/O sweep/O and/O dust/O and/O scrub/O;/O she/O herself/O
washed/O up/O something/O,/O washed/O out/O something/O else/O,/O laid/O something/O under/O the/O
quilt/O./O Something/O was/O by/O her/O directions/O brought/O into/O the/O sick-room/O,/O
something/O else/O was/O carried/O out/O./O She/O herself/O went/O several/O times/O to/O her/O
room/O,/O regardless/O of/O the/O men/O she/O met/O in/O the/O corridor/O,/O got/O out/O and/O brought/O
in/O sheets/O,/O pillow/O cases/O,/O towels/O,/O and/O shirts/O./O

The/O waiter/O,/O who/O was/O busy/O with/O a/O party/O of/O engineers/O dining/O in/O the/O dining/O
hall/O,/O came/O several/O times/O with/O an/O irate/O countenance/O in/O answer/O to/O her/O
summons/O,/O and/O could/O not/O avoid/O carrying/O out/O her/O orders/O,/O as/O she/O gave/O them/O
with/O such/O gracious/O insistence/O that/O there/O was/O no/O evading/O her/O./O Levin/PERSON did/O
not/O approve/O of/O all/O this/O;/O he/O did/O not/O believe/O it/O would/O be/O of/O any/O good/O to/O
the/O patient/O./O Above/O all/O,/O he/O feared/O the/O patient/O would/O be/O angry/O at/O it/O./O But/O
the/O sick/O man/O,/O though/O he/O seemed/O and/O was/O indifferent/O about/O it/O,/O was/O not/O
angry/O,/O but/O only/O abashed/O,/O and/O on/O the/O whole/O as/O it/O were/O interested/O in/O what/O
she/O was/O doing/O with/O him/O./O Coming/O back/O from/O the/O doctor/O to/O whom/O Kitty/PERSON had/O
sent/O him/O,/O Levin/PERSON,/O on/O opening/O the/O door/O,/O came/O upon/O the/O sick/O man/O at/O the/O
instant/O when/O,/O by/O Kitty/PERSON's/O directions/O,/O they/O were/O changing/O his/O linen/O./O The/O
long/O white/O ridge/O of/O his/O spine/O,/O with/O the/O huge/O,/O prominent/O shoulder/O blades/O
and/O jutting/O ribs/O and/O vertebrae/O,/O was/O bare/O,/O and/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON and/O the/O
waiter/O were/O struggling/O with/O the/O sleeve/O of/O the/O night/O shirt/O,/O and/O could/O not/O
get/O the/O long/O,/O limp/O arm/O into/O it/O./O Kitty/PERSON,/O hurriedly/O closing/O the/O door/O after/O
Levin/PERSON,/O was/O not/O looking/O that/O way/O;/O but/O the/O sick/O man/O groaned/O,/O and/O she/O moved/O
rapidly/O towards/O him/O./O

``/OMake/O haste/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O do/On't/O you/O come/O,/O''/O said/O the/O sick/O man/O angrily/O./O ``/OI/O'll/O do/O it/O my/O
myself/O.../O''/O

``/OWhat/O say/O?/O''/O queried/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON./O But/O Kitty/PERSON heard/O and/O saw/O he/O was/O
ashamed/O and/O uncomfortable/O at/O being/O naked/O before/O her/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O looking/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O looking/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O putting/O the/O arm/O in/O./O ``/OMarya/PERSON
Nikolaevna/PERSON,/O you/O come/O this/O side/O,/O you/O do/O it/O,/O''/O she/O added/O./O

``/OPlease/O go/O for/O me/O,/O there/O's/O a/O little/O bottle/O in/O my/O small/O bag/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
turning/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O ``/Oyou/O know/O,/O in/O the/O side/O pocket/O;/O bring/O it/O,/O please/O,/O
and/O meanwhile/O they/O'll/O finish/O clearing/O up/O here/O./O''/O

Returning/O with/O the/O bottle/O,/O Levin/PERSON found/O the/O sick/O man/O settled/O comfortably/O
and/O everything/O about/O him/O completely/O changed/O./O The/O heavy/O smell/O was/O
replaced/O by/O the/O smell/O of/O aromatic/O vinegar/O,/O which/O Kitty/PERSON with/O pouting/O lips/O
and/O puffed-out/O,/O rosy/O cheeks/O was/O squirting/O through/O a/O little/O pipe/O./O There/O
was/O no/O dust/O visible/O anywhere/O,/O a/O rug/O was/O laid/O by/O the/O bedside/O./O On/O the/O
table/O stood/O medicine/O bottles/O and/O decanters/O tidily/O arranged/O,/O and/O the/O
linen/O needed/O was/O folded/O up/O there/O,/O and/O Kitty/PERSON's/O _/Obroderie/O anglaise/O_/O./O On/O
the/O other/O table/O by/O the/O patient/O's/O bed/O there/O were/O candles/O and/O drink/O and/O
powders/O./O The/O sick/O man/O himself/O,/O washed/O and/O combed/O,/O lay/O in/O clean/O sheets/O on/O
high/O raised/O pillows/O,/O in/O a/O clean/O night-shirt/O with/O a/O white/O collar/O about/O
his/O astoundingly/O thin/O neck/O,/O and/O with/O a/O new/O expression/O of/O hope/O looked/O
fixedly/O at/O Kitty/LOCATION./O

The/O doctor/O brought/O by/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O found/O by/O him/O at/O the/O club/O,/O was/O not/O the/O
one/O who/O had/O been/O attending/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O as/O the/O patient/O was/O
dissatisfied/O with/O him/O./O The/O new/O doctor/O took/O up/O a/O stethoscope/O and/O sounded/O
the/O patient/O,/O shook/O his/O head/O,/O prescribed/O medicine/O,/O and/O with/O extreme/O
minuteness/O explained/O first/O how/O to/O take/O the/O medicine/O and/O then/O what/O diet/O
was/O to/O be/O kept/O to/O./O He/O advised/O eggs/O,/O raw/O or/O hardly/O cooked/O,/O and/O seltzer/O
water/O,/O with/O warm/O milk/O at/O a/O certain/O temperature/O./O When/O the/O doctor/O had/O gone/O
away/O the/O sick/O man/O said/O something/O to/O his/O brother/O,/O of/O which/O Levin/PERSON could/O
distinguish/O only/O the/O last/O words/O:/O ``/OYour/O Katya/O./O''/O By/O the/O expression/O with/O
which/O he/O gazed/O at/O her/O,/O Levin/PERSON saw/O that/O he/O was/O praising/O her/O./O He/O called/O
indeed/O to/O Katya/PERSON,/O as/O he/O called/O her/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O much/O better/O already/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OWhy/O,/O with/O you/O I/O should/O have/O got/O
well/O long/O ago/O./O How/O nice/O it/O is/O!/O''/O he/O took/O her/O hand/O and/O drew/O it/O towards/O his/O
lips/O,/O but/O as/O though/O afraid/O she/O would/O dislike/O it/O he/O changed/O his/O mind/O,/O let/O
it/O go/O,/O and/O only/O stroked/O it/O./O Kitty/PERSON took/O his/O hand/O in/O both/O hers/O and/O pressed/O
it/O./O

``/ONow/O turn/O me/O over/O on/O the/O left/O side/O and/O go/O to/O bed/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

No/O one/O could/O make/O out/O what/O he/O said/O but/O Kitty/PERSON;/O she/O alone/O understood/O./O She/O
understood/O because/O she/O was/O all/O the/O while/O mentally/O keeping/O watch/O on/O what/O
he/O needed/O./O

``/OOn/O the/O other/O side/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O ``/Ohe/O always/O sleeps/O on/O that/O
side/O./O Turn/O him/O over/O,/O it/O's/O so/O disagreeable/O calling/O the/O servants/O./O I/O'm/O not/O
strong/O enough/O./O Can/O you/O?/O''/O she/O said/O to/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON./O

``/OI/O'm/O afraid/O not/O,/O''/O answered/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON./O

Terrible/O as/O it/O was/O to/O Levin/PERSON to/O put/O his/O arms/O round/O that/O terrible/O body/O,/O to/O
take/O hold/O of/O that/O under/O the/O quilt/O,/O of/O which/O he/O preferred/O to/O know/O
nothing/O,/O under/O his/O wife/O's/O influence/O he/O made/O his/O resolute/O face/O that/O she/O
knew/O so/O well/O,/O and/O putting/O his/O arms/O into/O the/O bed/O took/O hold/O of/O the/O body/O,/O
but/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O own/O strength/O he/O was/O struck/O by/O the/O strange/O heaviness/O
of/O those/O powerless/O limbs/O./O While/O he/O was/O turning/O him/O over/O,/O conscious/O of/O
the/O huge/O emaciated/O arm/O about/O his/O neck/O,/O Kitty/PERSON swiftly/O and/O noiselessly/O
turned/O the/O pillow/O,/O beat/O it/O up/O and/O settled/O in/O it/O the/O sick/O man/O's/O head/O,/O
smoothing/O back/O his/O hair/O,/O which/O was/O sticking/O again/O to/O his/O moist/O brow/O./O

The/O sick/O man/O kept/O his/O brother/O's/O hand/O in/O his/O own/O./O Levin/PERSON felt/O that/O he/O
meant/O to/O do/O something/O with/O his/O hand/O and/O was/O pulling/O it/O somewhere/O./O Levin/PERSON
yielded/O with/O a/O sinking/O heart/O:/O yes/O,/O he/O drew/O it/O to/O his/O mouth/O and/O kissed/O
it/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O shaking/O with/O sobs/O and/O unable/O to/O articulate/O a/O word/O,/O went/O out/O
of/O the/O room/O./O



Chapter/O 19/O


``/OThou/O hast/O hid/O these/O things/O from/O the/O wise/O and/O prudent/O,/O and/O hast/O revealed/O
them/O unto/O babes/O./O''/O So/O Levin/PERSON thought/O about/O his/O wife/O as/O he/O talked/O to/O her/O
that/O evening/O./O

Levin/PERSON thought/O of/O the/O text/O,/O not/O because/O he/O considered/O himself/O ``/Owise/O and/O
prudent/O./O''/O He/O did/O not/O so/O consider/O himself/O,/O but/O he/O could/O not/O help/O knowing/O
that/O he/O had/O more/O intellect/O than/O his/O wife/O and/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O and/O he/O
could/O not/O help/O knowing/O that/O when/O he/O thought/O of/O death/O,/O he/O thought/O with/O
all/O the/O force/O of/O his/O intellect/O./O He/O knew/O too/O that/O the/O brains/O of/O many/O
great/O men/O,/O whose/O thoughts/O he/O had/O read/O,/O had/O brooded/O over/O death/O and/O yet/O
knew/O not/O a/O hundredth/O part/O of/O what/O his/O wife/O and/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON knew/O
about/O it/O./O Different/O as/O those/O two/O women/O were/O,/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON and/O Katya/PERSON,/O
as/O his/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON had/O called/O her/O,/O and/O as/O Levin/PERSON particularly/O liked/O
to/O call/O her/O now/O,/O they/O were/O quite/O alike/O in/O this/O./O Both/O knew/O,/O without/O a/O
shade/O of/O doubt/O,/O what/O sort/O of/O thing/O life/O was/O and/O what/O was/O death/O,/O and/O
though/O neither/O of/O them/O could/O have/O answered/O,/O and/O would/O even/O not/O have/O
understood/O the/O questions/O that/O presented/O themselves/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O both/O had/O no/O
doubt/O of/O the/O significance/O of/O this/O event/O,/O and/O were/O precisely/O alike/O in/O
their/O way/O of/O looking/O at/O it/O,/O which/O they/O shared/O with/O millions/O of/O people/O./O
The/O proof/O that/O they/O knew/O for/O a/O certainty/O the/O nature/O of/O death/O lay/O in/O the/O
fact/O that/O they/O knew/O without/O a/O second/O of/O hesitation/O how/O to/O deal/O with/O the/O
dying/O,/O and/O were/O not/O frightened/O of/O them/O./O Levin/PERSON and/O other/O men/O like/O him/O,/O
though/O they/O could/O have/O said/O a/O great/O deal/O about/O death/O,/O obviously/O did/O not/O
know/O this/O since/O they/O were/O afraid/O of/O death/O,/O and/O were/O absolutely/O at/O a/O loss/O
what/O to/O do/O when/O people/O were/O dying/O./O If/O Levin/PERSON had/O been/O alone/O now/O with/O his/O
brother/O Nikolay/PERSON,/O he/O would/O have/O looked/O at/O him/O with/O terror/O,/O and/O with/O still/O
greater/O terror/O waited/O,/O and/O would/O not/O have/O known/O what/O else/O to/O do/O./O

More/O than/O that/O,/O he/O did/O not/O know/O what/O to/O say/O,/O how/O to/O look/O,/O how/O to/O move/O./O
To/O talk/O of/O outside/O things/O seemed/O to/O him/O shocking/O,/O impossible/O,/O to/O talk/O of/O
death/O and/O depressing/O subjects/O--/Oalso/O impossible/O./O To/O be/O silent/O,/O also/O
impossible/O./O ``/OIf/O I/O look/O at/O him/O he/O will/O think/O I/O am/O studying/O him/O,/O I/O am/O
afraid/O;/O if/O I/O do/On't/O look/O at/O him/O,/O he/O'll/O think/O I/O'm/O thinking/O of/O other/O
things/O./O If/O I/O walk/O on/O tiptoe/O,/O he/O will/O be/O vexed/O;/O to/O tread/O firmly/O,/O I/O'm/O
ashamed/O./O''/O Kitty/PERSON evidently/O did/O not/O think/O of/O herself/O,/O and/O had/O no/O time/O to/O
think/O about/O herself/O:/O she/O was/O thinking/O about/O him/O because/O she/O knew/O
something/O,/O and/O all/O went/O well/O./O She/O told/O him/O about/O herself/O even/O and/O about/O
her/O wedding/O,/O and/O smiled/O and/O sympathized/O with/O him/O and/O petted/O him/O,/O and/O
talked/O of/O cases/O of/O recovery/O and/O all/O went/O well/O;/O so/O then/O she/O must/O know/O./O
The/O proof/O that/O her/O behavior/O and/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON's/O was/O not/O instinctive/O,/O
animal/O,/O irrational/O,/O was/O that/O apart/O from/O the/O physical/O treatment/O,/O the/O
relief/O of/O suffering/O,/O both/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON and/O Kitty/PERSON required/O for/O the/O
dying/O man/O something/O else/O more/O important/O than/O the/O physical/O treatment/O,/O and/O
something/O which/O had/O nothing/O in/O common/O with/O physical/O conditions/O./O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON,/O speaking/O of/O the/O man/O just/O dead/O,/O had/O said/O:/O ``/OWell/O,/O thank/O God/O,/O he/O
took/O the/O sacrament/O and/O received/O absolution/O;/O God/O grant/O each/O one/O of/O us/O
such/O a/O death/O./O''/O Katya/PERSON in/O just/O the/O same/O way/O,/O besides/O all/O her/O care/O about/O
linen/O,/O bedsores/O,/O drink/O,/O found/O time/O the/O very/O first/O day/O to/O persuade/O the/O
sick/O man/O of/O the/O necessity/O of/O taking/O the/O sacrament/O and/O receiving/O
absolution/O./O

On/O getting/O back/O from/O the/O sick-room/O to/O their/O own/O two/O rooms/O for/O the/O night/O,/O
Levin/PERSON sat/O with/O hanging/O head/O not/O knowing/O what/O to/O do/O./O Not/O to/O speak/O of/O
supper/O,/O of/O preparing/O for/O bed/O,/O of/O considering/O what/O they/O were/O going/O to/O do/O,/O
he/O could/O not/O even/O talk/O to/O his/O wife/O;/O he/O was/O ashamed/O to/O./O Kitty/PERSON,/O on/O the/O
contrary/O,/O was/O more/O active/O than/O usual/O./O She/O was/O even/O livelier/O than/O usual/O./O
She/O ordered/O supper/O to/O be/O brought/O,/O herself/O unpacked/O their/O things/O,/O and/O
herself/O helped/O to/O make/O the/O beds/O,/O and/O did/O not/O even/O forget/O to/O sprinkle/O
them/O with/O Persian/O powder/O./O She/O showed/O that/O alertness/O,/O that/O swiftness/O of/O
reflection/O comes/O out/O in/O men/O before/O a/O battle/O,/O in/O conflict/O,/O in/O the/O
dangerous/O and/O decisive/O moments/O of/O life/O--/Othose/O moments/O when/O a/O man/O shows/O
once/O and/O for/O all/O his/O value/O,/O and/O that/O all/O his/O past/O has/O not/O been/O wasted/O
but/O has/O been/O a/O preparation/O for/O these/O moments/O./O

Everything/O went/O rapidly/O in/O her/O hands/O,/O and/O before/O it/O was/O twelve/O o'clock/O
all/O their/O things/O were/O arranged/O cleanly/O and/O tidily/O in/O her/O rooms/O,/O in/O such/O
a/O way/O that/O the/O hotel/O rooms/O seemed/O like/O home/O:/O the/O beds/O were/O made/O,/O
brushes/O,/O combs/O,/O looking-glasses/O were/O put/O out/O,/O table/O napkins/O were/O spread/O./O

Levin/PERSON felt/O that/O it/O was/O unpardonable/O to/O eat/O,/O to/O sleep/O,/O to/O talk/O even/O now/O,/O
and/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O every/O movement/O he/O made/O was/O unseemly/O./O She/O
arranged/O the/O brushes/O,/O but/O she/O did/O it/O all/O so/O that/O there/O was/O nothing/O
shocking/O in/O it/O./O

They/O could/O neither/O of/O them/O eat/O,/O however/O,/O and/O for/O a/O long/O while/O they/O could/O
not/O sleep/O,/O and/O did/O not/O even/O go/O to/O bed/O./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O glad/O I/O persuaded/O him/O to/O receive/O extreme/O unction/O tomorrow/O,/O''/O
she/O said/O,/O sitting/O in/O her/O dressing/O jacket/O before/O her/O folding/O looking/O
glass/O,/O combing/O her/O soft/O,/O fragrant/O hair/O with/O a/O fine/O comb/O./O ``/OI/O have/O never/O
seen/O it/O,/O but/O I/O know/O,/O mamma/O has/O told/O me/O,/O there/O are/O prayers/O said/O for/O
recovery/O./O''/O

``/ODo/O you/O suppose/O he/O can/O possibly/O recover/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O watching/O a/O slender/O
tress/O at/O the/O back/O of/O her/O round/O little/O head/O that/O was/O continually/O hidden/O
when/O she/O passed/O the/O comb/O through/O the/O front/O./O

``/OI/O asked/O the/O doctor/O;/O he/O said/O he/O could/On't/O live/O more/O than/O three/O days/O./O But/O
can/O they/O be/O sure/O?/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O,/O anyway/O,/O that/O I/O persuaded/O him/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O,/O looking/O askance/O at/O her/O husband/O through/O her/O hair/O./O ``/OAnything/O is/O
possible/O,/O''/O she/O added/O with/O that/O peculiar/O,/O rather/O sly/O expression/O that/O was/O
always/O in/O her/O face/O when/O she/O spoke/O of/O religion/O./O

Since/O their/O conversation/O about/O religion/O when/O they/O were/O engaged/O neither/O
of/O them/O had/O ever/O started/O a/O discussion/O of/O the/O subject/O,/O but/O she/O performed/O
all/O the/O ceremonies/O of/O going/O to/O church/O,/O saying/O her/O prayers/O,/O and/O so/O on/O,/O
always/O with/O the/O unvarying/O conviction/O that/O this/O ought/O to/O be/O so/O./O In/O spite/O
of/O his/O assertion/O to/O the/O contrary/O,/O she/O was/O firmly/O persuaded/O that/O he/O was/O
as/O much/O a/O Christian/O as/O she/O,/O and/O indeed/O a/O far/O better/O one/O;/O and/O all/O that/O he/O
said/O about/O it/O was/O simply/O one/O of/O his/O absurd/O masculine/O freaks/O,/O just/O as/O he/O
would/O say/O about/O her/O _/Obroderie/O anglaise/O_/O that/O good/O people/O patch/O holes/O,/O
but/O that/O she/O cut/O them/O on/O purpose/O,/O and/O so/O on/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O see/O this/O woman/O,/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON,/O did/O not/O know/O how/O to/O manage/O
all/O this/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OAnd/O .../O I/O must/O own/O I/O'm/O very/O,/O very/O glad/O you/O came/O./O
You/O are/O such/O purity/O that/O.../O''/O He/O took/O her/O hand/O and/O did/O not/O kiss/O it/O -LRB-/Oto/O
kiss/O her/O hand/O in/O such/O closeness/O to/O death/O seemed/O to/O him/O improper/O-RRB-/O;/O he/O
merely/O squeezed/O it/O with/O a/O penitent/O air/O,/O looking/O at/O her/O brightening/O eyes/O./O

``/OIt/O would/O have/O been/O miserable/O for/O you/O to/O be/O alone/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O
lifting/O her/O hands/O which/O hid/O her/O cheeks/O flushing/O with/O pleasure/O,/O twisted/O
her/O coil/O of/O hair/O on/O the/O nape/O of/O her/O neck/O and/O pinned/O it/O there/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O''/O she/O
went/O on/O,/O ``/Oshe/O did/O not/O know/O how/O.../O./O Luckily/O,/O I/O learned/O a/O lot/O at/O Soden/PERSON./O''/O

``/OSurely/O there/O are/O not/O people/O there/O so/O ill/O?/O''/O

``/OWorse/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O's/O so/O awful/O to/O me/O is/O that/O I/O ca/On't/O see/O him/O as/O he/O was/O when/O he/O was/O
young/O./O You/O would/O not/O believe/O how/O charming/O he/O was/O as/O a/O youth/O,/O but/O I/O did/O
not/O understand/O him/O then/O./O''/O

``/OI/O can/O quite/O,/O quite/O believe/O it/O./O How/O I/O feel/O that/O we/O might/O have/O been/O
friends/O!/O''/O she/O said/O;/O and/O,/O distressed/O at/O what/O she/O had/O said/O,/O she/O looked/O
round/O at/O her/O husband/O,/O and/O tears/O came/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O _/Omight/O have/O been/O_/O,/O''/O he/O said/O mournfully/O./O ``/OHe/O's/O just/O one/O of/O those/O
people/O of/O whom/O they/O say/O they/O're/O not/O for/O this/O world/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O we/O have/O many/O days/O before/O us/O;/O we/O must/O go/O to/O bed/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O
glancing/O at/O her/O tiny/O watch/O./O



Chapter/O 20/O


The/O next/O day/O the/O sick/O man/O received/O the/O sacrament/O and/O extreme/O unction/O./O
During/O the/O ceremony/O Nikolay/PERSON Levin/PERSON prayed/O fervently/O./O His/O great/O eyes/O,/O
fastened/O on/O the/O holy/O image/O that/O was/O set/O out/O on/O a/O card/O table/O covered/O with/O
a/O colored/O napkin/O,/O expressed/O such/O passionate/O prayer/O and/O hope/O that/O it/O was/O
awful/O to/O Levin/PERSON to/O see/O it/O./O Levin/PERSON knew/O that/O this/O passionate/O prayer/O and/O
hope/O would/O only/O make/O him/O feel/O more/O bitterly/O parting/O from/O the/O life/O he/O so/O
loved/O./O Levin/PERSON knew/O his/O brother/O and/O the/O workings/O of/O his/O intellect/O:/O he/O knew/O
that/O his/O unbelief/O came/O not/O from/O life/O being/O easier/O for/O him/O without/O faith/O,/O
but/O had/O grown/O up/O because/O step/O by/O step/O the/O contemporary/O scientific/O
interpretation/O of/O natural/O phenomena/O crushed/O out/O the/O possibility/O of/O
faith/O;/O and/O so/O he/O knew/O that/O his/O present/O return/O was/O not/O a/O legitimate/O one/O,/O
brought/O about/O by/O way/O of/O the/O same/O working/O of/O his/O intellect/O,/O but/O simply/O a/O
temporary/O,/O interested/O return/O to/O faith/O in/O a/O desperate/O hope/O of/O recovery/O./O
Levin/PERSON knew/O too/O that/O Kitty/PERSON had/O strengthened/O his/O hope/O by/O accounts/O of/O the/O
marvelous/O recoveries/O she/O had/O heard/O of/O./O Levin/PERSON knew/O all/O this/O;/O and/O it/O was/O
agonizingly/O painful/O to/O him/O to/O behold/O the/O supplicating/O,/O hopeful/O eyes/O and/O
the/O emaciated/O wrist/O,/O lifted/O with/O difficulty/O,/O making/O the/O sign/O of/O the/O
cross/O on/O the/O tense/O brow/O,/O and/O the/O prominent/O shoulders/O and/O hollow/O,/O gasping/O
chest/O,/O which/O one/O could/O not/O feel/O consistent/O with/O the/O life/O the/O sick/O man/O
was/O praying/O for/O./O During/O the/O sacrament/O Levin/PERSON did/O what/O he/O,/O an/O unbeliever/O,/O
had/O done/O a/O thousand/O times/O./O He/O said/O,/O addressing/O God/O,/O ``/OIf/O Thou/O dost/O exist/O,/O
make/O this/O man/O to/O recover/O''/O -LRB-/Oof/O course/O this/O same/O thing/O has/O been/O repeated/O
many/O times/O-RRB-/O,/O ``/Oand/O Thou/O wilt/O save/O him/O and/O me/O./O''/O

After/O extreme/O unction/O the/O sick/O man/O became/O suddenly/O much/O better/O./O He/O did/O
not/O cough/O once/O in/O the/O course/O of/O an/O hour/O,/O smiled/O,/O kissed/O Kitty/PERSON's/O hand/O,/O
thanking/O her/O with/O tears/O,/O and/O said/O he/O was/O comfortable/O,/O free/O from/O pain/O,/O
and/O that/O he/O felt/O strong/O and/O had/O an/O appetite/O./O He/O even/O raised/O himself/O when/O
his/O soup/O was/O brought/O,/O and/O asked/O for/O a/O cutlet/O as/O well/O./O Hopelessly/O ill/O as/O
he/O was/O,/O obvious/O as/O it/O was/O at/O the/O first/O glance/O that/O he/O could/O not/O recover/O,/O
Levin/PERSON and/O Kitty/PERSON were/O for/O that/O hour/O both/O in/O the/O same/O state/O of/O excitement/O,/O
happy/O,/O though/O fearful/O of/O being/O mistaken/O./O

``/OIs/O he/O better/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O much/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O wonderful/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O's/O nothing/O wonderful/O in/O it/O./O''/O

``/OAnyway/O,/O he/O's/O better/O,/O''/O they/O said/O in/O a/O whisper/O,/O smiling/O to/O one/O another/O./O

This/O self-deception/O was/O not/O of/O long/O duration/O./O The/O sick/O man/O fell/O into/O a/O
quiet/O sleep/O,/O but/O he/O was/O waked/O up/O half/O an/O hour/O later/O by/O his/O cough/O./O And/O
all/O at/O once/O every/O hope/O vanished/O in/O those/O about/O him/O and/O in/O himself/O./O The/O
reality/O of/O his/O suffering/O crushed/O all/O hopes/O in/O Levin/LOCATION and/O Kitty/PERSON and/O in/O the/O
sick/O man/O himself/O,/O leaving/O no/O doubt/O,/O no/O memory/O even/O of/O past/O hopes/O./O

Without/O referring/O to/O what/O he/O had/O believed/O in/O half/O an/O hour/O before/O,/O as/O
though/O ashamed/O even/O to/O recall/O it/O,/O he/O asked/O for/O iodine/O to/O inhale/O in/O a/O
bottle/O covered/O with/O perforated/O paper/O./O Levin/PERSON gave/O him/O the/O bottle/O,/O and/O the/O
same/O look/O of/O passionate/O hope/O with/O which/O he/O had/O taken/O the/O sacrament/O was/O
now/O fastened/O on/O his/O brother/O,/O demanding/O from/O him/O the/O confirmation/O of/O the/O
doctor/O's/O words/O that/O inhaling/O iodine/O worked/O wonders/O./O

``/OIs/O Katya/PERSON not/O here/O?/O''/O he/O gasped/O,/O looking/O round/O while/O Levin/PERSON reluctantly/O
assented/O to/O the/O doctor/O's/O words/O./O ``/ONo/O;/O so/O I/O can/O say/O it/O.../O./O It/O was/O for/O her/O
sake/O I/O went/O through/O that/O farce/O./O She/O's/O so/O sweet/O;/O but/O you/O and/O I/O ca/On't/O
deceive/O ourselves/O./O This/O is/O what/O I/O believe/O in/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O,/O squeezing/O
the/O bottle/O in/O his/O bony/O hand/O,/O he/O began/O breathing/O over/O it/O./O

At/O eight/O o'clock/O in/O the/O evening/O Levin/PERSON and/O his/O wife/O were/O drinking/O tea/O in/O
their/O room/O when/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON ran/O in/O to/O them/O breathlessly/O./O She/O was/O
pale/O,/O and/O her/O lips/O were/O quivering/O./O ``/OHe/O is/O dying/O!/O''/O she/O whispered/O./O ``/OI/O'm/O
afraid/O will/O die/O this/O minute/O./O''/O

Both/O of/O them/O ran/O to/O him/O./O He/O was/O sitting/O raised/O up/O with/O one/O elbow/O on/O the/O
bed/O,/O his/O long/O back/O bent/O,/O and/O his/O head/O hanging/O low/O./O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O feel/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON asked/O in/O a/O whisper/O,/O after/O a/O silence/O./O

``/OI/O feel/O I/O'm/O setting/O off/O,/O''/O Nikolay/PERSON said/O with/O difficulty/O,/O but/O with/O extreme/O
distinctness/O,/O screwing/O the/O words/O out/O of/O himself/O./O He/O did/O not/O raise/O his/O
head/O,/O but/O simply/O turned/O his/O eyes/O upwards/O,/O without/O their/O reaching/O his/O
brother/O's/O face/O./O ``/OKatya/PERSON,/O go/O away/O!/O''/O he/O added/O./O

Levin/PERSON jumped/O up/O,/O and/O with/O a/O peremptory/O whisper/O made/O her/O go/O out/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O setting/O off/O,/O''/O he/O said/O again/O./O

``/OWhy/O do/O you/O think/O so/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O so/O as/O to/O say/O something/O./O

``/OBecause/O I/O'm/O setting/O off/O,/O''/O he/O repeated/O,/O as/O though/O he/O had/O a/O liking/O for/O
the/O phrase/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O the/O end/O./O''/O

Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON went/O up/O to/O him/O./O

``/OYou/O had/O better/O lie/O down/O;/O you/O'd/O be/O easier/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OI/O shall/O lie/O down/O soon/O enough/O,/O''/O he/O pronounced/O slowly/O,/O ``/Owhen/O I/O'm/O dead/O,/O''/O
he/O said/O sarcastically/O,/O wrathfully/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O you/O can/O lay/O me/O down/O if/O you/O
like/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON laid/O his/O brother/O on/O his/O back/O,/O sat/O down/O beside/O him/O,/O and/O gazed/O at/O
his/O face/O,/O holding/O his/O breath/O./O The/O dying/O man/O lay/O with/O closed/O eyes/O,/O but/O
the/O muscles/O twitched/O from/O time/O to/O time/O on/O his/O forehead/O,/O as/O with/O one/O
thinking/O deeply/O and/O intensely/O./O Levin/PERSON involuntarily/O thought/O with/O him/O of/O
what/O it/O was/O that/O was/O happening/O to/O him/O now/O,/O but/O in/O spite/O of/O all/O his/O
mental/O efforts/O to/O go/O along/O with/O him/O he/O saw/O by/O the/O expression/O of/O that/O
calm/O,/O stern/O face/O that/O for/O the/O dying/O man/O all/O was/O growing/O clearer/O and/O
clearer/O that/O was/O still/O as/O dark/O as/O ever/O for/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O so/O,/O''/O the/O dying/O man/O articulated/O slowly/O at/O intervals/O./O ``/OWait/O a/O
little/O./O''/O He/O was/O silent/O./O ``/ORight/O!/O''/O he/O pronounced/O all/O at/O once/O reassuringly/O,/O
as/O though/O all/O were/O solved/O for/O him/O./O ``/OO/O Lord/O!/O''/O he/O murmured/O,/O and/O sighed/O
deeply/O./O

Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON felt/O his/O feet/O./O ``/OThey/O're/O getting/O cold/O,/O''/O she/O whispered/O./O

For/O a/O long/O while/O,/O a/O very/O long/O while/O it/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O the/O sick/O man/O lay/O
motionless/O./O But/O he/O was/O still/O alive/O,/O and/O from/O time/O to/O time/O he/O sighed/O./O
Levin/PERSON by/O now/O was/O exhausted/O from/O mental/O strain/O./O He/O felt/O that/O,/O with/O no/O
mental/O effort/O,/O could/O he/O understand/O what/O it/O was/O that/O was/O _/Oright/O_/O./O He/O
could/O not/O even/O think/O of/O the/O problem/O of/O death/O itself/O,/O but/O with/O no/O will/O of/O
his/O own/O thoughts/O kept/O coming/O to/O him/O of/O what/O he/O had/O to/O do/O next/O;/O closing/O
the/O dead/O man/O's/O eyes/O,/O dressing/O him/O,/O ordering/O the/O coffin/O./O And/O,/O strange/O to/O
say/O,/O he/O felt/O utterly/O cold/O,/O and/O was/O not/O conscious/O of/O sorrow/O nor/O of/O loss/O,/O
less/O still/O of/O pity/O for/O his/O brother/O./O If/O he/O had/O any/O feeling/O for/O his/O
brother/O at/O that/O moment/O,/O it/O was/O envy/O for/O the/O knowledge/O the/O dying/O man/O had/O
now/O that/O he/O could/O not/O have/O./O

A/O long/O time/O more/O he/O sat/O over/O him/O so/O,/O continually/O expecting/O the/O end/O./O But/O
the/O end/O did/O not/O come/O./O The/O door/O opened/O and/O Kitty/PERSON appeared/O./O Levin/PERSON got/O up/O
to/O stop/O her/O./O But/O at/O the/O moment/O he/O was/O getting/O up/O,/O he/O caught/O the/O sound/O of/O
the/O dying/O man/O stirring/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O go/O away/O,/O''/O said/O Nikolay/PERSON and/O held/O out/O his/O hand/O./O Levin/PERSON gave/O him/O his/O,/O
and/O angrily/O waved/O to/O his/O wife/O to/O go/O away/O./O

With/O the/O dying/O man/O's/O hand/O in/O his/O hand/O,/O he/O sat/O for/O half/O an/O hour/O,/O an/O hour/O,/O
another/O hour/O./O He/O did/O not/O think/O of/O death/O at/O all/O now/O./O He/O wondered/O what/O
Kitty/PERSON was/O doing/O;/O who/O lived/O in/O the/O next/O room/O;/O whether/O the/O doctor/O lived/O in/O
a/O house/O of/O his/O own/O./O He/O longed/O for/O food/O and/O for/O sleep/O./O He/O cautiously/O drew/O
away/O his/O hand/O and/O felt/O the/O feet/O./O The/O feet/O were/O cold/O,/O but/O the/O sick/O man/O
was/O still/O breathing/O./O Levin/PERSON tried/O again/O to/O move/O away/O on/O tiptoe/O,/O but/O the/O
sick/O man/O stirred/O again/O and/O said/O:/O ``/ODo/On't/O go/O./O''/O

                                  --/O--/O--/O--/O

The/O dawn/O came/O;/O the/O sick/O man/O's/O condition/O was/O unchanged/O./O Levin/PERSON stealthily/O
withdrew/O his/O hand/O,/O and/O without/O looking/O at/O the/O dying/O man/O,/O went/O off/O to/O his/O
own/O room/O and/O went/O to/O sleep/O./O When/O he/O woke/O up/O,/O instead/O of/O news/O of/O his/O
brother/O's/O death/O which/O he/O expected/O,/O he/O learned/O that/O the/O sick/O man/O had/O
returned/O to/O his/O earlier/O condition/O./O He/O had/O begun/O sitting/O up/O again/O,/O
coughing/O,/O had/O begun/O eating/O again/O,/O talking/O again/O,/O and/O again/O had/O ceased/O to/O
talk/O of/O death/O,/O again/O had/O begun/O to/O express/O hope/O of/O his/O recovery/O,/O and/O had/O
become/O more/O irritable/O and/O more/O gloomy/O than/O ever/O./O No/O one/O,/O neither/O his/O
brother/O nor/O Kitty/PERSON,/O could/O soothe/O him/O./O He/O was/O angry/O with/O everyone/O,/O and/O
said/O nasty/O things/O to/O everyone/O,/O reproached/O everyone/O for/O his/O sufferings/O,/O
and/O insisted/O that/O they/O should/O get/O him/O a/O celebrated/O doctor/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION./O
To/O all/O inquiries/O made/O him/O as/O to/O how/O he/O felt/O,/O he/O made/O the/O same/O answer/O
with/O an/O expression/O of/O vindictive/O reproachfulness/O,/O ``/OI/O'm/O suffering/O
horribly/O,/O intolerably/O!/O''/O

The/O sick/O man/O was/O suffering/O more/O and/O more/O,/O especially/O from/O bedsores/O,/O
which/O it/O was/O impossible/O now/O to/O remedy/O,/O and/O grew/O more/O and/O more/O angry/O with/O
everyone/O about/O him/O,/O blaming/O them/O for/O everything/O,/O and/O especially/O for/O not/O
having/O brought/O him/O a/O doctor/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION./O Kitty/PERSON tried/O in/O every/O possible/O
way/O to/O relieve/O him/O,/O to/O soothe/O him/O;/O but/O it/O was/O all/O in/O vain/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON saw/O
that/O she/O herself/O was/O exhausted/O both/O physically/O and/O morally/O,/O though/O she/O
would/O not/O admit/O it/O./O The/O sense/O of/O death/O,/O which/O had/O been/O evoked/O in/O all/O by/O
his/O taking/O leave/O of/O life/O on/O the/O night/O when/O he/O had/O sent/O for/O his/O brother/O,/O
was/O broken/O up/O./O Everyone/O knew/O that/O he/O must/O inevitably/O die/O soon/O,/O that/O he/O
was/O half/O dead/O already/O./O Everyone/O wished/O for/O nothing/O but/O that/O he/O should/O
die/O as/O soon/O as/O possible/O,/O and/O everyone/O,/O concealing/O this/O,/O gave/O him/O
medicines/O,/O tried/O to/O find/O remedies/O and/O doctors/O,/O and/O deceived/O him/O and/O
themselves/O and/O each/O other/O./O All/O this/O was/O falsehood/O,/O disgusting/O,/O
irreverent/O deceit/O./O And/O owing/O to/O the/O bent/O of/O his/O character/O,/O and/O because/O
he/O loved/O the/O dying/O man/O more/O than/O anyone/O else/O did/O,/O Levin/PERSON was/O most/O
painfully/O conscious/O of/O this/O deceit/O./O

Levin/PERSON,/O who/O had/O long/O been/O possessed/O by/O the/O idea/O of/O reconciling/O his/O
brothers/O,/O at/O least/O in/O face/O of/O death/O,/O had/O written/O to/O his/O brother/O,/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O and/O having/O received/O an/O answer/O from/O him/O,/O he/O read/O this/O letter/O
to/O the/O sick/O man/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON wrote/O that/O he/O could/O not/O come/O himself/O,/O
and/O in/O touching/O terms/O he/O begged/O his/O brother/O's/O forgiveness/O./O

The/O sick/O man/O said/O nothing/O./O

``/OWhat/O am/O I/O to/O write/O to/O him/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OI/O hope/O you/O are/O not/O angry/O with/O
him/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O not/O the/O least/O!/O''/O Nikolay/PERSON answered/O,/O vexed/O at/O the/O question/O./O ``/OTell/O him/O
to/O send/O me/O a/O doctor/O./O''/O

Three/O more/O days/O of/O agony/O followed/O;/O the/O sick/O man/O was/O still/O in/O the/O same/O
condition/O./O The/O sense/O of/O longing/O for/O his/O death/O was/O felt/O by/O everyone/O now/O
at/O the/O mere/O sight/O of/O him/O,/O by/O the/O waiters/O and/O the/O hotel-keeper/O and/O all/O
the/O people/O staying/O in/O the/O hotel/O,/O and/O the/O doctor/O and/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON and/O
Levin/PERSON and/O Kitty/PERSON./O The/O sick/O man/O alone/O did/O not/O express/O this/O feeling/O,/O but/O on/O
the/O contrary/O was/O furious/O at/O their/O not/O getting/O him/O doctors/O,/O and/O went/O on/O
taking/O medicine/O and/O talking/O of/O life/O./O Only/O at/O rare/O moments/O,/O when/O the/O
opium/O gave/O him/O an/O instant/O's/O relief/O from/O the/O never-ceasing/O pain/O,/O he/O would/O
sometimes/O,/O half/O asleep/O,/O utter/O what/O was/O ever/O more/O intense/O in/O his/O heart/O
