than/O in/O all/O the/O others/O:/O ``/OOh/O,/O if/O it/O were/O only/O the/O end/O!/O''/O or/O:/O ``/OWhen/O will/O it/O
be/O over/O?/O''/O

His/O sufferings/O,/O steadily/O growing/O more/O intense/O,/O did/O their/O work/O and/O
prepared/O him/O for/O death/O./O There/O was/O no/O position/O in/O which/O he/O was/O not/O in/O
pain/O,/O there/O was/O not/O a/O minute/O in/O which/O he/O was/O unconscious/O of/O it/O,/O not/O a/O
limb/O,/O not/O a/O part/O of/O his/O body/O that/O did/O not/O ache/O and/O cause/O him/O agony/O./O Even/O
the/O memories/O,/O the/O impressions/O,/O the/O thoughts/O of/O this/O body/O awakened/O in/O him/O
now/O the/O same/O aversion/O as/O the/O body/O itself/O./O The/O sight/O of/O other/O people/O,/O
their/O remarks/O,/O his/O own/O reminiscences/O,/O everything/O was/O for/O him/O a/O source/O of/O
agony/O./O Those/O about/O him/O felt/O this/O,/O and/O instinctively/O did/O not/O allow/O
themselves/O to/O move/O freely/O,/O to/O talk/O,/O to/O express/O their/O wishes/O before/O him/O./O
All/O his/O life/O was/O merged/O in/O the/O one/O feeling/O of/O suffering/O and/O desire/O to/O be/O
rid/O of/O it/O./O

There/O was/O evidently/O coming/O over/O him/O that/O revulsion/O that/O would/O make/O him/O
look/O upon/O death/O as/O the/O goal/O of/O his/O desires/O,/O as/O happiness/O./O Hitherto/O each/O
individual/O desire/O,/O aroused/O by/O suffering/O or/O privation/O,/O such/O as/O hunger/O,/O
fatigue/O,/O thirst/O,/O had/O been/O satisfied/O by/O some/O bodily/O function/O giving/O
pleasure/O./O But/O now/O no/O physical/O craving/O or/O suffering/O received/O relief/O,/O and/O
the/O effort/O to/O relieve/O them/O only/O caused/O fresh/O suffering/O./O And/O so/O all/O
desires/O were/O merged/O in/O one/O--/Othe/O desire/O to/O be/O rid/O of/O all/O his/O sufferings/O
and/O their/O source/O,/O the/O body/O./O But/O he/O had/O no/O words/O to/O express/O this/O desire/O
of/O deliverance/O,/O and/O so/O he/O did/O not/O speak/O of/O it/O,/O and/O from/O habit/O asked/O for/O
the/O satisfaction/O of/O desires/O which/O could/O not/O now/O be/O satisfied/O./O ``/OTurn/O me/O
over/O on/O the/O other/O side/O,/O''/O he/O would/O say/O,/O and/O immediately/O after/O he/O would/O
ask/O to/O be/O turned/O back/O again/O as/O before/O./O ``/OGive/O me/O some/O broth/O./O Take/O away/O
the/O broth/O./O Talk/O of/O something/O:/O why/O are/O you/O silent/O?/O''/O And/O directly/O they/O
began/O to/O talk/O he/O would/O close/O his/O eyes/O,/O and/O would/O show/O weariness/O,/O
indifference/O,/O and/O loathing/O./O

On/O the/O tenth/O day/O from/O their/O arrival/O at/O the/O town/O,/O Kitty/PERSON was/O unwell/O./O She/O
suffered/O from/O headache/O and/O sickness/O,/O and/O she/O could/O not/O get/O up/O all/O the/O
morning/O./O

The/O doctor/O opined/O that/O the/O indisposition/O arose/O from/O fatigue/O and/O
excitement/O,/O and/O prescribed/O rest/O./O

After/O dinner/O,/O however/O,/O Kitty/PERSON got/O up/O and/O went/O as/O usual/O with/O her/O work/O to/O
the/O sick/O man/O./O He/O looked/O at/O her/O sternly/O when/O she/O came/O in/O,/O and/O smiled/O
contemptuously/O when/O she/O said/O she/O had/O been/O unwell/O./O That/O day/O he/O was/O
continually/O blowing/O his/O nose/O,/O and/O groaning/O piteously/O./O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O feel/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O him/O./O

``/OWorse/O,/O''/O he/O articulated/O with/O difficulty/O./O ``/OIn/O pain/O!/O''/O

``/OIn/O pain/O,/O where/O?/O''/O

``/OEverywhere/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O will/O be/O over/O today/O,/O you/O will/O see/O,/O''/O said/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON./O Though/O it/O
was/O said/O in/O a/O whisper/O,/O the/O sick/O man/O,/O whose/O hearing/O Levin/PERSON had/O noticed/O was/O
very/O keen/O,/O must/O have/O heard/O./O Levin/PERSON said/O hush/O to/O her/O,/O and/O looked/O round/O at/O
the/O sick/O man/O./O Nikolay/PERSON had/O heard/O;/O but/O these/O words/O produced/O no/O effect/O on/O
him/O./O His/O eyes/O had/O still/O the/O same/O intense/O,/O reproachful/O look/O./O

``/OWhy/O do/O you/O think/O so/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON asked/O her/O,/O when/O she/O had/O followed/O him/O into/O
the/O corridor/O./O

``/OHe/O has/O begun/O picking/O at/O himself/O,/O''/O said/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON./O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O mean/O?/O''/O

``/OLike/O this/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O tugging/O at/O the/O folds/O of/O her/O woolen/O skirt/O./O Levin/PERSON
noticed/O,/O indeed/O,/O that/O all/O that/O day/O the/O patient/O pulled/O at/O himself/O,/O as/O it/O
were/O,/O trying/O to/O snatch/O something/O away/O./O

Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON's/O prediction/O came/O true/O./O Towards/O night/O the/O sick/O man/O was/O
not/O able/O to/O lift/O his/O hands/O,/O and/O could/O only/O gaze/O before/O him/O with/O the/O same/O
intensely/O concentrated/O expression/O in/O his/O eyes/O./O Even/O when/O his/O brother/O or/O
Kitty/PERSON bent/O over/O him/O,/O so/O that/O he/O could/O see/O them/O,/O he/O looked/O just/O the/O same/O./O
Kitty/PERSON sent/O for/O the/O priest/O to/O read/O the/O prayer/O for/O the/O dying/O./O

While/O the/O priest/O was/O reading/O it/O,/O the/O dying/O man/O did/O not/O show/O any/O sign/O of/O
life/O;/O his/O eyes/O were/O closed/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O Marya/PERSON Nikolaevna/PERSON stood/O at/O
the/O bedside/O./O The/O priest/O had/O not/O quite/O finished/O reading/O the/O prayer/O when/O
the/O dying/O man/O stretched/O,/O sighed/O,/O and/O opened/O his/O eyes/O./O The/O priest/O,/O on/O
finishing/O the/O prayer/O,/O put/O the/O cross/O to/O the/O cold/O forehead/O,/O then/O slowly/O
returned/O it/O to/O the/O stand/O,/O and/O after/O standing/O for/O two/O minutes/O more/O in/O
silence/O,/O he/O touched/O the/O huge/O,/O bloodless/O hand/O that/O was/O turning/O cold/O./O

``/OHe/O is/O gone/O,/O''/O said/O the/O priest/O,/O and/O would/O have/O moved/O away/O;/O but/O suddenly/O
there/O was/O a/O faint/O stir/O in/O the/O mustaches/O of/O the/O dead/O man/O that/O seemed/O
glued/O together/O,/O and/O quite/O distinctly/O in/O the/O hush/O they/O heard/O from/O the/O
bottom/O of/O the/O chest/O the/O sharply/O defined/O sounds/O:/O

``/ONot/O quite/O .../O soon/O./O''/O

And/O a/O minute/O later/O the/O face/O brightened/O,/O a/O smile/O came/O out/O under/O the/O
mustaches/O,/O and/O the/O women/O who/O had/O gathered/O round/O began/O carefully/O laying/O
out/O the/O corpse/O./O

The/O sight/O of/O his/O brother/O,/O and/O the/O nearness/O of/O death/O,/O revived/O in/O Levin/PERSON
that/O sense/O of/O horror/O in/O face/O of/O the/O insoluble/O enigma/O,/O together/O with/O the/O
nearness/O and/O inevitability/O of/O death/O,/O that/O had/O come/O upon/O him/O that/O autumn/O
evening/O when/O his/O brother/O had/O come/O to/O him/O./O This/O feeling/O was/O now/O even/O
stronger/O than/O before/O;/O even/O less/O than/O before/O did/O he/O feel/O capable/O of/O
apprehending/O the/O meaning/O of/O death/O,/O and/O its/O inevitability/O rose/O up/O before/O
him/O more/O terrible/O than/O ever/O./O But/O now/O,/O thanks/O to/O his/O wife/O's/O presence/O,/O
that/O feeling/O did/O not/O reduce/O him/O to/O despair/O./O In/O spite/O of/O death/O,/O he/O felt/O
the/O need/O of/O life/O and/O love/O./O He/O felt/O that/O love/O saved/O him/O from/O despair/O,/O and/O
that/O this/O love/O,/O under/O the/O menace/O of/O despair/O,/O had/O become/O still/O stronger/O
and/O purer/O./O The/O one/O mystery/O of/O death/O,/O still/O unsolved/O,/O had/O scarcely/O passed/O
before/O his/O eyes/O,/O when/O another/O mystery/O had/O arisen/O,/O as/O insoluble/O,/O urging/O
him/O to/O love/O and/O to/O life/O./O

The/O doctor/O confirmed/O his/O suppositions/O in/O regard/O to/O Kitty/PERSON./O Her/O
indisposition/O was/O a/O symptom/O that/O she/O was/O with/O child/O./O



Chapter/O 21/O


From/O the/O moment/O when/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON understood/O from/O his/O
interviews/O with/O Betsy/PERSON and/O with/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON that/O all/O that/O was/O
expected/O of/O him/O was/O to/O leave/O his/O wife/O in/O peace/O,/O without/O burdening/O her/O
with/O his/O presence/O,/O and/O that/O his/O wife/O herself/O desired/O this/O,/O he/O felt/O so/O
distraught/O that/O he/O could/O come/O to/O no/O decision/O of/O himself/O;/O he/O did/O not/O know/O
himself/O what/O he/O wanted/O now/O,/O and/O putting/O himself/O in/O the/O hands/O of/O those/O
who/O were/O so/O pleased/O to/O interest/O themselves/O in/O his/O affairs/O,/O he/O met/O
everything/O with/O unqualified/O assent/O./O It/O was/O only/O when/O Anna/PERSON had/O left/O his/O
house/O,/O and/O the/O English/O governess/O sent/O to/O ask/O him/O whether/O she/O should/O dine/O
with/O him/O or/O separately/O,/O that/O for/O the/O first/O time/O he/O clearly/O comprehended/O
his/O position/O,/O and/O was/O appalled/O by/O it/O./O Most/O difficult/O of/O all/O in/O this/O
position/O was/O the/O fact/O that/O he/O could/O not/O in/O any/O way/O connect/O and/O reconcile/O
his/O past/O with/O what/O was/O now/O./O It/O was/O not/O the/O past/O when/O he/O had/O lived/O
happily/O with/O his/O wife/O that/O troubled/O him/O./O The/O transition/O from/O that/O past/O
to/O a/O knowledge/O of/O his/O wife/O's/O unfaithfulness/O he/O had/O lived/O through/O
miserably/O already/O;/O that/O state/O was/O painful/O,/O but/O he/O could/O understand/O it/O./O
If/O his/O wife/O had/O then/O,/O on/O declaring/O to/O him/O her/O unfaithfulness/O,/O left/O him/O,/O
he/O would/O have/O been/O wounded/O,/O unhappy/O,/O but/O he/O would/O not/O have/O been/O in/O the/O
hopeless/O position/O--/Oincomprehensible/O to/O himself/O--/Oin/O which/O he/O felt/O himself/O
now/O./O He/O could/O not/O now/O reconcile/O his/O immediate/O past/O,/O his/O tenderness/O,/O his/O
love/O for/O his/O sick/O wife/O,/O and/O for/O the/O other/O man/O's/O child/O with/O what/O was/O now/O
the/O case/O,/O that/O is/O with/O the/O fact/O that/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O in/O return/O for/O all/O this/O
he/O now/O found/O himself/O alone/O,/O put/O to/O shame/O,/O a/O laughing-stock/O,/O needed/O by/O no/O
one/O,/O and/O despised/O by/O everyone/O./O

For/O the/O first/O two/O days/O after/O his/O wife/O's/O departure/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
received/O applicants/O for/O assistance/O and/O his/O chief/O secretary/O,/O drove/O to/O the/O
committee/O,/O and/O went/O down/O to/O dinner/O in/O the/O dining/O room/O as/O usual/O./O Without/O
giving/O himself/O a/O reason/O for/O what/O he/O was/O doing/O,/O he/O strained/O every/O nerve/O
of/O his/O being/O for/O those/O two/O days/O,/O simply/O to/O preserve/O an/O appearance/O of/O
composure/O,/O and/O even/O of/O indifference/O./O Answering/O inquiries/O about/O the/O
disposition/O of/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON's/O rooms/O and/O belongings/O,/O he/O had/O exercised/O
immense/O self-control/O to/O appear/O like/O a/O man/O in/O whose/O eyes/O what/O had/O
occurred/O was/O not/O unforeseen/O nor/O out/O of/O the/O ordinary/O course/O of/O events/O,/O
and/O he/O attained/O his/O aim/O:/O no/O one/O could/O have/O detected/O in/O him/O signs/O of/O
despair/O./O But/O on/O the/O second/O day/O after/O her/O departure/O,/O when/O Korney/PERSON gave/O him/O
a/O bill/O from/O a/O fashionable/O draper/O's/O shop/O,/O which/O Anna/PERSON had/O forgotten/O to/O
pay/O,/O and/O announced/O that/O the/O clerk/O from/O the/O shop/O was/O waiting/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON told/O him/O to/O show/O the/O clerk/O up/O./O

``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O your/O excellency/O,/O for/O venturing/O to/O trouble/O you/O./O But/O if/O you/O
direct/O us/O to/O apply/O to/O her/O excellency/O,/O would/O you/O graciously/O oblige/O us/O
with/O her/O address/O?/O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON pondered/O,/O as/O it/O seemed/O to/O the/O clerk/O,/O and/O all/O at/O
once/O,/O turning/O round/O,/O he/O sat/O down/O at/O the/O table/O./O Letting/O his/O head/O sink/O
into/O his/O hands/O,/O he/O sat/O for/O a/O long/O while/O in/O that/O position/O,/O several/O times/O
attempted/O to/O speak/O and/O stopped/O short/O./O Korney/PERSON,/O perceiving/O his/O master/O's/O
emotion/O,/O asked/O the/O clerk/O to/O call/O another/O time/O./O Left/O alone/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON recognized/O that/O he/O had/O not/O the/O strength/O to/O keep/O up/O the/O
line/O of/O firmness/O and/O composure/O any/O longer/O./O He/O gave/O orders/O for/O the/O
carriage/O that/O was/O awaiting/O him/O to/O be/O taken/O back/O,/O and/O for/O no/O one/O to/O be/O
admitted/O,/O and/O he/O did/O not/O go/O down/O to/O dinner/O./O

He/O felt/O that/O he/O could/O not/O endure/O the/O weight/O of/O universal/O contempt/O and/O
exasperation/O,/O which/O he/O had/O distinctly/O seen/O in/O the/O face/O of/O the/O clerk/O and/O
of/O Korney/LOCATION,/O and/O of/O everyone/O,/O without/O exception/O,/O whom/O he/O had/O met/O during/O
those/O two/O days/O./O He/O felt/O that/O he/O could/O not/O turn/O aside/O from/O himself/O the/O
hatred/O of/O men/O,/O because/O that/O hatred/O did/O not/O come/O from/O his/O being/O bad/O -LRB-/Oin/O
that/O case/O he/O could/O have/O tried/O to/O be/O better/O-RRB-/O,/O but/O from/O his/O being/O
shamefully/O and/O repulsively/O unhappy/O./O He/O knew/O that/O for/O this/O,/O for/O the/O very/O
fact/O that/O his/O heart/O was/O torn/O with/O grief/O,/O they/O would/O be/O merciless/O to/O him/O./O
He/O felt/O that/O men/O would/O crush/O him/O as/O dogs/O strangle/O a/O torn/O dog/O yelping/O
with/O pain/O./O He/O knew/O that/O his/O sole/O means/O of/O security/O against/O people/O was/O to/O
hide/O his/O wounds/O from/O them/O,/O and/O instinctively/O he/O tried/O to/O do/O this/O for/O two/O
days/O,/O but/O now/O he/O felt/O incapable/O of/O keeping/O up/O the/O unequal/O struggle/O./O

His/O despair/O was/O even/O intensified/O by/O the/O consciousness/O that/O he/O was/O
utterly/O alone/O in/O his/O sorrow/O./O In/O all/O Petersburg/PERSON there/O was/O not/O a/O human/O
being/O to/O whom/O he/O could/O express/O what/O he/O was/O feeling/O,/O who/O would/O feel/O for/O
him/O,/O not/O as/O a/O high/O official/O,/O not/O as/O a/O member/O of/O society/O,/O but/O simply/O as/O a/O
suffering/O man/O;/O indeed/O he/O had/O not/O such/O a/O one/O in/O the/O whole/O world/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON grew/O up/O an/O orphan/O./O There/O were/O two/O brothers/O./O They/O
did/O not/O remember/O their/O father/O,/O and/O their/O mother/O died/O when/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O ten/O years/O old/O./O The/O property/O was/O a/O small/O one/O./O Their/O
uncle/O,/O Karenin/PERSON,/O a/O government/O official/O of/O high/O standing/O,/O at/O one/O time/O a/O
favorite/O of/O the/O late/O Tsar/O,/O had/O brought/O them/O up/O./O

On/O completing/O his/O high/O school/O and/O university/O courses/O with/O medals/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O,/O with/O his/O uncle/O's/O aid/O,/O immediately/O started/O in/O a/O
prominent/O position/O in/O the/O service/O,/O and/O from/O that/O time/O forward/O he/O had/O
devoted/O himself/O exclusively/O to/O political/O ambition/O./O In/O the/O high/O school/O
and/O the/O university/O,/O and/O afterwards/O in/O the/O service/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
had/O never/O formed/O a/O close/O friendship/O with/O anyone/O./O His/O brother/O had/O been/O
the/O person/O nearest/O to/O his/O heart/O,/O but/O he/O had/O a/O post/O in/O the/O Ministry/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION
Foreign/ORGANIZATION Affairs/ORGANIZATION,/O and/O was/O always/O abroad/O,/O where/O he/O had/O died/O shortly/O after/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O marriage/O./O

While/O he/O was/O governor/O of/O a/O province/O,/O Anna/PERSON's/O aunt/O,/O a/O wealthy/O provincial/O
lady/O,/O had/O thrown/O him/O--/Omiddle-aged/O as/O he/O was/O,/O though/O young/O for/O a/O
governor/O--/Owith/O her/O niece/O,/O and/O had/O succeeded/O in/O putting/O him/O in/O such/O a/O
position/O that/O he/O had/O either/O to/O declare/O himself/O or/O to/O leave/O the/O town/O./O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O not/O long/O in/O hesitation/O./O There/O were/O at/O the/O time/O
as/O many/O reasons/O for/O the/O step/O as/O against/O it/O,/O and/O there/O was/O no/O
overbalancing/O consideration/O to/O outweigh/O his/O invariable/O rule/O of/O
abstaining/O when/O in/O doubt/O./O But/O Anna/PERSON's/O aunt/O had/O through/O a/O common/O
acquaintance/O insinuated/O that/O he/O had/O already/O compromised/O the/O girl/O,/O and/O
that/O he/O was/O in/O honor/O bound/O to/O make/O her/O an/O offer/O./O He/O made/O the/O offer/O,/O and/O
concentrated/O on/O his/O betrothed/O and/O his/O wife/O all/O the/O feeling/O of/O which/O he/O
was/O capable/O./O

The/O attachment/O he/O felt/O to/O Anna/PERSON precluded/O in/O his/O heart/O every/O need/O of/O
intimate/O relations/O with/O others/O./O And/O now/O among/O all/O his/O acquaintances/O he/O
had/O not/O one/O friend/O./O He/O had/O plenty/O of/O so-called/O connections/O,/O but/O no/O
friendships/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O plenty/O of/O people/O whom/O he/O could/O
invite/O to/O dinner/O,/O to/O whose/O sympathy/O he/O could/O appeal/O in/O any/O public/O affair/O
he/O was/O concerned/O about/O,/O whose/O interest/O he/O could/O reckon/O upon/O for/O anyone/O
he/O wished/O to/O help/O,/O with/O whom/O he/O could/O candidly/O discuss/O other/O people/O's/O
business/O and/O affairs/O of/O state/O./O But/O his/O relations/O with/O these/O people/O were/O
confined/O to/O one/O clearly/O defined/O channel/O,/O and/O had/O a/O certain/O routine/O from/O
which/O it/O was/O impossible/O to/O depart/O./O There/O was/O one/O man/O,/O a/O comrade/O of/O his/O
at/O the/O university/O,/O with/O whom/O he/O had/O made/O friends/O later/O,/O and/O with/O whom/O he/O
could/O have/O spoken/O of/O a/O personal/O sorrow/O;/O but/O this/O friend/O had/O a/O post/O in/O
the/O Department/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION Education/ORGANIZATION in/O a/O remote/O part/O of/O Russia/LOCATION./O Of/O the/O people/O in/O
Petersburg/LOCATION the/O most/O intimate/O and/O most/O possible/O were/O his/O chief/O secretary/O
and/O his/O doctor/O./O

Mihail/PERSON Vassilievitch/PERSON Sludin/PERSON,/O the/O chief/O secretary/O,/O was/O a/O straightforward/O,/O
intelligent/O,/O good-hearted/O,/O and/O conscientious/O man/O,/O and/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O aware/O of/O his/O personal/O goodwill/O./O But/O their/O five/O years/O
of/O official/O work/O together/O seemed/O to/O have/O put/O a/O barrier/O between/O them/O that/O
cut/O off/O warmer/O relations/O./O

After/O signing/O the/O papers/O brought/O him/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O sat/O for/O
a/O long/O while/O in/O silence/O,/O glancing/O at/O Mihail/PERSON Vassilievitch/PERSON,/O and/O several/O
times/O he/O attempted/O to/O speak/O,/O but/O could/O not/O./O He/O had/O already/O prepared/O the/O
phrase/O:/O ``/OYou/O have/O heard/O of/O my/O trouble/O?/O''/O But/O he/O ended/O by/O saying/O,/O as/O
usual/O:/O ``/OSo/O you/O'll/O get/O this/O ready/O for/O me/O?/O''/O and/O with/O that/O dismissed/O him/O./O

The/O other/O person/O was/O the/O doctor/O,/O who/O had/O also/O a/O kindly/O feeling/O for/O him/O;/O
but/O there/O had/O long/O existed/O a/O taciturn/O understanding/O between/O them/O that/O
both/O were/O weighed/O down/O by/O work/O,/O and/O always/O in/O a/O hurry/O./O

Of/O his/O women/O friends/O,/O foremost/O amongst/O them/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON never/O thought/O./O All/O women/O,/O simply/O as/O women/O,/O were/O
terrible/O and/O distasteful/O to/O him/O./O



Chapter/O 22/O


Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O forgotten/O the/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O but/O she/O
had/O not/O forgotten/O him/O./O At/O the/O bitterest/O moment/O of/O his/O lonely/O despair/O she/O
came/O to/O him/O,/O and/O without/O waiting/O to/O be/O announced/O,/O walked/O straight/O into/O
his/O study/O./O She/O found/O him/O as/O he/O was/O sitting/O with/O his/O head/O in/O both/O hands/O./O

''/O_/OJ'ai/O forcé/O la/O consigne/O_/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O walking/O in/O with/O rapid/O steps/O and/O
breathing/O hard/O with/O excitement/O and/O rapid/O exercise/O./O ``/OI/O have/O heard/O all/O!/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON!/O Dear/O friend/O!/O''/O she/O went/O on/O,/O warmly/O squeezing/O his/O
hand/O in/O both/O of/O hers/O and/O gazing/O with/O her/O fine/O pensive/O eyes/O into/O his/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O frowning/O,/O got/O up/O,/O and/O disengaging/O his/O hand/O,/O moved/O
her/O a/O chair/O./O

``/OWo/On't/O you/O sit/O down/O,/O countess/O?/O I/O'm/O seeing/O no/O one/O because/O I/O'm/O unwell/O,/O
countess/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O his/O lips/O twitched/O./O

``/ODear/O friend/O!/O''/O repeated/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O never/O taking/O her/O eyes/O
off/O his/O,/O and/O suddenly/O her/O eyebrows/O rose/O at/O the/O inner/O corners/O,/O describing/O
a/O triangle/O on/O her/O forehead/O,/O her/O ugly/O yellow/O face/O became/O still/O uglier/O,/O
but/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON felt/O that/O she/O was/O sorry/O for/O him/O and/O was/O
preparing/O to/O cry/O./O And/O he/O too/O was/O softened/O;/O he/O snatched/O her/O plump/O hand/O
and/O proceeded/O to/O kiss/O it/O./O

``/ODear/O friend/O!/O''/O she/O said/O in/O a/O voice/O breaking/O with/O emotion/O./O ``/OYou/O ought/O not/O
to/O give/O way/O to/O grief/O./O Your/O sorrow/O is/O a/O great/O one/O,/O but/O you/O ought/O to/O find/O
consolation/O./O''/O

``/OI/O am/O crushed/O,/O I/O am/O annihilated/O,/O I/O am/O no/O longer/O a/O man/O!/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O letting/O go/O her/O hand/O,/O but/O still/O gazing/O into/O her/O brimming/O
eyes/O./O ``/OMy/O position/O is/O so/O awful/O because/O I/O can/O find/O nowhere/O,/O I/O can/Onot/O find/O
within/O me/O strength/O to/O support/O me/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O will/O find/O support/O;/O seek/O it/O--/Onot/O in/O me/O,/O though/O I/O beseech/O you/O to/O
believe/O in/O my/O friendship/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O a/O sigh/O./O ``/OOur/O support/O is/O love/O,/O
that/O love/O that/O He/O has/O vouchsafed/O us/O./O His/O burden/O is/O light/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
with/O the/O look/O of/O ecstasy/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON knew/O so/O well/O./O ``/OHe/O will/O be/O
your/O support/O and/O your/O succor/O./O''/O

Although/O there/O was/O in/O these/O words/O a/O flavor/O of/O that/O sentimental/O emotion/O
at/O her/O own/O lofty/O feelings/O,/O and/O that/O new/O mystical/O fervor/O which/O had/O lately/O
gained/O ground/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O which/O seemed/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
disproportionate/O,/O still/O it/O was/O pleasant/O to/O him/O to/O hear/O this/O now/O./O

``/OI/O am/O weak/O./O I/O am/O crushed/O./O I/O foresaw/O nothing/O,/O and/O now/O I/O understand/O
nothing/O./O''/O

``/ODear/O friend/O,/O''/O repeated/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O the/O loss/O of/O what/O I/O have/O not/O now/O,/O it/O's/O not/O that/O!/O''/O pursued/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O ``/OI/O do/O not/O grieve/O for/O that/O./O But/O I/O can/Onot/O help/O
feeling/O humiliated/O before/O other/O people/O for/O the/O position/O I/O am/O placed/O in/O./O
It/O is/O wrong/O,/O but/O I/O ca/On't/O help/O it/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O help/O it/O./O''/O

``/ONot/O you/O it/O was/O performed/O that/O noble/O act/O of/O forgiveness/O,/O at/O which/O I/O was/O
moved/O to/O ecstasy/O,/O and/O everyone/O else/O too/O,/O but/O He/O,/O working/O within/O your/O
heart/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O raising/O her/O eyes/O rapturously/O,/O ``/Oand/O
so/O you/O can/Onot/O be/O ashamed/O of/O your/O act/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON knitted/O his/O brows/O,/O and/O crooking/O his/O hands/O,/O he/O
cracked/O his/O fingers/O./O

``/OOne/O must/O know/O all/O the/O facts/O,/O''/O he/O said/O in/O his/O thin/O voice/O./O ``/OA/O man/O's/O
strength/O has/O its/O limits/O,/O countess/O,/O and/O I/O have/O reached/O my/O limits/O./O The/O
whole/O day/O I/O have/O had/O to/O be/O making/O arrangements/O,/O arrangements/O about/O
household/O matters/O arising/O''/O -LRB-/Ohe/O emphasized/O the/O word/O _/Oarising/O_/O-RRB-/O ``/Ofrom/O my/O
new/O,/O solitary/O position/O./O The/O servants/O,/O the/O governess/O,/O the/O accounts/O.../O./O
These/O pinpricks/O have/O stabbed/O me/O to/O the/O heart/O,/O and/O I/O have/O not/O the/O
strength/O to/O bear/O it/O./O At/O dinner/O .../O yesterday/O,/O I/O was/O almost/O getting/O up/O
from/O the/O dinner/O table/O./O I/O could/O not/O bear/O the/O way/O my/O son/O looked/O at/O me/O./O He/O
did/O not/O ask/O me/O the/O meaning/O of/O it/O all/O,/O but/O he/O wanted/O to/O ask/O,/O and/O I/O could/O
not/O bear/O the/O look/O in/O his/O eyes/O./O He/O was/O afraid/O to/O look/O at/O me/O,/O but/O that/O is/O
not/O all/O.../O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON would/O have/O referred/O to/O the/O bill/O that/O
had/O been/O brought/O him/O,/O but/O his/O voice/O shook/O,/O and/O he/O stopped/O./O That/O bill/O on/O
blue/O paper/O,/O for/O a/O hat/O and/O ribbons/O,/O he/O could/O not/O recall/O without/O a/O rush/O of/O
self-pity/O./O

``/OI/O understand/O,/O dear/O friend/O,/O''/O said/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O ``/OI/O understand/O it/O all/O./O
Succor/O and/O comfort/O you/O will/O find/O not/O in/O me/O,/O though/O I/O have/O come/O only/O to/O
aid/O you/O if/O I/O can/O./O If/O I/O could/O take/O from/O off/O you/O all/O these/O petty/O,/O
humiliating/O cares/O .../O I/O understand/O that/O a/O woman/O's/O word/O,/O a/O woman/O's/O
superintendence/O is/O needed/O./O You/O will/O intrust/O it/O to/O me/O?/O''/O

Silently/O and/O gratefully/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON pressed/O her/O hand/O./O

``/OTogether/O we/O will/O take/O care/O of/O Seryozha/PERSON./O Practical/O affairs/O are/O not/O my/O
strong/O point/O./O But/O I/O will/O set/O to/O work/O./O I/O will/O be/O your/O housekeeper/O./O Do/On't/O
thank/O me/O./O I/O do/O it/O not/O from/O myself/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O can/Onot/O help/O thanking/O you/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O,/O dear/O friend/O,/O do/O not/O give/O way/O to/O the/O feeling/O of/O which/O you/O
spoke/O--/Obeing/O ashamed/O of/O what/O is/O the/O Christian/O's/O highest/O glory/O:/O _/Ohe/O who/O
humbles/O himself/O shall/O be/O exalted/O_/O./O And/O you/O can/Onot/O thank/O me/O./O You/O must/O
thank/O Him/O,/O and/O pray/O to/O Him/O for/O succor/O./O In/O Him/O alone/O we/O find/O peace/O,/O
consolation/O,/O salvation/O,/O and/O love/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O turning/O her/O eyes/O
heavenwards/O,/O she/O began/O praying/O,/O as/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON gathered/O from/O
her/O silence/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON listened/O to/O her/O now/O,/O and/O those/O expressions/O which/O
had/O seemed/O to/O him/O,/O if/O not/O distasteful/O,/O at/O least/O exaggerated/O,/O now/O seemed/O
to/O him/O natural/O and/O consolatory/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O disliked/O this/O
new/O enthusiastic/O fervor/O./O He/O was/O a/O believer/O,/O who/O was/O interested/O in/O
religion/O primarily/O in/O its/O political/O aspect/O,/O and/O the/O new/O doctrine/O which/O
ventured/O upon/O several/O new/O interpretations/O,/O just/O because/O it/O paved/O the/O way/O
to/O discussion/O and/O analysis/O,/O was/O in/O principle/O disagreeable/O to/O him/O./O He/O had/O
hitherto/O taken/O up/O a/O cold/O and/O even/O antagonistic/O attitude/O to/O this/O new/O
doctrine/O,/O and/O with/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O who/O had/O been/O carried/O away/O by/O
it/O,/O he/O had/O never/O argued/O,/O but/O by/O silence/O had/O assiduously/O parried/O her/O
attempts/O to/O provoke/O him/O into/O argument/O./O Now/O for/O the/O first/O time/O he/O heard/O
her/O words/O with/O pleasure/O,/O and/O did/O not/O inwardly/O oppose/O them/O./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O,/O very/O grateful/O to/O you/O,/O both/O for/O your/O deeds/O and/O for/O your/O
words/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O when/O she/O had/O finished/O praying/O./O

Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON once/O more/O pressed/O both/O her/O friend/O's/O hands/O./O

``/ONow/O I/O will/O enter/O upon/O my/O duties/O,/O''/O she/O said/O with/O a/O smile/O after/O a/O pause/O,/O
as/O she/O wiped/O away/O the/O traces/O of/O tears/O./O ``/OI/O am/O going/O to/O Seryozha/PERSON./O Only/O in/O
the/O last/O extremity/O shall/O I/O apply/O to/O you/O./O''/O And/O she/O got/O up/O and/O went/O out/O./O

Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON went/O into/O Seryozha/PERSON's/O part/O of/O the/O house/O,/O and/O
dropping/O tears/O on/O the/O scared/O child/O's/O cheeks/O,/O she/O told/O him/O that/O his/O
father/O was/O a/O saint/O and/O his/O mother/O was/O dead/O./O

Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON kept/O her/O promise/O./O She/O did/O actually/O take/O upon/O
herself/O the/O care/O of/O the/O organization/O and/O management/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O household/O./O But/O she/O had/O not/O overstated/O the/O case/O when/O
saying/O that/O practical/O affairs/O were/O not/O her/O strong/O point/O./O All/O her/O
arrangements/O had/O to/O be/O modified/O because/O they/O could/O not/O be/O carried/O out/O,/O
and/O they/O were/O modified/O by/O Korney/PERSON,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O valet/O,/O who/O,/O
though/O no/O one/O was/O aware/O of/O the/O fact/O,/O now/O managed/O Karenin/PERSON's/O household/O,/O
and/O quietly/O and/O discreetly/O reported/O to/O his/O master/O while/O he/O was/O dressing/O
all/O it/O was/O necessary/O for/O him/O to/O know/O./O But/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON's/O help/O was/O none/O
the/O less/O real/O;/O she/O gave/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON moral/O support/O in/O the/O
consciousness/O of/O her/O love/O and/O respect/O for/O him/O,/O and/O still/O more/O,/O as/O it/O was/O
soothing/O to/O her/O to/O believe/O,/O in/O that/O she/O almost/O turned/O him/O to/O
Christianity/O--/Othat/O is/O,/O from/O an/O indifferent/O and/O apathetic/O believer/O she/O
turned/O him/O into/O an/O ardent/O and/O steadfast/O adherent/O of/O the/O new/O
interpretation/O of/O Christian/O doctrine/O,/O which/O had/O been/O gaining/O ground/O of/O
late/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O It/O was/O easy/O for/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON to/O believe/O in/O
this/O teaching/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O like/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON indeed/O,/O and/O
others/O who/O shared/O their/O views/O,/O was/O completely/O devoid/O of/O vividness/O of/O
imagination/O,/O that/O spiritual/O faculty/O in/O virtue/O of/O which/O the/O conceptions/O
evoked/O by/O the/O imagination/O become/O so/O vivid/O that/O they/O must/O needs/O be/O in/O
harmony/O with/O other/O conceptions/O,/O and/O with/O actual/O fact/O./O He/O saw/O nothing/O
impossible/O and/O inconceivable/O in/O the/O idea/O that/O death/O,/O though/O existing/O for/O
unbelievers/O,/O did/O not/O exist/O for/O him/O,/O and/O that/O,/O as/O he/O was/O possessed/O of/O the/O
most/O perfect/O faith/O,/O of/O the/O measure/O of/O which/O he/O was/O himself/O the/O judge/O,/O
therefore/O there/O was/O no/O sin/O in/O his/O soul/O,/O and/O he/O was/O experiencing/O complete/O
salvation/O here/O on/O earth/O./O

It/O is/O true/O that/O the/O erroneousness/O and/O shallowness/O of/O this/O conception/O of/O
his/O faith/O was/O dimly/O perceptible/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O and/O he/O knew/O
that/O when/O,/O without/O the/O slightest/O idea/O that/O his/O forgiveness/O was/O the/O
action/O of/O a/O higher/O power/O,/O he/O had/O surrendered/O directly/O to/O the/O feeling/O of/O
forgiveness/O,/O he/O had/O felt/O more/O happiness/O than/O now/O when/O he/O was/O thinking/O
every/O instant/O that/O Christ/PERSON was/O in/O his/O heart/O,/O and/O that/O in/O signing/O official/O
papers/O he/O was/O doing/O His/O will/O./O But/O for/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON it/O was/O a/O
necessity/O to/O think/O in/O that/O way/O;/O it/O was/O such/O a/O necessity/O for/O him/O in/O his/O
humiliation/O to/O have/O some/O elevated/O standpoint/O,/O however/O imaginary/O,/O from/O
which/O,/O looked/O down/O upon/O by/O all/O,/O he/O could/O look/O down/O on/O others/O,/O that/O he/O
clung/O,/O as/O to/O his/O one/O salvation/O,/O to/O his/O delusion/O of/O salvation/O./O



Chapter/O 23/O


The/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON had/O,/O as/O a/O very/O young/O and/O sentimental/O girl/O,/O
been/O married/O to/O a/O wealthy/O man/O of/O high/O rank/O,/O an/O extremely/O good-natured/O,/O
jovial/O,/O and/O extremely/O dissipated/O rake/O./O Two/O months/O after/O marriage/O her/O
husband/O abandoned/O her/O,/O and/O her/O impassioned/O protestations/O of/O affection/O he/O
met/O with/O a/O sarcasm/O and/O even/O hostility/O that/O people/O knowing/O the/O count/O's/O
good/O heart/O,/O and/O seeing/O no/O defects/O in/O the/O sentimental/O Lidia/PERSON,/O were/O at/O a/O
loss/O to/O explain/O./O Though/O they/O were/O divorced/O and/O lived/O apart/O,/O yet/O whenever/O
the/O husband/O met/O the/O wife/O,/O he/O invariably/O behaved/O to/O her/O with/O the/O same/O
malignant/O irony/O,/O the/O cause/O of/O which/O was/O incomprehensible/O./O

Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON had/O long/O given/O up/O being/O in/O love/O with/O her/O
husband/O,/O but/O from/O that/O time/O she/O had/O never/O given/O up/O being/O in/O love/O with/O
someone/O./O She/O was/O in/O love/O with/O several/O people/O at/O once/O,/O both/O men/O and/O
women/O;/O she/O had/O been/O in/O love/O with/O almost/O everyone/O who/O had/O been/O
particularly/O distinguished/O in/O any/O way/O./O She/O was/O in/O love/O with/O all/O the/O new/O
princes/O and/O princesses/O who/O married/O into/O the/O imperial/O family/O;/O she/O had/O
been/O in/O love/O with/O a/O high/O dignitary/O of/O the/O Church/O,/O a/O vicar/O,/O and/O a/O parish/O
priest/O;/O she/O had/O been/O in/O love/O with/O a/O journalist/O,/O three/O Slavophiles/O,/O with/O
Komissarov/PERSON,/O with/O a/O minister/O,/O a/O doctor/O,/O an/O English/O missionary/O and/O
Karenin/PERSON./O All/O these/O passions/O constantly/O waning/O or/O growing/O more/O ardent/O,/O
did/O not/O prevent/O her/O from/O keeping/O up/O the/O most/O extended/O and/O complicated/O
relations/O with/O the/O court/O and/O fashionable/O society/O./O But/O from/O the/O time/O that/O
after/O Karenin/PERSON's/O trouble/O she/O took/O him/O under/O her/O special/O protection/O,/O from/O
the/O time/O that/O she/O set/O to/O work/O in/O Karenin/PERSON's/O household/O looking/O after/O his/O
welfare/O,/O she/O felt/O that/O all/O her/O other/O attachments/O were/O not/O the/O real/O
thing/O,/O and/O that/O she/O was/O now/O genuinely/O in/O love/O,/O and/O with/O no/O one/O but/O
Karenin/PERSON./O The/O feeling/O she/O now/O experienced/O for/O him/O seemed/O to/O her/O stronger/O
than/O any/O of/O her/O former/O feelings/O./O Analyzing/O her/O feeling/O,/O and/O comparing/O it/O
with/O former/O passions/O,/O she/O distinctly/O perceived/O that/O she/O would/O not/O have/O
been/O in/O love/O with/O Komissarov/PERSON if/O he/O had/O not/O saved/O the/O life/O of/O the/O Tsar/O,/O
that/O she/O would/O not/O have/O been/O in/O love/O with/O Ristitch-Kudzhitsky/PERSON if/O there/O
had/O been/O no/O Slavonic/O question/O,/O but/O that/O she/O loved/O Karenin/PERSON for/O himself/O,/O
for/O his/O lofty/O,/O uncomprehended/O soul/O,/O for/O the/O sweet/O--/Oto/O her/O--/Ohigh/O notes/O of/O
his/O voice/O,/O for/O his/O drawling/O intonation/O,/O his/O weary/O eyes/O,/O his/O character/O,/O
and/O his/O soft/O white/O hands/O with/O their/O swollen/O veins/O./O She/O was/O not/O simply/O
overjoyed/O at/O meeting/O him/O,/O but/O she/O sought/O in/O his/O face/O signs/O of/O the/O
impression/O she/O was/O making/O on/O him/O./O She/O tried/O to/O please/O him/O,/O not/O by/O her/O
words/O only/O,/O but/O in/O her/O whole/O person/O./O For/O his/O sake/O it/O was/O that/O she/O now/O
lavished/O more/O care/O on/O her/O dress/O than/O before/O./O She/O caught/O herself/O in/O
reveries/O on/O what/O might/O have/O been/O,/O if/O she/O had/O not/O been/O married/O and/O he/O had/O
been/O free/O./O She/O blushed/O with/O emotion/O when/O he/O came/O into/O the/O room/O,/O she/O
could/O not/O repress/O a/O smile/O of/O rapture/O when/O he/O said/O anything/O amiable/O to/O
her/O./O

For/O several/O days/O now/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON had/O been/O in/O a/O state/O of/O
intense/O excitement/O./O She/O had/O learned/O that/O Anna/PERSON and/O Vronsky/O were/O in/O
Petersburg/LOCATION./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON must/O be/O saved/O from/O seeing/O her/O,/O he/O must/O
be/O saved/O even/O from/O the/O torturing/O knowledge/O that/O that/O awful/O woman/O was/O in/O
the/O same/O town/O with/O him/O,/O and/O that/O he/O might/O meet/O her/O any/O minute/O./O

Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON made/O inquiries/O through/O her/O friends/O as/O to/O what/O those/O
_/Oinfamous/O people/O_/O,/O as/O she/O called/O Anna/PERSON and/O Vronsky/O,/O intended/O doing/O,/O and/O
she/O endeavored/O so/O to/O guide/O every/O movement/O of/O her/O friend/O during/O those/O
days/O that/O he/O could/O not/O come/O across/O them/O./O The/O young/O adjutant/O,/O an/O
acquaintance/O of/O Vronsky/O,/O through/O whom/O she/O obtained/O her/O information/O,/O and/O
who/O hoped/O through/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON to/O obtain/O a/O concession/O,/O told/O
her/O that/O they/O had/O finished/O their/O business/O and/O were/O going/O away/O next/O day/O./O
Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON had/O already/O begun/O to/O calm/O down/O,/O when/O the/O next/O morning/O a/O
note/O was/O brought/O her/O,/O the/O handwriting/O of/O which/O she/O recognized/O with/O
horror/O./O It/O was/O the/O handwriting/O of/O Anna/PERSON Karenina/PERSON./O The/O envelope/O was/O of/O
paper/O as/O thick/O as/O bark/O;/O on/O the/O oblong/O yellow/O paper/O there/O was/O a/O huge/O
monogram/O,/O and/O the/O letter/O smelt/O of/O agreeable/O scent/O./O

``/OWho/O brought/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OA/O commissionaire/O from/O the/O hotel/O./O''/O

It/O was/O some/O time/O before/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON could/O sit/O down/O to/O read/O
the/O letter/O./O Her/O excitement/O brought/O on/O an/O attack/O of/O asthma/O,/O to/O which/O she/O
was/O subject/O./O When/O she/O had/O recovered/O her/O composure/O,/O she/O read/O the/O
following/O letter/O in/O French/O:/O

    ``/OMadame/O la/O Comtesse/O,/O

    ``/OThe/O Christian/O feelings/O with/O which/O your/O heart/O is/O filled/O give/O me/O
    the/O,/O I/O feel/O,/O unpardonable/O boldness/O to/O write/O to/O you/O./O I/O am/O
    miserable/O at/O being/O separated/O from/O my/O son/O./O I/O entreat/O permission/O
    to/O see/O him/O once/O before/O my/O departure/O./O Forgive/O me/O for/O recalling/O
    myself/O to/O your/O memory/O./O I/O apply/O to/O you/O and/O not/O to/O Alexey/PERSON
    Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O simply/O because/O I/O do/O not/O wish/O to/O cause/O that/O
    generous/O man/O to/O suffer/O in/O remembering/O me/O./O Knowing/O your/O
    friendship/O for/O him/O,/O I/O know/O you/O will/O understand/O me/O./O Could/O you/O
    send/O Seryozha/PERSON to/O me/O,/O or/O should/O I/O come/O to/O the/O house/O at/O some/O fixed/O
    hour/O,/O or/O will/O you/O let/O me/O know/O when/O and/O where/O I/O could/O see/O him/O
    away/O from/O home/O?/O I/O do/O not/O anticipate/O a/O refusal/O,/O knowing/O the/O
    magnanimity/O of/O him/O with/O whom/O it/O rests/O./O You/O can/Onot/O conceive/O the/O
    craving/O I/O have/O to/O see/O him/O,/O and/O so/O can/Onot/O conceive/O the/O gratitude/O
    your/O help/O will/O arouse/O in/O me/O./O

                                                               Anna/PERSON''/O

Everything/O in/O this/O letter/O exasperated/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON:/O its/O
contents/O and/O the/O allusion/O to/O magnanimity/O,/O and/O especially/O its/O free/O and/O
easy/O--/Oas/O she/O considered/O--/Otone/O./O

``/OSay/O that/O there/O is/O no/O answer/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O and/O
immediately/O opening/O her/O blotting-book/O,/O she/O wrote/O to/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON that/O she/O hoped/O to/O see/O him/O at/O one/O o'clock/O at/O the/O levee/O./O

``/OI/O must/O talk/O with/O you/O of/O a/O grave/O and/O painful/O subject/O./O There/O we/O will/O
arrange/O where/O to/O meet/O./O Best/O of/O all/O at/O my/O house/O,/O where/O I/O will/O order/O tea/O
_/Oas/O you/O like/O it/O_/O./O Urgent/O./O He/O lays/O the/O cross/O,/O but/O He/O gives/O the/O strength/O
to/O bear/O it/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O so/O as/O to/O give/O him/O some/O slight/O preparation/O./O
Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON usually/O wrote/O some/O two/O or/O three/O letters/O a/O day/O to/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O She/O enjoyed/O that/O form/O of/O communication/O,/O which/O
gave/O opportunity/O for/O a/O refinement/O and/O air/O of/O mystery/O not/O afforded/O by/O
their/O personal/O interviews/O./O



Chapter/O 24/O


The/O levee/O was/O drawing/O to/O a/O close/O./O People/O met/O as/O they/O were/O going/O away/O,/O
and/O gossiped/O of/O the/O latest/O news/O,/O of/O the/O newly/O bestowed/O honors/O and/O the/O
changes/O in/O the/O positions/O of/O the/O higher/O functionaries/O./O

``/OIf/O only/O Countess/O Marya/PERSON Borissovna/PERSON were/O Minister/O of/O War/O,/O and/O Princess/O
Vatkovskaya/PERSON were/O Commander-in-Chief/O,/O''/O said/O a/O gray-headed/O,/O little/O old/O man/O
in/O a/O gold-embroidered/O uniform/O,/O addressing/O a/O tall/O,/O handsome/O maid/O of/O honor/O
who/O had/O questioned/O him/O about/O the/O new/O appointments/O./O

``/OAnd/O me/O among/O the/O adjutants/O,/O''/O said/O the/O maid/O of/O honor/O,/O smiling/O./O

``/OYou/O have/O an/O appointment/O already/O./O You/O're/O over/O the/O ecclesiastical/O
department/O./O And/O your/O assistant/O's/O Karenin/PERSON./O''/O

``/OGood-day/O,/O prince/O!/O''/O said/O the/O little/O old/O man/O to/O a/O man/O who/O came/O up/O to/O him/O./O

``/OWhat/O were/O you/O saying/O of/O Karenin/PERSON?/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O./O

``/OHe/O and/O Putyatov/PERSON have/O received/O the/O Alexander/PERSON Nevsky/PERSON./O''/O

``/OI/O thought/O he/O had/O it/O already/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O./O Just/O look/O at/O him/O,/O''/O said/O the/O little/O old/O man/O,/O pointing/O with/O his/O
embroidered/O hat/O to/O Karenin/PERSON in/O a/O court/O uniform/O with/O the/O new/O red/O ribbon/O
across/O his/O shoulders/O,/O standing/O in/O the/O doorway/O of/O the/O hall/O with/O an/O
influential/O member/O of/O the/O Imperial/ORGANIZATION Council/ORGANIZATION./O ``/OPleased/O and/O happy/O as/O a/O
brass/O farthing/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O stopping/O to/O shake/O hands/O with/O a/O handsome/O
gentleman/O of/O the/O bedchamber/O of/O colossal/O proportions/O./O

``/ONo/O;/O he/O's/O looking/O older/O,/O''/O said/O the/O gentleman/O of/O the/O bedchamber/O./O

``/OFrom/O overwork/O./O He/O's/O always/O drawing/O up/O projects/O nowadays/O./O He/O wo/On't/O let/O a/O
poor/O devil/O go/O nowadays/O till/O he/O's/O explained/O it/O all/O to/O him/O under/O heads/O./O''/O

``/OLooking/O older/O,/O did/O you/O say/O?/O _/OIl/O fait/O des/O passions/O_/O./O I/O believe/O Countess/O
Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON's/O jealous/O now/O of/O his/O wife/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O come/O now/O,/O please/O do/On't/O say/O any/O harm/O of/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O is/O there/O any/O harm/O in/O her/O being/O in/O love/O with/O Karenin/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OBut/O is/O it/O true/O Madame/O Karenina/PERSON's/O here/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O not/O here/O in/O the/O palace/O,/O but/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O I/O met/O her/O yesterday/O
with/O Alexey/PERSON Vronsky/PERSON,/O _/Obras/O dessous/O,/O bras/O dessous/O_/O,/O in/O the/O Morsky/O./O''/O

``/OC'est/O un/O homme/O qui/O n/O'/Oa/O pas/O.../O''/O the/O gentleman/O of/O the/O bedchamber/O was/O
beginning/O,/O but/O he/O stopped/O to/O make/O room/O,/O bowing/O,/O for/O a/O member/O of/O the/O
Imperial/O family/O to/O pass/O./O

Thus/O people/O talked/O incessantly/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O finding/O fault/O
with/O him/O and/O laughing/O at/O him/O,/O while/O he/O,/O blocking/O up/O the/O way/O of/O the/O
member/O of/O the/O Imperial/ORGANIZATION Council/ORGANIZATION he/O had/O captured/O,/O was/O explaining/O to/O him/O
point/O by/O point/O his/O new/O financial/O project/O,/O never/O interrupting/O his/O
discourse/O for/O an/O instant/O for/O fear/O he/O should/O escape/O./O

Almost/O at/O the/O same/O time/O that/O his/O wife/O left/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON there/O
had/O come/O to/O him/O that/O bitterest/O moment/O in/O the/O life/O of/O an/O official/O--/Othe/O
moment/O when/O his/O upward/O career/O comes/O to/O a/O full/O stop/O./O This/O full/O stop/O had/O
arrived/O and/O everyone/O perceived/O it/O,/O but/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON himself/O was/O
not/O yet/O aware/O that/O his/O career/O was/O over/O./O Whether/O it/O was/O due/O to/O his/O feud/O
with/O Stremov/PERSON,/O or/O his/O misfortune/O with/O his/O wife/O,/O or/O simply/O that/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O reached/O his/O destined/O limits/O,/O it/O had/O become/O evident/O to/O
everyone/O in/O the/O course/O of/O that/O year/O that/O his/O career/O was/O at/O an/O end/O./O He/O
still/O filled/O a/O position/O of/O consequence/O,/O he/O sat/O on/O many/O commissions/O and/O
committees/O,/O but/O he/O was/O a/O man/O whose/O day/O was/O over/O,/O and/O from/O whom/O nothing/O
was/O expected/O./O Whatever/O he/O said/O,/O whatever/O he/O proposed/O,/O was/O heard/O as/O
though/O it/O were/O something/O long/O familiar/O,/O and/O the/O very/O thing/O that/O was/O not/O
needed/O./O But/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O not/O aware/O of/O this/O,/O and/O,/O on/O the/O
contrary/O,/O being/O cut/O off/O from/O direct/O participation/O in/O governmental/O
activity/O,/O he/O saw/O more/O clearly/O than/O ever/O the/O errors/O and/O defects/O in/O the/O
action/O of/O others/O,/O and/O thought/O it/O his/O duty/O to/O point/O out/O means/O for/O their/O
correction/O./O Shortly/O after/O his/O separation/O from/O his/O wife/O,/O he/O began/O writing/O
his/O first/O note/O on/O the/O new/O judicial/O procedure/O,/O the/O first/O of/O the/O endless/O
series/O of/O notes/O he/O was/O destined/O to/O write/O in/O the/O future/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON did/O not/O merely/O fail/O to/O observe/O his/O hopeless/O
position/O in/O the/O official/O world/O,/O he/O was/O not/O merely/O free/O from/O anxiety/O on/O
this/O head/O,/O he/O was/O positively/O more/O satisfied/O than/O ever/O with/O his/O own/O
activity/O./O

``/OHe/O that/O is/O unmarried/O careth/O for/O the/O things/O that/O belong/O to/O the/O Lord/O,/O how/O
he/O may/O please/O the/O Lord/O:/O But/O he/O that/O is/O married/O careth/O for/O the/O things/O
that/O are/O of/O the/O world/O,/O how/O he/O may/O please/O his/O wife/O,/O''/O says/O the/O Apostle/PERSON
Paul/PERSON,/O and/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O who/O was/O now/O guided/O in/O every/O action/O by/O
Scripture/O,/O often/O recalled/O this/O text/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O ever/O since/O he/O
had/O been/O left/O without/O a/O wife/O,/O he/O had/O in/O these/O very/O projects/O of/O reform/O
been/O serving/O the/O Lord/O more/O zealously/O than/O before/O./O

The/O unmistakable/O impatience/O of/O the/O member/O of/O the/O Council/ORGANIZATION trying/O to/O get/O
away/O from/O him/O did/O not/O trouble/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON;/O he/O gave/O up/O his/O
exposition/O only/O when/O the/O member/O of/O the/O Council/ORGANIZATION,/O seizing/O his/O chance/O when/O
one/O of/O the/O Imperial/O family/O was/O passing/O,/O slipped/O away/O from/O him/O./O

Left/O alone/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON looked/O down/O,/O collecting/O his/O thoughts/O,/O
then/O looked/O casually/O about/O him/O and/O walked/O towards/O the/O door/O,/O where/O he/O
hoped/O to/O meet/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O

``/OAnd/O how/O strong/O they/O all/O are/O,/O how/O sound/O physically/O,/O''/O thought/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O the/O powerfully/O built/O gentleman/O of/O the/O
bedchamber/O with/O his/O well-combed/O,/O perfumed/O whiskers/O,/O and/O at/O the/O red/O neck/O
of/O the/O prince/O,/O pinched/O by/O his/O tight/O uniform/O./O He/O had/O to/O pass/O them/O on/O his/O
way/O./O ``/OTruly/O is/O it/O said/O that/O all/O the/O world/O is/O evil/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O with/O
another/O sidelong/O glance/O at/O the/O calves/O of/O the/O gentleman/O of/O the/O
bedchamber/O./O

Moving/O forward/O deliberately/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON bowed/O with/O his/O
customary/O air/O of/O weariness/O and/O dignity/O to/O the/O gentleman/O who/O had/O been/O
talking/O about/O him/O,/O and/O looking/O towards/O the/O door/O,/O his/O eyes/O sought/O
Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O

``/OAh/O!/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON!/O''/O said/O the/O little/O old/O man/O,/O with/O a/O malicious/O
light/O in/O his/O eyes/O,/O at/O the/O moment/O when/O Karenin/PERSON was/O on/O a/O level/O with/O them/O,/O
and/O was/O nodding/O with/O a/O frigid/O gesture/O,/O ``/OI/O have/On't/O congratulated/O you/O
yet/O,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O man/O,/O pointing/O to/O his/O newly/O received/O ribbon/O./O

``/OThank/O you/O,/O''/O answered/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O ``/OWhat/O an/O _/Oexquisite/O_/O day/O
today/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O laying/O emphasis/O in/O his/O peculiar/O way/O on/O the/O word/O
_/Oexquisite/O_/O./O

That/O they/O laughed/O at/O him/O he/O was/O well/O aware/O,/O but/O he/O did/O not/O expect/O
anything/O but/O hostility/O from/O them/O;/O he/O was/O used/O to/O that/O by/O now/O./O

Catching/O sight/O of/O the/O yellow/O shoulders/O of/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON jutting/O out/O
above/O her/O corset/O,/O and/O her/O fine/O pensive/O eyes/O bidding/O him/O to/O her/O,/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON smiled/O,/O revealing/O untarnished/O white/O teeth/O,/O and/O went/O
towards/O her/O./O

Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON's/O dress/O had/O cost/O her/O great/O pains/O,/O as/O indeed/O all/O her/O
dresses/O had/O done/O of/O late/O./O Her/O aim/O in/O dress/O was/O now/O quite/O the/O reverse/O of/O
that/O she/O had/O pursued/O thirty/O years/O before/O./O Then/O her/O desire/O had/O been/O to/O
adorn/O herself/O with/O something/O,/O and/O the/O more/O adorned/O the/O better/O./O Now/O,/O on/O
the/O contrary/O,/O she/O was/O perforce/O decked/O out/O in/O a/O way/O so/O inconsistent/O with/O
her/O age/O and/O her/O figure/O,/O that/O her/O one/O anxiety/O was/O to/O contrive/O that/O the/O
contrast/O between/O these/O adornments/O and/O her/O own/O exterior/O should/O not/O be/O too/O
appalling/O./O And/O as/O far/O as/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O concerned/O she/O
succeeded/O,/O and/O was/O in/O his/O eyes/O attractive/O./O For/O him/O she/O was/O the/O one/O
island/O not/O only/O of/O goodwill/O to/O him/O,/O but/O of/O love/O in/O the/O midst/O of/O the/O sea/O
of/O hostility/O and/O jeering/O that/O surrounded/O him/O./O

Passing/O through/O rows/O of/O ironical/O eyes/O,/O he/O was/O drawn/O as/O naturally/O to/O her/O
loving/O glance/O as/O a/O plant/O to/O the/O sun/O./O

``/OI/O congratulate/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O him/O,/O her/O eyes/O on/O his/O ribbon/O./O

Suppressing/O a/O smile/O of/O pleasure/O,/O he/O shrugged/O his/O shoulders/O,/O closing/O his/O
eyes/O,/O as/O though/O to/O say/O that/O that/O could/O not/O be/O a/O source/O of/O joy/O to/O him/O./O
Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON was/O very/O well/O aware/O that/O it/O was/O one/O of/O his/O chief/O
sources/O of/O satisfaction/O,/O though/O he/O never/O admitted/O it/O./O

``/OHow/O is/O our/O angel/O?/O''/O said/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O meaning/O Seryozha/PERSON./O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O say/O I/O was/O quite/O pleased/O with/O him/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O
raising/O his/O eyebrows/O and/O opening/O his/O eyes/O./O ``/OAnd/O Sitnikov/PERSON is/O not/O
satisfied/O with/O him/O./O''/O -LRB-/OSitnikov/PERSON was/O the/O tutor/O to/O whom/O Seryozha/PERSON's/O secular/O
education/O had/O been/O intrusted/O./O-RRB-/O ``/OAs/O I/O have/O mentioned/O to/O you/O,/O there/O's/O a/O
sort/O of/O coldness/O in/O him/O towards/O the/O most/O important/O questions/O which/O ought/O
to/O touch/O the/O heart/O of/O every/O man/O and/O every/O child/O.../O''/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON began/O expounding/O his/O views/O on/O the/O sole/O question/O that/O
interested/O him/O besides/O the/O service/O--/Othe/O education/O of/O his/O son/O./O

When/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON with/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON's/O help/O had/O been/O brought/O
back/O anew/O to/O life/O and/O activity/O,/O he/O felt/O it/O his/O duty/O to/O undertake/O the/O
education/O of/O the/O son/O left/O on/O his/O hands/O./O Having/O never/O before/O taken/O any/O
interest/O in/O educational/O questions/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON devoted/O some/O
time/O to/O the/O theoretical/O study/O of/O the/O subject/O./O After/O reading/O several/O
books/O on/O anthropology/O,/O education/O,/O and/O didactics/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
drew/O up/O a/O plan/O of/O education/O,/O and/O engaging/O the/O best/O tutor/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION
to/O superintend/O it/O,/O he/O set/O to/O work/O,/O and/O the/O subject/O continually/O absorbed/O
him/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O the/O heart/O./O I/O see/O in/O him/O his/O father/O's/O heart/O,/O and/O with/O such/O a/O
heart/O a/O child/O can/Onot/O go/O far/O wrong/O,/O''/O said/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON with/O enthusiasm/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O perhaps/O.../O./O As/O for/O me/O,/O I/O do/O my/O duty/O./O It/O's/O all/O I/O can/O do/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O coming/O to/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O after/O a/O pause/O;/O ``/Owe/O
have/O to/O speak/O of/O a/O subject/O painful/O for/O you/O./O I/O would/O give/O anything/O to/O
have/O spared/O you/O certain/O memories/O,/O but/O others/O are/O not/O of/O the/O same/O mind/O./O I/O
have/O received/O a/O letter/O from/O _/Oher/O_/O./O _/OShe/O_/O is/O here/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON shuddered/O at/O the/O allusion/O to/O his/O wife/O,/O but/O
immediately/O his/O face/O assumed/O the/O deathlike/O rigidity/O which/O expressed/O
utter/O helplessness/O in/O the/O matter/O./O

``/OI/O was/O expecting/O it/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON looked/O at/O him/O ecstatically/O,/O and/O tears/O of/O rapture/O
at/O the/O greatness/O of/O his/O soul/O came/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O



Chapter/O 25/O


When/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON came/O into/O the/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON's/O snug/O
little/O boudoir/O,/O decorated/O with/O old/O china/O and/O hung/O with/O portraits/O,/O the/O
lady/O herself/O had/O not/O yet/O made/O her/O appearance/O./O

She/O was/O changing/O her/O dress/O./O

A/O cloth/O was/O laid/O on/O a/O round/O table/O,/O and/O on/O it/O stood/O a/O china/O tea/O service/O
and/O a/O silver/O spirit-lamp/O and/O tea/O kettle/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON looked/O
idly/O about/O at/O the/O endless/O familiar/O portraits/O which/O adorned/O the/O room/O,/O and/O
sitting/O down/O to/O the/O table/O,/O he/O opened/O a/O New/O Testament/O lying/O upon/O it/O./O The/O
rustle/O of/O the/O countess/O's/O silk/O skirt/O drew/O his/O attention/O off/O./O

``/OWell/O now/O,/O we/O can/O sit/O quietly/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O slipping/O
hurriedly/O with/O an/O agitated/O smile/O between/O the/O table/O and/O the/O sofa/O,/O ``/Oand/O
talk/O over/O our/O tea/O./O''/O

After/O some/O words/O of/O preparation/O,/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O breathing/O hard/O
and/O flushing/O crimson/O,/O gave/O into/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O hands/O the/O letter/O
she/O had/O received/O./O

After/O reading/O the/O letter/O,/O he/O sat/O a/O long/O while/O in/O silence/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O think/O I/O have/O the/O right/O to/O refuse/O her/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O timidly/O lifting/O
his/O eyes/O./O

``/ODear/O friend/O,/O you/O never/O see/O evil/O in/O anyone/O!/O''/O

``/OOn/O the/O contrary/O,/O I/O see/O that/O all/O is/O evil/O./O But/O whether/O it/O is/O just/O.../O''/O

His/O face/O showed/O irresolution/O,/O and/O a/O seeking/O for/O counsel/O,/O support/O,/O and/O
guidance/O in/O a/O matter/O he/O did/O not/O understand/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O''/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON interrupted/O him/O;/O ``/Othere/O are/O limits/O to/O
everything/O./O I/O can/O understand/O immorality/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O not/O quite/O
truthfully/O,/O since/O she/O never/O could/O understand/O that/O which/O leads/O women/O to/O
immorality/O;/O ``/Obut/O I/O do/On't/O understand/O cruelty/O:/O to/O whom/O?/O to/O you/O!/O How/O can/O
she/O stay/O in/O the/O town/O where/O you/O are/O?/O No/O,/O the/O longer/O one/O lives/O the/O more/O
one/O learns/O./O And/O I/O'm/O learning/O to/O understand/O your/O loftiness/O and/O her/O
baseness/O./O''/O

``/OWho/O is/O to/O throw/O a/O stone/O?/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O unmistakably/O
pleased/O with/O the/O part/O he/O had/O to/O play/O./O ``/OI/O have/O forgiven/O all/O,/O and/O so/O I/O
can/Onot/O deprive/O her/O of/O what/O is/O exacted/O by/O love/O in/O her/O--/Oby/O her/O love/O for/O her/O
son/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O is/O that/O love/O,/O my/O friend/O?/O Is/O it/O sincere/O?/O Admitting/O that/O you/O have/O
forgiven/O--/Othat/O you/O forgive/O--/Ohave/O we/O the/O right/O to/O work/O on/O the/O feelings/O of/O
that/O angel/O?/O He/O looks/O on/O her/O as/O dead/O./O He/O prays/O for/O her/O,/O and/O beseeches/O God/O
to/O have/O mercy/O on/O her/O sins/O./O And/O it/O is/O better/O so/O./O But/O now/O what/O will/O he/O
think/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O had/O not/O thought/O of/O that/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O evidently/O
agreeing/O./O

Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON hid/O her/O face/O in/O her/O hands/O and/O was/O silent/O./O She/O
was/O praying/O./O

``/OIf/O you/O ask/O my/O advice/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O having/O finished/O her/O prayer/O and/O
uncovered/O her/O face/O,/O ``/OI/O do/O not/O advise/O you/O to/O do/O this/O./O Do/O you/O suppose/O I/O
do/On't/O see/O how/O you/O are/O suffering/O,/O how/O this/O has/O torn/O open/O your/O wounds/O?/O But/O
supposing/O that/O,/O as/O always/O,/O you/O do/On't/O think/O of/O yourself/O,/O what/O can/O it/O lead/O
to/O?/O--/Oto/O fresh/O suffering/O for/O you/O,/O to/O torture/O for/O the/O child/O./O If/O there/O were/O
a/O trace/O of/O humanity/O left/O in/O her/O,/O she/O ought/O not/O to/O wish/O for/O it/O herself/O./O
No/O,/O I/O have/O no/O hesitation/O in/O saying/O I/O advise/O not/O,/O and/O if/O you/O will/O intrust/O
it/O to/O me/O,/O I/O will/O write/O to/O her/O./O''/O

And/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON consented/O,/O and/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON sent/O
the/O following/O letter/O in/O French/O:/O

    ``/ODear/O Madame/O,/O

    ``/OTo/O be/O reminded/O of/O you/O might/O have/O results/O for/O your/O son/O in/O
    leading/O to/O questions/O on/O his/O part/O which/O could/O not/O be/O answered/O
    without/O implanting/O in/O the/O child/O's/O soul/O a/O spirit/O of/O censure/O
    towards/O what/O should/O be/O for/O him/O sacred/O,/O and/O therefore/O I/O beg/O you/O
    to/O interpret/O your/O husband/O's/O refusal/O in/O the/O spirit/O of/O Christian/O
    love/O./O I/O pray/O to/O Almighty/O God/O to/O have/O mercy/O on/O you/O./O

                                                     Countess/O Lidia/O''/O

This/O letter/O attained/O the/O secret/O object/O which/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON had/O
concealed/O from/O herself/O./O It/O wounded/O Anna/PERSON to/O the/O quick/O./O

For/O his/O part/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O on/O returning/O home/O from/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON's/O,/O could/O not/O all/O that/O day/O concentrate/O himself/O on/O his/O usual/O
pursuits/O,/O and/O find/O that/O spiritual/O peace/O of/O one/O saved/O and/O believing/O which/O
he/O had/O felt/O of/O late/O./O

The/O thought/O of/O his/O wife/O,/O who/O had/O so/O greatly/O sinned/O against/O him/O,/O and/O
towards/O whom/O he/O had/O been/O so/O saintly/O,/O as/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON had/O so/O
justly/O told/O him/O,/O ought/O not/O to/O have/O troubled/O him/O;/O but/O he/O was/O not/O easy/O;/O he/O
could/O not/O understand/O the/O book/O he/O was/O reading/O;/O he/O could/O not/O drive/O away/O
harassing/O recollections/O of/O his/O relations/O with/O her/O,/O of/O the/O mistake/O which/O,/O
as/O it/O now/O seemed/O,/O he/O had/O made/O in/O regard/O to/O her/O./O The/O memory/O of/O how/O he/O had/O
received/O her/O confession/O of/O infidelity/O on/O their/O way/O home/O from/O the/O races/O
-LRB-/Oespecially/O that/O he/O had/O insisted/O only/O on/O the/O observance/O of/O external/O
decorum/O,/O and/O had/O not/O sent/O a/O challenge/O-RRB-/O tortured/O him/O like/O a/O remorse/O./O He/O
was/O tortured/O too/O by/O the/O thought/O of/O the/O letter/O he/O had/O written/O her/O;/O and/O
most/O of/O all/O,/O his/O forgiveness/O,/O which/O nobody/O wanted/O,/O and/O his/O care/O of/O the/O
other/O man/O's/O child/O made/O his/O heart/O burn/O with/O shame/O and/O remorse/O./O

And/O just/O the/O same/O feeling/O of/O shame/O and/O regret/O he/O felt/O now/O,/O as/O he/O
reviewed/O all/O his/O past/O with/O her/O,/O recalling/O the/O awkward/O words/O in/O which/O,/O
after/O long/O wavering/O,/O he/O had/O made/O her/O an/O offer/O./O

``/OBut/O how/O have/O I/O been/O to/O blame/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O./O And/O this/O question/O
always/O excited/O another/O question/O in/O him/O--/Owhether/O they/O felt/O differently/O,/O
did/O their/O loving/O and/O marrying/O differently/O,/O these/O Vronskys/O and/O Oblonskys/O
.../O these/O gentlemen/O of/O the/O bedchamber/O,/O with/O their/O fine/O calves/O./O And/O there/O
passed/O before/O his/O mind/O a/O whole/O series/O of/O these/O mettlesome/O,/O vigorous/O,/O
self-confident/O men/O,/O who/O always/O and/O everywhere/O drew/O his/O inquisitive/O
attention/O in/O spite/O of/O himself/O./O He/O tried/O to/O dispel/O these/O thoughts/O,/O he/O
tried/O to/O persuade/O himself/O that/O he/O was/O not/O living/O for/O this/O transient/O
life/O,/O but/O for/O the/O life/O of/O eternity/O,/O and/O that/O there/O was/O peace/O and/O love/O in/O
his/O heart/O./O

But/O the/O fact/O that/O he/O had/O in/O this/O transient/O,/O trivial/O life/O made/O,/O as/O it/O
seemed/O to/O him/O,/O a/O few/O trivial/O mistakes/O tortured/O him/O as/O though/O the/O eternal/O
salvation/O in/O which/O he/O believed/O had/O no/O existence/O./O But/O this/O temptation/O did/O
not/O last/O long/O,/O and/O soon/O there/O was/O reestablished/O once/O more/O in/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O soul/O the/O peace/O and/O the/O elevation/O by/O virtue/O of/O which/O he/O
could/O forget/O what/O he/O did/O not/O want/O to/O remember/O./O



Chapter/O 26/O


``/OWell/O,/O Kapitonitch/PERSON?/O''/O said/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O coming/O back/O rosy/O and/O good-humored/O
from/O his/O walk/O the/O day/O before/O his/O birthday/O,/O and/O giving/O his/O overcoat/O to/O
the/O tall/O old/O hall/O porter/O,/O who/O smiled/O down/O at/O the/O little/O person/O from/O the/O
height/O of/O his/O long/O figure/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O has/O the/O bandaged/O clerk/O been/O here/O
today/O?/O Did/O papa/O see/O him/O?/O''/O

``/OHe/O saw/O him/O./O The/O minute/O the/O chief/O secretary/O came/O out/O,/O I/O announced/O him/O,/O''/O
said/O the/O hall/O porter/O with/O a/O good-humored/O wink/O./O ``/OHere/O,/O I/O'll/O take/O it/O off/O./O''/O

``/OSeryozha/O!/O''/O said/O the/O tutor/O,/O stopping/O in/O the/O doorway/O leading/O to/O the/O inner/O
rooms/O./O ``/OTake/O it/O off/O yourself/O./O''/O But/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O though/O he/O heard/O his/O tutor/O's/O
feeble/O voice/O,/O did/O not/O pay/O attention/O to/O it/O./O He/O stood/O keeping/O hold/O of/O the/O
hall/O porter/O's/O belt/O,/O and/O gazing/O into/O his/O face/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O did/O papa/O do/O what/O he/O wanted/O for/O him/O?/O''/O

The/O hall/O porter/O nodded/O his/O head/O affirmatively/O./O The/O clerk/O with/O his/O face/O
tied/O up/O,/O who/O had/O already/O been/O seven/O times/O to/O ask/O some/O favor/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O interested/O both/O Seryozha/PERSON and/O the/O hall/O porter/O./O Seryozha/PERSON
had/O come/O upon/O him/O in/O the/O hall/O,/O and/O had/O heard/O him/O plaintively/O beg/O the/O
hall/O porter/O to/O announce/O him/O,/O saying/O that/O he/O and/O his/O children/O had/O death/O
staring/O them/O in/O the/O face/O./O

Since/O then/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O having/O met/O him/O a/O second/O time/O in/O the/O hall/O,/O took/O
great/O interest/O in/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O was/O he/O very/O glad/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O

``/OGlad/O?/O I/O should/O think/O so/O!/O Almost/O dancing/O as/O he/O walked/O away/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O has/O anything/O been/O left/O?/O''/O asked/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O after/O a/O pause/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O sir/O,/O''/O said/O the/O hall-porter/O;/O then/O with/O a/O shake/O of/O his/O head/O he/O
whispered/O,/O ``/OSomething/O from/O the/O countess/O./O''/O

Seryozha/PERSON understood/O at/O once/O that/O what/O the/O hall/O porter/O was/O speaking/O of/O
was/O a/O present/O from/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON for/O his/O birthday/O./O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O say/O?/O Where/O?/O''/O

``/OKorney/PERSON took/O it/O to/O your/O papa/O./O A/O fine/O plaything/O it/O must/O be/O too/O!/O''/O

``/OHow/O big/O?/O Like/O this/O?/O''/O

``/ORather/O small/O,/O but/O a/O fine/O thing/O./O''/O

``/OA/O book/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O a/O thing/O./O Run/O along/O,/O run/O along/O,/O Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON is/O calling/O you/O,/O''/O
said/O the/O porter/O,/O hearing/O the/O tutor/O's/O steps/O approaching/O,/O and/O carefully/O

he/O signed/O with/O his/O head/O towards/O the/O tutor/O./O

``/OVassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON,/O in/O a/O tiny/O minute/O!/O''/O answered/O Seryozha/PERSON with/O that/O gay/O and/O
loving/O smile/O which/O always/O won/O over/O the/O conscientious/O Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON./O

Seryozha/PERSON was/O too/O happy/O,/O everything/O was/O too/O delightful/O for/O him/O to/O be/O able/O
to/O help/O sharing/O with/O his/O friend/O the/O porter/O the/O family/O good/O fortune/O of/O
which/O he/O had/O heard/O during/O his/O walk/O in/O the/O public/O gardens/O from/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON's/O niece/O./O This/O piece/O of/O good/O news/O seemed/O to/O him/O particularly/O

seemed/O to/O Seryozha/PERSON that/O this/O was/O a/O day/O on/O which/O everyone/O ought/O to/O be/O
glad/O and/O happy/O./O

``/OYou/O know/O papa/O's/O received/O the/O Alexander/PERSON Nevsky/PERSON today/O?/O''/O

``/OTo/O be/O sure/O I/O do/O!/O People/O have/O been/O already/O to/O congratulate/O him/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O is/O he/O glad/O?/O''/O

``/OGlad/O at/O the/O Tsar/O's/O gracious/O favor/O!/O I/O should/O think/O so/O!/O It/O's/O a/O proof/O he/O's/O
deserved/O it/O,/O''/O said/O the/O porter/O severely/O and/O seriously/O./O

Seryozha/PERSON fell/O to/O dreaming/O,/O gazing/O up/O at/O the/O face/O of/O the/O porter/O,/O which/O he/O
had/O thoroughly/O studied/O in/O every/O detail/O,/O especially/O the/O chin/O that/O hung/O
down/O between/O the/O gray/O whiskers/O,/O never/O seen/O by/O anyone/O but/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O who/O
saw/O him/O only/O from/O below/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O has/O your/O daughter/O been/O to/O see/O you/O lately/O?/O''/O

The/O porter/O's/O daughter/O was/O a/O ballet/O dancer/O./O

``/OWhen/O is/O she/O to/O come/O on/O week-days/O?/O They/O've/O their/O lessons/O to/O learn/O too/O./O
And/O you/O've/O your/O lesson/O,/O sir/O;/O run/O along/O./O''/O

On/O coming/O into/O the/O room/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O instead/O of/O sitting/O down/O to/O his/O
lessons/O,/O told/O his/O tutor/O of/O his/O supposition/O that/O what/O had/O been/O brought/O
him/O must/O be/O a/O machine/O./O ``/OWhat/O do/O you/O think/O?/O''/O he/O inquired/O./O

But/O Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON was/O thinking/O of/O nothing/O but/O the/O necessity/O of/O
learning/O the/O grammar/O lesson/O for/O the/O teacher/O,/O who/O was/O coming/O at/O two/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O do/O just/O tell/O me/O,/O Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON,/O''/O he/O asked/O suddenly/O,/O when/O he/O was/O
seated/O at/O their/O work/O table/O with/O the/O book/O in/O his/O hands/O,/O ``/Owhat/O is/O greater/O
than/O the/O Alexander/PERSON Nevsky/PERSON?/O You/O know/O papa/O's/O received/O the/O Alexander/PERSON
Nevsky/PERSON?/O''/O

Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON replied/O that/O the/O Vladimir/PERSON was/O greater/O than/O the/O Alexander/PERSON
Nevsky/PERSON./O

``/OAnd/O higher/O still/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O highest/O of/O all/O is/O the/O Andrey/PERSON Pervozvanny/PERSON./O''/O

``/OAnd/O higher/O than/O the/O Andrey/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O,/O you/O do/On't/O know/O?/O''/O and/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O leaning/O on/O his/O elbows/O,/O sank/O into/O
deep/O meditation/O./O

His/O meditations/O were/O of/O the/O most/O complex/O and/O diverse/O character/O./O He/O
imagined/O his/O father/O's/O having/O suddenly/O been/O presented/O with/O both/O the/O
Vladimir/PERSON and/O the/O Andrey/PERSON today/O,/O and/O in/O consequence/O being/O much/O better/O
tempered/O at/O his/O lesson/O,/O and/O dreamed/O how/O,/O when/O he/O was/O grown/O up/O,/O he/O would/O
himself/O receive/O all/O the/O orders/O,/O and/O what/O they/O might/O invent/O higher/O than/O
the/O Andrey/PERSON./O Directly/O any/O higher/O order/O were/O invented/O,/O he/O would/O win/O it/O./O
They/O would/O make/O a/O higher/O one/O still/O,/O and/O he/O would/O immediately/O win/O that/O
too/O./O

The/O time/O passed/O in/O such/O meditations/O,/O and/O when/O the/O teacher/O came/O,/O the/O
lesson/O about/O the/O adverbs/O of/O place/O and/O time/O and/O manner/O of/O action/O was/O not/O
ready/O,/O and/O the/O teacher/O was/O not/O only/O displeased/O,/O but/O hurt/O./O This/O touched/O
Seryozha/PERSON./O He/O felt/O he/O was/O not/O to/O blame/O for/O not/O having/O learned/O the/O lesson/O;/O
however/O much/O he/O tried/O,/O he/O was/O utterly/O unable/O to/O do/O that/O./O As/O long/O as/O the/O
teacher/O was/O explaining/O to/O him/O,/O he/O believed/O him/O and/O seemed/O to/O comprehend/O,/O
but/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O was/O left/O alone/O,/O he/O was/O positively/O unable/O to/O recollect/O
and/O to/O understand/O that/O the/O short/O and/O familiar/O word/O ``/Osuddenly/O''/O is/O an/O
adverb/O of/O manner/O of/O action/O./O Still/O he/O was/O sorry/O that/O he/O had/O disappointed/O
the/O teacher/O./O

He/O chose/O a/O moment/O when/O the/O teacher/O was/O looking/O in/O silence/O at/O the/O book/O./O

``/OMihail/PERSON Ivanitch/PERSON,/O when/O is/O your/O birthday/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O all/O,/O of/O a/O sudden/O./O

``/OYou/O'd/O much/O better/O be/O thinking/O about/O your/O work/O./O Birthdays/O are/O of/O no/O
importance/O to/O a/O rational/O being/O./O It/O's/O a/O day/O like/O any/O other/O on/O which/O one/O
has/O to/O do/O one/O's/O work/O./O''/O

Seryozha/PERSON looked/O intently/O at/O the/O teacher/O,/O at/O his/O scanty/O beard/O,/O at/O his/O
spectacles/O,/O which/O had/O slipped/O down/O below/O the/O ridge/O on/O his/O nose/O,/O and/O fell/O
into/O so/O deep/O a/O reverie/O that/O he/O heard/O nothing/O of/O what/O the/O teacher/O was/O
explaining/O to/O him/O./O He/O knew/O that/O the/O teacher/O did/O not/O think/O what/O he/O said/O;/O
he/O felt/O it/O from/O the/O tone/O in/O which/O it/O was/O said/O./O ``/OBut/O why/O have/O they/O all/O
agreed/O to/O speak/O just/O in/O the/O same/O manner/O always/O the/O dreariest/O and/O most/O
useless/O stuff/O?/O Why/O does/O he/O keep/O me/O off/O;/O why/O does/On't/O he/O love/O me/O?/O''/O he/O
asked/O himself/O mournfully/O,/O and/O could/O not/O think/O of/O an/O answer/O./O



Chapter/O 27/O


After/O the/O lesson/O with/O the/O grammar/O teacher/O came/O his/O father/O's/O lesson/O./O
While/O waiting/O for/O his/O father/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON sat/O at/O the/O table/O playing/O with/O a/O
penknife/O,/O and/O fell/O to/O dreaming/O./O Among/O Seryozha/PERSON's/O favorite/O occupations/O
was/O searching/O for/O his/O mother/O during/O his/O walks/O./O He/O did/O not/O believe/O in/O
death/O generally/O,/O and/O in/O her/O death/O in/O particular/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O what/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON had/O told/O him/O and/O his/O father/O had/O confirmed/O,/O and/O it/O was/O just/O
because/O of/O that/O,/O and/O after/O he/O had/O been/O told/O she/O was/O dead/O,/O that/O he/O had/O
begun/O looking/O for/O her/O when/O out/O for/O a/O walk/O./O Every/O woman/O of/O full/O,/O graceful/O
figure/O with/O dark/O hair/O was/O his/O mother/O./O At/O the/O sight/O of/O such/O a/O woman/O such/O
a/O feeling/O of/O tenderness/O was/O stirred/O within/O him/O that/O his/O breath/O failed/O
him/O,/O and/O tears/O came/O into/O his/O eyes/O./O And/O he/O was/O on/O the/O tiptoe/O of/O
expectation/O that/O she/O would/O come/O up/O to/O him/O,/O would/O lift/O her/O veil/O./O All/O her/O
face/O would/O be/O visible/O,/O she/O would/O smile/O,/O she/O would/O hug/O him/O,/O he/O would/O
sniff/O her/O fragrance/O,/O feel/O the/O softness/O of/O her/O arms/O,/O and/O cry/O with/O
happiness/O,/O just/O as/O he/O had/O one/O evening/O lain/O on/O her/O lap/O while/O she/O tickled/O
him/O,/O and/O he/O laughed/O and/O bit/O her/O white/O,/O ring-covered/O fingers/O./O Later/O,/O when/O
he/O accidentally/O learned/O from/O his/O old/O nurse/O that/O his/O mother/O was/O not/O dead/O,/O
and/O his/O father/O and/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON had/O explained/O to/O him/O that/O she/O was/O dead/O
to/O him/O because/O she/O was/O wicked/O -LRB-/Owhich/O he/O could/O not/O possibly/O believe/O,/O
because/O he/O loved/O her/O-RRB-/O,/O he/O went/O on/O seeking/O her/O and/O expecting/O her/O in/O the/O
same/O way/O./O That/O day/O in/O the/O public/O gardens/O there/O had/O been/O a/O lady/O in/O a/O
lilac/O veil/O,/O whom/O he/O had/O watched/O with/O a/O throbbing/O heart/O,/O believing/O it/O to/O
be/O she/O as/O she/O came/O towards/O them/O along/O the/O path/O./O The/O lady/O had/O not/O come/O up/O
to/O them/O,/O but/O had/O disappeared/O somewhere/O./O That/O day/O,/O more/O intensely/O than/O
ever/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON felt/O a/O rush/O of/O love/O for/O her/O,/O and/O now/O,/O waiting/O for/O his/O
father/O,/O he/O forgot/O everything/O,/O and/O cut/O all/O round/O the/O edge/O of/O the/O table/O
with/O his/O penknife/O,/O staring/O straight/O before/O him/O with/O sparkling/O eyes/O and/O
dreaming/O of/O her/O./O

``/OHere/O is/O your/O papa/O!/O''/O said/O Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON,/O rousing/O him/O./O

Seryozha/PERSON jumped/O up/O and/O went/O up/O to/O his/O father/O,/O and/O kissing/O his/O hand/O,/O
looked/O at/O him/O intently/O,/O trying/O to/O discover/O signs/O of/O his/O joy/O at/O receiving/O
the/O Alexander/PERSON Nevsky/PERSON./O

``/ODid/O you/O have/O a/O nice/O walk/O?/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O sitting/O down/O in/O
his/O easy/O chair/O,/O pulling/O the/O volume/O of/O the/O Old/O Testament/O to/O him/O and/O
opening/O it/O./O Although/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON had/O more/O than/O once/O told/O
Seryozha/PERSON that/O every/O Christian/O ought/O to/O know/O Scripture/O history/O
thoroughly/O,/O he/O often/O referred/O to/O the/O Bible/O himself/O during/O the/O lesson/O,/O
and/O Seryozha/PERSON observed/O this/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O was/O very/O nice/O indeed/O,/O papa/O,/O''/O said/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O sitting/O sideways/O on/O
his/O chair/O and/O rocking/O it/O,/O which/O was/O forbidden/O./O ``/OI/O saw/O Nadinka/O''/O -LRB-/ONadinka/PERSON
was/O a/O niece/O of/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON's/O who/O was/O being/O brought/O up/O in/O her/O house/O-RRB-/O./O
``/OShe/O told/O me/O you/O'd/O been/O given/O a/O new/O star/O./O Are/O you/O glad/O,/O papa/O?/O''/O

``/OFirst/O of/O all/O,/O do/On't/O rock/O your/O chair/O,/O please/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O ``/OAnd/O secondly/O,/O it/O's/O not/O the/O reward/O that/O's/O precious/O,/O but/O
the/O work/O itself/O./O And/O I/O could/O have/O wished/O you/O understood/O that/O./O If/O you/O now/O
are/O going/O to/O work/O,/O to/O study/O in/O order/O to/O win/O a/O reward/O,/O then/O the/O work/O will/O
seem/O hard/O to/O you/O;/O but/O when/O you/O work/O''/O -LRB-/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O as/O he/O
spoke/O,/O thought/O of/O how/O he/O had/O been/O sustained/O by/O a/O sense/O of/O duty/O through/O
the/O wearisome/O labor/O of/O the/O morning/O,/O consisting/O of/O signing/O one/O hundred/O
and/O eighty/O papers/O-RRB-/O,/O ``/Oloving/O your/O work/O,/O you/O will/O find/O your/O reward/O in/O it/O./O''/O

Seryozha/PERSON's/O eyes/O,/O that/O had/O been/O shining/O with/O gaiety/O and/O tenderness/O,/O grew/O
dull/O and/O dropped/O before/O his/O father/O's/O gaze/O./O This/O was/O the/O same/O
long-familiar/O tone/O his/O father/O always/O took/O with/O him/O,/O and/O Seryozha/PERSON had/O
learned/O by/O now/O to/O fall/O in/O with/O it/O./O His/O father/O always/O talked/O to/O him/O--/Oso/O
Seryozha/PERSON felt/O--/Oas/O though/O he/O were/O addressing/O some/O boy/O of/O his/O own/O
imagination/O,/O one/O of/O those/O boys/O that/O exist/O in/O books/O,/O utterly/O unlike/O
himself/O./O And/O Seryozha/PERSON always/O tried/O with/O his/O father/O to/O act/O being/O the/O
story-book/O boy/O./O

``/OYou/O understand/O that/O,/O I/O hope/O?/O''/O said/O his/O father/O./O
