``/OYes/O,/O papa/O,/O''/O answered/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O acting/O the/O part/O of/O the/O imaginary/O boy/O./O

The/O lesson/O consisted/O of/O learning/O by/O heart/O several/O verses/O out/O of/O the/O
Gospel/O and/O the/O repetition/O of/O the/O beginning/O of/O the/O Old/O Testament/O./O The/O
verses/O from/O the/O Gospel/O Seryozha/O knew/O fairly/O well/O,/O but/O at/O the/O moment/O when/O
he/O was/O saying/O them/O he/O became/O so/O absorbed/O in/O watching/O the/O sharply/O
protruding/O,/O bony/O knobbiness/O of/O his/O father/O's/O forehead/O,/O that/O he/O lost/O the/O
thread/O,/O and/O he/O transposed/O the/O end/O of/O one/O verse/O and/O the/O beginning/O of/O
another/O./O So/O it/O was/O evident/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON that/O he/O did/O not/O
understand/O what/O he/O was/O saying/O,/O and/O that/O irritated/O him/O./O

He/O frowned/O,/O and/O began/O explaining/O what/O Seryozha/PERSON had/O heard/O many/O times/O
before/O and/O never/O could/O remember/O,/O because/O he/O understood/O it/O too/O well/O,/O just/O
as/O that/O ``/Osuddenly/O''/O is/O an/O adverb/O of/O manner/O of/O action/O./O Seryozha/PERSON looked/O
with/O scared/O eyes/O at/O his/O father/O,/O and/O could/O think/O of/O nothing/O but/O whether/O
his/O father/O would/O make/O him/O repeat/O what/O he/O had/O said/O,/O as/O he/O sometimes/O did/O./O
And/O this/O thought/O so/O alarmed/O Seryozha/PERSON that/O he/O now/O understood/O nothing/O./O But/O
his/O father/O did/O not/O make/O him/O repeat/O it/O,/O and/O passed/O on/O to/O the/O lesson/O out/O
of/O the/O Old/O Testament/O./O Seryozha/PERSON recounted/O the/O events/O themselves/O well/O
enough/O,/O but/O when/O he/O had/O to/O answer/O questions/O as/O to/O what/O certain/O events/O
prefigured/O,/O he/O knew/O nothing/O,/O though/O he/O had/O already/O been/O punished/O over/O
this/O lesson/O./O The/O passage/O at/O which/O he/O was/O utterly/O unable/O to/O say/O anything/O,/O
and/O began/O fidgeting/O and/O cutting/O the/O table/O and/O swinging/O his/O chair/O,/O was/O
where/O he/O had/O to/O repeat/O the/O patriarchs/O before/O the/O Flood/O./O He/O did/O not/O know/O
one/O of/O them/O,/O except/O Enoch/PERSON,/O who/O had/O been/O taken/O up/O alive/O to/O heaven/O./O Last/O
time/O he/O had/O remembered/O their/O names/O,/O but/O now/O he/O had/O forgotten/O them/O
utterly/O,/O chiefly/O because/O Enoch/PERSON was/O the/O personage/O he/O liked/O best/O in/O the/O
whole/O of/O the/O Old/O Testament/O,/O and/O Enoch/PERSON's/O translation/O to/O heaven/O was/O
connected/O in/O his/O mind/O with/O a/O whole/O long/O train/O of/O thought/O,/O in/O which/O he/O
became/O absorbed/O now/O while/O he/O gazed/O with/O fascinated/O eyes/O at/O his/O father/O's/O
watch-chain/O and/O a/O half-unbuttoned/O button/O on/O his/O waistcoat/O./O

In/O death/O,/O of/O which/O they/O talked/O to/O him/O so/O often/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON disbelieved/O
entirely/O./O He/O did/O not/O believe/O that/O those/O he/O loved/O could/O die/O,/O above/O all/O
that/O he/O himself/O would/O die/O./O That/O was/O to/O him/O something/O utterly/O
inconceivable/O and/O impossible/O./O But/O he/O had/O been/O told/O that/O all/O men/O die/O;/O he/O
had/O asked/O people/O,/O indeed/O,/O whom/O he/O trusted/O,/O and/O they/O too/O,/O had/O confirmed/O
it/O;/O his/O old/O nurse/O,/O too/O,/O said/O the/O same/O,/O though/O reluctantly/O./O But/O Enoch/PERSON had/O
not/O died/O,/O and/O so/O it/O followed/O that/O everyone/O did/O not/O die/O./O ``/OAnd/O why/O can/Onot/O
anyone/O else/O so/O serve/O God/O and/O be/O taken/O alive/O to/O heaven/O?/O''/O thought/O
Seryozha/PERSON./O Bad/O people/O,/O that/O is/O those/O Seryozha/PERSON did/O not/O like/O,/O they/O might/O
die/O,/O but/O the/O good/O might/O all/O be/O like/O Enoch/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O are/O the/O names/O of/O the/O patriarchs/O?/O''/O

``/OEnoch/PERSON,/O Enos/PERSON--/O''/O

``/OBut/O you/O have/O said/O that/O already/O./O This/O is/O bad/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O very/O bad/O./O If/O you/O
do/On't/O try/O to/O learn/O what/O is/O more/O necessary/O than/O anything/O for/O a/O
Christian/O,/O''/O said/O his/O father/O,/O getting/O up/O,/O ``/Owhatever/O can/O interest/O you/O?/O I/O
am/O displeased/O with/O you/O,/O and/O Piotr/PERSON Ignatitch/PERSON''/O -LRB-/Othis/O was/O the/O most/O
important/O of/O his/O teachers/O-RRB-/O ``/Ois/O displeased/O with/O you/O.../O./O I/O shall/O have/O to/O
punish/O you/O./O''/O

His/O father/O and/O his/O teacher/O were/O both/O displeased/O with/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O and/O he/O
certainly/O did/O learn/O his/O lessons/O very/O badly/O./O But/O still/O it/O could/O not/O be/O
said/O he/O was/O a/O stupid/O boy/O./O On/O the/O contrary/O,/O he/O was/O far/O cleverer/O than/O the/O
boys/O his/O teacher/O held/O up/O as/O examples/O to/O Seryozha/PERSON./O In/O his/O father/O's/O
opinion/O,/O he/O did/O not/O want/O to/O learn/O what/O he/O was/O taught/O./O In/O reality/O he/O
could/O not/O learn/O that/O./O He/O could/O not/O,/O because/O the/O claims/O of/O his/O own/O soul/O
were/O more/O binding/O on/O him/O than/O those/O claims/O his/O father/O and/O his/O teacher/O
made/O upon/O him/O./O Those/O claims/O were/O in/O opposition/O,/O and/O he/O was/O in/O direct/O
conflict/O with/O his/O education/O./O He/O was/O nine/O years/O old/O;/O he/O was/O a/O child/O;/O but/O
he/O knew/O his/O own/O soul/O,/O it/O was/O precious/O to/O him/O,/O he/O guarded/O it/O as/O the/O
eyelid/O guards/O the/O eye/O,/O and/O without/O the/O key/O of/O love/O he/O let/O no/O one/O into/O
his/O soul/O./O His/O teachers/O complained/O that/O he/O would/O not/O learn/O,/O while/O his/O
soul/O was/O brimming/O over/O with/O thirst/O for/O knowledge/O./O And/O he/O learned/O from/O
Kapitonitch/LOCATION,/O from/O his/O nurse/O,/O from/O Nadinka/LOCATION,/O from/O Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON,/O but/O not/O
from/O his/O teachers/O./O The/O spring/O his/O father/O and/O his/O teachers/O reckoned/O upon/O
to/O turn/O their/O mill-wheels/O had/O long/O dried/O up/O at/O the/O source/O,/O but/O its/O
waters/O did/O their/O work/O in/O another/O channel/O./O

His/O father/O punished/O Seryozha/PERSON by/O not/O letting/O him/O go/O to/O see/O Nadinka/PERSON,/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON's/O niece/O;/O but/O this/O punishment/O turned/O out/O happily/O for/O Seryozha/PERSON./O
Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON was/O in/O a/O good/O humor/O,/O and/O showed/O him/O how/O to/O make/O
windmills/O./O The/O whole/O evening/O passed/O over/O this/O work/O and/O in/O dreaming/O how/O
to/O make/O a/O windmill/O on/O which/O he/O could/O turn/O himself/O--/Oclutching/O at/O the/O sails/O
or/O tying/O himself/O on/O and/O whirling/O round/O./O Of/O his/O mother/O Seryozha/PERSON did/O not/O
think/O all/O the/O evening/O,/O but/O when/O he/O had/O gone/O to/O bed/O,/O he/O suddenly/O
remembered/O her/O,/O and/O prayed/O in/O his/O own/O words/O that/O his/O mother/O tomorrow/O for/O
his/O birthday/O might/O leave/O off/O hiding/O herself/O and/O come/O to/O him/O./O

``/OVassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON,/O do/O you/O know/O what/O I/O prayed/O for/O tonight/O extra/O besides/O
the/O regular/O things/O?/O''/O

``/OThat/O you/O might/O learn/O your/O lessons/O better/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O./O''/O

``/OToys/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O./O You/O'll/O never/O guess/O./O A/O splendid/O thing/O;/O but/O it/O's/O a/O secret/O!/O When/O it/O
comes/O to/O pass/O I/O'll/O tell/O you/O./O Ca/On't/O you/O guess/O!/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O guess/O./O You/O tell/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON with/O a/O smile/O,/O
which/O was/O rare/O with/O him/O./O ``/OCome/O,/O lie/O down/O,/O I/O'm/O putting/O out/O the/O candle/O./O''/O

``/OWithout/O the/O candle/O I/O can/O see/O better/O what/O I/O see/O and/O what/O I/O prayed/O for/O./O
There/O!/O I/O was/O almost/O telling/O the/O secret/O!/O''/O said/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O laughing/O gaily/O./O

When/O the/O candle/O was/O taken/O away/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON heard/O and/O felt/O his/O mother/O./O She/O
stood/O over/O him/O,/O and/O with/O loving/O eyes/O caressed/O him/O./O But/O then/O came/O
windmills/O,/O a/O knife/O,/O everything/O began/O to/O be/O mixed/O up/O,/O and/O he/O fell/O asleep/O./O



Chapter/O 28/O


On/O arriving/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O Vronsky/O and/O Anna/PERSON stayed/O at/O one/O of/O the/O best/O
hotels/O;/O Vronsky/O apart/O in/O a/O lower/O story/O,/O Anna/PERSON above/O with/O her/O child/O,/O its/O
nurse/O,/O and/O her/O maid/O,/O in/O a/O large/O suite/O of/O four/O rooms/O./O

On/O the/O day/O of/O his/O arrival/O Vronsky/O went/O to/O his/O brother/O's/O./O There/O he/O found/O
his/O mother/O,/O who/O had/O come/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION on/O business/O./O His/O mother/O and/O
sister-in-law/O greeted/O him/O as/O usual/O:/O they/O asked/O him/O about/O his/O stay/O
abroad/O,/O and/O talked/O of/O their/O common/O acquaintances/O,/O but/O did/O not/O let/O drop/O a/O
single/O word/O in/O allusion/O to/O his/O connection/O with/O Anna/PERSON./O His/O brother/O came/O
the/O next/O morning/O to/O see/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O of/O his/O own/O accord/O asked/O him/O about/O
her/O,/O and/O Alexey/PERSON Vronsky/PERSON told/O him/O directly/O that/O he/O looked/O upon/O his/O
connection/O with/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON as/O marriage/O;/O that/O he/O hoped/O to/O arrange/O a/O
divorce/O,/O and/O then/O to/O marry/O her/O,/O and/O until/O then/O he/O considered/O her/O as/O much/O
a/O wife/O as/O any/O other/O wife/O,/O and/O he/O begged/O him/O to/O tell/O their/O mother/O and/O his/O
wife/O so/O./O

``/OIf/O the/O world/O disapproves/O,/O I/O do/On't/O care/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O;/O ``/Obut/O if/O my/O
relations/O want/O to/O be/O on/O terms/O of/O relationship/O with/O me/O,/O they/O will/O have/O to/O
be/O on/O the/O same/O terms/O with/O my/O wife/O./O''/O

The/O elder/O brother/O,/O who/O had/O always/O a/O respect/O for/O his/O younger/O brother/O's/O
judgment/O,/O could/O not/O well/O tell/O whether/O he/O was/O right/O or/O not/O till/O the/O world/O
had/O decided/O the/O question/O;/O for/O his/O part/O he/O had/O nothing/O against/O it/O,/O and/O
with/O Alexey/PERSON he/O went/O up/O to/O see/O Anna/PERSON./O

Before/O his/O brother/O,/O as/O before/O everyone/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON addressed/O Anna/PERSON with/O a/O
certain/O formality/O,/O treating/O her/O as/O he/O might/O a/O very/O intimate/O friend/O,/O but/O
it/O was/O understood/O that/O his/O brother/O knew/O their/O real/O relations/O,/O and/O they/O
talked/O about/O Anna/PERSON's/O going/O to/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O estate/O./O

In/O spite/O of/O all/O his/O social/O experience/O Vronsky/O was/O,/O in/O consequence/O of/O the/O
new/O position/O in/O which/O he/O was/O placed/O,/O laboring/O under/O a/O strange/O
misapprehension/O./O One/O would/O have/O thought/O he/O must/O have/O understood/O that/O
society/O was/O closed/O for/O him/O and/O Anna/PERSON;/O but/O now/O some/O vague/O ideas/O had/O sprung/O
up/O in/O his/O brain/O that/O this/O was/O only/O the/O case/O in/O old-fashioned/O days/O,/O and/O
that/O now/O with/O the/O rapidity/O of/O modern/O progress/O -LRB-/Ohe/O had/O unconsciously/O
become/O by/O now/O a/O partisan/O of/O every/O sort/O of/O progress/O-RRB-/O the/O views/O of/O society/O
had/O changed/O,/O and/O that/O the/O question/O whether/O they/O would/O be/O received/O in/O
society/O was/O not/O a/O foregone/O conclusion/O./O ``/OOf/O course/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O ``/Oshe/O
would/O not/O be/O received/O at/O court/O,/O but/O intimate/O friends/O can/O and/O must/O look/O
at/O it/O in/O the/O proper/O light/O./O''/O One/O may/O sit/O for/O several/O hours/O at/O a/O stretch/O
with/O one/O's/O legs/O crossed/O in/O the/O same/O position/O,/O if/O one/O knows/O that/O there/O's/O
nothing/O to/O prevent/O one/O's/O changing/O one/O's/O position/O;/O but/O if/O a/O man/O knows/O
that/O he/O must/O remain/O sitting/O so/O with/O crossed/O legs/O,/O then/O cramps/O come/O on/O,/O
the/O legs/O begin/O to/O twitch/O and/O to/O strain/O towards/O the/O spot/O to/O which/O one/O
would/O like/O to/O draw/O them/O./O This/O was/O what/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O experiencing/O in/O
regard/O to/O the/O world/O./O Though/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O his/O heart/O he/O knew/O that/O the/O
world/O was/O shut/O on/O them/O,/O he/O put/O it/O to/O the/O test/O whether/O the/O world/O had/O not/O
changed/O by/O now/O and/O would/O not/O receive/O them/O./O But/O he/O very/O quickly/O perceived/O
that/O though/O the/O world/O was/O open/O for/O him/O personally/O,/O it/O was/O closed/O for/O
Anna/PERSON./O Just/O as/O in/O the/O game/O of/O cat/O and/O mouse/O,/O the/O hands/O raised/O for/O him/O
were/O dropped/O to/O bar/O the/O way/O for/O Anna/PERSON./O

One/O of/O the/O first/O ladies/O of/O Petersburg/LOCATION society/O whom/O Vronsky/O saw/O was/O his/O
cousin/O Betsy/PERSON./O

``/OAt/O last/O!/O''/O she/O greeted/O him/O joyfully/O./O ``/OAnd/O Anna/PERSON?/O How/O glad/O I/O am/O!/O Where/O are/O
you/O stopping/O?/O I/O can/O fancy/O after/O your/O delightful/O travels/O you/O must/O find/O
our/O poor/O Petersburg/PERSON horrid/O./O I/O can/O fancy/O your/O honeymoon/O in/O Rome/LOCATION./O How/O
about/O the/O divorce/O?/O Is/O that/O all/O over/O?/O''/O

Vronsky/O noticed/O that/O Betsy/PERSON's/O enthusiasm/O waned/O when/O she/O learned/O that/O no/O
divorce/O had/O as/O yet/O taken/O place/O./O

``/OPeople/O will/O throw/O stones/O at/O me/O,/O I/O know/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/Obut/O I/O shall/O come/O
and/O see/O Anna/PERSON;/O yes/O,/O I/O shall/O certainly/O come/O./O You/O wo/On't/O be/O here/O long/O,/O I/O
suppose/O?/O''/O

And/O she/O did/O certainly/O come/O to/O see/O Anna/PERSON the/O same/O day/O,/O but/O her/O tone/O was/O
not/O at/O all/O the/O same/O as/O in/O former/O days/O./O She/O unmistakably/O prided/O herself/O
on/O her/O courage/O,/O and/O wished/O Anna/PERSON to/O appreciate/O the/O fidelity/O of/O her/O
friendship/O./O She/O only/O stayed/O ten/O minutes/O,/O talking/O of/O society/O gossip/O,/O and/O
on/O leaving/O she/O said/O:/O

``/OYou/O've/O never/O told/O me/O when/O the/O divorce/O is/O to/O be/O?/O Supposing/O I/O'm/O ready/O to/O
fling/O my/O cap/O over/O the/O mill/O,/O other/O starchy/O people/O will/O give/O you/O the/O cold/O
shoulder/O until/O you/O're/O married/O./O And/O that/O's/O so/O simple/O nowadays/O./O _/OÇa/O se/O
fait/O_/O./O So/O you/O're/O going/O on/O Friday/O?/O Sorry/O we/O sha/On't/O see/O each/O other/O again/O./O''/O

From/O Betsy/PERSON's/O tone/O Vronsky/O might/O have/O grasped/O what/O he/O had/O to/O expect/O from/O
the/O world/O;/O but/O he/O made/O another/O effort/O in/O his/O own/O family/O./O His/O mother/O he/O
did/O not/O reckon/O upon/O./O He/O knew/O that/O his/O mother/O,/O who/O had/O been/O so/O
enthusiastic/O over/O Anna/PERSON at/O their/O first/O acquaintance/O,/O would/O have/O no/O mercy/O
on/O her/O now/O for/O having/O ruined/O her/O son/O's/O career/O./O But/O he/O had/O more/O hope/O of/O
Varya/PERSON,/O his/O brother/O's/O wife/O./O He/O fancied/O she/O would/O not/O throw/O stones/O,/O and/O
would/O go/O simply/O and/O directly/O to/O see/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O would/O receive/O her/O in/O her/O
own/O house/O./O

The/O day/O after/O his/O arrival/O Vronsky/O went/O to/O her/O,/O and/O finding/O her/O alone/O,/O
expressed/O his/O wishes/O directly/O./O

``/OYou/O know/O,/O Alexey/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O after/O hearing/O him/O,/O ``/Ohow/O fond/O I/O am/O of/O you/O,/O
and/O how/O ready/O I/O am/O to/O do/O anything/O for/O you/O;/O but/O I/O have/O not/O spoken/O,/O
because/O I/O knew/O I/O could/O be/O of/O no/O use/O to/O you/O and/O to/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O''/O she/O
said/O,/O articulating/O the/O name/O ``/OAnna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON''/O with/O particular/O care/O./O
``/ODo/On't/O suppose/O,/O please/O,/O that/O I/O judge/O her/O./O Never/O;/O perhaps/O in/O her/O place/O I/O
should/O have/O done/O the/O same/O./O I/O do/On't/O and/O ca/On't/O enter/O into/O that/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
glancing/O timidly/O at/O his/O gloomy/O face/O./O ``/OBut/O one/O must/O call/O things/O by/O their/O
names/O./O You/O want/O me/O to/O go/O and/O see/O her/O,/O to/O ask/O her/O here/O,/O and/O to/O
rehabilitate/O her/O in/O society/O;/O but/O do/O understand/O that/O I/O _/Ocan/Onot/O_/O do/O so/O./O I/O
have/O daughters/O growing/O up/O,/O and/O I/O must/O live/O in/O the/O world/O for/O my/O husband/O's/O
sake/O./O Well/O,/O I/O'm/O ready/O to/O come/O and/O see/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON:/O she/O will/O
understand/O that/O I/O ca/On't/O ask/O her/O here/O,/O or/O I/O should/O have/O to/O do/O so/O in/O such/O
a/O way/O that/O she/O would/O not/O meet/O people/O who/O look/O at/O things/O differently/O;/O
that/O would/O offend/O her/O./O I/O ca/On't/O raise/O her/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O do/On't/O regard/O her/O as/O fallen/O more/O than/O hundreds/O of/O women/O you/O do/O
receive/O!/O''/O Vronsky/O interrupted/O her/O still/O more/O gloomily/O,/O and/O he/O got/O up/O in/O
silence/O,/O understanding/O that/O his/O sister-in-law/O's/O decision/O was/O not/O to/O be/O
shaken/O./O

``/OAlexey/PERSON!/O do/On't/O be/O angry/O with/O me/O./O Please/O understand/O that/O I/O'm/O not/O to/O
blame/O,/O''/O began/O Varya/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O him/O with/O a/O timid/O smile/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O angry/O with/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O still/O as/O gloomily/O;/O ``/Obut/O I/O'm/O sorry/O in/O
two/O ways/O./O I/O'm/O sorry/O,/O too/O,/O that/O this/O means/O breaking/O up/O our/O friendship/O--/Oif/O
not/O breaking/O up/O,/O at/O least/O weakening/O it/O./O You/O will/O understand/O that/O for/O me/O,/O
too/O,/O it/O can/Onot/O be/O otherwise/O./O''/O

And/O with/O that/O he/O left/O her/O./O

Vronsky/O knew/O that/O further/O efforts/O were/O useless/O,/O and/O that/O he/O had/O to/O spend/O
these/O few/O days/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION as/O though/O in/O a/O strange/O town/O,/O avoiding/O every/O
sort/O of/O relation/O with/O his/O own/O old/O circle/O in/O order/O not/O to/O be/O exposed/O to/O
the/O annoyances/O and/O humiliations/O which/O were/O so/O intolerable/O to/O him/O./O One/O of/O
the/O most/O unpleasant/O features/O of/O his/O position/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION was/O that/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON and/O his/O name/O seemed/O to/O meet/O him/O everywhere/O./O He/O
could/O not/O begin/O to/O talk/O of/O anything/O without/O the/O conversation/O turning/O on/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON;/O he/O could/O not/O go/O anywhere/O without/O risk/O of/O meeting/O
him/O./O So/O at/O least/O it/O seemed/O to/O Vronsky/ORGANIZATION,/O just/O as/O it/O seems/O to/O a/O man/O with/O a/O
sore/O finger/O that/O he/O is/O continually/O,/O as/O though/O on/O purpose/O,/O grazing/O his/O
sore/O finger/O on/O everything/O./O

Their/O stay/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION was/O the/O more/O painful/O to/O Vronsky/O that/O he/O
perceived/O all/O the/O time/O a/O sort/O of/O new/O mood/O that/O he/O could/O not/O understand/O
in/O Anna/PERSON./O At/O one/O time/O she/O would/O seem/O in/O love/O with/O him/O,/O and/O then/O she/O would/O
become/O cold/O,/O irritable/O,/O and/O impenetrable/O./O She/O was/O worrying/O over/O
something/O,/O and/O keeping/O something/O back/O from/O him/O,/O and/O did/O not/O seem/O to/O
notice/O the/O humiliations/O which/O poisoned/O his/O existence/O,/O and/O for/O her/O,/O with/O
her/O delicate/O intuition/O,/O must/O have/O been/O still/O more/O unbearable/O./O



Chapter/O 29/O


One/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O objects/O in/O coming/O back/O to/O Russia/LOCATION had/O been/O to/O see/O her/O son/O./O
From/O the/O day/O she/O left/O Italy/LOCATION the/O thought/O of/O it/O had/O never/O ceased/O to/O
agitate/O her/O./O And/O as/O she/O got/O nearer/O to/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O the/O delight/O and/O
importance/O of/O this/O meeting/O grew/O ever/O greater/O in/O her/O imagination/O./O She/O did/O
not/O even/O put/O to/O herself/O the/O question/O how/O to/O arrange/O it/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O her/O
natural/O and/O simple/O to/O see/O her/O son/O when/O she/O should/O be/O in/O the/O same/O town/O
with/O him/O./O But/O on/O her/O arrival/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION she/O was/O suddenly/O made/O
distinctly/O aware/O of/O her/O present/O position/O in/O society/O,/O and/O she/O grasped/O the/O
fact/O that/O to/O arrange/O this/O meeting/O was/O no/O easy/O matter/O./O

She/O had/O now/O been/O two/O days/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O The/O thought/O of/O her/O son/O never/O
left/O her/O for/O a/O single/O instant/O,/O but/O she/O had/O not/O yet/O seen/O him/O./O To/O go/O
straight/O to/O the/O house/O,/O where/O she/O might/O meet/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O that/O
she/O felt/O she/O had/O no/O right/O to/O do/O./O She/O might/O be/O refused/O admittance/O and/O
insulted/O./O To/O write/O and/O so/O enter/O into/O relations/O with/O her/O husband/O--/Othat/O it/O
made/O her/O miserable/O to/O think/O of/O doing/O;/O she/O could/O only/O be/O at/O peace/O when/O
she/O did/O not/O think/O of/O her/O husband/O./O To/O get/O a/O glimpse/O of/O her/O son/O out/O
walking/O,/O finding/O out/O where/O and/O when/O he/O went/O out/O,/O was/O not/O enough/O for/O her/O;/O
she/O had/O so/O looked/O forward/O to/O this/O meeting/O,/O she/O had/O so/O much/O she/O must/O say/O
to/O him/O,/O she/O so/O longed/O to/O embrace/O him/O,/O to/O kiss/O him/O./O Seryozha/PERSON's/O old/O nurse/O
might/O be/O a/O help/O to/O her/O and/O show/O her/O what/O to/O do/O./O But/O the/O nurse/O was/O not/O
now/O living/O in/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON's/O house/O./O In/O this/O uncertainty/O,/O and/O in/O
efforts/O to/O find/O the/O nurse/O,/O two/O days/O had/O slipped/O by/O./O

Hearing/O of/O the/O close/O intimacy/O between/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON and/O Countess/O
Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O Anna/PERSON decided/O on/O the/O third/O day/O to/O write/O to/O her/O a/O letter/O,/O
which/O cost/O her/O great/O pains/O,/O and/O in/O which/O she/O intentionally/O said/O that/O
permission/O to/O see/O her/O son/O must/O depend/O on/O her/O husband/O's/O generosity/O./O She/O
knew/O that/O if/O the/O letter/O were/O shown/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O he/O would/O keep/O up/O his/O
character/O of/O magnanimity/O,/O and/O would/O not/O refuse/O her/O request/O./O

The/O commissionaire/O who/O took/O the/O letter/O had/O brought/O her/O back/O the/O most/O
cruel/O and/O unexpected/O answer/O,/O that/O there/O was/O no/O answer/O./O She/O had/O never/O
felt/O so/O humiliated/O as/O at/O the/O moment/O when/O,/O sending/O for/O the/O
commissionaire/O,/O she/O heard/O from/O him/O the/O exact/O account/O of/O how/O he/O had/O
waited/O,/O and/O how/O afterwards/O he/O had/O been/O told/O there/O was/O no/O answer/O./O Anna/PERSON
felt/O humiliated/O,/O insulted/O,/O but/O she/O saw/O that/O from/O her/O point/O of/O view/O
Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON was/O right/O./O Her/O suffering/O was/O the/O more/O poignant/O
that/O she/O had/O to/O bear/O it/O in/O solitude/O./O She/O could/O not/O and/O would/O not/O share/O
it/O with/O Vronsky/O./O She/O knew/O that/O to/O him/O,/O although/O he/O was/O the/O primary/O cause/O
of/O her/O distress/O,/O the/O question/O of/O her/O seeing/O her/O son/O would/O seem/O a/O matter/O
of/O very/O little/O consequence/O./O She/O knew/O that/O he/O would/O never/O be/O capable/O of/O
understanding/O all/O the/O depth/O of/O her/O suffering/O,/O that/O for/O his/O cool/O tone/O at/O
any/O allusion/O to/O it/O she/O would/O begin/O to/O hate/O him/O./O And/O she/O dreaded/O that/O
more/O than/O anything/O in/O the/O world/O,/O and/O so/O she/O hid/O from/O him/O everything/O that/O
related/O to/O her/O son/O./O Spending/O the/O whole/O day/O at/O home/O she/O considered/O ways/O
of/O seeing/O her/O son/O,/O and/O had/O reached/O a/O decision/O to/O write/O to/O her/O husband/O./O
She/O was/O just/O composing/O this/O letter/O when/O she/O was/O handed/O the/O letter/O from/O
Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O The/O countess/O's/O silence/O had/O subdued/O and/O depressed/O her/O,/O
but/O the/O letter/O,/O all/O that/O she/O read/O between/O the/O lines/O in/O it/O,/O so/O
exasperated/O her/O,/O this/O malice/O was/O so/O revolting/O beside/O her/O passionate/O,/O
legitimate/O tenderness/O for/O her/O son/O,/O that/O she/O turned/O against/O other/O people/O
and/O left/O off/O blaming/O herself/O./O

``/OThis/O coldness/O--/Othis/O pretense/O of/O feeling/O!/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O./O ``/OThey/O
must/O needs/O insult/O me/O and/O torture/O the/O child/O,/O and/O I/O am/O to/O submit/O to/O it/O!/O
Not/O on/O any/O consideration/O!/O She/O is/O worse/O than/O I/O am/O./O I/O do/On't/O lie/O,/O anyway/O./O''/O
And/O she/O decided/O on/O the/O spot/O that/O next/O day/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON's/O birthday/O,/O she/O
would/O go/O straight/O to/O her/O husband/O's/O house/O,/O bribe/O or/O deceive/O the/O servants/O,/O
but/O at/O any/O cost/O see/O her/O son/O and/O overturn/O the/O hideous/O deception/O with/O
which/O they/O were/O encompassing/O the/O unhappy/O child/O./O

She/O went/O to/O a/O toy/O shop/O,/O bought/O toys/O and/O thought/O over/O a/O plan/O of/O action/O./O
She/O would/O go/O early/O in/O the/O morning/O at/O eight/O o'clock/O,/O when/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON would/O be/O certain/O not/O to/O be/O up/O./O She/O would/O have/O money/O in/O
her/O hand/O to/O give/O the/O hall/O porter/O and/O the/O footman/O,/O so/O that/O they/O should/O
let/O her/O in/O,/O and/O not/O raising/O her/O veil/O,/O she/O would/O say/O that/O she/O had/O come/O
from/O Seryozha/PERSON's/O godfather/O to/O congratulate/O him/O,/O and/O that/O she/O had/O been/O
charged/O to/O leave/O the/O toys/O at/O his/O bedside/O./O She/O had/O prepared/O everything/O
but/O the/O words/O she/O should/O say/O to/O her/O son/O./O Often/O as/O she/O had/O dreamed/O of/O it/O,/O
she/O could/O never/O think/O of/O anything/O./O

The/O next/O day/O,/O at/O eight/O o'clock/O in/O the/O morning/O,/O Anna/PERSON got/O out/O of/O a/O hired/O
sledge/O and/O rang/O at/O the/O front/O entrance/O of/O her/O former/O home/O./O

``/ORun/O and/O see/O what/O's/O wanted/O./O Some/O lady/O,/O''/O said/O Kapitonitch/PERSON,/O who/O,/O not/O yet/O
dressed/O,/O in/O his/O overcoat/O and/O galoshes/O,/O had/O peeped/O out/O of/O the/O window/O and/O
seen/O a/O lady/O in/O a/O veil/O standing/O close/O up/O to/O the/O door/O./O His/O assistant/O,/O a/O
lad/O Anna/PERSON did/O not/O know/O,/O had/O no/O sooner/O opened/O the/O door/O to/O her/O than/O she/O
came/O in/O,/O and/O pulling/O a/O three-rouble/O note/O out/O of/O her/O muff/O put/O it/O
hurriedly/O into/O his/O hand/O./O

``/OSeryozha/O--/OSergey/PERSON Alexeitch/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O was/O going/O on/O./O Scrutinizing/O
the/O note/O,/O the/O porter/O's/O assistant/O stopped/O her/O at/O the/O second/O glass/O door/O./O

``/OWhom/O do/O you/O want/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O

She/O did/O not/O hear/O his/O words/O and/O made/O no/O answer/O./O

Noticing/O the/O embarrassment/O of/O the/O unknown/O lady/O,/O Kapitonitch/PERSON went/O out/O to/O
her/O,/O opened/O the/O second/O door/O for/O her/O,/O and/O asked/O her/O what/O she/O was/O pleased/O
to/O want/O./O

``/OFrom/O Prince/O Skorodumov/PERSON for/O Sergey/PERSON Alexeitch/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OHis/O honor/O's/O not/O up/O yet/O,/O''/O said/O the/O porter/O,/O looking/O at/O her/O attentively/O./O

Anna/PERSON had/O not/O anticipated/O that/O the/O absolutely/O unchanged/O hall/O of/O the/O house/O
where/O she/O had/O lived/O for/O nine/O years/O would/O so/O greatly/O affect/O her/O./O Memories/O
sweet/O and/O painful/O rose/O one/O after/O another/O in/O her/O heart/O,/O and/O for/O a/O moment/O
she/O forgot/O what/O she/O was/O here/O for/O./O

``/OWould/O you/O kindly/O wait/O?/O''/O said/O Kapitonitch/PERSON,/O taking/O off/O her/O fur/O cloak/O./O

As/O he/O took/O off/O the/O cloak/O,/O Kapitonitch/PERSON glanced/O at/O her/O face/O,/O recognized/O
her/O,/O and/O made/O her/O a/O low/O bow/O in/O silence/O./O

``/OPlease/O walk/O in/O,/O your/O excellency/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O her/O./O

She/O tried/O to/O say/O something/O,/O but/O her/O voice/O refused/O to/O utter/O any/O sound/O;/O
with/O a/O guilty/O and/O imploring/O glance/O at/O the/O old/O man/O she/O went/O with/O light/O,/O
swift/O steps/O up/O the/O stairs/O./O Bent/O double/O,/O and/O his/O galoshes/O catching/O in/O the/O
steps/O,/O Kapitonitch/PERSON ran/O after/O her/O,/O trying/O to/O overtake/O her/O./O

``/OThe/O tutor/O's/O there/O;/O maybe/O he/O's/O not/O dressed/O./O I/O'll/O let/O him/O know/O./O''/O

Anna/PERSON still/O mounted/O the/O familiar/O staircase/O,/O not/O understanding/O what/O the/O
old/O man/O was/O saying/O./O

``/OThis/O way/O,/O to/O the/O left/O,/O if/O you/O please/O./O Excuse/O its/O not/O being/O tidy/O./O His/O
honor/O's/O in/O the/O old/O parlor/O now/O,/O''/O the/O hall/O porter/O said/O,/O panting/O./O ``/OExcuse/O
me/O,/O wait/O a/O little/O,/O your/O excellency/O;/O I/O'll/O just/O see/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O
overtaking/O her/O,/O he/O opened/O the/O high/O door/O and/O disappeared/O behind/O it/O./O Anna/PERSON
stood/O still/O waiting/O./O ``/OHe/O's/O only/O just/O awake/O,/O''/O said/O the/O hall/O porter/O,/O
coming/O out/O./O And/O at/O the/O very/O instant/O the/O porter/O said/O this/O,/O Anna/PERSON caught/O
the/O sound/O of/O a/O childish/O yawn/O./O From/O the/O sound/O of/O this/O yawn/O alone/O she/O knew/O
her/O son/O and/O seemed/O to/O see/O him/O living/O before/O her/O eyes/O./O

``/OLet/O me/O in/O;/O go/O away/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O went/O in/O through/O the/O high/O doorway/O./O On/O
the/O right/O of/O the/O door/O stood/O a/O bed/O,/O and/O sitting/O up/O in/O the/O bed/O was/O the/O
boy/O./O His/O little/O body/O bent/O forward/O with/O his/O nightshirt/O unbuttoned/O,/O he/O was/O
stretching/O and/O still/O yawning/O./O The/O instant/O his/O lips/O came/O together/O they/O
curved/O into/O a/O blissfully/O sleepy/O smile/O,/O and/O with/O that/O smile/O he/O slowly/O and/O
deliciously/O rolled/O back/O again/O./O

``/OSeryozha/O!/O''/O she/O whispered/O,/O going/O noiselessly/O up/O to/O him/O./O

When/O she/O was/O parted/O from/O him/O,/O and/O all/O this/O latter/O time/O when/O she/O had/O been/O
feeling/O a/O fresh/O rush/O of/O love/O for/O him/O,/O she/O had/O pictured/O him/O as/O he/O was/O at/O
four/O years/O old/O,/O when/O she/O had/O loved/O him/O most/O of/O all/O./O Now/O he/O was/O not/O even/O
the/O same/O as/O when/O she/O had/O left/O him/O;/O he/O was/O still/O further/O from/O the/O
four-year-old/O baby/O,/O more/O grown/O and/O thinner/O./O How/O thin/O his/O face/O was/O,/O how/O
short/O his/O hair/O was/O!/O What/O long/O hands/O!/O How/O he/O had/O changed/O since/O she/O left/O
him/O!/O But/O it/O was/O he/O with/O his/O head/O,/O his/O lips/O,/O his/O soft/O neck/O and/O broad/O
little/O shoulders/O./O

``/OSeryozha/O!/O''/O she/O repeated/O just/O in/O the/O child/O's/O ear/O./O

He/O raised/O himself/O again/O on/O his/O elbow/O,/O turned/O his/O tangled/O head/O from/O side/O
to/O side/O as/O though/O looking/O for/O something/O,/O and/O opened/O his/O eyes/O./O Slowly/O and/O
inquiringly/O he/O looked/O for/O several/O seconds/O at/O his/O mother/O standing/O
motionless/O before/O him/O,/O then/O all/O at/O once/O he/O smiled/O a/O blissful/O smile/O,/O and/O
shutting/O his/O eyes/O,/O rolled/O not/O backwards/O but/O towards/O her/O into/O her/O arms/O./O

``/OSeryozha/O!/O my/O darling/O boy/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O breathing/O hard/O and/O putting/O her/O
arms/O round/O his/O plump/O little/O body/O./O ``/OMother/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O wriggling/O about/O in/O
her/O arms/O so/O as/O to/O touch/O her/O hands/O with/O different/O parts/O of/O him/O./O

Smiling/O sleepily/O still/O with/O closed/O eyes/O,/O he/O flung/O fat/O little/O arms/O round/O
her/O shoulders/O,/O rolled/O towards/O her/O,/O with/O the/O delicious/O sleepy/O warmth/O and/O
fragrance/O that/O is/O only/O found/O in/O children/O,/O and/O began/O rubbing/O his/O face/O
against/O her/O neck/O and/O shoulders/O./O

``/OI/O know/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O opening/O his/O eyes/O;/O ``/Oit/O's/O my/O birthday/O today/O./O I/O knew/O
you/O'd/O come/O./O I/O'll/O get/O up/O directly/O./O''/O

And/O saying/O that/O he/O dropped/O asleep/O./O

Anna/PERSON looked/O at/O him/O hungrily/O;/O she/O saw/O how/O he/O had/O grown/O and/O changed/O in/O her/O
absence/O./O She/O knew/O,/O and/O did/O not/O know/O,/O the/O bare/O legs/O so/O long/O now/O,/O that/O
were/O thrust/O out/O below/O the/O quilt/O,/O those/O short-cropped/O curls/O on/O his/O neck/O
in/O which/O she/O had/O so/O often/O kissed/O him/O./O She/O touched/O all/O this/O and/O could/O say/O
nothing/O;/O tears/O choked/O her/O./O

``/OWhat/O are/O you/O crying/O for/O,/O mother/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O waking/O completely/O up/O./O
``/OMother/O,/O what/O are/O you/O crying/O for/O?/O''/O he/O cried/O in/O a/O tearful/O voice/O./O

``/OI/O wo/On't/O cry/O .../O I/O'm/O crying/O for/O joy/O./O It/O's/O so/O long/O since/O I/O've/O seen/O you/O./O I/O
wo/On't/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O gulping/O down/O her/O tears/O and/O turning/O away/O./O
``/OCome/O,/O it/O's/O time/O for/O you/O to/O dress/O now/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O after/O a/O pause/O,/O and/O,/O
never/O letting/O go/O his/O hands/O,/O she/O sat/O down/O by/O his/O bedside/O on/O the/O chair/O,/O
where/O his/O clothes/O were/O put/O ready/O for/O him/O./O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O dress/O without/O me/O?/O How/O.../O''/O she/O tried/O to/O begin/O talking/O simply/O
and/O cheerfully/O,/O but/O she/O could/O not/O,/O and/O again/O she/O turned/O away/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O have/O a/O cold/O bath/O,/O papa/O did/On't/O order/O it/O./O And/O you/O've/O not/O seen/O
Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON?/O He/O'll/O come/O in/O soon/O./O Why/O,/O you/O're/O sitting/O on/O my/O clothes/O!/O''/O

And/O Seryozha/PERSON went/O off/O into/O a/O peal/O of/O laughter/O./O She/O looked/O at/O him/O and/O
smiled/O./O

``/OMother/O,/O darling/O,/O sweet/O one/O!/O''/O he/O shouted/O,/O flinging/O himself/O on/O her/O again/O
and/O hugging/O her/O./O It/O was/O as/O though/O only/O now/O,/O on/O seeing/O her/O smile/O,/O he/O
fully/O grasped/O what/O had/O happened/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O want/O that/O on/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O taking/O off/O her/O hat/O./O And/O as/O it/O were/O,/O
seeing/O her/O afresh/O without/O her/O hat/O,/O he/O fell/O to/O kissing/O her/O again/O./O

``/OBut/O what/O did/O you/O think/O about/O me/O?/O You/O did/On't/O think/O I/O was/O dead/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O never/O believed/O it/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O did/On't/O believe/O it/O,/O my/O sweet/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O knew/O,/O I/O knew/O!/O''/O he/O repeated/O his/O favorite/O phrase/O,/O and/O snatching/O the/O
hand/O that/O was/O stroking/O his/O hair/O,/O he/O pressed/O the/O open/O palm/O to/O his/O mouth/O
and/O kissed/O it/O./O



Chapter/O 30/O


Meanwhile/O Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON had/O not/O at/O first/O understood/O who/O this/O lady/O was/O,/O
and/O had/O learned/O from/O their/O conversation/O that/O it/O was/O no/O other/O person/O than/O
the/O mother/O who/O had/O left/O her/O husband/O,/O and/O whom/O he/O had/O not/O seen/O,/O as/O he/O had/O
entered/O the/O house/O after/O her/O departure/O./O He/O was/O in/O doubt/O whether/O to/O go/O in/O
or/O not/O,/O or/O whether/O to/O communicate/O with/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O Reflecting/O
finally/O that/O his/O duty/O was/O to/O get/O Seryozha/PERSON up/O at/O the/O hour/O fixed/O,/O and/O that/O
it/O was/O therefore/O not/O his/O business/O to/O consider/O who/O was/O there/O,/O the/O mother/O
or/O anyone/O else/O,/O but/O simply/O to/O do/O his/O duty/O,/O he/O finished/O dressing/O,/O went/O to/O
the/O door/O and/O opened/O it/O./O

But/O the/O embraces/O of/O the/O mother/O and/O child/O,/O the/O sound/O of/O their/O voices/O,/O and/O
what/O they/O were/O saying/O,/O made/O him/O change/O his/O mind/O./O

He/O shook/O his/O head/O,/O and/O with/O a/O sigh/O he/O closed/O the/O door/O./O ``/OI/O'll/O wait/O
another/O ten/O minutes/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O,/O clearing/O his/O throat/O and/O wiping/O
away/O tears/O./O

Among/O the/O servants/O of/O the/O household/O there/O was/O intense/O excitement/O all/O
this/O time/O./O All/O had/O heard/O that/O their/O mistress/O had/O come/O,/O and/O that/O
Kapitonitch/PERSON had/O let/O her/O in/O,/O and/O that/O she/O was/O even/O now/O in/O the/O nursery/O,/O
and/O that/O their/O master/O always/O went/O in/O person/O to/O the/O nursery/O at/O nine/O
o'clock/O,/O and/O every/O one/O fully/O comprehended/O that/O it/O was/O impossible/O for/O the/O
husband/O and/O wife/O to/O meet/O,/O and/O that/O they/O must/O prevent/O it/O./O Korney/PERSON,/O the/O
valet/O,/O going/O down/O to/O the/O hall/O porter/O's/O room/O,/O asked/O who/O had/O let/O her/O in/O,/O
and/O how/O it/O was/O he/O had/O done/O so/O,/O and/O ascertaining/O that/O Kapitonitch/PERSON had/O
admitted/O her/O and/O shown/O her/O up/O,/O he/O gave/O the/O old/O man/O a/O talking-to/O./O The/O
hall/O porter/O was/O doggedly/O silent/O,/O but/O when/O Korney/PERSON told/O him/O he/O ought/O to/O be/O
sent/O away/O,/O Kapitonitch/PERSON darted/O up/O to/O him/O,/O and/O waving/O his/O hands/O in/O
Korney/PERSON's/O face/O,/O began/O:/O

``/OOh/O yes/O,/O to/O be/O sure/O you/O'd/O not/O have/O let/O her/O in/O!/O After/O ten/O years/O'/O service/O,/O
and/O never/O a/O word/O but/O of/O kindness/O,/O and/O there/O you/O'd/O up/O and/O say/O,/O `/OBe/O off/O,/O
go/O along/O,/O get/O away/O with/O you/O!/O'/O Oh/O yes/O,/O you/O're/O a/O shrewd/O one/O at/O politics/O,/O I/O
dare/O say/O!/O You/O do/On't/O need/O to/O be/O taught/O how/O to/O swindle/O the/O master/O,/O and/O to/O
filch/O fur/O coats/O!/O''/O

``/OSoldier/O!/O''/O said/O Korney/PERSON contemptuously/O,/O and/O he/O turned/O to/O the/O nurse/O who/O
was/O coming/O in/O./O ``/OHere/O,/O what/O do/O you/O think/O,/O Marya/PERSON Efimovna/PERSON:/O he/O let/O her/O in/O
without/O a/O word/O to/O anyone/O,/O''/O Korney/PERSON said/O addressing/O her/O./O ``/OAlexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON will/O be/O down/O immediately/O--/Oand/O go/O into/O the/O nursery/O!/O''/O

``/OA/O pretty/O business/O,/O a/O pretty/O business/O!/O''/O said/O the/O nurse/O./O ``/OYou/O,/O Korney/PERSON
Vassilievitch/PERSON,/O you/O'd/O best/O keep/O him/O some/O way/O or/O other/O,/O the/O master/O,/O while/O
I/O'll/O run/O and/O get/O her/O away/O somehow/O./O A/O pretty/O business/O!/O''/O

When/O the/O nurse/O went/O into/O the/O nursery/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON was/O telling/O his/O mother/O
how/O he/O and/O Nadinka/PERSON had/O had/O a/O fall/O in/O sledging/O downhill/O,/O and/O had/O turned/O
over/O three/O times/O./O She/O was/O listening/O to/O the/O sound/O of/O his/O voice/O,/O watching/O
his/O face/O and/O the/O play/O of/O expression/O on/O it/O,/O touching/O his/O hand/O,/O but/O she/O
did/O not/O follow/O what/O he/O was/O saying/O./O She/O must/O go/O,/O she/O must/O leave/O him/O,/O--/Othis/O
was/O the/O only/O thing/O she/O was/O thinking/O and/O feeling/O./O She/O heard/O the/O steps/O of/O
Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON coming/O up/O to/O the/O door/O and/O coughing/O;/O she/O heard/O,/O too/O,/O the/O
steps/O of/O the/O nurse/O as/O she/O came/O near/O;/O but/O she/O sat/O like/O one/O turned/O to/O
stone/O,/O incapable/O of/O beginning/O to/O speak/O or/O to/O get/O up/O./O

``/OMistress/O,/O darling/O!/O''/O began/O the/O nurse/O,/O going/O up/O to/O Anna/PERSON and/O kissing/O her/O
hands/O and/O shoulders/O./O ``/OGod/O has/O brought/O joy/O indeed/O to/O our/O boy/O on/O his/O
birthday/O./O You/O are/On't/O changed/O one/O bit/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O nurse/O dear/O,/O I/O did/On't/O know/O you/O were/O in/O the/O house/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O
rousing/O herself/O for/O a/O moment/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O living/O here/O,/O I/O'm/O living/O with/O my/O daughter/O./O I/O came/O for/O the/O
birthday/O,/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O darling/O!/O''/O

The/O nurse/O suddenly/O burst/O into/O tears/O,/O and/O began/O kissing/O her/O hand/O again/O./O

Seryozha/PERSON,/O with/O radiant/O eyes/O and/O smiles/O,/O holding/O his/O mother/O by/O one/O hand/O
and/O his/O nurse/O by/O the/O other/O,/O pattered/O on/O the/O rug/O with/O his/O fat/O little/O bare/O
feet/O./O The/O tenderness/O shown/O by/O his/O beloved/O nurse/O to/O his/O mother/O threw/O him/O
into/O an/O ecstasy/O./O

``/OMother/O!/O She/O often/O comes/O to/O see/O me/O,/O and/O when/O she/O comes/O.../O''/O he/O was/O
beginning/O,/O but/O he/O stopped/O,/O noticing/O that/O the/O nurse/O was/O saying/O something/O
in/O a/O whisper/O to/O his/O mother/O,/O and/O that/O in/O his/O mother/O's/O face/O there/O was/O a/O
look/O of/O dread/O and/O something/O like/O shame/O,/O which/O was/O so/O strangely/O
unbecoming/O to/O her/O./O

She/O went/O up/O to/O him/O./O

``/OMy/O sweet/O!/O''/O she/O said/O./O

She/O could/O not/O say/O _/Ogood-bye/O_/O,/O but/O the/O expression/O on/O her/O face/O said/O it/O,/O
and/O he/O understood/O./O ``/ODarling/O,/O darling/O Kootik/O!/O''/O she/O used/O the/O name/O by/O which/O
she/O had/O called/O him/O when/O he/O was/O little/O,/O ``/Oyou/O wo/On't/O forget/O me/O?/O You/O.../O''/O but/O
she/O could/O not/O say/O more/O./O

How/O often/O afterwards/O she/O thought/O of/O words/O she/O might/O have/O said/O./O But/O now/O
she/O did/O not/O know/O how/O to/O say/O it/O,/O and/O could/O say/O nothing/O./O But/O Seryozha/PERSON knew/O
all/O she/O wanted/O to/O say/O to/O him/O./O He/O understood/O that/O she/O was/O unhappy/O and/O
loved/O him/O./O He/O understood/O even/O what/O the/O nurse/O had/O whispered/O./O He/O had/O
caught/O the/O words/O ``/Oalways/O at/O nine/O o'clock/O,/O''/O and/O he/O knew/O that/O this/O was/O
said/O of/O his/O father/O,/O and/O that/O his/O father/O and/O mother/O could/O not/O meet/O./O That/O
he/O understood/O,/O but/O one/O thing/O he/O could/O not/O understand/O--/Owhy/O there/O should/O be/O
a/O look/O of/O dread/O and/O shame/O in/O her/O face/O?/O.../O She/O was/O not/O in/O fault/O,/O but/O she/O
was/O afraid/O of/O him/O and/O ashamed/O of/O something/O./O He/O would/O have/O liked/O to/O put/O a/O
question/O that/O would/O have/O set/O at/O rest/O this/O doubt/O,/O but/O he/O did/O not/O dare/O;/O he/O
saw/O that/O she/O was/O miserable/O,/O and/O he/O felt/O for/O her/O./O Silently/O he/O pressed/O
close/O to/O her/O and/O whispered/O,/O ``/ODo/On't/O go/O yet/O./O He/O wo/On't/O come/O just/O yet/O./O''/O

The/O mother/O held/O him/O away/O from/O her/O to/O see/O what/O he/O was/O thinking/O,/O what/O to/O
say/O to/O him/O,/O and/O in/O his/O frightened/O face/O she/O read/O not/O only/O that/O he/O was/O
speaking/O of/O his/O father/O,/O but/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O asking/O her/O what/O he/O ought/O to/O
think/O about/O his/O father/O./O

``/OSeryozha/PERSON,/O my/O darling/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/Olove/O him/O;/O he/O's/O better/O and/O kinder/O than/O
I/O am/O,/O and/O I/O have/O done/O him/O wrong/O./O When/O you/O grow/O up/O you/O will/O judge/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O's/O no/O one/O better/O than/O you/O!/O.../O''/O he/O cried/O in/O despair/O through/O his/O
tears/O,/O and/O,/O clutching/O her/O by/O the/O shoulders/O,/O he/O began/O squeezing/O her/O with/O
all/O his/O force/O to/O him/O,/O his/O arms/O trembling/O with/O the/O strain/O./O

``/OMy/O sweet/O,/O my/O little/O one/O!/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O she/O cried/O as/O weakly/O and/O
childishly/O as/O he/O./O

At/O that/O moment/O the/O door/O opened/O./O Vassily/PERSON Lukitch/PERSON came/O in/O./O

At/O the/O other/O door/O there/O was/O the/O sound/O of/O steps/O,/O and/O the/O nurse/O in/O a/O
scared/O whisper/O said/O,/O ``/OHe/O's/O coming/O,/O''/O and/O gave/O Anna/PERSON her/O hat/O./O

Seryozha/PERSON sank/O onto/O the/O bed/O and/O sobbed/O,/O hiding/O his/O face/O in/O his/O hands/O./O
Anna/PERSON removed/O his/O hands/O,/O once/O more/O kissed/O his/O wet/O face/O,/O and/O with/O rapid/O
steps/O went/O to/O the/O door/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON walked/O in/O,/O meeting/O her/O./O
Seeing/O her/O,/O he/O stopped/O short/O and/O bowed/O his/O head/O./O

Although/O she/O had/O just/O said/O he/O was/O better/O and/O kinder/O than/O she/O,/O in/O the/O
rapid/O glance/O she/O flung/O at/O him/O,/O taking/O in/O his/O whole/O figure/O in/O all/O its/O
details/O,/O feelings/O of/O repulsion/O and/O hatred/O for/O him/O and/O jealousy/O over/O her/O
son/O took/O possession/O of/O her/O./O With/O a/O swift/O gesture/O she/O put/O down/O her/O veil/O,/O
and/O,/O quickening/O her/O pace/O,/O almost/O ran/O out/O of/O the/O room/O./O

She/O had/O not/O time/O to/O undo/O,/O and/O so/O carried/O back/O with/O her/O,/O the/O parcel/O of/O
toys/O she/O had/O chosen/O the/O day/O before/O in/O a/O toy/O shop/O with/O such/O love/O and/O
sorrow/O./O



Chapter/O 31/O


As/O intensely/O as/O Anna/PERSON had/O longed/O to/O see/O her/O son/O,/O and/O long/O as/O she/O had/O been/O
thinking/O of/O it/O and/O preparing/O herself/O for/O it/O,/O she/O had/O not/O in/O the/O least/O
expected/O that/O seeing/O him/O would/O affect/O her/O so/O deeply/O./O On/O getting/O back/O to/O
her/O lonely/O rooms/O in/O the/O hotel/O she/O could/O not/O for/O a/O long/O while/O understand/O
why/O she/O was/O there/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O all/O over/O,/O and/O I/O am/O again/O alone/O,/O''/O she/O said/O
to/O herself/O,/O and/O without/O taking/O off/O her/O hat/O she/O sat/O down/O in/O a/O low/O chair/O
by/O the/O hearth/O./O Fixing/O her/O eyes/O on/O a/O bronze/O clock/O standing/O on/O a/O table/O
between/O the/O windows/O,/O she/O tried/O to/O think/O./O

The/O French/O maid/O brought/O from/O abroad/O came/O in/O to/O suggest/O she/O should/O dress/O./O
She/O gazed/O at/O her/O wonderingly/O and/O said/O,/O ``/OPresently/O./O''/O A/O footman/O offered/O
her/O coffee/O./O ``/OLater/O on/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

The/O Italian/O nurse/O,/O after/O having/O taken/O the/O baby/O out/O in/O her/O best/O,/O came/O in/O
with/O her/O,/O and/O brought/O her/O to/O Anna/PERSON./O The/O plump/O,/O well-fed/O little/O baby/O,/O on/O
seeing/O her/O mother/O,/O as/O she/O always/O did/O,/O held/O out/O her/O fat/O little/O hands/O,/O and/O
with/O a/O smile/O on/O her/O toothless/O mouth/O,/O began/O,/O like/O a/O fish/O with/O a/O float/O,/O
bobbing/O her/O fingers/O up/O and/O down/O the/O starched/O folds/O of/O her/O embroidered/O
skirt/O,/O making/O them/O rustle/O./O It/O was/O impossible/O not/O to/O smile/O,/O not/O to/O kiss/O
the/O baby/O,/O impossible/O not/O to/O hold/O out/O a/O finger/O for/O her/O to/O clutch/O,/O crowing/O
and/O prancing/O all/O over/O;/O impossible/O not/O to/O offer/O her/O a/O lip/O which/O she/O
sucked/O into/O her/O little/O mouth/O by/O way/O of/O a/O kiss/O./O And/O all/O this/O Anna/PERSON did/O,/O
and/O took/O her/O in/O her/O arms/O and/O made/O her/O dance/O,/O and/O kissed/O her/O fresh/O little/O
cheek/O and/O bare/O little/O elbows/O;/O but/O at/O the/O sight/O of/O this/O child/O it/O was/O
plainer/O than/O ever/O to/O her/O that/O the/O feeling/O she/O had/O for/O her/O could/O not/O be/O
called/O love/O in/O comparison/O with/O what/O she/O felt/O for/O Seryozha/PERSON./O Everything/O in/O
this/O baby/O was/O charming/O,/O but/O for/O some/O reason/O all/O this/O did/O not/O go/O deep/O to/O
her/O heart/O./O On/O her/O first/O child/O,/O though/O the/O child/O of/O an/O unloved/O father/O,/O
had/O been/O concentrated/O all/O the/O love/O that/O had/O never/O found/O satisfaction/O./O
Her/O baby/O girl/O had/O been/O born/O in/O the/O most/O painful/O circumstances/O and/O had/O
not/O had/O a/O hundredth/O part/O of/O the/O care/O and/O thought/O which/O had/O been/O
concentrated/O on/O her/O first/O child/O./O Besides/O,/O in/O the/O little/O girl/O everything/O
was/O still/O in/O the/O future/O,/O while/O Seryozha/PERSON was/O by/O now/O almost/O a/O personality/O,/O
and/O a/O personality/O dearly/O loved/O./O In/O him/O there/O was/O a/O conflict/O of/O thought/O
and/O feeling/O;/O he/O understood/O her/O,/O he/O loved/O her/O,/O he/O judged/O her/O,/O she/O
thought/O,/O recalling/O his/O words/O and/O his/O eyes/O./O And/O she/O was/O forever/O--/Onot/O
physically/O only/O but/O spiritually/O--/Odivided/O from/O him/O,/O and/O it/O was/O impossible/O
to/O set/O this/O right/O./O

She/O gave/O the/O baby/O back/O to/O the/O nurse/O,/O let/O her/O go/O,/O and/O opened/O the/O locket/O
in/O which/O there/O was/O Seryozha/PERSON's/O portrait/O when/O he/O was/O almost/O of/O the/O same/O
age/O as/O the/O girl/O./O She/O got/O up/O,/O and/O,/O taking/O off/O her/O hat/O,/O took/O up/O from/O a/O
little/O table/O an/O album/O in/O which/O there/O were/O photographs/O of/O her/O son/O at/O
different/O ages/O./O She/O wanted/O to/O compare/O them/O,/O and/O began/O taking/O them/O out/O of/O
the/O album/O./O She/O took/O them/O all/O out/O except/O one/O,/O the/O latest/O and/O best/O
photograph/O./O In/O it/O he/O was/O in/O a/O white/O smock/O,/O sitting/O astride/O a/O chair/O,/O with/O
frowning/O eyes/O and/O smiling/O lips/O./O It/O was/O his/O best/O,/O most/O characteristic/O
expression/O./O With/O her/O little/O supple/O hands/O,/O her/O white/O,/O delicate/O fingers/O,/O
that/O moved/O with/O a/O peculiar/O intensity/O today/O,/O she/O pulled/O at/O a/O corner/O of/O
the/O photograph/O,/O but/O the/O photograph/O had/O caught/O somewhere/O,/O and/O she/O could/O
not/O get/O it/O out/O./O There/O was/O no/O paper/O knife/O on/O the/O table/O,/O and/O so/O,/O pulling/O
out/O the/O photograph/O that/O was/O next/O to/O her/O son/O's/O -LRB-/Oit/O was/O a/O photograph/O of/O
Vronsky/O taken/O at/O Rome/LOCATION in/O a/O round/O hat/O and/O with/O long/O hair/O-RRB-/O,/O she/O used/O it/O to/O
push/O out/O her/O son/O's/O photograph/O./O ``/OOh/O,/O here/O is/O he/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O glancing/O at/O
the/O portrait/O of/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O she/O suddenly/O recalled/O that/O he/O was/O the/O cause/O
of/O her/O present/O misery/O./O She/O had/O not/O once/O thought/O of/O him/O all/O the/O morning/O./O
But/O now/O,/O coming/O all/O at/O once/O upon/O that/O manly/O,/O noble/O face/O,/O so/O familiar/O and/O
so/O dear/O to/O her/O,/O she/O felt/O a/O sudden/O rush/O of/O love/O for/O him/O./O

``/OBut/O where/O is/O he/O?/O How/O is/O it/O he/O leaves/O me/O alone/O in/O my/O misery/O?/O''/O she/O
thought/O all/O at/O once/O with/O a/O feeling/O of/O reproach/O,/O forgetting/O she/O had/O
herself/O kept/O from/O him/O everything/O concerning/O her/O son/O./O She/O sent/O to/O ask/O him/O
to/O come/O to/O her/O immediately/O;/O with/O a/O throbbing/O heart/O she/O awaited/O him/O,/O
rehearsing/O to/O herself/O the/O words/O in/O which/O she/O would/O tell/O him/O all/O,/O and/O the/O
expressions/O of/O love/O with/O which/O he/O would/O console/O her/O./O The/O messenger/O
returned/O with/O the/O answer/O that/O he/O had/O a/O visitor/O with/O him/O,/O but/O that/O he/O
would/O come/O immediately/O,/O and/O that/O he/O asked/O whether/O she/O would/O let/O him/O
bring/O with/O him/O Prince/PERSON Yashvin/PERSON,/O who/O had/O just/O arrived/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O ``/OHe/O's/O
not/O coming/O alone/O,/O and/O since/O dinner/O yesterday/O he/O has/O not/O seen/O me/O,/O''/O she/O
thought/O;/O ``/Ohe/O's/O not/O coming/O so/O that/O I/O could/O tell/O him/O everything/O,/O but/O
coming/O with/O Yashvin/PERSON./O''/O And/O all/O at/O once/O a/O strange/O idea/O came/O to/O her/O:/O what/O
if/O he/O had/O ceased/O to/O love/O her/O?/O

And/O going/O over/O the/O events/O of/O the/O last/O few/O days/O,/O it/O seemed/O to/O her/O that/O
she/O saw/O in/O everything/O a/O confirmation/O of/O this/O terrible/O idea/O./O The/O fact/O
that/O he/O had/O not/O dined/O at/O home/O yesterday/O,/O and/O the/O fact/O that/O he/O had/O
insisted/O on/O their/O taking/O separate/O sets/O of/O rooms/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O that/O
even/O now/O he/O was/O not/O coming/O to/O her/O alone/O,/O as/O though/O he/O were/O trying/O to/O
avoid/O meeting/O her/O face/O to/O face/O./O

``/OBut/O he/O ought/O to/O tell/O me/O so/O./O I/O must/O know/O that/O it/O is/O so/O./O If/O I/O knew/O it/O,/O
then/O I/O know/O what/O I/O should/O do/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O,/O utterly/O unable/O to/O
picture/O to/O herself/O the/O position/O she/O would/O be/O in/O if/O she/O were/O convinced/O of/O
his/O not/O caring/O for/O her/O./O She/O thought/O he/O had/O ceased/O to/O love/O her/O,/O she/O felt/O
close/O upon/O despair/O,/O and/O consequently/O she/O felt/O exceptionally/O alert/O./O She/O
rang/O for/O her/O maid/O and/O went/O to/O her/O dressing/O room/O./O As/O she/O dressed/O,/O she/O
took/O more/O care/O over/O her/O appearance/O than/O she/O had/O done/O all/O those/O days/O,/O as/O
though/O he/O might/O,/O if/O he/O had/O grown/O cold/O to/O her/O,/O fall/O in/O love/O with/O her/O
again/O because/O she/O had/O dressed/O and/O arranged/O her/O hair/O in/O the/O way/O most/O
becoming/O to/O her/O./O

She/O heard/O the/O bell/O ring/O before/O she/O was/O ready/O./O When/O she/O went/O into/O the/O
drawing/O room/O it/O was/O not/O he/O,/O but/O Yashvin/PERSON,/O who/O met/O her/O eyes/O./O Vronsky/PERSON was/O
looking/O through/O the/O photographs/O of/O her/O son/O,/O which/O she/O had/O forgotten/O on/O
the/O table/O,/O and/O he/O made/O no/O haste/O to/O look/O round/O at/O her/O./O

``/OWe/O have/O met/O already/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O putting/O her/O little/O hand/O into/O the/O huge/O
hand/O of/O Yashvin/LOCATION,/O whose/O bashfulness/O was/O so/O queerly/O out/O of/O keeping/O with/O
his/O immense/O frame/O and/O coarse/O face/O./O ``/OWe/O met/O last/O year/O at/O the/O races/O./O Give/O
them/O to/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O a/O rapid/O movement/O snatching/O from/O Vronsky/O the/O
photographs/O of/O her/O son/O,/O and/O glancing/O significantly/O at/O him/O with/O flashing/O
eyes/O./O ``/OWere/O the/O races/O good/O this/O year/O?/O Instead/O of/O them/O I/O saw/O the/O races/O in/O
the/O Corso/LOCATION in/O Rome/LOCATION./O But/O you/O do/On't/O care/O for/O life/O abroad/O,/O''/O she/O said/O with/O a/O
cordial/O smile/O./O ``/OI/O know/O you/O and/O all/O your/O tastes/O,/O though/O I/O have/O seen/O so/O
little/O of/O you/O./O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O awfully/O sorry/O for/O that/O,/O for/O my/O tastes/O are/O mostly/O bad/O,/O''/O said/O
Yashvin/PERSON,/O gnawing/O at/O his/O left/O mustache/O./O

Having/O talked/O a/O little/O while/O,/O and/O noticing/O that/O Vronsky/O glanced/O at/O the/O
clock/O,/O Yashvin/PERSON asked/O her/O whether/O she/O would/O be/O staying/O much/O longer/O in/O
Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O unbending/O his/O huge/O figure/O reached/O after/O his/O cap/O./O

``/ONot/O long/O,/O I/O think/O,/O''/O she/O said/O hesitatingly/O,/O glancing/O at/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OSo/O then/O we/O sha/On't/O meet/O again/O?/O''/O

``/OCome/O and/O dine/O with/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON resolutely/O,/O angry/O it/O seemed/O with/O
herself/O for/O her/O embarrassment/O,/O but/O flushing/O as/O she/O always/O did/O when/O she/O
defined/O her/O position/O before/O a/O fresh/O person/O./O ``/OThe/O dinner/O here/O is/O not/O
good/O,/O but/O at/O least/O you/O will/O see/O him/O./O There/O is/O no/O one/O of/O his/O old/O friends/O
in/O the/O regiment/O Alexey/PERSON cares/O for/O as/O he/O does/O for/O you/O./O''/O

``/ODelighted/O,/O''/O said/O Yashvin/PERSON with/O a/O smile/O,/O from/O which/O Vronsky/O could/O see/O
that/O he/O liked/O Anna/PERSON very/O much/O./O

Yashvin/PERSON said/O good-bye/O and/O went/O away/O;/O Vronsky/PERSON stayed/O behind/O./O

``/OAre/O you/O going/O too/O?/O''/O she/O said/O to/O him/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O late/O already/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O./O ``/ORun/O along/O!/O I/O'll/O catch/O you/O up/O in/O a/O
moment/O,/O''/O he/O called/O to/O Yashvin/PERSON./O

She/O took/O him/O by/O the/O hand/O,/O and/O without/O taking/O her/O eyes/O off/O him/O,/O gazed/O at/O
him/O while/O she/O ransacked/O her/O mind/O for/O the/O words/O to/O say/O that/O would/O keep/O
him/O./O

``/OWait/O a/O minute/O,/O there/O's/O something/O I/O want/O to/O say/O to/O you/O,/O''/O and/O taking/O his/O
broad/O hand/O she/O pressed/O it/O on/O her/O neck/O./O ``/OOh/O,/O was/O it/O right/O my/O asking/O him/O
to/O dinner/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O did/O quite/O right/O,/O''/O he/O said/O with/O a/O serene/O smile/O that/O showed/O his/O even/O
teeth/O,/O and/O he/O kissed/O her/O hand/O./O

``/OAlexey/PERSON,/O you/O have/O not/O changed/O to/O me/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O pressing/O his/O hand/O in/O
both/O of/O hers/O./O ``/OAlexey/PERSON,/O I/O am/O miserable/O here/O./O When/O are/O we/O going/O away/O?/O''/O

``/OSoon/O,/O soon/O./O You/O would/On't/O believe/O how/O disagreeable/O our/O way/O of/O living/O
here/O is/O to/O me/O too/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O he/O drew/O away/O his/O hand/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O go/O,/O go/O!/O''/O she/O said/O in/O a/O tone/O of/O offense/O,/O and/O she/O walked/O quickly/O
away/O from/O him/O./O



Chapter/O 32/O


When/O Vronsky/PERSON returned/O home/O,/O Anna/PERSON was/O not/O yet/O home/O./O Soon/O after/O he/O had/O
left/O,/O some/O lady/O,/O so/O they/O told/O him/O,/O had/O come/O to/O see/O her/O,/O and/O she/O had/O gone/O
out/O with/O her/O./O That/O she/O had/O gone/O out/O without/O leaving/O word/O where/O she/O was/O
going/O,/O that/O she/O had/O not/O yet/O come/O back/O,/O and/O that/O all/O the/O morning/O she/O had/O
been/O going/O about/O somewhere/O without/O a/O word/O to/O him/O--/Oall/O this/O,/O together/O with/O
the/O strange/O look/O of/O excitement/O in/O her/O face/O in/O the/O morning/O,/O and/O the/O
recollection/O of/O the/O hostile/O tone/O with/O which/O she/O had/O before/O Yashvin/PERSON
almost/O snatched/O her/O son/O's/O photographs/O out/O of/O his/O hands/O,/O made/O him/O
serious/O./O He/O decided/O he/O absolutely/O must/O speak/O openly/O with/O her/O./O And/O he/O
waited/O for/O her/O in/O her/O drawing/O room/O./O But/O Anna/PERSON did/O not/O return/O alone/O,/O but/O
brought/O with/O her/O her/O old/O unmarried/O aunt/O,/O Princess/O Oblonskaya/PERSON./O This/O was/O
the/O lady/O who/O had/O come/O in/O the/O morning/O,/O and/O with/O whom/O Anna/PERSON had/O gone/O out/O
shopping/O./O Anna/PERSON appeared/O not/O to/O notice/O Vronsky/O's/O worried/O and/O inquiring/O
expression/O,/O and/O began/O a/O lively/O account/O of/O her/O morning/O's/O shopping/O./O He/O saw/O
that/O there/O was/O something/O working/O within/O her/O;/O in/O her/O flashing/O eyes/O,/O when/O
they/O rested/O for/O a/O moment/O on/O him/O,/O there/O was/O an/O intense/O concentration/O,/O and/O
in/O her/O words/O and/O movements/O there/O was/O that/O nervous/O rapidity/O and/O grace/O
which/O,/O during/O the/O early/O period/O of/O their/O intimacy/O,/O had/O so/O fascinated/O him/O,/O
but/O which/O now/O so/O disturbed/O and/O alarmed/O him/O./O

The/O dinner/O was/O laid/O for/O four/O./O All/O were/O gathered/O together/O and/O about/O to/O go/O
into/O the/O little/O dining/O room/O when/O Tushkevitch/PERSON made/O his/O appearance/O with/O a/O
message/O from/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON./O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON begged/O her/O to/O excuse/O her/O not/O
having/O come/O to/O say/O good-bye/O;/O she/O had/O been/O indisposed/O,/O but/O begged/O Anna/PERSON to/O
come/O to/O her/O between/O half-past/O six/O and/O nine/O o'clock/O./O Vronsky/O glanced/O at/O
Anna/PERSON at/O the/O precise/O limit/O of/O time/O,/O so/O suggestive/O of/O steps/O having/O been/O
taken/O that/O she/O should/O meet/O no/O one/O;/O but/O Anna/PERSON appeared/O not/O to/O notice/O it/O./O

``/OVery/O sorry/O that/O I/O ca/On't/O come/O just/O between/O half-past/O six/O and/O nine/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O with/O a/O faint/O smile/O./O

``/OThe/O princess/O will/O be/O very/O sorry/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O so/O am/O I./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O going/O,/O no/O doubt/O,/O to/O hear/O Patti/PERSON?/O''/O said/O Tushkevitch/PERSON./O

``/OPatti/PERSON?/O You/O suggest/O the/O idea/O to/O me/O./O I/O would/O go/O if/O it/O were/O possible/O to/O
get/O a/O box/O./O''/O

``/OI/O can/O get/O one/O,/O''/O Tushkevitch/PERSON offered/O his/O services/O./O

``/OI/O should/O be/O very/O,/O very/O grateful/O to/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O ``/OBut/O wo/On't/O you/O dine/O
with/O us/O?/O''/O

Vronsky/O gave/O a/O hardly/O perceptible/O shrug/O./O He/O was/O at/O a/O complete/O loss/O to/O
understand/O what/O Anna/PERSON was/O about/O./O What/O had/O she/O brought/O the/O old/O Princess/O
Oblonskaya/PERSON home/O for/O,/O what/O had/O she/O made/O Tushkevitch/PERSON stay/O to/O dinner/O for/O,/O
and/O,/O most/O amazing/O of/O all/O,/O why/O was/O she/O sending/O him/O for/O a/O box/O?/O Could/O she/O
possibly/O think/O in/O her/O position/O of/O going/O to/O Patti/PERSON's/O benefit/O,/O where/O all/O
the/O circle/O of/O her/O acquaintances/O would/O be/O?/O He/O looked/O at/O her/O with/O serious/O
eyes/O,/O but/O she/O responded/O with/O that/O defiant/O,/O half-mirthful/O,/O half-desperate/O
look/O,/O the/O meaning/O of/O which/O he/O could/O not/O comprehend/O./O At/O dinner/O Anna/PERSON was/O
in/O aggressively/O high/O spirits/O--/Oshe/O almost/O flirted/O both/O with/O Tushkevitch/PERSON
and/O with/O Yashvin/PERSON./O When/O they/O got/O up/O from/O dinner/O and/O Tushkevitch/PERSON had/O gone/O
to/O get/O a/O box/O at/O the/O opera/O,/O Yashvin/PERSON went/O to/O smoke/O,/O and/O Vronsky/PERSON went/O down/O
with/O him/O to/O his/O own/O rooms/O./O After/O sitting/O there/O for/O some/O time/O he/O ran/O
upstairs/O./O Anna/PERSON was/O already/O dressed/O in/O a/O low-necked/O gown/O of/O light/O silk/O
and/O velvet/O that/O she/O had/O had/O made/O in/O Paris/LOCATION,/O and/O with/O costly/O white/O lace/O on/O
her/O head/O,/O framing/O her/O face/O,/O and/O particularly/O becoming/O,/O showing/O up/O her/O
dazzling/O beauty/O./O

``/OAre/O you/O really/O going/O to/O the/O theater/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O trying/O not/O to/O look/O at/O
her/O./O

``/OWhy/O do/O you/O ask/O with/O such/O alarm/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O wounded/O again/O at/O his/O not/O
looking/O at/O her/O./O ``/OWhy/O should/On't/O I/O go/O?/O''/O

She/O appeared/O not/O to/O understand/O the/O motive/O of/O his/O words/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O of/O course/O,/O there/O's/O no/O reason/O whatever/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O frowning/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O just/O what/O I/O say/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O willfully/O refusing/O to/O see/O the/O irony/O
of/O his/O tone/O,/O and/O quietly/O turning/O back/O her/O long/O,/O perfumed/O glove/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O for/O God/O's/O sake/O!/O what/O is/O the/O matter/O with/O you/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O appealing/O
to/O her/O exactly/O as/O once/O her/O husband/O had/O done/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O understand/O what/O you/O are/O asking/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O know/O that/O it/O's/O out/O of/O the/O question/O to/O go/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O so/O?/O I/O'm/O not/O going/O alone/O./O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON has/O gone/O to/O dress/O,/O she/O is/O
going/O with/O me/O./O''/O

He/O shrugged/O his/O shoulders/O with/O an/O air/O of/O perplexity/O and/O despair/O./O

``/OBut/O do/O you/O mean/O to/O say/O you/O do/On't/O know/O?/O.../O''/O he/O began/O./O

``/OBut/O I/O do/On't/O care/O to/O know/O!/O''/O she/O almost/O shrieked/O./O ``/OI/O do/On't/O care/O to/O./O Do/O I/O
regret/O what/O I/O have/O done/O?/O No/O,/O no/O,/O no/O!/O If/O it/O were/O all/O to/O do/O again/O from/O the/O
beginning/O,/O it/O would/O be/O the/O same/O./O For/O us/O,/O for/O you/O and/O for/O me/O,/O there/O is/O
only/O one/O thing/O that/O matters/O,/O whether/O we/O love/O each/O other/O./O Other/O people/O we/O
need/O not/O consider/O./O Why/O are/O we/O living/O here/O apart/O and/O not/O seeing/O each/O
other/O?/O Why/O ca/On't/O I/O go/O?/O I/O love/O you/O,/O and/O I/O do/On't/O care/O for/O anything/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O in/O Russian/O,/O glancing/O at/O him/O with/O a/O peculiar/O gleam/O in/O her/O eyes/O that/O
he/O could/O not/O understand/O./O ``/OIf/O you/O have/O not/O changed/O to/O me/O,/O why/O do/On't/O you/O
look/O at/O me/O?/O''/O

He/O looked/O at/O her/O./O He/O saw/O all/O the/O beauty/O of/O her/O face/O and/O full/O dress/O,/O
always/O so/O becoming/O to/O her/O./O But/O now/O her/O beauty/O and/O elegance/O were/O just/O
what/O irritated/O him/O./O

``/OMy/O feeling/O can/Onot/O change/O,/O you/O know/O,/O but/O I/O beg/O you/O,/O I/O entreat/O you/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O again/O in/O French/O,/O with/O a/O note/O of/O tender/O supplication/O in/O his/O voice/O,/O
but/O with/O coldness/O in/O his/O eyes/O./O

She/O did/O not/O hear/O his/O words/O,/O but/O she/O saw/O the/O coldness/O of/O his/O eyes/O,/O and/O
answered/O with/O irritation/O:/O

``/OAnd/O I/O beg/O you/O to/O explain/O why/O I/O should/O not/O go/O./O''/O

``/OBecause/O it/O might/O cause/O you/O.../O''/O he/O hesitated/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O understand/O./O Yashvin/PERSON _/On'est/O pas/O compromettant/O_/O,/O and/O Princess/O
Varvara/PERSON is/O no/O worse/O than/O others/O./O Oh/O,/O here/O she/O is/O!/O''/O



Chapter/O 33/O


Vronsky/O for/O the/O first/O time/O experienced/O a/O feeling/O of/O anger/O against/O Anna/PERSON,/O
almost/O a/O hatred/O for/O her/O willfully/O refusing/O to/O understand/O her/O own/O
position/O./O This/O feeling/O was/O aggravated/O by/O his/O being/O unable/O to/O tell/O her/O
plainly/O the/O cause/O of/O his/O anger/O./O If/O he/O had/O told/O her/O directly/O what/O he/O was/O
thinking/O,/O he/O would/O have/O said/O:/O

``/OIn/O that/O dress/O,/O with/O a/O princess/O only/O too/O well/O known/O to/O everyone/O,/O to/O show/O
yourself/O at/O the/O theater/O is/O equivalent/O not/O merely/O to/O acknowledging/O your/O
position/O as/O a/O fallen/O woman/O,/O but/O is/O flinging/O down/O a/O challenge/O to/O society/O,/O
that/O is/O to/O say/O,/O cutting/O yourself/O off/O from/O it/O forever/O./O''/O

He/O could/O not/O say/O that/O to/O her/O./O ``/OBut/O how/O can/O she/O fail/O to/O see/O it/O,/O and/O what/O
is/O going/O on/O in/O her/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O./O He/O felt/O at/O the/O same/O time/O that/O
his/O respect/O for/O her/O was/O diminished/O while/O his/O sense/O of/O her/O beauty/O was/O
intensified/O./O

He/O went/O back/O scowling/O to/O his/O rooms/O,/O and/O sitting/O down/O beside/O Yashvin/PERSON,/O
who/O,/O with/O his/O long/O legs/O stretched/O out/O on/O a/O chair/O,/O was/O drinking/O brandy/O
and/O seltzer/O water/O,/O he/O ordered/O a/O glass/O of/O the/O same/O for/O himself/O./O

``/OYou/O were/O talking/O of/O Lankovsky/PERSON's/O Powerful/O./O That/O's/O a/O fine/O horse/O,/O and/O I/O
would/O advise/O you/O to/O buy/O him/O,/O''/O said/O Yashvin/PERSON,/O glancing/O at/O his/O comrade/O's/O
gloomy/O face/O./O ``/OHis/O hind-quarters/O are/On't/O quite/O first-rate/O,/O but/O the/O legs/O
and/O head/O--/Oone/O could/On't/O wish/O for/O anything/O better/O./O''/O

``/OI/O think/O I/O will/O take/O him/O,/O''/O answered/O Vronsky/O./O

Their/O conversation/O about/O horses/O interested/O him/O,/O but/O he/O did/O not/O for/O an/O
instant/O forget/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O could/O not/O help/O listening/O to/O the/O sound/O of/O steps/O
in/O the/O corridor/O and/O looking/O at/O the/O clock/O on/O the/O chimney/O piece/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON gave/O orders/O to/O announce/O that/O she/O has/O gone/O to/O the/O
theater/O./O''/O

Yashvin/PERSON,/O tipping/O another/O glass/O of/O brandy/O into/O the/O bubbling/O water/O,/O drank/O
it/O and/O got/O up/O,/O buttoning/O his/O coat/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O let/O's/O go/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O faintly/O smiling/O under/O his/O mustache/O,/O and/O
showing/O by/O this/O smile/O that/O he/O knew/O the/O cause/O of/O Vronsky/O's/O gloominess/O,/O
and/O did/O not/O attach/O any/O significance/O to/O it/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O going/O,/O''/O Vronsky/O answered/O gloomily/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O must/O,/O I/O promised/O to/O./O Good-bye/O,/O then/O./O If/O you/O do/O,/O come/O to/O the/O
stalls/O;/O you/O can/O take/O Kruzin/PERSON's/O stall/O,/O''/O added/O Yashvin/PERSON as/O he/O went/O out/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O busy/O./O''/O

``/OA/O wife/O is/O a/O care/O,/O but/O it/O's/O worse/O when/O she/O's/O not/O a/O wife/O,/O''/O thought/O
Yashvin/PERSON,/O as/O he/O walked/O out/O of/O the/O hotel/O./O

Vronsky/O,/O left/O alone/O,/O got/O up/O from/O his/O chair/O and/O began/O pacing/O up/O and/O down/O
the/O room/O./O

``/OAnd/O what/O's/O today/O?/O The/O fourth/O night/O.../O./O Yegor/PERSON and/O his/O wife/O are/O there/O,/O
and/O my/O mother/O,/O most/O likely/O./O Of/O course/O all/O Petersburg/PERSON's/O there/O./O Now/O she/O's/O
gone/O in/O,/O taken/O off/O her/O cloak/O and/O come/O into/O the/O light/O./O Tushkevitch/O,/O
Yashvin/LOCATION,/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON,/O''/O he/O pictured/O them/O to/O himself/O.../O ``/OWhat/O about/O
me/O?/O Either/O that/O I/O'm/O frightened/O or/O have/O given/O up/O to/O Tushkevitch/LOCATION the/O right/O
to/O protect/O her/O?/O From/O every/O point/O of/O view/O--/Ostupid/O,/O stupid/O!/O.../O And/O why/O is/O
she/O putting/O me/O in/O such/O a/O position/O?/O''/O he/O said/O with/O a/O gesture/O of/O despair/O./O

With/O that/O gesture/O he/O knocked/O against/O the/O table/O,/O on/O which/O there/O was/O
standing/O the/O seltzer/O water/O and/O the/O decanter/O of/O brandy/O,/O and/O almost/O upset/O
it/O./O He/O tried/O to/O catch/O it/O,/O let/O it/O slip/O,/O and/O angrily/O kicked/O the/O table/O over/O
and/O rang/O./O

``/OIf/O you/O care/O to/O be/O in/O my/O service/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O valet/O who/O came/O in/O,/O
``/Oyou/O had/O better/O remember/O your/O duties/O./O This/O should/On't/O be/O here/O./O You/O ought/O
to/O have/O cleared/O away/O./O''/O

The/O valet/O,/O conscious/O of/O his/O own/O innocence/O,/O would/O have/O defended/O himself/O,/O
but/O glancing/O at/O his/O master/O,/O he/O saw/O from/O his/O face/O that/O the/O only/O thing/O to/O
do/O was/O to/O be/O silent/O,/O and/O hurriedly/O threading/O his/O way/O in/O and/O out/O,/O dropped/O
down/O on/O the/O carpet/O and/O began/O gathering/O up/O the/O whole/O and/O broken/O glasses/O
and/O bottles/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O not/O your/O duty/O;/O send/O the/O waiter/O to/O clear/O away/O,/O and/O get/O my/O dress/O
coat/O out/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O went/O into/O the/O theater/O at/O half-past/O eight/O./O The/O performance/O was/O in/O
full/O swing/O./O The/O little/O old/O box-keeper/O,/O recognizing/O Vronsky/PERSON as/O he/O helped/O
him/O off/O with/O his/O fur/O coat/O,/O called/O him/O ``/OYour/O Excellency/O,/O''/O and/O suggested/O
he/O should/O not/O take/O a/O number/O but/O should/O simply/O call/O Fyodor/PERSON./O In/O the/O
brightly/O lighted/O corridor/O there/O was/O no/O one/O but/O the/O box-opener/O and/O two/O
attendants/O with/O fur/O cloaks/O on/O their/O arms/O listening/O at/O the/O doors/O./O Through/O
the/O closed/O doors/O came/O the/O sounds/O of/O the/O discreet/O _/Ostaccato/O_/O
accompaniment/O of/O the/O orchestra/O,/O and/O a/O single/O female/O voice/O rendering/O
distinctly/O a/O musical/O phrase/O./O The/O door/O opened/O to/O let/O the/O box-opener/O slip/O
through/O,/O and/O the/O phrase/O drawing/O to/O the/O end/O reached/O Vronsky/O's/O hearing/O
clearly/O./O But/O the/O doors/O were/O closed/O again/O at/O once/O,/O and/O Vronsky/PERSON did/O not/O
hear/O the/O end/O of/O the/O phrase/O and/O the/O cadence/O of/O the/O accompaniment/O,/O though/O
he/O knew/O from/O the/O thunder/O of/O applause/O that/O it/O was/O over/O./O When/O he/O entered/O
the/O hall/O,/O brilliantly/O lighted/O with/O chandeliers/O and/O gas/O jets/O,/O the/O noise/O
was/O still/O going/O on/O./O On/O the/O stage/O the/O singer/O,/O bowing/O and/O smiling/O,/O with/O
bare/O shoulders/O flashing/O with/O diamonds/O,/O was/O,/O with/O the/O help/O of/O the/O tenor/O
who/O had/O given/O her/O his/O arm/O,/O gathering/O up/O the/O bouquets/O that/O were/O flying/O
awkwardly/O over/O the/O footlights/O./O Then/O she/O went/O up/O to/O a/O gentleman/O with/O
glossy/O pomaded/O hair/O parted/O down/O the/O center/O,/O who/O was/O stretching/O across/O
the/O footlights/O holding/O out/O something/O to/O her/O,/O and/O all/O the/O public/O in/O the/O
stalls/O as/O well/O as/O in/O the/O boxes/O was/O in/O excitement/O,/O craning/O forward/O,/O
shouting/O and/O clapping/O./O The/O conductor/O in/O his/O high/O chair/O assisted/O in/O
passing/O the/O offering/O,/O and/O straightened/O his/O white/O tie/O./O Vronsky/O walked/O
into/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O stalls/O,/O and/O,/O standing/O still/O,/O began/O looking/O about/O
him/O./O That/O day/O less/O than/O ever/O was/O his/O attention/O turned/O upon/O the/O familiar/O,/O
habitual/O surroundings/O,/O the/O stage/O,/O the/O noise/O,/O all/O the/O familiar/O,/O
uninteresting/O,/O particolored/O herd/O of/O spectators/O in/O the/O packed/O theater/O./O

There/O were/O,/O as/O always/O,/O the/O same/O ladies/O of/O some/O sort/O with/O officers/O of/O
some/O sort/O in/O the/O back/O of/O the/O boxes/O;/O the/O same/O gaily/O dressed/O women/O--/OGod/O
knows/O who/O--/Oand/O uniforms/O and/O black/O coats/O;/O the/O same/O dirty/O crowd/O in/O the/O
upper/O gallery/O;/O and/O among/O the/O crowd/O,/O in/O the/O boxes/O and/O in/O the/O front/O rows/O,/O
were/O some/O forty/O of/O the/O _/Oreal/O_/O people/O./O And/O to/O those/O oases/O Vronsky/O at/O once/O
directed/O his/O attention/O,/O and/O with/O them/O he/O entered/O at/O once/O into/O relation/O./O

The/O act/O was/O over/O when/O he/O went/O in/O,/O and/O so/O he/O did/O not/O go/O straight/O to/O his/O
brother/O's/O box/O,/O but/O going/O up/O to/O the/O first/O row/O of/O stalls/O stopped/O at/O the/O
footlights/O with/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON,/O who/O,/O standing/O with/O one/O knee/O raised/O and/O his/O
heel/O on/O the/O footlights/O,/O caught/O sight/O of/O him/O in/O the/O distance/O and/O beckoned/O
to/O him/O,/O smiling/O./O

Vronsky/O had/O not/O yet/O seen/O Anna/PERSON./O He/O purposely/O avoided/O looking/O in/O her/O
direction/O./O But/O he/O knew/O by/O the/O direction/O of/O people/O's/O eyes/O where/O she/O was/O./O
He/O looked/O round/O discreetly/O,/O but/O he/O was/O not/O seeking/O her/O;/O expecting/O the/O
worst/O,/O his/O eyes/O sought/O for/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O To/O his/O relief/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O not/O in/O the/O theater/O that/O evening/O./O

``/OHow/O little/O of/O the/O military/O man/O there/O is/O left/O in/O you/O!/O''/O Serpuhovskoy/PERSON was/O
saying/O to/O him/O./O ``/OA/O diplomat/O,/O an/O artist/O,/O something/O of/O that/O sort/O,/O one/O would/O
say/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O was/O like/O going/O back/O home/O when/O I/O put/O on/O a/O black/O coat/O,/O''/O answered/O
Vronsky/O,/O smiling/O and/O slowly/O taking/O out/O his/O opera/O glass/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O'll/O own/O I/O envy/O you/O there/O./O When/O I/O come/O back/O from/O abroad/O and/O put/O
on/O this/O,/O''/O he/O touched/O his/O epaulets/O,/O ``/OI/O regret/O my/O freedom/O./O''/O

Serpuhovskoy/PERSON had/O long/O given/O up/O all/O hope/O of/O Vronsky/O's/O career/O,/O but/O he/O
liked/O him/O as/O before/O,/O and/O was/O now/O particularly/O cordial/O to/O him/O./O

``/OWhat/O a/O pity/O you/O were/O not/O in/O time/O for/O the/O first/O act/O!/O''/O

Vronsky/O,/O listening/O with/O one/O ear/O,/O moved/O his/O opera/O glass/O from/O the/O stalls/O
and/O scanned/O the/O boxes/O./O Near/O a/O lady/O in/O a/O turban/O and/O a/O bald/O old/O man/O,/O who/O
seemed/O to/O wave/O angrily/O in/O the/O moving/O opera/O glass/O,/O Vronsky/O suddenly/O
caught/O sight/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O head/O,/O proud/O,/O strikingly/O beautiful/O,/O and/O smiling/O in/O
the/O frame/O of/O lace/O./O She/O was/O in/O the/O fifth/O box/O,/O twenty/O paces/O from/O him/O./O She/O
was/O sitting/O in/O front/O,/O and/O slightly/O turning/O,/O was/O saying/O something/O to/O
Yashvin/PERSON./O The/O setting/O of/O her/O head/O on/O her/O handsome/O,/O broad/O shoulders/O,/O and/O
the/O restrained/O excitement/O and/O brilliance/O of/O her/O eyes/O and/O her/O whole/O face/O
reminded/O him/O of/O her/O just/O as/O he/O had/O seen/O her/O at/O the/O ball/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION./O But/O
he/O felt/O utterly/O different/O towards/O her/O beauty/O now/O./O In/O his/O feeling/O for/O her/O
now/O there/O was/O no/O element/O of/O mystery/O,/O and/O so/O her/O beauty/O,/O though/O it/O
attracted/O him/O even/O more/O intensely/O than/O before/O,/O gave/O him/O now/O a/O sense/O of/O
injury/O./O She/O was/O not/O looking/O in/O his/O direction/O,/O but/O Vronsky/PERSON felt/O that/O she/O
had/O seen/O him/O already/O./O

When/O Vronsky/PERSON turned/O the/O opera/O glass/O again/O in/O that/O direction/O,/O he/O noticed/O
that/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON was/O particularly/O red/O,/O and/O kept/O laughing/O
unnaturally/O and/O looking/O round/O at/O the/O next/O box/O./O Anna/PERSON,/O folding/O her/O fan/O and/O
tapping/O it/O on/O the/O red/O velvet/O,/O was/O gazing/O away/O and/O did/O not/O see/O,/O and/O
obviously/O did/O not/O wish/O to/O see/O,/O what/O was/O taking/O place/O in/O the/O next/O box/O./O
Yashvin/PERSON's/O face/O wore/O the/O expression/O which/O was/O common/O when/O he/O was/O losing/O
at/O cards/O./O Scowling/O,/O he/O sucked/O the/O left/O end/O of/O his/O mustache/O further/O and/O
further/O into/O his/O mouth/O,/O and/O cast/O sidelong/O glances/O at/O the/O next/O box/O./O

In/O that/O box/O on/O the/O left/O were/O the/O Kartasovs/O./O Vronsky/O knew/O them/O,/O and/O knew/O
that/O Anna/PERSON was/O acquainted/O with/O them/O./O Madame/PERSON Kartasova/PERSON,/O a/O thin/O little/O
woman/O,/O was/O standing/O up/O in/O her/O box/O,/O and/O,/O her/O back/O turned/O upon/O Anna/PERSON,/O she/O
was/O putting/O on/O a/O mantle/O that/O her/O husband/O was/O holding/O for/O her/O./O Her/O face/O
was/O pale/O and/O angry/O,/O and/O she/O was/O talking/O excitedly/O./O Kartasov/PERSON,/O a/O fat/O,/O bald/O
man/O,/O was/O continually/O looking/O round/O at/O Anna/PERSON,/O while/O he/O attempted/O to/O soothe/O
