his/O wife/O./O When/O the/O wife/O had/O gone/O out/O,/O the/O husband/O lingered/O a/O long/O while/O,/O
and/O tried/O to/O catch/O Anna/PERSON's/O eye/O,/O obviously/O anxious/O to/O bow/O to/O her/O./O But/O
Anna/PERSON,/O with/O unmistakable/O intention/O,/O avoided/O noticing/O him/O,/O and/O talked/O to/O
Yashvin/PERSON,/O whose/O cropped/O head/O was/O bent/O down/O to/O her/O./O Kartasov/PERSON went/O out/O
without/O making/O his/O salutation/O,/O and/O the/O box/O was/O left/O empty/O./O

Vronsky/O could/O not/O understand/O exactly/O what/O had/O passed/O between/O the/O
Kartasovs/LOCATION and/O Anna/PERSON,/O but/O he/O saw/O that/O something/O humiliating/O for/O Anna/PERSON had/O
happened/O./O He/O knew/O this/O both/O from/O what/O he/O had/O seen/O,/O and/O most/O of/O all/O from/O
the/O face/O of/O Anna/PERSON,/O who/O,/O he/O could/O see/O,/O was/O taxing/O every/O nerve/O to/O carry/O
through/O the/O part/O she/O had/O taken/O up/O./O And/O in/O maintaining/O this/O attitude/O of/O
external/O composure/O she/O was/O completely/O successful/O./O Anyone/O who/O did/O not/O
know/O her/O and/O her/O circle/O,/O who/O had/O not/O heard/O all/O the/O utterances/O of/O the/O
women/O expressive/O of/O commiseration/O,/O indignation/O,/O and/O amazement/O,/O that/O she/O
should/O show/O herself/O in/O society/O,/O and/O show/O herself/O so/O conspicuously/O with/O
her/O lace/O and/O her/O beauty/O,/O would/O have/O admired/O the/O serenity/O and/O loveliness/O
of/O this/O woman/O without/O a/O suspicion/O that/O she/O was/O undergoing/O the/O sensations/O
of/O a/O man/O in/O the/O stocks/O./O

Knowing/O that/O something/O had/O happened/O,/O but/O not/O knowing/O precisely/O what/O,/O
Vronsky/PERSON felt/O a/O thrill/O of/O agonizing/O anxiety/O,/O and/O hoping/O to/O find/O out/O
something/O,/O he/O went/O towards/O his/O brother/O's/O box/O./O Purposely/O choosing/O the/O way/O
round/O furthest/O from/O Anna/PERSON's/O box/O,/O he/O jostled/O as/O he/O came/O out/O against/O the/O
colonel/O of/O his/O old/O regiment/O talking/O to/O two/O acquaintances/O./O Vronsky/O heard/O
the/O name/O of/O Madame/O Karenina/PERSON,/O and/O noticed/O how/O the/O colonel/O hastened/O to/O
address/O Vronsky/O loudly/O by/O name/O,/O with/O a/O meaning/O glance/O at/O his/O companions/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O Vronsky/O!/O When/O are/O you/O coming/O to/O the/O regiment/O?/O We/O ca/On't/O let/O you/O off/O
without/O a/O supper/O./O You/O're/O one/O of/O the/O old/O set/O,/O''/O said/O the/O colonel/O of/O his/O
regiment/O./O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O stop/O,/O awfully/O sorry/O,/O another/O time/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O and/O he/O ran/O
upstairs/O towards/O his/O brother/O's/O box/O./O

The/O old/O countess/O,/O Vronsky/O's/O mother/O,/O with/O her/O steel-gray/O curls/O,/O was/O in/O
his/O brother/O's/O box/O./O Varya/O with/O the/O young/O Princess/O Sorokina/PERSON met/O him/O in/O the/O
corridor/O./O

Leaving/O the/O Princess/O Sorokina/PERSON with/O her/O mother/O,/O Varya/PERSON held/O out/O her/O hand/O
to/O her/O brother-in-law/O,/O and/O began/O immediately/O to/O speak/O of/O what/O interested/O
him/O./O She/O was/O more/O excited/O than/O he/O had/O ever/O seen/O her/O./O

``/OI/O think/O it/O's/O mean/O and/O hateful/O,/O and/O Madame/PERSON Kartasova/PERSON had/O no/O right/O to/O do/O
it/O./O Madame/O Karenina/PERSON.../O''/O she/O began/O./O

``/OBut/O what/O is/O it/O?/O I/O do/On't/O know/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O?/O you/O've/O not/O heard/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O know/O I/O should/O be/O the/O last/O person/O to/O hear/O of/O it/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O is/On't/O a/O more/O spiteful/O creature/O than/O that/O Madame/O Kartasova/O!/O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O did/O she/O do/O?/O''/O

``/OMy/O husband/O told/O me/O.../O./O She/O has/O insulted/O Madame/PERSON Karenina/PERSON./O Her/O husband/O
began/O talking/O to/O her/O across/O the/O box/O,/O and/O Madame/PERSON Kartasova/PERSON made/O a/O scene/O./O
She/O said/O something/O aloud/O,/O he/O says/O,/O something/O insulting/O,/O and/O went/O away/O./O''/O

``/OCount/O,/O your/O maman/O is/O asking/O for/O you/O,/O''/O said/O the/O young/O Princess/PERSON Sorokina/PERSON,/O
peeping/O out/O of/O the/O door/O of/O the/O box/O./O

``/OI/O've/O been/O expecting/O you/O all/O the/O while/O,/O''/O said/O his/O mother/O,/O smiling/O
sarcastically/O./O ``/OYou/O were/O nowhere/O to/O be/O seen/O./O''/O

Her/O son/O saw/O that/O she/O could/O not/O suppress/O a/O smile/O of/O delight/O./O

``/OGood/O evening/O,/O maman/O./O I/O have/O come/O to/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O coldly/O./O

``/OWhy/O are/On't/O you/O going/O to/O _/Ofaire/O la/O cour/O à/O Madame/O Karenina/PERSON?/O_/O''/O she/O went/O
on/O,/O when/O Princess/O Sorokina/PERSON had/O moved/O away/O./O ''/O_/OElle/PERSON fait/O sensation/O./O On/O
oublie/O la/O Patti/PERSON pour/O elle/O_/O./O''/O

``/OMaman/PERSON,/O I/O have/O asked/O you/O not/O to/O say/O anything/O to/O me/O of/O that/O,/O''/O he/O
answered/O,/O scowling/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O only/O saying/O what/O everyone/O's/O saying/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O made/O no/O reply/O,/O and/O saying/O a/O few/O words/O to/O Princess/O Sorokina/PERSON,/O he/O
went/O away/O./O At/O the/O door/O he/O met/O his/O brother/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O Alexey/PERSON!/O''/O said/O his/O brother/O./O ``/OHow/O disgusting/O!/O Idiot/O of/O a/O woman/O,/O
nothing/O else/O.../O./O I/O wanted/O to/O go/O straight/O to/O her/O./O Let/O's/O go/O together/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O did/O not/O hear/O him/O./O With/O rapid/O steps/O he/O went/O downstairs/O;/O he/O felt/O
that/O he/O must/O do/O something/O,/O but/O he/O did/O not/O know/O what/O./O Anger/O with/O her/O for/O
having/O put/O herself/O and/O him/O in/O such/O a/O false/O position/O,/O together/O with/O pity/O
for/O her/O suffering/O,/O filled/O his/O heart/O./O He/O went/O down/O,/O and/O made/O straight/O for/O
Anna/PERSON's/O box/O./O At/O her/O box/O stood/O Stremov/PERSON,/O talking/O to/O her/O./O

``/OThere/O are/O no/O more/O tenors/O./O _/OLe/O moule/O en/O est/O brisé/O!/O_/O''/O

Vronsky/PERSON bowed/O to/O her/O and/O stopped/O to/O greet/O Stremov/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O came/O in/O late/O,/O I/O think/O,/O and/O have/O missed/O the/O best/O song/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON said/O to/O
Vronsky/O,/O glancing/O ironically/O,/O he/O thought/O,/O at/O him/O./O

``/OI/O am/O a/O poor/O judge/O of/O music/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O sternly/O at/O her/O./O

``/OLike/O Prince/PERSON Yashvin/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O smiling/O,/O ``/Owho/O considers/O that/O Patti/PERSON sings/O
too/O loud/O./O''/O

``/OThank/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O her/O little/O hand/O in/O its/O long/O glove/O taking/O the/O
playbill/O Vronsky/O picked/O up/O,/O and/O suddenly/O at/O that/O instant/O her/O lovely/O face/O
quivered/O./O She/O got/O up/O and/O went/O into/O the/O interior/O of/O the/O box/O./O

Noticing/O in/O the/O next/O act/O that/O her/O box/O was/O empty/O,/O Vronsky/O,/O rousing/O
indignant/O ``/Ohushes/O''/O in/O the/O silent/O audience/O,/O went/O out/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O a/O
solo/O and/O drove/O home/O./O

Anna/PERSON was/O already/O at/O home/O./O When/O Vronsky/PERSON went/O up/O to/O her/O,/O she/O was/O in/O the/O
same/O dress/O as/O she/O had/O worn/O at/O the/O theater/O./O She/O was/O sitting/O in/O the/O first/O
armchair/O against/O the/O wall/O,/O looking/O straight/O before/O her/O./O She/O looked/O at/O
him/O,/O and/O at/O once/O resumed/O her/O former/O position/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OYou/O,/O you/O are/O to/O blame/O for/O everything/O!/O''/O she/O cried/O,/O with/O tears/O of/O despair/O
and/O hatred/O in/O her/O voice/O,/O getting/O up/O./O

``/OI/O begged/O,/O I/O implored/O you/O not/O to/O go/O,/O I/O knew/O it/O would/O be/O unpleasant/O.../O''/O

``/OUnpleasant/O!/O''/O she/O cried/O--/O``/Ohideous/O!/O As/O long/O as/O I/O live/O I/O shall/O never/O forget/O
it/O./O She/O said/O it/O was/O a/O disgrace/O to/O sit/O beside/O me/O./O''/O

``/OA/O silly/O woman/O's/O chatter/O,/O''/O he/O said/O:/O ``/Obut/O why/O risk/O it/O,/O why/O provoke/O?/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O hate/O your/O calm/O./O You/O ought/O not/O to/O have/O brought/O me/O to/O this/O./O If/O you/O had/O
loved/O me/O.../O''/O

``/OAnna/PERSON!/O How/O does/O the/O question/O of/O my/O love/O come/O in/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O if/O you/O loved/O me/O,/O as/O I/O love/O,/O if/O you/O were/O tortured/O as/O I/O am/O!/O.../O''/O she/O
said/O,/O looking/O at/O him/O with/O an/O expression/O of/O terror/O./O

He/O was/O sorry/O for/O her/O,/O and/O angry/O notwithstanding/O./O He/O assured/O her/O of/O his/O
love/O because/O he/O saw/O that/O this/O was/O the/O only/O means/O of/O soothing/O her/O,/O and/O he/O
did/O not/O reproach/O her/O in/O words/O,/O but/O in/O his/O heart/O he/O reproached/O her/O./O

And/O the/O asseverations/O of/O his/O love/O,/O which/O seemed/O to/O him/O so/O vulgar/O that/O he/O
was/O ashamed/O to/O utter/O them/O,/O she/O drank/O in/O eagerly/O,/O and/O gradually/O became/O
calmer/O./O The/O next/O day/O,/O completely/O reconciled/O,/O they/O left/O for/O the/O country/O./O




PART/O SIX/O



Chapter/O 1/O


Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON spent/O the/O summer/O with/O her/O children/O at/O Pokrovskoe/LOCATION,/O at/O
her/O sister/O Kitty/PERSON Levin/PERSON's/O./O The/O house/O on/O her/O own/O estate/O was/O quite/O in/O
ruins/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON and/O his/O wife/O had/O persuaded/O her/O to/O spend/O the/O summer/O with/O
them/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON greatly/O approved/O of/O the/O arrangement/O./O He/O said/O
he/O was/O very/O sorry/O his/O official/O duties/O prevented/O him/O from/O spending/O the/O
summer/O in/O the/O country/O with/O his/O family/O,/O which/O would/O have/O been/O the/O
greatest/O happiness/O for/O him/O;/O and/O remaining/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O he/O came/O down/O to/O the/O
country/O from/O time/O to/O time/O for/O a/O day/O or/O two/O./O Besides/O the/O Oblonskys/O,/O with/O
all/O their/O children/O and/O their/O governess/O,/O the/O old/O princess/O too/O came/O to/O
stay/O that/O summer/O with/O the/O Levins/PERSON,/O as/O she/O considered/O it/O her/O duty/O to/O watch/O
over/O her/O inexperienced/O daughter/O in/O her/O _/Ointeresting/O condition/O_/O./O
Moreover/O,/O Varenka/LOCATION,/O Kitty/PERSON's/O friend/O abroad/O,/O kept/O her/O promise/O to/O come/O to/O
Kitty/PERSON when/O she/O was/O married/O,/O and/O stayed/O with/O her/O friend/O./O All/O of/O these/O
were/O friends/O or/O relations/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O wife/O./O And/O though/O he/O liked/O them/O all/O,/O
he/O rather/O regretted/O his/O own/O Levin/PERSON world/O and/O ways/O,/O which/O was/O smothered/O by/O
this/O influx/O of/O the/O ``/OShtcherbatsky/O element/O,/O''/O as/O he/O called/O it/O to/O himself/O./O
Of/O his/O own/O relations/O there/O stayed/O with/O him/O only/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O but/O
he/O too/O was/O a/O man/O of/O the/O Koznishev/O and/O not/O the/O Levin/PERSON stamp/O,/O so/O that/O the/O
Levin/PERSON spirit/O was/O utterly/O obliterated/O./O

In/O the/O Levins/O'/O house/O,/O so/O long/O deserted/O,/O there/O were/O now/O so/O many/O people/O
that/O almost/O all/O the/O rooms/O were/O occupied/O,/O and/O almost/O every/O day/O it/O
happened/O that/O the/O old/O princess/O,/O sitting/O down/O to/O table/O,/O counted/O them/O all/O
over/O,/O and/O put/O the/O thirteenth/O grandson/O or/O granddaughter/O at/O a/O separate/O
table/O./O And/O Kitty/PERSON,/O with/O her/O careful/O housekeeping/O,/O had/O no/O little/O trouble/O
to/O get/O all/O the/O chickens/O,/O turkeys/O,/O and/O geese/O,/O of/O which/O so/O many/O were/O
needed/O to/O satisfy/O the/O summer/O appetites/O of/O the/O visitors/O and/O children/O./O

The/O whole/O family/O were/O sitting/O at/O dinner/O./O Dolly/PERSON's/O children/O,/O with/O their/O
governess/O and/O Varenka/LOCATION,/O were/O making/O plans/O for/O going/O to/O look/O for/O
mushrooms/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O who/O was/O looked/O up/O to/O by/O all/O the/O party/O for/O
his/O intellect/O and/O learning/O,/O with/O a/O respect/O that/O almost/O amounted/O to/O awe/O,/O
surprised/O everyone/O by/O joining/O in/O the/O conversation/O about/O mushrooms/O./O

``/OTake/O me/O with/O you/O./O I/O am/O very/O fond/O of/O picking/O mushrooms/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
looking/O at/O Varenka/LOCATION;/O ``/OI/O think/O it/O's/O a/O very/O nice/O occupation/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O we/O shall/O be/O delighted/O,/O''/O answered/O Varenka/PERSON,/O coloring/O a/O little/O./O Kitty/PERSON
exchanged/O meaningful/O glances/O with/O Dolly/PERSON./O The/O proposal/O of/O the/O learned/O and/O
intellectual/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON to/O go/O looking/O for/O mushrooms/O with/O Varenka/PERSON
confirmed/O certain/O theories/O of/O Kitty/PERSON's/O with/O which/O her/O mind/O had/O been/O very/O
busy/O of/O late/O./O She/O made/O haste/O to/O address/O some/O remark/O to/O her/O mother/O,/O so/O
that/O her/O look/O should/O not/O be/O noticed/O./O After/O dinner/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON sat/O
with/O his/O cup/O of/O coffee/O at/O the/O drawing-room/O window/O,/O and/O while/O he/O took/O
part/O in/O a/O conversation/O he/O had/O begun/O with/O his/O brother/O,/O he/O watched/O the/O
door/O through/O which/O the/O children/O would/O start/O on/O the/O mushroom-picking/O
expedition/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O sitting/O in/O the/O window/O near/O his/O brother/O./O

Kitty/PERSON stood/O beside/O her/O husband/O,/O evidently/O awaiting/O the/O end/O of/O a/O
conversation/O that/O had/O no/O interest/O for/O her/O,/O in/O order/O to/O tell/O him/O
something/O./O

``/OYou/O have/O changed/O in/O many/O respects/O since/O your/O marriage/O,/O and/O for/O the/O
better/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O to/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O obviously/O little/O
interested/O in/O the/O conversation/O,/O ``/Obut/O you/O have/O remained/O true/O to/O your/O
passion/O for/O defending/O the/O most/O paradoxical/O theories/O./O''/O

``/OKatya/PERSON,/O it/O's/O not/O good/O for/O you/O to/O stand/O,/O''/O her/O husband/O said/O to/O her/O,/O
putting/O a/O chair/O for/O her/O and/O looking/O significantly/O at/O her/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O and/O there/O's/O no/O time/O either/O,/O''/O added/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O seeing/O the/O
children/O running/O out/O./O

At/O the/O head/O of/O them/O all/O Tanya/PERSON galloped/O sideways/O,/O in/O her/O tightly-drawn/O
stockings/O,/O and/O waving/O a/O basket/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O hat/O,/O she/O ran/O
straight/O up/O to/O him/O./O

Boldly/O running/O up/O to/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON with/O shining/O eyes/O,/O so/O like/O her/O
father/O's/O fine/O eyes/O,/O she/O handed/O him/O his/O hat/O and/O made/O as/O though/O she/O would/O
put/O it/O on/O for/O him/O,/O softening/O her/O freedom/O by/O a/O shy/O and/O friendly/O smile/O./O

``/OVarenka/O's/O waiting/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O carefully/O putting/O his/O hat/O on/O,/O seeing/O from/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O smile/O that/O she/O might/O do/O so/O./O

Varenka/PERSON was/O standing/O at/O the/O door/O,/O dressed/O in/O a/O yellow/O print/O gown/O,/O with/O a/O
white/O kerchief/O on/O her/O head/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O coming/O,/O I/O'm/O coming/O,/O Varvara/PERSON Andreevna/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O
finishing/O his/O cup/O of/O coffee/O,/O and/O putting/O into/O their/O separate/O pockets/O his/O
handkerchief/O and/O cigar-case/O./O

``/OAnd/O how/O sweet/O my/O Varenka/O is/O!/O eh/O?/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON to/O her/O husband/O,/O as/O soon/O as/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON rose/O./O She/O spoke/O so/O that/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON could/O hear/O,/O
and/O it/O was/O clear/O that/O she/O meant/O him/O to/O do/O so/O./O ``/OAnd/O how/O good-looking/O she/O
is/O--/Osuch/O a/O refined/O beauty/O!/O Varenka/O!/O''/O Kitty/PERSON shouted/O./O ``/OShall/O you/O be/O in/O the/O
mill/O copse/O?/O We/O'll/O come/O out/O to/O you/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O certainly/O forget/O your/O condition/O,/O Kitty/PERSON,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O princess/O,/O
hurriedly/O coming/O out/O at/O the/O door/O./O ``/OYou/O must/On't/O shout/O like/O that/O./O''/O

Varenka/PERSON,/O hearing/O Kitty/PERSON's/O voice/O and/O her/O mother/O's/O reprimand/O,/O went/O with/O
light/O,/O rapid/O steps/O up/O to/O Kitty/PERSON./O The/O rapidity/O of/O her/O movement/O,/O her/O
flushed/O and/O eager/O face/O,/O everything/O betrayed/O that/O something/O out/O of/O the/O
common/O was/O going/O on/O in/O her/O./O Kitty/PERSON knew/O what/O this/O was/O,/O and/O had/O been/O
watching/O her/O intently/O./O She/O called/O Varenka/PERSON at/O that/O moment/O merely/O in/O order/O
mentally/O to/O give/O her/O a/O blessing/O for/O the/O important/O event/O which/O,/O as/O Kitty/PERSON
fancied/O,/O was/O bound/O to/O come/O to/O pass/O that/O day/O after/O dinner/O in/O the/O wood/O./O

``/OVarenka/O,/O I/O should/O be/O very/O happy/O if/O a/O certain/O something/O were/O to/O happen/O,/O''/O
she/O whispered/O as/O she/O kissed/O her/O./O

``/OAnd/O are/O you/O coming/O with/O us/O?/O''/O Varenka/PERSON said/O to/O Levin/PERSON in/O confusion/O,/O
pretending/O not/O to/O have/O heard/O what/O had/O been/O said/O./O

``/OI/O am/O coming/O,/O but/O only/O as/O far/O as/O the/O threshing-floor/O,/O and/O there/O I/O shall/O
stop/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O what/O do/O you/O want/O there/O?/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OI/O must/O go/O to/O have/O a/O look/O at/O the/O new/O wagons/O,/O and/O to/O check/O the/O invoice/O,/O''/O
said/O Levin/PERSON;/O ``/Oand/O where/O will/O you/O be/O?/O''/O

``/OOn/O the/O terrace/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 2/O


On/O the/O terrace/O were/O assembled/O all/O the/O ladies/O of/O the/O party/O./O They/O always/O
liked/O sitting/O there/O after/O dinner/O,/O and/O that/O day/O they/O had/O work/O to/O do/O there/O
too/O./O Besides/O the/O sewing/O and/O knitting/O of/O baby/O clothes/O,/O with/O which/O all/O of/O
them/O were/O busy/O,/O that/O afternoon/O jam/O was/O being/O made/O on/O the/O terrace/O by/O a/O
method/O new/O to/O Agafea/LOCATION Mihalovna/LOCATION,/O without/O the/O addition/O of/O water/O./O Kitty/PERSON had/O
introduced/O this/O new/O method/O,/O which/O had/O been/O in/O use/O in/O her/O home/O./O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON,/O to/O whom/O the/O task/O of/O jam-making/O had/O always/O been/O intrusted/O,/O
considering/O that/O what/O had/O been/O done/O in/O the/O Levin/PERSON household/O could/O not/O be/O
amiss/O,/O had/O nevertheless/O put/O water/O with/O the/O strawberries/O,/O maintaining/O
that/O the/O jam/O could/O not/O be/O made/O without/O it/O./O She/O had/O been/O caught/O in/O the/O
act/O,/O and/O was/O now/O making/O jam/O before/O everyone/O,/O and/O it/O was/O to/O be/O proved/O to/O
her/O conclusively/O that/O jam/O could/O be/O very/O well/O made/O without/O water/O./O

Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O her/O face/O heated/O and/O angry/O,/O her/O hair/O untidy/O,/O and/O her/O
thin/O arms/O bare/O to/O the/O elbows/O,/O was/O turning/O the/O preserving-pan/O over/O the/O
charcoal/O stove/O,/O looking/O darkly/O at/O the/O raspberries/O and/O devoutly/O hoping/O
they/O would/O stick/O and/O not/O cook/O properly/O./O The/O princess/O,/O conscious/O that/O
Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON's/O wrath/O must/O be/O chiefly/O directed/O against/O her/O,/O as/O the/O
person/O responsible/O for/O the/O raspberry/O jam-making/O,/O tried/O to/O appear/O to/O be/O
absorbed/O in/O other/O things/O and/O not/O interested/O in/O the/O jam/O,/O talked/O of/O other/O
matters/O,/O but/O cast/O stealthy/O glances/O in/O the/O direction/O of/O the/O stove/O./O

``/OI/O always/O buy/O my/O maids/O'/O dresses/O myself/O,/O of/O some/O cheap/O material/O,/O''/O the/O
princess/O said/O,/O continuing/O the/O previous/O conversation/O./O ``/OIs/On't/O it/O time/O to/O
skim/O it/O,/O my/O dear/O?/O''/O she/O added/O,/O addressing/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON./O ``/OThere/O's/O not/O
the/O slightest/O need/O for/O you/O to/O do/O it/O,/O and/O it/O's/O hot/O for/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
stopping/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OI/O'll/O do/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O and/O getting/O up/O,/O she/O carefully/O passed/O the/O spoon/O
over/O the/O frothing/O sugar/O,/O and/O from/O time/O to/O time/O shook/O off/O the/O clinging/O
jam/O from/O the/O spoon/O by/O knocking/O it/O on/O a/O plate/O that/O was/O covered/O with/O
yellow-red/O scum/O and/O blood-colored/O syrup/O./O ``/OHow/O they/O'll/O enjoy/O this/O at/O
tea-time/O!/O''/O she/O thought/O of/O her/O children/O,/O remembering/O how/O she/O herself/O as/O a/O
child/O had/O wondered/O how/O it/O was/O the/O grown-up/O people/O did/O not/O eat/O what/O was/O
best/O of/O all/O--/Othe/O scum/O of/O the/O jam/O./O

``/OStiva/PERSON says/O it/O's/O much/O better/O to/O give/O money/O./O''/O Dolly/PERSON took/O up/O meanwhile/O the/O
weighty/O subject/O under/O discussion/O,/O what/O presents/O should/O be/O made/O to/O
servants/O./O ``/OBut/O.../O''/O

``/OMoney/O's/O out/O of/O the/O question/O!/O''/O the/O princess/O and/O Kitty/PERSON exclaimed/O with/O one/O
voice/O./O ``/OThey/O appreciate/O a/O present/O.../O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O last/O year/O,/O for/O instance/O,/O I/O bought/O our/O Matrona/PERSON Semyenovna/PERSON,/O not/O a/O
poplin/O,/O but/O something/O of/O that/O sort/O,/O''/O said/O the/O princess/O./O

``/OI/O remember/O she/O was/O wearing/O it/O on/O your/O nameday/O./O''/O

``/OA/O charming/O pattern/O--/Oso/O simple/O and/O refined/O,/O--/OI/O should/O have/O liked/O it/O
myself/O,/O if/O she/O had/On't/O had/O it/O./O Something/O like/O Varenka/PERSON's/O./O So/O pretty/O and/O
inexpensive/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O now/O I/O think/O it/O's/O done/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O dropping/O the/O syrup/O from/O the/O
spoon/O./O

``/OWhen/O it/O sets/O as/O it/O drops/O,/O it/O's/O ready/O./O Cook/PERSON it/O a/O little/O longer/O,/O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON./O''/O

``/OThe/O flies/O!/O''/O said/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON angrily/O./O ``/OIt/O'll/O be/O just/O the/O same/O,/O''/O
she/O added/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O how/O sweet/O it/O is/O!/O do/On't/O frighten/O it/O!/O''/O Kitty/PERSON said/O suddenly/O,/O looking/O
at/O a/O sparrow/O that/O had/O settled/O on/O the/O step/O and/O was/O pecking/O at/O the/O center/O
of/O a/O raspberry/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O you/O keep/O a/O little/O further/O from/O the/O stove/O,/O''/O said/O her/O mother/O./O

''/O_/OÀ/O propos/O de/O Varenka/O_/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O speaking/O in/O French/O,/O as/O they/O had/O
been/O doing/O all/O the/O while/O,/O so/O that/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON should/O not/O understand/O
them/O,/O ``/Oyou/O know/O,/O mamma/O,/O I/O somehow/O expect/O things/O to/O be/O settled/O today/O./O You/O
know/O what/O I/O mean/O./O How/O splendid/O it/O would/O be/O!/O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O a/O famous/O matchmaker/O she/O is/O!/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OHow/O carefully/O and/O
cleverly/O she/O throws/O them/O together/O!/O.../O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O tell/O me/O,/O mamma/O,/O what/O do/O you/O think/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O what/O is/O one/O to/O think/O?/O He/O''/O -LRB-/O_/Ohe/O_/O meant/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON-RRB-/O ``/Omight/O at/O
any/O time/O have/O been/O a/O match/O for/O anyone/O in/O Russia/LOCATION;/O now/O,/O of/O course/O,/O he/O's/O
not/O quite/O a/O young/O man/O,/O still/O I/O know/O ever/O so/O many/O girls/O would/O be/O glad/O to/O
marry/O him/O even/O now/O.../O./O She/O's/O a/O very/O nice/O girl/O,/O but/O he/O might/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O mamma/O,/O do/O understand/O why/O,/O for/O him/O and/O for/O her/O too/O,/O nothing/O
better/O could/O be/O imagined/O./O In/O the/O first/O place/O,/O she/O's/O charming/O!/O''/O said/O
Kitty/PERSON,/O crooking/O one/O of/O her/O fingers/O./O

``/OHe/O thinks/O her/O very/O attractive/O,/O that/O's/O certain/O,/O''/O assented/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OThen/O he/O occupies/O such/O a/O position/O in/O society/O that/O he/O has/O no/O need/O to/O look/O
for/O either/O fortune/O or/O position/O in/O his/O wife/O./O All/O he/O needs/O is/O a/O good/O,/O
sweet/O wife/O--/Oa/O restful/O one/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O with/O her/O he/O would/O certainly/O be/O restful/O,/O''/O Dolly/PERSON assented/O./O

``/OThirdly/O,/O that/O she/O should/O love/O him/O./O And/O so/O it/O is/O .../O that/O is/O,/O it/O would/O
be/O so/O splendid/O!/O.../O I/O look/O forward/O to/O seeing/O them/O coming/O out/O of/O the/O
forest/O--/Oand/O everything/O settled/O./O I/O shall/O see/O at/O once/O by/O their/O eyes/O./O I/O
should/O be/O so/O delighted/O!/O What/O do/O you/O think/O,/O Dolly/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OBut/O do/On't/O excite/O yourself/O./O It/O's/O not/O at/O all/O the/O thing/O for/O you/O to/O be/O
excited/O,/O''/O said/O her/O mother/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O excited/O,/O mamma/O./O I/O fancy/O he/O will/O make/O her/O an/O offer/O today/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O that/O's/O so/O strange/O,/O how/O and/O when/O a/O man/O makes/O an/O offer/O!/O.../O There/O is/O a/O
sort/O of/O barrier/O,/O and/O all/O at/O once/O it/O's/O broken/O down/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O smiling/O
pensively/O and/O recalling/O her/O past/O with/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OMamma/O,/O how/O did/O papa/O make/O you/O an/O offer/O?/O''/O Kitty/PERSON asked/O suddenly/O./O

``/OThere/O was/O nothing/O out/O of/O the/O way/O,/O it/O was/O very/O simple/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O
princess/O,/O but/O her/O face/O beamed/O all/O over/O at/O the/O recollection/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O but/O how/O was/O it/O?/O You/O loved/O him/O,/O anyway/O,/O before/O you/O were/O allowed/O to/O
speak/O?/O''/O

Kitty/PERSON felt/O a/O peculiar/O pleasure/O in/O being/O able/O now/O to/O talk/O to/O her/O mother/O
on/O equal/O terms/O about/O those/O questions/O of/O such/O paramount/O interest/O in/O a/O
woman/O's/O life/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O I/O did/O;/O he/O had/O come/O to/O stay/O with/O us/O in/O the/O country/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O how/O was/O it/O settled/O between/O you/O,/O mamma/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O imagine/O,/O I/O dare/O say/O,/O that/O you/O invented/O something/O quite/O new/O?/O It/O's/O
always/O just/O the/O same/O:/O it/O was/O settled/O by/O the/O eyes/O,/O by/O smiles/O.../O''/O

``/OHow/O nicely/O you/O said/O that/O,/O mamma/O!/O It/O's/O just/O by/O the/O eyes/O,/O by/O smiles/O that/O
it/O's/O done/O,/O''/O Dolly/PERSON assented/O./O

``/OBut/O what/O words/O did/O he/O say/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O did/O Kostya/PERSON say/O to/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OHe/O wrote/O it/O in/O chalk/O./O It/O was/O wonderful/O.../O./O How/O long/O ago/O it/O seems/O!/O''/O she/O
said/O./O

And/O the/O three/O women/O all/O fell/O to/O musing/O on/O the/O same/O thing/O./O Kitty/PERSON was/O the/O
first/O to/O break/O the/O silence/O./O She/O remembered/O all/O that/O last/O winter/O before/O
her/O marriage/O,/O and/O her/O passion/O for/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OThere/O's/O one/O thing/O .../O that/O old/O love/O affair/O of/O Varenka/PERSON's/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O a/O
natural/O chain/O of/O ideas/O bringing/O her/O to/O this/O point/O./O ``/OI/O should/O have/O liked/O
to/O say/O something/O to/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O to/O prepare/O him/O./O They/O're/O all/O--/Oall/O
men/O,/O I/O mean/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O ``/Oawfully/O jealous/O over/O our/O past/O./O''/O

``/ONot/O all/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OYou/O judge/O by/O your/O own/O husband/O./O It/O makes/O him/O
miserable/O even/O now/O to/O remember/O Vronsky/O./O Eh/O?/O that/O's/O true/O,/O is/On't/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O Kitty/PERSON answered/O,/O a/O pensive/O smile/O in/O her/O eyes/O./O

``/OBut/O I/O really/O do/On't/O know/O,/O''/O the/O mother/O put/O in/O in/O defense/O of/O her/O motherly/O
care/O of/O her/O daughter/O,/O ``/Owhat/O there/O was/O in/O your/O past/O that/O could/O worry/O him/O?/O
That/O Vronsky/O paid/O you/O attentions/O--/Othat/O happens/O to/O every/O girl/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O but/O we/O did/On't/O mean/O that/O,/O''/O Kitty/PERSON said/O,/O flushing/O a/O little/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O let/O me/O speak/O,/O''/O her/O mother/O went/O on/O,/O ``/Owhy/O,/O you/O yourself/O would/O not/O let/O
me/O have/O a/O talk/O to/O Vronsky/O./O Do/On't/O you/O remember/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O mamma/O!/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O with/O an/O expression/O of/O suffering/O./O

``/OThere/O's/O no/O keeping/O you/O young/O people/O in/O check/O nowadays/O.../O./O Your/O
friendship/O could/O not/O have/O gone/O beyond/O what/O was/O suitable/O./O I/O should/O myself/O
have/O called/O upon/O him/O to/O explain/O himself/O./O But/O,/O my/O darling/O,/O it/O's/O not/O right/O
for/O you/O to/O be/O agitated/O./O Please/O remember/O that/O,/O and/O calm/O yourself/O./O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O perfectly/O calm/O,/O maman/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O happy/O it/O was/O for/O Kitty/PERSON that/O Anna/PERSON came/O then/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O ``/Oand/O how/O
unhappy/O for/O her/O./O It/O turned/O out/O quite/O the/O opposite/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O struck/O by/O
her/O own/O ideas/O./O ``/OThen/O Anna/PERSON was/O so/O happy/O,/O and/O Kitty/PERSON thought/O herself/O
unhappy/O./O Now/O it/O is/O just/O the/O opposite/O./O I/O often/O think/O of/O her/O./O''/O

``/OA/O nice/O person/O to/O think/O about/O!/O Horrid/O,/O repulsive/O woman/O--/Ono/O heart/O,/O''/O said/O
her/O mother/O,/O who/O could/O not/O forget/O that/O Kitty/PERSON had/O married/O not/O Vronsky/O,/O but/O
Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O want/O to/O talk/O of/O it/O for/O?/O''/O Kitty/PERSON said/O with/O annoyance/O./O ``/OI/O
never/O think/O about/O it/O,/O and/O I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O think/O of/O it/O.../O./O And/O I/O do/On't/O
want/O to/O think/O of/O it/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O catching/O the/O sound/O of/O her/O husband/O's/O
well-known/O step/O on/O the/O steps/O of/O the/O terrace/O./O

``/OWhat/O's/O that/O you/O do/On't/O want/O to/O think/O about/O?/O''/O inquired/O Levin/PERSON,/O coming/O onto/O
the/O terrace/O./O

But/O no/O one/O answered/O him/O,/O and/O he/O did/O not/O repeat/O the/O question/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O sorry/O I/O've/O broken/O in/O on/O your/O feminine/O parliament/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O
round/O on/O every/O one/O discontentedly/O,/O and/O perceiving/O that/O they/O had/O been/O
talking/O of/O something/O which/O they/O would/O not/O talk/O about/O before/O him/O./O

For/O a/O second/O he/O felt/O that/O he/O was/O sharing/O the/O feeling/O of/O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON,/O vexation/O at/O their/O making/O jam/O without/O water/O,/O and/O altogether/O at/O
the/O outside/O Shtcherbatsky/LOCATION element/O./O He/O smiled/O,/O however/O,/O and/O went/O up/O to/O
Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O are/O you/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O her/O,/O looking/O at/O her/O with/O the/O expression/O
with/O which/O everyone/O looked/O at/O her/O now/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O very/O well/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O smiling/O,/O ``/Oand/O how/O have/O things/O gone/O with/O
you/O?/O''/O

``/OThe/O wagons/O held/O three/O times/O as/O much/O as/O the/O old/O carts/O did/O./O Well/O,/O are/O we/O
going/O for/O the/O children/O?/O I/O've/O ordered/O the/O horses/O to/O be/O put/O in/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O!/O you/O want/O to/O take/O Kitty/PERSON in/O the/O wagonette/O?/O''/O her/O mother/O said/O
reproachfully/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O at/O a/O walking/O pace/O,/O princess/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON never/O called/O the/O princess/O ``/Omaman/O''/O as/O men/O often/O do/O call/O their/O
mothers-in-law/O,/O and/O the/O princess/O disliked/O his/O not/O doing/O so/O./O But/O though/O
he/O liked/O and/O respected/O the/O princess/O,/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O call/O her/O so/O without/O
a/O sense/O of/O profaning/O his/O feeling/O for/O his/O dead/O mother/O./O

``/OCome/O with/O us/O,/O maman/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O like/O to/O see/O such/O imprudence/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O'll/O walk/O then/O,/O I/O'm/O so/O well/O./O''/O Kitty/PERSON got/O up/O and/O went/O to/O her/O
husband/O and/O took/O his/O hand/O./O

``/OYou/O may/O be/O well/O,/O but/O everything/O in/O moderation/O,/O''/O said/O the/O princess/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O is/O the/O jam/O done/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O smiling/O to/O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON,/O and/O trying/O to/O cheer/O her/O up/O./O ``/OIs/O it/O all/O right/O in/O the/O new/O way/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O suppose/O it/O's/O all/O right/O./O For/O our/O notions/O it/O's/O boiled/O too/O long/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O'll/O be/O all/O the/O better/O,/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O it/O wo/On't/O mildew/O,/O even/O though/O
our/O ice/O has/O begun/O to/O thaw/O already/O,/O so/O that/O we/O've/O no/O cool/O cellar/O to/O store/O
it/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O at/O once/O divining/O her/O husband/O's/O motive/O,/O and/O addressing/O
the/O old/O housekeeper/O with/O the/O same/O feeling/O;/O ``/Obut/O your/O pickle/O's/O so/O good/O,/O
that/O mamma/O says/O she/O never/O tasted/O any/O like/O it/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O smiling/O,/O and/O
putting/O her/O kerchief/O straight/O./O

Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON looked/O angrily/O at/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O need/On't/O try/O to/O console/O me/O,/O mistress/O./O I/O need/O only/O to/O look/O at/O you/O
with/O him/O,/O and/O I/O feel/O happy/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O something/O in/O the/O rough/O
familiarity/O of/O that/O _/Owith/O him/O_/O touched/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OCome/O along/O with/O us/O to/O look/O for/O mushrooms/O,/O you/O will/O show/O us/O the/O best/O
places/O./O''/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON smiled/O and/O shook/O her/O head/O,/O as/O though/O to/O say/O:/O
``/OI/O should/O like/O to/O be/O angry/O with/O you/O too/O,/O but/O I/O ca/On't/O./O''/O

``/ODo/O it/O,/O please/O,/O by/O my/O receipt/O,/O''/O said/O the/O princess/O;/O ``/Oput/O some/O paper/O over/O
the/O jam/O,/O and/O moisten/O it/O with/O a/O little/O rum/O,/O and/O without/O even/O ice/O,/O it/O will/O
never/O go/O mildewy/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 3/O


Kitty/PERSON was/O particularly/O glad/O of/O a/O chance/O of/O being/O alone/O with/O her/O husband/O,/O
for/O she/O had/O noticed/O the/O shade/O of/O mortification/O that/O had/O passed/O over/O his/O
face/O--/Oalways/O so/O quick/O to/O reflect/O every/O feeling/O--/Oat/O the/O moment/O when/O he/O had/O
come/O onto/O the/O terrace/O and/O asked/O what/O they/O were/O talking/O of/O,/O and/O had/O got/O
no/O answer/O./O

When/O they/O had/O set/O off/O on/O foot/O ahead/O of/O the/O others/O,/O and/O had/O come/O out/O of/O
sight/O of/O the/O house/O onto/O the/O beaten/O dusty/O road/O,/O marked/O with/O rusty/O wheels/O
and/O sprinkled/O with/O grains/O of/O corn/O,/O she/O clung/O faster/O to/O his/O arm/O and/O
pressed/O it/O closer/O to/O her/O./O He/O had/O quite/O forgotten/O the/O momentary/O
unpleasant/O impression/O,/O and/O alone/O with/O her/O he/O felt/O,/O now/O that/O the/O thought/O
of/O her/O approaching/O motherhood/O was/O never/O for/O a/O moment/O absent/O from/O his/O
mind/O,/O a/O new/O and/O delicious/O bliss/O,/O quite/O pure/O from/O all/O alloy/O of/O sense/O,/O in/O
the/O being/O near/O to/O the/O woman/O he/O loved/O./O There/O was/O no/O need/O of/O speech/O,/O yet/O
he/O longed/O to/O hear/O the/O sound/O of/O her/O voice/O,/O which/O like/O her/O eyes/O had/O
changed/O since/O she/O had/O been/O with/O child/O./O In/O her/O voice/O,/O as/O in/O her/O eyes/O,/O
there/O was/O that/O softness/O and/O gravity/O which/O is/O found/O in/O people/O continually/O
concentrated/O on/O some/O cherished/O pursuit/O./O

``/OSo/O you/O're/O not/O tired/O?/O Lean/O more/O on/O me/O,/O''/O said/O he/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O so/O glad/O of/O a/O chance/O of/O being/O alone/O with/O you/O,/O and/O I/O must/O own/O,/O
though/O I/O'm/O happy/O with/O them/O,/O I/O do/O regret/O our/O winter/O evenings/O alone/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O was/O good/O,/O but/O this/O is/O even/O better/O./O Both/O are/O better/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
squeezing/O her/O hand/O./O

``/ODo/O you/O know/O what/O we/O were/O talking/O about/O when/O you/O came/O in/O?/O''/O

``/OAbout/O jam/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O about/O jam/O too/O;/O but/O afterwards/O,/O about/O how/O men/O make/O offers/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O listening/O more/O to/O the/O sound/O of/O her/O voice/O than/O to/O the/O
words/O she/O was/O saying/O,/O and/O all/O the/O while/O paying/O attention/O to/O the/O road/O,/O
which/O passed/O now/O through/O the/O forest/O,/O and/O avoiding/O places/O where/O she/O might/O
make/O a/O false/O step/O./O

``/OAnd/O about/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON and/O Varenka/LOCATION./O You/O've/O noticed/O?/O.../O I/O'm/O very/O
anxious/O for/O it/O,/O''/O she/O went/O on/O./O ``/OWhat/O do/O you/O think/O about/O it/O?/O''/O And/O she/O
peeped/O into/O his/O face/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O what/O to/O think/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON answered/O,/O smiling/O./O ``/OSergey/PERSON seems/O
very/O strange/O to/O me/O in/O that/O way/O./O I/O told/O you/O,/O you/O know/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O he/O was/O in/O love/O with/O that/O girl/O who/O died/O.../O''/O

``/OThat/O was/O when/O I/O was/O a/O child/O;/O I/O know/O about/O it/O from/O hearsay/O and/O
tradition/O./O I/O remember/O him/O then/O./O He/O was/O wonderfully/O sweet/O./O But/O I/O've/O
watched/O him/O since/O with/O women/O;/O he/O is/O friendly/O,/O some/O of/O them/O he/O likes/O,/O but/O
one/O feels/O that/O to/O him/O they/O're/O simply/O people/O,/O not/O women/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O now/O with/O Varenka/PERSON .../O I/O fancy/O there/O's/O something/O.../O''/O

``/OPerhaps/O there/O is/O.../O./O But/O one/O has/O to/O know/O him/O.../O./O He/O's/O a/O peculiar/O,/O
wonderful/O person/O./O He/O lives/O a/O spiritual/O life/O only/O./O He/O's/O too/O pure/O,/O too/O
exalted/O a/O nature/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O?/O Would/O this/O lower/O him/O,/O then/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O but/O he/O's/O so/O used/O to/O a/O spiritual/O life/O that/O he/O ca/On't/O reconcile/O
himself/O with/O actual/O fact/O,/O and/O Varenka/LOCATION is/O after/O all/O fact/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON had/O grown/O used/O by/O now/O to/O uttering/O his/O thought/O boldly/O,/O without/O
taking/O the/O trouble/O of/O clothing/O it/O in/O exact/O language/O./O He/O knew/O that/O his/O
wife/O,/O in/O such/O moments/O of/O loving/O tenderness/O as/O now/O,/O would/O understand/O what/O
he/O meant/O to/O say/O from/O a/O hint/O,/O and/O she/O did/O understand/O him/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O there/O's/O not/O so/O much/O of/O that/O actual/O fact/O about/O her/O as/O about/O me/O./O
I/O can/O see/O that/O he/O would/O never/O have/O cared/O for/O me/O./O She/O is/O altogether/O
spiritual/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O he/O is/O so/O fond/O of/O you/O,/O and/O I/O am/O always/O so/O glad/O when/O my/O people/O
like/O you/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O he/O's/O very/O nice/O to/O me/O;/O but/O.../O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O as/O it/O was/O with/O poor/O Nikolay/PERSON .../O you/O really/O cared/O for/O each/O
other/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON finished/O./O ``/OWhy/O not/O speak/O of/O him/O?/O''/O he/O added/O./O ``/OI/O sometimes/O
blame/O myself/O for/O not/O;/O it/O ends/O in/O one/O's/O forgetting/O./O Ah/O,/O how/O terrible/O and/O
dear/O he/O was/O!/O.../O Yes/O,/O what/O were/O we/O talking/O about/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O,/O after/O a/O
pause/O./O

``/OYou/O think/O he/O ca/On't/O fall/O in/O love/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O translating/O into/O her/O own/O
language/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O so/O much/O that/O he/O ca/On't/O fall/O in/O love/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O,/O smiling/O,/O ``/Obut/O
he/O has/O not/O the/O weakness/O necessary/O.../O./O I/O've/O always/O envied/O him/O,/O and/O even/O
now/O,/O when/O I/O'm/O so/O happy/O,/O I/O still/O envy/O him/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O envy/O him/O for/O not/O being/O able/O to/O fall/O in/O love/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O envy/O him/O for/O being/O better/O than/O I/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OHe/O does/O not/O live/O for/O
himself/O./O His/O whole/O life/O is/O subordinated/O to/O his/O duty/O./O And/O that/O's/O why/O he/O
can/O be/O calm/O and/O contented/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O you/O?/O''/O Kitty/PERSON asked/O,/O with/O an/O ironical/O and/O loving/O smile/O./O

She/O could/O never/O have/O explained/O the/O chain/O of/O thought/O that/O made/O her/O smile/O;/O
but/O the/O last/O link/O in/O it/O was/O that/O her/O husband/O,/O in/O exalting/O his/O brother/O
and/O abasing/O himself/O,/O was/O not/O quite/O sincere/O./O Kitty/PERSON knew/O that/O this/O
insincerity/O came/O from/O his/O love/O for/O his/O brother/O,/O from/O his/O sense/O of/O shame/O
at/O being/O too/O happy/O,/O and/O above/O all/O from/O his/O unflagging/O craving/O to/O be/O
better/O--/Oshe/O loved/O it/O in/O him/O,/O and/O so/O she/O smiled/O./O

``/OAnd/O you/O?/O What/O are/O you/O dissatisfied/O with/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O,/O with/O the/O same/O
smile/O./O

Her/O disbelief/O in/O his/O self-dissatisfaction/O delighted/O him/O,/O and/O
unconsciously/O he/O tried/O to/O draw/O her/O into/O giving/O utterance/O to/O the/O grounds/O
of/O her/O disbelief/O./O

``/OI/O am/O happy/O,/O but/O dissatisfied/O with/O myself/O.../O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O how/O can/O you/O be/O dissatisfied/O with/O yourself/O if/O you/O are/O happy/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O shall/O I/O say/O?/O.../O In/O my/O heart/O I/O really/O care/O for/O nothing/O
whatever/O but/O that/O you/O should/O not/O stumble/O--/Osee/O?/O Oh/O,/O but/O really/O you/O must/On't/O
skip/O about/O like/O that/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O,/O breaking/O off/O to/O scold/O her/O for/O too/O agile/O
a/O movement/O in/O stepping/O over/O a/O branch/O that/O lay/O in/O the/O path/O./O ``/OBut/O when/O I/O
think/O about/O myself/O,/O and/O compare/O myself/O with/O others/O,/O especially/O with/O my/O
brother/O,/O I/O feel/O I/O'm/O a/O poor/O creature/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O in/O what/O way/O?/O''/O Kitty/PERSON pursued/O with/O the/O same/O smile/O./O ``/ODo/On't/O you/O too/O
work/O for/O others/O?/O What/O about/O your/O co-operative/O settlement/O,/O and/O your/O work/O
on/O the/O estate/O,/O and/O your/O book/O?/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O but/O I/O feel/O,/O and/O particularly/O just/O now/O--/Oit/O's/O your/O fault/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
pressing/O her/O hand/O--/O``/Othat/O all/O that/O does/On't/O count/O./O I/O do/O it/O in/O a/O way/O
halfheartedly/O./O If/O I/O could/O care/O for/O all/O that/O as/O I/O care/O for/O you/O!/O.../O
Instead/O of/O that/O,/O I/O do/O it/O in/O these/O days/O like/O a/O task/O that/O is/O set/O me/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O would/O you/O say/O about/O papa/O?/O''/O asked/O Kitty/PERSON./O ``/OIs/O he/O a/O poor/O
creature/O then/O,/O as/O he/O does/O nothing/O for/O the/O public/O good/O?/O''/O

``/OHe/O?/O--/Ono/O!/O But/O then/O one/O must/O have/O the/O simplicity/O,/O the/O straightforwardness/O,/O
the/O goodness/O of/O your/O father/O:/O and/O I/O have/On't/O got/O that/O./O I/O do/O nothing/O,/O and/O I/O
fret/O about/O it/O./O It/O's/O all/O your/O doing/O./O Before/O there/O was/O you/O--/Oand/O _/Othis/O_/O
too/O,/O''/O he/O added/O with/O a/O glance/O towards/O her/O waist/O that/O she/O understood/O--/O``/OI/O
put/O all/O my/O energies/O into/O work/O;/O now/O I/O ca/On't/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O ashamed/O;/O I/O do/O it/O
just/O as/O though/O it/O were/O a/O task/O set/O me/O,/O I/O'm/O pretending/O.../O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O but/O would/O you/O like/O to/O change/O this/O minute/O with/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON?/O''/O
said/O Kitty/PERSON./O ``/OWould/O you/O like/O to/O do/O this/O work/O for/O the/O general/O good/O,/O and/O to/O
love/O the/O task/O set/O you/O,/O as/O he/O does/O,/O and/O nothing/O else/O?/O''/O

``/OOf/O course/O not/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OBut/O I/O'm/O so/O happy/O that/O I/O do/On't/O understand/O
anything/O./O So/O you/O think/O he/O'll/O make/O her/O an/O offer/O today/O?/O''/O he/O added/O after/O a/O
brief/O silence/O./O

``/OI/O think/O so/O,/O and/O I/O do/On't/O think/O so/O./O Only/O,/O I/O'm/O awfully/O anxious/O for/O it/O./O
Here/O,/O wait/O a/O minute/O./O''/O She/O stooped/O down/O and/O picked/O a/O wild/O camomile/O at/O the/O
edge/O of/O the/O path/O./O ``/OCome/O,/O count/O:/O he/O does/O propose/O,/O he/O does/On't/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
giving/O him/O the/O flower/O./O

``/OHe/O does/O,/O he/O does/On't/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O tearing/O off/O the/O white/O petals/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O no/O!/O''/O Kitty/PERSON,/O snatching/O at/O his/O hand/O,/O stopped/O him/O./O She/O had/O been/O
watching/O his/O fingers/O with/O interest/O./O ``/OYou/O picked/O off/O two/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O but/O see/O,/O this/O little/O one/O sha/On't/O count/O to/O make/O up/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O
tearing/O off/O a/O little/O half-grown/O petal/O./O ``/OHere/O's/O the/O wagonette/O overtaking/O
us/O./O''/O

``/OAre/On't/O you/O tired/O,/O Kitty/PERSON?/O''/O called/O the/O princess/O./O

``/ONot/O in/O the/O least/O./O''/O

``/OIf/O you/O are/O you/O can/O get/O in/O,/O as/O the/O horses/O are/O quiet/O and/O walking/O./O''/O

But/O it/O was/O not/O worth/O while/O to/O get/O in/O,/O they/O were/O quite/O near/O the/O place/O,/O
and/O all/O walked/O on/O together/O./O



Chapter/O 4/O


Varenka/O,/O with/O her/O white/O kerchief/O on/O her/O black/O hair/O,/O surrounded/O by/O the/O
children/O,/O gaily/O and/O good-humoredly/O looking/O after/O them/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O
time/O visibly/O excited/O at/O the/O possibility/O of/O receiving/O a/O declaration/O from/O
the/O man/O she/O cared/O for/O,/O was/O very/O attractive/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON walked/O
beside/O her/O,/O and/O never/O left/O off/O admiring/O her/O./O Looking/O at/O her/O,/O he/O recalled/O
all/O the/O delightful/O things/O he/O had/O heard/O from/O her/O lips/O,/O all/O the/O good/O he/O
knew/O about/O her/O,/O and/O became/O more/O and/O more/O conscious/O that/O the/O feeling/O he/O
had/O for/O her/O was/O something/O special/O that/O he/O had/O felt/O long/O,/O long/O ago/O,/O and/O
only/O once/O,/O in/O his/O early/O youth/O./O The/O feeling/O of/O happiness/O in/O being/O near/O
her/O continually/O grew/O,/O and/O at/O last/O reached/O such/O a/O point/O that/O,/O as/O he/O put/O a/O
huge/O,/O slender-stalked/O agaric/O fungus/O in/O her/O basket/O,/O he/O looked/O straight/O
into/O her/O face/O,/O and/O noticing/O the/O flush/O of/O glad/O and/O alarmed/O excitement/O
that/O overspread/O her/O face/O,/O he/O was/O confused/O himself/O,/O and/O smiled/O to/O her/O in/O
silence/O a/O smile/O that/O said/O too/O much/O./O

``/OIf/O so/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O,/O ``/OI/O ought/O to/O think/O it/O over/O and/O make/O up/O my/O
mind/O,/O and/O not/O give/O way/O like/O a/O boy/O to/O the/O impulse/O of/O a/O moment/O./O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O going/O to/O pick/O by/O myself/O apart/O from/O all/O the/O rest/O,/O or/O else/O my/O efforts/O
will/O make/O no/O show/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O he/O left/O the/O edge/O of/O the/O forest/O where/O
they/O were/O walking/O on/O low/O silky/O grass/O between/O old/O birch/O trees/O standing/O
far/O apart/O,/O and/O went/O more/O into/O the/O heart/O of/O the/O wood/O,/O where/O between/O the/O
white/O birch/O trunks/O there/O were/O gray/O trunks/O of/O aspen/O and/O dark/O bushes/O of/O
hazel/O./O Walking/O some/O forty/O paces/O away/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O knowing/O he/O was/O
out/O of/O sight/O,/O stood/O still/O behind/O a/O bushy/O spindle-tree/O in/O full/O flower/O
with/O its/O rosy/O red/O catkins/O./O It/O was/O perfectly/O still/O all/O round/O him/O./O Only/O
overhead/O in/O the/O birches/O under/O which/O he/O stood/O,/O the/O flies/O,/O like/O a/O swarm/O of/O
bees/O,/O buzzed/O unceasingly/O,/O and/O from/O time/O to/O time/O the/O children/O's/O voices/O
were/O floated/O across/O to/O him/O./O All/O at/O once/O he/O heard/O,/O not/O far/O from/O the/O edge/O
of/O the/O wood/O,/O the/O sound/O of/O Varenka/PERSON's/O contralto/O voice/O,/O calling/O Grisha/PERSON,/O and/O
a/O smile/O of/O delight/O passed/O over/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O face/O./O Conscious/O of/O
this/O smile/O,/O he/O shook/O his/O head/O disapprovingly/O at/O his/O own/O condition/O,/O and/O
taking/O out/O a/O cigar/O,/O he/O began/O lighting/O it/O./O For/O a/O long/O while/O he/O could/O not/O
get/O a/O match/O to/O light/O against/O the/O trunk/O of/O a/O birch/O tree/O./O The/O soft/O scales/O
of/O the/O white/O bark/O rubbed/O off/O the/O phosphorus/O,/O and/O the/O light/O went/O out/O./O At/O
last/O one/O of/O the/O matches/O burned/O,/O and/O the/O fragrant/O cigar/O smoke/O,/O hovering/O
uncertainly/O in/O flat/O,/O wide/O coils/O,/O stretched/O away/O forwards/O and/O upwards/O
over/O a/O bush/O under/O the/O overhanging/O branches/O of/O a/O birch/O tree/O./O Watching/O the/O
streak/O of/O smoke/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON walked/O gently/O on/O,/O deliberating/O on/O his/O
position/O./O

``/OWhy/O not/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O./O ``/OIf/O it/O were/O only/O a/O passing/O fancy/O or/O a/O passion/O,/O if/O
it/O were/O only/O this/O attraction/O--/Othis/O mutual/O attraction/O -LRB-/OI/O can/O call/O it/O a/O
_/Omutual/O_/O attraction/O-RRB-/O,/O but/O if/O I/O felt/O that/O it/O was/O in/O contradiction/O with/O
the/O whole/O bent/O of/O my/O life/O--/Oif/O I/O felt/O that/O in/O giving/O way/O to/O this/O
attraction/O I/O should/O be/O false/O to/O my/O vocation/O and/O my/O duty/O .../O but/O it/O's/O not/O
so/O./O The/O only/O thing/O I/O can/O say/O against/O it/O is/O that/O,/O when/O I/O lost/O Marie/PERSON,/O I/O
said/O to/O myself/O that/O I/O would/O remain/O faithful/O to/O her/O memory/O./O That/O's/O the/O
only/O thing/O I/O can/O say/O against/O my/O feeling/O.../O./O That/O's/O a/O great/O thing/O,/O''/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON said/O to/O himself/O,/O feeling/O at/O the/O same/O time/O that/O this/O
consideration/O had/O not/O the/O slightest/O importance/O for/O him/O personally/O,/O but/O
would/O only/O perhaps/O detract/O from/O his/O romantic/O character/O in/O the/O eyes/O of/O
others/O./O ``/OBut/O apart/O from/O that/O,/O however/O much/O I/O searched/O,/O I/O should/O never/O
find/O anything/O to/O say/O against/O my/O feeling/O./O If/O I/O were/O choosing/O by/O
considerations/O of/O suitability/O alone/O,/O I/O could/O not/O have/O found/O anything/O
better/O./O''/O

However/O many/O women/O and/O girls/O he/O thought/O of/O whom/O he/O knew/O,/O he/O could/O not/O
think/O of/O a/O girl/O who/O united/O to/O such/O a/O degree/O all/O,/O positively/O all/O,/O the/O
qualities/O he/O would/O wish/O to/O see/O in/O his/O wife/O./O She/O had/O all/O the/O charm/O and/O
freshness/O of/O youth/O,/O but/O she/O was/O not/O a/O child/O;/O and/O if/O she/O loved/O him/O,/O she/O
loved/O him/O consciously/O as/O a/O woman/O ought/O to/O love/O;/O that/O was/O one/O thing/O./O
Another/O point/O:/O she/O was/O not/O only/O far/O from/O being/O worldly/O,/O but/O had/O an/O
unmistakable/O distaste/O for/O worldly/O society/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O she/O knew/O
the/O world/O,/O and/O had/O all/O the/O ways/O of/O a/O woman/O of/O the/O best/O society/O,/O which/O
were/O absolutely/O essential/O to/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O conception/O of/O the/O woman/O
who/O was/O to/O share/O his/O life/O./O Thirdly/O:/O she/O was/O religious/O,/O and/O not/O like/O a/O
child/O,/O unconsciously/O religious/O and/O good/O,/O as/O Kitty/PERSON,/O for/O example/O,/O was/O,/O but/O
her/O life/O was/O founded/O on/O religious/O principles/O./O Even/O in/O trifling/O matters/O,/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON found/O in/O her/O all/O that/O he/O wanted/O in/O his/O wife/O:/O she/O was/O
poor/O and/O alone/O in/O the/O world/O,/O so/O she/O would/O not/O bring/O with/O her/O a/O mass/O of/O
relations/O and/O their/O influence/O into/O her/O husband/O's/O house/O,/O as/O he/O saw/O now/O in/O
Kitty/PERSON's/O case/O./O She/O would/O owe/O everything/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O which/O was/O what/O he/O
had/O always/O desired/O too/O for/O his/O future/O family/O life/O./O And/O this/O girl/O,/O who/O
united/O all/O these/O qualities/O,/O loved/O him/O./O He/O was/O a/O modest/O man/O,/O but/O he/O could/O
not/O help/O seeing/O it/O./O And/O he/O loved/O her/O./O There/O was/O one/O consideration/O
against/O it/O--/Ohis/O age/O./O But/O he/O came/O of/O a/O long-lived/O family/O,/O he/O had/O not/O a/O
single/O gray/O hair/O,/O no/O one/O would/O have/O taken/O him/O for/O forty/O,/O and/O he/O
remembered/O Varenka/PERSON's/O saying/O that/O it/O was/O only/O in/O Russia/LOCATION that/O men/O of/O fifty/O
thought/O themselves/O old/O,/O and/O that/O in/O France/LOCATION a/O man/O of/O fifty/O considers/O
himself/O _/Odans/O la/O force/O de/O l'âge/O_/O,/O while/O a/O man/O of/O forty/O is/O _/Oun/O jeune/O
homme/O_/O./O But/O what/O did/O the/O mere/O reckoning/O of/O years/O matter/O when/O he/O felt/O as/O
young/O in/O heart/O as/O he/O had/O been/O twenty/O years/O ago/O?/O Was/O it/O not/O youth/O to/O feel/O
as/O he/O felt/O now/O,/O when/O coming/O from/O the/O other/O side/O to/O the/O edge/O of/O the/O wood/O
he/O saw/O in/O the/O glowing/O light/O of/O the/O slanting/O sunbeams/O the/O gracious/O figure/O
of/O Varenka/LOCATION in/O her/O yellow/O gown/O with/O her/O basket/O,/O walking/O lightly/O by/O the/O
trunk/O of/O an/O old/O birch/O tree/O,/O and/O when/O this/O impression/O of/O the/O sight/O of/O
Varenka/LOCATION blended/O so/O harmoniously/O with/O the/O beauty/O of/O the/O view/O,/O of/O the/O
yellow/O oatfield/O lying/O bathed/O in/O the/O slanting/O sunshine/O,/O and/O beyond/O it/O the/O
distant/O ancient/O forest/O flecked/O with/O yellow/O and/O melting/O into/O the/O blue/O of/O
the/O distance/O?/O His/O heart/O throbbed/O joyously/O./O A/O softened/O feeling/O came/O over/O
him/O./O He/O felt/O that/O he/O had/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O./O Varenka/PERSON,/O who/O had/O just/O
crouched/O down/O to/O pick/O a/O mushroom/O,/O rose/O with/O a/O supple/O movement/O and/O looked/O
round/O./O Flinging/O away/O the/O cigar/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON advanced/O with/O resolute/O
steps/O towards/O her/O./O



Chapter/O 5/O


``/OVarvara/PERSON Andreevna/PERSON,/O when/O I/O was/O very/O young/O,/O I/O set/O before/O myself/O the/O ideal/O
of/O the/O woman/O I/O loved/O and/O should/O be/O happy/O to/O call/O my/O wife/O./O I/O have/O lived/O
through/O a/O long/O life/O,/O and/O now/O for/O the/O first/O time/O I/O have/O met/O what/O I/O
sought/O--/Oin/O you/O./O I/O love/O you/O,/O and/O offer/O you/O my/O hand/O./O''/O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O saying/O this/O to/O himself/O while/O he/O was/O ten/O paces/O from/O
Varvara/PERSON./O Kneeling/O down/O,/O with/O her/O hands/O over/O the/O mushrooms/O to/O guard/O them/O
from/O Grisha/PERSON,/O she/O was/O calling/O little/O Masha/PERSON./O

``/OCome/O here/O,/O little/O ones/O!/O There/O are/O so/O many/O!/O''/O she/O was/O saying/O in/O her/O
sweet/O,/O deep/O voice/O./O

Seeing/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON approaching/O,/O she/O did/O not/O get/O up/O and/O did/O not/O
change/O her/O position/O,/O but/O everything/O told/O him/O that/O she/O felt/O his/O presence/O
and/O was/O glad/O of/O it/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O did/O you/O find/O some/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O from/O under/O the/O white/O kerchief/O,/O
turning/O her/O handsome/O,/O gently/O smiling/O face/O to/O him/O./O

``/ONot/O one/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O ``/ODid/O you/O?/O''/O

She/O did/O not/O answer/O,/O busy/O with/O the/O children/O who/O thronged/O about/O her/O./O

``/OThat/O one/O too/O,/O near/O the/O twig/O,/O''/O she/O pointed/O out/O to/O little/O Masha/PERSON a/O little/O
fungus/O,/O split/O in/O half/O across/O its/O rosy/O cap/O by/O the/O dry/O grass/O from/O under/O
which/O it/O thrust/O itself/O./O Varenka/PERSON got/O up/O while/O Masha/PERSON picked/O the/O fungus/O,/O
breaking/O it/O into/O two/O white/O halves/O./O ``/OThis/O brings/O back/O my/O childhood/O,/O''/O she/O
added/O,/O moving/O apart/O from/O the/O children/O beside/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

They/O walked/O on/O for/O some/O steps/O in/O silence/O./O Varenka/PERSON saw/O that/O he/O wanted/O to/O
speak/O;/O she/O guessed/O of/O what/O,/O and/O felt/O faint/O with/O joy/O and/O panic/O./O They/O had/O
walked/O so/O far/O away/O that/O no/O one/O could/O hear/O them/O now/O,/O but/O still/O he/O did/O not/O
begin/O to/O speak/O./O It/O would/O have/O been/O better/O for/O Varenka/LOCATION to/O be/O silent/O./O
After/O a/O silence/O it/O would/O have/O been/O easier/O for/O them/O to/O say/O what/O they/O
wanted/O to/O say/O than/O after/O talking/O about/O mushrooms/O./O But/O against/O her/O own/O
will/O,/O as/O it/O were/O accidentally/O,/O Varenka/PERSON said/O:/O

``/OSo/O you/O found/O nothing/O?/O In/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O wood/O there/O are/O always/O fewer/O,/O
though/O./O''/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON sighed/O and/O made/O no/O answer/O./O He/O was/O annoyed/O
that/O she/O had/O spoken/O about/O the/O mushrooms/O./O He/O wanted/O to/O bring/O her/O back/O to/O
the/O first/O words/O she/O had/O uttered/O about/O her/O childhood/O;/O but/O after/O a/O pause/O
of/O some/O length/O,/O as/O though/O against/O his/O own/O will/O,/O he/O made/O an/O observation/O
in/O response/O to/O her/O last/O words/O./O

``/OI/O have/O heard/O that/O the/O white/O edible/O funguses/O are/O found/O principally/O at/O
the/O edge/O of/O the/O wood/O,/O though/O I/O ca/On't/O tell/O them/O apart/O./O''/O

Some/O minutes/O more/O passed/O,/O they/O moved/O still/O further/O away/O from/O the/O
children/O,/O and/O were/O quite/O alone/O./O Varenka/PERSON's/O heart/O throbbed/O so/O that/O she/O
heard/O it/O beating/O,/O and/O felt/O that/O she/O was/O turning/O red/O and/O pale/O and/O red/O
again/O./O

To/O be/O the/O wife/O of/O a/O man/O like/O Koznishev/PERSON,/O after/O her/O position/O with/O Madame/PERSON
Stahl/PERSON,/O was/O to/O her/O imagination/O the/O height/O of/O happiness/O./O Besides/O,/O she/O was/O
almost/O certain/O that/O she/O was/O in/O love/O with/O him/O./O And/O this/O moment/O it/O would/O
have/O to/O be/O decided/O./O She/O felt/O frightened/O./O She/O dreaded/O both/O his/O speaking/O
and/O his/O not/O speaking/O./O

Now/O or/O never/O it/O must/O be/O said/O--/Othat/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON felt/O too/O./O Everything/O
in/O the/O expression/O,/O the/O flushed/O cheeks/O and/O the/O downcast/O eyes/O of/O Varenka/LOCATION
betrayed/O a/O painful/O suspense/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON saw/O it/O and/O felt/O sorry/O for/O
her/O./O He/O felt/O even/O that/O to/O say/O nothing/O now/O would/O be/O a/O slight/O to/O her/O./O
Rapidly/O in/O his/O own/O mind/O he/O ran/O over/O all/O the/O arguments/O in/O support/O of/O his/O
decision/O./O He/O even/O said/O over/O to/O himself/O the/O words/O in/O which/O he/O meant/O to/O
put/O his/O offer/O,/O but/O instead/O of/O those/O words/O,/O some/O utterly/O unexpected/O
reflection/O that/O occurred/O to/O him/O made/O him/O ask/O:/O

``/OWhat/O is/O the/O difference/O between/O the/O `/Obirch/O'/O mushroom/O and/O the/O `/Owhite/O'/O
mushroom/O?/O''/O

Varenka/PERSON's/O lips/O quivered/O with/O emotion/O as/O she/O answered/O:/O

``/OIn/O the/O top/O part/O there/O is/O scarcely/O any/O difference/O,/O it/O's/O in/O the/O stalk/O./O''/O

And/O as/O soon/O as/O these/O words/O were/O uttered/O,/O both/O he/O and/O she/O felt/O that/O it/O
was/O over/O,/O that/O what/O was/O to/O have/O been/O said/O would/O not/O be/O said/O;/O and/O their/O
emotion/O,/O which/O had/O up/O to/O then/O been/O continually/O growing/O more/O intense/O,/O
began/O to/O subside/O./O

``/OThe/O birch/O mushroom/O's/O stalk/O suggests/O a/O dark/O man/O's/O chin/O after/O two/O days/O
without/O shaving/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O speaking/O quite/O calmly/O now/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O's/O true/O,/O''/O answered/O Varenka/PERSON smiling/O,/O and/O unconsciously/O the/O
direction/O of/O their/O walk/O changed/O./O They/O began/O to/O turn/O towards/O the/O
children/O./O Varenka/PERSON felt/O both/O sore/O and/O ashamed/O;/O at/O the/O same/O time/O she/O had/O a/O
sense/O of/O relief/O./O

When/O he/O had/O got/O home/O again/O and/O went/O over/O the/O whole/O subject/O,/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON thought/O his/O previous/O decision/O had/O been/O a/O mistaken/O one/O./O He/O
could/O not/O be/O false/O to/O the/O memory/O of/O Marie/PERSON./O

``/OGently/O,/O children/O,/O gently/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON shouted/O quite/O angrily/O to/O the/O children/O,/O
standing/O before/O his/O wife/O to/O protect/O her/O when/O the/O crowd/O of/O children/O flew/O
with/O shrieks/O of/O delight/O to/O meet/O them/O./O

Behind/O the/O children/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON and/O Varenka/PERSON walked/O out/O of/O the/O
wood/O./O Kitty/PERSON had/O no/O need/O to/O ask/O Varenka/LOCATION;/O she/O saw/O from/O the/O calm/O and/O
somewhat/O crestfallen/O faces/O of/O both/O that/O her/O plans/O had/O not/O come/O off/O./O

``/OWell/O?/O''/O her/O husband/O questioned/O her/O as/O they/O were/O going/O home/O again/O./O

``/OIt/O does/On't/O bite/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O her/O smile/O and/O manner/O of/O speaking/O
recalling/O her/O father/O,/O a/O likeness/O Levin/PERSON often/O noticed/O with/O pleasure/O./O

``/OHow/O does/On't/O bite/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O'll/O show/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O taking/O her/O husband/O's/O hand/O,/O lifting/O it/O to/O her/O
mouth/O,/O and/O just/O faintly/O brushing/O it/O with/O closed/O lips/O./O ``/OLike/O a/O kiss/O on/O a/O
priest/O's/O hand/O./O''/O

``/OWhich/O did/On't/O it/O bite/O with/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O laughing/O./O

``/OBoth/O./O But/O it/O should/O have/O been/O like/O this/O.../O''/O

``/OThere/O are/O some/O peasants/O coming/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O they/O did/On't/O see/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 6/O


During/O the/O time/O of/O the/O children/O's/O tea/O the/O grown-up/O people/O sat/O in/O the/O
balcony/O and/O talked/O as/O though/O nothing/O had/O happened/O,/O though/O they/O all/O,/O
especially/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON and/O Varenka/PERSON,/O were/O very/O well/O aware/O that/O
there/O had/O happened/O an/O event/O which/O,/O though/O negative/O,/O was/O of/O very/O great/O
importance/O./O They/O both/O had/O the/O same/O feeling/O,/O rather/O like/O that/O of/O a/O
schoolboy/O after/O an/O examination/O,/O which/O has/O left/O him/O in/O the/O same/O class/O or/O
shut/O him/O out/O of/O the/O school/O forever/O./O Everyone/O present/O,/O feeling/O too/O that/O
something/O had/O happened/O,/O talked/O eagerly/O about/O extraneous/O subjects/O./O Levin/PERSON
and/O Kitty/PERSON were/O particularly/O happy/O and/O conscious/O of/O their/O love/O that/O
evening/O./O And/O their/O happiness/O in/O their/O love/O seemed/O to/O imply/O a/O
disagreeable/O slur/O on/O those/O who/O would/O have/O liked/O to/O feel/O the/O same/O and/O
could/O not/O--/Oand/O they/O felt/O a/O prick/O of/O conscience/O./O

``/OMark/O my/O words/O,/O Alexander/PERSON will/O not/O come/O,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O princess/O./O

That/O evening/O they/O were/O expecting/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON to/O come/O down/O by/O
train/O,/O and/O the/O old/O prince/O had/O written/O that/O possibly/O he/O might/O come/O too/O./O

``/OAnd/O I/O know/O why/O,/O''/O the/O princess/O went/O on/O;/O ``/Ohe/O says/O that/O young/O people/O ought/O
to/O be/O left/O alone/O for/O a/O while/O at/O first/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O papa/O has/O left/O us/O alone/O./O We/O've/O never/O seen/O him/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON./O
``/OBesides/O,/O we/O're/O not/O young/O people/O!/O--/Owe/O're/O old/O,/O married/O people/O by/O now/O./O''/O

``/OOnly/O if/O he/O does/On't/O come/O,/O I/O shall/O say/O good-bye/O to/O you/O children/O,/O''/O said/O
the/O princess/O,/O sighing/O mournfully/O./O

``/OWhat/O nonsense/O,/O mamma/O!/O''/O both/O the/O daughters/O fell/O upon/O her/O at/O once/O./O

``/OHow/O do/O you/O suppose/O he/O is/O feeling/O?/O Why/O,/O now/O.../O''/O

And/O suddenly/O there/O was/O an/O unexpected/O quiver/O in/O the/O princess/O's/O voice/O./O Her/O
daughters/O were/O silent/O,/O and/O looked/O at/O one/O another/O./O ``/OMaman/O always/O finds/O
something/O to/O be/O miserable/O about/O,/O''/O they/O said/O in/O that/O glance/O./O They/O did/O not/O
know/O that/O happy/O as/O the/O princess/O was/O in/O her/O daughter/O's/O house/O,/O and/O useful/O
as/O she/O felt/O herself/O to/O be/O there/O,/O she/O had/O been/O extremely/O miserable/O,/O both/O
on/O her/O own/O account/O and/O her/O husband/O's/O,/O ever/O since/O they/O had/O married/O their/O
last/O and/O favorite/O daughter/O,/O and/O the/O old/O home/O had/O been/O left/O empty/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O,/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON?/O''/O Kitty/PERSON asked/O suddenly/O of/O Agafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON,/O who/O was/O standing/O with/O a/O mysterious/O air/O,/O and/O a/O face/O full/O of/O
meaning/O./O

``/OAbout/O supper/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O that/O's/O right/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON;/O ``/Oyou/O go/O and/O arrange/O about/O it/O,/O and/O I/O'll/O
go/O and/O hear/O Grisha/PERSON repeat/O his/O lesson/O,/O or/O else/O he/O will/O have/O nothing/O done/O
all/O day/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O my/O lesson/O!/O No/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O I/O'm/O going/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O jumping/O up/O./O

Grisha/PERSON,/O who/O was/O by/O now/O at/O a/O high/O school/O,/O had/O to/O go/O over/O the/O lessons/O of/O
the/O term/O in/O the/O summer/O holidays/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O who/O had/O been/O
studying/O Latin/O with/O her/O son/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION before/O,/O had/O made/O it/O a/O rule/O on/O
coming/O to/O the/O Levins/O'/O to/O go/O over/O with/O him/O,/O at/O least/O once/O a/O day/O,/O the/O most/O
difficult/O lessons/O of/O Latin/O and/O arithmetic/O./O Levin/PERSON had/O offered/O to/O take/O her/O
place/O,/O but/O the/O mother/O,/O having/O once/O overheard/O Levin/PERSON's/O lesson/O,/O and/O
noticing/O that/O it/O was/O not/O given/O exactly/O as/O the/O teacher/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION had/O
given/O it/O,/O said/O resolutely/O,/O though/O with/O much/O embarrassment/O and/O anxiety/O
not/O to/O mortify/O Levin/PERSON,/O that/O they/O must/O keep/O strictly/O to/O the/O book/O as/O the/O
teacher/O had/O done/O,/O and/O that/O she/O had/O better/O undertake/O it/O again/O herself/O./O
Levin/PERSON was/O amazed/O both/O at/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O who/O,/O by/O neglecting/O his/O
duty/O,/O threw/O upon/O the/O mother/O the/O supervision/O of/O studies/O of/O which/O she/O had/O
no/O comprehension/O,/O and/O at/O the/O teachers/O for/O teaching/O the/O children/O so/O
badly/O./O But/O he/O promised/O his/O sister-in-law/O to/O give/O the/O lessons/O exactly/O as/O
she/O wished/O./O And/O he/O went/O on/O teaching/O Grisha/PERSON,/O not/O in/O his/O own/O way/O,/O but/O by/O
the/O book/O,/O and/O so/O took/O little/O interest/O in/O it/O,/O and/O often/O forgot/O the/O hour/O
of/O the/O lesson/O./O So/O it/O had/O been/O today/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O going/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O you/O sit/O still/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OWe/O'll/O do/O it/O all/O
properly/O,/O like/O the/O book/O./O Only/O when/O Stiva/PERSON comes/O,/O and/O we/O go/O out/O shooting/O,/O
then/O we/O shall/O have/O to/O miss/O it/O./O''/O

And/O Levin/PERSON went/O to/O Grisha/PERSON./O

Varenka/PERSON was/O saying/O the/O same/O thing/O to/O Kitty/PERSON./O Even/O in/O the/O happy/O,/O
well-ordered/O household/O of/O the/O Levins/PERSON Varenka/PERSON had/O succeeded/O in/O making/O
herself/O useful/O./O

``/OI/O'll/O see/O to/O the/O supper/O,/O you/O sit/O still/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O got/O up/O to/O go/O to/O
Agafea/LOCATION Mihalovna/LOCATION./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O most/O likely/O they/O've/O not/O been/O able/O to/O get/O chickens/O./O If/O so/O,/O
ours/O.../O''/O

``/OAgafea/O Mihalovna/O and/O I/O will/O see/O about/O it/O,/O''/O and/O Varenka/PERSON vanished/O with/O
her/O./O

``/OWhat/O a/O nice/O girl/O!/O''/O said/O the/O princess/O./O

``/ONot/O nice/O,/O maman/O;/O she/O's/O an/O exquisite/O girl/O;/O there/O's/O no/O one/O else/O like/O
her/O./O''/O

``/OSo/O you/O are/O expecting/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON today/O?/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O evidently/O not/O disposed/O to/O pursue/O the/O conversation/O about/O
Varenka/LOCATION./O ``/OIt/O would/O be/O difficult/O to/O find/O two/O sons-in-law/O more/O unlike/O than/O
yours/O,/O''/O he/O said/O with/O a/O subtle/O smile/O./O ``/OOne/O all/O movement/O,/O only/O living/O in/O
society/O,/O like/O a/O fish/O in/O water/O;/O the/O other/O our/O Kostya/LOCATION,/O lively/O,/O alert/O,/O
quick/O in/O everything/O,/O but/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O is/O in/O society/O,/O he/O either/O sinks/O
into/O apathy/O,/O or/O struggles/O helplessly/O like/O a/O fish/O on/O land/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O he/O's/O very/O heedless/O,/O''/O said/O the/O princess/O,/O addressing/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON./O ``/OI/O've/O been/O meaning/O,/O indeed/O,/O to/O ask/O you/O to/O tell/O him/O that/O it/O's/O
out/O of/O the/O question/O for/O her/O''/O -LRB-/Oshe/O indicated/O Kitty/PERSON-RRB-/O ``/Oto/O stay/O here/O;/O that/O
she/O positively/O must/O come/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION./O He/O talks/O of/O getting/O a/O doctor/O
down/O.../O''/O

``/OMaman/PERSON,/O he/O'll/O do/O everything/O;/O he/O has/O agreed/O to/O everything/O,/O''/O Kitty/PERSON said/O,/O
angry/O with/O her/O mother/O for/O appealing/O to/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON to/O judge/O in/O
such/O a/O matter/O./O

In/O the/O middle/O of/O their/O conversation/O they/O heard/O the/O snorting/O of/O horses/O
and/O the/O sound/O of/O wheels/O on/O the/O gravel/O./O Dolly/PERSON had/O not/O time/O to/O get/O up/O to/O
go/O and/O meet/O her/O husband/O,/O when/O from/O the/O window/O of/O the/O room/O below/O,/O where/O
Grisha/PERSON was/O having/O his/O lesson/O,/O Levin/PERSON leaped/O out/O and/O helped/O Grisha/PERSON out/O
after/O him/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O Stiva/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON shouted/O from/O under/O the/O balcony/O./O ``/OWe/O've/O finished/O,/O
Dolly/PERSON,/O do/On't/O be/O afraid/O!/O''/O he/O added/O,/O and/O started/O running/O like/O a/O boy/O to/O
meet/O the/O carriage/O./O

''/O_/OIs/O ea/O id/O,/O ejus/O,/O ejus/O,/O ejus/O!/O_/O''/O shouted/O Grisha/PERSON,/O skipping/O along/O the/O
avenue/O./O

``/OAnd/O some/O one/O else/O too/O!/O Papa/O,/O of/O course/O!/O''/O cried/O Levin/PERSON,/O stopping/O at/O the/O
entrance/O of/O the/O avenue/O./O ``/OKitty/PERSON,/O do/On't/O come/O down/O the/O steep/O staircase/O,/O go/O
round/O./O''/O

But/O Levin/PERSON had/O been/O mistaken/O in/O taking/O the/O person/O sitting/O in/O the/O carriage/O
for/O the/O old/O prince/O./O As/O he/O got/O nearer/O to/O the/O carriage/O he/O saw/O beside/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON not/O the/O prince/O but/O a/O handsome/O,/O stout/O young/O man/O in/O a/O
Scotch/O cap/O,/O with/O long/O ends/O of/O ribbon/O behind/O./O This/O was/O Vassenka/PERSON
Veslovsky/PERSON,/O a/O distant/O cousin/O of/O the/O Shtcherbatskys/O,/O a/O brilliant/O young/O
gentleman/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION and/O Moscow/LOCATION society/O./O ``/OA/O capital/O fellow/O,/O and/O a/O
keen/O sportsman/O,/O''/O as/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O,/O introducing/O him/O./O

Not/O a/O whit/O abashed/O by/O the/O disappointment/O caused/O by/O his/O having/O come/O in/O
place/O of/O the/O old/O prince/O,/O Veslovsky/PERSON greeted/O Levin/PERSON gaily/O,/O claiming/O
acquaintance/O with/O him/O in/O the/O past/O,/O and/O snatching/O up/O Grisha/PERSON into/O the/O
carriage/O,/O lifted/O him/O over/O the/O pointer/O that/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O
brought/O with/O him/O./O

Levin/PERSON did/O not/O get/O into/O the/O carriage/O,/O but/O walked/O behind/O./O He/O was/O rather/O
vexed/O at/O the/O non-arrival/O of/O the/O old/O prince/O,/O whom/O he/O liked/O more/O and/O more/O
the/O more/O he/O saw/O of/O him/O,/O and/O also/O at/O the/O arrival/O of/O this/O Vassenka/PERSON
Veslovsky/PERSON,/O a/O quite/O uncongenial/O and/O superfluous/O person/O./O He/O seemed/O to/O him/O
still/O more/O uncongenial/O and/O superfluous/O when/O,/O on/O approaching/O the/O steps/O
where/O the/O whole/O party/O,/O children/O and/O grown-up/O,/O were/O gathered/O together/O in/O
much/O excitement/O,/O Levin/PERSON saw/O Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON,/O with/O a/O particularly/O warm/O
and/O gallant/O air/O,/O kissing/O Kitty/PERSON's/O hand/O./O

``/OYour/O wife/O and/O I/O are/O cousins/O and/O very/O old/O friends/O,/O''/O said/O Vassenka/PERSON
Veslovsky/PERSON,/O once/O more/O shaking/O Levin/PERSON's/O hand/O with/O great/O warmth/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O are/O there/O plenty/O of/O birds/O?/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O
hardly/O leaving/O time/O for/O everyone/O to/O utter/O their/O greetings/O./O ``/OWe/O've/O come/O
with/O the/O most/O savage/O intentions/O./O Why/O,/O maman/O,/O they/O've/O not/O been/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION
since/O!/O Look/O,/O Tanya/PERSON,/O here/O's/O something/O for/O you/O!/O Get/O it/O,/O please/O,/O it/O's/O in/O
the/O carriage/O,/O behind/O!/O''/O he/O talked/O in/O all/O directions/O./O ``/OHow/O pretty/O you/O've/O
grown/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O his/O wife/O,/O once/O more/O kissing/O her/O hand/O,/O holding/O
it/O in/O one/O of/O his/O,/O and/O patting/O it/O with/O the/O other/O./O

Levin/PERSON,/O who/O a/O minute/O before/O had/O been/O in/O the/O happiest/O frame/O of/O mind/O,/O now/O
looked/O darkly/O at/O everyone/O,/O and/O everything/O displeased/O him/O./O

``/OWho/O was/O it/O he/O kissed/O yesterday/O with/O those/O lips/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O looking/O at/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O tender/O demonstrations/O to/O his/O wife/O./O He/O looked/O at/O
Dolly/PERSON,/O and/O he/O did/O not/O like/O her/O either/O./O

``/OShe/O does/On't/O believe/O in/O his/O love/O./O So/O what/O is/O she/O so/O pleased/O about/O?/O
Revolting/O!/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON./O

He/O looked/O at/O the/O princess/O,/O who/O had/O been/O so/O dear/O to/O him/O a/O minute/O before/O,/O
and/O he/O did/O not/O like/O the/O manner/O in/O which/O she/O welcomed/O this/O Vassenka/LOCATION,/O with/O
his/O ribbons/O,/O just/O as/O though/O she/O were/O in/O her/O own/O house/O./O

Even/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O who/O had/O come/O out/O too/O onto/O the/O steps/O,/O seemed/O to/O
him/O unpleasant/O with/O the/O show/O of/O cordiality/O with/O which/O he/O met/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O though/O Levin/PERSON knew/O that/O his/O brother/O neither/O liked/O nor/O
respected/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O

And/O Varenka/PERSON,/O even/O she/O seemed/O hateful/O,/O with/O her/O air/O _/Osainte/O nitouche/O_/O
making/O the/O acquaintance/O of/O this/O gentleman/O,/O while/O all/O the/O while/O she/O was/O
thinking/O of/O nothing/O but/O getting/O married/O./O

And/O more/O hateful/O than/O anyone/O was/O Kitty/PERSON for/O falling/O in/O with/O the/O tone/O of/O
gaiety/O with/O which/O this/O gentleman/O regarded/O his/O visit/O in/O the/O country/O,/O as/O
though/O it/O were/O a/O holiday/O for/O himself/O and/O everyone/O else/O./O And/O,/O above/O all/O,/O
unpleasant/O was/O that/O particular/O smile/O with/O which/O she/O responded/O to/O his/O
smile/O./O

Noisily/O talking/O,/O they/O all/O went/O into/O the/O house/O;/O but/O as/O soon/O as/O they/O were/O
all/O seated/O,/O Levin/PERSON turned/O and/O went/O out/O./O

Kitty/PERSON saw/O something/O was/O wrong/O with/O her/O husband/O./O She/O tried/O to/O seize/O a/O
moment/O to/O speak/O to/O him/O alone/O,/O but/O he/O made/O haste/O to/O get/O away/O from/O her/O,/O
saying/O he/O was/O wanted/O at/O the/O counting-house/O./O It/O was/O long/O since/O his/O own/O
work/O on/O the/O estate/O had/O seemed/O to/O him/O so/O important/O as/O at/O that/O moment/O./O
``/OIt/O's/O all/O holiday/O for/O them/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O;/O ``/Obut/O these/O are/O no/O holiday/O
matters/O,/O they/O wo/On't/O wait/O,/O and/O there/O's/O no/O living/O without/O them/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 7/O


Levin/PERSON came/O back/O to/O the/O house/O only/O when/O they/O sent/O to/O summon/O him/O to/O
supper/O./O On/O the/O stairs/O were/O standing/O Kitty/PERSON and/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O
consulting/O about/O wines/O for/O supper/O./O

``/OBut/O why/O are/O you/O making/O all/O this/O fuss/O?/O Have/O what/O we/O usually/O do/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O Stiva/PERSON does/On't/O drink/O .../O Kostya/PERSON,/O stop/O,/O what/O's/O the/O matter/O?/O''/O Kitty/PERSON
began/O,/O hurrying/O after/O him/O,/O but/O he/O strode/O ruthlessly/O away/O to/O the/O dining/O
room/O without/O waiting/O for/O her/O,/O and/O at/O once/O joined/O in/O the/O lively/O general/O
conversation/O which/O was/O being/O maintained/O there/O by/O Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON and/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O do/O you/O say/O,/O are/O we/O going/O shooting/O tomorrow/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OPlease/O,/O do/O let/O's/O go/O,/O''/O said/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O moving/O to/O another/O chair/O,/O where/O he/O
sat/O down/O sideways/O,/O with/O one/O fat/O leg/O crossed/O under/O him/O./O

``/OI/O shall/O be/O delighted/O,/O we/O will/O go/O./O And/O have/O you/O had/O any/O shooting/O yet/O
this/O year/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON to/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O looking/O intently/O at/O his/O leg/O,/O but/O
speaking/O with/O that/O forced/O amiability/O that/O Kitty/PERSON knew/O so/O well/O in/O him/O,/O and/O
that/O was/O so/O out/O of/O keeping/O with/O him/O./O ``/OI/O ca/On't/O answer/O for/O our/O finding/O
grouse/O,/O but/O there/O are/O plenty/O of/O snipe/O./O Only/O we/O ought/O to/O start/O early/O./O
You/O're/O not/O tired/O?/O Are/On't/O you/O tired/O,/O Stiva/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OMe/O tired/O?/O I/O've/O never/O been/O tired/O yet/O./O Suppose/O we/O stay/O up/O all/O night/O./O
Let/O's/O go/O for/O a/O walk/O!/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O really/O,/O let/O's/O not/O go/O to/O bed/O at/O all/O!/O Capital/O!/O''/O Veslovsky/PERSON chimed/O in/O./O
