``/OOh/O,/O we/O all/O know/O you/O can/O do/O without/O sleep/O,/O and/O keep/O other/O people/O up/O
too/O,/O''/O Dolly/PERSON said/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O with/O that/O faint/O note/O of/O irony/O in/O her/O
voice/O which/O she/O almost/O always/O had/O now/O with/O her/O husband/O./O ``/OBut/O to/O my/O
thinking/O,/O it/O's/O time/O for/O bed/O now/O.../O./O I/O'm/O going/O,/O I/O do/On't/O want/O supper/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O do/O stay/O a/O little/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O going/O round/O to/O
her/O side/O behind/O the/O table/O where/O they/O were/O having/O supper/O./O ``/OI/O've/O so/O much/O
still/O to/O tell/O you/O./O''/O

``/ONothing/O really/O,/O I/O suppose/O./O''/O

``/ODo/O you/O know/O Veslovsky/PERSON has/O been/O at/O Anna/PERSON's/O,/O and/O he/O's/O going/O to/O them/O again/O?/O
You/O know/O they/O're/O hardly/O fifty/O miles/O from/O you/O,/O and/O I/O too/O must/O certainly/O
go/O over/O there/O./O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O come/O here/O!/O''/O

Vassenka/PERSON crossed/O over/O to/O the/O ladies/O,/O and/O sat/O down/O beside/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OAh/O,/O do/O tell/O me/O,/O please/O;/O you/O have/O stayed/O with/O her/O?/O How/O was/O she/O?/O''/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON appealed/O to/O him/O./O

Levin/PERSON was/O left/O at/O the/O other/O end/O of/O the/O table/O,/O and/O though/O never/O pausing/O
in/O his/O conversation/O with/O the/O princess/O and/O Varenka/LOCATION,/O he/O saw/O that/O there/O was/O
an/O eager/O and/O mysterious/O conversation/O going/O on/O between/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O Veslovsky/PERSON./O And/O that/O was/O not/O all/O./O He/O saw/O
on/O his/O wife/O's/O face/O an/O expression/O of/O real/O feeling/O as/O she/O gazed/O with/O fixed/O
eyes/O on/O the/O handsome/O face/O of/O Vassenka/LOCATION,/O who/O was/O telling/O them/O something/O
with/O great/O animation/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O exceedingly/O nice/O at/O their/O place/O,/O''/O Veslovsky/PERSON was/O telling/O them/O about/O
Vronsky/O and/O Anna/PERSON./O ``/OI/O ca/On't/O,/O of/O course/O,/O take/O it/O upon/O myself/O to/O judge/O,/O but/O
in/O their/O house/O you/O feel/O the/O real/O feeling/O of/O home/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O do/O they/O intend/O doing/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O believe/O they/O think/O of/O going/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION./O''/O

``/OHow/O jolly/O it/O would/O be/O for/O us/O all/O to/O go/O over/O to/O them/O together/O!/O When/O are/O
you/O going/O there/O?/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON asked/O Vassenka/PERSON./O

``/OI/O'm/O spending/O July/O there/O./O''/O

``/OWill/O you/O go/O?/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O to/O his/O wife/O./O

``/OI/O've/O been/O wanting/O to/O a/O long/O while/O;/O I/O shall/O certainly/O go/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O
``/OI/O am/O sorry/O for/O her/O,/O and/O I/O know/O her/O./O She/O's/O a/O splendid/O woman/O./O I/O will/O go/O
alone/O,/O when/O you/O go/O back/O,/O and/O then/O I/O shall/O be/O in/O no/O one/O's/O way/O./O And/O it/O
will/O be/O better/O indeed/O without/O you/O./O''/O

``/OTo/O be/O sure/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OAnd/O you/O,/O Kitty/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OI/O?/O Why/O should/O I/O go/O?/O''/O Kitty/PERSON said/O,/O flushing/O all/O over/O,/O and/O she/O glanced/O
round/O at/O her/O husband/O./O

``/ODo/O you/O know/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O then/O?/O''/O Veslovsky/PERSON asked/O her/O./O ``/OShe/O's/O a/O very/O
fascinating/O woman/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O she/O answered/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O crimsoning/O still/O more/O./O She/O got/O up/O and/O
walked/O across/O to/O her/O husband/O./O

``/OAre/O you/O going/O shooting/O,/O then/O,/O tomorrow/O?/O''/O she/O said/O./O

His/O jealousy/O had/O in/O these/O few/O moments/O,/O especially/O at/O the/O flush/O that/O had/O
overspread/O her/O cheeks/O while/O she/O was/O talking/O to/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O gone/O far/O
indeed/O./O Now/O as/O he/O heard/O her/O words/O,/O he/O construed/O them/O in/O his/O own/O fashion/O./O
Strange/O as/O it/O was/O to/O him/O afterwards/O to/O recall/O it/O,/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O at/O
the/O moment/O clear/O that/O in/O asking/O whether/O he/O was/O going/O shooting/O,/O all/O she/O
cared/O to/O know/O was/O whether/O he/O would/O give/O that/O pleasure/O to/O Vassenka/PERSON
Veslovsky/PERSON,/O with/O whom/O,/O as/O he/O fancied/O,/O she/O was/O in/O love/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O'm/O going/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O her/O in/O an/O unnatural/O voice/O,/O disagreeable/O to/O
himself/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O better/O spend/O the/O day/O here/O tomorrow/O,/O or/O Dolly/O wo/On't/O see/O anything/O of/O
her/O husband/O,/O and/O set/O off/O the/O day/O after/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON./O

The/O motive/O of/O Kitty/PERSON's/O words/O was/O interpreted/O by/O Levin/PERSON thus/O:/O ``/ODo/On't/O
separate/O me/O from/O _/Ohim/O_/O./O I/O do/On't/O care/O about/O _/Oyour/O_/O going/O,/O but/O do/O let/O me/O
enjoy/O the/O society/O of/O this/O delightful/O young/O man/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O if/O you/O wish/O,/O we/O'll/O stay/O here/O tomorrow/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON answered/O,/O with/O
peculiar/O amiability/O./O

Vassenka/PERSON meanwhile/O,/O utterly/O unsuspecting/O the/O misery/O his/O presence/O had/O
occasioned/O,/O got/O up/O from/O the/O table/O after/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O watching/O her/O with/O
smiling/O and/O admiring/O eyes/O,/O he/O followed/O her/O./O

Levin/PERSON saw/O that/O look/O./O He/O turned/O white/O,/O and/O for/O a/O minute/O he/O could/O hardly/O
breathe/O./O ``/OHow/O dare/O he/O look/O at/O my/O wife/O like/O that/O!/O''/O was/O the/O feeling/O that/O
boiled/O within/O him/O./O

``/OTomorrow/O,/O then/O?/O Do/O,/O please/O,/O let/O us/O go/O,/O''/O said/O Vassenka/PERSON,/O sitting/O down/O on/O
a/O chair/O,/O and/O again/O crossing/O his/O leg/O as/O his/O habit/O was/O./O

Levin/PERSON's/O jealousy/O went/O further/O still/O./O Already/O he/O saw/O himself/O a/O deceived/O
husband/O,/O looked/O upon/O by/O his/O wife/O and/O her/O lover/O as/O simply/O necessary/O to/O
provide/O them/O with/O the/O conveniences/O and/O pleasures/O of/O life/O.../O./O But/O in/O
spite/O of/O that/O he/O made/O polite/O and/O hospitable/O inquiries/O of/O Vassenka/LOCATION about/O
his/O shooting/O,/O his/O gun/O,/O and/O his/O boots/O,/O and/O agreed/O to/O go/O shooting/O next/O
day/O./O

Happily/O for/O Levin/PERSON,/O the/O old/O princess/O cut/O short/O his/O agonies/O by/O getting/O up/O
herself/O and/O advising/O Kitty/PERSON to/O go/O to/O bed/O./O But/O even/O at/O this/O point/O Levin/PERSON
could/O not/O escape/O another/O agony/O./O As/O he/O said/O good-night/O to/O his/O hostess/O,/O
Vassenka/PERSON would/O again/O have/O kissed/O her/O hand/O,/O but/O Kitty/PERSON,/O reddening/O,/O drew/O
back/O her/O hand/O and/O said/O with/O a/O naïve/O bluntness/O,/O for/O which/O the/O old/O
princess/O scolded/O her/O afterwards/O:/O

``/OWe/O do/On't/O like/O that/O fashion/O./O''/O

In/O Levin/PERSON's/O eyes/O she/O was/O to/O blame/O for/O having/O allowed/O such/O relations/O to/O
arise/O,/O and/O still/O more/O to/O blame/O for/O showing/O so/O awkwardly/O that/O she/O did/O not/O
like/O them/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O how/O can/O one/O want/O to/O go/O to/O bed/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O who/O,/O
after/O drinking/O several/O glasses/O of/O wine/O at/O supper/O,/O was/O now/O in/O his/O most/O
charming/O and/O sentimental/O humor/O./O ``/OLook/O,/O Kitty/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O pointing/O to/O the/O
moon/LOCATION,/O which/O had/O just/O risen/O behind/O the/O lime/O trees/O--/O``/Ohow/O exquisite/O!/O
Veslovsky/PERSON,/O this/O is/O the/O time/O for/O a/O serenade/O./O You/O know/O,/O he/O has/O a/O splendid/O
voice/O;/O we/O practiced/O songs/O together/O along/O the/O road/O./O He/O has/O brought/O some/O
lovely/O songs/O with/O him/O,/O two/O new/O ones/O./O Varvara/PERSON Andreevna/PERSON and/O he/O must/O sing/O
some/O duets/O./O''/O

When/O the/O party/O had/O broken/O up/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON walked/O a/O long/O while/O
about/O the/O avenue/O with/O Veslovsky/PERSON;/O their/O voices/O could/O be/O heard/O singing/O one/O
of/O the/O new/O songs/O./O

Levin/PERSON hearing/O these/O voices/O sat/O scowling/O in/O an/O easy-chair/O in/O his/O wife/O's/O
bedroom/O,/O and/O maintained/O an/O obstinate/O silence/O when/O she/O asked/O him/O what/O was/O
wrong/O./O But/O when/O at/O last/O with/O a/O timid/O glance/O she/O hazarded/O the/O question/O:/O
``/OWas/O there/O perhaps/O something/O you/O disliked/O about/O Veslovsky/PERSON?/O''/O--/Oit/O all/O burst/O
out/O,/O and/O he/O told/O her/O all/O./O He/O was/O humiliated/O himself/O at/O what/O he/O was/O
saying/O,/O and/O that/O exasperated/O him/O all/O the/O more/O./O

He/O stood/O facing/O her/O with/O his/O eyes/O glittering/O menacingly/O under/O his/O
scowling/O brows/O,/O and/O he/O squeezed/O his/O strong/O arms/O across/O his/O chest/O,/O as/O
though/O he/O were/O straining/O every/O nerve/O to/O hold/O himself/O in/O./O The/O expression/O
of/O his/O face/O would/O have/O been/O grim/O,/O and/O even/O cruel/O,/O if/O it/O had/O not/O at/O the/O
same/O time/O had/O a/O look/O of/O suffering/O which/O touched/O her/O./O His/O jaws/O were/O
twitching/O,/O and/O his/O voice/O kept/O breaking/O./O

``/OYou/O must/O understand/O that/O I/O'm/O not/O jealous/O,/O that/O's/O a/O nasty/O word/O./O I/O ca/On't/O
be/O jealous/O,/O and/O believe/O that/O.../O./O I/O ca/On't/O say/O what/O I/O feel/O,/O but/O this/O is/O
awful/O.../O./O I/O'm/O not/O jealous/O,/O but/O I/O'm/O wounded/O,/O humiliated/O that/O anybody/O dare/O
think/O,/O that/O anybody/O dare/O look/O at/O you/O with/O eyes/O like/O that/O./O''/O

``/OEyes/O like/O what/O?/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O trying/O as/O conscientiously/O as/O possible/O to/O
recall/O every/O word/O and/O gesture/O of/O that/O evening/O and/O every/O shade/O implied/O in/O
them/O./O

At/O the/O very/O bottom/O of/O her/O heart/O she/O did/O think/O there/O had/O been/O something/O
precisely/O at/O the/O moment/O when/O he/O had/O crossed/O over/O after/O her/O to/O the/O other/O
end/O of/O the/O table/O;/O but/O she/O dared/O not/O own/O it/O even/O to/O herself/O,/O and/O would/O
have/O been/O even/O more/O unable/O to/O bring/O herself/O to/O say/O so/O to/O him/O,/O and/O so/O
increase/O his/O suffering/O./O

``/OAnd/O what/O can/O there/O possibly/O be/O attractive/O about/O me/O as/O I/O am/O now/O?/O.../O''/O

``/OAh/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O,/O clutching/O at/O his/O head/O,/O ``/Oyou/O should/On't/O say/O that/O!/O.../O If/O
you/O had/O been/O attractive/O then/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O Kostya/PERSON,/O oh/O,/O wait/O a/O minute/O,/O oh/O,/O do/O listen/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O looking/O at/O
him/O with/O an/O expression/O of/O pained/O commiseration/O./O ``/OWhy/O,/O what/O can/O you/O be/O
thinking/O about/O!/O When/O for/O me/O there/O's/O no/O one/O in/O the/O world/O,/O no/O one/O,/O no/O
one/O!/O.../O Would/O you/O like/O me/O never/O to/O see/O anyone/O?/O''/O

For/O the/O first/O minute/O she/O had/O been/O offended/O at/O his/O jealousy/O;/O she/O was/O
angry/O that/O the/O slightest/O amusement/O,/O even/O the/O most/O innocent/O,/O should/O be/O
forbidden/O her/O;/O but/O now/O she/O would/O readily/O have/O sacrificed/O,/O not/O merely/O
such/O trifles/O,/O but/O everything/O,/O for/O his/O peace/O of/O mind/O,/O to/O save/O him/O from/O
the/O agony/O he/O was/O suffering/O./O

``/OYou/O must/O understand/O the/O horror/O and/O comedy/O of/O my/O position/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O
in/O a/O desperate/O whisper/O;/O ``/Othat/O he/O's/O in/O my/O house/O,/O that/O he/O's/O done/O nothing/O
improper/O positively/O except/O his/O free/O and/O easy/O airs/O and/O the/O way/O he/O sits/O on/O
his/O legs/O./O He/O thinks/O it/O's/O the/O best/O possible/O form/O,/O and/O so/O I/O'm/O obliged/O to/O
be/O civil/O to/O him/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O,/O Kostya/PERSON,/O you/O're/O exaggerating/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O her/O
heart/O rejoicing/O at/O the/O depth/O of/O his/O love/O for/O her/O,/O shown/O now/O in/O his/O
jealousy/O./O

``/OThe/O most/O awful/O part/O of/O it/O all/O is/O that/O you/O're/O just/O as/O you/O always/O are/O,/O
and/O especially/O now/O when/O to/O me/O you/O're/O something/O sacred/O,/O and/O we/O're/O so/O
happy/O,/O so/O particularly/O happy/O--/Oand/O all/O of/O a/O sudden/O a/O little/O wretch/O.../O./O
He/O's/O not/O a/O little/O wretch/O;/O why/O should/O I/O abuse/O him/O?/O I/O have/O nothing/O to/O do/O
with/O him/O./O But/O why/O should/O my/O,/O and/O your/O,/O happiness/O.../O''/O

``/ODo/O you/O know/O,/O I/O understand/O now/O what/O it/O's/O all/O come/O from/O,/O''/O Kitty/PERSON was/O
beginning/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O?/O what/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O saw/O how/O you/O looked/O while/O we/O were/O talking/O at/O supper/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O well/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O in/O dismay/O./O

She/O told/O him/O what/O they/O had/O been/O talking/O about/O./O And/O as/O she/O told/O him/O,/O she/O
was/O breathless/O with/O emotion/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O silent/O for/O a/O space/O,/O then/O he/O
scanned/O her/O pale/O and/O distressed/O face/O,/O and/O suddenly/O he/O clutched/O at/O his/O
head/O./O

``/OKatya/PERSON,/O I/O've/O been/O worrying/O you/O!/O Darling/O,/O forgive/O me/O!/O It/O's/O madness/O!/O
Katya/PERSON,/O I/O'm/O a/O criminal/O./O And/O how/O could/O you/O be/O so/O distressed/O at/O such/O
idiocy/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O was/O sorry/O for/O you/O./O''/O

``/OFor/O me/O?/O for/O me/O?/O How/O mad/O I/O am/O!/O.../O But/O why/O make/O you/O miserable/O?/O It/O's/O awful/O
to/O think/O that/O any/O outsider/O can/O shatter/O our/O happiness/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O humiliating/O too/O,/O of/O course/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O then/O I/O'll/O keep/O him/O here/O all/O the/O summer/O,/O and/O will/O overwhelm/O him/O with/O
civility/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O kissing/O her/O hands/O./O ``/OYou/O shall/O see/O./O Tomorrow/O.../O./O
Oh/O,/O yes/O,/O we/O are/O going/O tomorrow/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 8/O


Next/O day/O,/O before/O the/O ladies/O were/O up/O,/O the/O wagonette/O and/O a/O trap/O for/O the/O
shooting/O party/O were/O at/O the/O door/O,/O and/O Laska/PERSON,/O aware/O since/O early/O morning/O
that/O they/O were/O going/O shooting/O,/O after/O much/O whining/O and/O darting/O to/O and/O
fro/O,/O had/O sat/O herself/O down/O in/O the/O wagonette/O beside/O the/O coachman/O,/O and/O,/O
disapproving/O of/O the/O delay/O,/O was/O excitedly/O watching/O the/O door/O from/O which/O
the/O sportsmen/O still/O did/O not/O come/O out/O./O The/O first/O to/O come/O out/O was/O Vassenka/PERSON
Veslovsky/PERSON,/O in/O new/O high/O boots/O that/O reached/O half-way/O up/O his/O thick/O thighs/O,/O
in/O a/O green/O blouse/O,/O with/O a/O new/O Russian/O leather/O cartridge-belt/O,/O and/O in/O his/O
Scotch/O cap/O with/O ribbons/O,/O with/O a/O brand-new/O English/O gun/O without/O a/O sling/O./O
Laska/PERSON flew/O up/O to/O him/O,/O welcomed/O him/O,/O and/O jumping/O up/O,/O asked/O him/O in/O her/O own/O
way/O whether/O the/O others/O were/O coming/O soon/O,/O but/O getting/O no/O answer/O from/O him/O,/O
she/O returned/O to/O her/O post/O of/O observation/O and/O sank/O into/O repose/O again/O,/O her/O
head/O on/O one/O side/O,/O and/O one/O ear/O pricked/O up/O to/O listen/O./O At/O last/O the/O door/O
opened/O with/O a/O creak/O,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O spot-and-tan/O pointer/O Krak/O
flew/O out/O,/O running/O round/O and/O round/O and/O turning/O over/O in/O the/O air/O./O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON himself/O followed/O with/O a/O gun/O in/O his/O hand/O and/O a/O cigar/O in/O his/O
mouth/O./O

``/OGood/O dog/O,/O good/O dog/O,/O Krak/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O encouragingly/O to/O the/O dog/O,/O who/O put/O
his/O paws/O up/O on/O his/O chest/O,/O catching/O at/O his/O game/O bag/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
was/O dressed/O in/O rough/O leggings/O and/O spats/O,/O in/O torn/O trousers/O and/O a/O short/O
coat/O./O On/O his/O head/O there/O was/O a/O wreck/O of/O a/O hat/O of/O indefinite/O form/O,/O but/O his/O
gun/O of/O a/O new/O patent/O was/O a/O perfect/O gem/O,/O and/O his/O game/O bag/O and/O cartridge/O
belt/O,/O though/O worn/O,/O were/O of/O the/O very/O best/O quality/O./O

Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON had/O had/O no/O notion/O before/O that/O it/O was/O truly/O _/Ochic/O_/O for/O
a/O sportsman/O to/O be/O in/O tatters/O,/O but/O to/O have/O his/O shooting/O outfit/O of/O the/O
best/O quality/O./O He/O saw/O it/O now/O as/O he/O looked/O at/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O radiant/O
in/O his/O rags/O,/O graceful/O,/O well-fed/O,/O and/O joyous/O,/O a/O typical/O Russian/O nobleman/O./O
And/O he/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O that/O next/O time/O he/O went/O shooting/O he/O would/O
certainly/O adopt/O the/O same/O get-up/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O what/O about/O our/O host/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O

``/OA/O young/O wife/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O and/O such/O a/O charming/O one/O!/O''/O

``/OHe/O came/O down/O dressed/O./O No/O doubt/O he/O's/O run/O up/O to/O her/O again/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON guessed/O right/O./O Levin/PERSON had/O run/O up/O again/O to/O his/O wife/O to/O
ask/O her/O once/O more/O if/O she/O forgave/O him/O for/O his/O idiocy/O yesterday/O,/O and/O,/O
moreover/O,/O to/O beg/O her/O for/O Christ/PERSON's/O sake/O to/O be/O more/O careful/O./O The/O great/O
thing/O was/O for/O her/O to/O keep/O away/O from/O the/O children/O--/Othey/O might/O any/O minute/O
push/O against/O her/O./O Then/O he/O had/O once/O more/O to/O hear/O her/O declare/O that/O she/O was/O
not/O angry/O with/O him/O for/O going/O away/O for/O two/O days/O,/O and/O to/O beg/O her/O to/O be/O
sure/O to/O send/O him/O a/O note/O next/O morning/O by/O a/O servant/O on/O horseback/O,/O to/O write/O
him/O,/O if/O it/O were/O but/O two/O words/O only/O,/O to/O let/O him/O know/O that/O all/O was/O well/O
with/O her/O./O

Kitty/PERSON was/O distressed/O,/O as/O she/O always/O was/O,/O at/O parting/O for/O a/O couple/O of/O days/O
from/O her/O husband/O,/O but/O when/O she/O saw/O his/O eager/O figure/O,/O looking/O big/O and/O
strong/O in/O his/O shooting-boots/O and/O his/O white/O blouse/O,/O and/O a/O sort/O of/O
sportsman/O elation/O and/O excitement/O incomprehensible/O to/O her/O,/O she/O forgot/O her/O
own/O chagrin/O for/O the/O sake/O of/O his/O pleasure/O,/O and/O said/O good-bye/O to/O him/O
cheerfully/O./O

``/OPardon/O,/O gentlemen/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O running/O out/O onto/O the/O steps/O./O ``/OHave/O you/O put/O
the/O lunch/O in/O?/O Why/O is/O the/O chestnut/O on/O the/O right/O?/O Well/O,/O it/O does/On't/O matter/O./O
Laska/PERSON,/O down/O;/O go/O and/O lie/O down/O!/O''/O

``/OPut/O it/O with/O the/O herd/O of/O oxen/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O herdsman/O,/O who/O was/O waiting/O
for/O him/O at/O the/O steps/O with/O some/O question/O./O ``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O here/O comes/O another/O
villain/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON jumped/O out/O of/O the/O wagonette/O,/O in/O which/O he/O had/O already/O taken/O his/O
seat/O,/O to/O meet/O the/O carpenter/O,/O who/O came/O towards/O the/O steps/O with/O a/O rule/O in/O
his/O hand/O./O

``/OYou/O did/On't/O come/O to/O the/O counting/O house/O yesterday/O,/O and/O now/O you/O're/O
detaining/O me/O./O Well/O,/O what/O is/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OWould/O your/O honor/O let/O me/O make/O another/O turning/O?/O It/O's/O only/O three/O steps/O to/O
add/O./O And/O we/O make/O it/O just/O fit/O at/O the/O same/O time/O./O It/O will/O be/O much/O more/O
convenient/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O should/O have/O listened/O to/O me/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON answered/O with/O annoyance/O./O ``/OI/O
said/O:/O Put/O the/O lines/O and/O then/O fit/O in/O the/O steps/O./O Now/O there/O's/O no/O setting/O it/O
right/O./O Do/O as/O I/O told/O you/O,/O and/O make/O a/O new/O staircase/O./O''/O

The/O point/O was/O that/O in/O the/O lodge/O that/O was/O being/O built/O the/O carpenter/O had/O
spoiled/O the/O staircase/O,/O fitting/O it/O together/O without/O calculating/O the/O space/O
it/O was/O to/O fill/O,/O so/O that/O the/O steps/O were/O all/O sloping/O when/O it/O was/O put/O in/O
place/O./O Now/O the/O carpenter/O wanted/O,/O keeping/O the/O same/O staircase/O,/O to/O add/O
three/O steps/O./O

``/OIt/O will/O be/O much/O better/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O where/O's/O your/O staircase/O coming/O out/O with/O its/O three/O steps/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O upon/O my/O word/O,/O sir/O,/O''/O the/O carpenter/O said/O with/O a/O contemptuous/O smile/O./O
``/OIt/O comes/O out/O right/O at/O the/O very/O spot/O./O It/O starts/O,/O so/O to/O speak/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
with/O a/O persuasive/O gesture/O;/O ``/Oit/O comes/O down/O,/O and/O comes/O down/O,/O and/O comes/O
out/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O three/O steps/O will/O add/O to/O the/O length/O too/O .../O where/O is/O it/O to/O come/O
out/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O to/O be/O sure/O,/O it/O'll/O start/O from/O the/O bottom/O and/O go/O up/O and/O go/O up/O,/O and/O
come/O out/O so/O,/O''/O the/O carpenter/O said/O obstinately/O and/O convincingly/O./O

``/OIt/O'll/O reach/O the/O ceiling/O and/O the/O wall/O./O''/O

``/OUpon/O my/O word/O!/O Why/O,/O it/O'll/O go/O up/O,/O and/O up/O,/O and/O come/O out/O like/O this/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON took/O out/O a/O ramrod/O and/O began/O sketching/O him/O the/O staircase/O in/O the/O
dust/O./O

``/OThere/O,/O do/O you/O see/O?/O''/O

``/OAs/O your/O honor/O likes/O,/O''/O said/O the/O carpenter/O,/O with/O a/O sudden/O gleam/O in/O his/O
eyes/O,/O obviously/O understanding/O the/O thing/O at/O last/O./O ``/OIt/O seems/O it/O'll/O be/O best/O
to/O make/O a/O new/O one/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O then/O,/O do/O it/O as/O you/O're/O told/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON shouted/O,/O seating/O himself/O in/O
the/O wagonette/O./O ``/ODown/O!/O Hold/O the/O dogs/O,/O Philip/PERSON!/O''/O

Levin/PERSON felt/O now/O at/O leaving/O behind/O all/O his/O family/O and/O household/O cares/O such/O
an/O eager/O sense/O of/O joy/O in/O life/O and/O expectation/O that/O he/O was/O not/O disposed/O
to/O talk/O./O Besides/O that/O,/O he/O had/O that/O feeling/O of/O concentrated/O excitement/O
that/O every/O sportsman/O experiences/O as/O he/O approaches/O the/O scene/O of/O action/O./O
If/O he/O had/O anything/O on/O his/O mind/O at/O that/O moment/O,/O it/O was/O only/O the/O doubt/O
whether/O they/O would/O start/O anything/O in/O the/O Kolpensky/O marsh/O,/O whether/O Laska/PERSON
would/O show/O to/O advantage/O in/O comparison/O with/O Krak/PERSON,/O and/O whether/O he/O would/O
shoot/O well/O that/O day/O himself/O./O Not/O to/O disgrace/O himself/O before/O a/O new/O
spectator/O--/Onot/O to/O be/O outdone/O by/O Oblonsky/PERSON--/Othat/O too/O was/O a/O thought/O that/O
crossed/O his/O brain/O./O

Oblonsky/PERSON was/O feeling/O the/O same/O,/O and/O he/O too/O was/O not/O talkative/O./O Vassenka/PERSON
Veslovsky/PERSON kept/O up/O alone/O a/O ceaseless/O flow/O of/O cheerful/O chatter/O./O As/O he/O
listened/O to/O him/O now/O,/O Levin/PERSON felt/O ashamed/O to/O think/O how/O unfair/O he/O had/O been/O
to/O him/O the/O day/O before/O./O Vassenka/PERSON was/O really/O a/O nice/O fellow/O,/O simple/O,/O
good-hearted/O,/O and/O very/O good-humored/O./O If/O Levin/PERSON had/O met/O him/O before/O he/O was/O
married/O,/O he/O would/O have/O made/O friends/O with/O him/O./O Levin/PERSON rather/O disliked/O his/O
holiday/O attitude/O to/O life/O and/O a/O sort/O of/O free/O and/O easy/O assumption/O of/O
elegance/O./O It/O was/O as/O though/O he/O assumed/O a/O high/O degree/O of/O importance/O in/O
himself/O that/O could/O not/O be/O disputed/O,/O because/O he/O had/O long/O nails/O and/O a/O
stylish/O cap/O,/O and/O everything/O else/O to/O correspond/O;/O but/O this/O could/O be/O
forgiven/O for/O the/O sake/O of/O his/O good/O nature/O and/O good/O breeding/O./O Levin/PERSON liked/O
him/O for/O his/O good/O education/O,/O for/O speaking/O French/O and/O English/O with/O such/O an/O
excellent/O accent/O,/O and/O for/O being/O a/O man/O of/O his/O world/O./O

Vassenka/PERSON was/O extremely/O delighted/O with/O the/O left/O horse/O,/O a/O horse/O of/O the/O Don/PERSON
Steppes/PERSON./O He/O kept/O praising/O him/O enthusiastically/O./O ``/OHow/O fine/O it/O must/O be/O
galloping/O over/O the/O steppes/O on/O a/O steppe/O horse/O!/O Eh/O?/O is/On't/O it/O?/O''/O he/O said/O./O He/O
had/O imagined/O riding/O on/O a/O steppe/O horse/O as/O something/O wild/O and/O romantic/O,/O
and/O it/O turned/O out/O nothing/O of/O the/O sort/O./O But/O his/O simplicity/O,/O particularly/O
in/O conjunction/O with/O his/O good/O looks/O,/O his/O amiable/O smile/O,/O and/O the/O grace/O of/O
his/O movements/O,/O was/O very/O attractive/O./O Either/O because/O his/O nature/O was/O
sympathetic/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O or/O because/O Levin/PERSON was/O trying/O to/O atone/O for/O his/O sins/O
of/O the/O previous/O evening/O by/O seeing/O nothing/O but/O what/O was/O good/O in/O him/O,/O
anyway/O he/O liked/O his/O society/O./O

After/O they/O had/O driven/O over/O two/O miles/O from/O home/O,/O Veslovsky/PERSON all/O at/O once/O
felt/O for/O a/O cigar/O and/O his/O pocketbook/O,/O and/O did/O not/O know/O whether/O he/O had/O
lost/O them/O or/O left/O them/O on/O the/O table/O./O In/O the/O pocketbook/O there/O were/O
thirty-seven/O pounds/O,/O and/O so/O the/O matter/O could/O not/O be/O left/O in/O uncertainty/O./O

``/ODo/O you/O know/O what/O,/O Levin/PERSON,/O I/O'll/O gallop/O home/O on/O that/O left/O trace-horse/O./O
That/O will/O be/O splendid/O./O Eh/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O preparing/O to/O get/O out/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O why/O should/O you/O?/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O calculating/O that/O Vassenka/PERSON could/O
hardly/O weigh/O less/O than/O seventeen/O stone/O./O ``/OI/O'll/O send/O the/O coachman/O./O''/O

The/O coachman/O rode/O back/O on/O the/O trace-horse/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON himself/O drove/O the/O
remaining/O pair/O./O



Chapter/O 9/O


``/OWell/O,/O now/O what/O's/O our/O plan/O of/O campaign/O?/O Tell/O us/O all/O about/O it/O,/O''/O said/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OOur/O plan/O is/O this/O./O Now/O we/O're/O driving/O to/O Gvozdyov/PERSON./O In/O Gvozdyov/PERSON there/O's/O a/O
grouse/O marsh/O on/O this/O side/O,/O and/O beyond/O Gvozdyov/O come/O some/O magnificent/O
snipe/O marshes/O where/O there/O are/O grouse/O too/O./O It/O's/O hot/O now/O,/O and/O we/O'll/O get/O
there/O--/Oit/O's/O fifteen/O miles/O or/O so/O--/Otowards/O evening/O and/O have/O some/O evening/O
shooting/O;/O we/O'll/O spend/O the/O night/O there/O and/O go/O on/O tomorrow/O to/O the/O bigger/O
moors/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O is/O there/O nothing/O on/O the/O way/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O;/O but/O we/O'll/O reserve/O ourselves/O;/O besides/O it/O's/O hot/O./O There/O are/O two/O nice/O
little/O places/O,/O but/O I/O doubt/O there/O being/O anything/O to/O shoot/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON would/O himself/O have/O liked/O to/O go/O into/O these/O little/O places/O,/O but/O they/O
were/O near/O home/O;/O he/O could/O shoot/O them/O over/O any/O time/O,/O and/O they/O were/O only/O
little/O places/O--/Othere/O would/O hardly/O be/O room/O for/O three/O to/O shoot/O./O And/O so/O,/O
with/O some/O insincerity/O,/O he/O said/O that/O he/O doubted/O there/O being/O anything/O to/O
shoot/O./O When/O they/O reached/O a/O little/O marsh/O Levin/PERSON would/O have/O driven/O by/O,/O but/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O with/O the/O experienced/O eye/O of/O a/O sportsman/O,/O at/O once/O
detected/O reeds/O visible/O from/O the/O road/O./O

``/OSha/On't/O we/O try/O that/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O pointing/O to/O the/O little/O marsh/O./O

``/OLevin/PERSON,/O do/O,/O please/O!/O how/O delightful/O!/O''/O Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON began/O begging/O,/O
and/O Levin/PERSON could/O but/O consent/O./O

Before/O they/O had/O time/O to/O stop/O,/O the/O dogs/O had/O flown/O one/O before/O the/O other/O
into/O the/O marsh/O./O

``/OKrak/O!/O Laska/PERSON!/O.../O''/O

The/O dogs/O came/O back/O./O

``/OThere/O wo/On't/O be/O room/O for/O three/O./O I/O'll/O stay/O here/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O hoping/O they/O
would/O find/O nothing/O but/O peewits/O,/O who/O had/O been/O startled/O by/O the/O dogs/O,/O and/O
turning/O over/O in/O their/O flight/O,/O were/O plaintively/O wailing/O over/O the/O marsh/O./O

``/ONo/O!/O Come/O along/O,/O Levin/PERSON,/O let/O's/O go/O together/O!/O''/O Veslovsky/PERSON called/O./O

``/OReally/O,/O there/O's/O not/O room/O./O Laska/PERSON,/O back/O,/O Laska/PERSON!/O You/O wo/On't/O want/O another/O
dog/O,/O will/O you/O?/O''/O

Levin/PERSON remained/O with/O the/O wagonette/O,/O and/O looked/O enviously/O at/O the/O
sportsmen/O./O They/O walked/O right/O across/O the/O marsh/O./O Except/O little/O birds/O and/O
peewits/O,/O of/O which/O Vassenka/PERSON killed/O one/O,/O there/O was/O nothing/O in/O the/O marsh/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O you/O see/O now/O that/O it/O was/O not/O that/O I/O grudged/O the/O marsh/O,/O''/O said/O
Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Oonly/O it/O's/O wasting/O time/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O it/O was/O jolly/O all/O the/O same/O./O Did/O you/O see/O us/O?/O''/O said/O Vassenka/PERSON
Veslovsky/PERSON,/O clambering/O awkwardly/O into/O the/O wagonette/O with/O his/O gun/O and/O his/O
peewit/O in/O his/O hands/O./O ``/OHow/O splendidly/O I/O shot/O this/O bird/O!/O Did/On't/O I/O?/O Well/O,/O
shall/O we/O soon/O be/O getting/O to/O the/O real/O place/O?/O''/O

The/O horses/O started/O off/O suddenly/O,/O Levin/PERSON knocked/O his/O head/O against/O the/O
stock/O of/O someone/O's/O gun/O,/O and/O there/O was/O the/O report/O of/O a/O shot/O./O The/O gun/O did/O
actually/O go/O off/O first/O,/O but/O that/O was/O how/O it/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O It/O appeared/O
that/O Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON had/O pulled/O only/O one/O trigger/O,/O and/O had/O left/O the/O
other/O hammer/O still/O cocked/O./O The/O charge/O flew/O into/O the/O ground/O without/O doing/O
harm/O to/O anyone/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON shook/O his/O head/O and/O laughed/O
reprovingly/O at/O Veslovsky/LOCATION./O But/O Levin/PERSON had/O not/O the/O heart/O to/O reprove/O him/O./O In/O
the/O first/O place/O,/O any/O reproach/O would/O have/O seemed/O to/O be/O called/O forth/O by/O
the/O danger/O he/O had/O incurred/O and/O the/O bump/O that/O had/O come/O up/O on/O Levin/PERSON's/O
forehead/O./O And/O besides/O,/O Veslovsky/PERSON was/O at/O first/O so/O naïvely/O distressed/O,/O and/O
then/O laughed/O so/O good-humoredly/O and/O infectiously/O at/O their/O general/O dismay/O,/O
that/O one/O could/O not/O but/O laugh/O with/O him/O./O

When/O they/O reached/O the/O second/O marsh/O,/O which/O was/O fairly/O large/O,/O and/O would/O
inevitably/O take/O some/O time/O to/O shoot/O over/O,/O Levin/PERSON tried/O to/O persuade/O them/O to/O
pass/O it/O by/O./O But/O Veslovsky/PERSON again/O overpersuaded/O him/O./O Again/O,/O as/O the/O marsh/O
was/O narrow/O,/O Levin/PERSON,/O like/O a/O good/O host/O,/O remained/O with/O the/O carriage/O./O

Krak/PERSON made/O straight/O for/O some/O clumps/O of/O sedge/O./O Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON was/O the/O
first/O to/O run/O after/O the/O dog/O./O Before/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O time/O to/O come/O
up/O,/O a/O grouse/O flew/O out/O./O Veslovsky/PERSON missed/O it/O and/O it/O flew/O into/O an/O unmown/O
meadow/O./O This/O grouse/O was/O left/O for/O Veslovsky/LOCATION to/O follow/O up/O./O Krak/O found/O it/O
again/O and/O pointed/O,/O and/O Veslovsky/PERSON shot/O it/O and/O went/O back/O to/O the/O carriage/O./O
``/ONow/O you/O go/O and/O I/O'll/O stay/O with/O the/O horses/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

Levin/PERSON had/O begun/O to/O feel/O the/O pangs/O of/O a/O sportsman/O's/O envy/O./O He/O handed/O the/O
reins/O to/O Veslovsky/LOCATION and/O walked/O into/O the/O marsh/O./O

Laska/PERSON,/O who/O had/O been/O plaintively/O whining/O and/O fretting/O against/O the/O
injustice/O of/O her/O treatment/O,/O flew/O straight/O ahead/O to/O a/O hopeful/O place/O that/O
Levin/PERSON knew/O well/O,/O and/O that/O Krak/PERSON had/O not/O yet/O come/O upon/O./O

``/OWhy/O do/On't/O you/O stop/O her/O?/O''/O shouted/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OShe/O wo/On't/O scare/O them/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O sympathizing/O with/O his/O bitch/O's/O
pleasure/O and/O hurrying/O after/O her/O./O

As/O she/O came/O nearer/O and/O nearer/O to/O the/O familiar/O breeding/O places/O there/O was/O
more/O and/O more/O earnestness/O in/O Laska/PERSON's/O exploration/O./O A/O little/O marsh/O bird/O
did/O not/O divert/O her/O attention/O for/O more/O than/O an/O instant/O./O She/O made/O one/O
circuit/O round/O the/O clump/O of/O reeds/O,/O was/O beginning/O a/O second/O,/O and/O suddenly/O
quivered/O with/O excitement/O and/O became/O motionless/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O come/O,/O Stiva/O!/O''/O shouted/O Levin/PERSON,/O feeling/O his/O heart/O beginning/O to/O beat/O
more/O violently/O;/O and/O all/O of/O a/O sudden/O,/O as/O though/O some/O sort/O of/O shutter/O had/O
been/O drawn/O back/O from/O his/O straining/O ears/O,/O all/O sounds/O,/O confused/O but/O loud/O,/O
began/O to/O beat/O on/O his/O hearing/O,/O losing/O all/O sense/O of/O distance/O./O He/O heard/O the/O
steps/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O mistaking/O them/O for/O the/O tramp/O of/O the/O horses/O
in/O the/O distance/O;/O he/O heard/O the/O brittle/O sound/O of/O the/O twigs/O on/O which/O he/O had/O
trodden/O,/O taking/O this/O sound/O for/O the/O flying/O of/O a/O grouse/O./O He/O heard/O too/O,/O not/O
far/O behind/O him/O,/O a/O splashing/O in/O the/O water/O,/O which/O he/O could/O not/O explain/O to/O
himself/O./O

Picking/O his/O steps/O,/O he/O moved/O up/O to/O the/O dog/O./O

``/OFetch/O it/O!/O''/O

Not/O a/O grouse/O but/O a/O snipe/O flew/O up/O from/O beside/O the/O dog/O./O Levin/PERSON had/O lifted/O
his/O gun/O,/O but/O at/O the/O very/O instant/O when/O he/O was/O taking/O aim/O,/O the/O sound/O of/O
splashing/O grew/O louder/O,/O came/O closer/O,/O and/O was/O joined/O with/O the/O sound/O of/O
Veslovsky/PERSON's/O voice/O,/O shouting/O something/O with/O strange/O loudness/O./O Levin/PERSON saw/O
he/O had/O his/O gun/O pointed/O behind/O the/O snipe/O,/O but/O still/O he/O fired/O./O

When/O he/O had/O made/O sure/O he/O had/O missed/O,/O Levin/PERSON looked/O round/O and/O saw/O the/O
horses/O and/O the/O wagonette/O not/O on/O the/O road/O but/O in/O the/O marsh/O./O

Veslovsky/PERSON,/O eager/O to/O see/O the/O shooting/O,/O had/O driven/O into/O the/O marsh/O,/O and/O got/O
the/O horses/O stuck/O in/O the/O mud/O./O

``/ODamn/O the/O fellow/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O to/O himself/O,/O as/O he/O went/O back/O to/O the/O
carriage/O that/O had/O sunk/O in/O the/O mire/O./O ``/OWhat/O did/O you/O drive/O in/O for/O?/O''/O he/O said/O
to/O him/O dryly/O,/O and/O calling/O the/O coachman/O,/O he/O began/O pulling/O the/O horses/O out/O./O

Levin/PERSON was/O vexed/O both/O at/O being/O hindered/O from/O shooting/O and/O at/O his/O horses/O
getting/O stuck/O in/O the/O mud/O,/O and/O still/O more/O at/O the/O fact/O that/O neither/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON nor/O Veslovsky/PERSON helped/O him/O and/O the/O coachman/O to/O unharness/O the/O
horses/O and/O get/O them/O out/O,/O since/O neither/O of/O them/O had/O the/O slightest/O notion/O
of/O harnessing/O./O Without/O vouchsafing/O a/O syllable/O in/O reply/O to/O Vassenka/LOCATION's/O
protestations/O that/O it/O had/O been/O quite/O dry/O there/O,/O Levin/PERSON worked/O in/O silence/O
with/O the/O coachman/O at/O extricating/O the/O horses/O./O But/O then/O,/O as/O he/O got/O warm/O at/O
the/O work/O and/O saw/O how/O assiduously/O Veslovsky/PERSON was/O tugging/O at/O the/O wagonette/O
by/O one/O of/O the/O mud-guards/O,/O so/O that/O he/O broke/O it/O indeed/O,/O Levin/PERSON blamed/O
himself/O for/O having/O under/O the/O influence/O of/O yesterday/O's/O feelings/O been/O too/O
cold/O to/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O and/O tried/O to/O be/O particularly/O genial/O so/O as/O to/O smooth/O
over/O his/O chilliness/O./O When/O everything/O had/O been/O put/O right/O,/O and/O the/O
carriage/O had/O been/O brought/O back/O to/O the/O road/O,/O Levin/PERSON had/O the/O lunch/O served/O./O

''/O_/OBon/O appétit/O--/Obonne/O conscience/O!/O Ce/O poulet/O va/O tomber/O jusqu'au/O fond/O de/O mes/O
bottes/O_/O,/O''/O Vassenka/PERSON,/O who/O had/O recovered/O his/O spirits/O,/O quoted/O the/O French/O
saying/O as/O he/O finished/O his/O second/O chicken/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O now/O our/O troubles/O are/O
over/O,/O now/O everything/O's/O going/O to/O go/O well/O./O Only/O,/O to/O atone/O for/O my/O sins/O,/O I/O'm/O
bound/O to/O sit/O on/O the/O box/O./O That/O's/O so/O?/O eh/O?/O No/O,/O no/O!/O I/O'll/O be/O your/O Automedon/O./O
You/O shall/O see/O how/O I/O'll/O get/O you/O along/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O,/O not/O letting/O go/O the/O
rein/O,/O when/O Levin/PERSON begged/O him/O to/O let/O the/O coachman/O drive/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O I/O must/O atone/O
for/O my/O sins/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O very/O comfortable/O on/O the/O box/O./O''/O And/O he/O drove/O./O

Levin/PERSON was/O a/O little/O afraid/O he/O would/O exhaust/O the/O horses/O,/O especially/O the/O
chestnut/O,/O whom/O he/O did/O not/O know/O how/O to/O hold/O in/O;/O but/O unconsciously/O he/O fell/O
under/O the/O influence/O of/O his/O gaiety/O and/O listened/O to/O the/O songs/O he/O sang/O all/O
the/O way/O on/O the/O box/O,/O or/O the/O descriptions/O and/O representations/O he/O gave/O of/O
driving/O in/O the/O English/O fashion/O,/O four-in-hand/O;/O and/O it/O was/O in/O the/O very/O
best/O of/O spirits/O that/O after/O lunch/O they/O drove/O to/O the/O Gvozdyov/O marsh/O./O



Chapter/O 10/O


Vassenka/PERSON drove/O the/O horses/O so/O smartly/O that/O they/O reached/O the/O marsh/O too/O
early/O,/O while/O it/O was/O still/O hot/O./O

As/O they/O drew/O near/O this/O more/O important/O marsh/O,/O the/O chief/O aim/O of/O their/O
expedition/O,/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O help/O considering/O how/O he/O could/O get/O rid/O of/O
Vassenka/LOCATION and/O be/O free/O in/O his/O movements/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON evidently/O had/O
the/O same/O desire/O,/O and/O on/O his/O face/O Levin/PERSON saw/O the/O look/O of/O anxiety/O always/O
present/O in/O a/O true/O sportsman/O when/O beginning/O shooting/O,/O together/O with/O a/O
certain/O good-humored/O slyness/O peculiar/O to/O him/O./O

``/OHow/O shall/O we/O go/O?/O It/O's/O a/O splendid/O marsh/O,/O I/O see/O,/O and/O there/O are/O hawks/O,/O''/O
said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O pointing/O to/O two/O great/O birds/O hovering/O over/O the/O
reeds/O./O ``/OWhere/O there/O are/O hawks/O,/O there/O is/O sure/O to/O be/O game/O./O''/O

``/ONow/O,/O gentlemen/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O pulling/O up/O his/O boots/O and/O examining/O the/O
lock/O of/O his/O gun/O with/O rather/O a/O gloomy/O expression/O,/O ``/Odo/O you/O see/O those/O
reeds/O?/O''/O He/O pointed/O to/O an/O oasis/O of/O blackish/O green/O in/O the/O huge/O half-mown/O
wet/O meadow/O that/O stretched/O along/O the/O right/O bank/O of/O the/O river/O./O ``/OThe/O marsh/O
begins/O here/O,/O straight/O in/O front/O of/O us/O,/O do/O you/O see/O--/Owhere/O it/O is/O greener/O?/O
From/O here/O it/O runs/O to/O the/O right/O where/O the/O horses/O are/O;/O there/O are/O breeding/O
places/O there/O,/O and/O grouse/O,/O and/O all/O round/O those/O reeds/O as/O far/O as/O that/O
alder/O,/O and/O right/O up/O to/O the/O mill/O./O Over/O there/O,/O do/O you/O see/O,/O where/O the/O pools/O
are/O?/O That/O's/O the/O best/O place/O./O There/O I/O once/O shot/O seventeen/O snipe/O./O We/O'll/O
separate/O with/O the/O dogs/O and/O go/O in/O different/O directions/O,/O and/O then/O meet/O
over/O there/O at/O the/O mill/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O which/O shall/O go/O to/O left/O and/O which/O to/O right/O?/O''/O asked/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OIt/O's/O wider/O to/O the/O right/O;/O you/O two/O go/O that/O way/O and/O I/O'll/O
take/O the/O left/O,/O''/O he/O said/O with/O apparent/O carelessness/O./O

``/OCapital/O!/O we/O'll/O make/O the/O bigger/O bag/O!/O Yes/O,/O come/O along/O,/O come/O along/O!/O''/O
Vassenka/PERSON exclaimed/O./O

Levin/PERSON could/O do/O nothing/O but/O agree/O,/O and/O they/O divided/O./O

As/O soon/O as/O they/O entered/O the/O marsh/O,/O the/O two/O dogs/O began/O hunting/O about/O
together/O and/O made/O towards/O the/O green/O,/O slime-covered/O pool/O./O Levin/PERSON knew/O
Laska/PERSON's/O method/O,/O wary/O and/O indefinite/O;/O he/O knew/O the/O place/O too/O and/O expected/O
a/O whole/O covey/O of/O snipe/O./O

``/OVeslovsky/O,/O beside/O me/O,/O walk/O beside/O me/O!/O''/O he/O said/O in/O a/O faint/O voice/O to/O his/O
companion/O splashing/O in/O the/O water/O behind/O him/O./O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O help/O
feeling/O an/O interest/O in/O the/O direction/O his/O gun/O was/O pointed/O,/O after/O that/O
casual/O shot/O near/O the/O Kolpensky/O marsh/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O get/O in/O your/O way/O,/O do/On't/O trouble/O about/O me/O./O''/O

But/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O help/O troubling/O,/O and/O recalled/O Kitty/PERSON's/O words/O at/O
parting/O:/O ``/OMind/O you/O do/On't/O shoot/O one/O another/O./O''/O The/O dogs/O came/O nearer/O and/O
nearer/O,/O passed/O each/O other/O,/O each/O pursuing/O its/O own/O scent/O./O The/O expectation/O
of/O snipe/O was/O so/O intense/O that/O to/O Levin/PERSON the/O squelching/O sound/O of/O his/O own/O
heel/O,/O as/O he/O drew/O it/O up/O out/O of/O the/O mire/O,/O seemed/O to/O be/O the/O call/O of/O a/O
snipe/O,/O and/O he/O clutched/O and/O pressed/O the/O lock/O of/O his/O gun/O./O

``/OBang/O!/O bang/O!/O''/O sounded/O almost/O in/O his/O ear/O./O Vassenka/PERSON had/O fired/O at/O a/O flock/O
of/O ducks/O which/O was/O hovering/O over/O the/O marsh/O and/O flying/O at/O that/O moment/O
towards/O the/O sportsmen/O,/O far/O out/O of/O range/O./O Before/O Levin/PERSON had/O time/O to/O look/O
round/O,/O there/O was/O the/O whir/O of/O one/O snipe/O,/O another/O,/O a/O third/O,/O and/O some/O eight/O
more/O rose/O one/O after/O another/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON hit/O one/O at/O the/O very/O moment/O when/O it/O was/O beginning/O its/O
zigzag/O movements/O,/O and/O the/O snipe/O fell/O in/O a/O heap/O into/O the/O mud/O./O Oblonsky/PERSON
aimed/O deliberately/O at/O another/O,/O still/O flying/O low/O in/O the/O reeds/O,/O and/O
together/O with/O the/O report/O of/O the/O shot/O,/O that/O snipe/O too/O fell/O,/O and/O it/O could/O
be/O seen/O fluttering/O out/O where/O the/O sedge/O had/O been/O cut/O,/O its/O unhurt/O wing/O
showing/O white/O beneath/O./O

Levin/PERSON was/O not/O so/O lucky/O:/O he/O aimed/O at/O his/O first/O bird/O too/O low/O,/O and/O missed/O;/O
he/O aimed/O at/O it/O again/O,/O just/O as/O it/O was/O rising/O,/O but/O at/O that/O instant/O another/O
snipe/O flew/O up/O at/O his/O very/O feet/O,/O distracting/O him/O so/O that/O he/O missed/O again/O./O

While/O they/O were/O loading/O their/O guns/O,/O another/O snipe/O rose/O,/O and/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O
who/O had/O had/O time/O to/O load/O again/O,/O sent/O two/O charges/O of/O small-shot/O into/O the/O
water/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON picked/O up/O his/O snipe/O,/O and/O with/O sparkling/O eyes/O
looked/O at/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O now/O let/O us/O separate/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O and/O limping/O on/O
his/O left/O foot/O,/O holding/O his/O gun/O in/O readiness/O and/O whistling/O to/O his/O dog/O,/O he/O
walked/O off/O in/O one/O direction/O./O Levin/PERSON and/O Veslovsky/PERSON walked/O in/O the/O other/O./O

It/O always/O happened/O with/O Levin/PERSON that/O when/O his/O first/O shots/O were/O a/O failure/O
he/O got/O hot/O and/O out/O of/O temper/O,/O and/O shot/O badly/O the/O whole/O day/O./O So/O it/O was/O
that/O day/O./O The/O snipe/O showed/O themselves/O in/O numbers/O./O They/O kept/O flying/O up/O
from/O just/O under/O the/O dogs/O,/O from/O under/O the/O sportsmen/O's/O legs/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON
might/O have/O retrieved/O his/O ill/O luck/O./O But/O the/O more/O he/O shot/O,/O the/O more/O he/O
felt/O disgraced/O in/O the/O eyes/O of/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O who/O kept/O popping/O away/O merrily/O
and/O indiscriminately/O,/O killing/O nothing/O,/O and/O not/O in/O the/O slightest/O abashed/O
by/O his/O ill/O success/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O in/O feverish/O haste/O,/O could/O not/O restrain/O
himself/O,/O got/O more/O and/O more/O out/O of/O temper/O,/O and/O ended/O by/O shooting/O almost/O
without/O a/O hope/O of/O hitting/O./O Laska/PERSON,/O indeed/O,/O seemed/O to/O understand/O this/O./O She/O
began/O looking/O more/O languidly/O,/O and/O gazed/O back/O at/O the/O sportsmen/O,/O as/O it/O
were/O,/O with/O perplexity/O or/O reproach/O in/O her/O eyes/O./O Shots/O followed/O shots/O in/O
rapid/O succession/O./O The/O smoke/O of/O the/O powder/O hung/O about/O the/O sportsmen/O,/O
while/O in/O the/O great/O roomy/O net/O of/O the/O game/O bag/O there/O were/O only/O three/O light/O
little/O snipe/O./O And/O of/O these/O one/O had/O been/O killed/O by/O Veslovsky/PERSON alone/O,/O and/O
one/O by/O both/O of/O them/O together/O./O Meanwhile/O from/O the/O other/O side/O of/O the/O marsh/O
came/O the/O sound/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O shots/O,/O not/O frequent/O,/O but/O,/O as/O
Levin/PERSON fancied/O,/O well-directed/O,/O for/O almost/O after/O each/O they/O heard/O ``/OKrak/O,/O
Krak/PERSON,/O _/Oapporte/O_/O!/O''/O

This/O excited/O Levin/PERSON still/O more/O./O The/O snipe/O were/O floating/O continually/O in/O
the/O air/O over/O the/O reeds/O./O Their/O whirring/O wings/O close/O to/O the/O earth/O,/O and/O
their/O harsh/O cries/O high/O in/O the/O air/O,/O could/O be/O heard/O on/O all/O sides/O;/O the/O
snipe/O that/O had/O risen/O first/O and/O flown/O up/O into/O the/O air/O,/O settled/O again/O
before/O the/O sportsmen/O./O Instead/O of/O two/O hawks/O there/O were/O now/O dozens/O of/O them/O
hovering/O with/O shrill/O cries/O over/O the/O marsh/O./O

After/O walking/O through/O the/O larger/O half/O of/O the/O marsh/O,/O Levin/PERSON and/O Veslovsky/PERSON
reached/O the/O place/O where/O the/O peasants/O'/O mowing-grass/O was/O divided/O into/O long/O
strips/O reaching/O to/O the/O reeds/O,/O marked/O off/O in/O one/O place/O by/O the/O trampled/O
grass/O,/O in/O another/O by/O a/O path/O mown/O through/O it/O./O Half/O of/O these/O strips/O had/O
already/O been/O mown/O./O

Though/O there/O was/O not/O so/O much/O hope/O of/O finding/O birds/O in/O the/O uncut/O part/O as/O
the/O cut/O part/O,/O Levin/PERSON had/O promised/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON to/O meet/O him/O,/O and/O so/O
he/O walked/O on/O with/O his/O companion/O through/O the/O cut/O and/O uncut/O patches/O./O

``/OHi/O,/O sportsmen/O!/O''/O shouted/O one/O of/O a/O group/O of/O peasants/O,/O sitting/O on/O an/O
unharnessed/O cart/O;/O ``/Ocome/O and/O have/O some/O lunch/O with/O us/O!/O Have/O a/O drop/O of/O
wine/O!/O''/O

Levin/PERSON looked/O round/O./O

``/OCome/O along/O,/O it/O's/O all/O right/O!/O''/O shouted/O a/O good-humored-looking/O bearded/O
peasant/O with/O a/O red/O face/O,/O showing/O his/O white/O teeth/O in/O a/O grin/O,/O and/O holding/O
up/O a/O greenish/O bottle/O that/O flashed/O in/O the/O sunlight/O./O

''/O_/OQu'est/O-/Oce/O qu'ils/O disent/O_/O?/O''/O asked/O Veslovsky/PERSON./O

``/OThey/O invite/O you/O to/O have/O some/O vodka/O./O Most/O likely/O they/O've/O been/O dividing/O
the/O meadow/O into/O lots/O./O I/O should/O have/O some/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O not/O without/O some/O
guile/O,/O hoping/O Veslovsky/PERSON would/O be/O tempted/O by/O the/O vodka/O,/O and/O would/O go/O away/O
to/O them/O./O

``/OWhy/O do/O they/O offer/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O they/O're/O merry-making/O./O Really/O,/O you/O should/O join/O them/O./O You/O would/O be/O
interested/O./O''/O

''/O_/OAllons/O,/O c’est/O curieux/O_/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O go/O,/O you/O go/O,/O you/O'll/O find/O the/O way/O to/O the/O mill/O!/O''/O cried/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O
looking/O round/O he/O perceived/O with/O satisfaction/O that/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O bent/O and/O
stumbling/O with/O weariness/O,/O holding/O his/O gun/O out/O at/O arm/O's/O length/O,/O was/O
making/O his/O way/O out/O of/O the/O marsh/O towards/O the/O peasants/O./O

``/OYou/O come/O too/O!/O''/O the/O peasants/O shouted/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/ONever/O fear/O!/O You/O taste/O
our/O cake/O!/O''/O

Levin/PERSON felt/O a/O strong/O inclination/O to/O drink/O a/O little/O vodka/O and/O to/O eat/O some/O
bread/O./O He/O was/O exhausted/O,/O and/O felt/O it/O a/O great/O effort/O to/O drag/O his/O
staggering/O legs/O out/O of/O the/O mire/O,/O and/O for/O a/O minute/O he/O hesitated/O./O But/O
Laska/PERSON was/O setting/O./O And/O immediately/O all/O his/O weariness/O vanished/O,/O and/O he/O
walked/O lightly/O through/O the/O swamp/O towards/O the/O dog/O./O A/O snipe/O flew/O up/O at/O his/O
feet/O;/O he/O fired/O and/O killed/O it/O./O Laska/PERSON still/O pointed/O./O--/O``/OFetch/O it/O!/O''/O Another/O
bird/O flew/O up/O close/O to/O the/O dog/O./O Levin/PERSON fired/O./O But/O it/O was/O an/O unlucky/O day/O
for/O him/O;/O he/O missed/O it/O,/O and/O when/O he/O went/O to/O look/O for/O the/O one/O he/O had/O shot/O,/O
he/O could/O not/O find/O that/O either/O./O He/O wandered/O all/O about/O the/O reeds/O,/O but/O
Laska/PERSON did/O not/O believe/O he/O had/O shot/O it/O,/O and/O when/O he/O sent/O her/O to/O find/O it/O,/O
she/O pretended/O to/O hunt/O for/O it/O,/O but/O did/O not/O really/O./O And/O in/O the/O absence/O of/O
Vassenka/LOCATION,/O on/O whom/O Levin/PERSON threw/O the/O blame/O of/O his/O failure/O,/O things/O went/O no/O
better/O./O There/O were/O plenty/O of/O snipe/O still/O,/O but/O Levin/PERSON made/O one/O miss/O after/O
another/O./O

The/O slanting/O rays/O of/O the/O sun/O were/O still/O hot/O;/O his/O clothes/O,/O soaked/O through/O
with/O perspiration/O,/O stuck/O to/O his/O body/O;/O his/O left/O boot/O full/O of/O water/O
weighed/O heavily/O on/O his/O leg/O and/O squeaked/O at/O every/O step/O;/O the/O sweat/O ran/O in/O
drops/O down/O his/O powder-grimed/O face/O,/O his/O mouth/O was/O full/O of/O the/O bitter/O
taste/O,/O his/O nose/O of/O the/O smell/O of/O powder/O and/O stagnant/O water/O,/O his/O ears/O were/O
ringing/O with/O the/O incessant/O whir/O of/O the/O snipe/O;/O he/O could/O not/O touch/O the/O
stock/O of/O his/O gun/O,/O it/O was/O so/O hot/O;/O his/O heart/O beat/O with/O short/O,/O rapid/O
throbs/O;/O his/O hands/O shook/O with/O excitement/O,/O and/O his/O weary/O legs/O stumbled/O and/O
staggered/O over/O the/O hillocks/O and/O in/O the/O swamp/O,/O but/O still/O he/O walked/O on/O and/O
still/O he/O shot/O./O At/O last/O,/O after/O a/O disgraceful/O miss/O,/O he/O flung/O his/O gun/O and/O
his/O hat/O on/O the/O ground/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O must/O control/O myself/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O./O Picking/O up/O his/O gun/O and/O
his/O hat/O,/O he/O called/O Laska/PERSON,/O and/O went/O out/O of/O the/O swamp/O./O When/O he/O got/O on/O to/O
dry/O ground/O he/O sat/O down/O,/O pulled/O off/O his/O boot/O and/O emptied/O it/O,/O then/O walked/O
to/O the/O marsh/O,/O drank/O some/O stagnant-tasting/O water/O,/O moistened/O his/O burning/O
hot/O gun/O,/O and/O washed/O his/O face/O and/O hands/O./O Feeling/O refreshed/O,/O he/O went/O back/O
to/O the/O spot/O where/O a/O snipe/O had/O settled/O,/O firmly/O resolved/O to/O keep/O cool/O./O

He/O tried/O to/O be/O calm/O,/O but/O it/O was/O the/O same/O again/O./O His/O finger/O pressed/O the/O
cock/O before/O he/O had/O taken/O a/O good/O aim/O at/O the/O bird/O./O It/O got/O worse/O and/O worse/O./O

He/O had/O only/O five/O birds/O in/O his/O game-bag/O when/O he/O walked/O out/O of/O the/O marsh/O
towards/O the/O alders/O where/O he/O was/O to/O rejoin/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

Before/O he/O caught/O sight/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON he/O saw/O his/O dog/O./O Krak/PERSON
darted/O out/O from/O behind/O the/O twisted/O root/O of/O an/O alder/O,/O black/O all/O over/O with/O
the/O stinking/O mire/O of/O the/O marsh/O,/O and/O with/O the/O air/O of/O a/O conqueror/O sniffed/O
at/O Laska/LOCATION./O Behind/O Krak/O there/O came/O into/O view/O in/O the/O shade/O of/O the/O alder/O
tree/O the/O shapely/O figure/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O He/O came/O to/O meet/O him/O,/O red/O
and/O perspiring/O,/O with/O unbuttoned/O neckband/O,/O still/O limping/O in/O the/O same/O way/O./O

``/OWell/O?/O You/O have/O been/O popping/O away/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O smiling/O good-humoredly/O./O

``/OHow/O have/O you/O got/O on/O?/O''/O queried/O Levin/PERSON./O But/O there/O was/O no/O need/O to/O ask/O,/O for/O
he/O had/O already/O seen/O the/O full/O game/O bag/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O pretty/O fair/O./O''/O

He/O had/O fourteen/O birds/O./O

``/OA/O splendid/O marsh/O!/O I/O've/O no/O doubt/O Veslovsky/PERSON got/O in/O your/O way/O./O It/O's/O awkward/O
too/O,/O shooting/O with/O one/O dog/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O to/O soften/O his/O
triumph/O./O



Chapter/O 11/O


When/O Levin/PERSON and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON reached/O the/O peasant/O's/O hut/O where/O Levin/PERSON
always/O used/O to/O stay/O,/O Veslovsky/PERSON was/O already/O there/O./O He/O was/O sitting/O in/O the/O
middle/O of/O the/O hut/O,/O clinging/O with/O both/O hands/O to/O the/O bench/O from/O which/O he/O
was/O being/O pulled/O by/O a/O soldier/O,/O the/O brother/O of/O the/O peasant/O's/O wife/O,/O who/O
was/O helping/O him/O off/O with/O his/O miry/O boots/O./O Veslovsky/PERSON was/O laughing/O his/O
infectious/O,/O good-humored/O laugh/O./O

``/OI/O've/O only/O just/O come/O./O _/OIls/O ont/O été/O charmants/O_/O./O Just/O fancy/O,/O they/O gave/O me/O
drink/O,/O fed/O me/O!/O Such/O bread/O,/O it/O was/O exquisite/O!/O _/ODelicieux/O!/O_/O And/O the/O vodka/O,/O
I/O never/O tasted/O any/O better/O./O And/O they/O would/O not/O take/O a/O penny/O for/O anything/O./O
And/O they/O kept/O saying/O:/O `/OExcuse/O our/O homely/O ways/O./O'/O''/O

``/OWhat/O should/O they/O take/O anything/O for/O?/O They/O were/O entertaining/O you/O,/O to/O be/O
sure/O./O Do/O you/O suppose/O they/O keep/O vodka/O for/O sale/O?/O''/O said/O the/O soldier/O,/O
succeeding/O at/O last/O in/O pulling/O the/O soaked/O boot/O off/O the/O blackened/O
stocking/O./O

In/O spite/O of/O the/O dirtiness/O of/O the/O hut/O,/O which/O was/O all/O muddied/O by/O their/O
boots/O and/O the/O filthy/O dogs/O licking/O themselves/O clean/O,/O and/O the/O smell/O of/O
marsh/O mud/O and/O powder/O that/O filled/O the/O room/O,/O and/O the/O absence/O of/O knives/O and/O
forks/O,/O the/O party/O drank/O their/O tea/O and/O ate/O their/O supper/O with/O a/O relish/O only/O
known/O to/O sportsmen/O./O Washed/O and/O clean/O,/O they/O went/O into/O a/O hay-barn/O swept/O
ready/O for/O them/O,/O where/O the/O coachman/O had/O been/O making/O up/O beds/O for/O the/O
gentlemen/O./O

Though/O it/O was/O dusk/O,/O not/O one/O of/O them/O wanted/O to/O go/O to/O sleep/O./O

After/O wavering/O among/O reminiscences/O and/O anecdotes/O of/O guns/O,/O of/O dogs/O,/O and/O
of/O former/O shooting/O parties/O,/O the/O conversation/O rested/O on/O a/O topic/O that/O
interested/O all/O of/O them/O./O After/O Vassenka/PERSON had/O several/O times/O over/O expressed/O
his/O appreciation/O of/O this/O delightful/O sleeping/O place/O among/O the/O fragrant/O
hay/O,/O this/O delightful/O broken/O cart/O -LRB-/Ohe/O supposed/O it/O to/O be/O broken/O because/O
the/O shafts/O had/O been/O taken/O out/O-RRB-/O,/O of/O the/O good/O nature/O of/O the/O peasants/O that/O
had/O treated/O him/O to/O vodka/O,/O of/O the/O dogs/O who/O lay/O at/O the/O feet/O of/O their/O
respective/O masters/O,/O Oblonsky/PERSON began/O telling/O them/O of/O a/O delightful/O shooting/O
party/O at/O Malthus/PERSON's/O,/O where/O he/O had/O stayed/O the/O previous/O summer/O./O

Malthus/PERSON was/O a/O well-known/O capitalist/O,/O who/O had/O made/O his/O money/O by/O
speculation/O in/O railway/O shares/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON described/O what/O grouse/O
moors/O this/O Malthus/PERSON had/O bought/O in/O the/O Tver/LOCATION province/O,/O and/O how/O they/O were/O
preserved/O,/O and/O of/O the/O carriages/O and/O dogcarts/O in/O which/O the/O shooting/O party/O
had/O been/O driven/O,/O and/O the/O luncheon/O pavilion/O that/O had/O been/O rigged/O up/O at/O
the/O marsh/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O understand/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O sitting/O up/O in/O the/O hay/O;/O ``/Ohow/O is/O it/O
such/O people/O do/On't/O disgust/O you/O?/O I/O can/O understand/O a/O lunch/O with/O Lafitte/PERSON is/O
all/O very/O pleasant/O,/O but/O do/On't/O you/O dislike/O just/O that/O very/O sumptuousness/O?/O
All/O these/O people/O,/O just/O like/O our/O spirit/O monopolists/O in/O old/O days/O,/O get/O
their/O money/O in/O a/O way/O that/O gains/O them/O the/O contempt/O of/O everyone/O./O They/O
do/On't/O care/O for/O their/O contempt/O,/O and/O then/O they/O use/O their/O dishonest/O gains/O
to/O buy/O off/O the/O contempt/O they/O have/O deserved/O./O''/O

``/OPerfectly/O true/O!/O''/O chimed/O in/O Vassenka/LOCATION Veslovsky/LOCATION./O ``/OPerfectly/O!/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O of/O
course/O,/O goes/O out/O of/O _/Obonhomie/O_/O,/O but/O other/O people/O say/O:/O `/OWell/O,/O Oblonsky/PERSON
stays/O with/O them/O./O'/O.../O''/O

``/ONot/O a/O bit/O of/O it/O./O''/O Levin/PERSON could/O hear/O that/O Oblonsky/PERSON was/O smiling/O as/O he/O
spoke/O./O ``/OI/O simply/O do/On't/O consider/O him/O more/O dishonest/O than/O any/O other/O
wealthy/O merchant/O or/O nobleman/O./O They/O've/O all/O made/O their/O money/O alike/O--/Oby/O
their/O work/O and/O their/O intelligence/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O by/O what/O work/O?/O Do/O you/O call/O it/O work/O to/O get/O hold/O of/O concessions/O and/O
speculate/O with/O them/O?/O''/O

``/OOf/O course/O it/O's/O work/O./O Work/O in/O this/O sense/O,/O that/O if/O it/O were/O not/O for/O him/O
and/O others/O like/O him/O,/O there/O would/O have/O been/O no/O railways/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O that/O's/O not/O work/O,/O like/O the/O work/O of/O a/O peasant/O or/O a/O learned/O
profession/O./O''/O

``/OGranted/O,/O but/O it/O's/O work/O in/O the/O sense/O that/O his/O activity/O produces/O a/O
result/O--/Othe/O railways/O./O But/O of/O course/O you/O think/O the/O railways/O useless/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O that/O's/O another/O question/O;/O I/O am/O prepared/O to/O admit/O that/O they/O're/O
useful/O./O But/O all/O profit/O that/O is/O out/O of/O proportion/O to/O the/O labor/O expended/O
is/O dishonest/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O who/O is/O to/O define/O what/O is/O proportionate/O?/O''/O

``/OMaking/O profit/O by/O dishonest/O means/O,/O by/O trickery/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O conscious/O
that/O he/O could/O not/O draw/O a/O distinct/O line/O between/O honesty/O and/O dishonesty/O./O
``/OSuch/O as/O banking/O,/O for/O instance/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O an/O evil/O--/Othe/O amassing/O
of/O huge/O fortunes/O without/O labor/O,/O just/O the/O same/O thing/O as/O with/O the/O spirit/O
monopolies/O,/O it/O's/O only/O the/O form/O that/O's/O changed/O./O _/OLe/O roi/O est/O mort/O,/O vive/O le/O
roi/O_/O./O No/O sooner/O were/O the/O spirit/O monopolies/O abolished/O than/O the/O railways/O
came/O up/O,/O and/O banking/O companies/O;/O that/O,/O too/O,/O is/O profit/O without/O work/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O may/O all/O be/O very/O true/O and/O clever/O.../O./O Lie/O down/O,/O Krak/PERSON!/O''/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON called/O to/O his/O dog/O,/O who/O was/O scratching/O and/O turning/O over/O all/O
the/O hay/O./O He/O was/O obviously/O convinced/O of/O the/O correctness/O of/O his/O position/O,/O
and/O so/O talked/O serenely/O and/O without/O haste/O./O ``/OBut/O you/O have/O not/O drawn/O the/O
line/O between/O honest/O and/O dishonest/O work/O./O That/O I/O receive/O a/O bigger/O salary/O
than/O my/O chief/O clerk/O,/O though/O he/O knows/O more/O about/O the/O work/O than/O I/O
do/O--/Othat/O's/O dishonest/O,/O I/O suppose/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O say/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O but/O I/O can/O tell/O you/O:/O your/O receiving/O some/O five/O thousand/O,/O let/O's/O say/O,/O
for/O your/O work/O on/O the/O land/O,/O while/O our/O host/O,/O the/O peasant/O here/O,/O however/O
hard/O he/O works/O,/O can/O never/O get/O more/O than/O fifty/O roubles/O,/O is/O just/O as/O
dishonest/O as/O my/O earning/O more/O than/O my/O chief/O clerk/O,/O and/O Malthus/PERSON getting/O
more/O than/O a/O station-master/O./O No/O,/O quite/O the/O contrary/O;/O I/O see/O that/O society/O
takes/O up/O a/O sort/O of/O antagonistic/O attitude/O to/O these/O people/O,/O which/O is/O
utterly/O baseless/O,/O and/O I/O fancy/O there/O's/O envy/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O it/O.../O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O that/O's/O unfair/O,/O''/O said/O Veslovsky/PERSON;/O ``/Ohow/O could/O envy/O come/O in/O?/O There/O is/O
something/O not/O nice/O about/O that/O sort/O of/O business/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O say/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON went/O on/O,/O ``/Othat/O it/O's/O unjust/O for/O me/O to/O receive/O five/O
thousand/O,/O while/O the/O peasant/O has/O fifty/O;/O that/O's/O true/O./O It/O is/O unfair/O,/O and/O I/O
feel/O it/O,/O but/O.../O''/O

``/OIt/O really/O is/O./O Why/O is/O it/O we/O spend/O our/O time/O riding/O,/O drinking/O,/O shooting/O,/O
doing/O nothing/O,/O while/O they/O are/O forever/O at/O work/O?/O''/O said/O Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON,/O
obviously/O for/O the/O first/O time/O in/O his/O life/O reflecting/O on/O the/O question/O,/O and/O
consequently/O considering/O it/O with/O perfect/O sincerity/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O feel/O it/O,/O but/O you/O do/On't/O give/O him/O your/O property/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O intentionally/O,/O as/O it/O seemed/O,/O provoking/O Levin/PERSON./O

There/O had/O arisen/O of/O late/O something/O like/O a/O secret/O antagonism/O between/O the/O
two/O brothers-in-law/O;/O as/O though/O,/O since/O they/O had/O married/O sisters/O,/O a/O kind/O
of/O rivalry/O had/O sprung/O up/O between/O them/O as/O to/O which/O was/O ordering/O his/O life/O
best/O,/O and/O now/O this/O hostility/O showed/O itself/O in/O the/O conversation/O,/O as/O it/O
began/O to/O take/O a/O personal/O note/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O give/O it/O away/O,/O because/O no/O one/O demands/O that/O from/O me/O,/O and/O if/O I/O
wanted/O to/O,/O I/O could/O not/O give/O it/O away/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Oand/O have/O no/O one/O
to/O give/O it/O to/O./O''/O

``/OGive/O it/O to/O this/O peasant/O,/O he/O would/O not/O refuse/O it/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O how/O am/O I/O to/O give/O it/O up/O?/O Am/O I/O to/O go/O to/O him/O and/O make/O a/O deed/O of/O
conveyance/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O;/O but/O if/O you/O are/O convinced/O that/O you/O have/O no/O right/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O at/O all/O convinced/O./O On/O the/O contrary/O,/O I/O feel/O I/O have/O no/O right/O to/O
give/O it/O up/O,/O that/O I/O have/O duties/O both/O to/O the/O land/O and/O to/O my/O family/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O excuse/O me/O,/O but/O if/O you/O consider/O this/O inequality/O is/O unjust/O,/O why/O is/O it/O
you/O do/On't/O act/O accordingly/O?/O.../O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O do/O act/O negatively/O on/O that/O idea/O,/O so/O far/O as/O not/O trying/O to/O
increase/O the/O difference/O of/O position/O existing/O between/O him/O and/O me/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O excuse/O me/O,/O that/O's/O a/O paradox/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O there/O's/O something/O of/O a/O sophistry/O about/O that/O,/O''/O Veslovsky/PERSON agreed/O./O
``/OAh/O!/O our/O host/O;/O so/O you/O're/O not/O asleep/O yet/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O peasant/O who/O
came/O into/O the/O barn/O,/O opening/O the/O creaking/O door/O./O ``/OHow/O is/O it/O you/O're/O not/O
asleep/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O how/O's/O one/O to/O sleep/O!/O I/O thought/O our/O gentlemen/O would/O be/O asleep/O,/O but/O I/O
heard/O them/O chattering/O./O I/O want/O to/O get/O a/O hook/O from/O here/O./O She/O wo/On't/O bite/O?/O''/O
he/O added/O,/O stepping/O cautiously/O with/O his/O bare/O feet/O./O

``/OAnd/O where/O are/O you/O going/O to/O sleep/O?/O''/O

``/OWe/O are/O going/O out/O for/O the/O night/O with/O the/O beasts/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O what/O a/O night/O!/O''/O said/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O looking/O out/O at/O the/O edge/O of/O the/O hut/O
and/O the/O unharnessed/O wagonette/O that/O could/O be/O seen/O in/O the/O faint/O light/O of/O
the/O evening/O glow/O in/O the/O great/O frame/O of/O the/O open/O doors/O./O ``/OBut/O listen/O,/O
there/O are/O women/O's/O voices/O singing/O,/O and/O,/O on/O my/O word/O,/O not/O badly/O too/O./O Who/O's/O
that/O singing/O,/O my/O friend/O?/O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O the/O maids/O from/O hard/O by/O here/O./O''/O

``/OLet/O's/O go/O,/O let/O's/O have/O a/O walk/O!/O We/O sha/On't/O go/O to/O sleep/O,/O you/O know/O./O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O
come/O along/O!/O''/O

``/OIf/O one/O could/O only/O do/O both/O,/O lie/O here/O and/O go/O,/O''/O answered/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O
stretching/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O capital/O lying/O here/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O shall/O go/O by/O myself/O,/O''/O said/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O eagerly/O,/O and/O
putting/O on/O his/O shoes/O and/O stockings/O./O ``/OGood-bye/O,/O gentlemen/O./O If/O it/O's/O fun/O,/O
I/O'll/O fetch/O you/O./O You/O've/O treated/O me/O to/O some/O good/O sport/O,/O and/O I/O wo/On't/O forget/O
you/O./O''/O

``/OHe/O really/O is/O a/O capital/O fellow/O,/O is/On't/O he/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
when/O Veslovsky/PERSON had/O gone/O out/O and/O the/O peasant/O had/O closed/O the/O door/O after/O
him/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O capital/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O still/O thinking/O of/O the/O subject/O of/O their/O
conversation/O just/O before/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O he/O had/O clearly/O expressed/O
his/O thoughts/O and/O feelings/O to/O the/O best/O of/O his/O capacity/O,/O and/O yet/O both/O of/O
them/O,/O straightforward/O men/O and/O not/O fools/O,/O had/O said/O with/O one/O voice/O that/O he/O
was/O comforting/O himself/O with/O sophistries/O./O This/O disconcerted/O him/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O just/O this/O,/O my/O dear/O boy/O./O One/O must/O do/O one/O of/O two/O things/O:/O either/O
admit/O that/O the/O existing/O order/O of/O society/O is/O just/O,/O and/O then/O stick/O up/O for/O
one/O's/O rights/O in/O it/O;/O or/O acknowledge/O that/O you/O are/O enjoying/O unjust/O
privileges/O,/O as/O I/O do/O,/O and/O then/O enjoy/O them/O and/O be/O satisfied/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O if/O it/O were/O unjust/O,/O you/O could/O not/O enjoy/O these/O advantages/O and/O be/O
satisfied/O--/Oat/O least/O I/O could/O not/O./O The/O great/O thing/O for/O me/O is/O to/O feel/O that/O
I/O'm/O not/O to/O blame/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O say/O,/O why/O not/O go/O after/O all/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
evidently/O weary/O of/O the/O strain/O of/O thought/O./O ``/OWe/O sha/On't/O go/O to/O sleep/O,/O you/O
know/O./O Come/O,/O let/O's/O go/O!/O''/O

Levin/PERSON did/O not/O answer/O./O What/O they/O had/O said/O in/O the/O conversation/O,/O that/O he/O
acted/O justly/O only/O in/O a/O negative/O sense/O,/O absorbed/O his/O thoughts/O./O ``/OCan/O it/O be/O
that/O it/O's/O only/O possible/O to/O be/O just/O negatively/O?/O''/O he/O was/O asking/O himself/O./O

``/OHow/O strong/O the/O smell/O of/O the/O fresh/O hay/O is/O,/O though/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O./O ``/OThere/O's/O not/O a/O chance/O of/O sleeping/O./O Vassenka/LOCATION
has/O been/O getting/O up/O some/O fun/O there/O./O Do/O you/O hear/O the/O laughing/O and/O his/O
voice/O?/O Had/On't/O we/O better/O go/O?/O Come/O along/O!/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O coming/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OSurely/O that/O's/O not/O a/O matter/O of/O principle/O too/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
smiling/O,/O as/O he/O felt/O about/O in/O the/O dark/O for/O his/O cap/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O a/O matter/O of/O principle/O,/O but/O why/O should/O I/O go/O?/O''/O

``/OBut/O do/O you/O know/O you/O are/O preparing/O trouble/O for/O yourself/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O finding/O his/O cap/O and/O getting/O up/O./O

``/OHow/O so/O?/O''/O

``/ODo/O you/O suppose/O I/O do/On't/O see/O the/O line/O you/O've/O taken/O up/O with/O your/O wife/O?/O I/O
heard/O how/O it/O's/O a/O question/O of/O the/O greatest/O consequence/O,/O whether/O or/O not/O
you/O're/O to/O be/O away/O for/O a/O couple/O of/O days/O'/O shooting/O./O That/O's/O all/O very/O well/O
as/O an/O idyllic/O episode/O,/O but/O for/O your/O whole/O life/O that/O wo/On't/O answer/O./O A/O man/O
must/O be/O independent/O;/O he/O has/O his/O masculine/O interests/O./O A/O man/O has/O to/O be/O
manly/O,/O''/O said/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O opening/O the/O door/O./O

``/OIn/O what/O way/O?/O To/O go/O running/O after/O servant/O girls/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWhy/O not/O,/O if/O it/O amuses/O him/O?/O _/OÇa/O ne/O tire/O pas/O a/O consequence/O_/O./O It/O wo/On't/O do/O
my/O wife/O any/O harm/O,/O and/O it/O'll/O amuse/O me/O./O The/O great/O thing/O is/O to/O respect/O the/O
sanctity/O of/O the/O home/O./O There/O should/O be/O nothing/O in/O the/O home/O./O But/O do/On't/O tie/O
your/O own/O hands/O./O''/O

``/OPerhaps/O so/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON dryly/O,/O and/O he/O turned/O on/O his/O side/O./O ``/OTomorrow/O,/O
early/O,/O I/O want/O to/O go/O shooting/O,/O and/O I/O wo/On't/O wake/O anyone/O,/O and/O shall/O set/O off/O
at/O daybreak/O./O''/O

''/O_/OMessieurs/O,/O venez/O vite/O!/O_/O''/O they/O heard/O the/O voice/O of/O Veslovsky/O coming/O
back/O./O ''/O_/OCharmante/O!/O_/O I/O've/O made/O such/O a/O discovery/O./O _/OCharmante/O!/O_/O a/O perfect/O
Gretchen/PERSON,/O and/O I/O've/O already/O made/O friends/O with/O her/O./O Really/O,/O exceedingly/O
pretty/O,/O''/O he/O declared/O in/O a/O tone/O of/O approval/O,/O as/O though/O she/O had/O been/O made/O
pretty/O entirely/O on/O his/O account/O,/O and/O he/O was/O expressing/O his/O satisfaction/O
with/O the/O entertainment/O that/O had/O been/O provided/O for/O him/O./O

Levin/PERSON pretended/O to/O be/O asleep/O,/O while/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O putting/O on/O his/O slippers/O,/O
and/O lighting/O a/O cigar/O,/O walked/O out/O of/O the/O barn/O,/O and/O soon/O their/O voices/O were/O
lost/O./O

For/O a/O long/O while/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O get/O to/O sleep/O./O He/O heard/O the/O horses/O
munching/O hay/O,/O then/O he/O heard/O the/O peasant/O and/O his/O elder/O boy/O getting/O ready/O
for/O the/O night/O,/O and/O going/O off/O for/O the/O night/O watch/O with/O the/O beasts/O,/O then/O
he/O heard/O the/O soldier/O arranging/O his/O bed/O on/O the/O other/O side/O of/O the/O barn/O,/O
with/O his/O nephew/O,/O the/O younger/O son/O of/O their/O peasant/O host/O./O He/O heard/O the/O boy/O
in/O his/O shrill/O little/O voice/O telling/O his/O uncle/O what/O he/O thought/O about/O the/O
dogs/O,/O who/O seemed/O to/O him/O huge/O and/O terrible/O creatures/O,/O and/O asking/O what/O the/O
dogs/O were/O going/O to/O hunt/O next/O day/O,/O and/O the/O soldier/O in/O a/O husky/O,/O sleepy/O
voice/O,/O telling/O him/O the/O sportsmen/O were/O going/O in/O the/O morning/O to/O the/O marsh/O,/O
and/O would/O shoot/O with/O their/O guns/O;/O and/O then/O,/O to/O check/O the/O boy/O's/O questions/O,/O
he/O said/O,/O ``/OGo/O to/O sleep/O,/O Vaska/PERSON;/O go/O to/O sleep/O,/O or/O you/O'll/O catch/O it/O,/O''/O and/O soon/O
after/O he/O began/O snoring/O himself/O,/O and/O everything/O was/O still/O./O He/O could/O only/O
hear/O the/O snort/O of/O the/O horses/O,/O and/O the/O guttural/O cry/O of/O a/O snipe/O./O

``/OIs/O it/O really/O only/O negative/O?/O''/O he/O repeated/O to/O himself/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O what/O of/O it/O?/O
It/O's/O not/O my/O fault/O./O''/O And/O he/O began/O thinking/O about/O the/O next/O day/O./O

``/OTomorrow/O I/O'll/O go/O out/O early/O,/O and/O I/O'll/O make/O a/O point/O of/O keeping/O cool/O./O
There/O are/O lots/O of/O snipe/O;/O and/O there/O are/O grouse/O too/O./O When/O I/O come/O back/O
there/O'll/O be/O the/O note/O from/O Kitty/PERSON./O Yes/O,/O Stiva/PERSON may/O be/O right/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O manly/O
with/O her/O,/O I/O'm/O tied/O to/O her/O apron-strings/O.../O./O Well/O,/O it/O ca/On't/O be/O helped/O!/O
Negative/O again/O.../O''/O

Half/O asleep/O,/O he/O heard/O the/O laughter/O and/O mirthful/O talk/O of/O Veslovsky/PERSON and/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O For/O an/O instant/O he/O opened/O his/O eyes/O:/O the/O moon/O was/O up/O,/O
and/O in/O the/O open/O doorway/O,/O brightly/O lighted/O up/O by/O the/O moonlight/O,/O they/O were/O
standing/O talking/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O saying/O something/O of/O the/O
freshness/O of/O one/O girl/O,/O comparing/O her/O to/O a/O freshly/O peeled/O nut/O,/O and/O
Veslovsky/PERSON with/O his/O infectious/O laugh/O was/O repeating/O some/O words/O,/O probably/O
said/O to/O him/O by/O a/O peasant/O:/O ``/OAh/O,/O you/O do/O your/O best/O to/O get/O round/O her/O!/O''/O
Levin/PERSON,/O half/O asleep/O,/O said/O:/O

``/OGentlemen/O,/O tomorrow/O before/O daylight/O!/O''/O and/O fell/O asleep/O./O



Chapter/O 12/O


Waking/O up/O at/O earliest/O dawn/O,/O Levin/PERSON tried/O to/O wake/O his/O companions/O./O
Vassenka/PERSON,/O lying/O on/O his/O stomach/O,/O with/O one/O leg/O in/O a/O stocking/O thrust/O out/O,/O
was/O sleeping/O so/O soundly/O that/O he/O could/O elicit/O no/O response/O./O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O half/O
asleep/O,/O declined/O to/O get/O up/O so/O early/O./O Even/O Laska/PERSON,/O who/O was/O asleep/O,/O curled/O
up/O in/O the/O hay/O,/O got/O up/O unwillingly/O,/O and/O lazily/O stretched/O out/O and/O
straightened/O her/O hind/O legs/O one/O after/O the/O other/O./O Getting/O on/O his/O boots/O and/O
stockings/O,/O taking/O his/O gun/O,/O and/O carefully/O opening/O the/O creaking/O door/O of/O
the/O barn/O,/O Levin/PERSON went/O out/O into/O the/O road/O./O The/O coachmen/O were/O sleeping/O in/O
their/O carriages/O,/O the/O horses/O were/O dozing/O./O Only/O one/O was/O lazily/O eating/O
oats/O,/O dipping/O its/O nose/O into/O the/O manger/O./O It/O was/O still/O gray/O out-of-doors/O./O

``/OWhy/O are/O you/O up/O so/O early/O,/O my/O dear/O?/O''/O the/O old/O woman/O,/O their/O hostess/O,/O said/O,/O
coming/O out/O of/O the/O hut/O and/O addressing/O him/O affectionately/O as/O an/O old/O
friend/O./O

``/OGoing/O shooting/O,/O granny/O./O Do/O I/O go/O this/O way/O to/O the/O marsh/O?/O''/O

``/OStraight/O out/O at/O the/O back/O;/O by/O our/O threshing/O floor/O,/O my/O dear/O,/O and/O hemp/O
patches/O;/O there/O's/O a/O little/O footpath/O./O''/O Stepping/O carefully/O with/O her/O
sunburnt/O,/O bare/O feet/O,/O the/O old/O woman/O conducted/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O moved/O back/O the/O
fence/O for/O him/O by/O the/O threshing/O floor/O./O

``/OStraight/O on/O and/O you/O'll/O come/O to/O the/O marsh/O./O Our/O lads/O drove/O the/O cattle/O
there/O yesterday/O evening/O./O''/O

Laska/PERSON ran/O eagerly/O forward/O along/O the/O little/O path/O./O Levin/PERSON followed/O her/O with/O
a/O light/O,/O rapid/O step/O,/O continually/O looking/O at/O the/O sky/O./O He/O hoped/O the/O sun/O
would/O not/O be/O up/O before/O he/O reached/O the/O marsh/O./O But/O the/O sun/O did/O not/O delay/O./O
The/O moon/O,/O which/O had/O been/O bright/O when/O he/O went/O out/O,/O by/O now/O shone/O only/O like/O
a/O crescent/O of/O quicksilver/O./O The/O pink/O flush/O of/O dawn/O,/O which/O one/O could/O not/O
help/O seeing/O before/O,/O now/O had/O to/O be/O sought/O to/O be/O discerned/O at/O all/O./O What/O
were/O before/O undefined/O,/O vague/O blurs/O in/O the/O distant/O countryside/O could/O now/O
be/O distinctly/O seen/O./O They/O were/O sheaves/O of/O rye/O./O The/O dew/O,/O not/O visible/O till/O
the/O sun/O was/O up/O,/O wetted/O Levin/PERSON's/O legs/O and/O his/O blouse/O above/O his/O belt/O in/O the/O
high/O growing/O,/O fragrant/O hemp/O patch/O,/O from/O which/O the/O pollen/O had/O already/O
fallen/O out/O./O In/O the/O transparent/O stillness/O of/O morning/O the/O smallest/O sounds/O
were/O audible/O./O A/O bee/O flew/O by/O Levin/PERSON's/O ear/O with/O the/O whizzing/O sound/O of/O a/O
bullet/O./O He/O looked/O carefully/O,/O and/O saw/O a/O second/O and/O a/O third/O./O They/O were/O all/O
flying/O from/O the/O beehives/O behind/O the/O hedge/O,/O and/O they/O disappeared/O over/O the/O
hemp/O patch/O in/O the/O direction/O of/O the/O marsh/O./O The/O path/O led/O straight/O to/O the/O
marsh/O./O The/O marsh/O could/O be/O recognized/O by/O the/O mist/O which/O rose/O from/O it/O,/O
thicker/O in/O one/O place/O and/O thinner/O in/O another/O,/O so/O that/O the/O reeds/O and/O
willow/O bushes/O swayed/O like/O islands/O in/O this/O mist/O./O At/O the/O edge/O of/O the/O marsh/O
and/O the/O road/O,/O peasant/O boys/O and/O men/O,/O who/O had/O been/O herding/O for/O the/O night/O,/O
were/O lying/O,/O and/O in/O the/O dawn/O all/O were/O asleep/O under/O their/O coats/O./O Not/O far/O
from/O them/O were/O three/O hobbled/O horses/O./O One/O of/O them/O clanked/O a/O chain/O./O Laska/PERSON
walked/O beside/O her/O master/O,/O pressing/O a/O little/O forward/O and/O looking/O round/O./O
Passing/O the/O sleeping/O peasants/O and/O reaching/O the/O first/O reeds/O,/O Levin/PERSON
examined/O his/O pistols/O and/O let/O his/O dog/O off/O./O One/O of/O the/O horses/O,/O a/O sleek/O,/O
dark-brown/O three-year-old/O,/O seeing/O the/O dog/O,/O started/O away/O,/O switched/O its/O
tail/O and/O snorted/O./O The/O other/O horses/O too/O were/O frightened/O,/O and/O splashing/O
through/O the/O water/O with/O their/O hobbled/O legs/O,/O and/O drawing/O their/O hoofs/O out/O
of/O the/O thick/O mud/O with/O a/O squelching/O sound/O,/O they/O bounded/O out/O of/O the/O marsh/O./O
Laska/PERSON stopped/O,/O looking/O ironically/O at/O the/O horses/O and/O inquiringly/O at/O
Levin/PERSON./O Levin/PERSON patted/O Laska/PERSON,/O and/O whistled/O as/O a/O sign/O that/O she/O might/O begin/O./O
