Laska/PERSON ran/O joyfully/O and/O anxiously/O through/O the/O slush/O that/O swayed/O under/O
her/O./O

Running/O into/O the/O marsh/O among/O the/O familiar/O scents/O of/O roots/O,/O marsh/O plants/O,/O
and/O slime/O,/O and/O the/O extraneous/O smell/O of/O horse/O dung/O,/O Laska/PERSON detected/O at/O
once/O a/O smell/O that/O pervaded/O the/O whole/O marsh/O,/O the/O scent/O of/O that/O
strong-smelling/O bird/O that/O always/O excited/O her/O more/O than/O any/O other/O./O Here/O
and/O there/O among/O the/O moss/O and/O marsh/O plants/O this/O scent/O was/O very/O strong/O,/O
but/O it/O was/O impossible/O to/O determine/O in/O which/O direction/O it/O grew/O stronger/O
or/O fainter/O./O To/O find/O the/O direction/O,/O she/O had/O to/O go/O farther/O away/O from/O the/O
wind/O./O Not/O feeling/O the/O motion/O of/O her/O legs/O,/O Laska/PERSON bounded/O with/O a/O stiff/O
gallop/O,/O so/O that/O at/O each/O bound/O she/O could/O stop/O short/O,/O to/O the/O right/O,/O away/O
from/O the/O wind/O that/O blew/O from/O the/O east/O before/O sunrise/O,/O and/O turned/O facing/O
the/O wind/O./O Sniffing/O in/O the/O air/O with/O dilated/O nostrils/O,/O she/O felt/O at/O once/O
that/O not/O their/O tracks/O only/O but/O they/O themselves/O were/O here/O before/O her/O,/O and/O
not/O one/O,/O but/O many/O./O Laska/PERSON slackened/O her/O speed/O./O They/O were/O here/O,/O but/O where/O
precisely/O she/O could/O not/O yet/O determine/O./O To/O find/O the/O very/O spot/O,/O she/O began/O
to/O make/O a/O circle/O,/O when/O suddenly/O her/O master/O's/O voice/O drew/O her/O off/O./O ``/OLaska/PERSON!/O
here/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O,/O pointing/O her/O to/O a/O different/O direction/O./O She/O stopped/O,/O
asking/O him/O if/O she/O had/O better/O not/O go/O on/O doing/O as/O she/O had/O begun/O./O But/O he/O
repeated/O his/O command/O in/O an/O angry/O voice/O,/O pointing/O to/O a/O spot/O covered/O with/O
water/O,/O where/O there/O could/O not/O be/O anything/O./O She/O obeyed/O him/O,/O pretending/O she/O
was/O looking/O,/O so/O as/O to/O please/O him/O,/O went/O round/O it/O,/O and/O went/O back/O to/O her/O
former/O position/O,/O and/O was/O at/O once/O aware/O of/O the/O scent/O again/O./O Now/O when/O he/O
was/O not/O hindering/O her/O,/O she/O knew/O what/O to/O do/O,/O and/O without/O looking/O at/O what/O
was/O under/O her/O feet/O,/O and/O to/O her/O vexation/O stumbling/O over/O a/O high/O stump/O into/O
the/O water/O,/O but/O righting/O herself/O with/O her/O strong/O,/O supple/O legs/O,/O she/O began/O
making/O the/O circle/O which/O was/O to/O make/O all/O clear/O to/O her/O./O The/O scent/O of/O them/O
reached/O her/O,/O stronger/O and/O stronger/O,/O and/O more/O and/O more/O defined/O,/O and/O all/O
at/O once/O it/O became/O perfectly/O clear/O to/O her/O that/O one/O of/O them/O was/O here/O,/O
behind/O this/O tuft/O of/O reeds/O,/O five/O paces/O in/O front/O of/O her/O;/O she/O stopped/O,/O and/O
her/O whole/O body/O was/O still/O and/O rigid/O./O On/O her/O short/O legs/O she/O could/O see/O
nothing/O in/O front/O of/O her/O,/O but/O by/O the/O scent/O she/O knew/O it/O was/O sitting/O not/O
more/O than/O five/O paces/O off/O./O She/O stood/O still/O,/O feeling/O more/O and/O more/O
conscious/O of/O it/O,/O and/O enjoying/O it/O in/O anticipation/O./O Her/O tail/O was/O stretched/O
straight/O and/O tense/O,/O and/O only/O wagging/O at/O the/O extreme/O end/O./O Her/O mouth/O was/O
slightly/O open/O,/O her/O ears/O raised/O./O One/O ear/O had/O been/O turned/O wrong/O side/O out/O
as/O she/O ran/O up/O,/O and/O she/O breathed/O heavily/O but/O warily/O,/O and/O still/O more/O
warily/O looked/O round/O,/O but/O more/O with/O her/O eyes/O than/O her/O head/O,/O to/O her/O
master/O./O He/O was/O coming/O along/O with/O the/O face/O she/O knew/O so/O well/O,/O though/O the/O
eyes/O were/O always/O terrible/O to/O her/O./O He/O stumbled/O over/O the/O stump/O as/O he/O came/O,/O
and/O moved/O,/O as/O she/O thought/O,/O extraordinarily/O slowly/O./O She/O thought/O he/O came/O
slowly/O,/O but/O he/O was/O running/O./O

Noticing/O Laska/PERSON's/O special/O attitude/O as/O she/O crouched/O on/O the/O ground/O,/O as/O it/O
were/O,/O scratching/O big/O prints/O with/O her/O hind/O paws/O,/O and/O with/O her/O mouth/O
slightly/O open/O,/O Levin/PERSON knew/O she/O was/O pointing/O at/O grouse/O,/O and/O with/O an/O inward/O
prayer/O for/O luck/O,/O especially/O with/O the/O first/O bird/O,/O he/O ran/O up/O to/O her/O./O
Coming/O quite/O close/O up/O to/O her/O,/O he/O could/O from/O his/O height/O look/O beyond/O her/O,/O
and/O he/O saw/O with/O his/O eyes/O what/O she/O was/O seeing/O with/O her/O nose/O./O In/O a/O space/O
between/O two/O little/O thickets/O,/O at/O a/O couple/O of/O yards/O'/O distance/O,/O he/O could/O
see/O a/O grouse/O./O Turning/O its/O head/O,/O it/O was/O listening/O./O Then/O lightly/O preening/O
and/O folding/O its/O wings/O,/O it/O disappeared/O round/O a/O corner/O with/O a/O clumsy/O wag/O
of/O its/O tail/O./O

``/OFetch/O it/O,/O fetch/O it/O!/O''/O shouted/O Levin/PERSON,/O giving/O Laska/PERSON a/O shove/O from/O behind/O./O

``/OBut/O I/O ca/On't/O go/O,/O''/O thought/O Laska/PERSON./O ``/OWhere/O am/O I/O to/O go/O?/O From/O here/O I/O feel/O
them/O,/O but/O if/O I/O move/O forward/O I/O shall/O know/O nothing/O of/O where/O they/O are/O or/O
who/O they/O are/O./O''/O But/O then/O he/O shoved/O her/O with/O his/O knee/O,/O and/O in/O an/O excited/O
whisper/O said/O,/O ``/OFetch/O it/O,/O Laska/PERSON./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O if/O that/O's/O what/O he/O wishes/O,/O I/O'll/O do/O it/O,/O but/O I/O ca/On't/O answer/O for/O
myself/O now/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O and/O darted/O forward/O as/O fast/O as/O her/O legs/O would/O
carry/O her/O between/O the/O thick/O bushes/O./O She/O scented/O nothing/O now/O;/O she/O could/O
only/O see/O and/O hear/O,/O without/O understanding/O anything/O./O

Ten/O paces/O from/O her/O former/O place/O a/O grouse/O rose/O with/O a/O guttural/O cry/O and/O
the/O peculiar/O round/O sound/O of/O its/O wings/O./O And/O immediately/O after/O the/O shot/O it/O
splashed/O heavily/O with/O its/O white/O breast/O on/O the/O wet/O mire/O./O Another/O bird/O did/O
not/O linger/O,/O but/O rose/O behind/O Levin/PERSON without/O the/O dog/O./O When/O Levin/PERSON turned/O
towards/O it/O,/O it/O was/O already/O some/O way/O off/O./O But/O his/O shot/O caught/O it/O./O Flying/O
twenty/O paces/O further/O,/O the/O second/O grouse/O rose/O upwards/O,/O and/O whirling/O round/O
like/O a/O ball/O,/O dropped/O heavily/O on/O a/O dry/O place/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O this/O is/O going/O to/O be/O some/O good/O!/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O packing/O the/O warm/O
and/O fat/O grouse/O into/O his/O game/O bag/O./O ``/OEh/O,/O Laska/PERSON,/O will/O it/O be/O good/O?/O''/O

When/O Levin/PERSON,/O after/O loading/O his/O gun/O,/O moved/O on/O,/O the/O sun/O had/O fully/O risen/O,/O
though/O unseen/O behind/O the/O storm-clouds/O./O The/O moon/O had/O lost/O all/O of/O its/O
luster/O,/O and/O was/O like/O a/O white/O cloud/O in/O the/O sky/O./O Not/O a/O single/O star/O could/O
be/O seen/O./O The/O sedge/O,/O silvery/O with/O dew/O before/O,/O now/O shone/O like/O gold/O./O The/O
stagnant/O pools/O were/O all/O like/O amber/O./O The/O blue/O of/O the/O grass/O had/O changed/O to/O
yellow-green/O./O The/O marsh/O birds/O twittered/O and/O swarmed/O about/O the/O brook/O and/O
upon/O the/O bushes/O that/O glittered/O with/O dew/O and/O cast/O long/O shadows/O./O A/O hawk/O
woke/O up/O and/O settled/O on/O a/O haycock/O,/O turning/O its/O head/O from/O side/O to/O side/O and/O
looking/O discontentedly/O at/O the/O marsh/O./O Crows/O were/O flying/O about/O the/O field/O,/O
and/O a/O bare-legged/O boy/O was/O driving/O the/O horses/O to/O an/O old/O man/O,/O who/O had/O got/O
up/O from/O under/O his/O long/O coat/O and/O was/O combing/O his/O hair/O./O The/O smoke/O from/O the/O
gun/O was/O white/O as/O milk/O over/O the/O green/O of/O the/O grass/O./O

One/O of/O the/O boys/O ran/O up/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OUncle/O,/O there/O were/O ducks/O here/O yesterday/O!/O''/O he/O shouted/O to/O him/O,/O and/O he/O
walked/O a/O little/O way/O off/O behind/O him/O./O

And/O Levin/PERSON was/O doubly/O pleased/O,/O in/O sight/O of/O the/O boy/O,/O who/O expressed/O his/O
approval/O,/O at/O killing/O three/O snipe/O,/O one/O after/O another/O,/O straight/O off/O./O



Chapter/O 13/O


The/O sportsman/O's/O saying/O,/O that/O if/O the/O first/O beast/O or/O the/O first/O bird/O is/O not/O
missed/O,/O the/O day/O will/O be/O lucky/O,/O turned/O out/O correct/O./O

At/O ten/O o'clock/O Levin/PERSON,/O weary/O,/O hungry/O,/O and/O happy/O after/O a/O tramp/O of/O twenty/O
miles/O,/O returned/O to/O his/O night/O's/O lodging/O with/O nineteen/O head/O of/O fine/O game/O
and/O one/O duck/O,/O which/O he/O tied/O to/O his/O belt/O,/O as/O it/O would/O not/O go/O into/O the/O
game/O bag/O./O His/O companions/O had/O long/O been/O awake/O,/O and/O had/O had/O time/O to/O get/O
hungry/O and/O have/O breakfast/O./O

``/OWait/O a/O bit/O,/O wait/O a/O bit/O,/O I/O know/O there/O are/O nineteen/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O
counting/O a/O second/O time/O over/O the/O grouse/O and/O snipe/O,/O that/O looked/O so/O much/O
less/O important/O now/O,/O bent/O and/O dry/O and/O bloodstained/O,/O with/O heads/O crooked/O
aside/O,/O than/O they/O did/O when/O they/O were/O flying/O./O

The/O number/O was/O verified/O,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O envy/O pleased/O Levin/PERSON./O
He/O was/O pleased/O too/O on/O returning/O to/O find/O the/O man/O sent/O by/O Kitty/PERSON with/O a/O
note/O was/O already/O there/O./O

``/OI/O am/O perfectly/O well/O and/O happy/O./O If/O you/O were/O uneasy/O about/O me/O,/O you/O can/O
feel/O easier/O than/O ever/O./O I/O've/O a/O new/O bodyguard/O,/O Marya/PERSON Vlasyevna/PERSON,/O''/O--/Othis/O was/O
the/O midwife/O,/O a/O new/O and/O important/O personage/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O domestic/O life/O./O
``/OShe/O has/O come/O to/O have/O a/O look/O at/O me/O./O She/O found/O me/O perfectly/O well/O,/O and/O we/O
have/O kept/O her/O till/O you/O are/O back/O./O All/O are/O happy/O and/O well/O,/O and/O please/O,/O
do/On't/O be/O in/O a/O hurry/O to/O come/O back/O,/O but/O,/O if/O the/O sport/O is/O good/O,/O stay/O
another/O day/O./O''/O

These/O two/O pleasures/O,/O his/O lucky/O shooting/O and/O the/O letter/O from/O his/O wife/O,/O
were/O so/O great/O that/O two/O slightly/O disagreeable/O incidents/O passed/O lightly/O
over/O Levin/PERSON./O One/O was/O that/O the/O chestnut/O trace/O horse/O,/O who/O had/O been/O
unmistakably/O overworked/O on/O the/O previous/O day/O,/O was/O off/O his/O feed/O and/O out/O of/O
sorts/O./O The/O coachman/O said/O he/O was/O ``/OOverdriven/O yesterday/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON
Dmitrievitch/PERSON./O Yes/O,/O indeed/O!/O driven/O ten/O miles/O with/O no/O sense/O!/O''/O

The/O other/O unpleasant/O incident/O,/O which/O for/O the/O first/O minute/O destroyed/O his/O
good/O humor/O,/O though/O later/O he/O laughed/O at/O it/O a/O great/O deal/O,/O was/O to/O find/O that/O
of/O all/O the/O provisions/O Kitty/PERSON had/O provided/O in/O such/O abundance/O that/O one/O
would/O have/O thought/O there/O was/O enough/O for/O a/O week/O,/O nothing/O was/O left/O./O On/O his/O
way/O back/O,/O tired/O and/O hungry/O from/O shooting/O,/O Levin/PERSON had/O so/O distinct/O a/O vision/O
of/O meat-pies/O that/O as/O he/O approached/O the/O hut/O he/O seemed/O to/O smell/O and/O taste/O
them/O,/O as/O Laska/PERSON had/O smelt/O the/O game/O,/O and/O he/O immediately/O told/O Philip/PERSON to/O
give/O him/O some/O./O It/O appeared/O that/O there/O were/O no/O pies/O left/O,/O nor/O even/O any/O
chicken/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O this/O fellow/O's/O appetite/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O laughing/O and/O
pointing/O at/O Vassenka/LOCATION Veslovsky/LOCATION./O ``/OI/O never/O suffer/O from/O loss/O of/O appetite/O,/O
but/O he/O's/O really/O marvelous/O!/O.../O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O it/O ca/On't/O be/O helped/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O looking/O gloomily/O at/O Veslovsky/LOCATION./O
``/OWell/O,/O Philip/PERSON,/O give/O me/O some/O beef/O,/O then/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O beef/O's/O been/O eaten/O,/O and/O the/O bones/O given/O to/O the/O dogs/O,/O''/O answered/O
Philip/PERSON./O

Levin/PERSON was/O so/O hurt/O that/O he/O said/O,/O in/O a/O tone/O of/O vexation/O,/O ``/OYou/O might/O have/O
left/O me/O something/O!/O''/O and/O he/O felt/O ready/O to/O cry/O./O

``/OThen/O put/O away/O the/O game/O,/O''/O he/O said/O in/O a/O shaking/O voice/O to/O Philip/LOCATION,/O trying/O
not/O to/O look/O at/O Vassenka/LOCATION,/O ``/Oand/O cover/O them/O with/O some/O nettles/O./O And/O you/O
might/O at/O least/O ask/O for/O some/O milk/O for/O me/O./O''/O

But/O when/O he/O had/O drunk/O some/O milk/O,/O he/O felt/O ashamed/O immediately/O at/O having/O
shown/O his/O annoyance/O to/O a/O stranger/O,/O and/O he/O began/O to/O laugh/O at/O his/O hungry/O
mortification/O./O

In/O the/O evening/O they/O went/O shooting/O again/O,/O and/O Veslovsky/PERSON had/O several/O
successful/O shots/O,/O and/O in/O the/O night/O they/O drove/O home/O./O

Their/O homeward/O journey/O was/O as/O lively/O as/O their/O drive/O out/O had/O been/O./O
Veslovsky/PERSON sang/O songs/O and/O related/O with/O enjoyment/O his/O adventures/O with/O the/O
peasants/O,/O who/O had/O regaled/O him/O with/O vodka/O,/O and/O said/O to/O him/O,/O ``/OExcuse/O our/O
homely/O ways/O,/O''/O and/O his/O night/O's/O adventures/O with/O kiss-in-the-ring/O and/O the/O
servant-girl/O and/O the/O peasant/O,/O who/O had/O asked/O him/O was/O he/O married/O,/O and/O on/O
learning/O that/O he/O was/O not/O,/O said/O to/O him/O,/O ``/OWell/O,/O mind/O you/O do/On't/O run/O after/O
other/O men/O's/O wives/O--/Oyou/O'd/O better/O get/O one/O of/O your/O own/O./O''/O These/O words/O had/O
particularly/O amused/O Veslovsky/PERSON./O

``/OAltogether/O,/O I/O've/O enjoyed/O our/O outing/O awfully/O./O And/O you/O,/O Levin/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OI/O have/O,/O very/O much/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O quite/O sincerely/O./O It/O was/O particularly/O
delightful/O to/O him/O to/O have/O got/O rid/O of/O the/O hostility/O he/O had/O been/O feeling/O
towards/O Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON at/O home/O,/O and/O to/O feel/O instead/O the/O most/O
friendly/O disposition/O to/O him/O./O



Chapter/O 14/O


Next/O day/O at/O ten/O o'clock/O Levin/PERSON,/O who/O had/O already/O gone/O his/O rounds/O,/O knocked/O
at/O the/O room/O where/O Vassenka/LOCATION had/O been/O put/O for/O the/O night/O./O

''/O_/OEntrez/O!/O_/O''/O Veslovsky/PERSON called/O to/O him/O./O ``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O I/O've/O only/O just/O finished/O
my/O ablutions/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O smiling/O,/O standing/O before/O him/O in/O his/O underclothes/O
only/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O mind/O me/O,/O please/O./O''/O Levin/PERSON sat/O down/O in/O the/O window/O./O ``/OHave/O you/O slept/O
well/O?/O''/O

``/OLike/O the/O dead/O./O What/O sort/O of/O day/O is/O it/O for/O shooting/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O will/O you/O take/O,/O tea/O or/O coffee/O?/O''/O

``/ONeither/O./O I/O'll/O wait/O till/O lunch/O./O I/O'm/O really/O ashamed/O./O I/O suppose/O the/O ladies/O
are/O down/O?/O A/O walk/O now/O would/O be/O capital/O./O You/O show/O me/O your/O horses/O./O''/O

After/O walking/O about/O the/O garden/O,/O visiting/O the/O stable/O,/O and/O even/O doing/O some/O
gymnastic/O exercises/O together/O on/O the/O parallel/O bars/O,/O Levin/PERSON returned/O to/O the/O
house/O with/O his/O guest/O,/O and/O went/O with/O him/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O

``/OWe/O had/O splendid/O shooting/O,/O and/O so/O many/O delightful/O experiences/O!/O''/O said/O
Veslovsky/PERSON,/O going/O up/O to/O Kitty/PERSON,/O who/O was/O sitting/O at/O the/O samovar/O./O ``/OWhat/O a/O
pity/O ladies/O are/O cut/O off/O from/O these/O delights/O!/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O suppose/O he/O must/O say/O something/O to/O the/O lady/O of/O the/O house/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON
said/O to/O himself/O./O Again/O he/O fancied/O something/O in/O the/O smile/O,/O in/O the/O
all-conquering/O air/O with/O which/O their/O guest/O addressed/O Kitty/PERSON.../O./O

The/O princess/O,/O sitting/O on/O the/O other/O side/O of/O the/O table/O with/O Marya/PERSON
Vlasyevna/PERSON and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O called/O Levin/PERSON to/O her/O side/O,/O and/O began/O
to/O talk/O to/O him/O about/O moving/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION for/O Kitty/PERSON's/O confinement/O,/O and/O
getting/O ready/O rooms/O for/O them/O./O Just/O as/O Levin/PERSON had/O disliked/O all/O the/O trivial/O
preparations/O for/O his/O wedding/O,/O as/O derogatory/O to/O the/O grandeur/O of/O the/O
event/O,/O now/O he/O felt/O still/O more/O offensive/O the/O preparations/O for/O the/O
approaching/O birth/O,/O the/O date/O of/O which/O they/O reckoned/O,/O it/O seemed/O,/O on/O their/O
fingers/O./O He/O tried/O to/O turn/O a/O deaf/O ear/O to/O these/O discussions/O of/O the/O best/O
patterns/O of/O long/O clothes/O for/O the/O coming/O baby/O;/O tried/O to/O turn/O away/O and/O
avoid/O seeing/O the/O mysterious/O,/O endless/O strips/O of/O knitting/O,/O the/O triangles/O
of/O linen/O,/O and/O so/O on/O,/O to/O which/O Dolly/O attached/O special/O importance/O./O The/O
birth/O of/O a/O son/O -LRB-/Ohe/O was/O certain/O it/O would/O be/O a/O son/O-RRB-/O which/O was/O promised/O
him/O,/O but/O which/O he/O still/O could/O not/O believe/O in/O--/Oso/O marvelous/O it/O
seemed/O--/Opresented/O itself/O to/O his/O mind/O,/O on/O one/O hand/O,/O as/O a/O happiness/O so/O
immense/O,/O and/O therefore/O so/O incredible/O;/O on/O the/O other/O,/O as/O an/O event/O so/O
mysterious/O,/O that/O this/O assumption/O of/O a/O definite/O knowledge/O of/O what/O would/O
be/O,/O and/O consequent/O preparation/O for/O it/O,/O as/O for/O something/O ordinary/O that/O
did/O happen/O to/O people/O,/O jarred/O on/O him/O as/O confusing/O and/O humiliating/O./O

But/O the/O princess/O did/O not/O understand/O his/O feelings/O,/O and/O put/O down/O his/O
reluctance/O to/O think/O and/O talk/O about/O it/O to/O carelessness/O and/O indifference/O,/O
and/O so/O she/O gave/O him/O no/O peace/O./O She/O had/O commissioned/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
to/O look/O at/O a/O flat/O,/O and/O now/O she/O called/O Levin/PERSON up/O./O

``/OI/O know/O nothing/O about/O it/O,/O princess/O./O Do/O as/O you/O think/O fit/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OYou/O must/O decide/O when/O you/O will/O move/O./O''/O

``/OI/O really/O do/On't/O know/O./O I/O know/O millions/O of/O children/O are/O born/O away/O from/O
Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O doctors/O .../O why/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O if/O so/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O as/O Kitty/PERSON wishes/O./O''/O

``/OWe/O ca/On't/O talk/O to/O Kitty/PERSON about/O it/O!/O Do/O you/O want/O me/O to/O frighten/O her/O?/O Why/O,/O
this/O spring/O Natalia/PERSON Golitzina/PERSON died/O from/O having/O an/O ignorant/O doctor/O./O''/O

``/OI/O will/O do/O just/O what/O you/O say/O,/O''/O he/O said/O gloomily/O./O

The/O princess/O began/O talking/O to/O him/O,/O but/O he/O did/O not/O hear/O her/O./O Though/O the/O
conversation/O with/O the/O princess/O had/O indeed/O jarred/O upon/O him/O,/O he/O was/O
gloomy/O,/O not/O on/O account/O of/O that/O conversation/O,/O but/O from/O what/O he/O saw/O at/O the/O
samovar/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O it/O's/O impossible/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O glancing/O now/O and/O then/O at/O Vassenka/LOCATION
bending/O over/O Kitty/PERSON,/O telling/O her/O something/O with/O his/O charming/O smile/O,/O and/O
at/O her/O,/O flushed/O and/O disturbed/O./O

There/O was/O something/O not/O nice/O in/O Vassenka/LOCATION's/O attitude/O,/O in/O his/O eyes/O,/O in/O his/O
smile/O./O Levin/PERSON even/O saw/O something/O not/O nice/O in/O Kitty/PERSON's/O attitude/O and/O look/O./O
And/O again/O the/O light/O died/O away/O in/O his/O eyes/O./O Again/O,/O as/O before/O,/O all/O of/O a/O
sudden/O,/O without/O the/O slightest/O transition/O,/O he/O felt/O cast/O down/O from/O a/O
pinnacle/O of/O happiness/O,/O peace/O,/O and/O dignity/O,/O into/O an/O abyss/O of/O despair/O,/O
rage/O,/O and/O humiliation/O./O Again/O everything/O and/O everyone/O had/O become/O hateful/O
to/O him/O./O

``/OYou/O do/O just/O as/O you/O think/O best/O,/O princess/O,/O''/O he/O said/O again/O,/O looking/O round/O./O

``/OHeavy/O is/O the/O cap/O of/O Monomach/LOCATION,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O playfully/O,/O
hinting/O,/O evidently/O,/O not/O simply/O at/O the/O princess/O's/O conversation/O,/O but/O at/O
the/O cause/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O agitation/O,/O which/O he/O had/O noticed/O./O

``/OHow/O late/O you/O are/O today/O,/O Dolly/PERSON!/O''/O

Everyone/O got/O up/O to/O greet/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON./O Vassenka/O only/O rose/O for/O an/O
instant/O,/O and/O with/O the/O lack/O of/O courtesy/O to/O ladies/O characteristic/O of/O the/O
modern/O young/O man/O,/O he/O scarcely/O bowed/O,/O and/O resumed/O his/O conversation/O again/O,/O
laughing/O at/O something/O./O

``/OI/O've/O been/O worried/O about/O Masha/PERSON./O She/O did/O not/O sleep/O well/O,/O and/O is/O
dreadfully/O tiresome/O today/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O

The/O conversation/O Vassenka/LOCATION had/O started/O with/O Kitty/PERSON was/O running/O on/O the/O same/O
lines/O as/O on/O the/O previous/O evening/O,/O discussing/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O whether/O love/O is/O
to/O be/O put/O higher/O than/O worldly/O considerations/O./O Kitty/PERSON disliked/O the/O
conversation/O,/O and/O she/O was/O disturbed/O both/O by/O the/O subject/O and/O the/O tone/O in/O
which/O it/O was/O conducted/O,/O and/O also/O by/O the/O knowledge/O of/O the/O effect/O it/O would/O
have/O on/O her/O husband/O./O But/O she/O was/O too/O simple/O and/O innocent/O to/O know/O how/O to/O
cut/O short/O this/O conversation/O,/O or/O even/O to/O conceal/O the/O superficial/O pleasure/O
afforded/O her/O by/O the/O young/O man/O's/O very/O obvious/O admiration/O./O She/O wanted/O to/O
stop/O it/O,/O but/O she/O did/O not/O know/O what/O to/O do/O./O Whatever/O she/O did/O she/O knew/O
would/O be/O observed/O by/O her/O husband/O,/O and/O the/O worst/O interpretation/O put/O on/O
it/O./O And/O,/O in/O fact/O,/O when/O she/O asked/O Dolly/PERSON what/O was/O wrong/O with/O Masha/PERSON,/O and/O
Vassenka/LOCATION,/O waiting/O till/O this/O uninteresting/O conversation/O was/O over/O,/O began/O
to/O gaze/O indifferently/O at/O Dolly/LOCATION,/O the/O question/O struck/O Levin/PERSON as/O an/O
unnatural/O and/O disgusting/O piece/O of/O hypocrisy/O./O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O say/O,/O shall/O we/O go/O and/O look/O for/O mushrooms/O today/O?/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OBy/O all/O means/O,/O please/O,/O and/O I/O shall/O come/O too/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O and/O she/O
blushed/O./O She/O wanted/O from/O politeness/O to/O ask/O Vassenka/PERSON whether/O he/O would/O
come/O,/O and/O she/O did/O not/O ask/O him/O./O ``/OWhere/O are/O you/O going/O,/O Kostya/PERSON?/O''/O she/O asked/O
her/O husband/O with/O a/O guilty/O face/O,/O as/O he/O passed/O by/O her/O with/O a/O resolute/O
step/O./O This/O guilty/O air/O confirmed/O all/O his/O suspicions/O./O

``/OThe/O mechanician/O came/O when/O I/O was/O away/O;/O I/O have/On't/O seen/O him/O yet/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
not/O looking/O at/O her/O./O

He/O went/O downstairs/O,/O but/O before/O he/O had/O time/O to/O leave/O his/O study/O he/O heard/O
his/O wife/O's/O familiar/O footsteps/O running/O with/O reckless/O speed/O to/O him/O./O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O want/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O her/O shortly/O./O ``/OWe/O are/O busy/O./O''/O

``/OI/O beg/O your/O pardon/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O the/O German/O mechanician/O;/O ``/OI/O want/O a/O few/O
words/O with/O my/O husband/O./O''/O

The/O German/O would/O have/O left/O the/O room/O,/O but/O Levin/PERSON said/O to/O him/O:/O

``/ODo/On't/O disturb/O yourself/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O train/O is/O at/O three/O?/O''/O queried/O the/O German/O./O ``/OI/O must/On't/O be/O late/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON did/O not/O answer/O him/O,/O but/O walked/O out/O himself/O with/O his/O wife/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O have/O you/O to/O say/O to/O me/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O her/O in/O French/O./O

He/O did/O not/O look/O her/O in/O the/O face/O,/O and/O did/O not/O care/O to/O see/O that/O she/O in/O her/O
condition/O was/O trembling/O all/O over/O,/O and/O had/O a/O piteous/O,/O crushed/O look/O./O

``/OI/O .../O I/O want/O to/O say/O that/O we/O ca/On't/O go/O on/O like/O this/O;/O that/O this/O is/O
misery/O.../O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OThe/O servants/O are/O here/O at/O the/O sideboard/O,/O''/O he/O said/O angrily/O;/O ``/Odo/On't/O make/O a/O
scene/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O let/O's/O go/O in/O here/O!/O''/O

They/O were/O standing/O in/O the/O passage/O./O Kitty/PERSON would/O have/O gone/O into/O the/O next/O
room/O,/O but/O there/O the/O English/O governess/O was/O giving/O Tanya/PERSON a/O lesson/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O come/O into/O the/O garden/O./O''/O

In/O the/O garden/O they/O came/O upon/O a/O peasant/O weeding/O the/O path/O./O And/O no/O longer/O
considering/O that/O the/O peasant/O could/O see/O her/O tear-stained/O and/O his/O agitated/O
face/O,/O that/O they/O looked/O like/O people/O fleeing/O from/O some/O disaster/O,/O they/O went/O
on/O with/O rapid/O steps/O,/O feeling/O that/O they/O must/O speak/O out/O and/O clear/O up/O
misunderstandings/O,/O must/O be/O alone/O together/O,/O and/O so/O get/O rid/O of/O the/O misery/O
they/O were/O both/O feeling/O./O

``/OWe/O ca/On't/O go/O on/O like/O this/O!/O It/O's/O misery/O!/O I/O am/O wretched/O;/O you/O are/O wretched/O./O
What/O for/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O when/O they/O had/O at/O last/O reached/O a/O solitary/O garden/O
seat/O at/O a/O turn/O in/O the/O lime/O tree/O avenue/O./O

``/OBut/O tell/O me/O one/O thing/O:/O was/O there/O in/O his/O tone/O anything/O unseemly/O,/O not/O
nice/O,/O humiliatingly/O horrible/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O standing/O before/O her/O again/O in/O the/O
same/O position/O with/O his/O clenched/O fists/O on/O his/O chest/O,/O as/O he/O had/O stood/O
before/O her/O that/O night/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O she/O said/O in/O a/O shaking/O voice/O;/O ``/Obut/O,/O Kostya/PERSON,/O surely/O you/O see/O I/O'm/O not/O
to/O blame/O?/O All/O the/O morning/O I/O've/O been/O trying/O to/O take/O a/O tone/O .../O but/O such/O
people/O.../O./O Why/O did/O he/O come/O?/O How/O happy/O we/O were/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O breathless/O
with/O the/O sobs/O that/O shook/O her/O./O

Although/O nothing/O had/O been/O pursuing/O them/O,/O and/O there/O was/O nothing/O to/O run/O
away/O from/O,/O and/O they/O could/O not/O possibly/O have/O found/O anything/O very/O
delightful/O on/O that/O garden/O seat/O,/O the/O gardener/O saw/O with/O astonishment/O that/O
they/O passed/O him/O on/O their/O way/O home/O with/O comforted/O and/O radiant/O faces/O./O



Chapter/O 15/O


After/O escorting/O his/O wife/O upstairs/O,/O Levin/PERSON went/O to/O Dolly/PERSON's/O part/O of/O the/O
house/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O for/O her/O part/O,/O was/O in/O great/O distress/O too/O that/O
day/O./O She/O was/O walking/O about/O the/O room/O,/O talking/O angrily/O to/O a/O little/O girl/O,/O
who/O stood/O in/O the/O corner/O roaring/O./O

``/OAnd/O you/O shall/O stand/O all/O day/O in/O the/O corner/O,/O and/O have/O your/O dinner/O all/O
alone/O,/O and/O not/O see/O one/O of/O your/O dolls/O,/O and/O I/O wo/On't/O make/O you/O a/O new/O frock/O,/O''/O
she/O said/O,/O not/O knowing/O how/O to/O punish/O her/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O she/O is/O a/O disgusting/O child/O!/O''/O she/O turned/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OWhere/O does/O she/O
get/O such/O wicked/O propensities/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O what/O has/O she/O done/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O without/O much/O interest/O,/O for/O he/O had/O
wanted/O to/O ask/O her/O advice/O,/O and/O so/O was/O annoyed/O that/O he/O had/O come/O at/O an/O
unlucky/O moment/O./O

``/OGrisha/PERSON and/O she/O went/O into/O the/O raspberries/O,/O and/O there/O .../O I/O ca/On't/O tell/O
you/O really/O what/O she/O did/O./O It/O's/O a/O thousand/O pities/O Miss/O Elliot/PERSON's/O not/O with/O
us/O./O This/O one/O sees/O to/O nothing/O--/Oshe/O's/O a/O machine/O.../O _/OFigurez-vous/O que/O la/O
petite/O_/O?/O.../O''/O

And/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON described/O Masha/PERSON's/O crime/O./O

``/OThat/O proves/O nothing/O;/O it/O's/O not/O a/O question/O of/O evil/O propensities/O at/O all/O,/O
it/O's/O simply/O mischief/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON assured/O her/O./O

``/OBut/O you/O are/O upset/O about/O something/O?/O What/O have/O you/O come/O for/O?/O''/O asked/O
Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OWhat/O's/O going/O on/O there/O?/O''/O

And/O in/O the/O tone/O of/O her/O question/O Levin/PERSON heard/O that/O it/O would/O be/O easy/O for/O
him/O to/O say/O what/O he/O had/O meant/O to/O say/O./O

``/OI/O've/O not/O been/O in/O there/O,/O I/O've/O been/O alone/O in/O the/O garden/O with/O Kitty/PERSON./O We/O've/O
had/O a/O quarrel/O for/O the/O second/O time/O since/O .../O Stiva/O came/O./O''/O

Dolly/PERSON looked/O at/O him/O with/O her/O shrewd/O,/O comprehending/O eyes/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O tell/O me/O,/O honor/O bright/O,/O has/O there/O been/O .../O not/O in/O Kitty/LOCATION,/O but/O in/O
that/O gentleman/O's/O behavior/O,/O a/O tone/O which/O might/O be/O unpleasant/O--/Onot/O
unpleasant/O,/O but/O horrible/O,/O offensive/O to/O a/O husband/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O mean/O,/O how/O shall/O I/O say/O.../O./O Stay/O,/O stay/O in/O the/O corner/O!/O''/O she/O said/O to/O
Masha/PERSON,/O who/O,/O detecting/O a/O faint/O smile/O in/O her/O mother/O's/O face/O,/O had/O been/O
turning/O round/O./O ``/OThe/O opinion/O of/O the/O world/O would/O be/O that/O he/O is/O behaving/O as/O
young/O men/O do/O behave/O./O _/OIl/O fait/O la/O cour/O à/O une/O jeune/O et/O jolie/O femme/O_/O,/O and/O a/O
husband/O who/O's/O a/O man/O of/O the/O world/O should/O only/O be/O flattered/O by/O it/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON gloomily/O;/O ``/Obut/O you/O noticed/O it/O?/O''/O

``/ONot/O only/O I/O,/O but/O Stiva/PERSON noticed/O it/O./O Just/O after/O breakfast/O he/O said/O to/O me/O in/O
so/O many/O words/O,/O _/OJe/O crois/O que/O Veslovsky/PERSON fait/O un/O petit/O brin/O de/O cour/O à/O
Kitty/PERSON_/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O that/O's/O all/O right/O then/O;/O now/O I/O'm/O satisfied/O./O I/O'll/O send/O him/O away/O,/O''/O
said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O mean/O!/O Are/O you/O crazy/O?/O''/O Dolly/PERSON cried/O in/O horror/O;/O ``/Ononsense/O,/O
Kostya/PERSON,/O only/O think/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O laughing/O./O ``/OYou/O can/O go/O now/O to/O Fanny/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O to/O Masha/PERSON./O ``/ONo/O,/O if/O you/O wish/O it/O,/O I/O'll/O speak/O to/O Stiva/PERSON./O He/O'll/O take/O him/O
away/O./O He/O can/O say/O you/O're/O expecting/O visitors/O./O Altogether/O he/O does/On't/O fit/O
into/O the/O house/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O no/O,/O I/O'll/O do/O it/O myself/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O you/O'll/O quarrel/O with/O him/O?/O''/O

``/ONot/O a/O bit/O./O I/O shall/O so/O enjoy/O it/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O,/O his/O eyes/O flashing/O with/O
real/O enjoyment/O./O ``/OCome/O,/O forgive/O her/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O she/O wo/On't/O do/O it/O again/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O of/O the/O little/O sinner/O,/O who/O had/O not/O gone/O to/O Fanny/ORGANIZATION,/O but/O was/O standing/O
irresolutely/O before/O her/O mother/O,/O waiting/O and/O looking/O up/O from/O under/O her/O
brows/O to/O catch/O her/O mother/O's/O eye/O./O

The/O mother/O glanced/O at/O her/O./O The/O child/O broke/O into/O sobs/O,/O hid/O her/O face/O on/O
her/O mother/O's/O lap/O,/O and/O Dolly/PERSON laid/O her/O thin/O,/O tender/O hand/O on/O her/O head/O./O

``/OAnd/O what/O is/O there/O in/O common/O between/O us/O and/O him/O?/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O he/O
went/O off/O to/O look/O for/O Veslovsky/PERSON./O

As/O he/O passed/O through/O the/O passage/O he/O gave/O orders/O for/O the/O carriage/O to/O be/O
got/O ready/O to/O drive/O to/O the/O station/O./O

``/OThe/O spring/O was/O broken/O yesterday/O,/O''/O said/O the/O footman/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O the/O covered/O trap/O,/O then/O,/O and/O make/O haste/O./O Where/O's/O the/O visitor/O?/O''/O

``/OThe/O gentleman/O's/O gone/O to/O his/O room/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON came/O upon/O Veslovsky/PERSON at/O the/O moment/O when/O the/O latter/O,/O having/O unpacked/O
his/O things/O from/O his/O trunk/O,/O and/O laid/O out/O some/O new/O songs/O,/O was/O putting/O on/O
his/O gaiters/O to/O go/O out/O riding/O./O

Whether/O there/O was/O something/O exceptional/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O face/O,/O or/O that/O
Vassenka/PERSON was/O himself/O conscious/O that/O _/Oce/O petit/O brin/O de/O cour/O_/O he/O was/O
making/O was/O out/O of/O place/O in/O this/O family/O,/O but/O he/O was/O somewhat/O -LRB-/Oas/O much/O as/O
a/O young/O man/O in/O society/O can/O be/O-RRB-/O disconcerted/O at/O Levin/PERSON's/O entrance/O./O

``/OYou/O ride/O in/O gaiters/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O much/O cleaner/O,/O''/O said/O Vassenka/PERSON,/O putting/O his/O fat/O leg/O on/O a/O chair/O,/O
fastening/O the/O bottom/O hook/O,/O and/O smiling/O with/O simple-hearted/O good/O humor/O./O

He/O was/O undoubtedly/O a/O good-natured/O fellow/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON felt/O sorry/O for/O him/O
and/O ashamed/O of/O himself/O,/O as/O his/O host/O,/O when/O he/O saw/O the/O shy/O look/O on/O
Vassenka/PERSON's/O face/O./O

On/O the/O table/O lay/O a/O piece/O of/O stick/O which/O they/O had/O broken/O together/O that/O
morning/O,/O trying/O their/O strength/O./O Levin/PERSON took/O the/O fragment/O in/O his/O hands/O and/O
began/O smashing/O it/O up/O,/O breaking/O bits/O off/O the/O stick/O,/O not/O knowing/O how/O to/O
begin/O./O

``/OI/O wanted/O.../O''/O He/O paused/O,/O but/O suddenly/O,/O remembering/O Kitty/PERSON and/O everything/O
that/O had/O happened/O,/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O him/O resolutely/O in/O the/O face/O:/O ``/OI/O have/O
ordered/O the/O horses/O to/O be/O put-to/O for/O you/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O so/O?/O''/O Vassenka/PERSON began/O in/O surprise/O./O ``/OTo/O drive/O where/O?/O''/O

``/OFor/O you/O to/O drive/O to/O the/O station/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O gloomily/O./O

``/OAre/O you/O going/O away/O,/O or/O has/O something/O happened/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O happens/O that/O I/O expect/O visitors/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O his/O strong/O fingers/O more/O
and/O more/O rapidly/O breaking/O off/O the/O ends/O of/O the/O split/O stick/O./O ``/OAnd/O I/O'm/O not/O
expecting/O visitors/O,/O and/O nothing/O has/O happened/O,/O but/O I/O beg/O you/O to/O go/O away/O./O
You/O can/O explain/O my/O rudeness/O as/O you/O like/O./O''/O

Vassenka/PERSON drew/O himself/O up/O./O

``/OI/O beg/O you/O to/O explain/O.../O''/O he/O said/O with/O dignity/O,/O understanding/O at/O last/O./O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O explain/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O softly/O and/O deliberately/O,/O trying/O to/O control/O
the/O trembling/O of/O his/O jaw/O;/O ``/Oand/O you/O'd/O better/O not/O ask/O./O''/O

And/O as/O the/O split/O ends/O were/O all/O broken/O off/O,/O Levin/PERSON clutched/O the/O thick/O ends/O
in/O his/O finger/O,/O broke/O the/O stick/O in/O two/O,/O and/O carefully/O caught/O the/O end/O as/O
it/O fell/O./O

Probably/O the/O sight/O of/O those/O nervous/O fingers/O,/O of/O the/O muscles/O he/O had/O
proved/O that/O morning/O at/O gymnastics/O,/O of/O the/O glittering/O eyes/O,/O the/O soft/O
voice/O,/O and/O quivering/O jaws/O,/O convinced/O Vassenka/PERSON better/O than/O any/O words/O./O He/O
bowed/O,/O shrugging/O his/O shoulders/O,/O and/O smiling/O contemptuously/O./O

``/OCan/O I/O not/O see/O Oblonsky/O?/O''/O

The/O shrug/O and/O the/O smile/O did/O not/O irritate/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWhat/O else/O was/O there/O for/O him/O to/O do/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

``/OI/O'll/O send/O him/O to/O you/O at/O once/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O madness/O is/O this/O?/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O when/O,/O after/O hearing/O
from/O his/O friend/O that/O he/O was/O being/O turned/O out/O of/O the/O house/O,/O he/O found/O
Levin/PERSON in/O the/O garden/O,/O where/O he/O was/O walking/O about/O waiting/O for/O his/O guest/O's/O
departure/O./O ''/O_/OMais/O c’est/O ridicule/O!/O_/O What/O fly/O has/O stung/O you/O?/O _/OMais/O c’est/O
du/O dernier/O ridicule/O!/O_/O What/O did/O you/O think/O,/O if/O a/O young/O man/O.../O''/O

But/O the/O place/O where/O Levin/PERSON had/O been/O stung/O was/O evidently/O still/O sore/O,/O for/O
he/O turned/O pale/O again/O,/O when/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON would/O have/O enlarged/O on/O
the/O reason/O,/O and/O he/O himself/O cut/O him/O short/O./O

``/OPlease/O do/On't/O go/O into/O it/O!/O I/O ca/On't/O help/O it/O./O I/O feel/O ashamed/O of/O how/O I/O'm/O
treating/O you/O and/O him/O./O But/O it/O wo/On't/O be/O,/O I/O imagine/O,/O a/O great/O grief/O to/O him/O
to/O go/O,/O and/O his/O presence/O was/O distasteful/O to/O me/O and/O to/O my/O wife/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O it/O's/O insulting/O to/O him/O!/O _/OEt/O puis/O c’est/O ridicule/O_/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O to/O me/O it/O's/O both/O insulting/O and/O distressing/O!/O And/O I/O'm/O not/O at/O fault/O in/O
any/O way/O,/O and/O there/O's/O no/O need/O for/O me/O to/O suffer/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O this/O I/O did/On't/O expect/O of/O you/O!/O _/OOn/O peut/O être/O jaloux/O,/O mais/O à/O ce/O
point/O,/O c’est/O du/O dernier/O ridicule/O!/O_/O''/O

Levin/PERSON turned/O quickly/O,/O and/O walked/O away/O from/O him/O into/O the/O depths/O of/O the/O
avenue/O,/O and/O he/O went/O on/O walking/O up/O and/O down/O alone/O./O Soon/O he/O heard/O the/O
rumble/O of/O the/O trap/O,/O and/O saw/O from/O behind/O the/O trees/O how/O Vassenka/LOCATION,/O sitting/O
in/O the/O hay/O -LRB-/Ounluckily/O there/O was/O no/O seat/O in/O the/O trap/O-RRB-/O in/O his/O Scotch/O cap/O,/O
was/O driven/O along/O the/O avenue/O,/O jolting/O up/O and/O down/O over/O the/O ruts/O./O

``/OWhat/O's/O this/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON thought/O,/O when/O a/O footman/O ran/O out/O of/O the/O house/O and/O
stopped/O the/O trap/O./O It/O was/O the/O mechanician/O,/O whom/O Levin/PERSON had/O totally/O
forgotten/O./O The/O mechanician/O,/O bowing/O low/O,/O said/O something/O to/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O
then/O clambered/O into/O the/O trap/O,/O and/O they/O drove/O off/O together/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON and/O the/O princess/O were/O much/O upset/O by/O Levin/PERSON's/O action/O./O
And/O he/O himself/O felt/O not/O only/O in/O the/O highest/O degree/O _/Oridicule/O_/O,/O but/O also/O
utterly/O guilty/O and/O disgraced/O./O But/O remembering/O what/O sufferings/O he/O and/O his/O
wife/O had/O been/O through/O,/O when/O he/O asked/O himself/O how/O he/O should/O act/O another/O
time/O,/O he/O answered/O that/O he/O should/O do/O just/O the/O same/O again/O./O

In/O spite/O of/O all/O this/O,/O towards/O the/O end/O of/O that/O day/O,/O everyone/O except/O the/O
princess/O,/O who/O could/O not/O pardon/O Levin/PERSON's/O action/O,/O became/O extraordinarily/O
lively/O and/O good/O humored/O,/O like/O children/O after/O a/O punishment/O or/O grown-up/O
people/O after/O a/O dreary/O,/O ceremonious/O reception/O,/O so/O that/O by/O the/O evening/O
Vassenka/PERSON's/O dismissal/O was/O spoken/O of/O,/O in/O the/O absence/O of/O the/O princess/O,/O as/O
though/O it/O were/O some/O remote/O event/O./O And/O Dolly/PERSON,/O who/O had/O inherited/O her/O
father/O's/O gift/O of/O humorous/O storytelling/O,/O made/O Varenka/LOCATION helpless/O with/O
laughter/O as/O she/O related/O for/O the/O third/O and/O fourth/O time/O,/O always/O with/O fresh/O
humorous/O additions/O,/O how/O she/O had/O only/O just/O put/O on/O her/O new/O shoes/O for/O the/O
benefit/O of/O the/O visitor/O,/O and/O on/O going/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O heard/O
suddenly/O the/O rumble/O of/O the/O trap/O./O And/O who/O should/O be/O in/O the/O trap/O but/O
Vassenka/PERSON himself/O,/O with/O his/O Scotch/O cap/O,/O and/O his/O songs/O and/O his/O gaiters/O,/O
and/O all/O,/O sitting/O in/O the/O hay/O./O

``/OIf/O only/O you/O'd/O ordered/O out/O the/O carriage/O!/O But/O no/O!/O and/O then/O I/O hear/O:/O
`/OStop/O!/O'/O Oh/O,/O I/O thought/O they/O've/O relented/O./O I/O look/O out/O,/O and/O behold/O a/O fat/O
German/O being/O sat/O down/O by/O him/O and/O driving/O away/O.../O./O And/O my/O new/O shoes/O all/O
for/O nothing/O!/O.../O''/O



Chapter/O 16/O


Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON carried/O out/O her/O intention/O and/O went/O to/O see/O Anna/PERSON./O She/O
was/O sorry/O to/O annoy/O her/O sister/O and/O to/O do/O anything/O Levin/PERSON disliked/O./O She/O
quite/O understood/O how/O right/O the/O Levins/O were/O in/O not/O wishing/O to/O have/O
anything/O to/O do/O with/O Vronsky/O./O But/O she/O felt/O she/O must/O go/O and/O see/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O
show/O her/O that/O her/O feelings/O could/O not/O be/O changed/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O change/O
in/O her/O position/O./O That/O she/O might/O be/O independent/O of/O the/O Levins/O in/O this/O
expedition/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON sent/O to/O the/O village/O to/O hire/O horses/O for/O
the/O drive/O;/O but/O Levin/PERSON learning/O of/O it/O went/O to/O her/O to/O protest/O./O

``/OWhat/O makes/O you/O suppose/O that/O I/O dislike/O your/O going/O?/O But/O,/O even/O if/O I/O did/O
dislike/O it/O,/O I/O should/O still/O more/O dislike/O your/O not/O taking/O my/O horses/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O./O ``/OYou/O never/O told/O me/O that/O you/O were/O going/O for/O certain/O./O Hiring/O horses/O
in/O the/O village/O is/O disagreeable/O to/O me/O,/O and/O,/O what/O's/O of/O more/O importance/O,/O
they/O'll/O undertake/O the/O job/O and/O never/O get/O you/O there/O./O I/O have/O horses/O./O And/O if/O
you/O do/On't/O want/O to/O wound/O me/O,/O you/O'll/O take/O mine/O./O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON had/O to/O consent/O,/O and/O on/O the/O day/O fixed/O Levin/PERSON had/O ready/O
for/O his/O sister-in-law/O a/O set/O of/O four/O horses/O and/O relays/O,/O getting/O them/O
together/O from/O the/O farm/O-/O and/O saddle-horses/O--/Onot/O at/O all/O a/O smart-looking/O
set/O,/O but/O capable/O of/O taking/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON the/O whole/O distance/O in/O a/O
single/O day/O./O At/O that/O moment/O,/O when/O horses/O were/O wanted/O for/O the/O princess/O,/O
who/O was/O going/O,/O and/O for/O the/O midwife/O,/O it/O was/O a/O difficult/O matter/O for/O Levin/PERSON
to/O make/O up/O the/O number/O,/O but/O the/O duties/O of/O hospitality/O would/O not/O let/O him/O
allow/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON to/O hire/O horses/O when/O staying/O in/O his/O house/O./O
Moreover/O,/O he/O was/O well/O aware/O that/O the/O twenty/O roubles/O that/O would/O be/O asked/O
for/O the/O journey/O were/O a/O serious/O matter/O for/O her/O;/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O
pecuniary/O affairs/O,/O which/O were/O in/O a/O very/O unsatisfactory/O state/O,/O were/O taken/O
to/O heart/O by/O the/O Levins/PERSON as/O if/O they/O were/O their/O own/O./O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O by/O Levin/PERSON's/O advice/O,/O started/O before/O daybreak/O./O The/O road/O
was/O good/O,/O the/O carriage/O comfortable/O,/O the/O horses/O trotted/O along/O merrily/O,/O
and/O on/O the/O box/O,/O besides/O the/O coachman/O,/O sat/O the/O counting-house/O clerk/O,/O whom/O
Levin/PERSON was/O sending/O instead/O of/O a/O groom/O for/O greater/O security/O./O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON dozed/O and/O waked/O up/O only/O on/O reaching/O the/O inn/O where/O the/O
horses/O were/O to/O be/O changed/O./O

After/O drinking/O tea/O at/O the/O same/O well-to-do/O peasant/O's/O with/O whom/O Levin/PERSON had/O
stayed/O on/O the/O way/O to/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O,/O and/O chatting/O with/O the/O women/O about/O
their/O children/O,/O and/O with/O the/O old/O man/O about/O Count/O Vronsky/O,/O whom/O the/O
latter/O praised/O very/O highly/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O at/O ten/O o'clock/O,/O went/O on/O
again/O./O At/O home/O,/O looking/O after/O her/O children/O,/O she/O had/O no/O time/O to/O think/O./O So/O
now/O,/O after/O this/O journey/O of/O four/O hours/O,/O all/O the/O thoughts/O she/O had/O
suppressed/O before/O rushed/O swarming/O into/O her/O brain/O,/O and/O she/O thought/O over/O
all/O her/O life/O as/O she/O never/O had/O before/O,/O and/O from/O the/O most/O different/O points/O
of/O view/O./O Her/O thoughts/O seemed/O strange/O even/O to/O herself/O./O At/O first/O she/O
thought/O about/O the/O children/O,/O about/O whom/O she/O was/O uneasy/O,/O although/O the/O
princess/O and/O Kitty/PERSON -LRB-/Oshe/O reckoned/O more/O upon/O her/O-RRB-/O had/O promised/O to/O look/O
after/O them/O./O ``/OIf/O only/O Masha/PERSON does/O not/O begin/O her/O naughty/O tricks/O,/O if/O Grisha/PERSON
is/On't/O kicked/O by/O a/O horse/O,/O and/O Lily/PERSON's/O stomach/O is/On't/O upset/O again/O!/O''/O she/O
thought/O./O But/O these/O questions/O of/O the/O present/O were/O succeeded/O by/O questions/O
of/O the/O immediate/O future/O./O She/O began/O thinking/O how/O she/O had/O to/O get/O a/O new/O
flat/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION for/O the/O coming/O winter/O,/O to/O renew/O the/O drawing/O room/O
furniture/O,/O and/O to/O make/O her/O elder/O girl/O a/O cloak/O./O Then/O questions/O of/O the/O
more/O remote/O future/O occurred/O to/O her/O:/O how/O she/O was/O to/O place/O her/O children/O in/O
the/O world/O./O ``/OThe/O girls/O are/O all/O right/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O;/O ``/Obut/O the/O boys/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O very/O well/O that/O I/O'm/O teaching/O Grisha/PERSON,/O but/O of/O course/O that/O's/O only/O
because/O I/O am/O free/O myself/O now/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O with/O child/O./O Stiva/PERSON,/O of/O course/O,/O
there/O's/O no/O counting/O on/O./O And/O with/O the/O help/O of/O good-natured/O friends/O I/O can/O
bring/O them/O up/O;/O but/O if/O there/O's/O another/O baby/O coming/O?/O.../O''/O And/O the/O thought/O
struck/O her/O how/O untruly/O it/O was/O said/O that/O the/O curse/O laid/O on/O woman/O was/O that/O
in/O sorrow/O she/O should/O bring/O forth/O children/O./O

``/OThe/O birth/O itself/O,/O that/O's/O nothing/O;/O but/O the/O months/O of/O carrying/O the/O
child/O--/Othat/O's/O what/O's/O so/O intolerable/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O picturing/O to/O herself/O
her/O last/O pregnancy/O,/O and/O the/O death/O of/O the/O last/O baby/O./O And/O she/O recalled/O the/O
conversation/O she/O had/O just/O had/O with/O the/O young/O woman/O at/O the/O inn/O./O On/O being/O
asked/O whether/O she/O had/O any/O children/O,/O the/O handsome/O young/O woman/O had/O
answered/O cheerfully/O:/O

``/OI/O had/O a/O girl/O baby/O,/O but/O God/O set/O me/O free/O;/O I/O buried/O her/O last/O Lent/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O did/O you/O grieve/O very/O much/O for/O her/O?/O''/O asked/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON./O

``/OWhy/O grieve/O?/O The/O old/O man/O has/O grandchildren/O enough/O as/O it/O is/O./O It/O was/O only/O
a/O trouble/O./O No/O working/O,/O nor/O nothing/O./O Only/O a/O tie/O./O''/O

This/O answer/O had/O struck/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON as/O revolting/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O
good-natured/O and/O pleasing/O face/O of/O the/O young/O woman/O;/O but/O now/O she/O could/O not/O
help/O recalling/O these/O words/O./O In/O those/O cynical/O words/O there/O was/O indeed/O a/O
grain/O of/O truth/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O altogether/O,/O''/O thought/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O looking/O back/O over/O her/O
whole/O existence/O during/O those/O fifteen/O years/O of/O her/O married/O life/O,/O
``/Opregnancy/O,/O sickness/O,/O mental/O incapacity/O,/O indifference/O to/O everything/O,/O and/O
most/O of/O all/O--/Ohideousness/O./O Kitty/PERSON,/O young/O and/O pretty/O as/O she/O is/O,/O even/O Kitty/PERSON
has/O lost/O her/O looks/O;/O and/O I/O when/O I/O'm/O with/O child/O become/O hideous/O,/O I/O know/O it/O./O
The/O birth/O,/O the/O agony/O,/O the/O hideous/O agonies/O,/O that/O last/O moment/O .../O then/O the/O
nursing/O,/O the/O sleepless/O nights/O,/O the/O fearful/O pains/O.../O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON shuddered/O at/O the/O mere/O recollection/O of/O the/O pain/O from/O
sore/O breasts/O which/O she/O had/O suffered/O with/O almost/O every/O child/O./O ``/OThen/O the/O
children/O's/O illnesses/O,/O that/O everlasting/O apprehension/O;/O then/O bringing/O them/O
up/O;/O evil/O propensities/O''/O -LRB-/Oshe/O thought/O of/O little/O Masha/PERSON's/O crime/O among/O the/O
raspberries/O-RRB-/O,/O ``/Oeducation/O,/O Latin/O--/Oit/O's/O all/O so/O incomprehensible/O and/O
difficult/O./O And/O on/O the/O top/O of/O it/O all/O,/O the/O death/O of/O these/O children/O./O''/O And/O
there/O rose/O again/O before/O her/O imagination/O the/O cruel/O memory/O,/O that/O always/O
tore/O her/O mother/O's/O heart/O,/O of/O the/O death/O of/O her/O last/O little/O baby/O,/O who/O had/O
died/O of/O croup/O;/O his/O funeral/O,/O the/O callous/O indifference/O of/O all/O at/O the/O
little/O pink/O coffin/O,/O and/O her/O own/O torn/O heart/O,/O and/O her/O lonely/O anguish/O at/O
the/O sight/O of/O the/O pale/O little/O brow/O with/O its/O projecting/O temples/O,/O and/O the/O
open/O,/O wondering/O little/O mouth/O seen/O in/O the/O coffin/O at/O the/O moment/O when/O it/O
was/O being/O covered/O with/O the/O little/O pink/O lid/O with/O a/O cross/O braided/O on/O it/O./O

``/OAnd/O all/O this/O,/O what/O's/O it/O for/O?/O What/O is/O to/O come/O of/O it/O all/O?/O That/O I/O'm/O
wasting/O my/O life/O,/O never/O having/O a/O moment/O's/O peace/O,/O either/O with/O child/O,/O or/O
nursing/O a/O child/O,/O forever/O irritable/O,/O peevish/O,/O wretched/O myself/O and/O
worrying/O others/O,/O repulsive/O to/O my/O husband/O,/O while/O the/O children/O are/O growing/O
up/O unhappy/O,/O badly/O educated/O,/O and/O penniless/O./O Even/O now/O,/O if/O it/O were/On't/O for/O
spending/O the/O summer/O at/O the/O Levins/O'/O,/O I/O do/On't/O know/O how/O we/O should/O be/O
managing/O to/O live/O./O Of/O course/O Kostya/PERSON and/O Kitty/PERSON have/O so/O much/O tact/O that/O we/O
do/On't/O feel/O it/O;/O but/O it/O ca/On't/O go/O on/O./O They/O'll/O have/O children/O,/O they/O wo/On't/O be/O
able/O to/O keep/O us/O;/O it/O's/O a/O drag/O on/O them/O as/O it/O is/O./O How/O is/O papa/O,/O who/O has/O
hardly/O anything/O left/O for/O himself/O,/O to/O help/O us/O?/O So/O that/O I/O ca/On't/O even/O bring/O
the/O children/O up/O by/O myself/O,/O and/O may/O find/O it/O hard/O with/O the/O help/O of/O other/O
people/O,/O at/O the/O cost/O of/O humiliation/O./O Why/O,/O even/O if/O we/O suppose/O the/O greatest/O
good/O luck/O,/O that/O the/O children/O do/On't/O die/O,/O and/O I/O bring/O them/O up/O somehow/O./O At/O
the/O very/O best/O they/O'll/O simply/O be/O decent/O people/O./O That/O's/O all/O I/O can/O hope/O
for/O./O And/O to/O gain/O simply/O that/O--/Owhat/O agonies/O,/O what/O toil/O!/O.../O One/O's/O whole/O
life/O ruined/O!/O''/O Again/O she/O recalled/O what/O the/O young/O peasant/O woman/O had/O said/O,/O
and/O again/O she/O was/O revolted/O at/O the/O thought/O;/O but/O she/O could/O not/O help/O
admitting/O that/O there/O was/O a/O grain/O of/O brutal/O truth/O in/O the/O words/O./O

``/OIs/O it/O far/O now/O,/O Mihail/PERSON?/O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON asked/O the/O counting/O house/O
clerk/O,/O to/O turn/O her/O mind/O from/O thoughts/O that/O were/O frightening/O her/O./O

``/OFrom/O this/O village/O,/O they/O say/O,/O it/O's/O five/O miles/O./O''/O The/O carriage/O drove/O along/O
the/O village/O street/O and/O onto/O a/O bridge/O./O On/O the/O bridge/O was/O a/O crowd/O of/O
peasant/O women/O with/O coils/O of/O ties/O for/O the/O sheaves/O on/O their/O shoulders/O,/O
gaily/O and/O noisily/O chattering/O./O They/O stood/O still/O on/O the/O bridge/O,/O staring/O
inquisitively/O at/O the/O carriage/O./O All/O the/O faces/O turned/O to/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON looked/O to/O her/O healthy/O and/O happy/O,/O making/O her/O envious/O of/O
their/O enjoyment/O of/O life/O./O ``/OThey/O're/O all/O living/O,/O they/O're/O all/O enjoying/O
life/O,/O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON still/O mused/O when/O she/O had/O passed/O the/O peasant/O
women/O and/O was/O driving/O uphill/O again/O at/O a/O trot/O,/O seated/O comfortably/O on/O the/O
soft/O springs/O of/O the/O old/O carriage/O,/O ``/Owhile/O I/O,/O let/O out/O,/O as/O it/O were/O from/O
prison/O,/O from/O the/O world/O of/O worries/O that/O fret/O me/O to/O death/O,/O am/O only/O looking/O
about/O me/O now/O for/O an/O instant/O./O They/O all/O live/O;/O those/O peasant/O women/O and/O my/O
sister/O Natalia/PERSON and/O Varenka/PERSON and/O Anna/PERSON,/O whom/O I/O am/O going/O to/O see/O--/Oall/O,/O but/O not/O
I./O

``/OAnd/O they/O attack/O Anna/PERSON./O What/O for/O?/O am/O I/O any/O better/O?/O I/O have/O,/O anyway/O,/O a/O
husband/O I/O love/O--/Onot/O as/O I/O should/O like/O to/O love/O him/O,/O still/O I/O do/O love/O him/O,/O
while/O Anna/PERSON never/O loved/O hers/O./O How/O is/O she/O to/O blame/O?/O She/O wants/O to/O live/O./O God/O
has/O put/O that/O in/O our/O hearts/O./O Very/O likely/O I/O should/O have/O done/O the/O same/O./O
Even/O to/O this/O day/O I/O do/On't/O feel/O sure/O I/O did/O right/O in/O listening/O to/O her/O at/O
that/O terrible/O time/O when/O she/O came/O to/O me/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION./O I/O ought/O then/O to/O have/O
cast/O off/O my/O husband/O and/O have/O begun/O my/O life/O fresh/O./O I/O might/O have/O loved/O and/O
have/O been/O loved/O in/O reality/O./O And/O is/O it/O any/O better/O as/O it/O is/O?/O I/O do/On't/O
respect/O him/O./O He/O's/O necessary/O to/O me/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O about/O her/O husband/O,/O ``/Oand/O
I/O put/O up/O with/O him/O./O Is/O that/O any/O better/O?/O At/O that/O time/O I/O could/O still/O have/O
been/O admired/O,/O I/O had/O beauty/O left/O me/O still/O,/O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON pursued/O
her/O thoughts/O,/O and/O she/O would/O have/O liked/O to/O look/O at/O herself/O in/O the/O looking/O
glass/O./O She/O had/O a/O traveling/O looking/O glass/O in/O her/O handbag/O,/O and/O she/O wanted/O
to/O take/O it/O out/O;/O but/O looking/O at/O the/O backs/O of/O the/O coachman/O and/O the/O swaying/O
counting/O house/O clerk/O,/O she/O felt/O that/O she/O would/O be/O ashamed/O if/O either/O of/O
them/O were/O to/O look/O round/O,/O and/O she/O did/O not/O take/O out/O the/O glass/O./O

But/O without/O looking/O in/O the/O glass/O,/O she/O thought/O that/O even/O now/O it/O was/O not/O
too/O late/O;/O and/O she/O thought/O of/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O who/O was/O always/O
particularly/O attentive/O to/O her/O,/O of/O Stiva/PERSON's/O good-hearted/O friend/O,/O
Turovtsin/PERSON,/O who/O had/O helped/O her/O nurse/O her/O children/O through/O the/O scarlatina/O,/O
and/O was/O in/O love/O with/O her/O./O And/O there/O was/O someone/O else/O,/O a/O quite/O young/O man/O,/O
who/O--/Oher/O husband/O had/O told/O her/O it/O as/O a/O joke/O--/Othought/O her/O more/O beautiful/O
than/O either/O of/O her/O sisters/O./O And/O the/O most/O passionate/O and/O impossible/O
romances/O rose/O before/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O imagination/O./O ``/OAnna/PERSON did/O quite/O
right/O,/O and/O certainly/O I/O shall/O never/O reproach/O her/O for/O it/O./O She/O is/O happy/O,/O
she/O makes/O another/O person/O happy/O,/O and/O she/O's/O not/O broken/O down/O as/O I/O am/O,/O but/O
most/O likely/O just/O as/O she/O always/O was/O,/O bright/O,/O clever/O,/O open/O to/O every/O
impression/O,/O''/O thought/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O--/Oand/O a/O sly/O smile/O curved/O her/O
lips/O,/O for/O,/O as/O she/O pondered/O on/O Anna/PERSON's/O love/O affair/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON
constructed/O on/O parallel/O lines/O an/O almost/O identical/O love/O affair/O for/O
herself/O,/O with/O an/O imaginary/O composite/O figure/O,/O the/O ideal/O man/O who/O was/O in/O
love/O with/O her/O./O She/O,/O like/O Anna/PERSON,/O confessed/O the/O whole/O affair/O to/O her/O
husband/O./O And/O the/O amazement/O and/O perplexity/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON at/O this/O
avowal/O made/O her/O smile/O./O

In/O such/O daydreams/O she/O reached/O the/O turning/O of/O the/O highroad/O that/O led/O to/O
Vozdvizhenskoe/PERSON./O



Chapter/O 17/O


The/O coachman/O pulled/O up/O his/O four/O horses/O and/O looked/O round/O to/O the/O right/O,/O to/O
a/O field/O of/O rye/O,/O where/O some/O peasants/O were/O sitting/O on/O a/O cart/O./O The/O counting/O
house/O clerk/O was/O just/O going/O to/O jump/O down/O,/O but/O on/O second/O thoughts/O he/O
shouted/O peremptorily/O to/O the/O peasants/O instead/O,/O and/O beckoned/O to/O them/O to/O
come/O up/O./O The/O wind/O,/O that/O seemed/O to/O blow/O as/O they/O drove/O,/O dropped/O when/O the/O
carriage/O stood/O still/O;/O gadflies/O settled/O on/O the/O steaming/O horses/O that/O
angrily/O shook/O them/O off/O./O The/O metallic/O clank/O of/O a/O whetstone/O against/O a/O
scythe/O,/O that/O came/O to/O them/O from/O the/O cart/O,/O ceased/O./O One/O of/O the/O peasants/O got/O
up/O and/O came/O towards/O the/O carriage/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O are/O slow/O!/O''/O the/O counting/O house/O clerk/O shouted/O angrily/O to/O the/O
peasant/O who/O was/O stepping/O slowly/O with/O his/O bare/O feet/O over/O the/O ruts/O of/O the/O
rough/O dry/O road/O./O ``/OCome/O along/O,/O do/O!/O''/O

A/O curly-headed/O old/O man/O with/O a/O bit/O of/O bast/O tied/O round/O his/O hair/O,/O and/O his/O
bent/O back/O dark/O with/O perspiration/O,/O came/O towards/O the/O carriage/O,/O quickening/O
his/O steps/O,/O and/O took/O hold/O of/O the/O mud-guard/O with/O his/O sunburnt/O hand/O./O

``/OVozdvizhenskoe/O,/O the/O manor/O house/O?/O the/O count/O's/O?/O''/O he/O repeated/O;/O ``/Ogo/O on/O to/O
the/O end/O of/O this/O track/O./O Then/O turn/O to/O the/O left/O./O Straight/O along/O the/O avenue/O
and/O you/O'll/O come/O right/O upon/O it/O./O But/O whom/O do/O you/O want/O?/O The/O count/O himself/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O are/O they/O at/O home/O,/O my/O good/O man/O?/O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON said/O vaguely/O,/O
not/O knowing/O how/O to/O ask/O about/O Anna/PERSON,/O even/O of/O this/O peasant/O./O

``/OAt/O home/O for/O sure/O,/O''/O said/O the/O peasant/O,/O shifting/O from/O one/O bare/O foot/O to/O the/O
other/O,/O and/O leaving/O a/O distinct/O print/O of/O five/O toes/O and/O a/O heel/O in/O the/O dust/O./O
``/OSure/O to/O be/O at/O home/O,/O''/O he/O repeated/O,/O evidently/O eager/O to/O talk/O./O ``/OOnly/O
yesterday/O visitors/O arrived/O./O There/O's/O a/O sight/O of/O visitors/O come/O./O What/O do/O
you/O want/O?/O''/O He/O turned/O round/O and/O called/O to/O a/O lad/O,/O who/O was/O shouting/O
something/O to/O him/O from/O the/O cart/O./O ``/OOh/O!/O They/O all/O rode/O by/O here/O not/O long/O
since/O,/O to/O look/O at/O a/O reaping/O machine/O./O They/O'll/O be/O home/O by/O now/O./O And/O who/O
will/O you/O be/O belonging/O to/O?/O.../O''/O

``/OWe/O've/O come/O a/O long/O way/O,/O''/O said/O the/O coachman/O,/O climbing/O onto/O the/O box/O./O ``/OSo/O
it/O's/O not/O far/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O tell/O you/O,/O it/O's/O just/O here/O./O As/O soon/O as/O you/O get/O out/O.../O''/O he/O said/O,/O keeping/O
hold/O all/O the/O while/O of/O the/O carriage/O./O

A/O healthy-looking/O,/O broad-shouldered/O young/O fellow/O came/O up/O too/O./O

``/OWhat/O,/O is/O it/O laborers/O they/O want/O for/O the/O harvest/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O,/O my/O boy/O./O''/O

``/OSo/O you/O keep/O to/O the/O left/O,/O and/O you/O'll/O come/O right/O on/O it/O,/O''/O said/O the/O
peasant/O,/O unmistakably/O loth/O to/O let/O the/O travelers/O go/O,/O and/O eager/O to/O
converse/O./O

The/O coachman/O started/O the/O horses/O,/O but/O they/O were/O only/O just/O turning/O off/O
when/O the/O peasant/O shouted/O:/O ``/OStop/O!/O Hi/O,/O friend/O!/O Stop/O!/O''/O called/O the/O two/O
voices/O./O The/O coachman/O stopped/O./O

``/OThey/O're/O coming/O!/O They/O're/O yonder/O!/O''/O shouted/O the/O peasant/O./O ``/OSee/O what/O a/O
turn-out/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O pointing/O to/O four/O persons/O on/O horseback/O,/O and/O two/O in/O a/O
_/Ochar-à-banc/O_/O,/O coming/O along/O the/O road/O./O

They/O were/O Vronsky/O with/O a/O jockey/O,/O Veslovsky/PERSON and/O Anna/PERSON on/O horseback/O,/O and/O
Princess/O Varvara/PERSON and/O Sviazhsky/PERSON in/O the/O _/Ochar-à-banc/O_/O./O They/O had/O gone/O out/O
to/O look/O at/O the/O working/O of/O a/O new/O reaping/O machine/O./O

When/O the/O carriage/O stopped/O,/O the/O party/O on/O horseback/O were/O coming/O at/O a/O
walking/O pace/O./O Anna/PERSON was/O in/O front/O beside/O Veslovsky/O./O Anna/PERSON,/O quietly/O walking/O
her/O horse/O,/O a/O sturdy/O English/O cob/O with/O cropped/O mane/O and/O short/O tail/O,/O her/O
beautiful/O head/O with/O her/O black/O hair/O straying/O loose/O under/O her/O high/O hat/O,/O
her/O full/O shoulders/O,/O her/O slender/O waist/O in/O her/O black/O riding/O habit/O,/O and/O all/O
the/O ease/O and/O grace/O of/O her/O deportment/O,/O impressed/O Dolly/PERSON./O

For/O the/O first/O minute/O it/O seemed/O to/O her/O unsuitable/O for/O Anna/PERSON to/O be/O on/O
horseback/O./O The/O conception/O of/O riding/O on/O horseback/O for/O a/O lady/O was/O,/O in/O
Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O mind/O,/O associated/O with/O ideas/O of/O youthful/O flirtation/O
and/O frivolity/O,/O which/O,/O in/O her/O opinion/O,/O was/O unbecoming/O in/O Anna/PERSON's/O position/O./O
But/O when/O she/O had/O scrutinized/O her/O,/O seeing/O her/O closer/O,/O she/O was/O at/O once/O
reconciled/O to/O her/O riding/O./O In/O spite/O of/O her/O elegance/O,/O everything/O was/O so/O
simple/O,/O quiet/O,/O and/O dignified/O in/O the/O attitude/O,/O the/O dress/O and/O the/O
movements/O of/O Anna/PERSON,/O that/O nothing/O could/O have/O been/O more/O natural/O./O

Beside/O Anna/PERSON,/O on/O a/O hot-looking/O gray/O cavalry/O horse/O,/O was/O Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON
in/O his/O Scotch/O cap/O with/O floating/O ribbons/O,/O his/O stout/O legs/O stretched/O out/O in/O
front/O,/O obviously/O pleased/O with/O his/O own/O appearance/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON
could/O not/O suppress/O a/O good-humored/O smile/O as/O she/O recognized/O him/O./O Behind/O
rode/O Vronsky/O on/O a/O dark/O bay/O mare/O,/O obviously/O heated/O from/O galloping/O./O He/O was/O
holding/O her/O in/O,/O pulling/O at/O the/O reins/O./O

After/O him/O rode/O a/O little/O man/O in/O the/O dress/O of/O a/O jockey/O./O Sviazhsky/PERSON and/O
Princess/O Varvara/PERSON in/O a/O new/O _/Ochar-à-banc/O_/O with/O a/O big/O,/O raven-black/O trotting/O
horse/O,/O overtook/O the/O party/O on/O horseback/O./O

Anna/PERSON's/O face/O suddenly/O beamed/O with/O a/O joyful/O smile/O at/O the/O instant/O when/O,/O in/O
the/O little/O figure/O huddled/O in/O a/O corner/O of/O the/O old/O carriage/O,/O she/O
recognized/O Dolly/PERSON./O She/O uttered/O a/O cry/O,/O started/O in/O the/O saddle/O,/O and/O set/O her/O
horse/O into/O a/O gallop/O./O On/O reaching/O the/O carriage/O she/O jumped/O off/O without/O
assistance/O,/O and/O holding/O up/O her/O riding/O habit/O,/O she/O ran/O up/O to/O greet/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OI/O thought/O it/O was/O you/O and/O dared/O not/O think/O it/O./O How/O delightful/O!/O You/O ca/On't/O
fancy/O how/O glad/O I/O am/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O at/O one/O moment/O pressing/O her/O face/O against/O
Dolly/PERSON and/O kissing/O her/O,/O and/O at/O the/O next/O holding/O her/O off/O and/O examining/O her/O
with/O a/O smile/O./O

``/OHere/O's/O a/O delightful/O surprise/O,/O Alexey/PERSON!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O looking/O round/O at/O
Vronsky/O,/O who/O had/O dismounted/O,/O and/O was/O walking/O towards/O them/O./O

Vronsky/O,/O taking/O off/O his/O tall/O gray/O hat/O,/O went/O up/O to/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O would/On't/O believe/O how/O glad/O we/O are/O to/O see/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O giving/O
peculiar/O significance/O to/O the/O words/O,/O and/O showing/O his/O strong/O white/O teeth/O
in/O a/O smile/O./O

Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON,/O without/O getting/O off/O his/O horse/O,/O took/O off/O his/O cap/O and/O
greeted/O the/O visitor/O by/O gleefully/O waving/O the/O ribbons/O over/O his/O head/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON,/O''/O Anna/PERSON said/O in/O reply/O to/O a/O glance/O of/O inquiry/O
from/O Dolly/PERSON as/O the/O _/Ochar-à-banc/O_/O drove/O up/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O and/O unconsciously/O her/O face/O betrayed/O her/O
dissatisfaction/O./O

Princess/O Varvara/PERSON was/O her/O husband/O's/O aunt/O,/O and/O she/O had/O long/O known/O her/O,/O and/O
did/O not/O respect/O her/O./O She/O knew/O that/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON had/O passed/O her/O whole/O
life/O toadying/O on/O her/O rich/O relations/O,/O but/O that/O she/O should/O now/O be/O sponging/O
on/O Vronsky/O,/O a/O man/O who/O was/O nothing/O to/O her/O,/O mortified/O Dolly/PERSON on/O account/O of/O
her/O kinship/O with/O her/O husband/O./O Anna/PERSON noticed/O Dolly/PERSON's/O expression/O,/O and/O was/O
disconcerted/O by/O it/O./O She/O blushed/O,/O dropped/O her/O riding/O habit/O,/O and/O stumbled/O
over/O it/O./O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON went/O up/O to/O the/O _/Ochar-à-banc/O_/O and/O coldly/O greeted/O
Princess/O Varvara/PERSON./O Sviazhsky/PERSON too/O she/O knew/O./O He/O inquired/O how/O his/O queer/O
friend/O with/O the/O young/O wife/O was/O,/O and/O running/O his/O eyes/O over/O the/O
ill-matched/O horses/O and/O the/O carriage/O with/O its/O patched/O mud-guards/O,/O
proposed/O to/O the/O ladies/O that/O they/O should/O get/O into/O the/O _/Ochar-à-banc/O_/O./O

``/OAnd/O I/O'll/O get/O into/O this/O vehicle/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OThe/O horse/O is/O quiet/O,/O and/O the/O
princess/O drives/O capitally/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O stay/O as/O you/O were/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O coming/O up/O,/O ``/Oand/O we/O'll/O go/O in/O the/O
carriage/O,/O''/O and/O taking/O Dolly/PERSON's/O arm/O,/O she/O drew/O her/O away/O./O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O eyes/O were/O fairly/O dazzled/O by/O the/O elegant/O carriage/O of/O
a/O pattern/O she/O had/O never/O seen/O before/O,/O the/O splendid/O horses/O,/O and/O the/O
elegant/O and/O gorgeous/O people/O surrounding/O her/O./O But/O what/O struck/O her/O most/O of/O
all/O was/O the/O change/O that/O had/O taken/O place/O in/O Anna/PERSON,/O whom/O she/O knew/O so/O well/O
and/O loved/O./O Any/O other/O woman/O,/O a/O less/O close/O observer/O,/O not/O knowing/O Anna/PERSON
before/O,/O or/O not/O having/O thought/O as/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON had/O been/O thinking/O on/O
the/O road/O,/O would/O not/O have/O noticed/O anything/O special/O in/O Anna/PERSON./O But/O now/O Dolly/PERSON
was/O struck/O by/O that/O temporary/O beauty/O,/O which/O is/O only/O found/O in/O women/O during/O
the/O moments/O of/O love/O,/O and/O which/O she/O saw/O now/O in/O Anna/PERSON's/O face/O./O Everything/O in/O
her/O face/O,/O the/O clearly/O marked/O dimples/O in/O her/O cheeks/O and/O chin/O,/O the/O line/O of/O
her/O lips/O,/O the/O smile/O which/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O fluttered/O about/O her/O face/O,/O the/O
brilliance/O of/O her/O eyes/O,/O the/O grace/O and/O rapidity/O of/O her/O movements/O,/O the/O
fulness/O of/O the/O notes/O of/O her/O voice/O,/O even/O the/O manner/O in/O which/O,/O with/O a/O sort/O
of/O angry/O friendliness/O,/O she/O answered/O Veslovsky/PERSON when/O he/O asked/O permission/O
to/O get/O on/O her/O cob/O,/O so/O as/O to/O teach/O it/O to/O gallop/O with/O the/O right/O leg/O
foremost/O--/Oit/O was/O all/O peculiarly/O fascinating/O,/O and/O it/O seemed/O as/O if/O she/O were/O
herself/O aware/O of/O it/O,/O and/O rejoicing/O in/O it/O./O

When/O both/O the/O women/O were/O seated/O in/O the/O carriage/O,/O a/O sudden/O embarrassment/O
came/O over/O both/O of/O them/O./O Anna/PERSON was/O disconcerted/O by/O the/O intent/O look/O of/O
inquiry/O Dolly/PERSON fixed/O upon/O her/O./O Dolly/PERSON was/O embarrassed/O because/O after/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O phrase/O about/O ``/Othis/O vehicle/O,/O''/O she/O could/O not/O help/O feeling/O
ashamed/O of/O the/O dirty/O old/O carriage/O in/O which/O Anna/PERSON was/O sitting/O with/O her/O./O
The/O coachman/O Philip/PERSON and/O the/O counting/O house/O clerk/O were/O experiencing/O the/O
same/O sensation/O./O The/O counting/O house/O clerk/O,/O to/O conceal/O his/O confusion/O,/O
busied/O himself/O settling/O the/O ladies/O,/O but/O Philip/PERSON the/O coachman/O became/O
sullen/O,/O and/O was/O bracing/O himself/O not/O to/O be/O overawed/O in/O future/O by/O this/O
external/O superiority/O./O He/O smiled/O ironically/O,/O looking/O at/O the/O raven/O horse/O,/O
and/O was/O already/O deciding/O in/O his/O own/O mind/O that/O this/O smart/O trotter/O in/O the/O
_/Ochar-à-banc/O_/O was/O only/O good/O for/O _/Opromenade/O_/O,/O and/O would/On't/O do/O thirty/O
miles/O straight/O off/O in/O the/O heat/O./O

The/O peasants/O had/O all/O got/O up/O from/O the/O cart/O and/O were/O inquisitively/O and/O
mirthfully/O staring/O at/O the/O meeting/O of/O the/O friends/O,/O making/O their/O comments/O
on/O it/O./O

``/OThey/O're/O pleased/O,/O too/O;/O have/On't/O seen/O each/O other/O for/O a/O long/O while/O,/O''/O said/O
the/O curly-headed/O old/O man/O with/O the/O bast/O round/O his/O hair/O./O

``/OI/O say/O,/O Uncle/PERSON Gerasim/PERSON,/O if/O we/O could/O take/O that/O raven/O horse/O now/O,/O to/O cart/O
the/O corn/O,/O that/O '/Oud/O be/O quick/O work/O!/O''/O

``/OLook-ee/O!/O Is/O that/O a/O woman/O in/O breeches/O?/O''/O said/O one/O of/O them/O,/O pointing/O to/O
Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON sitting/O in/O a/O side/O saddle/O./O

``/ONay/O,/O a/O man/O!/O See/O how/O smartly/O he/O's/O going/O it/O!/O''/O

``/OEh/O,/O lads/O!/O seems/O we/O're/O not/O going/O to/O sleep/O,/O then/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O chance/O of/O sleep/O today/O!/O''/O said/O the/O old/O man/O,/O with/O a/O sidelong/O look/O at/O
the/O sun/O./O ``/OMidday/O's/O past/O,/O look-ee/O!/O Get/O your/O hooks/O,/O and/O come/O along/O!/O''/O



Chapter/O 18/O


Anna/PERSON looked/O at/O Dolly/PERSON's/O thin/O,/O care-worn/O face/O,/O with/O its/O wrinkles/O filled/O
with/O dust/O from/O the/O road/O,/O and/O she/O was/O on/O the/O point/O of/O saying/O what/O she/O was/O
thinking/O,/O that/O is/O,/O that/O Dolly/PERSON had/O got/O thinner/O./O But/O,/O conscious/O that/O she/O
herself/O had/O grown/O handsomer/O,/O and/O that/O Dolly/PERSON's/O eyes/O were/O telling/O her/O so/O,/O
she/O sighed/O and/O began/O to/O speak/O about/O herself/O./O

``/OYou/O are/O looking/O at/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/Oand/O wondering/O how/O I/O can/O be/O happy/O in/O
my/O position/O?/O Well/O!/O it/O's/O shameful/O to/O confess/O,/O but/O I/O .../O I/O'm/O inexcusably/O
happy/O./O Something/O magical/O has/O happened/O to/O me/O,/O like/O a/O dream/O,/O when/O you/O're/O
frightened/O,/O panic-stricken/O,/O and/O all/O of/O a/O sudden/O you/O wake/O up/O and/O all/O the/O
horrors/O are/O no/O more/O./O I/O have/O waked/O up/O./O I/O have/O lived/O through/O the/O misery/O,/O
the/O dread/O,/O and/O now/O for/O a/O long/O while/O past/O,/O especially/O since/O we/O've/O been/O
here/O,/O I/O've/O been/O so/O happy/O!/O.../O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O a/O timid/O smile/O of/O inquiry/O
looking/O at/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OHow/O glad/O I/O am/O!/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON smiling/O,/O involuntarily/O speaking/O more/O coldly/O
than/O she/O wanted/O to/O./O ``/OI/O'm/O very/O glad/O for/O you/O./O Why/O have/On't/O you/O written/O to/O
me/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O?/O.../O Because/O I/O had/On't/O the/O courage/O.../O./O You/O forget/O my/O position/O.../O''/O

``/OTo/O me/O?/O Had/On't/O the/O courage/O?/O If/O you/O knew/O how/O I/O .../O I/O look/O at/O.../O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON wanted/O to/O express/O her/O thoughts/O of/O the/O morning/O,/O but/O
for/O some/O reason/O it/O seemed/O to/O her/O now/O out/O of/O place/O to/O do/O so/O./O

``/OBut/O of/O that/O we/O'll/O talk/O later/O./O What/O's/O this/O,/O what/O are/O all/O these/O
buildings/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O,/O wanting/O to/O change/O the/O conversation/O and/O pointing/O
to/O the/O red/O and/O green/O roofs/O that/O came/O into/O view/O behind/O the/O green/O hedges/O
of/O acacia/O and/O lilac/O./O ``/OQuite/O a/O little/O town/O./O''/O

But/O Anna/PERSON did/O not/O answer/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O no/O!/O How/O do/O you/O look/O at/O my/O position/O,/O what/O do/O you/O think/O of/O it/O?/O''/O she/O
asked/O./O

``/OI/O consider/O.../O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON was/O beginning/O,/O but/O at/O that/O instant/O
Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON,/O having/O brought/O the/O cob/O to/O gallop/O with/O the/O right/O leg/O
foremost/O,/O galloped/O past/O them/O,/O bumping/O heavily/O up/O and/O down/O in/O his/O short/O
jacket/O on/O the/O chamois/O leather/O of/O the/O side/O saddle/O./O ``/OHe/O's/O doing/O it/O,/O Anna/PERSON
Arkadyevna/PERSON!/O''/O he/O shouted/O./O

Anna/PERSON did/O not/O even/O glance/O at/O him/O;/O but/O again/O it/O seemed/O to/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON out/O of/O place/O to/O enter/O upon/O such/O a/O long/O conversation/O in/O the/O
carriage/O,/O and/O so/O she/O cut/O short/O her/O thought/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O think/O anything/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/Obut/O I/O always/O loved/O you/O,/O and/O if/O one/O
loves/O anyone/O,/O one/O loves/O the/O whole/O person/O,/O just/O as/O they/O are/O and/O not/O as/O
one/O would/O like/O them/O to/O be/O.../O''/O

Anna/PERSON,/O taking/O her/O eyes/O off/O her/O friend/O's/O face/O and/O dropping/O her/O eyelids/O
-LRB-/Othis/O was/O a/O new/O habit/O Dolly/PERSON had/O not/O seen/O in/O her/O before/O-RRB-/O,/O pondered/O,/O
trying/O to/O penetrate/O the/O full/O significance/O of/O the/O words/O./O And/O obviously/O
interpreting/O them/O as/O she/O would/O have/O wished/O,/O she/O glanced/O at/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OIf/O you/O had/O any/O sins/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/Othey/O would/O all/O be/O forgiven/O you/O for/O
your/O coming/O to/O see/O me/O and/O these/O words/O./O''/O

And/O Dolly/PERSON saw/O that/O tears/O stood/O in/O her/O eyes/O./O She/O pressed/O Anna/PERSON's/O hand/O in/O
silence/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O are/O these/O buildings/O?/O How/O many/O there/O are/O of/O them/O!/O''/O After/O a/O
moment/O's/O silence/O she/O repeated/O her/O question/O./O

``/OThese/O are/O the/O servants/O'/O houses/O,/O barns/O,/O and/O stables/O,/O''/O answered/O Anna/PERSON./O
``/OAnd/O there/O the/O park/O begins/O./O It/O had/O all/O gone/O to/O ruin/O,/O but/O Alexey/PERSON had/O
everything/O renewed/O./O He/O is/O very/O fond/O of/O this/O place/O,/O and/O,/O what/O I/O never/O
expected/O,/O he/O has/O become/O intensely/O interested/O in/O looking/O after/O it/O./O But/O
his/O is/O such/O a/O rich/O nature/O!/O Whatever/O he/O takes/O up/O,/O he/O does/O splendidly/O./O So/O
far/O from/O being/O bored/O by/O it/O,/O he/O works/O with/O passionate/O interest/O./O He/O--/Owith/O
his/O temperament/O as/O I/O know/O it/O--/Ohe/O has/O become/O careful/O and/O businesslike/O,/O a/O
first-rate/O manager/O,/O he/O positively/O reckons/O every/O penny/O in/O his/O management/O
of/O the/O land/O./O But/O only/O in/O that/O./O When/O it/O's/O a/O question/O of/O tens/O of/O
thousands/O,/O he/O does/On't/O think/O of/O money/O./O''/O She/O spoke/O with/O that/O gleefully/O sly/O
smile/O with/O which/O women/O often/O talk/O of/O the/O secret/O characteristics/O only/O
known/O to/O them/O--/Oof/O those/O they/O love/O./O ``/ODo/O you/O see/O that/O big/O building/O?/O that/O's/O
the/O new/O hospital/O./O I/O believe/O it/O will/O cost/O over/O a/O hundred/O thousand/O;/O that/O's/O
his/O hobby/O just/O now/O./O And/O do/O you/O know/O how/O it/O all/O came/O about/O?/O The/O peasants/O
asked/O him/O for/O some/O meadowland/O,/O I/O think/O it/O was/O,/O at/O a/O cheaper/O rate/O,/O and/O he/O
refused/O,/O and/O I/O accused/O him/O of/O being/O miserly/O./O Of/O course/O it/O was/O not/O really/O
because/O of/O that/O,/O but/O everything/O together/O,/O he/O began/O this/O hospital/O to/O
prove/O,/O do/O you/O see/O,/O that/O he/O was/O not/O miserly/O about/O money/O./O _/OC'est/O une/O
petitesse/O_/O,/O if/O you/O like/O,/O but/O I/O love/O him/O all/O the/O more/O for/O it/O./O And/O now/O
you/O'll/O see/O the/O house/O in/O a/O moment/O./O It/O was/O his/O grandfather/O's/O house/O,/O and/O he/O
has/O had/O nothing/O changed/O outside/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O beautiful/O!/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O looking/O with/O involuntary/O admiration/O at/O the/O
handsome/O house/O with/O columns/O,/O standing/O out/O among/O the/O different-colored/O
greens/O of/O the/O old/O trees/O in/O the/O garden/O./O

``/OIs/On't/O it/O fine/O?/O And/O from/O the/O house/O,/O from/O the/O top/O,/O the/O view/O is/O
wonderful/O./O''/O

They/O drove/O into/O a/O courtyard/O strewn/O with/O gravel/O and/O bright/O with/O flowers/O,/O
in/O which/O two/O laborers/O were/O at/O work/O putting/O an/O edging/O of/O stones/O round/O the/O
light/O mould/O of/O a/O flower/O bed/O,/O and/O drew/O up/O in/O a/O covered/O entry/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O they/O're/O here/O already/O!/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O the/O saddle/O horses/O,/O
which/O were/O just/O being/O led/O away/O from/O the/O steps/O./O ``/OIt/O is/O a/O nice/O horse/O,/O
is/On't/O it/O?/O It/O's/O my/O cob/O;/O my/O favorite/O./O Lead/O him/O here/O and/O bring/O me/O some/O
sugar/O./O Where/O is/O the/O count/O?/O''/O she/O inquired/O of/O two/O smart/O footmen/O who/O darted/O
out/O./O ``/OAh/O,/O there/O he/O is/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O seeing/O Vronsky/O coming/O to/O meet/O her/O with/O
Veslovsky/PERSON./O

``/OWhere/O are/O you/O going/O to/O put/O the/O princess/O?/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O in/O French/O,/O
addressing/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O without/O waiting/O for/O a/O reply/O,/O he/O once/O more/O greeted/O
Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O and/O this/O time/O he/O kissed/O her/O hand/O./O ``/OI/O think/O the/O big/O
balcony/O room/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O that/O's/O too/O far/O off/O!/O Better/O in/O the/O corner/O room/O,/O we/O shall/O see/O
each/O other/O more/O./O Come/O,/O let/O's/O go/O up/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O as/O she/O gave/O her/O favorite/O
horse/O the/O sugar/O the/O footman/O had/O brought/O her/O./O
