''/O_/OEt/O vous/O oubliez/O votre/O devoir/O_/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O who/O came/O out/O
too/O on/O the/O steps/O./O

''/O_/OPardon/O,/O j'/Oen/O ai/O tout/O plein/O les/O poches/O_/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O,/O smiling/O,/O putting/O
his/O fingers/O in/O his/O waistcoat/O pocket/O./O

''/O_/OMais/O vous/O venez/O trop/O tard/O_/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O rubbing/O her/O handkerchief/O on/O her/O
hand/O,/O which/O the/O horse/O had/O made/O wet/O in/O taking/O the/O sugar/O./O

Anna/PERSON turned/O to/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OYou/O can/O stay/O some/O time/O?/O For/O one/O day/O only/O?/O That/O's/O
impossible/O!/O''/O

``/OI/O promised/O to/O be/O back/O,/O and/O the/O children/O.../O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O feeling/O
embarrassed/O both/O because/O she/O had/O to/O get/O her/O bag/O out/O of/O the/O carriage/O,/O and/O
because/O she/O knew/O her/O face/O must/O be/O covered/O with/O dust/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O darling/O!/O.../O Well/O,/O we/O'll/O see/O./O Come/O along/O,/O come/O along/O!/O''/O and/O
Anna/PERSON led/O Dolly/PERSON to/O her/O room/O./O

That/O room/O was/O not/O the/O smart/O guest/O chamber/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O suggested/O,/O but/O the/O
one/O of/O which/O Anna/PERSON had/O said/O that/O Dolly/PERSON would/O excuse/O it/O./O And/O this/O room/O,/O
for/O which/O excuse/O was/O needed/O,/O was/O more/O full/O of/O luxury/O than/O any/O in/O which/O
Dolly/PERSON had/O ever/O stayed/O,/O a/O luxury/O that/O reminded/O her/O of/O the/O best/O hotels/O
abroad/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O darling/O,/O how/O happy/O I/O am/O!/O''/O Anna/PERSON said/O,/O sitting/O down/O in/O her/O riding/O
habit/O for/O a/O moment/O beside/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OTell/O me/O about/O all/O of/O you/O./O Stiva/O I/O had/O
only/O a/O glimpse/O of/O,/O and/O he/O can/Onot/O tell/O one/O about/O the/O children/O./O How/O is/O my/O
favorite/O,/O Tanya/PERSON?/O Quite/O a/O big/O girl/O,/O I/O expect/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O she/O's/O very/O tall/O,/O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON answered/O shortly/O,/O surprised/O
herself/O that/O she/O should/O respond/O so/O coolly/O about/O her/O children/O./O ``/OWe/O are/O
having/O a/O delightful/O stay/O at/O the/O Levins/O'/O,/O''/O she/O added/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O if/O I/O had/O known/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O ``/Othat/O you/O do/O not/O despise/O me/O!/O.../O You/O
might/O have/O all/O come/O to/O us/O./O Stiva/PERSON's/O an/O old/O friend/O and/O a/O great/O friend/O of/O
Alexey/PERSON's/O,/O you/O know/O,/O''/O she/O added/O,/O and/O suddenly/O she/O blushed/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O we/O are/O all/O.../O''/O Dolly/PERSON answered/O in/O confusion/O./O

``/OBut/O in/O my/O delight/O I/O'm/O talking/O nonsense/O./O The/O one/O thing/O,/O darling/O,/O is/O that/O
I/O am/O so/O glad/O to/O have/O you/O!/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O kissing/O her/O again/O./O ``/OYou/O have/On't/O
told/O me/O yet/O how/O and/O what/O you/O think/O about/O me/O,/O and/O I/O keep/O wanting/O to/O know/O./O
But/O I/O'm/O glad/O you/O will/O see/O me/O as/O I/O am/O./O The/O chief/O thing/O I/O should/On't/O like/O
would/O be/O for/O people/O to/O imagine/O I/O want/O to/O prove/O anything/O./O I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O
prove/O anything/O;/O I/O merely/O want/O to/O live/O,/O to/O do/O no/O one/O harm/O but/O myself/O./O I/O
have/O the/O right/O to/O do/O that/O,/O have/On't/O I/O?/O But/O it/O is/O a/O big/O subject/O,/O and/O we/O'll/O
talk/O over/O everything/O properly/O later/O./O Now/O I/O'll/O go/O and/O dress/O and/O send/O a/O
maid/O to/O you/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 19/O


Left/O alone/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O with/O a/O good/O housewife/O's/O eye/O,/O scanned/O her/O
room/O./O All/O she/O had/O seen/O in/O entering/O the/O house/O and/O walking/O through/O it/O,/O and/O
all/O she/O saw/O now/O in/O her/O room/O,/O gave/O her/O an/O impression/O of/O wealth/O and/O
sumptuousness/O and/O of/O that/O modern/O European/O luxury/O of/O which/O she/O had/O only/O
read/O in/O English/O novels/O,/O but/O had/O never/O seen/O in/O Russia/LOCATION and/O in/O the/O country/O./O
Everything/O was/O new/O from/O the/O new/O French/O hangings/O on/O the/O walls/O to/O the/O
carpet/O which/O covered/O the/O whole/O floor/O./O The/O bed/O had/O a/O spring/O mattress/O,/O and/O
a/O special/O sort/O of/O bolster/O and/O silk/O pillowcases/O on/O the/O little/O pillows/O./O
The/O marble/O washstand/O,/O the/O dressing/O table/O,/O the/O little/O sofa/O,/O the/O tables/O,/O
the/O bronze/O clock/O on/O the/O chimney/O piece/O,/O the/O window/O curtains/O,/O and/O the/O
_/Oportières/O_/O were/O all/O new/O and/O expensive/O./O

The/O smart/O maid/O,/O who/O came/O in/O to/O offer/O her/O services/O,/O with/O her/O hair/O done/O up/O
high/O,/O and/O a/O gown/O more/O fashionable/O than/O Dolly/PERSON's/O,/O was/O as/O new/O and/O expensive/O
as/O the/O whole/O room/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON liked/O her/O neatness/O,/O her/O
deferential/O and/O obliging/O manners/O,/O but/O she/O felt/O ill/O at/O ease/O with/O her/O./O She/O
felt/O ashamed/O of/O her/O seeing/O the/O patched/O dressing/O jacket/O that/O had/O
unluckily/O been/O packed/O by/O mistake/O for/O her/O./O She/O was/O ashamed/O of/O the/O very/O
patches/O and/O darned/O places/O of/O which/O she/O had/O been/O so/O proud/O at/O home/O./O At/O
home/O it/O had/O been/O so/O clear/O that/O for/O six/O dressing/O jackets/O there/O would/O be/O
needed/O twenty-four/O yards/O of/O nainsook/O at/O sixteen/O pence/O the/O yard/O,/O which/O
was/O a/O matter/O of/O thirty/O shillings/O besides/O the/O cutting-out/O and/O making/O,/O and/O
these/O thirty/O shillings/O had/O been/O saved/O./O But/O before/O the/O maid/O she/O felt/O,/O if/O
not/O exactly/O ashamed/O,/O at/O least/O uncomfortable/O./O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON had/O a/O great/O sense/O of/O relief/O when/O Annushka/LOCATION,/O whom/O she/O
had/O known/O for/O years/O,/O walked/O in/O./O The/O smart/O maid/O was/O sent/O for/O to/O go/O to/O her/O
mistress/O,/O and/O Annushka/PERSON remained/O with/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON./O

Annushka/PERSON was/O obviously/O much/O pleased/O at/O that/O lady/O's/O arrival/O,/O and/O began/O to/O
chatter/O away/O without/O a/O pause/O./O Dolly/PERSON observed/O that/O she/O was/O longing/O to/O
express/O her/O opinion/O in/O regard/O to/O her/O mistress/O's/O position/O,/O especially/O as/O
to/O the/O love/O and/O devotion/O of/O the/O count/O to/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O but/O Dolly/PERSON
carefully/O interrupted/O her/O whenever/O she/O began/O to/O speak/O about/O this/O./O

``/OI/O grew/O up/O with/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON;/O my/O lady/O's/O dearer/O to/O me/O than/O anything/O./O
Well/O,/O it/O's/O not/O for/O us/O to/O judge/O./O And/O,/O to/O be/O sure/O,/O there/O seems/O so/O much/O
love/O.../O''/O

``/OKindly/O pour/O out/O the/O water/O for/O me/O to/O wash/O now/O,/O please/O,/O''/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON cut/O her/O short/O./O

``/OCertainly/O./O We/O've/O two/O women/O kept/O specially/O for/O washing/O small/O things/O,/O but/O
most/O of/O the/O linen/O's/O done/O by/O machinery/O./O The/O count/O goes/O into/O everything/O
himself/O./O Ah/O,/O what/O a/O husband/O!/O.../O''/O

Dolly/PERSON was/O glad/O when/O Anna/PERSON came/O in/O,/O and/O by/O her/O entrance/O put/O a/O stop/O to/O
Annushka/PERSON's/O gossip/O./O

Anna/PERSON had/O put/O on/O a/O very/O simple/O batiste/O gown/O./O Dolly/PERSON scrutinized/O that/O
simple/O gown/O attentively/O./O She/O knew/O what/O it/O meant/O,/O and/O the/O price/O at/O which/O
such/O simplicity/O was/O obtained/O./O

``/OAn/O old/O friend/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON of/PERSON Annushka/PERSON./O

Anna/PERSON was/O not/O embarrassed/O now/O./O She/O was/O perfectly/O composed/O and/O at/O ease/O./O
Dolly/PERSON saw/O that/O she/O had/O now/O completely/O recovered/O from/O the/O impression/O her/O
arrival/O had/O made/O on/O her/O,/O and/O had/O assumed/O that/O superficial/O,/O careless/O tone/O
which/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O closed/O the/O door/O on/O that/O compartment/O in/O which/O her/O
deeper/O feelings/O and/O ideas/O were/O kept/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O how/O is/O your/O little/O girl/O?/O''/O asked/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OAnnie/PERSON?/O''/O -LRB-/OThis/O was/O what/O she/O called/O her/O little/O daughter/O Anna/PERSON./O-RRB-/O ``/OVery/O
well/O./O She/O has/O got/O on/O wonderfully/O./O Would/O you/O like/O to/O see/O her/O?/O Come/O,/O I/O'll/O
show/O her/O to/O you/O./O We/O had/O a/O terrible/O bother/O,/O''/O she/O began/O telling/O her/O,/O ``/Oover/O
nurses/O./O We/O had/O an/O Italian/O wet-nurse/O./O A/O good/O creature/O,/O but/O so/O stupid/O!/O We/O
wanted/O to/O get/O rid/O of/O her/O,/O but/O the/O baby/O is/O so/O used/O to/O her/O that/O we/O've/O gone/O
on/O keeping/O her/O still/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O how/O have/O you/O managed/O?/O.../O''/O Dolly/PERSON was/O beginning/O a/O question/O as/O to/O what/O
name/O the/O little/O girl/O would/O have/O;/O but/O noticing/O a/O sudden/O frown/O on/O Anna/PERSON's/O
face/O,/O she/O changed/O the/O drift/O of/O her/O question/O./O

``/OHow/O did/O you/O manage/O?/O have/O you/O weaned/O her/O yet/O?/O''/O

But/O Anna/PERSON had/O understood/O./O

``/OYou/O did/On't/O mean/O to/O ask/O that/O?/O You/O meant/O to/O ask/O about/O her/O surname/O./O Yes/O?/O
That/O worries/O Alexey/PERSON./O She/O has/O no/O name/O--/Othat/O is/O,/O she/O's/O a/O Karenina/PERSON,/O''/O said/O
Anna/PERSON,/O dropping/O her/O eyelids/O till/O nothing/O could/O be/O seen/O but/O the/O eyelashes/O
meeting/O./O ``/OBut/O we/O'll/O talk/O about/O all/O that/O later/O,/O''/O her/O face/O suddenly/O
brightening/O./O ``/OCome/O,/O I/O'll/O show/O you/O her/O./O _/OElle/O est/O très/O gentille/O_/O./O She/O
crawls/O now/O./O''/O

In/O the/O nursery/O the/O luxury/O which/O had/O impressed/O Dolly/O in/O the/O whole/O house/O
struck/O her/O still/O more/O./O There/O were/O little/O go-carts/O ordered/O from/O England/LOCATION,/O
and/O appliances/O for/O learning/O to/O walk/O,/O and/O a/O sofa/O after/O the/O fashion/O of/O a/O
billiard/O table/O,/O purposely/O constructed/O for/O crawling/O,/O and/O swings/O and/O
baths/O,/O all/O of/O special/O pattern/O,/O and/O modern/O./O They/O were/O all/O English/O,/O solid/O,/O
and/O of/O good/O make/O,/O and/O obviously/O very/O expensive/O./O The/O room/O was/O large/O,/O and/O
very/O light/O and/O lofty/O./O

When/O they/O went/O in/O,/O the/O baby/O,/O with/O nothing/O on/O but/O her/O little/O smock/O,/O was/O
sitting/O in/O a/O little/O elbow/O chair/O at/O the/O table/O,/O having/O her/O dinner/O of/O
broth/O,/O which/O she/O was/O spilling/O all/O over/O her/O little/O chest/O./O The/O baby/O was/O
being/O fed/O,/O and/O the/O Russian/O nursery/O maid/O was/O evidently/O sharing/O her/O meal/O./O
Neither/O the/O wet-nurse/O nor/O the/O head/O nurse/O were/O there/O;/O they/O were/O in/O the/O
next/O room/O,/O from/O which/O came/O the/O sound/O of/O their/O conversation/O in/O the/O queer/O
French/O which/O was/O their/O only/O means/O of/O communication/O./O

Hearing/O Anna/PERSON's/O voice/O,/O a/O smart/O,/O tall/O,/O English/O nurse/O with/O a/O disagreeable/O
face/O and/O a/O dissolute/O expression/O walked/O in/O at/O the/O door/O,/O hurriedly/O shaking/O
her/O fair/O curls/O,/O and/O immediately/O began/O to/O defend/O herself/O though/O Anna/PERSON had/O
not/O found/O fault/O with/O her/O./O At/O every/O word/O Anna/PERSON said/O,/O the/O English/O nurse/O
said/O hurriedly/O several/O times/O,/O ``/OYes/O,/O my/O lady/O./O''/O

The/O rosy/O baby/O with/O her/O black/O eyebrows/O and/O hair/O,/O her/O sturdy/O red/O little/O
body/O with/O tight/O goose-flesh/O skin/O,/O delighted/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON in/O spite/O
of/O the/O cross/O expression/O with/O which/O she/O stared/O at/O the/O stranger/O./O She/O
positively/O envied/O the/O baby/O's/O healthy/O appearance/O./O She/O was/O delighted/O,/O too/O,/O
at/O the/O baby/O's/O crawling/O./O Not/O one/O of/O her/O own/O children/O had/O crawled/O like/O
that/O./O When/O the/O baby/O was/O put/O on/O the/O carpet/O and/O its/O little/O dress/O tucked/O up/O
behind/O,/O it/O was/O wonderfully/O charming/O./O Looking/O round/O like/O some/O little/O wild/O
animal/O at/O the/O grown-up/O big/O people/O with/O her/O bright/O black/O eyes/O,/O she/O
smiled/O,/O unmistakably/O pleased/O at/O their/O admiring/O her/O,/O and/O holding/O her/O legs/O
sideways/O,/O she/O pressed/O vigorously/O on/O her/O arms/O,/O and/O rapidly/O drew/O her/O whole/O
back/O up/O after/O,/O and/O then/O made/O another/O step/O forward/O with/O her/O little/O arms/O./O

But/O the/O whole/O atmosphere/O of/O the/O nursery/O,/O and/O especially/O the/O English/O
nurse/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON did/O not/O like/O at/O all/O./O It/O was/O only/O on/O the/O
supposition/O that/O no/O good/O nurse/O would/O have/O entered/O so/O irregular/O a/O
household/O as/O Anna/PERSON's/O that/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON could/O explain/O to/O herself/O how/O
Anna/PERSON with/O her/O insight/O into/O people/O could/O take/O such/O an/O unprepossessing/O,/O
disreputable-looking/O woman/O as/O nurse/O to/O her/O child/O./O

Besides/O,/O from/O a/O few/O words/O that/O were/O dropped/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON saw/O at/O
once/O that/O Anna/PERSON,/O the/O two/O nurses/O,/O and/O the/O child/O had/O no/O common/O existence/O,/O
and/O that/O the/O mother/O's/O visit/O was/O something/O exceptional/O./O Anna/PERSON wanted/O to/O
get/O the/O baby/O her/O plaything/O,/O and/O could/O not/O find/O it/O./O

Most/O amazing/O of/O all/O was/O the/O fact/O that/O on/O being/O asked/O how/O many/O teeth/O the/O
baby/O had/O,/O Anna/PERSON answered/O wrong/O,/O and/O knew/O nothing/O about/O the/O two/O last/O
teeth/O./O

``/OI/O sometimes/O feel/O sorry/O I/O'm/O so/O superfluous/O here/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O going/O out/O
of/O the/O nursery/O and/O holding/O up/O her/O skirt/O so/O as/O to/O escape/O the/O plaything/O
standing/O in/O the/O doorway/O./O ``/OIt/O was/O very/O different/O with/O my/O first/O child/O./O''/O

``/OI/O expected/O it/O to/O be/O the/O other/O way/O,/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON shyly/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O!/O By/O the/O way/O,/O do/O you/O know/O I/O saw/O Seryozha/PERSON?/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O screwing/O up/O
her/O eyes/O,/O as/O though/O looking/O at/O something/O far/O away/O./O ``/OBut/O we/O'll/O talk/O about/O
that/O later/O./O You/O would/On't/O believe/O it/O,/O I/O'm/O like/O a/O hungry/O beggar/O woman/O when/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O ought/O to/O give/O you/O a/O sketch/O of/O the/O company/O you/O will/O meet/O with/O us/O,/O''/O

that/O later/O on/O,/O though/O./O Then/O Sviazhsky/PERSON--/Ohe/O's/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O district/O,/O

Chapter/O 20/O


``/OHere/O's/O Dolly/O for/O you/O,/O princess/O,/O you/O were/O so/O anxious/O to/O see/O her/O,/O''/O said/O
Anna/PERSON,/O coming/O out/O with/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON onto/O the/O stone/O terrace/O where/O
Princess/O Varvara/PERSON was/O sitting/O in/O the/O shade/O at/O an/O embroidery/O frame/O,/O
working/O at/O a/O cover/O for/O Count/O Alexey/PERSON Kirillovitch/PERSON's/O easy/O chair/O./O ``/OShe/O says/O
she/O does/On't/O want/O anything/O before/O dinner/O,/O but/O please/O order/O some/O lunch/O for/O
her/O,/O and/O I/O'll/O go/O and/O look/O for/O Alexey/PERSON and/O bring/O them/O all/O in/O./O''/O

Princess/O Varvara/PERSON gave/O Dolly/PERSON a/O cordial/O and/O rather/O patronizing/O reception/O,/O
and/O began/O at/O once/O explaining/O to/O her/O that/O she/O was/O living/O with/O Anna/PERSON
because/O she/O had/O always/O cared/O more/O for/O her/O than/O her/O sister/O Katerina/PERSON
Pavlovna/PERSON,/O the/O aunt/O that/O had/O brought/O Anna/PERSON up/O,/O and/O that/O now/O,/O when/O every/O
one/O had/O abandoned/O Anna/PERSON,/O she/O thought/O it/O her/O duty/O to/O help/O her/O in/O this/O most/O
difficult/O period/O of/O transition/O./O

``/OHer/O husband/O will/O give/O her/O a/O divorce/O,/O and/O then/O I/O shall/O go/O back/O to/O my/O
solitude/O;/O but/O now/O I/O can/O be/O of/O use/O,/O and/O I/O am/O doing/O my/O duty/O,/O however/O
difficult/O it/O may/O be/O for/O me/O--/Onot/O like/O some/O other/O people/O./O And/O how/O sweet/O it/O
is/O of/O you/O,/O how/O right/O of/O you/O to/O have/O come/O!/O They/O live/O like/O the/O best/O of/O
married/O couples/O;/O it/O's/O for/O God/O to/O judge/O them/O,/O not/O for/O us/O./O And/O did/On't/O
Biryuzovsky/PERSON and/O Madame/O Avenieva/O .../O and/O Sam/PERSON Nikandrov/PERSON,/O and/O Vassiliev/PERSON and/O
Madame/PERSON Mamonova/PERSON,/O and/O Liza/PERSON Neptunova/PERSON.../O Did/O no/O one/O say/O anything/O about/O
them/O?/O And/O it/O has/O ended/O by/O their/O being/O received/O by/O everyone/O./O And/O then/O,/O
_/Oc’est/O un/O intérieur/O si/O joli/O,/O si/O comme/O il/O faut/O./O Tout-à-fait/O à/O l'anglaise/O./O
On/O se/O réunit/O le/O matin/O au/O breakfast/O,/O et/O puis/O on/O se/O sépare/O./O_/O Everyone/O does/O
as/O he/O pleases/O till/O dinnertime/O./O Dinner/O at/O seven/O o'clock/O./O Stiva/PERSON did/O very/O
rightly/O to/O send/O you/O./O He/O needs/O their/O support/O./O You/O know/O that/O through/O his/O
mother/O and/O brother/O he/O can/O do/O anything/O./O And/O then/O they/O do/O so/O much/O good/O./O He/O
did/On't/O tell/O you/O about/O his/O hospital/O?/O _/OCe/O sera/O admirable/O_/O--/Oeverything/O from/O
Paris/LOCATION./O''/O

Their/O conversation/O was/O interrupted/O by/O Anna/PERSON,/O who/O had/O found/O the/O men/O of/O the/O
party/O in/O the/O billiard/O room/O,/O and/O returned/O with/O them/O to/O the/O terrace/O./O There/O
was/O still/O a/O long/O time/O before/O the/O dinner-hour/O,/O it/O was/O exquisite/O weather/O,/O
and/O so/O several/O different/O methods/O of/O spending/O the/O next/O two/O hours/O were/O
proposed/O./O There/O were/O very/O many/O methods/O of/O passing/O the/O time/O at/O
Vozdvizhenskoe/LOCATION,/O and/O these/O were/O all/O unlike/O those/O in/O use/O at/O Pokrovskoe/LOCATION./O

''/O_/OUne/O partie/O de/O lawn-tennis/O,/O_/O''/O Veslovsky/PERSON proposed/O,/O with/O his/O handsome/O
smile/O./O ``/OWe/O'll/O be/O partners/O again/O,/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O it/O's/O too/O hot/O;/O better/O stroll/O about/O the/O garden/O and/O have/O a/O row/O in/O the/O
boat/O,/O show/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON the/O river/O banks/O./O''/O Vronsky/O proposed/O./O

``/OI/O agree/O to/O anything/O,/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O

``/OI/O imagine/O that/O what/O Dolly/PERSON would/O like/O best/O would/O be/O a/O stroll/O--/Owould/On't/O
you/O?/O And/O then/O the/O boat/O,/O perhaps/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O

So/O it/O was/O decided/O./O Veslovsky/PERSON and/O Tushkevitch/PERSON went/O off/O to/O the/O bathing/O
place/O,/O promising/O to/O get/O the/O boat/O ready/O and/O to/O wait/O there/O for/O them/O./O

They/O walked/O along/O the/O path/O in/O two/O couples/O,/O Anna/PERSON with/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O and/O
Dolly/PERSON with/O Vronsky/O./O Dolly/PERSON was/O a/O little/O embarrassed/O and/O anxious/O in/O the/O
new/O surroundings/O in/O which/O she/O found/O herself/O./O Abstractly/O,/O theoretically/O,/O
she/O did/O not/O merely/O justify/O,/O she/O positively/O approved/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O conduct/O./O
As/O is/O indeed/O not/O unfrequent/O with/O women/O of/O unimpeachable/O virtue/O,/O weary/O of/O
the/O monotony/O of/O respectable/O existence/O,/O at/O a/O distance/O she/O not/O only/O
excused/O illicit/O love/O,/O she/O positively/O envied/O it/O./O Besides/O,/O she/O loved/O Anna/PERSON
with/O all/O her/O heart/O./O But/O seeing/O Anna/PERSON in/O actual/O life/O among/O these/O
strangers/O,/O with/O this/O fashionable/O tone/O that/O was/O so/O new/O to/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O she/O felt/O ill/O at/O ease/O./O What/O she/O disliked/O particularly/O was/O
seeing/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON ready/O to/O overlook/O everything/O for/O the/O sake/O of/O the/O
comforts/O she/O enjoyed/O./O

As/O a/O general/O principle/O,/O abstractly/O,/O Dolly/PERSON approved/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O action/O;/O but/O
to/O see/O the/O man/O for/O whose/O sake/O her/O action/O had/O been/O taken/O was/O disagreeable/O
to/O her/O./O Moreover/O,/O she/O had/O never/O liked/O Vronsky/O./O She/O thought/O him/O very/O
proud/O,/O and/O saw/O nothing/O in/O him/O of/O which/O he/O could/O be/O proud/O except/O his/O
wealth/O./O But/O against/O her/O own/O will/O,/O here/O in/O his/O own/O house/O,/O he/O overawed/O her/O
more/O than/O ever/O,/O and/O she/O could/O not/O be/O at/O ease/O with/O him/O./O She/O felt/O with/O him/O
the/O same/O feeling/O she/O had/O had/O with/O the/O maid/O about/O her/O dressing/O jacket/O./O
Just/O as/O with/O the/O maid/O she/O had/O felt/O not/O exactly/O ashamed/O,/O but/O embarrassed/O
at/O her/O darns/O,/O so/O she/O felt/O with/O him/O not/O exactly/O ashamed/O,/O but/O embarrassed/O
at/O herself/O./O

Dolly/PERSON was/O ill/O at/O ease/O,/O and/O tried/O to/O find/O a/O subject/O of/O conversation/O./O Even/O
though/O she/O supposed/O that/O,/O through/O his/O pride/O,/O praise/O of/O his/O house/O and/O
garden/O would/O be/O sure/O to/O be/O disagreeable/O to/O him/O,/O she/O did/O all/O the/O same/O
tell/O him/O how/O much/O she/O liked/O his/O house/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O a/O very/O fine/O building/O,/O and/O in/O the/O good/O old-fashioned/O style/O,/O''/O
he/O said/O./O

``/OI/O like/O so/O much/O the/O court/O in/O front/O of/O the/O steps/O./O Was/O that/O always/O so/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O his/O face/O beamed/O with/O pleasure/O./O ``/OIf/O you/O could/O only/O
have/O seen/O that/O court/O last/O spring/O!/O''/O

And/O he/O began/O,/O at/O first/O rather/O diffidently/O,/O but/O more/O and/O more/O carried/O
away/O by/O the/O subject/O as/O he/O went/O on/O,/O to/O draw/O her/O attention/O to/O the/O various/O
details/O of/O the/O decoration/O of/O his/O house/O and/O garden/O./O It/O was/O evident/O that/O,/O
having/O devoted/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O trouble/O to/O improve/O and/O beautify/O his/O home/O,/O
Vronsky/PERSON felt/O a/O need/O to/O show/O off/O the/O improvements/O to/O a/O new/O person/O,/O and/O
was/O genuinely/O delighted/O at/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O praise/O./O

``/OIf/O you/O would/O care/O to/O look/O at/O the/O hospital/O,/O and/O are/O not/O tired/O,/O indeed/O,/O
it/O's/O not/O far/O./O Shall/O we/O go/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O glancing/O into/O her/O face/O to/O convince/O
himself/O that/O she/O was/O not/O bored/O./O ``/OAre/O you/O coming/O,/O Anna/PERSON?/O''/O he/O turned/O to/O
her/O./O

``/OWe/O will/O come/O,/O wo/On't/O we/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O addressing/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O ''/O_/OMais/O il/O ne/O
faut/O pas/O laisser/O le/O pauvre/O Veslovsky/O et/O Tushkevitch/O se/O morfondre/O là/O dans/O
le/O bateau/O./O_/O We/O must/O send/O and/O tell/O them/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O this/O is/O a/O monument/O he/O is/O setting/O up/O here/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O turning/O to/O
Dolly/PERSON with/O that/O sly/O smile/O of/O comprehension/O with/O which/O she/O had/O previously/O
talked/O about/O the/O hospital/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O it/O's/O a/O work/O of/O real/O importance/O!/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O But/O to/O show/O he/O was/O
not/O trying/O to/O ingratiate/O himself/O with/O Vronsky/O,/O he/O promptly/O added/O some/O
slightly/O critical/O remarks/O./O

``/OI/O wonder/O,/O though/O,/O count/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/Othat/O while/O you/O do/O so/O much/O for/O the/O
health/O of/O the/O peasants/O,/O you/O take/O so/O little/O interest/O in/O the/O schools/O./O''/O

''/O_/OC'est/O devenu/O tellement/O commun/O les/O écoles/O,/O_/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON./O ``/OYou/O
understand/O it/O's/O not/O on/O that/O account/O,/O but/O it/O just/O happens/O so/O,/O my/O interest/O
has/O been/O diverted/O elsewhere/O./O This/O way/O then/O to/O the/O hospital/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O
Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O pointing/O to/O a/O turning/O out/O of/O the/O avenue/O./O

The/O ladies/O put/O up/O their/O parasols/O and/O turned/O into/O the/O side/O path/O./O After/O
going/O down/O several/O turnings/O,/O and/O going/O through/O a/O little/O gate/O,/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON saw/O standing/O on/O rising/O ground/O before/O her/O a/O large/O
pretentious-looking/O red/O building/O,/O almost/O finished/O./O The/O iron/O roof/O,/O which/O
was/O not/O yet/O painted/O,/O shone/O with/O dazzling/O brightness/O in/O the/O sunshine/O./O
Beside/O the/O finished/O building/O another/O had/O been/O begun/O,/O surrounded/O by/O
scaffolding/O./O Workmen/O in/O aprons/O,/O standing/O on/O scaffolds/O,/O were/O laying/O
bricks/O,/O pouring/O mortar/O out/O of/O vats/O,/O and/O smoothing/O it/O with/O trowels/O./O

``/OHow/O quickly/O work/O gets/O done/O with/O you/O!/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O ``/OWhen/O I/O was/O here/O
last/O time/O the/O roof/O was/O not/O on/O./O''/O

``/OBy/O the/O autumn/O it/O will/O all/O be/O ready/O./O Inside/O almost/O everything/O is/O done/O,/O''/O
said/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OAnd/O what/O's/O this/O new/O building/O?/O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O the/O house/O for/O the/O doctor/O and/O the/O dispensary/O,/O''/O answered/O Vronsky/O,/O
seeing/O the/O architect/O in/O a/O short/O jacket/O coming/O towards/O him/O;/O and/O excusing/O
himself/O to/O the/O ladies/O,/O he/O went/O to/O meet/O him/O./O

Going/O round/O a/O hole/O where/O the/O workmen/O were/O slaking/O lime/O,/O he/O stood/O still/O
with/O the/O architect/O and/O began/O talking/O rather/O warmly/O./O

``/OThe/O front/O is/O still/O too/O low/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O Anna/PERSON,/O who/O had/O asked/O what/O was/O
the/O matter/O./O

``/OI/O said/O the/O foundation/O ought/O to/O be/O raised/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O of/O course/O it/O would/O have/O been/O much/O better/O,/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O''/O said/O
the/O architect/O,/O ``/Obut/O now/O it/O's/O too/O late/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O take/O a/O great/O interest/O in/O it/O,/O''/O Anna/PERSON answered/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O who/O was/O
expressing/O his/O surprise/O at/O her/O knowledge/O of/O architecture/O./O ``/OThis/O new/O
building/O ought/O to/O have/O been/O in/O harmony/O with/O the/O hospital/O./O It/O was/O an/O
afterthought/O,/O and/O was/O begun/O without/O a/O plan/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O,/O having/O finished/O his/O talk/O with/O the/O architect/O,/O joined/O the/O ladies/O,/O
and/O led/O them/O inside/O the/O hospital/O./O

Although/O they/O were/O still/O at/O work/O on/O the/O cornices/O outside/O and/O were/O
painting/O on/O the/O ground/O floor/O,/O upstairs/O almost/O all/O the/O rooms/O were/O
finished/O./O Going/O up/O the/O broad/O cast-iron/O staircase/O to/O the/O landing/O,/O they/O
walked/O into/O the/O first/O large/O room/O./O The/O walls/O were/O stuccoed/O to/O look/O like/O
marble/O,/O the/O huge/O plate-glass/O windows/O were/O already/O in/O,/O only/O the/O parquet/O
floor/O was/O not/O yet/O finished/O,/O and/O the/O carpenters/O,/O who/O were/O planing/O a/O block/O
of/O it/O,/O left/O their/O work/O,/O taking/O off/O the/O bands/O that/O fastened/O their/O hair/O,/O
to/O greet/O the/O gentry/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O the/O reception/O room/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON./O ``/OHere/O there/O will/O be/O a/O desk/O,/O
tables/O,/O and/O benches/O,/O and/O nothing/O more/O./O''/O

``/OThis/O way/O;/O let/O us/O go/O in/O here/O./O Do/On't/O go/O near/O the/O window/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O
trying/O the/O paint/O to/O see/O if/O it/O were/O dry/O./O ``/OAlexey/PERSON,/O the/O paint/O's/O dry/O
already/O,/O''/O she/O added/O./O

From/O the/O reception/O room/O they/O went/O into/O the/O corridor/O./O Here/O Vronsky/O showed/O
them/O the/O mechanism/O for/O ventilation/O on/O a/O novel/O system/O./O Then/O he/O showed/O
them/O marble/O baths/O,/O and/O beds/O with/O extraordinary/O springs/O./O Then/O he/O showed/O
them/O the/O wards/O one/O after/O another/O,/O the/O storeroom/O,/O the/O linen/O room/O,/O then/O
the/O heating/O stove/O of/O a/O new/O pattern/O,/O then/O the/O trolleys/O,/O which/O would/O make/O
no/O noise/O as/O they/O carried/O everything/O needed/O along/O the/O corridors/O,/O and/O many/O
other/O things/O./O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O as/O a/O connoisseur/O in/O the/O latest/O mechanical/O
improvements/O,/O appreciated/O everything/O fully/O./O Dolly/PERSON simply/O wondered/O at/O all/O
she/O had/O not/O seen/O before/O,/O and/O,/O anxious/O to/O understand/O it/O all/O,/O made/O minute/O
inquiries/O about/O everything/O,/O which/O gave/O Vronsky/O great/O satisfaction/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O imagine/O that/O this/O will/O be/O the/O solitary/O example/O of/O a/O properly/O
fitted/O hospital/O in/O Russia/LOCATION,/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O

``/OAnd/O wo/On't/O you/O have/O a/O lying-in/O ward/O?/O''/O asked/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OThat/O's/O so/O much/O
needed/O in/O the/O country/O./O I/O have/O often/O.../O''/O

In/O spite/O of/O his/O usual/O courtesy/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON interrupted/O her/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O not/O a/O lying-in/O home/O,/O but/O a/O hospital/O for/O the/O sick/O,/O and/O is/O
intended/O for/O all/O diseases/O,/O except/O infectious/O complaints/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OAh/O!/O
look/O at/O this/O,/O''/O and/O he/O rolled/O up/O to/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON an/O invalid/O chair/O
that/O had/O just/O been/O ordered/O for/O the/O convalescents/O./O ``/OLook/O./O''/O He/O sat/O down/O in/O
the/O chair/O and/O began/O moving/O it/O./O ``/OThe/O patient/O ca/On't/O walk/O--/Ostill/O too/O weak/O,/O
perhaps/O,/O or/O something/O wrong/O with/O his/O legs/O,/O but/O he/O must/O have/O air/O,/O and/O he/O
moves/O,/O rolls/O himself/O along/O.../O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON was/O interested/O by/O everything/O./O She/O liked/O everything/O
very/O much/O,/O but/O most/O of/O all/O she/O liked/O Vronsky/PERSON himself/O with/O his/O natural/O,/O
simple-hearted/O eagerness/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O he/O's/O a/O very/O nice/O,/O good/O man/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O
several/O times/O,/O not/O hearing/O what/O he/O said/O,/O but/O looking/O at/O him/O and/O
penetrating/O into/O his/O expression/O,/O while/O she/O mentally/O put/O herself/O in/O
Anna/PERSON's/O place/O./O She/O liked/O him/O so/O much/O just/O now/O with/O his/O eager/O interest/O
that/O she/O saw/O how/O Anna/PERSON could/O be/O in/O love/O with/O him/O./O



Chapter/O 21/O


``/ONo/O,/O I/O think/O the/O princess/O is/O tired/O,/O and/O horses/O do/On't/O interest/O her/O,/O''/O
Vronsky/PERSON said/O to/O Anna/PERSON,/O who/O wanted/O to/O go/O on/O to/O the/O stables/O,/O where/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON wished/O to/O see/O the/O new/O stallion/O./O ``/OYou/O go/O on/O,/O while/O I/O escort/O the/O
princess/O home/O,/O and/O we/O'll/O have/O a/O little/O talk/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/Oif/O you/O would/O
like/O that/O?/O''/O he/O added/O,/O turning/O to/O her/O./O

``/OI/O know/O nothing/O about/O horses/O,/O and/O I/O shall/O be/O delighted/O,/O''/O answered/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O rather/O astonished/O./O

She/O saw/O by/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O face/O that/O he/O wanted/O something/O from/O her/O./O She/O was/O not/O
mistaken/O./O As/O soon/O as/O they/O had/O passed/O through/O the/O little/O gate/O back/O into/O
the/O garden/O,/O he/O looked/O in/O the/O direction/O Anna/PERSON had/O taken/O,/O and/O having/O made/O
sure/O that/O she/O could/O neither/O hear/O nor/O see/O them/O,/O he/O began/O:/O

``/OYou/O guess/O that/O I/O have/O something/O I/O want/O to/O say/O to/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O
at/O her/O with/O laughing/O eyes/O./O ``/OI/O am/O not/O wrong/O in/O believing/O you/O to/O be/O a/O
friend/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O./O''/O He/O took/O off/O his/O hat/O,/O and/O taking/O out/O his/O handkerchief/O,/O
wiped/O his/O head/O,/O which/O was/O growing/O bald/O./O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON made/O no/O answer/O,/O and/O merely/O stared/O at/O him/O with/O dismay/O./O
When/O she/O was/O left/O alone/O with/O him/O,/O she/O suddenly/O felt/O afraid/O;/O his/O laughing/O
eyes/O and/O stern/O expression/O scared/O her/O./O

The/O most/O diverse/O suppositions/O as/O to/O what/O he/O was/O about/O to/O speak/O of/O to/O her/O
flashed/O into/O her/O brain/O./O ``/OHe/O is/O going/O to/O beg/O me/O to/O come/O to/O stay/O with/O them/O
with/O the/O children/O,/O and/O I/O shall/O have/O to/O refuse/O;/O or/O to/O create/O a/O set/O that/O
will/O receive/O Anna/PERSON in/O Moscow/LOCATION.../O./O Or/O is/On't/O it/O Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON and/O his/O
relations/O with/O Anna/PERSON?/O Or/O perhaps/O about/O Kitty/PERSON,/O that/O he/O feels/O he/O was/O to/O
blame/O?/O''/O All/O her/O conjectures/O were/O unpleasant/O,/O but/O she/O did/O not/O guess/O what/O
he/O really/O wanted/O to/O talk/O about/O to/O her/O./O

``/OYou/O have/O so/O much/O influence/O with/O Anna/PERSON,/O she/O is/O so/O fond/O of/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O;/O
``/Odo/O help/O me/O./O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON looked/O with/O timid/O inquiry/O into/O his/O energetic/O face/O,/O
which/O under/O the/O lime-trees/O was/O continually/O being/O lighted/O up/O in/O patches/O
by/O the/O sunshine/O,/O and/O then/O passing/O into/O complete/O shadow/O again/O./O She/O waited/O
for/O him/O to/O say/O more/O,/O but/O he/O walked/O in/O silence/O beside/O her/O,/O scratching/O
with/O his/O cane/O in/O the/O gravel/O./O

``/OYou/O have/O come/O to/O see/O us/O,/O you/O,/O the/O only/O woman/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O former/O friends/O--/OI/O
do/On't/O count/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON--/Obut/O I/O know/O that/O you/O have/O done/O this/O not/O
because/O you/O regard/O our/O position/O as/O normal/O,/O but/O because/O,/O understanding/O
all/O the/O difficulty/O of/O the/O position/O,/O you/O still/O love/O her/O and/O want/O to/O be/O a/O
help/O to/O her/O./O Have/O I/O understood/O you/O rightly/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O,/O looking/O round/O at/O
her/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O''/O answered/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O putting/O down/O her/O sunshade/O,/O
``/Obut/O.../O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O''/O he/O broke/O in/O,/O and/O unconsciously/O,/O oblivious/O of/O the/O awkward/O position/O
into/O which/O he/O was/O putting/O his/O companion/O,/O he/O stopped/O abruptly/O,/O so/O that/O
she/O had/O to/O stop/O short/O too/O./O ``/ONo/O one/O feels/O more/O deeply/O and/O intensely/O than/O
I/O do/O all/O the/O difficulty/O of/O Anna/PERSON's/O position/O;/O and/O that/O you/O may/O well/O
understand/O,/O if/O you/O do/O me/O the/O honor/O of/O supposing/O I/O have/O any/O heart/O./O I/O am/O
to/O blame/O for/O that/O position/O,/O and/O that/O is/O why/O I/O feel/O it/O./O''/O

``/OI/O understand/O,/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O involuntarily/O admiring/O the/O
sincerity/O and/O firmness/O with/O which/O he/O said/O this/O./O ``/OBut/O just/O because/O you/O
feel/O yourself/O responsible/O,/O you/O exaggerate/O it/O,/O I/O am/O afraid/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O
``/OHer/O position/O in/O the/O world/O is/O difficult/O,/O I/O can/O well/O understand/O./O''/O

``/OIn/O the/O world/O it/O is/O hell/O!/O''/O he/O brought/O out/O quickly/O,/O frowning/O darkly/O./O ``/OYou/O
ca/On't/O imagine/O moral/O sufferings/O greater/O than/O what/O she/O went/O through/O in/O
Petersburg/LOCATION in/O that/O fortnight/O .../O and/O I/O beg/O you/O to/O believe/O it/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O here/O,/O so/O long/O as/O neither/O Anna/PERSON .../O nor/O you/O miss/O society/O.../O''/O

``/OSociety/O!/O''/O he/O said/O contemptuously/O,/O ``/Ohow/O could/O I/O miss/O society/O?/O''/O

``/OSo/O far/O--/Oand/O it/O may/O be/O so/O always/O--/Oyou/O are/O happy/O and/O at/O peace/O./O I/O see/O in/O
Anna/PERSON that/O she/O is/O happy/O,/O perfectly/O happy/O,/O she/O has/O had/O time/O to/O tell/O me/O so/O
much/O already/O,/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O smiling/O;/O and/O involuntarily/O,/O as/O
she/O said/O this/O,/O at/O the/O same/O moment/O a/O doubt/O entered/O her/O mind/O whether/O Anna/PERSON
really/O were/O happy/O./O

But/O Vronsky/O,/O it/O appeared/O,/O had/O no/O doubts/O on/O that/O score/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/OI/O know/O that/O she/O has/O revived/O after/O all/O her/O
sufferings/O;/O she/O is/O happy/O./O She/O is/O happy/O in/O the/O present/O./O But/O I/O?/O.../O I/O am/O
afraid/O of/O what/O is/O before/O us/O .../O I/O beg/O your/O pardon/O,/O you/O would/O like/O to/O
walk/O on/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O do/On't/O mind/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O then/O,/O let/O us/O sit/O here/O./O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON sat/O down/O on/O a/O garden/O seat/O in/O a/O corner/O of/O the/O avenue/O./O
He/O stood/O up/O facing/O her/O./O

``/OI/O see/O that/O she/O is/O happy/O,/O''/O he/O repeated/O,/O and/O the/O doubt/O whether/O she/O were/O
happy/O sank/O more/O deeply/O into/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O mind/O./O ``/OBut/O can/O it/O last/O?/O
Whether/O we/O have/O acted/O rightly/O or/O wrongly/O is/O another/O question/O,/O but/O the/O
die/O is/O cast/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O passing/O from/O Russian/O to/O French/O,/O ``/Oand/O we/O are/O bound/O
together/O for/O life/O./O We/O are/O united/O by/O all/O the/O ties/O of/O love/O that/O we/O hold/O
most/O sacred/O./O We/O have/O a/O child/O,/O we/O may/O have/O other/O children/O./O But/O the/O law/O
and/O all/O the/O conditions/O of/O our/O position/O are/O such/O that/O thousands/O of/O
complications/O arise/O which/O she/O does/O not/O see/O and/O does/O not/O want/O to/O see/O./O And/O
that/O one/O can/O well/O understand/O./O But/O I/O ca/On't/O help/O seeing/O them/O./O My/O daughter/O
is/O by/O law/O not/O my/O daughter/O,/O but/O Karenin/PERSON's/O./O I/O can/Onot/O bear/O this/O falsity/O!/O''/O
he/O said/O,/O with/O a/O vigorous/O gesture/O of/O refusal/O,/O and/O he/O looked/O with/O gloomy/O
inquiry/O towards/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON./O

She/O made/O no/O answer/O,/O but/O simply/O gazed/O at/O him/O./O He/O went/O on/O:/O

``/OOne/O day/O a/O son/O may/O be/O born/O,/O my/O son/O,/O and/O he/O will/O be/O legally/O a/O Karenin/ORGANIZATION;/O he/O
will/O not/O be/O the/O heir/O of/O my/O name/O nor/O of/O my/O property/O,/O and/O however/O happy/O we/O
may/O be/O in/O our/O home/O life/O and/O however/O many/O children/O we/O may/O have/O,/O there/O
will/O be/O no/O real/O tie/O between/O us/O./O They/O will/O be/O Karenins/O./O You/O can/O
understand/O the/O bitterness/O and/O horror/O of/O this/O position/O!/O I/O have/O tried/O to/O
speak/O of/O this/O to/O Anna/PERSON./O It/O irritates/O her/O./O She/O does/O not/O understand/O,/O and/O to/O
her/O I/O can/Onot/O speak/O plainly/O of/O all/O this/O./O Now/O look/O at/O another/O side/O./O I/O am/O
happy/O,/O happy/O in/O her/O love/O,/O but/O I/O must/O have/O occupation/O./O I/O have/O found/O
occupation/O,/O and/O am/O proud/O of/O what/O I/O am/O doing/O and/O consider/O it/O nobler/O than/O
the/O pursuits/O of/O my/O former/O companions/O at/O court/O and/O in/O the/O army/O./O And/O most/O
certainly/O I/O would/O not/O change/O the/O work/O I/O am/O doing/O for/O theirs/O./O I/O am/O
working/O here/O,/O settled/O in/O my/O own/O place/O,/O and/O I/O am/O happy/O and/O contented/O,/O and/O
we/O need/O nothing/O more/O to/O make/O us/O happy/O./O I/O love/O my/O work/O here/O./O _/OCe/O n'est/O
pas/O un/O pis-aller/O,/O_/O on/O the/O contrary/O.../O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON noticed/O that/O at/O this/O point/O in/O his/O explanation/O he/O grew/O
confused/O,/O and/O she/O did/O not/O quite/O understand/O this/O digression/O,/O but/O she/O felt/O
that/O having/O once/O begun/O to/O speak/O of/O matters/O near/O his/O heart/O,/O of/O which/O he/O
could/O not/O speak/O to/O Anna/PERSON,/O he/O was/O now/O making/O a/O clean/O breast/O of/O everything/O,/O
and/O that/O the/O question/O of/O his/O pursuits/O in/O the/O country/O fell/O into/O the/O same/O
category/O of/O matters/O near/O his/O heart/O,/O as/O the/O question/O of/O his/O relations/O
with/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O will/O go/O on/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O collecting/O himself/O./O ``/OThe/O great/O thing/O is/O
that/O as/O I/O work/O I/O want/O to/O have/O a/O conviction/O that/O what/O I/O am/O doing/O will/O not/O
die/O with/O me/O,/O that/O I/O shall/O have/O heirs/O to/O come/O after/O me/O,/O--/Oand/O this/O I/O have/O
not/O./O Conceive/O the/O position/O of/O a/O man/O who/O knows/O that/O his/O children/O,/O the/O
children/O of/O the/O woman/O he/O loves/O,/O will/O not/O be/O his/O,/O but/O will/O belong/O to/O
someone/O who/O hates/O them/O and/O cares/O nothing/O about/O them/O!/O It/O is/O awful/O!/O''/O

He/O paused/O,/O evidently/O much/O moved/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O indeed/O,/O I/O see/O that/O./O But/O what/O can/O Anna/PERSON do/O?/O''/O queried/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O brings/O me/O to/O the/O object/O of/O my/O conversation/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O calming/O
himself/O with/O an/O effort/O./O ``/OAnna/PERSON can/O,/O it/O depends/O on/O her/O.../O./O Even/O to/O
petition/O the/O Tsar/O for/O legitimization/O,/O a/O divorce/O is/O essential/O./O And/O that/O
depends/O on/O Anna/PERSON./O Her/O husband/O agreed/O to/O a/O divorce/O--/Oat/O that/O time/O your/O
husband/O had/O arranged/O it/O completely/O./O And/O now/O,/O I/O know/O,/O he/O would/O not/O refuse/O
it/O./O It/O is/O only/O a/O matter/O of/O writing/O to/O him/O./O He/O said/O plainly/O at/O that/O time/O
that/O if/O she/O expressed/O the/O desire/O,/O he/O would/O not/O refuse/O./O Of/O course/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O gloomily/O,/O ``/Oit/O is/O one/O of/O those/O Pharisaical/O cruelties/O of/O which/O only/O
such/O heartless/O men/O are/O capable/O./O He/O knows/O what/O agony/O any/O recollection/O of/O
him/O must/O give/O her/O,/O and/O knowing/O her/O,/O he/O must/O have/O a/O letter/O from/O her/O./O I/O
can/O understand/O that/O it/O is/O agony/O to/O her/O./O But/O the/O matter/O is/O of/O such/O
importance/O,/O that/O one/O must/O _/Opasser/O pardessus/O toutes/O ces/O finesses/O de/O
sentiment/O./O Il/O y/O va/O du/O bonheur/O et/O de/O l'existence/O d'Anne/O et/O de/O ses/O
enfants/O./O_/O I/O wo/On't/O speak/O of/O myself/O,/O though/O it/O's/O hard/O for/O me/O,/O very/O hard/O,/O''/O
he/O said/O,/O with/O an/O expression/O as/O though/O he/O were/O threatening/O someone/O for/O
its/O being/O hard/O for/O him/O./O ``/OAnd/O so/O it/O is/O,/O princess/O,/O that/O I/O am/O shamelessly/O
clutching/O at/O you/O as/O an/O anchor/O of/O salvation/O./O Help/O me/O to/O persuade/O her/O to/O
write/O to/O him/O and/O ask/O for/O a/O divorce/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O of/O course/O,/O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON said/O dreamily/O,/O as/O she/O vividly/O
recalled/O her/O last/O interview/O with/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O ``/OYes/O,/O of/O
course/O,/O''/O she/O repeated/O with/O decision/O,/O thinking/O of/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OUse/O your/O influence/O with/O her/O,/O make/O her/O write/O./O I/O do/On't/O like/O--/OI/O'm/O almost/O
unable/O to/O speak/O about/O this/O to/O her/O./O''/O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O I/O will/O talk/O to/O her/O./O But/O how/O is/O it/O she/O does/O not/O think/O of/O it/O
herself/O?/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O and/O for/O some/O reason/O she/O suddenly/O at/O
that/O point/O recalled/O Anna/PERSON's/O strange/O new/O habit/O of/O half-closing/O her/O eyes/O./O
And/O she/O remembered/O that/O Anna/PERSON drooped/O her/O eyelids/O just/O when/O the/O deeper/O
questions/O of/O life/O were/O touched/O upon/O./O ``/OJust/O as/O though/O she/O half-shut/O her/O
eyes/O to/O her/O own/O life/O,/O so/O as/O not/O to/O see/O everything/O,/O''/O thought/O Dolly/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O
indeed/O,/O for/O my/O own/O sake/O and/O for/O hers/O I/O will/O talk/O to/O her/O,/O''/O Dolly/PERSON said/O in/O
reply/O to/O his/O look/O of/O gratitude/O./O

They/O got/O up/O and/O walked/O to/O the/O house/O./O



Chapter/O 22/O


When/O Anna/PERSON found/O Dolly/PERSON at/O home/O before/O her/O,/O she/O looked/O intently/O in/O her/O
eyes/O,/O as/O though/O questioning/O her/O about/O the/O talk/O she/O had/O had/O with/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O
but/O she/O made/O no/O inquiry/O in/O words/O./O

``/OI/O believe/O it/O's/O dinner/O time/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OWe/O've/O not/O seen/O each/O other/O at/O
all/O yet/O./O I/O am/O reckoning/O on/O the/O evening/O./O Now/O I/O want/O to/O go/O and/O dress/O./O I/O
expect/O you/O do/O too/O;/O we/O all/O got/O splashed/O at/O the/O buildings/O./O''/O

Dolly/PERSON went/O to/O her/O room/O and/O she/O felt/O amused/O./O To/O change/O her/O dress/O was/O
impossible/O,/O for/O she/O had/O already/O put/O on/O her/O best/O dress/O./O But/O in/O order/O to/O
signify/O in/O some/O way/O her/O preparation/O for/O dinner/O,/O she/O asked/O the/O maid/O to/O
brush/O her/O dress/O,/O changed/O her/O cuffs/O and/O tie/O,/O and/O put/O some/O lace/O on/O her/O
head/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O all/O I/O can/O do/O,/O''/O she/O said/O with/O a/O smile/O to/O Anna/PERSON,/O who/O came/O in/O to/O
her/O in/O a/O third/O dress/O,/O again/O of/O extreme/O simplicity/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O we/O are/O too/O formal/O here/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O as/O it/O were/O apologizing/O for/O her/O
magnificence/O./O ``/OAlexey/PERSON is/O delighted/O at/O your/O visit/O,/O as/O he/O rarely/O is/O at/O
anything/O./O He/O has/O completely/O lost/O his/O heart/O to/O you/O,/O''/O she/O added/O./O ``/OYou/O're/O
not/O tired/O?/O''/O

There/O was/O no/O time/O for/O talking/O about/O anything/O before/O dinner/O./O Going/O into/O
the/O drawing/O room/O they/O found/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON already/O there/O,/O and/O the/O
gentlemen/O of/O the/O party/O in/O black/O frock-coats/O./O The/O architect/O wore/O a/O
swallow-tail/O coat/O./O Vronsky/O presented/O the/O doctor/O and/O the/O steward/O to/O his/O
guest/O./O The/O architect/O he/O had/O already/O introduced/O to/O her/O at/O the/O hospital/O./O

A/O stout/O butler/O,/O resplendent/O with/O a/O smoothly/O shaven/O round/O chin/O and/O a/O
starched/O white/O cravat/O,/O announced/O that/O dinner/O was/O ready/O,/O and/O the/O ladies/O
got/O up/O./O Vronsky/O asked/O Sviazhsky/PERSON to/O take/O in/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O and/O himself/O
offered/O his/O arm/O to/O Dolly/PERSON./O Veslovsky/PERSON was/O before/O Tushkevitch/PERSON in/O offering/O
his/O arm/O to/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON,/O so/O that/O Tushkevitch/PERSON with/O the/O steward/O and/O
the/O doctor/O walked/O in/O alone/O./O

The/O dinner/O,/O the/O dining/O room/O,/O the/O service/O,/O the/O waiting/O at/O table/O,/O the/O
wine/O,/O and/O the/O food/O,/O were/O not/O simply/O in/O keeping/O with/O the/O general/O tone/O of/O
modern/O luxury/O throughout/O all/O the/O house/O,/O but/O seemed/O even/O more/O sumptuous/O
and/O modern/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON watched/O this/O luxury/O which/O was/O novel/O to/O
her/O,/O and/O as/O a/O good/O housekeeper/O used/O to/O managing/O a/O household/O--/Oalthough/O she/O
never/O dreamed/O of/O adapting/O anything/O she/O saw/O to/O her/O own/O household/O,/O as/O it/O
was/O all/O in/O a/O style/O of/O luxury/O far/O above/O her/O own/O manner/O of/O living/O--/Oshe/O
could/O not/O help/O scrutinizing/O every/O detail/O,/O and/O wondering/O how/O and/O by/O whom/O
it/O was/O all/O done/O./O Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON,/O her/O husband/O,/O and/O even/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O
and/O many/O other/O people/O she/O knew/O,/O would/O never/O have/O considered/O this/O
question/O,/O and/O would/O have/O readily/O believed/O what/O every/O well-bred/O host/O
tries/O to/O make/O his/O guests/O feel/O,/O that/O is/O,/O that/O all/O that/O is/O well-ordered/O in/O
his/O house/O has/O cost/O him/O,/O the/O host/O,/O no/O trouble/O whatever/O,/O but/O comes/O of/O
itself/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON was/O well/O aware/O that/O even/O porridge/O for/O the/O
children/O's/O breakfast/O does/O not/O come/O of/O itself/O,/O and/O that/O therefore/O,/O where/O
so/O complicated/O and/O magnificent/O a/O style/O of/O luxury/O was/O maintained/O,/O someone/O
must/O give/O earnest/O attention/O to/O its/O organization/O./O And/O from/O the/O glance/O
with/O which/O Alexey/PERSON Kirillovitch/PERSON scanned/O the/O table/O,/O from/O the/O way/O he/O nodded/O
to/O the/O butler/O,/O and/O offered/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON her/O choice/O between/O cold/O
soup/O and/O hot/O soup/O,/O she/O saw/O that/O it/O was/O all/O organized/O and/O maintained/O by/O
the/O care/O of/O the/O master/O of/O the/O house/O himself/O./O It/O was/O evident/O that/O it/O all/O
rested/O no/O more/O upon/O Anna/PERSON than/O upon/O Veslovsky/PERSON./O She/O,/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O the/O
princess/O,/O and/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O were/O equally/O guests/O,/O with/O light/O hearts/O enjoying/O
what/O had/O been/O arranged/O for/O them/O./O

Anna/PERSON was/O the/O hostess/O only/O in/O conducting/O the/O conversation/O./O The/O
conversation/O was/O a/O difficult/O one/O for/O the/O lady/O of/O the/O house/O at/O a/O small/O
table/O with/O persons/O present/O,/O like/O the/O steward/O and/O the/O architect/O,/O
belonging/O to/O a/O completely/O different/O world/O,/O struggling/O not/O to/O be/O overawed/O
by/O an/O elegance/O to/O which/O they/O were/O unaccustomed/O,/O and/O unable/O to/O sustain/O a/O
large/O share/O in/O the/O general/O conversation/O./O But/O this/O difficult/O conversation/O
Anna/PERSON directed/O with/O her/O usual/O tact/O and/O naturalness/O,/O and/O indeed/O she/O did/O so/O
with/O actual/O enjoyment/O,/O as/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON observed/O./O The/O conversation/O
began/O about/O the/O row/O Tushkevitch/O and/O Veslovsky/PERSON had/O taken/O alone/O together/O
in/O the/O boat/O,/O and/O Tushkevitch/PERSON began/O describing/O the/O last/O boat/O races/O in/O
Petersburg/LOCATION at/O the/O Yacht/ORGANIZATION Club/ORGANIZATION./O But/O Anna/PERSON,/O seizing/O the/O first/O pause/O,/O at/O once/O
turned/O to/O the/O architect/O to/O draw/O him/O out/O of/O his/O silence/O./O

``/ONikolay/PERSON Ivanitch/PERSON was/O struck/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O meaning/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O ``/Oat/O the/O
progress/O the/O new/O building/O had/O made/O since/O he/O was/O here/O last/O;/O but/O I/O am/O
there/O every/O day/O,/O and/O every/O day/O I/O wonder/O at/O the/O rate/O at/O which/O it/O grows/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O first-rate/O working/O with/O his/O excellency/O,/O''/O said/O the/O architect/O with/O a/O

call/O upon/O the/O count/O,/O and/O in/O three/O words/O we/O settle/O the/O business/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O American/O way/O of/O doing/O business/O,/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O with/O a/O smile/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O there/O they/O build/O in/O a/O rational/O fashion/O.../O''/O

The/O conversation/O passed/O to/O the/O misuse/O of/O political/O power/O in/O the/O United/LOCATION
States/LOCATION,/O but/O Anna/PERSON quickly/O brought/O it/O round/O to/O another/O topic/O,/O so/O as/O to/O
draw/O the/O steward/O into/O talk/O./O

``/OHave/O you/O ever/O seen/O a/O reaping/O machine/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O addressing/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON./O ``/OWe/O had/O just/O ridden/O over/O to/O look/O at/O one/O when/O we/O met/O./O It/O's/O
the/O first/O time/O I/O ever/O saw/O one/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O do/O they/O work/O?/O''/O asked/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OExactly/O like/O little/O scissors/O./O A/O plank/O and/O a/O lot/O of/O little/O scissors/O./O
Like/O this/O./O''/O

Anna/PERSON took/O a/O knife/O and/O fork/O in/O her/O beautiful/O white/O hands/O covered/O with/O
rings/O,/O and/O began/O showing/O how/O the/O machine/O worked/O./O It/O was/O clear/O that/O she/O
saw/O nothing/O would/O be/O understood/O from/O her/O explanation/O;/O but/O aware/O that/O her/O
talk/O was/O pleasant/O and/O her/O hands/O beautiful/O she/O went/O on/O explaining/O./O

``/OMore/O like/O little/O penknives/O,/O''/O Veslovsky/PERSON said/O playfully/O,/O never/O taking/O his/O
eyes/O off/O her/O./O

Anna/PERSON gave/O a/O just/O perceptible/O smile/O,/O but/O made/O no/O answer/O./O ``/OIs/On't/O it/O true/O,/O

''/O_/OOh/O,/O ja/O,/O_/O''/O answered/O the/O German/O./O _/O``/OEs/O ist/O ein/O ganz/O einfaches/O Ding/PERSON,/O''/O_/O and/O
he/O began/O to/O explain/O the/O construction/O of/O the/O machine/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O a/O pity/O it/O does/On't/O bind/O too/O./O I/O saw/O one/O at/O the/O Vienna/LOCATION exhibition/O,/O

in/O use/O./O''/O

_/O``/OEs/O kommt/O drauf/O an/O.../O./O Der/PERSON Preis/PERSON vom/O Draht/PERSON muss/O ausgerechnet/O werden/O./O''/O_/O

_/O``/OWünscht/O man/O Dochots/PERSON,/O so/O hat/O man/O auch/O Klopots/O,/O''/O_/O said/O Vassenka/PERSON

_/O``/OCessez/O,/O''/O_/O she/O said/O with/O playful/O severity/O./O

``/OWe/O expected/O to/O find/O you/O in/O the/O fields/O,/O Vassily/PERSON Semyonitch/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O
the/O doctor/O,/O a/O sickly-looking/O man/O;/O ``/Ohave/O you/O been/O there/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O went/O there/O,/O but/O I/O had/O taken/O flight/O,/O''/O the/O doctor/O answered/O with/O gloomy/O
jocoseness/O./O

``/OThen/O you/O've/O taken/O a/O good/O constitutional/O?/O''/O

``/OSplendid/O!/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O how/O was/O the/O old/O woman/O?/O I/O hope/O it/O's/O not/O typhus/O?/O''/O

``/OTyphus/O it/O is/O not/O,/O but/O it/O's/O taking/O a/O bad/O turn/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O a/O pity/O!/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O having/O thus/O paid/O the/O dues/O of/O civility/O to/O
her/O domestic/O circle/O,/O she/O turned/O to/O her/O own/O friends/O./O

``/OIt/O would/O be/O a/O hard/O task/O,/O though/O,/O to/O construct/O a/O machine/O from/O your/O
description/O,/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O''/O Sviazhsky/PERSON said/O jestingly/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O why/O so/O?/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON with/O a/O smile/O that/O betrayed/O that/O she/O knew/O
there/O was/O something/O charming/O in/O her/O disquisitions/O upon/O the/O machine/O that/O
had/O been/O noticed/O by/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O This/O new/O trait/O of/O girlish/O coquettishness/O

``/OBut/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON's/O knowledge/O of/O architecture/O is/O marvelous/O,/O''/O said/O
Tushkevitch/PERSON./O

``/OTo/O be/O sure/O,/O I/O heard/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON talking/O yesterday/O about/O plinths/O and/O
damp-courses/O,/O''/O said/O Veslovsky/PERSON./O ``/OHave/O I/O got/O it/O right/O?/O''/O

``/OThere/O's/O nothing/O marvelous/O about/O it/O,/O when/O one/O sees/O and/O hears/O so/O much/O of/O
it/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O ``/OBut/O,/O I/O dare/O say/O,/O you/O do/On't/O even/O know/O what/O houses/O are/O
made/O of/O?/O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON saw/O that/O Anna/PERSON disliked/O the/O tone/O of/O raillery/O that/O
existed/O between/O her/O and/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O but/O fell/O in/O with/O it/O against/O her/O will/O./O

Vronsky/O acted/O in/O this/O matter/O quite/O differently/O from/O Levin/PERSON./O He/O obviously/O
attached/O no/O significance/O to/O Veslovsky/PERSON's/O chattering/O;/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O he/O
encouraged/O his/O jests/O./O

``/OCome/O now/O,/O tell/O us/O,/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O how/O are/O the/O stones/O held/O together/O?/O''/O

``/OBy/O cement/O,/O of/O course/O./O''/O

``/OBravo/O!/O And/O what/O is/O cement/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O some/O sort/O of/O paste/O .../O no/O,/O putty/O,/O''/O said/O Veslovsky/PERSON,/O raising/O a/O
general/O laugh/O./O

The/O company/O at/O dinner/O,/O with/O the/O exception/O of/O the/O doctor/O,/O the/O architect/O,/O
and/O the/O steward/O,/O who/O remained/O plunged/O in/O gloomy/O silence/O,/O kept/O up/O a/O
conversation/O that/O never/O paused/O,/O glancing/O off/O one/O subject/O,/O fastening/O on/O
another/O,/O and/O at/O times/O stinging/O one/O or/O the/O other/O to/O the/O quick/O./O Once/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON felt/O wounded/O to/O the/O quick/O,/O and/O got/O so/O hot/O that/O she/O
positively/O flushed/O and/O wondered/O afterwards/O whether/O she/O had/O said/O anything/O
extreme/O or/O unpleasant/O./O Sviazhsky/PERSON began/O talking/O of/O Levin/PERSON,/O describing/O his/O
strange/O view/O that/O machinery/O is/O simply/O pernicious/O in/O its/O effects/O on/O
Russian/O agriculture/O./O

``/OI/O have/O not/O the/O pleasure/O of/O knowing/O this/O M./PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O''/O Vronsky/PERSON said/O,/O
smiling/O,/O ``/Obut/O most/O likely/O he/O has/O never/O seen/O the/O machines/O he/O condemns/O;/O or/O
if/O he/O has/O seen/O and/O tried/O any/O,/O it/O must/O have/O been/O after/O a/O queer/O fashion/O,/O
some/O Russian/O imitation/O,/O not/O a/O machine/O from/O abroad/O./O What/O sort/O of/O views/O

``/OTurkish/O views/O,/O in/O general/O,/O''/O Veslovsky/PERSON said/O,/O turning/O to/O Anna/PERSON with/O a/O
smile/O./O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O defend/O his/O opinions/O,/O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON said/O,/O firing/O up/O;/O ``/Obut/O
I/O can/O say/O that/O he/O's/O a/O highly/O cultivated/O man/O,/O and/O if/O he/O were/O here/O he/O

``/OI/O like/O him/O extremely/O,/O and/O we/O are/O great/O friends/O,/O''/O Sviazhsky/PERSON said/O,/O
smiling/O good-naturedly/O./O ''/O_/OMais/O pardon/O,/O il/O est/O un/O petit/O peu/O toqué/O;/O_/O he/O

``/OIt/O's/O our/O Russian/O apathy/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O pouring/O water/O from/O an/O iced/O

``/OI/O know/O no/O man/O more/O strict/O in/O the/O performance/O of/O his/O duties/O,/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON

It/O was/O strange/O to/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON to/O hear/O how/O serenely/O confident/O he/O

Sviazhsky/PERSON--/O``/Oover/O twenty/O,/O I/O fancy/O./O''/O

Anna/PERSON spoke/O lightly/O,/O but/O irritation/O could/O be/O discerned/O in/O her/O tone/O./O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O watching/O Anna/PERSON and/O Vronsky/O attentively/O,/O detected/O it/O

immediately/O taken/O a/O serious/O and/O obstinate/O expression/O./O Noticing/O this/O,/O and/O
that/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON at/O once/O made/O haste/O to/O change/O the/O conversation/O by/O
talking/O of/O Petersburg/LOCATION acquaintances/O,/O and/O remembering/O what/O Vronsky/O had/O
without/O apparent/O connection/O said/O in/O the/O garden/O of/O his/O work/O in/O the/O
country/O,/O Dolly/PERSON surmised/O that/O this/O question/O of/O public/O activity/O was/O
connected/O with/O some/O deep/O private/O disagreement/O between/O Anna/PERSON and/O Vronsky/O./O

The/O dinner/O,/O the/O wine/O,/O the/O decoration/O of/O the/O table/O were/O all/O very/O good/O;/O
but/O it/O was/O all/O like/O what/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON had/O seen/O at/O formal/O dinners/O
and/O balls/O which/O of/O late/O years/O had/O become/O quite/O unfamiliar/O to/O her/O;/O it/O all/O
had/O the/O same/O impersonal/O and/O constrained/O character/O,/O and/O so/O on/O an/O ordinary/O
day/O and/O in/O a/O little/O circle/O of/O friends/O it/O made/O a/O disagreeable/O impression/O
on/O her/O./O

After/O dinner/O they/O sat/O on/O the/O terrace/O,/O then/O they/O proceeded/O to/O play/O lawn/O
tennis/O./O The/O players/O,/O divided/O into/O two/O parties/O,/O stood/O on/O opposite/O sides/O
of/O a/O tightly/O drawn/O net/O with/O gilt/O poles/O on/O the/O carefully/O leveled/O and/O
rolled/O croquet-ground/O./O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON made/O an/O attempt/O to/O play/O,/O but/O
it/O was/O a/O long/O time/O before/O she/O could/O understand/O the/O game/O,/O and/O by/O the/O time/O
she/O did/O understand/O it/O,/O she/O was/O so/O tired/O that/O she/O sat/O down/O with/O Princess/O
Varvara/PERSON and/O simply/O looked/O on/O at/O the/O players/O./O Her/O partner/O,/O Tushkevitch/PERSON,/O
gave/O up/O playing/O too/O,/O but/O the/O others/O kept/O the/O game/O up/O for/O a/O long/O time/O./O
Sviazhsky/PERSON and/O Vronsky/O both/O played/O very/O well/O and/O seriously/O./O They/O kept/O a/O
sharp/O lookout/O on/O the/O balls/O served/O to/O them/O,/O and/O without/O haste/O or/O getting/O
in/O each/O other/O's/O way/O,/O they/O ran/O adroitly/O up/O to/O them/O,/O waited/O for/O the/O
rebound/O,/O and/O neatly/O and/O accurately/O returned/O them/O over/O the/O net/O./O Veslovsky/PERSON
played/O worse/O than/O the/O others/O./O He/O was/O too/O eager/O,/O but/O he/O kept/O the/O players/O
lively/O with/O his/O high/O spirits/O./O His/O laughter/O and/O outcries/O never/O paused/O./O
Like/O the/O other/O men/O of/O the/O party/O,/O with/O the/O ladies/O'/O permission/O,/O he/O took/O
off/O his/O coat/O,/O and/O his/O solid/O,/O comely/O figure/O in/O his/O white/O shirt-sleeves/O,/O
with/O his/O red/O perspiring/O face/O and/O his/O impulsive/O movements/O,/O made/O a/O picture/O
that/O imprinted/O itself/O vividly/O on/O the/O memory/O./O

When/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON lay/O in/O bed/O that/O night/O,/O as/O soon/O as/O she/O closed/O her/O
eyes/O,/O she/O saw/O Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON flying/O about/O the/O croquet/O ground/O./O

During/O the/O game/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON was/O not/O enjoying/O herself/O./O She/O did/O not/O
like/O the/O light/O tone/O of/O raillery/O that/O was/O kept/O up/O all/O the/O time/O between/O
Vassenka/PERSON Veslovsky/PERSON and/O Anna/PERSON,/O and/O the/O unnaturalness/O altogether/O of/O
grown-up/O people/O,/O all/O alone/O without/O children/O,/O playing/O at/O a/O child/O's/O game/O./O
But/O to/O avoid/O breaking/O up/O the/O party/O and/O to/O get/O through/O the/O time/O somehow/O,/O
after/O a/O rest/O she/O joined/O the/O game/O again/O,/O and/O pretended/O to/O be/O enjoying/O it/O./O
All/O that/O day/O it/O seemed/O to/O her/O as/O though/O she/O were/O acting/O in/O a/O theater/O
with/O actors/O cleverer/O than/O she/O,/O and/O that/O her/O bad/O acting/O was/O spoiling/O the/O
whole/O performance/O./O She/O had/O come/O with/O the/O intention/O of/O staying/O two/O days/O,/O
if/O all/O went/O well/O./O But/O in/O the/O evening/O,/O during/O the/O game/O,/O she/O made/O up/O her/O
mind/O that/O she/O would/O go/O home/O next/O day/O./O The/O maternal/O cares/O and/O worries/O,/O
which/O she/O had/O so/O hated/O on/O the/O way/O,/O now/O,/O after/O a/O day/O spent/O without/O them/O,/O
struck/O her/O in/O quite/O another/O light/O,/O and/O tempted/O her/O back/O to/O them/O./O

When/O,/O after/O evening/O tea/O and/O a/O row/O by/O night/O in/O the/O boat/O,/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON went/O alone/O to/O her/O room/O,/O took/O off/O her/O dress/O,/O and/O began/O
arranging/O her/O thin/O hair/O for/O the/O night/O,/O she/O had/O a/O great/O sense/O of/O relief/O./O

It/O was/O positively/O disagreeable/O to/O her/O to/O think/O that/O Anna/PERSON was/O coming/O to/O
see/O her/O immediately/O./O She/O longed/O to/O be/O alone/O with/O her/O own/O thoughts/O./O



Chapter/O 23/O


Dolly/PERSON was/O wanting/O to/O go/O to/O bed/O when/O Anna/PERSON came/O in/O to/O see/O her/O,/O attired/O for/O
the/O night/O./O In/O the/O course/O of/O the/O day/O Anna/PERSON had/O several/O times/O begun/O to/O

``/OThat/O's/O impossible/O./O Well/O?/O''/O

``/OAnnie/PERSON and/O those/O to/O come/O.../O''/O

``/OImpossible/O!/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O opening/O her/O eyes/O wide/O./O

For/O her/O this/O was/O one/O of/O those/O discoveries/O the/O consequences/O and/O

_/O``/ON'est/O-/Oce/O pas/O immoral/O?/O''/O_/O was/O all/O she/O said/O,/O after/O a/O brief/O pause/O./O

Chapter/O 24/O


``/OThen/O there/O is/O all/O the/O more/O reason/O for/O you/O to/O legalize/O your/O position/O,/O if/O
possible/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O if/O possible/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O speaking/O all/O at/O once/O in/O an/O utterly/O
different/O tone/O,/O subdued/O and/O mournful/O./O

``/OSurely/O you/O do/On't/O mean/O a/O divorce/O is/O impossible/O?/O I/O was/O told/O your/O husband/O
had/O consented/O to/O it/O./O''/O

``/ODolly/O,/O I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O talk/O about/O that/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O we/O wo/On't/O then/O,/O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON hastened/O to/O say/O,/O noticing/O the/O

gloomy/O a/O view/O of/O things/O./O''/O

``/OI/O?/O Not/O at/O all/O!/O I/O'm/O always/O bright/O and/O happy/O./O You/O see/O,/O _/Oje/O fais/O des/O
passions/O./O_/O Veslovsky/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O to/O tell/O the/O truth/O,/O I/O do/On't/O like/O Veslovsky/PERSON's/O tone/O,/O''/O said/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O anxious/O to/O change/O the/O subject/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O that/O's/O nonsense/O!/O It/O amuses/O Alexey/PERSON,/O and/O that/O's/O all/O;/O but/O he/O's/O a/O boy/O,/O
and/O quite/O under/O my/O control/O./O You/O know/O,/O I/O turn/O him/O as/O I/O please/O./O It/O's/O just/O
as/O it/O might/O be/O with/O your/O Grisha/O.../O./O Dolly/O!/O''/O--/Oshe/O suddenly/O changed/O the/O
subject/O--/O``/Oyou/O say/O I/O take/O too/O gloomy/O a/O view/O of/O things/O./O You/O ca/On't/O
understand/O./O It/O's/O too/O awful/O!/O I/O try/O not/O to/O take/O any/O view/O of/O it/O at/O all/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O think/O you/O ought/O to/O./O You/O ought/O to/O do/O all/O you/O can/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O can/O I/O do/O?/O Nothing/O./O You/O tell/O me/O to/O marry/O Alexey/PERSON,/O and/O say/O I/O
do/On't/O think/O about/O it/O./O I/O do/On't/O think/O about/O it/O!/O''/O she/O repeated/O,/O and/O a/O flush/O
rose/O into/O her/O face/O./O She/O got/O up/O,/O straightening/O her/O chest/O,/O and/O sighed/O
heavily/O./O With/O her/O light/O step/O she/O began/O pacing/O up/O and/O down/O the/O room/O,/O
stopping/O now/O and/O then/O./O ``/OI/O do/On't/O think/O of/O it/O?/O Not/O a/O day/O,/O not/O an/O hour/O
passes/O that/O I/O do/On't/O think/O of/O it/O,/O and/O blame/O myself/O for/O thinking/O of/O it/O .../O
because/O thinking/O of/O that/O may/O drive/O me/O mad/O./O Drive/O me/O mad/O!/O''/O she/O repeated/O./O
``/OWhen/O I/O think/O of/O it/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O sleep/O without/O morphine/O./O But/O never/O mind/O./O Let/O
us/O talk/O quietly/O./O They/O tell/O me/O,/O divorce/O./O In/O the/O first/O place/O,/O he/O wo/On't/O
give/O me/O a/O divorce/O./O He/O's/O under/O the/O influence/O of/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON
now/O./O''/O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O sitting/O erect/O on/O a/O chair/O,/O turned/O her/O head/O,/O following/O
Anna/PERSON with/O a/O face/O of/O sympathetic/O suffering/O./O

``/OYou/O ought/O to/O make/O the/O attempt/O,/O''/O she/O said/O softly/O./O

``/OSuppose/O I/O make/O the/O attempt/O./O What/O does/O it/O mean/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O evidently/O
giving/O utterance/O to/O a/O thought/O,/O a/O thousand/O times/O thought/O over/O and/O learned/O
by/O heart/O./O ``/OIt/O means/O that/O I/O,/O hating/O him/O,/O but/O still/O recognizing/O that/O I/O
have/O wronged/O him/O--/Oand/O I/O consider/O him/O magnanimous/O--/Othat/O I/O humiliate/O myself/O
to/O write/O to/O him/O.../O./O Well/O,/O suppose/O I/O make/O the/O effort/O;/O I/O do/O it/O./O Either/O I/O
receive/O a/O humiliating/O refusal/O or/O consent/O.../O./O Well/O,/O I/O have/O received/O his/O
consent/O,/O say/O.../O''/O Anna/PERSON was/O at/O that/O moment/O at/O the/O furthest/O end/O of/O the/O
room/O,/O and/O she/O stopped/O there/O,/O doing/O something/O to/O the/O curtain/O at/O the/O
window/O./O ``/OI/O receive/O his/O consent/O,/O but/O my/O .../O my/O son/O?/O They/O wo/On't/O give/O him/O
up/O to/O me/O./O He/O will/O grow/O up/O despising/O me/O,/O with/O his/O father/O,/O whom/O I/O've/O
abandoned/O./O Do/O you/O see/O,/O I/O love/O .../O equally/O,/O I/O think/O,/O but/O both/O more/O than/O
myself/O--/Otwo/O creatures/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON and/O Alexey/PERSON./O''/O

She/O came/O out/O into/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O room/O and/O stood/O facing/O Dolly/PERSON,/O with/O
her/O arms/O pressed/O tightly/O across/O her/O chest/O./O In/O her/O white/O dressing/O gown/O
her/O figure/O seemed/O more/O than/O usually/O grand/O and/O broad/O./O She/O bent/O her/O head/O,/O
and/O with/O shining/O,/O wet/O eyes/O looked/O from/O under/O her/O brows/O at/O Dolly/LOCATION,/O a/O thin/O
little/O pitiful/O figure/O in/O her/O patched/O dressing/O jacket/O and/O nightcap/O,/O
shaking/O all/O over/O with/O emotion/O./O

``/OIt/O is/O only/O those/O two/O creatures/O that/O I/O love/O,/O and/O one/O excludes/O the/O other/O./O
I/O ca/On't/O have/O them/O together/O,/O and/O that/O's/O the/O only/O thing/O I/O want/O./O And/O since/O
I/O ca/On't/O have/O that/O,/O I/O do/On't/O care/O about/O the/O rest/O./O I/O do/On't/O care/O about/O
anything/O,/O anything/O./O And/O it/O will/O end/O one/O way/O or/O another/O,/O and/O so/O I/O ca/On't/O,/O
I/O do/On't/O like/O to/O talk/O of/O it/O./O So/O do/On't/O blame/O me/O,/O do/On't/O judge/O me/O for/O
anything/O./O You/O ca/On't/O with/O your/O pure/O heart/O understand/O all/O that/O I/O'm/O
suffering/O./O''/O She/O went/O up/O,/O sat/O down/O beside/O Dolly/PERSON,/O and/O with/O a/O guilty/O look/O,/O
peeped/O into/O her/O face/O and/O took/O her/O hand/O./O

``/OWhat/O are/O you/O thinking/O?/O What/O are/O you/O thinking/O about/O me/O?/O Do/On't/O despise/O
me/O./O I/O do/On't/O deserve/O contempt/O./O I/O'm/O simply/O unhappy/O./O If/O anyone/O is/O unhappy/O,/O
I/O am/O,/O''/O she/O articulated/O,/O and/O turning/O away/O,/O she/O burst/O into/O tears/O./O

Left/O alone/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON said/O her/O prayers/O and/O went/O to/O bed/O./O She/O had/O
felt/O for/O Anna/PERSON with/O all/O her/O heart/O while/O she/O was/O speaking/O to/O her/O,/O but/O now/O
she/O could/O not/O force/O herself/O to/O think/O of/O her/O./O The/O memories/O of/O home/O and/O of/O
her/O children/O rose/O up/O in/O her/O imagination/O with/O a/O peculiar/O charm/O quite/O new/O
to/O her/O,/O with/O a/O sort/O of/O new/O brilliance/O./O That/O world/O of/O her/O own/O seemed/O to/O
her/O now/O so/O sweet/O and/O precious/O that/O she/O would/O not/O on/O any/O account/O spend/O an/O
extra/O day/O outside/O it/O,/O and/O she/O made/O up/O her/O mind/O that/O she/O would/O certainly/O
go/O back/O next/O day/O./O

Anna/PERSON meantime/O went/O back/O to/O her/O boudoir/O,/O took/O a/O wine/O glass/O and/O dropped/O
into/O it/O several/O drops/O of/O a/O medicine/O,/O of/O which/O the/O principal/O ingredient/O
was/O morphine/O./O After/O drinking/O it/O off/O and/O sitting/O still/O a/O little/O while/O,/O
she/O went/O into/O her/O bedroom/O in/O a/O soothed/O and/O more/O cheerful/O frame/O of/O mind/O./O

When/O she/O went/O into/O the/O bedroom/O,/O Vronsky/O looked/O intently/O at/O her/O./O He/O was/O
looking/O for/O traces/O of/O the/O conversation/O which/O he/O knew/O that/O,/O staying/O so/O
long/O in/O Dolly/PERSON's/O room/O,/O she/O must/O have/O had/O with/O her/O./O But/O in/O her/O expression/O
of/O restrained/O excitement/O,/O and/O of/O a/O sort/O of/O reserve/O,/O he/O could/O find/O
nothing/O but/O the/O beauty/O that/O always/O bewitched/O him/O afresh/O though/O he/O was/O
used/O to/O it/O,/O the/O consciousness/O of/O it/O,/O and/O the/O desire/O that/O it/O should/O
affect/O him/O./O He/O did/O not/O want/O to/O ask/O her/O what/O they/O had/O been/O talking/O of/O,/O
but/O he/O hoped/O that/O she/O would/O tell/O him/O something/O of/O her/O own/O accord/O./O But/O
she/O only/O said/O:/O

``/OI/O am/O so/O glad/O you/O like/O Dolly/PERSON./O You/O do/O,/O do/On't/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O've/O known/O her/O a/O long/O while/O,/O you/O know/O./O She/O's/O very/O good-hearted/O,/O I/O
suppose/O,/O _/Omais/O excessivement/O terre-à-terre/O./O_/O Still/O,/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O to/O see/O
her/O./O''/O

He/O took/O Anna/PERSON's/O hand/O and/O looked/O inquiringly/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O

Misinterpreting/O the/O look/O,/O she/O smiled/O to/O him/O./O Next/O morning/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O
the/O protests/O of/O her/O hosts/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON prepared/O for/O her/O homeward/O
journey/O./O Levin/PERSON's/O coachman/O,/O in/O his/O by/O no/O means/O new/O coat/O and/O shabby/O hat/O,/O
with/O his/O ill-matched/O horses/O and/O his/O coach/O with/O the/O patched/O mud-guards/O,/O
drove/O with/O gloomy/O determination/O into/O the/O covered/O gravel/O approach/O./O

Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON disliked/O taking/O leave/O of/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON and/O the/O
gentlemen/O of/O the/O party/O./O After/O a/O day/O spent/O together/O,/O both/O she/O and/O her/O
hosts/O were/O distinctly/O aware/O that/O they/O did/O not/O get/O on/O together/O,/O and/O that/O
it/O was/O better/O for/O them/O not/O to/O meet/O./O Only/O Anna/PERSON was/O sad/O./O She/O knew/O that/O
now/O,/O from/O Dolly/PERSON's/O departure/O,/O no/O one/O again/O would/O stir/O up/O within/O her/O soul/O
the/O feelings/O that/O had/O been/O roused/O by/O their/O conversation/O./O It/O hurt/O her/O to/O
stir/O up/O these/O feelings/O,/O but/O yet/O she/O knew/O that/O that/O was/O the/O best/O part/O of/O
her/O soul/O,/O and/O that/O that/O part/O of/O her/O soul/O would/O quickly/O be/O smothered/O in/O
the/O life/O she/O was/O leading/O./O

As/O she/O drove/O out/O into/O the/O open/O country/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON had/O a/O
delightful/O sense/O of/O relief/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O tempted/O to/O ask/O the/O two/O men/O how/O
they/O had/O liked/O being/O at/O Vronsky/ORGANIZATION's/O,/O when/O suddenly/O the/O coachman/O,/O Philip/PERSON,/O
expressed/O himself/O unasked/O:/O

``/ORolling/O in/O wealth/O they/O may/O be/O,/O but/O three/O pots/O of/O oats/O was/O all/O they/O gave/O
us/O./O Everything/O cleared/O up/O till/O there/O was/On't/O a/O grain/O left/O by/O cockcrow/O./O
What/O are/O three/O pots/O?/O A/O mere/O mouthful/O!/O And/O oats/O now/O down/O to/O forty-five/O
kopecks/O./O At/O our/O place/O,/O no/O fear/O,/O all/O comers/O may/O have/O as/O much/O as/O they/O can/O
eat/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O master/O's/O a/O screw/O,/O''/O put/O in/O the/O counting/O house/O clerk/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O did/O you/O like/O their/O horses/O?/O''/O asked/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OThe/O horses/O!/O--/Othere/O's/O no/O two/O opinions/O about/O them/O./O And/O the/O food/O was/O good/O./O
But/O it/O seemed/O to/O me/O sort/O of/O dreary/O there/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON./O I/O do/On't/O
know/O what/O you/O thought/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O turning/O his/O handsome/O,/O good-natured/O face/O
to/O her/O./O

``/OI/O thought/O so/O too/O./O Well/O,/O shall/O we/O get/O home/O by/O evening/O?/O''/O

``/OEh/O,/O we/O must/O!/O''/O

On/O reaching/O home/O and/O finding/O everyone/O entirely/O satisfactory/O and/O
particularly/O charming/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON began/O with/O great/O liveliness/O
telling/O them/O how/O she/O had/O arrived/O,/O how/O warmly/O they/O had/O received/O her/O,/O of/O
the/O luxury/O and/O good/O taste/O in/O which/O the/O Vronskys/O lived/O,/O and/O of/O their/O
recreations/O,/O and/O she/O would/O not/O allow/O a/O word/O to/O be/O said/O against/O them/O./O

``/OOne/O has/O to/O know/O Anna/PERSON and/O Vronsky/O--/OI/O have/O got/O to/O know/O him/O better/O now/O--/Oto/O
see/O how/O nice/O they/O are/O,/O and/O how/O touching/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O speaking/O now/O with/O
perfect/O sincerity/O,/O and/O forgetting/O the/O vague/O feeling/O of/O dissatisfaction/O
and/O awkwardness/O she/O had/O experienced/O there/O./O



Chapter/O 25/O


Vronsky/O and/O Anna/PERSON spent/O the/O whole/O summer/O and/O part/O of/O the/O winter/O in/O the/O
country/O,/O living/O in/O just/O the/O same/O condition/O,/O and/O still/O taking/O no/O steps/O to/O
obtain/O a/O divorce/O./O It/O was/O an/O understood/O thing/O between/O them/O that/O they/O
should/O not/O go/O away/O anywhere/O;/O but/O both/O felt/O,/O the/O longer/O they/O lived/O alone/O,/O
especially/O in/O the/O autumn/O,/O without/O guests/O in/O the/O house/O,/O that/O they/O could/O
not/O stand/O this/O existence/O,/O and/O that/O they/O would/O have/O to/O alter/O it/O./O

Their/O life/O was/O apparently/O such/O that/O nothing/O better/O could/O be/O desired/O./O
They/O had/O the/O fullest/O abundance/O of/O everything/O;/O they/O had/O a/O child/O,/O and/O both/O
had/O occupation/O./O Anna/PERSON devoted/O just/O as/O much/O care/O to/O her/O appearance/O when/O
they/O had/O no/O visitors/O,/O and/O she/O did/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O reading/O,/O both/O of/O
novels/O and/O of/O what/O serious/O literature/O was/O in/O fashion/O./O She/O ordered/O all/O
the/O books/O that/O were/O praised/O in/O the/O foreign/O papers/O and/O reviews/O she/O
received/O,/O and/O read/O them/O with/O that/O concentrated/O attention/O which/O is/O only/O
given/O to/O what/O is/O read/O in/O seclusion/O./O Moreover/O,/O every/O subject/O that/O was/O of/O
interest/O to/O Vronsky/O,/O she/O studied/O in/O books/O and/O special/O journals/O,/O so/O that/O
he/O often/O went/O straight/O to/O her/O with/O questions/O relating/O to/O agriculture/O or/O
architecture/O,/O sometimes/O even/O with/O questions/O relating/O to/O horse-breeding/O
or/O sport/O./O He/O was/O amazed/O at/O her/O knowledge/O,/O her/O memory/O,/O and/O at/O first/O was/O
disposed/O to/O doubt/O it/O,/O to/O ask/O for/O confirmation/O of/O her/O facts/O;/O and/O she/O
would/O find/O what/O he/O asked/O for/O in/O some/O book/O,/O and/O show/O it/O to/O him/O./O

The/O building/O of/O the/O hospital/O,/O too/O,/O interested/O her/O./O She/O did/O not/O merely/O
assist/O,/O but/O planned/O and/O suggested/O a/O great/O deal/O herself/O./O But/O her/O chief/O
thought/O was/O still/O of/O herself/O--/Ohow/O far/O she/O was/O dear/O to/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O how/O far/O
she/O could/O make/O up/O to/O him/O for/O all/O he/O had/O given/O up/O./O Vronsky/O appreciated/O
this/O desire/O not/O only/O to/O please/O,/O but/O to/O serve/O him/O,/O which/O had/O become/O the/O
sole/O aim/O of/O her/O existence/O,/O but/O at/O the/O same/O time/O he/O wearied/O of/O the/O loving/O
snares/O in/O which/O she/O tried/O to/O hold/O him/O fast/O./O As/O time/O went/O on/O,/O and/O he/O saw/O
himself/O more/O and/O more/O often/O held/O fast/O in/O these/O snares/O,/O he/O had/O an/O ever/O
growing/O desire/O,/O not/O so/O much/O to/O escape/O from/O them/O,/O as/O to/O try/O whether/O they/O
hindered/O his/O freedom/O./O Had/O it/O not/O been/O for/O this/O growing/O desire/O to/O be/O
free/O,/O not/O to/O have/O scenes/O every/O time/O he/O wanted/O to/O go/O to/O the/O town/O to/O a/O
meeting/O or/O a/O race/O,/O Vronsky/O would/O have/O been/O perfectly/O satisfied/O with/O his/O
