life/O./O The/O rôle/O he/O had/O taken/O up/O,/O the/O rôle/O of/O a/O wealthy/O landowner/O,/O one/O of/O
that/O class/O which/O ought/O to/O be/O the/O very/O heart/O of/O the/O Russian/O aristocracy/O,/O
was/O entirely/O to/O his/O taste/O;/O and/O now/O,/O after/O spending/O six/O months/O in/O that/O
character/O,/O he/O derived/O even/O greater/O satisfaction/O from/O it/O./O And/O his/O
management/O of/O his/O estate/O,/O which/O occupied/O and/O absorbed/O him/O more/O and/O more/O,/O
was/O most/O successful/O./O In/O spite/O of/O the/O immense/O sums/O cost/O him/O by/O the/O
hospital/O,/O by/O machinery/O,/O by/O cows/O ordered/O from/O Switzerland/LOCATION,/O and/O many/O other/O
things/O,/O he/O was/O convinced/O that/O he/O was/O not/O wasting/O,/O but/O increasing/O his/O
substance/O./O In/O all/O matters/O affecting/O income/O,/O the/O sales/O of/O timber/O,/O wheat/O,/O
and/O wool/O,/O the/O letting/O of/O lands/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O hard/O as/O a/O rock/O,/O and/O knew/O
well/O how/O to/O keep/O up/O prices/O./O In/O all/O operations/O on/O a/O large/O scale/O on/O this/O
and/O his/O other/O estates/O,/O he/O kept/O to/O the/O simplest/O methods/O involving/O no/O
risk/O,/O and/O in/O trifling/O details/O he/O was/O careful/O and/O exacting/O to/O an/O extreme/O
degree/O./O In/O spite/O of/O all/O the/O cunning/O and/O ingenuity/O of/O the/O German/O steward/O,/O
who/O would/O try/O to/O tempt/O him/O into/O purchases/O by/O making/O his/O original/O
estimate/O always/O far/O larger/O than/O really/O required/O,/O and/O then/O representing/O
to/O Vronsky/O that/O he/O might/O get/O the/O thing/O cheaper/O,/O and/O so/O make/O a/O profit/O,/O
Vronsky/PERSON did/O not/O give/O in/O./O He/O listened/O to/O his/O steward/O,/O cross-examined/O him/O,/O
and/O only/O agreed/O to/O his/O suggestions/O when/O the/O implement/O to/O be/O ordered/O or/O
constructed/O was/O the/O very/O newest/O,/O not/O yet/O known/O in/O Russia/LOCATION,/O and/O likely/O to/O
excite/O wonder/O./O Apart/O from/O such/O exceptions/O,/O he/O resolved/O upon/O an/O increased/O
outlay/O only/O where/O there/O was/O a/O surplus/O,/O and/O in/O making/O such/O an/O outlay/O he/O
went/O into/O the/O minutest/O details/O,/O and/O insisted/O on/O getting/O the/O very/O best/O
for/O his/O money/O;/O so/O that/O by/O the/O method/O on/O which/O he/O managed/O his/O affairs/O,/O it/O
was/O clear/O that/O he/O was/O not/O wasting/O,/O but/O increasing/O his/O substance/O./O

In/O October/O there/O were/O the/O provincial/O elections/O in/O the/O Kashinsky/LOCATION
province/O,/O where/O were/O the/O estates/O of/O Vronsky/O,/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O Koznishev/PERSON,/O
Oblonsky/PERSON,/O and/O a/O small/O part/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O land/O./O

These/O elections/O were/O attracting/O public/O attention/O from/O several/O
circumstances/O connected/O with/O them/O,/O and/O also/O from/O the/O people/O taking/O part/O
in/O them/O./O There/O had/O been/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O talk/O about/O them/O,/O and/O great/O
preparations/O were/O being/O made/O for/O them/O./O Persons/O who/O never/O attended/O the/O
elections/O were/O coming/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O from/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O from/O abroad/O to/O
attend/O these/O./O Vronsky/O had/O long/O before/O promised/O Sviazhsky/PERSON to/O go/O to/O them/O./O
Before/O the/O elections/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O who/O often/O visited/O Vozdvizhenskoe/PERSON,/O drove/O
over/O to/O fetch/O Vronsky/O./O On/O the/O day/O before/O there/O had/O been/O almost/O a/O quarrel/O
between/O Vronsky/O and/O Anna/PERSON over/O this/O proposed/O expedition/O./O It/O was/O the/O very/O
dullest/O autumn/O weather/O,/O which/O is/O so/O dreary/O in/O the/O country/O,/O and/O so/O,/O
preparing/O himself/O for/O a/O struggle/O,/O Vronsky/O,/O with/O a/O hard/O and/O cold/O
expression/O,/O informed/O Anna/PERSON of/O his/O departure/O as/O he/O had/O never/O spoken/O to/O her/O
before/O./O But/O,/O to/O his/O surprise/O,/O Anna/PERSON accepted/O the/O information/O with/O great/O
composure/O,/O and/O merely/O asked/O when/O he/O would/O be/O back/O./O He/O looked/O intently/O at/O
her/O,/O at/O a/O loss/O to/O explain/O this/O composure/O./O She/O smiled/O at/O his/O look/O./O He/O
knew/O that/O way/O she/O had/O of/O withdrawing/O into/O herself/O,/O and/O knew/O that/O it/O only/O
happened/O when/O she/O had/O determined/O upon/O something/O without/O letting/O him/O know/O
her/O plans/O./O He/O was/O afraid/O of/O this/O;/O but/O he/O was/O so/O anxious/O to/O avoid/O a/O scene/O
that/O he/O kept/O up/O appearances/O,/O and/O half/O sincerely/O believed/O in/O what/O he/O
longed/O to/O believe/O in/O--/Oher/O reasonableness/O./O

``/OI/O hope/O you/O wo/On't/O be/O dull/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O hope/O not/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O ``/OI/O got/O a/O box/O of/O books/O yesterday/O from/O Gautier/PERSON's/O./O
No/O,/O I/O sha/On't/O be/O dull/O./O''/O

``/OShe/O's/O trying/O to/O take/O that/O tone/O,/O and/O so/O much/O the/O better/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O
``/Oor/O else/O it/O would/O be/O the/O same/O thing/O over/O and/O over/O again/O./O''/O

And/O he/O set/O off/O for/O the/O elections/O without/O appealing/O to/O her/O for/O a/O candid/O
explanation/O./O It/O was/O the/O first/O time/O since/O the/O beginning/O of/O their/O intimacy/O
that/O he/O had/O parted/O from/O her/O without/O a/O full/O explanation/O./O From/O one/O point/O
of/O view/O this/O troubled/O him/O,/O but/O on/O the/O other/O side/O he/O felt/O that/O it/O was/O
better/O so/O./O ``/OAt/O first/O there/O will/O be/O,/O as/O this/O time/O,/O something/O undefined/O
kept/O back/O,/O and/O then/O she/O will/O get/O used/O to/O it/O./O In/O any/O case/O I/O can/O give/O up/O
anything/O for/O her/O,/O but/O not/O my/O masculine/O independence/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O



Chapter/O 26/O


In/O September/O Levin/PERSON moved/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION for/O Kitty/PERSON's/O confinement/O./O He/O had/O spent/O
a/O whole/O month/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION with/O nothing/O to/O do/O,/O when/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O who/O
had/O property/O in/O the/O Kashinsky/LOCATION province/O,/O and/O took/O great/O interest/O in/O the/O
question/O of/O the/O approaching/O elections/O,/O made/O ready/O to/O set/O off/O to/O the/O
elections/O./O He/O invited/O his/O brother/O,/O who/O had/O a/O vote/O in/O the/O Seleznevsky/LOCATION
district/O,/O to/O come/O with/O him/O./O Levin/PERSON had/O,/O moreover/O,/O to/O transact/O in/O Kashin/LOCATION
some/O extremely/O important/O business/O relating/O to/O the/O wardship/O of/O land/O and/O
to/O the/O receiving/O of/O certain/O redemption/O money/O for/O his/O sister/O,/O who/O was/O
abroad/O./O

Levin/PERSON still/O hesitated/O,/O but/O Kitty/PERSON,/O who/O saw/O that/O he/O was/O bored/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O
and/O urged/O him/O to/O go/O,/O on/O her/O own/O authority/O ordered/O him/O the/O proper/O
nobleman/O's/O uniform/O,/O costing/O seven/O pounds/O./O And/O that/O seven/O pounds/O paid/O for/O
the/O uniform/O was/O the/O chief/O cause/O that/O finally/O decided/O Levin/PERSON to/O go/O./O He/O
went/O to/O Kashin/PERSON.../O./O

Levin/PERSON had/O been/O six/O days/O in/O Kashin/LOCATION,/O visiting/O the/O assembly/O each/O day/O,/O and/O
busily/O engaged/O about/O his/O sister/O's/O business/O,/O which/O still/O dragged/O on/O./O The/O
district/O marshals/O of/O nobility/O were/O all/O occupied/O with/O the/O elections/O,/O and/O
it/O was/O impossible/O to/O get/O the/O simplest/O thing/O done/O that/O depended/O upon/O the/O
court/O of/O wardship/O./O The/O other/O matter/O,/O the/O payment/O of/O the/O sums/O due/O,/O was/O
met/O too/O by/O difficulties/O./O After/O long/O negotiations/O over/O the/O legal/O details/O,/O
the/O money/O was/O at/O last/O ready/O to/O be/O paid/O;/O but/O the/O notary/O,/O a/O most/O obliging/O
person/O,/O could/O not/O hand/O over/O the/O order/O,/O because/O it/O must/O have/O the/O
signature/O of/O the/O president/O,/O and/O the/O president/O,/O though/O he/O had/O not/O given/O
over/O his/O duties/O to/O a/O deputy/O,/O was/O at/O the/O elections/O./O All/O these/O worrying/O
negotiations/O,/O this/O endless/O going/O from/O place/O to/O place/O,/O and/O talking/O with/O
pleasant/O and/O excellent/O people/O,/O who/O quite/O saw/O the/O unpleasantness/O of/O the/O
petitioner/O's/O position/O,/O but/O were/O powerless/O to/O assist/O him/O--/Oall/O these/O
efforts/O that/O yielded/O no/O result/O,/O led/O to/O a/O feeling/O of/O misery/O in/O Levin/PERSON akin/O
to/O the/O mortifying/O helplessness/O one/O experiences/O in/O dreams/O when/O one/O tries/O
to/O use/O physical/O force/O./O He/O felt/O this/O frequently/O as/O he/O talked/O to/O his/O most/O
good-natured/O solicitor/O./O This/O solicitor/O did/O,/O it/O seemed/O,/O everything/O
possible/O,/O and/O strained/O every/O nerve/O to/O get/O him/O out/O of/O his/O difficulties/O./O
``/OI/O tell/O you/O what/O you/O might/O try/O,/O''/O he/O said/O more/O than/O once/O;/O ``/Ogo/O to/O
so-and-so/O and/O so-and-so/O,/O''/O and/O the/O solicitor/O drew/O up/O a/O regular/O plan/O for/O
getting/O round/O the/O fatal/O point/O that/O hindered/O everything/O./O But/O he/O would/O add/O
immediately/O,/O ``/OIt/O'll/O mean/O some/O delay/O,/O anyway/O,/O but/O you/O might/O try/O it/O./O''/O And/O
Levin/PERSON did/O try/O,/O and/O did/O go/O./O Everyone/O was/O kind/O and/O civil/O,/O but/O the/O point/O
evaded/O seemed/O to/O crop/O up/O again/O in/O the/O end/O,/O and/O again/O to/O bar/O the/O way/O./O
What/O was/O particularly/O trying/O,/O was/O that/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O make/O out/O with/O
whom/O he/O was/O struggling/O,/O to/O whose/O interest/O it/O was/O that/O his/O business/O
should/O not/O be/O done/O./O That/O no/O one/O seemed/O to/O know/O;/O the/O solicitor/O certainly/O
did/O not/O know/O./O If/O Levin/PERSON could/O have/O understood/O why/O,/O just/O as/O he/O saw/O why/O one/O
can/O only/O approach/O the/O booking/O office/O of/O a/O railway/O station/O in/O single/O
file/O,/O it/O would/O not/O have/O been/O so/O vexatious/O and/O tiresome/O to/O him/O./O But/O with/O
the/O hindrances/O that/O confronted/O him/O in/O his/O business/O,/O no/O one/O could/O explain/O
why/O they/O existed/O./O

But/O Levin/PERSON had/O changed/O a/O good/O deal/O since/O his/O marriage/O;/O he/O was/O patient/O,/O
and/O if/O he/O could/O not/O see/O why/O it/O was/O all/O arranged/O like/O this/O,/O he/O told/O
himself/O that/O he/O could/O not/O judge/O without/O knowing/O all/O about/O it/O,/O and/O that/O
most/O likely/O it/O must/O be/O so/O,/O and/O he/O tried/O not/O to/O fret/O./O

In/O attending/O the/O elections/O,/O too/O,/O and/O taking/O part/O in/O them/O,/O he/O tried/O now/O
not/O to/O judge/O,/O not/O to/O fall/O foul/O of/O them/O,/O but/O to/O comprehend/O as/O fully/O as/O he/O
could/O the/O question/O which/O was/O so/O earnestly/O and/O ardently/O absorbing/O honest/O
and/O excellent/O men/O whom/O he/O respected/O./O Since/O his/O marriage/O there/O had/O been/O
revealed/O to/O Levin/PERSON so/O many/O new/O and/O serious/O aspects/O of/O life/O that/O had/O
previously/O,/O through/O his/O frivolous/O attitude/O to/O them/O,/O seemed/O of/O no/O
importance/O,/O that/O in/O the/O question/O of/O the/O elections/O too/O he/O assumed/O and/O
tried/O to/O find/O some/O serious/O significance/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON explained/O to/O him/O the/O meaning/O and/O object/O of/O the/O
proposed/O revolution/O at/O the/O elections/O./O The/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O in/O
whose/O hands/O the/O law/O had/O placed/O the/O control/O of/O so/O many/O important/O public/O
functions/O--/Othe/O guardianship/O of/O wards/O -LRB-/Othe/O very/O department/O which/O was/O
giving/O Levin/PERSON so/O much/O trouble/O just/O now/O-RRB-/O,/O the/O disposal/O of/O large/O sums/O
subscribed/O by/O the/O nobility/O of/O the/O province/O,/O the/O high/O schools/O,/O female/O,/O
male/O,/O and/O military/O,/O and/O popular/O instruction/O on/O the/O new/O model/O,/O and/O
finally/O,/O the/O district/O council/O--/Othe/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O,/O Snetkov/PERSON,/O was/O
a/O nobleman/O of/O the/O old/O school/O,/O--/Odissipating/O an/O immense/O fortune/O,/O a/O
good-hearted/O man/O,/O honest/O after/O his/O own/O fashion/O,/O but/O utterly/O without/O any/O
comprehension/O of/O the/O needs/O of/O modern/O days/O./O He/O always/O took/O,/O in/O every/O
question/O,/O the/O side/O of/O the/O nobility/O;/O he/O was/O positively/O antagonistic/O to/O
the/O spread/O of/O popular/O education/O,/O and/O he/O succeeded/O in/O giving/O a/O purely/O
party/O character/O to/O the/O district/O council/O which/O ought/O by/O rights/O to/O be/O of/O
such/O an/O immense/O importance/O./O What/O was/O needed/O was/O to/O put/O in/O his/O place/O a/O
fresh/O,/O capable/O,/O perfectly/O modern/O man/O,/O of/O contemporary/O ideas/O,/O and/O to/O
frame/O their/O policy/O so/O as/O from/O the/O rights/O conferred/O upon/O the/O nobles/O,/O not/O
as/O the/O nobility/O,/O but/O as/O an/O element/O of/O the/O district/O council/O,/O to/O extract/O
all/O the/O powers/O of/O self-government/O that/O could/O possibly/O be/O derived/O from/O
them/O./O In/O the/O wealthy/O Kashinsky/PERSON province/O,/O which/O always/O took/O the/O lead/O of/O
other/O provinces/O in/O everything/O,/O there/O was/O now/O such/O a/O preponderance/O of/O
forces/O that/O this/O policy/O,/O once/O carried/O through/O properly/O there/O,/O might/O
serve/O as/O a/O model/O for/O other/O provinces/O for/O all/O Russia/LOCATION./O And/O hence/O the/O whole/O
question/O was/O of/O the/O greatest/O importance/O./O It/O was/O proposed/O to/O elect/O as/O
marshal/O in/O place/O of/O Snetkov/O either/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O or/O,/O better/O still/O,/O
Nevyedovsky/PERSON,/O a/O former/O university/O professor/O,/O a/O man/O of/O remarkable/O
intelligence/O and/O a/O great/O friend/O of/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

The/O meeting/O was/O opened/O by/O the/O governor/O,/O who/O made/O a/O speech/O to/O the/O nobles/O,/O
urging/O them/O to/O elect/O the/O public/O functionaries/O,/O not/O from/O regard/O for/O
persons/O,/O but/O for/O the/O service/O and/O welfare/O of/O their/O fatherland/O,/O and/O hoping/O
that/O the/O honorable/O nobility/O of/O the/O Kashinsky/LOCATION province/O would/O,/O as/O at/O all/O
former/O elections/O,/O hold/O their/O duty/O as/O sacred/O,/O and/O vindicate/O the/O exalted/O
confidence/O of/O the/O monarch/O./O

When/O he/O had/O finished/O with/O his/O speech/O,/O the/O governor/O walked/O out/O of/O the/O
hall/O,/O and/O the/O noblemen/O noisily/O and/O eagerly/O--/Osome/O even/O
enthusiastically/O--/Ofollowed/O him/O and/O thronged/O round/O him/O while/O he/O put/O on/O his/O
fur/O coat/O and/O conversed/O amicably/O with/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O
anxious/O to/O see/O into/O everything/O and/O not/O to/O miss/O anything/O,/O stood/O there/O too/O
in/O the/O crowd/O,/O and/O heard/O the/O governor/O say/O:/O ``/OPlease/O tell/O Marya/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON my/O
wife/O is/O very/O sorry/O she/O could/On't/O come/O to/O the/O Home/O./O''/O And/O thereupon/O the/O
nobles/O in/O high/O good-humor/O sorted/O out/O their/O fur/O coats/O and/O all/O drove/O off/O
to/O the/O cathedral/O./O

In/O the/O cathedral/O Levin/PERSON,/O lifting/O his/O hand/O like/O the/O rest/O and/O repeating/O the/O
words/O of/O the/O archdeacon/O,/O swore/O with/O most/O terrible/O oaths/O to/O do/O all/O the/O
governor/O had/O hoped/O they/O would/O do/O./O Church/O services/O always/O affected/O Levin/PERSON,/O
and/O as/O he/O uttered/O the/O words/O ``/OI/O kiss/O the/O cross/O,/O''/O and/O glanced/O round/O at/O the/O
crowd/O of/O young/O and/O old/O men/O repeating/O the/O same/O,/O he/O felt/O touched/O./O

On/O the/O second/O and/O third/O days/O there/O was/O business/O relating/O to/O the/O finances/O
of/O the/O nobility/O and/O the/O female/O high/O school/O,/O of/O no/O importance/O whatever/O,/O
as/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON explained/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON,/O busy/O seeing/O after/O his/O own/O
affairs/O,/O did/O not/O attend/O the/O meetings/O./O On/O the/O fourth/O day/O the/O auditing/O of/O
the/O marshal/O's/O accounts/O took/O place/O at/O the/O high/O table/O of/O the/O marshal/O of/O
the/O province/O./O And/O then/O there/O occurred/O the/O first/O skirmish/O between/O the/O new/O
party/O and/O the/O old/O./O The/O committee/O who/O had/O been/O deputed/O to/O verify/O the/O
accounts/O reported/O to/O the/O meeting/O that/O all/O was/O in/O order/O./O The/O marshal/O of/O
the/O province/O got/O up/O,/O thanked/O the/O nobility/O for/O their/O confidence/O,/O and/O shed/O
tears/O./O The/O nobles/O gave/O him/O a/O loud/O welcome/O,/O and/O shook/O hands/O with/O him/O./O But/O
at/O that/O instant/O a/O nobleman/O of/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O party/O said/O that/O he/O had/O
heard/O that/O the/O committee/O had/O not/O verified/O the/O accounts/O,/O considering/O such/O
a/O verification/O an/O insult/O to/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O./O One/O of/O the/O
members/O of/O the/O committee/O incautiously/O admitted/O this/O./O Then/O a/O small/O
gentleman/O,/O very/O young-looking/O but/O very/O malignant/O,/O began/O to/O say/O that/O it/O
would/O probably/O be/O agreeable/O to/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O to/O give/O an/O
account/O of/O his/O expenditures/O of/O the/O public/O moneys/O,/O and/O that/O the/O misplaced/O
delicacy/O of/O the/O members/O of/O the/O committee/O was/O depriving/O him/O of/O this/O moral/O
satisfaction/O./O Then/O the/O members/O of/O the/O committee/O tried/O to/O withdraw/O their/O
admission/O,/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON began/O to/O prove/O that/O they/O must/O logically/O
admit/O either/O that/O they/O had/O verified/O the/O accounts/O or/O that/O they/O had/O not/O,/O
and/O he/O developed/O this/O dilemma/O in/O detail/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O answered/O
by/O the/O spokesman/O of/O the/O opposite/O party/O./O Then/O Sviazhsky/PERSON spoke/O,/O and/O then/O
the/O malignant/O gentleman/O again/O./O The/O discussion/O lasted/O a/O long/O time/O and/O
ended/O in/O nothing/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O surprised/O that/O they/O should/O dispute/O upon/O this/O
subject/O so/O long/O,/O especially/O as/O,/O when/O he/O asked/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON whether/O
he/O supposed/O that/O money/O had/O been/O misappropriated/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
answered/O:/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O!/O He/O's/O an/O honest/O man/O./O But/O those/O old-fashioned/O methods/O of/O paternal/O
family/O arrangements/O in/O the/O management/O of/O provincial/O affairs/O must/O be/O
broken/O down/O./O''/O

On/O the/O fifth/O day/O came/O the/O elections/O of/O the/O district/O marshals/O./O It/O was/O
rather/O a/O stormy/O day/O in/O several/O districts/O./O In/O the/O Seleznevsky/LOCATION district/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O elected/O unanimously/O without/O a/O ballot/O,/O and/O he/O gave/O a/O dinner/O
that/O evening/O./O



Chapter/O 27/O


The/O sixth/O day/O was/O fixed/O for/O the/O election/O of/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O./O

The/O rooms/O,/O large/O and/O small/O,/O were/O full/O of/O noblemen/O in/O all/O sorts/O of/O
uniforms/O./O Many/O had/O come/O only/O for/O that/O day/O./O Men/O who/O had/O not/O seen/O each/O
other/O for/O years/O,/O some/O from/O the/O Crimea/LOCATION,/O some/O from/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O some/O from/O
abroad/O,/O met/O in/O the/O rooms/O of/O the/O Hall/O of/O Nobility/O./O There/O was/O much/O
discussion/O around/O the/O governor/O's/O table/O under/O the/O portrait/O of/O the/O Tsar/O./O

The/O nobles/O,/O both/O in/O the/O larger/O and/O the/O smaller/O rooms/O,/O grouped/O themselves/O
in/O camps/O,/O and/O from/O their/O hostile/O and/O suspicious/O glances/O,/O from/O the/O
silence/O that/O fell/O upon/O them/O when/O outsiders/O approached/O a/O group/O,/O and/O from/O
the/O way/O that/O some/O,/O whispering/O together/O,/O retreated/O to/O the/O farther/O
corridor/O,/O it/O was/O evident/O that/O each/O side/O had/O secrets/O from/O the/O other/O./O In/O
appearance/O the/O noblemen/O were/O sharply/O divided/O into/O two/O classes/O:/O the/O old/O
and/O the/O new/O./O The/O old/O were/O for/O the/O most/O part/O either/O in/O old/O uniforms/O of/O
the/O nobility/O,/O buttoned/O up/O closely/O,/O with/O spurs/O and/O hats/O,/O or/O in/O their/O own/O
special/O naval/O,/O cavalry/O,/O infantry/O,/O or/O official/O uniforms/O./O The/O uniforms/O of/O
the/O older/O men/O were/O embroidered/O in/O the/O old-fashioned/O way/O with/O epaulets/O on/O
their/O shoulders/O;/O they/O were/O unmistakably/O tight/O and/O short/O in/O the/O waist/O,/O as/O
though/O their/O wearers/O had/O grown/O out/O of/O them/O./O The/O younger/O men/O wore/O the/O
uniform/O of/O the/O nobility/O with/O long/O waists/O and/O broad/O shoulders/O,/O unbuttoned/O
over/O white/O waistcoats/O,/O or/O uniforms/O with/O black/O collars/O and/O with/O the/O
embroidered/O badges/O of/O justices/O of/O the/O peace/O./O To/O the/O younger/O men/O belonged/O
the/O court/O uniforms/O that/O here/O and/O there/O brightened/O up/O the/O crowd/O./O

But/O the/O division/O into/O young/O and/O old/O did/O not/O correspond/O with/O the/O division/O
of/O parties/O./O Some/O of/O the/O young/O men/O,/O as/O Levin/PERSON observed/O,/O belonged/O to/O the/O
old/O party/O;/O and/O some/O of/O the/O very/O oldest/O noblemen/O,/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O were/O
whispering/O with/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O and/O were/O evidently/O ardent/O partisans/O of/O the/O
new/O party/O./O

Levin/PERSON stood/O in/O the/O smaller/O room/O,/O where/O they/O were/O smoking/O and/O taking/O
light/O refreshments/O,/O close/O to/O his/O own/O friends/O,/O and/O listening/O to/O what/O they/O
were/O saying/O,/O he/O conscientiously/O exerted/O all/O his/O intelligence/O trying/O to/O
understand/O what/O was/O said/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O the/O center/O round/O which/O
the/O others/O grouped/O themselves/O./O He/O was/O listening/O at/O that/O moment/O to/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON and/O Hliustov/PERSON,/O the/O marshal/O of/O another/O district/O,/O who/O belonged/O to/O
their/O party/O./O Hliustov/PERSON would/O not/O agree/O to/O go/O with/O his/O district/O to/O ask/O
Snetkov/PERSON to/O stand/O,/O while/O Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O persuading/O him/O to/O do/O so/O,/O and/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O approving/O of/O the/O plan/O./O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O make/O out/O
why/O the/O opposition/O was/O to/O ask/O the/O marshal/O to/O stand/O whom/O they/O wanted/O to/O
supersede/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O who/O had/O just/O been/O drinking/O and/O taking/O some/O lunch/O,/O
came/O up/O to/O them/O in/O his/O uniform/O of/O a/O gentleman/O of/O the/O bedchamber/O,/O wiping/O
his/O lips/O with/O a/O perfumed/O handkerchief/O of/O bordered/O batiste/O./O

``/OWe/O are/O placing/O our/O forces/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O pulling/O out/O his/O whiskers/O,/O ``/OSergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON!/O''/O

And/O listening/O to/O the/O conversation/O,/O he/O supported/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O contention/O./O

``/OOne/O district/O's/O enough/O,/O and/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O obviously/O of/O the/O opposition/O,/O''/O he/O
said/O,/O words/O evidently/O intelligible/O to/O all/O except/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWhy/O,/O Kostya/PERSON,/O you/O here/O too/O!/O I/O suppose/O you/O're/O converted/O,/O eh/O?/O''/O he/O added/O,/O
turning/O to/O Levin/PERSON and/O drawing/O his/O arm/O through/O his/O./O Levin/PERSON would/O have/O been/O
glad/O indeed/O to/O be/O converted/O,/O but/O could/O not/O make/O out/O what/O the/O point/O was/O,/O
and/O retreating/O a/O few/O steps/O from/O the/O speakers/O,/O he/O explained/O to/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON his/O inability/O to/O understand/O why/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O
should/O be/O asked/O to/O stand/O./O

_/O``/OO/O sancta/O simplicitas/O!/O''/O_/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O and/O briefly/O and/O
clearly/O he/O explained/O it/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O If/O,/O as/O at/O previous/O elections/O,/O all/O the/O
districts/O asked/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O to/O stand/O,/O then/O he/O would/O be/O
elected/O without/O a/O ballot/O./O That/O must/O not/O be/O./O Now/O eight/O districts/O had/O
agreed/O to/O call/O upon/O him/O:/O if/O two/O refused/O to/O do/O so/O,/O Snetkov/PERSON might/O decline/O
to/O stand/O at/O all/O;/O and/O then/O the/O old/O party/O might/O choose/O another/O of/O their/O
party/O,/O which/O would/O throw/O them/O completely/O out/O in/O their/O reckoning/O./O But/O if/O
only/O one/O district/O,/O Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O,/O did/O not/O call/O upon/O him/O to/O stand/O,/O Snetkov/PERSON
would/O let/O himself/O be/O balloted/O for/O./O They/O were/O even/O,/O some/O of/O them/O,/O going/O
to/O vote/O for/O him/O,/O and/O purposely/O to/O let/O him/O get/O a/O good/O many/O votes/O,/O so/O that/O
the/O enemy/O might/O be/O thrown/O off/O the/O scent/O,/O and/O when/O a/O candidate/O of/O the/O
other/O side/O was/O put/O up/O,/O they/O too/O might/O give/O him/O some/O votes/O./O Levin/PERSON
understood/O to/O some/O extent/O,/O but/O not/O fully/O,/O and/O would/O have/O put/O a/O few/O more/O
questions/O,/O when/O suddenly/O everyone/O began/O talking/O and/O making/O a/O noise/O and/O
they/O moved/O towards/O the/O big/O room/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O?/O eh/O?/O whom/O?/O''/O ``/ONo/O guarantee/O?/O whose/O?/O what/O?/O''/O ``/OThey/O wo/On't/O pass/O
him/O?/O''/O ``/ONo/O guarantee/O?/O''/O ``/OThey/O wo/On't/O let/O Flerov/PERSON in/O?/O''/O ``/OEh/O,/O because/O of/O the/O
charge/O against/O him/O?/O''/O ``/OWhy/O,/O at/O this/O rate/O,/O they/O wo/On't/O admit/O anyone/O./O It/O's/O a/O
swindle/O!/O''/O ``/OThe/O law/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON heard/O exclamations/O on/O all/O sides/O,/O and/O he/O moved/O
into/O the/O big/O room/O together/O with/O the/O others/O,/O all/O hurrying/O somewhere/O and/O
afraid/O of/O missing/O something/O./O Squeezed/O by/O the/O crowding/O noblemen/O,/O he/O drew/O
near/O the/O high/O table/O where/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O,/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O and/O
the/O other/O leaders/O were/O hotly/O disputing/O about/O something/O./O



Chapter/O 28/O


Levin/PERSON was/O standing/O rather/O far/O off/O./O A/O nobleman/O breathing/O heavily/O and/O
hoarsely/O at/O his/O side/O,/O and/O another/O whose/O thick/O boots/O were/O creaking/O,/O
prevented/O him/O from/O hearing/O distinctly/O./O He/O could/O only/O hear/O the/O soft/O voice/O
of/O the/O marshal/O faintly/O,/O then/O the/O shrill/O voice/O of/O the/O malignant/O
gentleman/O,/O and/O then/O the/O voice/O of/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O They/O were/O disputing/O,/O as/O far/O
as/O he/O could/O make/O out/O,/O as/O to/O the/O interpretation/O to/O be/O put/O on/O the/O act/O and/O
the/O exact/O meaning/O of/O the/O words/O:/O ``/Oliable/O to/O be/O called/O up/O for/O trial/O./O''/O

The/O crowd/O parted/O to/O make/O way/O for/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON approaching/O the/O
table/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O waiting/O till/O the/O malignant/O gentleman/O had/O
finished/O speaking/O,/O said/O that/O he/O thought/O the/O best/O solution/O would/O be/O to/O
refer/O to/O the/O act/O itself/O,/O and/O asked/O the/O secretary/O to/O find/O the/O act/O./O The/O
act/O said/O that/O in/O case/O of/O difference/O of/O opinion/O,/O there/O must/O be/O a/O ballot/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON read/O the/O act/O and/O began/O to/O explain/O its/O meaning/O,/O but/O at/O
that/O point/O a/O tall/O,/O stout/O,/O round-shouldered/O landowner/O,/O with/O dyed/O
whiskers/O,/O in/O a/O tight/O uniform/O that/O cut/O the/O back/O of/O his/O neck/O,/O interrupted/O
him/O./O He/O went/O up/O to/O the/O table/O,/O and/O striking/O it/O with/O his/O finger/O ring/O,/O he/O
shouted/O loudly/O:/O ``/OA/O ballot/O!/O Put/O it/O to/O the/O vote/O!/O No/O need/O for/O more/O
talking/O!/O''/O Then/O several/O voices/O began/O to/O talk/O all/O at/O once/O,/O and/O the/O tall/O
nobleman/O with/O the/O ring/O,/O getting/O more/O and/O more/O exasperated/O,/O shouted/O more/O
and/O more/O loudly/O./O But/O it/O was/O impossible/O to/O make/O out/O what/O he/O said/O./O

He/O was/O shouting/O for/O the/O very/O course/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON had/O proposed/O;/O but/O
it/O was/O evident/O that/O he/O hated/O him/O and/O all/O his/O party/O,/O and/O this/O feeling/O of/O
hatred/O spread/O through/O the/O whole/O party/O and/O roused/O in/O opposition/O to/O it/O the/O
same/O vindictiveness/O,/O though/O in/O a/O more/O seemly/O form/O,/O on/O the/O other/O side/O./O
Shouts/O were/O raised/O,/O and/O for/O a/O moment/O all/O was/O confusion/O,/O so/O that/O the/O
marshal/O of/O the/O province/O had/O to/O call/O for/O order/O./O

``/OA/O ballot/O!/O A/O ballot/O!/O Every/O nobleman/O sees/O it/O!/O We/O shed/O our/O blood/O for/O our/O
country/O!/O.../O The/O confidence/O of/O the/O monarch/O.../O./O No/O checking/O the/O accounts/O
of/O the/O marshal/O;/O he/O's/O not/O a/O cashier/O.../O./O But/O that/O's/O not/O the/O point/O.../O./O
Votes/O,/O please/O!/O Beastly/O!/O.../O''/O shouted/O furious/O and/O violent/O voices/O on/O all/O
sides/O./O Looks/O and/O faces/O were/O even/O more/O violent/O and/O furious/O than/O their/O
words/O./O They/O expressed/O the/O most/O implacable/O hatred/O./O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O in/O the/O
least/O understand/O what/O was/O the/O matter/O,/O and/O he/O marveled/O at/O the/O passion/O
with/O which/O it/O was/O disputed/O whether/O or/O not/O the/O decision/O about/O Flerov/PERSON
should/O be/O put/O to/O the/O vote/O./O He/O forgot/O,/O as/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON explained/O to/O
him/O afterwards/O,/O this/O syllogism/O:/O that/O it/O was/O necessary/O for/O the/O public/O
good/O to/O get/O rid/O of/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O;/O that/O to/O get/O rid/O of/O the/O
marshal/O it/O was/O necessary/O to/O have/O a/O majority/O of/O votes/O;/O that/O to/O get/O a/O
majority/O of/O votes/O it/O was/O necessary/O to/O secure/O Flerov/PERSON's/O right/O to/O vote/O;/O
that/O to/O secure/O the/O recognition/O of/O Flerov/PERSON's/O right/O to/O vote/O they/O must/O
decide/O on/O the/O interpretation/O to/O be/O put/O on/O the/O act/O./O

``/OAnd/O one/O vote/O may/O decide/O the/O whole/O question/O,/O and/O one/O must/O be/O serious/O and/O
consecutive/O,/O if/O one/O wants/O to/O be/O of/O use/O in/O public/O life/O,/O''/O concluded/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON./O But/O Levin/PERSON forgot/O all/O that/O,/O and/O it/O was/O painful/O to/O him/O to/O see/O
all/O these/O excellent/O persons/O,/O for/O whom/O he/O had/O a/O respect/O,/O in/O such/O an/O
unpleasant/O and/O vicious/O state/O of/O excitement/O./O To/O escape/O from/O this/O painful/O
feeling/O he/O went/O away/O into/O the/O other/O room/O where/O there/O was/O nobody/O except/O
the/O waiters/O at/O the/O refreshment/O bar/O./O Seeing/O the/O waiters/O busy/O over/O washing/O
up/O the/O crockery/O and/O setting/O in/O order/O their/O plates/O and/O wine/O glasses/O,/O
seeing/O their/O calm/O and/O cheerful/O faces/O,/O Levin/PERSON felt/O an/O unexpected/O sense/O of/O
relief/O as/O though/O he/O had/O come/O out/O of/O a/O stuffy/O room/O into/O the/O fresh/O air/O./O He/O
began/O walking/O up/O and/O down/O,/O looking/O with/O pleasure/O at/O the/O waiters/O./O He/O
particularly/O liked/O the/O way/O one/O gray-whiskered/O waiter/O,/O who/O showed/O his/O
scorn/O for/O the/O other/O younger/O ones/O and/O was/O jeered/O at/O by/O them/O,/O was/O teaching/O
them/O how/O to/O fold/O up/O napkins/O properly/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O just/O about/O to/O enter/O into/O
conversation/O with/O the/O old/O waiter/O,/O when/O the/O secretary/O of/O the/O court/O of/O
wardship/O,/O a/O little/O old/O man/O whose/O specialty/O it/O was/O to/O know/O all/O the/O
noblemen/O of/O the/O province/O by/O name/O and/O patronymic/O,/O drew/O him/O away/O./O

``/OPlease/O come/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/Oyour/O brother/O's/O looking/O
for/O you/O./O They/O are/O voting/O on/O the/O legal/O point/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON walked/O into/O the/O room/O,/O received/O a/O white/O ball/O,/O and/O followed/O his/O
brother/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O to/O the/O table/O where/O Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O standing/O
with/O a/O significant/O and/O ironical/O face/O,/O holding/O his/O beard/O in/O his/O fist/O and/O
sniffing/O at/O it/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON put/O his/O hand/O into/O the/O box/O,/O put/O the/O
ball/O somewhere/O,/O and/O making/O room/O for/O Levin/PERSON,/O stopped/O./O Levin/PERSON advanced/O,/O but/O
utterly/O forgetting/O what/O he/O was/O to/O do/O,/O and/O much/O embarrassed/O,/O he/O turned/O to/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON with/O the/O question/O,/O ``/OWhere/O am/O I/O to/O put/O it/O?/O''/O He/O asked/O
this/O softly/O,/O at/O a/O moment/O when/O there/O was/O talking/O going/O on/O near/O,/O so/O that/O
he/O had/O hoped/O his/O question/O would/O not/O be/O overheard/O./O But/O the/O persons/O
speaking/O paused/O,/O and/O his/O improper/O question/O was/O overheard/O./O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON frowned/O./O

``/OThat/O is/O a/O matter/O for/O each/O man/O's/O own/O decision/O,/O''/O he/O said/O severely/O./O

Several/O people/O smiled/O./O Levin/PERSON crimsoned/O,/O hurriedly/O thrust/O his/O hand/O under/O
the/O cloth/O,/O and/O put/O the/O ball/O to/O the/O right/O as/O it/O was/O in/O his/O right/O hand/O./O
Having/O put/O it/O in/O,/O he/O recollected/O that/O he/O ought/O to/O have/O thrust/O his/O left/O
hand/O too/O,/O and/O so/O he/O thrust/O it/O in/O though/O too/O late/O,/O and/O,/O still/O more/O
overcome/O with/O confusion/O,/O he/O beat/O a/O hasty/O retreat/O into/O the/O background/O./O

``/OA/O hundred/O and/O twenty-six/O for/O admission/O!/O Ninety-eight/O against/O!/O''/O sang/O out/O
the/O voice/O of/O the/O secretary/O,/O who/O could/O not/O pronounce/O the/O letter/O _/Or/O_/O./O Then/O
there/O was/O a/O laugh/O;/O a/O button/O and/O two/O nuts/O were/O found/O in/O the/O box/O./O The/O
nobleman/O was/O allowed/O the/O right/O to/O vote/O,/O and/O the/O new/O party/O had/O conquered/O./O

But/O the/O old/O party/O did/O not/O consider/O themselves/O conquered/O./O Levin/PERSON heard/O
that/O they/O were/O asking/O Snetkov/PERSON to/O stand/O,/O and/O he/O saw/O that/O a/O crowd/O of/O
noblemen/O was/O surrounding/O the/O marshal/O,/O who/O was/O saying/O something/O./O Levin/PERSON
went/O nearer/O./O In/O reply/O Snetkov/PERSON spoke/O of/O the/O trust/O the/O noblemen/O of/O the/O
province/O had/O placed/O in/O him/O,/O the/O affection/O they/O had/O shown/O him/O,/O which/O he/O
did/O not/O deserve/O,/O as/O his/O only/O merit/O had/O been/O his/O attachment/O to/O the/O
nobility/O,/O to/O whom/O he/O had/O devoted/O twelve/O years/O of/O service/O./O Several/O times/O
he/O repeated/O the/O words/O:/O ``/OI/O have/O served/O to/O the/O best/O of/O my/O powers/O with/O
truth/O and/O good/O faith/O,/O I/O value/O your/O goodness/O and/O thank/O you/O,/O''/O and/O suddenly/O
he/O stopped/O short/O from/O the/O tears/O that/O choked/O him/O,/O and/O went/O out/O of/O the/O
room/O./O Whether/O these/O tears/O came/O from/O a/O sense/O of/O the/O injustice/O being/O done/O
him/O,/O from/O his/O love/O for/O the/O nobility/O,/O or/O from/O the/O strain/O of/O the/O position/O
he/O was/O placed/O in/O,/O feeling/O himself/O surrounded/O by/O enemies/O,/O his/O emotion/O
infected/O the/O assembly/O,/O the/O majority/O were/O touched/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON felt/O a/O
tenderness/O for/O Snetkov/O./O

In/O the/O doorway/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O jostled/O against/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OBeg/O pardon/O,/O excuse/O me/O,/O please/O,/O''/O he/O said/O as/O to/O a/O stranger/O,/O but/O
recognizing/O Levin/PERSON,/O he/O smiled/O timidly/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON that/O he/O would/O
have/O liked/O to/O say/O something/O,/O but/O could/O not/O speak/O for/O emotion/O./O His/O face/O
and/O his/O whole/O figure/O in/O his/O uniform/O with/O the/O crosses/O,/O and/O white/O trousers/O
striped/O with/O braid/O,/O as/O he/O moved/O hurriedly/O along/O,/O reminded/O Levin/PERSON of/O some/O
hunted/O beast/O who/O sees/O that/O he/O is/O in/O evil/O case/O./O This/O expression/O in/O the/O
marshal/O's/O face/O was/O particularly/O touching/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O because/O,/O only/O the/O day/O
before/O,/O he/O had/O been/O at/O his/O house/O about/O his/O trustee/O business/O and/O had/O seen/O
him/O in/O all/O his/O grandeur/O,/O a/O kind-hearted/O,/O fatherly/O man/O./O The/O big/O house/O
with/O the/O old/O family/O furniture/O;/O the/O rather/O dirty/O,/O far/O from/O stylish/O,/O but/O
respectful/O footmen/O,/O unmistakably/O old/O house/O serfs/O who/O had/O stuck/O to/O their/O
master/O;/O the/O stout/O,/O good-natured/O wife/O in/O a/O cap/O with/O lace/O and/O a/O Turkish/O
shawl/O,/O petting/O her/O pretty/O grandchild/O,/O her/O daughter/O's/O daughter/O;/O the/O young/O
son/O,/O a/O sixth/O form/O high/O school/O boy/O,/O coming/O home/O from/O school/O,/O and/O greeting/O
his/O father/O,/O kissing/O his/O big/O hand/O;/O the/O genuine/O,/O cordial/O words/O and/O
gestures/O of/O the/O old/O man/O--/Oall/O this/O had/O the/O day/O before/O roused/O an/O
instinctive/O feeling/O of/O respect/O and/O sympathy/O in/O Levin/PERSON./O This/O old/O man/O was/O a/O
touching/O and/O pathetic/O figure/O to/O Levin/PERSON now/O,/O and/O he/O longed/O to/O say/O
something/O pleasant/O to/O him/O./O

``/OSo/O you/O're/O sure/O to/O be/O our/O marshal/O again/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O likely/O,/O''/O said/O the/O marshal/O,/O looking/O round/O with/O a/O scared/O
expression/O./O ``/OI/O'm/O worn/O out/O,/O I/O'm/O old/O./O If/O there/O are/O men/O younger/O and/O more/O
deserving/O than/O I/O,/O let/O them/O serve/O./O''/O

And/O the/O marshal/O disappeared/O through/O a/O side/O door/O./O

The/O most/O solemn/O moment/O was/O at/O hand/O./O They/O were/O to/O proceed/O immediately/O to/O
the/O election/O./O The/O leaders/O of/O both/O parties/O were/O reckoning/O white/O and/O black/O
on/O their/O fingers/O./O

The/O discussion/O upon/O Flerov/PERSON had/O given/O the/O new/O party/O not/O only/O Flerov/PERSON's/O
vote/O,/O but/O had/O also/O gained/O time/O for/O them/O,/O so/O that/O they/O could/O send/O to/O
fetch/O three/O noblemen/O who/O had/O been/O rendered/O unable/O to/O take/O part/O in/O the/O
elections/O by/O the/O wiles/O of/O the/O other/O party/O./O Two/O noble/O gentlemen/O,/O who/O had/O
a/O weakness/O for/O strong/O drink/O,/O had/O been/O made/O drunk/O by/O the/O partisans/O of/O
Snetkov/LOCATION,/O and/O a/O third/O had/O been/O robbed/O of/O his/O uniform/O./O

On/O learning/O this/O,/O the/O new/O party/O had/O made/O haste/O,/O during/O the/O dispute/O about/O
Flerov/PERSON,/O to/O send/O some/O of/O their/O men/O in/O a/O sledge/O to/O clothe/O the/O stripped/O
gentleman/O,/O and/O to/O bring/O along/O one/O of/O the/O intoxicated/O to/O the/O meeting/O./O

``/OI/O've/O brought/O one/O,/O drenched/O him/O with/O water/O,/O''/O said/O the/O landowner/O,/O who/O had/O
gone/O on/O this/O errand/O,/O to/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O ``/OHe/O's/O all/O right/O?/O he/O'll/O do/O./O''/O

``/ONot/O too/O drunk/O,/O he/O wo/On't/O fall/O down/O?/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O shaking/O his/O head/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O he/O's/O first-rate/O./O If/O only/O they/O do/On't/O give/O him/O any/O more/O here/O.../O./O I/O've/O
told/O the/O waiter/O not/O to/O give/O him/O anything/O on/O any/O account/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 29/O


The/O narrow/O room/O,/O in/O which/O they/O were/O smoking/O and/O taking/O refreshments/O,/O was/O
full/O of/O noblemen/O./O The/O excitement/O grew/O more/O intense/O,/O and/O every/O face/O
betrayed/O some/O uneasiness/O./O The/O excitement/O was/O specially/O keen/O for/O the/O
leaders/O of/O each/O party/O,/O who/O knew/O every/O detail/O,/O and/O had/O reckoned/O up/O every/O
vote/O./O They/O were/O the/O generals/O organizing/O the/O approaching/O battle/O./O The/O
rest/O,/O like/O the/O rank/O and/O file/O before/O an/O engagement/O,/O though/O they/O were/O
getting/O ready/O for/O the/O fight/O,/O sought/O for/O other/O distractions/O in/O the/O
interval/O./O Some/O were/O lunching/O,/O standing/O at/O the/O bar/O,/O or/O sitting/O at/O the/O
table/O;/O others/O were/O walking/O up/O and/O down/O the/O long/O room/O,/O smoking/O
cigarettes/O,/O and/O talking/O with/O friends/O whom/O they/O had/O not/O seen/O for/O a/O long/O
while/O./O

Levin/PERSON did/O not/O care/O to/O eat/O,/O and/O he/O was/O not/O smoking/O;/O he/O did/O not/O want/O to/O
join/O his/O own/O friends/O,/O that/O is/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON and/O the/O rest/O,/O because/O Vronsky/O in/O his/O equerry/O's/O uniform/O was/O
standing/O with/O them/O in/O eager/O conversation/O./O Levin/PERSON had/O seen/O him/O already/O at/O
the/O meeting/O on/O the/O previous/O day/O,/O and/O he/O had/O studiously/O avoided/O him/O,/O not/O
caring/O to/O greet/O him/O./O He/O went/O to/O the/O window/O and/O sat/O down/O,/O scanning/O the/O
groups/O,/O and/O listening/O to/O what/O was/O being/O said/O around/O him/O./O He/O felt/O
depressed/O,/O especially/O because/O everyone/O else/O was/O,/O as/O he/O saw/O,/O eager/O,/O
anxious/O,/O and/O interested/O,/O and/O he/O alone/O,/O with/O an/O old/O,/O toothless/O little/O man/O
with/O mumbling/O lips/O wearing/O a/O naval/O uniform/O,/O sitting/O beside/O him/O,/O had/O no/O
interest/O in/O it/O and/O nothing/O to/O do/O./O

``/OHe/O's/O such/O a/O blackguard/O!/O I/O have/O told/O him/O so/O,/O but/O it/O makes/O no/O difference/O./O
Only/O think/O of/O it/O!/O He/O could/On't/O collect/O it/O in/O three/O years/O!/O''/O he/O heard/O
vigorously/O uttered/O by/O a/O round-shouldered/O,/O short/O,/O country/O gentleman/O,/O who/O
had/O pomaded/O hair/O hanging/O on/O his/O embroidered/O collar/O,/O and/O new/O boots/O
obviously/O put/O on/O for/O the/O occasion/O,/O with/O heels/O that/O tapped/O energetically/O
as/O he/O spoke/O./O Casting/O a/O displeased/O glance/O at/O Levin/LOCATION,/O this/O gentleman/O
sharply/O turned/O his/O back/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O a/O dirty/O business/O,/O there/O's/O no/O denying/O,/O''/O a/O small/O gentleman/O
assented/O in/O a/O high/O voice/O./O

Next/O,/O a/O whole/O crowd/O of/O country/O gentlemen/O,/O surrounding/O a/O stout/O general/O,/O
hurriedly/O came/O near/O Levin/LOCATION./O These/O persons/O were/O unmistakably/O seeking/O a/O
place/O where/O they/O could/O talk/O without/O being/O overheard/O./O

``/OHow/O dare/O he/O say/O I/O had/O his/O breeches/O stolen/O!/O Pawned/O them/O for/O drink/O,/O I/O
expect/O./O Damn/O the/O fellow/O,/O prince/O indeed/O!/O He/O'd/O better/O not/O say/O it/O,/O the/O
beast/O!/O''/O

``/OBut/O excuse/O me/O!/O They/O take/O their/O stand/O on/O the/O act/O,/O''/O was/O being/O said/O in/O
another/O group/O;/O ``/Othe/O wife/O must/O be/O registered/O as/O noble/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O damn/O your/O acts/O!/O I/O speak/O from/O my/O heart/O./O We/O're/O all/O gentlemen/O,/O are/On't/O
we/O?/O Above/O suspicion/O./O''/O

``/OShall/O we/O go/O on/O,/O your/O excellency/O,/O _/Ofine/O champagne/O?/O_/O''/O

Another/O group/O was/O following/O a/O nobleman/O,/O who/O was/O shouting/O something/O in/O a/O
loud/O voice/O;/O it/O was/O one/O of/O the/O three/O intoxicated/O gentlemen/O./O

``/OI/O always/O advised/O Marya/PERSON Semyonovna/PERSON to/O let/O for/O a/O fair/O rent/O,/O for/O she/O can/O
never/O save/O a/O profit/O,/O''/O he/O heard/O a/O pleasant/O voice/O say/O./O The/O speaker/O was/O a/O
country/O gentleman/O with/O gray/O whiskers/O,/O wearing/O the/O regimental/O uniform/O of/O
an/O old/O general/O staff-officer/O./O It/O was/O the/O very/O landowner/O Levin/PERSON had/O met/O at/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON's/O./O He/O knew/O him/O at/O once/O./O The/O landowner/O too/O stared/O at/O Levin/LOCATION,/O and/O
they/O exchanged/O greetings/O./O

``/OVery/O glad/O to/O see/O you/O!/O To/O be/O sure/O!/O I/O remember/O you/O very/O well/O./O Last/O year/O
at/O our/O district/O marshal/O,/O Nikolay/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O how/O is/O your/O land/O doing/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O still/O just/O the/O same/O,/O always/O at/O a/O loss/O,/O''/O the/O landowner/O answered/O with/O
a/O resigned/O smile/O,/O but/O with/O an/O expression/O of/O serenity/O and/O conviction/O that/O
so/O it/O must/O be/O./O ``/OAnd/O how/O do/O you/O come/O to/O be/O in/O our/O province/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O
``/OCome/O to/O take/O part/O in/O our/O _/Ocoup/O d'état/O?/O_/O''/O he/O said/O,/O confidently/O
pronouncing/O the/O French/O words/O with/O a/O bad/O accent/O./O ``/OAll/O Russia/LOCATION's/O
here/O--/Ogentlemen/O of/O the/O bedchamber/O,/O and/O everything/O short/O of/O the/O ministry/O./O''/O
He/O pointed/O to/O the/O imposing/O figure/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON in/O white/O
trousers/O and/O his/O court/O uniform/O,/O walking/O by/O with/O a/O general/O./O

``/OI/O ought/O to/O own/O that/O I/O do/On't/O very/O well/O understand/O the/O drift/O of/O the/O
provincial/O elections/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

The/O landowner/O looked/O at/O him/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O what/O is/O there/O to/O understand/O?/O There/O's/O no/O meaning/O in/O it/O at/O all/O./O It/O's/O
a/O decaying/O institution/O that/O goes/O on/O running/O only/O by/O the/O force/O of/O
inertia/O./O Just/O look/O,/O the/O very/O uniforms/O tell/O you/O that/O it/O's/O an/O assembly/O of/O
justices/O of/O the/O peace/O,/O permanent/O members/O of/O the/O court/O,/O and/O so/O on/O,/O but/O
not/O of/O noblemen/O./O''/O

``/OThen/O why/O do/O you/O come/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OFrom/O habit/O,/O nothing/O else/O./O Then/O,/O too/O,/O one/O must/O keep/O up/O connections/O./O It/O's/O
a/O moral/O obligation/O of/O a/O sort/O./O And/O then/O,/O to/O tell/O the/O truth/O,/O there/O's/O one/O's/O
own/O interests/O./O My/O son-in-law/O wants/O to/O stand/O as/O a/O permanent/O member/O;/O
they/O're/O not/O rich/O people/O,/O and/O he/O must/O be/O brought/O forward/O./O These/O
gentlemen/O,/O now/O,/O what/O do/O they/O come/O for/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O pointing/O to/O the/O
malignant/O gentleman/O,/O who/O was/O talking/O at/O the/O high/O table/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O the/O new/O generation/O of/O nobility/O./O''/O

``/ONew/O it/O may/O be/O,/O but/O nobility/O it/O is/On't/O./O They/O're/O proprietors/O of/O a/O sort/O,/O
but/O we/O're/O the/O landowners/O./O As/O noblemen/O,/O they/O're/O cutting/O their/O own/O
throats/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O you/O say/O it/O's/O an/O institution/O that/O's/O served/O its/O time/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O it/O may/O be/O,/O but/O still/O it/O ought/O to/O be/O treated/O a/O little/O more/O
respectfully/O./O Snetkov/PERSON,/O now/O.../O./O We/O may/O be/O of/O use/O,/O or/O we/O may/O not/O,/O but/O
we/O're/O the/O growth/O of/O a/O thousand/O years/O./O If/O we/O're/O laying/O out/O a/O garden/O,/O
planning/O one/O before/O the/O house/O,/O you/O know/O,/O and/O there/O you/O've/O a/O tree/O that/O's/O
stood/O for/O centuries/O in/O the/O very/O spot/O.../O./O Old/O and/O gnarled/O it/O may/O be/O,/O and/O
yet/O you/O do/On't/O cut/O down/O the/O old/O fellow/O to/O make/O room/O for/O the/O flowerbeds/O,/O
but/O lay/O out/O your/O beds/O so/O as/O to/O take/O advantage/O of/O the/O tree/O./O You/O wo/On't/O
grow/O him/O again/O in/O a/O year/O,/O''/O he/O said/O cautiously/O,/O and/O he/O immediately/O
changed/O the/O conversation/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O and/O how/O is/O your/O land/O doing/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O not/O very/O well/O./O I/O make/O five/O per/O cent/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O you/O do/On't/O reckon/O your/O own/O work/O./O Are/On't/O you/O worth/O something/O
too/O?/O I/O'll/O tell/O you/O my/O own/O case/O./O Before/O I/O took/O to/O seeing/O after/O the/O land/O,/O
I/O had/O a/O salary/O of/O three/O hundred/O pounds/O from/O the/O service/O./O Now/O I/O do/O more/O
work/O than/O I/O did/O in/O the/O service/O,/O and/O like/O you/O I/O get/O five/O per/O cent/O./O on/O the/O
land/O,/O and/O thank/O God/O for/O that/O./O But/O one/O's/O work/O is/O thrown/O in/O for/O nothing/O./O''/O

``/OThen/O why/O do/O you/O do/O it/O,/O if/O it/O's/O a/O clear/O loss/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O one/O does/O it/O!/O What/O would/O you/O have/O?/O It/O's/O habit/O,/O and/O one/O knows/O
it/O's/O how/O it/O should/O be/O./O And/O what/O's/O more/O,/O''/O the/O landowner/O went/O on/O,/O leaning/O
his/O elbows/O on/O the/O window/O and/O chatting/O on/O,/O ``/Omy/O son/O,/O I/O must/O tell/O you/O,/O has/O
no/O taste/O for/O it/O./O There/O's/O no/O doubt/O he/O'll/O be/O a/O scientific/O man/O./O So/O there/O'll/O
be/O no/O one/O to/O keep/O it/O up/O./O And/O yet/O one/O does/O it/O./O Here/O this/O year/O I/O've/O
planted/O an/O orchard/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Othat/O's/O perfectly/O true/O./O I/O always/O feel/O there/O's/O no/O
real/O balance/O of/O gain/O in/O my/O work/O on/O the/O land/O,/O and/O yet/O one/O does/O it/O.../O./O
It/O's/O a/O sort/O of/O duty/O one/O feels/O to/O the/O land/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O tell/O you/O what/O,/O''/O the/O landowner/O pursued/O;/O ``/Oa/O neighbor/O of/O mine/O,/O a/O
merchant/O,/O was/O at/O my/O place/O./O We/O walked/O about/O the/O fields/O and/O the/O garden/O./O
`/ONo/O,/O'/O said/O he/O,/O `/OStepan/PERSON Vassilievitch/PERSON,/O everything/O's/O well/O looked/O after/O,/O
but/O your/O garden/O's/O neglected/O./O'/O But/O,/O as/O a/O fact/O,/O it/O's/O well/O kept/O up/O./O `/OTo/O my/O
thinking/O,/O I/O'd/O cut/O down/O that/O lime-tree/O./O Here/O you/O've/O thousands/O of/O limes/O,/O
and/O each/O would/O make/O two/O good/O bundles/O of/O bark/O./O And/O nowadays/O that/O bark/O's/O
worth/O something/O./O I/O'd/O cut/O down/O the/O lot/O./O'/O''/O

``/OAnd/O with/O what/O he/O made/O he/O'd/O increase/O his/O stock/O,/O or/O buy/O some/O land/O for/O a/O
trifle/O,/O and/O let/O it/O out/O in/O lots/O to/O the/O peasants/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON added/O,/O smiling/O./O
He/O had/O evidently/O more/O than/O once/O come/O across/O those/O commercial/O
calculations/O./O ``/OAnd/O he/O'd/O make/O his/O fortune/O./O But/O you/O and/O I/O must/O thank/O God/O
if/O we/O keep/O what/O we/O've/O got/O and/O leave/O it/O to/O our/O children/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O married/O,/O I/O've/O heard/O?/O''/O said/O the/O landowner/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON answered/O,/O with/O proud/O satisfaction/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O rather/O
strange/O,/O''/O he/O went/O on/O./O ``/OSo/O we/O live/O without/O making/O anything/O,/O as/O though/O we/O
were/O ancient/O vestals/O set/O to/O keep/O in/O a/O fire/O./O''/O

The/O landowner/O chuckled/O under/O his/O white/O mustaches/O./O

``/OThere/O are/O some/O among/O us/O,/O too/O,/O like/O our/O friend/O Nikolay/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O or/O
Count/O Vronsky/O,/O that/O's/O settled/O here/O lately/O,/O who/O try/O to/O carry/O on/O their/O
husbandry/O as/O though/O it/O were/O a/O factory/O;/O but/O so/O far/O it/O leads/O to/O nothing/O
but/O making/O away/O with/O capital/O on/O it/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O why/O is/O it/O we/O do/On't/O do/O like/O the/O merchants/O?/O Why/O do/On't/O we/O cut/O down/O our/O
parks/O for/O timber/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O returning/O to/O a/O thought/O that/O had/O struck/O
him/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O as/O you/O said/O,/O to/O keep/O the/O fire/O in/O./O Besides/O that/O's/O not/O work/O for/O a/O
nobleman/O./O And/O our/O work/O as/O noblemen/O is/On't/O done/O here/O at/O the/O elections/O,/O but/O
yonder/O,/O each/O in/O our/O corner/O./O There/O's/O a/O class/O instinct/O,/O too/O,/O of/O what/O one/O
ought/O and/O ought/On't/O to/O do/O./O There/O's/O the/O peasants/O,/O too/O,/O I/O wonder/O at/O them/O
sometimes/O;/O any/O good/O peasant/O tries/O to/O take/O all/O the/O land/O he/O can/O./O However/O
bad/O the/O land/O is/O,/O he/O'll/O work/O it/O./O Without/O a/O return/O too/O./O At/O a/O simple/O loss/O./O''/O

``/OJust/O as/O we/O do/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OVery/O,/O very/O glad/O to/O have/O met/O you/O,/O''/O he/O
added/O,/O seeing/O Sviazhsky/PERSON approaching/O him/O./O

``/OAnd/O here/O we/O've/O met/O for/O the/O first/O time/O since/O we/O met/O at/O your/O place/O,/O''/O said/O
the/O landowner/O to/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O ``/Oand/O we/O've/O had/O a/O good/O talk/O too/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O have/O you/O been/O attacking/O the/O new/O order/O of/O things/O?/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON
with/O a/O smile/O./O

``/OThat/O we/O're/O bound/O to/O do/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O've/O relieved/O your/O feelings/O?/O''/O



Chapter/O 30/O


Sviazhsky/PERSON took/O Levin/PERSON's/O arm/O,/O and/O went/O with/O him/O to/O his/O own/O friends/O./O This/O
time/O there/O was/O no/O avoiding/O Vronsky/O./O He/O was/O standing/O with/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O and/O looking/O straight/O at/O Levin/PERSON as/O he/O
drew/O near/O./O

``/ODelighted/O!/O I/O believe/O I/O've/O had/O the/O pleasure/O of/O meeting/O you/O .../O at/O
Princess/O Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON's/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O giving/O Levin/PERSON his/O hand/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O quite/O remember/O our/O meeting/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O blushing/O crimson/O,/O
he/O turned/O away/O immediately/O,/O and/O began/O talking/O to/O his/O brother/O./O

With/O a/O slight/O smile/O Vronsky/O went/O on/O talking/O to/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O obviously/O
without/O the/O slightest/O inclination/O to/O enter/O into/O conversation/O with/O Levin/PERSON./O
But/O Levin/PERSON,/O as/O he/O talked/O to/O his/O brother/O,/O was/O continually/O looking/O round/O at/O
Vronsky/O,/O trying/O to/O think/O of/O something/O to/O say/O to/O him/O to/O gloss/O over/O his/O
rudeness/O./O

``/OWhat/O are/O we/O waiting/O for/O now/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O Sviazhsky/LOCATION and/O
Vronsky/O./O

``/OFor/O Snetkov/O./O He/O has/O to/O refuse/O or/O to/O consent/O to/O stand/O,/O''/O answered/O
Sviazhsky/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O what/O has/O he/O done/O,/O consented/O or/O not/O?/O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O the/O point/O,/O that/O he/O's/O done/O neither/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON./O

``/OAnd/O if/O he/O refuses/O,/O who/O will/O stand/O then/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O
Vronsky/O./O

``/OWhoever/O chooses/O to/O,/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON./O

``/OShall/O you/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OCertainly/O not/O I/O,/O''/O said/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O looking/O confused/O,/O and/O turning/O an/O
alarmed/O glance/O at/O the/O malignant/O gentleman/O,/O who/O was/O standing/O beside/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OWho/O then/O?/O Nevyedovsky/PERSON?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O feeling/O he/O was/O putting/O his/O foot/O
into/O it/O./O

But/O this/O was/O worse/O still/O./O Nevyedovsky/PERSON and/O Sviazhsky/PERSON were/O the/O two/O
candidates/O./O

``/OI/O certainly/O shall/O not/O,/O under/O any/O circumstances/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O malignant/O
gentleman/O./O

This/O was/O Nevyedovsky/PERSON himself/O./O Sviazhsky/PERSON introduced/O him/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O find/O it/O exciting/O too/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O winking/O at/O
Vronsky/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O something/O like/O a/O race/O./O One/O might/O bet/O on/O it/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O is/O keenly/O exciting/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OAnd/O once/O taking/O the/O thing/O
up/O,/O one/O's/O eager/O to/O see/O it/O through/O./O It/O's/O a/O fight/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O scowling/O and/O
setting/O his/O powerful/O jaws/O./O

``/OWhat/O a/O capable/O fellow/O Sviazhsky/PERSON is/O!/O Sees/O it/O all/O so/O clearly/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O!/O''/O Vronsky/O assented/O indifferently/O./O

A/O silence/O followed/O,/O during/O which/O Vronsky/O--/Osince/O he/O had/O to/O look/O at/O
something/O--/Olooked/O at/O Levin/PERSON,/O at/O his/O feet/O,/O at/O his/O uniform/O,/O then/O at/O his/O
face/O,/O and/O noticing/O his/O gloomy/O eyes/O fixed/O upon/O him/O,/O he/O said/O,/O in/O order/O to/O
say/O something/O:/O

``/OHow/O is/O it/O that/O you/O,/O living/O constantly/O in/O the/O country/O,/O are/O not/O a/O justice/O
of/O the/O peace/O?/O You/O are/O not/O in/O the/O uniform/O of/O one/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O because/O I/O consider/O that/O the/O justice/O of/O the/O peace/O is/O a/O silly/O
institution/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON answered/O gloomily/O./O He/O had/O been/O all/O the/O time/O looking/O
for/O an/O opportunity/O to/O enter/O into/O conversation/O with/O Vronsky/O,/O so/O as/O to/O
smooth/O over/O his/O rudeness/O at/O their/O first/O meeting/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O think/O so/O,/O quite/O the/O contrary/O,/O''/O Vronsky/PERSON said/O,/O with/O quiet/O
surprise/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O a/O plaything/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON cut/O him/O short/O./O ``/OWe/O do/On't/O want/O justices/O of/O the/O
peace/O./O I/O've/O never/O had/O a/O single/O thing/O to/O do/O with/O them/O during/O eight/O years/O./O
And/O what/O I/O have/O had/O was/O decided/O wrongly/O by/O them/O./O The/O justice/O of/O the/O
peace/O is/O over/O thirty/O miles/O from/O me/O./O For/O some/O matter/O of/O two/O roubles/O I/O
should/O have/O to/O send/O a/O lawyer/O,/O who/O costs/O me/O fifteen/O./O''/O

And/O he/O related/O how/O a/O peasant/O had/O stolen/O some/O flour/O from/O the/O miller/O,/O and/O
when/O the/O miller/PERSON told/O him/O of/O it/O,/O had/O lodged/O a/O complaint/O for/O slander/O./O All/O
this/O was/O utterly/O uncalled/O for/O and/O stupid/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON felt/O it/O himself/O as/O
he/O said/O it/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O this/O is/O such/O an/O original/O fellow/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON with/O his/O
most/O soothing/O,/O almond-oil/O smile/O./O ``/OBut/O come/O along/O;/O I/O think/O they/O're/O
voting/O.../O''/O

And/O they/O separated/O./O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O understand/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O who/O had/O observed/O his/O
brother/O's/O clumsiness/O,/O ``/OI/O ca/On't/O understand/O how/O anyone/O can/O be/O so/O
absolutely/O devoid/O of/O political/O tact/O./O That/O's/O where/O we/O Russians/O are/O so/O
deficient/O./O The/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O is/O our/O opponent/O,/O and/O with/O him/O
you/O're/O _/Oami/O cochon/O_/O,/O and/O you/O beg/O him/O to/O stand/O./O Count/O Vronsky/O,/O now/O .../O
I/O'm/O not/O making/O a/O friend/O of/O him/O;/O he/O's/O asked/O me/O to/O dinner/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O not/O
going/O;/O but/O he/O's/O one/O of/O our/O side/O--/Owhy/O make/O an/O enemy/O of/O him/O?/O Then/O you/O ask/O
Nevyedovsky/PERSON if/O he/O's/O going/O to/O stand/O./O That/O's/O not/O a/O thing/O to/O do/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O do/On't/O understand/O it/O at/O all/O!/O And/O it/O's/O all/O such/O nonsense/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON
answered/O gloomily/O./O

``/OYou/O say/O it/O's/O all/O such/O nonsense/O,/O but/O as/O soon/O as/O you/O have/O anything/O to/O do/O
with/O it/O,/O you/O make/O a/O muddle/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON did/O not/O answer/O,/O and/O they/O walked/O together/O into/O the/O big/O room/O./O

The/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O,/O though/O he/O was/O vaguely/O conscious/O in/O the/O air/O
of/O some/O trap/O being/O prepared/O for/O him/O,/O and/O though/O he/O had/O not/O been/O called/O
upon/O by/O all/O to/O stand/O,/O had/O still/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O to/O stand/O./O All/O was/O
silence/O in/O the/O room/O./O The/O secretary/O announced/O in/O a/O loud/O voice/O that/O the/O
captain/O of/O the/O guards/O,/O Mihail/PERSON Stepanovitch/PERSON Snetkov/PERSON,/O would/O now/O be/O
balloted/O for/O as/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O./O

The/O district/O marshals/O walked/O carrying/O plates/O,/O on/O which/O were/O balls/O,/O from/O
their/O tables/O to/O the/O high/O table/O,/O and/O the/O election/O began/O./O

``/OPut/O it/O in/O the/O right/O side/O,/O''/O whispered/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O as/O with/O his/O
brother/O Levin/PERSON followed/O the/O marshal/O of/O his/O district/O to/O the/O table/O./O But/O
Levin/PERSON had/O forgotten/O by/O now/O the/O calculations/O that/O had/O been/O explained/O to/O
him/O,/O and/O was/O afraid/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON might/O be/O mistaken/O in/O saying/O ``/Othe/O
right/O side/O./O''/O Surely/O Snetkov/PERSON was/O the/O enemy/O./O As/O he/O went/O up/O,/O he/O held/O the/O
ball/O in/O his/O right/O hand/O,/O but/O thinking/O he/O was/O wrong/O,/O just/O at/O the/O box/O he/O
changed/O to/O the/O left/O hand/O,/O and/O undoubtedly/O put/O the/O ball/O to/O the/O left/O./O An/O
adept/O in/O the/O business/O,/O standing/O at/O the/O box/O and/O seeing/O by/O the/O mere/O action/O
of/O the/O elbow/O where/O each/O put/O his/O ball/O,/O scowled/O with/O annoyance/O./O It/O was/O no/O
good/O for/O him/O to/O use/O his/O insight/O./O

Everything/O was/O still/O,/O and/O the/O counting/O of/O the/O balls/O was/O heard/O./O Then/O a/O
single/O voice/O rose/O and/O proclaimed/O the/O numbers/O for/O and/O against/O./O The/O
marshal/O had/O been/O voted/O for/O by/O a/O considerable/O majority/O./O All/O was/O noise/O and/O
eager/O movement/O towards/O the/O doors/O./O Snetkov/PERSON came/O in/O,/O and/O the/O nobles/O
thronged/O round/O him/O,/O congratulating/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O now/O is/O it/O over/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON asked/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OIt/O's/O only/O just/O beginning/O,/O''/O Sviazhsky/PERSON said/O,/O replying/O for/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON with/O a/O smile/O./O ``/OSome/O other/O candidate/O may/O receive/O more/O votes/O
than/O the/O marshal/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON had/O quite/O forgotten/O about/O that/O./O Now/O he/O could/O only/O remember/O that/O
there/O was/O some/O sort/O of/O trickery/O in/O it/O,/O but/O he/O was/O too/O bored/O to/O think/O
what/O it/O was/O exactly/O./O He/O felt/O depressed/O,/O and/O longed/O to/O get/O out/O of/O the/O
crowd/O./O

As/O no/O one/O was/O paying/O any/O attention/O to/O him/O,/O and/O no/O one/O apparently/O needed/O
him/O,/O he/O quietly/O slipped/O away/O into/O the/O little/O room/O where/O the/O refreshments/O
were/O,/O and/O again/O had/O a/O great/O sense/O of/O comfort/O when/O he/O saw/O the/O waiters/O./O
The/O little/O old/O waiter/O pressed/O him/O to/O have/O something/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON agreed/O./O
After/O eating/O a/O cutlet/O with/O beans/O and/O talking/O to/O the/O waiters/O of/O their/O
former/O masters/O,/O Levin/PERSON,/O not/O wishing/O to/O go/O back/O to/O the/O hall/O,/O where/O it/O was/O
all/O so/O distasteful/O to/O him/O,/O proceeded/O to/O walk/O through/O the/O galleries/O./O The/O
galleries/O were/O full/O of/O fashionably/O dressed/O ladies/O,/O leaning/O over/O the/O
balustrade/O and/O trying/O not/O to/O lose/O a/O single/O word/O of/O what/O was/O being/O said/O
below/O./O With/O the/O ladies/O were/O sitting/O and/O standing/O smart/O lawyers/O,/O high/O
school/O teachers/O in/O spectacles/O,/O and/O officers/O./O Everywhere/O they/O were/O
talking/O of/O the/O election/O,/O and/O of/O how/O worried/O the/O marshal/O was/O,/O and/O how/O
splendid/O the/O discussions/O had/O been/O./O In/O one/O group/O Levin/PERSON heard/O his/O
brother/O's/O praises/O./O One/O lady/O was/O telling/O a/O lawyer/O:/O

``/OHow/O glad/O I/O am/O I/O heard/O Koznishev/PERSON!/O It/O's/O worth/O losing/O one/O's/O dinner/O./O He/O's/O
exquisite/O!/O So/O clear/O and/O distinct/O all/O of/O it/O!/O There/O's/O not/O one/O of/O you/O in/O
the/O law/O courts/O that/O speaks/O like/O that/O./O The/O only/O one/O is/O Meidel/PERSON,/O and/O he/O's/O
not/O so/O eloquent/O by/O a/O long/O way/O./O''/O

Finding/O a/O free/O place/O,/O Levin/PERSON leaned/O over/O the/O balustrade/O and/O began/O looking/O
and/O listening/O./O

All/O the/O noblemen/O were/O sitting/O railed/O off/O behind/O barriers/O according/O to/O
their/O districts/O./O In/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O room/O stood/O a/O man/O in/O a/O uniform/O,/O who/O
shouted/O in/O a/O loud/O,/O high/O voice/O:/O

``/OAs/O a/O candidate/O for/O the/O marshalship/O of/O the/O nobility/O of/O the/O province/O we/O
call/O upon/O staff-captain/O Yevgeney/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON Apuhtin/PERSON!/O''/O A/O dead/O silence/O
followed/O,/O and/O then/O a/O weak/O old/O voice/O was/O heard/O:/O ``/ODeclined/O!/O''/O

``/OWe/O call/O upon/O the/O privy/O councilor/O Pyotr/PERSON Petrovitch/PERSON Bol/PERSON,/O''/O the/O voice/O began/O
again/O./O

``/ODeclined/O!/O''/O a/O high/O boyish/O voice/O replied/O./O

Again/O it/O began/O,/O and/O again/O ``/ODeclined/O./O''/O And/O so/O it/O went/O on/O for/O about/O an/O
hour/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O with/O his/O elbows/O on/O the/O balustrade/O,/O looked/O and/O listened/O./O At/O
first/O he/O wondered/O and/O wanted/O to/O know/O what/O it/O meant/O;/O then/O feeling/O sure/O
that/O he/O could/O not/O make/O it/O out/O he/O began/O to/O be/O bored/O./O Then/O recalling/O all/O
the/O excitement/O and/O vindictiveness/O he/O had/O seen/O on/O all/O the/O faces/O,/O he/O felt/O
sad/O;/O he/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O to/O go/O,/O and/O went/O downstairs/O./O As/O he/O passed/O
through/O the/O entry/O to/O the/O galleries/O he/O met/O a/O dejected/O high/O school/O boy/O
walking/O up/O and/O down/O with/O tired-looking/O eyes/O./O On/O the/O stairs/O he/O met/O a/O
couple/O--/Oa/O lady/O running/O quickly/O on/O her/O high/O heels/O and/O the/O jaunty/O deputy/O
prosecutor/O./O

``/OI/O told/O you/O you/O were/On't/O late/O,/O''/O the/O deputy/O prosecutor/O was/O saying/O at/O the/O
moment/O when/O Levin/PERSON moved/O aside/O to/O let/O the/O lady/O pass/O./O

Levin/PERSON was/O on/O the/O stairs/O to/O the/O way/O out/O,/O and/O was/O just/O feeling/O in/O his/O
waistcoat/O pocket/O for/O the/O number/O of/O his/O overcoat/O,/O when/O the/O secretary/O
overtook/O him/O./O

``/OThis/O way/O,/O please/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON;/O they/O are/O voting/O./O''/O

The/O candidate/O who/O was/O being/O voted/O on/O was/O Nevyedovsky/PERSON,/O who/O had/O so/O stoutly/O
denied/O all/O idea/O of/O standing/O./O Levin/PERSON went/O up/O to/O the/O door/O of/O the/O room/O;/O it/O
was/O locked/O./O The/O secretary/O knocked/O,/O the/O door/O opened/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON was/O met/O by/O
two/O red-faced/O gentlemen/O,/O who/O darted/O out/O./O

``/OI/O ca/On't/O stand/O any/O more/O of/O it/O,/O''/O said/O one/O red-faced/O gentleman/O./O

After/O them/O the/O face/O of/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O was/O poked/O out/O./O His/O
face/O was/O dreadful-looking/O from/O exhaustion/O and/O dismay/O./O

``/OI/O told/O you/O not/O to/O let/O any/O one/O out/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O to/O the/O doorkeeper/O./O

``/OI/O let/O someone/O in/O,/O your/O excellency/O!/O''/O

``/OMercy/O on/O us/O!/O''/O and/O with/O a/O heavy/O sigh/O the/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O walked/O
with/O downcast/O head/O to/O the/O high/O table/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O room/O,/O his/O legs/O
staggering/O in/O his/O white/O trousers/O./O

Nevyedovsky/PERSON had/O scored/O a/O higher/O majority/O,/O as/O they/O had/O planned/O,/O and/O he/O
was/O the/O new/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O./O Many/O people/O were/O amused/O,/O many/O were/O
pleased/O and/O happy/O,/O many/O were/O in/O ecstasies/O,/O many/O were/O disgusted/O and/O
unhappy/O./O The/O former/O marshal/O of/O the/O province/O was/O in/O a/O state/O of/O despair/O,/O
which/O he/O could/O not/O conceal/O./O When/O Nevyedovsky/PERSON went/O out/O of/O the/O room/O,/O the/O
crowd/O thronged/O round/O him/O and/O followed/O him/O enthusiastically/O,/O just/O as/O they/O
had/O followed/O the/O governor/O who/O had/O opened/O the/O meetings/O,/O and/O just/O as/O they/O
had/O followed/O Snetkov/PERSON when/O he/O was/O elected/O./O



Chapter/O 31/O


The/O newly/O elected/O marshal/O and/O many/O of/O the/O successful/O party/O dined/O that/O
day/O with/O Vronsky/O./O

Vronsky/O had/O come/O to/O the/O elections/O partly/O because/O he/O was/O bored/O in/O the/O
country/O and/O wanted/O to/O show/O Anna/PERSON his/O right/O to/O independence/O,/O and/O also/O to/O
repay/O Sviazhsky/PERSON by/O his/O support/O at/O the/O election/O for/O all/O the/O trouble/O he/O
had/O taken/O for/O Vronsky/O at/O the/O district/O council/O election/O,/O but/O chiefly/O in/O
order/O strictly/O to/O perform/O all/O those/O duties/O of/O a/O nobleman/O and/O landowner/O
which/O he/O had/O taken/O upon/O himself/O./O But/O he/O had/O not/O in/O the/O least/O expected/O
that/O the/O election/O would/O so/O interest/O him/O,/O so/O keenly/O excite/O him/O,/O and/O that/O
he/O would/O be/O so/O good/O at/O this/O kind/O of/O thing/O./O He/O was/O quite/O a/O new/O man/O in/O the/O
circle/O of/O the/O nobility/O of/O the/O province/O,/O but/O his/O success/O was/O
unmistakable/O,/O and/O he/O was/O not/O wrong/O in/O supposing/O that/O he/O had/O already/O
obtained/O a/O certain/O influence/O./O This/O influence/O was/O due/O to/O his/O wealth/O and/O
reputation/O,/O the/O capital/O house/O in/O the/O town/O lent/O him/O by/O his/O old/O friend/O
Shirkov/PERSON,/O who/O had/O a/O post/O in/O the/O department/O of/O finances/O and/O was/O director/O
of/O a/O flourishing/O bank/O in/O Kashin/LOCATION;/O the/O excellent/O cook/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O brought/O
from/O the/O country/O,/O and/O his/O friendship/O with/O the/O governor/O,/O who/O was/O a/O
schoolfellow/O of/O Vronsky/O's/O--/Oa/O schoolfellow/O he/O had/O patronized/O and/O protected/O
indeed/O./O But/O what/O contributed/O more/O than/O all/O to/O his/O success/O was/O his/O
direct/O,/O equable/O manner/O with/O everyone/O,/O which/O very/O quickly/O made/O the/O
majority/O of/O the/O noblemen/O reverse/O the/O current/O opinion/O of/O his/O supposed/O
haughtiness/O./O He/O was/O himself/O conscious/O that/O,/O except/O that/O whimsical/O
gentleman/O married/O to/O Kitty/PERSON Shtcherbatskaya/PERSON,/O who/O had/O _/Oà/O propos/O de/O bottes/O_/O
poured/O out/O a/O stream/O of/O irrelevant/O absurdities/O with/O such/O spiteful/O fury/O,/O
every/O nobleman/O with/O whom/O he/O had/O made/O acquaintance/O had/O become/O his/O
adherent/O./O He/O saw/O clearly/O,/O and/O other/O people/O recognized/O it/O,/O too/O,/O that/O he/O
had/O done/O a/O great/O deal/O to/O secure/O the/O success/O of/O Nevyedovsky/O./O And/O now/O at/O
his/O own/O table/O,/O celebrating/O Nevyedovsky/PERSON's/O election/O,/O he/O was/O experiencing/O
an/O agreeable/O sense/O of/O triumph/O over/O the/O success/O of/O his/O candidate/O./O The/O
election/O itself/O had/O so/O fascinated/O him/O that/O,/O if/O he/O could/O succeed/O in/O
getting/O married/O during/O the/O next/O three/O years/O,/O he/O began/O to/O think/O of/O
standing/O himself/O--/Omuch/O as/O after/O winning/O a/O race/O ridden/O by/O a/O jockey/O,/O he/O had/O
longed/O to/O ride/O a/O race/O himself/O./O

Today/O he/O was/O celebrating/O the/O success/O of/O his/O jockey/O./O Vronsky/O sat/O at/O the/O
head/O of/O the/O table/O,/O on/O his/O right/O hand/O sat/O the/O young/O governor/O,/O a/O general/O
of/O high/O rank/O./O To/O all/O the/O rest/O he/O was/O the/O chief/O man/O in/O the/O province/O,/O who/O
had/O solemnly/O opened/O the/O elections/O with/O his/O speech/O,/O and/O aroused/O a/O feeling/O
of/O respect/O and/O even/O of/O awe/O in/O many/O people/O,/O as/O Vronsky/O saw/O;/O to/O Vronsky/O he/O
was/O little/O Katka/PERSON Maslov/PERSON--/Othat/O had/O been/O his/O nickname/O in/O the/O Pages/O'/O
Corps/ORGANIZATION--/Owhom/O he/O felt/O to/O be/O shy/O and/O tried/O to/O _/Omettre/O à/O son/O aise/O_/O./O On/O the/O
left/O hand/O sat/O Nevyedovsky/PERSON with/O his/O youthful/O,/O stubborn/O,/O and/O malignant/O
face/O./O With/O him/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O simple/O and/O deferential/O./O

Sviazhsky/PERSON took/O his/O failure/O very/O light-heartedly/O./O It/O was/O indeed/O no/O
failure/O in/O his/O eyes/O,/O as/O he/O said/O himself/O,/O turning/O,/O glass/O in/O hand/O,/O to/O
Nevyedovsky/LOCATION;/O they/O could/O not/O have/O found/O a/O better/O representative/O of/O the/O
new/O movement/O,/O which/O the/O nobility/O ought/O to/O follow/O./O And/O so/O every/O honest/O
person/O,/O as/O he/O said/O,/O was/O on/O the/O side/O of/O today/O's/O success/O and/O was/O rejoicing/O
over/O it/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O glad/O,/O too/O,/O that/O he/O was/O having/O a/O good/O time/O,/O and/O
that/O everyone/O was/O pleased/O./O The/O episode/O of/O the/O elections/O served/O as/O a/O good/O
occasion/O for/O a/O capital/O dinner/O./O Sviazhsky/PERSON comically/O imitated/O the/O tearful/O
discourse/O of/O the/O marshal/O,/O and/O observed/O,/O addressing/O Nevyedovsky/PERSON,/O that/O his/O
excellency/O would/O have/O to/O select/O another/O more/O complicated/O method/O of/O
auditing/O the/O accounts/O than/O tears/O./O Another/O nobleman/O jocosely/O described/O
how/O footmen/O in/O stockings/O had/O been/O ordered/O for/O the/O marshal/O's/O ball/O,/O and/O
how/O now/O they/O would/O have/O to/O be/O sent/O back/O unless/O the/O new/O marshal/O would/O
give/O a/O ball/O with/O footmen/O in/O stockings/O./O

Continually/O during/O dinner/O they/O said/O of/O Nevyedovsky/PERSON:/O ``/Oour/O marshal/O,/O''/O and/O
``/Oyour/O excellency/O./O''/O

This/O was/O said/O with/O the/O same/O pleasure/O with/O which/O a/O bride/O is/O called/O
``/OMadame/O''/O and/O her/O husband/O's/O name/O./O Nevyedovsky/PERSON affected/O to/O be/O not/O merely/O
indifferent/O but/O scornful/O of/O this/O appellation/O,/O but/O it/O was/O obvious/O that/O he/O
was/O highly/O delighted/O,/O and/O had/O to/O keep/O a/O curb/O on/O himself/O not/O to/O betray/O
the/O triumph/O which/O was/O unsuitable/O to/O their/O new/O liberal/O tone/O./O

After/O dinner/O several/O telegrams/O were/O sent/O to/O people/O interested/O in/O the/O
result/O of/O the/O election/O./O And/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O who/O was/O in/O high/O good/O
humor/O,/O sent/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON a/O telegram/O:/O ``/ONevyedovsky/O elected/O by/O
twenty/O votes/O./O Congratulations/O./O Tell/O people/O./O''/O He/O dictated/O it/O aloud/O,/O
saying/O:/O ``/OWe/O must/O let/O them/O share/O our/O rejoicing/O./O''/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O
getting/O the/O message/O,/O simply/O sighed/O over/O the/O rouble/O wasted/O on/O it/O,/O and/O
understood/O that/O it/O was/O an/O after-dinner/O affair/O./O She/O knew/O Stiva/PERSON had/O a/O
weakness/O after/O dining/O for/O _/Ofaire/O jouer/O le/O télégraphe/O./O_/O

Everything/O,/O together/O with/O the/O excellent/O dinner/O and/O the/O wine/O,/O not/O from/O
Russian/O merchants/O,/O but/O imported/O direct/O from/O abroad/O,/O was/O extremely/O
dignified/O,/O simple/O,/O and/O enjoyable/O./O The/O party/O--/Osome/O twenty/O--/Ohad/O been/O
selected/O by/O Sviazhsky/PERSON from/O among/O the/O more/O active/O new/O liberals/O,/O all/O of/O
the/O same/O way/O of/O thinking/O,/O who/O were/O at/O the/O same/O time/O clever/O and/O well/O
bred/O./O They/O drank/O,/O also/O half/O in/O jest/O,/O to/O the/O health/O of/O the/O new/O marshal/O of/O
the/O province/O,/O of/O the/O governor/O,/O of/O the/O bank/O director/O,/O and/O of/O ``/Oour/O amiable/O
host/O./O''/O

Vronsky/O was/O satisfied/O./O He/O had/O never/O expected/O to/O find/O so/O pleasant/O a/O tone/O
in/O the/O provinces/O./O

Towards/O the/O end/O of/O dinner/O it/O was/O still/O more/O lively/O./O The/O governor/O asked/O
Vronsky/O to/O come/O to/O a/O concert/O for/O the/O benefit/O of/O the/O Servians/O which/O his/O
wife/O,/O who/O was/O anxious/O to/O make/O his/O acquaintance/O,/O had/O been/O getting/O up/O./O

``/OThere/O'll/O be/O a/O ball/O,/O and/O you/O'll/O see/O the/O belle/O of/O the/O province/O./O Worth/O
seeing/O,/O really/O./O''/O

``/ONot/O in/O my/O line/O,/O''/O Vronsky/O answered/O./O He/O liked/O that/O English/O phrase/O./O But/O he/O
smiled/O,/O and/O promised/O to/O come/O./O

Before/O they/O rose/O from/O the/O table/O,/O when/O all/O of/O them/O were/O smoking/O,/O
Vronsky/O's/O valet/O went/O up/O to/O him/O with/O a/O letter/O on/O a/O tray/O./O

``/OFrom/O Vozdvizhenskoe/O by/O special/O messenger/O,/O''/O he/O said/O with/O a/O significant/O
expression/O./O

``/OAstonishing/O!/O how/O like/O he/O is/O to/O the/O deputy/O prosecutor/O Sventitsky/PERSON,/O''/O said/O
one/O of/O the/O guests/O in/O French/O of/O the/O valet/O,/O while/O Vronsky/O,/O frowning/O,/O read/O
the/O letter/O./O

The/O letter/O was/O from/O Anna/PERSON./O Before/O he/O read/O the/O letter/O,/O he/O knew/O its/O
contents/O./O Expecting/O the/O elections/O to/O be/O over/O in/O five/O days/O,/O he/O had/O
promised/O to/O be/O back/O on/O Friday/O./O Today/O was/O Saturday/O,/O and/O he/O knew/O that/O the/O
letter/O contained/O reproaches/O for/O not/O being/O back/O at/O the/O time/O fixed/O./O The/O
letter/O he/O had/O sent/O the/O previous/O evening/O had/O probably/O not/O reached/O her/O
yet/O./O

The/O letter/O was/O what/O he/O had/O expected/O,/O but/O the/O form/O of/O it/O was/O unexpected/O,/O
and/O particularly/O disagreeable/O to/O him/O./O ``/OAnnie/PERSON is/O very/O ill/O,/O the/O doctor/O
says/O it/O may/O be/O inflammation/O./O I/O am/O losing/O my/O head/O all/O alone/O./O Princess/O
Varvara/PERSON is/O no/O help/O,/O but/O a/O hindrance/O./O I/O expected/O you/O the/O day/O before/O
yesterday/O,/O and/O yesterday/O,/O and/O now/O I/O am/O sending/O to/O find/O out/O where/O you/O are/O
and/O what/O you/O are/O doing/O./O I/O wanted/O to/O come/O myself/O,/O but/O thought/O better/O of/O
it/O,/O knowing/O you/O would/O dislike/O it/O./O Send/O some/O answer/O,/O that/O I/O may/O know/O what/O
to/O do/O./O''/O

The/O child/O ill/O,/O yet/O she/O had/O thought/O of/O coming/O herself/O./O Their/O daughter/O
ill/O,/O and/O this/O hostile/O tone/O./O

The/O innocent/O festivities/O over/O the/O election/O,/O and/O this/O gloomy/O,/O burdensome/O
love/O to/O which/O he/O had/O to/O return/O struck/O Vronsky/O by/O their/O contrast/O./O But/O he/O
had/O to/O go/O,/O and/O by/O the/O first/O train/O that/O night/O he/O set/O off/O home/O./O



Chapter/O 32/O
