Before/O Vronsky/O's/O departure/O for/O the/O elections/O,/O Anna/PERSON had/O reflected/O that/O
the/O scenes/O constantly/O repeated/O between/O them/O each/O time/O he/O left/O home/O,/O
might/O only/O make/O him/O cold/O to/O her/O instead/O of/O attaching/O him/O to/O her/O,/O and/O
resolved/O to/O do/O all/O she/O could/O to/O control/O herself/O so/O as/O to/O bear/O the/O
parting/O with/O composure/O./O But/O the/O cold/O,/O severe/O glance/O with/O which/O he/O had/O
looked/O at/O her/O when/O he/O came/O to/O tell/O her/O he/O was/O going/O had/O wounded/O her/O,/O and/O
before/O he/O had/O started/O her/O peace/O of/O mind/O was/O destroyed/O./O

In/O solitude/O afterwards/O,/O thinking/O over/O that/O glance/O which/O had/O expressed/O
his/O right/O to/O freedom/O,/O she/O came/O,/O as/O she/O always/O did/O,/O to/O the/O same/O point/O--/Othe/O
sense/O of/O her/O own/O humiliation/O./O ``/OHe/O has/O the/O right/O to/O go/O away/O when/O and/O
where/O he/O chooses/O./O Not/O simply/O to/O go/O away/O,/O but/O to/O leave/O me/O./O He/O has/O every/O
right/O,/O and/O I/O have/O none/O./O But/O knowing/O that/O,/O he/O ought/O not/O to/O do/O it/O./O What/O
has/O he/O done/O,/O though/O?/O.../O He/O looked/O at/O me/O with/O a/O cold/O,/O severe/O expression/O./O
Of/O course/O that/O is/O something/O indefinable/O,/O impalpable/O,/O but/O it/O has/O never/O
been/O so/O before/O,/O and/O that/O glance/O means/O a/O great/O deal/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O./O ``/OThat/O
glance/O shows/O the/O beginning/O of/O indifference/O./O''/O

And/O though/O she/O felt/O sure/O that/O a/O coldness/O was/O beginning/O,/O there/O was/O
nothing/O she/O could/O do/O,/O she/O could/O not/O in/O any/O way/O alter/O her/O relations/O to/O
him/O./O Just/O as/O before/O,/O only/O by/O love/O and/O by/O charm/O could/O she/O keep/O him/O./O And/O
so/O,/O just/O as/O before/O,/O only/O by/O occupation/O in/O the/O day/O,/O by/O morphine/O at/O night/O,/O
could/O she/O stifle/O the/O fearful/O thought/O of/O what/O would/O be/O if/O he/O ceased/O to/O
love/O her/O./O It/O is/O true/O there/O was/O still/O one/O means/O;/O not/O to/O keep/O him/O--/Ofor/O that/O
she/O wanted/O nothing/O more/O than/O his/O love/O--/Obut/O to/O be/O nearer/O to/O him/O,/O to/O be/O in/O
such/O a/O position/O that/O he/O would/O not/O leave/O her/O./O That/O means/O was/O divorce/O and/O
marriage/O./O And/O she/O began/O to/O long/O for/O that/O,/O and/O made/O up/O her/O mind/O to/O agree/O
to/O it/O the/O first/O time/O he/O or/O Stiva/O approached/O her/O on/O the/O subject/O./O

Absorbed/O in/O such/O thoughts/O,/O she/O passed/O five/O days/O without/O him/O,/O the/O five/O
days/O that/O he/O was/O to/O be/O at/O the/O elections/O./O

Walks/O,/O conversation/O with/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON,/O visits/O to/O the/O hospital/O,/O and/O,/O
most/O of/O all/O,/O reading/O--/Oreading/O of/O one/O book/O after/O another/O--/Ofilled/O up/O her/O
time/O./O But/O on/O the/O sixth/O day/O,/O when/O the/O coachman/O came/O back/O without/O him/O,/O she/O
felt/O that/O now/O she/O was/O utterly/O incapable/O of/O stifling/O the/O thought/O of/O him/O
and/O of/O what/O he/O was/O doing/O there/O,/O just/O at/O that/O time/O her/O little/O girl/O was/O
taken/O ill/O./O Anna/PERSON began/O to/O look/O after/O her/O,/O but/O even/O that/O did/O not/O distract/O
her/O mind/O,/O especially/O as/O the/O illness/O was/O not/O serious/O./O However/O hard/O she/O
tried/O,/O she/O could/O not/O love/O this/O little/O child/O,/O and/O to/O feign/O love/O was/O
beyond/O her/O powers/O./O Towards/O the/O evening/O of/O that/O day/O,/O still/O alone/O,/O Anna/PERSON
was/O in/O such/O a/O panic/O about/O him/O that/O she/O decided/O to/O start/O for/O the/O town/O,/O
but/O on/O second/O thoughts/O wrote/O him/O the/O contradictory/O letter/O that/O Vronsky/O
received/O,/O and/O without/O reading/O it/O through/O,/O sent/O it/O off/O by/O a/O special/O
messenger/O./O The/O next/O morning/O she/O received/O his/O letter/O and/O regretted/O her/O
own/O./O She/O dreaded/O a/O repetition/O of/O the/O severe/O look/O he/O had/O flung/O at/O her/O at/O
parting/O,/O especially/O when/O he/O knew/O that/O the/O baby/O was/O not/O dangerously/O ill/O./O
But/O still/O she/O was/O glad/O she/O had/O written/O to/O him/O./O At/O this/O moment/O Anna/PERSON was/O
positively/O admitting/O to/O herself/O that/O she/O was/O a/O burden/O to/O him/O,/O that/O he/O
would/O relinquish/O his/O freedom/O regretfully/O to/O return/O to/O her/O,/O and/O in/O spite/O
of/O that/O she/O was/O glad/O he/O was/O coming/O./O Let/O him/O weary/O of/O her/O,/O but/O he/O would/O
be/O here/O with/O her/O,/O so/O that/O she/O would/O see/O him/O,/O would/O know/O of/O every/O action/O
he/O took/O./O

She/O was/O sitting/O in/O the/O drawing/O room/O near/O a/O lamp/O,/O with/O a/O new/O volume/O of/O
Taine/PERSON,/O and/O as/O she/O read/O,/O listening/O to/O the/O sound/O of/O the/O wind/O outside/O,/O and/O
every/O minute/O expecting/O the/O carriage/O to/O arrive/O./O Several/O times/O she/O had/O
fancied/O she/O heard/O the/O sound/O of/O wheels/O,/O but/O she/O had/O been/O mistaken/O./O At/O
last/O she/O heard/O not/O the/O sound/O of/O wheels/O,/O but/O the/O coachman/O's/O shout/O and/O the/O
dull/O rumble/O in/O the/O covered/O entry/O./O Even/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON,/O playing/O
patience/O,/O confirmed/O this/O,/O and/O Anna/PERSON,/O flushing/O hotly/O,/O got/O up/O;/O but/O instead/O
of/O going/O down/O,/O as/O she/O had/O done/O twice/O before/O,/O she/O stood/O still/O./O She/O
suddenly/O felt/O ashamed/O of/O her/O duplicity/O,/O but/O even/O more/O she/O dreaded/O how/O he/O
might/O meet/O her/O./O All/O feeling/O of/O wounded/O pride/O had/O passed/O now/O;/O she/O was/O
only/O afraid/O of/O the/O expression/O of/O his/O displeasure/O./O She/O remembered/O that/O
her/O child/O had/O been/O perfectly/O well/O again/O for/O the/O last/O two/O days/O./O She/O felt/O
positively/O vexed/O with/O her/O for/O getting/O better/O from/O the/O very/O moment/O her/O
letter/O was/O sent/O off/O./O Then/O she/O thought/O of/O him/O,/O that/O he/O was/O here/O,/O all/O of/O
him/O,/O with/O his/O hands/O,/O his/O eyes/O./O She/O heard/O his/O voice/O./O And/O forgetting/O
everything/O,/O she/O ran/O joyfully/O to/O meet/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O is/O Annie/PERSON?/O''/O he/O said/O timidly/O from/O below/O,/O looking/O up/O to/O Anna/PERSON as/O
she/O ran/O down/O to/O him/O./O

He/O was/O sitting/O on/O a/O chair/O,/O and/O a/O footman/O was/O pulling/O off/O his/O warm/O
over-boot/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O she/O is/O better/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O you/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O shaking/O himself/O./O

She/O took/O his/O hand/O in/O both/O of/O hers/O,/O and/O drew/O it/O to/O her/O waist/O,/O never/O
taking/O her/O eyes/O off/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O'm/O glad/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O coldly/O scanning/O her/O,/O her/O hair/O,/O her/O dress/O,/O
which/O he/O knew/O she/O had/O put/O on/O for/O him/O./O All/O was/O charming/O,/O but/O how/O many/O
times/O it/O had/O charmed/O him/O!/O And/O the/O stern/O,/O stony/O expression/O that/O she/O so/O
dreaded/O settled/O upon/O his/O face/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O'm/O glad/O./O And/O are/O you/O well/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O wiping/O his/O damp/O beard/O with/O
his/O handkerchief/O and/O kissing/O her/O hand/O./O

``/ONever/O mind/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O ``/Oonly/O let/O him/O be/O here/O,/O and/O so/O long/O as/O he/O's/O
here/O he/O can/Onot/O,/O he/O dare/O not/O,/O cease/O to/O love/O me/O./O''/O

The/O evening/O was/O spent/O happily/O and/O gaily/O in/O the/O presence/O of/O Princess/O
Varvara/PERSON,/O who/O complained/O to/O him/O that/O Anna/PERSON had/O been/O taking/O morphine/O in/O his/O
absence/O./O

``/OWhat/O am/O I/O to/O do/O?/O I/O could/On't/O sleep/O.../O./O My/O thoughts/O prevented/O me/O./O When/O
he/O's/O here/O I/O never/O take/O it/O--/Ohardly/O ever/O./O''/O

He/O told/O her/O about/O the/O election/O,/O and/O Anna/PERSON knew/O how/O by/O adroit/O questions/O to/O
bring/O him/O to/O what/O gave/O him/O most/O pleasure/O--/Ohis/O own/O success/O./O She/O told/O him/O
of/O everything/O that/O interested/O him/O at/O home/O;/O and/O all/O that/O she/O told/O him/O was/O
of/O the/O most/O cheerful/O description/O./O

But/O late/O in/O the/O evening/O,/O when/O they/O were/O alone/O,/O Anna/PERSON,/O seeing/O that/O she/O had/O
regained/O complete/O possession/O of/O him/O,/O wanted/O to/O erase/O the/O painful/O
impression/O of/O the/O glance/O he/O had/O given/O her/O for/O her/O letter/O./O She/O said/O:/O

``/OTell/O me/O frankly/O,/O you/O were/O vexed/O at/O getting/O my/O letter/O,/O and/O you/O did/On't/O
believe/O me/O?/O''/O

As/O soon/O as/O she/O had/O said/O it/O,/O she/O felt/O that/O however/O warm/O his/O feelings/O were/O
to/O her/O,/O he/O had/O not/O forgiven/O her/O for/O that/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/Othe/O letter/O was/O so/O strange/O./O First/O,/O Annie/PERSON ill/O,/O and/O then/O
you/O thought/O of/O coming/O yourself/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O was/O all/O the/O truth/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O do/On't/O doubt/O it/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O do/O doubt/O it/O./O You/O are/O vexed/O,/O I/O see/O./O''/O

``/ONot/O for/O one/O moment/O./O I/O'm/O only/O vexed/O,/O that/O's/O true/O,/O that/O you/O seem/O somehow/O
unwilling/O to/O admit/O that/O there/O are/O duties/O.../O''/O

``/OThe/O duty/O of/O going/O to/O a/O concert/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O we/O wo/On't/O talk/O about/O it/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OWhy/O not/O talk/O about/O it/O?/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OI/O only/O meant/O to/O say/O that/O matters/O of/O real/O importance/O may/O turn/O up/O./O Now/O,/O
for/O instance/O,/O I/O shall/O have/O to/O go/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION to/O arrange/O about/O the/O
house/O.../O./O Oh/O,/O Anna/PERSON,/O why/O are/O you/O so/O irritable/O?/O Do/On't/O you/O know/O that/O I/O
ca/On't/O live/O without/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OIf/O so/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O her/O voice/O suddenly/O changing/O,/O ``/Oit/O means/O that/O you/O are/O
sick/O of/O this/O life/O.../O./O Yes/O,/O you/O will/O come/O for/O a/O day/O and/O go/O away/O,/O as/O men/O
do/O.../O''/O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O that/O's/O cruel/O./O I/O am/O ready/O to/O give/O up/O my/O whole/O life/O./O''/O

But/O she/O did/O not/O hear/O him/O./O

``/OIf/O you/O go/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O I/O will/O go/O too/O./O I/O will/O not/O stay/O here/O./O Either/O we/O
must/O separate/O or/O else/O live/O together/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O you/O know/O,/O that/O's/O my/O one/O desire/O./O But/O for/O that/O.../O''/O

``/OWe/O must/O get/O a/O divorce/O./O I/O will/O write/O to/O him/O./O I/O see/O I/O can/Onot/O go/O on/O like/O
this/O.../O./O But/O I/O will/O come/O with/O you/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION./O''/O

``/OYou/O talk/O as/O if/O you/O were/O threatening/O me/O./O But/O I/O desire/O nothing/O so/O much/O as/O
never/O to/O be/O parted/O from/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O smiling/O./O

But/O as/O he/O said/O these/O words/O there/O gleamed/O in/O his/O eyes/O not/O merely/O a/O cold/O
look/O,/O but/O the/O vindictive/O look/O of/O a/O man/O persecuted/O and/O made/O cruel/O./O

She/O saw/O the/O look/O and/O correctly/O divined/O its/O meaning/O./O

``/OIf/O so/O,/O it/O's/O a/O calamity/O!/O''/O that/O glance/O told/O her/O./O It/O was/O a/O moment/O's/O
impression/O,/O but/O she/O never/O forgot/O it/O./O

Anna/PERSON wrote/O to/O her/O husband/O asking/O him/O about/O a/O divorce/O,/O and/O towards/O the/O
end/O of/O November/O,/O taking/O leave/O of/O Princess/O Varvara/PERSON,/O who/O wanted/O to/O go/O to/O
Petersburg/LOCATION,/O she/O went/O with/O Vronsky/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION./O Expecting/O every/O day/O an/O
answer/O from/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O and/O after/O that/O the/O divorce/O,/O they/O now/O
established/O themselves/O together/O like/O married/O people/O./O




PART/O SEVEN/O



Chapter/O 1/O


The/O Levins/O had/O been/O three/O months/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION./O The/O date/O had/O long/O passed/O on/O
which/O,/O according/O to/O the/O most/O trustworthy/O calculations/O of/O people/O learned/O
in/O such/O matters/O,/O Kitty/PERSON should/O have/O been/O confined/O./O But/O she/O was/O still/O
about/O,/O and/O there/O was/O nothing/O to/O show/O that/O her/O time/O was/O any/O nearer/O than/O
two/O months/O ago/O./O The/O doctor/O,/O the/O monthly/O nurse/O,/O and/O Dolly/PERSON and/O her/O mother/O,/O
and/O most/O of/O all/O Levin/PERSON,/O who/O could/O not/O think/O of/O the/O approaching/O event/O
without/O terror/O,/O began/O to/O be/O impatient/O and/O uneasy/O./O Kitty/PERSON was/O the/O only/O
person/O who/O felt/O perfectly/O calm/O and/O happy/O./O

She/O was/O distinctly/O conscious/O now/O of/O the/O birth/O of/O a/O new/O feeling/O of/O love/O
for/O the/O future/O child/O,/O for/O her/O to/O some/O extent/O actually/O existing/O already/O,/O
and/O she/O brooded/O blissfully/O over/O this/O feeling/O./O He/O was/O not/O by/O now/O
altogether/O a/O part/O of/O herself/O,/O but/O sometimes/O lived/O his/O own/O life/O
independently/O of/O her/O./O Often/O this/O separate/O being/O gave/O her/O pain/O,/O but/O at/O
the/O same/O time/O she/O wanted/O to/O laugh/O with/O a/O strange/O new/O joy/O./O

All/O the/O people/O she/O loved/O were/O with/O her/O,/O and/O all/O were/O so/O good/O to/O her/O,/O so/O
attentively/O caring/O for/O her/O,/O so/O entirely/O pleasant/O was/O everything/O
presented/O to/O her/O,/O that/O if/O she/O had/O not/O known/O and/O felt/O that/O it/O must/O all/O
soon/O be/O over/O,/O she/O could/O not/O have/O wished/O for/O a/O better/O and/O pleasanter/O
life/O./O The/O only/O thing/O that/O spoiled/O the/O charm/O of/O this/O manner/O of/O life/O was/O
that/O her/O husband/O was/O not/O here/O as/O she/O loved/O him/O to/O be/O,/O and/O as/O he/O was/O in/O
the/O country/O./O

She/O liked/O his/O serene/O,/O friendly/O,/O and/O hospitable/O manner/O in/O the/O country/O./O In/O
the/O town/O he/O seemed/O continually/O uneasy/O and/O on/O his/O guard/O,/O as/O though/O he/O
were/O afraid/O someone/O would/O be/O rude/O to/O him/O,/O and/O still/O more/O to/O her/O./O At/O home/O
in/O the/O country/O,/O knowing/O himself/O distinctly/O to/O be/O in/O his/O right/O place/O,/O he/O
was/O never/O in/O haste/O to/O be/O off/O elsewhere/O./O He/O was/O never/O unoccupied/O./O Here/O in/O
town/O he/O was/O in/O a/O continual/O hurry/O,/O as/O though/O afraid/O of/O missing/O something/O,/O
and/O yet/O he/O had/O nothing/O to/O do/O./O And/O she/O felt/O sorry/O for/O him/O./O To/O others/O,/O she/O
knew/O,/O he/O did/O not/O appear/O an/O object/O of/O pity/O./O On/O the/O contrary/O,/O when/O Kitty/PERSON
looked/O at/O him/O in/O society/O,/O as/O one/O sometimes/O looks/O at/O those/O one/O loves/O,/O
trying/O to/O see/O him/O as/O if/O he/O were/O a/O stranger/O,/O so/O as/O to/O catch/O the/O
impression/O he/O must/O make/O on/O others/O,/O she/O saw/O with/O a/O panic/O even/O of/O jealous/O
fear/O that/O he/O was/O far/O indeed/O from/O being/O a/O pitiable/O figure/O,/O that/O he/O was/O
very/O attractive/O with/O his/O fine/O breeding/O,/O his/O rather/O old-fashioned/O,/O
reserved/O courtesy/O with/O women/O,/O his/O powerful/O figure/O,/O and/O striking/O,/O as/O she/O
thought/O,/O and/O expressive/O face/O./O But/O she/O saw/O him/O not/O from/O without/O,/O but/O from/O
within/O;/O she/O saw/O that/O here/O he/O was/O not/O himself/O;/O that/O was/O the/O only/O way/O she/O
could/O define/O his/O condition/O to/O herself/O./O Sometimes/O she/O inwardly/O reproached/O
him/O for/O his/O inability/O to/O live/O in/O the/O town/O;/O sometimes/O she/O recognized/O that/O
it/O was/O really/O hard/O for/O him/O to/O order/O his/O life/O here/O so/O that/O he/O could/O be/O
satisfied/O with/O it/O./O

What/O had/O he/O to/O do/O,/O indeed/O?/O He/O did/O not/O care/O for/O cards/O;/O he/O did/O not/O go/O to/O a/O
club/O./O Spending/O the/O time/O with/O jovial/O gentlemen/O of/O Oblonsky/PERSON's/O type/O--/Oshe/O
knew/O now/O what/O that/O meant/O .../O it/O meant/O drinking/O and/O going/O somewhere/O after/O
drinking/O./O She/O could/O not/O think/O without/O horror/O of/O where/O men/O went/O on/O such/O
occasions/O./O Was/O he/O to/O go/O into/O society/O?/O But/O she/O knew/O he/O could/O only/O find/O
satisfaction/O in/O that/O if/O he/O took/O pleasure/O in/O the/O society/O of/O young/O women/O,/O
and/O that/O she/O could/O not/O wish/O for/O./O Should/O he/O stay/O at/O home/O with/O her/O,/O her/O
mother/O and/O her/O sisters/O?/O But/O much/O as/O she/O liked/O and/O enjoyed/O their/O
conversations/O forever/O on/O the/O same/O subjects/O--/O``/OAline-Nadine/O,/O''/O as/O the/O old/O
prince/O called/O the/O sisters/O'/O talks/O--/Oshe/O knew/O it/O must/O bore/O him/O./O What/O was/O
there/O left/O for/O him/O to/O do/O?/O To/O go/O on/O writing/O at/O his/O book/O he/O had/O indeed/O
attempted/O,/O and/O at/O first/O he/O used/O to/O go/O to/O the/O library/O and/O make/O extracts/O
and/O look/O up/O references/O for/O his/O book/O./O But/O,/O as/O he/O told/O her/O,/O the/O more/O he/O
did/O nothing/O,/O the/O less/O time/O he/O had/O to/O do/O anything/O./O And/O besides/O,/O he/O
complained/O that/O he/O had/O talked/O too/O much/O about/O his/O book/O here/O,/O and/O that/O
consequently/O all/O his/O ideas/O about/O it/O were/O muddled/O and/O had/O lost/O their/O
interest/O for/O him/O./O

One/O advantage/O in/O this/O town/O life/O was/O that/O quarrels/O hardly/O ever/O happened/O
between/O them/O here/O in/O town/O./O Whether/O it/O was/O that/O their/O conditions/O were/O
different/O,/O or/O that/O they/O had/O both/O become/O more/O careful/O and/O sensible/O in/O
that/O respect/O,/O they/O had/O no/O quarrels/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION from/O jealousy/O,/O which/O they/O
had/O so/O dreaded/O when/O they/O moved/O from/O the/O country/O./O

One/O event/O,/O an/O event/O of/O great/O importance/O to/O both/O from/O that/O point/O of/O view/O,/O
did/O indeed/O happen/O--/Othat/O was/O Kitty/PERSON's/O meeting/O with/O Vronsky/O./O

The/O old/O Princess/O Marya/PERSON Borissovna/PERSON,/O Kitty/PERSON's/O godmother/O,/O who/O had/O always/O
been/O very/O fond/O of/O her/O,/O had/O insisted/O on/O seeing/O her/O./O Kitty/PERSON,/O though/O she/O did/O
not/O go/O into/O society/O at/O all/O on/O account/O of/O her/O condition/O,/O went/O with/O her/O
father/O to/O see/O the/O venerable/O old/O lady/O,/O and/O there/O met/O Vronsky/O./O

The/O only/O thing/O Kitty/PERSON could/O reproach/O herself/O for/O at/O this/O meeting/O was/O that/O
at/O the/O instant/O when/O she/O recognized/O in/O his/O civilian/O dress/O the/O features/O
once/O so/O familiar/O to/O her/O,/O her/O breath/O failed/O her/O,/O the/O blood/O rushed/O to/O her/O
heart/O,/O and/O a/O vivid/O blush/O--/Oshe/O felt/O it/O--/Ooverspread/O her/O face/O./O But/O this/O
lasted/O only/O a/O few/O seconds/O./O Before/O her/O father/O,/O who/O purposely/O began/O
talking/O in/O a/O loud/O voice/O to/O Vronsky/O,/O had/O finished/O,/O she/O was/O perfectly/O
ready/O to/O look/O at/O Vronsky/O,/O to/O speak/O to/O him/O,/O if/O necessary/O,/O exactly/O as/O she/O
spoke/O to/O Princess/O Marya/PERSON Borissovna/PERSON,/O and/O more/O than/O that/O,/O to/O do/O so/O in/O such/O
a/O way/O that/O everything/O to/O the/O faintest/O intonation/O and/O smile/O would/O have/O
been/O approved/O by/O her/O husband/O,/O whose/O unseen/O presence/O she/O seemed/O to/O feel/O
about/O her/O at/O that/O instant/O./O

She/O said/O a/O few/O words/O to/O him/O,/O even/O smiled/O serenely/O at/O his/O joke/O about/O the/O
elections/O,/O which/O he/O called/O ``/Oour/O parliament/O./O''/O -LRB-/OShe/O had/O to/O smile/O to/O show/O
she/O saw/O the/O joke/O./O-RRB-/O But/O she/O turned/O away/O immediately/O to/O Princess/O Marya/PERSON
Borissovna/PERSON,/O and/O did/O not/O once/O glance/O at/O him/O till/O he/O got/O up/O to/O go/O;/O then/O
she/O looked/O at/O him/O,/O but/O evidently/O only/O because/O it/O would/O be/O uncivil/O not/O to/O
look/O at/O a/O man/O when/O he/O is/O saying/O good-bye/O./O

She/O was/O grateful/O to/O her/O father/O for/O saying/O nothing/O to/O her/O about/O their/O
meeting/O Vronsky/O,/O but/O she/O saw/O by/O his/O special/O warmth/O to/O her/O after/O the/O
visit/O during/O their/O usual/O walk/O that/O he/O was/O pleased/O with/O her/O./O She/O was/O
pleased/O with/O herself/O./O She/O had/O not/O expected/O she/O would/O have/O had/O the/O power/O,/O
while/O keeping/O somewhere/O in/O the/O bottom/O of/O her/O heart/O all/O the/O memories/O of/O
her/O old/O feeling/O for/O Vronsky/O,/O not/O only/O to/O seem/O but/O to/O be/O perfectly/O
indifferent/O and/O composed/O with/O him/O./O

Levin/PERSON flushed/O a/O great/O deal/O more/O than/O she/O when/O she/O told/O him/O she/O had/O met/O
Vronsky/O at/O Princess/O Marya/PERSON Borissovna/PERSON's/O./O It/O was/O very/O hard/O for/O her/O to/O tell/O
him/O this/O,/O but/O still/O harder/O to/O go/O on/O speaking/O of/O the/O details/O of/O the/O
meeting/O,/O as/O he/O did/O not/O question/O her/O,/O but/O simply/O gazed/O at/O her/O with/O a/O
frown/O./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O sorry/O you/O were/On't/O there/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/ONot/O that/O you/O were/On't/O in/O
the/O room/O .../O I/O could/On't/O have/O been/O so/O natural/O in/O your/O presence/O .../O I/O am/O
blushing/O now/O much/O more/O,/O much/O,/O much/O more/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O blushing/O till/O the/O
tears/O came/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O ``/OBut/O that/O you/O could/On't/O see/O through/O a/O crack/O./O''/O

The/O truthful/O eyes/O told/O Levin/PERSON that/O she/O was/O satisfied/O with/O herself/O,/O and/O in/O
spite/O of/O her/O blushing/O he/O was/O quickly/O reassured/O and/O began/O questioning/O
her/O,/O which/O was/O all/O she/O wanted/O./O When/O he/O had/O heard/O everything/O,/O even/O to/O the/O
detail/O that/O for/O the/O first/O second/O she/O could/O not/O help/O flushing/O,/O but/O that/O
afterwards/O she/O was/O just/O as/O direct/O and/O as/O much/O at/O her/O ease/O as/O with/O any/O
chance/O acquaintance/O,/O Levin/PERSON was/O quite/O happy/O again/O and/O said/O he/O was/O glad/O of/O
it/O,/O and/O would/O not/O now/O behave/O as/O stupidly/O as/O he/O had/O done/O at/O the/O election/O,/O
but/O would/O try/O the/O first/O time/O he/O met/O Vronsky/O to/O be/O as/O friendly/O as/O
possible/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O so/O wretched/O to/O feel/O that/O there/O's/O a/O man/O almost/O an/O enemy/O whom/O it/O's/O
painful/O to/O meet/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OI/O'm/O very/O,/O very/O glad/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 2/O


``/OGo/O,/O please/O,/O go/O then/O and/O call/O on/O the/O Bols/ORGANIZATION,/O''/O Kitty/PERSON said/O to/O her/O husband/O,/O
when/O he/O came/O in/O to/O see/O her/O at/O eleven/O o'clock/O before/O going/O out/O./O ``/OI/O know/O
you/O are/O dining/O at/O the/O club/O;/O papa/O put/O down/O your/O name/O./O But/O what/O are/O you/O
going/O to/O do/O in/O the/O morning/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O am/O only/O going/O to/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWhy/O so/O early/O?/O''/O

``/OHe/O promised/O to/O introduce/O me/O to/O Metrov/LOCATION./O I/O wanted/O to/O talk/O to/O him/O about/O my/O
work/O./O He/O's/O a/O distinguished/O scientific/O man/O from/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O;/O was/On't/O it/O his/O article/O you/O were/O praising/O so/O?/O Well/O,/O and/O after/O that/O?/O''/O
said/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OI/O shall/O go/O to/O the/O court/O,/O perhaps/O,/O about/O my/O sister/O's/O business/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O the/O concert/O?/O''/O she/O queried/O./O

``/OI/O sha/On't/O go/O there/O all/O alone/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O?/O do/O go/O;/O there/O are/O going/O to/O be/O some/O new/O things/O.../O./O That/O interested/O
you/O so/O./O I/O should/O certainly/O go/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O anyway/O,/O I/O shall/O come/O home/O before/O dinner/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O looking/O at/O his/O
watch/O./O

``/OPut/O on/O your/O frock/O coat/O,/O so/O that/O you/O can/O go/O straight/O to/O call/O on/O Countess/O
Bola/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O is/O it/O absolutely/O necessary/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O absolutely/O!/O He/O has/O been/O to/O see/O us/O./O Come/O,/O what/O is/O it/O?/O You/O go/O in/O,/O sit/O
down/O,/O talk/O for/O five/O minutes/O of/O the/O weather/O,/O get/O up/O and/O go/O away/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O you/O would/On't/O believe/O it/O!/O I/O've/O got/O so/O out/O of/O the/O way/O of/O all/O this/O
that/O it/O makes/O me/O feel/O positively/O ashamed/O./O It/O's/O such/O a/O horrible/O thing/O to/O
do/O!/O A/O complete/O outsider/O walks/O in/O,/O sits/O down/O,/O stays/O on/O with/O nothing/O to/O
do/O,/O wastes/O their/O time/O and/O worries/O himself/O,/O and/O walks/O away/O!/O''/O

Kitty/PERSON laughed/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O I/O suppose/O you/O used/O to/O pay/O calls/O before/O you/O were/O married/O,/O did/On't/O
you/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O did/O,/O but/O I/O always/O felt/O ashamed/O,/O and/O now/O I/O'm/O so/O out/O of/O the/O way/O of/O
it/O that/O,/O by/O Jove/PERSON!/O I/O'd/O sooner/O go/O two/O days/O running/O without/O my/O dinner/O than/O
pay/O this/O call/O!/O One/O's/O so/O ashamed/O!/O I/O feel/O all/O the/O while/O that/O they/O're/O
annoyed/O,/O that/O they/O're/O saying/O,/O `/OWhat/O has/O he/O come/O for/O?/O'/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O they/O wo/On't/O./O I/O'll/O answer/O for/O that/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O looking/O into/O his/O
face/O with/O a/O laugh/O./O She/O took/O his/O hand/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O good-bye/O.../O./O Do/O go/O,/O
please/O./O''/O

He/O was/O just/O going/O out/O after/O kissing/O his/O wife/O's/O hand/O,/O when/O she/O stopped/O
him/O./O

``/OKostya/PERSON,/O do/O you/O know/O I/O've/O only/O fifty/O roubles/O left/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O all/O right/O,/O I/O'll/O go/O to/O the/O bank/O and/O get/O some/O./O How/O much/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
with/O the/O expression/O of/O dissatisfaction/O she/O knew/O so/O well/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O wait/O a/O minute/O./O''/O She/O held/O his/O hand/O./O ``/OLet/O's/O talk/O about/O it/O,/O it/O worries/O
me/O./O I/O seem/O to/O spend/O nothing/O unnecessary/O,/O but/O money/O seems/O to/O fly/O away/O
simply/O./O We/O do/On't/O manage/O well/O,/O somehow/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O it/O's/O all/O right/O,/O''/O he/O said/O with/O a/O little/O cough/O,/O looking/O at/O her/O from/O
under/O his/O brows/O./O

That/O cough/O she/O knew/O well/O./O It/O was/O a/O sign/O of/O intense/O dissatisfaction/O,/O not/O
with/O her/O,/O but/O with/O himself/O./O He/O certainly/O was/O displeased/O not/O at/O so/O much/O
money/O being/O spent/O,/O but/O at/O being/O reminded/O of/O what/O he/O,/O knowing/O something/O
was/O unsatisfactory/O,/O wanted/O to/O forget/O./O

``/OI/O have/O told/O Sokolov/PERSON to/O sell/O the/O wheat/O,/O and/O to/O borrow/O an/O advance/O on/O the/O
mill/O./O We/O shall/O have/O money/O enough/O in/O any/O case/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O I/O'm/O afraid/O that/O altogether/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O it/O's/O all/O right/O,/O all/O right/O,/O''/O he/O repeated/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O good-bye/O,/O darling/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O really/O sorry/O sometimes/O that/O I/O listened/O to/O mamma/O./O How/O nice/O it/O
would/O have/O been/O in/O the/O country/O!/O As/O it/O is/O,/O I/O'm/O worrying/O you/O all/O,/O and/O
we/O're/O wasting/O our/O money/O./O''/O

``/ONot/O at/O all/O,/O not/O at/O all/O./O Not/O once/O since/O I/O've/O been/O married/O have/O I/O said/O
that/O things/O could/O have/O been/O better/O than/O they/O are/O.../O''/O

``/OTruly/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O looking/O into/O his/O eyes/O./O

He/O had/O said/O it/O without/O thinking/O,/O simply/O to/O console/O her/O./O But/O when/O he/O
glanced/O at/O her/O and/O saw/O those/O sweet/O truthful/O eyes/O fastened/O questioningly/O
on/O him/O,/O he/O repeated/O it/O with/O his/O whole/O heart/O./O ``/OI/O was/O positively/O
forgetting/O her/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O And/O he/O remembered/O what/O was/O before/O them/O,/O so/O
soon/O to/O come/O./O

``/OWill/O it/O be/O soon/O?/O How/O do/O you/O feel/O?/O''/O he/O whispered/O,/O taking/O her/O two/O hands/O./O

``/OI/O have/O so/O often/O thought/O so/O,/O that/O now/O I/O do/On't/O think/O about/O it/O or/O know/O
anything/O about/O it/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O you/O're/O not/O frightened/O?/O''/O

She/O smiled/O contemptuously/O./O

``/ONot/O the/O least/O little/O bit/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O if/O anything/O happens/O,/O I/O shall/O be/O at/O Katavasov/PERSON's/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O nothing/O will/O happen/O,/O and/O do/On't/O think/O about/O it/O./O I/O'm/O going/O for/O a/O walk/O
on/O the/O boulevard/O with/O papa/O./O We/O're/O going/O to/O see/O Dolly/PERSON./O I/O shall/O expect/O you/O
before/O dinner/O./O Oh/O,/O yes/O!/O Do/O you/O know/O that/O Dolly/PERSON's/O position/O is/O becoming/O
utterly/O impossible/O?/O She/O's/O in/O debt/O all/O round/O;/O she/O has/On't/O a/O penny/O./O We/O were/O
talking/O yesterday/O with/O mamma/O and/O Arseny/PERSON''/O -LRB-/Othis/O was/O her/O sister/O's/O husband/O
Lvov/LOCATION-RRB-/O,/O ``/Oand/O we/O determined/O to/O send/O you/O with/O him/O to/O talk/O to/O Stiva/PERSON./O It/O's/O
really/O unbearable/O./O One/O ca/On't/O speak/O to/O papa/O about/O it/O.../O./O But/O if/O you/O and/O
he/O.../O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O what/O can/O we/O do/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O'll/O be/O at/O Arseny/PERSON's/O,/O anyway/O;/O talk/O to/O him/O,/O he/O will/O tell/O what/O we/O
decided/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O agree/O to/O everything/O Arseny/PERSON thinks/O beforehand/O./O I/O'll/O go/O and/O see/O
him/O./O By/O the/O way/O,/O if/O I/O do/O go/O to/O the/O concert/O,/O I/O'll/O go/O with/O Natalia/PERSON./O Well/O,/O
good-bye/O./O''/O

On/O the/O steps/O Levin/PERSON was/O stopped/O by/O his/O old/O servant/O Kouzma/PERSON,/O who/O had/O been/O
with/O him/O before/O his/O marriage/O,/O and/O now/O looked/O after/O their/O household/O in/O
town/O./O

``/OBeauty/O''/O -LRB-/Othat/O was/O the/O left/O shaft-horse/O brought/O up/O from/O the/O country/O-RRB-/O
``/Ohas/O been/O badly/O shod/O and/O is/O quite/O lame/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OWhat/O does/O your/O honor/O
wish/O to/O be/O done/O?/O''/O

During/O the/O first/O part/O of/O their/O stay/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O Levin/PERSON had/O used/O his/O own/O
horses/O brought/O up/O from/O the/O country/O./O He/O had/O tried/O to/O arrange/O this/O part/O of/O
their/O expenses/O in/O the/O best/O and/O cheapest/O way/O possible/O;/O but/O it/O appeared/O
that/O their/O own/O horses/O came/O dearer/O than/O hired/O horses/O,/O and/O they/O still/O
hired/O too/O./O

``/OSend/O for/O the/O veterinary/O,/O there/O may/O be/O a/O bruise/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O for/O Katerina/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON?/O''/O asked/O Kouzma/PERSON./O

Levin/PERSON was/O not/O by/O now/O struck/O as/O he/O had/O been/O at/O first/O by/O the/O fact/O that/O to/O
get/O from/O one/O end/O of/O Moscow/LOCATION to/O the/O other/O he/O had/O to/O have/O two/O powerful/O
horses/O put/O into/O a/O heavy/O carriage/O,/O to/O take/O the/O carriage/O three/O miles/O
through/O the/O snowy/O slush/O and/O to/O keep/O it/O standing/O there/O four/O hours/O,/O paying/O
five/O roubles/O every/O time/O./O

Now/O it/O seemed/O quite/O natural/O./O

``/OHire/O a/O pair/O for/O our/O carriage/O from/O the/O jobmaster/O,/O''/O said/O he/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O sir/O./O''/O

And/O so/O,/O simply/O and/O easily/O,/O thanks/O to/O the/O facilities/O of/O town/O life/O,/O Levin/PERSON
settled/O a/O question/O which/O,/O in/O the/O country/O,/O would/O have/O called/O for/O so/O much/O
personal/O trouble/O and/O exertion/O,/O and/O going/O out/O onto/O the/O steps/O,/O he/O called/O a/O
sledge/O,/O sat/O down/O,/O and/O drove/O to/O Nikitsky/PERSON./O On/O the/O way/O he/O thought/O no/O more/O
of/O money/O,/O but/O mused/O on/O the/O introduction/O that/O awaited/O him/O to/O the/O
Petersburg/LOCATION savant/O,/O a/O writer/O on/O sociology/O,/O and/O what/O he/O would/O say/O to/O him/O
about/O his/O book/O./O

Only/O during/O the/O first/O days/O of/O his/O stay/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION Levin/LOCATION had/O been/O struck/O
by/O the/O expenditure/O,/O strange/O to/O one/O living/O in/O the/O country/O,/O unproductive/O
but/O inevitable/O,/O that/O was/O expected/O of/O him/O on/O every/O side/O./O But/O by/O now/O he/O
had/O grown/O used/O to/O it/O./O That/O had/O happened/O to/O him/O in/O this/O matter/O which/O is/O
said/O to/O happen/O to/O drunkards/O--/Othe/O first/O glass/O sticks/O in/O the/O throat/O,/O the/O
second/O flies/O down/O like/O a/O hawk/O,/O but/O after/O the/O third/O they/O're/O like/O tiny/O
little/O birds/O./O When/O Levin/PERSON had/O changed/O his/O first/O hundred-rouble/O note/O to/O
pay/O for/O liveries/O for/O his/O footmen/O and/O hall-porter/O he/O could/O not/O help/O
reflecting/O that/O these/O liveries/O were/O of/O no/O use/O to/O anyone/O--/Obut/O they/O were/O
indubitably/O necessary/O,/O to/O judge/O by/O the/O amazement/O of/O the/O princess/O and/O
Kitty/PERSON when/O he/O suggested/O that/O they/O might/O do/O without/O liveries/O,/O--/Othat/O these/O
liveries/O would/O cost/O the/O wages/O of/O two/O laborers/O for/O the/O summer/O,/O that/O is/O,/O
would/O pay/O for/O about/O three/O hundred/O working/O days/O from/O Easter/O to/O Ash/O
Wednesday/O,/O and/O each/O a/O day/O of/O hard/O work/O from/O early/O morning/O to/O late/O
evening/O--/Oand/O that/O hundred-rouble/O note/O did/O stick/O in/O his/O throat/O./O But/O the/O
next/O note/O,/O changed/O to/O pay/O for/O providing/O a/O dinner/O for/O their/O relations/O,/O
that/O cost/O twenty-eight/O roubles/O,/O though/O it/O did/O excite/O in/O Levin/PERSON the/O
reflection/O that/O twenty-eight/O roubles/O meant/O nine/O measures/O of/O oats/O,/O which/O
men/O would/O with/O groans/O and/O sweat/O have/O reaped/O and/O bound/O and/O thrashed/O and/O
winnowed/O and/O sifted/O and/O sown/O,/O--/Othis/O next/O one/O he/O parted/O with/O more/O easily/O./O
And/O now/O the/O notes/O he/O changed/O no/O longer/O aroused/O such/O reflections/O,/O and/O
they/O flew/O off/O like/O little/O birds/O./O Whether/O the/O labor/O devoted/O to/O obtaining/O
the/O money/O corresponded/O to/O the/O pleasure/O given/O by/O what/O was/O bought/O with/O it/O,/O
was/O a/O consideration/O he/O had/O long/O ago/O dismissed/O./O His/O business/O calculation/O
that/O there/O was/O a/O certain/O price/O below/O which/O he/O could/O not/O sell/O certain/O
grain/O was/O forgotten/O too/O./O The/O rye/O,/O for/O the/O price/O of/O which/O he/O had/O so/O long/O
held/O out/O,/O had/O been/O sold/O for/O fifty/O kopecks/O a/O measure/O cheaper/O than/O it/O had/O
been/O fetching/O a/O month/O ago/O./O Even/O the/O consideration/O that/O with/O such/O an/O
expenditure/O he/O could/O not/O go/O on/O living/O for/O a/O year/O without/O debt/O,/O that/O even/O
had/O no/O force/O./O Only/O one/O thing/O was/O essential/O:/O to/O have/O money/O in/O the/O bank/O,/O
without/O inquiring/O where/O it/O came/O from/O,/O so/O as/O to/O know/O that/O one/O had/O the/O
wherewithal/O to/O buy/O meat/O for/O tomorrow/O./O And/O this/O condition/O had/O hitherto/O
been/O fulfilled/O;/O he/O had/O always/O had/O the/O money/O in/O the/O bank/O./O But/O now/O the/O
money/O in/O the/O bank/O had/O gone/O,/O and/O he/O could/O not/O quite/O tell/O where/O to/O get/O the/O
next/O installment/O./O And/O this/O it/O was/O which/O,/O at/O the/O moment/O when/O Kitty/PERSON had/O
mentioned/O money/O,/O had/O disturbed/O him/O;/O but/O he/O had/O no/O time/O to/O think/O about/O
it/O./O He/O drove/O off/O,/O thinking/O of/O Katavasov/LOCATION and/O the/O meeting/O with/O Metrov/PERSON that/O
was/O before/O him/O./O



Chapter/O 3/O


Levin/PERSON had/O on/O this/O visit/O to/O town/O seen/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O his/O old/O friend/O at/O
the/O university/O,/O Professor/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O whom/O he/O had/O not/O seen/O since/O his/O
marriage/O./O He/O liked/O in/O Katavasov/LOCATION the/O clearness/O and/O simplicity/O of/O his/O
conception/O of/O life/O./O Levin/PERSON thought/O that/O the/O clearness/O of/O Katavasov/PERSON's/O
conception/O of/O life/O was/O due/O to/O the/O poverty/O of/O his/O nature/O;/O Katavasov/PERSON
thought/O that/O the/O disconnectedness/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O ideas/O was/O due/O to/O his/O lack/O
of/O intellectual/O discipline/O;/O but/O Levin/PERSON enjoyed/O Katavasov/PERSON's/O clearness/O,/O and/O
Katavasov/PERSON enjoyed/O the/O abundance/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O untrained/O ideas/O,/O and/O they/O
liked/O to/O meet/O and/O to/O discuss/O./O

Levin/PERSON had/O read/O Katavasov/PERSON some/O parts/O of/O his/O book/O,/O and/O he/O had/O liked/O them/O./O
On/O the/O previous/O day/O Katavasov/PERSON had/O met/O Levin/PERSON at/O a/O public/O lecture/O and/O told/O
him/O that/O the/O celebrated/O Metrov/PERSON,/O whose/O article/O Levin/PERSON had/O so/O much/O liked/O,/O
was/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O that/O he/O had/O been/O much/O interested/O by/O what/O Katavasov/PERSON had/O
told/O him/O about/O Levin/PERSON's/O work/O,/O and/O that/O he/O was/O coming/O to/O see/O him/O tomorrow/O
at/O eleven/O,/O and/O would/O be/O very/O glad/O to/O make/O Levin/PERSON's/O acquaintance/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O positively/O a/O reformed/O character/O,/O I/O'm/O glad/O to/O see/O,/O''/O said/O
Katavasov/PERSON,/O meeting/O Levin/PERSON in/O the/O little/O drawing/O room/O./O ``/OI/O heard/O the/O bell/O
and/O thought/O:/O Impossible/O that/O it/O can/O be/O he/O at/O the/O exact/O time/O!/O.../O Well/O,/O
what/O do/O you/O say/O to/O the/O Montenegrins/O now/O?/O They/O're/O a/O race/O of/O warriors/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O what/O's/O happened/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON./O

Katavasov/PERSON in/O a/O few/O words/O told/O him/O the/O last/O piece/O of/O news/O from/O the/O war/O,/O
and/O going/O into/O his/O study/O,/O introduced/O Levin/PERSON to/O a/O short/O,/O thick-set/O man/O of/O
pleasant/O appearance/O./O This/O was/O Metrov/PERSON./O The/O conversation/O touched/O for/O a/O
brief/O space/O on/O politics/O and/O on/O how/O recent/O events/O were/O looked/O at/O in/O the/O
higher/O spheres/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O Metrov/O repeated/O a/O saying/O that/O had/O reached/O
him/O through/O a/O most/O trustworthy/O source/O,/O reported/O as/O having/O been/O uttered/O
on/O this/O subject/O by/O the/O Tsar/O and/O one/O of/O the/O ministers/O./O Katavasov/PERSON had/O
heard/O also/O on/O excellent/O authority/O that/O the/O Tsar/O had/O said/O something/O quite/O
different/O./O Levin/PERSON tried/O to/O imagine/O circumstances/O in/O which/O both/O sayings/O
might/O have/O been/O uttered/O,/O and/O the/O conversation/O on/O that/O topic/O dropped/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O here/O he/O's/O written/O almost/O a/O book/O on/O the/O natural/O conditions/O of/O the/O
laborer/O in/O relation/O to/O the/O land/O,/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON;/O ``/OI/O'm/O not/O a/O specialist/O,/O
but/O I/O,/O as/O a/O natural/O science/O man/O,/O was/O pleased/O at/O his/O not/O taking/O mankind/O
as/O something/O outside/O biological/O laws/O;/O but/O,/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O seeing/O his/O
dependence/O on/O his/O surroundings/O,/O and/O in/O that/O dependence/O seeking/O the/O laws/O
of/O his/O development/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O very/O interesting/O,/O''/O said/O Metrov/PERSON./O

``/OWhat/O I/O began/O precisely/O was/O to/O write/O a/O book/O on/O agriculture/O;/O but/O studying/O
the/O chief/O instrument/O of/O agriculture/O,/O the/O laborer/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O
reddening/O,/O ``/OI/O could/O not/O help/O coming/O to/O quite/O unexpected/O results/O./O''/O

And/O Levin/PERSON began/O carefully/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O feeling/O his/O ground/O,/O to/O expound/O
his/O views/O./O He/O knew/O Metrov/PERSON had/O written/O an/O article/O against/O the/O generally/O
accepted/O theory/O of/O political/O economy/O,/O but/O to/O what/O extent/O he/O could/O reckon/O
on/O his/O sympathy/O with/O his/O own/O new/O views/O he/O did/O not/O know/O and/O could/O not/O
guess/O from/O the/O clever/O and/O serene/O face/O of/O the/O learned/O man/O./O

``/OBut/O in/O what/O do/O you/O see/O the/O special/O characteristics/O of/O the/O Russian/O
laborer/O?/O''/O said/O Metrov/PERSON;/O ``/Oin/O his/O biological/O characteristics/O,/O so/O to/O speak/O,/O
or/O in/O the/O condition/O in/O which/O he/O is/O placed/O?/O''/O

Levin/PERSON saw/O that/O there/O was/O an/O idea/O underlying/O this/O question/O with/O which/O he/O
did/O not/O agree/O./O But/O he/O went/O on/O explaining/O his/O own/O idea/O that/O the/O Russian/O
laborer/O has/O a/O quite/O special/O view/O of/O the/O land/O,/O different/O from/O that/O of/O
other/O people/O;/O and/O to/O support/O this/O proposition/O he/O made/O haste/O to/O add/O that/O
in/O his/O opinion/O this/O attitude/O of/O the/O Russian/O peasant/O was/O due/O to/O the/O
consciousness/O of/O his/O vocation/O to/O people/O vast/O unoccupied/O expanses/O in/O the/O
East/O./O

``/OOne/O may/O easily/O be/O led/O into/O error/O in/O basing/O any/O conclusion/O on/O the/O
general/O vocation/O of/O a/O people/O,/O''/O said/O Metrov/PERSON,/O interrupting/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OThe/O
condition/O of/O the/O laborer/O will/O always/O depend/O on/O his/O relation/O to/O the/O land/O
and/O to/O capital/O./O''/O

And/O without/O letting/O Levin/PERSON finish/O explaining/O his/O idea/O,/O Metrov/PERSON began/O
expounding/O to/O him/O the/O special/O point/O of/O his/O own/O theory/O./O

In/O what/O the/O point/O of/O his/O theory/O lay/O,/O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O understand/O,/O because/O
he/O did/O not/O take/O the/O trouble/O to/O understand/O./O He/O saw/O that/O Metrov/PERSON,/O like/O
other/O people/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O own/O article/O,/O in/O which/O he/O had/O attacked/O the/O
current/O theory/O of/O political/O economy/O,/O looked/O at/O the/O position/O of/O the/O
Russian/O peasant/O simply/O from/O the/O point/O of/O view/O of/O capital/O,/O wages/O,/O and/O
rent/O./O He/O would/O indeed/O have/O been/O obliged/O to/O admit/O that/O in/O the/O
eastern/O--/Omuch/O the/O larger/O--/Opart/O of/O Russia/LOCATION rent/O was/O as/O yet/O nil/O,/O that/O for/O
nine-tenths/O of/O the/O eighty/O millions/O of/O the/O Russian/O peasants/O wages/O took/O
the/O form/O simply/O of/O food/O provided/O for/O themselves/O,/O and/O that/O capital/O does/O
not/O so/O far/O exist/O except/O in/O the/O form/O of/O the/O most/O primitive/O tools/O./O Yet/O it/O
was/O only/O from/O that/O point/O of/O view/O that/O he/O considered/O every/O laborer/O,/O
though/O in/O many/O points/O he/O differed/O from/O the/O economists/O and/O had/O his/O own/O
theory/O of/O the/O wage-fund/O,/O which/O he/O expounded/O to/O Levin/PERSON./O

Levin/PERSON listened/O reluctantly/O,/O and/O at/O first/O made/O objections/O./O He/O would/O have/O
liked/O to/O interrupt/O Metrov/PERSON,/O to/O explain/O his/O own/O thought/O,/O which/O in/O his/O
opinion/O would/O have/O rendered/O further/O exposition/O of/O Metrov/PERSON's/O theories/O
superfluous/O./O But/O later/O on/O,/O feeling/O convinced/O that/O they/O looked/O at/O the/O
matter/O so/O differently/O,/O that/O they/O could/O never/O understand/O one/O another/O,/O he/O
did/O not/O even/O oppose/O his/O statements/O,/O but/O simply/O listened/O./O Although/O what/O
Metrov/PERSON was/O saying/O was/O by/O now/O utterly/O devoid/O of/O interest/O for/O him/O,/O he/O yet/O
experienced/O a/O certain/O satisfaction/O in/O listening/O to/O him/O./O It/O flattered/O his/O
vanity/O that/O such/O a/O learned/O man/O should/O explain/O his/O ideas/O to/O him/O so/O
eagerly/O,/O with/O such/O intensity/O and/O confidence/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O understanding/O of/O
the/O subject/O,/O sometimes/O with/O a/O mere/O hint/O referring/O him/O to/O a/O whole/O aspect/O
of/O the/O subject/O./O He/O put/O this/O down/O to/O his/O own/O credit/O,/O unaware/O that/O Metrov/PERSON,/O
who/O had/O already/O discussed/O his/O theory/O over/O and/O over/O again/O with/O all/O his/O
intimate/O friends/O,/O talked/O of/O it/O with/O special/O eagerness/O to/O every/O new/O
person/O,/O and/O in/O general/O was/O eager/O to/O talk/O to/O anyone/O of/O any/O subject/O that/O
interested/O him/O,/O even/O if/O still/O obscure/O to/O himself/O./O

``/OWe/O are/O late/O though/O,/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O his/O watch/O directly/O
Metrov/PERSON had/O finished/O his/O discourse/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O there/O's/O a/O meeting/O of/O the/O Society/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION Amateurs/ORGANIZATION today/O in/O
commemoration/O of/O the/O jubilee/O of/O Svintitch/O,/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON in/O answer/O to/O
Levin/PERSON's/O inquiry/O./O ``/OPyotr/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON and/O I/O were/O going/O./O I/O've/O promised/O to/O
deliver/O an/O address/O on/O his/O labors/O in/O zoology/O./O Come/O along/O with/O us/O,/O it/O's/O
very/O interesting/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O and/O indeed/O it/O's/O time/O to/O start/O,/O''/O said/O Metrov/PERSON./O ``/OCome/O with/O us/O,/O and/O
from/O there/O,/O if/O you/O care/O to/O,/O come/O to/O my/O place/O./O I/O should/O very/O much/O like/O to/O
hear/O your/O work/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O!/O It/O's/O no/O good/O yet/O,/O it/O's/O unfinished/O./O But/O I/O shall/O be/O very/O glad/O to/O
go/O to/O the/O meeting/O./O''/O

``/OI/O say/O,/O friends/O,/O have/O you/O heard/O?/O He/O has/O handed/O in/O the/O separate/O report/O,/O''/O
Katavasov/PERSON called/O from/O the/O other/O room/O,/O where/O he/O was/O putting/O on/O his/O frock/O
coat/O./O

And/O a/O conversation/O sprang/O up/O upon/O the/O university/O question/O,/O which/O was/O a/O
very/O important/O event/O that/O winter/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION./O Three/O old/O professors/O in/O the/O
council/O had/O not/O accepted/O the/O opinion/O of/O the/O younger/O professors/O./O The/O
young/O ones/O had/O registered/O a/O separate/O resolution/O./O This/O,/O in/O the/O judgment/O
of/O some/O people/O,/O was/O monstrous/O,/O in/O the/O judgment/O of/O others/O it/O was/O the/O
simplest/O and/O most/O just/O thing/O to/O do/O,/O and/O the/O professors/O were/O split/O up/O
into/O two/O parties/O./O

One/O party/O,/O to/O which/O Katavasov/PERSON belonged/O,/O saw/O in/O the/O opposite/O party/O a/O
scoundrelly/O betrayal/O and/O treachery/O,/O while/O the/O opposite/O party/O saw/O in/O them/O
childishness/O and/O lack/O of/O respect/O for/O the/O authorities/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O though/O he/O
did/O not/O belong/O to/O the/O university/O,/O had/O several/O times/O already/O during/O his/O
stay/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION heard/O and/O talked/O about/O this/O matter/O,/O and/O had/O his/O own/O
opinion/O on/O the/O subject/O./O He/O took/O part/O in/O the/O conversation/O that/O was/O
continued/O in/O the/O street/O,/O as/O they/O all/O three/O walked/O to/O the/O buildings/O of/O
the/O old/O university/O./O

The/O meeting/O had/O already/O begun/O./O Round/O the/O cloth-covered/O table/O,/O at/O which/O
Katavasov/PERSON and/O Metrov/PERSON seated/O themselves/O,/O there/O were/O some/O half-dozen/O
persons/O,/O and/O one/O of/O these/O was/O bending/O close/O over/O a/O manuscript/O,/O reading/O
something/O aloud/O./O Levin/PERSON sat/O down/O in/O one/O of/O the/O empty/O chairs/O that/O were/O
standing/O round/O the/O table/O,/O and/O in/O a/O whisper/O asked/O a/O student/O sitting/O near/O
what/O was/O being/O read/O./O The/O student/O,/O eyeing/O Levin/PERSON with/O displeasure/O,/O said/O:/O

``/OBiography/O./O''/O

Though/O Levin/PERSON was/O not/O interested/O in/O the/O biography/O,/O he/O could/O not/O help/O
listening/O,/O and/O learned/O some/O new/O and/O interesting/O facts/O about/O the/O life/O of/O
the/O distinguished/O man/O of/O science/O./O

When/O the/O reader/O had/O finished/O,/O the/O chairman/O thanked/O him/O and/O read/O some/O
verses/O of/O the/O poet/O Ment/PERSON sent/O him/O on/O the/O jubilee/O,/O and/O said/O a/O few/O words/O by/O
way/O of/O thanks/O to/O the/O poet/O./O Then/O Katavasov/PERSON in/O his/O loud/O,/O ringing/O voice/O
read/O his/O address/O on/O the/O scientific/O labors/O of/O the/O man/O whose/O jubilee/O was/O
being/O kept/O./O

When/O Katavasov/PERSON had/O finished/O,/O Levin/PERSON looked/O at/O his/O watch/O,/O saw/O it/O was/O past/O
one/O,/O and/O thought/O that/O there/O would/O not/O be/O time/O before/O the/O concert/O to/O read/O
Metrov/PERSON his/O book/O,/O and/O indeed/O,/O he/O did/O not/O now/O care/O to/O do/O so/O./O During/O the/O
reading/O he/O had/O thought/O over/O their/O conversation/O./O He/O saw/O distinctly/O now/O
that/O though/O Metrov/PERSON's/O ideas/O might/O perhaps/O have/O value/O,/O his/O own/O ideas/O had/O a/O
value/O too/O,/O and/O their/O ideas/O could/O only/O be/O made/O clear/O and/O lead/O to/O
something/O if/O each/O worked/O separately/O in/O his/O chosen/O path/O,/O and/O that/O nothing/O
would/O be/O gained/O by/O putting/O their/O ideas/O together/O./O And/O having/O made/O up/O his/O
mind/O to/O refuse/O Metrov/PERSON's/O invitation/O,/O Levin/PERSON went/O up/O to/O him/O at/O the/O end/O of/O
the/O meeting/O./O Metrov/PERSON introduced/O Levin/PERSON to/O the/O chairman/O,/O with/O whom/O he/O was/O
talking/O of/O the/O political/O news/O./O Metrov/PERSON told/O the/O chairman/O what/O he/O had/O
already/O told/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O Levin/PERSON made/O the/O same/O remarks/O on/O his/O news/O that/O he/O
had/O already/O made/O that/O morning/O,/O but/O for/O the/O sake/O of/O variety/O he/O expressed/O
also/O a/O new/O opinion/O which/O had/O only/O just/O struck/O him/O./O After/O that/O the/O
conversation/O turned/O again/O on/O the/O university/O question/O./O As/O Levin/PERSON had/O
already/O heard/O it/O all/O,/O he/O made/O haste/O to/O tell/O Metrov/PERSON that/O he/O was/O sorry/O he/O
could/O not/O take/O advantage/O of/O his/O invitation/O,/O took/O leave/O,/O and/O drove/O to/O
Lvov/LOCATION's/O./O



Chapter/O 4/O


Lvov/ORGANIZATION,/O the/O husband/O of/O Natalia/PERSON,/O Kitty/PERSON's/O sister/O,/O had/O spent/O all/O his/O life/O in/O
foreign/O capitals/O,/O where/O he/O had/O been/O educated/O,/O and/O had/O been/O in/O the/O
diplomatic/O service/O./O

During/O the/O previous/O year/O he/O had/O left/O the/O diplomatic/O service/O,/O not/O owing/O
to/O any/O ``/Ounpleasantness/O''/O -LRB-/Ohe/O never/O had/O any/O ``/Ounpleasantness/O''/O with/O anyone/O-RRB-/O,/O
and/O was/O transferred/O to/O the/O department/O of/O the/O court/O of/O the/O palace/O in/O
Moscow/LOCATION,/O in/O order/O to/O give/O his/O two/O boys/O the/O best/O education/O possible/O./O

In/O spite/O of/O the/O striking/O contrast/O in/O their/O habits/O and/O views/O and/O the/O fact/O
that/O Lvov/LOCATION was/O older/O than/O Levin/PERSON,/O they/O had/O seen/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O one/O
another/O that/O winter/O,/O and/O had/O taken/O a/O great/O liking/O to/O each/O other/O./O

Lvov/LOCATION was/O at/O home/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON went/O in/O to/O him/O unannounced/O./O

Lvov/LOCATION,/O in/O a/O house/O coat/O with/O a/O belt/O and/O in/O chamois/O leather/O shoes/O,/O was/O
sitting/O in/O an/O armchair/O,/O and/O with/O a/O pince-nez/O with/O blue/O glasses/O he/O was/O
reading/O a/O book/O that/O stood/O on/O a/O reading/O desk/O,/O while/O in/O his/O beautiful/O hand/O
he/O held/O a/O half-burned/O cigarette/O daintily/O away/O from/O him/O./O

His/O handsome/O,/O delicate/O,/O and/O still/O youthful-looking/O face/O,/O to/O which/O his/O
curly/O,/O glistening/O silvery/O hair/O gave/O a/O still/O more/O aristocratic/O air/O,/O
lighted/O up/O with/O a/O smile/O when/O he/O saw/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OCapital/O!/O I/O was/O meaning/O to/O send/O to/O you/O./O How/O's/O Kitty/PERSON?/O Sit/O here/O,/O it/O's/O more/O
comfortable/O./O''/O He/O got/O up/O and/O pushed/O up/O a/O rocking/O chair/O./O ``/OHave/O you/O read/O
the/O last/O circular/O in/O the/O _/OJournal/O de/O St./LOCATION Petersbourg/LOCATION?/O_/O I/O think/O it/O's/O
excellent/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O a/O slight/O French/O accent/O./O

Levin/PERSON told/O him/O what/O he/O had/O heard/O from/O Katavasov/PERSON was/O being/O said/O in/O
Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O after/O talking/O a/O little/O about/O politics/O,/O he/O told/O him/O of/O
his/O interview/O with/O Metrov/PERSON,/O and/O the/O learned/O society/O's/O meeting/O./O To/O Lvov/LOCATION it/O
was/O very/O interesting/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O what/O I/O envy/O you/O,/O that/O you/O are/O able/O to/O mix/O in/O these/O interesting/O
scientific/O circles/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O And/O as/O he/O talked/O,/O he/O passed/O as/O usual/O into/O
French/O,/O which/O was/O easier/O to/O him/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O true/O I/O have/On't/O the/O time/O for/O it/O./O
My/O official/O work/O and/O the/O children/O leave/O me/O no/O time/O;/O and/O then/O I/O'm/O not/O
ashamed/O to/O own/O that/O my/O education/O has/O been/O too/O defective/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O I/O do/On't/O believe/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON with/O a/O smile/O,/O feeling/O,/O as/O he/O always/O
did/O,/O touched/O at/O Lvov/LOCATION's/O low/O opinion/O of/O himself/O,/O which/O was/O not/O in/O the/O
least/O put/O on/O from/O a/O desire/O to/O seem/O or/O to/O be/O modest/O,/O but/O was/O absolutely/O
sincere/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O indeed/O!/O I/O feel/O now/O how/O badly/O educated/O I/O am/O./O To/O educate/O my/O
children/O I/O positively/O have/O to/O look/O up/O a/O great/O deal/O,/O and/O in/O fact/O simply/O
to/O study/O myself/O./O For/O it/O's/O not/O enough/O to/O have/O teachers/O,/O there/O must/O be/O
someone/O to/O look/O after/O them/O,/O just/O as/O on/O your/O land/O you/O want/O laborers/O and/O
an/O overseer/O./O See/O what/O I/O'm/O reading/O''/O--/Ohe/O pointed/O to/O Buslaev/PERSON's/O _/OGrammar/O_/O on/O
the/O desk/O--/O``/Oit/O's/O expected/O of/O Misha/ORGANIZATION,/O and/O it/O's/O so/O difficult/O.../O./O Come/O,/O
explain/O to/O me/O.../O./O Here/O he/O says/O.../O''/O

Levin/PERSON tried/O to/O explain/O to/O him/O that/O it/O could/On't/O be/O understood/O,/O but/O that/O
it/O had/O to/O be/O taught/O;/O but/O Lvov/LOCATION would/O not/O agree/O with/O him/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O you/O're/O laughing/O at/O it/O!/O''/O

``/OOn/O the/O contrary/O,/O you/O ca/On't/O imagine/O how/O,/O when/O I/O look/O at/O you/O,/O I/O'm/O always/O
learning/O the/O task/O that/O lies/O before/O me/O,/O that/O is/O the/O education/O of/O one/O's/O
children/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O there/O's/O nothing/O for/O you/O to/O learn/O,/O''/O said/O Lvov/LOCATION./O

``/OAll/O I/O know/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Ois/O that/O I/O have/O never/O seen/O better/O brought-up/O
children/O than/O yours/O,/O and/O I/O would/On't/O wish/O for/O children/O better/O than/O
yours/O./O''/O

Lvov/LOCATION visibly/O tried/O to/O restrain/O the/O expression/O of/O his/O delight/O,/O but/O he/O was/O
positively/O radiant/O with/O smiles/O./O

``/OIf/O only/O they/O're/O better/O than/O I/O!/O That/O's/O all/O I/O desire/O./O You/O do/On't/O know/O yet/O
all/O the/O work/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/Owith/O boys/O who/O've/O been/O left/O like/O mine/O to/O run/O
wild/O abroad/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O'll/O catch/O all/O that/O up/O./O They/O're/O such/O clever/O children/O./O The/O great/O thing/O
is/O the/O education/O of/O character/O./O That/O's/O what/O I/O learn/O when/O I/O look/O at/O your/O
children/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O talk/O of/O the/O education/O of/O character/O./O You/O ca/On't/O imagine/O how/O difficult/O
that/O is/O!/O You/O have/O hardly/O succeeded/O in/O combating/O one/O tendency/O when/O others/O
crop/O up/O,/O and/O the/O struggle/O begins/O again/O./O If/O one/O had/O not/O a/O support/O in/O
religion/O--/Oyou/O remember/O we/O talked/O about/O that/O--/Ono/O father/O could/O bring/O
children/O up/O relying/O on/O his/O own/O strength/O alone/O without/O that/O help/O./O''/O

This/O subject/O,/O which/O always/O interested/O Levin/PERSON,/O was/O cut/O short/O by/O the/O
entrance/O of/O the/O beauty/O Natalia/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O dressed/O to/O go/O out/O./O

``/OI/O did/On't/O know/O you/O were/O here/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O unmistakably/O feeling/O no/O regret/O,/O
but/O a/O positive/O pleasure/O,/O in/O interrupting/O this/O conversation/O on/O a/O topic/O
she/O had/O heard/O so/O much/O of/O that/O she/O was/O by/O now/O weary/O of/O it/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O how/O is/O
Kitty/PERSON?/O I/O am/O dining/O with/O you/O today/O./O I/O tell/O you/O what/O,/O Arseny/PERSON,/O''/O she/O turned/O
to/O her/O husband/O,/O ``/Oyou/O take/O the/O carriage/O./O''/O

And/O the/O husband/O and/O wife/O began/O to/O discuss/O their/O arrangements/O for/O the/O
day/O./O As/O the/O husband/O had/O to/O drive/O to/O meet/O someone/O on/O official/O business/O,/O
while/O the/O wife/O had/O to/O go/O to/O the/O concert/O and/O some/O public/O meeting/O of/O a/O
committee/O on/O the/O Eastern/O Question/O,/O there/O was/O a/O great/O deal/O to/O consider/O
and/O settle/O./O Levin/PERSON had/O to/O take/O part/O in/O their/O plans/O as/O one/O of/O themselves/O./O
It/O was/O settled/O that/O Levin/PERSON should/O go/O with/O Natalia/PERSON to/O the/O concert/O and/O the/O
meeting/O,/O and/O that/O from/O there/O they/O should/O send/O the/O carriage/O to/O the/O office/O
for/O Arseny/PERSON,/O and/O he/O should/O call/O for/O her/O and/O take/O her/O to/O Kitty/PERSON's/O;/O or/O that/O,/O
if/O he/O had/O not/O finished/O his/O work/O,/O he/O should/O send/O the/O carriage/O back/O and/O
Levin/PERSON would/O go/O with/O her/O./O

``/OHe/O's/O spoiling/O me/O,/O''/O Lvov/PERSON said/O to/O his/O wife/O;/O ``/Ohe/O assures/O me/O that/O our/O
children/O are/O splendid/O,/O when/O I/O know/O how/O much/O that/O's/O bad/O there/O is/O in/O
them/O./O''/O

``/OArseny/PERSON goes/O to/O extremes/O,/O I/O always/O say/O,/O''/O said/O his/O wife/O./O ``/OIf/O you/O look/O for/O
perfection/O,/O you/O will/O never/O be/O satisfied/O./O And/O it/O's/O true/O,/O as/O papa/O
says/O,/O--/Othat/O when/O we/O were/O brought/O up/O there/O was/O one/O extreme/O--/Owe/O were/O kept/O in/O
the/O basement/O,/O while/O our/O parents/O lived/O in/O the/O best/O rooms/O;/O now/O it/O's/O just/O
the/O other/O way/O--/Othe/O parents/O are/O in/O the/O wash/O house/O,/O while/O the/O children/O are/O
in/O the/O best/O rooms/O./O Parents/O now/O are/O not/O expected/O to/O live/O at/O all/O,/O but/O to/O
exist/O altogether/O for/O their/O children/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O if/O they/O like/O it/O better/O?/O''/O Lvov/PERSON said/O,/O with/O his/O beautiful/O
smile/O,/O touching/O her/O hand/O./O ``/OAnyone/O who/O did/On't/O know/O you/O would/O think/O you/O
were/O a/O stepmother/O,/O not/O a/O true/O mother/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O extremes/O are/O not/O good/O in/O anything/O,/O''/O Natalia/PERSON said/O serenely/O,/O putting/O
his/O paper/O knife/O straight/O in/O its/O proper/O place/O on/O the/O table/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O come/O here/O,/O you/O perfect/O children/O,/O''/O Lvov/PERSON said/O to/O the/O two/O handsome/O
boys/O who/O came/O in/O,/O and/O after/O bowing/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O went/O up/O to/O their/O father/O,/O
obviously/O wishing/O to/O ask/O him/O about/O something/O./O

Levin/PERSON would/O have/O liked/O to/O talk/O to/O them/O,/O to/O hear/O what/O they/O would/O say/O to/O
their/O father/O,/O but/O Natalia/PERSON began/O talking/O to/O him/O,/O and/O then/O Lvov/LOCATION's/O
colleague/O in/O the/O service/O,/O Mahotin/LOCATION,/O walked/O in/O,/O wearing/O his/O court/O uniform/O,/O
to/O go/O with/O him/O to/O meet/O someone/O,/O and/O a/O conversation/O was/O kept/O up/O without/O a/O
break/O upon/O Herzegovina/LOCATION,/O Princess/O Korzinskaya/PERSON,/O the/O town/O council/O,/O and/O the/O
sudden/O death/O of/O Madame/O Apraksina/O./O

Levin/PERSON even/O forgot/O the/O commission/O intrusted/O to/O him/O./O He/O recollected/O it/O as/O
he/O was/O going/O into/O the/O hall/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O Kitty/PERSON told/O me/O to/O talk/O to/O you/O about/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O as/O Lvov/LOCATION was/O
standing/O on/O the/O stairs/O,/O seeing/O his/O wife/O and/O Levin/PERSON off/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O maman/O wants/O us/O,/O _/Oles/O beaux-frères/O,/O_/O to/O attack/O him/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
blushing/O./O ``/OBut/O why/O should/O I/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O then/O,/O I/O will/O attack/O him/O,/O''/O said/O Madame/PERSON Lvova/PERSON,/O with/O a/O smile/O,/O
standing/O in/O her/O white/O sheepskin/O cape/O,/O waiting/O till/O they/O had/O finished/O
speaking/O./O ``/OCome/O,/O let/O us/O go/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 5/O


At/O the/O concert/O in/O the/O afternoon/O two/O very/O interesting/O things/O were/O
performed/O./O One/O was/O a/O fantasia/O,/O _/OKing/O Lear/PERSON;/O_/O the/O other/O was/O a/O quartette/O
dedicated/O to/O the/O memory/O of/O Bach/PERSON./O Both/O were/O new/O and/O in/O the/O new/O style/O,/O and/O
Levin/PERSON was/O eager/O to/O form/O an/O opinion/O of/O them/O./O After/O escorting/O his/O
sister-in-law/O to/O her/O stall/O,/O he/O stood/O against/O a/O column/O and/O tried/O to/O
listen/O as/O attentively/O and/O conscientiously/O as/O possible/O./O He/O tried/O not/O to/O
let/O his/O attention/O be/O distracted/O,/O and/O not/O to/O spoil/O his/O impression/O by/O
looking/O at/O the/O conductor/O in/O a/O white/O tie/O,/O waving/O his/O arms/O,/O which/O always/O
disturbed/O his/O enjoyment/O of/O music/O so/O much/O,/O or/O the/O ladies/O in/O bonnets/O,/O with/O
strings/O carefully/O tied/O over/O their/O ears/O,/O and/O all/O these/O people/O either/O
thinking/O of/O nothing/O at/O all/O or/O thinking/O of/O all/O sorts/O of/O things/O except/O the/O
music/O./O He/O tried/O to/O avoid/O meeting/O musical/O connoisseurs/O or/O talkative/O
acquaintances/O,/O and/O stood/O looking/O at/O the/O floor/O straight/O before/O him/O,/O
listening/O./O

But/O the/O more/O he/O listened/O to/O the/O fantasia/O of/O King/O Lear/PERSON the/O further/O he/O
felt/O from/O forming/O any/O definite/O opinion/O of/O it/O./O There/O was/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O a/O
continual/O beginning/O,/O a/O preparation/O of/O the/O musical/O expression/O of/O some/O
feeling/O,/O but/O it/O fell/O to/O pieces/O again/O directly/O,/O breaking/O into/O new/O musical/O
motives/O,/O or/O simply/O nothing/O but/O the/O whims/O of/O the/O composer/O,/O exceedingly/O
complex/O but/O disconnected/O sounds/O./O And/O these/O fragmentary/O musical/O
expressions/O,/O though/O sometimes/O beautiful/O,/O were/O disagreeable/O,/O because/O they/O
were/O utterly/O unexpected/O and/O not/O led/O up/O to/O by/O anything/O./O Gaiety/O and/O grief/O
and/O despair/O and/O tenderness/O and/O triumph/O followed/O one/O another/O without/O any/O
connection/O,/O like/O the/O emotions/O of/O a/O madman/O./O And/O those/O emotions/O,/O like/O a/O
madman/O's/O,/O sprang/O up/O quite/O unexpectedly/O./O

During/O the/O whole/O of/O the/O performance/O Levin/PERSON felt/O like/O a/O deaf/O man/O watching/O
people/O dancing/O,/O and/O was/O in/O a/O state/O of/O complete/O bewilderment/O when/O the/O
fantasia/O was/O over/O,/O and/O felt/O a/O great/O weariness/O from/O the/O fruitless/O strain/O
on/O his/O attention/O./O Loud/O applause/O resounded/O on/O all/O sides/O./O Everyone/O got/O up/O,/O
moved/O about/O,/O and/O began/O talking/O./O Anxious/O to/O throw/O some/O light/O on/O his/O own/O
perplexity/O from/O the/O impressions/O of/O others/O,/O Levin/PERSON began/O to/O walk/O about/O,/O
looking/O for/O connoisseurs/O,/O and/O was/O glad/O to/O see/O a/O well-known/O musical/O
amateur/O in/O conversation/O with/O Pestsov/PERSON,/O whom/O he/O knew/O./O

``/OMarvelous/O!/O''/O Pestsov/PERSON was/O saying/O in/O his/O mellow/O bass/O./O ``/OHow/O are/O you/O,/O
Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON?/O Particularly/O sculpturesque/O and/O plastic/O,/O so/O to/O
say/O,/O and/O richly/O colored/O is/O that/O passage/O where/O you/O feel/O Cordelia/PERSON's/O
approach/O,/O where/O woman/O,/O _/Odas/O ewig/O Weibliche/O,/O_/O enters/O into/O conflict/O with/O
fate/O./O Is/On't/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O mean/O .../O what/O has/O Cordelia/PERSON to/O do/O with/O it/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON asked/O timidly/O,/O
forgetting/O that/O the/O fantasia/O was/O supposed/O to/O represent/O King/O Lear/PERSON./O

``/OCordelia/PERSON comes/O in/O .../O see/O here/O!/O''/O said/O Pestsov/PERSON,/O tapping/O his/O finger/O on/O
the/O satiny/O surface/O of/O the/O program/O he/O held/O in/O his/O hand/O and/O passing/O it/O to/O
Levin/PERSON./O

Only/O then/O Levin/PERSON recollected/O the/O title/O of/O the/O fantasia/O,/O and/O made/O haste/O to/O
read/O in/O the/O Russian/O translation/O the/O lines/O from/O Shakespeare/PERSON that/O were/O
printed/O on/O the/O back/O of/O the/O program/O./O

``/OYou/O ca/On't/O follow/O it/O without/O that/O,/O''/O said/O Pestsov/PERSON,/O addressing/O Levin/PERSON,/O as/O
the/O person/O he/O had/O been/O speaking/O to/O had/O gone/O away/O,/O and/O he/O had/O no/O one/O to/O
talk/O to/O./O

In/O the/O _/Oentr/O'/Oacte/O_/O Levin/PERSON and/O Pestsov/PERSON fell/O into/O an/O argument/O upon/O the/O
merits/O and/O defects/O of/O music/O of/O the/O Wagner/PERSON school/O./O Levin/PERSON maintained/O that/O
the/O mistake/O of/O Wagner/PERSON and/O all/O his/O followers/O lay/O in/O their/O trying/O to/O take/O
music/O into/O the/O sphere/O of/O another/O art/O,/O just/O as/O poetry/O goes/O wrong/O when/O it/O
tries/O to/O paint/O a/O face/O as/O the/O art/O of/O painting/O ought/O to/O do/O,/O and/O as/O an/O
instance/O of/O this/O mistake/O he/O cited/O the/O sculptor/O who/O carved/O in/O marble/O
certain/O poetic/O phantasms/O flitting/O round/O the/O figure/O of/O the/O poet/O on/O the/O
pedestal/O./O ``/OThese/O phantoms/O were/O so/O far/O from/O being/O phantoms/O that/O they/O were/O
positively/O clinging/O on/O the/O ladder/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O The/O comparison/O pleased/O
him/O,/O but/O he/O could/O not/O remember/O whether/O he/O had/O not/O used/O the/O same/O phrase/O
before/O,/O and/O to/O Pestsov/PERSON,/O too/O,/O and/O as/O he/O said/O it/O he/O felt/O confused/O./O

Pestsov/PERSON maintained/O that/O art/O is/O one/O,/O and/O that/O it/O can/O attain/O its/O highest/O
manifestations/O only/O by/O conjunction/O with/O all/O kinds/O of/O art/O./O

The/O second/O piece/O that/O was/O performed/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O hear/O./O Pestsov/PERSON,/O who/O
was/O standing/O beside/O him/O,/O was/O talking/O to/O him/O almost/O all/O the/O time/O,/O
condemning/O the/O music/O for/O its/O excessive/O affected/O assumption/O of/O
simplicity/O,/O and/O comparing/O it/O with/O the/O simplicity/O of/O the/O Pre-Raphaelites/O
in/O painting/O./O As/O he/O went/O out/O Levin/PERSON met/O many/O more/O acquaintances/O,/O with/O whom/O
he/O talked/O of/O politics/O,/O of/O music/O,/O and/O of/O common/O acquaintances/O./O Among/O
others/O he/O met/O Count/PERSON Bol/PERSON,/O whom/O he/O had/O utterly/O forgotten/O to/O call/O upon/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O go/O at/O once/O then/O,/O''/O Madame/PERSON Lvova/PERSON said/O,/O when/O he/O told/O her/O;/O ``/Operhaps/O
they/O'll/O not/O be/O at/O home/O,/O and/O then/O you/O can/O come/O to/O the/O meeting/O to/O fetch/O
me/O./O You/O'll/O find/O me/O still/O there/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 6/O


``/OPerhaps/O they/O're/O not/O at/O home/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O as/O he/O went/O into/O the/O hall/O of/O
Countess/O Bola/O's/O house/O./O

``/OAt/O home/O;/O please/O walk/O in/O,/O''/O said/O the/O porter/O,/O resolutely/O removing/O his/O
overcoat/O./O

``/OHow/O annoying/O!/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON with/O a/O sigh/O,/O taking/O off/O one/O glove/O and/O
stroking/O his/O hat/O./O ``/OWhat/O did/O I/O come/O for/O?/O What/O have/O I/O to/O say/O to/O them/O?/O''/O

As/O he/O passed/O through/O the/O first/O drawing/O room/O Levin/PERSON met/O in/O the/O doorway/O
Countess/ORGANIZATION Bola/ORGANIZATION,/O giving/O some/O order/O to/O a/O servant/O with/O a/O care-worn/O and/O
severe/O face/O./O On/O seeing/O Levin/PERSON she/O smiled/O,/O and/O asked/O him/O to/O come/O into/O the/O
little/O drawing/O room/O,/O where/O he/O heard/O voices/O./O In/O this/O room/O there/O were/O
sitting/O in/O armchairs/O the/O two/O daughters/O of/O the/O countess/O,/O and/O a/O Moscow/LOCATION
colonel/O,/O whom/O Levin/PERSON knew/O./O Levin/PERSON went/O up/O,/O greeted/O them/O,/O and/O sat/O down/O
beside/O the/O sofa/O with/O his/O hat/O on/O his/O knees/O./O

``/OHow/O is/O your/O wife/O?/O Have/O you/O been/O at/O the/O concert/O?/O We/O could/On't/O go/O./O Mamma/O
had/O to/O be/O at/O the/O funeral/O service/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O heard/O.../O./O What/O a/O sudden/O death/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

The/O countess/O came/O in/O,/O sat/O down/O on/O the/O sofa/O,/O and/O she/O too/O asked/O after/O his/O
wife/O and/O inquired/O about/O the/O concert/O./O

Levin/PERSON answered/O,/O and/O repeated/O an/O inquiry/O about/O Madame/PERSON Apraksina/PERSON's/O sudden/O
death/O./O

``/OBut/O she/O was/O always/O in/O weak/O health/O./O''/O

``/OWere/O you/O at/O the/O opera/O yesterday/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O was/O./O''/O

``/OLucca/LOCATION was/O very/O good/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O very/O good/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O as/O it/O was/O utterly/O of/O no/O consequence/O to/O
him/O what/O they/O thought/O of/O him/O,/O he/O began/O repeating/O what/O they/O had/O heard/O a/O
hundred/O times/O about/O the/O characteristics/O of/O the/O singer/O's/O talent/O./O Countess/O
Bola/O pretended/O to/O be/O listening/O./O Then/O,/O when/O he/O had/O said/O enough/O and/O
paused/O,/O the/O colonel/O,/O who/O had/O been/O silent/O till/O then/O,/O began/O to/O talk/O./O The/O
colonel/O too/O talked/O of/O the/O opera/O,/O and/O about/O culture/O./O At/O last/O,/O after/O
speaking/O of/O the/O proposed/O _/Ofolle/O journée/O_/O at/O Turin/LOCATION's/O,/O the/O colonel/O
laughed/O,/O got/O up/O noisily/O,/O and/O went/O away/O./O Levin/PERSON too/O rose/O,/O but/O he/O saw/O by/O
the/O face/O of/O the/O countess/O that/O it/O was/O not/O yet/O time/O for/O him/O to/O go/O./O He/O must/O
stay/O two/O minutes/O longer/O./O He/O sat/O down/O./O

But/O as/O he/O was/O thinking/O all/O the/O while/O how/O stupid/O it/O was/O,/O he/O could/O not/O
find/O a/O subject/O for/O conversation/O,/O and/O sat/O silent/O./O

``/OYou/O are/O not/O going/O to/O the/O public/O meeting/O?/O They/O say/O it/O will/O be/O very/O
interesting/O,/O''/O began/O the/O countess/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O promised/O my/O _/Obelle-soeur/O_/O to/O fetch/O her/O from/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

A/O silence/O followed/O./O The/O mother/O once/O more/O exchanged/O glances/O with/O a/O
daughter/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O now/O I/O think/O the/O time/O has/O come/O,/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O he/O got/O up/O./O The/O
ladies/O shook/O hands/O with/O him/O,/O and/O begged/O him/O to/O say/O _/Omille/O choses/O_/O to/O his/O
wife/O for/O them/O./O

The/O porter/O asked/O him/O,/O as/O he/O gave/O him/O his/O coat/O,/O ``/OWhere/O is/O your/O honor/O
staying/O?/O''/O and/O immediately/O wrote/O down/O his/O address/O in/O a/O big/O handsomely/O
bound/O book/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O I/O do/On't/O care/O,/O but/O still/O I/O feel/O ashamed/O and/O awfully/O stupid/O,/O''/O
thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O consoling/O himself/O with/O the/O reflection/O that/O everyone/O does/O
it/O./O He/O drove/O to/O the/O public/O meeting/O,/O where/O he/O was/O to/O find/O his/O
sister-in-law/O,/O so/O as/O to/O drive/O home/O with/O her/O./O

At/O the/O public/O meeting/O of/O the/O committee/O there/O were/O a/O great/O many/O people/O,/O
and/O almost/O all/O the/O highest/O society/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O in/O time/O for/O the/O report/O
which/O,/O as/O everyone/O said/O,/O was/O very/O interesting/O./O When/O the/O reading/O of/O the/O
report/O was/O over/O,/O people/O moved/O about/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON met/O Sviazhsky/PERSON,/O who/O
invited/O him/O very/O pressingly/O to/O come/O that/O evening/O to/O a/O meeting/O of/O the/O
Society/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION Agriculture/ORGANIZATION,/O where/O a/O celebrated/O lecture/O was/O to/O be/O delivered/O,/O
and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O who/O had/O only/O just/O come/O from/O the/O races/O,/O and/O many/O
other/O acquaintances/O;/O and/O Levin/PERSON heard/O and/O uttered/O various/O criticisms/O on/O
the/O meeting/O,/O on/O the/O new/O fantasia/O,/O and/O on/O a/O public/O trial/O./O But/O,/O probably/O
from/O the/O mental/O fatigue/O he/O was/O beginning/O to/O feel/O,/O he/O made/O a/O blunder/O in/O
speaking/O of/O the/O trial/O,/O and/O this/O blunder/O he/O recalled/O several/O times/O with/O
vexation/O./O Speaking/O of/O the/O sentence/O upon/O a/O foreigner/O who/O had/O been/O
condemned/O in/O Russia/LOCATION,/O and/O of/O how/O unfair/O it/O would/O be/O to/O punish/O him/O by/O
exile/O abroad/O,/O Levin/PERSON repeated/O what/O he/O had/O heard/O the/O day/O before/O in/O
conversation/O from/O an/O acquaintance/O./O

``/OI/O think/O sending/O him/O abroad/O is/O much/O the/O same/O as/O punishing/O a/O carp/O by/O
putting/O it/O into/O the/O water/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O Then/O he/O recollected/O that/O this/O
idea/O,/O which/O he/O had/O heard/O from/O an/O acquaintance/O and/O uttered/O as/O his/O own/O,/O
came/O from/O a/O fable/O of/O Krilov/PERSON's/O,/O and/O that/O the/O acquaintance/O had/O picked/O it/O
up/O from/O a/O newspaper/O article/O./O

After/O driving/O home/O with/O his/O sister-in-law/O,/O and/O finding/O Kitty/PERSON in/O good/O
spirits/O and/O quite/O well/O,/O Levin/PERSON drove/O to/O the/O club/O./O



Chapter/O 7/O


Levin/PERSON reached/O the/O club/O just/O at/O the/O right/O time/O./O Members/O and/O visitors/O were/O
driving/O up/O as/O he/O arrived/O./O Levin/PERSON had/O not/O been/O at/O the/O club/O for/O a/O very/O long/O
while/O--/Onot/O since/O he/O lived/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O when/O he/O was/O leaving/O the/O university/O
and/O going/O into/O society/O./O He/O remembered/O the/O club/O,/O the/O external/O details/O of/O
its/O arrangement/O,/O but/O he/O had/O completely/O forgotten/O the/O impression/O it/O had/O
made/O on/O him/O in/O old/O days/O./O But/O as/O soon/O as/O,/O driving/O into/O the/O wide/O
semicircular/O court/O and/O getting/O out/O of/O the/O sledge/O,/O he/O mounted/O the/O steps/O,/O
and/O the/O hall/O porter/O,/O adorned/O with/O a/O crossway/O scarf/O,/O noiselessly/O opened/O
the/O door/O to/O him/O with/O a/O bow/O;/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O saw/O in/O the/O porter/O's/O room/O the/O
cloaks/O and/O galoshes/O of/O members/O who/O thought/O it/O less/O trouble/O to/O take/O them/O
off/O downstairs/O;/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O heard/O the/O mysterious/O ringing/O bell/O that/O
preceded/O him/O as/O he/O ascended/O the/O easy/O,/O carpeted/O staircase/O,/O and/O saw/O the/O
statue/O on/O the/O landing/O,/O and/O the/O third/O porter/O at/O the/O top/O doors/O,/O a/O familiar/O
figure/O grown/O older/O,/O in/O the/O club/O livery/O,/O opening/O the/O door/O without/O haste/O
or/O delay/O,/O and/O scanning/O the/O visitors/O as/O they/O passed/O in/O--/OLevin/PERSON felt/O the/O old/O
impression/O of/O the/O club/O come/O back/O in/O a/O rush/O,/O an/O impression/O of/O repose/O,/O
comfort/O,/O and/O propriety/O./O

``/OYour/O hat/O,/O please/O,/O''/O the/O porter/O said/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O who/O forgot/O the/O club/O rule/O
to/O leave/O his/O hat/O in/O the/O porter/O's/O room/O./O ``/OLong/O time/O since/O you/O've/O been/O./O The/O
prince/O put/O your/O name/O down/O yesterday/O./O Prince/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON is/O not/O
here/O yet/O./O''/O

The/O porter/O did/O not/O only/O know/O Levin/PERSON,/O but/O also/O all/O his/O ties/O and/O
relationships/O,/O and/O so/O immediately/O mentioned/O his/O intimate/O friends/O./O

Passing/O through/O the/O outer/O hall/O,/O divided/O up/O by/O screens/O,/O and/O the/O room/O
partitioned/O on/O the/O right/O,/O where/O a/O man/O sits/O at/O the/O fruit/O buffet/O,/O Levin/PERSON
overtook/O an/O old/O man/O walking/O slowly/O in/O,/O and/O entered/O the/O dining/O room/O full/O
of/O noise/O and/O people/O./O

He/O walked/O along/O the/O tables/O,/O almost/O all/O full/O,/O and/O looked/O at/O the/O visitors/O./O
He/O saw/O people/O of/O all/O sorts/O,/O old/O and/O young/O;/O some/O he/O knew/O a/O little/O,/O some/O
intimate/O friends/O./O There/O was/O not/O a/O single/O cross/O or/O worried-looking/O face/O./O
All/O seemed/O to/O have/O left/O their/O cares/O and/O anxieties/O in/O the/O porter/O's/O room/O
with/O their/O hats/O,/O and/O were/O all/O deliberately/O getting/O ready/O to/O enjoy/O the/O
material/O blessings/O of/O life/O./O Sviazhsky/PERSON was/O here/O and/O Shtcherbatsky/PERSON,/O
Nevyedovsky/PERSON and/O the/O old/O prince/O,/O and/O Vronsky/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OAh/O!/O why/O are/O you/O late/O?/O''/O the/O prince/O said/O smiling/O,/O and/O giving/O him/O his/O hand/O
over/O his/O own/O shoulder/O./O ``/OHow/O's/O Kitty/PERSON?/O''/O he/O added/O,/O smoothing/O out/O the/O napkin/O
he/O had/O tucked/O in/O at/O his/O waistcoat/O buttons/O./O

``/OAll/O right/O;/O they/O are/O dining/O at/O home/O,/O all/O the/O three/O of/O them/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O `/OAline-Nadine/O,/O'/O to/O be/O sure/O!/O There/O's/O no/O room/O with/O us/O./O Go/O to/O that/O
table/O,/O and/O make/O haste/O and/O take/O a/O seat/O,/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O,/O and/O turning/O
away/O he/O carefully/O took/O a/O plate/O of/O eel/O soup/O./O

``/OLevin/PERSON,/O this/O way/O!/O''/O a/O good-natured/O voice/O shouted/O a/O little/O farther/O on/O./O It/O
was/O Turovtsin/PERSON./O He/O was/O sitting/O with/O a/O young/O officer/O,/O and/O beside/O them/O were/O
two/O chairs/O turned/O upside/O down/O./O Levin/PERSON gladly/O went/O up/O to/O them/O./O He/O had/O
always/O liked/O the/O good-hearted/O rake/O,/O Turovtsin/PERSON--/Ohe/O was/O associated/O in/O his/O
mind/O with/O memories/O of/O his/O courtship/O--/Oand/O at/O that/O moment/O,/O after/O the/O strain/O
of/O intellectual/O conversation/O,/O the/O sight/O of/O Turovtsin/PERSON's/O good-natured/O face/O
was/O particularly/O welcome/O./O

``/OFor/O you/O and/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O He/O'll/O be/O here/O directly/O./O''/O

The/O young/O man/O,/O holding/O himself/O very/O erect/O,/O with/O eyes/O forever/O twinkling/O
