with/O enjoyment/O,/O was/O an/O officer/O from/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O Gagin/PERSON./O Turovtsin/PERSON
introduced/O them/O./O

``/OOblonsky/O's/O always/O late/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O here/O he/O is/O!/O''/O

``/OHave/O you/O only/O just/O come/O?/O''/O said/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O coming/O quickly/O towards/O them/O./O
``/OGood/O day/O./O Had/O some/O vodka/O?/O Well/O,/O come/O along/O then/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON got/O up/O and/O went/O with/O him/O to/O the/O big/O table/O spread/O with/O spirits/O and/O
appetizers/O of/O the/O most/O various/O kinds/O./O One/O would/O have/O thought/O that/O out/O of/O
two/O dozen/O delicacies/O one/O might/O find/O something/O to/O one/O's/O taste/O,/O but/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON asked/O for/O something/O special/O,/O and/O one/O of/O the/O liveried/O
waiters/O standing/O by/O immediately/O brought/O what/O was/O required/O./O They/O drank/O a/O
wine/O glassful/O and/O returned/O to/O their/O table/O./O

At/O once/O,/O while/O they/O were/O still/O at/O the/O soup/O,/O Gagin/PERSON was/O served/O with/O
champagne/O,/O and/O told/O the/O waiter/O to/O fill/O four/O glasses/O./O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O
refuse/O the/O wine/O,/O and/O asked/O for/O a/O second/O bottle/O./O He/O was/O very/O hungry/O,/O and/O
ate/O and/O drank/O with/O great/O enjoyment/O,/O and/O with/O still/O greater/O enjoyment/O
took/O part/O in/O the/O lively/O and/O simple/O conversation/O of/O his/O companions/O./O
Gagin/PERSON,/O dropping/O his/O voice/O,/O told/O the/O last/O good/O story/O from/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O and/O
the/O story/O,/O though/O improper/O and/O stupid/O,/O was/O so/O ludicrous/O that/O Levin/PERSON broke/O
into/O roars/O of/O laughter/O so/O loud/O that/O those/O near/O looked/O round/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O in/O the/O same/O style/O as/O,/O `/Othat/O's/O a/O thing/O I/O ca/On't/O endure/O!/O'/O You/O know/O
the/O story/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OAh/O,/O that/O's/O exquisite/O!/O Another/O
bottle/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O waiter/O,/O and/O he/O began/O to/O relate/O his/O good/O story/O./O

``/OPyotr/PERSON Illyitch/PERSON Vinovsky/PERSON invites/O you/O to/O drink/O with/O him/O,/O''/O a/O little/O old/O
waiter/O interrupted/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O bringing/O two/O delicate/O glasses/O of/O
sparkling/O champagne/O,/O and/O addressing/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON and/O Levin/PERSON./O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON took/O the/O glass/O,/O and/O looking/O towards/O a/O bald/O man/O with/O
red/O mustaches/O at/O the/O other/O end/O of/O the/O table/O,/O he/O nodded/O to/O him/O,/O smiling/O./O

``/OWho/O's/O that/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O met/O him/O once/O at/O my/O place/O,/O do/On't/O you/O remember/O?/O A/O good-natured/O
fellow/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON did/O the/O same/O as/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON and/O took/O the/O glass/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O anecdote/O too/O was/O very/O amusing/O./O Levin/PERSON told/O his/O
story/O,/O and/O that/O too/O was/O successful/O./O Then/O they/O talked/O of/O horses/O,/O of/O the/O
races/O,/O of/O what/O they/O had/O been/O doing/O that/O day/O,/O and/O of/O how/O smartly/O
Vronsky/O's/O Atlas/O had/O won/O the/O first/O prize/O./O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O notice/O how/O the/O
time/O passed/O at/O dinner/O./O

``/OAh/O!/O and/O here/O they/O are/O!/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O towards/O the/O end/O of/O
dinner/O,/O leaning/O over/O the/O back/O of/O his/O chair/O and/O holding/O out/O his/O hand/O to/O
Vronsky/PERSON,/O who/O came/O up/O with/O a/O tall/O officer/O of/O the/O Guards/O./O Vronsky/PERSON's/O face/O
too/O beamed/O with/O the/O look/O of/O good-humored/O enjoyment/O that/O was/O general/O in/O
the/O club/O./O He/O propped/O his/O elbow/O playfully/O on/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O
shoulder/O,/O whispering/O something/O to/O him/O,/O and/O he/O held/O out/O his/O hand/O to/O Levin/PERSON
with/O the/O same/O good-humored/O smile/O./O

``/OVery/O glad/O to/O meet/O you/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OI/O looked/O out/O for/O you/O at/O the/O election/O,/O
but/O I/O was/O told/O you/O had/O gone/O away/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O left/O the/O same/O day/O./O We/O've/O just/O been/O talking/O of/O your/O horse/O./O I/O
congratulate/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OIt/O was/O very/O rapidly/O run/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O;/O you/O've/O race/O horses/O too/O,/O have/On't/O you/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O my/O father/O had/O;/O but/O I/O remember/O and/O know/O something/O about/O it/O./O''/O

``/OWhere/O have/O you/O dined/O?/O''/O asked/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OWe/O were/O at/O the/O second/O table/O,/O behind/O the/O columns/O./O''/O

``/OWe/O've/O been/O celebrating/O his/O success/O,/O''/O said/O the/O tall/O colonel/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O his/O
second/O Imperial/O prize/O./O I/O wish/O I/O might/O have/O the/O luck/O at/O cards/O he/O has/O with/O
horses/O./O Well/O,/O why/O waste/O the/O precious/O time/O?/O I/O'm/O going/O to/O the/O `/Oinfernal/O
regions/O,/O'/O''/O added/O the/O colonel/O,/O and/O he/O walked/O away/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O Yashvin/O,/O''/O Vronsky/PERSON said/O in/O answer/O to/O Turovtsin/LOCATION,/O and/O he/O sat/O down/O
in/O the/O vacated/O seat/O beside/O them/O./O He/O drank/O the/O glass/O offered/O him/O,/O and/O
ordered/O a/O bottle/O of/O wine/O./O Under/O the/O influence/O of/O the/O club/O atmosphere/O or/O
the/O wine/O he/O had/O drunk/O,/O Levin/PERSON chatted/O away/O to/O Vronsky/O of/O the/O best/O breeds/O
of/O cattle/O,/O and/O was/O very/O glad/O not/O to/O feel/O the/O slightest/O hostility/O to/O this/O
man/O./O He/O even/O told/O him/O,/O among/O other/O things/O,/O that/O he/O had/O heard/O from/O his/O
wife/O that/O she/O had/O met/O him/O at/O Princess/O Marya/PERSON Borissovna/PERSON's/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O Princess/O Marya/PERSON Borissovna/PERSON,/O she/O's/O exquisite/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O and/O he/O told/O an/O anecdote/O about/O her/O which/O set/O them/O all/O
laughing/O./O Vronsky/O particularly/O laughed/O with/O such/O simplehearted/O amusement/O
that/O Levin/PERSON felt/O quite/O reconciled/O to/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O have/O we/O finished/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O with/O a/O
smile/O./O ``/OLet/O us/O go/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 8/O


Getting/O up/O from/O the/O table/O,/O Levin/PERSON walked/O with/O Gagin/PERSON through/O the/O lofty/O
room/O to/O the/O billiard/O room/O,/O feeling/O his/O arms/O swing/O as/O he/O walked/O with/O a/O
peculiar/O lightness/O and/O ease/O./O As/O he/O crossed/O the/O big/O room/O,/O he/O came/O upon/O
his/O father-in-law/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O do/O you/O like/O our/O Temple/O of/O Indolence/O?/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O,/O taking/O
his/O arm/O./O ``/OCome/O along/O,/O come/O along/O!/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O wanted/O to/O walk/O about/O and/O look/O at/O everything/O./O It/O's/O interesting/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O it/O's/O interesting/O for/O you/O./O But/O its/O interest/O for/O me/O is/O quite/O
different/O./O You/O look/O at/O those/O little/O old/O men/O now/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O pointing/O to/O a/O
club/O member/O with/O bent/O back/O and/O projecting/O lip/O,/O shuffling/O towards/O them/O in/O
his/O soft/O boots/O,/O ``/Oand/O imagine/O that/O they/O were/O _/Oshlupiks/O_/O like/O that/O from/O
their/O birth/O up/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O _/Oshlupiks/O_/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O see/O you/O do/On't/O know/O that/O name/O./O That/O's/O our/O club/O designation/O./O You/O know/O
the/O game/O of/O rolling/O eggs/O:/O when/O one/O's/O rolled/O a/O long/O while/O it/O becomes/O a/O
_/Oshlupik/O_/O./O So/O it/O is/O with/O us/O;/O one/O goes/O on/O coming/O and/O coming/O to/O the/O club/O,/O
and/O ends/O by/O becoming/O a/O _/Oshlupik/O_/O./O Ah/O,/O you/O laugh/O!/O but/O we/O look/O out/O,/O for/O
fear/O of/O dropping/O into/O it/O ourselves/O./O You/O know/O Prince/O Tchetchensky/PERSON?/O''/O
inquired/O the/O prince/O;/O and/O Levin/PERSON saw/O by/O his/O face/O that/O he/O was/O just/O going/O to/O
relate/O something/O funny/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O do/On't/O know/O him/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O say/O so/O!/O Well/O,/O Prince/PERSON Tchetchensky/PERSON is/O a/O well-known/O figure/O./O No/O
matter/O,/O though/O./O He/O's/O always/O playing/O billiards/O here/O./O Only/O three/O years/O ago/O
he/O was/O not/O a/O _/Oshlupik/O_/O and/O kept/O up/O his/O spirits/O and/O even/O used/O to/O call/O
other/O people/O _/Oshlupiks/O_/O./O But/O one/O day/O he/O turns/O up/O,/O and/O our/O porter/O .../O you/O
know/O Vassily/PERSON?/O Why/O,/O that/O fat/O one/O;/O he/O's/O famous/O for/O his/O _/Obon/O mots/O_/O./O And/O so/O
Prince/PERSON Tchetchensky/PERSON asks/O him/O,/O `/OCome/O,/O Vassily/PERSON,/O who/O's/O here/O?/O Any/O _/Oshlupiks/O_/O
here/O yet/O?/O'/O And/O he/O says/O,/O `/OYou/O're/O the/O third/O./O'/O Yes/O,/O my/O dear/O boy/O,/O that/O he/O
did/O!/O''/O

Talking/O and/O greeting/O the/O friends/O they/O met/O,/O Levin/PERSON and/O the/O prince/O walked/O
through/O all/O the/O rooms/O:/O the/O great/O room/O where/O tables/O had/O already/O been/O set/O,/O
and/O the/O usual/O partners/O were/O playing/O for/O small/O stakes/O;/O the/O divan/O room/O,/O
where/O they/O were/O playing/O chess/O,/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O sitting/O talking/O
to/O somebody/O;/O the/O billiard/O room/O,/O where/O,/O about/O a/O sofa/O in/O a/O recess/O,/O there/O
was/O a/O lively/O party/O drinking/O champagne/O--/OGagin/PERSON was/O one/O of/O them/O./O They/O peeped/O
into/O the/O ``/Oinfernal/O regions/O,/O''/O where/O a/O good/O many/O men/O were/O crowding/O round/O
one/O table/O,/O at/O which/O Yashvin/PERSON was/O sitting/O./O Trying/O not/O to/O make/O a/O noise/O,/O
they/O walked/O into/O the/O dark/O reading/O room/O,/O where/O under/O the/O shaded/O lamps/O
there/O sat/O a/O young/O man/O with/O a/O wrathful/O countenance/O,/O turning/O over/O one/O
journal/O after/O another/O,/O and/O a/O bald/O general/O buried/O in/O a/O book/O./O They/O went/O,/O
too/O,/O into/O what/O the/O prince/O called/O the/O intellectual/O room/O,/O where/O three/O
gentlemen/O were/O engaged/O in/O a/O heated/O discussion/O of/O the/O latest/O political/O
news/O./O

``/OPrince/O,/O please/O come/O,/O we/O're/O ready/O,/O''/O said/O one/O of/O his/O card/O party/O,/O who/O had/O
come/O to/O look/O for/O him/O,/O and/O the/O prince/O went/O off/O./O Levin/PERSON sat/O down/O and/O
listened/O,/O but/O recalling/O all/O the/O conversation/O of/O the/O morning/O he/O felt/O all/O
of/O a/O sudden/O fearfully/O bored/O./O He/O got/O up/O hurriedly/O,/O and/O went/O to/O look/O for/O
Oblonsky/PERSON and/O Turovtsin/PERSON,/O with/O whom/O it/O had/O been/O so/O pleasant/O./O

Turovtsin/PERSON was/O one/O of/O the/O circle/O drinking/O in/O the/O billiard/O room/O,/O and/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O talking/O with/O Vronsky/O near/O the/O door/O at/O the/O
farther/O corner/O of/O the/O room/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O that/O she/O's/O dull/O;/O but/O this/O undefined/O,/O this/O unsettled/O position/O,/O''/O
Levin/PERSON caught/O,/O and/O he/O was/O hurrying/O away/O,/O but/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON called/O
to/O him/O./O

``/OLevin/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O and/O Levin/PERSON noticed/O that/O his/O eyes/O were/O
not/O full/O of/O tears/O exactly/O,/O but/O moist/O,/O which/O always/O happened/O when/O he/O had/O
been/O drinking/O,/O or/O when/O he/O was/O touched/O./O Just/O now/O it/O was/O due/O to/O both/O
causes/O./O ``/OLevin/PERSON,/O do/On't/O go/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O he/O warmly/O squeezed/O his/O arm/O above/O
the/O elbow/O,/O obviously/O not/O at/O all/O wishing/O to/O let/O him/O go/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O a/O true/O friend/O of/O mine/O--/Oalmost/O my/O greatest/O friend/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O
Vronsky/O./O ``/OYou/O have/O become/O even/O closer/O and/O dearer/O to/O me/O./O And/O I/O want/O you/O,/O
and/O I/O know/O you/O ought/O,/O to/O be/O friends/O,/O and/O great/O friends/O,/O because/O you/O're/O
both/O splendid/O fellows/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O there/O's/O nothing/O for/O us/O now/O but/O to/O kiss/O and/O be/O friends/O,/O''/O Vronsky/PERSON
said/O,/O with/O good-natured/O playfulness/O,/O holding/O out/O his/O hand/O./O

Levin/PERSON quickly/O took/O the/O offered/O hand/O,/O and/O pressed/O it/O warmly/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O very/O,/O very/O glad/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWaiter/O,/O a/O bottle/O of/O champagne/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OAnd/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O

But/O in/O spite/O of/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O desire/O,/O and/O their/O own/O desire/O,/O they/O
had/O nothing/O to/O talk/O about/O,/O and/O both/O felt/O it/O./O

``/ODo/O you/O know/O,/O he/O has/O never/O met/O Anna/PERSON?/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O to/O
Vronsky/O./O ``/OAnd/O I/O want/O above/O everything/O to/O take/O him/O to/O see/O her/O./O Let/O us/O go/O,/O
Levin/PERSON!/O''/O

``/OReally/O?/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O ``/OShe/O will/O be/O very/O glad/O to/O see/O you/O./O I/O should/O be/O
going/O home/O at/O once/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O ``/Obut/O I/O'm/O worried/O about/O Yashvin/PERSON,/O and/O I/O
want/O to/O stay/O on/O till/O he/O finishes/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O is/O he/O losing/O?/O''/O

``/OHe/O keeps/O losing/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O the/O only/O friend/O that/O can/O restrain/O him/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O do/O you/O say/O to/O pyramids/O?/O Levin/PERSON,/O will/O you/O play/O?/O Capital/O!/O''/O said/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OGet/O the/O table/O ready/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O the/O marker/O./O

``/OIt/O has/O been/O ready/O a/O long/O while/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O marker/O,/O who/O had/O already/O
set/O the/O balls/O in/O a/O triangle/O,/O and/O was/O knocking/O the/O red/O one/O about/O for/O his/O
own/O diversion/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O let/O us/O begin/O./O''/O

After/O the/O game/O Vronsky/O and/O Levin/PERSON sat/O down/O at/O Gagin/LOCATION's/O table/O,/O and/O at/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O suggestion/O Levin/PERSON took/O a/O hand/O in/O the/O game/O./O

Vronsky/O sat/O down/O at/O the/O table/O,/O surrounded/O by/O friends/O,/O who/O were/O
incessantly/O coming/O up/O to/O him/O./O Every/O now/O and/O then/O he/O went/O to/O the/O
``/Oinfernal/O''/O to/O keep/O an/O eye/O on/O Yashvin/O./O Levin/PERSON was/O enjoying/O a/O delightful/O
sense/O of/O repose/O after/O the/O mental/O fatigue/O of/O the/O morning/O./O He/O was/O glad/O
that/O all/O hostility/O was/O at/O an/O end/O with/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O the/O sense/O of/O peace/O,/O
decorum/O,/O and/O comfort/O never/O left/O him/O./O

When/O the/O game/O was/O over/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON took/O Levin/PERSON's/O arm/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O let/O us/O go/O to/O Anna/PERSON's/O,/O then/O./O At/O once/O?/O Eh/O?/O She/O is/O at/O home/O./O I/O
promised/O her/O long/O ago/O to/O bring/O you/O./O Where/O were/O you/O meaning/O to/O spend/O the/O
evening/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O nowhere/O specially/O./O I/O promised/O Sviazhsky/PERSON to/O go/O to/O the/O Society/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION
Agriculture/ORGANIZATION./O By/O all/O means/O,/O let/O us/O go/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OVery/O good/O;/O come/O along/O./O Find/O out/O if/O my/O carriage/O is/O here/O,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O to/O the/O waiter/O./O

Levin/PERSON went/O up/O to/O the/O table/O,/O paid/O the/O forty/O roubles/O he/O had/O lost/O;/O paid/O his/O
bill/O,/O the/O amount/O of/O which/O was/O in/O some/O mysterious/O way/O ascertained/O by/O the/O
little/O old/O waiter/O who/O stood/O at/O the/O counter/O,/O and/O swinging/O his/O arms/O he/O
walked/O through/O all/O the/O rooms/O to/O the/O way/O out/O./O



Chapter/O 9/O


``/OOblonsky/O's/O carriage/O!/O''/O the/O porter/O shouted/O in/O an/O angry/O bass/O./O The/O carriage/O
drove/O up/O and/O both/O got/O in/O./O It/O was/O only/O for/O the/O first/O few/O moments/O,/O while/O
the/O carriage/O was/O driving/O out/O of/O the/O clubhouse/O gates/O,/O that/O Levin/PERSON was/O
still/O under/O the/O influence/O of/O the/O club/O atmosphere/O of/O repose/O,/O comfort/O,/O and/O
unimpeachable/O good/O form/O./O But/O as/O soon/O as/O the/O carriage/O drove/O out/O into/O the/O
street/O,/O and/O he/O felt/O it/O jolting/O over/O the/O uneven/O road/O,/O heard/O the/O angry/O
shout/O of/O a/O sledge/O driver/O coming/O towards/O them/O,/O saw/O in/O the/O uncertain/O light/O
the/O red/O blind/O of/O a/O tavern/O and/O the/O shops/O,/O this/O impression/O was/O dissipated/O,/O
and/O he/O began/O to/O think/O over/O his/O actions/O,/O and/O to/O wonder/O whether/O he/O was/O
doing/O right/O in/O going/O to/O see/O Anna/PERSON./O What/O would/O Kitty/PERSON say/O?/O But/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON gave/O him/O no/O time/O for/O reflection/O,/O and/O,/O as/O though/O divining/O
his/O doubts/O,/O he/O scattered/O them/O./O

``/OHow/O glad/O I/O am/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O ``/Othat/O you/O should/O know/O her/O!/O You/O know/O Dolly/PERSON has/O
long/O wished/O for/O it/O./O And/O Lvov/LOCATION's/O been/O to/O see/O her/O,/O and/O often/O goes/O./O Though/O
she/O is/O my/O sister/O,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON pursued/O,/O ``/OI/O do/On't/O hesitate/O to/O say/O
that/O she/O's/O a/O remarkable/O woman/O./O But/O you/O will/O see/O./O Her/O position/O is/O very/O
painful/O,/O especially/O now/O./O''/O

``/OWhy/O especially/O now/O?/O''/O

``/OWe/O are/O carrying/O on/O negotiations/O with/O her/O husband/O about/O a/O divorce/O./O And/O
he/O's/O agreed/O;/O but/O there/O are/O difficulties/O in/O regard/O to/O the/O son/O,/O and/O the/O
business/O,/O which/O ought/O to/O have/O been/O arranged/O long/O ago/O,/O has/O been/O dragging/O
on/O for/O three/O months/O past/O./O As/O soon/O as/O the/O divorce/O is/O over/O,/O she/O will/O marry/O
Vronsky/O./O How/O stupid/O these/O old/O ceremonies/O are/O,/O that/O no/O one/O believes/O in/O,/O
and/O which/O only/O prevent/O people/O being/O comfortable/O!/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
put/O in/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O then/O their/O position/O will/O be/O as/O regular/O as/O mine/O,/O as/O
yours/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O is/O the/O difficulty/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O it/O's/O a/O long/O and/O tedious/O story/O!/O The/O whole/O business/O is/O in/O such/O an/O
anomalous/O position/O with/O us/O./O But/O the/O point/O is/O she/O has/O been/O for/O three/O
months/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O where/O everyone/O knows/O her/O,/O waiting/O for/O the/O divorce/O;/O she/O
goes/O out/O nowhere/O,/O sees/O no/O woman/O except/O Dolly/PERSON,/O because/O,/O do/O you/O
understand/O,/O she/O does/On't/O care/O to/O have/O people/O come/O as/O a/O favor/O./O That/O fool/O
Princess/O Varvara/PERSON,/O even/O she/O has/O left/O her/O,/O considering/O this/O a/O breach/O of/O
propriety/O./O Well/O,/O you/O see/O,/O in/O such/O a/O position/O any/O other/O woman/O would/O not/O
have/O found/O resources/O in/O herself/O./O But/O you/O'll/O see/O how/O she/O has/O arranged/O her/O
life/O--/Ohow/O calm/O,/O how/O dignified/O she/O is/O./O To/O the/O left/O,/O in/O the/O crescent/O
opposite/O the/O church/O!/O''/O shouted/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O leaning/O out/O of/O the/O
window/O./O ``/OPhew/O!/O how/O hot/O it/O is/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O twelve/O degrees/O of/O
frost/O,/O flinging/O his/O open/O overcoat/O still/O wider/O open/O./O

``/OBut/O she/O has/O a/O daughter/O:/O no/O doubt/O she/O's/O busy/O looking/O after/O her/O?/O''/O said/O
Levin/PERSON./O

``/OI/O believe/O you/O picture/O every/O woman/O simply/O as/O a/O female/O,/O _/Oune/O couveuse/O,/O_/O''/O
said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OIf/O she/O's/O occupied/O,/O it/O must/O be/O with/O her/O
children/O./O No/O,/O she/O brings/O her/O up/O capitally/O,/O I/O believe/O,/O but/O one/O does/On't/O
hear/O about/O her/O./O She/O's/O busy/O,/O in/O the/O first/O place/O,/O with/O what/O she/O writes/O./O I/O
see/O you/O're/O smiling/O ironically/O,/O but/O you/O're/O wrong/O./O She/O's/O writing/O a/O
children/O's/O book/O,/O and/O does/On't/O talk/O about/O it/O to/O anyone/O,/O but/O she/O read/O it/O to/O
me/O and/O I/O gave/O the/O manuscript/O to/O Vorkuev/PERSON .../O you/O know/O the/O publisher/O .../O
and/O he/O's/O an/O author/O himself/O too/O,/O I/O fancy/O./O He/O understands/O those/O things/O,/O
and/O he/O says/O it/O's/O a/O remarkable/O piece/O of/O work/O./O But/O are/O you/O fancying/O she/O's/O
an/O authoress/O?/O--/Onot/O a/O bit/O of/O it/O./O She/O's/O a/O woman/O with/O a/O heart/O,/O before/O
everything/O,/O but/O you/O'll/O see/O./O Now/O she/O has/O a/O little/O English/O girl/O with/O her/O,/O
and/O a/O whole/O family/O she/O's/O looking/O after/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O something/O in/O a/O philanthropic/O way/O?/O''/O

``/OWhy/O,/O you/O will/O look/O at/O everything/O in/O the/O worst/O light/O./O It/O's/O not/O from/O
philanthropy/O,/O it/O's/O from/O the/O heart/O./O They/O--/Othat/O is/O,/O Vronsky/O--/Ohad/O a/O trainer/O,/O
an/O Englishman/O,/O first-rate/O in/O his/O own/O line/O,/O but/O a/O drunkard/O./O He/O's/O
completely/O given/O up/O to/O drink/O--/Odelirium/O tremens/O--/Oand/O the/O family/O were/O cast/O
on/O the/O world/O./O She/O saw/O them/O,/O helped/O them/O,/O got/O more/O and/O more/O interested/O in/O
them/O,/O and/O now/O the/O whole/O family/O is/O on/O her/O hands/O./O But/O not/O by/O way/O of/O
patronage/O,/O you/O know/O,/O helping/O with/O money/O;/O she/O's/O herself/O preparing/O the/O
boys/O in/O Russian/O for/O the/O high/O school/O,/O and/O she/O's/O taken/O the/O little/O girl/O to/O
live/O with/O her/O./O But/O you/O'll/O see/O her/O for/O yourself/O./O''/O

The/O carriage/O drove/O into/O the/O courtyard/O,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON rang/O
loudly/O at/O the/O entrance/O where/O sledges/O were/O standing/O./O

And/O without/O asking/O the/O servant/O who/O opened/O the/O door/O whether/O the/O lady/O were/O
at/O home/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON walked/O into/O the/O hall/O./O Levin/PERSON followed/O him/O,/O
more/O and/O more/O doubtful/O whether/O he/O was/O doing/O right/O or/O wrong/O./O

Looking/O at/O himself/O in/O the/O glass/O,/O Levin/PERSON noticed/O that/O he/O was/O red/O in/O the/O
face/O,/O but/O he/O felt/O certain/O he/O was/O not/O drunk/O,/O and/O he/O followed/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON up/O the/O carpeted/O stairs/O./O At/O the/O top/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
inquired/O of/O the/O footman/O,/O who/O bowed/O to/O him/O as/O to/O an/O intimate/O friend/O,/O who/O
was/O with/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O and/O received/O the/O answer/O that/O it/O was/O M./PERSON
Vorkuev/PERSON./O

``/OWhere/O are/O they/O?/O''/O

``/OIn/O the/O study/O./O''/O

Passing/O through/O the/O dining/O room/O,/O a/O room/O not/O very/O large/O,/O with/O dark/O,/O
paneled/O walls/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON and/O Levin/PERSON walked/O over/O the/O soft/O carpet/O
to/O the/O half-dark/O study/O,/O lighted/O up/O by/O a/O single/O lamp/O with/O a/O big/O dark/O
shade/O./O Another/O lamp/O with/O a/O reflector/O was/O hanging/O on/O the/O wall/O,/O lighting/O
up/O a/O big/O full-length/O portrait/O of/O a/O woman/O,/O which/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O help/O
looking/O at/O./O It/O was/O the/O portrait/O of/O Anna/PERSON,/O painted/O in/O Italy/LOCATION by/O Mihailov/PERSON./O
While/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON went/O behind/O the/O _/Otreillage/O_/O,/O and/O the/O man/O's/O
voice/O which/O had/O been/O speaking/O paused/O,/O Levin/PERSON gazed/O at/O the/O portrait/O,/O which/O
stood/O out/O from/O the/O frame/O in/O the/O brilliant/O light/O thrown/O on/O it/O,/O and/O he/O
could/O not/O tear/O himself/O away/O from/O it/O./O He/O positively/O forgot/O where/O he/O was/O,/O
and/O not/O even/O hearing/O what/O was/O said/O,/O he/O could/O not/O take/O his/O eyes/O off/O the/O
marvelous/O portrait/O./O It/O was/O not/O a/O picture/O,/O but/O a/O living/O,/O charming/O woman/O,/O
with/O black/O curling/O hair/O,/O with/O bare/O arms/O and/O shoulders/O,/O with/O a/O pensive/O
smile/O on/O the/O lips/O,/O covered/O with/O soft/O down/O;/O triumphantly/O and/O softly/O she/O
looked/O at/O him/O with/O eyes/O that/O baffled/O him/O./O She/O was/O not/O living/O only/O
because/O she/O was/O more/O beautiful/O than/O a/O living/O woman/O can/O be/O./O

``/OI/O am/O delighted/O!/O''/O He/O heard/O suddenly/O near/O him/O a/O voice/O,/O unmistakably/O
addressing/O him/O,/O the/O voice/O of/O the/O very/O woman/O he/O had/O been/O admiring/O in/O the/O
portrait/O./O Anna/PERSON had/O come/O from/O behind/O the/O treillage/O to/O meet/O him/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON
saw/O in/O the/O dim/O light/O of/O the/O study/O the/O very/O woman/O of/O the/O portrait/O,/O in/O a/O
dark/O blue/O shot/O gown/O,/O not/O in/O the/O same/O position/O nor/O with/O the/O same/O
expression/O,/O but/O with/O the/O same/O perfection/O of/O beauty/O which/O the/O artist/O had/O
caught/O in/O the/O portrait/O./O She/O was/O less/O dazzling/O in/O reality/O,/O but/O,/O on/O the/O
other/O hand/O,/O there/O was/O something/O fresh/O and/O seductive/O in/O the/O living/O woman/O
which/O was/O not/O in/O the/O portrait/O./O



Chapter/O 10/O


She/O had/O risen/O to/O meet/O him/O,/O not/O concealing/O her/O pleasure/O at/O seeing/O him/O;/O
and/O in/O the/O quiet/O ease/O with/O which/O she/O held/O out/O her/O little/O vigorous/O hand/O,/O
introduced/O him/O to/O Vorkuev/PERSON and/O indicated/O a/O red-haired/O,/O pretty/O little/O girl/O
who/O was/O sitting/O at/O work/O,/O calling/O her/O her/O pupil/O,/O Levin/PERSON recognized/O and/O
liked/O the/O manners/O of/O a/O woman/O of/O the/O great/O world/O,/O always/O self-possessed/O
and/O natural/O./O

``/OI/O am/O delighted/O,/O delighted/O,/O''/O she/O repeated/O,/O and/O on/O her/O lips/O these/O simple/O
words/O took/O for/O Levin/PERSON's/O ears/O a/O special/O significance/O./O ``/OI/O have/O known/O you/O
and/O liked/O you/O for/O a/O long/O while/O,/O both/O from/O your/O friendship/O with/O Stiva/PERSON and/O
for/O your/O wife/O's/O sake/O.../O./O I/O knew/O her/O for/O a/O very/O short/O time/O,/O but/O she/O left/O
on/O me/O the/O impression/O of/O an/O exquisite/O flower/O,/O simply/O a/O flower/O./O And/O to/O
think/O she/O will/O soon/O be/O a/O mother/O!/O''/O

She/O spoke/O easily/O and/O without/O haste/O,/O looking/O now/O and/O then/O from/O Levin/PERSON to/O
her/O brother/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON felt/O that/O the/O impression/O he/O was/O making/O was/O good/O,/O
and/O he/O felt/O immediately/O at/O home/O,/O simple/O and/O happy/O with/O her/O,/O as/O though/O he/O
had/O known/O her/O from/O childhood/O./O

``/OIvan/PERSON Petrovitch/PERSON and/O I/O settled/O in/O Alexey/PERSON's/O study/O,/O''/O she/O said/O in/O answer/O to/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O question/O whether/O he/O might/O smoke/O,/O ``/Ojust/O so/O as/O to/O be/O
able/O to/O smoke/O''/O--/Oand/O glancing/O at/O Levin/PERSON,/O instead/O of/O asking/O whether/O he/O would/O
smoke/O,/O she/O pulled/O closer/O a/O tortoise-shell/O cigar-case/O and/O took/O a/O
cigarette/O./O

``/OHow/O are/O you/O feeling/O today/O?/O''/O her/O brother/O asked/O her/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O nothing/O./O Nerves/O,/O as/O usual/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O is/On't/O it/O extraordinarily/O fine/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O noticing/O
that/O Levin/PERSON was/O scrutinizing/O the/O picture/O./O

``/OI/O have/O never/O seen/O a/O better/O portrait/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O extraordinarily/O like/O,/O is/On't/O it/O?/O''/O said/O Vorkuev/PERSON./O

Levin/PERSON looked/O from/O the/O portrait/O to/O the/O original/O./O A/O peculiar/O brilliance/O
lighted/O up/O Anna/PERSON's/O face/O when/O she/O felt/O his/O eyes/O on/O her/O./O Levin/PERSON flushed/O,/O and/O
to/O cover/O his/O confusion/O would/O have/O asked/O whether/O she/O had/O seen/O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON lately/O;/O but/O at/O that/O moment/O Anna/PERSON spoke/O./O ``/OWe/O were/O just/O
talking/O,/O Ivan/PERSON Petrovitch/PERSON and/O I/O,/O of/O Vashtchenkov/PERSON's/O last/O pictures/O./O Have/O
you/O seen/O them/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O have/O seen/O them/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OBut/O,/O I/O beg/O your/O pardon/O,/O I/O interrupted/O you/O .../O you/O were/O saying/O?/O.../O''/O

Levin/PERSON asked/O if/O she/O had/O seen/O Dolly/PERSON lately/O./O

``/OShe/O was/O here/O yesterday/O./O She/O was/O very/O indignant/O with/O the/O high/O school/O
people/O on/O Grisha/PERSON's/O account/O./O The/O Latin/O teacher/O,/O it/O seems/O,/O had/O been/O unfair/O
to/O him/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O have/O seen/O his/O pictures/O./O I/O did/On't/O care/O for/O them/O very/O much/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON
went/O back/O to/O the/O subject/O she/O had/O started/O./O

Levin/PERSON talked/O now/O not/O at/O all/O with/O that/O purely/O businesslike/O attitude/O to/O
the/O subject/O with/O which/O he/O had/O been/O talking/O all/O the/O morning/O./O Every/O word/O
in/O his/O conversation/O with/O her/O had/O a/O special/O significance/O./O And/O talking/O to/O
her/O was/O pleasant/O;/O still/O pleasanter/O it/O was/O to/O listen/O to/O her/O./O

Anna/PERSON talked/O not/O merely/O naturally/O and/O cleverly/O,/O but/O cleverly/O and/O
carelessly/O,/O attaching/O no/O value/O to/O her/O own/O ideas/O and/O giving/O great/O weight/O
to/O the/O ideas/O of/O the/O person/O she/O was/O talking/O to/O./O

The/O conversation/O turned/O on/O the/O new/O movement/O in/O art/O,/O on/O the/O new/O
illustrations/O of/O the/O Bible/O by/O a/O French/O artist/O./O Vorkuev/PERSON attacked/O the/O
artist/O for/O a/O realism/O carried/O to/O the/O point/O of/O coarseness/O./O

Levin/PERSON said/O that/O the/O French/O had/O carried/O conventionality/O further/O than/O
anyone/O,/O and/O that/O consequently/O they/O see/O a/O great/O merit/O in/O the/O return/O to/O
realism/O./O In/O the/O fact/O of/O not/O lying/O they/O see/O poetry/O./O

Never/O had/O anything/O clever/O said/O by/O Levin/PERSON given/O him/O so/O much/O pleasure/O as/O
this/O remark/O./O Anna/PERSON's/O face/O lighted/O up/O at/O once/O,/O as/O at/O once/O she/O appreciated/O
the/O thought/O./O She/O laughed/O./O

``/OI/O laugh/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/Oas/O one/O laughs/O when/O one/O sees/O a/O very/O true/O portrait/O./O
What/O you/O said/O so/O perfectly/O hits/O off/O French/O art/O now/O,/O painting/O and/O
literature/O too/O,/O indeed/O--/OZola/PERSON,/O Daudet/PERSON./O But/O perhaps/O it/O is/O always/O so/O,/O that/O
men/O form/O their/O conceptions/O from/O fictitious/O,/O conventional/O types/O,/O and/O
then/O--/Oall/O the/O _/Ocombinaisons/O_/O made/O--/Othey/O are/O tired/O of/O the/O fictitious/O
figures/O and/O begin/O to/O invent/O more/O natural/O,/O true/O figures/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O perfectly/O true/O,/O''/O said/O Vorknev/PERSON./O

``/OSo/O you/O've/O been/O at/O the/O club/O?/O''/O she/O said/O to/O her/O brother/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O this/O is/O a/O woman/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON thought/O,/O forgetting/O himself/O and/O
staring/O persistently/O at/O her/O lovely/O,/O mobile/O face/O,/O which/O at/O that/O moment/O
was/O all/O at/O once/O completely/O transformed/O./O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O hear/O what/O she/O was/O
talking/O of/O as/O she/O leaned/O over/O to/O her/O brother/O,/O but/O he/O was/O struck/O by/O the/O
change/O of/O her/O expression/O./O Her/O face/O--/Oso/O handsome/O a/O moment/O before/O in/O its/O
repose/O--/Osuddenly/O wore/O a/O look/O of/O strange/O curiosity/O,/O anger/O,/O and/O pride/O./O But/O
this/O lasted/O only/O an/O instant/O./O She/O dropped/O her/O eyelids/O,/O as/O though/O
recollecting/O something/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O but/O that/O's/O of/O no/O interest/O to/O anyone/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O she/O
turned/O to/O the/O English/O girl/O./O

``/OPlease/O order/O the/O tea/O in/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O''/O she/O said/O in/O English/O./O

The/O girl/O got/O up/O and/O went/O out/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O did/O she/O get/O through/O her/O examination/O?/O''/O asked/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OSplendidly/O!/O She/O's/O a/O very/O gifted/O child/O and/O a/O sweet/O character/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O will/O end/O in/O your/O loving/O her/O more/O than/O your/O own/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O a/O man/O speaks/O./O In/O love/O there/O's/O no/O more/O nor/O less/O./O I/O love/O my/O
daughter/O with/O one/O love/O,/O and/O her/O with/O another/O./O''/O

``/OI/O was/O just/O telling/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Vorkuev/PERSON,/O ``/Othat/O if/O she/O were/O to/O
put/O a/O hundredth/O part/O of/O the/O energy/O she/O devotes/O to/O this/O English/O girl/O to/O
the/O public/O question/O of/O the/O education/O of/O Russian/O children/O,/O she/O would/O be/O
doing/O a/O great/O and/O useful/O work/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O I/O ca/On't/O help/O it/O;/O I/O could/On't/O do/O it/O./O Count/O Alexey/PERSON Kirillovitch/PERSON
urged/O me/O very/O much/O''/O -LRB-/Oas/O she/O uttered/O the/O words/O _/OCount/O Alexey/PERSON
Kirillovitch/PERSON_/O she/O glanced/O with/O appealing/O timidity/O at/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O he/O
unconsciously/O responded/O with/O a/O respectful/O and/O reassuring/O look/O-RRB-/O;/O ``/Ohe/O
urged/O me/O to/O take/O up/O the/O school/O in/O the/O village/O./O I/O visited/O it/O several/O
times/O./O The/O children/O were/O very/O nice/O,/O but/O I/O could/O not/O feel/O drawn/O to/O the/O
work/O./O You/O speak/O of/O energy/O./O Energy/O rests/O upon/O love/O;/O and/O come/O as/O it/O will/O,/O
there/O's/O no/O forcing/O it/O./O I/O took/O to/O this/O child/O--/OI/O could/O not/O myself/O say/O why/O./O''/O

And/O she/O glanced/O again/O at/O Levin/PERSON./O And/O her/O smile/O and/O her/O glance/O--/Oall/O told/O
him/O that/O it/O was/O to/O him/O only/O she/O was/O addressing/O her/O words/O,/O valuing/O his/O
good/O opinion/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O sure/O beforehand/O that/O they/O understood/O
each/O other/O./O

``/OI/O quite/O understand/O that/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON answered/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O impossible/O to/O give/O
one/O's/O heart/O to/O a/O school/O or/O such/O institutions/O in/O general/O,/O and/O I/O believe/O
that/O's/O just/O why/O philanthropic/O institutions/O always/O give/O such/O poor/O
results/O./O''/O

She/O was/O silent/O for/O a/O while/O,/O then/O she/O smiled/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O''/O she/O agreed/O;/O ``/OI/O never/O could/O./O _/OJe/O n'ai/O pas/O le/O coeur/O assez/O_/O
large/O to/O love/O a/O whole/O asylum/O of/O horrid/O little/O girls/O./O _/OCela/PERSON ne/O m/O'/Oa/O jamais/O
réussi/O./O_/O There/O are/O so/O many/O women/O who/O have/O made/O themselves/O _/Oune/O position/O
sociale/O_/O in/O that/O way/O./O And/O now/O more/O than/O ever/O,/O''/O she/O said/O with/O a/O mournful/O,/O
confiding/O expression/O,/O ostensibly/O addressing/O her/O brother/O,/O but/O
unmistakably/O intending/O her/O words/O only/O for/O Levin/PERSON,/O ``/Onow/O when/O I/O have/O such/O
need/O of/O some/O occupation/O,/O I/O can/Onot/O./O''/O And/O suddenly/O frowning/O -LRB-/OLevin/PERSON saw/O
that/O she/O was/O frowning/O at/O herself/O for/O talking/O about/O herself/O-RRB-/O she/O changed/O
the/O subject/O./O ``/OI/O know/O about/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O Levin/PERSON;/O ``/Othat/O you/O're/O not/O a/O
public-spirited/O citizen/O,/O and/O I/O have/O defended/O you/O to/O the/O best/O of/O my/O
ability/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O have/O you/O defended/O me/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O according/O to/O the/O attacks/O made/O on/O you/O./O But/O wo/On't/O you/O have/O some/O tea/O?/O''/O
She/O rose/O and/O took/O up/O a/O book/O bound/O in/O morocco/O./O

``/OGive/O it/O to/O me/O,/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Vorkuev/PERSON,/O indicating/O the/O book/O./O
``/OIt/O's/O well/O worth/O taking/O up/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O it/O's/O all/O so/O sketchy/O./O''/O

``/OI/O told/O him/O about/O it/O,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O to/O his/O sister/O,/O nodding/O
at/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O should/On't/O have/O./O My/O writing/O is/O something/O after/O the/O fashion/O of/O those/O
little/O baskets/O and/O carving/O which/O Liza/PERSON Mertsalova/PERSON used/O to/O sell/O me/O from/O
the/O prisons/O./O She/O had/O the/O direction/O of/O the/O prison/O department/O in/O that/O
society/O,/O''/O she/O turned/O to/O Levin/PERSON;/O ``/Oand/O they/O were/O miracles/O of/O patience/O,/O the/O
work/O of/O those/O poor/O wretches/O./O''/O

And/O Levin/PERSON saw/O a/O new/O trait/O in/O this/O woman/O,/O who/O attracted/O him/O so/O
extraordinarily/O./O Besides/O wit/O,/O grace/O,/O and/O beauty/O,/O she/O had/O truth/O./O She/O had/O
no/O wish/O to/O hide/O from/O him/O all/O the/O bitterness/O of/O her/O position/O./O As/O she/O said/O
that/O she/O sighed/O,/O and/O her/O face/O suddenly/O taking/O a/O hard/O expression/O,/O looked/O
as/O it/O were/O turned/O to/O stone/O./O With/O that/O expression/O on/O her/O face/O she/O was/O
more/O beautiful/O than/O ever/O;/O but/O the/O expression/O was/O new/O;/O it/O was/O utterly/O
unlike/O that/O expression/O,/O radiant/O with/O happiness/O and/O creating/O happiness/O,/O
which/O had/O been/O caught/O by/O the/O painter/O in/O her/O portrait/O./O Levin/PERSON looked/O more/O
than/O once/O at/O the/O portrait/O and/O at/O her/O figure/O,/O as/O taking/O her/O brother/O's/O arm/O
she/O walked/O with/O him/O to/O the/O high/O doors/O and/O he/O felt/O for/O her/O a/O tenderness/O
and/O pity/O at/O which/O he/O wondered/O himself/O./O

She/O asked/O Levin/PERSON and/O Vorkuev/PERSON to/O go/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O while/O she/O
stayed/O behind/O to/O say/O a/O few/O words/O to/O her/O brother/O./O ``/OAbout/O her/O divorce/O,/O
about/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O what/O he/O's/O doing/O at/O the/O club/O,/O about/O me/O?/O''/O wondered/O
Levin/PERSON./O And/O he/O was/O so/O keenly/O interested/O by/O the/O question/O of/O what/O she/O was/O
saying/O to/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O that/O he/O scarcely/O heard/O what/O Vorkuev/PERSON was/O
telling/O him/O of/O the/O qualities/O of/O the/O story/O for/O children/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON
had/O written/O./O

At/O tea/O the/O same/O pleasant/O sort/O of/O talk/O,/O full/O of/O interesting/O matter/O,/O
continued/O./O There/O was/O not/O a/O single/O instant/O when/O a/O subject/O for/O
conversation/O was/O to/O seek/O;/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O it/O was/O felt/O that/O one/O had/O
hardly/O time/O to/O say/O what/O one/O had/O to/O say/O,/O and/O eagerly/O held/O back/O to/O hear/O
what/O the/O others/O were/O saying/O./O And/O all/O that/O was/O said/O,/O not/O only/O by/O her/O,/O but/O
by/O Vorkuev/PERSON and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON--/Oall/O,/O so/O it/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON,/O gained/O
peculiar/O significance/O from/O her/O appreciation/O and/O her/O criticism/O./O While/O he/O
followed/O this/O interesting/O conversation/O,/O Levin/PERSON was/O all/O the/O time/O admiring/O
her/O--/Oher/O beauty/O,/O her/O intelligence/O,/O her/O culture/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O her/O
directness/O and/O genuine/O depth/O of/O feeling/O./O He/O listened/O and/O talked/O,/O and/O all/O
the/O while/O he/O was/O thinking/O of/O her/O inner/O life/O,/O trying/O to/O divine/O her/O
feelings/O./O And/O though/O he/O had/O judged/O her/O so/O severely/O hitherto/O,/O now/O by/O some/O
strange/O chain/O of/O reasoning/O he/O was/O justifying/O her/O and/O was/O also/O sorry/O for/O
her/O,/O and/O afraid/O that/O Vronsky/PERSON did/O not/O fully/O understand/O her/O./O At/O eleven/O
o'clock/O,/O when/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON got/O up/O to/O go/O -LRB-/OVorkuev/PERSON had/O left/O
earlier/O-RRB-/O,/O it/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON that/O he/O had/O only/O just/O come/O./O Regretfully/O
Levin/PERSON too/O rose/O./O

``/OGood-bye/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O holding/O his/O hand/O and/O glancing/O into/O his/O face/O with/O a/O
winning/O look/O./O ``/OI/O am/O very/O glad/O _/Oque/O la/O glace/O est/O rompue/O./O_/O''/O

She/O dropped/O his/O hand/O,/O and/O half/O closed/O her/O eyes/O./O

``/OTell/O your/O wife/O that/O I/O love/O her/O as/O before/O,/O and/O that/O if/O she/O can/Onot/O pardon/O
me/O my/O position/O,/O then/O my/O wish/O for/O her/O is/O that/O she/O may/O never/O pardon/O it/O./O To/O
pardon/O it/O,/O one/O must/O go/O through/O what/O I/O have/O gone/O through/O,/O and/O may/O God/O
spare/O her/O that/O./O''/O

``/OCertainly/O,/O yes/O,/O I/O will/O tell/O her/O.../O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O,/O blushing/O./O



Chapter/O 11/O


``/OWhat/O a/O marvelous/O,/O sweet/O and/O unhappy/O woman/O!/O''/O he/O was/O thinking/O,/O as/O he/O
stepped/O out/O into/O the/O frosty/O air/O with/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O did/On't/O I/O tell/O you/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O seeing/O that/O Levin/PERSON
had/O been/O completely/O won/O over/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON dreamily/O,/O ``/Oan/O extraordinary/O woman/O!/O It/O's/O not/O her/O
cleverness/O,/O but/O she/O has/O such/O wonderful/O depth/O of/O feeling/O./O I/O'm/O awfully/O
sorry/O for/O her/O!/O''/O

``/ONow/O,/O please/O God/O,/O everything/O will/O soon/O be/O settled/O./O Well/O,/O well/O,/O do/On't/O be/O
hard/O on/O people/O in/O future/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O opening/O the/O
carriage/O door/O./O ``/OGood-bye/O;/O we/O do/On't/O go/O the/O same/O way/O./O''/O

Still/O thinking/O of/O Anna/PERSON,/O of/O everything/O,/O even/O the/O simplest/O phrase/O in/O their/O
conversation/O with/O her/O,/O and/O recalling/O the/O minutest/O changes/O in/O her/O
expression/O,/O entering/O more/O and/O more/O into/O her/O position/O,/O and/O feeling/O
sympathy/O for/O her/O,/O Levin/PERSON reached/O home/O./O

At/O home/O Kouzma/PERSON told/O Levin/PERSON that/O Katerina/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON was/O quite/O well/O,/O and/O
that/O her/O sisters/O had/O not/O long/O been/O gone/O,/O and/O he/O handed/O him/O two/O letters/O./O
Levin/PERSON read/O them/O at/O once/O in/O the/O hall/O,/O that/O he/O might/O not/O over/O look/O them/O
later/O./O One/O was/O from/O Sokolov/PERSON,/O his/O bailiff/O./O Sokolov/PERSON wrote/O that/O the/O corn/O
could/O not/O be/O sold/O,/O that/O it/O was/O fetching/O only/O five/O and/O a/O half/O roubles/O,/O
and/O that/O more/O than/O that/O could/O not/O be/O got/O for/O it/O./O The/O other/O letter/O was/O
from/O his/O sister/O./O She/O scolded/O him/O for/O her/O business/O being/O still/O unsettled/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O we/O must/O sell/O it/O at/O five/O and/O a/O half/O if/O we/O ca/On't/O get/O more/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON
decided/O the/O first/O question/O,/O which/O had/O always/O before/O seemed/O such/O a/O
weighty/O one/O,/O with/O extraordinary/O facility/O on/O the/O spot/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O
extraordinary/O how/O all/O one/O's/O time/O is/O taken/O up/O here/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O
considering/O the/O second/O letter/O./O He/O felt/O himself/O to/O blame/O for/O not/O having/O
got/O done/O what/O his/O sister/O had/O asked/O him/O to/O do/O for/O her/O./O ``/OToday/O,/O again/O,/O
I/O've/O not/O been/O to/O the/O court/O,/O but/O today/O I/O've/O certainly/O not/O had/O time/O./O''/O And/O
resolving/O that/O he/O would/O not/O fail/O to/O do/O it/O next/O day/O,/O he/O went/O up/O to/O his/O
wife/O./O As/O he/O went/O in/O,/O Levin/PERSON rapidly/O ran/O through/O mentally/O the/O day/O he/O had/O
spent/O./O All/O the/O events/O of/O the/O day/O were/O conversations/O,/O conversations/O he/O
had/O heard/O and/O taken/O part/O in/O./O All/O the/O conversations/O were/O upon/O subjects/O
which/O,/O if/O he/O had/O been/O alone/O at/O home/O,/O he/O would/O never/O have/O taken/O up/O,/O but/O
here/O they/O were/O very/O interesting/O./O And/O all/O these/O conversations/O were/O right/O
enough/O,/O only/O in/O two/O places/O there/O was/O something/O not/O quite/O right/O./O One/O was/O
what/O he/O had/O said/O about/O the/O carp/O,/O the/O other/O was/O something/O not/O ``/Oquite/O the/O
thing/O''/O in/O the/O tender/O sympathy/O he/O was/O feeling/O for/O Anna/PERSON./O

Levin/PERSON found/O his/O wife/O low-spirited/O and/O dull/O./O The/O dinner/O of/O the/O three/O
sisters/O had/O gone/O off/O very/O well/O,/O but/O then/O they/O had/O waited/O and/O waited/O for/O
him/O,/O all/O of/O them/O had/O felt/O dull/O,/O the/O sisters/O had/O departed/O,/O and/O she/O had/O
been/O left/O alone/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O what/O have/O you/O been/O doing/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O him/O,/O looking/O straight/O
into/O his/O eyes/O,/O which/O shone/O with/O rather/O a/O suspicious/O brightness/O./O But/O that/O
she/O might/O not/O prevent/O his/O telling/O her/O everything/O,/O she/O concealed/O her/O
close/O scrutiny/O of/O him/O,/O and/O with/O an/O approving/O smile/O listened/O to/O his/O
account/O of/O how/O he/O had/O spent/O the/O evening/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O'm/O very/O glad/O I/O met/O Vronsky/O./O I/O felt/O quite/O at/O ease/O and/O natural/O
with/O him/O./O You/O understand/O,/O I/O shall/O try/O not/O to/O see/O him/O,/O but/O I/O'm/O glad/O that/O
this/O awkwardness/O is/O all/O over/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O remembering/O that/O by/O way/O of/O
trying/O not/O to/O see/O him/O,/O he/O had/O immediately/O gone/O to/O call/O on/O Anna/PERSON,/O he/O
blushed/O./O ``/OWe/O talk/O about/O the/O peasants/O drinking/O;/O I/O do/On't/O know/O which/O drinks/O
most/O,/O the/O peasantry/O or/O our/O own/O class/O;/O the/O peasants/O do/O on/O holidays/O,/O
but/O.../O''/O

But/O Kitty/PERSON took/O not/O the/O slightest/O interest/O in/O discussing/O the/O drinking/O
habits/O of/O the/O peasants/O./O She/O saw/O that/O he/O blushed/O,/O and/O she/O wanted/O to/O know/O
why/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O then/O where/O did/O you/O go/O?/O''/O

``/OStiva/O urged/O me/O awfully/O to/O go/O and/O see/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON./O''/O

And/O as/O he/O said/O this/O,/O Levin/PERSON blushed/O even/O more/O,/O and/O his/O doubts/O as/O to/O
whether/O he/O had/O done/O right/O in/O going/O to/O see/O Anna/PERSON were/O settled/O once/O for/O
all/O./O He/O knew/O now/O that/O he/O ought/O not/O to/O have/O done/O so/O./O

Kitty/PERSON's/O eyes/O opened/O in/O a/O curious/O way/O and/O gleamed/O at/O Anna/PERSON's/O name/O,/O but/O
controlling/O herself/O with/O an/O effort/O,/O she/O concealed/O her/O emotion/O and/O
deceived/O him/O./O

``/OOh/O!/O''/O was/O all/O she/O said/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O sure/O you/O wo/On't/O be/O angry/O at/O my/O going/O./O Stiva/PERSON begged/O me/O to/O,/O and/O Dolly/PERSON
wished/O it/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON went/O on/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O but/O he/O saw/O in/O her/O eyes/O a/O constraint/O that/O boded/O him/O
no/O good/O./O

``/OShe/O is/O a/O very/O sweet/O,/O very/O,/O very/O unhappy/O,/O good/O woman/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O telling/O
her/O about/O Anna/PERSON,/O her/O occupations/O,/O and/O what/O she/O had/O told/O him/O to/O say/O to/O
her/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O of/O course/O,/O she/O is/O very/O much/O to/O be/O pitied/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O when/O he/O had/O
finished/O./O ``/OWhom/O was/O your/O letter/O from/O?/O''/O

He/O told/O her/O,/O and/O believing/O in/O her/O calm/O tone/O,/O he/O went/O to/O change/O his/O coat/O./O

Coming/O back/O,/O he/O found/O Kitty/PERSON in/O the/O same/O easy/O chair/O./O When/O he/O went/O up/O to/O
her/O,/O she/O glanced/O at/O him/O and/O broke/O into/O sobs/O./O

``/OWhat/O?/O what/O is/O it/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O,/O knowing/O beforehand/O what/O./O

``/OYou/O're/O in/O love/O with/O that/O hateful/O woman/O;/O she/O has/O bewitched/O you/O!/O I/O saw/O it/O
in/O your/O eyes/O./O Yes/O,/O yes/O!/O What/O can/O it/O all/O lead/O to/O?/O You/O were/O drinking/O at/O
the/O club/O,/O drinking/O and/O gambling/O,/O and/O then/O you/O went/O .../O to/O her/O of/O all/O
people/O!/O No/O,/O we/O must/O go/O away/O.../O./O I/O shall/O go/O away/O tomorrow/O./O''/O

It/O was/O a/O long/O while/O before/O Levin/PERSON could/O soothe/O his/O wife/O./O At/O last/O he/O
succeeded/O in/O calming/O her/O,/O only/O by/O confessing/O that/O a/O feeling/O of/O pity/O,/O in/O
conjunction/O with/O the/O wine/O he/O had/O drunk/O,/O had/O been/O too/O much/O for/O him/O,/O that/O
he/O had/O succumbed/O to/O Anna/PERSON's/O artful/O influence/O,/O and/O that/O he/O would/O avoid/O
her/O./O One/O thing/O he/O did/O with/O more/O sincerity/O confess/O to/O was/O that/O living/O so/O
long/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O a/O life/O of/O nothing/O but/O conversation/O,/O eating/O and/O drinking/O,/O
he/O was/O degenerating/O./O They/O talked/O till/O three/O o'clock/O in/O the/O morning/O./O Only/O
at/O three/O o'clock/O were/O they/O sufficiently/O reconciled/O to/O be/O able/O to/O go/O to/O
sleep/O./O



Chapter/O 12/O


After/O taking/O leave/O of/O her/O guests/O,/O Anna/PERSON did/O not/O sit/O down/O,/O but/O began/O
walking/O up/O and/O down/O the/O room/O./O She/O had/O unconsciously/O the/O whole/O evening/O
done/O her/O utmost/O to/O arouse/O in/O Levin/PERSON a/O feeling/O of/O love/O--/Oas/O of/O late/O she/O had/O
fallen/O into/O doing/O with/O all/O young/O men/O--/Oand/O she/O knew/O she/O had/O attained/O her/O
aim/O,/O as/O far/O as/O was/O possible/O in/O one/O evening/O,/O with/O a/O married/O and/O
conscientious/O man/O./O She/O liked/O him/O indeed/O extremely/O,/O and/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O
striking/O difference/O,/O from/O the/O masculine/O point/O of/O view/O,/O between/O Vronsky/O
and/O Levin/PERSON,/O as/O a/O woman/O she/O saw/O something/O they/O had/O in/O common/O,/O which/O had/O
made/O Kitty/PERSON able/O to/O love/O both/O./O Yet/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O was/O out/O of/O the/O room/O,/O she/O
ceased/O to/O think/O of/O him/O./O

One/O thought/O,/O and/O one/O only/O,/O pursued/O her/O in/O different/O forms/O,/O and/O refused/O
to/O be/O shaken/O off/O./O ``/OIf/O I/O have/O so/O much/O effect/O on/O others/O,/O on/O this/O man/O,/O who/O
loves/O his/O home/O and/O his/O wife/O,/O why/O is/O it/O _/Ohe/O_/O is/O so/O cold/O to/O me/O?/O.../O not/O
cold/O exactly/O,/O he/O loves/O me/O,/O I/O know/O that/O!/O But/O something/O new/O is/O drawing/O us/O
apart/O now/O./O Why/O was/On't/O he/O here/O all/O the/O evening/O?/O He/O told/O Stiva/PERSON to/O say/O he/O
could/O not/O leave/O Yashvin/PERSON,/O and/O must/O watch/O over/O his/O play/O./O Is/O Yashvin/O a/O
child/O?/O But/O supposing/O it/O's/O true/O./O He/O never/O tells/O a/O lie/O./O But/O there/O's/O
something/O else/O in/O it/O if/O it/O's/O true/O./O He/O is/O glad/O of/O an/O opportunity/O of/O
showing/O me/O that/O he/O has/O other/O duties/O;/O I/O know/O that/O,/O I/O submit/O to/O that/O./O But/O
why/O prove/O that/O to/O me/O?/O He/O wants/O to/O show/O me/O that/O his/O love/O for/O me/O is/O not/O to/O
interfere/O with/O his/O freedom/O./O But/O I/O need/O no/O proofs/O,/O I/O need/O love/O./O He/O ought/O
to/O understand/O all/O the/O bitterness/O of/O this/O life/O for/O me/O here/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION./O Is/O
this/O life/O?/O I/O am/O not/O living/O,/O but/O waiting/O for/O an/O event/O,/O which/O is/O
continually/O put/O off/O and/O put/O off/O./O No/O answer/O again/O!/O And/O Stiva/PERSON says/O he/O
can/Onot/O go/O to/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O And/O I/O ca/On't/O write/O again/O./O I/O can/O do/O
nothing/O,/O can/O begin/O nothing/O,/O can/O alter/O nothing/O;/O I/O hold/O myself/O in/O,/O I/O wait/O,/O
inventing/O amusements/O for/O myself/O--/Othe/O English/O family/O,/O writing/O,/O reading/O--/Obut/O
it/O's/O all/O nothing/O but/O a/O sham/O,/O it/O's/O all/O the/O same/O as/O morphine/O./O He/O ought/O to/O
feel/O for/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O feeling/O tears/O of/O self-pity/O coming/O into/O her/O eyes/O./O

She/O heard/O Vronsky/O's/O abrupt/O ring/O and/O hurriedly/O dried/O her/O tears/O--/Onot/O only/O
dried/O her/O tears/O,/O but/O sat/O down/O by/O a/O lamp/O and/O opened/O a/O book/O,/O affecting/O
composure/O./O She/O wanted/O to/O show/O him/O that/O she/O was/O displeased/O that/O he/O had/O
not/O come/O home/O as/O he/O had/O promised/O--/Odispleased/O only/O,/O and/O not/O on/O any/O account/O
to/O let/O him/O see/O her/O distress/O,/O and/O least/O of/O all/O,/O her/O self-pity/O./O She/O might/O
pity/O herself/O,/O but/O he/O must/O not/O pity/O her/O./O She/O did/O not/O want/O strife/O,/O she/O
blamed/O him/O for/O wanting/O to/O quarrel/O,/O but/O unconsciously/O put/O herself/O into/O an/O
attitude/O of/O antagonism/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O've/O not/O been/O dull/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O eagerly/O and/O good-humoredly/O,/O going/O
up/O to/O her/O./O ``/OWhat/O a/O terrible/O passion/O it/O is/O--/Ogambling/O!/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O've/O not/O been/O dull/O;/O I/O've/O learned/O long/O ago/O not/O to/O be/O dull/O./O Stiva/PERSON has/O
been/O here/O and/O Levin/PERSON./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O they/O meant/O to/O come/O and/O see/O you/O./O Well/O,/O how/O did/O you/O like/O Levin/PERSON?/O''/O he/O
said/O,/O sitting/O down/O beside/O her/O./O

``/OVery/O much/O./O They/O have/O not/O long/O been/O gone/O./O What/O was/O Yashvin/O doing/O?/O''/O

``/OHe/O was/O winning/O--/Oseventeen/O thousand/O./O I/O got/O him/O away/O./O He/O had/O really/O
started/O home/O,/O but/O he/O went/O back/O again/O,/O and/O now/O he/O's/O losing/O./O''/O

``/OThen/O what/O did/O you/O stay/O for/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O,/O suddenly/O lifting/O her/O eyes/O to/O
him/O./O The/O expression/O of/O her/O face/O was/O cold/O and/O ungracious/O./O ``/OYou/O told/O Stiva/PERSON
you/O were/O staying/O on/O to/O get/O Yashvin/PERSON away/O./O And/O you/O have/O left/O him/O there/O./O''/O

The/O same/O expression/O of/O cold/O readiness/O for/O the/O conflict/O appeared/O on/O his/O
face/O too/O./O

``/OIn/O the/O first/O place/O,/O I/O did/O not/O ask/O him/O to/O give/O you/O any/O message/O;/O and/O
secondly/O,/O I/O never/O tell/O lies/O./O But/O what/O's/O the/O chief/O point/O,/O I/O wanted/O to/O
stay/O,/O and/O I/O stayed/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O frowning/O./O ``/OAnna/PERSON,/O what/O is/O it/O for/O,/O why/O will/O
you/O?/O''/O he/O said/O after/O a/O moment/O's/O silence/O,/O bending/O over/O towards/O her/O,/O and/O he/O
opened/O his/O hand/O,/O hoping/O she/O would/O lay/O hers/O in/O it/O./O

She/O was/O glad/O of/O this/O appeal/O for/O tenderness/O./O But/O some/O strange/O force/O of/O
evil/O would/O not/O let/O her/O give/O herself/O up/O to/O her/O feelings/O,/O as/O though/O the/O
rules/O of/O warfare/O would/O not/O permit/O her/O to/O surrender/O./O

``/OOf/O course/O you/O wanted/O to/O stay/O,/O and/O you/O stayed/O./O You/O do/O everything/O you/O
want/O to/O./O But/O what/O do/O you/O tell/O me/O that/O for/O?/O With/O what/O object/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
getting/O more/O and/O more/O excited/O./O ``/ODoes/O anyone/O contest/O your/O rights/O?/O But/O you/O
want/O to/O be/O right/O,/O and/O you/O're/O welcome/O to/O be/O right/O./O''/O

His/O hand/O closed/O,/O he/O turned/O away/O,/O and/O his/O face/O wore/O a/O still/O more/O
obstinate/O expression/O./O

``/OFor/O you/O it/O's/O a/O matter/O of/O obstinacy/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O watching/O him/O intently/O
and/O suddenly/O finding/O the/O right/O word/O for/O that/O expression/O that/O irritated/O
her/O,/O ``/Osimply/O obstinacy/O./O For/O you/O it/O's/O a/O question/O of/O whether/O you/O keep/O the/O
upper/O hand/O of/O me/O,/O while/O for/O me/O.../O''/O Again/O she/O felt/O sorry/O for/O herself/O,/O
and/O she/O almost/O burst/O into/O tears/O./O ``/OIf/O you/O knew/O what/O it/O is/O for/O me/O!/O When/O I/O
feel/O as/O I/O do/O now/O that/O you/O are/O hostile/O,/O yes/O,/O hostile/O to/O me/O,/O if/O you/O knew/O
what/O this/O means/O for/O me/O!/O If/O you/O knew/O how/O I/O feel/O on/O the/O brink/O of/O calamity/O
at/O this/O instant/O,/O how/O afraid/O I/O am/O of/O myself/O!/O''/O And/O she/O turned/O away/O,/O hiding/O
her/O sobs/O./O

``/OBut/O what/O are/O you/O talking/O about/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O horrified/O at/O her/O expression/O
of/O despair/O,/O and/O again/O bending/O over/O her/O,/O he/O took/O her/O hand/O and/O kissed/O it/O./O
``/OWhat/O is/O it/O for/O?/O Do/O I/O seek/O amusements/O outside/O our/O home/O?/O Do/On't/O I/O avoid/O
the/O society/O of/O women/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O yes/O!/O If/O that/O were/O all/O!/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O tell/O me/O what/O I/O ought/O to/O do/O to/O give/O you/O peace/O of/O mind/O?/O I/O am/O ready/O
to/O do/O anything/O to/O make/O you/O happy/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O touched/O by/O her/O expression/O of/O
despair/O;/O ``/Owhat/O would/On't/O I/O do/O to/O save/O you/O from/O distress/O of/O any/O sort/O,/O as/O
now/O,/O Anna/PERSON!/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O nothing/O,/O nothing/O!/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O myself/O whether/O it/O's/O the/O
solitary/O life/O,/O my/O nerves/O.../O./O Come/O,/O do/On't/O let/O us/O talk/O of/O it/O./O What/O about/O
the/O race/O?/O You/O have/On't/O told/O me/O!/O''/O she/O inquired/O,/O trying/O to/O conceal/O her/O
triumph/O at/O the/O victory/O,/O which/O had/O anyway/O been/O on/O her/O side/O./O

He/O asked/O for/O supper/O,/O and/O began/O telling/O her/O about/O the/O races/O;/O but/O in/O his/O
tone/O,/O in/O his/O eyes/O,/O which/O became/O more/O and/O more/O cold/O,/O she/O saw/O that/O he/O did/O
not/O forgive/O her/O for/O her/O victory/O,/O that/O the/O feeling/O of/O obstinacy/O with/O
which/O she/O had/O been/O struggling/O had/O asserted/O itself/O again/O in/O him/O./O He/O was/O
colder/O to/O her/O than/O before/O,/O as/O though/O he/O were/O regretting/O his/O surrender/O./O
And/O she/O,/O remembering/O the/O words/O that/O had/O given/O her/O the/O victory/O,/O ``/Ohow/O I/O
feel/O on/O the/O brink/O of/O calamity/O,/O how/O afraid/O I/O am/O of/O myself/O,/O''/O saw/O that/O this/O
weapon/O was/O a/O dangerous/O one/O,/O and/O that/O it/O could/O not/O be/O used/O a/O second/O time/O./O
And/O she/O felt/O that/O beside/O the/O love/O that/O bound/O them/O together/O there/O had/O
grown/O up/O between/O them/O some/O evil/O spirit/O of/O strife/O,/O which/O she/O could/O not/O
exorcise/O from/O his/O,/O and/O still/O less/O from/O her/O own/O heart/O./O



Chapter/O 13/O


There/O are/O no/O conditions/O to/O which/O a/O man/O can/Onot/O become/O used/O,/O especially/O if/O
he/O sees/O that/O all/O around/O him/O are/O living/O in/O the/O same/O way/O./O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O
have/O believed/O three/O months/O before/O that/O he/O could/O have/O gone/O quietly/O to/O
sleep/O in/O the/O condition/O in/O which/O he/O was/O that/O day/O,/O that/O leading/O an/O
aimless/O,/O irrational/O life/O,/O living/O too/O beyond/O his/O means/O,/O after/O drinking/O to/O
excess/O -LRB-/Ohe/O could/O not/O call/O what/O happened/O at/O the/O club/O anything/O else/O-RRB-/O,/O
forming/O inappropriately/O friendly/O relations/O with/O a/O man/O with/O whom/O his/O wife/O
had/O once/O been/O in/O love/O,/O and/O a/O still/O more/O inappropriate/O call/O upon/O a/O woman/O
who/O could/O only/O be/O called/O a/O lost/O woman/O,/O after/O being/O fascinated/O by/O that/O
woman/O and/O causing/O his/O wife/O distress/O--/Ohe/O could/O still/O go/O quietly/O to/O sleep/O./O
But/O under/O the/O influence/O of/O fatigue/O,/O a/O sleepless/O night/O,/O and/O the/O wine/O he/O
had/O drunk/O,/O his/O sleep/O was/O sound/O and/O untroubled/O./O

At/O five/O o'clock/O the/O creak/O of/O a/O door/O opening/O waked/O him/O./O He/O jumped/O up/O and/O
looked/O round/O./O Kitty/PERSON was/O not/O in/O bed/O beside/O him/O./O But/O there/O was/O a/O light/O
moving/O behind/O the/O screen/O,/O and/O he/O heard/O her/O steps/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O?/O.../O what/O is/O it/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O half-asleep/O./O ``/OKitty/O!/O What/O is/O it/O?/O''/O

``/ONothing/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O coming/O from/O behind/O the/O screen/O with/O a/O candle/O in/O her/O
hand/O./O ``/OI/O felt/O unwell/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O smiling/O a/O particularly/O sweet/O and/O
meaning/O smile/O./O

``/OWhat/O?/O has/O it/O begun/O?/O''/O he/O said/O in/O terror/O./O ``/OWe/O ought/O to/O send/O.../O''/O and/O
hurriedly/O he/O reached/O after/O his/O clothes/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O no/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O smiling/O and/O holding/O his/O hand/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O sure/O to/O be/O
nothing/O./O I/O was/O rather/O unwell/O,/O only/O a/O little/O./O It/O's/O all/O over/O now/O./O''/O

And/O getting/O into/O bed/O,/O she/O blew/O out/O the/O candle/O,/O lay/O down/O and/O was/O still/O./O
Though/O he/O thought/O her/O stillness/O suspicious/O,/O as/O though/O she/O were/O holding/O
her/O breath/O,/O and/O still/O more/O suspicious/O the/O expression/O of/O peculiar/O
tenderness/O and/O excitement/O with/O which/O,/O as/O she/O came/O from/O behind/O the/O
screen/O,/O she/O said/O ``/Onothing/O,/O''/O he/O was/O so/O sleepy/O that/O he/O fell/O asleep/O at/O
once/O./O Only/O later/O he/O remembered/O the/O stillness/O of/O her/O breathing/O,/O and/O
understood/O all/O that/O must/O have/O been/O passing/O in/O her/O sweet/O,/O precious/O heart/O
while/O she/O lay/O beside/O him/O,/O not/O stirring/O,/O in/O anticipation/O of/O the/O greatest/O
event/O in/O a/O woman/O's/O life/O./O At/O seven/O o'clock/O he/O was/O waked/O by/O the/O touch/O of/O
her/O hand/O on/O his/O shoulder/O,/O and/O a/O gentle/O whisper/O./O She/O seemed/O struggling/O
between/O regret/O at/O waking/O him/O,/O and/O the/O desire/O to/O talk/O to/O him/O./O

``/OKostya/PERSON,/O do/On't/O be/O frightened/O./O It/O's/O all/O right/O./O But/O I/O fancy/O.../O./O We/O ought/O
to/O send/O for/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON./O''/O

The/O candle/O was/O lighted/O again/O./O She/O was/O sitting/O up/O in/O bed/O,/O holding/O some/O
knitting/O,/O which/O she/O had/O been/O busy/O upon/O during/O the/O last/O few/O days/O./O

``/OPlease/O,/O do/On't/O be/O frightened/O,/O it/O's/O all/O right/O./O I/O'm/O not/O a/O bit/O afraid/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O,/O seeing/O his/O scared/O face/O,/O and/O she/O pressed/O his/O hand/O to/O her/O bosom/O and/O
then/O to/O her/O lips/O./O

He/O hurriedly/O jumped/O up/O,/O hardly/O awake/O,/O and/O kept/O his/O eyes/O fixed/O on/O her/O,/O as/O
he/O put/O on/O his/O dressing/O gown/O;/O then/O he/O stopped/O,/O still/O looking/O at/O her/O./O He/O
had/O to/O go/O,/O but/O he/O could/O not/O tear/O himself/O from/O her/O eyes/O./O He/O thought/O he/O
loved/O her/O face/O,/O knew/O her/O expression/O,/O her/O eyes/O,/O but/O never/O had/O he/O seen/O it/O
like/O this/O./O How/O hateful/O and/O horrible/O he/O seemed/O to/O himself/O,/O thinking/O of/O
the/O distress/O he/O had/O caused/O her/O yesterday/O./O Her/O flushed/O face/O,/O fringed/O with/O
soft/O curling/O hair/O under/O her/O night/O cap/O,/O was/O radiant/O with/O joy/O and/O courage/O./O

Though/O there/O was/O so/O little/O that/O was/O complex/O or/O artificial/O in/O Kitty/PERSON's/O
character/O in/O general/O,/O Levin/PERSON was/O struck/O by/O what/O was/O revealed/O now/O,/O when/O
suddenly/O all/O disguises/O were/O thrown/O off/O and/O the/O very/O kernel/O of/O her/O soul/O
shone/O in/O her/O eyes/O./O And/O in/O this/O simplicity/O and/O nakedness/O of/O her/O soul/O,/O
she/O,/O the/O very/O woman/O he/O loved/O in/O her/O,/O was/O more/O manifest/O than/O ever/O./O She/O
looked/O at/O him/O,/O smiling/O;/O but/O all/O at/O once/O her/O brows/O twitched/O,/O she/O threw/O up/O
her/O head/O,/O and/O going/O quickly/O up/O to/O him/O,/O clutched/O his/O hand/O and/O pressed/O
close/O up/O to/O him/O,/O breathing/O her/O hot/O breath/O upon/O him/O./O She/O was/O in/O pain/O and/O
was/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O complaining/O to/O him/O of/O her/O suffering/O./O And/O for/O the/O first/O
minute/O,/O from/O habit/O,/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O he/O was/O to/O blame/O./O But/O in/O her/O
eyes/O there/O was/O a/O tenderness/O that/O told/O him/O that/O she/O was/O far/O from/O
reproaching/O him/O,/O that/O she/O loved/O him/O for/O her/O sufferings/O./O ``/OIf/O not/O I/O,/O who/O
is/O to/O blame/O for/O it/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O unconsciously/O,/O seeking/O someone/O
responsible/O for/O this/O suffering/O for/O him/O to/O punish/O;/O but/O there/O was/O no/O one/O
responsible/O./O She/O was/O suffering/O,/O complaining/O,/O and/O triumphing/O in/O her/O
sufferings/O,/O and/O rejoicing/O in/O them/O,/O and/O loving/O them/O./O He/O saw/O that/O
something/O sublime/O was/O being/O accomplished/O in/O her/O soul/O,/O but/O what/O?/O He/O could/O
not/O make/O it/O out/O./O It/O was/O beyond/O his/O understanding/O./O

``/OI/O have/O sent/O to/O mamma/O./O You/O go/O quickly/O to/O fetch/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON .../O
Kostya/PERSON!/O.../O Nothing/O,/O it/O's/O over/O./O''/O

She/O moved/O away/O from/O him/O and/O rang/O the/O bell/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O go/O now/O;/O Pasha/PERSON's/O coming/O./O I/O am/O all/O right/O./O''/O

And/O Levin/PERSON saw/O with/O astonishment/O that/O she/O had/O taken/O up/O the/O knitting/O she/O
had/O brought/O in/O in/O the/O night/O and/O begun/O working/O at/O it/O again/O./O

As/O Levin/PERSON was/O going/O out/O of/O one/O door/O,/O he/O heard/O the/O maid-servant/O come/O in/O at/O
the/O other/O./O He/O stood/O at/O the/O door/O and/O heard/O Kitty/PERSON giving/O exact/O directions/O
to/O the/O maid/O,/O and/O beginning/O to/O help/O her/O move/O the/O bedstead/O./O

He/O dressed/O,/O and/O while/O they/O were/O putting/O in/O his/O horses/O,/O as/O a/O hired/O sledge/O
was/O not/O to/O be/O seen/O yet/O,/O he/O ran/O again/O up/O to/O the/O bedroom/O,/O not/O on/O tiptoe/O,/O
it/O seemed/O to/O him/O,/O but/O on/O wings/O./O Two/O maid-servants/O were/O carefully/O moving/O
something/O in/O the/O bedroom/O./O

Kitty/PERSON was/O walking/O about/O knitting/O rapidly/O and/O giving/O directions/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O going/O for/O the/O doctor/O./O They/O have/O sent/O for/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON,/O but/O
I/O'll/O go/O on/O there/O too/O./O Is/On't/O there/O anything/O wanted/O?/O Yes/O,/O shall/O I/O go/O to/O
Dolly/PERSON's/O?/O''/O

She/O looked/O at/O him/O,/O obviously/O not/O hearing/O what/O he/O was/O saying/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O./O Do/O go/O,/O''/O she/O said/O quickly/O,/O frowning/O and/O waving/O her/O hand/O to/O
him/O./O

He/O had/O just/O gone/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O when/O suddenly/O a/O plaintive/O moan/O
sounded/O from/O the/O bedroom/O,/O smothered/O instantly/O./O He/O stood/O still/O,/O and/O for/O a/O
long/O while/O he/O could/O not/O understand/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O is/O she/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O,/O and/O clutching/O at/O his/O head/O he/O ran/O
downstairs/O./O

``/OLord/O have/O mercy/O on/O us/O!/O pardon/O us/O!/O aid/O us/O!/O''/O he/O repeated/O the/O words/O that/O
for/O some/O reason/O came/O suddenly/O to/O his/O lips/O./O And/O he/O,/O an/O unbeliever/O,/O
repeated/O these/O words/O not/O with/O his/O lips/O only/O./O At/O that/O instant/O he/O knew/O
that/O all/O his/O doubts/O,/O even/O the/O impossibility/O of/O believing/O with/O his/O
reason/O,/O of/O which/O he/O was/O aware/O in/O himself/O,/O did/O not/O in/O the/O least/O hinder/O
his/O turning/O to/O God/O./O All/O of/O that/O now/O floated/O out/O of/O his/O soul/O like/O dust/O./O
To/O whom/O was/O he/O to/O turn/O if/O not/O to/O Him/O in/O whose/O hands/O he/O felt/O himself/O,/O his/O
soul/O,/O and/O his/O love/O?/O

The/O horse/O was/O not/O yet/O ready/O,/O but/O feeling/O a/O peculiar/O concentration/O of/O his/O
physical/O forces/O and/O his/O intellect/O on/O what/O he/O had/O to/O do/O,/O he/O started/O off/O
on/O foot/O without/O waiting/O for/O the/O horse/O,/O and/O told/O Kouzma/PERSON to/O overtake/O him/O./O

At/O the/O corner/O he/O met/O a/O night/O cabman/O driving/O hurriedly/O./O In/O the/O little/O
sledge/O,/O wrapped/O in/O a/O velvet/O cloak/O,/O sat/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON with/O a/O kerchief/O
round/O her/O head/O./O ``/OThank/O God/O!/O thank/O God/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O overjoyed/O to/O recognize/O
her/O little/O fair/O face/O which/O wore/O a/O peculiarly/O serious/O,/O even/O stern/O
expression/O./O Telling/O the/O driver/O not/O to/O stop/O,/O he/O ran/O along/O beside/O her/O./O

``/OFor/O two/O hours/O,/O then/O?/O Not/O more/O?/O''/O she/O inquired/O./O ``/OYou/O should/O let/O Pyotr/PERSON
Dmitrievitch/PERSON know/O,/O but/O do/On't/O hurry/O him/O./O And/O get/O some/O opium/O at/O the/O
chemist/O's/O./O''/O

``/OSo/O you/O think/O that/O it/O may/O go/O on/O well/O?/O Lord/O have/O mercy/O on/O us/O and/O help/O
us/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O,/O seeing/O his/O own/O horse/O driving/O out/O of/O the/O gate/O./O Jumping/O
into/O the/O sledge/O beside/O Kouzma/LOCATION,/O he/O told/O him/O to/O drive/O to/O the/O doctor/O's/O./O



Chapter/O 14/O


The/O doctor/O was/O not/O yet/O up/O,/O and/O the/O footman/O said/O that/O ``/Ohe/O had/O been/O up/O
late/O,/O and/O had/O given/O orders/O not/O to/O be/O waked/O,/O but/O would/O get/O up/O soon/O./O''/O The/O
footman/O was/O cleaning/O the/O lamp-chimneys/O,/O and/O seemed/O very/O busy/O about/O them/O./O
This/O concentration/O of/O the/O footman/O upon/O his/O lamps/O,/O and/O his/O indifference/O
to/O what/O was/O passing/O in/O Levin/PERSON,/O at/O first/O astounded/O him/O,/O but/O immediately/O on/O
considering/O the/O question/O he/O realized/O that/O no/O one/O knew/O or/O was/O bound/O to/O
know/O his/O feelings/O,/O and/O that/O it/O was/O all/O the/O more/O necessary/O to/O act/O calmly/O,/O
sensibly/O,/O and/O resolutely/O to/O get/O through/O this/O wall/O of/O indifference/O and/O
attain/O his/O aim/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O be/O in/O a/O hurry/O or/O let/O anything/O slip/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O to/O himself/O,/O
feeling/O a/O greater/O and/O greater/O flow/O of/O physical/O energy/O and/O attention/O to/O
all/O that/O lay/O before/O him/O to/O do/O./O

Having/O ascertained/O that/O the/O doctor/O was/O not/O getting/O up/O,/O Levin/PERSON considered/O
various/O plans/O,/O and/O decided/O on/O the/O following/O one/O:/O that/O Kouzma/PERSON should/O go/O
for/O another/O doctor/O,/O while/O he/O himself/O should/O go/O to/O the/O chemist/O's/O for/O
opium/O,/O and/O if/O when/O he/O came/O back/O the/O doctor/O had/O not/O yet/O begun/O to/O get/O up/O,/O
he/O would/O either/O by/O tipping/O the/O footman/O,/O or/O by/O force/O,/O wake/O the/O doctor/O at/O
all/O hazards/O./O

At/O the/O chemist/O's/O the/O lank/O shopman/O sealed/O up/O a/O packet/O of/O powders/O for/O a/O
coachman/O who/O stood/O waiting/O,/O and/O refused/O him/O opium/O with/O the/O same/O
callousness/O with/O which/O the/O doctor/O's/O footman/O had/O cleaned/O his/O lamp/O
chimneys/O./O Trying/O not/O to/O get/O flurried/O or/O out/O of/O temper/O,/O Levin/PERSON mentioned/O
the/O names/O of/O the/O doctor/O and/O midwife/O,/O and/O explaining/O what/O the/O opium/O was/O
needed/O for/O,/O tried/O to/O persuade/O him/O./O The/O assistant/O inquired/O in/O German/O
whether/O he/O should/O give/O it/O,/O and/O receiving/O an/O affirmative/O reply/O from/O
behind/O the/O partition/O,/O he/O took/O out/O a/O bottle/O and/O a/O funnel/O,/O deliberately/O
poured/O the/O opium/O from/O a/O bigger/O bottle/O into/O a/O little/O one/O,/O stuck/O on/O a/O
label/O,/O sealed/O it/O up/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O request/O that/O he/O would/O not/O do/O
so/O,/O and/O was/O about/O to/O wrap/O it/O up/O too/O./O This/O was/O more/O than/O Levin/PERSON could/O
stand/O;/O he/O took/O the/O bottle/O firmly/O out/O of/O his/O hands/O,/O and/O ran/O to/O the/O big/O
glass/O doors/O./O The/O doctor/O was/O not/O even/O now/O getting/O up/O,/O and/O the/O footman/O,/O
busy/O now/O in/O putting/O down/O the/O rugs/O,/O refused/O to/O wake/O him/O./O Levin/PERSON
deliberately/O took/O out/O a/O ten/O rouble/O note/O,/O and/O,/O careful/O to/O speak/O slowly/O,/O
though/O losing/O no/O time/O over/O the/O business/O,/O he/O handed/O him/O the/O note/O,/O and/O
explained/O that/O Pyotr/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON -LRB-/Owhat/O a/O great/O and/O important/O personage/O
he/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON now/O,/O this/O Pyotr/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O who/O had/O been/O of/O so/O
little/O consequence/O in/O his/O eyes/O before/O!/O-RRB-/O had/O promised/O to/O come/O at/O any/O
time/O;/O that/O he/O would/O certainly/O not/O be/O angry/O!/O and/O that/O he/O must/O therefore/O
wake/O him/O at/O once/O./O

The/O footman/O agreed/O,/O and/O went/O upstairs/O,/O taking/O Levin/PERSON into/O the/O waiting/O
room/O./O

Levin/PERSON could/O hear/O through/O the/O door/O the/O doctor/O coughing/O,/O moving/O about/O,/O
washing/O,/O and/O saying/O something/O./O Three/O minutes/O passed/O;/O it/O seemed/O to/O Levin/PERSON
that/O more/O than/O an/O hour/O had/O gone/O by/O./O He/O could/O not/O wait/O any/O longer/O./O

``/OPyotr/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O Pyotr/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON!/O''/O he/O said/O in/O an/O imploring/O voice/O
at/O the/O open/O door/O./O ``/OFor/O God/O's/O sake/O,/O forgive/O me/O!/O See/O me/O as/O you/O are/O./O It/O's/O
been/O going/O on/O more/O than/O two/O hours/O already/O./O''/O

``/OIn/O a/O minute/O;/O in/O a/O minute/O!/O''/O answered/O a/O voice/O,/O and/O to/O his/O amazement/O Levin/PERSON
heard/O that/O the/O doctor/O was/O smiling/O as/O he/O spoke/O./O

``/OFor/O one/O instant/O./O''/O

``/OIn/O a/O minute/O./O''/O

Two/O minutes/O more/O passed/O while/O the/O doctor/O was/O putting/O on/O his/O boots/O,/O and/O
two/O minutes/O more/O while/O the/O doctor/O put/O on/O his/O coat/O and/O combed/O his/O hair/O./O

``/OPyotr/O Dmitrievitch/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON was/O beginning/O again/O in/O a/O plaintive/O voice/O,/O
just/O as/O the/O doctor/O came/O in/O dressed/O and/O ready/O./O ``/OThese/O people/O have/O no/O
conscience/O,/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OCombing/O his/O hair/O,/O while/O we/O're/O dying/O!/O''/O

``/OGood/O morning/O!/O''/O the/O doctor/O said/O to/O him/O,/O shaking/O hands/O,/O and/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O
teasing/O him/O with/O his/O composure/O./O ``/OThere/O's/O no/O hurry/O./O Well/O now/O?/O''/O

Trying/O to/O be/O as/O accurate/O as/O possible/O,/O Levin/PERSON began/O to/O tell/O him/O every/O
unnecessary/O detail/O of/O his/O wife/O's/O condition/O,/O interrupting/O his/O account/O
repeatedly/O with/O entreaties/O that/O the/O doctor/O would/O come/O with/O him/O at/O once/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O you/O need/On't/O be/O in/O any/O hurry/O./O You/O do/On't/O understand/O,/O you/O know/O./O I/O'm/O
certain/O I/O'm/O not/O wanted/O,/O still/O I/O've/O promised/O,/O and/O if/O you/O like/O,/O I/O'll/O come/O./O
But/O there/O's/O no/O hurry/O./O Please/O sit/O down/O;/O wo/On't/O you/O have/O some/O coffee/O?/O''/O

Levin/PERSON stared/O at/O him/O with/O eyes/O that/O asked/O whether/O he/O was/O laughing/O at/O him/O;/O
but/O the/O doctor/O had/O no/O notion/O of/O making/O fun/O of/O him/O./O

``/OI/O know/O,/O I/O know/O,/O''/O the/O doctor/O said/O,/O smiling/O;/O ``/OI/O'm/O a/O married/O man/O myself/O;/O
and/O at/O these/O moments/O we/O husbands/O are/O very/O much/O to/O be/O pitied/O./O I/O've/O a/O
patient/O whose/O husband/O always/O takes/O refuge/O in/O the/O stables/O on/O such/O
occasions/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O do/O you/O think/O,/O Pyotr/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON?/O Do/O you/O suppose/O it/O may/O go/O all/O
right/O?/O''/O

``/OEverything/O points/O to/O a/O favorable/O issue/O./O''/O

``/OSo/O you/O'll/O come/O immediately/O?/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O looking/O wrathfully/O at/O the/O
servant/O who/O was/O bringing/O in/O the/O coffee/O./O

``/OIn/O an/O hour/O's/O time/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O for/O mercy/O's/O sake/O!/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O let/O me/O drink/O my/O coffee/O,/O anyway/O./O''/O

The/O doctor/O started/O upon/O his/O coffee/O./O Both/O were/O silent/O./O

``/OThe/O Turks/O are/O really/O getting/O beaten/O,/O though/O./O Did/O you/O read/O yesterday/O's/O
telegrams/O?/O''/O said/O the/O doctor/O,/O munching/O some/O roll/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O stand/O it/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O jumping/O up/O./O ``/OSo/O you/O'll/O be/O with/O us/O in/O
a/O quarter/O of/O an/O hour/O./O''/O

``/OIn/O half/O an/O hour/O./O''/O

``/OOn/O your/O honor/O?/O''/O

When/O Levin/PERSON got/O home/O,/O he/O drove/O up/O at/O the/O same/O time/O as/O the/O princess/O,/O and/O
they/O went/O up/O to/O the/O bedroom/O door/O together/O./O The/O princess/O had/O tears/O in/O her/O
eyes/O,/O and/O her/O hands/O were/O shaking/O./O Seeing/O Levin/PERSON,/O she/O embraced/O him/O,/O and/O
burst/O into/O tears/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O my/O dear/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON?/O''/O she/O queried/O,/O clasping/O the/O hand/O of/O the/O
midwife/O,/O who/O came/O out/O to/O meet/O them/O with/O a/O beaming/O and/O anxious/O face/O./O

``/OShe/O's/O going/O on/O well/O,/O''/O she/O said/O;/O ``/Opersuade/O her/O to/O lie/O down/O./O She/O will/O be/O
easier/O so/O./O''/O

From/O the/O moment/O when/O he/O had/O waked/O up/O and/O understood/O what/O was/O going/O on/O,/O
Levin/PERSON had/O prepared/O his/O mind/O to/O bear/O resolutely/O what/O was/O before/O him/O,/O and/O
without/O considering/O or/O anticipating/O anything/O,/O to/O avoid/O upsetting/O his/O
wife/O,/O and/O on/O the/O contrary/O to/O soothe/O her/O and/O keep/O up/O her/O courage/O./O Without/O
allowing/O himself/O even/O to/O think/O of/O what/O was/O to/O come/O,/O of/O how/O it/O would/O end/O,/O
judging/O from/O his/O inquiries/O as/O to/O the/O usual/O duration/O of/O these/O ordeals/O,/O
Levin/PERSON had/O in/O his/O imagination/O braced/O himself/O to/O bear/O up/O and/O to/O keep/O a/O
tight/O rein/O on/O his/O feelings/O for/O five/O hours/O,/O and/O it/O had/O seemed/O to/O him/O he/O
could/O do/O this/O./O But/O when/O he/O came/O back/O from/O the/O doctor/O's/O and/O saw/O her/O
sufferings/O again/O,/O he/O fell/O to/O repeating/O more/O and/O more/O frequently/O:/O ``/OLord/O,/O
have/O mercy/O on/O us/O,/O and/O succor/O us/O!/O''/O He/O sighed/O,/O and/O flung/O his/O head/O up/O,/O and/O
began/O to/O feel/O afraid/O he/O could/O not/O bear/O it/O,/O that/O he/O would/O burst/O into/O
tears/O or/O run/O away/O./O Such/O agony/O it/O was/O to/O him/O./O And/O only/O one/O hour/O had/O
