passed/O./O

But/O after/O that/O hour/O there/O passed/O another/O hour/O,/O two/O hours/O,/O three/O,/O the/O
full/O five/O hours/O he/O had/O fixed/O as/O the/O furthest/O limit/O of/O his/O sufferings/O,/O
and/O the/O position/O was/O still/O unchanged/O;/O and/O he/O was/O still/O bearing/O it/O
because/O there/O was/O nothing/O to/O be/O done/O but/O bear/O it/O;/O every/O instant/O feeling/O
that/O he/O had/O reached/O the/O utmost/O limits/O of/O his/O endurance/O,/O and/O that/O his/O
heart/O would/O break/O with/O sympathy/O and/O pain/O./O

But/O still/O the/O minutes/O passed/O by/O and/O the/O hours/O,/O and/O still/O hours/O more/O,/O and/O
his/O misery/O and/O horror/O grew/O and/O were/O more/O and/O more/O intense/O./O

All/O the/O ordinary/O conditions/O of/O life/O,/O without/O which/O one/O can/O form/O no/O
conception/O of/O anything/O,/O had/O ceased/O to/O exist/O for/O Levin/PERSON./O He/O lost/O all/O sense/O
of/O time/O./O Minutes/O--/Othose/O minutes/O when/O she/O sent/O for/O him/O and/O he/O held/O her/O
moist/O hand/O,/O that/O would/O squeeze/O his/O hand/O with/O extraordinary/O violence/O and/O
then/O push/O it/O away/O--/Oseemed/O to/O him/O hours/O,/O and/O hours/O seemed/O to/O him/O minutes/O./O
He/O was/O surprised/O when/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON asked/O him/O to/O light/O a/O candle/O
behind/O a/O screen/O,/O and/O he/O found/O that/O it/O was/O five/O o'clock/O in/O the/O afternoon/O./O
If/O he/O had/O been/O told/O it/O was/O only/O ten/O o'clock/O in/O the/O morning/O,/O he/O would/O not/O
have/O been/O more/O surprised/O./O Where/O he/O was/O all/O this/O time/O,/O he/O knew/O as/O little/O
as/O the/O time/O of/O anything/O./O He/O saw/O her/O swollen/O face/O,/O sometimes/O bewildered/O
and/O in/O agony/O,/O sometimes/O smiling/O and/O trying/O to/O reassure/O him/O./O He/O saw/O the/O
old/O princess/O too/O,/O flushed/O and/O overwrought/O,/O with/O her/O gray/O curls/O in/O
disorder/O,/O forcing/O herself/O to/O gulp/O down/O her/O tears/O,/O biting/O her/O lips/O;/O he/O
saw/O Dolly/PERSON too/O and/O the/O doctor/O,/O smoking/O fat/O cigarettes/O,/O and/O Lizaveta/PERSON
Petrovna/PERSON with/O a/O firm/O,/O resolute/O,/O reassuring/O face/O,/O and/O the/O old/O prince/O
walking/O up/O and/O down/O the/O hall/O with/O a/O frowning/O face/O./O But/O why/O they/O came/O in/O
and/O went/O out/O,/O where/O they/O were/O,/O he/O did/O not/O know/O./O The/O princess/O was/O with/O
the/O doctor/O in/O the/O bedroom/O,/O then/O in/O the/O study/O,/O where/O a/O table/O set/O for/O
dinner/O suddenly/O appeared/O;/O then/O she/O was/O not/O there/O,/O but/O Dolly/PERSON was/O./O Then/O
Levin/PERSON remembered/O he/O had/O been/O sent/O somewhere/O./O Once/O he/O had/O been/O sent/O to/O
move/O a/O table/O and/O sofa/O./O He/O had/O done/O this/O eagerly/O,/O thinking/O it/O had/O to/O be/O
done/O for/O her/O sake/O,/O and/O only/O later/O on/O he/O found/O it/O was/O his/O own/O bed/O he/O had/O
been/O getting/O ready/O./O Then/O he/O had/O been/O sent/O to/O the/O study/O to/O ask/O the/O doctor/O
something/O./O The/O doctor/O had/O answered/O and/O then/O had/O said/O something/O about/O the/O
irregularities/O in/O the/O municipal/O council/O./O Then/O he/O had/O been/O sent/O to/O the/O
bedroom/O to/O help/O the/O old/O princess/O to/O move/O the/O holy/O picture/O in/O its/O silver/O
and/O gold/O setting/O,/O and/O with/O the/O princess/O's/O old/O waiting/O maid/O he/O had/O
clambered/O on/O a/O shelf/O to/O reach/O it/O and/O had/O broken/O the/O little/O lamp/O,/O and/O the/O
old/O servant/O had/O tried/O to/O reassure/O him/O about/O the/O lamp/O and/O about/O his/O wife/O,/O
and/O he/O carried/O the/O holy/O picture/O and/O set/O it/O at/O Kitty/PERSON's/O head/O,/O carefully/O
tucking/O it/O in/O behind/O the/O pillow/O./O But/O where/O,/O when/O,/O and/O why/O all/O this/O had/O
happened/O,/O he/O could/O not/O tell/O./O He/O did/O not/O understand/O why/O the/O old/O princess/O
took/O his/O hand/O,/O and/O looking/O compassionately/O at/O him/O,/O begged/O him/O not/O to/O
worry/O himself/O,/O and/O Dolly/PERSON persuaded/O him/O to/O eat/O something/O and/O led/O him/O out/O
of/O the/O room/O,/O and/O even/O the/O doctor/O looked/O seriously/O and/O with/O commiseration/O
at/O him/O and/O offered/O him/O a/O drop/O of/O something/O./O

All/O he/O knew/O and/O felt/O was/O that/O what/O was/O happening/O was/O what/O had/O happened/O
nearly/O a/O year/O before/O in/O the/O hotel/O of/O the/O country/O town/O at/O the/O deathbed/O of/O
his/O brother/O Nikolay/PERSON./O But/O that/O had/O been/O grief/O--/Othis/O was/O joy/O./O Yet/O that/O
grief/O and/O this/O joy/O were/O alike/O outside/O all/O the/O ordinary/O conditions/O of/O
life/O;/O they/O were/O loop-holes/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O in/O that/O ordinary/O life/O through/O
which/O there/O came/O glimpses/O of/O something/O sublime/O./O And/O in/O the/O contemplation/O
of/O this/O sublime/O something/O the/O soul/O was/O exalted/O to/O inconceivable/O heights/O
of/O which/O it/O had/O before/O had/O no/O conception/O,/O while/O reason/O lagged/O behind/O,/O
unable/O to/O keep/O up/O with/O it/O./O

``/OLord/O,/O have/O mercy/O on/O us/O,/O and/O succor/O us/O!/O''/O he/O repeated/O to/O himself/O
incessantly/O,/O feeling/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O his/O long/O and/O,/O as/O it/O seemed/O,/O complete/O
alienation/O from/O religion/O,/O that/O he/O turned/O to/O God/O just/O as/O trustfully/O and/O
simply/O as/O he/O had/O in/O his/O childhood/O and/O first/O youth/O./O

All/O this/O time/O he/O had/O two/O distinct/O spiritual/O conditions/O./O One/O was/O away/O
from/O her/O,/O with/O the/O doctor/O,/O who/O kept/O smoking/O one/O fat/O cigarette/O after/O
another/O and/O extinguishing/O them/O on/O the/O edge/O of/O a/O full/O ash/O tray/O,/O with/O
Dolly/PERSON,/O and/O with/O the/O old/O prince/O,/O where/O there/O was/O talk/O about/O dinner/O,/O about/O
politics/O,/O about/O Marya/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON's/O illness/O,/O and/O where/O Levin/PERSON suddenly/O
forgot/O for/O a/O minute/O what/O was/O happening/O,/O and/O felt/O as/O though/O he/O had/O waked/O
up/O from/O sleep/O;/O the/O other/O was/O in/O her/O presence/O,/O at/O her/O pillow/O,/O where/O his/O
heart/O seemed/O breaking/O and/O still/O did/O not/O break/O from/O sympathetic/O
suffering/O,/O and/O he/O prayed/O to/O God/O without/O ceasing/O./O And/O every/O time/O he/O was/O
brought/O back/O from/O a/O moment/O of/O oblivion/O by/O a/O scream/O reaching/O him/O from/O the/O
bedroom/O,/O he/O fell/O into/O the/O same/O strange/O terror/O that/O had/O come/O upon/O him/O the/O
first/O minute/O./O Every/O time/O he/O heard/O a/O shriek/O,/O he/O jumped/O up/O,/O ran/O to/O justify/O
himself/O,/O remembered/O on/O the/O way/O that/O he/O was/O not/O to/O blame/O,/O and/O he/O longed/O
to/O defend/O her/O,/O to/O help/O her/O./O But/O as/O he/O looked/O at/O her/O,/O he/O saw/O again/O that/O
help/O was/O impossible/O,/O and/O he/O was/O filled/O with/O terror/O and/O prayed/O:/O ``/OLord/O,/O
have/O mercy/O on/O us/O,/O and/O help/O us/O!/O''/O And/O as/O time/O went/O on/O,/O both/O these/O
conditions/O became/O more/O intense/O;/O the/O calmer/O he/O became/O away/O from/O her/O,/O
completely/O forgetting/O her/O,/O the/O more/O agonizing/O became/O both/O her/O sufferings/O
and/O his/O feeling/O of/O helplessness/O before/O them/O./O He/O jumped/O up/O,/O would/O have/O
liked/O to/O run/O away/O,/O but/O ran/O to/O her/O./O

Sometimes/O,/O when/O again/O and/O again/O she/O called/O upon/O him/O,/O he/O blamed/O her/O;/O but/O
seeing/O her/O patient/O,/O smiling/O face/O,/O and/O hearing/O the/O words/O,/O ``/OI/O am/O worrying/O
you/O,/O''/O he/O threw/O the/O blame/O on/O God/O;/O but/O thinking/O of/O God/O,/O at/O once/O he/O fell/O to/O
beseeching/O God/O to/O forgive/O him/O and/O have/O mercy/O./O



Chapter/O 15/O


He/O did/O not/O know/O whether/O it/O was/O late/O or/O early/O./O The/O candles/O had/O all/O burned/O
out/O./O Dolly/PERSON had/O just/O been/O in/O the/O study/O and/O had/O suggested/O to/O the/O doctor/O
that/O he/O should/O lie/O down/O./O Levin/PERSON sat/O listening/O to/O the/O doctor/O's/O stories/O of/O
a/O quack/O mesmerizer/O and/O looking/O at/O the/O ashes/O of/O his/O cigarette/O./O There/O had/O
been/O a/O period/O of/O repose/O,/O and/O he/O had/O sunk/O into/O oblivion/O./O He/O had/O
completely/O forgotten/O what/O was/O going/O on/O now/O./O He/O heard/O the/O doctor/O's/O chat/O
and/O understood/O it/O./O Suddenly/O there/O came/O an/O unearthly/O shriek/O./O The/O shriek/O
was/O so/O awful/O that/O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O even/O jump/O up/O,/O but/O holding/O his/O breath/O,/O
gazed/O in/O terrified/O inquiry/O at/O the/O doctor/O./O The/O doctor/O put/O his/O head/O on/O one/O
side/O,/O listened/O,/O and/O smiled/O approvingly/O./O Everything/O was/O so/O extraordinary/O
that/O nothing/O could/O strike/O Levin/PERSON as/O strange/O./O ``/OI/O suppose/O it/O must/O be/O so/O,/O''/O
he/O thought/O,/O and/O still/O sat/O where/O he/O was/O./O Whose/O scream/O was/O this/O?/O He/O jumped/O
up/O,/O ran/O on/O tiptoe/O to/O the/O bedroom/O,/O edged/O round/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON and/O the/O
princess/O,/O and/O took/O up/O his/O position/O at/O Kitty/ORGANIZATION's/O pillow/O./O The/O scream/O had/O
subsided/O,/O but/O there/O was/O some/O change/O now/O./O What/O it/O was/O he/O did/O not/O see/O and/O
did/O not/O comprehend/O,/O and/O he/O had/O no/O wish/O to/O see/O or/O comprehend/O./O But/O he/O saw/O
it/O by/O the/O face/O of/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON./O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON's/O face/O was/O stern/O
and/O pale/O,/O and/O still/O as/O resolute/O,/O though/O her/O jaws/O were/O twitching/O,/O and/O her/O
eyes/O were/O fixed/O intently/O on/O Kitty/PERSON./O Kitty/PERSON's/O swollen/O and/O agonized/O face/O,/O a/O
tress/O of/O hair/O clinging/O to/O her/O moist/O brow/O,/O was/O turned/O to/O him/O and/O sought/O
his/O eyes/O./O Her/O lifted/O hands/O asked/O for/O his/O hands/O./O Clutching/O his/O chill/O
hands/O in/O her/O moist/O ones/O,/O she/O began/O squeezing/O them/O to/O her/O face/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O go/O,/O do/On't/O go/O!/O I/O'm/O not/O afraid/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O afraid/O!/O''/O she/O said/O rapidly/O./O
``/OMamma/O,/O take/O my/O earrings/O./O They/O bother/O me/O./O You/O're/O not/O afraid/O?/O Quick/O,/O
quick/O,/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON.../O''/O

She/O spoke/O quickly/O,/O very/O quickly/O,/O and/O tried/O to/O smile/O./O But/O suddenly/O her/O
face/O was/O drawn/O,/O she/O pushed/O him/O away/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O this/O is/O awful/O!/O I/O'm/O dying/O,/O I/O'm/O dying/O!/O Go/O away/O!/O''/O she/O shrieked/O,/O and/O
again/O he/O heard/O that/O unearthly/O scream/O./O

Levin/PERSON clutched/O at/O his/O head/O and/O ran/O out/O of/O the/O room/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O nothing/O,/O it/O's/O nothing/O,/O it/O's/O all/O right/O,/O''/O Dolly/PERSON called/O after/O him/O./O

But/O they/O might/O say/O what/O they/O liked/O,/O he/O knew/O now/O that/O all/O was/O over/O./O He/O
stood/O in/O the/O next/O room/O,/O his/O head/O leaning/O against/O the/O door/O post/O,/O and/O
heard/O shrieks/O,/O howls/O such/O as/O he/O had/O never/O heard/O before/O,/O and/O he/O knew/O that/O
what/O had/O been/O Kitty/PERSON was/O uttering/O these/O shrieks/O./O He/O had/O long/O ago/O ceased/O
to/O wish/O for/O the/O child/O./O By/O now/O he/O loathed/O this/O child/O./O He/O did/O not/O even/O
wish/O for/O her/O life/O now/O,/O all/O he/O longed/O for/O was/O the/O end/O of/O this/O awful/O
anguish/O./O

``/ODoctor/O!/O What/O is/O it/O?/O What/O is/O it/O?/O By/O God/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O snatching/O at/O the/O
doctor/O's/O hand/O as/O he/O came/O up/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O the/O end/O,/O''/O said/O the/O doctor/O./O And/O the/O doctor/O's/O face/O was/O so/O grave/O as/O
he/O said/O it/O that/O Levin/PERSON took/O _/Othe/O end/O_/O as/O meaning/O her/O death/O./O

Beside/O himself/O,/O he/O ran/O into/O the/O bedroom/O./O The/O first/O thing/O he/O saw/O was/O the/O
face/O of/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON./O It/O was/O even/O more/O frowning/O and/O stern/O./O Kitty/PERSON's/O
face/O he/O did/O not/O know/O./O In/O the/O place/O where/O it/O had/O been/O was/O something/O that/O
was/O fearful/O in/O its/O strained/O distortion/O and/O in/O the/O sounds/O that/O came/O from/O
it/O./O He/O fell/O down/O with/O his/O head/O on/O the/O wooden/O framework/O of/O the/O bed/O,/O
feeling/O that/O his/O heart/O was/O bursting/O./O The/O awful/O scream/O never/O paused/O,/O it/O
became/O still/O more/O awful/O,/O and/O as/O though/O it/O had/O reached/O the/O utmost/O limit/O
of/O terror/O,/O suddenly/O it/O ceased/O./O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O believe/O his/O ears/O,/O but/O
there/O could/O be/O no/O doubt/O;/O the/O scream/O had/O ceased/O and/O he/O heard/O a/O subdued/O
stir/O and/O bustle/O,/O and/O hurried/O breathing/O,/O and/O her/O voice/O,/O gasping/O,/O alive/O,/O
tender/O,/O and/O blissful/O,/O uttered/O softly/O,/O ``/OIt/O's/O over/O!/O''/O

He/O lifted/O his/O head/O./O With/O her/O hands/O hanging/O exhausted/O on/O the/O quilt/O,/O
looking/O extraordinarily/O lovely/O and/O serene/O,/O she/O looked/O at/O him/O in/O silence/O
and/O tried/O to/O smile/O,/O and/O could/O not/O./O

And/O suddenly/O,/O from/O the/O mysterious/O and/O awful/O far-away/O world/O in/O which/O he/O
had/O been/O living/O for/O the/O last/O twenty-two/O hours/O,/O Levin/PERSON felt/O himself/O all/O in/O
an/O instant/O borne/O back/O to/O the/O old/O every-day/O world/O,/O glorified/O though/O now/O,/O
by/O such/O a/O radiance/O of/O happiness/O that/O he/O could/O not/O bear/O it/O./O The/O strained/O
chords/O snapped/O,/O sobs/O and/O tears/O of/O joy/O which/O he/O had/O never/O foreseen/O rose/O
up/O with/O such/O violence/O that/O his/O whole/O body/O shook/O,/O that/O for/O long/O they/O
prevented/O him/O from/O speaking/O./O

Falling/O on/O his/O knees/O before/O the/O bed/O,/O he/O held/O his/O wife/O's/O hand/O before/O his/O
lips/O and/O kissed/O it/O,/O and/O the/O hand/O,/O with/O a/O weak/O movement/O of/O the/O fingers/O,/O
responded/O to/O his/O kiss/O./O And/O meanwhile/O,/O there/O at/O the/O foot/O of/O the/O bed/O,/O in/O
the/O deft/O hands/O of/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON,/O like/O a/O flickering/O light/O in/O a/O lamp/O,/O
lay/O the/O life/O of/O a/O human/O creature/O,/O which/O had/O never/O existed/O before/O,/O and/O
which/O would/O now/O with/O the/O same/O right/O,/O with/O the/O same/O importance/O to/O itself/O,/O
live/O and/O create/O in/O its/O own/O image/O./O

``/OAlive/O!/O alive/O!/O And/O a/O boy/O too/O!/O Set/O your/O mind/O at/O rest/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON heard/O
Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON saying/O,/O as/O she/O slapped/O the/O baby/O's/O back/O with/O a/O shaking/O
hand/O./O

``/OMamma/O,/O is/O it/O true/O?/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON's/O voice/O./O

The/O princess/O's/O sobs/O were/O all/O the/O answers/O she/O could/O make/O./O And/O in/O the/O
midst/O of/O the/O silence/O there/O came/O in/O unmistakable/O reply/O to/O the/O mother/O's/O
question/O,/O a/O voice/O quite/O unlike/O the/O subdued/O voices/O speaking/O in/O the/O room/O./O
It/O was/O the/O bold/O,/O clamorous/O,/O self-assertive/O squall/O of/O the/O new/O human/O
being/O,/O who/O had/O so/O incomprehensibly/O appeared/O./O

If/O Levin/PERSON had/O been/O told/O before/O that/O Kitty/PERSON was/O dead/O,/O and/O that/O he/O had/O died/O
with/O her/O,/O and/O that/O their/O children/O were/O angels/O,/O and/O that/O God/PERSON was/O standing/O
before/O him/O,/O he/O would/O have/O been/O surprised/O at/O nothing/O./O But/O now/O,/O coming/O
back/O to/O the/O world/O of/O reality/O,/O he/O had/O to/O make/O great/O mental/O efforts/O to/O
take/O in/O that/O she/O was/O alive/O and/O well/O,/O and/O that/O the/O creature/O squalling/O so/O
desperately/O was/O his/O son/O./O Kitty/PERSON was/O alive/O,/O her/O agony/O was/O over/O./O And/O he/O was/O
unutterably/O happy/O./O That/O he/O understood/O;/O he/O was/O completely/O happy/O in/O it/O./O
But/O the/O baby/O?/O Whence/O,/O why/O,/O who/O was/O he/O?/O.../O He/O could/O not/O get/O used/O to/O the/O
idea/O./O It/O seemed/O to/O him/O something/O extraneous/O,/O superfluous/O,/O to/O which/O he/O
could/O not/O accustom/O himself/O./O



Chapter/O 16/O


At/O ten/O o'clock/O the/O old/O prince/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O and/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON were/O sitting/O at/O Levin/PERSON's/O./O Having/O inquired/O after/O Kitty/PERSON,/O they/O
had/O dropped/O into/O conversation/O upon/O other/O subjects/O./O Levin/PERSON heard/O them/O,/O and/O
unconsciously/O,/O as/O they/O talked/O,/O going/O over/O the/O past/O,/O over/O what/O had/O been/O
up/O to/O that/O morning/O,/O he/O thought/O of/O himself/O as/O he/O had/O been/O yesterday/O till/O
that/O point/O./O It/O was/O as/O though/O a/O hundred/O years/O had/O passed/O since/O then/O./O He/O
felt/O himself/O exalted/O to/O unattainable/O heights/O,/O from/O which/O he/O studiously/O
lowered/O himself/O so/O as/O not/O to/O wound/O the/O people/O he/O was/O talking/O to/O./O He/O
talked/O,/O and/O was/O all/O the/O time/O thinking/O of/O his/O wife/O,/O of/O her/O condition/O now/O,/O
of/O his/O son/O,/O in/O whose/O existence/O he/O tried/O to/O school/O himself/O into/O
believing/O./O The/O whole/O world/O of/O woman/O,/O which/O had/O taken/O for/O him/O since/O his/O
marriage/O a/O new/O value/O he/O had/O never/O suspected/O before/O,/O was/O now/O so/O exalted/O
that/O he/O could/O not/O take/O it/O in/O in/O his/O imagination/O./O He/O heard/O them/O talk/O of/O
yesterday/O's/O dinner/O at/O the/O club/O,/O and/O thought/O:/O ``/OWhat/O is/O happening/O with/O her/O
now/O?/O Is/O she/O asleep/O?/O How/O is/O she/O?/O What/O is/O she/O thinking/O of/O?/O Is/O he/O crying/O,/O
my/O son/O Dmitri/PERSON?/O''/O And/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O conversation/O,/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O
a/O sentence/O,/O he/O jumped/O up/O and/O went/O out/O of/O the/O room/O./O

``/OSend/O me/O word/O if/O I/O can/O see/O her/O,/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O./O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O in/O a/O minute/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O without/O stopping/O,/O he/O went/O
to/O her/O room/O./O

She/O was/O not/O asleep/O,/O she/O was/O talking/O gently/O with/O her/O mother/O,/O making/O plans/O
about/O the/O christening/O./O

Carefully/O set/O to/O rights/O,/O with/O hair/O well-brushed/O,/O in/O a/O smart/O little/O cap/O
with/O some/O blue/O in/O it/O,/O her/O arms/O out/O on/O the/O quilt/O,/O she/O was/O lying/O on/O her/O
back/O./O Meeting/O his/O eyes/O,/O her/O eyes/O drew/O him/O to/O her/O./O Her/O face/O,/O bright/O
before/O,/O brightened/O still/O more/O as/O he/O drew/O near/O her/O./O There/O was/O the/O same/O
change/O in/O it/O from/O earthly/O to/O unearthly/O that/O is/O seen/O in/O the/O face/O of/O the/O
dead/O./O But/O then/O it/O means/O farewell/O,/O here/O it/O meant/O welcome/O./O Again/O a/O rush/O of/O
emotion/O,/O such/O as/O he/O had/O felt/O at/O the/O moment/O of/O the/O child/O's/O birth/O,/O flooded/O
his/O heart/O./O She/O took/O his/O hand/O and/O asked/O him/O if/O he/O had/O slept/O./O He/O could/O not/O
answer/O,/O and/O turned/O away/O,/O struggling/O with/O his/O weakness/O./O

``/OI/O have/O had/O a/O nap/O,/O Kostya/PERSON!/O''/O she/O said/O to/O him/O;/O ``/Oand/O I/O am/O so/O comfortable/O
now/O./O''/O

She/O looked/O at/O him/O,/O but/O suddenly/O her/O expression/O changed/O./O

``/OGive/O him/O to/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O hearing/O the/O baby/O's/O cry/O./O ``/OGive/O him/O to/O me/O,/O
Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON,/O and/O he/O shall/O look/O at/O him/O./O''/O

``/OTo/O be/O sure/O,/O his/O papa/O shall/O look/O at/O him/O,/O''/O said/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON,/O
getting/O up/O and/O bringing/O something/O red/O,/O and/O queer/O,/O and/O wriggling/O./O ``/OWait/O a/O
minute/O,/O we/O'll/O make/O him/O tidy/O first/O,/O''/O and/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON laid/O the/O red/O
wobbling/O thing/O on/O the/O bed/O,/O began/O untrussing/O and/O trussing/O up/O the/O baby/O,/O
lifting/O it/O up/O and/O turning/O it/O over/O with/O one/O finger/O and/O powdering/O it/O with/O
something/O./O

Levin/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O the/O tiny/O,/O pitiful/O creature/O,/O made/O strenuous/O efforts/O to/O
discover/O in/O his/O heart/O some/O traces/O of/O fatherly/O feeling/O for/O it/O./O He/O felt/O
nothing/O towards/O it/O but/O disgust/O./O But/O when/O it/O was/O undressed/O and/O he/O caught/O
a/O glimpse/O of/O wee/O,/O wee/O,/O little/O hands/O,/O little/O feet/O,/O saffron-colored/O,/O with/O
little/O toes/O,/O too/O,/O and/O positively/O with/O a/O little/O big/O toe/O different/O from/O
the/O rest/O,/O and/O when/O he/O saw/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON closing/O the/O wide-open/O little/O
hands/O,/O as/O though/O they/O were/O soft/O springs/O,/O and/O putting/O them/O into/O linen/O
garments/O,/O such/O pity/O for/O the/O little/O creature/O came/O upon/O him/O,/O and/O such/O
terror/O that/O she/O would/O hurt/O it/O,/O that/O he/O held/O her/O hand/O back/O./O

Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON laughed/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O be/O frightened/O,/O do/On't/O be/O frightened/O!/O''/O

When/O the/O baby/O had/O been/O put/O to/O rights/O and/O transformed/O into/O a/O firm/O doll/O,/O
Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON dandled/O it/O as/O though/O proud/O of/O her/O handiwork/O,/O and/O stood/O
a/O little/O away/O so/O that/O Levin/PERSON might/O see/O his/O son/O in/O all/O his/O glory/O./O

Kitty/PERSON looked/O sideways/O in/O the/O same/O direction/O,/O never/O taking/O her/O eyes/O off/O
the/O baby/O./O ``/OGive/O him/O to/O me/O!/O give/O him/O to/O me/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O even/O made/O as/O
though/O she/O would/O sit/O up/O./O

``/OWhat/O are/O you/O thinking/O of/O,/O Katerina/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O you/O must/On't/O move/O like/O
that/O!/O Wait/O a/O minute/O./O I/O'll/O give/O him/O to/O you/O./O Here/O we/O're/O showing/O papa/O what/O
a/O fine/O fellow/O we/O are/O!/O''/O

And/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON,/O with/O one/O hand/O supporting/O the/O wobbling/O head/O,/O
lifted/O up/O on/O the/O other/O arm/O the/O strange/O,/O limp/O,/O red/O creature/O,/O whose/O head/O
was/O lost/O in/O its/O swaddling/O clothes/O./O But/O it/O had/O a/O nose/O,/O too/O,/O and/O slanting/O
eyes/O and/O smacking/O lips/O./O

``/OA/O splendid/O baby/O!/O''/O said/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON./O

Levin/PERSON sighed/O with/O mortification/O./O This/O splendid/O baby/O excited/O in/O him/O no/O
feeling/O but/O disgust/O and/O compassion/O./O It/O was/O not/O at/O all/O the/O feeling/O he/O had/O
looked/O forward/O to/O./O

He/O turned/O away/O while/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON put/O the/O baby/O to/O the/O unaccustomed/O
breast/O./O

Suddenly/O laughter/O made/O him/O look/O round/O./O The/O baby/O had/O taken/O the/O breast/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O that/O's/O enough/O,/O that/O's/O enough/O!/O''/O said/O Lizaveta/PERSON Petrovna/PERSON,/O but/O Kitty/PERSON
would/O not/O let/O the/O baby/O go/O./O He/O fell/O asleep/O in/O her/O arms/O./O

``/OLook/O,/O now/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O turning/O the/O baby/O so/O that/O he/O could/O see/O it/O./O The/O
aged-looking/O little/O face/O suddenly/O puckered/O up/O still/O more/O and/O the/O baby/O
sneezed/O./O

Smiling/O,/O hardly/O able/O to/O restrain/O his/O tears/O,/O Levin/PERSON kissed/O his/O wife/O and/O
went/O out/O of/O the/O dark/O room/O./O What/O he/O felt/O towards/O this/O little/O creature/O was/O
utterly/O unlike/O what/O he/O had/O expected/O./O There/O was/O nothing/O cheerful/O and/O
joyous/O in/O the/O feeling/O;/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O it/O was/O a/O new/O torture/O of/O
apprehension/O./O It/O was/O the/O consciousness/O of/O a/O new/O sphere/O of/O liability/O to/O
pain/O./O And/O this/O sense/O was/O so/O painful/O at/O first/O,/O the/O apprehension/O lest/O this/O
helpless/O creature/O should/O suffer/O was/O so/O intense/O,/O that/O it/O prevented/O him/O
from/O noticing/O the/O strange/O thrill/O of/O senseless/O joy/O and/O even/O pride/O that/O he/O
had/O felt/O when/O the/O baby/O sneezed/O./O



Chapter/O 17/O


Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O affairs/O were/O in/O a/O very/O bad/O way/O./O

The/O money/O for/O two-thirds/O of/O the/O forest/O had/O all/O been/O spent/O already/O,/O and/O
he/O had/O borrowed/O from/O the/O merchant/O in/O advance/O at/O ten/O per/O cent/O discount/O,/O
almost/O all/O the/O remaining/O third/O./O The/O merchant/O would/O not/O give/O more/O,/O
especially/O as/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O for/O the/O first/O time/O that/O winter/O
insisting/O on/O her/O right/O to/O her/O own/O property/O,/O had/O refused/O to/O sign/O the/O
receipt/O for/O the/O payment/O of/O the/O last/O third/O of/O the/O forest/O./O All/O his/O salary/O
went/O on/O household/O expenses/O and/O in/O payment/O of/O petty/O debts/O that/O could/O not/O
be/O put/O off/O./O There/O was/O positively/O no/O money/O./O

This/O was/O unpleasant/O and/O awkward/O,/O and/O in/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O opinion/O
things/O could/O not/O go/O on/O like/O this/O./O The/O explanation/O of/O the/O position/O was/O,/O
in/O his/O view/O,/O to/O be/O found/O in/O the/O fact/O that/O his/O salary/O was/O too/O small/O./O The/O
post/O he/O filled/O had/O been/O unmistakably/O very/O good/O five/O years/O ago/O,/O but/O it/O
was/O so/O no/O longer/O./O

Petrov/PERSON,/O the/O bank/O director/O,/O had/O twelve/O thousand/O;/O Sventitsky/PERSON,/O a/O company/O
director/O,/O had/O seventeen/O thousand/O;/O Mitin/PERSON,/O who/O had/O founded/O a/O bank/O,/O
received/O fifty/O thousand/O./O

``/OClearly/O I/O've/O been/O napping/O,/O and/O they/O've/O overlooked/O me/O,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON thought/O about/O himself/O./O And/O he/O began/O keeping/O his/O eyes/O and/O
ears/O open/O,/O and/O towards/O the/O end/O of/O the/O winter/O he/O had/O discovered/O a/O very/O
good/O berth/O and/O had/O formed/O a/O plan/O of/O attack/O upon/O it/O,/O at/O first/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION
through/O aunts/O,/O uncles/O,/O and/O friends/O,/O and/O then/O,/O when/O the/O matter/O was/O well/O
advanced/O,/O in/O the/O spring/O,/O he/O went/O himself/O to/O Petersburg/PERSON./O It/O was/O one/O of/O
those/O snug/O,/O lucrative/O berths/O of/O which/O there/O are/O so/O many/O more/O nowadays/O
than/O there/O used/O to/O be/O,/O with/O incomes/O ranging/O from/O one/O thousand/O to/O fifty/O
thousand/O roubles/O./O It/O was/O the/O post/O of/O secretary/O of/O the/O committee/O of/O the/O
amalgamated/O agency/O of/O the/O southern/O railways/O,/O and/O of/O certain/O banking/O
companies/O./O This/O position/O,/O like/O all/O such/O appointments/O,/O called/O for/O such/O
immense/O energy/O and/O such/O varied/O qualifications/O,/O that/O it/O was/O difficult/O for/O
them/O to/O be/O found/O united/O in/O any/O one/O man/O./O And/O since/O a/O man/O combining/O all/O
the/O qualifications/O was/O not/O to/O be/O found/O,/O it/O was/O at/O least/O better/O that/O the/O
post/O be/O filled/O by/O an/O honest/O than/O by/O a/O dishonest/O man/O./O And/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O not/O merely/O an/O honest/O man/O--/Ounemphatically/O--/Oin/O the/O common/O
acceptation/O of/O the/O words/O,/O he/O was/O an/O honest/O man/O--/Oemphatically/O--/Oin/O that/O
special/O sense/O which/O the/O word/O has/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O when/O they/O talk/O of/O an/O
``/Ohonest/O''/O politician/O,/O an/O ``/Ohonest/O''/O writer/O,/O an/O ``/Ohonest/O''/O newspaper/O,/O an/O
``/Ohonest/O''/O institution/O,/O an/O ``/Ohonest/O''/O tendency/O,/O meaning/O not/O simply/O that/O the/O
man/O or/O the/O institution/O is/O not/O dishonest/O,/O but/O that/O they/O are/O capable/O on/O
occasion/O of/O taking/O a/O line/O of/O their/O own/O in/O opposition/O to/O the/O authorities/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON moved/O in/O those/O circles/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION in/O which/O that/O
expression/O had/O come/O into/O use/O,/O was/O regarded/O there/O as/O an/O honest/O man/O,/O and/O
so/O had/O more/O right/O to/O this/O appointment/O than/O others/O./O

The/O appointment/O yielded/O an/O income/O of/O from/O seven/O to/O ten/O thousand/O a/O year/O,/O
and/O Oblonsky/PERSON could/O fill/O it/O without/O giving/O up/O his/O government/O position/O./O It/O
was/O in/O the/O hands/O of/O two/O ministers/O,/O one/O lady/O,/O and/O two/O Jews/O,/O and/O all/O these/O
people/O,/O though/O the/O way/O had/O been/O paved/O already/O with/O them/O,/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O to/O see/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O Besides/O this/O business/O,/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O promised/O his/O sister/O Anna/PERSON to/O obtain/O from/O Karenin/PERSON a/O
definite/O answer/O on/O the/O question/O of/O divorce/O./O And/O begging/O fifty/O roubles/O
from/O Dolly/PERSON,/O he/O set/O off/O for/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON sat/O in/O Karenin/PERSON's/O study/O listening/O to/O his/O report/O on/O
the/O causes/O of/O the/O unsatisfactory/O position/O of/O Russian/O finance/O,/O and/O only/O
waiting/O for/O the/O moment/O when/O he/O would/O finish/O to/O speak/O about/O his/O own/O
business/O or/O about/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O's/O very/O true/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O when/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON took/O off/O
the/O pince-nez/O,/O without/O which/O he/O could/O not/O read/O now/O,/O and/O looked/O
inquiringly/O at/O his/O former/O brother-in-law/O,/O ``/Othat/O's/O very/O true/O in/O
particular/O cases/O,/O but/O still/O the/O principle/O of/O our/O day/O is/O freedom/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O I/O lay/O down/O another/O principle/O,/O embracing/O the/O principle/O of/O
freedom/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O with/O emphasis/O on/O the/O word/O
``/Oembracing/O,/O''/O and/O he/O put/O on/O his/O pince-nez/O again/O,/O so/O as/O to/O read/O the/O
passage/O in/O which/O this/O statement/O was/O made/O./O And/O turning/O over/O the/O
beautifully/O written/O,/O wide-margined/O manuscript/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
read/O aloud/O over/O again/O the/O conclusive/O passage/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O advocate/O protection/O for/O the/O sake/O of/O private/O interests/O,/O but/O for/O
the/O public/O weal/O,/O and/O for/O the/O lower/O and/O upper/O classes/O equally/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
looking/O over/O his/O pince-nez/O at/O Oblonsky/LOCATION./O ``/OBut/O _/Othey/O_/O can/Onot/O grasp/O that/O,/O
_/Othey/O_/O are/O taken/O up/O now/O with/O personal/O interests/O,/O and/O carried/O away/O by/O
phrases/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON knew/O that/O when/O Karenin/PERSON began/O to/O talk/O of/O what/O _/Othey/O_/O
were/O doing/O and/O thinking/O,/O the/O persons/O who/O would/O not/O accept/O his/O report/O and/O
were/O the/O cause/O of/O everything/O wrong/O in/O Russia/LOCATION,/O that/O it/O was/O coming/O near/O
the/O end/O./O And/O so/O now/O he/O eagerly/O abandoned/O the/O principle/O of/O free-trade/O,/O
and/O fully/O agreed/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON paused/O,/O thoughtfully/O turning/O
over/O the/O pages/O of/O his/O manuscript/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O by/O the/O way/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O ``/OI/O wanted/O to/O ask/O you/O,/O some/O
time/O when/O you/O see/O Pomorsky/PERSON,/O to/O drop/O him/O a/O hint/O that/O I/O should/O be/O very/O
glad/O to/O get/O that/O new/O appointment/O of/O secretary/O of/O the/O committee/O of/O the/O
amalgamated/O agency/O of/O the/O southern/O railways/O and/O banking/O companies/O./O''/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O familiar/O by/O now/O with/O the/O title/O of/O the/O post/O he/O
coveted/O,/O and/O he/O brought/O it/O out/O rapidly/O without/O mistake/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON questioned/O him/O as/O to/O the/O duties/O of/O this/O new/O
committee/O,/O and/O pondered/O./O He/O was/O considering/O whether/O the/O new/O committee/O
would/O not/O be/O acting/O in/O some/O way/O contrary/O to/O the/O views/O he/O had/O been/O
advocating/O./O But/O as/O the/O influence/O of/O the/O new/O committee/O was/O of/O a/O very/O
complex/O nature/O,/O and/O his/O views/O were/O of/O very/O wide/O application/O,/O he/O could/O
not/O decide/O this/O straight/O off/O,/O and/O taking/O off/O his/O pince-nez/O,/O he/O said/O:/O

``/OOf/O course/O,/O I/O can/O mention/O it/O to/O him/O;/O but/O what/O is/O your/O reason/O precisely/O
for/O wishing/O to/O obtain/O the/O appointment/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O a/O good/O salary/O,/O rising/O to/O nine/O thousand/O,/O and/O my/O means/O.../O''/O

``/ONine/O thousand/O!/O''/O repeated/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O and/O he/O frowned/O./O The/O
high/O figure/O of/O the/O salary/O made/O him/O reflect/O that/O on/O that/O side/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O proposed/O position/O ran/O counter/O to/O the/O main/O tendency/O of/O his/O
own/O projects/O of/O reform/O,/O which/O always/O leaned/O towards/O economy/O./O

``/OI/O consider/O,/O and/O I/O have/O embodied/O my/O views/O in/O a/O note/O on/O the/O subject/O,/O that/O
in/O our/O day/O these/O immense/O salaries/O are/O evidence/O of/O the/O unsound/O economic/O
_/Oassiette/O_/O of/O our/O finances/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O's/O to/O be/O done/O?/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OSuppose/O a/O bank/O
director/O gets/O ten/O thousand/O--/Owell/O,/O he/O's/O worth/O it/O;/O or/O an/O engineer/O gets/O
twenty/O thousand/O--/Oafter/O all/O,/O it/O's/O a/O growing/O thing/O,/O you/O know/O!/O''/O

``/OI/O assume/O that/O a/O salary/O is/O the/O price/O paid/O for/O a/O commodity/O,/O and/O it/O ought/O
to/O conform/O with/O the/O law/O of/O supply/O and/O demand/O./O If/O the/O salary/O is/O fixed/O
without/O any/O regard/O for/O that/O law/O,/O as/O,/O for/O instance/O,/O when/O I/O see/O two/O
engineers/O leaving/O college/O together/O,/O both/O equally/O well/O trained/O and/O
efficient/O,/O and/O one/O getting/O forty/O thousand/O while/O the/O other/O is/O satisfied/O
with/O two/O;/O or/O when/O I/O see/O lawyers/O and/O hussars/O,/O having/O no/O special/O
qualifications/O,/O appointed/O directors/O of/O banking/O companies/O with/O immense/O
salaries/O,/O I/O conclude/O that/O the/O salary/O is/O not/O fixed/O in/O accordance/O with/O the/O
law/O of/O supply/O and/O demand/O,/O but/O simply/O through/O personal/O interest/O./O And/O this/O
is/O an/O abuse/O of/O great/O gravity/O in/O itself/O,/O and/O one/O that/O reacts/O injuriously/O
on/O the/O government/O service/O./O I/O consider/O.../O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON made/O haste/O to/O interrupt/O his/O brother-in-law/O./O

``/OYes/O;/O but/O you/O must/O agree/O that/O it/O's/O a/O new/O institution/O of/O undoubted/O
utility/O that/O's/O being/O started/O./O After/O all/O,/O you/O know/O,/O it/O's/O a/O growing/O thing/O!/O
What/O they/O lay/O particular/O stress/O on/O is/O the/O thing/O being/O carried/O on/O
honestly/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON with/O emphasis/O./O

But/O the/O Moscow/LOCATION significance/O of/O the/O word/O ``/Ohonest/O''/O was/O lost/O on/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OHonesty/O is/O only/O a/O negative/O qualification/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O you/O'll/O do/O me/O a/O great/O service/O,/O anyway/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
``/Oby/O putting/O in/O a/O word/O to/O Pomorsky/LOCATION--/Ojust/O in/O the/O way/O of/O conversation/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O fancy/O it/O's/O more/O in/O Volgarinov/PERSON's/O hands/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OVolgarinov/PERSON has/O fully/O assented/O,/O as/O far/O as/O he/O's/O concerned/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O turning/O red/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON reddened/O at/O the/O mention/O
of/O that/O name/O,/O because/O he/O had/O been/O that/O morning/O at/O the/O Jew/O Volgarinov/O's/O,/O
and/O the/O visit/O had/O left/O an/O unpleasant/O recollection/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON believed/O most/O positively/O that/O the/O committee/O in/O which/O
he/O was/O trying/O to/O get/O an/O appointment/O was/O a/O new/O,/O genuine/O,/O and/O honest/O
public/O body/O,/O but/O that/O morning/O when/O Volgarinov/PERSON had/O--/Ointentionally/O,/O beyond/O
a/O doubt/O--/Okept/O him/O two/O hours/O waiting/O with/O other/O petitioners/O in/O his/O waiting/O
room/O,/O he/O had/O suddenly/O felt/O uneasy/O./O

Whether/O he/O was/O uncomfortable/O that/O he/O,/O a/O descendant/O of/O Rurik/LOCATION,/O Prince/O
Oblonsky/PERSON,/O had/O been/O kept/O for/O two/O hours/O waiting/O to/O see/O a/O Jew/O,/O or/O that/O for/O
the/O first/O time/O in/O his/O life/O he/O was/O not/O following/O the/O example/O of/O his/O
ancestors/O in/O serving/O the/O government/O,/O but/O was/O turning/O off/O into/O a/O new/O
career/O,/O anyway/O he/O was/O very/O uncomfortable/O./O During/O those/O two/O hours/O in/O
Volgarinov/PERSON's/O waiting/O room/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O stepping/O jauntily/O about/O
the/O room/O,/O pulling/O his/O whiskers/O,/O entering/O into/O conversation/O with/O the/O
other/O petitioners/O,/O and/O inventing/O an/O epigram/O on/O his/O position/O,/O assiduously/O
concealed/O from/O others/O,/O and/O even/O from/O himself/O,/O the/O feeling/O he/O was/O
experiencing/O./O

But/O all/O the/O time/O he/O was/O uncomfortable/O and/O angry/O,/O he/O could/O not/O have/O said/O
why/O--/Owhether/O because/O he/O could/O not/O get/O his/O epigram/O just/O right/O,/O or/O from/O
some/O other/O reason/O./O When/O at/O last/O Volgarinov/PERSON had/O received/O him/O with/O
exaggerated/O politeness/O and/O unmistakable/O triumph/O at/O his/O humiliation/O,/O and/O
had/O all/O but/O refused/O the/O favor/O asked/O of/O him/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O made/O
haste/O to/O forget/O it/O all/O as/O soon/O as/O possible/O./O And/O now/O,/O at/O the/O mere/O
recollection/O,/O he/O blushed/O./O



Chapter/O 18/O


``/ONow/O there/O is/O something/O I/O want/O to/O talk/O about/O,/O and/O you/O know/O what/O it/O is/O./O
About/O Anna/PERSON,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O,/O pausing/O for/O a/O brief/O space/O,/O and/O
shaking/O off/O the/O unpleasant/O impression/O./O

As/O soon/O as/O Oblonsky/PERSON uttered/O Anna/PERSON's/O name/O,/O the/O face/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON was/O completely/O transformed/O;/O all/O the/O life/O was/O gone/O out/O of/O
it/O,/O and/O it/O looked/O weary/O and/O dead/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O exactly/O that/O you/O want/O from/O me/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O moving/O in/O his/O chair/O
and/O snapping/O his/O pince-nez/O./O

``/OA/O definite/O settlement/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O some/O settlement/O of/O the/O
position/O./O I/O'm/O appealing/O to/O you/O''/O -LRB-/O``/Onot/O as/O an/O injured/O husband/O,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O going/O to/O say/O,/O but/O afraid/O of/O wrecking/O his/O negotiation/O by/O
this/O,/O he/O changed/O the/O words/O-RRB-/O ``/Onot/O as/O a/O statesman/O''/O -LRB-/Owhich/O did/O not/O sound/O _/Oà/O
propos/O_/O-RRB-/O,/O ``/Obut/O simply/O as/O a/O man/O,/O and/O a/O good-hearted/O man/O and/O a/O Christian/O./O
You/O must/O have/O pity/O on/O her/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OThat/O is/O,/O in/O what/O way/O precisely/O?/O''/O Karenin/PERSON said/O softly/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O pity/O on/O her/O./O If/O you/O had/O seen/O her/O as/O I/O have/O!/O--/OI/O have/O been/O spending/O
all/O the/O winter/O with/O her/O--/Oyou/O would/O have/O pity/O on/O her/O./O Her/O position/O is/O
awful/O,/O simply/O awful/O!/O''/O

``/OI/O had/O imagined/O,/O''/O answered/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON in/O a/O higher/O,/O almost/O
shrill/O voice/O,/O ``/Othat/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON had/O everything/O she/O had/O desired/O for/O
herself/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O for/O heaven/O's/O sake/O,/O do/On't/O let/O us/O indulge/O in/O
recriminations/O!/O What/O is/O past/O is/O past/O,/O and/O you/O know/O what/O she/O wants/O and/O is/O
waiting/O for/O--/Odivorce/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O believe/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON refuses/O a/O divorce/O,/O if/O I/O make/O it/O a/O
condition/O to/O leave/O me/O my/O son/O./O I/O replied/O in/O that/O sense/O,/O and/O supposed/O that/O
the/O matter/O was/O ended/O./O I/O consider/O it/O at/O an/O end/O,/O''/O shrieked/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OBut/O,/O for/O heaven/O's/O sake/O,/O do/On't/O get/O hot/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
touching/O his/O brother-in-law/O's/O knee/O./O ``/OThe/O matter/O is/O not/O ended/O./O If/O you/O
will/O allow/O me/O to/O recapitulate/O,/O it/O was/O like/O this/O:/O when/O you/O parted/O,/O you/O
were/O as/O magnanimous/O as/O could/O possibly/O be/O;/O you/O were/O ready/O to/O give/O her/O
everything/O--/Ofreedom/O,/O divorce/O even/O./O She/O appreciated/O that/O./O No/O,/O do/On't/O think/O
that/O./O She/O did/O appreciate/O it/O--/Oto/O such/O a/O degree/O that/O at/O the/O first/O moment/O,/O
feeling/O how/O she/O had/O wronged/O you/O,/O she/O did/O not/O consider/O and/O could/O not/O
consider/O everything/O./O She/O gave/O up/O everything/O./O But/O experience/O,/O time/O,/O have/O
shown/O that/O her/O position/O is/O unbearable/O,/O impossible/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O life/O of/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON can/O have/O no/O interest/O for/O me/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON put/O in/O,/O lifting/O his/O eyebrows/O./O

``/OAllow/O me/O to/O disbelieve/O that/O,/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON replied/O gently/O./O ``/OHer/O
position/O is/O intolerable/O for/O her/O,/O and/O of/O no/O benefit/O to/O anyone/O whatever/O./O
She/O has/O deserved/O it/O,/O you/O will/O say/O./O She/O knows/O that/O and/O asks/O you/O for/O
nothing/O;/O she/O says/O plainly/O that/O she/O dare/O not/O ask/O you/O./O But/O I/O,/O all/O of/O us/O,/O
her/O relatives/O,/O all/O who/O love/O her/O,/O beg/O you/O,/O entreat/O you/O./O Why/O should/O she/O
suffer/O?/O Who/O is/O any/O the/O better/O for/O it/O?/O''/O

``/OExcuse/O me/O,/O you/O seem/O to/O put/O me/O in/O the/O position/O of/O the/O guilty/O party/O,/O''/O
observed/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O oh/O,/O no/O,/O not/O at/O all/O!/O please/O understand/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O touching/O his/O hand/O again/O,/O as/O though/O feeling/O sure/O this/O
physical/O contact/O would/O soften/O his/O brother-in-law/O./O ``/OAll/O I/O say/O is/O this/O:/O
her/O position/O is/O intolerable/O,/O and/O it/O might/O be/O alleviated/O by/O you/O,/O and/O you/O
will/O lose/O nothing/O by/O it/O./O I/O will/O arrange/O it/O all/O for/O you/O,/O so/O that/O you/O'll/O
not/O notice/O it/O./O You/O did/O promise/O it/O,/O you/O know/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O promise/O was/O given/O before/O./O And/O I/O had/O supposed/O that/O the/O question/O of/O
my/O son/O had/O settled/O the/O matter/O./O Besides/O,/O I/O had/O hoped/O that/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON
had/O enough/O generosity/O.../O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON articulated/O with/O
difficulty/O,/O his/O lips/O twitching/O and/O his/O face/O white/O./O

``/OShe/O leaves/O it/O all/O to/O your/O generosity/O./O She/O begs/O,/O she/O implores/O one/O thing/O
of/O you/O--/Oto/O extricate/O her/O from/O the/O impossible/O position/O in/O which/O she/O is/O
placed/O./O She/O does/O not/O ask/O for/O her/O son/O now/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O you/O are/O
a/O good/O man/O./O Put/O yourself/O in/O her/O position/O for/O a/O minute/O./O The/O question/O of/O
divorce/O for/O her/O in/O her/O position/O is/O a/O question/O of/O life/O and/O death/O./O If/O you/O
had/O not/O promised/O it/O once/O,/O she/O would/O have/O reconciled/O herself/O to/O her/O
position/O,/O she/O would/O have/O gone/O on/O living/O in/O the/O country/O./O But/O you/O promised/O
it/O,/O and/O she/O wrote/O to/O you/O,/O and/O moved/O to/O Moscow/LOCATION./O And/O here/O she/O's/O been/O for/O
six/O months/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O where/O every/O chance/O meeting/O cuts/O her/O to/O the/O heart/O,/O
every/O day/O expecting/O an/O answer/O./O Why/O,/O it/O's/O like/O keeping/O a/O condemned/O
criminal/O for/O six/O months/O with/O the/O rope/O round/O his/O neck/O,/O promising/O him/O
perhaps/O death/O,/O perhaps/O mercy/O./O Have/O pity/O on/O her/O,/O and/O I/O will/O undertake/O to/O
arrange/O everything/O./O _/OVos/O scrupules/O_/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O am/O not/O talking/O about/O that/O,/O about/O that/O.../O''/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
interrupted/O with/O disgust/O./O ``/OBut/O,/O perhaps/O,/O I/O promised/O what/O I/O had/O no/O right/O
to/O promise/O./O''/O

``/OSo/O you/O go/O back/O from/O your/O promise/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O have/O never/O refused/O to/O do/O all/O that/O is/O possible/O,/O but/O I/O want/O time/O to/O
consider/O how/O much/O of/O what/O I/O promised/O is/O possible/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON!/O''/O cried/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O jumping/O up/O,/O ``/OI/O wo/On't/O
believe/O that/O!/O She/O's/O unhappy/O as/O only/O an/O unhappy/O woman/O can/O be/O,/O and/O you/O
can/Onot/O refuse/O in/O such/O.../O''/O

``/OAs/O much/O of/O what/O I/O promised/O as/O is/O possible/O./O _/OVous/O professez/O d'être/O libre/O
penseur/O./O_/O But/O I/O as/O a/O believer/O can/Onot/O,/O in/O a/O matter/O of/O such/O gravity/O,/O act/O
in/O opposition/O to/O the/O Christian/O law/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O in/O Christian/O societies/O and/O among/O us/O,/O as/O far/O as/O I/O'm/O aware/O,/O divorce/O
is/O allowed/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/ODivorce/O is/O sanctioned/O even/O by/O
our/O church/O./O And/O we/O see/O.../O''/O

``/OIt/O is/O allowed/O,/O but/O not/O in/O the/O sense/O.../O''/O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O you/O are/O not/O like/O yourself/O,/O''/O said/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O after/O
a/O brief/O pause/O./O ``/OWas/On't/O it/O you/O -LRB-/Oand/O did/On't/O we/O all/O appreciate/O it/O in/O you/O?/O-RRB-/O
who/O forgave/O everything/O,/O and/O moved/O simply/O by/O Christian/O feeling/O was/O ready/O
to/O make/O any/O sacrifice/O?/O You/O said/O yourself/O:/O if/O a/O man/O take/O thy/O coat/O,/O give/O
him/O thy/O cloak/O also/O,/O and/O now/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O beg/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON shrilly/O,/O getting/O suddenly/O onto/O his/O
feet/O,/O his/O face/O white/O and/O his/O jaws/O twitching/O,/O ``/OI/O beg/O you/O to/O drop/O this/O .../O
to/O drop/O .../O this/O subject/O!/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O!/O Oh/O,/O forgive/O me/O,/O forgive/O me/O if/O I/O have/O wounded/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O holding/O out/O his/O hand/O with/O a/O smile/O of/O embarrassment/O;/O ``/Obut/O
like/O a/O messenger/O I/O have/O simply/O performed/O the/O commission/O given/O me/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON gave/O him/O his/O hand/O,/O pondered/O a/O little/O,/O and/O said/O:/O

``/OI/O must/O think/O it/O over/O and/O seek/O for/O guidance/O./O The/O day/O after/O tomorrow/O I/O
will/O give/O you/O a/O final/O answer/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O after/O considering/O a/O moment/O./O



Chapter/O 19/O


Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O about/O to/O go/O away/O when/O Korney/PERSON came/O in/O to/O
announce/O:/O

``/OSergey/PERSON Alexyevitch/PERSON!/O''/O

``/OWho/O's/O Sergey/PERSON Alexyevitch/PERSON?/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O beginning/O,/O but/O he/O
remembered/O immediately/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON!/O''/O he/O said/O aloud/O./O ``/OSergey/PERSON Alexyevitch/PERSON!/O I/O thought/O it/O was/O the/O
director/O of/O a/O department/O./O Anna/PERSON asked/O me/O to/O see/O him/O too/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

And/O he/O recalled/O the/O timid/O,/O piteous/O expression/O with/O which/O Anna/PERSON had/O said/O
to/O him/O at/O parting/O:/O ``/OAnyway/O,/O you/O will/O see/O him/O./O Find/O out/O exactly/O where/O he/O
is/O,/O who/O is/O looking/O after/O him/O./O And/O Stiva/O .../O if/O it/O were/O possible/O!/O Could/O
it/O be/O possible/O?/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON knew/O what/O was/O meant/O by/O that/O ``/Oif/O it/O
were/O possible/O,/O''/O--/Oif/O it/O were/O possible/O to/O arrange/O the/O divorce/O so/O as/O to/O let/O
her/O have/O her/O son/O.../O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON saw/O now/O that/O it/O was/O no/O good/O to/O
dream/O of/O that/O,/O but/O still/O he/O was/O glad/O to/O see/O his/O nephew/O./O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON reminded/O his/O brother-in-law/O that/O they/O never/O spoke/O
to/O the/O boy/O of/O his/O mother/O,/O and/O he/O begged/O him/O not/O to/O mention/O a/O single/O word/O
about/O her/O./O

``/OHe/O was/O very/O ill/O after/O that/O interview/O with/O his/O mother/O,/O which/O we/O had/O not/O
foreseen/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O ``/OIndeed/O,/O we/O feared/O for/O his/O life/O./O
But/O with/O rational/O treatment/O,/O and/O sea-bathing/O in/O the/O summer/O,/O he/O regained/O
his/O strength/O,/O and/O now/O,/O by/O the/O doctor/O's/O advice/O,/O I/O have/O let/O him/O go/O to/O
school/O./O And/O certainly/O the/O companionship/O of/O school/O has/O had/O a/O good/O effect/O
on/O him/O,/O and/O he/O is/O perfectly/O well/O,/O and/O making/O good/O progress/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O a/O fine/O fellow/O he/O's/O grown/O!/O He/O's/O not/O Seryozha/PERSON now/O,/O but/O quite/O
full-fledged/O Sergey/PERSON Alexyevitch/PERSON!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O smiling/O,/O as/O
he/O looked/O at/O the/O handsome/O,/O broad-shouldered/O lad/O in/O blue/O coat/O and/O long/O
trousers/O,/O who/O walked/O in/O alertly/O and/O confidently/O./O The/O boy/O looked/O healthy/O
and/O good-humored/O./O He/O bowed/O to/O his/O uncle/O as/O to/O a/O stranger/O,/O but/O
recognizing/O him/O,/O he/O blushed/O and/O turned/O hurriedly/O away/O from/O him/O,/O as/O
though/O offended/O and/O irritated/O at/O something/O./O The/O boy/O went/O up/O to/O his/O
father/O and/O handed/O him/O a/O note/O of/O the/O marks/O he/O had/O gained/O in/O school/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O that/O's/O very/O fair/O,/O''/O said/O his/O father/O,/O ``/Oyou/O can/O go/O./O''/O

``/OHe/O's/O thinner/O and/O taller/O,/O and/O has/O grown/O out/O of/O being/O a/O child/O into/O a/O boy/O;/O
I/O like/O that/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/ODo/O you/O remember/O me/O?/O''/O

The/O boy/O looked/O back/O quickly/O at/O his/O uncle/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O _/Omon/O oncle/O_/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O,/O glancing/O at/O his/O father/O,/O and/O again/O he/O
looked/O downcast/O./O

His/O uncle/O called/O him/O to/O him/O,/O and/O took/O his/O hand/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O how/O are/O you/O getting/O on/O?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O wanting/O to/O talk/O to/O him/O,/O and/O
not/O knowing/O what/O to/O say/O./O

The/O boy/O,/O blushing/O and/O making/O no/O answer/O,/O cautiously/O drew/O his/O hand/O away/O./O
As/O soon/O as/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON let/O go/O his/O hand/O,/O he/O glanced/O doubtfully/O at/O
his/O father/O,/O and/O like/O a/O bird/O set/O free/O,/O he/O darted/O out/O of/O the/O room/O./O

A/O year/O had/O passed/O since/O the/O last/O time/O Seryozha/PERSON had/O seen/O his/O mother/O./O
Since/O then/O he/O had/O heard/O nothing/O more/O of/O her/O./O And/O in/O the/O course/O of/O that/O
year/O he/O had/O gone/O to/O school/O,/O and/O made/O friends/O among/O his/O schoolfellows/O./O
The/O dreams/O and/O memories/O of/O his/O mother/O,/O which/O had/O made/O him/O ill/O after/O
seeing/O her/O,/O did/O not/O occupy/O his/O thoughts/O now/O./O When/O they/O came/O back/O to/O him/O,/O
he/O studiously/O drove/O them/O away/O,/O regarding/O them/O as/O shameful/O and/O girlish/O,/O
below/O the/O dignity/O of/O a/O boy/O and/O a/O schoolboy/O./O He/O knew/O that/O his/O father/O and/O
mother/O were/O separated/O by/O some/O quarrel/O,/O he/O knew/O that/O he/O had/O to/O remain/O
with/O his/O father/O,/O and/O he/O tried/O to/O get/O used/O to/O that/O idea/O./O

He/O disliked/O seeing/O his/O uncle/O,/O so/O like/O his/O mother/O,/O for/O it/O called/O up/O those/O
memories/O of/O which/O he/O was/O ashamed/O./O He/O disliked/O it/O all/O the/O more/O as/O from/O
some/O words/O he/O had/O caught/O as/O he/O waited/O at/O the/O study/O door/O,/O and/O still/O more/O
from/O the/O faces/O of/O his/O father/O and/O uncle/O,/O he/O guessed/O that/O they/O must/O have/O
been/O talking/O of/O his/O mother/O./O And/O to/O avoid/O condemning/O the/O father/O with/O whom/O
he/O lived/O and/O on/O whom/O he/O was/O dependent/O,/O and/O,/O above/O all/O,/O to/O avoid/O giving/O
way/O to/O sentimentality/O,/O which/O he/O considered/O so/O degrading/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON tried/O
not/O to/O look/O at/O his/O uncle/O who/O had/O come/O to/O disturb/O his/O peace/O of/O mind/O,/O and/O
not/O to/O think/O of/O what/O he/O recalled/O to/O him/O./O

But/O when/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O going/O out/O after/O him/O,/O saw/O him/O on/O the/O
stairs/O,/O and/O calling/O to/O him/O,/O asked/O him/O how/O he/O spent/O his/O playtime/O at/O
school/O,/O Seryozha/PERSON talked/O more/O freely/O to/O him/O away/O from/O his/O father/O's/O
presence/O./O

``/OWe/O have/O a/O railway/O now/O,/O''/O he/O said/O in/O answer/O to/O his/O uncle/O's/O question/O./O
``/OIt/O's/O like/O this/O,/O do/O you/O see/O:/O two/O sit/O on/O a/O bench/O--/Othey/O're/O the/O passengers/O;/O
and/O one/O stands/O up/O straight/O on/O the/O bench/O./O And/O all/O are/O harnessed/O to/O it/O by/O
their/O arms/O or/O by/O their/O belts/O,/O and/O they/O run/O through/O all/O the/O rooms/O--/Othe/O
doors/O are/O left/O open/O beforehand/O./O Well/O,/O and/O it/O's/O pretty/O hard/O work/O being/O
the/O conductor/O!/O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O the/O one/O that/O stands/O?/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON inquired/O,/O smiling/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O want/O pluck/O for/O it/O,/O and/O cleverness/O too/O,/O especially/O when/O they/O
stop/O all/O of/O a/O sudden/O,/O or/O someone/O falls/O down/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O must/O be/O a/O serious/O matter/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O watching/O
with/O mournful/O interest/O the/O eager/O eyes/O,/O like/O his/O mother/O's/O;/O not/O childish/O
now/O--/Ono/O longer/O fully/O innocent/O./O And/O though/O he/O had/O promised/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON not/O to/O speak/O of/O Anna/PERSON,/O he/O could/O not/O restrain/O himself/O./O

``/ODo/O you/O remember/O your/O mother/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O suddenly/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O do/On't/O,/O''/O Seryozha/PERSON said/O quickly/O./O He/O blushed/O crimson/O,/O and/O his/O face/O
clouded/O over/O./O And/O his/O uncle/O could/O get/O nothing/O more/O out/O of/O him/O./O His/O tutor/O
found/O his/O pupil/O on/O the/O staircase/O half/O an/O hour/O later/O,/O and/O for/O a/O long/O
while/O he/O could/O not/O make/O out/O whether/O he/O was/O ill-tempered/O or/O crying/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O?/O I/O expect/O you/O hurt/O yourself/O when/O you/O fell/O down/O?/O''/O said/O the/O
tutor/O./O ``/OI/O told/O you/O it/O was/O a/O dangerous/O game/O./O And/O we/O shall/O have/O to/O speak/O
to/O the/O director/O./O''/O

``/OIf/O I/O had/O hurt/O myself/O,/O nobody/O should/O have/O found/O it/O out/O,/O that/O's/O certain/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O is/O it/O,/O then/O?/O''/O

``/OLeave/O me/O alone/O!/O If/O I/O remember/O,/O or/O if/O I/O do/On't/O remember/O?/O.../O what/O business/O
is/O it/O of/O his/O?/O Why/O should/O I/O remember/O?/O Leave/O me/O in/O peace/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
addressing/O not/O his/O tutor/O,/O but/O the/O whole/O world/O./O



Chapter/O 20/O


Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O as/O usual/O,/O did/O not/O waste/O his/O time/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O In/O
Petersburg/LOCATION,/O besides/O business/O,/O his/O sister/O's/O divorce/O,/O and/O his/O coveted/O
appointment/O,/O he/O wanted/O,/O as/O he/O always/O did/O,/O to/O freshen/O himself/O up/O,/O as/O he/O
said/O,/O after/O the/O mustiness/O of/O Moscow/LOCATION./O

In/O spite/O of/O its/O _/Ocafés/O chantants/O_/O and/O its/O omnibuses/O,/O Moscow/LOCATION was/O yet/O a/O
stagnant/O bog/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON always/O felt/O it/O./O After/O living/O for/O some/O
time/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O especially/O in/O close/O relations/O with/O his/O family/O,/O he/O was/O
conscious/O of/O a/O depression/O of/O spirits/O./O After/O being/O a/O long/O time/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION
without/O a/O change/O,/O he/O reached/O a/O point/O when/O he/O positively/O began/O to/O be/O
worrying/O himself/O over/O his/O wife/O's/O ill-humor/O and/O reproaches/O,/O over/O his/O
children/O's/O health/O and/O education/O,/O and/O the/O petty/O details/O of/O his/O official/O
work/O;/O even/O the/O fact/O of/O being/O in/O debt/O worried/O him/O./O But/O he/O had/O only/O to/O go/O
and/O stay/O a/O little/O while/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O in/O the/O circle/O there/O in/O which/O he/O
moved/O,/O where/O people/O lived/O--/Oreally/O lived/O--/Oinstead/O of/O vegetating/O as/O in/O
Moscow/LOCATION,/O and/O all/O such/O ideas/O vanished/O and/O melted/O away/O at/O once/O,/O like/O wax/O
before/O the/O fire/O./O His/O wife/O?/O.../O Only/O that/O day/O he/O had/O been/O talking/O to/O
Prince/PERSON Tchetchensky/PERSON./O Prince/O Tchetchensky/PERSON had/O a/O wife/O and/O family/O,/O grown-up/O
pages/O in/O the/O corps/O,/O .../O and/O he/O had/O another/O illegitimate/O family/O of/O
children/O also/O./O Though/O the/O first/O family/O was/O very/O nice/O too/O,/O Prince/O
Tchetchensky/PERSON felt/O happier/O in/O his/O second/O family/O;/O and/O he/O used/O to/O take/O his/O
eldest/O son/O with/O him/O to/O his/O second/O family/O,/O and/O told/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON
that/O he/O thought/O it/O good/O for/O his/O son/O,/O enlarging/O his/O ideas/O./O What/O would/O
have/O been/O said/O to/O that/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION?/O

His/O children/O?/O In/O Petersburg/LOCATION children/O did/O not/O prevent/O their/O parents/O from/O
enjoying/O life/O./O The/O children/O were/O brought/O up/O in/O schools/O,/O and/O there/O was/O no/O
trace/O of/O the/O wild/O idea/O that/O prevailed/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O in/O Lvov/LOCATION's/O household/O,/O
for/O instance/O,/O that/O all/O the/O luxuries/O of/O life/O were/O for/O the/O children/O,/O while/O
the/O parents/O have/O nothing/O but/O work/O and/O anxiety/O./O Here/O people/O understood/O
that/O a/O man/O is/O in/O duty/O bound/O to/O live/O for/O himself/O,/O as/O every/O man/O of/O culture/O
should/O live/O./O

His/O official/O duties/O?/O Official/O work/O here/O was/O not/O the/O stiff/O,/O hopeless/O
drudgery/O that/O it/O was/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION./O Here/O there/O was/O some/O interest/O in/O official/O
life/O./O A/O chance/O meeting/O,/O a/O service/O rendered/O,/O a/O happy/O phrase/O,/O a/O knack/O of/O
facetious/O mimicry/O,/O and/O a/O man/O's/O career/O might/O be/O made/O in/O a/O trice/O./O So/O it/O
had/O been/O with/O Bryantsev/PERSON,/O whom/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O met/O the/O previous/O
day/O,/O and/O who/O was/O one/O of/O the/O highest/O functionaries/O in/O government/O now/O./O
There/O was/O some/O interest/O in/O official/O work/O like/O that/O./O

The/O Petersburg/LOCATION attitude/O on/O pecuniary/O matters/O had/O an/O especially/O soothing/O
effect/O on/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O Bartnyansky/PERSON,/O who/O must/O spend/O at/O least/O
fifty/O thousand/O to/O judge/O by/O the/O style/O he/O lived/O in/O,/O had/O made/O an/O
interesting/O comment/O the/O day/O before/O on/O that/O subject/O./O

As/O they/O were/O talking/O before/O dinner/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON said/O to/O
Bartnyansky/PERSON:/O

``/OYou/O're/O friendly/O,/O I/O fancy/O,/O with/O Mordvinsky/PERSON;/O you/O might/O do/O me/O a/O favor/O:/O say/O
a/O word/O to/O him/O,/O please/O,/O for/O me/O./O There/O's/O an/O appointment/O I/O should/O like/O to/O
get/O--/Osecretary/O of/O the/O agency/O.../O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O sha/On't/O remember/O all/O that/O,/O if/O you/O tell/O it/O to/O me/O.../O./O But/O what/O
possesses/O you/O to/O have/O to/O do/O with/O railways/O and/O Jews/O?/O.../O Take/O it/O as/O you/O
will/O,/O it/O's/O a/O low/O business/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON did/O not/O say/O to/O Bartnyansky/PERSON that/O it/O was/O a/O ``/Ogrowing/O
thing/O''/O--/OBartnyansky/PERSON would/O not/O have/O understood/O that/O./O

``/OI/O want/O the/O money/O,/O I/O've/O nothing/O to/O live/O on/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O're/O living/O,/O are/On't/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O in/O debt/O./O''/O

``/OAre/O you/O,/O though/O?/O Heavily/O?/O''/O said/O Bartnyansky/PERSON sympathetically/O./O

``/OVery/O heavily/O:/O twenty/O thousand/O./O''/O

Bartnyansky/PERSON broke/O into/O good-humored/O laughter/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O lucky/O fellow/O!/O''/O said/O he/O./O ``/OMy/O debts/O mount/O up/O to/O a/O million/O and/O a/O half/O,/O
and/O I/O've/O nothing/O,/O and/O still/O I/O can/O live/O,/O as/O you/O see/O!/O''/O

And/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON saw/O the/O correctness/O of/O this/O view/O not/O in/O words/O
only/O but/O in/O actual/O fact/O./O Zhivahov/PERSON owed/O three/O hundred/O thousand/O,/O and/O
had/On't/O a/O farthing/O to/O bless/O himself/O with/O,/O and/O he/O lived/O,/O and/O in/O style/O too/O!/O
Count/O Krivtsov/PERSON was/O considered/O a/O hopeless/O case/O by/O everyone/O,/O and/O yet/O he/O
kept/O two/O mistresses/O./O Petrovsky/PERSON had/O run/O through/O five/O millions/O,/O and/O still/O
lived/O in/O just/O the/O same/O style/O,/O and/O was/O even/O a/O manager/O in/O the/O financial/O
department/O with/O a/O salary/O of/O twenty/O thousand/O./O But/O besides/O this/O,/O
Petersburg/PERSON had/O physically/O an/O agreeable/O effect/O on/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O It/O
made/O him/O younger/O./O In/O Moscow/LOCATION he/O sometimes/O found/O a/O gray/O hair/O in/O his/O head/O,/O
dropped/O asleep/O after/O dinner/O,/O stretched/O,/O walked/O slowly/O upstairs/O,/O
breathing/O heavily/O,/O was/O bored/O by/O the/O society/O of/O young/O women/O,/O and/O did/O not/O
dance/O at/O balls/O./O In/O Petersburg/LOCATION he/O always/O felt/O ten/O years/O younger/O./O

His/O experience/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION was/O exactly/O what/O had/O been/O described/O to/O him/O
on/O the/O previous/O day/O by/O Prince/O Pyotr/PERSON Oblonsky/PERSON,/O a/O man/O of/O sixty/O,/O who/O had/O
just/O come/O back/O from/O abroad/O:/O

``/OWe/O do/On't/O know/O the/O way/O to/O live/O here/O,/O''/O said/O Pyotr/PERSON Oblonsky/PERSON./O ``/OI/O spent/O the/O
summer/O in/O Baden/LOCATION,/O and/O you/O would/On't/O believe/O it/O,/O I/O felt/O quite/O a/O young/O man/O./O
At/O a/O glimpse/O of/O a/O pretty/O woman/O,/O my/O thoughts/O.../O./O One/O dines/O and/O drinks/O a/O
glass/O of/O wine/O,/O and/O feels/O strong/O and/O ready/O for/O anything/O./O I/O came/O home/O to/O
Russia/LOCATION--/Ohad/O to/O see/O my/O wife/O,/O and/O,/O what/O's/O more/O,/O go/O to/O my/O country/O place/O;/O and/O
there/O,/O you/O'd/O hardly/O believe/O it/O,/O in/O a/O fortnight/O I/O'd/O got/O into/O a/O dressing/O
gown/O and/O given/O up/O dressing/O for/O dinner/O./O Need/On't/O say/O I/O had/O no/O thoughts/O
left/O for/O pretty/O women/O./O I/O became/O quite/O an/O old/O gentleman/O./O There/O was/O
nothing/O left/O for/O me/O but/O to/O think/O of/O my/O eternal/O salvation/O./O I/O went/O off/O to/O
Paris/LOCATION--/OI/O was/O as/O right/O as/O could/O be/O at/O once/O./O''/O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON felt/O exactly/O the/O difference/O that/O Pyotr/PERSON Oblonsky/PERSON
described/O./O In/O Moscow/LOCATION he/O degenerated/O so/O much/O that/O if/O he/O had/O had/O to/O be/O
there/O for/O long/O together/O,/O he/O might/O in/O good/O earnest/O have/O come/O to/O
considering/O his/O salvation/O;/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION he/O felt/O himself/O a/O man/O of/O the/O
world/O again/O./O

Between/O Princess/O Betsy/PERSON Tverskaya/PERSON and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON there/O had/O long/O
existed/O rather/O curious/O relations/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON always/O flirted/O
with/O her/O in/O jest/O,/O and/O used/O to/O say/O to/O her/O,/O also/O in/O jest/O,/O the/O most/O
unseemly/O things/O,/O knowing/O that/O nothing/O delighted/O her/O so/O much/O./O The/O day/O
after/O his/O conversation/O with/O Karenin/PERSON,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON went/O to/O see/O
her/O,/O and/O felt/O so/O youthful/O that/O in/O this/O jesting/O flirtation/O and/O nonsense/O
he/O recklessly/O went/O so/O far/O that/O he/O did/O not/O know/O how/O to/O extricate/O himself/O,/O
as/O unluckily/O he/O was/O so/O far/O from/O being/O attracted/O by/O her/O that/O he/O thought/O
her/O positively/O disagreeable/O./O What/O made/O it/O hard/O to/O change/O the/O
conversation/O was/O the/O fact/O that/O he/O was/O very/O attractive/O to/O her/O./O So/O that/O he/O
was/O considerably/O relieved/O at/O the/O arrival/O of/O Princess/O Myakaya/O,/O which/O cut/O
short/O their/O _/Otête-à-tête/O_/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O so/O you/O're/O here/O!/O''/O said/O she/O when/O she/O saw/O him/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O and/O what/O news/O of/O
your/O poor/O sister/O?/O You/O need/On't/O look/O at/O me/O like/O that/O,/O''/O she/O added/O./O ``/OEver/O
since/O they/O've/O all/O turned/O against/O her/O,/O all/O those/O who/O're/O a/O thousand/O times/O
worse/O than/O she/O,/O I/O've/O thought/O she/O did/O a/O very/O fine/O thing/O./O I/O ca/On't/O forgive/O
Vronsky/O for/O not/O letting/O me/O know/O when/O she/O was/O in/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O I/O'd/O have/O
gone/O to/O see/O her/O and/O gone/O about/O with/O her/O everywhere/O./O Please/O give/O her/O my/O
love/O./O Come/O,/O tell/O me/O about/O her/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O her/O position/O is/O very/O difficult/O;/O she/O.../O''/O began/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
in/O the/O simplicity/O of/O his/O heart/O accepting/O as/O sterling/O coin/O Princess/O
Myakaya/PERSON's/O words/O ``/Otell/O me/O about/O her/O./O''/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON interrupted/O him/O
immediately/O,/O as/O she/O always/O did/O,/O and/O began/O talking/O herself/O./O

``/OShe/O's/O done/O what/O they/O all/O do/O,/O except/O me/O--/Oonly/O they/O hide/O it/O./O But/O she/O
would/On't/O be/O deceitful/O,/O and/O she/O did/O a/O fine/O thing/O./O And/O she/O did/O better/O
still/O in/O throwing/O up/O that/O crazy/O brother-in-law/O of/O yours/O./O You/O must/O excuse/O
me/O./O Everybody/O used/O to/O say/O he/O was/O so/O clever/O,/O so/O very/O clever/O;/O I/O was/O the/O
only/O one/O that/O said/O he/O was/O a/O fool/O./O Now/O that/O he/O's/O so/O thick/O with/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON and/O Landau/PERSON,/O they/O all/O say/O he/O's/O crazy/O,/O and/O I/O should/O prefer/O not/O to/O
agree/O with/O everybody/O,/O but/O this/O time/O I/O ca/On't/O help/O it/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O do/O please/O explain/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON;/O ``/Owhat/O does/O it/O mean/O?/O
Yesterday/O I/O was/O seeing/O him/O on/O my/O sister/O's/O behalf/O,/O and/O I/O asked/O him/O to/O
give/O me/O a/O final/O answer/O./O He/O gave/O me/O no/O answer/O,/O and/O said/O he/O would/O think/O it/O
over/O./O But/O this/O morning/O,/O instead/O of/O an/O answer/O,/O I/O received/O an/O invitation/O
from/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON for/O this/O evening/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O so/O that/O's/O it/O,/O that/O's/O it/O!/O''/O said/O Princess/O Myakaya/PERSON gleefully/O,/O ``/Othey/O're/O
going/O to/O ask/O Landau/PERSON what/O he/O's/O to/O say/O./O''/O

``/OAsk/O Landau/PERSON?/O What/O for/O?/O Who/O or/O what/O's/O Landau/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O!/O you/O do/On't/O know/O Jules/PERSON Landau/PERSON,/O _/Ole/O fameux/O Jules/PERSON Landau/PERSON,/O le/O
clairvoyant/O_/O?/O He/O's/O crazy/O too/O,/O but/O on/O him/O your/O sister/O's/O fate/O depends/O./O See/O
what/O comes/O of/O living/O in/O the/O provinces/O--/Oyou/O know/O nothing/O about/O anything/O./O
Landau/PERSON,/O do/O you/O see/O,/O was/O a/O _/Ocommis/O_/O in/O a/O shop/O in/O Paris/LOCATION,/O and/O he/O went/O to/O a/O
doctor/O's/O;/O and/O in/O the/O doctor/O's/O waiting/O room/O he/O fell/O asleep/O,/O and/O in/O his/O

it/O was/O!/O Then/O the/O wife/O of/O Yury/PERSON Meledinsky/PERSON--/Oyou/O know/O,/O the/O invalid/O?/O--/Oheard/O of/O
this/O Landau/PERSON,/O and/O had/O him/O to/O see/O her/O husband/O./O And/O he/O cured/O her/O husband/O,/O
though/O I/O ca/On't/O say/O that/O I/O see/O he/O did/O him/O much/O good/O,/O for/O he/O's/O just/O as/O
feeble/O a/O creature/O as/O ever/O he/O was/O,/O but/O they/O believed/O in/O him/O,/O and/O took/O him/O
along/O with/O them/O and/O brought/O him/O to/O Russia/LOCATION./O Here/O there/O's/O been/O a/O general/O

Bezzubova/PERSON,/O and/O she/O took/O such/O a/O fancy/O to/O him/O that/O she/O adopted/O him/O./O''/O

``/OAdopted/O him/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O as/O her/O son/O./O He/O's/O not/O Landau/PERSON any/O more/O now/O,/O but/O Count/PERSON Bezzubov/PERSON./O
That/O's/O neither/O here/O nor/O there/O,/O though/O;/O but/O Lidia/PERSON--/OI/O'm/O very/O fond/O of/O her/O,/O
but/O she/O has/O a/O screw/O loose/O somewhere/O--/Ohas/O lost/O her/O heart/O to/O this/O Landau/PERSON

without/O him/O,/O and/O so/O your/O sister/O's/O fate/O is/O now/O in/O the/O hands/O of/O Landau/LOCATION,/O
_/Oalias/O_/O Count/O Bezzubov/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 21/O


After/O a/O capital/O dinner/O and/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O cognac/O drunk/O at/O
Bartnyansky/PERSON's/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O only/O a/O little/O later/O than/O the/O
appointed/O time/O,/O went/O in/O to/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON's/O./O

``/OWho/O else/O is/O with/O the/O countess/O?/O--/Oa/O Frenchman/O?/O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON asked/O
the/O hall/O porter/O,/O as/O he/O glanced/O at/O the/O familiar/O overcoat/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON and/O a/O queer/O,/O rather/O artless-looking/O overcoat/O with/O clasps/O./O

``/OAlexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON Karenin/PERSON and/O Count/O Bezzubov/O,/O''/O the/O porter/O answered/O
severely/O./O

``/OPrincess/O Myakaya/PERSON guessed/O right/O,/O''/O thought/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O as/O he/O
went/O upstairs/O./O ``/OCurious/O!/O It/O would/O be/O quite/O as/O well/O,/O though/O,/O to/O get/O on/O
friendly/O terms/O with/O her/O./O She/O has/O immense/O influence/O./O If/O she/O would/O say/O a/O
word/O to/O Pomorsky/PERSON,/O the/O thing/O would/O be/O a/O certainty/O./O''/O

It/O was/O still/O quite/O light/O out-of-doors/O,/O but/O in/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON's/O
little/O drawing/O room/O the/O blinds/O were/O drawn/O and/O the/O lamps/O lighted/O./O At/O a/O
round/O table/O under/O a/O lamp/O sat/O the/O countess/O and/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O
talking/O softly/O./O A/O short/O,/O thinnish/O man/O,/O very/O pale/O and/O handsome/O,/O with/O
feminine/O hips/O and/O knock-kneed/O legs/O,/O with/O fine/O brilliant/O eyes/O and/O long/O
hair/O lying/O on/O the/O collar/O of/O his/O coat/O,/O was/O standing/O at/O the/O end/O of/O the/O
room/O gazing/O at/O the/O portraits/O on/O the/O wall/O./O After/O greeting/O the/O lady/O of/O the/O
house/O and/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON could/O not/O resist/O
glancing/O once/O more/O at/O the/O unknown/O man/O./O

``/OMonsieur/PERSON Landau/PERSON!/O''/O the/O countess/O addressed/O him/O with/O a/O softness/O and/O
caution/O that/O impressed/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O And/O she/O introduced/O them/O./O

Landau/PERSON looked/O round/O hurriedly/O,/O came/O up/O,/O and/O smiling/O,/O laid/O his/O moist/O,/O
lifeless/O hand/O in/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O outstretched/O hand/O and/O immediately/O
walked/O away/O and/O fell/O to/O gazing/O at/O the/O portraits/O again/O./O The/O countess/O and/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON looked/O at/O each/O other/O significantly/O./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O glad/O to/O see/O you/O,/O particularly/O today/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON,/O pointing/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON to/O a/O seat/O beside/O Karenin/PERSON./O

``/OI/O introduced/O you/O to/O him/O as/O Landau/PERSON,/O''/O she/O said/O in/O a/O soft/O voice/O,/O glancing/O
at/O the/O Frenchman/O and/O again/O immediately/O after/O at/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O
``/Obut/O he/O is/O really/O Count/PERSON Bezzubov/PERSON,/O as/O you/O're/O probably/O aware/O./O Only/O he/O does/O
not/O like/O the/O title/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O heard/O so/O,/O''/O answered/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON;/O ``/Othey/O say/O he/O completely/O
cured/O Countess/O Bezzubova/O./O''/O

``/OShe/O was/O here/O today/O,/O poor/O thing/O!/O''/O the/O countess/O said/O,/O turning/O to/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O ``/OThis/O separation/O is/O awful/O for/O her/O./O It/O's/O such/O a/O blow/O to/O
her/O!/O''/O

``/OAnd/O he/O positively/O is/O going/O?/O''/O queried/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O he/O's/O going/O to/O Paris/LOCATION./O He/O heard/O a/O voice/O yesterday/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/O
Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OAh/O,/O a/O voice/O!/O''/O repeated/O Oblonsky/PERSON,/O feeling/O that/O he/O must/O be/O as/O circumspect/O
as/O he/O possibly/O could/O in/O this/O society/O,/O where/O something/O peculiar/O was/O going/O
on/O,/O or/O was/O to/O go/O on/O,/O to/O which/O he/O had/O not/O the/O key/O./O

A/O moment/O's/O silence/O followed/O,/O after/O which/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O as/O
though/O approaching/O the/O main/O topic/O of/O conversation/O,/O said/O with/O a/O fine/O
smile/O to/O Oblonsky/PERSON:/O

``/OI/O've/O known/O you/O for/O a/O long/O while/O,/O and/O am/O very/O glad/O to/O make/O a/O closer/O
acquaintance/O with/O you/O./O _/OLes/O amis/O de/O nos/O amis/O sont/O nos/O amis/O./O_/O But/O to/O be/O a/O
true/O friend/O,/O one/O must/O enter/O into/O the/O spiritual/O state/O of/O one/O's/O friend/O,/O
and/O I/O fear/O that/O you/O are/O not/O doing/O so/O in/O the/O case/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O You/O understand/O what/O I/O mean/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O lifting/O her/O fine/O
pensive/O eyes/O./O

``/OIn/O part/O,/O countess/O,/O I/O understand/O the/O position/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON.../O''/O said/O Oblonsky/PERSON./O Having/O no/O clear/O idea/O what/O they/O were/O
talking/O about/O,/O he/O wanted/O to/O confine/O himself/O to/O generalities/O./O

``/OThe/O change/O is/O not/O in/O his/O external/O position/O,/O''/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON
said/O sternly/O,/O following/O with/O eyes/O of/O love/O the/O figure/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON as/O he/O got/O up/O and/O crossed/O over/O to/O Landau/PERSON;/O ``/Ohis/O heart/O is/O
changed/O,/O a/O new/O heart/O has/O been/O vouchsafed/O him/O,/O and/O I/O fear/O you/O do/On't/O fully/O
apprehend/O the/O change/O that/O has/O taken/O place/O in/O him/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O in/O general/O outlines/O I/O can/O conceive/O the/O change/O./O We/O have/O always/O
been/O friendly/O,/O and/O now/O.../O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O responding/O with/O a/O
sympathetic/O glance/O to/O the/O expression/O of/O the/O countess/O,/O and/O mentally/O
balancing/O the/O question/O with/O which/O of/O the/O two/O ministers/O she/O was/O most/O
intimate/O,/O so/O as/O to/O know/O about/O which/O to/O ask/O her/O to/O speak/O for/O him/O./O

``/OThe/O change/O that/O has/O taken/O place/O in/O him/O can/Onot/O lessen/O his/O love/O for/O his/O
neighbors/O;/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O that/O change/O can/O only/O intensify/O love/O in/O his/O
heart/O./O But/O I/O am/O afraid/O you/O do/O not/O understand/O me/O./O Wo/On't/O you/O have/O some/O
tea/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O with/O her/O eyes/O indicating/O the/O footman/O,/O who/O was/O handing/O
round/O tea/O on/O a/O tray/O./O

``/ONot/O quite/O,/O countess/O./O Of/O course/O,/O his/O misfortune/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O a/O misfortune/O which/O has/O proved/O the/O highest/O happiness/O,/O when/O his/O
heart/O was/O made/O new/O,/O was/O filled/O full/O of/O it/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O gazing/O with/O eyes/O
full/O of/O love/O at/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OI/O do/O believe/O I/O might/O ask/O her/O to/O speak/O to/O both/O of/O them/O,/O''/O thought/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O of/O course/O,/O countess/O,/O''/O he/O said/O;/O ``/Obut/O I/O imagine/O such/O changes/O are/O a/O
matter/O so/O private/O that/O no/O one/O,/O even/O the/O most/O intimate/O friend/O,/O would/O care/O
to/O speak/O of/O them/O./O''/O

``/OOn/O the/O contrary/O!/O We/O ought/O to/O speak/O freely/O and/O help/O one/O another/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O undoubtedly/O so/O,/O but/O there/O is/O such/O a/O difference/O of/O convictions/O,/O and/O
besides/O.../O''/O said/O Oblonsky/PERSON with/O a/O soft/O smile/O./O

``/OThere/O can/O be/O no/O difference/O where/O it/O is/O a/O question/O of/O holy/O truth/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O of/O course/O;/O but/O.../O''/O and/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON paused/O in/O confusion/O./O
He/O understood/O at/O last/O that/O they/O were/O talking/O of/O religion/O./O

``/OI/O fancy/O he/O will/O fall/O asleep/O immediately/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON in/O
a/O whisper/O full/O of/O meaning/O,/O going/O up/O to/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON looked/O round/O./O Landau/PERSON was/O sitting/O at/O the/O window/O,/O
leaning/O on/O his/O elbow/O and/O the/O back/O of/O his/O chair/O,/O his/O head/O drooping/O./O
Noticing/O that/O all/O eyes/O were/O turned/O on/O him/O he/O raised/O his/O head/O and/O smiled/O
a/O smile/O of/O childlike/O artlessness/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O take/O any/O notice/O,/O''/O said/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O and/O she/O lightly/O moved/O a/O
chair/O up/O for/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON./O ``/OI/O have/O observed/O.../O''/O she/O was/O
beginning/O,/O when/O a/O footman/O came/O into/O the/O room/O with/O a/O letter/O./O Lidia/PERSON
