Ivanovna/PERSON rapidly/O ran/O her/O eyes/O over/O the/O note/O,/O and/O excusing/O herself/O,/O wrote/O
an/O answer/O with/O extraordinary/O rapidity/O,/O handed/O it/O to/O the/O man/O,/O and/O came/O
back/O to/O the/O table/O./O ``/OI/O have/O observed/O,/O''/O she/O went/O on/O,/O ``/Othat/O Moscow/LOCATION people/O,/O
especially/O the/O men/O,/O are/O more/O indifferent/O to/O religion/O than/O anyone/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O,/O countess/O,/O I/O thought/O Moscow/LOCATION people/O had/O the/O reputation/O of/O being/O
the/O firmest/O in/O the/O faith/O,/O''/O answered/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O

``/OBut/O as/O far/O as/O I/O can/O make/O out/O,/O you/O are/O unfortunately/O one/O of/O the/O
indifferent/O ones/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O turning/O to/O him/O with/O a/O
weary/O smile/O./O

``/OHow/O anyone/O can/O be/O indifferent/O!/O''/O said/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O

``/OI/O am/O not/O so/O much/O indifferent/O on/O that/O subject/O as/O I/O am/O waiting/O in/O
suspense/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O with/O his/O most/O deprecating/O smile/O./O ``/OI/O
hardly/O think/O that/O the/O time/O for/O such/O questions/O has/O come/O yet/O for/O me/O./O''/O

Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON and/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON looked/O at/O each/O other/O./O

``/OWe/O can/O never/O tell/O whether/O the/O time/O has/O come/O for/O us/O or/O not/O,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON severely/O./O ``/OWe/O ought/O not/O to/O think/O whether/O we/O are/O ready/O or/O
not/O ready/O./O God/O's/O grace/O is/O not/O guided/O by/O human/O considerations/O:/O sometimes/O
it/O comes/O not/O to/O those/O that/O strive/O for/O it/O,/O and/O comes/O to/O those/O that/O are/O
unprepared/O,/O like/O Saul/PERSON./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O believe/O it/O wo/On't/O be/O just/O yet/O,/O''/O said/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O who/O had/O been/O
meanwhile/O watching/O the/O movements/O of/O the/O Frenchman/O./O Landau/PERSON got/O up/O and/O
came/O to/O them/O./O

``/ODo/O you/O allow/O me/O to/O listen/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O;/O I/O did/O not/O want/O to/O disturb/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O gazing/O
tenderly/O at/O him/O;/O ``/Osit/O here/O with/O us/O./O''/O

``/OOne/O has/O only/O not/O to/O close/O one/O's/O eyes/O to/O shut/O out/O the/O light/O,/O''/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON went/O on/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O if/O you/O knew/O the/O happiness/O we/O know/O,/O feeling/O His/O presence/O ever/O in/O our/O
hearts/O!/O''/O said/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON with/O a/O rapturous/O smile/O./O

``/OBut/O a/O man/O may/O feel/O himself/O unworthy/O sometimes/O to/O rise/O to/O that/O height/O,/O''/O
said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O conscious/O of/O hypocrisy/O in/O admitting/O this/O
religious/O height/O,/O but/O at/O the/O same/O time/O unable/O to/O bring/O himself/O to/O
acknowledge/O his/O free-thinking/O views/O before/O a/O person/O who/O,/O by/O a/O single/O
word/O to/O Pomorsky/PERSON,/O might/O procure/O him/O the/O coveted/O appointment/O./O

``/OThat/O is/O,/O you/O mean/O that/O sin/O keeps/O him/O back/O?/O''/O said/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O ``/OBut/O
that/O is/O a/O false/O idea/O./O There/O is/O no/O sin/O for/O believers/O,/O their/O sin/O has/O been/O
atoned/O for/O./O _/OPardon/O,/O_/O''/O she/O added/O,/O looking/O at/O the/O footman/O,/O who/O came/O in/O
again/O with/O another/O letter/O./O She/O read/O it/O and/O gave/O a/O verbal/O answer/O:/O
``/OTomorrow/O at/O the/O Grand/O Duchess/O's/O,/O say/O./O''/O ``/OFor/O the/O believer/O sin/O is/O not/O,/O''/O
she/O went/O on/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O but/O faith/O without/O works/O is/O dead/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
recalling/O the/O phrase/O from/O the/O catechism/O,/O and/O only/O by/O his/O smile/O clinging/O
to/O his/O independence/O./O

``/OThere/O you/O have/O it/O--/Ofrom/O the/O epistle/O of/O St./PERSON James/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O addressing/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O with/O a/O certain/O
reproachfulness/O in/O his/O tone/O./O It/O was/O unmistakably/O a/O subject/O they/O had/O
discussed/O more/O than/O once/O before/O./O ``/OWhat/O harm/O has/O been/O done/O by/O the/O false/O
interpretation/O of/O that/O passage/O!/O Nothing/O holds/O men/O back/O from/O belief/O like/O
that/O misinterpretation/O./O `/OI/O have/O not/O works/O,/O so/O I/O can/Onot/O believe/O,/O'/O though/O
all/O the/O while/O that/O is/O not/O said/O./O But/O the/O very/O opposite/O is/O said/O./O''/O

``/OStriving/O for/O God/O,/O saving/O the/O soul/O by/O fasting/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON,/O with/O disgusted/O contempt/O,/O ``/Othose/O are/O the/O crude/O ideas/O of/O our/O
monks/O.../O./O Yet/O that/O is/O nowhere/O said/O./O It/O is/O far/O simpler/O and/O easier/O,/O''/O she/O
added/O,/O looking/O at/O Oblonsky/LOCATION with/O the/O same/O encouraging/O smile/O with/O which/O at/O
court/O she/O encouraged/O youthful/O maids/O of/O honor/O,/O disconcerted/O by/O the/O new/O
surroundings/O of/O the/O court/O./O

``/OWe/O are/O saved/O by/O Christ/PERSON who/O suffered/O for/O us/O./O We/O are/O saved/O by/O faith/O,/O''/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON chimed/O in/O,/O with/O a/O glance/O of/O approval/O at/O her/O words/O./O

_/O``/OVous/O comprenez/O l'anglais/O?/O''/O_/O asked/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O and/O receiving/O a/O
reply/O in/O the/O affirmative/O,/O she/O got/O up/O and/O began/O looking/O through/O a/O shelf/O
of/O books/O./O

``/OI/O want/O to/O read/O him/O `/OSafe/O and/O Happy/O,/O'/O or/O `/OUnder/O the/O Wing/O,/O'/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
looking/O inquiringly/O at/O Karenin/LOCATION./O And/O finding/O the/O book/O,/O and/O sitting/O down/O
again/O in/O her/O place/O,/O she/O opened/O it/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O very/O short/O./O In/O it/O is/O described/O
the/O way/O by/O which/O faith/O can/O be/O reached/O,/O and/O the/O happiness/O,/O above/O all/O
earthly/O bliss/O,/O with/O which/O it/O fills/O the/O soul/O./O The/O believer/O can/Onot/O be/O
unhappy/O because/O he/O is/O not/O alone/O./O But/O you/O will/O see/O./O''/O She/O was/O just/O
settling/O herself/O to/O read/O when/O the/O footman/O came/O in/O again/O./O ``/OMadame/O
Borozdina/O?/O Tell/O her/O,/O tomorrow/O at/O two/O o'clock/O./O Yes/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O putting/O
her/O finger/O in/O the/O place/O in/O the/O book/O,/O and/O gazing/O before/O her/O with/O her/O fine/O
pensive/O eyes/O,/O ``/Othat/O is/O how/O true/O faith/O acts/O./O You/O know/O Marie/PERSON Sanina/PERSON?/O You/O
know/O about/O her/O trouble/O?/O She/O lost/O her/O only/O child/O./O She/O was/O in/O despair/O./O And/O
what/O happened/O?/O She/O found/O this/O comforter/O,/O and/O she/O thanks/O God/O now/O for/O the/O
death/O of/O her/O child/O./O Such/O is/O the/O happiness/O faith/O brings/O!/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O that/O is/O most/O.../O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O glad/O they/O were/O
going/O to/O read/O,/O and/O let/O him/O have/O a/O chance/O to/O collect/O his/O faculties/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O
I/O see/O I/O'd/O better/O not/O ask/O her/O about/O anything/O today/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O ``/OIf/O only/O
I/O can/O get/O out/O of/O this/O without/O putting/O my/O foot/O in/O it/O!/O''/O

``/OIt/O will/O be/O dull/O for/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O addressing/O
Landau/PERSON;/O ``/Oyou/O do/On't/O know/O English/O,/O but/O it/O's/O short/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O shall/O understand/O,/O''/O said/O Landau/PERSON,/O with/O the/O same/O smile/O,/O and/O he/O
closed/O his/O eyes/O./O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON and/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON exchanged/O
meaningful/O glances/O,/O and/O the/O reading/O began/O./O



Chapter/O 22/O


Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON felt/O completely/O nonplussed/O by/O the/O strange/O talk/O which/O
he/O was/O hearing/O for/O the/O first/O time/O./O The/O complexity/O of/O Petersburg/LOCATION,/O as/O a/O
rule/O,/O had/O a/O stimulating/O effect/O on/O him/O,/O rousing/O him/O out/O of/O his/O Moscow/LOCATION
stagnation/O./O But/O he/O liked/O these/O complications/O,/O and/O understood/O them/O only/O
in/O the/O circles/O he/O knew/O and/O was/O at/O home/O in/O./O In/O these/O unfamiliar/O
surroundings/O he/O was/O puzzled/O and/O disconcerted/O,/O and/O could/O not/O get/O his/O
bearings/O./O As/O he/O listened/O to/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O aware/O of/O the/O
beautiful/O,/O artless/O--/Oor/O perhaps/O artful/O,/O he/O could/O not/O decide/O which/O--/Oeyes/O of/O
Landau/PERSON fixed/O upon/O him/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON began/O to/O be/O conscious/O of/O a/O
peculiar/O heaviness/O in/O his/O head/O./O

The/O most/O incongruous/O ideas/O were/O in/O confusion/O in/O his/O head/O./O ``/OMarie/PERSON Sanina/PERSON
is/O glad/O her/O child/O's/O dead/O.../O./O How/O good/O a/O smoke/O would/O be/O now/O!/O.../O To/O be/O
saved/O,/O one/O need/O only/O believe/O,/O and/O the/O monks/O do/On't/O know/O how/O the/O thing/O's/O
to/O be/O done/O,/O but/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON does/O know/O.../O./O And/O why/O is/O my/O head/O
so/O heavy/O?/O Is/O it/O the/O cognac/O,/O or/O all/O this/O being/O so/O queer/O?/O Anyway/O,/O I/O fancy/O
I/O've/O done/O nothing/O unsuitable/O so/O far/O./O But/O anyway/O,/O it/O wo/On't/O do/O to/O ask/O her/O
now/O./O They/O say/O they/O make/O one/O say/O one/O's/O prayers/O./O I/O only/O hope/O they/O wo/On't/O
make/O me/O!/O That/O'll/O be/O too/O imbecile/O./O And/O what/O stuff/O it/O is/O she/O's/O reading/O!/O
but/O she/O has/O a/O good/O accent/O./O Landau/PERSON--/OBezzubov/PERSON--/Owhat/O's/O he/O Bezzubov/O for/O?/O''/O All/O
at/O once/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON became/O aware/O that/O his/O lower/O jaw/O was/O
uncontrollably/O forming/O a/O yawn/O./O He/O pulled/O his/O whiskers/O to/O cover/O the/O yawn/O,/O
and/O shook/O himself/O together/O./O But/O soon/O after/O he/O became/O aware/O that/O he/O was/O
dropping/O asleep/O and/O on/O the/O very/O point/O of/O snoring/O./O He/O recovered/O himself/O
at/O the/O very/O moment/O when/O the/O voice/O of/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON was/O saying/O
``/Ohe/O's/O asleep/O./O''/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON started/O with/O dismay/O,/O feeling/O guilty/O
and/O caught/O./O But/O he/O was/O reassured/O at/O once/O by/O seeing/O that/O the/O words/O ``/Ohe/O's/O
asleep/O''/O referred/O not/O to/O him/O,/O but/O to/O Landau/PERSON./O The/O Frenchman/O was/O asleep/O as/O
well/O as/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O But/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O being/O asleep/O
would/O have/O offended/O them/O,/O as/O he/O thought/O -LRB-/Othough/O even/O this/O,/O he/O thought/O,/O
might/O not/O be/O so/O,/O as/O everything/O seemed/O so/O queer/O-RRB-/O,/O while/O Landau/PERSON's/O being/O
asleep/O delighted/O them/O extremely/O,/O especially/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O

_/O``/OMon/O ami/O,/O''/O_/O said/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O carefully/O holding/O the/O folds/O of/O her/O
silk/O gown/O so/O as/O not/O to/O rustle/O,/O and/O in/O her/O excitement/O calling/O Karenin/PERSON not/O
Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O but/O _/O``/Omon/O ami/O,/O''/O ``/Odonnez-lui/O la/O main/O./O Vous/O voyez/O?/O
Sh/O!/O''/O_/O she/O hissed/O at/O the/O footman/O as/O he/O came/O in/O again/O./O ``/ONot/O at/O home/O./O''/O

The/O Frenchman/O was/O asleep/O,/O or/O pretending/O to/O be/O asleep/O,/O with/O his/O head/O on/O
the/O back/O of/O his/O chair/O,/O and/O his/O moist/O hand/O,/O as/O it/O lay/O on/O his/O knee/O,/O made/O
faint/O movements/O,/O as/O though/O trying/O to/O catch/O something/O./O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON got/O up/O,/O tried/O to/O move/O carefully/O,/O but/O stumbled/O against/O the/O
table/O,/O went/O up/O and/O laid/O his/O hand/O in/O the/O Frenchman/O's/O hand/O./O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON got/O up/O too/O,/O and/O opening/O his/O eyes/O wide/O,/O trying/O to/O wake/O
himself/O up/O if/O he/O were/O asleep/O,/O he/O looked/O first/O at/O one/O and/O then/O at/O the/O
other/O./O It/O was/O all/O real/O./O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON felt/O that/O his/O head/O was/O
getting/O worse/O and/O worse/O./O

''/O_/OQue/O la/O personne/O qui/O est/O arrivee/O la/O derniere/O,/O celle/O qui/O demande/O,/O
qu'elle/O sorte/O!/O Qu'elle/O sorte/O!/O_/O''/O articulated/O the/O Frenchman/O,/O without/O
opening/O his/O eyes/O./O

''/O_/OVous/O m/O'/Oexcuserez/O,/O mais/O vous/O voyez/O.../O./O Revenez/O vers/O dix/O heures/O,/O encore/O
mieux/O demain/O./O_/O''/O

''/O_/OQu'elle/O sorte/O!/O_/O''/O repeated/O the/O Frenchman/O impatiently/O./O

''/O_/OC'est/O moi/O,/O n'est/O-/Oce/O pas/O?/O_/O''/O And/O receiving/O an/O answer/O in/O the/O affirmative/O,/O
Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O forgetting/O the/O favor/O he/O had/O meant/O to/O ask/O of/O Lidia/PERSON
Ivanovna/PERSON,/O and/O forgetting/O his/O sister/O's/O affairs/O,/O caring/O for/O nothing/O,/O but/O
filled/O with/O the/O sole/O desire/O to/O get/O away/O as/O soon/O as/O possible/O,/O went/O out/O on/O
tiptoe/O and/O ran/O out/O into/O the/O street/O as/O though/O from/O a/O plague-stricken/O
house/O./O For/O a/O long/O while/O he/O chatted/O and/O joked/O with/O his/O cab-driver/O,/O trying/O
to/O recover/O his/O spirits/O./O

At/O the/O French/O theater/O where/O he/O arrived/O for/O the/O last/O act/O,/O and/O afterwards/O
at/O the/O Tatar/ORGANIZATION restaurant/O after/O his/O champagne/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON felt/O a/O
little/O refreshed/O in/O the/O atmosphere/O he/O was/O used/O to/O./O But/O still/O he/O felt/O
quite/O unlike/O himself/O all/O that/O evening/O./O

On/O getting/O home/O to/O Pyotr/PERSON Oblonsky/PERSON's/O,/O where/O he/O was/O staying/O,/O Stepan/PERSON
Arkadyevitch/PERSON found/O a/O note/O from/O Betsy/PERSON./O She/O wrote/O to/O him/O that/O she/O was/O very/O
anxious/O to/O finish/O their/O interrupted/O conversation/O,/O and/O begged/O him/O to/O come/O
next/O day/O./O He/O had/O scarcely/O read/O this/O note/O,/O and/O frowned/O at/O its/O contents/O,/O
when/O he/O heard/O below/O the/O ponderous/O tramp/O of/O the/O servants/O,/O carrying/O
something/O heavy/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON went/O out/O to/O look/O./O It/O was/O the/O rejuvenated/O Pyotr/PERSON
Oblonsky/PERSON./O He/O was/O so/O drunk/O that/O he/O could/O not/O walk/O upstairs/O;/O but/O he/O told/O
them/O to/O set/O him/O on/O his/O legs/O when/O he/O saw/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O and/O
clinging/O to/O him/O,/O walked/O with/O him/O into/O his/O room/O and/O there/O began/O telling/O
him/O how/O he/O had/O spent/O the/O evening/O,/O and/O fell/O asleep/O doing/O so/O./O

Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O in/O very/O low/O spirits/O,/O which/O happened/O rarely/O with/O
him/O,/O and/O for/O a/O long/O while/O he/O could/O not/O go/O to/O sleep/O./O Everything/O he/O could/O
recall/O to/O his/O mind/O,/O everything/O was/O disgusting/O;/O but/O most/O disgusting/O of/O
all/O,/O as/O if/O it/O were/O something/O shameful/O,/O was/O the/O memory/O of/O the/O evening/O he/O
had/O spent/O at/O Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON's/O./O

Next/O day/O he/O received/O from/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON a/O final/O answer/O,/O refusing/O
to/O grant/O Anna/PERSON's/O divorce/O,/O and/O he/O understood/O that/O this/O decision/O was/O based/O
on/O what/O the/O Frenchman/O had/O said/O in/O his/O real/O or/O pretended/O trance/O./O



Chapter/O 23/O


In/O order/O to/O carry/O through/O any/O undertaking/O in/O family/O life/O,/O there/O must/O
necessarily/O be/O either/O complete/O division/O between/O the/O husband/O and/O wife/O,/O or/O
loving/O agreement/O./O When/O the/O relations/O of/O a/O couple/O are/O vacillating/O and/O
neither/O one/O thing/O nor/O the/O other/O,/O no/O sort/O of/O enterprise/O can/O be/O
undertaken/O./O

Many/O families/O remain/O for/O years/O in/O the/O same/O place/O,/O though/O both/O husband/O
and/O wife/O are/O sick/O of/O it/O,/O simply/O because/O there/O is/O neither/O complete/O
division/O nor/O agreement/O between/O them/O./O

Both/O Vronsky/O and/O Anna/PERSON felt/O life/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION insupportable/O in/O the/O heat/O and/O
dust/O,/O when/O the/O spring/O sunshine/O was/O followed/O by/O the/O glare/O of/O summer/O,/O and/O
all/O the/O trees/O in/O the/O boulevards/O had/O long/O since/O been/O in/O full/O leaf/O,/O and/O
the/O leaves/O were/O covered/O with/O dust/O./O But/O they/O did/O not/O go/O back/O to/O
Vozdvizhenskoe/PERSON,/O as/O they/O had/O arranged/O to/O do/O long/O before/O;/O they/O went/O on/O
staying/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O though/O they/O both/O loathed/O it/O,/O because/O of/O late/O there/O
had/O been/O no/O agreement/O between/O them/O./O

The/O irritability/O that/O kept/O them/O apart/O had/O no/O external/O cause/O,/O and/O all/O
efforts/O to/O come/O to/O an/O understanding/O intensified/O it/O,/O instead/O of/O removing/O
it/O./O It/O was/O an/O inner/O irritation/O,/O grounded/O in/O her/O mind/O on/O the/O conviction/O
that/O his/O love/O had/O grown/O less/O;/O in/O his/O,/O on/O regret/O that/O he/O had/O put/O himself/O
for/O her/O sake/O in/O a/O difficult/O position/O,/O which/O she/O,/O instead/O of/O lightening/O,/O
made/O still/O more/O difficult/O./O Neither/O of/O them/O gave/O full/O utterance/O to/O their/O
sense/O of/O grievance/O,/O but/O they/O considered/O each/O other/O in/O the/O wrong/O,/O and/O
tried/O on/O every/O pretext/O to/O prove/O this/O to/O one/O another/O./O

In/O her/O eyes/O the/O whole/O of/O him/O,/O with/O all/O his/O habits/O,/O ideas/O,/O desires/O,/O with/O
all/O his/O spiritual/O and/O physical/O temperament/O,/O was/O one/O thing/O--/Olove/O for/O
women/O,/O and/O that/O love/O,/O she/O felt/O,/O ought/O to/O be/O entirely/O concentrated/O on/O her/O
alone/O./O That/O love/O was/O less/O;/O consequently/O,/O as/O she/O reasoned/O,/O he/O must/O have/O
transferred/O part/O of/O his/O love/O to/O other/O women/O or/O to/O another/O woman/O--/Oand/O she/O
was/O jealous/O./O She/O was/O jealous/O not/O of/O any/O particular/O woman/O but/O of/O the/O
decrease/O of/O his/O love/O./O Not/O having/O got/O an/O object/O for/O her/O jealousy/O,/O she/O was/O
on/O the/O lookout/O for/O it/O./O At/O the/O slightest/O hint/O she/O transferred/O her/O
jealousy/O from/O one/O object/O to/O another/O./O At/O one/O time/O she/O was/O jealous/O of/O
those/O low/O women/O with/O whom/O he/O might/O so/O easily/O renew/O his/O old/O bachelor/O
ties/O;/O then/O she/O was/O jealous/O of/O the/O society/O women/O he/O might/O meet/O;/O then/O she/O
was/O jealous/O of/O the/O imaginary/O girl/O whom/O he/O might/O want/O to/O marry/O,/O for/O whose/O
sake/O he/O would/O break/O with/O her/O./O And/O this/O last/O form/O of/O jealousy/O tortured/O
her/O most/O of/O all/O,/O especially/O as/O he/O had/O unwarily/O told/O her/O,/O in/O a/O moment/O of/O
frankness/O,/O that/O his/O mother/O knew/O him/O so/O little/O that/O she/O had/O had/O the/O
audacity/O to/O try/O and/O persuade/O him/O to/O marry/O the/O young/O Princess/O Sorokina/PERSON./O

And/O being/O jealous/O of/O him/O,/O Anna/PERSON was/O indignant/O against/O him/O and/O found/O
grounds/O for/O indignation/O in/O everything/O./O For/O everything/O that/O was/O difficult/O
in/O her/O position/O she/O blamed/O him/O./O The/O agonizing/O condition/O of/O suspense/O she/O
had/O passed/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O the/O tardiness/O and/O indecision/O of/O Alexey/PERSON
Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O her/O solitude/O--/Oshe/O put/O it/O all/O down/O to/O him/O./O If/O he/O had/O loved/O
her/O he/O would/O have/O seen/O all/O the/O bitterness/O of/O her/O position/O,/O and/O would/O
have/O rescued/O her/O from/O it/O./O For/O her/O being/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION and/O not/O in/O the/O
country/O,/O he/O was/O to/O blame/O too/O./O He/O could/O not/O live/O buried/O in/O the/O country/O as/O
she/O would/O have/O liked/O to/O do/O./O He/O must/O have/O society/O,/O and/O he/O had/O put/O her/O in/O
this/O awful/O position/O,/O the/O bitterness/O of/O which/O he/O would/O not/O see/O./O And/O
again/O,/O it/O was/O his/O fault/O that/O she/O was/O forever/O separated/O from/O her/O son/O./O

Even/O the/O rare/O moments/O of/O tenderness/O that/O came/O from/O time/O to/O time/O did/O not/O
soothe/O her/O;/O in/O his/O tenderness/O now/O she/O saw/O a/O shade/O of/O complacency/O,/O of/O
self-confidence/O,/O which/O had/O not/O been/O of/O old/O,/O and/O which/O exasperated/O her/O./O

It/O was/O dusk/O./O Anna/PERSON was/O alone/O,/O and/O waiting/O for/O him/O to/O come/O back/O from/O a/O
bachelor/O dinner/O./O She/O walked/O up/O and/O down/O in/O his/O study/O -LRB-/Othe/O room/O where/O the/O
noise/O from/O the/O street/O was/O least/O heard/O-RRB-/O,/O and/O thought/O over/O every/O detail/O of/O
their/O yesterday/O's/O quarrel/O./O Going/O back/O from/O the/O well-remembered/O,/O
offensive/O words/O of/O the/O quarrel/O to/O what/O had/O been/O the/O ground/O of/O it/O,/O she/O
arrived/O at/O last/O at/O its/O origin/O./O For/O a/O long/O while/O she/O could/O hardly/O believe/O
that/O their/O dissension/O had/O arisen/O from/O a/O conversation/O so/O inoffensive/O,/O of/O
so/O little/O moment/O to/O either/O./O But/O so/O it/O actually/O had/O been/O./O It/O all/O arose/O
from/O his/O laughing/O at/O the/O girls/O'/O high/O schools/O,/O declaring/O they/O were/O
useless/O,/O while/O she/O defended/O them/O./O He/O had/O spoken/O slightingly/O of/O women/O's/O
education/O in/O general/O,/O and/O had/O said/O that/O Hannah/PERSON,/O Anna/PERSON's/O English/O protegée/O,/O
had/O not/O the/O slightest/O need/O to/O know/O anything/O of/O physics/O./O

This/O irritated/O Anna/PERSON./O She/O saw/O in/O this/O a/O contemptuous/O reference/O to/O her/O
occupations/O./O And/O she/O bethought/O her/O of/O a/O phrase/O to/O pay/O him/O back/O for/O the/O
pain/O he/O had/O given/O her/O./O ``/OI/O do/On't/O expect/O you/O to/O understand/O me/O,/O my/O
feelings/O,/O as/O anyone/O who/O loved/O me/O might/O,/O but/O simple/O delicacy/O I/O did/O
expect/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

And/O he/O had/O actually/O flushed/O with/O vexation/O,/O and/O had/O said/O something/O
unpleasant/O./O She/O could/O not/O recall/O her/O answer/O,/O but/O at/O that/O point/O,/O with/O an/O
unmistakable/O desire/O to/O wound/O her/O too/O,/O he/O had/O said/O:/O

``/OI/O feel/O no/O interest/O in/O your/O infatuation/O over/O this/O girl/O,/O that/O's/O true/O,/O
because/O I/O see/O it/O's/O unnatural/O./O''/O

The/O cruelty/O with/O which/O he/O shattered/O the/O world/O she/O had/O built/O up/O for/O
herself/O so/O laboriously/O to/O enable/O her/O to/O endure/O her/O hard/O life/O,/O the/O
injustice/O with/O which/O he/O had/O accused/O her/O of/O affectation/O,/O of/O
artificiality/O,/O aroused/O her/O./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O sorry/O that/O nothing/O but/O what/O's/O coarse/O and/O material/O is/O
comprehensible/O and/O natural/O to/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O and/O walked/O out/O of/O the/O room/O./O

When/O he/O had/O come/O in/O to/O her/O yesterday/O evening/O,/O they/O had/O not/O referred/O to/O
the/O quarrel/O,/O but/O both/O felt/O that/O the/O quarrel/O had/O been/O smoothed/O over/O,/O but/O
was/O not/O at/O an/O end/O./O

Today/O he/O had/O not/O been/O at/O home/O all/O day/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O so/O lonely/O and/O
wretched/O in/O being/O on/O bad/O terms/O with/O him/O that/O she/O wanted/O to/O forget/O it/O
all/O,/O to/O forgive/O him/O,/O and/O be/O reconciled/O with/O him/O;/O she/O wanted/O to/O throw/O the/O
blame/O on/O herself/O and/O to/O justify/O him/O./O

``/OI/O am/O myself/O to/O blame/O./O I/O'm/O irritable/O,/O I/O'm/O insanely/O jealous/O./O I/O will/O make/O
it/O up/O with/O him/O,/O and/O we/O'll/O go/O away/O to/O the/O country/O;/O there/O I/O shall/O be/O more/O
at/O peace/O./O''/O

``/OUnnatural/O!/O''/O She/O suddenly/O recalled/O the/O word/O that/O had/O stung/O her/O most/O of/O
all/O,/O not/O so/O much/O the/O word/O itself/O as/O the/O intent/O to/O wound/O her/O with/O which/O
it/O was/O said/O./O ``/OI/O know/O what/O he/O meant/O;/O he/O meant/O--/Ounnatural/O,/O not/O loving/O my/O
own/O daughter/O,/O to/O love/O another/O person/O's/O child/O./O What/O does/O he/O know/O of/O love/O
for/O children/O,/O of/O my/O love/O for/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O whom/O I/O've/O sacrificed/O for/O him/O?/O But/O
that/O wish/O to/O wound/O me/O!/O No/O,/O he/O loves/O another/O woman/O,/O it/O must/O be/O so/O./O''/O

And/O perceiving/O that/O,/O while/O trying/O to/O regain/O her/O peace/O of/O mind/O,/O she/O had/O
gone/O round/O the/O same/O circle/O that/O she/O had/O been/O round/O so/O often/O before/O,/O and/O
had/O come/O back/O to/O her/O former/O state/O of/O exasperation/O,/O she/O was/O horrified/O at/O
herself/O./O ``/OCan/O it/O be/O impossible/O?/O Can/O it/O be/O beyond/O me/O to/O control/O myself/O?/O''/O
she/O said/O to/O herself/O,/O and/O began/O again/O from/O the/O beginning/O./O ``/OHe/O's/O truthful/O,/O
he/O's/O honest/O,/O he/O loves/O me/O./O I/O love/O him/O,/O and/O in/O a/O few/O days/O the/O divorce/O will/O
come/O./O What/O more/O do/O I/O want/O?/O I/O want/O peace/O of/O mind/O and/O trust/O,/O and/O I/O will/O
take/O the/O blame/O on/O myself/O./O Yes/O,/O now/O when/O he/O comes/O in/O,/O I/O will/O tell/O him/O I/O
was/O wrong/O,/O though/O I/O was/O not/O wrong/O,/O and/O we/O will/O go/O away/O tomorrow/O./O''/O

And/O to/O escape/O thinking/O any/O more/O,/O and/O being/O overcome/O by/O irritability/O,/O she/O
rang/O,/O and/O ordered/O the/O boxes/O to/O be/O brought/O up/O for/O packing/O their/O things/O
for/O the/O country/O./O

At/O ten/O o'clock/O Vronsky/O came/O in/O./O



Chapter/O 24/O


``/OWell/O,/O was/O it/O nice/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O,/O coming/O out/O to/O meet/O him/O with/O a/O penitent/O
and/O meek/O expression/O./O

``/OJust/O as/O usual/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O,/O seeing/O at/O a/O glance/O that/O she/O was/O in/O one/O of/O
her/O good/O moods/O./O He/O was/O used/O by/O now/O to/O these/O transitions/O,/O and/O he/O was/O
particularly/O glad/O to/O see/O it/O today/O,/O as/O he/O was/O in/O a/O specially/O good/O humor/O
himself/O./O

``/OWhat/O do/O I/O see/O?/O Come/O,/O that/O's/O good/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O pointing/O to/O the/O boxes/O in/O
the/O passage/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O we/O must/O go/O./O I/O went/O out/O for/O a/O drive/O,/O and/O it/O was/O so/O fine/O I/O longed/O to/O
be/O in/O the/O country/O./O There/O's/O nothing/O to/O keep/O you/O,/O is/O there/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O the/O one/O thing/O I/O desire/O./O I/O'll/O be/O back/O directly/O,/O and/O we/O'll/O talk/O it/O
over/O;/O I/O only/O want/O to/O change/O my/O coat/O./O Order/O some/O tea/O./O''/O

And/O he/O went/O into/O his/O room/O./O

There/O was/O something/O mortifying/O in/O the/O way/O he/O had/O said/O ``/OCome/O,/O that/O's/O
good/O,/O''/O as/O one/O says/O to/O a/O child/O when/O it/O leaves/O off/O being/O naughty/O,/O and/O
still/O more/O mortifying/O was/O the/O contrast/O between/O her/O penitent/O and/O his/O
self-confident/O tone/O;/O and/O for/O one/O instant/O she/O felt/O the/O lust/O of/O strife/O
rising/O up/O in/O her/O again/O,/O but/O making/O an/O effort/O she/O conquered/O it/O,/O and/O met/O
Vronsky/PERSON as/O good-humoredly/O as/O before/O./O

When/O he/O came/O in/O she/O told/O him/O,/O partly/O repeating/O phrases/O she/O had/O prepared/O
beforehand/O,/O how/O she/O had/O spent/O the/O day/O,/O and/O her/O plans/O for/O going/O away/O./O

``/OYou/O know/O it/O came/O to/O me/O almost/O like/O an/O inspiration/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OWhy/O wait/O
here/O for/O the/O divorce/O?/O Wo/On't/O it/O be/O just/O the/O same/O in/O the/O country/O?/O I/O ca/On't/O
wait/O any/O longer/O!/O I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O go/O on/O hoping/O,/O I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O hear/O
anything/O about/O the/O divorce/O./O I/O have/O made/O up/O my/O mind/O it/O shall/O not/O have/O any/O
more/O influence/O on/O my/O life/O./O Do/O you/O agree/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O glancing/O uneasily/O at/O her/O excited/O face/O./O

``/OWhat/O did/O you/O do/O?/O Who/O was/O there/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O after/O a/O pause/O./O

Vronsky/O mentioned/O the/O names/O of/O the/O guests/O./O ``/OThe/O dinner/O was/O first/O rate/O,/O
and/O the/O boat/O race/O,/O and/O it/O was/O all/O pleasant/O enough/O,/O but/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION they/O
can/O never/O do/O anything/O without/O something/O _/Oridicule/O_/O./O A/O lady/O of/O a/O sort/O
appeared/O on/O the/O scene/O,/O teacher/O of/O swimming/O to/O the/O Queen/O of/O Sweden/LOCATION,/O and/O
gave/O us/O an/O exhibition/O of/O her/O skill/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O?/O did/O she/O swim/O?/O''/O asked/O Anna/PERSON,/O frowning/O./O

``/OIn/O an/O absurd/O red/O _/Ocostume/O de/O natation/O;/O_/O she/O was/O old/O and/O hideous/O too/O./O So/O
when/O shall/O we/O go/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O an/O absurd/O fancy/O!/O Why/O,/O did/O she/O swim/O in/O some/O special/O way/O,/O then/O?/O''/O
said/O Anna/PERSON,/O not/O answering/O./O

``/OThere/O was/O absolutely/O nothing/O in/O it/O./O That/O's/O just/O what/O I/O say/O,/O it/O was/O
awfully/O stupid/O./O Well/O,/O then/O,/O when/O do/O you/O think/O of/O going/O?/O''/O

Anna/PERSON shook/O her/O head/O as/O though/O trying/O to/O drive/O away/O some/O unpleasant/O idea/O./O

``/OWhen/O?/O Why/O,/O the/O sooner/O the/O better/O!/O By/O tomorrow/O we/O sha/On't/O be/O ready/O./O The/O
day/O after/O tomorrow/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O .../O oh/O,/O no/O,/O wait/O a/O minute/O!/O The/O day/O after/O tomorrow/O's/O Sunday/O,/O I/O have/O
to/O be/O at/O maman/O's/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O embarrassed/O,/O because/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O
uttered/O his/O mother/O's/O name/O he/O was/O aware/O of/O her/O intent/O,/O suspicious/O eyes/O./O
His/O embarrassment/O confirmed/O her/O suspicion/O./O She/O flushed/O hotly/O and/O drew/O
away/O from/O him/O./O It/O was/O now/O not/O the/O Queen/O of/O Sweden/LOCATION's/O swimming-mistress/O
who/O filled/O Anna/PERSON's/O imagination/O,/O but/O the/O young/O Princess/O Sorokina/PERSON./O She/O was/O
staying/O in/O a/O village/O near/O Moscow/LOCATION with/O Countess/LOCATION Vronskaya/LOCATION./O

``/OCa/On't/O you/O go/O tomorrow/O?/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O no/O!/O The/O deeds/O and/O the/O money/O for/O the/O business/O I/O'm/O going/O there/O for/O
I/O ca/On't/O get/O by/O tomorrow/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O./O

``/OIf/O so/O,/O we/O wo/On't/O go/O at/O all/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O why/O so/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O shall/O not/O go/O later/O./O Monday/O or/O never/O!/O''/O

``/OWhat/O for/O?/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O,/O as/O though/O in/O amazement/O./O ``/OWhy/O,/O there/O's/O no/O
meaning/O in/O it/O!/O''/O

``/OThere/O's/O no/O meaning/O in/O it/O to/O you/O,/O because/O you/O care/O nothing/O for/O me/O./O You/O
do/On't/O care/O to/O understand/O my/O life/O./O The/O one/O thing/O that/O I/O cared/O for/O here/O
was/O Hannah/PERSON./O You/O say/O it/O's/O affectation/O./O Why/O,/O you/O said/O yesterday/O that/O I/O
do/On't/O love/O my/O daughter/O,/O that/O I/O love/O this/O English/O girl/O,/O that/O it/O's/O
unnatural/O./O I/O should/O like/O to/O know/O what/O life/O there/O is/O for/O me/O that/O could/O be/O
natural/O!/O''/O

For/O an/O instant/O she/O had/O a/O clear/O vision/O of/O what/O she/O was/O doing/O,/O and/O was/O
horrified/O at/O how/O she/O had/O fallen/O away/O from/O her/O resolution/O./O But/O even/O
though/O she/O knew/O it/O was/O her/O own/O ruin/O,/O she/O could/O not/O restrain/O herself/O,/O
could/O not/O keep/O herself/O from/O proving/O to/O him/O that/O he/O was/O wrong/O,/O could/O not/O
give/O way/O to/O him/O./O

``/OI/O never/O said/O that/O;/O I/O said/O I/O did/O not/O sympathize/O with/O this/O sudden/O
passion/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O is/O it/O,/O though/O you/O boast/O of/O your/O straightforwardness/O,/O you/O do/On't/O tell/O
the/O truth/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O never/O boast/O,/O and/O I/O never/O tell/O lies/O,/O''/O he/O said/O slowly/O,/O restraining/O his/O
rising/O anger/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O a/O great/O pity/O if/O you/O ca/On't/O respect/O.../O''/O

``/ORespect/O was/O invented/O to/O cover/O the/O empty/O place/O where/O love/O should/O be/O./O And/O
if/O you/O do/On't/O love/O me/O any/O more/O,/O it/O would/O be/O better/O and/O more/O honest/O to/O say/O
so/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O this/O is/O becoming/O unbearable/O!/O''/O cried/O Vronsky/O,/O getting/O up/O from/O his/O
chair/O;/O and/O stopping/O short/O,/O facing/O her/O,/O he/O said/O,/O speaking/O deliberately/O:/O
``/OWhat/O do/O you/O try/O my/O patience/O for/O?/O''/O looking/O as/O though/O he/O might/O have/O said/O
much/O more/O,/O but/O was/O restraining/O himself/O./O ``/OIt/O has/O limits/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O mean/O by/O that/O?/O''/O she/O cried/O,/O looking/O with/O terror/O at/O the/O
undisguised/O hatred/O in/O his/O whole/O face/O,/O and/O especially/O in/O his/O cruel/O,/O
menacing/O eyes/O./O

``/OI/O mean/O to/O say/O.../O''/O he/O was/O beginning/O,/O but/O he/O checked/O himself/O./O ``/OI/O must/O ask/O
what/O it/O is/O you/O want/O of/O me/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O can/O I/O want/O?/O All/O I/O can/O want/O is/O that/O you/O should/O not/O desert/O me/O,/O as/O
you/O think/O of/O doing/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O understanding/O all/O he/O had/O not/O uttered/O./O
``/OBut/O that/O I/O do/On't/O want/O;/O that/O's/O secondary/O./O I/O want/O love/O,/O and/O there/O is/O
none/O./O So/O then/O all/O is/O over/O./O''/O

She/O turned/O towards/O the/O door/O./O

``/OStop/O!/O sto-op/O!/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O with/O no/O change/O in/O the/O gloomy/O lines/O of/O his/O
brows/O,/O though/O he/O held/O her/O by/O the/O hand/O./O ``/OWhat/O is/O it/O all/O about/O?/O I/O said/O
that/O we/O must/O put/O off/O going/O for/O three/O days/O,/O and/O on/O that/O you/O told/O me/O I/O was/O
lying/O,/O that/O I/O was/O not/O an/O honorable/O man/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O and/O I/O repeat/O that/O the/O man/O who/O reproaches/O me/O with/O having/O sacrificed/O
everything/O for/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O recalling/O the/O words/O of/O a/O still/O earlier/O
quarrel/O,/O ``/Othat/O he/O's/O worse/O than/O a/O dishonorable/O man/O--/Ohe/O's/O a/O heartless/O man/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O there/O are/O limits/O to/O endurance/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O,/O and/O hastily/O let/O go/O her/O
hand/O./O

``/OHe/O hates/O me/O,/O that/O's/O clear/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O and/O in/O silence/O,/O without/O
looking/O round/O,/O she/O walked/O with/O faltering/O steps/O out/O of/O the/O room/O./O ``/OHe/O
loves/O another/O woman/O,/O that/O's/O even/O clearer/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O as/O she/O
went/O into/O her/O own/O room/O./O ``/OI/O want/O love/O,/O and/O there/O is/O none/O./O So/O,/O then/O,/O all/O
is/O over/O./O''/O She/O repeated/O the/O words/O she/O had/O said/O,/O ``/Oand/O it/O must/O be/O ended/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O how/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O herself/O,/O and/O she/O sat/O down/O in/O a/O low/O chair/O before/O the/O
looking/O glass/O./O

Thoughts/O of/O where/O she/O would/O go/O now/O,/O whether/O to/O the/O aunt/O who/O had/O brought/O
her/O up/O,/O to/O Dolly/PERSON,/O or/O simply/O alone/O abroad/O,/O and/O of/O what/O _/Ohe/O_/O was/O doing/O now/O
alone/O in/O his/O study/O;/O whether/O this/O was/O the/O final/O quarrel/O,/O or/O whether/O
reconciliation/O were/O still/O possible/O;/O and/O of/O what/O all/O her/O old/O friends/O at/O
Petersburg/LOCATION would/O say/O of/O her/O now/O;/O and/O of/O how/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON would/O
look/O at/O it/O,/O and/O many/O other/O ideas/O of/O what/O would/O happen/O now/O after/O this/O
rupture/O,/O came/O into/O her/O head/O;/O but/O she/O did/O not/O give/O herself/O up/O to/O them/O
with/O all/O her/O heart/O./O At/O the/O bottom/O of/O her/O heart/O was/O some/O obscure/O idea/O
that/O alone/O interested/O her/O,/O but/O she/O could/O not/O get/O clear/O sight/O of/O it/O./O
Thinking/O once/O more/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O she/O recalled/O the/O time/O of/O
her/O illness/O after/O her/O confinement/O,/O and/O the/O feeling/O which/O never/O left/O her/O
at/O that/O time/O./O ``/OWhy/O did/On't/O I/O die/O?/O''/O and/O the/O words/O and/O the/O feeling/O of/O that/O
time/O came/O back/O to/O her/O./O And/O all/O at/O once/O she/O knew/O what/O was/O in/O her/O soul/O./O
Yes/O,/O it/O was/O that/O idea/O which/O alone/O solved/O all/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O to/O die/O!/O.../O And/O the/O
shame/O and/O disgrace/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON and/O of/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O and/O my/O
awful/O shame/O,/O it/O will/O all/O be/O saved/O by/O death/O./O To/O die/O!/O and/O he/O will/O feel/O
remorse/O;/O will/O be/O sorry/O;/O will/O love/O me/O;/O he/O will/O suffer/O on/O my/O account/O./O''/O
With/O the/O trace/O of/O a/O smile/O of/O commiseration/O for/O herself/O she/O sat/O down/O in/O
the/O armchair/O,/O taking/O off/O and/O putting/O on/O the/O rings/O on/O her/O left/O hand/O,/O
vividly/O picturing/O from/O different/O sides/O his/O feelings/O after/O her/O death/O./O

Approaching/O footsteps/O--/Ohis/O steps/O--/Odistracted/O her/O attention/O./O As/O though/O
absorbed/O in/O the/O arrangement/O of/O her/O rings/O,/O she/O did/O not/O even/O turn/O to/O him/O./O

He/O went/O up/O to/O her/O,/O and/O taking/O her/O by/O the/O hand/O,/O said/O softly/O:/O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O we/O'll/O go/O the/O day/O after/O tomorrow/O,/O if/O you/O like/O./O I/O agree/O to/O
everything/O./O''/O

She/O did/O not/O speak/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O?/O''/O he/O urged/O./O

``/OYou/O know/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O instant/O,/O unable/O to/O restrain/O
herself/O any/O longer/O,/O she/O burst/O into/O sobs/O./O

``/OCast/O me/O off/O!/O''/O she/O articulated/O between/O her/O sobs/O./O ``/OI/O'll/O go/O away/O tomorrow/O
.../O I/O'll/O do/O more/O./O What/O am/O I/O?/O An/O immoral/O woman/O!/O A/O stone/O round/O your/O neck/O./O
I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O make/O you/O wretched/O,/O I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O!/O I/O'll/O set/O you/O free/O./O
You/O do/On't/O love/O me/O;/O you/O love/O someone/O else/O!/O''/O

Vronsky/O besought/O her/O to/O be/O calm/O,/O and/O declared/O that/O there/O was/O no/O trace/O of/O
foundation/O for/O her/O jealousy/O;/O that/O he/O had/O never/O ceased/O,/O and/O never/O would/O
cease/O,/O to/O love/O her/O;/O that/O he/O loved/O her/O more/O than/O ever/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O why/O distress/O yourself/O and/O me/O so/O?/O''/O he/O said/O to/O her/O,/O kissing/O her/O
hands/O./O There/O was/O tenderness/O now/O in/O his/O face/O,/O and/O she/O fancied/O she/O caught/O
the/O sound/O of/O tears/O in/O his/O voice/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O them/O wet/O on/O her/O hand/O./O And/O
instantly/O Anna/PERSON's/O despairing/O jealousy/O changed/O to/O a/O despairing/O passion/O of/O
tenderness/O./O She/O put/O her/O arms/O round/O him/O,/O and/O covered/O with/O kisses/O his/O
head/O,/O his/O neck/O,/O his/O hands/O./O



Chapter/O 25/O


Feeling/O that/O the/O reconciliation/O was/O complete/O,/O Anna/PERSON set/O eagerly/O to/O work/O
in/O the/O morning/O preparing/O for/O their/O departure/O./O Though/O it/O was/O not/O settled/O
whether/O they/O should/O go/O on/O Monday/O or/O Tuesday/O,/O as/O they/O had/O each/O given/O way/O
to/O the/O other/O,/O Anna/PERSON packed/O busily/O,/O feeling/O absolutely/O indifferent/O whether/O
they/O went/O a/O day/O earlier/O or/O later/O./O She/O was/O standing/O in/O her/O room/O over/O an/O
open/O box/O,/O taking/O things/O out/O of/O it/O,/O when/O he/O came/O in/O to/O see/O her/O earlier/O
than/O usual/O,/O dressed/O to/O go/O out/O./O

``/OI/O'm/O going/O off/O at/O once/O to/O see/O maman/O;/O she/O can/O send/O me/O the/O money/O by/O
Yegorov/PERSON./O And/O I/O shall/O be/O ready/O to/O go/O tomorrow/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

Though/O she/O was/O in/O such/O a/O good/O mood/O,/O the/O thought/O of/O his/O visit/O to/O his/O
mother/O's/O gave/O her/O a/O pang/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O sha/On't/O be/O ready/O by/O then/O myself/O,/O''/O she/O said/O;/O and/O at/O once/O reflected/O,/O
``/Oso/O then/O it/O was/O possible/O to/O arrange/O to/O do/O as/O I/O wished/O./O''/O ``/ONo/O,/O do/O as/O you/O
meant/O to/O do/O./O Go/O into/O the/O dining/O room/O,/O I/O'm/O coming/O directly/O./O It/O's/O only/O to/O
turn/O out/O those/O things/O that/O are/On't/O wanted/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O putting/O something/O
more/O on/O the/O heap/O of/O frippery/O that/O lay/O in/O Annushka/LOCATION's/O arms/O./O

Vronsky/PERSON was/O eating/O his/O beefsteak/O when/O she/O came/O into/O the/O dining-room/O./O

``/OYou/O would/On't/O believe/O how/O distasteful/O these/O rooms/O have/O become/O to/O me/O,/O''/O
she/O said/O,/O sitting/O down/O beside/O him/O to/O her/O coffee/O./O ``/OThere/O's/O nothing/O more/O
awful/O than/O these/O _/Ochambres/O garnies/O_/O./O There/O's/O no/O individuality/O in/O them/O,/O
no/O soul/O./O These/O clocks/O,/O and/O curtains/O,/O and/O,/O worst/O of/O all/O,/O the/O
wallpapers/O--/Othey/O're/O a/O nightmare/O./O I/O think/O of/O Vozdvizhenskoe/PERSON as/O the/O
promised/O land/O./O You/O're/O not/O sending/O the/O horses/O off/O yet/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O they/O will/O come/O after/O us/O./O Where/O are/O you/O going/O to/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O wanted/O to/O go/O to/O Wilson/PERSON's/O to/O take/O some/O dresses/O to/O her/O./O So/O it/O's/O really/O
to/O be/O tomorrow/O?/O''/O she/O said/O in/O a/O cheerful/O voice/O;/O but/O suddenly/O her/O face/O
changed/O./O

Vronsky/O's/O valet/O came/O in/O to/O ask/O him/O to/O sign/O a/O receipt/O for/O a/O telegram/O from/O
Petersburg/LOCATION./O There/O was/O nothing/O out/O of/O the/O way/O in/O Vronsky/O's/O getting/O a/O
telegram/O,/O but/O he/O said/O,/O as/O though/O anxious/O to/O conceal/O something/O from/O her/O,/O
that/O the/O receipt/O was/O in/O his/O study/O,/O and/O he/O turned/O hurriedly/O to/O her/O./O

``/OBy/O tomorrow/O,/O without/O fail/O,/O I/O will/O finish/O it/O all/O./O''/O

``/OFrom/O whom/O is/O the/O telegram/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O,/O not/O hearing/O him/O./O

``/OFrom/O Stiva/O,/O''/O he/O answered/O reluctantly/O./O

``/OWhy/O did/On't/O you/O show/O it/O to/O me/O?/O What/O secret/O can/O there/O be/O between/O Stiva/LOCATION
and/O me/O?/O''/O

Vronsky/PERSON called/O the/O valet/O back/O,/O and/O told/O him/O to/O bring/O the/O telegram/O./O

``/OI/O did/On't/O want/O to/O show/O it/O to/O you/O,/O because/O Stiva/PERSON has/O such/O a/O passion/O for/O
telegraphing/O:/O why/O telegraph/O when/O nothing/O is/O settled/O?/O''/O

``/OAbout/O the/O divorce/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O;/O but/O he/O says/O he/O has/O not/O been/O able/O to/O come/O at/O anything/O yet/O./O He/O has/O
promised/O a/O decisive/O answer/O in/O a/O day/O or/O two/O./O But/O here/O it/O is/O;/O read/O it/O./O''/O

With/O trembling/O hands/O Anna/PERSON took/O the/O telegram/O,/O and/O read/O what/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O
told/O her/O./O At/O the/O end/O was/O added/O:/O ``/OLittle/O hope/O;/O but/O I/O will/O do/O everything/O
possible/O and/O impossible/O./O''/O

``/OI/O said/O yesterday/O that/O it/O's/O absolutely/O nothing/O to/O me/O when/O I/O get/O,/O or/O
whether/O I/O never/O get/O,/O a/O divorce/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O flushing/O crimson/O./O ``/OThere/O was/O
not/O the/O slightest/O necessity/O to/O hide/O it/O from/O me/O./O''/O ``/OSo/O he/O may/O hide/O and/O
does/O hide/O his/O correspondence/O with/O women/O from/O me/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O./O

``/OYashvin/O meant/O to/O come/O this/O morning/O with/O Voytov/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON;/O ``/OI/O
believe/O he/O's/O won/O from/O Pyevtsov/PERSON all/O and/O more/O than/O he/O can/O pay/O,/O about/O sixty/O
thousand/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O irritated/O by/O his/O so/O obviously/O showing/O by/O this/O change/O of/O
subject/O that/O he/O was/O irritated/O,/O ``/Owhy/O did/O you/O suppose/O that/O this/O news/O would/O
affect/O me/O so/O,/O that/O you/O must/O even/O try/O to/O hide/O it/O?/O I/O said/O I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O
consider/O it/O,/O and/O I/O should/O have/O liked/O you/O to/O care/O as/O little/O about/O it/O as/O I/O
do/O./O''/O

``/OI/O care/O about/O it/O because/O I/O like/O definiteness/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/ODefiniteness/O is/O not/O in/O the/O form/O but/O the/O love/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O more/O and/O more/O
irritated/O,/O not/O by/O his/O words/O,/O but/O by/O the/O tone/O of/O cool/O composure/O in/O which/O
he/O spoke/O./O ``/OWhat/O do/O you/O want/O it/O for/O?/O''/O

``/OMy/O God/O!/O love/O again/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O frowning/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O you/O know/O what/O for/O;/O for/O your/O sake/O and/O your/O children/O's/O in/O the/O
future/O./O''/O

``/OThere/O wo/On't/O be/O children/O in/O the/O future/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O a/O great/O pity/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O

``/OYou/O want/O it/O for/O the/O children/O's/O sake/O,/O but/O you/O do/On't/O think/O of/O me/O?/O''/O she/O
said/O,/O quite/O forgetting/O or/O not/O having/O heard/O that/O he/O had/O said/O,/O ''/O_/Ofor/O your/O
sake/O_/O and/O the/O children/O's/O./O''/O

The/O question/O of/O the/O possibility/O of/O having/O children/O had/O long/O been/O a/O
subject/O of/O dispute/O and/O irritation/O to/O her/O./O His/O desire/O to/O have/O children/O
she/O interpreted/O as/O a/O proof/O he/O did/O not/O prize/O her/O beauty/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O said/O:/O for/O your/O sake/O./O Above/O all/O for/O your/O sake/O,/O''/O he/O repeated/O,/O
frowning/O as/O though/O in/O pain/O,/O ``/Obecause/O I/O am/O certain/O that/O the/O greater/O part/O
of/O your/O irritability/O comes/O from/O the/O indefiniteness/O of/O the/O position/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O now/O he/O has/O laid/O aside/O all/O pretense/O,/O and/O all/O his/O cold/O hatred/O for/O me/O
is/O apparent/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O not/O hearing/O his/O words/O,/O but/O watching/O with/O
terror/O the/O cold/O,/O cruel/O judge/O who/O looked/O mocking/O her/O out/O of/O his/O eyes/O./O

``/OThe/O cause/O is/O not/O that/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/Oand/O,/O indeed/O,/O I/O do/On't/O see/O how/O the/O
cause/O of/O my/O irritability/O,/O as/O you/O call/O it/O,/O can/O be/O that/O I/O am/O completely/O in/O
your/O power/O./O What/O indefiniteness/O is/O there/O in/O the/O position/O?/O on/O the/O
contrary/O.../O''/O

``/OI/O am/O very/O sorry/O that/O you/O do/On't/O care/O to/O understand/O,/O''/O he/O interrupted/O,/O
obstinately/O anxious/O to/O give/O utterance/O to/O his/O thought/O./O ``/OThe/O
indefiniteness/O consists/O in/O your/O imagining/O that/O I/O am/O free/O./O''/O

``/OOn/O that/O score/O you/O can/O set/O your/O mind/O quite/O at/O rest/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O
turning/O away/O from/O him/O,/O she/O began/O drinking/O her/O coffee/O./O

She/O lifted/O her/O cup/O,/O with/O her/O little/O finger/O held/O apart/O,/O and/O put/O it/O to/O her/O
lips/O./O After/O drinking/O a/O few/O sips/O she/O glanced/O at/O him/O,/O and/O by/O his/O
expression/O,/O she/O saw/O clearly/O that/O he/O was/O repelled/O by/O her/O hand/O,/O and/O her/O
gesture/O,/O and/O the/O sound/O made/O by/O her/O lips/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O care/O in/O the/O least/O what/O your/O mother/O thinks/O,/O and/O what/O match/O she/O
wants/O to/O make/O for/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O putting/O the/O cup/O down/O with/O a/O shaking/O
hand/O./O

``/OBut/O we/O are/O not/O talking/O about/O that/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O's/O just/O what/O we/O are/O talking/O about/O./O And/O let/O me/O tell/O you/O that/O a/O
heartless/O woman/O,/O whether/O she/O's/O old/O or/O not/O old/O,/O your/O mother/O or/O anyone/O
else/O,/O is/O of/O no/O consequence/O to/O me/O,/O and/O I/O would/O not/O consent/O to/O know/O her/O./O''/O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O I/O beg/O you/O not/O to/O speak/O disrespectfully/O of/O my/O mother/O./O''/O

``/OA/O woman/O whose/O heart/O does/O not/O tell/O her/O where/O her/O son/O's/O happiness/O and/O
honor/O lie/O has/O no/O heart/O./O''/O

``/OI/O repeat/O my/O request/O that/O you/O will/O not/O speak/O disrespectfully/O of/O my/O
mother/O,/O whom/O I/O respect/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O raising/O his/O voice/O and/O looking/O sternly/O
at/O her/O./O

She/O did/O not/O answer/O./O Looking/O intently/O at/O him/O,/O at/O his/O face/O,/O his/O hands/O,/O she/O
recalled/O all/O the/O details/O of/O their/O reconciliation/O the/O previous/O day/O,/O and/O
his/O passionate/O caresses/O./O ``/OThere/O,/O just/O such/O caresses/O he/O has/O lavished/O,/O and/O
will/O lavish/O,/O and/O longs/O to/O lavish/O on/O other/O women/O!/O''/O she/O thought/O./O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O love/O your/O mother/O./O That/O's/O all/O talk/O,/O and/O talk/O,/O and/O talk/O!/O''/O she/O
said/O,/O looking/O at/O him/O with/O hatred/O in/O her/O eyes/O./O

``/OEven/O if/O so/O,/O you/O must/O.../O''/O

``/OMust/O decide/O,/O and/O I/O have/O decided/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O she/O would/O have/O gone/O
away/O,/O but/O at/O that/O moment/O Yashvin/PERSON walked/O into/O the/O room/O./O Anna/PERSON greeted/O him/O
and/O remained/O./O

Why/O,/O when/O there/O was/O a/O tempest/O in/O her/O soul/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O she/O was/O standing/O
at/O a/O turning/O point/O in/O her/O life/O,/O which/O might/O have/O fearful/O
consequences/O--/Owhy/O,/O at/O that/O minute/O,/O she/O had/O to/O keep/O up/O appearances/O before/O
an/O outsider/O,/O who/O sooner/O or/O later/O must/O know/O it/O all/O--/Oshe/O did/O not/O know/O./O But/O
at/O once/O quelling/O the/O storm/O within/O her/O,/O she/O sat/O down/O and/O began/O talking/O to/O
their/O guest/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O how/O are/O you/O getting/O on/O?/O Has/O your/O debt/O been/O paid/O you/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O
Yashvin/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O pretty/O fair/O;/O I/O fancy/O I/O sha/On't/O get/O it/O all/O,/O but/O I/O shall/O get/O a/O good/O
half/O./O And/O when/O are/O you/O off/O?/O''/O said/O Yashvin/PERSON,/O looking/O at/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O
unmistakably/O guessing/O at/O a/O quarrel/O./O

``/OThe/O day/O after/O tomorrow/O,/O I/O think/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OYou/O've/O been/O meaning/O to/O go/O so/O long/O,/O though/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O now/O it/O's/O quite/O decided/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O looking/O Vronsky/O straight/O in/O the/O
face/O with/O a/O look/O which/O told/O him/O not/O to/O dream/O of/O the/O possibility/O of/O
reconciliation/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O you/O feel/O sorry/O for/O that/O unlucky/O Pyevtsov/O?/O''/O she/O went/O on/O,/O talking/O
to/O Yashvin/PERSON./O

``/OI/O've/O never/O asked/O myself/O the/O question/O,/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON,/O whether/O I/O'm/O
sorry/O for/O him/O or/O not/O./O You/O see/O,/O all/O my/O fortune/O's/O here/O''/O--/Ohe/O touched/O his/O
breast/O pocket/O--/O``/Oand/O just/O now/O I/O'm/O a/O wealthy/O man/O./O But/O today/O I/O'm/O going/O to/O
the/O club/O,/O and/O I/O may/O come/O out/O a/O beggar/O./O You/O see/O,/O whoever/O sits/O down/O to/O
play/O with/O me/O--/Ohe/O wants/O to/O leave/O me/O without/O a/O shirt/O to/O my/O back/O,/O and/O so/O do/O
I/O him/O./O And/O so/O we/O fight/O it/O out/O,/O and/O that/O's/O the/O pleasure/O of/O it/O./O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O but/O suppose/O you/O were/O married/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O ``/Ohow/O would/O it/O be/O for/O
your/O wife/O?/O''/O

Yashvin/PERSON laughed/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O why/O I/O'm/O not/O married/O,/O and/O never/O mean/O to/O be/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O Helsingfors/O?/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O entering/O into/O the/O conversation/O and/O
glancing/O at/O Anna/PERSON's/O smiling/O face/O./O Meeting/O his/O eyes/O,/O Anna/PERSON's/O face/O instantly/O
took/O a/O coldly/O severe/O expression/O as/O though/O she/O were/O saying/O to/O him/O:/O ``/OIt/O's/O
not/O forgotten/O./O It/O's/O all/O the/O same/O./O''/O

``/OWere/O you/O really/O in/O love/O?/O''/O she/O said/O to/O Yashvin/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O heavens/O!/O ever/O so/O many/O times/O!/O But/O you/O see/O,/O some/O men/O can/O play/O but/O only/O
so/O that/O they/O can/O always/O lay/O down/O their/O cards/O when/O the/O hour/O of/O a/O
_/Orendezvous/O_/O comes/O,/O while/O I/O can/O take/O up/O love/O,/O but/O only/O so/O as/O not/O to/O be/O
late/O for/O my/O cards/O in/O the/O evening/O./O That/O's/O how/O I/O manage/O things/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O did/On't/O mean/O that/O,/O but/O the/O real/O thing/O./O''/O She/O would/O have/O said/O
_/OHelsingfors/O_/O,/O but/O would/O not/O repeat/O the/O word/O used/O by/O Vronsky/O./O

Voytov/PERSON,/O who/O was/O buying/O the/O horse/O,/O came/O in/O./O Anna/PERSON got/O up/O and/O went/O out/O of/O
the/O room/O./O

Before/O leaving/O the/O house/O,/O Vronsky/O went/O into/O her/O room/O./O She/O would/O have/O
pretended/O to/O be/O looking/O for/O something/O on/O the/O table/O,/O but/O ashamed/O of/O
making/O a/O pretense/O,/O she/O looked/O straight/O in/O his/O face/O with/O cold/O eyes/O./O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O want/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O in/O French/O./O

``/OTo/O get/O the/O guarantee/O for/O Gambetta/PERSON,/O I/O've/O sold/O him/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O in/O a/O tone/O
which/O said/O more/O clearly/O than/O words/O,/O ``/OI/O've/O no/O time/O for/O discussing/O things/O,/O
and/O it/O would/O lead/O to/O nothing/O./O''/O

``/OI/O'm/O not/O to/O blame/O in/O any/O way/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O ``/OIf/O she/O will/O punish/O herself/O,/O
_/Otant/O pis/O pour/O elle/O./O_/O''/O But/O as/O he/O was/O going/O he/O fancied/O that/O she/O said/O
something/O,/O and/O his/O heart/O suddenly/O ached/O with/O pity/O for/O her/O./O

``/OEh/O,/O Anna/PERSON?/O''/O he/O queried/O./O

``/OI/O said/O nothing/O,/O''/O she/O answered/O just/O as/O coldly/O and/O calmly/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O nothing/O,/O _/Otant/O pis/O_/O then/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O feeling/O cold/O again/O,/O and/O he/O
turned/O and/O went/O out/O./O As/O he/O was/O going/O out/O he/O caught/O a/O glimpse/O in/O the/O
looking/O glass/O of/O her/O face/O,/O white/O,/O with/O quivering/O lips/O./O He/O even/O wanted/O to/O
stop/O and/O to/O say/O some/O comforting/O word/O to/O her/O,/O but/O his/O legs/O carried/O him/O
out/O of/O the/O room/O before/O he/O could/O think/O what/O to/O say/O./O The/O whole/O of/O that/O day/O
he/O spent/O away/O from/O home/O,/O and/O when/O he/O came/O in/O late/O in/O the/O evening/O the/O
maid/O told/O him/O that/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON had/O a/O headache/O and/O begged/O him/O not/O to/O
go/O in/O to/O her/O./O



Chapter/O 26/O


Never/O before/O had/O a/O day/O been/O passed/O in/O quarrel/O./O Today/O was/O the/O first/O time/O./O
And/O this/O was/O not/O a/O quarrel/O./O It/O was/O the/O open/O acknowledgment/O of/O complete/O
coldness/O./O Was/O it/O possible/O to/O glance/O at/O her/O as/O he/O had/O glanced/O when/O he/O
came/O into/O the/O room/O for/O the/O guarantee/O?/O--/Oto/O look/O at/O her/O,/O see/O her/O heart/O was/O
breaking/O with/O despair/O,/O and/O go/O out/O without/O a/O word/O with/O that/O face/O of/O
callous/O composure/O?/O He/O was/O not/O merely/O cold/O to/O her/O,/O he/O hated/O her/O because/O
he/O loved/O another/O woman/O--/Othat/O was/O clear/O./O

And/O remembering/O all/O the/O cruel/O words/O he/O had/O said/O,/O Anna/PERSON supplied/O,/O too/O,/O the/O
words/O that/O he/O had/O unmistakably/O wished/O to/O say/O and/O could/O have/O said/O to/O her/O,/O
and/O she/O grew/O more/O and/O more/O exasperated/O./O

``/OI/O wo/On't/O prevent/O you/O,/O''/O he/O might/O say/O./O ``/OYou/O can/O go/O where/O you/O like/O./O You/O
were/O unwilling/O to/O be/O divorced/O from/O your/O husband/O,/O no/O doubt/O so/O that/O you/O
might/O go/O back/O to/O him/O./O Go/O back/O to/O him/O./O If/O you/O want/O money/O,/O I/O'll/O give/O it/O to/O
you/O./O How/O many/O roubles/O do/O you/O want/O?/O''/O

All/O the/O most/O cruel/O words/O that/O a/O brutal/O man/O could/O say/O,/O he/O said/O to/O her/O in/O
her/O imagination/O,/O and/O she/O could/O not/O forgive/O him/O for/O them/O,/O as/O though/O he/O
had/O actually/O said/O them/O./O

``/OBut/O did/On't/O he/O only/O yesterday/O swear/O he/O loved/O me/O,/O he/O,/O a/O truthful/O and/O
sincere/O man/O?/O Have/On't/O I/O despaired/O for/O nothing/O many/O times/O already/O?/O''/O she/O
said/O to/O herself/O afterwards/O./O

All/O that/O day/O,/O except/O for/O the/O visit/O to/O Wilson/PERSON's/O,/O which/O occupied/O two/O
hours/O,/O Anna/PERSON spent/O in/O doubts/O whether/O everything/O were/O over/O or/O whether/O
there/O were/O still/O hope/O of/O reconciliation/O,/O whether/O she/O should/O go/O away/O at/O
once/O or/O see/O him/O once/O more/O./O She/O was/O expecting/O him/O the/O whole/O day/O,/O and/O in/O
the/O evening/O,/O as/O she/O went/O to/O her/O own/O room/O,/O leaving/O a/O message/O for/O him/O that/O
her/O head/O ached/O,/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O,/O ``/OIf/O he/O comes/O in/O spite/O of/O what/O the/O
maid/O says/O,/O it/O means/O that/O he/O loves/O me/O still/O./O If/O not/O,/O it/O means/O that/O all/O is/O
over/O,/O and/O then/O I/O will/O decide/O what/O I/O'm/O to/O do/O!/O.../O''/O

In/O the/O evening/O she/O heard/O the/O rumbling/O of/O his/O carriage/O stop/O at/O the/O
entrance/O,/O his/O ring/O,/O his/O steps/O and/O his/O conversation/O with/O the/O servant/O;/O he/O
believed/O what/O was/O told/O him/O,/O did/O not/O care/O to/O find/O out/O more/O,/O and/O went/O to/O
his/O own/O room/O./O So/O then/O everything/O was/O over/O./O

And/O death/O rose/O clearly/O and/O vividly/O before/O her/O mind/O as/O the/O sole/O means/O of/O
bringing/O back/O love/O for/O her/O in/O his/O heart/O,/O of/O punishing/O him/O and/O of/O gaining/O
the/O victory/O in/O that/O strife/O which/O the/O evil/O spirit/O in/O possession/O of/O her/O
heart/O was/O waging/O with/O him/O./O

Now/O nothing/O mattered/O:/O going/O or/O not/O going/O to/O Vozdvizhenskoe/LOCATION,/O getting/O or/O
not/O getting/O a/O divorce/O from/O her/O husband/O--/Oall/O that/O did/O not/O matter/O./O The/O one/O
thing/O that/O mattered/O was/O punishing/O him/O./O When/O she/O poured/O herself/O out/O her/O
usual/O dose/O of/O opium/O,/O and/O thought/O that/O she/O had/O only/O to/O drink/O off/O the/O
whole/O bottle/O to/O die/O,/O it/O seemed/O to/O her/O so/O simple/O and/O easy/O,/O that/O she/O began/O
musing/O with/O enjoyment/O on/O how/O he/O would/O suffer/O,/O and/O repent/O and/O love/O her/O
memory/O when/O it/O would/O be/O too/O late/O./O She/O lay/O in/O bed/O with/O open/O eyes/O,/O by/O the/O
light/O of/O a/O single/O burned-down/O candle/O,/O gazing/O at/O the/O carved/O cornice/O of/O
the/O ceiling/O and/O at/O the/O shadow/O of/O the/O screen/O that/O covered/O part/O of/O it/O,/O
while/O she/O vividly/O pictured/O to/O herself/O how/O he/O would/O feel/O when/O she/O would/O
be/O no/O more/O,/O when/O she/O would/O be/O only/O a/O memory/O to/O him/O./O ``/OHow/O could/O I/O say/O
such/O cruel/O things/O to/O her/O?/O''/O he/O would/O say/O./O ``/OHow/O could/O I/O go/O out/O of/O the/O room/O
without/O saying/O anything/O to/O her/O?/O But/O now/O she/O is/O no/O more/O./O She/O has/O gone/O
away/O from/O us/O forever/O./O She/O is/O.../O''/O Suddenly/O the/O shadow/O of/O the/O screen/O
wavered/O,/O pounced/O on/O the/O whole/O cornice/O,/O the/O whole/O ceiling/O;/O other/O shadows/O
from/O the/O other/O side/O swooped/O to/O meet/O it/O,/O for/O an/O instant/O the/O shadows/O
flitted/O back/O,/O but/O then/O with/O fresh/O swiftness/O they/O darted/O forward/O,/O
wavered/O,/O commingled/O,/O and/O all/O was/O darkness/O./O ``/ODeath/O!/O''/O she/O thought/O./O And/O
such/O horror/O came/O upon/O her/O that/O for/O a/O long/O while/O she/O could/O not/O realize/O
where/O she/O was/O,/O and/O for/O a/O long/O while/O her/O trembling/O hands/O could/O not/O find/O
the/O matches/O and/O light/O another/O candle/O,/O instead/O of/O the/O one/O that/O had/O burned/O
down/O and/O gone/O out/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O anything/O--/Oonly/O to/O live/O!/O Why/O,/O I/O love/O him/O!/O Why/O,/O he/O
loves/O me/O!/O This/O has/O been/O before/O and/O will/O pass/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O feeling/O that/O
tears/O of/O joy/O at/O the/O return/O to/O life/O were/O trickling/O down/O her/O cheeks/O./O And/O
to/O escape/O from/O her/O panic/O she/O went/O hurriedly/O to/O his/O room/O./O

He/O was/O asleep/O there/O,/O and/O sleeping/O soundly/O./O She/O went/O up/O to/O him/O,/O and/O
holding/O the/O light/O above/O his/O face/O,/O she/O gazed/O a/O long/O while/O at/O him/O./O Now/O
when/O he/O was/O asleep/O,/O she/O loved/O him/O so/O that/O at/O the/O sight/O of/O him/O she/O could/O
not/O keep/O back/O tears/O of/O tenderness/O./O But/O she/O knew/O that/O if/O he/O waked/O up/O he/O
would/O look/O at/O her/O with/O cold/O eyes/O,/O convinced/O that/O he/O was/O right/O,/O and/O that/O
before/O telling/O him/O of/O her/O love/O,/O she/O would/O have/O to/O prove/O to/O him/O that/O he/O
had/O been/O wrong/O in/O his/O treatment/O of/O her/O./O Without/O waking/O him/O,/O she/O went/O
back/O,/O and/O after/O a/O second/O dose/O of/O opium/O she/O fell/O towards/O morning/O into/O a/O
heavy/O,/O incomplete/O sleep/O,/O during/O which/O she/O never/O quite/O lost/O
consciousness/O./O

In/O the/O morning/O she/O was/O waked/O by/O a/O horrible/O nightmare/O,/O which/O had/O recurred/O
several/O times/O in/O her/O dreams/O,/O even/O before/O her/O connection/O with/O Vronsky/O./O A/O
little/O old/O man/O with/O unkempt/O beard/O was/O doing/O something/O bent/O down/O over/O
some/O iron/O,/O muttering/O meaningless/O French/O words/O,/O and/O she/O,/O as/O she/O always/O
did/O in/O this/O nightmare/O -LRB-/Oit/O was/O what/O made/O the/O horror/O of/O it/O-RRB-/O,/O felt/O that/O
this/O peasant/O was/O taking/O no/O notice/O of/O her/O,/O but/O was/O doing/O something/O
horrible/O with/O the/O iron/O--/Oover/O her/O./O And/O she/O waked/O up/O in/O a/O cold/O sweat/O./O

When/O she/O got/O up/O,/O the/O previous/O day/O came/O back/O to/O her/O as/O though/O veiled/O in/O
mist/O./O

``/OThere/O was/O a/O quarrel/O./O Just/O what/O has/O happened/O several/O times/O./O I/O said/O I/O had/O
a/O headache/O,/O and/O he/O did/O not/O come/O in/O to/O see/O me/O./O Tomorrow/O we/O're/O going/O away/O;/O
I/O must/O see/O him/O and/O get/O ready/O for/O the/O journey/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O./O And/O
learning/O that/O he/O was/O in/O his/O study/O,/O she/O went/O down/O to/O him/O./O As/O she/O passed/O
through/O the/O drawing/O room/O she/O heard/O a/O carriage/O stop/O at/O the/O entrance/O,/O and/O
looking/O out/O of/O the/O window/O she/O saw/O the/O carriage/O,/O from/O which/O a/O young/O girl/O
in/O a/O lilac/O hat/O was/O leaning/O out/O giving/O some/O direction/O to/O the/O footman/O
ringing/O the/O bell/O./O After/O a/O parley/O in/O the/O hall/O,/O someone/O came/O upstairs/O,/O and/O
Vronsky/O's/O steps/O could/O be/O heard/O passing/O the/O drawing/O room/O./O He/O went/O rapidly/O
downstairs/O./O Anna/PERSON went/O again/O to/O the/O window/O./O She/O saw/O him/O come/O out/O onto/O the/O
steps/O without/O his/O hat/O and/O go/O up/O to/O the/O carriage/O./O The/O young/O girl/O in/O the/O
lilac/O hat/O handed/O him/O a/O parcel/O./O Vronsky/O,/O smiling/O,/O said/O something/O to/O her/O./O
The/O carriage/O drove/O away/O,/O he/O ran/O rapidly/O upstairs/O again/O./O

The/O mists/O that/O had/O shrouded/O everything/O in/O her/O soul/O parted/O suddenly/O./O The/O
feelings/O of/O yesterday/O pierced/O the/O sick/O heart/O with/O a/O fresh/O pang/O./O She/O
could/O not/O understand/O now/O how/O she/O could/O have/O lowered/O herself/O by/O spending/O
a/O whole/O day/O with/O him/O in/O his/O house/O./O She/O went/O into/O his/O room/O to/O announce/O
her/O determination/O./O

``/OThat/O was/O Madame/PERSON Sorokina/PERSON and/O her/O daughter/O./O They/O came/O and/O brought/O me/O the/O
money/O and/O the/O deeds/O from/O maman/O./O I/O could/On't/O get/O them/O yesterday/O./O How/O is/O
your/O head/O,/O better/O?/O''/O he/O said/O quietly/O,/O not/O wishing/O to/O see/O and/O to/O
understand/O the/O gloomy/O and/O solemn/O expression/O of/O her/O face/O./O

She/O looked/O silently/O,/O intently/O at/O him/O,/O standing/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O
room/O./O He/O glanced/O at/O her/O,/O frowned/O for/O a/O moment/O,/O and/O went/O on/O reading/O a/O
letter/O./O She/O turned/O,/O and/O went/O deliberately/O out/O of/O the/O room/O./O He/O still/O
might/O have/O turned/O her/O back/O,/O but/O she/O had/O reached/O the/O door/O,/O he/O was/O still/O
silent/O,/O and/O the/O only/O sound/O audible/O was/O the/O rustling/O of/O the/O note/O paper/O as/O
he/O turned/O it/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O by/O the/O way/O,/O''/O he/O said/O at/O the/O very/O moment/O she/O was/O in/O the/O doorway/O,/O
``/Owe/O're/O going/O tomorrow/O for/O certain/O,/O are/On't/O we/O?/O''/O

``/OYou/O,/O but/O not/O I/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O turning/O round/O to/O him/O./O

``/OAnna/PERSON,/O we/O ca/On't/O go/O on/O like/O this/O.../O''/O

``/OYou/O,/O but/O not/O I/O,/O''/O she/O repeated/O./O

``/OThis/O is/O getting/O unbearable/O!/O''/O

``/OYou/O .../O you/O will/O be/O sorry/O for/O this/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O went/O out/O./O

Frightened/O by/O the/O desperate/O expression/O with/O which/O these/O words/O were/O
uttered/O,/O he/O jumped/O up/O and/O would/O have/O run/O after/O her/O,/O but/O on/O second/O
thoughts/O he/O sat/O down/O and/O scowled/O,/O setting/O his/O teeth/O./O This/O vulgar/O--/Oas/O he/O
thought/O it/O--/Othreat/O of/O something/O vague/O exasperated/O him/O./O ``/OI/O've/O tried/O
everything/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O;/O ``/Othe/O only/O thing/O left/O is/O not/O to/O pay/O attention/O,/O''/O
and/O he/O began/O to/O get/O ready/O to/O drive/O into/O town/O,/O and/O again/O to/O his/O mother/O's/O
to/O get/O her/O signature/O to/O the/O deeds/O./O

She/O heard/O the/O sound/O of/O his/O steps/O about/O the/O study/O and/O the/O dining/O room/O./O At/O
the/O drawing/O room/O he/O stood/O still/O./O But/O he/O did/O not/O turn/O in/O to/O see/O her/O,/O he/O
merely/O gave/O an/O order/O that/O the/O horse/O should/O be/O given/O to/O Voytov/PERSON if/O he/O came/O
while/O he/O was/O away/O./O Then/O she/O heard/O the/O carriage/O brought/O round/O,/O the/O door/O
opened/O,/O and/O he/O came/O out/O again/O./O But/O he/O went/O back/O into/O the/O porch/O again/O,/O
and/O someone/O was/O running/O upstairs/O./O It/O was/O the/O valet/O running/O up/O for/O his/O
gloves/O that/O had/O been/O forgotten/O./O She/O went/O to/O the/O window/O and/O saw/O him/O take/O
the/O gloves/O without/O looking/O,/O and/O touching/O the/O coachman/O on/O the/O back/O he/O
said/O something/O to/O him/O./O Then/O without/O looking/O up/O at/O the/O window/O he/O settled/O
himself/O in/O his/O usual/O attitude/O in/O the/O carriage/O,/O with/O his/O legs/O crossed/O,/O
and/O drawing/O on/O his/O gloves/O he/O vanished/O round/O the/O corner/O./O



Chapter/O 27/O


``/OHe/O has/O gone/O!/O It/O is/O over/O!/O''/O Anna/PERSON said/O to/O herself/O,/O standing/O at/O the/O window/O;/O
and/O in/O answer/O to/O this/O statement/O the/O impression/O of/O the/O darkness/O when/O the/O
candle/O had/O flickered/O out/O,/O and/O of/O her/O fearful/O dream/O mingling/O into/O one/O,/O
filled/O her/O heart/O with/O cold/O terror/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O that/O can/Onot/O be/O!/O''/O she/O cried/O,/O and/O crossing/O the/O room/O she/O rang/O the/O
bell/O./O She/O was/O so/O afraid/O now/O of/O being/O alone/O,/O that/O without/O waiting/O for/O the/O
servant/O to/O come/O in/O,/O she/O went/O out/O to/O meet/O him/O./O

``/OInquire/O where/O the/O count/O has/O gone/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O The/O servant/O answered/O that/O
the/O count/O had/O gone/O to/O the/O stable/O./O

``/OHis/O honor/O left/O word/O that/O if/O you/O cared/O to/O drive/O out/O,/O the/O carriage/O would/O
be/O back/O immediately/O./O''/O

``/OVery/O good/O./O Wait/O a/O minute/O./O I/O'll/O write/O a/O note/O at/O once/O./O Send/O Mihail/PERSON with/O
the/O note/O to/O the/O stables/O./O Make/O haste/O./O''/O

She/O sat/O down/O and/O wrote/O:/O

``/OI/O was/O wrong/O./O Come/O back/O home/O;/O I/O must/O explain/O./O For/O God/O's/O sake/O come/O!/O I/O'm/O
afraid/O./O''/O

She/O sealed/O it/O up/O and/O gave/O it/O to/O the/O servant/O./O

She/O was/O afraid/O of/O being/O left/O alone/O now/O;/O she/O followed/O the/O servant/O out/O of/O
the/O room/O,/O and/O went/O to/O the/O nursery/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O this/O is/On't/O it/O,/O this/O is/On't/O he/O!/O Where/O are/O his/O blue/O eyes/O,/O his/O sweet/O,/O
shy/O smile/O?/O''/O was/O her/O first/O thought/O when/O she/O saw/O her/O chubby/O,/O rosy/O little/O
girl/O with/O her/O black/O,/O curly/O hair/O instead/O of/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O whom/O in/O the/O tangle/O
of/O her/O ideas/O she/O had/O expected/O to/O see/O in/O the/O nursery/O./O The/O little/O girl/O
sitting/O at/O the/O table/O was/O obstinately/O and/O violently/O battering/O on/O it/O with/O
a/O cork/O,/O and/O staring/O aimlessly/O at/O her/O mother/O with/O her/O pitch-black/O eyes/O./O
Answering/O the/O English/O nurse/O that/O she/O was/O quite/O well/O,/O and/O that/O she/O was/O
going/O to/O the/O country/O tomorrow/O,/O Anna/PERSON sat/O down/O by/O the/O little/O girl/O and/O
began/O spinning/O the/O cork/O to/O show/O her/O./O But/O the/O child/O's/O loud/O,/O ringing/O
laugh/O,/O and/O the/O motion/O of/O her/O eyebrows/O,/O recalled/O Vronsky/O so/O vividly/O that/O
she/O got/O up/O hurriedly/O,/O restraining/O her/O sobs/O,/O and/O went/O away/O./O ``/OCan/O it/O be/O
all/O over/O?/O No/O,/O it/O can/Onot/O be/O!/O''/O she/O thought/O./O ``/OHe/O will/O come/O back/O./O But/O how/O
can/O he/O explain/O that/O smile/O,/O that/O excitement/O after/O he/O had/O been/O talking/O to/O
her/O?/O But/O even/O if/O he/O does/On't/O explain/O,/O I/O will/O believe/O./O If/O I/O do/On't/O believe/O,/O
there/O's/O only/O one/O thing/O left/O for/O me/O,/O and/O I/O ca/On't/O./O''/O

She/O looked/O at/O her/O watch/O./O Twenty/O minutes/O had/O passed/O./O ``/OBy/O now/O he/O has/O
received/O the/O note/O and/O is/O coming/O back/O./O Not/O long/O,/O ten/O minutes/O more/O.../O./O But/O
what/O if/O he/O does/On't/O come/O?/O No/O,/O that/O can/Onot/O be/O./O He/O must/On't/O see/O me/O with/O
tear-stained/O eyes/O./O I/O'll/O go/O and/O wash/O./O Yes/O,/O yes/O;/O did/O I/O do/O my/O hair/O or/O not/O?/O''/O
she/O asked/O herself/O./O And/O she/O could/O not/O remember/O./O She/O felt/O her/O head/O with/O
her/O hand/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O my/O hair/O has/O been/O done/O,/O but/O when/O I/O did/O it/O I/O ca/On't/O in/O the/O
least/O remember/O./O''/O She/O could/O not/O believe/O the/O evidence/O of/O her/O hand/O,/O and/O
went/O up/O to/O the/O pier/O glass/O to/O see/O whether/O she/O really/O had/O done/O her/O hair/O./O
She/O certainly/O had/O,/O but/O she/O could/O not/O think/O when/O she/O had/O done/O it/O./O ``/OWho/O's/O
that/O?/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O looking/O in/O the/O looking/O glass/O at/O the/O swollen/O face/O
with/O strangely/O glittering/O eyes/O,/O that/O looked/O in/O a/O scared/O way/O at/O her/O./O
``/OWhy/O,/O it/O's/O I/O!/O''/O she/O suddenly/O understood/O,/O and/O looking/O round/O,/O she/O seemed/O
all/O at/O once/O to/O feel/O his/O kisses/O on/O her/O,/O and/O twitched/O her/O shoulders/O,/O
shuddering/O./O Then/O she/O lifted/O her/O hand/O to/O her/O lips/O and/O kissed/O it/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O?/O Why/O,/O I/O'm/O going/O out/O of/O my/O mind/O!/O''/O and/O she/O went/O into/O her/O
bedroom/O,/O where/O Annushka/PERSON was/O tidying/O the/O room/O./O

``/OAnnushka/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O coming/O to/O a/O standstill/O before/O her/O,/O and/O she/O stared/O
at/O the/O maid/O,/O not/O knowing/O what/O to/O say/O to/O her/O./O

``/OYou/O meant/O to/O go/O and/O see/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O''/O said/O the/O girl/O,/O as/O though/O
she/O understood/O./O

``/ODarya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON?/O Yes/O,/O I/O'll/O go/O./O''/O

``/OFifteen/O minutes/O there/O,/O fifteen/O minutes/O back/O./O He/O's/O coming/O,/O he/O'll/O be/O here/O
soon/O./O''/O She/O took/O out/O her/O watch/O and/O looked/O at/O it/O./O ``/OBut/O how/O could/O he/O go/O
away/O,/O leaving/O me/O in/O such/O a/O state/O?/O How/O can/O he/O live/O,/O without/O making/O it/O up/O
with/O me/O?/O''/O She/O went/O to/O the/O window/O and/O began/O looking/O into/O the/O street/O./O
Judging/O by/O the/O time/O,/O he/O might/O be/O back/O now/O./O But/O her/O calculations/O might/O be/O
wrong/O,/O and/O she/O began/O once/O more/O to/O recall/O when/O he/O had/O started/O and/O to/O
count/O the/O minutes/O./O

At/O the/O moment/O when/O she/O had/O moved/O away/O to/O the/O big/O clock/O to/O compare/O it/O
with/O her/O watch/O,/O someone/O drove/O up/O./O Glancing/O out/O of/O the/O window/O,/O she/O saw/O
his/O carriage/O./O But/O no/O one/O came/O upstairs/O,/O and/O voices/O could/O be/O heard/O below/O./O
It/O was/O the/O messenger/O who/O had/O come/O back/O in/O the/O carriage/O./O She/O went/O down/O to/O
him/O./O

``/OWe/O did/On't/O catch/O the/O count/O./O The/O count/O had/O driven/O off/O on/O the/O lower/O city/O
road/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O say/O?/O What/O!/O.../O''/O she/O said/O to/O the/O rosy/O,/O good-humored/O Mihail/PERSON,/O
as/O he/O handed/O her/O back/O her/O note/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O then/O,/O he/O has/O never/O received/O it/O!/O''/O she/O thought/O./O

``/OGo/O with/O this/O note/O to/O Countess/O Vronskaya/PERSON's/O place/O,/O you/O know/O?/O and/O bring/O an/O
answer/O back/O immediately/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O the/O messenger/O./O

``/OAnd/O I/O,/O what/O am/O I/O going/O to/O do/O?/O''/O she/O thought/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O I/O'm/O going/O to/O Dolly/PERSON's/O,/O
that/O's/O true/O or/O else/O I/O shall/O go/O out/O of/O my/O mind/O./O Yes/O,/O and/O I/O can/O telegraph/O,/O
too/O./O''/O And/O she/O wrote/O a/O telegram/O./O ``/OI/O absolutely/O must/O talk/O to/O you/O;/O come/O at/O
once/O./O''/O After/O sending/O off/O the/O telegram/O,/O she/O went/O to/O dress/O./O When/O she/O was/O
dressed/O and/O in/O her/O hat/O,/O she/O glanced/O again/O into/O the/O eyes/O of/O the/O plump/O,/O
comfortable-looking/O Annushka/LOCATION./O There/O was/O unmistakable/O sympathy/O in/O those/O
good-natured/O little/O gray/O eyes/O./O

``/OAnnushka/O,/O dear/O,/O what/O am/O I/O to/O do/O?/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O sobbing/O and/O sinking/O
helplessly/O into/O a/O chair/O./O

``/OWhy/O fret/O yourself/O so/O,/O Anna/PERSON Arkadyevna/PERSON?/O Why/O,/O there/O's/O nothing/O out/O of/O the/O
way/O./O You/O drive/O out/O a/O little/O,/O and/O it/O'll/O cheer/O you/O up/O,/O''/O said/O the/O maid/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O'm/O going/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON,/O rousing/O herself/O and/O getting/O up/O./O ``/OAnd/O if/O
there/O's/O a/O telegram/O while/O I/O'm/O away/O,/O send/O it/O on/O to/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON's/O
.../O but/O no/O,/O I/O shall/O be/O back/O myself/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O must/On't/O think/O,/O I/O must/O do/O something/O,/O drive/O somewhere/O,/O and/O most/O of/O
all/O,/O get/O out/O of/O this/O house/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O feeling/O with/O terror/O the/O strange/O
turmoil/O going/O on/O in/O her/O own/O heart/O,/O and/O she/O made/O haste/O to/O go/O out/O and/O get/O
into/O the/O carriage/O./O

``/OWhere/O to/O?/O''/O asked/O Pyotr/PERSON before/O getting/O onto/O the/O box/O./O

``/OTo/O Znamenka/LOCATION,/O the/O Oblonskys/O'/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 28/O


It/O was/O bright/O and/O sunny/O./O A/O fine/O rain/O had/O been/O falling/O all/O the/O morning/O,/O
and/O now/O it/O had/O not/O long/O cleared/O up/O./O The/O iron/O roofs/O,/O the/O flags/O of/O the/O
roads/O,/O the/O flints/O of/O the/O pavements/O,/O the/O wheels/O and/O leather/O,/O the/O brass/O
and/O the/O tinplate/O of/O the/O carriages/O--/Oall/O glistened/O brightly/O in/O the/O May/O
sunshine/O./O It/O was/O three/O o'clock/O,/O and/O the/O very/O liveliest/O time/O in/O the/O
streets/O./O

As/O she/O sat/O in/O a/O corner/O of/O the/O comfortable/O carriage/O,/O that/O hardly/O swayed/O
on/O its/O supple/O springs/O,/O while/O the/O grays/O trotted/O swiftly/O,/O in/O the/O midst/O of/O
the/O unceasing/O rattle/O of/O wheels/O and/O the/O changing/O impressions/O in/O the/O pure/O
air/O,/O Anna/PERSON ran/O over/O the/O events/O of/O the/O last/O days/O,/O and/O she/O saw/O her/O position/O
quite/O differently/O from/O how/O it/O had/O seemed/O at/O home/O./O Now/O the/O thought/O of/O
death/O seemed/O no/O longer/O so/O terrible/O and/O so/O clear/O to/O her/O,/O and/O death/O itself/O
no/O longer/O seemed/O so/O inevitable/O./O Now/O she/O blamed/O herself/O for/O the/O
humiliation/O to/O which/O she/O had/O lowered/O herself/O./O ``/OI/O entreat/O him/O to/O forgive/O
me/O./O I/O have/O given/O in/O to/O him/O./O I/O have/O owned/O myself/O in/O fault/O./O What/O for/O?/O
Ca/On't/O I/O live/O without/O him/O?/O''/O And/O leaving/O unanswered/O the/O question/O how/O she/O
was/O going/O to/O live/O without/O him/O,/O she/O fell/O to/O reading/O the/O signs/O on/O the/O
shops/O./O ``/OOffice/O and/O warehouse/O./O Dental/O surgeon/O./O Yes/O,/O I/O'll/O tell/O Dolly/PERSON all/O
about/O it/O./O She/O does/On't/O like/O Vronsky/O./O I/O shall/O be/O sick/O and/O ashamed/O,/O but/O
I/O'll/O tell/O her/O./O She/O loves/O me/O,/O and/O I/O'll/O follow/O her/O advice/O./O I/O wo/On't/O give/O in/O
to/O him/O;/O I/O wo/On't/O let/O him/O train/O me/O as/O he/O pleases/O./O Filippov/PERSON,/O bun/O shop/O./O They/O
say/O they/O send/O their/O dough/O to/O Petersburg/LOCATION./O The/O Moscow/LOCATION water/O is/O so/O good/O for/O
it/O./O Ah/O,/O the/O springs/O at/O Mitishtchen/LOCATION,/O and/O the/O pancakes/O!/O''/O

And/O she/O remembered/O how/O,/O long/O,/O long/O ago/O,/O when/O she/O was/O a/O girl/O of/O
seventeen/O,/O she/O had/O gone/O with/O her/O aunt/O to/O Troitsa/LOCATION./O ``/ORiding/O,/O too/O./O Was/O that/O
really/O me/O,/O with/O red/O hands/O?/O How/O much/O that/O seemed/O to/O me/O then/O splendid/O and/O
out/O of/O reach/O has/O become/O worthless/O,/O while/O what/O I/O had/O then/O has/O gone/O out/O of/O
my/O reach/O forever/O!/O Could/O I/O ever/O have/O believed/O then/O that/O I/O could/O come/O to/O
