such/O humiliation/O?/O How/O conceited/O and/O self-satisfied/O he/O will/O be/O when/O he/O
gets/O my/O note/O!/O But/O I/O will/O show/O him/O.../O./O How/O horrid/O that/O paint/O smells/O!/O Why/O
is/O it/O they/O're/O always/O painting/O and/O building/O?/O _/OModes/O et/O robes/O,/O_/O''/O she/O read/O./O
A/O man/O bowed/O to/O her/O./O It/O was/O Annushka/PERSON's/O husband/O./O ``/OOur/O parasites/O''/O;/O she/O
remembered/O how/O Vronsky/PERSON had/O said/O that/O./O ``/OOur/O?/O Why/O our/O?/O What/O's/O so/O awful/O is/O
that/O one/O ca/On't/O tear/O up/O the/O past/O by/O its/O roots/O./O One/O ca/On't/O tear/O it/O out/O,/O but/O
one/O can/O hide/O one/O's/O memory/O of/O it/O./O And/O I/O'll/O hide/O it/O./O''/O And/O then/O she/O thought/O
of/O her/O past/O with/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O of/O how/O she/O had/O blotted/O the/O
memory/O of/O it/O out/O of/O her/O life/O./O ``/ODolly/PERSON will/O think/O I/O'm/O leaving/O my/O second/O
husband/O,/O and/O so/O I/O certainly/O must/O be/O in/O the/O wrong/O./O As/O if/O I/O cared/O to/O be/O
right/O!/O I/O ca/On't/O help/O it/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O she/O wanted/O to/O cry/O./O But/O at/O once/O
she/O fell/O to/O wondering/O what/O those/O two/O girls/O could/O be/O smiling/O about/O./O
``/OLove/O,/O most/O likely/O./O They/O do/On't/O know/O how/O dreary/O it/O is/O,/O how/O low/O.../O./O The/O
boulevard/O and/O the/O children/O./O Three/O boys/O running/O,/O playing/O at/O horses/O./O
Seryozha/PERSON!/O And/O I/O'm/O losing/O everything/O and/O not/O getting/O him/O back/O./O Yes/O,/O I/O'm/O
losing/O everything/O,/O if/O he/O does/On't/O return/O./O Perhaps/O he/O was/O late/O for/O the/O
train/O and/O has/O come/O back/O by/O now/O./O Longing/O for/O humiliation/O again/O!/O''/O she/O said/O
to/O herself/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O I/O'll/O go/O to/O Dolly/PERSON,/O and/O say/O straight/O out/O to/O her/O,/O I/O'm/O
unhappy/O,/O I/O deserve/O this/O,/O I/O'm/O to/O blame/O,/O but/O still/O I/O'm/O unhappy/O,/O help/O me/O./O
These/O horses/O,/O this/O carriage/O--/Ohow/O loathsome/O I/O am/O to/O myself/O in/O this/O
carriage/O--/Oall/O his/O;/O but/O I/O wo/On't/O see/O them/O again/O./O''/O

Thinking/O over/O the/O words/O in/O which/O she/O would/O tell/O Dolly/PERSON,/O and/O mentally/O
working/O her/O heart/O up/O to/O great/O bitterness/O,/O Anna/PERSON went/O upstairs/O./O

``/OIs/O there/O anyone/O with/O her/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O in/O the/O hall/O./O

``/OKaterina/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON Levin/PERSON,/O''/O answered/O the/O footman/O./O

``/OKitty/O!/O Kitty/PERSON,/O whom/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O in/O love/O with/O!/O''/O thought/O Anna/PERSON,/O ``/Othe/O girl/O
he/O thinks/O of/O with/O love/O./O He/O's/O sorry/O he/O did/On't/O marry/O her/O./O But/O me/O he/O thinks/O
of/O with/O hatred/O,/O and/O is/O sorry/O he/O had/O anything/O to/O do/O with/O me/O./O''/O

The/O sisters/O were/O having/O a/O consultation/O about/O nursing/O when/O Anna/PERSON called/O./O
Dolly/PERSON went/O down/O alone/O to/O see/O the/O visitor/O who/O had/O interrupted/O their/O
conversation/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O so/O you/O've/O not/O gone/O away/O yet/O?/O I/O meant/O to/O have/O come/O to/O you/O,/O''/O she/O
said/O;/O ``/OI/O had/O a/O letter/O from/O Stiva/LOCATION today/O./O''/O

``/OWe/O had/O a/O telegram/O too/O,/O''/O answered/O Anna/PERSON,/O looking/O round/O for/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OHe/O writes/O that/O he/O ca/On't/O make/O out/O quite/O what/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON
wants/O,/O but/O he/O wo/On't/O go/O away/O without/O a/O decisive/O answer/O./O''/O

``/OI/O thought/O you/O had/O someone/O with/O you/O./O Can/O I/O see/O the/O letter/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O;/O Kitty/PERSON,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O embarrassed/O./O ``/OShe/O stayed/O in/O the/O nursery/O./O She/O
has/O been/O very/O ill/O./O''/O

``/OSo/O I/O heard/O./O May/O I/O see/O the/O letter/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O'll/O get/O it/O directly/O./O But/O he/O does/On't/O refuse/O;/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O Stiva/PERSON has/O
hopes/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O stopping/O in/O the/O doorway/O./O

``/OI/O have/On't/O,/O and/O indeed/O I/O do/On't/O wish/O it/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OWhat/O's/O this/O?/O Does/O Kitty/PERSON consider/O it/O degrading/O to/O meet/O me/O?/O''/O thought/O Anna/PERSON
when/O she/O was/O alone/O./O ``/OPerhaps/O she/O's/O right/O,/O too/O./O But/O it/O's/O not/O for/O her/O,/O the/O
girl/O who/O was/O in/O love/O with/O Vronsky/O,/O it/O's/O not/O for/O her/O to/O show/O me/O that/O,/O
even/O if/O it/O is/O true/O./O I/O know/O that/O in/O my/O position/O I/O ca/On't/O be/O received/O by/O
any/O decent/O woman/O./O I/O knew/O that/O from/O the/O first/O moment/O I/O sacrificed/O
everything/O to/O him/O./O And/O this/O is/O my/O reward/O!/O Oh/O,/O how/O I/O hate/O him/O!/O And/O what/O
did/O I/O come/O here/O for/O?/O I/O'm/O worse/O here/O,/O more/O miserable/O./O''/O She/O heard/O from/O the/O
next/O room/O the/O sisters/O'/O voices/O in/O consultation/O./O ``/OAnd/O what/O am/O I/O going/O to/O
say/O to/O Dolly/PERSON now/O?/O Amuse/O Kitty/PERSON by/O the/O sight/O of/O my/O wretchedness/O,/O submit/O to/O
her/O patronizing/O?/O No/O;/O and/O besides/O,/O Dolly/PERSON would/On't/O understand/O./O And/O it/O
would/O be/O no/O good/O my/O telling/O her/O./O It/O would/O only/O be/O interesting/O to/O see/O
Kitty/PERSON,/O to/O show/O her/O how/O I/O despise/O everyone/O and/O everything/O,/O how/O nothing/O
matters/O to/O me/O now/O./O''/O

Dolly/PERSON came/O in/O with/O the/O letter/O./O Anna/PERSON read/O it/O and/O handed/O it/O back/O in/O
silence/O./O

``/OI/O knew/O all/O that/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O ``/Oand/O it/O does/On't/O interest/O me/O in/O the/O least/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O why/O so/O?/O On/O the/O contrary/O,/O I/O have/O hopes/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O looking/O
inquisitively/O at/O Anna/PERSON./O She/O had/O never/O seen/O her/O in/O such/O a/O strangely/O
irritable/O condition/O./O ``/OWhen/O are/O you/O going/O away/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O./O

Anna/PERSON,/O half-closing/O her/O eyes/O,/O looked/O straight/O before/O her/O and/O did/O not/O
answer/O./O

``/OWhy/O does/O Kitty/PERSON shrink/O from/O me/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O looking/O at/O the/O door/O and/O
flushing/O red/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O what/O nonsense/O!/O She/O's/O nursing/O,/O and/O things/O are/On't/O going/O right/O with/O
her/O,/O and/O I/O've/O been/O advising/O her/O.../O./O She/O's/O delighted/O./O She/O'll/O be/O here/O in/O a/O
minute/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON awkwardly/O,/O not/O clever/O at/O lying/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O here/O she/O is/O./O''/O

Hearing/O that/O Anna/PERSON had/O called/O,/O Kitty/PERSON had/O wanted/O not/O to/O appear/O,/O but/O Dolly/PERSON
persuaded/O her/O./O Rallying/O her/O forces/O,/O Kitty/PERSON went/O in/O,/O walked/O up/O to/O her/O,/O
blushing/O,/O and/O shook/O hands/O./O

``/OI/O am/O so/O glad/O to/O see/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O with/O a/O trembling/O voice/O./O

Kitty/PERSON had/O been/O thrown/O into/O confusion/O by/O the/O inward/O conflict/O between/O her/O
antagonism/O to/O this/O bad/O woman/O and/O her/O desire/O to/O be/O nice/O to/O her/O./O But/O as/O
soon/O as/O she/O saw/O Anna/PERSON's/O lovely/O and/O attractive/O face/O,/O all/O feeling/O of/O
antagonism/O disappeared/O./O

``/OI/O should/O not/O have/O been/O surprised/O if/O you/O had/O not/O cared/O to/O meet/O me/O./O I/O'm/O
used/O to/O everything/O./O You/O have/O been/O ill/O?/O Yes/O,/O you/O are/O changed/O,/O''/O said/O Anna/PERSON./O

Kitty/PERSON felt/O that/O Anna/PERSON was/O looking/O at/O her/O with/O hostile/O eyes/O./O She/O ascribed/O
this/O hostility/O to/O the/O awkward/O position/O in/O which/O Anna/PERSON,/O who/O had/O once/O
patronized/O her/O,/O must/O feel/O with/O her/O now/O,/O and/O she/O felt/O sorry/O for/O her/O./O

They/O talked/O of/O Kitty/PERSON's/O illness/O,/O of/O the/O baby/O,/O of/O Stiva/LOCATION,/O but/O it/O was/O
obvious/O that/O nothing/O interested/O Anna/PERSON./O

``/OI/O came/O to/O say/O good-bye/O to/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O getting/O up/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O when/O are/O you/O going/O?/O''/O

But/O again/O not/O answering/O,/O Anna/PERSON turned/O to/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O am/O very/O glad/O to/O have/O seen/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O with/O a/O smile/O./O ``/OI/O have/O
heard/O so/O much/O of/O you/O from/O everyone/O,/O even/O from/O your/O husband/O./O He/O came/O to/O
see/O me/O,/O and/O I/O liked/O him/O exceedingly/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O unmistakably/O with/O
malicious/O intent/O./O ``/OWhere/O is/O he/O?/O''/O

``/OHe/O has/O gone/O back/O to/O the/O country/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O blushing/O./O

``/ORemember/O me/O to/O him/O,/O be/O sure/O you/O do/O./O''/O

``/OI/O'll/O be/O sure/O to/O!/O''/O Kitty/PERSON said/O naïvely/O,/O looking/O compassionately/O into/O her/O
eyes/O./O

``/OSo/O good-bye/O,/O Dolly/PERSON./O''/O And/O kissing/O Dolly/PERSON and/O shaking/O hands/O with/O Kitty/PERSON,/O
Anna/PERSON went/O out/O hurriedly/O./O

``/OShe/O's/O just/O the/O same/O and/O just/O as/O charming/O!/O She/O's/O very/O lovely/O!/O''/O said/O
Kitty/PERSON,/O when/O she/O was/O alone/O with/O her/O sister/O./O ``/OBut/O there/O's/O something/O
piteous/O about/O her/O./O Awfully/O piteous/O!/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O there/O's/O something/O unusual/O about/O her/O today/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O ``/OWhen/O I/O
went/O with/O her/O into/O the/O hall/O,/O I/O fancied/O she/O was/O almost/O crying/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 29/O


Anna/PERSON got/O into/O the/O carriage/O again/O in/O an/O even/O worse/O frame/O of/O mind/O than/O
when/O she/O set/O out/O from/O home/O./O To/O her/O previous/O tortures/O was/O added/O now/O that/O
sense/O of/O mortification/O and/O of/O being/O an/O outcast/O which/O she/O had/O felt/O so/O
distinctly/O on/O meeting/O Kitty/PERSON./O

``/OWhere/O to/O?/O Home/O?/O''/O asked/O Pyotr/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O home/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O not/O even/O thinking/O now/O where/O she/O was/O going/O./O

``/OHow/O they/O looked/O at/O me/O as/O something/O dreadful/O,/O incomprehensible/O,/O and/O
curious/O!/O What/O can/O he/O be/O telling/O the/O other/O with/O such/O warmth/O?/O''/O she/O
thought/O,/O staring/O at/O two/O men/O who/O walked/O by/O./O ``/OCan/O one/O ever/O tell/O anyone/O
what/O one/O is/O feeling/O?/O I/O meant/O to/O tell/O Dolly/PERSON,/O and/O it/O's/O a/O good/O thing/O I/O
did/On't/O tell/O her/O./O How/O pleased/O she/O would/O have/O been/O at/O my/O misery/O!/O She/O would/O
have/O concealed/O it/O,/O but/O her/O chief/O feeling/O would/O have/O been/O delight/O at/O my/O
being/O punished/O for/O the/O happiness/O she/O envied/O me/O for/O./O Kitty/PERSON,/O she/O would/O
have/O been/O even/O more/O pleased/O./O How/O I/O can/O see/O through/O her/O!/O She/O knows/O I/O was/O
more/O than/O usually/O sweet/O to/O her/O husband/O./O And/O she/O's/O jealous/O and/O hates/O me/O./O
And/O she/O despises/O me/O./O In/O her/O eyes/O I/O'm/O an/O immoral/O woman/O./O If/O I/O were/O an/O
immoral/O woman/O I/O could/O have/O made/O her/O husband/O fall/O in/O love/O with/O me/O .../O if/O
I/O'd/O cared/O to/O./O And/O,/O indeed/O,/O I/O did/O care/O to/O./O There/O's/O someone/O who/O's/O pleased/O
with/O himself/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O as/O she/O saw/O a/O fat/O,/O rubicund/O gentleman/O coming/O
towards/O her/O./O He/O took/O her/O for/O an/O acquaintance/O,/O and/O lifted/O his/O glossy/O hat/O
above/O his/O bald/O,/O glossy/O head/O,/O and/O then/O perceived/O his/O mistake/O./O ``/OHe/O thought/O
he/O knew/O me/O./O Well/O,/O he/O knows/O me/O as/O well/O as/O anyone/O in/O the/O world/O knows/O me/O./O I/O
do/On't/O know/O myself/O./O I/O know/O my/O appetites/O,/O as/O the/O French/O say/O./O They/O want/O
that/O dirty/O ice/O cream/O,/O that/O they/O do/O know/O for/O certain/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O
looking/O at/O two/O boys/O stopping/O an/O ice/O cream/O seller/O,/O who/O took/O a/O barrel/O off/O
his/O head/O and/O began/O wiping/O his/O perspiring/O face/O with/O a/O towel/O./O ``/OWe/O all/O want/O
what/O is/O sweet/O and/O nice/O./O If/O not/O sweetmeats/O,/O then/O a/O dirty/O ice/O./O And/O Kitty/PERSON's/O
the/O same/O--/Oif/O not/O Vronsky/O,/O then/O Levin/PERSON./O And/O she/O envies/O me/O,/O and/O hates/O me/O./O
And/O we/O all/O hate/O each/O other/O./O I/O Kitty/PERSON,/O Kitty/PERSON me/O./O Yes/O,/O that/O's/O the/O truth/O./O
`/O_/OTiutkin/PERSON,/O coiffeur/O./O_/O'/O _/OJe/O me/O fais/O coiffer/O par/O Tiutkin/O.../O_/O I/O'll/O tell/O
him/O that/O when/O he/O comes/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O and/O smiled/O./O But/O the/O same/O instant/O
she/O remembered/O that/O she/O had/O no/O one/O now/O to/O tell/O anything/O amusing/O to/O./O ``/OAnd/O
there/O's/O nothing/O amusing/O,/O nothing/O mirthful/O,/O really/O./O It/O's/O all/O hateful/O./O
They/O're/O singing/O for/O vespers/O,/O and/O how/O carefully/O that/O merchant/O crosses/O
himself/O!/O as/O if/O he/O were/O afraid/O of/O missing/O something/O./O Why/O these/O churches/O
and/O this/O singing/O and/O this/O humbug/O?/O Simply/O to/O conceal/O that/O we/O all/O hate/O
each/O other/O like/O these/O cab/O drivers/O who/O are/O abusing/O each/O other/O so/O angrily/O./O
Yashvin/PERSON says/O,/O `/OHe/O wants/O to/O strip/O me/O of/O my/O shirt/O,/O and/O I/O him/O of/O his/O./O'/O Yes/O,/O
that/O's/O the/O truth/O!/O''/O

She/O was/O plunged/O in/O these/O thoughts/O,/O which/O so/O engrossed/O her/O that/O she/O left/O
off/O thinking/O of/O her/O own/O position/O,/O when/O the/O carriage/O drew/O up/O at/O the/O steps/O
of/O her/O house/O./O It/O was/O only/O when/O she/O saw/O the/O porter/O running/O out/O to/O meet/O
her/O that/O she/O remembered/O she/O had/O sent/O the/O note/O and/O the/O telegram/O./O

``/OIs/O there/O an/O answer/O?/O''/O she/O inquired/O./O

``/OI/O'll/O see/O this/O minute/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O porter/O,/O and/O glancing/O into/O his/O room/O,/O
he/O took/O out/O and/O gave/O her/O the/O thin/O square/O envelope/O of/O a/O telegram/O./O ``/OI/O
ca/On't/O come/O before/O ten/O o'clock/O./O--/PERSONVronsky/PERSON,/O''/O she/O read/O./O

``/OAnd/O has/On't/O the/O messenger/O come/O back/O?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O''/O answered/O the/O porter/O./O

``/OThen/O,/O since/O it/O's/O so/O,/O I/O know/O what/O I/O must/O do/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O feeling/O a/O
vague/O fury/O and/O craving/O for/O revenge/O rising/O up/O within/O her/O,/O she/O ran/O
upstairs/O./O ``/OI/O'll/O go/O to/O him/O myself/O./O Before/O going/O away/O forever/O,/O I/O'll/O tell/O
him/O all/O./O Never/O have/O I/O hated/O anyone/O as/O I/O hate/O that/O man/O!/O''/O she/O thought/O./O
Seeing/O his/O hat/O on/O the/O rack/O,/O she/O shuddered/O with/O aversion/O./O She/O did/O not/O
consider/O that/O his/O telegram/O was/O an/O answer/O to/O her/O telegram/O and/O that/O he/O had/O
not/O yet/O received/O her/O note/O./O She/O pictured/O him/O to/O herself/O as/O talking/O calmly/O
to/O his/O mother/O and/O Princess/O Sorokina/PERSON and/O rejoicing/O at/O her/O sufferings/O./O
``/OYes/O,/O I/O must/O go/O quickly/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O not/O knowing/O yet/O where/O she/O was/O going/O./O
She/O longed/O to/O get/O away/O as/O quickly/O as/O possible/O from/O the/O feelings/O she/O had/O
gone/O through/O in/O that/O awful/O house/O./O The/O servants/O,/O the/O walls/O,/O the/O things/O in/O
that/O house/O--/Oall/O aroused/O repulsion/O and/O hatred/O in/O her/O and/O lay/O like/O a/O weight/O
upon/O her/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O must/O go/O to/O the/O railway/O station/O,/O and/O if/O he/O's/O not/O there/O,/O then/O go/O
there/O and/O catch/O him/O./O''/O Anna/PERSON looked/O at/O the/O railway/O timetable/O in/O the/O
newspapers/O./O An/O evening/O train/O went/O at/O two/O minutes/O past/O eight/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O I/O
shall/O be/O in/O time/O./O''/O She/O gave/O orders/O for/O the/O other/O horses/O to/O be/O put/O in/O the/O
carriage/O,/O and/O packed/O in/O a/O traveling-bag/O the/O things/O needed/O for/O a/O few/O
days/O./O She/O knew/O she/O would/O never/O come/O back/O here/O again/O./O

Among/O the/O plans/O that/O came/O into/O her/O head/O she/O vaguely/O determined/O that/O
after/O what/O would/O happen/O at/O the/O station/O or/O at/O the/O countess/O's/O house/O,/O she/O
would/O go/O as/O far/O as/O the/O first/O town/O on/O the/O Nizhni/LOCATION road/O and/O stop/O there/O./O

Dinner/O was/O on/O the/O table/O;/O she/O went/O up/O,/O but/O the/O smell/O of/O the/O bread/O and/O
cheese/O was/O enough/O to/O make/O her/O feel/O that/O all/O food/O was/O disgusting/O./O She/O
ordered/O the/O carriage/O and/O went/O out/O./O The/O house/O threw/O a/O shadow/O now/O right/O
across/O the/O street/O,/O but/O it/O was/O a/O bright/O evening/O and/O still/O warm/O in/O the/O
sunshine/O./O Annushka/PERSON,/O who/O came/O down/O with/O her/O things/O,/O and/O Pyotr/PERSON,/O who/O put/O
the/O things/O in/O the/O carriage/O,/O and/O the/O coachman/O,/O evidently/O out/O of/O humor/O,/O
were/O all/O hateful/O to/O her/O,/O and/O irritated/O her/O by/O their/O words/O and/O actions/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O want/O you/O,/O Pyotr/PERSON./O''/O

``/OBut/O how/O about/O the/O ticket/O?/O''/O

``/OWell/O,/O as/O you/O like/O,/O it/O does/On't/O matter/O,/O''/O she/O said/O crossly/O./O

Pyotr/PERSON jumped/O on/O the/O box/O,/O and/O putting/O his/O arms/O akimbo/O,/O told/O the/O coachman/O
to/O drive/O to/O the/O booking-office/O./O



Chapter/O 30/O


``/OHere/O it/O is/O again/O!/O Again/O I/O understand/O it/O all/O!/O''/O Anna/PERSON said/O to/O herself/O,/O as/O
soon/O as/O the/O carriage/O had/O started/O and/O swaying/O lightly/O,/O rumbled/O over/O the/O
tiny/O cobbles/O of/O the/O paved/O road/O,/O and/O again/O one/O impression/O followed/O
rapidly/O upon/O another/O./O

``/OYes/O;/O what/O was/O the/O last/O thing/O I/O thought/O of/O so/O clearly/O?/O''/O she/O tried/O to/O
recall/O it/O./O ''/O`/O_/OTiutkin/PERSON,/O coiffeur/O?/O_/O'/O--/Ono/O,/O not/O that/O./O Yes/O,/O of/O what/O Yashvin/PERSON
says/O,/O the/O struggle/O for/O existence/O and/O hatred/O is/O the/O one/O thing/O that/O holds/O
men/O together/O./O No/O,/O it/O's/O a/O useless/O journey/O you/O're/O making/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O
mentally/O addressing/O a/O party/O in/O a/O coach/O and/O four/O,/O evidently/O going/O for/O an/O
excursion/O into/O the/O country/O./O ``/OAnd/O the/O dog/O you/O're/O taking/O with/O you/O will/O be/O
no/O help/O to/O you/O./O You/O ca/On't/O get/O away/O from/O yourselves/O./O''/O Turning/O her/O eyes/O in/O
the/O direction/O Pyotr/PERSON had/O turned/O to/O look/O,/O she/O saw/O a/O factory/O hand/O almost/O
dead/O drunk/O,/O with/O hanging/O head/O,/O being/O led/O away/O by/O a/O policeman/O./O ``/OCome/O,/O
he/O's/O found/O a/O quicker/O way/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O./O ``/OCount/O Vronsky/O and/O I/O did/O not/O
find/O that/O happiness/O either/O,/O though/O we/O expected/O so/O much/O from/O it/O./O''/O And/O now/O
for/O the/O first/O time/O Anna/PERSON turned/O that/O glaring/O light/O in/O which/O she/O was/O
seeing/O everything/O on/O to/O her/O relations/O with/O him/O,/O which/O she/O had/O hitherto/O
avoided/O thinking/O about/O./O ``/OWhat/O was/O it/O he/O sought/O in/O me/O?/O Not/O love/O so/O much/O
as/O the/O satisfaction/O of/O vanity/O./O''/O She/O remembered/O his/O words/O,/O the/O expression/O
of/O his/O face/O,/O that/O recalled/O an/O abject/O setter-dog/O,/O in/O the/O early/O days/O of/O
their/O connection/O./O And/O everything/O now/O confirmed/O this/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O there/O was/O the/O
triumph/O of/O success/O in/O him/O./O Of/O course/O there/O was/O love/O too/O,/O but/O the/O chief/O
element/O was/O the/O pride/O of/O success/O./O He/O boasted/O of/O me/O./O Now/O that/O's/O over/O./O
There/O's/O nothing/O to/O be/O proud/O of/O./O Not/O to/O be/O proud/O of/O,/O but/O to/O be/O ashamed/O
of/O./O He/O has/O taken/O from/O me/O all/O he/O could/O,/O and/O now/O I/O am/O no/O use/O to/O him/O./O He/O is/O
weary/O of/O me/O and/O is/O trying/O not/O to/O be/O dishonorable/O in/O his/O behavior/O to/O me/O./O
He/O let/O that/O out/O yesterday/O--/Ohe/O wants/O divorce/O and/O marriage/O so/O as/O to/O burn/O
his/O ships/O./O He/O loves/O me/O,/O but/O how/O?/O The/O zest/O is/O gone/O,/O as/O the/O English/O say/O./O
That/O fellow/O wants/O everyone/O to/O admire/O him/O and/O is/O very/O much/O pleased/O with/O
himself/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O looking/O at/O a/O red-faced/O clerk/O,/O riding/O on/O a/O riding/O
school/O horse/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O there/O's/O not/O the/O same/O flavor/O about/O me/O for/O him/O now/O./O If/O
I/O go/O away/O from/O him/O,/O at/O the/O bottom/O of/O his/O heart/O he/O will/O be/O glad/O./O''/O

This/O was/O not/O mere/O supposition/O,/O she/O saw/O it/O distinctly/O in/O the/O piercing/O
light/O,/O which/O revealed/O to/O her/O now/O the/O meaning/O of/O life/O and/O human/O
relations/O./O

``/OMy/O love/O keeps/O growing/O more/O passionate/O and/O egoistic/O,/O while/O his/O is/O waning/O
and/O waning/O,/O and/O that/O's/O why/O we/O're/O drifting/O apart/O./O''/O She/O went/O on/O musing/O./O
``/OAnd/O there/O's/O no/O help/O for/O it/O./O He/O is/O everything/O for/O me/O,/O and/O I/O want/O him/O
more/O and/O more/O to/O give/O himself/O up/O to/O me/O entirely/O./O And/O he/O wants/O more/O and/O
more/O to/O get/O away/O from/O me/O./O We/O walked/O to/O meet/O each/O other/O up/O to/O the/O time/O of/O
our/O love/O,/O and/O then/O we/O have/O been/O irresistibly/O drifting/O in/O different/O
directions/O./O And/O there/O's/O no/O altering/O that/O./O He/O tells/O me/O I/O'm/O insanely/O
jealous/O,/O and/O I/O have/O told/O myself/O that/O I/O am/O insanely/O jealous/O;/O but/O it/O's/O not/O
true/O./O I/O'm/O not/O jealous/O,/O but/O I/O'm/O unsatisfied/O./O But/O.../O''/O she/O opened/O her/O lips/O,/O
and/O shifted/O her/O place/O in/O the/O carriage/O in/O the/O excitement/O,/O aroused/O by/O the/O
thought/O that/O suddenly/O struck/O her/O./O ``/OIf/O I/O could/O be/O anything/O but/O a/O
mistress/O,/O passionately/O caring/O for/O nothing/O but/O his/O caresses/O;/O but/O I/O ca/On't/O
and/O I/O do/On't/O care/O to/O be/O anything/O else/O./O And/O by/O that/O desire/O I/O rouse/O
aversion/O in/O him/O,/O and/O he/O rouses/O fury/O in/O me/O,/O and/O it/O can/Onot/O be/O different/O./O
Do/On't/O I/O know/O that/O he/O would/On't/O deceive/O me/O,/O that/O he/O has/O no/O schemes/O about/O
Princess/O Sorokina/PERSON,/O that/O he/O's/O not/O in/O love/O with/O Kitty/PERSON,/O that/O he/O wo/On't/O
desert/O me/O!/O I/O know/O all/O that/O,/O but/O it/O makes/O it/O no/O better/O for/O me/O./O If/O without/O
loving/O me/O,/O from/O _/Oduty/O_/O he/O'll/O be/O good/O and/O kind/O to/O me/O,/O without/O what/O I/O
want/O,/O that/O's/O a/O thousand/O times/O worse/O than/O unkindness/O!/O That/O's/O--/Ohell/O!/O And/O
that/O's/O just/O how/O it/O is/O./O For/O a/O long/O while/O now/O he/O has/On't/O loved/O me/O./O And/O
where/O love/O ends/O,/O hate/O begins/O./O I/O do/On't/O know/O these/O streets/O at/O all/O./O Hills/O
it/O seems/O,/O and/O still/O houses/O,/O and/O houses/O .../O./O And/O in/O the/O houses/O always/O
people/O and/O people/O.../O./O How/O many/O of/O them/O,/O no/O end/O,/O and/O all/O hating/O each/O
other/O!/O Come/O,/O let/O me/O try/O and/O think/O what/O I/O want/O,/O to/O make/O me/O happy/O./O Well/O?/O
Suppose/O I/O am/O divorced/O,/O and/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON lets/O me/O have/O Seryozha/PERSON,/O
and/O I/O marry/O Vronsky/O./O''/O Thinking/O of/O Alexey/PERSON Alexandrovitch/PERSON,/O she/O at/O once/O
pictured/O him/O with/O extraordinary/O vividness/O as/O though/O he/O were/O alive/O before/O
her/O,/O with/O his/O mild/O,/O lifeless/O,/O dull/O eyes/O,/O the/O blue/O veins/O in/O his/O white/O
hands/O,/O his/O intonations/O and/O the/O cracking/O of/O his/O fingers/O,/O and/O remembering/O
the/O feeling/O which/O had/O existed/O between/O them/O,/O and/O which/O was/O also/O called/O
love/O,/O she/O shuddered/O with/O loathing/O./O ``/OWell/O,/O I/O'm/O divorced/O,/O and/O become/O
Vronsky/O's/O wife/O./O Well/O,/O will/O Kitty/PERSON cease/O looking/O at/O me/O as/O she/O looked/O at/O me/O
today/O?/O No/O./O And/O will/O Seryozha/PERSON leave/O off/O asking/O and/O wondering/O about/O my/O two/O
husbands/O?/O And/O is/O there/O any/O new/O feeling/O I/O can/O awaken/O between/O Vronsky/O and/O
me/O?/O Is/O there/O possible/O,/O if/O not/O happiness/O,/O some/O sort/O of/O ease/O from/O misery/O?/O
No/O,/O no/O!/O''/O she/O answered/O now/O without/O the/O slightest/O hesitation/O./O ``/OImpossible/O!/O
We/O are/O drawn/O apart/O by/O life/O,/O and/O I/O make/O his/O unhappiness/O,/O and/O he/O mine/O,/O and/O
there/O's/O no/O altering/O him/O or/O me/O./O Every/O attempt/O has/O been/O made/O,/O the/O screw/O
has/O come/O unscrewed/O./O Oh/O,/O a/O beggar/O woman/O with/O a/O baby/O./O She/O thinks/O I/O'm/O sorry/O
for/O her/O./O Are/On't/O we/O all/O flung/O into/O the/O world/O only/O to/O hate/O each/O other/O,/O and/O
so/O to/O torture/O ourselves/O and/O each/O other/O?/O Schoolboys/O coming/O--/Olaughing/O
Seryozha/PERSON?/O''/O she/O thought/O./O ``/OI/O thought/O,/O too/O,/O that/O I/O loved/O him/O,/O and/O used/O to/O
be/O touched/O by/O my/O own/O tenderness/O./O But/O I/O have/O lived/O without/O him/O,/O I/O gave/O
him/O up/O for/O another/O love/O,/O and/O did/O not/O regret/O the/O exchange/O till/O that/O love/O
was/O satisfied/O./O''/O And/O with/O loathing/O she/O thought/O of/O what/O she/O meant/O by/O that/O
love/O./O And/O the/O clearness/O with/O which/O she/O saw/O life/O now/O,/O her/O own/O and/O all/O
men/O's/O,/O was/O a/O pleasure/O to/O her/O./O ``/OIt/O's/O so/O with/O me/O and/O Pyotr/PERSON,/O and/O the/O
coachman/O,/O Fyodor/PERSON,/O and/O that/O merchant/O,/O and/O all/O the/O people/O living/O along/O the/O
Volga/LOCATION,/O where/O those/O placards/O invite/O one/O to/O go/O,/O and/O everywhere/O and/O
always/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O when/O she/O had/O driven/O under/O the/O low-pitched/O roof/O of/O
the/O Nizhigorod/O station/O,/O and/O the/O porters/O ran/O to/O meet/O her/O./O

``/OA/O ticket/O to/O Obiralovka/PERSON?/O''/O said/O Pyotr/PERSON./O

She/O had/O utterly/O forgotten/O where/O and/O why/O she/O was/O going/O,/O and/O only/O by/O a/O
great/O effort/O she/O understood/O the/O question/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O handing/O him/O her/O purse/O,/O and/O taking/O a/O little/O red/O bag/O in/O
her/O hand/O,/O she/O got/O out/O of/O the/O carriage/O./O

Making/O her/O way/O through/O the/O crowd/O to/O the/O first-class/O waiting-room/O,/O she/O
gradually/O recollected/O all/O the/O details/O of/O her/O position/O,/O and/O the/O plans/O
between/O which/O she/O was/O hesitating/O./O And/O again/O at/O the/O old/O sore/O places/O,/O hope/O
and/O then/O despair/O poisoned/O the/O wounds/O of/O her/O tortured/O,/O fearfully/O
throbbing/O heart/O./O As/O she/O sat/O on/O the/O star-shaped/O sofa/O waiting/O for/O the/O
train/O,/O she/O gazed/O with/O aversion/O at/O the/O people/O coming/O and/O going/O -LRB-/Othey/O were/O
all/O hateful/O to/O her/O-RRB-/O,/O and/O thought/O how/O she/O would/O arrive/O at/O the/O station/O,/O
would/O write/O him/O a/O note/O,/O and/O what/O she/O would/O write/O to/O him/O,/O and/O how/O he/O was/O
at/O this/O moment/O complaining/O to/O his/O mother/O of/O his/O position/O,/O not/O
understanding/O her/O sufferings/O,/O and/O how/O she/O would/O go/O into/O the/O room/O,/O and/O
what/O she/O would/O say/O to/O him/O./O Then/O she/O thought/O that/O life/O might/O still/O be/O
happy/O,/O and/O how/O miserably/O she/O loved/O and/O hated/O him/O,/O and/O how/O fearfully/O her/O
heart/O was/O beating/O./O



Chapter/O 31/O


A/O bell/O rang/O,/O some/O young/O men/O,/O ugly/O and/O impudent/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O
careful/O of/O the/O impression/O they/O were/O making/O,/O hurried/O by/O./O Pyotr/PERSON,/O too/O,/O
crossed/O the/O room/O in/O his/O livery/O and/O top-boots/O,/O with/O his/O dull/O,/O animal/O
face/O,/O and/O came/O up/O to/O her/O to/O take/O her/O to/O the/O train/O./O Some/O noisy/O men/O were/O
quiet/O as/O she/O passed/O them/O on/O the/O platform/O,/O and/O one/O whispered/O something/O
about/O her/O to/O another/O--/Osomething/O vile/O,/O no/O doubt/O./O She/O stepped/O up/O on/O the/O
high/O step/O,/O and/O sat/O down/O in/O a/O carriage/O by/O herself/O on/O a/O dirty/O seat/O that/O
had/O been/O white/O./O Her/O bag/O lay/O beside/O her/O,/O shaken/O up/O and/O down/O by/O the/O
springiness/O of/O the/O seat/O./O With/O a/O foolish/O smile/O Pyotr/PERSON raised/O his/O hat/O,/O with/O
its/O colored/O band/O,/O at/O the/O window/O,/O in/O token/O of/O farewell/O;/O an/O impudent/O
conductor/O slammed/O the/O door/O and/O the/O latch/O./O A/O grotesque-looking/O lady/O
wearing/O a/O bustle/O -LRB-/OAnna/PERSON mentally/O undressed/O the/O woman/O,/O and/O was/O appalled/O at/O
her/O hideousness/O-RRB-/O,/O and/O a/O little/O girl/O laughing/O affectedly/O ran/O down/O the/O
platform/O./O

``/OKaterina/PERSON Andreevna/PERSON,/O she/O's/O got/O them/O all/O,/O _/Oma/O tante/O!/O_/O''/O cried/O the/O girl/O./O

``/OEven/O the/O child/O's/O hideous/O and/O affected/O,/O''/O thought/O Anna/PERSON./O To/O avoid/O seeing/O
anyone/O,/O she/O got/O up/O quickly/O and/O seated/O herself/O at/O the/O opposite/O window/O of/O
the/O empty/O carriage/O./O A/O misshapen-looking/O peasant/O covered/O with/O dirt/O,/O in/O a/O
cap/O from/O which/O his/O tangled/O hair/O stuck/O out/O all/O round/O,/O passed/O by/O that/O
window/O,/O stooping/O down/O to/O the/O carriage/O wheels/O./O ``/OThere/O's/O something/O
familiar/O about/O that/O hideous/O peasant/O,/O''/O thought/O Anna/PERSON./O And/O remembering/O her/O
dream/O,/O she/O moved/O away/O to/O the/O opposite/O door/O,/O shaking/O with/O terror/O./O The/O
conductor/O opened/O the/O door/O and/O let/O in/O a/O man/O and/O his/O wife/O./O

``/ODo/O you/O wish/O to/O get/O out/O?/O''/O

Anna/PERSON made/O no/O answer/O./O The/O conductor/O and/O her/O two/O fellow-passengers/O did/O not/O
notice/O under/O her/O veil/O her/O panic-stricken/O face/O./O She/O went/O back/O to/O her/O
corner/O and/O sat/O down/O./O The/O couple/O seated/O themselves/O on/O the/O opposite/O side/O,/O
and/O intently/O but/O surreptitiously/O scrutinized/O her/O clothes/O./O Both/O husband/O
and/O wife/O seemed/O repulsive/O to/O Anna/PERSON./O The/O husband/O asked/O,/O would/O she/O allow/O
him/O to/O smoke/O,/O obviously/O not/O with/O a/O view/O to/O smoking/O but/O to/O getting/O into/O
conversation/O with/O her/O./O Receiving/O her/O assent/O,/O he/O said/O to/O his/O wife/O in/O
French/O something/O about/O caring/O less/O to/O smoke/O than/O to/O talk/O./O They/O made/O
inane/O and/O affected/O remarks/O to/O one/O another/O,/O entirely/O for/O her/O benefit/O./O
Anna/PERSON saw/O clearly/O that/O they/O were/O sick/O of/O each/O other/O,/O and/O hated/O each/O
other/O./O And/O no/O one/O could/O have/O helped/O hating/O such/O miserable/O monstrosities/O./O

A/O second/O bell/O sounded/O,/O and/O was/O followed/O by/O moving/O of/O luggage/O,/O noise/O,/O
shouting/O and/O laughter/O./O It/O was/O so/O clear/O to/O Anna/PERSON that/O there/O was/O nothing/O
for/O anyone/O to/O be/O glad/O of/O,/O that/O this/O laughter/O irritated/O her/O agonizingly/O,/O
and/O she/O would/O have/O liked/O to/O stop/O up/O her/O ears/O not/O to/O hear/O it/O./O At/O last/O the/O
third/O bell/O rang/O,/O there/O was/O a/O whistle/O and/O a/O hiss/O of/O steam/O,/O and/O a/O clank/O of/O
chains/O,/O and/O the/O man/O in/O her/O carriage/O crossed/O himself/O./O ``/OIt/O would/O be/O
interesting/O to/O ask/O him/O what/O meaning/O he/O attaches/O to/O that/O,/O''/O thought/O Anna/PERSON,/O
looking/O angrily/O at/O him/O./O She/O looked/O past/O the/O lady/O out/O of/O the/O window/O at/O
the/O people/O who/O seemed/O whirling/O by/O as/O they/O ran/O beside/O the/O train/O or/O stood/O
on/O the/O platform/O./O The/O train/O,/O jerking/O at/O regular/O intervals/O at/O the/O
junctions/O of/O the/O rails/O,/O rolled/O by/O the/O platform/O,/O past/O a/O stone/O wall/O,/O a/O
signal-box/O,/O past/O other/O trains/O;/O the/O wheels/O,/O moving/O more/O smoothly/O and/O
evenly/O,/O resounded/O with/O a/O slight/O clang/O on/O the/O rails/O./O The/O window/O was/O
lighted/O up/O by/O the/O bright/O evening/O sun/O,/O and/O a/O slight/O breeze/O fluttered/O the/O
curtain/O./O Anna/PERSON forgot/O her/O fellow/O passengers/O,/O and/O to/O the/O light/O swaying/O of/O
the/O train/O she/O fell/O to/O thinking/O again/O,/O as/O she/O breathed/O the/O fresh/O air/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O what/O did/O I/O stop/O at/O?/O That/O I/O could/On't/O conceive/O a/O position/O in/O which/O
life/O would/O not/O be/O a/O misery/O,/O that/O we/O are/O all/O created/O to/O be/O miserable/O,/O and/O
that/O we/O all/O know/O it/O,/O and/O all/O invent/O means/O of/O deceiving/O each/O other/O./O And/O
when/O one/O sees/O the/O truth/O,/O what/O is/O one/O to/O do/O?/O''/O

``/OThat/O's/O what/O reason/O is/O given/O man/O for/O,/O to/O escape/O from/O what/O worries/O him/O,/O''/O
said/O the/O lady/O in/O French/O,/O lisping/O affectedly/O,/O and/O obviously/O pleased/O with/O
her/O phrase/O./O

The/O words/O seemed/O an/O answer/O to/O Anna/PERSON's/O thoughts/O./O

``/OTo/O escape/O from/O what/O worries/O him/O,/O''/O repeated/O Anna/PERSON./O And/O glancing/O at/O the/O
red-cheeked/O husband/O and/O the/O thin/O wife/O,/O she/O saw/O that/O the/O sickly/O wife/O
considered/O herself/O misunderstood/O,/O and/O the/O husband/O deceived/O her/O and/O
encouraged/O her/O in/O that/O idea/O of/O herself/O./O Anna/PERSON seemed/O to/O see/O all/O their/O
history/O and/O all/O the/O crannies/O of/O their/O souls/O,/O as/O it/O were/O turning/O a/O light/O
upon/O them/O./O But/O there/O was/O nothing/O interesting/O in/O them/O,/O and/O she/O pursued/O
her/O thought/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O'm/O very/O much/O worried/O,/O and/O that/O's/O what/O reason/O was/O given/O me/O for/O,/O to/O
escape/O;/O so/O then/O one/O must/O escape/O:/O why/O not/O put/O out/O the/O light/O when/O there/O's/O
nothing/O more/O to/O look/O at/O,/O when/O it/O's/O sickening/O to/O look/O at/O it/O all/O?/O But/O how/O?/O
Why/O did/O the/O conductor/O run/O along/O the/O footboard/O,/O why/O are/O they/O shrieking/O,/O
those/O young/O men/O in/O that/O train/O?/O why/O are/O they/O talking/O,/O why/O are/O they/O
laughing/O?/O It/O's/O all/O falsehood/O,/O all/O lying/O,/O all/O humbug/O,/O all/O cruelty/O!/O.../O''/O

When/O the/O train/O came/O into/O the/O station/O,/O Anna/PERSON got/O out/O into/O the/O crowd/O of/O
passengers/O,/O and/O moving/O apart/O from/O them/O as/O if/O they/O were/O lepers/O,/O she/O stood/O
on/O the/O platform/O,/O trying/O to/O think/O what/O she/O had/O come/O here/O for/O,/O and/O what/O
she/O meant/O to/O do/O./O Everything/O that/O had/O seemed/O to/O her/O possible/O before/O was/O
now/O so/O difficult/O to/O consider/O,/O especially/O in/O this/O noisy/O crowd/O of/O hideous/O
people/O who/O would/O not/O leave/O her/O alone/O./O One/O moment/O porters/O ran/O up/O to/O her/O
proffering/O their/O services/O,/O then/O young/O men/O,/O clacking/O their/O heels/O on/O the/O
planks/O of/O the/O platform/O and/O talking/O loudly/O,/O stared/O at/O her/O;/O people/O meeting/O
her/O dodged/O past/O on/O the/O wrong/O side/O./O Remembering/O that/O she/O had/O meant/O to/O go/O
on/O further/O if/O there/O were/O no/O answer/O,/O she/O stopped/O a/O porter/O and/O asked/O if/O
her/O coachman/O were/O not/O here/O with/O a/O note/O from/O Count/O Vronsky/O./O

``/OCount/O Vronsky/O?/O They/O sent/O up/O here/O from/O the/O Vronskys/LOCATION just/O this/O minute/O,/O to/O
meet/O Princess/O Sorokina/PERSON and/O her/O daughter/O./O And/O what/O is/O the/O coachman/O like/O?/O''/O

Just/O as/O she/O was/O talking/O to/O the/O porter/O,/O the/O coachman/O Mihail/PERSON,/O red/O and/O
cheerful/O in/O his/O smart/O blue/O coat/O and/O chain/O,/O evidently/O proud/O of/O having/O so/O
successfully/O performed/O his/O commission/O,/O came/O up/O to/O her/O and/O gave/O her/O a/O
letter/O./O She/O broke/O it/O open/O,/O and/O her/O heart/O ached/O before/O she/O had/O read/O it/O./O

``/OI/O am/O very/O sorry/O your/O note/O did/O not/O reach/O me/O./O I/O will/O be/O home/O at/O ten/O,/O''/O
Vronsky/O had/O written/O carelessly/O.../O

``/OYes/O,/O that/O's/O what/O I/O expected/O!/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O with/O an/O evil/O smile/O./O

``/OVery/O good/O,/O you/O can/O go/O home/O then/O,/O''/O she/O said/O softly/O,/O addressing/O Mihail/PERSON./O
She/O spoke/O softly/O because/O the/O rapidity/O of/O her/O heart/O's/O beating/O hindered/O
her/O breathing/O./O ``/ONo/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O let/O you/O make/O me/O miserable/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O
menacingly/O,/O addressing/O not/O him/O,/O not/O herself/O,/O but/O the/O power/O that/O made/O her/O
suffer/O,/O and/O she/O walked/O along/O the/O platform/O./O

Two/O maid-servants/O walking/O along/O the/O platform/O turned/O their/O heads/O,/O staring/O
at/O her/O and/O making/O some/O remarks/O about/O her/O dress/O./O ``/OReal/O,/O''/O they/O said/O of/O the/O
lace/O she/O was/O wearing/O./O The/O young/O men/O would/O not/O leave/O her/O in/O peace/O./O Again/O
they/O passed/O by/O,/O peering/O into/O her/O face/O,/O and/O with/O a/O laugh/O shouting/O
something/O in/O an/O unnatural/O voice/O./O The/O station-master/O coming/O up/O asked/O her/O
whether/O she/O was/O going/O by/O train/O./O A/O boy/O selling/O kvas/O never/O took/O his/O eyes/O
off/O her/O./O ``/OMy/O God/O!/O where/O am/O I/O to/O go/O?/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O going/O farther/O and/O
farther/O along/O the/O platform/O./O At/O the/O end/O she/O stopped/O./O Some/O ladies/O and/O
children/O,/O who/O had/O come/O to/O meet/O a/O gentleman/O in/O spectacles/O,/O paused/O in/O
their/O loud/O laughter/O and/O talking/O,/O and/O stared/O at/O her/O as/O she/O reached/O them/O./O
She/O quickened/O her/O pace/O and/O walked/O away/O from/O them/O to/O the/O edge/O of/O the/O
platform/O./O A/O luggage/O train/O was/O coming/O in/O./O The/O platform/O began/O to/O sway/O,/O and/O
she/O fancied/O she/O was/O in/O the/O train/O again/O./O

And/O all/O at/O once/O she/O thought/O of/O the/O man/O crushed/O by/O the/O train/O the/O day/O she/O
had/O first/O met/O Vronsky/O,/O and/O she/O knew/O what/O she/O had/O to/O do/O./O With/O a/O rapid/O,/O
light/O step/O she/O went/O down/O the/O steps/O that/O led/O from/O the/O tank/O to/O the/O rails/O
and/O stopped/O quite/O near/O the/O approaching/O train/O./O

She/O looked/O at/O the/O lower/O part/O of/O the/O carriages/O,/O at/O the/O screws/O and/O chains/O
and/O the/O tall/O cast-iron/O wheel/O of/O the/O first/O carriage/O slowly/O moving/O up/O,/O and/O
trying/O to/O measure/O the/O middle/O between/O the/O front/O and/O back/O wheels/O,/O and/O the/O
very/O minute/O when/O that/O middle/O point/O would/O be/O opposite/O her/O./O

``/OThere/O,/O''/O she/O said/O to/O herself/O,/O looking/O into/O the/O shadow/O of/O the/O carriage/O,/O
at/O the/O sand/O and/O coal/O dust/O which/O covered/O the/O sleepers/O--/O``/Othere/O,/O in/O the/O very/O
middle/O,/O and/O I/O will/O punish/O him/O and/O escape/O from/O everyone/O and/O from/O myself/O./O''/O

She/O tried/O to/O fling/O herself/O below/O the/O wheels/O of/O the/O first/O carriage/O as/O it/O
reached/O her/O;/O but/O the/O red/O bag/O which/O she/O tried/O to/O drop/O out/O of/O her/O hand/O
delayed/O her/O,/O and/O she/O was/O too/O late/O;/O she/O missed/O the/O moment/O./O She/O had/O to/O
wait/O for/O the/O next/O carriage/O./O A/O feeling/O such/O as/O she/O had/O known/O when/O about/O
to/O take/O the/O first/O plunge/O in/O bathing/O came/O upon/O her/O,/O and/O she/O crossed/O
herself/O./O That/O familiar/O gesture/O brought/O back/O into/O her/O soul/O a/O whole/O series/O
of/O girlish/O and/O childish/O memories/O,/O and/O suddenly/O the/O darkness/O that/O had/O
covered/O everything/O for/O her/O was/O torn/O apart/O,/O and/O life/O rose/O up/O before/O her/O
for/O an/O instant/O with/O all/O its/O bright/O past/O joys/O./O But/O she/O did/O not/O take/O her/O
eyes/O from/O the/O wheels/O of/O the/O second/O carriage/O./O And/O exactly/O at/O the/O moment/O
when/O the/O space/O between/O the/O wheels/O came/O opposite/O her/O,/O she/O dropped/O the/O red/O
bag/O,/O and/O drawing/O her/O head/O back/O into/O her/O shoulders/O,/O fell/O on/O her/O hands/O
under/O the/O carriage/O,/O and/O lightly/O,/O as/O though/O she/O would/O rise/O again/O at/O once/O,/O
dropped/O on/O to/O her/O knees/O./O And/O at/O the/O same/O instant/O she/O was/O terror-stricken/O
at/O what/O she/O was/O doing/O./O ``/OWhere/O am/O I/O?/O What/O am/O I/O doing/O?/O What/O for/O?/O''/O She/O
tried/O to/O get/O up/O,/O to/O drop/O backwards/O;/O but/O something/O huge/O and/O merciless/O
struck/O her/O on/O the/O head/O and/O rolled/O her/O on/O her/O back/O./O ``/OLord/O,/O forgive/O me/O
all/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O feeling/O it/O impossible/O to/O struggle/O./O A/O peasant/O muttering/O
something/O was/O working/O at/O the/O iron/O above/O her/O./O And/O the/O light/O by/O which/O she/O
had/O read/O the/O book/O filled/O with/O troubles/O,/O falsehoods/O,/O sorrow/O,/O and/O evil/O,/O
flared/O up/O more/O brightly/O than/O ever/O before/O,/O lighted/O up/O for/O her/O all/O that/O
had/O been/O in/O darkness/O,/O flickered/O,/O began/O to/O grow/O dim/O,/O and/O was/O quenched/O
forever/O./O




PART/O EIGHT/O



Chapter/O 1/O


Almost/O two/O months/O had/O passed/O./O The/O hot/O summer/O was/O half/O over/O,/O but/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O only/O just/O preparing/O to/O leave/O Moscow/LOCATION./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O life/O had/O not/O been/O uneventful/O during/O this/O time/O./O A/O
year/O ago/O he/O had/O finished/O his/O book/O,/O the/O fruit/O of/O six/O years/O'/O labor/O,/O
``/OSketch/O of/O a/O Survey/O of/O the/O Principles/O and/O Forms/O of/O Government/O in/O Europe/LOCATION
and/O Russia/LOCATION./O''/O Several/O sections/O of/O this/O book/O and/O its/O introduction/O had/O
appeared/O in/O periodical/O publications/O,/O and/O other/O parts/O had/O been/O read/O by/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON to/O persons/O of/O his/O circle/O,/O so/O that/O the/O leading/O ideas/O of/O
the/O work/O could/O not/O be/O completely/O novel/O to/O the/O public/O./O But/O still/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON had/O expected/O that/O on/O its/O appearance/O his/O book/O would/O be/O sure/O to/O
make/O a/O serious/O impression/O on/O society/O,/O and/O if/O it/O did/O not/O cause/O a/O
revolution/O in/O social/O science/O it/O would/O,/O at/O any/O rate/O,/O make/O a/O great/O stir/O in/O
the/O scientific/O world/O./O

After/O the/O most/O conscientious/O revision/O the/O book/O had/O last/O year/O been/O
published/O,/O and/O had/O been/O distributed/O among/O the/O booksellers/O./O

Though/O he/O asked/O no/O one/O about/O it/O,/O reluctantly/O and/O with/O feigned/O
indifference/O answered/O his/O friends/O'/O inquiries/O as/O to/O how/O the/O book/O was/O
going/O,/O and/O did/O not/O even/O inquire/O of/O the/O booksellers/O how/O the/O book/O was/O
selling/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O all/O on/O the/O alert/O,/O with/O strained/O
attention/O,/O watching/O for/O the/O first/O impression/O his/O book/O would/O make/O in/O the/O
world/O and/O in/O literature/O./O

But/O a/O week/O passed/O,/O a/O second/O,/O a/O third/O,/O and/O in/O society/O no/O impression/O
whatever/O could/O be/O detected/O./O His/O friends/O who/O were/O specialists/O and/O
savants/O,/O occasionally/O--/Ounmistakably/O from/O politeness/O--/Oalluded/O to/O it/O./O The/O
rest/O of/O his/O acquaintances/O,/O not/O interested/O in/O a/O book/O on/O a/O learned/O
subject/O,/O did/O not/O talk/O of/O it/O at/O all/O./O And/O society/O generally/O--/Ojust/O now/O
especially/O absorbed/O in/O other/O things/O--/Owas/O absolutely/O indifferent/O./O In/O the/O
press/O,/O too/O,/O for/O a/O whole/O month/O there/O was/O not/O a/O word/O about/O his/O book/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON had/O calculated/O to/O a/O nicety/O the/O time/O necessary/O for/O
writing/O a/O review/O,/O but/O a/O month/O passed/O,/O and/O a/O second/O,/O and/O still/O there/O was/O
silence/O./O

Only/O in/O the/O _/ONorthern/O Beetle/O_/O,/O in/O a/O comic/O article/O on/O the/O singer/O
Drabanti/PERSON,/O who/O had/O lost/O his/O voice/O,/O there/O was/O a/O contemptuous/O allusion/O to/O
Koznishev/PERSON's/O book/O,/O suggesting/O that/O the/O book/O had/O been/O long/O ago/O seen/O
through/O by/O everyone/O,/O and/O was/O a/O subject/O of/O general/O ridicule/O./O

At/O last/O in/O the/O third/O month/O a/O critical/O article/O appeared/O in/O a/O serious/O
review/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON knew/O the/O author/O of/O the/O article/O./O He/O had/O met/O him/O
once/O at/O Golubtsov/PERSON's/O./O

The/O author/O of/O the/O article/O was/O a/O young/O man/O,/O an/O invalid/O,/O very/O bold/O as/O a/O
writer/O,/O but/O extremely/O deficient/O in/O breeding/O and/O shy/O in/O personal/O
relations/O./O

In/O spite/O of/O his/O absolute/O contempt/O for/O the/O author/O,/O it/O was/O with/O complete/O
respect/O that/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON set/O about/O reading/O the/O article/O./O The/O
article/O was/O awful/O./O

The/O critic/O had/O undoubtedly/O put/O an/O interpretation/O upon/O the/O book/O which/O
could/O not/O possibly/O be/O put/O on/O it/O./O But/O he/O had/O selected/O quotations/O so/O
adroitly/O that/O for/O people/O who/O had/O not/O read/O the/O book/O -LRB-/Oand/O obviously/O
scarcely/O anyone/O had/O read/O it/O-RRB-/O it/O seemed/O absolutely/O clear/O that/O the/O whole/O
book/O was/O nothing/O but/O a/O medley/O of/O high-flown/O phrases/O,/O not/O even/O--/Oas/O
suggested/O by/O marks/O of/O interrogation/O--/Oused/O appropriately/O,/O and/O that/O the/O
author/O of/O the/O book/O was/O a/O person/O absolutely/O without/O knowledge/O of/O the/O
subject/O./O And/O all/O this/O was/O so/O wittily/O done/O that/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON would/O
not/O have/O disowned/O such/O wit/O himself/O./O But/O that/O was/O just/O what/O was/O so/O awful/O./O

In/O spite/O of/O the/O scrupulous/O conscientiousness/O with/O which/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON verified/O the/O correctness/O of/O the/O critic/O's/O arguments/O,/O he/O did/O
not/O for/O a/O minute/O stop/O to/O ponder/O over/O the/O faults/O and/O mistakes/O which/O were/O
ridiculed/O;/O but/O unconsciously/O he/O began/O immediately/O trying/O to/O recall/O every/O
detail/O of/O his/O meeting/O and/O conversation/O with/O the/O author/O of/O the/O article/O./O

``/ODid/On't/O I/O offend/O him/O in/O some/O way/O?/O''/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON wondered/O./O

And/O remembering/O that/O when/O they/O met/O he/O had/O corrected/O the/O young/O man/O about/O
something/O he/O had/O said/O that/O betrayed/O ignorance/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON found/O
the/O clue/O to/O explain/O the/O article/O./O

This/O article/O was/O followed/O by/O a/O deadly/O silence/O about/O the/O book/O both/O in/O the/O
press/O and/O in/O conversation/O,/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON saw/O that/O his/O six/O years/O'/O
task/O,/O toiled/O at/O with/O such/O love/O and/O labor/O,/O had/O gone/O,/O leaving/O no/O trace/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O position/O was/O still/O more/O difficult/O from/O the/O fact/O
that/O,/O since/O he/O had/O finished/O his/O book/O,/O he/O had/O had/O no/O more/O literary/O work/O
to/O do/O,/O such/O as/O had/O hitherto/O occupied/O the/O greater/O part/O of/O his/O time/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O clever/O,/O cultivated/O,/O healthy/O,/O and/O energetic/O,/O and/O he/O
did/O not/O know/O what/O use/O to/O make/O of/O his/O energy/O./O Conversations/O in/O drawing/O
rooms/O,/O in/O meetings/O,/O assemblies/O,/O and/O committees/O--/Oeverywhere/O where/O talk/O was/O
possible/O--/Otook/O up/O part/O of/O his/O time/O./O But/O being/O used/O for/O years/O to/O town/O
life/O,/O he/O did/O not/O waste/O all/O his/O energies/O in/O talk/O,/O as/O his/O less/O experienced/O
younger/O brother/O did/O,/O when/O he/O was/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION./O He/O had/O a/O great/O deal/O of/O
leisure/O and/O intellectual/O energy/O still/O to/O dispose/O of/O./O

Fortunately/O for/O him/O,/O at/O this/O period/O so/O difficult/O for/O him/O from/O the/O
failure/O of/O his/O book/O,/O the/O various/O public/O questions/O of/O the/O dissenting/O
sects/O,/O of/O the/O American/O alliance/O,/O of/O the/O Samara/LOCATION famine/O,/O of/O exhibitions/O,/O
and/O of/O spiritualism/O,/O were/O definitely/O replaced/O in/O public/O interest/O by/O the/O
Slavonic/O question/O,/O which/O had/O hitherto/O rather/O languidly/O interested/O
society/O,/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O who/O had/O been/O one/O of/O the/O first/O to/O raise/O
this/O subject/O,/O threw/O himself/O into/O it/O heart/O and/O soul/O./O

In/O the/O circle/O to/O which/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON belonged/O,/O nothing/O was/O talked/O of/O
or/O written/O about/O just/O now/O but/O the/O Servian/O War/O./O Everything/O that/O the/O idle/O
crowd/O usually/O does/O to/O kill/O time/O was/O done/O now/O for/O the/O benefit/O of/O the/O
Slavonic/O States/O./O Balls/O,/O concerts/O,/O dinners/O,/O matchboxes/O,/O ladies/O'/O dresses/O,/O
beer/O,/O restaurants/O--/Oeverything/O testified/O to/O sympathy/O with/O the/O Slavonic/O
peoples/O./O

From/O much/O of/O what/O was/O spoken/O and/O written/O on/O the/O subject/O,/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON differed/O on/O various/O points/O./O He/O saw/O that/O the/O Slavonic/O question/O
had/O become/O one/O of/O those/O fashionable/O distractions/O which/O succeed/O one/O
another/O in/O providing/O society/O with/O an/O object/O and/O an/O occupation/O./O He/O saw/O,/O
too/O,/O that/O a/O great/O many/O people/O were/O taking/O up/O the/O subject/O from/O motives/O of/O
self-interest/O and/O self-advertisement/O./O He/O recognized/O that/O the/O newspapers/O
published/O a/O great/O deal/O that/O was/O superfluous/O and/O exaggerated/O,/O with/O the/O
sole/O aim/O of/O attracting/O attention/O and/O outbidding/O one/O another/O./O He/O saw/O that/O
in/O this/O general/O movement/O those/O who/O thrust/O themselves/O most/O forward/O and/O
shouted/O the/O loudest/O were/O men/O who/O had/O failed/O and/O were/O smarting/O under/O a/O
sense/O of/O injury/O--/Ogenerals/O without/O armies/O,/O ministers/O not/O in/O the/O ministry/O,/O
journalists/O not/O on/O any/O paper/O,/O party/O leaders/O without/O followers/O./O He/O saw/O
that/O there/O was/O a/O great/O deal/O in/O it/O that/O was/O frivolous/O and/O absurd/O./O But/O he/O
saw/O and/O recognized/O an/O unmistakable/O growing/O enthusiasm/O,/O uniting/O all/O
classes/O,/O with/O which/O it/O was/O impossible/O not/O to/O sympathize/O./O The/O massacre/O of/O
men/O who/O were/O fellow/O Christians/O,/O and/O of/O the/O same/O Slavonic/O race/O,/O excited/O
sympathy/O for/O the/O sufferers/O and/O indignation/O against/O the/O oppressors/O./O And/O
the/O heroism/O of/O the/O Servians/O and/O Montenegrins/O struggling/O for/O a/O great/O
cause/O begot/O in/O the/O whole/O people/O a/O longing/O to/O help/O their/O brothers/O not/O in/O
word/O but/O in/O deed/O./O

But/O in/O this/O there/O was/O another/O aspect/O that/O rejoiced/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O
That/O was/O the/O manifestation/O of/O public/O opinion/O./O The/O public/O had/O definitely/O
expressed/O its/O desire/O./O The/O soul/O of/O the/O people/O had/O,/O as/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
said/O,/O found/O expression/O./O And/O the/O more/O he/O worked/O in/O this/O cause/O,/O the/O more/O
incontestable/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O it/O was/O a/O cause/O destined/O to/O assume/O
vast/O dimensions/O,/O to/O create/O an/O epoch/O./O

He/O threw/O himself/O heart/O and/O soul/O into/O the/O service/O of/O this/O great/O cause/O,/O
and/O forgot/O to/O think/O about/O his/O book/O./O His/O whole/O time/O now/O was/O engrossed/O by/O
it/O,/O so/O that/O he/O could/O scarcely/O manage/O to/O answer/O all/O the/O letters/O and/O
appeals/O addressed/O to/O him/O./O He/O worked/O the/O whole/O spring/O and/O part/O of/O the/O
summer/O,/O and/O it/O was/O only/O in/O July/O that/O he/O prepared/O to/O go/O away/O to/O his/O
brother/O's/O in/O the/O country/O./O

He/O was/O going/O both/O to/O rest/O for/O a/O fortnight/O,/O and/O in/O the/O very/O heart/O of/O the/O
people/O,/O in/O the/O farthest/O wilds/O of/O the/O country/O,/O to/O enjoy/O the/O sight/O of/O that/O
uplifting/O of/O the/O spirit/O of/O the/O people/O,/O of/O which/O,/O like/O all/O residents/O in/O
the/O capital/O and/O big/O towns/O,/O he/O was/O fully/O persuaded/O./O Katavasov/PERSON had/O long/O
been/O meaning/O to/O carry/O out/O his/O promise/O to/O stay/O with/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O so/O he/O was/O
going/O with/O him/O./O



Chapter/O 2/O


Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON and/O Katavasov/PERSON had/O only/O just/O reached/O the/O station/O of/O the/O
Kursk/O line/O,/O which/O was/O particularly/O busy/O and/O full/O of/O people/O that/O day/O,/O
when/O,/O looking/O round/O for/O the/O groom/O who/O was/O following/O with/O their/O things/O,/O
they/O saw/O a/O party/O of/O volunteers/O driving/O up/O in/O four/O cabs/O./O Ladies/O met/O them/O
with/O bouquets/O of/O flowers/O,/O and/O followed/O by/O the/O rushing/O crowd/O they/O went/O
into/O the/O station/O./O

One/O of/O the/O ladies/O,/O who/O had/O met/O the/O volunteers/O,/O came/O out/O of/O the/O hall/O and/O
addressed/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OYou/O too/O come/O to/O see/O them/O off/O?/O''/O she/O asked/O in/O French/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O going/O away/O myself/O,/O princess/O./O To/O my/O brother/O's/O for/O a/O holiday/O./O Do/O
you/O always/O see/O them/O off/O?/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON with/O a/O hardly/O
perceptible/O smile/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O that/O would/O be/O impossible/O!/O''/O answered/O the/O princess/O./O ``/OIs/O it/O true/O that/O
eight/O hundred/O have/O been/O sent/O from/O us/O already/O?/O Malvinsky/PERSON would/On't/O believe/O
me/O./O''/O

``/OMore/O than/O eight/O hundred/O./O If/O you/O reckon/O those/O who/O have/O been/O sent/O not/O
directly/O from/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O over/O a/O thousand/O,/O''/O answered/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OThere/O!/O That/O's/O just/O what/O I/O said/O!/O''/O exclaimed/O the/O lady/O./O ``/OAnd/O it/O's/O true/O
too/O,/O I/O suppose/O,/O that/O more/O than/O a/O million/O has/O been/O subscribed/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O princess/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O do/O you/O say/O to/O today/O's/O telegram/O?/O Beaten/O the/O Turks/O again/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O so/O I/O saw/O,/O''/O answered/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O They/O were/O speaking/O of/O the/O
last/O telegram/O stating/O that/O the/O Turks/O had/O been/O for/O three/O days/O in/O
succession/O beaten/O at/O all/O points/O and/O put/O to/O flight/O,/O and/O that/O tomorrow/O a/O
decisive/O engagement/O was/O expected/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O by/O the/O way/O,/O a/O splendid/O young/O fellow/O has/O asked/O leave/O to/O go/O,/O and/O
they/O've/O made/O some/O difficulty/O,/O I/O do/On't/O know/O why/O./O I/O meant/O to/O ask/O you/O;/O I/O
know/O him/O;/O please/O write/O a/O note/O about/O his/O case/O./O He/O's/O being/O sent/O by/O
Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON./O''/O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON asked/O for/O all/O the/O details/O the/O princess/O knew/O about/O the/O
young/O man/O,/O and/O going/O into/O the/O first-class/O waiting-room/O,/O wrote/O a/O note/O to/O
the/O person/O on/O whom/O the/O granting/O of/O leave/O of/O absence/O depended/O,/O and/O handed/O
it/O to/O the/O princess/O./O

``/OYou/O know/O Count/O Vronsky/O,/O the/O notorious/O one/O .../O is/O going/O by/O this/O train/O?/O''/O
said/O the/O princess/O with/O a/O smile/O full/O of/O triumph/O and/O meaning/O,/O when/O he/O
found/O her/O again/O and/O gave/O her/O the/O letter/O./O

``/OI/O had/O heard/O he/O was/O going/O,/O but/O I/O did/O not/O know/O when/O./O By/O this/O train/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O've/O seen/O him/O./O He/O's/O here/O:/O there/O's/O only/O his/O mother/O seeing/O him/O off/O./O It/O's/O
the/O best/O thing/O,/O anyway/O,/O that/O he/O could/O do/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O yes/O,/O of/O course/O./O''/O

While/O they/O were/O talking/O the/O crowd/O streamed/O by/O them/O into/O the/O dining/O room/O./O
They/O went/O forward/O too/O,/O and/O heard/O a/O gentleman/O with/O a/O glass/O in/O his/O hand/O
delivering/O a/O loud/O discourse/O to/O the/O volunteers/O./O ``/OIn/O the/O service/O of/O
religion/O,/O humanity/O,/O and/O our/O brothers/O,/O''/O the/O gentleman/O said/O,/O his/O voice/O
growing/O louder/O and/O louder/O;/O ``/Oto/O this/O great/O cause/O mother/O Moscow/LOCATION dedicates/O
you/O with/O her/O blessing/O./O _/OJivio/O!/O_/O''/O he/O concluded/O,/O loudly/O and/O tearfully/O./O

Everyone/O shouted/O _/OJivio/O!/O_/O and/O a/O fresh/O crowd/O dashed/O into/O the/O hall/O,/O almost/O
carrying/O the/O princess/O off/O her/O legs/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O princess/O!/O that/O was/O something/O like/O!/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O
suddenly/O appearing/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O crowd/O and/O beaming/O upon/O them/O with/O
a/O delighted/O smile/O./O ``/OCapitally/O,/O warmly/O said/O,/O was/On't/O it/O?/O Bravo/O!/O And/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON!/O Why/O,/O you/O ought/O to/O have/O said/O something/O--/Ojust/O a/O few/O words/O,/O you/O
know/O,/O to/O encourage/O them/O;/O you/O do/O that/O so/O well/O,/O''/O he/O added/O with/O a/O soft/O,/O
respectful/O,/O and/O discreet/O smile/O,/O moving/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON forward/O a/O
little/O by/O the/O arm/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'm/O just/O off/O./O''/O

``/OWhere/O to/O?/O''/O

``/OTo/O the/O country/O,/O to/O my/O brother/O's/O,/O''/O answered/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OThen/O you/O'll/O see/O my/O wife/O./O I/O've/O written/O to/O her/O,/O but/O you/O'll/O see/O her/O first/O./O
Please/O tell/O her/O that/O they/O've/O seen/O me/O and/O that/O it/O's/O `/Oall/O right/O,/O'/O as/O the/O
English/O say/O./O She/O'll/O understand/O./O Oh/O,/O and/O be/O so/O good/O as/O to/O tell/O her/O I/O'm/O
appointed/O secretary/O of/O the/O committee/O.../O./O But/O she/O'll/O understand/O!/O You/O
know/O,/O _/Oles/O petites/O misères/O de/O la/O vie/O humaine/O,/O_/O''/O he/O said/O,/O as/O it/O were/O
apologizing/O to/O the/O princess/O./O ``/OAnd/O Princess/O Myakaya/O--/Onot/O Liza/PERSON,/O but/O
Bibish/PERSON--/Ois/O sending/O a/O thousand/O guns/O and/O twelve/O nurses/O./O Did/O I/O tell/O you/O?/O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O heard/O so/O,/O''/O answered/O Koznishev/PERSON indifferently/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O a/O pity/O you/O're/O going/O away/O,/O''/O said/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O ``/OTomorrow/O
we/O're/O giving/O a/O dinner/O to/O two/O who/O're/O setting/O off/O--/ODimer-Bartnyansky/O from/O
Petersburg/LOCATION and/O our/O Veslovsky/LOCATION,/O Grisha/PERSON./O They/O're/O both/O going/O./O Veslovsky/PERSON's/O
only/O lately/O married/O./O There/O's/O a/O fine/O fellow/O for/O you/O!/O Eh/O,/O princess/O?/O''/O he/O
turned/O to/O the/O lady/O./O

The/O princess/O looked/O at/O Koznishev/LOCATION without/O replying/O./O But/O the/O fact/O that/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON and/O the/O princess/O seemed/O anxious/O to/O get/O rid/O of/O him/O did/O
not/O in/O the/O least/O disconcert/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON./O Smiling/O,/O he/O stared/O at/O
the/O feather/O in/O the/O princess/O's/O hat/O,/O and/O then/O about/O him/O as/O though/O he/O were/O
going/O to/O pick/O something/O up/O./O Seeing/O a/O lady/O approaching/O with/O a/O collecting/O
box/O,/O he/O beckoned/O her/O up/O and/O put/O in/O a/O five-rouble/O note/O./O

``/OI/O can/O never/O see/O these/O collecting/O boxes/O unmoved/O while/O I/O've/O money/O in/O my/O
pocket/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O ``/OAnd/O how/O about/O today/O's/O telegram/O?/O Fine/O chaps/O those/O
Montenegrins/O!/O''/O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O say/O so/O!/O''/O he/O cried/O,/O when/O the/O princess/O told/O him/O that/O Vronsky/PERSON
was/O going/O by/O this/O train/O./O For/O an/O instant/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON's/O face/O
looked/O sad/O,/O but/O a/O minute/O later/O,/O when/O,/O stroking/O his/O mustaches/O and/O
swinging/O as/O he/O walked/O,/O he/O went/O into/O the/O hall/O where/O Vronsky/PERSON was/O,/O he/O had/O
completely/O forgotten/O his/O own/O despairing/O sobs/O over/O his/O sister/O's/O corpse/O,/O
and/O he/O saw/O in/O Vronsky/O only/O a/O hero/O and/O an/O old/O friend/O./O

``/OWith/O all/O his/O faults/O one/O ca/On't/O refuse/O to/O do/O him/O justice/O,/O''/O said/O the/O
princess/O to/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON as/O soon/O as/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON had/O left/O
them/O./O ``/OWhat/O a/O typically/O Russian/O,/O Slav/O nature/O!/O Only/O,/O I/O'm/O afraid/O it/O wo/On't/O
be/O pleasant/O for/O Vronsky/O to/O see/O him/O./O Say/O what/O you/O will/O,/O I/O'm/O touched/O by/O
that/O man/O's/O fate/O./O Do/O talk/O to/O him/O a/O little/O on/O the/O way/O,/O''/O said/O the/O princess/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O perhaps/O,/O if/O it/O happens/O so/O./O''/O

``/OI/O never/O liked/O him/O./O But/O this/O atones/O for/O a/O great/O deal/O./O He/O's/O not/O merely/O
going/O himself/O,/O he/O's/O taking/O a/O squadron/O at/O his/O own/O expense/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O so/O I/O heard/O./O''/O

A/O bell/O sounded/O./O Everyone/O crowded/O to/O the/O doors/O./O ``/OHere/O he/O is/O!/O''/O said/O the/O
princess/O,/O indicating/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O who/O with/O his/O mother/O on/O his/O arm/O walked/O by/O,/O
wearing/O a/O long/O overcoat/O and/O wide-brimmed/O black/O hat/O./O Oblonsky/PERSON was/O walking/O
beside/O him/O,/O talking/O eagerly/O of/O something/O./O

Vronsky/O was/O frowning/O and/O looking/O straight/O before/O him/O,/O as/O though/O he/O did/O
not/O hear/O what/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON was/O saying/O./O

Probably/O on/O Oblonsky/PERSON's/O pointing/O them/O out/O,/O he/O looked/O round/O in/O the/O
direction/O where/O the/O princess/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON were/O standing/O,/O and/O
without/O speaking/O lifted/O his/O hat/O./O His/O face/O,/O aged/O and/O worn/O by/O suffering/O,/O
looked/O stony/O./O

Going/O onto/O the/O platform/O,/O Vronsky/PERSON left/O his/O mother/O and/O disappeared/O into/O a/O
compartment/O./O

On/O the/O platform/O there/O rang/O out/O ``/OGod/O save/O the/O Tsar/O,/O''/O then/O shouts/O of/O
``/Ohurrah/O!/O''/O and/O _/O``/Ojivio/O!/O''/O_/O One/O of/O the/O volunteers/O,/O a/O tall/O,/O very/O young/O man/O
with/O a/O hollow/O chest/O,/O was/O particularly/O conspicuous/O,/O bowing/O and/O waving/O his/O
felt/O hat/O and/O a/O nosegay/O over/O his/O head/O./O Then/O two/O officers/O emerged/O,/O bowing/O
too/O,/O and/O a/O stout/O man/O with/O a/O big/O beard/O,/O wearing/O a/O greasy/O forage/O cap/O./O



Chapter/O 3/O


Saying/O good-bye/O to/O the/O princess/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON was/O joined/O by/O
Katavasov/PERSON;/O together/O they/O got/O into/O a/O carriage/O full/O to/O overflowing/O,/O and/O
the/O train/O started/O./O

At/O Tsaritsino/LOCATION station/O the/O train/O was/O met/O by/O a/O chorus/O of/O young/O men/O singing/O
``/OHail/O to/O Thee/O!/O''/O Again/O the/O volunteers/O bowed/O and/O poked/O their/O heads/O out/O,/O
but/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON paid/O no/O attention/O to/O them/O./O He/O had/O had/O so/O much/O to/O
do/O with/O the/O volunteers/O that/O the/O type/O was/O familiar/O to/O him/O and/O did/O not/O
interest/O him/O./O Katavasov/PERSON,/O whose/O scientific/O work/O had/O prevented/O his/O having/O
a/O chance/O of/O observing/O them/O hitherto/O,/O was/O very/O much/O interested/O in/O them/O
and/O questioned/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON advised/O him/O to/O go/O into/O the/O second-class/O and/O talk/O to/O
them/O himself/O./O At/O the/O next/O station/O Katavasov/PERSON acted/O on/O this/O suggestion/O./O

At/O the/O first/O stop/O he/O moved/O into/O the/O second-class/O and/O made/O the/O
acquaintance/O of/O the/O volunteers/O./O They/O were/O sitting/O in/O a/O corner/O of/O the/O
carriage/O,/O talking/O loudly/O and/O obviously/O aware/O that/O the/O attention/O of/O the/O
passengers/O and/O Katavasov/PERSON as/O he/O got/O in/O was/O concentrated/O upon/O them/O./O More/O
loudly/O than/O all/O talked/O the/O tall/O,/O hollow-chested/O young/O man/O./O He/O was/O
unmistakably/O tipsy/O,/O and/O was/O relating/O some/O story/O that/O had/O occurred/O at/O his/O
school/O./O Facing/O him/O sat/O a/O middle-aged/O officer/O in/O the/O Austrian/O military/O
jacket/O of/O the/O Guards/O uniform/O./O He/O was/O listening/O with/O a/O smile/O to/O the/O
hollow-chested/O youth/O,/O and/O occasionally/O pulling/O him/O up/O./O The/O third/O,/O in/O an/O
artillery/O uniform/O,/O was/O sitting/O on/O a/O box/O beside/O them/O./O A/O fourth/O was/O
asleep/O./O

Entering/O into/O conversation/O with/O the/O youth/O,/O Katavasov/PERSON learned/O that/O he/O was/O
a/O wealthy/O Moscow/LOCATION merchant/O who/O had/O run/O through/O a/O large/O fortune/O before/O he/O
was/O two-and-twenty/O./O Katavasov/PERSON did/O not/O like/O him/O,/O because/O he/O was/O unmanly/O
and/O effeminate/O and/O sickly/O./O He/O was/O obviously/O convinced/O,/O especially/O now/O
after/O drinking/O,/O that/O he/O was/O performing/O a/O heroic/O action/O,/O and/O he/O bragged/O
of/O it/O in/O the/O most/O unpleasant/O way/O./O

The/O second/O,/O the/O retired/O officer/O,/O made/O an/O unpleasant/O impression/O too/O upon/O
Katavasov/PERSON./O He/O was/O,/O it/O seemed/O,/O a/O man/O who/O had/O tried/O everything/O./O He/O had/O
been/O on/O a/O railway/O,/O had/O been/O a/O land-steward/O,/O and/O had/O started/O factories/O,/O
and/O he/O talked/O,/O quite/O without/O necessity/O,/O of/O all/O he/O had/O done/O,/O and/O used/O
learned/O expressions/O quite/O inappropriately/O./O

The/O third/O,/O the/O artilleryman/O,/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O struck/O Katavasov/PERSON very/O
favorably/O./O He/O was/O a/O quiet/O,/O modest/O fellow/O,/O unmistakably/O impressed/O by/O the/O
knowledge/O of/O the/O officer/O and/O the/O heroic/O self-sacrifice/O of/O the/O merchant/O
and/O saying/O nothing/O about/O himself/O./O When/O Katavasov/PERSON asked/O him/O what/O had/O
impelled/O him/O to/O go/O to/O Servia/PERSON,/O he/O answered/O modestly/O:/O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O everyone/O's/O going/O./O The/O Servians/O want/O help/O,/O too/O./O I/O'm/O sorry/O for/O
them/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O artillerymen/O especially/O are/O scarce/O there/O,/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O was/On't/O long/O in/O the/O artillery/O,/O maybe/O they/O'll/O put/O me/O into/O the/O
infantry/O or/O the/O cavalry/O./O''/O

``/OInto/O the/O infantry/O when/O they/O need/O artillery/O more/O than/O anything/O?/O''/O said/O
Katavasov/PERSON,/O fancying/O from/O the/O artilleryman/O's/O apparent/O age/O that/O he/O must/O
have/O reached/O a/O fairly/O high/O grade/O./O

``/OI/O was/On't/O long/O in/O the/O artillery/O;/O I/O'm/O a/O cadet/O retired/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O and/O he/O
began/O to/O explain/O how/O he/O had/O failed/O in/O his/O examination/O./O

All/O of/O this/O together/O made/O a/O disagreeable/O impression/O on/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O and/O
when/O the/O volunteers/O got/O out/O at/O a/O station/O for/O a/O drink/O,/O Katavasov/PERSON would/O
have/O liked/O to/O compare/O his/O unfavorable/O impression/O in/O conversation/O with/O
someone/O./O There/O was/O an/O old/O man/O in/O the/O carriage/O,/O wearing/O a/O military/O
overcoat/O,/O who/O had/O been/O listening/O all/O the/O while/O to/O Katavasov/PERSON's/O
conversation/O with/O the/O volunteers/O./O When/O they/O were/O left/O alone/O,/O Katavasov/PERSON
addressed/O him/O./O

``/OWhat/O different/O positions/O they/O come/O from/O,/O all/O those/O fellows/O who/O are/O
going/O off/O there/O,/O''/O Katavasov/PERSON said/O vaguely/O,/O not/O wishing/O to/O express/O his/O own/O
opinion/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O anxious/O to/O find/O out/O the/O old/O man/O's/O views/O./O

The/O old/O man/O was/O an/O officer/O who/O had/O served/O on/O two/O campaigns/O./O He/O knew/O what/O
makes/O a/O soldier/O,/O and/O judging/O by/O the/O appearance/O and/O the/O talk/O of/O those/O
persons/O,/O by/O the/O swagger/O with/O which/O they/O had/O recourse/O to/O the/O bottle/O on/O
the/O journey/O,/O he/O considered/O them/O poor/O soldiers/O./O Moreover/O,/O he/O lived/O in/O a/O
district/O town/O,/O and/O he/O was/O longing/O to/O tell/O how/O one/O soldier/O had/O
volunteered/O from/O his/O town/O,/O a/O drunkard/O and/O a/O thief/O whom/O no/O one/O would/O
employ/O as/O a/O laborer/O./O But/O knowing/O by/O experience/O that/O in/O the/O present/O
condition/O of/O the/O public/O temper/O it/O was/O dangerous/O to/O express/O an/O opinion/O
opposed/O to/O the/O general/O one/O,/O and/O especially/O to/O criticize/O the/O volunteers/O
unfavorably/O,/O he/O too/O watched/O Katavasov/PERSON without/O committing/O himself/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O men/O are/O wanted/O there/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O laughing/O with/O his/O eyes/O./O And/O they/O
fell/O to/O talking/O of/O the/O last/O war/O news/O,/O and/O each/O concealed/O from/O the/O other/O
his/O perplexity/O as/O to/O the/O engagement/O expected/O next/O day/O,/O since/O the/O Turks/O
had/O been/O beaten/O,/O according/O to/O the/O latest/O news/O,/O at/O all/O points/O./O And/O so/O
they/O parted/O,/O neither/O giving/O expression/O to/O his/O opinion/O./O

Katavasov/PERSON went/O back/O to/O his/O own/O carriage/O,/O and/O with/O reluctant/O hypocrisy/O
reported/O to/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON his/O observations/O of/O the/O volunteers/O,/O from/O
which/O it/O would/O appear/O that/O they/O were/O capital/O fellows/O./O

At/O a/O big/O station/O at/O a/O town/O the/O volunteers/O were/O again/O greeted/O with/O shouts/O
and/O singing/O,/O again/O men/O and/O women/O with/O collecting/O boxes/O appeared/O,/O and/O
provincial/O ladies/O brought/O bouquets/O to/O the/O volunteers/O and/O followed/O them/O
into/O the/O refreshment/O room/O;/O but/O all/O this/O was/O on/O a/O much/O smaller/O and/O
feebler/O scale/O than/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION./O



Chapter/O 4/O


While/O the/O train/O was/O stopping/O at/O the/O provincial/O town/O,/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
did/O not/O go/O to/O the/O refreshment/O room/O,/O but/O walked/O up/O and/O down/O the/O platform/O./O

The/O first/O time/O he/O passed/O Vronsky/O's/O compartment/O he/O noticed/O that/O the/O
curtain/O was/O drawn/O over/O the/O window/O;/O but/O as/O he/O passed/O it/O the/O second/O time/O
he/O saw/O the/O old/O countess/O at/O the/O window/O./O She/O beckoned/O to/O Koznishev/PERSON./O

``/OI/O'm/O going/O,/O you/O see/O,/O taking/O him/O as/O far/O as/O Kursk/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O so/O I/O heard/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O standing/O at/O her/O window/O and/O
peeping/O in/O./O ``/OWhat/O a/O noble/O act/O on/O his/O part/O!/O''/O he/O added/O,/O noticing/O that/O
Vronsky/O was/O not/O in/O the/O compartment/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O after/O his/O misfortune/O,/O what/O was/O there/O for/O him/O to/O do/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O a/O terrible/O thing/O it/O was/O!/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OAh/O,/O what/O I/O have/O been/O through/O!/O But/O do/O get/O in/O.../O./O Ah/O,/O what/O I/O have/O been/O
through/O!/O''/O she/O repeated/O,/O when/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON had/O got/O in/O and/O sat/O down/O
beside/O her/O./O ``/OYou/O ca/On't/O conceive/O it/O!/O For/O six/O weeks/O he/O did/O not/O speak/O to/O
anyone/O,/O and/O would/O not/O touch/O food/O except/O when/O I/O implored/O him/O./O And/O not/O for/O
one/O minute/O could/O we/O leave/O him/O alone/O./O We/O took/O away/O everything/O he/O could/O
have/O used/O against/O himself/O./O We/O lived/O on/O the/O ground/O floor/O,/O but/O there/O was/O
no/O reckoning/O on/O anything/O./O You/O know/O,/O of/O course/O,/O that/O he/O had/O shot/O himself/O
once/O already/O on/O her/O account/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O and/O the/O old/O lady/O's/O eyelashes/O
twitched/O at/O the/O recollection/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O hers/O was/O the/O fitting/O end/O for/O such/O a/O
woman/O./O Even/O the/O death/O she/O chose/O was/O low/O and/O vulgar/O./O''/O

``/OIt/O's/O not/O for/O us/O to/O judge/O,/O countess/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON;/O ``/Obut/O I/O can/O
understand/O that/O it/O has/O been/O very/O hard/O for/O you/O./O''/O

``/OAh/O,/O do/On't/O speak/O of/O it/O!/O I/O was/O staying/O on/O my/O estate/O,/O and/O he/O was/O with/O me/O./O
A/O note/O was/O brought/O him/O./O He/O wrote/O an/O answer/O and/O sent/O it/O off/O./O We/O had/On't/O an/O
idea/O that/O she/O was/O close/O by/O at/O the/O station/O./O In/O the/O evening/O I/O had/O only/O
just/O gone/O to/O my/O room/O,/O when/O my/O Mary/PERSON told/O me/O a/O lady/O had/O thrown/O herself/O
under/O the/O train/O./O Something/O seemed/O to/O strike/O me/O at/O once/O./O I/O knew/O it/O was/O
she/O./O The/O first/O thing/O I/O said/O was/O,/O he/O was/O not/O to/O be/O told/O./O But/O they/O'd/O told/O
him/O already/O./O His/O coachman/O was/O there/O and/O saw/O it/O all/O./O When/O I/O ran/O into/O his/O
room/O,/O he/O was/O beside/O himself/O--/Oit/O was/O fearful/O to/O see/O him/O./O He/O did/On't/O say/O a/O
word/O,/O but/O galloped/O off/O there/O./O I/O do/On't/O know/O to/O this/O day/O what/O happened/O
there/O,/O but/O he/O was/O brought/O back/O at/O death/O's/O door/O./O I/O should/On't/O have/O known/O
him/O./O _/OProstration/O complete/O,/O_/O the/O doctor/O said/O./O And/O that/O was/O followed/O
almost/O by/O madness/O./O Oh/O,/O why/O talk/O of/O it/O!/O''/O said/O the/O countess/O with/O a/O wave/O of/O
her/O hand/O./O ``/OIt/O was/O an/O awful/O time/O!/O No/O,/O say/O what/O you/O will/O,/O she/O was/O a/O bad/O
woman/O./O Why/O,/O what/O is/O the/O meaning/O of/O such/O desperate/O passions/O?/O It/O was/O all/O
to/O show/O herself/O something/O out/O of/O the/O way/O./O Well/O,/O and/O that/O she/O did/O do/O./O She/O
brought/O herself/O to/O ruin/O and/O two/O good/O men/O--/Oher/O husband/O and/O my/O unhappy/O
son/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O what/O did/O her/O husband/O do/O?/O''/O asked/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OHe/O has/O taken/O her/O daughter/O./O Alexey/PERSON was/O ready/O to/O agree/O to/O anything/O at/O
first/O./O Now/O it/O worries/O him/O terribly/O that/O he/O should/O have/O given/O his/O own/O
child/O away/O to/O another/O man/O./O But/O he/O ca/On't/O take/O back/O his/O word/O./O Karenin/PERSON came/O
to/O the/O funeral/O./O But/O we/O tried/O to/O prevent/O his/O meeting/O Alexey/PERSON./O For/O him/O,/O for/O
her/O husband/O,/O it/O was/O easier/O,/O anyway/O./O She/O had/O set/O him/O free/O./O But/O my/O poor/O
son/O was/O utterly/O given/O up/O to/O her/O./O He/O had/O thrown/O up/O everything/O,/O his/O
career/O,/O me/O,/O and/O even/O then/O she/O had/O no/O mercy/O on/O him/O,/O but/O of/O set/O purpose/O
she/O made/O his/O ruin/O complete/O./O No/O,/O say/O what/O you/O will/O,/O her/O very/O death/O was/O
the/O death/O of/O a/O vile/O woman/O,/O of/O no/O religious/O feeling/O./O God/O forgive/O me/O,/O but/O
I/O ca/On't/O help/O hating/O the/O memory/O of/O her/O,/O when/O I/O look/O at/O my/O son/O's/O misery/O!/O''/O

``/OBut/O how/O is/O he/O now/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O was/O a/O blessing/O from/O Providence/LOCATION for/O us/O--/Othis/O Servian/O war/O./O I/O'm/O old/O,/O and/O
I/O do/On't/O understand/O the/O rights/O and/O wrongs/O of/O it/O,/O but/O it/O's/O come/O as/O a/O
providential/O blessing/O to/O him/O./O Of/O course/O for/O me/O,/O as/O his/O mother/O,/O it/O's/O
terrible/O;/O and/O what/O's/O worse/O,/O they/O say/O,/O _/Oce/O n'est/O pas/O très/O bien/O vu/O a/O
Pétersbourg/O_/O./O But/O it/O ca/On't/O be/O helped/O!/O It/O was/O the/O one/O thing/O that/O could/O
rouse/O him/O./O Yashvin/O--/Oa/O friend/O of/O his/O--/Ohe/O had/O lost/O all/O he/O had/O at/O cards/O and/O
he/O was/O going/O to/O Servia/PERSON./O He/O came/O to/O see/O him/O and/O persuaded/O him/O to/O go/O./O Now/O
it/O's/O an/O interest/O for/O him/O./O Do/O please/O talk/O to/O him/O a/O little/O./O I/O want/O to/O
distract/O his/O mind/O./O He/O's/O so/O low-spirited/O./O And/O as/O bad/O luck/O would/O have/O it/O,/O
he/O has/O toothache/O too/O./O But/O he/O'll/O be/O delighted/O to/O see/O you/O./O Please/O do/O talk/O
to/O him/O;/O he/O's/O walking/O up/O and/O down/O on/O that/O side/O./O''/O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON said/O he/O would/O be/O very/O glad/O to/O,/O and/O crossed/O over/O to/O the/O
other/O side/O of/O the/O station/O./O



Chapter/O 5/O


In/O the/O slanting/O evening/O shadows/O cast/O by/O the/O baggage/O piled/O up/O on/O the/O
platform/O,/O Vronsky/O in/O his/O long/O overcoat/O and/O slouch/O hat/O,/O with/O his/O hands/O in/O
his/O pockets/O,/O strode/O up/O and/O down/O,/O like/O a/O wild/O beast/O in/O a/O cage/O,/O turning/O
sharply/O after/O twenty/O paces/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON fancied/O,/O as/O he/O approached/O
him/O,/O that/O Vronsky/PERSON saw/O him/O but/O was/O pretending/O not/O to/O see/O./O This/O did/O not/O
affect/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON in/O the/O slightest/O./O He/O was/O above/O all/O personal/O
considerations/O with/O Vronsky/O./O

At/O that/O moment/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON looked/O upon/O Vronsky/O as/O a/O man/O taking/O an/O
important/O part/O in/O a/O great/O cause/O,/O and/O Koznishev/PERSON thought/O it/O his/O duty/O to/O
encourage/O him/O and/O express/O his/O approval/O./O He/O went/O up/O to/O him/O./O

Vronsky/O stood/O still/O,/O looked/O intently/O at/O him/O,/O recognized/O him/O,/O and/O going/O a/O
few/O steps/O forward/O to/O meet/O him/O,/O shook/O hands/O with/O him/O very/O warmly/O./O

``/OPossibly/O you/O did/On't/O wish/O to/O see/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O ``/Obut/O
could/On't/O I/O be/O of/O use/O to/O you/O?/O''/O
