``/OThere/O's/O no/O one/O I/O should/O less/O dislike/O seeing/O than/O you/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON./O
``/OExcuse/O me/O;/O and/O there/O's/O nothing/O in/O life/O for/O me/O to/O like/O./O''/O

``/OI/O quite/O understand/O,/O and/O I/O merely/O meant/O to/O offer/O you/O my/O services/O,/O''/O said/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O scanning/O Vronsky/PERSON's/O face/O,/O full/O of/O unmistakable/O
suffering/O./O ``/OWould/On't/O it/O be/O of/O use/O to/O you/O to/O have/O a/O letter/O to/O Ristitch/O--/Oto/O
Milan/LOCATION?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O no/O!/O''/O Vronsky/O said/O,/O seeming/O to/O understand/O him/O with/O difficulty/O./O ``/OIf/O
you/O do/On't/O mind/O,/O let/O's/O walk/O on/O./O It/O's/O so/O stuffy/O among/O the/O carriages/O./O A/O
letter/O?/O No/O,/O thank/O you/O;/O to/O meet/O death/O one/O needs/O no/O letters/O of/O
introduction/O./O Nor/O for/O the/O Turks/O.../O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O a/O smile/O that/O was/O
merely/O of/O the/O lips/O./O His/O eyes/O still/O kept/O their/O look/O of/O angry/O suffering/O./O

``/OYes/O;/O but/O you/O might/O find/O it/O easier/O to/O get/O into/O relations/O,/O which/O are/O
after/O all/O essential/O,/O with/O anyone/O prepared/O to/O see/O you/O./O But/O that/O's/O as/O you/O
like/O./O I/O was/O very/O glad/O to/O hear/O of/O your/O intention/O./O There/O have/O been/O so/O many/O
attacks/O made/O on/O the/O volunteers/O,/O and/O a/O man/O like/O you/O raises/O them/O in/O public/O
estimation/O./O''/O

``/OMy/O use/O as/O a/O man/O,/O''/O said/O Vronsky/PERSON,/O ``/Ois/O that/O life/O's/O worth/O nothing/O to/O me/O./O
And/O that/O I/O've/O enough/O bodily/O energy/O to/O cut/O my/O way/O into/O their/O ranks/O,/O and/O
to/O trample/O on/O them/O or/O fall/O--/OI/O know/O that/O./O I/O'm/O glad/O there/O's/O something/O to/O
give/O my/O life/O for/O,/O for/O it/O's/O not/O simply/O useless/O but/O loathsome/O to/O me/O./O
Anyone/O's/O welcome/O to/O it/O./O''/O And/O his/O jaw/O twitched/O impatiently/O from/O the/O
incessant/O gnawing/O toothache/O,/O that/O prevented/O him/O from/O even/O speaking/O with/O
a/O natural/O expression/O./O

``/OYou/O will/O become/O another/O man/O,/O I/O predict/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O
feeling/O touched/O./O ``/OTo/O deliver/O one/O's/O brother-men/O from/O bondage/O is/O an/O aim/O
worth/O death/O and/O life/O./O God/O grant/O you/O success/O outwardly/O--/Oand/O inwardly/O
peace/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O and/O he/O held/O out/O his/O hand/O./O Vronsky/O warmly/O pressed/O his/O
outstretched/O hand/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O as/O a/O weapon/O I/O may/O be/O of/O some/O use/O./O But/O as/O a/O man/O,/O I/O'm/O a/O wreck/O,/O''/O he/O
jerked/O out/O./O

He/O could/O hardly/O speak/O for/O the/O throbbing/O ache/O in/O his/O strong/O teeth/O,/O that/O
were/O like/O rows/O of/O ivory/O in/O his/O mouth/O./O He/O was/O silent/O,/O and/O his/O eyes/O rested/O
on/O the/O wheels/O of/O the/O tender/O,/O slowly/O and/O smoothly/O rolling/O along/O the/O
rails/O./O

And/O all/O at/O once/O a/O different/O pain/O,/O not/O an/O ache/O,/O but/O an/O inner/O trouble/O,/O
that/O set/O his/O whole/O being/O in/O anguish/O,/O made/O him/O for/O an/O instant/O forget/O his/O
toothache/O./O As/O he/O glanced/O at/O the/O tender/O and/O the/O rails/O,/O under/O the/O
influence/O of/O the/O conversation/O with/O a/O friend/O he/O had/O not/O met/O since/O his/O
misfortune/O,/O he/O suddenly/O recalled/O _/Oher/O_/O--/Othat/O is/O,/O what/O was/O left/O of/O her/O
when/O he/O had/O run/O like/O one/O distraught/O into/O the/O cloak/O room/O of/O the/O railway/O
station/O--/Oon/O the/O table/O,/O shamelessly/O sprawling/O out/O among/O strangers/O,/O the/O
bloodstained/O body/O so/O lately/O full/O of/O life/O;/O the/O head/O unhurt/O dropping/O back/O
with/O its/O weight/O of/O hair/O,/O and/O the/O curling/O tresses/O about/O the/O temples/O,/O and/O
the/O exquisite/O face/O,/O with/O red/O,/O half-opened/O mouth/O,/O the/O strange/O,/O fixed/O
expression/O,/O piteous/O on/O the/O lips/O and/O awful/O in/O the/O still/O open/O eyes/O,/O that/O
seemed/O to/O utter/O that/O fearful/O phrase/O--/Othat/O he/O would/O be/O sorry/O for/O it/O--/Othat/O
she/O had/O said/O when/O they/O were/O quarreling/O./O

And/O he/O tried/O to/O think/O of/O her/O as/O she/O was/O when/O he/O met/O her/O the/O first/O time/O,/O
at/O a/O railway/O station/O too/O,/O mysterious/O,/O exquisite/O,/O loving/O,/O seeking/O and/O
giving/O happiness/O,/O and/O not/O cruelly/O revengeful/O as/O he/O remembered/O her/O on/O
that/O last/O moment/O./O He/O tried/O to/O recall/O his/O best/O moments/O with/O her/O,/O but/O
those/O moments/O were/O poisoned/O forever/O./O He/O could/O only/O think/O of/O her/O as/O
triumphant/O,/O successful/O in/O her/O menace/O of/O a/O wholly/O useless/O remorse/O never/O
to/O be/O effaced/O./O He/O lost/O all/O consciousness/O of/O toothache/O,/O and/O his/O face/O
worked/O with/O sobs/O./O

Passing/O twice/O up/O and/O down/O beside/O the/O baggage/O in/O silence/O and/O regaining/O
his/O self-possession/O,/O he/O addressed/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON calmly/O:/O

``/OYou/O have/O had/O no/O telegrams/O since/O yesterday/O's/O?/O Yes/O,/O driven/O back/O for/O a/O
third/O time/O,/O but/O a/O decisive/O engagement/O expected/O for/O tomorrow/O./O''/O

And/O after/O talking/O a/O little/O more/O of/O King/ORGANIZATION Milan/ORGANIZATION's/O proclamation/O,/O and/O the/O
immense/O effect/O it/O might/O have/O,/O they/O parted/O,/O going/O to/O their/O carriages/O on/O
hearing/O the/O second/O bell/O./O



Chapter/O 6/O


Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON had/O not/O telegraphed/O to/O his/O brother/O to/O send/O to/O meet/O
him/O,/O as/O he/O did/O not/O know/O when/O he/O should/O be/O able/O to/O leave/O Moscow/LOCATION./O Levin/PERSON
was/O not/O at/O home/O when/O Katavasov/PERSON and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON in/O a/O fly/O hired/O at/O
the/O station/O drove/O up/O to/O the/O steps/O of/O the/O Pokrovskoe/O house/O,/O as/O black/O as/O
Moors/O from/O the/O dust/O of/O the/O road/O./O Kitty/PERSON,/O sitting/O on/O the/O balcony/O with/O her/O
father/O and/O sister/O,/O recognized/O her/O brother-in-law/O,/O and/O ran/O down/O to/O meet/O
him/O./O

``/OWhat/O a/O shame/O not/O to/O have/O let/O us/O know/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O giving/O her/O hand/O to/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O and/O putting/O her/O forehead/O up/O for/O him/O to/O kiss/O./O

``/OWe/O drove/O here/O capitally/O,/O and/O have/O not/O put/O you/O out/O,/O''/O answered/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON./O ``/OI/O'm/O so/O dirty/O./O I/O'm/O afraid/O to/O touch/O you/O./O I/O've/O been/O so/O busy/O,/O I/O
did/On't/O know/O when/O I/O should/O be/O able/O to/O tear/O myself/O away/O./O And/O so/O you/O're/O
still/O as/O ever/O enjoying/O your/O peaceful/O,/O quiet/O happiness/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O
smiling/O,/O ``/Oout/O of/O the/O reach/O of/O the/O current/O in/O your/O peaceful/O backwater/O./O
Here/O's/O our/O friend/O Fyodor/PERSON Vassilievitch/PERSON who/O has/O succeeded/O in/O getting/O here/O
at/O last/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O'm/O not/O a/O negro/O,/O I/O shall/O look/O like/O a/O human/O being/O when/O I/O wash/O,/O''/O said/O
Katavasov/PERSON in/O his/O jesting/O fashion/O,/O and/O he/O shook/O hands/O and/O smiled/O,/O his/O
teeth/O flashing/O white/O in/O his/O black/O face/O./O

``/OKostya/PERSON will/O be/O delighted/O./O He/O has/O gone/O to/O his/O settlement/O./O It/O's/O time/O he/O
should/O be/O home/O./O''/O

``/OBusy/O as/O ever/O with/O his/O farming/O./O It/O really/O is/O a/O peaceful/O backwater/O,/O''/O said/O
Katavasov/PERSON;/O ``/Owhile/O we/O in/O town/O think/O of/O nothing/O but/O the/O Servian/O war/O./O Well/O,/O
how/O does/O our/O friend/O look/O at/O it/O?/O He/O's/O sure/O not/O to/O think/O like/O other/O
people/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O do/On't/O know/O,/O like/O everybody/O else/O,/O''/O Kitty/PERSON answered/O,/O a/O little/O
embarrassed/O,/O looking/O round/O at/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O ``/OI/O'll/O send/O to/O fetch/O
him/O./O Papa/O's/O staying/O with/O us/O./O He/O's/O only/O just/O come/O home/O from/O abroad/O./O''/O

And/O making/O arrangements/O to/O send/O for/O Levin/PERSON and/O for/O the/O guests/O to/O wash/O,/O
one/O in/O his/O room/O and/O the/O other/O in/O what/O had/O been/O Dolly/PERSON's/O,/O and/O giving/O
orders/O for/O their/O luncheon/O,/O Kitty/PERSON ran/O out/O onto/O the/O balcony/O,/O enjoying/O the/O
freedom/O,/O and/O rapidity/O of/O movement/O,/O of/O which/O she/O had/O been/O deprived/O during/O
the/O months/O of/O her/O pregnancy/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON and/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O a/O professor/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O that/O's/O a/O bore/O in/O this/O heat/O,/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O papa/O,/O he/O's/O very/O nice/O,/O and/O Kostya/PERSON's/O very/O fond/O of/O him/O,/O''/O Kitty/PERSON said/O,/O
with/O a/O deprecating/O smile/O,/O noticing/O the/O irony/O on/O her/O father/O's/O face/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O did/On't/O say/O anything/O./O''/O

``/OYou/O go/O to/O them/O,/O darling/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON to/O her/O sister/O,/O ``/Oand/O entertain/O
them/O./O They/O saw/O Stiva/PERSON at/O the/O station/O;/O he/O was/O quite/O well/O./O And/O I/O must/O run/O
to/O Mitya/PERSON./O As/O ill-luck/O would/O have/O it/O,/O I/O have/On't/O fed/O him/O since/O tea/O./O He/O's/O
awake/O now/O,/O and/O sure/O to/O be/O screaming/O./O''/O And/O feeling/O a/O rush/O of/O milk/O,/O she/O
hurried/O to/O the/O nursery/O./O

This/O was/O not/O a/O mere/O guess/O;/O her/O connection/O with/O the/O child/O was/O still/O so/O
close/O,/O that/O she/O could/O gauge/O by/O the/O flow/O of/O her/O milk/O his/O need/O of/O food/O,/O
and/O knew/O for/O certain/O he/O was/O hungry/O./O

She/O knew/O he/O was/O crying/O before/O she/O reached/O the/O nursery/O./O And/O he/O was/O indeed/O
crying/O./O She/O heard/O him/O and/O hastened/O./O But/O the/O faster/O she/O went/O,/O the/O louder/O
he/O screamed/O./O It/O was/O a/O fine/O healthy/O scream/O,/O hungry/O and/O impatient/O./O

``/OHas/O he/O been/O screaming/O long/O,/O nurse/O,/O very/O long/O?/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON hurriedly/O,/O
seating/O herself/O on/O a/O chair/O,/O and/O preparing/O to/O give/O the/O baby/O the/O breast/O./O
``/OBut/O give/O me/O him/O quickly/O./O Oh/O,/O nurse/O,/O how/O tiresome/O you/O are/O!/O There/O,/O tie/O
the/O cap/O afterwards/O,/O do/O!/O''/O

The/O baby/O's/O greedy/O scream/O was/O passing/O into/O sobs/O./O

``/OBut/O you/O ca/On't/O manage/O so/O,/O ma'am/O,/O''/O said/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O who/O was/O almost/O
always/O to/O be/O found/O in/O the/O nursery/O./O ``/OHe/O must/O be/O put/O straight/O./O A-oo/O!/O
a-oo/O!/O''/O she/O chanted/O over/O him/O,/O paying/O no/O attention/O to/O the/O mother/O./O

The/O nurse/O brought/O the/O baby/O to/O his/O mother/O./O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON followed/O him/O
with/O a/O face/O dissolving/O with/O tenderness/O./O

``/OHe/O knows/O me/O,/O he/O knows/O me/O./O In/O God/O's/O faith/O,/O Katerina/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O ma'am/O,/O
he/O knew/O me/O!/O''/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON cried/O above/O the/O baby/O's/O screams/O./O

But/O Kitty/PERSON did/O not/O hear/O her/O words/O./O Her/O impatience/O kept/O growing/O,/O like/O the/O
baby/O's/O./O

Their/O impatience/O hindered/O things/O for/O a/O while/O./O The/O baby/O could/O not/O get/O
hold/O of/O the/O breast/O right/O,/O and/O was/O furious/O./O

At/O last/O,/O after/O despairing/O,/O breathless/O screaming/O,/O and/O vain/O sucking/O,/O
things/O went/O right/O,/O and/O mother/O and/O child/O felt/O simultaneously/O soothed/O,/O and/O
both/O subsided/O into/O calm/O./O

``/OBut/O poor/O darling/O,/O he/O's/O all/O in/O perspiration/O!/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON in/O a/O whisper/O,/O
touching/O the/O baby/O./O

``/OWhat/O makes/O you/O think/O he/O knows/O you/O?/O''/O she/O added/O,/O with/O a/O sidelong/O glance/O
at/O the/O baby/O's/O eyes/O,/O that/O peered/O roguishly/O,/O as/O she/O fancied/O,/O from/O under/O
his/O cap/O,/O at/O his/O rhythmically/O puffing/O cheeks/O,/O and/O the/O little/O red-palmed/O
hand/O he/O was/O waving/O./O

``/OImpossible/O!/O If/O he/O knew/O anyone/O,/O he/O would/O have/O known/O me/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON,/O in/O
response/O to/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON's/O statement/O,/O and/O she/O smiled/O./O

She/O smiled/O because/O,/O though/O she/O said/O he/O could/O not/O know/O her/O,/O in/O her/O heart/O
she/O was/O sure/O that/O he/O knew/O not/O merely/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O but/O that/O he/O knew/O
and/O understood/O everything/O,/O and/O knew/O and/O understood/O a/O great/O deal/O too/O that/O
no/O one/O else/O knew/O,/O and/O that/O she/O,/O his/O mother/O,/O had/O learned/O and/O come/O to/O
understand/O only/O through/O him/O./O To/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O to/O the/O nurse/O,/O to/O his/O
grandfather/O,/O to/O his/O father/O even/O,/O Mitya/PERSON was/O a/O living/O being/O,/O requiring/O
only/O material/O care/O,/O but/O for/O his/O mother/O he/O had/O long/O been/O a/O mortal/O being/O,/O
with/O whom/O there/O had/O been/O a/O whole/O series/O of/O spiritual/O relations/O already/O./O

``/OWhen/O he/O wakes/O up/O,/O please/O God/O,/O you/O shall/O see/O for/O yourself/O./O Then/O when/O I/O
do/O like/O this/O,/O he/O simply/O beams/O on/O me/O,/O the/O darling/O!/O Simply/O beams/O like/O a/O
sunny/O day/O!/O''/O said/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O well/O;/O then/O we/O shall/O see/O,/O''/O whispered/O Kitty/PERSON./O ``/OBut/O now/O go/O away/O,/O he/O's/O
going/O to/O sleep/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 7/O


Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON went/O out/O on/O tiptoe/O;/O the/O nurse/O let/O down/O the/O blind/O,/O
chased/O a/O fly/O out/O from/O under/O the/O muslin/O canopy/O of/O the/O crib/O,/O and/O a/O
bumblebee/O struggling/O on/O the/O window-frame/O,/O and/O sat/O down/O waving/O a/O faded/O
branch/O of/O birch/O over/O the/O mother/O and/O the/O baby/O./O

``/OHow/O hot/O it/O is/O!/O if/O God/O would/O send/O a/O drop/O of/O rain/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O sh/O--/Osh/O--/Osh/O--/O''/O was/O all/O Kitty/PERSON answered/O,/O rocking/O a/O little/O,/O and/O
tenderly/O squeezing/O the/O plump/O little/O arm/O,/O with/O rolls/O of/O fat/O at/O the/O wrist/O,/O
which/O Mitya/PERSON still/O waved/O feebly/O as/O he/O opened/O and/O shut/O his/O eyes/O./O That/O hand/O
worried/O Kitty/PERSON;/O she/O longed/O to/O kiss/O the/O little/O hand/O,/O but/O was/O afraid/O to/O for/O
fear/O of/O waking/O the/O baby/O./O At/O last/O the/O little/O hand/O ceased/O waving/O,/O and/O the/O
eyes/O closed/O./O Only/O from/O time/O to/O time/O,/O as/O he/O went/O on/O sucking/O,/O the/O baby/O
raised/O his/O long/O,/O curly/O eyelashes/O and/O peeped/O at/O his/O mother/O with/O wet/O eyes/O,/O
that/O looked/O black/O in/O the/O twilight/O./O The/O nurse/O had/O left/O off/O fanning/O,/O and/O
was/O dozing/O./O From/O above/O came/O the/O peals/O of/O the/O old/O prince/O's/O voice/O,/O and/O the/O
chuckle/O of/O Katavasov/PERSON./O

``/OThey/O have/O got/O into/O talk/O without/O me/O,/O''/O thought/O Kitty/PERSON,/O ``/Obut/O still/O it/O's/O
vexing/O that/O Kostya/PERSON's/O out/O./O He/O's/O sure/O to/O have/O gone/O to/O the/O bee/O house/O again/O./O
Though/O it/O's/O a/O pity/O he/O's/O there/O so/O often/O,/O still/O I/O'm/O glad/O./O It/O distracts/O his/O
mind/O./O He/O's/O become/O altogether/O happier/O and/O better/O now/O than/O in/O the/O spring/O./O
He/O used/O to/O be/O so/O gloomy/O and/O worried/O that/O I/O felt/O frightened/O for/O him/O./O And/O
how/O absurd/O he/O is/O!/O''/O she/O whispered/O,/O smiling/O./O

She/O knew/O what/O worried/O her/O husband/O./O It/O was/O his/O unbelief/O./O Although/O,/O if/O she/O
had/O been/O asked/O whether/O she/O supposed/O that/O in/O the/O future/O life/O,/O if/O he/O did/O
not/O believe/O,/O he/O would/O be/O damned/O,/O she/O would/O have/O had/O to/O admit/O that/O he/O
would/O be/O damned/O,/O his/O unbelief/O did/O not/O cause/O her/O unhappiness/O./O And/O she/O,/O
confessing/O that/O for/O an/O unbeliever/O there/O can/O be/O no/O salvation/O,/O and/O loving/O
her/O husband/O's/O soul/O more/O than/O anything/O in/O the/O world/O,/O thought/O with/O a/O smile/O
of/O his/O unbelief/O,/O and/O told/O herself/O that/O he/O was/O absurd/O./O

``/OWhat/O does/O he/O keep/O reading/O philosophy/O of/O some/O sort/O for/O all/O this/O year/O?/O''/O
she/O wondered/O./O ``/OIf/O it/O's/O all/O written/O in/O those/O books/O,/O he/O can/O understand/O
them/O./O If/O it/O's/O all/O wrong/O,/O why/O does/O he/O read/O them/O?/O He/O says/O himself/O that/O he/O
would/O like/O to/O believe/O./O Then/O why/O is/O it/O he/O does/On't/O believe/O?/O Surely/O from/O
his/O thinking/O so/O much/O?/O And/O he/O thinks/O so/O much/O from/O being/O solitary/O./O He/O's/O
always/O alone/O,/O alone/O./O He/O ca/On't/O talk/O about/O it/O all/O to/O us/O./O I/O fancy/O he/O'll/O be/O
glad/O of/O these/O visitors/O,/O especially/O Katavasov/PERSON./O He/O likes/O discussions/O with/O
them/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O,/O and/O passed/O instantly/O to/O the/O consideration/O of/O where/O
it/O would/O be/O more/O convenient/O to/O put/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O to/O sleep/O alone/O or/O to/O share/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O room/O./O And/O then/O an/O idea/O suddenly/O struck/O her/O,/O which/O
made/O her/O shudder/O and/O even/O disturb/O Mitya/PERSON,/O who/O glanced/O severely/O at/O her/O./O ``/OI/O
do/O believe/O the/O laundress/O has/On't/O sent/O the/O washing/O yet/O,/O and/O all/O the/O best/O
sheets/O are/O in/O use/O./O If/O I/O do/On't/O see/O to/O it/O,/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON will/O give/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON the/O wrong/O sheets/O,/O''/O and/O at/O the/O very/O idea/O of/O this/O the/O
blood/O rushed/O to/O Kitty/PERSON's/O face/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O will/O arrange/O it/O,/O''/O she/O decided/O,/O and/O going/O back/O to/O her/O former/O
thoughts/O,/O she/O remembered/O that/O some/O spiritual/O question/O of/O importance/O had/O
been/O interrupted/O,/O and/O she/O began/O to/O recall/O what/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O Kostya/PERSON,/O an/O
unbeliever/O,/O''/O she/O thought/O again/O with/O a/O smile/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O an/O unbeliever/O then/O!/O Better/O let/O him/O always/O be/O one/O than/O like/O Madame/PERSON
Stahl/PERSON,/O or/O what/O I/O tried/O to/O be/O in/O those/O days/O abroad/O./O No/O,/O he/O wo/On't/O ever/O
sham/O anything/O./O''/O

And/O a/O recent/O instance/O of/O his/O goodness/O rose/O vividly/O to/O her/O mind/O./O A/O
fortnight/O ago/O a/O penitent/O letter/O had/O come/O from/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON to/O
Dolly/PERSON./O He/O besought/O her/O to/O save/O his/O honor/O,/O to/O sell/O her/O estate/O to/O pay/O his/O
debts/O./O Dolly/PERSON was/O in/O despair/O,/O she/O detested/O her/O husband/O,/O despised/O him/O,/O
pitied/O him/O,/O resolved/O on/O a/O separation/O,/O resolved/O to/O refuse/O,/O but/O ended/O by/O
agreeing/O to/O sell/O part/O of/O her/O property/O./O After/O that/O,/O with/O an/O irrepressible/O
smile/O of/O tenderness/O,/O Kitty/PERSON recalled/O her/O husband/O's/O shamefaced/O
embarrassment/O,/O his/O repeated/O awkward/O efforts/O to/O approach/O the/O subject/O,/O and/O
how/O at/O last/O,/O having/O thought/O of/O the/O one/O means/O of/O helping/O Dolly/PERSON without/O
wounding/O her/O pride/O,/O he/O had/O suggested/O to/O Kitty/PERSON--/Owhat/O had/O not/O occurred/O to/O
her/O before/O--/Othat/O she/O should/O give/O up/O her/O share/O of/O the/O property/O./O

``/OHe/O an/O unbeliever/O indeed/O!/O With/O his/O heart/O,/O his/O dread/O of/O offending/O anyone/O,/O
even/O a/O child/O!/O Everything/O for/O others/O,/O nothing/O for/O himself/O./O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON simply/O considers/O it/O as/O Kostya/PERSON's/O duty/O to/O be/O his/O steward/O./O And/O
it/O's/O the/O same/O with/O his/O sister/O./O Now/O Dolly/PERSON and/O her/O children/O are/O under/O his/O
guardianship/O;/O all/O these/O peasants/O who/O come/O to/O him/O every/O day/O,/O as/O though/O he/O
were/O bound/O to/O be/O at/O their/O service/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O only/O be/O like/O your/O father/O,/O only/O like/O him/O,/O''/O she/O said/O,/O handing/O Mitya/PERSON
over/O to/O the/O nurse/O,/O and/O putting/O her/O lips/O to/O his/O cheek/O./O



Chapter/O 8/O


Ever/O since/O,/O by/O his/O beloved/O brother/O's/O deathbed/O,/O Levin/PERSON had/O first/O glanced/O
into/O the/O questions/O of/O life/O and/O death/O in/O the/O light/O of/O these/O new/O
convictions/O,/O as/O he/O called/O them/O,/O which/O had/O during/O the/O period/O from/O his/O
twentieth/O to/O his/O thirty-fourth/O year/O imperceptibly/O replaced/O his/O childish/O
and/O youthful/O beliefs/O--/Ohe/O had/O been/O stricken/O with/O horror/O,/O not/O so/O much/O of/O
death/O,/O as/O of/O life/O,/O without/O any/O knowledge/O of/O whence/O,/O and/O why/O,/O and/O how/O,/O
and/O what/O it/O was/O./O The/O physical/O organization/O,/O its/O decay/O,/O the/O
indestructibility/O of/O matter/O,/O the/O law/O of/O the/O conservation/O of/O energy/O,/O
evolution/O,/O were/O the/O words/O which/O usurped/O the/O place/O of/O his/O old/O belief/O./O
These/O words/O and/O the/O ideas/O associated/O with/O them/O were/O very/O well/O for/O
intellectual/O purposes/O./O But/O for/O life/O they/O yielded/O nothing/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON felt/O
suddenly/O like/O a/O man/O who/O has/O changed/O his/O warm/O fur/O cloak/O for/O a/O muslin/O
garment/O,/O and/O going/O for/O the/O first/O time/O into/O the/O frost/O is/O immediately/O
convinced/O,/O not/O by/O reason/O,/O but/O by/O his/O whole/O nature/O that/O he/O is/O as/O good/O as/O
naked/O,/O and/O that/O he/O must/O infallibly/O perish/O miserably/O./O

From/O that/O moment/O,/O though/O he/O did/O not/O distinctly/O face/O it/O,/O and/O still/O went/O
on/O living/O as/O before/O,/O Levin/PERSON had/O never/O lost/O this/O sense/O of/O terror/O at/O his/O
lack/O of/O knowledge/O./O

He/O vaguely/O felt/O,/O too/O,/O that/O what/O he/O called/O his/O new/O convictions/O were/O not/O
merely/O lack/O of/O knowledge/O,/O but/O that/O they/O were/O part/O of/O a/O whole/O order/O of/O
ideas/O,/O in/O which/O no/O knowledge/O of/O what/O he/O needed/O was/O possible/O./O

At/O first/O,/O marriage/O,/O with/O the/O new/O joys/O and/O duties/O bound/O up/O with/O it/O,/O had/O
completely/O crowded/O out/O these/O thoughts/O./O But/O of/O late/O,/O while/O he/O was/O staying/O
in/O Moscow/LOCATION after/O his/O wife/O's/O confinement/O,/O with/O nothing/O to/O do/O,/O the/O question/O
that/O clamored/O for/O solution/O had/O more/O and/O more/O often/O,/O more/O and/O more/O
insistently/O,/O haunted/O Levin/PERSON's/O mind/O./O

The/O question/O was/O summed/O up/O for/O him/O thus/O:/O ``/OIf/O I/O do/O not/O accept/O the/O answers/O
Christianity/O gives/O to/O the/O problems/O of/O my/O life/O,/O what/O answers/O do/O I/O
accept/O?/O''/O And/O in/O the/O whole/O arsenal/O of/O his/O convictions/O,/O so/O far/O from/O
finding/O any/O satisfactory/O answers/O,/O he/O was/O utterly/O unable/O to/O find/O anything/O
at/O all/O like/O an/O answer/O./O

He/O was/O in/O the/O position/O of/O a/O man/O seeking/O food/O in/O toy/O shops/O and/O tool/O
shops/O./O

Instinctively/O,/O unconsciously/O,/O with/O every/O book/O,/O with/O every/O conversation/O,/O
with/O every/O man/O he/O met/O,/O he/O was/O on/O the/O lookout/O for/O light/O on/O these/O
questions/O and/O their/O solution/O./O

What/O puzzled/O and/O distracted/O him/O above/O everything/O was/O that/O the/O majority/O
of/O men/O of/O his/O age/O and/O circle/O had/O,/O like/O him/O,/O exchanged/O their/O old/O beliefs/O
for/O the/O same/O new/O convictions/O,/O and/O yet/O saw/O nothing/O to/O lament/O in/O this/O,/O and/O
were/O perfectly/O satisfied/O and/O serene/O./O So/O that/O,/O apart/O from/O the/O principal/O
question/O,/O Levin/PERSON was/O tortured/O by/O other/O questions/O too/O./O Were/O these/O people/O
sincere/O?/O he/O asked/O himself/O,/O or/O were/O they/O playing/O a/O part/O?/O or/O was/O it/O that/O
they/O understood/O the/O answers/O science/O gave/O to/O these/O problems/O in/O some/O
different/O,/O clearer/O sense/O than/O he/O did/O?/O And/O he/O assiduously/O studied/O both/O
these/O men/O's/O opinions/O and/O the/O books/O which/O treated/O of/O these/O scientific/O
explanations/O./O

One/O fact/O he/O had/O found/O out/O since/O these/O questions/O had/O engrossed/O his/O mind/O,/O
was/O that/O he/O had/O been/O quite/O wrong/O in/O supposing/O from/O the/O recollections/O of/O
the/O circle/O of/O his/O young/O days/O at/O college/O,/O that/O religion/O had/O outlived/O its/O
day/O,/O and/O that/O it/O was/O now/O practically/O non-existent/O./O All/O the/O people/O
nearest/O to/O him/O who/O were/O good/O in/O their/O lives/O were/O believers/O./O The/O old/O
prince/O,/O and/O Lvov/LOCATION,/O whom/O he/O liked/O so/O much/O,/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O and/O all/O
the/O women/O believed/O,/O and/O his/O wife/O believed/O as/O simply/O as/O he/O had/O believed/O
in/O his/O earliest/O childhood/O,/O and/O ninety-nine/O hundredths/O of/O the/O Russian/O
people/O,/O all/O the/O working/O people/O for/O whose/O life/O he/O felt/O the/O deepest/O
respect/O,/O believed/O./O

Another/O fact/O of/O which/O he/O became/O convinced/O,/O after/O reading/O many/O scientific/O
books/O,/O was/O that/O the/O men/O who/O shared/O his/O views/O had/O no/O other/O construction/O
to/O put/O on/O them/O,/O and/O that/O they/O gave/O no/O explanation/O of/O the/O questions/O which/O
he/O felt/O he/O could/O not/O live/O without/O answering/O,/O but/O simply/O ignored/O their/O
existence/O and/O attempted/O to/O explain/O other/O questions/O of/O no/O possible/O
interest/O to/O him/O,/O such/O as/O the/O evolution/O of/O organisms/O,/O the/O materialistic/O
theory/O of/O consciousness/O,/O and/O so/O forth/O./O

Moreover/O,/O during/O his/O wife/O's/O confinement/O,/O something/O had/O happened/O that/O
seemed/O extraordinary/O to/O him/O./O He/O,/O an/O unbeliever/O,/O had/O fallen/O into/O praying/O,/O
and/O at/O the/O moment/O he/O prayed/O,/O he/O believed/O./O But/O that/O moment/O had/O passed/O,/O
and/O he/O could/O not/O make/O his/O state/O of/O mind/O at/O that/O moment/O fit/O into/O the/O rest/O
of/O his/O life/O./O

He/O could/O not/O admit/O that/O at/O that/O moment/O he/O knew/O the/O truth/O,/O and/O that/O now/O
he/O was/O wrong/O;/O for/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O began/O thinking/O calmly/O about/O it/O,/O it/O all/O
fell/O to/O pieces/O./O He/O could/O not/O admit/O that/O he/O was/O mistaken/O then/O,/O for/O his/O
spiritual/O condition/O then/O was/O precious/O to/O him/O,/O and/O to/O admit/O that/O it/O was/O a/O
proof/O of/O weakness/O would/O have/O been/O to/O desecrate/O those/O moments/O./O He/O was/O
miserably/O divided/O against/O himself/O,/O and/O strained/O all/O his/O spiritual/O forces/O
to/O the/O utmost/O to/O escape/O from/O this/O condition/O./O



Chapter/O 9/O


These/O doubts/O fretted/O and/O harassed/O him/O,/O growing/O weaker/O or/O stronger/O from/O
time/O to/O time/O,/O but/O never/O leaving/O him/O./O He/O read/O and/O thought/O,/O and/O the/O more/O
he/O read/O and/O the/O more/O he/O thought/O,/O the/O further/O he/O felt/O from/O the/O aim/O he/O was/O
pursuing/O./O

Of/O late/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION and/O in/O the/O country/O,/O since/O he/O had/O become/O convinced/O that/O
he/O would/O find/O no/O solution/O in/O the/O materialists/O,/O he/O had/O read/O and/O re-read/O
thoroughly/O Plato/ORGANIZATION,/O Spinoza/PERSON,/O Kant/PERSON,/O Schelling/PERSON,/O Hegel/PERSON,/O and/O Schopenhauer/PERSON,/O the/O
philosophers/O who/O gave/O a/O non-materialistic/O explanation/O of/O life/O./O

Their/O ideas/O seemed/O to/O him/O fruitful/O when/O he/O was/O reading/O or/O was/O himself/O
seeking/O arguments/O to/O refute/O other/O theories/O,/O especially/O those/O of/O the/O
materialists/O;/O but/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O began/O to/O read/O or/O sought/O for/O himself/O a/O
solution/O of/O problems/O,/O the/O same/O thing/O always/O happened/O./O As/O long/O as/O he/O
followed/O the/O fixed/O definition/O of/O obscure/O words/O such/O as/O _/Ospirit/O,/O will/O,/O
freedom/O,/O essence/O,/O_/O purposely/O letting/O himself/O go/O into/O the/O snare/O of/O words/O
the/O philosophers/O set/O for/O him/O,/O he/O seemed/O to/O comprehend/O something/O./O But/O he/O
had/O only/O to/O forget/O the/O artificial/O train/O of/O reasoning/O,/O and/O to/O turn/O from/O
life/O itself/O to/O what/O had/O satisfied/O him/O while/O thinking/O in/O accordance/O with/O
the/O fixed/O definitions/O,/O and/O all/O this/O artificial/O edifice/O fell/O to/O pieces/O at/O
once/O like/O a/O house/O of/O cards/O,/O and/O it/O became/O clear/O that/O the/O edifice/O had/O
been/O built/O up/O out/O of/O those/O transposed/O words/O,/O apart/O from/O anything/O in/O life/O
more/O important/O than/O reason/O./O

At/O one/O time/O,/O reading/O Schopenhauer/PERSON,/O he/O put/O in/O place/O of/O his/O will/O the/O word/O
_/Olove/O_/O,/O and/O for/O a/O couple/O of/O days/O this/O new/O philosophy/O charmed/O him/O,/O till/O
he/O removed/O a/O little/O away/O from/O it/O./O But/O then/O,/O when/O he/O turned/O from/O life/O
itself/O to/O glance/O at/O it/O again/O,/O it/O fell/O away/O too/O,/O and/O proved/O to/O be/O the/O
same/O muslin/O garment/O with/O no/O warmth/O in/O it/O./O

His/O brother/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON advised/O him/O to/O read/O the/O theological/O works/O
of/O Homiakov/PERSON./O Levin/PERSON read/O the/O second/O volume/O of/O Homiakov/PERSON's/O works/O,/O and/O in/O
spite/O of/O the/O elegant/O,/O epigrammatic/O,/O argumentative/O style/O which/O at/O first/O
repelled/O him/O,/O he/O was/O impressed/O by/O the/O doctrine/O of/O the/O church/O he/O found/O in/O
them/O./O He/O was/O struck/O at/O first/O by/O the/O idea/O that/O the/O apprehension/O of/O divine/O
truths/O had/O not/O been/O vouchsafed/O to/O man/O,/O but/O to/O a/O corporation/O of/O men/O bound/O
together/O by/O love/O--/Oto/O the/O church/O./O What/O delighted/O him/O was/O the/O thought/O how/O
much/O easier/O it/O was/O to/O believe/O in/O a/O still/O existing/O living/O church/O,/O
embracing/O all/O the/O beliefs/O of/O men/O,/O and/O having/O God/O at/O its/O head/O,/O and/O
therefore/O holy/O and/O infallible/O,/O and/O from/O it/O to/O accept/O the/O faith/O in/O God/O,/O
in/O the/O creation/O,/O the/O fall/O,/O the/O redemption/O,/O than/O to/O begin/O with/O God/O,/O a/O
mysterious/O,/O far-away/O God/O,/O the/O creation/O,/O etc./O./O But/O afterwards/O,/O on/O reading/O
a/O Catholic/O writer/O's/O history/O of/O the/O church/O,/O and/O then/O a/O Greek/O orthodox/O
writer/O's/O history/O of/O the/O church/O,/O and/O seeing/O that/O the/O two/O churches/O,/O in/O
their/O very/O conception/O infallible/O,/O each/O deny/O the/O authority/O of/O the/O other/O,/O
Homiakov/PERSON's/O doctrine/O of/O the/O church/O lost/O all/O its/O charm/O for/O him/O,/O and/O this/O
edifice/O crumbled/O into/O dust/O like/O the/O philosophers/O'/O edifices/O./O

All/O that/O spring/O he/O was/O not/O himself/O,/O and/O went/O through/O fearful/O moments/O of/O
horror/O./O

``/OWithout/O knowing/O what/O I/O am/O and/O why/O I/O am/O here/O,/O life/O's/O impossible/O;/O and/O
that/O I/O ca/On't/O know/O,/O and/O so/O I/O ca/On't/O live/O,/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O to/O himself/O./O

``/OIn/O infinite/O time/O,/O in/O infinite/O matter/O,/O in/O infinite/O space/O,/O is/O formed/O a/O
bubble-organism/O,/O and/O that/O bubble/O lasts/O a/O while/O and/O bursts/O,/O and/O that/O
bubble/O is/O Me/O./O''/O

It/O was/O an/O agonizing/O error/O,/O but/O it/O was/O the/O sole/O logical/O result/O of/O ages/O of/O
human/O thought/O in/O that/O direction/O./O

This/O was/O the/O ultimate/O belief/O on/O which/O all/O the/O systems/O elaborated/O by/O
human/O thought/O in/O almost/O all/O their/O ramifications/O rested/O./O It/O was/O the/O
prevalent/O conviction/O,/O and/O of/O all/O other/O explanations/O Levin/PERSON had/O
unconsciously/O,/O not/O knowing/O when/O or/O how/O,/O chosen/O it/O,/O as/O anyway/O the/O
clearest/O,/O and/O made/O it/O his/O own/O./O

But/O it/O was/O not/O merely/O a/O falsehood/O,/O it/O was/O the/O cruel/O jeer/O of/O some/O wicked/O
power/O,/O some/O evil/O,/O hateful/O power/O,/O to/O whom/O one/O could/O not/O submit/O./O

He/O must/O escape/O from/O this/O power/O./O And/O the/O means/O of/O escape/O every/O man/O had/O in/O
his/O own/O hands/O./O He/O had/O but/O to/O cut/O short/O this/O dependence/O on/O evil/O./O And/O
there/O was/O one/O means/O--/Odeath/O./O

And/O Levin/PERSON,/O a/O happy/O father/O and/O husband/O,/O in/O perfect/O health/O,/O was/O several/O
times/O so/O near/O suicide/O that/O he/O hid/O the/O cord/O that/O he/O might/O not/O be/O tempted/O
to/O hang/O himself/O,/O and/O was/O afraid/O to/O go/O out/O with/O his/O gun/O for/O fear/O of/O
shooting/O himself/O./O

But/O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O shoot/O himself/O,/O and/O did/O not/O hang/O himself/O;/O he/O went/O on/O
living/O./O



Chapter/O 10/O


When/O Levin/PERSON thought/O what/O he/O was/O and/O what/O he/O was/O living/O for/O,/O he/O could/O find/O
no/O answer/O to/O the/O questions/O and/O was/O reduced/O to/O despair/O,/O but/O he/O left/O off/O
questioning/O himself/O about/O it/O./O It/O seemed/O as/O though/O he/O knew/O both/O what/O he/O
was/O and/O for/O what/O he/O was/O living/O,/O for/O he/O acted/O and/O lived/O resolutely/O and/O
without/O hesitation/O./O Indeed/O,/O in/O these/O latter/O days/O he/O was/O far/O more/O decided/O
and/O unhesitating/O in/O life/O than/O he/O had/O ever/O been/O./O

When/O he/O went/O back/O to/O the/O country/O at/O the/O beginning/O of/O June/O,/O he/O went/O back/O
also/O to/O his/O usual/O pursuits/O./O The/O management/O of/O the/O estate/O,/O his/O relations/O
with/O the/O peasants/O and/O the/O neighbors/O,/O the/O care/O of/O his/O household/O,/O the/O
management/O of/O his/O sister/O's/O and/O brother/O's/O property/O,/O of/O which/O he/O had/O the/O
direction/O,/O his/O relations/O with/O his/O wife/O and/O kindred/O,/O the/O care/O of/O his/O
child/O,/O and/O the/O new/O bee-keeping/O hobby/O he/O had/O taken/O up/O that/O spring/O,/O filled/O
all/O his/O time/O./O

These/O things/O occupied/O him/O now/O,/O not/O because/O he/O justified/O them/O to/O himself/O
by/O any/O sort/O of/O general/O principles/O,/O as/O he/O had/O done/O in/O former/O days/O;/O on/O the/O
contrary/O,/O disappointed/O by/O the/O failure/O of/O his/O former/O efforts/O for/O the/O
general/O welfare/O,/O and/O too/O much/O occupied/O with/O his/O own/O thought/O and/O the/O mass/O
of/O business/O with/O which/O he/O was/O burdened/O from/O all/O sides/O,/O he/O had/O completely/O
given/O up/O thinking/O of/O the/O general/O good/O,/O and/O he/O busied/O himself/O with/O all/O
this/O work/O simply/O because/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O he/O must/O do/O what/O he/O was/O
doing/O--/Othat/O he/O could/O not/O do/O otherwise/O./O In/O former/O days/O--/Oalmost/O from/O
childhood/O,/O and/O increasingly/O up/O to/O full/O manhood/O--/Owhen/O he/O had/O tried/O to/O do/O
anything/O that/O would/O be/O good/O for/O all/O,/O for/O humanity/O,/O for/O Russia/LOCATION,/O for/O the/O
whole/O village/O,/O he/O had/O noticed/O that/O the/O idea/O of/O it/O had/O been/O pleasant/O,/O but/O
the/O work/O itself/O had/O always/O been/O incoherent/O,/O that/O then/O he/O had/O never/O had/O a/O
full/O conviction/O of/O its/O absolute/O necessity/O,/O and/O that/O the/O work/O that/O had/O
begun/O by/O seeming/O so/O great/O,/O had/O grown/O less/O and/O less/O,/O till/O it/O vanished/O
into/O nothing/O./O But/O now/O,/O since/O his/O marriage/O,/O when/O he/O had/O begun/O to/O confine/O
himself/O more/O and/O more/O to/O living/O for/O himself/O,/O though/O he/O experienced/O no/O
delight/O at/O all/O at/O the/O thought/O of/O the/O work/O he/O was/O doing/O,/O he/O felt/O a/O
complete/O conviction/O of/O its/O necessity/O,/O saw/O that/O it/O succeeded/O far/O better/O
than/O in/O old/O days/O,/O and/O that/O it/O kept/O on/O growing/O more/O and/O more/O./O

Now/O,/O involuntarily/O it/O seemed/O,/O he/O cut/O more/O and/O more/O deeply/O into/O the/O soil/O
like/O a/O plough/O,/O so/O that/O he/O could/O not/O be/O drawn/O out/O without/O turning/O aside/O
the/O furrow/O./O

To/O live/O the/O same/O family/O life/O as/O his/O father/O and/O forefathers/O--/Othat/O is/O,/O in/O
the/O same/O condition/O of/O culture/O--/Oand/O to/O bring/O up/O his/O children/O in/O the/O same/O,/O
was/O incontestably/O necessary/O./O It/O was/O as/O necessary/O as/O dining/O when/O one/O was/O
hungry/O./O And/O to/O do/O this/O,/O just/O as/O it/O was/O necessary/O to/O cook/O dinner/O,/O it/O was/O
necessary/O to/O keep/O the/O mechanism/O of/O agriculture/O at/O Pokrovskoe/O going/O so/O as/O
to/O yield/O an/O income/O./O Just/O as/O incontestably/O as/O it/O was/O necessary/O to/O repay/O a/O
debt/O was/O it/O necessary/O to/O keep/O the/O property/O in/O such/O a/O condition/O that/O his/O
son/O,/O when/O he/O received/O it/O as/O a/O heritage/O,/O would/O say/O ``/Othank/O you/O''/O to/O his/O
father/O as/O Levin/PERSON had/O said/O ``/Othank/O you/O''/O to/O his/O grandfather/O for/O all/O he/O built/O
and/O planted/O./O And/O to/O do/O this/O it/O was/O necessary/O to/O look/O after/O the/O land/O
himself/O,/O not/O to/O let/O it/O,/O and/O to/O breed/O cattle/O,/O manure/O the/O fields/O,/O and/O
plant/O timber/O./O

It/O was/O impossible/O not/O to/O look/O after/O the/O affairs/O of/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O of/O
his/O sister/O,/O of/O the/O peasants/O who/O came/O to/O him/O for/O advice/O and/O were/O
accustomed/O to/O do/O so/O--/Oas/O impossible/O as/O to/O fling/O down/O a/O child/O one/O is/O
carrying/O in/O one/O's/O arms/O./O It/O was/O necessary/O to/O look/O after/O the/O comfort/O of/O
his/O sister-in-law/O and/O her/O children/O,/O and/O of/O his/O wife/O and/O baby/O,/O and/O it/O was/O
impossible/O not/O to/O spend/O with/O them/O at/O least/O a/O short/O time/O each/O day/O./O

And/O all/O this/O,/O together/O with/O shooting/O and/O his/O new/O bee-keeping/O,/O filled/O up/O
the/O whole/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O life/O,/O which/O had/O no/O meaning/O at/O all/O for/O him/O,/O when/O he/O
began/O to/O think/O./O

But/O besides/O knowing/O thoroughly/O what/O he/O had/O to/O do/O,/O Levin/PERSON knew/O in/O just/O the/O
same/O way/O _/Ohow/O_/O he/O had/O to/O do/O it/O all/O,/O and/O what/O was/O more/O important/O than/O the/O
rest/O./O

He/O knew/O he/O must/O hire/O laborers/O as/O cheaply/O as/O possible/O;/O but/O to/O hire/O men/O
under/O bond/O,/O paying/O them/O in/O advance/O at/O less/O than/O the/O current/O rate/O of/O
wages/O,/O was/O what/O he/O must/O not/O do/O,/O even/O though/O it/O was/O very/O profitable/O./O
Selling/O straw/O to/O the/O peasants/O in/O times/O of/O scarcity/O of/O provender/O was/O what/O
he/O might/O do/O,/O even/O though/O he/O felt/O sorry/O for/O them/O;/O but/O the/O tavern/O and/O the/O
pothouse/O must/O be/O put/O down/O,/O though/O they/O were/O a/O source/O of/O income/O./O Felling/O
timber/O must/O be/O punished/O as/O severely/O as/O possible/O,/O but/O he/O could/O not/O exact/O
forfeits/O for/O cattle/O being/O driven/O onto/O his/O fields/O;/O and/O though/O it/O annoyed/O
the/O keeper/O and/O made/O the/O peasants/O not/O afraid/O to/O graze/O their/O cattle/O on/O his/O
land/O,/O he/O could/O not/O keep/O their/O cattle/O as/O a/O punishment/O./O

To/O Pyotr/PERSON,/O who/O was/O paying/O a/O money-lender/O 10/O per/O cent/O./O a/O month/O,/O he/O must/O
lend/O a/O sum/O of/O money/O to/O set/O him/O free/O./O But/O he/O could/O not/O let/O off/O peasants/O
who/O did/O not/O pay/O their/O rent/O,/O nor/O let/O them/O fall/O into/O arrears/O./O It/O was/O
impossible/O to/O overlook/O the/O bailiff/O's/O not/O having/O mown/O the/O meadows/O and/O
letting/O the/O hay/O spoil/O;/O and/O it/O was/O equally/O impossible/O to/O mow/O those/O acres/O
where/O a/O young/O copse/O had/O been/O planted/O./O It/O was/O impossible/O to/O excuse/O a/O
laborer/O who/O had/O gone/O home/O in/O the/O busy/O season/O because/O his/O father/O was/O
dying/O,/O however/O sorry/O he/O might/O feel/O for/O him/O,/O and/O he/O must/O subtract/O from/O
his/O pay/O those/O costly/O months/O of/O idleness/O./O But/O it/O was/O impossible/O not/O to/O
allow/O monthly/O rations/O to/O the/O old/O servants/O who/O were/O of/O no/O use/O for/O
anything/O./O

Levin/PERSON knew/O that/O when/O he/O got/O home/O he/O must/O first/O of/O all/O go/O to/O his/O wife/O,/O
who/O was/O unwell/O,/O and/O that/O the/O peasants/O who/O had/O been/O waiting/O for/O three/O
hours/O to/O see/O him/O could/O wait/O a/O little/O longer/O./O He/O knew/O too/O that/O,/O
regardless/O of/O all/O the/O pleasure/O he/O felt/O in/O taking/O a/O swarm/O,/O he/O must/O forego/O
that/O pleasure/O,/O and/O leave/O the/O old/O man/O to/O see/O to/O the/O bees/O alone/O,/O while/O he/O
talked/O to/O the/O peasants/O who/O had/O come/O after/O him/O to/O the/O bee-house/O./O

Whether/O he/O were/O acting/O rightly/O or/O wrongly/O he/O did/O not/O know/O,/O and/O far/O from/O
trying/O to/O prove/O that/O he/O was/O,/O nowadays/O he/O avoided/O all/O thought/O or/O talk/O
about/O it/O./O

Reasoning/O had/O brought/O him/O to/O doubt/O,/O and/O prevented/O him/O from/O seeing/O what/O
he/O ought/O to/O do/O and/O what/O he/O ought/O not/O./O When/O he/O did/O not/O think/O,/O but/O simply/O
lived/O,/O he/O was/O continually/O aware/O of/O the/O presence/O of/O an/O infallible/O judge/O
in/O his/O soul/O,/O determining/O which/O of/O two/O possible/O courses/O of/O action/O was/O the/O
better/O and/O which/O was/O the/O worse/O,/O and/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O did/O not/O act/O rightly/O,/O
he/O was/O at/O once/O aware/O of/O it/O./O

So/O he/O lived/O,/O not/O knowing/O and/O not/O seeing/O any/O chance/O of/O knowing/O what/O he/O
was/O and/O what/O he/O was/O living/O for/O,/O and/O harassed/O at/O this/O lack/O of/O knowledge/O
to/O such/O a/O point/O that/O he/O was/O afraid/O of/O suicide/O,/O and/O yet/O firmly/O laying/O
down/O his/O own/O individual/O definite/O path/O in/O life/O./O



Chapter/O 11/O


The/O day/O on/O which/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON came/O to/O Pokrovskoe/LOCATION was/O one/O of/O Levin/PERSON's/O
most/O painful/O days/O./O It/O was/O the/O very/O busiest/O working/O time/O,/O when/O all/O the/O
peasantry/O show/O an/O extraordinary/O intensity/O of/O self-sacrifice/O in/O labor/O,/O
such/O as/O is/O never/O shown/O in/O any/O other/O conditions/O of/O life/O,/O and/O would/O be/O
highly/O esteemed/O if/O the/O men/O who/O showed/O these/O qualities/O themselves/O thought/O
highly/O of/O them/O,/O and/O if/O it/O were/O not/O repeated/O every/O year/O,/O and/O if/O the/O
results/O of/O this/O intense/O labor/O were/O not/O so/O simple/O./O

To/O reap/O and/O bind/O the/O rye/O and/O oats/O and/O to/O carry/O it/O,/O to/O mow/O the/O meadows/O,/O
turn/O over/O the/O fallows/O,/O thrash/O the/O seed/O and/O sow/O the/O winter/O corn/O--/Oall/O this/O
seems/O so/O simple/O and/O ordinary/O;/O but/O to/O succeed/O in/O getting/O through/O it/O all/O
everyone/O in/O the/O village/O,/O from/O the/O old/O man/O to/O the/O young/O child/O,/O must/O toil/O
incessantly/O for/O three/O or/O four/O weeks/O,/O three/O times/O as/O hard/O as/O usual/O,/O
living/O on/O rye-beer/O,/O onions/O,/O and/O black/O bread/O,/O thrashing/O and/O carrying/O the/O
sheaves/O at/O night/O,/O and/O not/O giving/O more/O than/O two/O or/O three/O hours/O in/O the/O
twenty-four/O to/O sleep/O./O And/O every/O year/O this/O is/O done/O all/O over/O Russia/LOCATION./O

Having/O lived/O the/O greater/O part/O of/O his/O life/O in/O the/O country/O and/O in/O the/O
closest/O relations/O with/O the/O peasants/O,/O Levin/PERSON always/O felt/O in/O this/O busy/O time/O
that/O he/O was/O infected/O by/O this/O general/O quickening/O of/O energy/O in/O the/O people/O./O

In/O the/O early/O morning/O he/O rode/O over/O to/O the/O first/O sowing/O of/O the/O rye/O,/O and/O to/O
the/O oats/O,/O which/O were/O being/O carried/O to/O the/O stacks/O,/O and/O returning/O home/O at/O
the/O time/O his/O wife/O and/O sister-in-law/O were/O getting/O up/O,/O he/O drank/O coffee/O
with/O them/O and/O walked/O to/O the/O farm/O,/O where/O a/O new/O thrashing/O machine/O was/O to/O
be/O set/O working/O to/O get/O ready/O the/O seed-corn/O./O

He/O was/O standing/O in/O the/O cool/O granary/O,/O still/O fragrant/O with/O the/O leaves/O of/O
the/O hazel/O branches/O interlaced/O on/O the/O freshly/O peeled/O aspen/O beams/O of/O the/O
new/O thatch/O roof/O./O He/O gazed/O through/O the/O open/O door/O in/O which/O the/O dry/O bitter/O
dust/O of/O the/O thrashing/O whirled/O and/O played/O,/O at/O the/O grass/O of/O the/O thrashing/O
floor/O in/O the/O sunlight/O and/O the/O fresh/O straw/O that/O had/O been/O brought/O in/O from/O
the/O barn/O,/O then/O at/O the/O speckly-headed/O,/O white-breasted/O swallows/O that/O flew/O
chirping/O in/O under/O the/O roof/O and/O,/O fluttering/O their/O wings/O,/O settled/O in/O the/O
crevices/O of/O the/O doorway/O,/O then/O at/O the/O peasants/O bustling/O in/O the/O dark/O,/O
dusty/O barn/O,/O and/O he/O thought/O strange/O thoughts/O./O

``/OWhy/O is/O it/O all/O being/O done/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O./O ``/OWhy/O am/O I/O standing/O here/O,/O making/O
them/O work/O?/O What/O are/O they/O all/O so/O busy/O for/O,/O trying/O to/O show/O their/O zeal/O
before/O me/O?/O What/O is/O that/O old/O Matrona/PERSON,/O my/O old/O friend/O,/O toiling/O for/O?/O -LRB-/OI/O
doctored/O her/O,/O when/O the/O beam/O fell/O on/O her/O in/O the/O fire/O-RRB-/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O
looking/O at/O a/O thin/O old/O woman/O who/O was/O raking/O up/O the/O grain/O,/O moving/O
painfully/O with/O her/O bare/O,/O sun-blackened/O feet/O over/O the/O uneven/O,/O rough/O
floor/O./O ``/OThen/O she/O recovered/O,/O but/O today/O or/O tomorrow/O or/O in/O ten/O years/O she/O
wo/On't/O;/O they/O'll/O bury/O her/O,/O and/O nothing/O will/O be/O left/O either/O of/O her/O or/O of/O
that/O smart/O girl/O in/O the/O red/O jacket/O,/O who/O with/O that/O skillful/O,/O soft/O action/O
shakes/O the/O ears/O out/O of/O their/O husks/O./O They/O'll/O bury/O her/O and/O this/O piebald/O
horse/O,/O and/O very/O soon/O too/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O gazing/O at/O the/O heavily/O moving/O,/O
panting/O horse/O that/O kept/O walking/O up/O the/O wheel/O that/O turned/O under/O him/O./O ``/OAnd/O
they/O will/O bury/O her/O and/O Fyodor/PERSON the/O thrasher/O with/O his/O curly/O beard/O full/O of/O
chaff/O and/O his/O shirt/O torn/O on/O his/O white/O shoulders/O--/Othey/O will/O bury/O him/O./O He/O's/O
untying/O the/O sheaves/O,/O and/O giving/O orders/O,/O and/O shouting/O to/O the/O women/O,/O and/O
quickly/O setting/O straight/O the/O strap/O on/O the/O moving/O wheel/O./O And/O what/O's/O more/O,/O
it/O's/O not/O them/O alone/O--/Ome/O they/O'll/O bury/O too/O,/O and/O nothing/O will/O be/O left/O./O What/O
for/O?/O''/O

He/O thought/O this/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O looked/O at/O his/O watch/O to/O reckon/O how/O
much/O they/O thrashed/O in/O an/O hour/O./O He/O wanted/O to/O know/O this/O so/O as/O to/O judge/O by/O
it/O the/O task/O to/O set/O for/O the/O day/O./O

``/OIt/O'll/O soon/O be/O one/O,/O and/O they/O're/O only/O beginning/O the/O third/O sheaf/O,/O''/O thought/O
Levin/PERSON./O He/O went/O up/O to/O the/O man/O that/O was/O feeding/O the/O machine/O,/O and/O shouting/O
over/O the/O roar/O of/O the/O machine/O he/O told/O him/O to/O put/O it/O in/O more/O slowly/O./O ``/OYou/O
put/O in/O too/O much/O at/O a/O time/O,/O Fyodor/PERSON./O Do/O you/O see/O--/Oit/O gets/O choked/O,/O that/O's/O why/O
it/O is/On't/O getting/O on/O./O Do/O it/O evenly/O./O''/O

Fyodor/PERSON,/O black/O with/O the/O dust/O that/O clung/O to/O his/O moist/O face/O,/O shouted/O
something/O in/O response/O,/O but/O still/O went/O on/O doing/O it/O as/O Levin/PERSON did/O not/O want/O
him/O to/O./O

Levin/PERSON,/O going/O up/O to/O the/O machine/O,/O moved/O Fyodor/PERSON aside/O,/O and/O began/O feeding/O
the/O corn/O in/O himself/O./O Working/O on/O till/O the/O peasants/O'/O dinner/O hour/O,/O which/O
was/O not/O long/O in/O coming/O,/O he/O went/O out/O of/O the/O barn/O with/O Fyodor/PERSON and/O fell/O
into/O talk/O with/O him/O,/O stopping/O beside/O a/O neat/O yellow/O sheaf/O of/O rye/O laid/O on/O
the/O thrashing/O floor/O for/O seed/O./O

Fyodor/PERSON came/O from/O a/O village/O at/O some/O distance/O from/O the/O one/O in/O which/O Levin/PERSON
had/O once/O allotted/O land/O to/O his/O cooperative/O association/O./O Now/O it/O had/O been/O
let/O to/O a/O former/O house/O porter/O./O

Levin/PERSON talked/O to/O Fyodor/PERSON about/O this/O land/O and/O asked/O whether/O Platon/PERSON,/O a/O
well-to-do/O peasant/O of/O good/O character/O belonging/O to/O the/O same/O village/O,/O
would/O not/O take/O the/O land/O for/O the/O coming/O year/O./O

``/OIt/O's/O a/O high/O rent/O;/O it/O would/On't/O pay/O Platon/PERSON,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON,/O''/O
answered/O the/O peasant/O,/O picking/O the/O ears/O off/O his/O sweat-drenched/O shirt/O./O

``/OBut/O how/O does/O Kirillov/PERSON make/O it/O pay/O?/O''/O

``/OMituh/O!/O''/O -LRB-/Oso/O the/O peasant/O called/O the/O house/O porter/O,/O in/O a/O tone/O of/O
contempt/O-RRB-/O,/O ``/Oyou/O may/O be/O sure/O he/O'll/O make/O it/O pay/O,/O Konstantin/PERSON Dmitrievitch/PERSON!/O
He/O'll/O get/O his/O share/O,/O however/O he/O has/O to/O squeeze/O to/O get/O it/O!/O He/O's/O no/O mercy/O
on/O a/O Christian/O./O But/O Uncle/O Fokanitch/O''/O -LRB-/Oso/O he/O called/O the/O old/O peasant/O
Platon/LOCATION-RRB-/O,/O ``/Odo/O you/O suppose/O he/O'd/O flay/O the/O skin/O off/O a/O man/O?/O Where/O there/O's/O
debt/O,/O he/O'll/O let/O anyone/O off/O./O And/O he/O'll/O not/O wring/O the/O last/O penny/O out/O./O He/O's/O
a/O man/O too/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O why/O will/O he/O let/O anyone/O off/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O well/O,/O of/O course/O,/O folks/O are/O different/O./O One/O man/O lives/O for/O his/O own/O
wants/O and/O nothing/O else/O,/O like/O Mituh/PERSON,/O he/O only/O thinks/O of/O filling/O his/O belly/O,/O
but/O Fokanitch/PERSON is/O a/O righteous/O man/O./O He/O lives/O for/O his/O soul/O./O He/O does/O not/O
forget/O God/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O thinks/O of/O God/O?/O How/O does/O he/O live/O for/O his/O soul/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON almost/O
shouted/O./O

``/OWhy/O,/O to/O be/O sure/O,/O in/O truth/O,/O in/O God/O's/O way/O./O Folks/O are/O different/O./O Take/O you/O
now/O,/O you/O would/On't/O wrong/O a/O man/O.../O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O yes/O,/O good-bye/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O breathless/O with/O excitement/O,/O and/O
turning/O round/O he/O took/O his/O stick/O and/O walked/O quickly/O away/O towards/O home/O./O At/O
the/O peasant/O's/O words/O that/O Fokanitch/PERSON lived/O for/O his/O soul/O,/O in/O truth/O,/O in/O
God/O's/O way/O,/O undefined/O but/O significant/O ideas/O seemed/O to/O burst/O out/O as/O though/O
they/O had/O been/O locked/O up/O,/O and/O all/O striving/O towards/O one/O goal/O,/O they/O
thronged/O whirling/O through/O his/O head/O,/O blinding/O him/O with/O their/O light/O./O



Chapter/O 12/O


Levin/PERSON strode/O along/O the/O highroad/O,/O absorbed/O not/O so/O much/O in/O his/O thoughts/O
-LRB-/Ohe/O could/O not/O yet/O disentangle/O them/O-RRB-/O as/O in/O his/O spiritual/O condition/O,/O
unlike/O anything/O he/O had/O experienced/O before/O./O

The/O words/O uttered/O by/O the/O peasant/O had/O acted/O on/O his/O soul/O like/O an/O electric/O
shock/O,/O suddenly/O transforming/O and/O combining/O into/O a/O single/O whole/O the/O whole/O
swarm/O of/O disjointed/O,/O impotent/O,/O separate/O thoughts/O that/O incessantly/O
occupied/O his/O mind/O./O These/O thoughts/O had/O unconsciously/O been/O in/O his/O mind/O
even/O when/O he/O was/O talking/O about/O the/O land/O./O

He/O was/O aware/O of/O something/O new/O in/O his/O soul/O,/O and/O joyfully/O tested/O this/O new/O
thing/O,/O not/O yet/O knowing/O what/O it/O was/O./O

``/ONot/O living/O for/O his/O own/O wants/O,/O but/O for/O God/O?/O For/O what/O God/O?/O And/O could/O one/O
say/O anything/O more/O senseless/O than/O what/O he/O said/O?/O He/O said/O that/O one/O must/O not/O
live/O for/O one/O's/O own/O wants/O,/O that/O is/O,/O that/O one/O must/O not/O live/O for/O what/O we/O
understand/O,/O what/O we/O are/O attracted/O by/O,/O what/O we/O desire/O,/O but/O must/O live/O for/O
something/O incomprehensible/O,/O for/O God/O,/O whom/O no/O one/O can/O understand/O nor/O even/O
define/O./O What/O of/O it/O?/O Did/On't/O I/O understand/O those/O senseless/O words/O of/O
Fyodor/PERSON's/O?/O And/O understanding/O them/O,/O did/O I/O doubt/O of/O their/O truth/O?/O Did/O I/O
think/O them/O stupid/O,/O obscure/O,/O inexact/O?/O No/O,/O I/O understood/O him/O,/O and/O exactly/O
as/O he/O understands/O the/O words/O./O I/O understood/O them/O more/O fully/O and/O clearly/O
than/O I/O understand/O anything/O in/O life/O,/O and/O never/O in/O my/O life/O have/O I/O doubted/O
nor/O can/O I/O doubt/O about/O it/O./O And/O not/O only/O I/O,/O but/O everyone/O,/O the/O whole/O world/O
understands/O nothing/O fully/O but/O this/O,/O and/O about/O this/O only/O they/O have/O no/O
doubt/O and/O are/O always/O agreed/O./O

``/OAnd/O I/O looked/O out/O for/O miracles/O,/O complained/O that/O I/O did/O not/O see/O a/O miracle/O
which/O would/O convince/O me/O./O A/O material/O miracle/O would/O have/O persuaded/O me/O./O And/O
here/O is/O a/O miracle/O,/O the/O sole/O miracle/O possible/O,/O continually/O existing/O,/O
surrounding/O me/O on/O all/O sides/O,/O and/O I/O never/O noticed/O it/O!/O

``/OFyodor/PERSON says/O that/O Kirillov/PERSON lives/O for/O his/O belly/O./O That/O's/O comprehensible/O
and/O rational/O./O All/O of/O us/O as/O rational/O beings/O ca/On't/O do/O anything/O else/O but/O
live/O for/O our/O belly/O./O And/O all/O of/O a/O sudden/O the/O same/O Fyodor/PERSON says/O that/O one/O
must/On't/O live/O for/O one/O's/O belly/O,/O but/O must/O live/O for/O truth/O,/O for/O God/O,/O and/O at/O a/O
hint/O I/O understand/O him/O!/O And/O I/O and/O millions/O of/O men/O,/O men/O who/O lived/O ages/O ago/O
and/O men/O living/O now/O--/Opeasants/O,/O the/O poor/O in/O spirit/O and/O the/O learned/O,/O who/O
have/O thought/O and/O written/O about/O it/O,/O in/O their/O obscure/O words/O saying/O the/O
same/O thing/O--/Owe/O are/O all/O agreed/O about/O this/O one/O thing/O:/O what/O we/O must/O live/O for/O
and/O what/O is/O good/O./O I/O and/O all/O men/O have/O only/O one/O firm/O,/O incontestable/O,/O clear/O
knowledge/O,/O and/O that/O knowledge/O can/Onot/O be/O explained/O by/O the/O reason/O--/Oit/O is/O
outside/O it/O,/O and/O has/O no/O causes/O and/O can/O have/O no/O effects/O./O

``/OIf/O goodness/O has/O causes/O,/O it/O is/O not/O goodness/O;/O if/O it/O has/O effects/O,/O a/O
reward/O,/O it/O is/O not/O goodness/O either/O./O So/O goodness/O is/O outside/O the/O chain/O of/O
cause/O and/O effect/O./O

``/OAnd/O yet/O I/O know/O it/O,/O and/O we/O all/O know/O it/O./O

``/OWhat/O could/O be/O a/O greater/O miracle/O than/O that/O?/O

``/OCan/O I/O have/O found/O the/O solution/O of/O it/O all/O?/O can/O my/O sufferings/O be/O over/O?/O''/O
thought/O Levin/PERSON,/O striding/O along/O the/O dusty/O road/O,/O not/O noticing/O the/O heat/O nor/O
his/O weariness/O,/O and/O experiencing/O a/O sense/O of/O relief/O from/O prolonged/O
suffering/O./O This/O feeling/O was/O so/O delicious/O that/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O
incredible/O./O He/O was/O breathless/O with/O emotion/O and/O incapable/O of/O going/O
farther/O;/O he/O turned/O off/O the/O road/O into/O the/O forest/O and/O lay/O down/O in/O the/O
shade/O of/O an/O aspen/O on/O the/O uncut/O grass/O./O He/O took/O his/O hat/O off/O his/O hot/O head/O
and/O lay/O propped/O on/O his/O elbow/O in/O the/O lush/O,/O feathery/O,/O woodland/O grass/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O I/O must/O make/O it/O clear/O to/O myself/O and/O understand/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O
looking/O intently/O at/O the/O untrampled/O grass/O before/O him/O,/O and/O following/O the/O
movements/O of/O a/O green/O beetle/O,/O advancing/O along/O a/O blade/O of/O couch-grass/O and/O
lifting/O up/O in/O its/O progress/O a/O leaf/O of/O goat-weed/O./O ``/OWhat/O have/O I/O
discovered/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O himself/O,/O bending/O aside/O the/O leaf/O of/O goat-weed/O out/O
of/O the/O beetle/O's/O way/O and/O twisting/O another/O blade/O of/O grass/O above/O for/O the/O
beetle/O to/O cross/O over/O onto/O it/O./O ``/OWhat/O is/O it/O makes/O me/O glad/O?/O What/O have/O I/O
discovered/O?/O

``/OI/O have/O discovered/O nothing/O./O I/O have/O only/O found/O out/O what/O I/O knew/O./O I/O
understand/O the/O force/O that/O in/O the/O past/O gave/O me/O life/O,/O and/O now/O too/O gives/O me/O
life/O./O I/O have/O been/O set/O free/O from/O falsity/O,/O I/O have/O found/O the/O Master/O./O

``/OOf/O old/O I/O used/O to/O say/O that/O in/O my/O body/O,/O that/O in/O the/O body/O of/O this/O grass/O
and/O of/O this/O beetle/O -LRB-/Othere/O,/O she/O did/On't/O care/O for/O the/O grass/O,/O she/O's/O opened/O
her/O wings/O and/O flown/O away/O-RRB-/O,/O there/O was/O going/O on/O a/O transformation/O of/O matter/O
in/O accordance/O with/O physical/O,/O chemical/O,/O and/O physiological/O laws/O./O And/O in/O
all/O of/O us/O,/O as/O well/O as/O in/O the/O aspens/O and/O the/O clouds/O and/O the/O misty/O
patches/O,/O there/O was/O a/O process/O of/O evolution/O./O Evolution/O from/O what/O?/O into/O
what/O?/O--/OEternal/O evolution/O and/O struggle/O.../O./O As/O though/O there/O could/O be/O any/O
sort/O of/O tendency/O and/O struggle/O in/O the/O eternal/O!/O And/O I/O was/O astonished/O that/O
in/O spite/O of/O the/O utmost/O effort/O of/O thought/O along/O that/O road/O I/O could/O not/O
discover/O the/O meaning/O of/O life/O,/O the/O meaning/O of/O my/O impulses/O and/O yearnings/O./O
Now/O I/O say/O that/O I/O know/O the/O meaning/O of/O my/O life/O:/O `/OTo/O live/O for/O God/O,/O for/O my/O
soul/O./O'/O And/O this/O meaning/O,/O in/O spite/O of/O its/O clearness/O,/O is/O mysterious/O and/O
marvelous/O./O Such/O,/O indeed/O,/O is/O the/O meaning/O of/O everything/O existing/O./O Yes/O,/O
pride/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O,/O turning/O over/O on/O his/O stomach/O and/O beginning/O to/O
tie/O a/O noose/O of/O blades/O of/O grass/O,/O trying/O not/O to/O break/O them/O./O

``/OAnd/O not/O merely/O pride/O of/O intellect/O,/O but/O dulness/O of/O intellect/O./O And/O most/O
of/O all/O,/O the/O deceitfulness/O;/O yes/O,/O the/O deceitfulness/O of/O intellect/O./O The/O
cheating/O knavishness/O of/O intellect/O,/O that/O's/O it/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O himself/O./O

And/O he/O briefly/O went/O through/O,/O mentally/O,/O the/O whole/O course/O of/O his/O ideas/O
during/O the/O last/O two/O years/O,/O the/O beginning/O of/O which/O was/O the/O clear/O
confronting/O of/O death/O at/O the/O sight/O of/O his/O dear/O brother/O hopelessly/O ill/O./O

Then/O,/O for/O the/O first/O time/O,/O grasping/O that/O for/O every/O man/O,/O and/O himself/O too/O,/O
there/O was/O nothing/O in/O store/O but/O suffering/O,/O death/O,/O and/O forgetfulness/O,/O he/O
had/O made/O up/O his/O mind/O that/O life/O was/O impossible/O like/O that/O,/O and/O that/O he/O
must/O either/O interpret/O life/O so/O that/O it/O would/O not/O present/O itself/O to/O him/O as/O
the/O evil/O jest/O of/O some/O devil/O,/O or/O shoot/O himself/O./O

But/O he/O had/O not/O done/O either/O,/O but/O had/O gone/O on/O living/O,/O thinking/O,/O and/O
feeling/O,/O and/O had/O even/O at/O that/O very/O time/O married/O,/O and/O had/O had/O many/O joys/O
and/O had/O been/O happy/O,/O when/O he/O was/O not/O thinking/O of/O the/O meaning/O of/O his/O life/O./O

What/O did/O this/O mean/O?/O It/O meant/O that/O he/O had/O been/O living/O rightly/O,/O but/O
thinking/O wrongly/O./O

He/O had/O lived/O -LRB-/Owithout/O being/O aware/O of/O it/O-RRB-/O on/O those/O spiritual/O truths/O that/O
he/O had/O sucked/O in/O with/O his/O mother/O's/O milk/O,/O but/O he/O had/O thought/O,/O not/O merely/O
without/O recognition/O of/O these/O truths/O,/O but/O studiously/O ignoring/O them/O./O

Now/O it/O was/O clear/O to/O him/O that/O he/O could/O only/O live/O by/O virtue/O of/O the/O beliefs/O
in/O which/O he/O had/O been/O brought/O up/O./O

``/OWhat/O should/O I/O have/O been/O,/O and/O how/O should/O I/O have/O spent/O my/O life/O,/O if/O I/O had/O
not/O had/O these/O beliefs/O,/O if/O I/O had/O not/O known/O that/O I/O must/O live/O for/O God/O and/O
not/O for/O my/O own/O desires/O?/O I/O should/O have/O robbed/O and/O lied/O and/O killed/O./O
Nothing/O of/O what/O makes/O the/O chief/O happiness/O of/O my/O life/O would/O have/O existed/O
for/O me/O./O''/O And/O with/O the/O utmost/O stretch/O of/O imagination/O he/O could/O not/O
conceive/O the/O brutal/O creature/O he/O would/O have/O been/O himself/O,/O if/O he/O had/O not/O
known/O what/O he/O was/O living/O for/O./O

``/OI/O looked/O for/O an/O answer/O to/O my/O question/O./O And/O thought/O could/O not/O give/O an/O
answer/O to/O my/O question/O--/Oit/O is/O incommensurable/O with/O my/O question/O./O The/O answer/O
has/O been/O given/O me/O by/O life/O itself/O,/O in/O my/O knowledge/O of/O what/O is/O right/O and/O
what/O is/O wrong/O./O And/O that/O knowledge/O I/O did/O not/O arrive/O at/O in/O any/O way/O,/O it/O was/O
given/O to/O me/O as/O to/O all/O men/O,/O _/Ogiven/O_/O,/O because/O I/O could/O not/O have/O got/O it/O from/O
anywhere/O./O

``/OWhere/O could/O I/O have/O got/O it/O?/O By/O reason/O could/O I/O have/O arrived/O at/O knowing/O
that/O I/O must/O love/O my/O neighbor/O and/O not/O oppress/O him/O?/O I/O was/O told/O that/O in/O my/O
childhood/O,/O and/O I/O believed/O it/O gladly/O,/O for/O they/O told/O me/O what/O was/O already/O
in/O my/O soul/O./O But/O who/O discovered/O it/O?/O Not/O reason/O./O Reason/O discovered/O the/O
