But/O loving/O one/O's/O neighbor/O reason/O could/O never/O discover/O,/O because/O it/O's/O
irrational/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 13/O


And/O Levin/PERSON remembered/O a/O scene/O he/O had/O lately/O witnessed/O between/O Dolly/PERSON and/O
her/O children/O./O The/O children/O,/O left/O to/O themselves/O,/O had/O begun/O cooking/O
raspberries/O over/O the/O candles/O and/O squirting/O milk/O into/O each/O other/O's/O mouths/O
with/O a/O syringe/O./O Their/O mother/O,/O catching/O them/O at/O these/O pranks/O,/O began/O
reminding/O them/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O presence/O of/O the/O trouble/O their/O mischief/O gave/O to/O
the/O grown-up/O people/O,/O and/O that/O this/O trouble/O was/O all/O for/O their/O sake/O,/O and/O
that/O if/O they/O smashed/O the/O cups/O they/O would/O have/O nothing/O to/O drink/O their/O tea/O
out/O of/O,/O and/O that/O if/O they/O wasted/O the/O milk/O,/O they/O would/O have/O nothing/O to/O
eat/O,/O and/O die/O of/O hunger/O./O

And/O Levin/PERSON had/O been/O struck/O by/O the/O passive/O,/O weary/O incredulity/O with/O which/O
the/O children/O heard/O what/O their/O mother/O said/O to/O them/O./O They/O were/O simply/O
annoyed/O that/O their/O amusing/O play/O had/O been/O interrupted/O,/O and/O did/O not/O
believe/O a/O word/O of/O what/O their/O mother/O was/O saying/O./O They/O could/O not/O believe/O
it/O indeed/O,/O for/O they/O could/O not/O take/O in/O the/O immensity/O of/O all/O they/O
habitually/O enjoyed/O,/O and/O so/O could/O not/O conceive/O that/O what/O they/O were/O
destroying/O was/O the/O very/O thing/O they/O lived/O by/O./O

``/OThat/O all/O comes/O of/O itself/O,/O''/O they/O thought/O,/O ``/Oand/O there/O's/O nothing/O
interesting/O or/O important/O about/O it/O because/O it/O has/O always/O been/O so/O,/O and/O
always/O will/O be/O so/O./O And/O it/O's/O all/O always/O the/O same/O./O We/O've/O no/O need/O to/O think/O
about/O that/O,/O it/O's/O all/O ready/O./O But/O we/O want/O to/O invent/O something/O of/O our/O own/O,/O
and/O new/O./O So/O we/O thought/O of/O putting/O raspberries/O in/O a/O cup/O,/O and/O cooking/O them/O
over/O a/O candle/O,/O and/O squirting/O milk/O straight/O into/O each/O other/O's/O mouths/O./O
That/O's/O fun/O,/O and/O something/O new/O,/O and/O not/O a/O bit/O worse/O than/O drinking/O out/O of/O
cups/O./O''/O

``/OIs/On't/O it/O just/O the/O same/O that/O we/O do/O,/O that/O I/O did/O,/O searching/O by/O the/O aid/O of/O
reason/O for/O the/O significance/O of/O the/O forces/O of/O nature/O and/O the/O meaning/O of/O
the/O life/O of/O man/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

``/OAnd/O do/On't/O all/O the/O theories/O of/O philosophy/O do/O the/O same/O,/O trying/O by/O the/O
path/O of/O thought/O,/O which/O is/O strange/O and/O not/O natural/O to/O man/O,/O to/O bring/O him/O
to/O a/O knowledge/O of/O what/O he/O has/O known/O long/O ago/O,/O and/O knows/O so/O certainly/O
that/O he/O could/O not/O live/O at/O all/O without/O it/O?/O Is/On't/O it/O distinctly/O to/O be/O seen/O
in/O the/O development/O of/O each/O philosopher/O's/O theory/O,/O that/O he/O knows/O what/O is/O
the/O chief/O significance/O of/O life/O beforehand/O,/O just/O as/O positively/O as/O the/O
peasant/O Fyodor/PERSON,/O and/O not/O a/O bit/O more/O clearly/O than/O he/O,/O and/O is/O simply/O trying/O
by/O a/O dubious/O intellectual/O path/O to/O come/O back/O to/O what/O everyone/O knows/O?/O

``/ONow/O then/O,/O leave/O the/O children/O to/O themselves/O to/O get/O things/O alone/O and/O make/O
their/O crockery/O,/O get/O the/O milk/O from/O the/O cows/O,/O and/O so/O on/O./O Would/O they/O be/O
naughty/O then/O?/O Why/O,/O they/O'd/O die/O of/O hunger/O!/O Well/O,/O then/O,/O leave/O us/O with/O our/O
passions/O and/O thoughts/O,/O without/O any/O idea/O of/O the/O one/O God/O,/O of/O the/O Creator/O,/O
or/O without/O any/O idea/O of/O what/O is/O right/O,/O without/O any/O idea/O of/O moral/O evil/O./O

``/OJust/O try/O and/O build/O up/O anything/O without/O those/O ideas/O!/O

``/OWe/O only/O try/O to/O destroy/O them/O,/O because/O we/O're/O spiritually/O provided/O for/O./O
Exactly/O like/O the/O children/O!/O

``/OWhence/O have/O I/O that/O joyful/O knowledge/O,/O shared/O with/O the/O peasant/O,/O that/O
alone/O gives/O peace/O to/O my/O soul/O?/O Whence/O did/O I/O get/O it/O?/O

``/OBrought/O up/O with/O an/O idea/O of/O God/O,/O a/O Christian/O,/O my/O whole/O life/O filled/O with/O
the/O spiritual/O blessings/O Christianity/O has/O given/O me/O,/O full/O of/O them/O,/O and/O
living/O on/O those/O blessings/O,/O like/O the/O children/O I/O did/O not/O understand/O them/O,/O
and/O destroy/O,/O that/O is/O try/O to/O destroy/O,/O what/O I/O live/O by/O./O And/O as/O soon/O as/O an/O
important/O moment/O of/O life/O comes/O,/O like/O the/O children/O when/O they/O are/O cold/O and/O
hungry/O,/O I/O turn/O to/O Him/O,/O and/O even/O less/O than/O the/O children/O when/O their/O mother/O
scolds/O them/O for/O their/O childish/O mischief/O,/O do/O I/O feel/O that/O my/O childish/O
efforts/O at/O wanton/O madness/O are/O reckoned/O against/O me/O./O

``/OYes/O,/O what/O I/O know/O,/O I/O know/O not/O by/O reason/O,/O but/O it/O has/O been/O given/O to/O me/O,/O
revealed/O to/O me/O,/O and/O I/O know/O it/O with/O my/O heart/O,/O by/O faith/O in/O the/O chief/O thing/O
taught/O by/O the/O church/O./O

``/OThe/O church/O!/O the/O church/O!/O''/O Levin/PERSON repeated/O to/O himself/O./O He/O turned/O over/O on/O
the/O other/O side/O,/O and/O leaning/O on/O his/O elbow/O,/O fell/O to/O gazing/O into/O the/O
distance/O at/O a/O herd/O of/O cattle/O crossing/O over/O to/O the/O river/O./O

``/OBut/O can/O I/O believe/O in/O all/O the/O church/O teaches/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O trying/O
himself/O,/O and/O thinking/O of/O everything/O that/O could/O destroy/O his/O present/O peace/O
of/O mind/O./O Intentionally/O he/O recalled/O all/O those/O doctrines/O of/O the/O church/O
which/O had/O always/O seemed/O most/O strange/O and/O had/O always/O been/O a/O stumbling/O
block/O to/O him/O./O

``/OThe/O Creation/O?/O But/O how/O did/O I/O explain/O existence/O?/O By/O existence/O?/O By/O
nothing/O?/O The/O devil/O and/O sin/O./O But/O how/O do/O I/O explain/O evil/O?/O.../O The/O
atonement/O?/O.../O

``/OBut/O I/O know/O nothing/O,/O nothing/O,/O and/O I/O can/O know/O nothing/O but/O what/O has/O been/O
told/O to/O me/O and/O all/O men/O./O''/O

And/O it/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O there/O was/O not/O a/O single/O article/O of/O faith/O of/O the/O
church/O which/O could/O destroy/O the/O chief/O thing/O--/Ofaith/O in/O God/O,/O in/O goodness/O,/O as/O
the/O one/O goal/O of/O man/O's/O destiny/O./O

Under/O every/O article/O of/O faith/O of/O the/O church/O could/O be/O put/O the/O faith/O in/O the/O
service/O of/O truth/O instead/O of/O one/O's/O desires/O./O And/O each/O doctrine/O did/O not/O
simply/O leave/O that/O faith/O unshaken/O,/O each/O doctrine/O seemed/O essential/O to/O
complete/O that/O great/O miracle/O,/O continually/O manifest/O upon/O earth/O,/O that/O made/O
it/O possible/O for/O each/O man/O and/O millions/O of/O different/O sorts/O of/O men/O,/O wise/O
men/O and/O imbeciles/O,/O old/O men/O and/O children/O--/Oall/O men/O,/O peasants/O,/O Lvov/LOCATION,/O Kitty/PERSON,/O
beggars/O and/O kings/O to/O understand/O perfectly/O the/O same/O one/O thing/O,/O and/O to/O
build/O up/O thereby/O that/O life/O of/O the/O soul/O which/O alone/O is/O worth/O living/O,/O and/O
which/O alone/O is/O precious/O to/O us/O./O

Lying/O on/O his/O back/O,/O he/O gazed/O up/O now/O into/O the/O high/O,/O cloudless/O sky/O./O ``/ODo/O I/O
not/O know/O that/O that/O is/O infinite/O space/O,/O and/O that/O it/O is/O not/O a/O round/O arch/O?/O
But/O,/O however/O I/O screw/O up/O my/O eyes/O and/O strain/O my/O sight/O,/O I/O can/Onot/O see/O it/O not/O
round/O and/O not/O bounded/O,/O and/O in/O spite/O of/O my/O knowing/O about/O infinite/O space/O,/O
I/O am/O incontestably/O right/O when/O I/O see/O a/O solid/O blue/O dome/O,/O and/O more/O right/O
than/O when/O I/O strain/O my/O eyes/O to/O see/O beyond/O it/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON ceased/O thinking/O,/O and/O only/O,/O as/O it/O were/O,/O listened/O to/O mysterious/O
voices/O that/O seemed/O talking/O joyfully/O and/O earnestly/O within/O him/O./O

``/OCan/O this/O be/O faith/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O afraid/O to/O believe/O in/O his/O happiness/O./O ``/OMy/O
God/O,/O I/O thank/O Thee/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O gulping/O down/O his/O sobs/O,/O and/O with/O both/O hands/O
brushing/O away/O the/O tears/O that/O filled/O his/O eyes/O./O



Chapter/O 14/O


Levin/PERSON looked/O before/O him/O and/O saw/O a/O herd/O of/O cattle/O,/O then/O he/O caught/O sight/O
of/O his/O trap/O with/O Raven/O in/O the/O shafts/O,/O and/O the/O coachman/O,/O who/O,/O driving/O up/O
to/O the/O herd/O,/O said/O something/O to/O the/O herdsman/O./O Then/O he/O heard/O the/O rattle/O of/O
the/O wheels/O and/O the/O snort/O of/O the/O sleek/O horse/O close/O by/O him/O./O But/O he/O was/O so/O
buried/O in/O his/O thoughts/O that/O he/O did/O not/O even/O wonder/O why/O the/O coachman/O had/O
come/O for/O him/O./O

He/O only/O thought/O of/O that/O when/O the/O coachman/O had/O driven/O quite/O up/O to/O him/O and/O
shouted/O to/O him/O./O ``/OThe/O mistress/O sent/O me/O./O Your/O brother/O has/O come/O,/O and/O some/O
gentleman/O with/O him/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON got/O into/O the/O trap/O and/O took/O the/O reins/O./O As/O though/O just/O roused/O out/O of/O
sleep/O,/O for/O a/O long/O while/O Levin/PERSON could/O not/O collect/O his/O faculties/O./O He/O stared/O
at/O the/O sleek/O horse/O flecked/O with/O lather/O between/O his/O haunches/O and/O on/O his/O
neck/O,/O where/O the/O harness/O rubbed/O,/O stared/O at/O Ivan/PERSON the/PERSON coachman/PERSON sitting/O
beside/O him/O,/O and/O remembered/O that/O he/O was/O expecting/O his/O brother/O,/O thought/O
that/O his/O wife/O was/O most/O likely/O uneasy/O at/O his/O long/O absence/O,/O and/O tried/O to/O
guess/O who/O was/O the/O visitor/O who/O had/O come/O with/O his/O brother/O./O And/O his/O brother/O
and/O his/O wife/O and/O the/O unknown/O guest/O seemed/O to/O him/O now/O quite/O different/O
from/O before/O./O He/O fancied/O that/O now/O his/O relations/O with/O all/O men/O would/O be/O
different/O./O

``/OWith/O my/O brother/O there/O will/O be/O none/O of/O that/O aloofness/O there/O always/O used/O
to/O be/O between/O us/O,/O there/O will/O be/O no/O disputes/O;/O with/O Kitty/PERSON there/O shall/O
never/O be/O quarrels/O;/O with/O the/O visitor/O,/O whoever/O he/O may/O be/O,/O I/O will/O be/O
friendly/O and/O nice/O;/O with/O the/O servants/O,/O with/O Ivan/PERSON,/O it/O will/O all/O be/O
different/O./O''/O

Pulling/O the/O stiff/O rein/O and/O holding/O in/O the/O good/O horse/O that/O snorted/O with/O
impatience/O and/O seemed/O begging/O to/O be/O let/O go/O,/O Levin/PERSON looked/O round/O at/O Ivan/PERSON
sitting/O beside/O him/O,/O not/O knowing/O what/O to/O do/O with/O his/O unoccupied/O hand/O,/O
continually/O pressing/O down/O his/O shirt/O as/O it/O puffed/O out/O,/O and/O he/O tried/O to/O
find/O something/O to/O start/O a/O conversation/O about/O with/O him/O./O He/O would/O have/O
said/O that/O Ivan/PERSON had/O pulled/O the/O saddle-girth/O up/O too/O high/O,/O but/O that/O was/O
like/O blame/O,/O and/O he/O longed/O for/O friendly/O,/O warm/O talk/O./O Nothing/O else/O occurred/O
to/O him/O./O

``/OYour/O honor/O must/O keep/O to/O the/O right/O and/O mind/O that/O stump/O,/O''/O said/O the/O
coachman/O,/O pulling/O the/O rein/O Levin/PERSON held/O./O

``/OPlease/O do/On't/O touch/O and/O do/On't/O teach/O me/O!/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O angered/O by/O this/O
interference/O./O Now/O,/O as/O always/O,/O interference/O made/O him/O angry/O,/O and/O he/O felt/O
sorrowfully/O at/O once/O how/O mistaken/O had/O been/O his/O supposition/O that/O his/O
spiritual/O condition/O could/O immediately/O change/O him/O in/O contact/O with/O
reality/O./O

He/O was/O not/O a/O quarter/O of/O a/O mile/O from/O home/O when/O he/O saw/O Grisha/PERSON and/O Tanya/PERSON
running/O to/O meet/O him/O./O

``/OUncle/O Kostya/PERSON!/O mamma/O's/O coming/O,/O and/O grandfather/O,/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O
and/O someone/O else/O,/O''/O they/O said/O,/O clambering/O up/O into/O the/O trap/O./O

``/OWho/O is/O he/O?/O''/O

``/OAn/O awfully/O terrible/O person/O!/O And/O he/O does/O like/O this/O with/O his/O arms/O,/O''/O said/O
Tanya/PERSON,/O getting/O up/O in/O the/O trap/O and/O mimicking/O Katavasov/PERSON./O

``/OOld/O or/O young/O?/O''/O asked/O Levin/PERSON,/O laughing/O,/O reminded/O of/O someone/O,/O he/O did/O not/O
know/O whom/O,/O by/O Tanya/PERSON's/O performance/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O I/O hope/O it/O's/O not/O a/O tiresome/O person/O!/O''/O thought/O Levin/PERSON./O

As/O soon/O as/O he/O turned/O,/O at/O a/O bend/O in/O the/O road/O,/O and/O saw/O the/O party/O coming/O,/O
Levin/PERSON recognized/O Katavasov/PERSON in/O a/O straw/O hat/O,/O walking/O along/O swinging/O his/O
arms/O just/O as/O Tanya/PERSON had/O shown/O him/O./O Katavasov/PERSON was/O very/O fond/O of/O discussing/O
metaphysics/O,/O having/O derived/O his/O notions/O from/O natural/O science/O writers/O who/O
had/O never/O studied/O metaphysics/O,/O and/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION Levin/LOCATION had/O had/O many/O
arguments/O with/O him/O of/O late/O./O

And/O one/O of/O these/O arguments/O,/O in/O which/O Katavasov/PERSON had/O obviously/O considered/O
that/O he/O came/O off/O victorious/O,/O was/O the/O first/O thing/O Levin/PERSON thought/O of/O as/O he/O
recognized/O him/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O whatever/O I/O do/O,/O I/O wo/On't/O argue/O and/O give/O utterance/O to/O my/O ideas/O
lightly/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O./O

Getting/O out/O of/O the/O trap/O and/O greeting/O his/O brother/O and/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O Levin/PERSON
asked/O about/O his/O wife/O./O

``/OShe/O has/O taken/O Mitya/PERSON to/O Kolok/O''/O -LRB-/Oa/O copse/O near/O the/O house/O-RRB-/O./O ``/OShe/O meant/O to/O
have/O him/O out/O there/O because/O it/O's/O so/O hot/O indoors/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O Levin/PERSON had/O
always/O advised/O his/O wife/O not/O to/O take/O the/O baby/O to/O the/O wood/O,/O thinking/O it/O
unsafe/O,/O and/O he/O was/O not/O pleased/O to/O hear/O this/O./O

``/OShe/O rushes/O about/O from/O place/O to/O place/O with/O him/O,/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O,/O
smiling/O./O ``/OI/O advised/O her/O to/O try/O putting/O him/O in/O the/O ice/O cellar/O./O''/O

``/OShe/O meant/O to/O come/O to/O the/O bee/O house/O./O She/O thought/O you/O would/O be/O there/O./O We/O
are/O going/O there/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O,/O and/O what/O are/O you/O doing/O?/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O falling/O back/O
from/O the/O rest/O and/O walking/O beside/O him/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O nothing/O special/O./O Busy/O as/O usual/O with/O the/O land/O,/O''/O answered/O Levin/PERSON./O
``/OWell/O,/O and/O what/O about/O you/O?/O Come/O for/O long/O?/O We/O have/O been/O expecting/O you/O for/O
such/O a/O long/O time/O./O''/O

``/OOnly/O for/O a/O fortnight/O./O I/O've/O a/O great/O deal/O to/O do/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION./O''/O

At/O these/O words/O the/O brothers/O'/O eyes/O met/O,/O and/O Levin/PERSON,/O in/O spite/O of/O the/O desire/O
he/O always/O had/O,/O stronger/O than/O ever/O just/O now/O,/O to/O be/O on/O affectionate/O and/O
still/O more/O open/O terms/O with/O his/O brother/O,/O felt/O an/O awkwardness/O in/O looking/O
at/O him/O./O He/O dropped/O his/O eyes/O and/O did/O not/O know/O what/O to/O say/O./O

Casting/O over/O the/O subjects/O of/O conversation/O that/O would/O be/O pleasant/O to/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O and/O would/O keep/O him/O off/O the/O subject/O of/O the/O Servian/O war/O
and/O the/O Slavonic/O question/O,/O at/O which/O he/O had/O hinted/O by/O the/O allusion/O to/O
what/O he/O had/O to/O do/O in/O Moscow/LOCATION,/O Levin/PERSON began/O to/O talk/O of/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O
book/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O have/O there/O been/O reviews/O of/O your/O book/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON smiled/O at/O the/O intentional/O character/O of/O the/O question/O./O

``/ONo/O one/O is/O interested/O in/O that/O now/O,/O and/O I/O less/O than/O anyone/O,/O''/O he/O said/O./O
``/OJust/O look/O,/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O we/O shall/O have/O a/O shower/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O
pointing/O with/O a/O sunshade/O at/O the/O white/O rain/O clouds/O that/O showed/O above/O the/O
aspen/O tree-tops/O./O

And/O these/O words/O were/O enough/O to/O re-establish/O again/O between/O the/O brothers/O
that/O tone/O--/Ohardly/O hostile/O,/O but/O chilly/O--/Owhich/O Levin/PERSON had/O been/O so/O longing/O to/O
avoid/O./O

Levin/PERSON went/O up/O to/O Katavasov/PERSON./O

``/OIt/O was/O jolly/O of/O you/O to/O make/O up/O your/O mind/O to/O come/O,/O''/O he/O said/O to/O him/O./O

``/OI/O've/O been/O meaning/O to/O a/O long/O while/O./O Now/O we/O shall/O have/O some/O discussion/O,/O
we/O'll/O see/O to/O that/O./O Have/O you/O been/O reading/O Spencer/PERSON?/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O've/O not/O finished/O reading/O him/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OBut/O I/O do/On't/O need/O him/O
now/O./O''/O

``/OHow/O's/O that/O?/O that/O's/O interesting/O./O Why/O so/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O mean/O that/O I/O'm/O fully/O convinced/O that/O the/O solution/O of/O the/O problems/O that/O
interest/O me/O I/O shall/O never/O find/O in/O him/O and/O his/O like/O./O Now/O.../O''/O

But/O Katavasov/PERSON's/O serene/O and/O good-humored/O expression/O suddenly/O struck/O him/O,/O
and/O he/O felt/O such/O tenderness/O for/O his/O own/O happy/O mood/O,/O which/O he/O was/O
unmistakably/O disturbing/O by/O this/O conversation/O,/O that/O he/O remembered/O his/O
resolution/O and/O stopped/O short/O./O

``/OBut/O we/O'll/O talk/O later/O on/O,/O''/O he/O added/O./O ``/OIf/O we/O're/O going/O to/O the/O bee/O house/O,/O
it/O's/O this/O way/O,/O along/O this/O little/O path/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O addressing/O them/O all/O./O

Going/O along/O the/O narrow/O path/O to/O a/O little/O uncut/O meadow/O covered/O on/O one/O side/O
with/O thick/O clumps/O of/O brilliant/O heart/O's/O-/Oease/O among/O which/O stood/O up/O here/O
and/O there/O tall/O,/O dark/O green/O tufts/O of/O hellebore/O,/O Levin/PERSON settled/O his/O guests/O
in/O the/O dense/O,/O cool/O shade/O of/O the/O young/O aspens/O on/O a/O bench/O and/O some/O stumps/O
purposely/O put/O there/O for/O visitors/O to/O the/O bee/O house/O who/O might/O be/O afraid/O of/O
the/O bees/O,/O and/O he/O went/O off/O himself/O to/O the/O hut/O to/O get/O bread/O,/O cucumbers/O,/O
and/O fresh/O honey/O,/O to/O regale/O them/O with/O./O

Trying/O to/O make/O his/O movements/O as/O deliberate/O as/O possible/O,/O and/O listening/O to/O
the/O bees/O that/O buzzed/O more/O and/O more/O frequently/O past/O him/O,/O he/O walked/O along/O
the/O little/O path/O to/O the/O hut/O./O In/O the/O very/O entry/O one/O bee/O hummed/O angrily/O,/O
caught/O in/O his/O beard/O,/O but/O he/O carefully/O extricated/O it/O./O Going/O into/O the/O
shady/O outer/O room/O,/O he/O took/O down/O from/O the/O wall/O his/O veil/O,/O that/O hung/O on/O a/O
peg/O,/O and/O putting/O it/O on/O,/O and/O thrusting/O his/O hands/O into/O his/O pockets/O,/O he/O
went/O into/O the/O fenced-in/O bee-garden/O,/O where/O there/O stood/O in/O the/O midst/O of/O a/O
closely/O mown/O space/O in/O regular/O rows/O,/O fastened/O with/O bast/O on/O posts/O,/O all/O the/O
hives/O he/O knew/O so/O well/O,/O the/O old/O stocks/O,/O each/O with/O its/O own/O history/O,/O and/O
along/O the/O fences/O the/O younger/O swarms/O hived/O that/O year/O./O In/O front/O of/O the/O
openings/O of/O the/O hives/O,/O it/O made/O his/O eyes/O giddy/O to/O watch/O the/O bees/O and/O
drones/O whirling/O round/O and/O round/O about/O the/O same/O spot/O,/O while/O among/O them/O
the/O working/O bees/O flew/O in/O and/O out/O with/O spoils/O or/O in/O search/O of/O them/O,/O
always/O in/O the/O same/O direction/O into/O the/O wood/O to/O the/O flowering/O lime/O trees/O
and/O back/O to/O the/O hives/O./O

His/O ears/O were/O filled/O with/O the/O incessant/O hum/O in/O various/O notes/O,/O now/O the/O
busy/O hum/O of/O the/O working/O bee/O flying/O quickly/O off/O,/O then/O the/O blaring/O of/O the/O
lazy/O drone/O,/O and/O the/O excited/O buzz/O of/O the/O bees/O on/O guard/O protecting/O their/O
property/O from/O the/O enemy/O and/O preparing/O to/O sting/O./O On/O the/O farther/O side/O of/O
the/O fence/O the/O old/O bee-keeper/O was/O shaving/O a/O hoop/O for/O a/O tub/O,/O and/O he/O did/O
not/O see/O Levin/PERSON./O Levin/PERSON stood/O still/O in/O the/O midst/O of/O the/O beehives/O and/O did/O
not/O call/O him/O./O

He/O was/O glad/O of/O a/O chance/O to/O be/O alone/O to/O recover/O from/O the/O influence/O of/O
ordinary/O actual/O life/O,/O which/O had/O already/O depressed/O his/O happy/O mood/O./O He/O
thought/O that/O he/O had/O already/O had/O time/O to/O lose/O his/O temper/O with/O Ivan/PERSON,/O to/O
show/O coolness/O to/O his/O brother/O,/O and/O to/O talk/O flippantly/O with/O Katavasov/PERSON./O

``/OCan/O it/O have/O been/O only/O a/O momentary/O mood/O,/O and/O will/O it/O pass/O and/O leave/O no/O
trace/O?/O''/O he/O thought/O./O But/O the/O same/O instant/O,/O going/O back/O to/O his/O mood/O,/O he/O
felt/O with/O delight/O that/O something/O new/O and/O important/O had/O happened/O to/O him/O./O
Real/O life/O had/O only/O for/O a/O time/O overcast/O the/O spiritual/O peace/O he/O had/O found/O,/O
but/O it/O was/O still/O untouched/O within/O him/O./O

Just/O as/O the/O bees/O,/O whirling/O round/O him/O,/O now/O menacing/O him/O and/O distracting/O
his/O attention/O,/O prevented/O him/O from/O enjoying/O complete/O physical/O peace/O,/O
forced/O him/O to/O restrain/O his/O movements/O to/O avoid/O them/O,/O so/O had/O the/O petty/O
cares/O that/O had/O swarmed/O about/O him/O from/O the/O moment/O he/O got/O into/O the/O trap/O
restricted/O his/O spiritual/O freedom/O;/O but/O that/O lasted/O only/O so/O long/O as/O he/O was/O
among/O them/O./O Just/O as/O his/O bodily/O strength/O was/O still/O unaffected/O,/O in/O spite/O
of/O the/O bees/O,/O so/O too/O was/O the/O spiritual/O strength/O that/O he/O had/O just/O become/O
aware/O of/O./O



Chapter/O 15/O


``/ODo/O you/O know/O,/O Kostya/PERSON,/O with/O whom/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON traveled/O on/O his/O way/O
here/O?/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O doling/O out/O cucumbers/O and/O honey/O to/O the/O children/O;/O ``/Owith/O
Vronsky/O!/O He/O's/O going/O to/O Servia/O./O''/O

``/OAnd/O not/O alone/O;/O he/O's/O taking/O a/O squadron/O out/O with/O him/O at/O his/O own/O expense/O,/O''/O
said/O Katavasov/PERSON./O

``/OThat/O's/O the/O right/O thing/O for/O him/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OAre/O volunteers/O still/O
going/O out/O then/O?/O''/O he/O added/O,/O glancing/O at/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON did/O not/O answer/O./O He/O was/O carefully/O with/O a/O blunt/O knife/O
getting/O a/O live/O bee/O covered/O with/O sticky/O honey/O out/O of/O a/O cup/O full/O of/O white/O
honeycomb/O./O

``/OI/O should/O think/O so/O!/O You/O should/O have/O seen/O what/O was/O going/O on/O at/O the/O
station/O yesterday/O!/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O biting/O with/O a/O juicy/O sound/O into/O a/O
cucumber/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O is/O one/O to/O make/O of/O it/O?/O For/O mercy/O's/O sake/O,/O do/O explain/O to/O me/O,/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O where/O are/O all/O those/O volunteers/O going/O,/O whom/O are/O they/O
fighting/O with/O?/O''/O asked/O the/O old/O prince/O,/O unmistakably/O taking/O up/O a/O
conversation/O that/O had/O sprung/O up/O in/O Levin/PERSON's/O absence/O./O

``/OWith/O the/O Turks/O,/O''/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON answered/O,/O smiling/O serenely/O,/O as/O he/O
extricated/O the/O bee/O,/O dark/O with/O honey/O and/O helplessly/O kicking/O,/O and/O put/O it/O
with/O the/O knife/O on/O a/O stout/O aspen/O leaf/O./O

``/OBut/O who/O has/O declared/O war/O on/O the/O Turks/O?/O--/OIvan/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON Ragozov/PERSON and/O
Countess/O Lidia/PERSON Ivanovna/PERSON,/O assisted/O by/O Madame/PERSON Stahl/PERSON?/O''/O

``/ONo/O one/O has/O declared/O war/O,/O but/O people/O sympathize/O with/O their/O neighbors/O'/O
sufferings/O and/O are/O eager/O to/O help/O them/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OBut/O the/O prince/O is/O not/O speaking/O of/O help/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O coming/O to/O the/O
assistance/O of/O his/O father-in-law/O,/O ``/Obut/O of/O war/O./O The/O prince/O says/O that/O
private/O persons/O can/Onot/O take/O part/O in/O war/O without/O the/O permission/O of/O the/O
government/O./O''/O

``/OKostya/PERSON,/O mind/O,/O that/O's/O a/O bee/O!/O Really/O,/O they/O'll/O sting/O us/O!/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O
waving/O away/O a/O wasp/O./O

``/OBut/O that/O's/O not/O a/O bee/O,/O it/O's/O a/O wasp/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OWell/O now/O,/O well/O,/O what/O's/O your/O own/O theory/O?/O''/O Katavasov/PERSON said/O to/O Levin/PERSON with/O a/O
smile/O,/O distinctly/O challenging/O him/O to/O a/O discussion/O./O ``/OWhy/O have/O not/O private/O
persons/O the/O right/O to/O do/O so/O?/O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O my/O theory/O's/O this/O:/O war/O is/O on/O one/O side/O such/O a/O beastly/O,/O cruel/O,/O and/O
awful/O thing/O,/O that/O no/O one/O man/O,/O not/O to/O speak/O of/O a/O Christian/O,/O can/O
individually/O take/O upon/O himself/O the/O responsibility/O of/O beginning/O wars/O;/O
that/O can/O only/O be/O done/O by/O a/O government/O,/O which/O is/O called/O upon/O to/O do/O this/O,/O
and/O is/O driven/O inevitably/O into/O war/O./O On/O the/O other/O hand/O,/O both/O political/O
science/O and/O common/O sense/O teach/O us/O that/O in/O matters/O of/O state/O,/O and/O
especially/O in/O the/O matter/O of/O war/O,/O private/O citizens/O must/O forego/O their/O
personal/O individual/O will/O./O''/O

Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON and/O Katavasov/PERSON had/O their/O replies/O ready/O,/O and/O both/O began/O
speaking/O at/O the/O same/O time/O./O

``/OBut/O the/O point/O is/O,/O my/O dear/O fellow/O,/O that/O there/O may/O be/O cases/O when/O the/O
government/O does/O not/O carry/O out/O the/O will/O of/O the/O citizens/O and/O then/O the/O
public/O asserts/O its/O will/O,/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON./O

But/O evidently/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON did/O not/O approve/O of/O this/O answer/O./O His/O
brows/O contracted/O at/O Katavasov/PERSON's/O words/O and/O he/O said/O something/O else/O./O

``/OYou/O do/On't/O put/O the/O matter/O in/O its/O true/O light/O./O There/O is/O no/O question/O here/O
of/O a/O declaration/O of/O war/O,/O but/O simply/O the/O expression/O of/O a/O human/O Christian/O
feeling/O./O Our/O brothers/O,/O one/O with/O us/O in/O religion/O and/O in/O race/O,/O are/O being/O
massacred/O./O Even/O supposing/O they/O were/O not/O our/O brothers/O nor/O
fellow-Christians/O,/O but/O simply/O children/O,/O women/O,/O old/O people/O,/O feeling/O is/O
aroused/O and/O Russians/O go/O eagerly/O to/O help/O in/O stopping/O these/O atrocities/O./O
Fancy/O,/O if/O you/O were/O going/O along/O the/O street/O and/O saw/O drunken/O men/O beating/O a/O
woman/O or/O a/O child/O--/OI/O imagine/O you/O would/O not/O stop/O to/O inquire/O whether/O war/O had/O
been/O declared/O on/O the/O men/O,/O but/O would/O throw/O yourself/O on/O them/O,/O and/O protect/O
the/O victim/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O I/O should/O not/O kill/O them/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O

``/OYes/O,/O you/O would/O kill/O them/O./O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O know/O./O If/O I/O saw/O that/O,/O I/O might/O give/O way/O to/O my/O impulse/O of/O the/O
moment/O,/O but/O I/O ca/On't/O say/O beforehand/O./O And/O such/O a/O momentary/O impulse/O there/O
is/O not/O,/O and/O there/O can/Onot/O be/O,/O in/O the/O case/O of/O the/O oppression/O of/O the/O
Slavonic/O peoples/O./O''/O

``/OPossibly/O for/O you/O there/O is/O not/O;/O but/O for/O others/O there/O is/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O frowning/O with/O displeasure/O./O ``/OThere/O are/O traditions/O still/O
extant/O among/O the/O people/O of/O Slavs/O of/O the/O true/O faith/O suffering/O under/O the/O
yoke/O of/O the/O `/Ounclean/O sons/O of/O Hagar/PERSON./O'/O The/O people/O have/O heard/O of/O the/O
sufferings/O of/O their/O brethren/O and/O have/O spoken/O./O''/O

``/OPerhaps/O so/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON evasively/O;/O ``/Obut/O I/O do/On't/O see/O it/O./O I/O'm/O one/O of/O the/O
people/O myself/O,/O and/O I/O do/On't/O feel/O it/O./O''/O

``/OHere/O am/O I/O too/O,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O prince/O./O ``/OI/O've/O been/O staying/O abroad/O and/O
reading/O the/O papers/O,/O and/O I/O must/O own/O,/O up/O to/O the/O time/O of/O the/O Bulgarian/O
atrocities/O,/O I/O could/On't/O make/O out/O why/O it/O was/O all/O the/O Russians/O were/O all/O of/O
a/O sudden/O so/O fond/O of/O their/O Slavonic/O brethren/O,/O while/O I/O did/On't/O feel/O the/O
slightest/O affection/O for/O them/O./O I/O was/O very/O much/O upset/O,/O thought/O I/O was/O a/O
monster/O,/O or/O that/O it/O was/O the/O influence/O of/O Carlsbad/LOCATION on/O me/O./O But/O since/O I/O
have/O been/O here/O,/O my/O mind/O's/O been/O set/O at/O rest/O./O I/O see/O that/O there/O are/O people/O
besides/O me/O who/O're/O only/O interested/O in/O Russia/LOCATION,/O and/O not/O in/O their/O Slavonic/O
brethren/O./O Here/O's/O Konstantin/PERSON too/O./O''/O

``/OPersonal/O opinions/O mean/O nothing/O in/O such/O a/O case/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON;/O
``/Oit/O's/O not/O a/O matter/O of/O personal/O opinions/O when/O all/O Russia/LOCATION--/Othe/O whole/O
people/O--/Ohas/O expressed/O its/O will/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O excuse/O me/O,/O I/O do/On't/O see/O that/O./O The/O people/O do/On't/O know/O anything/O about/O
it/O,/O if/O you/O come/O to/O that/O,/O''/O said/O the/O old/O prince/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O papa/O!/O.../O how/O can/O you/O say/O that/O?/O And/O last/O Sunday/O in/O church/O?/O''/O said/O
Dolly/PERSON,/O listening/O to/O the/O conversation/O./O ``/OPlease/O give/O me/O a/O cloth/O,/O''/O she/O said/O
to/O the/O old/O man/O,/O who/O was/O looking/O at/O the/O children/O with/O a/O smile/O./O ``/OWhy/O,/O it/O's/O
not/O possible/O that/O all/O.../O''/O

``/OBut/O what/O was/O it/O in/O church/O on/O Sunday/O?/O The/O priest/O had/O been/O told/O to/O read/O
that/O./O He/O read/O it/O./O They/O did/On't/O understand/O a/O word/O of/O it/O./O Then/O they/O were/O
told/O that/O there/O was/O to/O be/O a/O collection/O for/O a/O pious/O object/O in/O church/O;/O
well/O,/O they/O pulled/O out/O their/O halfpence/O and/O gave/O them/O,/O but/O what/O for/O they/O
could/On't/O say/O./O''/O

``/OThe/O people/O can/Onot/O help/O knowing/O;/O the/O sense/O of/O their/O own/O destinies/O is/O
always/O in/O the/O people/O,/O and/O at/O such/O moments/O as/O the/O present/O that/O sense/O
finds/O utterance/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON with/O conviction/O,/O glancing/O at/O
the/O old/O bee-keeper/O./O

The/O handsome/O old/O man/O,/O with/O black/O grizzled/O beard/O and/O thick/O silvery/O hair/O,/O
stood/O motionless/O,/O holding/O a/O cup/O of/O honey/O,/O looking/O down/O from/O the/O height/O
of/O his/O tall/O figure/O with/O friendly/O serenity/O at/O the/O gentlefolk/O,/O obviously/O
understanding/O nothing/O of/O their/O conversation/O and/O not/O caring/O to/O understand/O
it/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O so/O,/O no/O doubt/O,/O''/O he/O said/O,/O with/O a/O significant/O shake/O of/O his/O head/O at/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O words/O./O

``/OHere/O,/O then/O,/O ask/O him/O./O He/O knows/O nothing/O about/O it/O and/O thinks/O nothing/O,/O''/O
said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OHave/O you/O heard/O about/O the/O war/O,/O Mihalitch/PERSON?/O''/O he/O said/O,/O turning/O
to/O him/O./O ``/OWhat/O they/O read/O in/O the/O church/O?/O What/O do/O you/O think/O about/O it/O?/O Ought/O
we/O to/O fight/O for/O the/O Christians/O?/O''/O

``/OWhat/O should/O we/O think/O?/O Alexander/PERSON Nikolaevitch/PERSON our/O Emperor/O has/O thought/O
for/O us/O;/O he/O thinks/O for/O us/O indeed/O in/O all/O things/O./O It/O's/O clearer/O for/O him/O to/O
see/O./O Shall/O I/O bring/O a/O bit/O more/O bread/O?/O Give/O the/O little/O lad/O some/O more/O?/O''/O he/O
said/O addressing/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON and/O pointing/O to/O Grisha/PERSON,/O who/O had/O
finished/O his/O crust/O./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O need/O to/O ask/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O ``/Owe/O have/O seen/O and/O are/O
seeing/O hundreds/O and/O hundreds/O of/O people/O who/O give/O up/O everything/O to/O serve/O a/O
just/O cause/O,/O come/O from/O every/O part/O of/O Russia/LOCATION,/O and/O directly/O and/O clearly/O
express/O their/O thought/O and/O aim/O./O They/O bring/O their/O halfpence/O or/O go/O
themselves/O and/O say/O directly/O what/O for/O./O What/O does/O it/O mean/O?/O''/O

``/OIt/O means/O,/O to/O my/O thinking/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O who/O was/O beginning/O to/O get/O warm/O,/O
``/Othat/O among/O eighty/O millions/O of/O people/O there/O can/O always/O be/O found/O not/O
hundreds/O,/O as/O now/O,/O but/O tens/O of/O thousands/O of/O people/O who/O have/O lost/O caste/O,/O
ne'er/O-/Odo-wells/O,/O who/O are/O always/O ready/O to/O go/O anywhere/O--/Oto/O Pogatchev/PERSON's/O
bands/O,/O to/O Khiva/LOCATION,/O to/O Serbia/LOCATION.../O''/O

``/OI/O tell/O you/O that/O it/O's/O not/O a/O case/O of/O hundreds/O or/O of/O ne'er/O-/Odo-wells/O,/O but/O
the/O best/O representatives/O of/O the/O people/O!/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O with/O as/O
much/O irritation/O as/O if/O he/O were/O defending/O the/O last/O penny/O of/O his/O fortune/O./O
``/OAnd/O what/O of/O the/O subscriptions/O?/O In/O this/O case/O it/O is/O a/O whole/O people/O
directly/O expressing/O their/O will/O./O''/O

``/OThat/O word/O `/Opeople/O'/O is/O so/O vague/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON./O ``/OParish/O clerks/O,/O teachers/O,/O
and/O one/O in/O a/O thousand/O of/O the/O peasants/O,/O maybe/O,/O know/O what/O it/O's/O all/O about/O./O
The/O rest/O of/O the/O eighty/O millions/O,/O like/O Mihalitch/PERSON,/O far/O from/O expressing/O
their/O will/O,/O have/On't/O the/O faintest/O idea/O what/O there/O is/O for/O them/O to/O express/O
their/O will/O about/O./O What/O right/O have/O we/O to/O say/O that/O this/O is/O the/O people/O's/O
will/O?/O''/O



Chapter/O 16/O


Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O being/O practiced/O in/O argument/O,/O did/O not/O reply/O,/O but/O at/O
once/O turned/O the/O conversation/O to/O another/O aspect/O of/O the/O subject/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O if/O you/O want/O to/O learn/O the/O spirit/O of/O the/O people/O by/O arithmetical/O
computation/O,/O of/O course/O it/O's/O very/O difficult/O to/O arrive/O at/O it/O./O And/O voting/O
has/O not/O been/O introduced/O among/O us/O and/O can/Onot/O be/O introduced/O,/O for/O it/O does/O
not/O express/O the/O will/O of/O the/O people/O;/O but/O there/O are/O other/O ways/O of/O reaching/O
that/O./O It/O is/O felt/O in/O the/O air/O,/O it/O is/O felt/O by/O the/O heart/O./O I/O wo/On't/O speak/O of/O
those/O deep/O currents/O which/O are/O astir/O in/O the/O still/O ocean/O of/O the/O people/O,/O
and/O which/O are/O evident/O to/O every/O unprejudiced/O man/O;/O let/O us/O look/O at/O society/O
in/O the/O narrow/O sense/O./O All/O the/O most/O diverse/O sections/O of/O the/O educated/O
public/O,/O hostile/O before/O,/O are/O merged/O in/O one/O./O Every/O division/O is/O at/O an/O end/O,/O
all/O the/O public/O organs/O say/O the/O same/O thing/O over/O and/O over/O again/O,/O all/O feel/O
the/O mighty/O torrent/O that/O has/O overtaken/O them/O and/O is/O carrying/O them/O in/O one/O
direction/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O all/O the/O newspapers/O do/O say/O the/O same/O thing/O,/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O./O
``/OThat/O's/O true/O./O But/O so/O it/O is/O the/O same/O thing/O that/O all/O the/O frogs/O croak/O
before/O a/O storm/O./O One/O can/O hear/O nothing/O for/O them/O./O''/O

``/OFrogs/O or/O no/O frogs/O,/O I/O'm/O not/O the/O editor/O of/O a/O paper/O and/O I/O do/On't/O want/O to/O
defend/O them/O;/O but/O I/O am/O speaking/O of/O the/O unanimity/O in/O the/O intellectual/O
world/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O addressing/O his/O brother/O./O Levin/PERSON would/O have/O
answered/O,/O but/O the/O old/O prince/O interrupted/O him/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O about/O that/O unanimity/O,/O that/O's/O another/O thing/O,/O one/O may/O say/O,/O''/O said/O
the/O prince/O./O ``/OThere/O's/O my/O son-in-law/O,/O Stepan/PERSON Arkadyevitch/PERSON,/O you/O know/O him/O./O
He/O's/O got/O a/O place/O now/O on/O the/O committee/O of/O a/O commission/O and/O something/O or/O
other/O,/O I/O do/On't/O remember/O./O Only/O there/O's/O nothing/O to/O do/O in/O it/O--/Owhy/O,/O Dolly/PERSON,/O
it/O's/O no/O secret/O!/O--/Oand/O a/O salary/O of/O eight/O thousand/O./O You/O try/O asking/O him/O
whether/O his/O post/O is/O of/O use/O,/O he/O'll/O prove/O to/O you/O that/O it/O's/O most/O necessary/O./O
And/O he/O's/O a/O truthful/O man/O too/O,/O but/O there/O's/O no/O refusing/O to/O believe/O in/O the/O
utility/O of/O eight/O thousand/O roubles/O./O''/O

``/OYes/O,/O he/O asked/O me/O to/O give/O a/O message/O to/O Darya/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON about/O the/O
post/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON reluctantly/O,/O feeling/O the/O prince/O's/O remark/O
to/O be/O ill-timed/O./O

``/OSo/O it/O is/O with/O the/O unanimity/O of/O the/O press/O./O That/O's/O been/O explained/O to/O me/O:/O
as/O soon/O as/O there/O's/O war/O their/O incomes/O are/O doubled/O./O How/O can/O they/O help/O
believing/O in/O the/O destinies/O of/O the/O people/O and/O the/O Slavonic/O races/O .../O and/O
all/O that/O?/O''/O

``/OI/O do/On't/O care/O for/O many/O of/O the/O papers/O,/O but/O that/O's/O unjust/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OI/O would/O only/O make/O one/O condition/O,/O''/O pursued/O the/O old/O prince/O./O ``/OAlphonse/PERSON
Karr/PERSON said/O a/O capital/O thing/O before/O the/O war/O with/O Prussia/LOCATION:/O `/OYou/O consider/O war/O
to/O be/O inevitable/O?/O Very/O good/O./O Let/O everyone/O who/O advocates/O war/O be/O enrolled/O
in/O a/O special/O regiment/O of/O advance-guards/O,/O for/O the/O front/O of/O every/O storm/O,/O
of/O every/O attack/O,/O to/O lead/O them/O all/O!/O'/O''/O

``/OA/O nice/O lot/O the/O editors/O would/O make/O!/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O with/O a/O loud/O roar/O,/O
as/O he/O pictured/O the/O editors/O he/O knew/O in/O this/O picked/O legion/O./O

``/OBut/O they/O'd/O run/O,/O''/O said/O Dolly/PERSON,/O ``/Othey/O'd/O only/O be/O in/O the/O way/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O if/O they/O ran/O away/O,/O then/O we/O'd/O have/O grape-shot/O or/O Cossacks/O with/O whips/O
behind/O them/O,/O''/O said/O the/O prince/O./O

``/OBut/O that/O's/O a/O joke/O,/O and/O a/O poor/O one/O too/O,/O if/O you/O'll/O excuse/O my/O saying/O so/O,/O
prince/O,/O''/O said/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O

``/OI/O do/On't/O see/O that/O it/O was/O a/O joke/O,/O that/O.../O''/O Levin/PERSON was/O beginning/O,/O but/O
Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON interrupted/O him/O./O

``/OEvery/O member/O of/O society/O is/O called/O upon/O to/O do/O his/O own/O special/O work/O,/O''/O
said/O he/O./O ``/OAnd/O men/O of/O thought/O are/O doing/O their/O work/O when/O they/O express/O
public/O opinion/O./O And/O the/O single-hearted/O and/O full/O expression/O of/O public/O
opinion/O is/O the/O service/O of/O the/O press/O and/O a/O phenomenon/O to/O rejoice/O us/O at/O
the/O same/O time/O./O Twenty/O years/O ago/O we/O should/O have/O been/O silent/O,/O but/O now/O we/O
have/O heard/O the/O voice/O of/O the/O Russian/O people/O,/O which/O is/O ready/O to/O rise/O as/O
one/O man/O and/O ready/O to/O sacrifice/O itself/O for/O its/O oppressed/O brethren/O;/O that/O
is/O a/O great/O step/O and/O a/O proof/O of/O strength/O./O''/O

``/OBut/O it/O's/O not/O only/O making/O a/O sacrifice/O,/O but/O killing/O Turks/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON
timidly/O./O ``/OThe/O people/O make/O sacrifices/O and/O are/O ready/O to/O make/O sacrifices/O
for/O their/O soul/O,/O but/O not/O for/O murder/O,/O''/O he/O added/O,/O instinctively/O connecting/O
the/O conversation/O with/O the/O ideas/O that/O had/O been/O absorbing/O his/O mind/O./O

``/OFor/O their/O soul/O?/O That/O's/O a/O most/O puzzling/O expression/O for/O a/O natural/O science/O
man/O,/O do/O you/O understand/O?/O What/O sort/O of/O thing/O is/O the/O soul/O?/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O
smiling/O./O

``/OOh/O,/O you/O know/O!/O''/O

``/ONo/O,/O by/O God/O,/O I/O have/On't/O the/O faintest/O idea/O!/O''/O said/O Katavasov/PERSON with/O a/O loud/O
roar/O of/O laughter/O./O

''/O`/OI/O bring/O not/O peace/O,/O but/O a/O sword/O,/O'/O says/O Christ/PERSON,/O''/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON
rejoined/O for/O his/O part/O,/O quoting/O as/O simply/O as/O though/O it/O were/O the/O easiest/O
thing/O to/O understand/O the/O very/O passage/O that/O had/O always/O puzzled/O Levin/PERSON most/O./O

``/OThat/O's/O so/O,/O no/O doubt/O,/O''/O the/O old/O man/O repeated/O again/O./O He/O was/O standing/O near/O
them/O and/O responded/O to/O a/O chance/O glance/O turned/O in/O his/O direction/O./O

``/OAh/O,/O my/O dear/O fellow/O,/O you/O're/O defeated/O,/O utterly/O defeated/O!/O''/O cried/O Katavasov/PERSON
good-humoredly/O./O

Levin/PERSON reddened/O with/O vexation/O,/O not/O at/O being/O defeated/O,/O but/O at/O having/O
failed/O to/O control/O himself/O and/O being/O drawn/O into/O argument/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O argue/O with/O them/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O;/O ``/Othey/O wear/O impenetrable/O
armor/O,/O while/O I/O'm/O naked/O./O''/O

He/O saw/O that/O it/O was/O impossible/O to/O convince/O his/O brother/O and/O Katavasov/PERSON,/O and/O
he/O saw/O even/O less/O possibility/O of/O himself/O agreeing/O with/O them/O./O What/O they/O
advocated/O was/O the/O very/O pride/O of/O intellect/O that/O had/O almost/O been/O his/O ruin/O./O
He/O could/O not/O admit/O that/O some/O dozens/O of/O men/O,/O among/O them/O his/O brother/O,/O had/O
the/O right/O,/O on/O the/O ground/O of/O what/O they/O were/O told/O by/O some/O hundreds/O of/O glib/O
volunteers/O swarming/O to/O the/O capital/O,/O to/O say/O that/O they/O and/O the/O newspapers/O
were/O expressing/O the/O will/O and/O feeling/O of/O the/O people/O,/O and/O a/O feeling/O which/O
was/O expressed/O in/O vengeance/O and/O murder/O./O He/O could/O not/O admit/O this/O,/O because/O
he/O neither/O saw/O the/O expression/O of/O such/O feelings/O in/O the/O people/O among/O whom/O
he/O was/O living/O,/O nor/O found/O them/O in/O himself/O -LRB-/Oand/O he/O could/O not/O but/O consider/O
himself/O one/O of/O the/O persons/O making/O up/O the/O Russian/O people/O-RRB-/O,/O and/O most/O of/O
all/O because/O he/O,/O like/O the/O people/O,/O did/O not/O know/O and/O could/O not/O know/O what/O is/O
for/O the/O general/O good/O,/O though/O he/O knew/O beyond/O a/O doubt/O that/O this/O general/O
good/O could/O be/O attained/O only/O by/O the/O strict/O observance/O of/O that/O law/O of/O
right/O and/O wrong/O which/O has/O been/O revealed/O to/O every/O man/O,/O and/O therefore/O he/O
could/O not/O wish/O for/O war/O or/O advocate/O war/O for/O any/O general/O objects/O whatever/O./O
He/O said/O as/O Mihalitch/PERSON did/O and/O the/O people/O,/O who/O had/O expressed/O their/O feeling/O
in/O the/O traditional/O invitations/O of/O the/O Varyagi/O:/O ``/OBe/O princes/O and/O rule/O over/O
us/O./O Gladly/O we/O promise/O complete/O submission/O./O All/O the/O labor/O,/O all/O
humiliations/O,/O all/O sacrifices/O we/O take/O upon/O ourselves/O;/O but/O we/O will/O not/O
judge/O and/O decide/O./O''/O And/O now/O,/O according/O to/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O account/O,/O
the/O people/O had/O foregone/O this/O privilege/O they/O had/O bought/O at/O such/O a/O costly/O
price/O./O

He/O wanted/O to/O say/O too/O that/O if/O public/O opinion/O were/O an/O infallible/O guide/O,/O
then/O why/O were/O not/O revolutions/O and/O the/O commune/O as/O lawful/O as/O the/O movement/O
in/O favor/O of/O the/O Slavonic/O peoples/O?/O But/O these/O were/O merely/O thoughts/O that/O
could/O settle/O nothing/O./O One/O thing/O could/O be/O seen/O beyond/O doubt/O--/Othat/O was/O that/O
at/O the/O actual/O moment/O the/O discussion/O was/O irritating/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O
and/O so/O it/O was/O wrong/O to/O continue/O it/O./O And/O Levin/PERSON ceased/O speaking/O and/O then/O
called/O the/O attention/O of/O his/O guests/O to/O the/O fact/O that/O the/O storm/O clouds/O
were/O gathering/O,/O and/O that/O they/O had/O better/O be/O going/O home/O before/O it/O rained/O./O



Chapter/O 17/O


The/O old/O prince/O and/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON got/O into/O the/O trap/O and/O drove/O off/O;/O
the/O rest/O of/O the/O party/O hastened/O homewards/O on/O foot/O./O

But/O the/O storm-clouds/O,/O turning/O white/O and/O then/O black/O,/O moved/O down/O so/O
quickly/O that/O they/O had/O to/O quicken/O their/O pace/O to/O get/O home/O before/O the/O rain/O./O
The/O foremost/O clouds/O,/O lowering/O and/O black/O as/O soot-laden/O smoke/O,/O rushed/O with/O
extraordinary/O swiftness/O over/O the/O sky/O./O They/O were/O still/O two/O hundred/O paces/O
from/O home/O and/O a/O gust/O of/O wind/O had/O already/O blown/O up/O,/O and/O every/O second/O the/O
downpour/O might/O be/O looked/O for/O./O

The/O children/O ran/O ahead/O with/O frightened/O and/O gleeful/O shrieks/O./O Darya/PERSON
Alexandrovna/PERSON,/O struggling/O painfully/O with/O her/O skirts/O that/O clung/O round/O her/O
legs/O,/O was/O not/O walking/O,/O but/O running/O,/O her/O eyes/O fixed/O on/O the/O children/O./O The/O
men/O of/O the/O party/O,/O holding/O their/O hats/O on/O,/O strode/O with/O long/O steps/O beside/O
her/O./O They/O were/O just/O at/O the/O steps/O when/O a/O big/O drop/O fell/O splashing/O on/O the/O
edge/O of/O the/O iron/O guttering/O./O The/O children/O and/O their/O elders/O after/O them/O ran/O
into/O the/O shelter/O of/O the/O house/O,/O talking/O merrily/O./O

``/OKaterina/PERSON Alexandrovna/PERSON?/O''/O Levin/PERSON asked/O of/O Agafea/PERSON Mihalovna/PERSON,/O who/O met/O them/O
with/O kerchiefs/O and/O rugs/O in/O the/O hall/O./O

``/OWe/O thought/O she/O was/O with/O you/O,/O''/O she/O said/O./O

``/OAnd/O Mitya/PERSON?/O''/O

``/OIn/O the/O copse/O,/O he/O must/O be/O,/O and/O the/O nurse/O with/O him/O./O''/O

Levin/PERSON snatched/O up/O the/O rugs/O and/O ran/O towards/O the/O copse/O./O

In/O that/O brief/O interval/O of/O time/O the/O storm/O clouds/O had/O moved/O on/O,/O covering/O
the/O sun/O so/O completely/O that/O it/O was/O dark/O as/O an/O eclipse/O./O Stubbornly/O,/O as/O
though/O insisting/O on/O its/O rights/O,/O the/O wind/O stopped/O Levin/PERSON,/O and/O tearing/O the/O
leaves/O and/O flowers/O off/O the/O lime/O trees/O and/O stripping/O the/O white/O birch/O
branches/O into/O strange/O unseemly/O nakedness/O,/O it/O twisted/O everything/O on/O one/O
side/O--/Oacacias/O,/O flowers/O,/O burdocks/O,/O long/O grass/O,/O and/O tall/O tree-tops/O./O The/O
peasant/O girls/O working/O in/O the/O garden/O ran/O shrieking/O into/O shelter/O in/O the/O
servants/O'/O quarters/O./O The/O streaming/O rain/O had/O already/O flung/O its/O white/O veil/O
over/O all/O the/O distant/O forest/O and/O half/O the/O fields/O close/O by/O,/O and/O was/O
rapidly/O swooping/O down/O upon/O the/O copse/O./O The/O wet/O of/O the/O rain/O spurting/O up/O in/O
tiny/O drops/O could/O be/O smelt/O in/O the/O air/O./O

Holding/O his/O head/O bent/O down/O before/O him/O,/O and/O struggling/O with/O the/O wind/O that/O
strove/O to/O tear/O the/O wraps/O away/O from/O him/O,/O Levin/PERSON was/O moving/O up/O to/O the/O copse/O
and/O had/O just/O caught/O sight/O of/O something/O white/O behind/O the/O oak/O tree/O,/O when/O
there/O was/O a/O sudden/O flash/O,/O the/O whole/O earth/O seemed/O on/O fire/O,/O and/O the/O vault/O
of/O heaven/O seemed/O crashing/O overhead/O./O Opening/O his/O blinded/O eyes/O,/O Levin/PERSON
gazed/O through/O the/O thick/O veil/O of/O rain/O that/O separated/O him/O now/O from/O the/O
copse/O,/O and/O to/O his/O horror/O the/O first/O thing/O he/O saw/O was/O the/O green/O crest/O of/O
the/O familiar/O oak-tree/O in/O the/O middle/O of/O the/O copse/O uncannily/O changing/O its/O
position/O./O ``/OCan/O it/O have/O been/O struck/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON hardly/O had/O time/O to/O think/O
when/O,/O moving/O more/O and/O more/O rapidly/O,/O the/O oak/O tree/O vanished/O behind/O the/O
other/O trees/O,/O and/O he/O heard/O the/O crash/O of/O the/O great/O tree/O falling/O upon/O the/O
others/O./O

The/O flash/O of/O lightning/O,/O the/O crash/O of/O thunder/O,/O and/O the/O instantaneous/O
chill/O that/O ran/O through/O him/O were/O all/O merged/O for/O Levin/PERSON in/O one/O sense/O of/O
terror/O./O

``/OMy/O God/O!/O my/O God/O!/O not/O on/O them/O!/O''/O he/O said/O./O

And/O though/O he/O thought/O at/O once/O how/O senseless/O was/O his/O prayer/O that/O they/O
should/O not/O have/O been/O killed/O by/O the/O oak/O which/O had/O fallen/O now/O,/O he/O repeated/O
it/O,/O knowing/O that/O he/O could/O do/O nothing/O better/O than/O utter/O this/O senseless/O
prayer/O./O

Running/O up/O to/O the/O place/O where/O they/O usually/O went/O,/O he/O did/O not/O find/O them/O
there/O./O

They/O were/O at/O the/O other/O end/O of/O the/O copse/O under/O an/O old/O lime-tree/O;/O they/O
were/O calling/O him/O./O Two/O figures/O in/O dark/O dresses/O -LRB-/Othey/O had/O been/O light/O
summer/O dresses/O when/O they/O started/O out/O-RRB-/O were/O standing/O bending/O over/O
something/O./O It/O was/O Kitty/PERSON with/O the/O nurse/O./O The/O rain/O was/O already/O ceasing/O,/O
and/O it/O was/O beginning/O to/O get/O light/O when/O Levin/PERSON reached/O them/O./O The/O nurse/O was/O
not/O wet/O on/O the/O lower/O part/O of/O her/O dress/O,/O but/O Kitty/PERSON was/O drenched/O through/O,/O
and/O her/O soaked/O clothes/O clung/O to/O her/O./O Though/O the/O rain/O was/O over/O,/O they/O
still/O stood/O in/O the/O same/O position/O in/O which/O they/O had/O been/O standing/O when/O
the/O storm/O broke/O./O Both/O stood/O bending/O over/O a/O perambulator/O with/O a/O green/O
umbrella/O./O

``/OAlive/O?/O Unhurt/O?/O Thank/O God/O!/O''/O he/O said/O,/O splashing/O with/O his/O soaked/O boots/O
through/O the/O standing/O water/O and/O running/O up/O to/O them/O./O

Kitty/PERSON's/O rosy/O wet/O face/O was/O turned/O towards/O him/O,/O and/O she/O smiled/O timidly/O
under/O her/O shapeless/O sopped/O hat/O./O

``/OAre/On't/O you/O ashamed/O of/O yourself/O?/O I/O ca/On't/O think/O how/O you/O can/O be/O so/O
reckless/O!/O''/O he/O said/O angrily/O to/O his/O wife/O./O

``/OIt/O was/On't/O my/O fault/O,/O really/O./O We/O were/O just/O meaning/O to/O go/O,/O when/O he/O made/O
such/O a/O to-do/O that/O we/O had/O to/O change/O him/O./O We/O were/O just/O.../O''/O Kitty/PERSON began/O
defending/O herself/O./O

Mitya/PERSON was/O unharmed/O,/O dry/O,/O and/O still/O fast/O asleep/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O thank/O God/O!/O I/O do/On't/O know/O what/O I/O'm/O saying/O!/O''/O

They/O gathered/O up/O the/O baby/O's/O wet/O belongings/O;/O the/O nurse/O picked/O up/O the/O baby/O
and/O carried/O it/O./O Levin/PERSON walked/O beside/O his/O wife/O,/O and/O,/O penitent/O for/O having/O
been/O angry/O,/O he/O squeezed/O her/O hand/O when/O the/O nurse/O was/O not/O looking/O./O



Chapter/O 18/O


During/O the/O whole/O of/O that/O day/O,/O in/O the/O extremely/O different/O conversations/O
in/O which/O he/O took/O part/O,/O only/O as/O it/O were/O with/O the/O top/O layer/O of/O his/O mind/O,/O
in/O spite/O of/O the/O disappointment/O of/O not/O finding/O the/O change/O he/O expected/O in/O
himself/O,/O Levin/PERSON had/O been/O all/O the/O while/O joyfully/O conscious/O of/O the/O fulness/O
of/O his/O heart/O./O

After/O the/O rain/O it/O was/O too/O wet/O to/O go/O for/O a/O walk/O;/O besides/O,/O the/O storm/O
clouds/O still/O hung/O about/O the/O horizon/O,/O and/O gathered/O here/O and/O there/O,/O black/O
and/O thundery/O,/O on/O the/O rim/O of/O the/O sky/O./O The/O whole/O party/O spent/O the/O rest/O of/O
the/O day/O in/O the/O house/O./O

No/O more/O discussions/O sprang/O up/O;/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O after/O dinner/O every/O one/O
was/O in/O the/O most/O amiable/O frame/O of/O mind/O./O

At/O first/O Katavasov/PERSON amused/O the/O ladies/O by/O his/O original/O jokes/O,/O which/O always/O
pleased/O people/O on/O their/O first/O acquaintance/O with/O him/O./O Then/O Sergey/PERSON
Ivanovitch/PERSON induced/O him/O to/O tell/O them/O about/O the/O very/O interesting/O
observations/O he/O had/O made/O on/O the/O habits/O and/O characteristics/O of/O common/O
houseflies/O,/O and/O their/O life/O./O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O too/O,/O was/O in/O good/O spirits/O,/O
and/O at/O tea/O his/O brother/O drew/O him/O on/O to/O explain/O his/O views/O of/O the/O future/O of/O
the/O Eastern/O question/O,/O and/O he/O spoke/O so/O simply/O and/O so/O well/O,/O that/O everyone/O
listened/O eagerly/O./O

Kitty/PERSON was/O the/O only/O one/O who/O did/O not/O hear/O it/O all/O--/Oshe/O was/O summoned/O to/O give/O
Mitya/PERSON his/O bath/O./O

A/O few/O minutes/O after/O Kitty/PERSON had/O left/O the/O room/O she/O sent/O for/O Levin/PERSON to/O come/O
to/O the/O nursery/O./O

Leaving/O his/O tea/O,/O and/O regretfully/O interrupting/O the/O interesting/O
conversation/O,/O and/O at/O the/O same/O time/O uneasily/O wondering/O why/O he/O had/O been/O
sent/O for/O,/O as/O this/O only/O happened/O on/O important/O occasions/O,/O Levin/PERSON went/O to/O
the/O nursery/O./O

Although/O he/O had/O been/O much/O interested/O by/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON's/O views/O of/O the/O
new/O epoch/O in/O history/O that/O would/O be/O created/O by/O the/O emancipation/O of/O forty/O
millions/O of/O men/O of/O Slavonic/O race/O acting/O with/O Russia/LOCATION,/O a/O conception/O quite/O
new/O to/O him/O,/O and/O although/O he/O was/O disturbed/O by/O uneasy/O wonder/O at/O being/O sent/O
for/O by/O Kitty/PERSON,/O as/O soon/O as/O he/O came/O out/O of/O the/O drawing/O room/O and/O was/O alone/O,/O
his/O mind/O reverted/O at/O once/O to/O the/O thoughts/O of/O the/O morning/O./O And/O all/O the/O
theories/O of/O the/O significance/O of/O the/O Slav/O element/O in/O the/O history/O of/O the/O
world/O seemed/O to/O him/O so/O trivial/O compared/O with/O what/O was/O passing/O in/O his/O own/O
soul/O,/O that/O he/O instantly/O forgot/O it/O all/O and/O dropped/O back/O into/O the/O same/O
frame/O of/O mind/O that/O he/O had/O been/O in/O that/O morning/O./O

He/O did/O not/O,/O as/O he/O had/O done/O at/O other/O times/O,/O recall/O the/O whole/O train/O of/O
thought/O--/Othat/O he/O did/O not/O need/O./O He/O fell/O back/O at/O once/O into/O the/O feeling/O
which/O had/O guided/O him/O,/O which/O was/O connected/O with/O those/O thoughts/O,/O and/O he/O
found/O that/O feeling/O in/O his/O soul/O even/O stronger/O and/O more/O definite/O than/O
before/O./O He/O did/O not/O,/O as/O he/O had/O had/O to/O do/O with/O previous/O attempts/O to/O find/O
comforting/O arguments/O,/O need/O to/O revive/O a/O whole/O chain/O of/O thought/O to/O find/O
the/O feeling/O./O Now/O,/O on/O the/O contrary/O,/O the/O feeling/O of/O joy/O and/O peace/O was/O
keener/O than/O ever/O,/O and/O thought/O could/O not/O keep/O pace/O with/O feeling/O./O

He/O walked/O across/O the/O terrace/O and/O looked/O at/O two/O stars/O that/O had/O come/O out/O
in/O the/O darkening/O sky/O,/O and/O suddenly/O he/O remembered/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O looking/O at/O the/O
sky/O,/O I/O thought/O that/O the/O dome/O that/O I/O see/O is/O not/O a/O deception/O,/O and/O then/O I/O
thought/O something/O,/O I/O shirked/O facing/O something/O,/O''/O he/O mused/O./O ``/OBut/O whatever/O
it/O was/O,/O there/O can/O be/O no/O disproving/O it/O!/O I/O have/O but/O to/O think/O,/O and/O all/O will/O
come/O clear/O!/O''/O

Just/O as/O he/O was/O going/O into/O the/O nursery/O he/O remembered/O what/O it/O was/O he/O had/O
shirked/O facing/O./O It/O was/O that/O if/O the/O chief/O proof/O of/O the/O Divinity/O was/O His/O
revelation/O of/O what/O is/O right/O,/O how/O is/O it/O this/O revelation/O is/O confined/O to/O
the/O Christian/O church/O alone/O?/O What/O relation/O to/O this/O revelation/O have/O the/O
beliefs/O of/O the/O Buddhists/O,/O Mohammedans/PERSON,/O who/O preached/O and/O did/O good/O too/O?/O

It/O seemed/O to/O him/O that/O he/O had/O an/O answer/O to/O this/O question/O;/O but/O he/O had/O not/O
time/O to/O formulate/O it/O to/O himself/O before/O he/O went/O into/O the/O nursery/O./O

Kitty/PERSON was/O standing/O with/O her/O sleeves/O tucked/O up/O over/O the/O baby/O in/O the/O bath/O./O
Hearing/O her/O husband/O's/O footstep/O,/O she/O turned/O towards/O him/O,/O summoning/O him/O to/O
her/O with/O her/O smile/O./O With/O one/O hand/O she/O was/O supporting/O the/O fat/O baby/O that/O
lay/O floating/O and/O sprawling/O on/O its/O back/O,/O while/O with/O the/O other/O she/O
squeezed/O the/O sponge/O over/O him/O./O

``/OCome/O,/O look/O,/O look/O!/O''/O she/O said/O,/O when/O her/O husband/O came/O up/O to/O her/O./O ``/OAgafea/PERSON
Mihalovna/PERSON's/O right/O./O He/O knows/O us/O!/O''/O

Mitya/PERSON had/O on/O that/O day/O given/O unmistakable/O,/O incontestable/O signs/O of/O
recognizing/O all/O his/O friends/O./O

As/O soon/O as/O Levin/PERSON approached/O the/O bath/O,/O the/O experiment/O was/O tried/O,/O and/O it/O
was/O completely/O successful/O./O The/O cook/O,/O sent/O for/O with/O this/O object/O,/O bent/O
over/O the/O baby/O./O He/O frowned/O and/O shook/O his/O head/O disapprovingly/O./O Kitty/PERSON bent/O
down/O to/O him/O,/O he/O gave/O her/O a/O beaming/O smile/O,/O propped/O his/O little/O hands/O on/O
the/O sponge/O and/O chirruped/O,/O making/O such/O a/O queer/O little/O contented/O sound/O
with/O his/O lips/O,/O that/O Kitty/PERSON and/O the/O nurse/O were/O not/O alone/O in/O their/O
admiration/O./O Levin/PERSON,/O too/O,/O was/O surprised/O and/O delighted/O./O

The/O baby/O was/O taken/O out/O of/O the/O bath/O,/O drenched/O with/O water/O,/O wrapped/O in/O
towels/O,/O dried/O,/O and/O after/O a/O piercing/O scream/O,/O handed/O to/O his/O mother/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O I/O am/O glad/O you/O are/O beginning/O to/O love/O him/O,/O''/O said/O Kitty/PERSON to/O her/O
husband/O,/O when/O she/O had/O settled/O herself/O comfortably/O in/O her/O usual/O place/O,/O
with/O the/O baby/O at/O her/O breast/O./O ``/OI/O am/O so/O glad/O!/O It/O had/O begun/O to/O distress/O me/O./O
You/O said/O you/O had/O no/O feeling/O for/O him/O./O''/O

``/ONo/O;/O did/O I/O say/O that/O?/O I/O only/O said/O I/O was/O disappointed/O./O''/O

``/OWhat/O!/O disappointed/O in/O him/O?/O''/O

``/ONot/O disappointed/O in/O him/O,/O but/O in/O my/O own/O feeling/O;/O I/O had/O expected/O more/O./O I/O
had/O expected/O a/O rush/O of/O new/O delightful/O emotion/O to/O come/O as/O a/O surprise/O./O And/O
then/O instead/O of/O that/O--/Odisgust/O,/O pity/O.../O''/O

She/O listened/O attentively/O,/O looking/O at/O him/O over/O the/O baby/O,/O while/O she/O put/O
back/O on/O her/O slender/O fingers/O the/O rings/O she/O had/O taken/O off/O while/O giving/O
Mitya/PERSON his/O bath/O./O

``/OAnd/O most/O of/O all/O,/O at/O there/O being/O far/O more/O apprehension/O and/O pity/O than/O
pleasure/O./O Today/O,/O after/O that/O fright/O during/O the/O storm/O,/O I/O understand/O how/O I/O
love/O him/O./O''/O

Kitty/PERSON's/O smile/O was/O radiant/O./O

``/OWere/O you/O very/O much/O frightened/O?/O''/O she/O said/O./O ``/OSo/O was/O I/O too/O,/O but/O I/O feel/O it/O
more/O now/O that/O it/O's/O over/O./O I/O'm/O going/O to/O look/O at/O the/O oak/O./O How/O nice/O
Katavasov/O is/O!/O And/O what/O a/O happy/O day/O we/O've/O had/O altogether/O./O And/O you/O're/O so/O
nice/O with/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON,/O when/O you/O care/O to/O be/O.../O./O Well/O,/O go/O back/O to/O
them/O./O It/O's/O always/O so/O hot/O and/O steamy/O here/O after/O the/O bath/O./O''/O



Chapter/O 19/O


Going/O out/O of/O the/O nursery/O and/O being/O again/O alone/O,/O Levin/PERSON went/O back/O at/O once/O
to/O the/O thought/O,/O in/O which/O there/O was/O something/O not/O clear/O./O

Instead/O of/O going/O into/O the/O drawing/O room/O,/O where/O he/O heard/O voices/O,/O he/O
stopped/O on/O the/O terrace/O,/O and/O leaning/O his/O elbows/O on/O the/O parapet/O,/O he/O gazed/O
up/O at/O the/O sky/O./O

It/O was/O quite/O dark/O now/O,/O and/O in/O the/O south/O,/O where/O he/O was/O looking/O,/O there/O
were/O no/O clouds/O./O The/O storm/O had/O drifted/O on/O to/O the/O opposite/O side/O of/O the/O
sky/O,/O and/O there/O were/O flashes/O of/O lightning/O and/O distant/O thunder/O from/O that/O
quarter/O./O Levin/PERSON listened/O to/O the/O monotonous/O drip/O from/O the/O lime/O trees/O in/O
the/O garden/O,/O and/O looked/O at/O the/O triangle/O of/O stars/O he/O knew/O so/O well/O,/O and/O the/O
Milky/O Way/O with/O its/O branches/O that/O ran/O through/O its/O midst/O./O At/O each/O flash/O of/O
lightning/O the/O Milky/O Way/O,/O and/O even/O the/O bright/O stars/O,/O vanished/O,/O but/O as/O
soon/O as/O the/O lightning/O died/O away/O,/O they/O reappeared/O in/O their/O places/O as/O
though/O some/O hand/O had/O flung/O them/O back/O with/O careful/O aim/O./O

``/OWell/O,/O what/O is/O it/O perplexes/O me/O?/O''/O Levin/PERSON said/O to/O himself/O,/O feeling/O
beforehand/O that/O the/O solution/O of/O his/O difficulties/O was/O ready/O in/O his/O soul/O,/O
though/O he/O did/O not/O know/O it/O yet/O./O ``/OYes/O,/O the/O one/O unmistakable/O,/O incontestable/O
manifestation/O of/O the/O Divinity/O is/O the/O law/O of/O right/O and/O wrong/O,/O which/O has/O
come/O into/O the/O world/O by/O revelation/O,/O and/O which/O I/O feel/O in/O myself/O,/O and/O in/O
the/O recognition/O of/O which/O--/OI/O do/On't/O make/O myself/O,/O but/O whether/O I/O will/O or/O
not/O--/OI/O am/O made/O one/O with/O other/O men/O in/O one/O body/O of/O believers/O,/O which/O is/O
called/O the/O church/O./O Well/O,/O but/O the/O Jews/O,/O the/O Mohammedans/O,/O the/O Confucians/O,/O
the/O Buddhists/O--/Owhat/O of/O them/O?/O''/O he/O put/O to/O himself/O the/O question/O he/O had/O
feared/O to/O face/O./O ``/OCan/O these/O hundreds/O of/O millions/O of/O men/O be/O deprived/O of/O
that/O highest/O blessing/O without/O which/O life/O has/O no/O meaning/O?/O''/O He/O pondered/O a/O
moment/O,/O but/O immediately/O corrected/O himself/O./O ``/OBut/O what/O am/O I/O questioning/O?/O''/O
he/O said/O to/O himself/O./O ``/OI/O am/O questioning/O the/O relation/O to/O Divinity/O of/O all/O
the/O different/O religions/O of/O all/O mankind/O./O I/O am/O questioning/O the/O universal/O
manifestation/O of/O God/O to/O all/O the/O world/O with/O all/O those/O misty/O blurs/O./O What/O
am/O I/O about/O?/O To/O me/O individually/O,/O to/O my/O heart/O has/O been/O revealed/O a/O
knowledge/O beyond/O all/O doubt/O,/O and/O unattainable/O by/O reason/O,/O and/O here/O I/O am/O
obstinately/O trying/O to/O express/O that/O knowledge/O in/O reason/O and/O words/O./O

``/ODo/On't/O I/O know/O that/O the/O stars/O do/On't/O move/O?/O''/O he/O asked/O himself/O,/O gazing/O at/O
the/O bright/O planet/O which/O had/O shifted/O its/O position/O up/O to/O the/O topmost/O twig/O
of/O the/O birch-tree/O./O ``/OBut/O looking/O at/O the/O movements/O of/O the/O stars/O,/O I/O ca/On't/O
picture/O to/O myself/O the/O rotation/O of/O the/O earth/O,/O and/O I/O'm/O right/O in/O saying/O
that/O the/O stars/O move/O./O

``/OAnd/O could/O the/O astronomers/O have/O understood/O and/O calculated/O anything/O,/O if/O
they/O had/O taken/O into/O account/O all/O the/O complicated/O and/O varied/O motions/O of/O
the/O earth/O?/O All/O the/O marvelous/O conclusions/O they/O have/O reached/O about/O the/O
distances/O,/O weights/O,/O movements/O,/O and/O deflections/O of/O the/O heavenly/O bodies/O
are/O only/O founded/O on/O the/O apparent/O motions/O of/O the/O heavenly/O bodies/O about/O a/O
stationary/O earth/O,/O on/O that/O very/O motion/O I/O see/O before/O me/O now/O,/O which/O has/O
been/O so/O for/O millions/O of/O men/O during/O long/O ages/O,/O and/O was/O and/O will/O be/O always/O
alike/O,/O and/O can/O always/O be/O trusted/O./O And/O just/O as/O the/O conclusions/O of/O the/O
astronomers/O would/O have/O been/O vain/O and/O uncertain/O if/O not/O founded/O on/O
observations/O of/O the/O seen/O heavens/O,/O in/O relation/O to/O a/O single/O meridian/O and/O a/O
single/O horizon/O,/O so/O would/O my/O conclusions/O be/O vain/O and/O uncertain/O if/O not/O
founded/O on/O that/O conception/O of/O right/O,/O which/O has/O been/O and/O will/O be/O always/O
alike/O for/O all/O men/O,/O which/O has/O been/O revealed/O to/O me/O as/O a/O Christian/O,/O and/O
which/O can/O always/O be/O trusted/O in/O my/O soul/O./O The/O question/O of/O other/O religions/O
and/O their/O relations/O to/O Divinity/O I/O have/O no/O right/O to/O decide/O,/O and/O no/O
possibility/O of/O deciding/O./O''/O

``/OOh/O,/O you/O have/On't/O gone/O in/O then/O?/O''/O he/O heard/O Kitty/PERSON's/O voice/O all/O at/O once/O,/O as/O
she/O came/O by/O the/O same/O way/O to/O the/O drawing-room/O./O

``/OWhat/O is/O it/O?/O you/O're/O not/O worried/O about/O anything/O?/O''/O she/O said/O,/O looking/O
intently/O at/O his/O face/O in/O the/O starlight/O./O

But/O she/O could/O not/O have/O seen/O his/O face/O if/O a/O flash/O of/O lightning/O had/O not/O
hidden/O the/O stars/O and/O revealed/O it/O./O In/O that/O flash/O she/O saw/O his/O face/O
distinctly/O,/O and/O seeing/O him/O calm/O and/O happy/O,/O she/O smiled/O at/O him/O./O

``/OShe/O understands/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O;/O ``/Oshe/O knows/O what/O I/O'm/O thinking/O about/O./O Shall/O
I/O tell/O her/O or/O not/O?/O Yes/O,/O I/O'll/O tell/O her/O./O''/O But/O at/O the/O moment/O he/O was/O about/O
to/O speak/O,/O she/O began/O speaking/O./O

``/OKostya/PERSON!/O do/O something/O for/O me/O,/O''/O she/O said/O;/O ``/Ogo/O into/O the/O corner/O room/O and/O
see/O if/O they/O've/O made/O it/O all/O right/O for/O Sergey/PERSON Ivanovitch/PERSON./O I/O ca/On't/O very/O
well/O./O See/O if/O they/O've/O put/O the/O new/O wash/O stand/O in/O it/O./O''/O

``/OVery/O well/O,/O I/O'll/O go/O directly/O,/O''/O said/O Levin/PERSON,/O standing/O up/O and/O kissing/O her/O./O

``/ONo/O,/O I/O'd/O better/O not/O speak/O of/O it/O,/O''/O he/O thought/O,/O when/O she/O had/O gone/O in/O
before/O him/O./O ``/OIt/O is/O a/O secret/O for/O me/O alone/O,/O of/O vital/O importance/O for/O me/O,/O
and/O not/O to/O be/O put/O into/O words/O./O

``/OThis/O new/O feeling/O has/O not/O changed/O me/O,/O has/O not/O made/O me/O happy/O and/O
enlightened/O all/O of/O a/O sudden/O,/O as/O I/O had/O dreamed/O,/O just/O like/O the/O feeling/O for/O
my/O child/O./O There/O was/O no/O surprise/O in/O this/O either/O./O Faith/O--/Oor/O not/O faith/O--/OI/O
do/On't/O know/O what/O it/O is/O--/Obut/O this/O feeling/O has/O come/O just/O as/O imperceptibly/O
through/O suffering/O,/O and/O has/O taken/O firm/O root/O in/O my/O soul/O./O

``/OI/O shall/O go/O on/O in/O the/O same/O way/O,/O losing/O my/O temper/O with/O Ivan/PERSON the/PERSON coachman/PERSON,/O
falling/O into/O angry/O discussions/O,/O expressing/O my/O opinions/O tactlessly/O;/O there/O
will/O be/O still/O the/O same/O wall/O between/O the/O holy/O of/O holies/O of/O my/O soul/O and/O
other/O people/O,/O even/O my/O wife/O;/O I/O shall/O still/O go/O on/O scolding/O her/O for/O my/O own/O
terror/O,/O and/O being/O remorseful/O for/O it/O;/O I/O shall/O still/O be/O as/O unable/O to/O
understand/O with/O my/O reason/O why/O I/O pray/O,/O and/O I/O shall/O still/O go/O on/O praying/O;/O
but/O my/O life/O now/O,/O my/O whole/O life/O apart/O from/O anything/O that/O can/O happen/O to/O
me/O,/O every/O minute/O of/O it/O is/O no/O more/O meaningless/O,/O as/O it/O was/O before/O,/O but/O it/O
has/O the/O positive/O meaning/O of/O goodness/O,/O which/O I/O have/O the/O power/O to/O put/O into/O
it/O./O''/O

Section/O 2/O./O Information/O about/O the/O Mission/ORGANIZATION of/ORGANIZATION Project/ORGANIZATION Gutenberg/ORGANIZATION™/ORGANIZATION


Project/ORGANIZATION Gutenberg/ORGANIZATION™/O is/O synonymous/O with/O the/O free/O distribution/O of/O
electronic/O works/O in/O formats/O readable/O by/O the/O widest/O variety/O of/O computers/O
including/O obsolete/O,/O old/O,/O middle-aged/O and/O new/O computers/O./O It/O exists/O
because/O of/O the/O efforts/O of/O hundreds/O of/O volunteers/O and/O donations/O from/O
people/O in/O all/O walks/O of/O life/O./O

Volunteers/O and/O financial/O support/O to/O provide/O volunteers/O with/O the/O
assistance/O they/O need/O,/O is/O critical/O to/O reaching/O Project/O Gutenberg/O™/O's/O goals/O
and/O ensuring/O that/O the/O Project/O Gutenberg/O™/O collection/O will/O remain/O freely/O
available/O for/O generations/O to/O come/O./O In/O 2001/O,/O the/O Project/ORGANIZATION Gutenberg/ORGANIZATION
Literary/ORGANIZATION Archive/ORGANIZATION Foundation/ORGANIZATION was/O created/O to/O provide/O a/O secure/O and/O
permanent/O future/O for/O Project/O Gutenberg/O™/O and/O future/O generations/O./O To/O learn/O
more/O about/O the/O Project/ORGANIZATION Gutenberg/ORGANIZATION Literary/ORGANIZATION Archive/ORGANIZATION Foundation/ORGANIZATION and/O how/O
your/O efforts/O and/O donations/O can/O help/O,/O see/O Sections/O 3/O and/O 4/O and/O the/O
Foundation/O web/O page/O at/O http://www.pglaf.org/O ./O

Project/ORGANIZATION Gutenberg/ORGANIZATION™/O depends/O upon/O and/O can/Onot/O survive/O without/O wide/O spread/O
public/O support/O and/O donations/O to/O carry/O out/O its/O mission/O of/O increasing/O the/O
number/O of/O public/O domain/O and/O licensed/O works/O that/O can/O be/O freely/O
distributed/O in/O machine/O readable/O form/O accessible/O by/O the/O widest/O array/O of/O
equipment/O including/O outdated/O equipment/O./O Many/O small/O donations/O -LRB-/O$/O1/O to/O
$/O5,000/O-RRB-/O are/O particularly/O important/O to/O maintaining/O tax/O exempt/O status/O with/O
the/O IRS/ORGANIZATION./O

The/O Foundation/ORGANIZATION is/O committed/O to/O complying/O with/O the/O laws/O regulating/O
charities/O and/O charitable/O donations/O in/O all/O 50/O states/O of/O the/O United/LOCATION
States/LOCATION./O Compliance/O requirements/O are/O not/O uniform/O and/O it/O takes/O a/O
considerable/O effort/O,/O much/O paperwork/O and/O many/O fees/O to/O meet/O and/O keep/O up/O
with/O these/O requirements/O./O We/O do/O not/O solicit/O donations/O in/O locations/O where/O
we/O have/O not/O received/O written/O confirmation/O of/O compliance/O./O To/O SEND/O
DONATIONS/O or/O determine/O the/O status/O of/O compliance/O for/O any/O particular/O state/O
visit/O http://www.gutenberg.org/fundraising/donate/O

While/O we/O can/Onot/O and/O do/O not/O solicit/O contributions/O from/O states/O where/O we/O
have/O not/O met/O the/O solicitation/O requirements/O,/O we/O know/O of/O no/O prohibition/O
against/O accepting/O unsolicited/O donations/O from/O donors/O in/O such/O states/O who/O
approach/O us/O with/O offers/O to/O donate/O./O

statements/O concerning/O tax/O treatment/O of/O donations/O received/O from/O outside/O
the/O United/LOCATION States/LOCATION./O U.S./LOCATION laws/O alone/O swamp/O our/O small/O staff/O./O

Section/O 5/O./O General/ORGANIZATION Information/ORGANIZATION About/ORGANIZATION Project/ORGANIZATION Gutenberg/ORGANIZATION™/O electronic/O
works/O./O


Professor/O Michael/PERSON S./PERSON Hart/PERSON is/O the/O originator/O of/O the/O Project/O Gutenberg/O™/O
concept/O of/O a/O library/O of/O electronic/O works/O that/O could/O be/O freely/O shared/O
with/O anyone/O./O For/O thirty/O years/O,/O he/O produced/O and/O distributed/O Project/O
Gutenberg/O™/O eBooks/O with/O only/O a/O loose/O network/O of/O volunteer/O support/O./O

Project/O Gutenberg/O™/O eBooks/O are/O often/O created/O from/O several/O printed/O
editions/O,/O all/O of/O which/O are/O confirmed/O as/O Public/O Domain/O in/O the/O U.S./LOCATION unless/O
a/O copyright/O notice/O is/O included/O./O Thus/O,/O we/O do/O not/O necessarily/O keep/O eBooks/O
in/O compliance/O with/O any/O particular/O paper/O edition/O./O

Each/O eBook/O is/O in/O a/O subdirectory/O of/O the/O same/O number/O as/O the/O eBook/O's/O eBook/O
number/O,/O often/O in/O several/O formats/O including/O plain/O vanilla/O ASCII/O,/O
compressed/O -LRB-/Ozipped/O-RRB-/O,/O HTML/O and/O others/O./O

Corrected/O _/Oeditions/O_/O of/O our/O eBooks/O replace/O the/O old/O file/O and/O take/O over/O
the/O old/O filename/O and/O etext/O number/O./O The/O replaced/O older/O file/O is/O renamed/O./O
_/OVersions/O_/O based/O on/O separate/O sources/O are/O treated/O as/O new/O eBooks/O receiving/O
new/O filenames/O and/O etext/O numbers/O./O

Most/O people/O start/O at/O our/O Web/O site/O which/O has/O the/O main/O PG/O search/O facility/O:/O
